Wel 36:11 Lacen Rwot owacca ni, ‘A malo, imed wotti kun itelo wi lwak, wek gudony, gucam lobo ma yam akwoŋo pire bot kwarogi ni abimiyogi.’ Gin ma Lubaŋa mito ki botwa
Wel 36:12 “Doŋ kombeddi, wun jo Icrael, gin ma Rwot Lubaŋawu mito ki botwu en ene keken ni, wulwor Rwot Lubaŋawu ki cwinywu ducu ki tipowu ducu,
Wel 36:13 dok wugwok gin ducu ma en ociko ki cik mapatpat ma acikowu kwede tin wek wubed doŋ maber.
Wel 36:14 Nen, Rwot Lubaŋawu aye rwot me polo, ki polo ma malo makato ducu, ki lobo ki jami ma tye ducu liweŋ.
Wel 36:15 Ento kadi bed kumeno, Rwot oketo cwinye i kom kwarowu, omarogi, oyero likwayogi ma gulubogi, ma gin aye wun, ki i kin rok ducu macalo wa i kare man.
Wel 36:16 Pienno, wubed jo ma gulirre wa i cwinygi, pe wubed jo ma ŋutgi tek.
Wel 36:316 
Wel 36:17 Pien Rwot Lubaŋawu aye Lubaŋa pa lubaŋa ducu ki Rwot pa rwodi. En Lubaŋa madit, ma tye ki tek, ma ryaŋo kom dano; pe dworo kor dano mo, pe giwilo ki lim.
Wel 36:18 En ŋolo kop pa litino kic atir, ki pa mon to, dok maro lubedo bene, miyogi cam ki boŋŋi.
Wel 36:19 Wun bene myero wumar lubedo, pien yam wubedo lubedo i lobo Ejipt.
Wel 36:20 Wulwor Rwot Lubaŋawu; wuti bote kun wumoko i kome matek, dok wukwoŋ kwoŋwu ki nyiŋe keken.
Wel 36:21 En aye ma myero wupake; en Lubaŋawu ma yam otimo botwu tim man ducu madito ki ma ryaŋo kom dano, ma waŋwu doŋ oneno-ni.
Wel 36:22 Kwarowu yam gucito i Ejipt kun gin jo pyerabiro keken; ci tin Rwot Lubaŋawu doŋ omiyo wunya mapol macalo lwak lakalatwe me polo. Nwoyo Cik 11 Dit pa Lubaŋa
Wel 36:1 “Mar Rwot Lubaŋani, lub cikke i kare ducu, cik mapatpat ma oketo ki oŋon me cikke ki lok ma en oŋolo ducu.
Wel 36:2 Tin doŋ wutam, (pien pe atye ka lok ki litinowu ma yam pe giŋeyo dok ma pe guneno), wutam kit ma Rwot Lubaŋawu opwonyowu kwede pi tiro kitwu, wutam pi ditte ki bade matek ki ciŋe ma oryeyo-ni,
Wel 36:3 ki lwak lanyut ki ticce ma otiyo i Ejipt i kom Parao kabaka me Ejipt ki i kom lobone ducu;
Wel 36:4 ki gin ma otimo i kom mony pa jo Ejipt ki i kom aguraguragi ducu ki gadigadigi, ki kit ma yam omiyo pii me Nam Makwar omwonyogi woko i kare ma giryemo korwu-ni, ki kit ma Rwot otyekogi woko kwede nio wa i kare man.
Wel 36:5 Dok wutam gin ma yam otimo i komwu i tim nio ka wubino wuo i kabedo man;
Wel 36:6 wupo bene gin ma en otiyo i kom Datan ki Abiram ma awobe pa Eliab wod pa Reuben; ki kit ma yam lobo oŋamo kwede doge ci omwonyogi woko ki jo ma i otgi ducu ki kemagi ducu;
Wel 36:7 pien wutyeko neno ki waŋwu tic madito ma Rwot yam otiyo ducu. Gum ma binen i lobo ma Rwot ocikke me miyogi
Wel 36:8 “Wumak cikka ducu ma acikowu kwede tin-ni, wek wubed ki tek me cito i lobo ma wubicito loka ca ka camone obed mewu, wucam,
Wel 36:9 dok wek wuri pi kare malac i lobo ma yam Rwot okwoŋo pire bot kwarowu, ni ebimiyogi wa ki likwayogi bene, en lobo ma mol cak ki moo kic.
Wel 36:317 
Wel 36:10 Pien lobo ma wubidonyo iye ka camone-ni pe rom ki lobo Ejipt ka ma yam wua iye-ni, ka ma yam wucoyo iye kodiwu ka dok wubaro waŋ piine ki tyenwu, macalo poto dek ma gicamo pote-ni.
Wel 36:11 Ento lobo ma wucito loka ca ka camone obed mewu obedo lobo godi ki nota-gu, ma mato pii kot ma cwer a ki i polo;
Wel 36:12 en aye lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu gwoko; waŋ Rwot Lubaŋawu bedo i kome nino ducu, nia i acakki mwaka o wa i agikki mwaka ducu.
Wel 36:13 “Ka wubilubo cikka ducu ma acikowu kwede tin-ni, ni wumar Rwot Lubaŋawu, wuti bote ki cwinywu ducu ki tipowu ducu,
Wel 36:14 ci en bimiyo kot cwer i lobowu i karene, i poto kot ki kot oro-gu, wek wucek kalwu ki koŋo vinowu ki moowu.
Wel 36:15 Dok en bimiyowu lum i oletwu me cam pa lim makwo, miyo wubinoŋo, cam ma yeŋowu.
Wel 36:16 Wugwokke wek pe gibwolwu, miyo wulokke: wubarre woko, wutiyo bot lwak lubaŋa mukene, wuworogi bene,
Wel 36:17 miyo kiniga mako Rwot i komwu, ci geŋo polo, juko kot pe cwer, miyo lobo pe ceko cam, ci wuto wutum woko oyotoyot ki i lobo maber ma Rwot bimiyowu-ni.
Wel 36:18 “Wubiketo lok magi ducu i cwinywu ki i tamwu; wubitweyogi i ŋut ciŋwu obed me lanyut, dok gubed me atweya i dye tur nyimwu.
Wel 36:19 Wupwony litinowu ki lok magi, wubed ka lok komgi ka wubedo i odiwu, ka wutye ka wot i yo, ka wubuto piny ki ka wua malo.
Wel 36:20 Dok wuco lok magi i yat doggola odiwu, ki i dog gaŋwu,
Wel 36:21 wek wun ki likwayowu wuri pi mwaka mapol i lobo ma yam Rwot okwoŋo pire bot kwarowu ni ebimiyogi pi kare ducu ma polo pud bibedo malo ka wi lobo.
Wel 36:22 Ka ce wubigwokke wek wulub cik man ducu ma atye ka cikowu kwede ni wulubi, kun wumaro Rwot Lubaŋawu, ma wulubo yone ducu, ma wucuŋ i kome matek,
Wel 36:23 ci Rwot biryemo rok mukene woko ducu ki i nyimwu, miyo wucamo lobo pa rok madito ki matego makatowu.
Wel 36:24 Kabedo ducu ma tyenwu binyono bibedo mewu; ci lobo ma wubiloyo bibedo nia wa i tim nio wa i Lebanon, ki nia wa i Kulu, ma en aye kulu Euprate, nio wa i nam ma yo tuŋ potoceŋ.
Wel 36:25 Pe tye dano mo ma bicuŋ i nyimwu; Rwot Lubaŋawu biketo lworo ki atiba piwu i kom lobo ducu ma tyenwu binyonone, kit ma yam ocikowu kwede-ni.
Wel 36:26 “Nen, tin aketo i nyimwu gum ki ceno dano:
Wel 36:318 
Wel 36:27 gum bibino ka ce wulubo cik pa Rwot Lubaŋawu ma atye ka cikowu kwede tin- ni,
Wel 36:28 ci ceno dano bi bino ka ce pe wulubo cik pa Rwot Lubaŋawu, ento noŋo wulokke, wubarre woko nia ki i yo ma acikowu kwede tinni ci dok wulubo kor lubaŋa mukene ma yam pe wuŋeyo.
Wel 36:29 Ka Rwot Lubaŋawu doŋ okelowu i lobo ma wubicito iye ka camone-ni, ci wubiketo gum obed i kom got Gerijim, ki ceno dano bibedo i kom got Eba!.
Wel 36:30 Gin godi-nu gitye loka Jordan, ma but piny yo tuŋ potoceŋ, tuŋ ka ma ceŋ poto iye-ni, i lobo pa jo Kanaan ma gibedo i Araba, ma okemo Gilgal, ma ka ŋet yadi kworo me More;
Wel 36:31 Wubiŋolo Jordan, wukato loka ca ka camo lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu. Ka doŋ wucamo, ma wubedo iye,
Wel 36:32 ci wugwokke wek wulub cik ki oŋon me cikke ducu ma doŋ aketo i nyimwu tin- ni. Nwoyo Cik 12 Woro Lubaŋa myero obed i kabedo acel keken
Wel 36:1 “Magi gin aye cik ki oŋon me cik ma wubimako matek kun wulubogi i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwarowu bimiyowu obed mewu, pi kare ducu ma wubibedo iye i wi lobo-ni.
Wel 36:2 Wubibalo kabedo ducu liweŋ ka ma yam rok ducu ma ubigamo lobogi giworo iye lubaŋagi, ma gitye malo i wi godi mabocone ducu ki i wi cere ki i waŋ ayweya ma i te yadi ma potgi oluk.
Wel 36:3 Wumuk keno jogigi woko ducu, wuŋid wir jogi megi woko matitino, wuwaŋ yadi ma gicomo i ŋom pi woro jok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera, wutoŋ cal lubaŋa apaya-gi woko ducu, wunek nyiŋgi woko ki i kabedo meno.
Wel 36:4 Pe wubitimo kit meno i kom Rwot Lubaŋawu,
Wel 36:5 ento wubipenyo dog Rwot Lubaŋawu i kabedo ma en biyero ki i kin kakawu ducu pi keto iye nyiŋe wek obed pacone.
Wel 36:6 Kenyo aye wubicito iye, kenyo en aye wubitero iye gitum awaŋa ki gitum mewu ducu, ki dul acel me apar, ki gityer mapatpat ma wubimiyo, gityer me cobo kwoŋ, ki gityer ma iwu opwoyo, ki litino kayo pa dyaŋiwu ki pa romi ki dyegiwu.
Wel 36:7 Wubicamone ki kunnu i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu, ci cwinywu bibedo yom, wun ki jo ma i odiwu ducu, i kom gin ducu ma wubiketo iye ciŋwu, ma onoŋo Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyowu iye gum.
Wel 36:8 “Pe wubitimo kunnu kit ma watye ka timo kany i kare-ni, ma dano acel acel tye ka tiyo gin ducu ma en tamo ni tye atir;
Wel 36:319 
Wel 36:9 pien peya wuo i kabedo me yweyowu, i lobo ma wubileyo, ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu.
Wel 36:10 Ento ka doŋ wukato loka Jordan, ma wubedo i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋa bimiyo me aleyawu, ka doŋ omiyo wuywe ki i lweny i kom lumerokwu ma gurumowu dyere- ni, ci doŋ wubibedo ma piny okwe mot.
Wel 36:11 Rwot Lubaŋawu biyero kabedo ka ma en biketo iye nyiŋe bedo iye; kenyo en aye wubikelo iye gin ducu ma acikowu-ni: gitum awaŋawu ki gitum mukene ducu, ki dul acel me apar, ki gityer mapatpat ma wubimiyo, ki gityer me cobo kwon ducu ma wukwoŋo me miyogi bot Rwot.
Wel 36:12 Ci cwinywu bibedo yom i nyim Rwot, wun ki awobewu ki anyirawu, opiiwu ki aŋecawu ducu, ki Lulevi ma tye i gaŋiwu, pien gin Lulevi pe gibipokogi dul lobo mo nyo kabedo mo i kinwu me aleyagi.
Wel 36:13 Gwokke wek pe ityer gitum awaŋani i kabedo mo ma ineno;
Wel 36:14 ento ibityerone ki i kabedo ma Rwot biyero ki i kakawu mo acel. Ibityero gitum awaŋani ducu kunnu, dok ibitiyo gin ducu ma aciki-ni ki kunnu.
Wel 36:15 “Ento wutwero neko lee me acamawu ki i gaŋiwu ducu kit ma cwinywu mito, muporo gum ma Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyowu. Dano ma kome ki keni twero camo, ki dano ma olony, macalo gicamo riŋo abur nyo til.
Wel 36:16 Remone keken aye pe wubicamo; wubionyo woko piny i ŋom, macalo pii.
Wel 36:17 Pe myero wucam dul acel me apar me kalwu, nyo me koŋo vinowu nyo me moo jeituniwu ki i gaŋiwu, kadi litino kayo pa dyaŋiwu nyo pa romi ki dyegiwu, nyo gityer me cobo kwoŋwu ma wukwoŋo, nyo gityer mewu ma cwinywu opwoyo, nyo gityer mo ma wumiyo.
Wel 36:18 Ento wubicamo ki i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu i kabedo ma en biyero, in ki wodi ki nyari, ki opiini, ki aŋecani, ki Lulevi ma i gaŋwu; dok cwinyi bibedo yom i nyim Rwot Lubaŋani pi gin ducu ma ibiketo iye ciŋi.
Wel 36:19 Gwokke pe ibwot Lulevi ata i kare ducu ma ibedo i lobowu-ni.
Wel 36:20 “Ka Rwot Lubaŋawu doŋ oyabo waŋ lobowu obedo malac, kit ma yam ocikke kwede botwu, ce iwacci, ‘Abicamo riŋo,’ pien onoŋo itye ki miti iye, ci itwero camo riŋo kit ma cwinyi mito.
Wel 36:21 Ka ce kabedo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu biyero me keto iye nyiŋe tye ka mabor ki ka ma itye-ni, ci itwero neko dyaŋŋi nyo romoni ma Rwot omiyo boti, macalo doŋ aciki; itwero camo ki i gaŋŋi kit ma cwinyi mito.
Wel 36:22 Itwero camone kit ma gicamo riŋo abur ki til; kadi wa dano ma kome ki keni twero camone kacel ki dano ma olony.
Wel 36:320 
Wel 36:23 Cuŋ matek i man keken ni, pe icam remone, pien remo en aye kwo; pienno pe ibicamo kwo kacel ki riŋone.
Wel 36:24 Pe ibicamone, ibionyo woko i ŋom macalo pii.
Wel 36:25 Pe ibicamone, wek nyimi obed leŋ, in kacel ki litinoni ma bilubi, ka ce ibedo ka tiyo gin ma nen atir i waŋ Rwot.
Wel 36:26 Ento jamini maleŋ ducu ma myero imi, ki gityer me cobo kwoŋ, ibikwanyo icito kwede i kabedo ma Rwot biyero.
Wel 36:27 Ibityero gitum awaŋani ducu, riŋone ki remone, i wi keno tyer pa Rwot Lubaŋani; remo me gitummi ducu gibionyo woko i kom keno tyer pa Rwot Lubaŋani, ento riŋone ibicamo.
Wel 36:28 Gwokke wek ilub lok magi ducu ma aciki kwede-ni, wek nyimi obed leŋ nakanaka, in ki likwayi ma bilubi, ka ce itiyo gin ma nen maber ki ma atir i waŋ Rwot Lubaŋani. Juk i kom woro jogi
Wel 36:29 “Ka Rwot Lubaŋawu doŋ otyeko lurok woko ki i nyimwu ma wucito ka camo lobogi-ni, ma doŋ wucamo lobogi, wubedo iye,
Wel 36:30 myero wugwokke wek pe wumok i owic pi lubo kitgi, i kare ma doŋ gityekogi woko ki i nyimwu. Dok pe wubed ka penyo lok i kom lubaŋagi, kun wuwacci, ‘Rok man yam giworo lubaŋagi niŋniŋ? wek an bene aworgi kit meno.’
Wel 36:31 Pe ibitimo kumeno i kom Rwot Lubaŋawu, pien gibedo ka timo gin me kwer ducu ma Rwot dagi pi woro lwak lubaŋagi; giwaŋo wa awobegi ki anyiragi ki mac macalo gitum me woro lubaŋagi.
Wel 36:32 “Gin ducu ma acikowu kwede myero wugwokke ka lubone; pe wubimedo wiye nyo wukwanyo mogo woko. Nwoyo Cik 13
Wel 36:1 “Ka ce lanebi mo onen i kinwu, nyo lalek lek mo, miyo wu lanyut nyo taŋo mo,
Wel 36:2 ka ce lanyut nyo taŋo ma otitti pire-ni otimme kakare, ce en owacci, ‘Wek doŋ walub kor lubaŋa mukene,’ ma yam pe iŋeyo, ‘wacak worogi,’
Wel 36:3 pe iwiny dog lanebi meno, lalek meno; pien noŋo Rwot Lubaŋawu tye ka temo cwinywu wek eŋe ka wumaro Rwot Lubaŋawu ki cwinywu ducu ki tipowu ducu.
Wel 36:4 Wulub kor Rwot Lubaŋawu kun wulworo en dok wugwoko cikke ducu; wuwor doge, wuti bote kun wucuŋ i kome matek.
Wel 36:5 Ento nyo lalek meno wubineko woko, pien opwonyo dano ki jemo i kom Rwot Lubaŋawu, ma yam okwanyowu woko ki i lobo Ejipt, okokowu ki i ot me opii, ci
Wel 36:321  en bimiyo wuweko yo ma yam Rwot Lubaŋawu ociko ni wulubi. Kit meno miyo wubijwero gin marac woko ki i kinwu.
Wel 36:6 “Ka ce omeru mo ma wod pa meni, nyo wodi, nyo nyari, nyo damaroni kikome, nyo laremi ma imaro ki kwoni ducu, obiti i muŋ kun wacci, ‘Wek wacit ka woro lubaŋa mogo mukene,’ ma noŋo in kikomi nyo kwarowu yam pe guŋeyo,
Wel 36:7 lubaŋa pa rok ma gurumowu dyere-ni, kadi ma gitye ka ma cok kwedwu nyo gitye ka mabor, nia i agikki lobo tuŋ cel cito kwede i agikkine tuŋ cel,
Wel 36:8 pe iye doge, pe iwiny lokke, pe kica omaki i kome, pe imuŋ lokke;
Wel 36:9 ento ibineke woko. Ciŋi aye bikwoŋo poto i kome me neke, lacen ciŋ lwak ducu bipoto i kome.
Wel 36:10 Ibicele ki got ineko woko, pien obedo ka yenyo yo me kwanyi woko ki bot Rwot Lubaŋawu ma yam okwanyowu woko ki i lobo Ejipt, ki i ot me opii.
Wel 36:11 Ci jo Icrael ducu gibiwinyo pire, ci gibilworo, miyo pe gibinwoyo timo bal marac macalo meno i kinwu.
Wel 36:12 “Gwok nyo i gaŋ mo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu me bedo iye wubiwinyo ni
Wel 36:13 jo mogo ma kitgi raco, ma gin jowu kikome, guywayo tam pa jo ma bedo i gaŋ meno kun giwacci, ‘Wubin wacitu ka woro lubaŋa mukene,’ ma yam pe wuŋeyo.
Wel 36:14 Myero wupeny lokke kun wuyenyo tere motmot; ka ce onen ni lokke otimme ada, ma gimoko ni lok me kwer macalo meno otimme i kinwu,
Wel 36:15 ci wubineko jo ma gibedo i gaŋ meno woko ki pala lucwan, wujwerogi woko ducu liweŋ, Jo ducu ma tye iye, ki lim makwo bene ma tye iye, myero gutum woko ki pala lucwan.
Wel 36:16 Wubicoko jami ma wuyako-ni ducu, wugurogi i dyekal ka maleŋ, ci wubiwaŋo gaŋ meno ki jami ducu ma tye iye woko ki mac, obed gitum ma giwaŋo ducu ki berre bot Rwot Lubaŋawu. Bibedo wi odur matwal; pe dok gibigero iye gaŋ mo.
Wel 36:17 Gin mo ma gidyero bot Rwot pe wubiweko doŋ i ciŋwu, wek Rwot okwany kinigane mager twatwal-li woko. Bitimowu kica kun nyuto cwiny me kica i komwu, ci miyo wunya mapol kit ma yam okwoŋo kwede bot kwarowu-ni,
Wel 36:18 ka ce wuworo dog Rwot Lubaŋawu, wumako cikke ducu ma acikowu kwede tin-ni dok wutiyo gin ma nen atir i waŋe. Nwoyo Cik 14 Pe gulub kit kwero cola pa lurok
Wel 36:1 “Wun aye litino pa Rwot Lubaŋawu: pe wubiŋolo komwu kenwu nyo Lyelo tur nyimwu pi kwero cola.
Wel 36:322 
Wel 36:2 Pien wun aye jo maleŋ pa Rwot Lubaŋawu; en Rwot aye yam oyerowu ki i kin rok ducu ma tye i wi lobo wek wubed jone kikome. Lee ma gicamo ki lee ma gikwero (Levi 11.1-47)
Wel 36:3 “Pe wubicamo gin mo me kwer.
Wel 36:4 Magi aye gin lee ma wutwero camogi: dyaŋ, romo, dyel,
Wel 36:5 til, abur, ruda, dyel me tim, jubi, pura, ki romo ma i godi.
Wel 36:6 Lee ducu ma oboŋ tyengi akara, ma kin tyengi opokke aryo, ma nyamo omen ki i kin lee ducu wutwero camogi.
Wel 36:7 Ento lee ma ginyamo omen nyo ma oboŋ tyengi akara ma pe wubicamo gin ene; kinaga, apwoyo ki oduka, Gin ginyamo omen ento kin tyengi pe akara; pienno gibedo keni botwu.
Wel 36:8 Ki opego bene, pien kadi oboŋ tyene akara ento pe nyamo omen, en bene bedo keni botwu. Pe wucam riŋogi, pe wugud wa komgi ma oto bene.
Wel 36:9 “Magi aye wutwero camogi ki i kin gin ducu ma bedo i pii: gin ducu ma tye ki kiŋa ŋegi ki pok komgi wutwero camogi;
Wel 36:10 ento gin ma pe ki kiŋa ŋegi ki pok komgi pe wubicamogi, pien gibedo keni botwu.
Wel 36:11 “Wutwero camo winyo ma gilony ducu,
Wel 36:12 ento magi aye pe wubicamogi: ocur, acut, koga,
Wel 36:13 agoga, okwata ki kit kwagi ducu;
Wel 36:14 agak ki kit kwagi ducu;
Wel 36:15 udu, tebu, awewet, olwilwit ki kit kwagi ducu;
Wel 36:16 tula matino ki tula madoŋo, lagweno kulu,
Wel 36:17 kikuŋ ki ocur madito ki alwinya,
Wel 36:18 acebe ki ogoro ki kit kwagi ducu; ki putput ki olik.
Wel 36:19 “Ki kwidi ducu ma bwomgi tye gibedo keni botwu; pe wubicamogi.
Wel 36:20 Gin ducu ma bwomgi tye ma gilony wutwero camogi.
Wel 36:21 “Pe wubicamo geŋ lee mo muto kene; wutwero miyo bot labedo mo ma bedo i gaŋiwu, wek en aye ocam, nyo wutwero cato bot larok mo owil; pien wun aye rok maleŋ pa Rwot Lubaŋawu. “Pe wuted riŋo latin dyel ki cak pa minne. Cik ma mako dul acel me apar
Wel 36:323 
Wel 36:22 “Wubimiyo dul acel me apar me jami ma wuceko i poto, ma a i poto mwaka ki mwaka.
Wel 36:23 Dok wubicamo dul acel me apar me kalwu ki i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu i kabedo ka ma en biyero ci keto nyiŋe bedo iye, ki dul acel me apar me koŋo vinowu ki moowu, ki litino kayo pa dyaŋiwu ki pa romi ki dyegiwu; wek wupwony lworo Rwot Lubaŋawu jwijwi.
Wel 36:24 Ka ce wutye ka mabor twatwal ma miyo pe wutwero kelo dul acel me apar i kare ma Rwot omiyowu iye gum-mi, pien kabedo ma Rwot oyero me keto iye nyiŋe odoko bor kwedwu,
Wel 36:25 ci wubicato woko wek wunoŋ cente, ci wutweyo lim meno wucito kwede i kabedo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu oyero-ni.
Wel 36:26 Wubitic ki lim meno pi kit gin ducu ma cwinywu mito, macalo me wilo twoni, nyo romo nyo koŋo vino nyo koŋo makecce, ki gin ducu ma cwinywu mito, ci wubicamo ki kunnu ki yomcwiny i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu, in ki jo ma i odi ducu.
Wel 36:27 Dok pe wubitenyo Lulevi ma gitye i gaŋwu ata, pien pe gipokogi dul lobo mo nyo gin mo me aleyagi kacel kwed wu.
Wel 36:28 “I agikki mwaka adek adek wubikelo iye dul acel me apar me gin ducu ma wuceko i mwaka-nu, wukano i gaŋiwu madito.
Wel 36:29 Ci Lulevi ma pe ki dul lobo nyo ka mo ma guleyo i kinwu, ki lubedo, ki litino kic, ki mon to ma i gaŋiwu ducu, gin ducu gibibino ka cam kwedwu giyeŋ; wek Rwot Lubaŋawu omiwu gum i kom gin ducu ma ciŋwu otiyo. Nwoyo Cik 15 Cik me weko banya matwal
Wel 36:1 “I agikki mwaka abiro abiro wubiweko banya bot dano ma twal.
Wel 36:2 Man aye kit me weko banya: lami banya biweko banya me lim matwal ki bot dano ma yam omako banyane-ni; pe bipido banyane bot lawote matwal ma ominne, pien doŋ gityeko tito ki dano pi weko banya matwal kit ma Rwot ociko- ni.
Wel 36:3 Itwero pido larok ocul banyani; ento kwany cwinyi woko i kom banya ma omeru ma Laicrael omako boti.
Wel 36:4 Ento lacan mo pe doŋ bibedo i kinwu, pien Rwot bimiyowu gum i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu wucam me aleyawu matwal,
Wel 36:5 ka ce wubiworo dog Rwot Lubaŋawu kun wugwokke wek wulub cikke ducu ma acikowu kwede tin.
Wel 36:324 
Wel 36:6 Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu gum kit ma yam ocikke kwede botwu-ni. Wubimiyo rok mapol mako banya botwu, ento wun pe wubimako banya mo; dok wubiloyo rok mapol, ento gin pe gibiloyowu.
Wel 36:7 “Ka tye dano mo ma lacan i kinwu, i kin omegiwu ma gitye i gaŋ mo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu, pe cwinyi obed tek, pe ijuk ciŋi woko i kom ominwu-nu ma lacan-ni.
Wel 36:8 Ento ikonye, imiye mako banya ma romo cobo gin ma en mito ducu, kadi bed gin aŋo.
Wel 36:9 Ber igwokke wek tam marac mo pe obed i cwinyi ma miyo iwacci, ‘Mwaka me abiro, ma en aye mwaka me weko banya matwal, doŋ cok,’ ci waŋi cido woko i kom omeru ma lacan-ni miyo pe doŋ imiye gin mo. Meno miyo en cako kok i komi i nyim Rwot, ci doko bal i komi.
Wel 36:10 Ka imiye gin mo, ber imiye ma cwinyi leŋ matwal, cwinyi pe waŋ pi gin ma imiye-ni: pien Rwot Lubaŋani bimiyi gum i kom tic ducu ma itiyo, ki i kom gin ducu ma ciŋi ogudo.
Wel 36:11 Lucan pe gibitum woko i lobowu, mumiyo aciki ni, ibiyabo ciŋi malac bot omeru ki jo ma piny oloyogi, ki bot lucan ma i lobowu. Tic ki opii (Nia 21.1-11)
Wel 36:12 “Ka ce gicato boti omeru mo, laco ma Laibru nyo dako ma Laibru, ci iwilo obed opiini nyo aŋecani, en bitiyo tic boti pi mwaka abicel. I mwaka me abirone ibiweke a woko ki boti cito gire ki kuc.
Wel 36:13 Ka igonye wek ociti, pe, ibiweko en cito ki ciŋe nono.
Wel 36:14 Ibimiye cito ki jami mapolpol, romi ki dyegi, bel ki koŋo vino, ma lubo kit ma Rwot Lubaŋani omiyi kwede gum.
Wel 36:15 Ibipo ni yam ibedo opii i lobo Ejipt, ka ma Rwot Lubaŋani okoki ki iye; en gin mumiyo tin aciki kumeno.
Wel 36:16 Ento ka en owacci, ‘An pe abia woko ki boti,’ pien en mari ki jo ma i odi ducu, pien obedo kwedwu maber,
Wel 36:17 ci ibikwanyo atero, ituco ki ite i doggola, ci doŋ bibedo opiini matwal. Ki aŋecani bene ibitimo kit meno.
Wel 36:18 Pe ibitamo ni tek twatwal me weke a woko ki boti, pien obedo ka tic boti pi mwaka abicel kulu kun ticce dodo tic pa Lapakaca kiryo pi wel manok mo. Ka itimo kit meno, Rwot Lubaŋani bimiyi gum i tic ducu ma itiyo. Kwero kom litino kayo me lim makwo
Wel 36:325 
Wel 36:19 “Litino kayo ducu ma ginywalogi i kin dyaŋini nyo romi ki dyegini ibikwero komgi i nyim Rwot Lubaŋani, Pe ibitiyo tic mo ki litino kayo pa dyaŋini, pe ibiŋolo yer kom litino, kayo pa romini.
Wel 36:20 Ibicamo riŋone kacel ki jo ma i Odi, i nyim Rwot Lubaŋani mwaka ki mwaka ki i kabedo ma Rwot biyero.
Wel 36:21 Ento ka kome ki mwonyo, ka tyene oŋol, nyo waŋe oto, nyo tye ki kit mwonyo mo marac i kome, pe ibitumo bot Rwot Lubaŋani.
Wel 36:22 Wubicamo ki i gaŋwu ki kunnu; dano ma kome ki keni twero camo kacel ki dano ma olony, macalo riŋo abur ki til.
Wel 36:23 Remone keken aye pe wubicamo; wubionyo woko piny i ŋom macalo pii. Nwoyo Cik 16 Kato (Paska) (Nia 12.1-20)
Wel 36:1 “Wugwok dwe me Abib, wukwer iye nino madit me Kato pi woro Rwot Lubaŋawu, pien i dwe me Abib yam Rwot Lubaŋawu okwanyowu iye woko ki i Ejipt dyewor.
Wel 36:2 Wubikwanyo gitum me Kato ki i kin romiwu nyo i kin dyaŋiwu, wutumo bot Rwot i kabedo ma en biyero, ka ma en biketo nyiŋe bedo iye.
Wel 36:3 Pe wubicamo mugati ma girubo iye tobi; ento wubicamo mugati ma tobi pe iye pi nino abiro pi po pi atwom ma yam wubedo kwede; pien yam wua ki i lobo Ejipt rucurucu; mumiyo ibipo pi nino ma yam wua kwede ki i lobo Ejipt pi kare me kwowu ducu.
Wel 36:4 Tobi mo pe myero onen botwu i lobowu ducu pi nino abiro; kadi wa riŋo mo ma ityero me gitum wi otyeno i nino mukwoŋone pe bidoŋ nio wa odiko.
Wel 36:5 Pe wubityero gitum me Kato ki i gaŋ mo ma i kin gaŋiwu ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu;
Wel 36:6 ento wubityero ki i kabedo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu biyero, ka ma en biketo nyiŋe bedo iye, Wubityero gitum me Kato kunnu wi otyeno ma ceŋ cito ka poto-ni, i ca wa ma yam wua kwede ki i Ejipt.
Wel 36:7 Wubitedo wucamo i kabedo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu biyero; ci odiko wubia wudok i kemawu.
Wel 36:8 Wubicamo mugati ma tobi pe iye pi nino abicel; i kom nino me abirone wubibedo iye ki cokke madit pi woro Rwot Lubaŋawu; pe wubitiyo iye tic mo. Nino madit me kwero wi mwaka (Nia 34.22; Levi 23.15-21)
Wel 36:326 
Wel 36:9 “Wubikwano cabit abiro cakke ki i kare ma wukwoŋo keto iye pala kac i ŋut kal mucuŋ i poto.
Wel 36:10 Ka dok wubibedo ki nino madit me kwero agikki cabit abiro i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu kun wumiyo gityer ma iwu opwoyo; wubimiyo muporo gum ma Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyowu.
Wel 36:11 Ibibedo ki yomcwiny i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu, in ki wodi ki nyari ki opiini ki aŋecani, ki Lulevi ma gibedo i gaŋwu, ki lubedo ki litino kic ki mon-to ma tye i kinwu, ki i kabedo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu biyero, ka ma en biketo iye nyiŋe bedo iye.
Wel 36:12 Wubipo ni yam wubedo opii i Ejipt, ci wubigwoko cik magi ducu matek. Nino madito me Bolo (Levi 23.33-43)
Wel 36:13 “Wubikwero nino madito me Bolo pi nino abiro, i kare ma doŋ wukayo cam ducu wudino woko wutero paco, kacel ki pig olok ma doŋ wukayo wubiyo woko.
Wel 36:14 Wubibedo ki yomcwiny ka wukwero nino madito-ni, in ki wodi ki nyari, opiini ki aŋecani, kacel ki Lulevi ki lubedo, litino kic ki monto ma gibedo i gaŋiwu.
Wel 36:15 Wubikwero kare man pi nino abiro i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu ki i kabedo ma en biyero; pien Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu gum i cam ducu ma wuceko ki i kom tic me ciŋwu ducu, ma miyo wubibedo ki yomcwiny keken:
Wel 36:16 “Co ducu ma i kinwu myero gubin i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu tyen adek i mwaka acel acel ki i kabedo ma en biyero: i nino madito me Mugati ma Tobi Pe Iye, i nino madit me kwero cabit abiro, ki i nino madito me Bolo. Pe gubin i nyim Rwot ki ciŋgi noŋo;
Wel 36:17 dano acel acel bimiyo mot macalo en twero muporo kit gum ma Rwot Lubaŋawu omiye. Keto luŋolkop
Wel 36:18 “Wubiketo luŋolkop ki ludito i gaŋiwu ducu ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu, ma oporo kakawu; gin myero guŋol ki lwak kop ma atir.
Wel 36:19 Pe wubal te pido pa dano ma lokke tye atir; pe wuket apokapoka mo i kin dano; pe giwilwu ki limo Ka giwilo dano ki lim miyo laryeko doko lawaŋeoto ci balo te pido pa jo ma lokgi tye atir.
Wel 36:20 Wuŋol kop atir keken, wuŋol kop atir, wek wubed makwo, wule lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu. Woro lubaŋa mukene
Wel 36:21 “I kare ma wubicano keno tyer pi Rwot Lubaŋawu, pe wubipito yat mo i ŋete pi woro jok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera.
Wel 36:327 
Wel 36:22 Dok pe wubicibo wir got mo cuŋ me awora; en aye gin ma Rwot Lubaŋawu okwero matek. Nwoyo Cik 17
Wel 36:1 “Pe wubitumo bot Rwot Lubaŋawu twon nyo romo nyo dyel mo ma kome ki mwonyo, nyo ma tye ki kit ŋolo mo, pien meno aye bedo me kwer bot Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:2 “Gwok nyo gibinoŋo dano mo i gaŋ mo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu, laco nyo dako, ma otimo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot Lubaŋawu pi taro gicikkene,
Wel 36:3 ce ocito ka woro lwak lubaŋa mukene, nyo ceŋ nyo dwe nyo gin mo ma i kin mony me polo ci oryebbe piny i nyimgi, ma en aye gin ma Rwot ociko ni pe myero gitim.
Wel 36:4 Ka doŋ gitito lokke botwu ci wuwinyo, wubipenyo lokke motmot, Ka ce lokke tye ada ma ŋene atir ni gin me kwer macalo meno otimme i Icrael,
Wel 36:5 wubikelo laco meno nyo dako meno ma otimo bal marac-ci i dog gaŋ, ci wubicelo ki got wuneko woko.
Wel 36:6 Dano meno gineko pi lok pa lucaden aryo nyo adek; dano mo pe gibineko pi lok pa lacaden acel keken.
Wel 36:7 Dok ciŋ lucaden aye bikwoŋo poto i kom dano meno me neke, ka lacen ciŋ lwak bipoto i kome. Kit meno miyo wubijwero gin marac woko ki i kinwu. Pido i nyim ajwagi ma Lulevi
Wel 36:8 “Ka ce pido mo onen i kinwu ma ŋolone oloyowu, macalo poko kin kit nek mapatpat, nyo lok kom twer ma dano mo-ni tye kwede i nyim cik, nyo lok kom ret ma dano mo oketo i kom lawote, kit pido mo ma twero nen i gaŋiwu ma ŋolone tek loyowu, ci wubia wucito i kabedo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu oyero-ni.
Wel 36:9 Wubicito bot ajwagi ma Lulevi, ki bot laŋolkop ma tye ka tic i kare meno, wubipenyogi ci gibititowu kit ŋolle.
Wel 36:10 Wubilubo kit ma gitito botwu i kabedo ma Rwot biyero; wubigwokke wek wuti kit gin ducu ma gicikowu kwede.
Wel 36:11 Wubitiyo kun wulubo kit pwony ducu ma gipwonyowu kwede, muporo kit ŋol ma gin guŋolo. Pe wubikwero lubo lok ma gin guŋolo, ento wubilubo kun pe wuŋak woko yo tuŋ acuc nyo tuŋ acam.
Wel 36:12 Dano ma lanywar ma okwero woro dog ajwaka ma ocuŋ ka tic i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu, nyo dog laŋolkop, dano meno bito; kit meno miyo wubijwero gin marac woko ki i kinwu.
Wel 36:13 Lwak ducu gibiwinyo pire, ci miyogi lworo, miyo ŋat mo pe dok bitimo tim anywar macalo meno.
Wel 36:328  Pwony ma mako kom kabaka
Wel 36:14 “I kare ma doŋ wuo i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu, ma doŋ wucamo wubedo iye, gwok nyo wubiwacci, ‘Waket kabaka me loyowa, kit ma rok ducu ma gurumowa tye kwedeni.’
Wel 36:15 Doŋ ka wuketo kabaka ma loyowu myero wunen ni obedo dano ma Rwot Lubaŋawu oyero. Myero obed ŋat mo i kin utmegiwu; pe wuket larok olowu ma pe rokwu kikome.
Wel 36:16 En pe obed ka coko lwak aguragura pire kene, pe omi lwak odok cen i Ejipt pi wilo aguragura, pien Rwot yam owaco botwu ni, ‘Pe wubidok cen kunnu matwal.’
Wel 36:17 Pe onyom mon mapol, miyo ŋako cwinye woko; pe bene ocok lonyo madwoŋ pire kene.
Wel 36:18 “Ka doŋ obedo i wi komkerre, ci bicoyo lok me cik man ducu i buk kun kwanyo lokke ki i buk ma ajwagi ma Lulevi gwoko-ni.
Wel 36:19 En bibedo kwede ci bedo ka kwanone pi kare me kwone ducu, wek opwony lworo Rwot Lubaŋane pi gwoko lok ducu ma tye i cik man ki lubo gin ducu ma Rwot ociko,
Wel 36:20 wek pe obed ka wakke i cwinye ni edit ekato omegine, dok pe oŋak owek cik woko, pe odok yo tuŋ acuc nyo yo tuŋ acam, wek omedde bedo i kerre nakanaka, en ki likwaye i Icrael. Nwoyo Cik 18 Waŋ wat pa ajwagi ki Lulevi
Wel 36:1 “Ajwagi ma Lulevi, wa kaka pa jo Levi ducu, pe gibilimo dul lobo mo nyo ginaleya mo i kin jo Icrael. Gibicamo gityer ma giwaŋo ki mac bot Rwot ki gin ducu ma myero dano gumi bot Rwot.
Wel 36:2 Pe gibileyo dul lobo mo i kin utmegigi, pien Rwot aye ginaleyagi kit ma yam ocikogi kwede.
Wel 36:3 Man aye bibedo waŋ wat pa ajwagi ma lwak gibimiyo botgi: Jo ma gityero gitum, kadi bibedo twon nyo romo, gibimiyo riŋo bat bot ajwaka, ki cwake aryo ki apika.
Wel 36:4 Kal ki koŋo vino ki moo mewu me wi mwaka, ki yer romo ma gikwoŋo nyarone, wubimiyo bot ajwaka;
Wel 36:5 pien Rwot Lubaŋawu yam oyero jo Levi ki i kin kakawu ducu wek gucuŋ ka tic i nyim Rwot, gin ki likwayogi matwal.
Wel 36:6 “Ka ce Lalevi mo oa ki i gaŋwu mo ma i lobo Icrael ducu, ka ma yam en bedo iye, ci bino i kabedo ma Rwot biyero, en twero bino kit ma cwinye mito,
Wel 36:7 ci bitic i nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋane macalo Lulevi luwote ducu ma gicuŋ ka tic kunnu i nyim Rwot.
Wel 36:329 
Wel 36:8 Gibilimo waŋ wat me acamagi ducu marom, medo ki lim ma Lalevi mo-ni olimo ki i jami pa kwarone ma ocato. Pe gilub kit tim pa lurok
Wel 36:9 “Ka doŋ wuo i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu, pe wubipwonyo lubo kit tim me kwer pa lurok ma kunnu.
Wel 36:10 Pe ginoŋ ŋat mo i kinwu ma owaŋo wode nyo nyare me gityer, nyo dano mo ma odoko latyet, nyo latyet ki ajaa, laŋi i dyel, latal,
Wel 36:11 lakot piny, lakor tipo, min jok nyo lapeny dog tipo pa lato.
Wel 36:12 Ka dano mo timo gin ma kit meno ci en bedo me kwer bot Rwot; pien pi timo gin me kwer ma kit meno miyo Rwot Lubaŋawu biryemo rok meno ducu woko ki i nyimwu.
Wel 36:13 Wun myero wubed laboŋo bal mo i komwu i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu;
Wel 36:14 rok magi ducu ma wubicamo lobogi-ni giwinyo dog lutyet ki ajaa ki lutyet mukene ducu, ento wun aye Rwot Lubaŋawu pe ye ni wutim kumeno. Lubaŋa ociko pi cwalo lanebi macalo Moses
Wel 36:15 “Rwot Lubaŋawu bicwalo lanebi mo macalo an, ma a ki i kin utmegiwu; wubiwinyo en
Wel 36:16 I nino ma yam wucokke iye i Koreb wubako dogwu bot Rwot Lubaŋawu kun wuwacci, ‘Pe dok awiny dwan Rwot Lubaŋawa, nyo anen kom mac madit-ti, wek pe ato.’
Wel 36:17 Ci Rwot owaco bota ni, ‘Gutimo ber pi waco lok meno ducu ma guwaco-ni.
Wel 36:18 Abicwalo botgi lanebi mo macalo in ma oa ki i kin utmegigi. Abiketo lokka i doge, ci en biwaco bot lwak lok ducu ma abicike kwede.
Wel 36:19 Ka ce dano mo okwero winyo lokka ma en biwacone i nyiŋa, ci an aye abipenyo dog dano-nu wek aket can i kome.
Wel 36:20 Ento ka lanebi mo ocorre ki wiye ka waco lok mo i nyiŋa ma onoŋo pe an aye acike ni oloki, nyo ma loko i nyiŋ lubaŋa mukene, lanebi meno bito.’
Wel 36:21 Ka ce iloko ki i cwinyi ni, ‘Wabiŋeyo lok ma Rwot pe owaco niŋniŋ mo no?’
Wel 36:22 ci agamo kit man ni, ‘Ka ce lanebi mo oloko i nyiŋ Rwot ce lokke-nu pe otimme nyo pe obedo me ada, meno nyuto ni lokke pe Rwot aye owaco.’ Lanebi meno ocorre ki wiye kene ki lokke gire, pienno pe myero wubed ka lwore. Nwoyo Cik 19 Gaŋi me laro lunek dano (Wel 35.9-28; Yoc 20.1-9)
Wel 36:330 
Wel 36:1 “I kare ma Rwot Lubaŋawu doŋ otyeko lurok woko ma en bimiyo lobogi botwu- ni, ma doŋ wucamo lobogi ci wubedo i gaŋigi ki i odigi ducu,
Wel 36:2 ci wubipoko gaŋi adek woko pat i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋa doŋ omiyowu me bedo mewu.
Wel 36:3 Wubiyubo yo gudo dok wubipoko dye lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu i dul adek wek okony ŋat ma oneko dano me riŋo iye wek olar iye kome.
Wel 36:4 “Man aye lok me konyo kom lanek dano. Ka dano mo pe oneko lawote akaka, ma yam mone mo pe i kingi, myero en oriŋ kunnu wek olar kome.
Wel 36:5 Labolle ka dano mo ocito i buŋa ki lawote mo ka toŋo yen, ce otiŋo latoŋ me toŋo ki yen me areta piny ci latoŋ oput woko ki i purre, ogoyo lawote oneko woko, en myero oriŋ olar kome i gaŋ mo acel ma i kin gaŋi meno.
Wel 36:6 Ka pe kumeno, miyo lacul kwor remo ka kinigane olyetti biryemo kor lanek, mako woko iyo, pien noŋo piny bor, ci cobo neko woko. Ento dano macalo meno pe romo aneka, pien pe onoŋo mone mo tye i kingi i kare macon,
Wel 36:7 en gin mumiyo acikowu pi poko gaŋi adek pat.
Wel 36:8 I kare ma Rwot Lubaŋawu oyabo waŋ lobowu omedo malac kit ma yam okwoŋo kwede bot kwarowu, ma doŋ ominiwu lobo ducu ma yam ociko ni ebimiyo bot kwarowu,
Wel 36:9 dok ka ce wubigwoko cik man ducu ma acikowu kwede tin-ni, ni wumar Rwot Lubaŋawu, wulub yone ducu i kare ducu, ci dok wubimedo gaŋi mukene adek i kom maca.
Wel 36:10 Kit meno pe gibionyo remo pa dano mo ma pe ki bal i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu me aleyawu, ci miyo alii me to pe bedo i wiwu.
Wel 36:11 “Ento ka dano mo iye dag lawote, ce obuto okure i yo, ci olwenyo i kome, ocobo omedo ki neko woko, ka laco meno oriŋo olaro i gaŋ mo i kin gaŋ adek-ki,
Wel 36:12 ci ludoŋo me tuŋ pa lanek-ki gibicwalo dano giome ki kunnu, gimiye i ciŋ lacul kwor remo, wek gineke woko.
Wel 36:13 Kica pe bimakowu i kome, ento myero wulwok alii me to pa dano ma pe ki bal woko ki i Icrael kit meno, wek ariya mo obed pe i nyimwu. Waŋ lobo ma ludoŋo gupoko
Wel 36:14 “Pe ibikobo got ma poko waŋ lobo pa lawoti ma yam ludoŋo gutyeko pokone ki i lobo ma ibileyo bot kwarowu i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu me bedo mewu. Cik ma mako lucaden
Wel 36:15 “Lacaden acel pe miyo pido loyo dano mo pi kit bal mo nyo kit tim marac mo ma onoŋo otimo; ento kop biloyo dano pi lok pa lucaden aryo nyo adek.
Wel 36:331 
Wel 36:16 Ka ce lacaden ma lagoba odoto dano mo ni otimo bal,
Wel 36:17 ci gin lupido aryo ducu gibicito i nyim Rwot, ki i nyim ajwagi pa Lubaŋa ki luŋolkop ma gitye i dog tic i kare meno.
Wel 36:18 Luŋolkop gibipenyo lokke mot. Ka ce lacaden ma lagoba odoto ominne ki adot me atoŋa
Wel 36:19 ci gibiketo can i kome ma rom ki can ma nene en mito ni giket i kom ominne-ni: kit meno miyo wubijwero tim marac woko ki i kinwu.
Wel 36:20 Jo mukene gibiwinyone, miyo gilworo, miyo ŋat mo pe dok bitimo tim marac macalo meno.
Wel 36:21 Kica pe bimakowu i kome; kwo gibiculo ki kwo, waŋ ki waŋ, lak ki lak, bad ki bad, tyen ki tyen. Nwoyo Cik 20 Cik ma mako mony
Wel 36:1 “I kare ma wubicito ka monyo lumerokwu, ka ce wuneno gin tye ki lwak aguragura ki gadigadi lweny, dok monygi bene dit makato mewu, pe wubed ki lworo i komgi, pien Rwot Lubaŋawu bibedo kwedwu, en ma yam okwanyowu woko ki i lobo Ejipt.
Wel 36:2 Ka doŋ wurwayo cok ka lweny, ci ajwaka pa Lubaŋa bikato anyim ka lok ki lwak.
Wel 36:3 Biwaco botgi ni, ‘Wun jo Icrael wuwiny, tin doŋ wurwayo cok ka lweny i kom lumerokwu: cwinywu pe oryaŋŋe, pe wulwor, komwu pe omyel, atiba pe omakwu i komgi;
Wel 36:4 pien Rwot Lubaŋawu aye bicito kwedwu ka lweny piwu i kom lumerokwu ci bimiyo wuloyogi.’
Wel 36:5 “Lacen ludito mony gibilok ki dano kun giwacci, ‘Tye laco mo kany ma ogero ode ci peya okwero me donyo iye? Wek en odok cen paco, wek pe oto i lweny ci miyo dano mu kene aye dok bikwero ode.
Wel 36:6 Tye laco mo kany ma opito poto olokke ci peya ocamo nyige? Wek en odok paco, wek pe oto i lweny ci miyo ŋat mukene aye camo nyig olokke.
Wel 36:7 Tye laco mo kany ma otoŋo keny i kom dako ci peya obedo kwede.’ Wek en odok paco, wek pe oto i lweny ci miyo laco mukene aye bedo kwede.
Wel 36:8 Ludito mony dok gibimedde ki lokgi bot lwak kun giwacci, ‘Tye laco mo kany ma lalworo ma kome obaŋŋe woko? Wek en odok woko paco, pien bimiyo jo mukene cwinygi ryaŋŋe woko: macalo en-ni.’
Wel 36:9 Ka doŋ ludito gutyeko lokgi bot lwak, ci doŋ gibiyero lutel wi mony.
Wel 36:332 
Wel 36:10 “I kare ma wurwayo cok ka lweny i kom gaŋ mo, koŋ wumi dwan me kuc i kome.
Wel 36:11 Ka jo me gaŋ meno gidok iye botwu ki dwan me kuc ce giyabo dog gaŋgi botwu, ci jo ducu ma binoŋŋe iye wubiketo tic muroni i wigi miyo gibedo macalo opiiwu.
Wel 36:12 Ento ka gukwero jolo lokwu me kuc, ce gucako lweny i komwu, ci monywu birumo gaŋ meno.
Wel 36:13 Ka Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyogi i ciŋwu, ci wubineko co ducu ki pala lucwan,
Wel 36:14 ento mon ki litino matino ducu ki limgi makwo, ki jami ma i gaŋ-gu ducu gibibedo me ayakawu, wubiyako wuterogi bedo mewu, ci wutwero tic ki jami ma wuyako ki bot lumerokwu, ma Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyo botwu.
Wel 36:15 Wubitimo gaŋi ducu ma tye ka mabor kwedwu kit meno, ma pe gaŋi pa lurok ma gibedo kanynyi.
Wel 36:16 “Ento gaŋi pa rok magi ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyo lobogi botwu obed mewu-ni pe wubiweko gin mo doŋ iye makwo;
Wel 36:17 wubijwerogi woko ducu liweŋ, gin aye jo Kit, jo Amor, jo Kanaan, jo Periji, jo Kiv ki jo Jebuc, macalo Rwot Lubaŋawu yam ocikowu kwede;
Wel 36:18 wek gin pe gubed ka pwonyowu ki timo gin me kwer ma gubedo ka timo me woro lwak lubaŋagi, ma bimiyowupoto i bal i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:19 “Ka ce wurumo gaŋ mo pi kare malac, kun wulwenyo i kome me makone, pe wubitoŋo yadi ma i ŋete woko ducu ki latoŋwu, Wutwero camo nyiggi ento pe wutoŋ yadi wuret woko piny, Yadi bene ma gitye i lum gudoko dano bo wek monywu orumgi olweny i komgi?
Wel 36:20 Ento yadi ma wuŋeyo ni pe gicamo nyiggi aye wubityekogi woko kun wutoŋogi wureto woko piny wek wuger ki cel matek me lweny i kom gaŋ ma tye ka lweny i komwu-ni, nio ka opoto i ciŋwu. Nwoyo Cik 21 Tyeko kop i kom nek ma pe ŋene
Wel 36:1 “Ka ce ginoŋo dano mo gineko i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu me bedo mewu, kun kome obuto i tim ata, ci pe giŋeyo ŋat ma oneke,
Wel 36:2 ci ludoŋowu ki luŋolkopwu gibibino kunnu, gibiporo bor piny nio wa i gaŋi ma orumo kom dano ma gineko-ni.
Wel 36:3 Ludoŋo ma i gaŋi ma cok ki kom dano ma gineko-ni gibikelo roya ma peya otiyo tic mo, ma peya oywayo kweri dyaŋ.
Wel 36:4 Gibitero roya wa i nota kulu mo ma piine mol kare ducu, i kabedo mo ka ma yam peya gipuro, ma pe gicoyo iye kodi. Gibituro ŋut roya woko ki i nota kunnu;
Wel 36:333 
Wel 36:5 ci ajwagi ma gin likwayo pa Levi gibinyiko cok, pien yam Rwot Lubaŋawu oyerogi pi tic bote ki me lamo gum i nyiŋ Rwot, gin bene myero gutyek lok ducu me pido ki me bwami.
Wel 36:6 Ludoŋo me gaŋ meno ma cok ki ka ma ginoŋo iye kom dano ma gineko-ni gibilwoko ciŋgi malo i wi kom roya ma gituro ŋute i ŋota-ni,
Wel 36:7 ci gilamo doggi kun giwacci, ‘Ciŋwa pe ooyo remo pa dano man, waŋwa bene pe oneno ka gineke.
Wel 36:8 Ai Rwot, tim kica ki jo Icrael ma gin aye joni ma yam ikokogi-ni, pe iket alii me remo pa dano man ma pe ki bal-li i dye lwakki Icrael, ento itimgi kica pi bal me to man.’
Wel 36:9 Wubilwoko alii me remo ma pe ki bal woko ki i kinwu kit meno, ka ce wutiyo gin ma nen atir i waŋ Rwot. Mon ma gimakogi i lweny
Wel 36:10 “Ka wucito ka lweny i kom lumerokwu, ce Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyogi i ciŋwu ci wuyakogi wutero obedo dano alimawu,
Wel 36:11 gwok nyo ibineno dako mo mamwonya i kin jo ma iyakoni ci cwinyi mare matek kun imito ni ikwany odok dakoni.
Wel 36:12 Ka tye kumeno ci ibitere paco wa i odi. En koŋ bilyelo wiye ki ŋolo Lwete,
Wel 36:13 ci lunyo boŋone woko ma imake kwede me bedo opii, ruko mukene; ci bibedo i odi kun koko wonne ki minnne dwe acel kulu, ka lacen itwero bedo kwede macalo cware, ci en doŋ bibedo dakoni.
Wel 36:14 Ka inen cwinyi pe mare twatwal ci ibiweko en cito gire mot ka ma en bimito; ento pe ibicato woko giwilo ki lim, pe ibitime macalo aŋeca, pien noŋo ityeko lanye woko. Lim aleya pa latin kayo
Wel 36:15 “Ka laco mo tye ki mon aryo, acel dako ma gimaro ki acel ma pe gimaro, ci gin mon aryo ducu ginywalo litino ka latin kayo obedo wod pa dako ma en pe maro- ni,
Wel 36:16 i kare ma laco-ni poko lim me aleya ki awobene, pe omi bot latin kayo pa dako ma gimaroni dullim muporo dit pa latin kayo ma ka miyo bot latin kayone kikome ma wod pa dako ma en pe maro-ni.
Wel 36:17 Ento en bituco ni latin kayo en aye pa dako ma pe gimaro-ni, ci bimiye lim ma dodo dul aryo ma i kom jamine ducu ma en tye kwede; en acakki kero kome, dit me bedo latin kayo aye mere gire. Awobi ma lajemo
Wel 36:334 
Wel 36:18 “Ka dano mo tye ki wode ma ŋute nwaŋ dok lajemo, ma pe winyo dog wonne ki minne, kadi bed gijuye matek, pe winyogi,
Wel 36:19 ci wonne ki minne gibimake gitere wa i dog gaŋ bot Ludoŋo me gaŋ meno ma en bedo iye-ni.
Wel 36:20 Ci gibiwaco bot ludoŋo ma i gaŋgi-nu ni, ‘Latin awobiwa man ŋute nwaŋ dok lajemo, pe winyo dogwa, en lacarcar dok lamero koŋo matek.’
Wel 36:21 Ci dano ducu me gaŋ meno gibicele woko ki got nio ka oto. Kit meno miyo wubijwero gin marac woko ki i kinwu; jo Icrael ducu gibiwinyo ci miyo gilworo. Cik mogo mapatpat
Wel 36:22 “Ka dano mo otimo bal ma romme noŋo can me to ci gineke woko, ma giŋabe malo i wi yat,
Wel 36:23 ci pe gibiweko kome bedo i wi yat dyewor. Wubiyiko kome i nino meno kikome, pien dano ma giŋabo i wi yat bedo dano ma Lubaŋa ceno; pe wubinyobo lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu me aleyawu. Nwoyo Cik 22
Wel 36:1 “Ka ineno dyaŋ nyo romo pa omeru ma orwenyo woko ata, ci pe ikwer miyo kony; dwokgi cen bot omeru.
Wel 36:2 Ka ce en pe bedo cok kwedi, nyo ka pe iŋeye, ibitero lee-nu paco ci bibedo boti nio ka wonne oyenyo, ka doŋ ibidwokone bote.
Wel 36:3 Kanane bene ibitimo kit meno, ki boŋone nyo kit jami mo keken pa omeru ma orwenyo ki bote ma in inoŋo; pe ikwer miyo kony.
Wel 36:4 “Ka inoŋo kana pa omeru nyo dyaŋŋe ma opoto piny i ŋet yo, pe inen anena; kony omeru ki tiŋone malo.
Wel 36:5 “Dako pe oruk ginaruka pa co, dok laco bene pe oruk ruk pa mon, pien dano ma otimo kumeno bedo me kwer bot Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:6 “Ka ce icob i kom ot winyo mo ma tye i wi yat nyo piny i nom, ma litino tye iye, nyo toŋe, ki minne bene oumo wi litinone nyo obuto i wi toŋe, pe ibimako minne kacel ki litinone.
Wel 36:7 Ibiweko minne tuk cito, ento ibicoko litino icito kwede, wek ariya mo pe onen i nyimi ento ibed kwo pi kare malac.
Wel 36:8 “Ka ce igero ot manyen, ibigoyo wi ot meri irumo woko, wek pe ikel bal me oyo remo lodi, ma noŋo ŋat mo obut opoto piny ki i wiye.
Wel 36:9 “Pe ibicoyo poto olokki ki kit kodi mapatpat aryo, miyo gin ducu ma ocek iye myero giter i ot pa Lubaŋa, gin ma icoyo iye wa ki nyig olok bene.
Wel 36:10 Pe ibitweyo dyaŋ ki kana kacel me ywayo kweri dyaŋ.
Wel 36:335 
Wel 36:11 Pe ibiruko boŋo ma gicweyo ki uci yer romo kacel ki uci camanini.
Wel 36:12 “Ibikwoyo jira aŋwen i twok boŋo ma iume kwede-ni. Cik ma mako cot
Wel 36:13 “Ka laco mo onyomo nyako ce obedo kwede, ka iye okwere woko,
Wel 36:14 ci otoŋo doge ki lok me lewic ma obalo nyiŋ nyako woko marac kun waco ni, ‘Anyomo nyako man ci ka anyiko bote cok pe anoŋo gin ma nyuto atir ni peya ocodo co,’
Wel 36:15 won latin dako-nu ki minne gibikelo boŋo ma nyuto atir ni latin dako-nu peya ocodo co bot ludoŋo ma i gaŋ meno ka ma gicokke iye i dog gaŋ.
Wel 36:16 Ci won latin dako-nu biwaco bot ludoŋo ni, ‘Amiyo nyara o ot laco man ci onyomo ka dok okwero en woko.
Wel 36:17 Ci, nen, okelo lok me lewic i kome kun waco ni pe enoŋo gin ma nyuto atir ni nyara peya ocodo co, Koŋ wunen, man en aye gin ma nyuto atir ni nyara peya ocodo co.’ Ci biyaro bone-nu i nyim ludoŋo ma i gaŋ meno.
Wel 36:18 Ludoŋo gibitero laco-nu gigoyo,
Wel 36:19 giŋolle cul me cekel me ryal miya acel. Gibimiyo limme bot won nyako, pien laco-nu obalo nyiŋ nya jo Icrael ma peya ocodo co. Ci bibedo dakone, pe biryeme woko matwal pi kare me kwone ducu.
Wel 36:20 Ento ka lokke ada ni, gin mo pe ginoŋo ma nyuto atir ni latin dako-nu peya ocodo co,
Wel 36:21 ci jo ma i gaŋ meno gibicele ki got gineko woko, pien otimo gin ma pe myero i Icrael pi codo co ki i ot pa wonne. Wubijwero tim marac woko ki i kinwu kit meno.
Wel 36:22 “Ka ginoŋo laco mo obuto ki dako pa laco mukene, gin aryo ducu gibito, laco ma obuto ki dako, ki dako bene. Kit meno miyo wubijwero gin marac woko ki i kinwu.
Wel 36:23 “Ka tye nyako mo ma peya oŋeyo laco, ma gitoŋo keny i kome ce laco mo oromo kwede i dye gaŋ ka obuto kwede,
Wel 36:24 ci wubitero gin aryo ducu woko i dog gaŋ, wucelogi ki got wunekogi woko, latin dako-nu pien pe ogoyo oduru kadi onoŋo tye i dye gaŋ, dok laco bene pi mako dako pa lawote ki tek. Kit meno miyo wubijwero tim marac woko ki i kinwu.
Wel 36:25 “Ento ka laco mo orwatte ki nyako mo ma gitoŋo keny i kome i dye tim ce omake tektek obuto kwede, ci laco ma obuto kwede-ni aye bito.
Wel 36:26 Pe wubitimo gin mo i kom nyako, pien en pe ki bal mo ma romo keto can me to i kome. Lok man rom ki pa laco mo ma olwenyo i kom lawote ci oneke woko.
Wel 36:336 
Wel 36:27 Laco-nu obino i kom nyako-nu i dye tim ci kadi bed en ogoyo oduru noŋo ŋat mo pe kunnu ma lare.
Wel 36:28 “Ka laco mo orwatte ki nyako mo ma peya gitoŋo keny i kome ce omake tektek obuto kwede, ka gimakogi,
Wel 36:29 ci laco ma obuto kwede-ni bimiyo lim me luk bot won nyako ma romo cekel pyerabic, ci nyako-nu bidoko dakone, pien omake ki tek; pe biryeme woko matwal pi kare me kwone ducu.
Wel 36:30 “Laco mo pe obed ki ci-wonne, pe oket lewic i kom wonne kumeno. Nwoyo Cik 23 Dano ma gigeŋogi bedo i cokke pa jo pa Lubaŋa
Wel 36:1 “Dano ma gidino mane nyo ma giŋolo kome me co woko pe bidonyo i cokke pa Rwot.
Wel 36:2 “Latin luk pe bidonyo i cokke pa Rwot; kadi wa likwaye me aparre acel mo pe bidonyo i cokke pa Rwot.
Wel 36:3 “Dano mo pa jo Ammon nyo pa jo Moab pe bidonyo i cokke pa Rwot; kadi wa likwayogi me aparre ŋat acel mo ki i komgi pe bidonyo i cokke pa Rwot matwal,
Wel 36:4 pien gin yam gukwero jolowu ki kwon ki pii i kare ma wua woko ki i Ejipt, dok bene yam gukelo Balaam wod pa Beor ki i Petor ma i Mecopotamia ci guwilo ki lim wek ocenwu.
Wel 36:5 Ento Rwot Lubaŋawu pe owinyo dog Balaam; oloko lok me cenowu odoko me kelo gum i komwu, pien Rwot Labaŋawu onoŋo marowu.
Wel 36:6 Pe wutim gin mo ma kelligi kuc ki berbedo matwal, pi kare me kwo mewu ducu.
Wel 36:7 “Pe ii okwer Laedom mo, pien en omeru. Pe ii okwer Laejipt mo, pien yam in labedo i lobone.
Wel 36:8 Litinogi ma giliywalo ma likwayogi me adekke gitwero donyo i cokke pa Rwot.
Wel 36:9 “Ka wucito ka lweny ki lumerokwu, ma pud wutye i gony, myero wugwokke i kom gin maraco ducu.
Wel 36:10 “Ka tye laco mo i kinwu ma odoko keni pi gin ma otimme bote dyewor, ci en bicito woko i ne gony, bedo kunnu.
Wel 36:11 Ento ka piny oyuto bilwoko kome ki pii, ci ka ceŋ opoto en twero dwogo i gony.
Wel 36:12 “Wubiyubo kabedo mo woko i ŋe gony ka ma wubicito ka konnye iye.
Wel 36:13 Wubed ki tir i kin jami lwenywu; ci ka inyoŋo ka konnye ibikwinyo bur ki tir-ru, ka ilokke iumo wi coronni woko.
Wel 36:337 
Wel 36:14 Pien Rwot Lubaŋawu woto limo dye gonywu pi larowu ki pi ryemo lumerokwu woko ki i nyimwu, mumiyo dye gonywu myero obed maleŋ wek en pe onen gin mo ma keni ci miyo en lokke wekowu woko. Cik mapatpat
Wel 36:15 “Pe ibidwoko opii mo bot rwode ka ce en oriŋo rwode olaro boti.
Wel 36:16 En bibedo i kinwu i kabedo mo ma en oyero ki i kin gaŋiwu, ka ma iye mito; pe wubiune.
Wel 36:17 “Kit me timo kwele me woro jogi obed peke i kin anyira Icrael, dok kit me timo kwele ki awobe mukene pi woro jogi obed peke ki i kin awobe Icrael.
Wel 36:18 Pe wubikelo lim ma ginoŋo pi tim kwele nyo pi tim caro macalo gwok i ot pa Rwot Lubaŋawu macalo cul me cobo kwoŋwu mo; pien gin ducu jami me kipyeda i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:19 “Pe ibimiyo omeru ma dano me Icrael mako banya boti me ciliŋ nyo me cam pi limo magoba, kadi banya me gin mo ma kelo magoba.
Wel 36:20 Itwero mako magoba i kom banya ma imiyo bot dano me rok mukene, ento pe i kom banya ma imiyo bot omeru ma Laicrael. Ka ilubo cik man ci miyo Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyi gum i kom gin ducu ma ibitiyo i lobo ma doŋ wucok donyo iye me camone-ni.
Wel 36:21 “Ka ikwoŋo kwoŋ mo bot Rwot Lubaŋani, pe ibed ka galle ki cobone; pien Rwot Lubaŋawu bipenyi pire ada, ci bibedo bal boti ka pe iculo.
Wel 36:22 Ka pe ikwoŋo kwoŋ, bal mo pe boti.
Wel 36:23 Ento tekke imine ka kwoŋo kwoŋ mo bot Rwot Lubaŋawu, myero igwokke mada ka cobo lok ma okatti ki i dogi.
Wel 36:24 “Ka iwok ki i dye poto olok pa lawoti, itwero camo nyige mabup macalo imito, ento pe ibipiko mogo i kicaani.
Wel 36:25 Dok ka iwok ki i poto pa lawoti ma kal Ocuŋ iye, itwero jako wite ki ciŋi, ento pe ibiketo pala kac i ŋut kal mucuŋ i poto pa lawoti. Nwoyo Cik 24 Cik ma mako ryemo dako
Wel 36:1 “Ka laco mo onoŋo dako ce onyomo, ka dakone pe yomo cwinye pien onoŋo roc mo i kome, laco twero coyo waraga me keto nyom, miyo i ciŋe, ryeme kwede woko ki i ode, ci dako-ni a woko ki i ode.
Wel 36:2 Ento ka laco mukene onyome,
Wel 36:3 ce cware ma lacen-ni bene pe mite ci coyo waraga me keto nyom, miyo i ciŋe ci ryeme kwede woko ki i ode, nyo ka cware me aryone oto woko,
Wel 36:338 
Wel 36:4 ci cware mukwoŋo ma yam oryeme woko pe dok owar en me bedo dakone ma onoŋo en doŋ oballe pi doko dako pa ŋat mukene, pien kit tim macalo meno bedo me kwer i nyim Rwot, wun pe wubikelo bal i kom lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyo botwu me aleyawu.
Wel 36:5 “Ka laco mo pud onyomo nyen, pe bicito woko kacel ki mony, dok pe gibicwale i dog tic mo; en bibedo paco mot pi mwaka acel, wek obed ki yomcwiny gin ki dakone ma onyomo-ni.
Wel 36:6 “Dano mo pe omi gijeŋ bote min kidi rego nyo nya kidi rego; meno rom ki kwanyo kwo pa dano me ajeŋa.
Wel 36:7 “Ka ŋatti mo ginoŋo okwalo dano mo ki i kin omege jo Icrael, ce otimo en kit ma gitimo ki opii, nyo ocate woko, ci lakwo meno gibinekone woko; kit meno miyo wubijwero tim marac woko ki i kinwu.
Wel 36:8 “I kom two dobo wubed ka gwokke matek kun wutimo gin ducu kit ma ajwaka ma Lalevi bititowu; kit ma yam acikogi kwede, wubigwokke ka tiyo kit meno.
Wel 36:9 Wupo gin ma yam Rwot Lubaŋawu otiyo i kom Miriam ki i yo ma onoŋo wua ki i Ejipt.
Wel 36:10 “Ka lawoti mo omako banya mo boti, pe ibicito i ode ka omo gin ma en jeŋo boti.
Wel 36:11 In ibicuŋ ki woko, ci dano ma omako banya boti-ni bikelo gin ma ojeŋo boti ki woko.
Wel 36:12 Ka en dano ma lacan, pe ibibuto ki gin ma en ojeŋo boti.
Wel 36:13 Ka ceŋ mito poto, in ibidwoko bote gin ma ojeŋo-ni wek en obut ki boŋone kun lammi gum; ci bimiyo Rwot Lubaŋawu bineni macalo dano ma kite atir.
Wel 36:14 “Pe ibiburo lapakacani mo ma lacan ma piny oloyo, kadi en bed omeru ma Laicrael nyo dano mo ma i kin lubedo ma gibedo i lobowu, i gaŋiwu.
Wel 36:15 Ibimiye mucarane i nino ma otiyo iye-ni ma onoŋo ceŋ peya opoto, pien en lacan, en bedo ka paro pire; wek en pe okok i komi bot Rwot ci bedo bal i komi.
Wel 36:16 “Won latin pe gibineko pi bal pa wode, nyo latin bene pe gibineko pi bal pa wonne; dano acel acel gibineko pi balle kikome.
Wel 36:17 “Pe ibal te pido pa labedo mo nyo pa latin kic wek lok oloye, pe iter boŋo pa daa-to me ajeŋa boti.
Wel 36:18 Ento ibipo ni yam ibedo opii i lobo Ejipt ci Rwot Lubaŋawu okoki woko ki i kunnu, en gin mumiyo aciko ni itim kit meno.
Wel 36:19 “Ka ikayo cam i potoni, ce wii owil ki larita bel mo iweko odoŋ i poto, pe idok cen ka omone; doŋ bibedo pi labedo ki latin kic ki daa-to; wek Rwot Lubaŋawu omii gum i kom tic ducu ma ibitiyo.
Wel 36:339 
Wel 36:20 Ka ce igoyo yat jeitunini pi coko nyige, pe idok ibek obote; doŋ bibedo pa labedo ki latin kic ki daa-to.
Wel 36:21 Ka icoko nyig olok ki i potoni, pe idok cen ka beko obote; doŋ bibedo pa labedo ki latin kic ki daa-to.
Wel 36:22 Ibipo ni yam ibedo opii i lobo Ejipt, engin mumiyo aciko ni itim kumeno. Nwoyo Cik 25
Wel 36:1 “Ka laro kop mo tye ikin dano, ka gubino ka ma gipido iye, ce luŋolkop guŋolo kop i kingi kun gituco dano ma pe ki bal, ka giŋolo kop loyo latim bal,
Wel 36:2 ka dano ma labalo romo agoya, ci laŋolkop miyo en buto piny ci gigoye ki i nyime ki wel odoo muporo kit balle.
Wel 36:3 Wel odoo twero bedo pyeraŋwen, ento pe okat kenyo, wek pe gigoye ki lwak goco makato meno miyo wucayo ominwu.
Wel 36:4 “Pe itwe dog twon ka tye ka nyono bel me dinone. Lako daa to
Wel 36:5 “Ka ce omego aryo gibedo kacel ce ŋat acel i kingi oto woko ma pe ki wode mo, pe wubiye dano ma welo ma pe ladoggolagi oter dako pa lato. Omin cware aye bilako dako-nu,
Wel 36:6 ci bedo kwede doko dakone wek onywal kwede litino ka wi ominne, wek nyiŋ ominne pe orweny woko ki i Icrael.
Wel 36:7 Ento ka laco pe mito lako ci-ominne, ci ci-ominne bicito ka ma ludoŋo me, gaŋ gucokke iye ci wacci, ‘Ywera okwero nywalo wi ominne wek nyiŋe pe orweny woko ki i kin jo Icrael; en pe oye cobo tic pa ywero i koma.’
Wel 36:8 Ka ludoŋo ma i gaŋgi gibilwoŋo laco-nu ci giloko kwede. Ka ce en pud medde ki lokke kun wacci, ‘An pe amito lake,’
Wel 36:9 ci-ominne bicito cok bote i nyim ludoŋo ci lunyo war woko ki i tyene, ka ŋulo laa i wane kun wacci, ‘Laco ma okwero nywalo litino ka wi ominne gibitimo kit meno.’
Wel 36:10 Ki nyiŋ doggolane gibilwoŋo i Icrael ni, ‘Doggola pa dano ma gilunyo war woko ki i tyene.’
Wel 36:11 “Ka ce co gitye ka lweny kekengi, ka dako pa ŋat acel onyiko cok ka laro cware ki i ciŋ dano ma tye ka goye-ni, ce ocwalo ciŋe omako kom me co pa laco-ni,
Wel 36:12 ci ibitoŋo ciŋ dako iŋolo woko, ma kica pe maki i kome.
Wel 36:13 “Pe ibed ki kidi aryo me pimo jami i kicaani, mapekke ki mayotte.
Wel 36:14 Pe ibed ki lapor jami aryo i odi, maditte ki matidine.
Wel 36:340 
Wel 36:15 Ibibedo ki kidi lapim pek pa jami maberre ma romo kakare, ki agwata lapor jami maberre ma romo kakare, wek iri pi kare malac i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu.
Wel 36:16 Jo ducu ma gitimo gin macalo meno, ki jo ducu ma pe gitiyo gin ma tye atir, gibedo me kwer bot Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:17 “Wupo gin ma yam jo Amalek gutimo i komwu i yo i kare ma wua woko ki i Ejipt,
Wel 36:18 kit ma yam gulwenyo kwede i komwu i yo ca, i kare ma onoŋo wuder, ma komwu ducu oloc woko, kit ma gin guŋolo kwede wi jo ma gudoŋ i ŋewu ma gi goro; gin yam pe gulworo Lubaŋa wacel.
Wel 36:19 Ka ce Rwot Lubaŋawu doŋ omiyo wuywe ki lweny ki merokwu ducu ma orumowu dyere-ni, ki i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyo wucamo me aleyawu, ci wubijwayo jo Amalek woko ki i tam pa dano ducu ma gitye piny i te polo. Wukan lok man i cwinywu. Nwoyo Cik 26 Kwero wi mwaka ki tyero dul acel me apar
Wel 36:1 “I kare ma doŋ wuo i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu me aleyawu, ma doŋ wucamo lobo wubedo iye,
Wel 36:2 ibikwanyo dul mo i kom gin mukwoŋo cek i kom kit cam ducu ma ikayo ki i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu omii, ibiketo i aduku icito kwede i kabedo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu biyero ka ma biketo nyiŋe bedo iye.
Wel 36:3 Ibicito bot ajwaka pa Lubaŋa ma tye ka tic i kare meno, iwacce ni, ‘Tin atuco bot Rwot Lubaŋana ni atyeko o i lobo ma yam Rwot okwoŋo pire bot kwarowa ni ebimiyo botwa.’
Wel 36:4 Ci ajwaka bigamo aduku ki i ciŋ, ci keto piny i nyim keno tyer pa Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:5 “Ci ibidok iye ki i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu ni, ‘Kwarowa yam dano me lobo Aram, ma lamal gaŋ ata. Yam olak ocito wa i Ejipt obedo kunnu ma welgi nok mo; ki kunnu en odoko rok madit ki matek munya mapol.
Wel 36:6 Jo Ejipt gubedo ka timowa magwa marac twatwal, ma giunowa, giketowa i tic matego me opii.
Wel 36:7 Ka yam wakok bot Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwarowa, ci Rwot owinyo dogwa, oneno kit ma giunowa kwede, ki aroma ticwa, ki atwomwa.
Wel 36:8 Rwot okwanyowa woko ki i Ejipt pi twero me bade, ki ciŋe ma oryeyo, ki tim ma okelo lworo madwoŋ, ki lwak lanyut ki taŋo.
Wel 36:9 Okelowa wa i kabedo man, omiyowa lobo-ni, en lobo ma mol cak ki moo kic.
Wel 36:341 
Wel 36:10 Ci doŋ inen ka tin akelo wi mwaka mua i poto ma imiyo bota; ai Rwot.’ Ka doŋ iketo aduku piny i nyim Rwot Lubaŋani, ci iryebbe piny iwore.
Wel 36:11 Cwinyi bibedo yom pi jami mabeco ducu ma Rwot Lubaŋani omiyo boti ki bot jo me odi; ci ibimiyo Lulevi ki lubedo ma gibedo i kinwu bene cwinygi obed yom kacel kwedwu.
Wel 36:12 “I mwaka me adekke, ma en aye mwakame miyo dul acel i kom apar, ibimiyo dul acel me apar me kit cam ducu ma ocek i potoni bot Lulevi, lubedo, litino kic ki mon-to wek gin bene gubed ki cam ma romogi i gaŋiwu ducu. Ka doŋ ityeko miyone botgi,
Wel 36:13 ci ibiwaco bot Rwot Lubaŋani ni meno, ‘Doŋ atyeko kobo jami maleŋ woko ki i oda, amiyo woko bot Lulevi, lubedo, litino kic ki mon-to kun alubo cikki ducu ma imiyo bota. Pe aturo cikki mo, pe bene wiya owil i komgi.
Wel 36:14 Pe acamo gin mo i kom dul acel me apar i kare ma atye ka kwero cola, pe akobo gin mo ki i oda ma onoŋo koma ki keni, pe atyero mogo bot tipo pa lato mo; doŋ aworo dogi, in Rwot Lubaŋana, atyeko tiyo gin ducu kit ma yam icika kwede.
Wel 36:15 Nen piny ki i kabedoni maleŋ-ŋi, nia ki i polo, ci imi gum i kom joni Icrael ki i kom lobo ma imiyowa kit ma yam ikwoŋo kwede bot kwarowa, en lobo ma mol cak ki moo kic.’ Jo Icrael gin rok maleŋ pa Rwot (Nia 34.11-16)
Wel 36:16 “Tin Rwot Lubaŋawu ociko ni wulub cik magi ki gin ma en oŋolo ducu, mumiyo wubigwokke mada ka lubogi ki cwinywu ducu ki tipowu ducu.
Wel 36:17 Tin doŋ wutuco lok i kom Rwot ni en aye Lubaŋawu, dok ni wubilubo yone ducu kun wugwoko cikke ki gin ma en ociko ducu, dok wubiworo doge.
Wel 36:18 Dok tin Rwot otuco lok i komwu ni wun aye wu jone kikome,
Wel 36:19 dok en bipilo wiwu makato rok ducu ma yam en oketo; gibipake piwu, nyiŋe biywek piwu, en bilimo deyo i komwu, dok otuco ni wun wubibedo rok maleŋ pi Rwot Lubaŋawu, kit ma yam owaco ni.” Nwoyo Cik 27 Cik myero gico i wi got Ebal
Wel 36:1 Moses ki ludoŋo pa jo Icrael guciko lwak kun giwacci, “Wu mak cik ducu ma wacikowu kwede tin.
Wel 36:2 Dok i kom nino ma wuŋolo iye kulu Jordan pi donyo i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu, wubicibo iye kidi madito ci wupuyo komgi ki opuyu.
Wel 36:342 
Wel 36:3 Wubicoyo lok me cik magi ducu i kare ma wukato wudonyo i lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu, en aye lobo ma mol cak ki moo kic, kit ma Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarowu, yam ocikowu kwede-ni.
Wel 36:4 Ka wuŋolo loka Jordan, wubicibo kidi-nu gicuŋ i kom got Ebal, kit ma tin acikowu kwede, dok wubipuyo komgi woko ki opuyu.
Wel 36:5 Wubicano keno tyer kunnu pi Rwot Lubaŋawu, keno tyer ma gicano ki got; pe gitiŋ nyonyo mo me payo komgi.
Wel 36:6 Wubitumo gitum awaŋa i wi keno-nu bot Rwot Lubaŋawu,
Wel 36:7 ka dok wubityero iye gityer lakwecwiny ma wubicamone ki kunnu, ci cwinywu bibedo yom i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:8 Wubicoyo lok me cik man ducu i kom kidi ma wubicibogi kunnu maber ma kwanone yot.”
Wel 36:9 Moses ki ajwagi ma Lulevi guwaco ki jo Icrael ducu ni, “Wuliŋ mot, wuwiny, wun jo Icrael. I nino ma tin aye wudoko iye lwak pa Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:10 Mumiyo doŋ wuwor dog Rwot Lubaŋawu kun wumako cik mere ki gin ma en ociko ducu ma acikowu kwede tin-ni.” Ceno dano i kom got Ebal
Wel 36:11 Moses ociko lwak i nino meno kikome kun wacci,
Wel 36:12 “Ka doŋ wutyeko kato loka Jordan, jo magi gibicuŋ i wi got Gerijim ka gilamo gum i kom lwak: jo Cimeon, Levi, Juda, Icakar, Yucepu ki Benjamin;
Wel 36:13 ki jo magi gibicuŋ i wi got Ebal i kare ma giceno dano: jo Reuben, Gad, Acer, Jabulon, Dan ki Naputali.
Wel 36:14 Ci Lulevi gibiwaco lok man bot jo Icrael ducu ki dwan maloŋo ni.
Wel 36:15 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma otiyo cal Jok apaya mo nyo cal jok nyonyo ma giliyo aliya ma gin me kwer bot Rwot, ma ladiro otiyo ki ciŋe ci ocibo me awora i muŋ.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:16 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma pe woro wonne ki minne.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:17 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma okobo got ma poko waŋ lobo pa lawote woko.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:18 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma opaŋo wi lawaŋeoto oweko yo.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:19 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma obalo te pido pa labedo, nyo pa latin kic, nyo pa daa- to oweko lok oloye.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:343 
Wel 36:20 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma obuto ki ci-wonne, pien oketo lewic i kom wonne.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:21 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma obuto ki lee mo.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:22 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma obuto ki laminne, kadi nya pa wonne, kadi nya pa minne.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:23 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma obuto ki marone.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:24 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma oneko lawote i muŋ ali.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:25 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma giwilo ki lim me Labal te pido pa dano ma pe obalo, miyo gineke nono.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’
Wel 36:26 “ ‘Cen opot i kom dano ma pe moko lok ducu me cik man kun lubogi.’ Lwak ducu gibigamo ni, ‘Amen.’ Nwoyo Cik 28 Gum ma bino pi gwoko cik (Levi 26.3-13; Nwo 7.12-24)
Wel 36:1 “Ka wubiworo dog Rwot Lubaŋawu, ma wugwokke ka lubo cikke ducu ma acikowu kwede tin-ni, ci Rwot Lubaŋawu bipilo wiwu makato rok ducu ma wi lobo-ni,
Wel 36:2 ci miyo gum man ducu bipoto i komwu ci moko i komwu ka ce wuworo dog Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:3 Wubibedo ki gum i gaŋiwu dok wubibedo ki gum ipottiwu.
Wel 36:4 Gum bibedo i kom litino ma wubinywalogi, ki i kom cam ma bicek i pottiwu; i kom litino dyaŋiwu ki i kom litino romiwu ki dyegiwu.
Wel 36:5 Gum bibedo i kom adukuwu ma wuyeyo ki cam i kare me kac, gum bibedo i kom otakowu me myeno kwon.
Wel 36:6 Gum bipoto i komwu ka wudonyo i ot, ci gum bipoto i komwu ka wukato woko.
Wel 36:7 “Rwot biloyo lumerokwu ducu ma bibino ka lweny i komwu, miyo wubinekogi woko ki i nyimwu. Gibimol ka lweny i komwu ki i yo acel, giriŋo giket woko i yo abiro.
Wel 36:8 “Rwot Lubaŋawu biciko gum poto i kom derowu ducu, ki i kom gin ducu ma wubitiyo; bimiyowu gum i lobo ma en bimiyo botwu-ni.
Wel 36:9 “Rwot bimokowu me bedo lwakke maleŋ kit ma yam okwoŋo kwede botwu, ka ce wumako cik pa Rwot Lubaŋawu, kun wulubo yone ducu.
Wel 36:10 “Jo ma i wi lobo ducu gibineno ka gilwoŋowu ki nyiŋ Rwot, ci gibilworowu.
Wel 36:344 
Wel 36:11 Rwot bimiyo wulony ki lwak jami mapol; bimiyo wunywalo litino mapol bimiyo limwu makwo nya madwoŋ ma pottiwu bene ceko cam mabup.
Wel 36:12 Rwot biyabo polo piwu, ma en ot kano limme maber, ci miyo kot cwer i lobowu i karene, ci miyo gum i kom tic ducu ma wutiyo. Jo me rok mapol gibimako banya botwu ento wun pe wubimako banya mo.
Wel 36:13 Rwot bimiyo wubedo jo ma telo nyim, pe jo ma coko ter; wubibedo ka cito anyim ma pe doŋ wudok cen, tekke wubedo ka lubo cik pa Rwot Lubaŋawu ma acikowu kwede tin-ni kun wugwokke ka cobogi maber,
Wel 36:14 ma pe wulokke wukwero lubo lok ducu ma acikowu kwede tin ci wuŋak wudok yo tuŋ acuc nyo tuŋ acam pi lubo kor lubaŋa mukene ki pi worogi. Can ma bino pi balo cik (Levi 26.14-46)
Wel 36:15 “Ka ce pe wuworo dog Rwot Lubaŋawu nyo pe wugwokke ka lubo lok ma en ociko ducu ki cikke ma acikowu kwede tin-ni, ci lwak cen magi ducu bipoto i komwu ci moko i komwu.
Wel 36:16 Cen bibedo i komwu i gaŋiwu dok cen bibedo i komwu i pottiwu.
Wel 36:17 Cen bibedo i kom adukuwu ma wuyeyo ki cam i kare me kac, cen bibedo i kom otakowu me myeno kwon.
Wel 36:18 Cen bibedo i kom litino ma wubinywalogi, ki i kom cam ma bicek i pottiwu, i kom litino dyaŋiwu ki i kom litino romiwu ki dyegiwu.
Wel 36:19 Cen bibedo i komwu ka wudonyo i ot, ci cen bibedo i komwu ka wukato woko.
Wel 36:20 “Ka ce wubwoto Rwot, ma wubedo ka tiyo gin marac, ci Rwot bicwalo cen i komwu bibaŋowu woko ci bijukowu i gin ducu ma wutemo tiyone nio ka wuto wutum woko oyotoyot.
Wel 36:21 Rwot bimiyo two gemo marac poto i komwu nio ka bityekowu woko ki i lobo ma wubicito iye ka camone.
Wel 36:22 Rwot bipwodowu ki two aona opiyo, ki aburu ki two akwota, ki lyeto madwoŋ; bicwalo oro malyet mada, ci miyowu kal mubwarre ki mupur woko.
Wel 36:23 Polo ma tye ka wiwu bibedo macalo mola, ki piny ma ka tyenwu bibedo tek macalo nyonyo.
Wel 36:24 Rwot bimiyo apulu ki apwa aye cwer ma ka kot i lobowu kun a ki malo duny i komwu nio ka otyekowu woko.
Wel 36:25 “Rwot bimiyo lumerokwu giloyowu woko. Wubilubo yo acel ka wucito ka lweny i komgi, ka wuriŋo wuket i yo abiro ki i nyimgi. Lworo bimako ker ducu ma wi lobo pi gin ma bitimme i komwu.
Wel 36:345 
Wel 36:26 Komwu muto-ni bibedo cam pa winyo ducu me polo, ki pa lee timgu; pe bibedo dano mo ma ryemogi.
Wel 36:27 Rwot bipwodowu ki odeke kit ma yam otimo i kom jo Ejipt, ki bur adola ki nyac ki gwenyo, ma caŋone biloyowu:
Wel 36:28 Rwot bipwodowu ki two apoya ki to-waŋ-gu, dok bibaŋo tamwu woko.
Wel 36:29 Wubipanne apaŋa i dyeceŋ macalo lawaŋoto paŋŋe i colpiny, pe wubilimo gum mo i wot mewu ducu; gibibedo ka unowu ki yako jamiwu jwijwi, dano ma bikonyowu bibedo pe.
Wel 36:30 “Ibitoŋo keny i kom nyako, ci ŋat mukene aye bibuto kwede; ibigero ot ci pe ibibedo iye; ibipito poto olok ci pe ibicamo nyige.
Wel 36:31 Gibineko twonni i nyimi ma ineno ci pe ibibilo riŋone; gibimayo kanani ki i nyimi gitero woko ki tek, pe gibidwokone boti, gibimiyo romini bot lumerokki, ŋat mo ma konyi bibedo pe.
Wel 36:32 Awobeni ki anyirani gibimiyogi bot jo me rok mukene ma kun waŋi nenogi ci piny loyi i komgi matal, pe ibibedo ki twero me geŋogi wot.
Wel 36:33 Rok mo ma yam pe iŋeyo aye bicamo gin ma ocek i potoni pi tic matek ducu ma iyelle iye. Gibiuni auna keken, gibidiyi piny jwijwi,
Wel 36:34 miyo ibibaŋŋe woko pi gin ma ineno ki waŋi.
Wel 36:35 Rwot bipwodi ki odeke mudet i coŋi ki i tyeni ma caŋone biloyo dano; odeke bimwono komi woko liweŋ cakke i tyeni o kwede wa i wii.
Wel 36:36 “Rwot biterowu kacel ki kabakawu ma wuketo me loyowu i rok mukene ma yam peya wuŋeyo kadi wa kwarowu bene pe guŋeyo; wubiworo lwak lubaŋa mukene kunnu ma gipayo calgi ki bao nyo ki got.
Wel 36:37 Wubidoko gin ma kelo lworo i kin rok ducu ka ma Rwot biterowu iye, ci gibitiyo ki nyiŋwu macalo carolok ki lok aboka:
Wel 36:38 “Ibitiŋo lwak kodi madwoŋ itero i poto, ento ibicoko iye cam matidi mo, pien bonyo bicamo, tyeko woko.
Wel 36:39 Ibipito potti olok, iyubo maber, ento pe ibimato kono vinone, dok pe ibicoko nyige, pien kwidi bicamogi woko ducu.
Wel 36:40 Ibibedo ki yadi jeituni i dye loboni ducu, ento pe ibiwirre ki moone, pien nyige bio woko piny.
Wel 36:41 Ibinywalo awobe ki anyira, ento pe gibibedo joni, pien gibiterogi woko i opii.
Wel 36:42 Yadini ducu ki gin ma ocek i potoni bonyo aye bicamone woko.
Wel 36:43 Lubedo ma gibedo i kinwu gibidoko dito giloyowu, dok wigi bibedo doŋo i komwu, ento wun wubimedde ki doko jo matitino mogo.
Wel 36:346 
Wel 36:44 Gin aye dok bimiyo wumako banya botgi, wun pe wubimiyo gimako banya ki botwu. Gin aye gibibedo jo ma telo nyim, wun wubicoko ter.
Wel 36:45 “Lwak cen man ducu bipoto i komwu kun lubo korwu, makowu, nio ka bityekowu woko, pien onoŋo wukwero winyo dog Rwot Lubaŋawu, pe wulubo cikke ki gin ma yam ocikowu kwede ducu.
Wel 36:46 Can magi gibibedo lanyut ki taŋo botwu ki bot likwayowu matwal,
Wel 36:47 pien yam pe wutiyo bot Rwot Lubaŋawu ki yomcwiny pi lwak jami ma en omiyowu-ni.
Wel 36:48 Pienno wubitic ki lumerokwu ma Rwot bicwalo ka lweny i komwu. Kec ki orwo pii binekowu, wubibedo munero ma can jami ducu omakowu, ci Rwot biriyo okol nyonyo i ŋutwu nio ka otyekowu woko ducu.
Wel 36:49 Rwot bikelo rok mo i komwu mua ki ka mabor, nia wa ki i agikki lobo, ma gidwir macalo ocur ma tuk, en aye rok mo ma pe wuŋeyo lebgi.
Wel 36:50 Gin rok ma waŋgi tek ma pe biparo pi woro jo, muti, kadi wa timo kica i kom jo matino.
Wel 36:51 Gibicamo litino dyaŋiwu woko, ki cam mucek i potowu nio ka gityekowu woko; pe kalwu mo doŋ, nyo koŋo vino nyo moo, gibiweko kadi wa litino dyaŋiwu ki litino romi ki dyegiwu, miyo wubito woko liweŋ.
Wel 36:52 Gibirumowu woko i gaŋiwu ducu nio ka cel maboco ki gogo ma wugenoni gupoto woko piny ki i lobowu ducu; monygi birumowu woko i gaŋiwu ducu ma oromo dye lobowu ducu ma yam Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyowu.
Wel 36:53 “Wubicamo riŋo kom litinowu, en aye riŋo kom awobewu ki anyirawu ma Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyo botwu, i kare ma girumo gaŋwu woko, i kare me can madwoŋ ma lumerokwu gibiketo i komwu.
Wel 36:54 Laco ma yam kome okwe mot ki kuc waŋe bicido woko i kom camme miyo twono ominne woko, ki dakone ma en maro, ki litinone mogo ma pud gudoŋ;
Wel 36:55 pe biye ni ŋat mo i kingi onywak camo kwede riŋo kom litinone ma en tye ka camone, pien pe tye gin mo mudoŋ bote, i kare me rumo gaŋ ki i kare me can madwoŋ ma lumerokwu gibiketo i komwu i gaŋiwu ducu.
Wel 36:56 Dako bene ma yam kome okwe mot ki kuc, ma yam lworo keto tyene piny i ŋom pien yam gigwoke mada, waŋe bicido woko i kom cware ma en maro, ki i kom wode ki nyare,
Wel 36:57 bitwonogi byero ma okatti ki i kin tyene ki riŋo kom litino ma en onywalo, pien bicamogi ki i muŋ pi can jami ducu, i kare me rumo gaŋ ki i kare me can madwoŋ ma lumerokwu gibiketo i komwu i gaŋ mewu ducu.
Wel 36:347 
Wel 36:58 “Ka pe wugwokke ka lubo lok ducu ma i cik man ma gicoyo i buk man wek wubed ka lworo nyiŋ me deyo ki mapek pa Rwot, Lubaŋawu,
Wel 36:59 ci Rwot dok bikelo atwom madit i komwu ki i kom likwayowu, en atwom malik ma bedo nakanaka, ki two magwa ma ri nakanaka.
Wel 36:60 En bikelo i komwu kit two ducu pa jo Ejipt ma yam wubedo ka lworogi; twone biniaŋ i komwu matek.
Wel 36:61 Dok kit two ducu ki kit atwom ducu ma pe gicoyogi i buk man me cik Rwot aye bikelogi i komwu, nio ka otyekowu woko liweŋ.
Wel 36:62 Kadi onoŋo yam wunya mapol macalo lwak lakalatwe me polo, gibiweko welwu doŋ manok mo, pien pe wubedo ka woro dog Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:63 Kit ma yam cwiny Rwot obedo yom i komwu omiyo otimowu maber-ri dok omiyo wunya mapol, kit meno bene cwiny Rwot dok bibedo yom pi kelowu topiny ma bityekowu woko liweŋ; ci bikwanyowu woko ki i lobo ma doŋ wucok donyo iye ka camone.
Wel 36:64 “Rwot bikeyowu woko ata i kin rok ducu, cakke i agikki lobo tuŋ cel o kwede i agikkine mukene tuŋ cel. Wubiworo lwak lubaŋa mukene kunnu ma gipayo calgi ki bao nyo ki got, ma yam pe wuŋeyo kadi wa kwarowu bene pe guŋeyo.
Wel 36:65 I kin lurok magi pe wubinoŋo iye kuc mo, dok pe wubinoŋo iye ka yweyo tyenwu, ento Rwot bimiyo cwinywu myel kunnu, waŋwu bimyeno, tipo komwu bito woko lirut.
Wel 36:66 Cwinywu biŋabbe aŋaba pi kwowu me anyim; wubibedo ki lworo madwoŋ dyewor ki dyeceŋ, ma pe wutye ki gen mo i kwowu.
Wel 36:67 Odiko wubiwacci, ‘Kono nene obedo otyeno!’ dok otyeno wubiwacci, ‘Kono nene obedo odiko!’ pi lworo madwoŋ i cwinywu pi gin ma tye anyim ma waŋwu bineno.
Wel 36:68 Dok Rwot bidwokowu cen i Ejipt kun giterowu i mel, wubidok i wot ma yam aciko ni pe dok wubinwoyone-ni. Wubimine kekenwu kunnu bot lumerokwu kun wucatte ni giwilwu wubed opiigi ki aŋecagi, ento dano mo pe ma biwilowu.” Nwoyo Cik 29 Rwot ocikke ki jo Icrael i lobo Moab
Wel 36:1 Man aye lok me gicikke ma yam Rwot ociko ki Moses ma oketo i kingi ki jo Icrael i lobo Moab, ma omedo i kom gicikke ma yam oketo i kingi i wi got Koreb.
Wel 36:2 Moses olwoŋo jo Icrael ducu ci owaco botgi ni, “Doŋ wutyeko neno gin ducu ma yam Rwot otiyo i lobo Ejipt ma wuneno ki waŋwu, gin ma en otimo i kom Parao ki i kom luticce ki i kom lobone ducu.
Wel 36:348 
Wel 36:3 Wun yam wuneno ki waŋwu kit ma Rwot otemo kwede cwinye ki lwak, lanyut ki taŋo madito.
Wel 36:4 Ento Rwot peya omiyowu cwiny me niaŋ, nyo waŋ me neno, nyo it me winyo nio wa onyoo.
Wel 36:5 Doŋ atelo wiwu i dye tim mwaka pyeraŋwen ma boŋowu pe guti ki i komwu, ki war tyenwu bene pe guti woko ki i tyenwu.
Wel 36:6 I kare meno onoŋo pe wutye ki kwon me acama, pe wumato koŋo vino nyo kono makecce; meno aye oweko wuŋeyo ni an aye a Rwot Lubaŋawu.
Wel 36:7 Ka doŋ wuo i kabedo-ni, ci Cikon kabaka me Kecbon ki Og kabaka me Bacan gubino ka romo kwedwa i lweny, ento waloyogi woko,
Wel 36:8 ci wamayo lobogi woko wamiyo obedo ginaleya pa jo pa Reuben, ki pa jo pa Gad, ki pa nucu kaka pa Manace.
Wel 36:9 Pi meno myero wugwokke ka lubo lok ducu me gicikke man, wek gumkom omakwu i kom gin ducu ma wutiyo.
Wel 36:10 “Tin wun ducu wucuŋ i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu: ludito wi kakawu, ludoŋowu, ludito ticwu ki co ducu pa jo Icrael,
Wel 36:11 litinowu ki mon mewu ki lubedo ma gibedo i gonywu ma gin aye lubar yenwu ki lutwom piiwu.
Wel 36:12 Wucuŋ kany wek wun ducu wukwoŋŋe pi donyo i gicikke man ma Rwot Lubaŋawu oketo i kinwu ki en tin,
Wel 36:13 wek en omi wubed jone tin, wek en obed Lubaŋawu, kit ma yam ocikke kwede botwu-ni, ki kit ma yam olwoŋo kwede bot kwarowu Abraim, Icaka ki Yakobo.
Wel 36:14 Pe aketo kwoŋ man ki gicikke man kwedwu keken,
Wel 36:15 ento okwako wa dano ma pe gitye kany kwedwa tin ma rom ki wan ducu ma wacuŋ kany i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawa tin.
Wel 36:16 “Wun wuŋeyo kit ma yam wabedo kwede i lobo Ejipt, kit ma wawoto wabino kwede kun wawok ki i dye rok mapol;
Wel 36:17 dok wuneno gin me kwer ma gitye kwede ducu, cal lubaŋagi me bao ki me got, me ryal ki me jabu;
Wel 36:18 Wugwokke wek laco mo nyo dako mo, nyo doggolawu mo, nyo kakawu mo pe onen i kinwu ma cwinye olokke oa woko i kom Rwot Lubaŋawa, ci okobo ocito ka woro lubaŋa mogo pa rok meno ducu, wek i kinwu pe onen iye dano mo ma rom ki lwit yat ma nyako kwir ki nyige makec.
Wel 36:19 Gwok nyo dano macalo meno ka owinyo kwoŋ man ki gicikke man ci lamo gum i kome kene i cwinye kun wacci, ‘An gira abibedo ki kuc, kadi bed cwinya nwaŋ
Wel 36:349  ma alubo yona kena.’ Kit meno miyo gijwero gin maber ki gin maracce woko kacel.
Wel 36:20 Rwot pe bitimo dano macalo meno kica, ento kiniga pa Rwot ki nyekone aye bidunyo yito i kome, ki lok me ceno dano ma gicoyo i buk man bimoko i kome matwal, Rwot bijwayo nyiŋe woko ki i te polo.
Wel 36:21 Rwot bipoko en woko kene ki i kin kaka pa jo Icrael ducu, ci bolo can mapek i kome ma rwatte ki lok ducu me ceno dano ma i gicikke ma gicoyo i buk man me cik.
Wel 36:22 “Dok likwayowu ma gibilubowu, litinowu ma gibileyo ka tyenwu, ki lurok ma gua ki i lobo mabor, ka gibineno lwak aroma ducu ma opoto i lobowu ki lwak two ma Rwot omiyo omako dano,
Wel 36:23 dok ka gibineno lobowu ducu mac obalo, kun odoŋ gweŋ calfa ma mac olenyo, ki kado keken, ma pe gicoyo iye kodi mo, ma gin mo pe doŋo iye, ma lum pe lot iye, lobo muballe woko ma rom ki Codom ki Gomora ki Adma ki Jeboim, ma yam Rwot obalo woko ki kiniga ki akecane,
Wel 36:24 ada, ka guneno man ducu gibiwacci, ‘Piŋo Rwot otimo lobo-ni kit man? Lyeto me kiniga madwoŋ ma rom manni te lokke aŋo?’
Wel 36:25 Ci dano gibigamo ni, ‘Gin mumiyo otimo kit meno pien guweko lubo gicikke pa Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwarogi woko, ma ocikke iye kwedgi i kare ma okwanyogi woko ki i Ejipt,
Wel 36:26 ci guyeŋ gucito ka woro lwak lubaŋa mukene ki ryebbe piny i nyimgi, lwak lubaŋa ma onoŋo yam pe giŋeyo, ma yam pe gimiyo botgi me awora;
Wel 36:27 mumiyo kiniga omako Rwot i kom lobo man, ma okelo iye lwak lok ducu me ceno dano ma gicoyo i buk man.
Wel 36:28 Rwot oputo lwitgi woko ki i lobogi pi kinigane ki akecane ki akemone madwoŋ, ka obayogi woko wa i lobo mukene, macalo tye kwede wa onyooni.’
Wel 36:29 “Rwot Lubaŋawu tye ki muŋŋe; ento gin ma doŋ oyabo omiyo botwa doŋ bedo mewa ki pa likwayowa matwal, wek walub lok ducu ma i cik man. Nwoyo Cik 30 Lubaŋa bidwoko gum pa jo Icrael botgi ka gudwogo bote
Wel 36:1 “Ka gin man ducu doŋ opoto i komwu, gum ki lok me ceno dano ma atyeko ketone i nyimwu-ni, ka wupo pire ki i kin rok ducu ka ma Rwot Lubaŋawu yam ocwalowu iye-ni
Wel 36:2 ce wudwogo cen bot Rwot Lubaŋawu, wun ki likwayowu, ci wucako woro doge i lok ducu ma acikowu kwede tin-ni ki cwinywu ducu ki tipowu ducu,
Wel 36:350 
Wel 36:3 ci Rwot Lubaŋawu bidwoko gum mewu botwu; en dok bicokowu woko ki i kin rok ducu ka ma yam okeyowu iye-ni.
Wel 36:4 Kadi wa jowu ma obayogi ka mabor wa i agikki te polo, Rwot Lubaŋawu bicokogi woko ki kunnu; en biomowu woko ki kunnu.
Wel 36:5 Rwot Lubaŋawu bikelowu i lobo ma yam kwarowu gucamo-ni wek wun bene wucam obed mewu. Lubaŋa-bimiyo wubedo ki lwak lonyo mabeco, kun wunya mapol makato kwarowu.
Wel 36:6 Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyo wubedo jo mulirre i cwinywu, wun ki likwayowu bene, wek wumar Rwot Lubaŋawu ki cwinywu ducu ki tipowu ducu wek wubed makwo.
Wel 36:7 Rwot Lubaŋawu biketo lok magi me ceno dano I kom lumonewu ki lumerokwu ma guunowu, tin-ni.
Wel 36:8 ci wun dok wubiworo dog Rwot kun wugwoko cikke ducu ma acikowu kwede
Wel 36:9 Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyo wubedo ki jami mabeco madwoŋ mada ma wubinoŋo pi ticwu; wubibedo ki litino mapol, limwu makwo binya mapol bene, potowu biceko cam mabup, pien cwiny Rwot dok bibedo yom pi miyowu lonyo ki jami mabeco, kit ma yam cwinye obedo yom i kom kwarowu-ni.
Wel 36:10 Ka ce wubiworo dog Rwot Lubaŋawu, ma wugwoko cikke ki gin ma ociko ducu ma gicoyo i buk man me cik, ka ce wudwogo cen bot Rwot Lubaŋawu ki cwinywu ducu ki tipowu ducu, ci Lubaŋa bimiyowu gum man.
Wel 36:11 “Pien cik ma acikowu kwede tin-ni pe tek twatwal ma cobone loyowu, dok pe tye ka mabor kwedwu.
Wel 36:12 Pe tye wa i polo, ma kono omiyo wuwacci, ‘Aŋa ma bicito ka omone botwa ki malo i polo kuca, wek okel botwa ka wek wawiny lokke walubi?’
Wel 36:13 Dok pe tye wa loka nam, ma kono omiyo wuwacci, ‘Aŋa ma bicito piwa wa loka nam kuca, wek okel botwa ka wek wawiny lokke walubi?’
Wel 36:14 Ento lokke tye cok kwedwu; wumako doŋ i cwinywu, ci wubedo ka tucone ki dogwu, miyo wutwero lubone.
Wel 36:15 “Nen maber ni, tin atyeko keto i nyimwu kwo ki lonyo ki to ki keckom.
Wel 36:16 Ka ce wuworo cik pa Rwot Lubaŋawu ma ocikowu kwede tin-ni, wek wumar Rwot Lubaŋawu, ma wulubo yone kun wugwoko cikke ki gin ma en ociko nyo oŋolo ducu, ci wubikwo dok wubinya mapol, dok Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyowu gum i lobo ma wubidonyo iye ka camone-ni.
Wel 36:17 Ento ka ce cwinywu odok cen ka ryebbe i nyim lubaŋa mukene ki tiyo botgi ma wukwero winyo dog Rwot,
Wel 36:351 
Wel 36:18 atuco atir botwu tin ni wubito wutum woko; pe wubiri pi kare malac i lobo ma wubecito iye loka Jordan ka camone-ni.
Wel 36:19 Alwoŋo polo ki lobo me bedo lucaden i komwu tin, ni, atyeko keto i nyimwu kwo ki to, gum ki lok me ceno dano; mumiyo wuyer kwo wek wun ki likwayowu wubed makwo,
Wel 36:20 ma kun wumaro Rwot Lubaŋawu, wuworo doge ci wumoko i kome matek; en aye kelo kwo botwu, ci miyo wuri pi kare malac, wek wubed i lobo ma yam Rwot okwoŋo pire bot kwarowu Abraim, Icaka ki Yakobo ni ebimiyogi.” Nwoyo Cik 31 Yocwa oleyo tyen Moses
Wel 36:1 Moses dok omedde ki waco lok magi bot jo Icrael ducu.
Wel 36:2 Owaco botgi ni, “An mwaka me ditta doŋ romo miya ki pyeraboro tin, ci pe doŋ aromo wot ki dwogo kit ma iya mito. Rwot otyeko waco bota ni pe abikato loka Jordan.
Wel 36:3 Rwot Lubaŋawu kikome aye doŋ bitelo nyimwu wa loka ca. En bityeko rok magi woko ducu ki i nyimwu, ci wubicamo lobogi; ki Yocwa aye doŋ bikato loka ca ka telo wiwu kit ma doŋ Rwot owaco-ni.
Wel 36:4 Rwot bitimogi kit ma yam otimo i kom Cikon ki Og ma luker pa jo Amor ki i kom lobogi i kare ma otyekogi kwede woko-ni.
Wel 36:5 Rwot bimiyo gipoto i ciŋwu, wun wubitimogi ma lubo cik ducu ma atyeko cikowu kwede-ni.
Wel 36:6 Wubed oteka ma cwinywu nwaŋ; pe wulwor, pe atiba opot i komwu pigi, pien Rwot Lubaŋawu aye biwot kwedwu, pe bibwotowu ata, pe biwekowu wudoŋ kenwu.”
Wel 36:7 Lacen Moses olwoŋo Yocwa ci owaco bote ki i nyim jo Icrael ducu ni, “Bed oteka ma cwinyi nwaŋ, pien ibicito ki lwak man wa ilobo ma yam Rwot okwoŋo pire bot kwarogi ni ebimiyogi-ni; in aye ibimiyo gicamo doko megi.
Wel 36:8 Rwot aye bi telo nyimi, en bibedo kwedi, pe bibwoti ata, pe biweki keni. Pe ilwor, cwinyi pe opoti.” Cik myero gikwan i ge mwaka abiro abiro
Wel 36:9 Moses ocoyo cik man ducu ci omiyo bot ajwagi ma gin likwayo pa Levi, ma yam gitiŋo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot, ki bot ludoŋo ducu pa jo Icrael.
Wel 36:10 Ocikogi ni, “I ŋe mwaka abiro abiro, i kare ma giciko pire ni obed mwaka me weko banya, i nino me Bolo,
Wel 36:11 ma noŋo jo Icrael ducu gubino i nyim Rwot Lubaŋagi i kabedo ma en biyerone, wubikwano iye cik man i nyim jo Icrael ducu wek guwiny.
Wel 36:352 
Wel 36:12 Wugur lwak kacel, co wa ki mon ki litino, ki lubedo ma gibedo i gaŋiwu, wek guwiny ci gupwony lworo Rwot Lubaŋawu, gugwokke ka lubo lok ducu me cik man,
Wel 36:13 ka wek litinogi ma peya guŋeyo lokke guwiny ci gupwony lworo Rwot Lubaŋawu, i kare ducu ma wubedo i lobo ma wucito iye loka Jordan ka camone- ni.” Pwony pa Rwot me agikkine bot Moses
Wel 36:14 Dok Rwot owaco ki Moses ni, “Nen, nino ma ibito iye doŋ onyiko cok. Lwoŋ Yocwa ci wucuŋ kwede i kema me rwatte wek acike.” Ci Moses ki Yocwa gucito gucuŋ i kema me rwatte.
Wel 36:15 Rwot ocako nen i kema ki wir me pol; ci wir me pol ocuŋ okemo doggola me kema.
Wel 36:16 Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Nen, in doŋ icok cito ka yweyo bot kwarowu; ci lwak man gibitwaro gicito ka woro lubaŋa mogo ma welo ki tim kwele kwele, i lobo ma gicito ka bedo iye i kingi-ni. Gibibwota woko dok gibituro gicikkena ma atyeko ketone i kinwa wan kwedgi.
Wel 36:17 Dok kiniga bi maka i komgi i kare meno, ci abitenyogi woko ma akano waŋa woko pe anenogi, miyo gibityekogi woko liweŋ, Gin maraco-gu ki lwak ayela mapol bipoto i komgi, mumiyo i kare meno gibiwacci, ‘Gin mumiyo can man opoto i komwa, pien Lubaŋawa doŋ pe tye i kinwa.’
Wel 36:18 Abikano waŋa woko i kare meno adada pi lwak balgi ducu ma gubedo ka timo, pien gudok woko cen bot lwak lubaŋa mukene.
Wel 36:19 Kombeddi doŋ ico wer man wek ipwony ki jo Icrael. Ket wer man i doggi, wek obed cadenna i kom jo Icrael.
Wel 36:20 Pien ka akelogi i lobo ma mol cak ki moo kic ma yam akwoŋo pire ni abimiyo bot kwarogi, ka gucamo ci guyeŋ gucwe kwede, ci gibidok cen bot lubaŋa mogo mukene. Gibiworogi ma kun gicaya woko, gituro gicikkena.
Wel 36:21 Dok ka gin maraco mapol ki lwak ayela mapol opoto i komgi, ci wer man bicuŋ i nyimgi me bedo caden botgi, pien likwayogi pud gibiwero, wigi pe biwil iye. Pien aŋeyo tam ma gutyeko yubone ma onoŋo peya aterogi i lobo ma yam akwoŋo pire ni abimiyogi.”
Wel 36:22 Moses ocoyo wer meno i nino meno kikome, ocako pwonyo ki jo Icrael.
Wel 36:23 Ka Rwot ociko Yocwa wod pa Nun kun waco bote ni, “Bed oteka ma cwinyi nwaŋ, pien in aye ibitero likwayo pa Icrael i lobo ma yam akwoŋo pire ni abimiyogi-ni, ci an abibedo kwedi.”
Wel 36:24 Ka yam Moses otyeko coyo lok me cik man ducu i buk nio ka otum woko ducu,
Wel 36:25 ci ociko Lulevi ma gitiŋo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot,
Wel 36:353 
Wel 36:26 owacci, “Wugam buk man me cik, wuket i ŋet canduk me gicikke pa Rwot Lubaŋawu, wek obed kunnu me bedo caden i komwu.
Wel 36:27 Pien aŋeyo kit jemowu ki kit ma ŋutwu nwaŋ kwede ducu, Nen, ka tin dok wujemo i kom Rwot ma an pud atye kwedwu ma akwo, ci jemowu bibedo dwoŋ ma rom mene ka doŋ ato woko?
