Wel 36:28 Wumi ludoŋo ma i kakawu ducu ki ludito ticwu gugurre kacel ka doŋ awac lok magi guwiny, ka doŋ alwoŋ polo ki lobo wek obed caden i komgi.
Wel 36:29 Pien aŋeyo adada ni, Ka doŋ ato, wubitimo tim aranyi; ci wubilokke, wubibarre woko ki i yo ma acikowu kwede. Gum marac bipoto i komwu i kare me anyim, pien wubitimo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot kun wumiyo kiniga make ki gin ma wutiyo.” Wer pa Moses
Wel 36:30 Moses okwano lok ma i wer man nio ka otyeko ducu, kun lwak jo Icrael ducu ma gugurre kacel gubedo ka winyone: Nwoyo Cik 32
Wel 36:1 “Wucik itwu, wun polo ducu, an doŋ abiloko; wek lobo bene owiny lok ducu ma i doga.
Wel 36:2 Lubaŋa omi pwonnya ocwer macalo kot, omi lokka oton macalo toyo, macalo kot ma ŋido i kom lum alita macalo kot ma wo i kom doo.
Wel 36:3 Pien abituco nyiŋ Rwot. Wutit dit pa Lubaŋawa!
Wel 36:4 “En aye Got, ma ticce ducu cobbe kakare; gin ducu ma en tiyo tye atir. En Lubaŋa ma lagen, ma pe ki bal mo; kite atir, gin ma en timo ducu tye maber.
Wel 36:5 Gutimo tim aranyi i kome; pe doŋ gin litinone, pien komgi ki mwonyo; gin aye yalwak muŋak mugom woko.
Wel 36:6 Wun mono dok wuculo Rwot kit meno, wun jo mamiŋ ki rok ma pe ki ryeko? Pe en aye wonwu ma oketowu? Pe en aye lacwec ma omiyo wutye makwo?
Wel 36:7 Po i kom kare ma yam con ca, tam pi lwak mwaka pa yalwak macon. Peny woru, ci binyutti maber, ki ludoŋowu bene gibititti.
Wel 36:8 I kare ma En Mamalo Twal yam omiyo ki rok ducu ginaleyagi, i kare ma opoko kin litino pa dano, yam opoko waŋ lobo pa rok acel acel kun lubo wei awobe pa Lubaŋa.
Wel 36:9 Pien lwak pa Rwot gin aye dulle, jo pa Yakobo aye gipiny ma gipoko bote.
Wel 36:10 “Yam onoŋo Yakobo i dye tim aroo, i lobo kweyo marac ma dano pe iye; okwake ki bade kun gwoke maber ogwoke macalo toŋ waŋe kikome.
Wel 36:11 Macalo ocur ma pwonyo litinone ki tuk kun teŋo bwome ma oyaro ka wigi, yaro bwome, jologi kwede, ci tiŋogi ki kono lacar madito.
Wel 36:354 
Wel 36:12 Rwot kene aye yam telo wi jone, kun onoŋo lubaŋa pa lurok mo pe ka ŋete.
Wel 36:13 “Omiyo guriŋo i wi cere mutiŋŋe malo i lobo, opitogi ki cam mucek i poto; omiyogi doto moo kic ma noŋŋe i wi got, ki noto moo yaa mucek i dye pata got matek.
Wel 36:14 Omiyogi boto cak lukulu pa dyaŋi, ki mato cak ma libo bene pa dyegigi; gucamo moo litino romi ki nyogi romi, ki riŋo dyaŋi me Bacan ki riŋo dyegi, kacel ki moko ŋano mabecone twatwal, gumato kono vino makwar me pig olok.
Wel 36:15 “Ento Jecurun ocwe matek, ma loyone tek; jo pa Rwot gucwe ma komgi pek, muliŋŋe. Gubwoto Lubaŋa ma Lacwecgi woko, gucayo Got mularogi-ni.
Wel 36:16 Guworo lubaŋa ma welo-gu mumiyo nyeko omake, guŋeto cwinye ki tim marac me kwer omiyo kiniga omake.
Wel 36:17 Gutumo tum bot jogi ma pe gin lubaŋa, bot lubaŋa mogo ma yam pe giŋeyo, bot lubaŋa mogo manyen ma obino lacen ma yam kwarogi pe gulworo.
Wel 36:18 Gin pe guparo Got ma onywalogi-ni, wigi owil woko i kom Lubaŋa ma Wongi-ni.
Wel 36:19 “Rwot oneno ci ocayogi woko, pien awobene ki anyirane guŋeto cwinye.
Wel 36:20 Owacci, ‘Abikano waŋa woko ki botgi, wek dok anen kit ma gibitum kwede; pien gin yalwak muŋak woko ata, gin litino ma pe lugen.
Wel 36:21 Gumiyo nyeko omaka i kom gin ata ma pe lubaŋa; guŋeto cwinya ki cal jogi acweyagu. An bene abimiyo nyeko makogi i komji ata; abimiyo rok mo mamiŋ ŋeto cwinygi.
Wel 36:22 Pien kinigana doŋ omoko mac woko, doŋ tye ka waŋ wa i te bur matut me lyel, kun waŋo lobo ki gin ma ocek iye ducu, ka dok cwinyo mac waŋ wa te guti me godi.
Wel 36:23 “ ‘Abicoko can aguro i wigi; abityeko aterona woko i komgi.
Wel 36:24 Kec aye bimiyo gijony liŋok, dok awaŋogi ki lyeto ki two gemo maraco atyekogi woko liweŋ; abicwalo lak ŋuu i komgi ki kwir pa gin ma lak alaka i ŋom.
Wel 36:25 Pala lucwan bityekogi woko i tim, lworo bibedo wa i kicika ot; pala bityeko litino co ki anyira, litino ma dot wa ki jo ma wigi ki lwar.
Wel 36:26 Kono awacci, “Abikeyowu woko ka ma boco, abimiyo nyiŋgi pe doŋ gipo iye i kin dano,”
Wel 36:27 ento alworo lumerok wek pe guŋet cwinya, wek lumonegi pe guter marac, pe guwacci, “Waloyogi giwa, ciŋ Rwot pe otimo gin mo.” ’
Wel 36:28 “Pien gin aye rok ma gikwiya yubo lok, niaŋ lok bene loyogi woko.
Wel 36:29 Ka nene giryek, kono giniaŋ lok man, kono giŋeyo agikki me kwogi.
Wel 36:355 
Wel 36:30 Dano acel ryemo jo alip kulu, jo aryo twaro jo alip apar, ka Gotgi aye pe omiyogi woko bot lukworgi, ka Rwot pe otenyogi woko?
Wel 36:31 Pien gotgi pe rom ki Gotwa, lubaŋagi pe tek ma rom ki mewa; wa merokwa bene giye lok man.
Wel 36:32 Lukworwa girom ki jo Codom ki Gomora, gical ki olok marac ma nyige kec; girom ki koŋo vino ma girubo ki kwir twol,
Wel 36:33 ki kwir twol golla mager-ri.
Wel 36:34 “Man aye gin ma akano, ma agwoko i ot kano limma.
Wel 36:35 An aye abiculo kwor, abiculo waŋe lacen. Akuro kare ma tyengi bicer; pien nino me to-pinygi doŋ cok, bipoto i komgi atura.
Wel 36:36 Pien Rwot bimiyo jone loyo kop, kica bimake i kom luticce ka oneno tekgi doŋ otum woko, ma dano mo pe odoŋ kadi opii nyo ŋat ma lone kene.
Wel 36:37 Ci bipenyogi ni, ‘Lwak lubaŋawu doŋ gitye kwene kaa, ki got ma yam wuriŋo wularo iyeni?
Wel 36:38 Jogi ma yam camo moo me gitumwu doŋ tye kwene, ki lumat koŋo vino me gityer amatawu? Wek doŋ gua malo ka konyowu, wek gin aye gubed jo ma gwokowu!
Wel 36:39 “ ‘Tin doŋ wunen ni, an aye a ene, an kena, lubaŋa mukene pe ka ŋeta. An aye aneko dok an aye amiyo kwo; an aye aketo ret dok acaŋo burre, dok pe tye ŋat mo ma laro dano ki i ciŋa.
Wel 36:40 Atiŋo ciŋa malo acimo polo ci akwoŋo kwon man ni, Macalo an Lubaŋa ma abedo kwo matwal-li,
Wel 36:41 ka ce apako pala lucwanna ma mil amila, ce aryeyo ciŋa pi ŋolo kop ci abiculo kwor i kom lumonena, abiketo can i kom jo ma gidaga.
Wel 36:42 Abimiyo aterona mer ki remo, pala lucwanna bicamo riŋo mabup, biyeŋ ki remo jo ma ginekogi ki ma gimakogi, bitoŋo wi lutel pa lumerok.’
Wel 36:43 “Wupake wun rok ducu kacel ki lwakke, pien en culokwor remo pa luticce; en culo kwor i kom lumonene pi kwanyo bal woko ki i lobo pa jone.”
Wel 36:44 Moses okwano wer man ducu wek lwak guwiny, en kacel ki Yocwa wod pa Nun. Moses ociko jo Icrael tyen me agikkine
Wel 36:45 Ka Moses otyeko waco lok magi ducu bot jo Icrael ducu ci owaco botgi ni,
Wel 36:46 “Wuket i cwinywu lok ducu ma awaco botwu tin-ni, wek wuketgi gubed cik ma mako litinowu bene, wek gugwokke ka lubo lok ducu me cik man.
Wel 36:47 Lok magi pe lok ma tere pe; gin aye kwowu kikome. Pi gwoko cik magi miyo wubiri pi kare malac i lobo ma wucito iye loka Jordan ka camone-ni.”
Wel 36:356  Lubaŋa onyuto lobo Kanaan bot Moses
Wel 36:48 I nino meno kikome Rwot owaco bot Moses ni,
Wel 36:49 “It malo i wi got man me Abarim, got Nebo, ma tye i lobo Moab mukemo Jeriko, wek inen lobo Kanaan ma abimiyo bot jo Icrael obed megi.
Wel 36:50 Ibito i wi got ka ma iito iye-ni wek idok bot lutuwu, macalo omeru Aron yam oto i wi got Kor ci odok bot lutugi;
Wel 36:51 pien yam wuŋayo waŋa woko ki i dye jo Icrael, i dog pii me Meribakadec i tim me Jin; yam pe wuwora i nyim jo Icrael macalo an Lubaŋa maleŋ.
Wel 36:52 Pienno ibineno lobo-nu ki cen i nyimi kuca, ento pe ibicito kunnu, i lobo ma abimiyo ki jo Icrael.” Nwoyo Cik 33 Moses olam gum i kom kaka pa jo Icrael ducu
Wel 36:1 Man aye lamo gum pa Moses ma dano pa Lubaŋa-ni, ma yam olamo i kom likwayo pa Icrael ma onoŋo peya oto.
Wel 36:2 Moses olamo ni, “Rwot yam obino oa ki i wi got Cinai, ci otuc ki i Ceir wa i komwa cut, kun ryeny ki i wi got Paran. Obino ma oa ki i kin jo maleŋ alip ki alip, ki leb mac ma lyel tuŋ ciŋe malacuc.
Wel 36:3 Ada, en maro jone, gwoko jone maleŋ ducu i ciŋe. Pi meno waryebbe ka tyene kun en bedo ka pwonyowa,
Wel 36:4 ki cik ma yam Moses oketo i komwa me bedo me aleya pa lwak pa Yakobo.
Wel 36:5 Kit meno Rwot odoko kabaka i Jecurun i kare ma ludito ma gitelo wi lwak gucokke, ma kaka pa jo Icrael ducu gugurre kacel.
Wel 36:6 I kom kaka pa Reuben Moses olamo gum kit man. “Wek Reuben obed makwo, pe oto, kadi bed jone nok.”
Wel 36:7 Olamo gum i kom kaka pa Juda kit man, “Ai Rwot, winy dwan Juda, kele wa paco bot jone. In aye ilweny pire ki ciŋi, ikonye ka lwenyo i kom lumonene.”
Wel 36:8 I kom kaka pa Levi olamo ni, “Mi ki Levi Tumim meri, miye Urim meri pien en lwori. En aye dano ma yam iomo iye i Maca, en aye ŋat ma yam itemo i ŋet pii me Meriba.
Wel 36:9 Yam owaco i kom wonne ki minne ni, ‘Pe aparo pigi’; opokke woko ki omegine, dok pe oŋeyo wa litinone. Pien jo pa Levi gumako lokki, gulubo gicikkeni bene.
Wel 36:10 Gibipwonyo jo pa Yako bo ki lok ma iŋolo, gibipwonyo cikki bot jo Icrael; gibiwaŋo odok eceta i nyimi, gibityero gitum ma giwaŋo woko ducu ki berre i wi keno tyerri.
Wel 36:357 
Wel 36:11 Ai Rwot, mi gum i kom gipinygi, dok igam tic ma gitiyo ki ciŋgi. Nyon pyer lumonegi piny, ma gin aye jo ma daggi, wek pe dok gutub i komgi.”
Wel 36:12 I kom kaka pa Benjamin olamo ni, “Dano ma Rwot maro-ni bedo ki kuc, Rwot Mamalo Twal gwoke kare ducu, tino en malo i wi gwoke.”
Wel 36:13 I kom kaka pa Yucepu olamo ni, “Rwot omi gum opot i kom lobone, ki mot mabeco ma a malo ki i polo, ki mua ki i kut matut ma oyarre i te lobo.
Wel 36:14 Omine nyig yadi mabeco ma nyak ki cen, ki lonyo me cam ma cek ki dwene;
Wel 36:15 Omine cam ma cek mabeco i kom godi muri mada, ki mubakke i wi cere ma bedo matwal;
Wel 36:16 omine mot mabeco me nom ki lonyone, ki gum pa Labedo i caka mulyel mac. Wek gum magi ducu gupot i kom Yucepu, i wi dano mubedo laker i kin omegine.
Wel 36:17 Ditte ki deyone bibedo rom ki pa wod twon me kayo, tuŋe aryo ducu tye macalo tuŋ twon ma i tim. En aye bitwomo kwede rok mapol, bicobogi ducu nio wa i agikki lobo; tuŋe aye jo Epraim ma gikato alip apar, ki jo Manace ma giromo alip mapol-li.”
Wel 36:18 I kom kaka pa Jabulon olamo ni, “Cwinyi obed yom, in Jabulon, ka ikato woko; ki in Icakar ka ibedo i kemani.
Wel 36:19 Gibilwoŋo rok ducu wek gucit i wi gotgi, gibityero gitum muporre kunnu, pien lim ma tye i nam obedo megi, kacel ki lonyo ma gikano i kweyo.”
Wel 36:20 I kom kaka pa Gad olamo ni, “Gum opot i kom dano ma oyabo i lobo pa Gadmalac! Gad obuto piny macalo min labwor, en yeco bat lee, dano wiye.
Wel 36:21 Oyero lobo maberre ni obed mere, pien onoŋo gikano lobo pa lawimony kunnu. Obino bot ludito wi lwak, otimo gin ma tye atir i nyiŋ Rwot, ocobo gin ma Rwot ociko kacel ki jo Icrael.”
Wel 36:22 I kom kaka pa Dan olamo ni, “Dan aye latin labwor ma kirre nia ki i Bacan.”
Wel 36:23 I kom kaka pa Naputali olamo ni, “Bed ki lonyo ma rommi, in Naputali, gum pa Rwot obed kwedi madwoŋ, nam ki lobo ma tun acuc obed meri.”
Wel 36:24 I kom kaka pa Acer olamo ni, “Acer olim gum madit makato litino ducu; wek cwiny omegine ducu omare; wek olwa tyene ki moo.
Wel 36:25 Laceg dog gaŋŋi obed nyonyo ki mola; bed ki tekkomi nio wa ka toni.
Wel 36:26 “Pe tye ŋat mo macalo Lubaŋawu, wun jo Jecurun, ma ito pol bino kwede ka konyowu, kun baro dye polo ki doyone.
Wel 36:27 Lubaŋa ma bedo nakanaka-ni en aye kabedowu, ciŋe tye ki tuŋ piny ma tiŋowu kwede malo. Oryemo lumerok woko ki i nyimwu kun wacci, ‘Tyekgi woko liweŋ.’
Wel 36:28 Icrael yam obedo ki kuc kit meno, waŋ it pa Yakobo obedo kene i lobo me kai ki koŋo vino; iyo, polo miyo toyo ton piny kunnu.
Wel 36:358 
Wel 36:29 Cwinyi yom kuman, Icrael! Aŋa mono ma calo in kaa? In i rok ma yam Rwot olaro. Rwot aye kwot ma gwokowu, ki pala lucwan ma kelowu wayu! Lumerokwu gibibino botwu kun gimwolle amwola; ento wun wubinyonogi woko piny.” Nwoyo Cik 34 To pa Moses
Wel 36:1 Moses oa ki i lobo aroo me Moab, ocito i wi got Nebo, oito wa i wi lacol me got Piciga ma okemo Jeriko, ci Rwot onyutte lobo ducu. Onyutte lobo Gilead ducu nio kwede wa i Dan,
Wel 36:2 ki lobo Naputali ducu, ki lobo pa jo Epraim ki Manace, ki lobo Juda ducu nio kwede wa yo tuŋ potoceŋ,
Wel 36:3 ki Negeb kacel ki lobo bar-gu, ma en ayenota me Jeriko, ma gaŋ me yadi otit, ki nio kwede wa i Joar.
Wel 36:4 Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Man aye lobo ma yam akwoŋo pire bot Abraim ki Icaka ki Yakobo, ni abimiyone bot likwayogi. Doŋ aweki ineno lobone ki waŋi, ento pe ibikato loka ca.”
Wel 36:5 Moses latic pa Rwot oto kit meno ki i lobo Moab, kit ma yam Rwot owaco-ni,
Wel 36:6 ci Rwot oyike ki kunnu i nota ma i lobo Moab ma okemo Bet-peor; ento pe tye dano, mo ma oŋeyo kabedo ma oyike iye nio wa onyoo.
Wel 36:7 Moses onoŋo mwaka me ditte romo miya acel ki pyeraryo ka oto. Onoŋo waŋe peya ocor, ki kome bene onoŋo pud tek.
Wel 36:8 Jo Icrael gukoko Moses ki i lobo aroo me Moab pi nino pyeradek, ci doŋ kare me koko ki kumo pi Moses otum woko.
Wel 36:9 Yocwawod pa Nun yam opoŋ ki cwiny me ryeko, pien onoŋo yam Moses oketo ciŋe i kome; mumiyo jo Icrael gubedo ka woro doge, kun gilubo kit ma yam Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Wel 36:10 Lanebi mo mukene pe dok onen macalo Moses, ma yam Rwot nene kwede waŋ ki waŋ.
Wel 36:11 Pe tye ŋat mo ma rom kwede ma obedo ka tiyo lwak lanyut ki taŋo ducu ma Rwot ocwale kwede i lobo Ejipt, ma otiyo i kom Parao ki luticce ducu ki lobone ducu.
Wel 36:12 Pe tye lanebi mo mukene ma obedo ki twer madwoŋ ma rom ki mere pi tiyo kit tic madito ki ma kelo lworo madwoŋ kit ma yam Moses obedo ka tiyone ki i nyim jo Icrael ducu-ni.
Wel 36:359  Yocwa
Yocwa 1:1 Ka Moses latic pa Rwot doŋ oto woko, Rwot owaco bot Yocwa wod pa Nun ma lakony pa Moses ni,
Yocwa 1:2 “Laticca Moses doŋ oto woko; pienno in aye doŋ ia malo, iciŋol loka Jordan man, in ki lwak jo-ni ducu, wucit wa i lobo ma abemiyo botgi-ni, ma abimiyo bot gin jo Icrael.
Yocwa 1:3 Kabedo ducu ma tyenwu binyono abimiyo botwu, kit ma yam aciko ki Moses.
Yocwa 1:4 Cakke wa i tim ki i Lebanon kany o kwede wa i kulu madit, en aye kulu Euprate, lobo ducu pa jo Kit nio wa i Nam Madit ma yo tuŋ potoceŋ, ducu bibedo lobowu.
Yocwa 1:5 Pe tye dano mo ma bicuŋ i nyimi i kare me kwoni ducu. Kit ma yam abedo ki Moses, abibedo kwedi kit meno; pe abibwoti, pe abitenyi ata.
Yocwa 1:6 Bed oteka ma cwinyi nwaŋ, pien ibimiyo rok man leyo lobo ma yam akwoŋo pire bot kwarowu ni abimiyo botgi.
Yocwa 1:7 Ento bed oteka ma lacwinye nwaŋ, bed ma igwokke ka lubo cik ma yam laticca Moses ociki kwede i gin ma itiyo ducu; pe iŋak idok yo tuŋ acuc nyo yo tuŋ acam, wek ibed ki gum maber i kabedo ducu ma ibicito iye.
Yocwa 1:8 Buk man me cik pe bia ki i dogi, ento ibibedo ka Iwodone i cwinyi dyeceŋ ki dyewor, wek igwokke ka lubo gin ducu ma gicoyo iye-ni, Kit meno bimiyo nyimi bedo maleŋ, ka dok ticci ducu bicobbe kakare.
Yocwa 1:9 An doŋ atyeko ciki ba. Bed oteka ma cwinyi nwaŋ; pe komi omyel, pe cwinyi oryaŋŋe, pien Rwot Lubaŋani tye kwedi ka ma iwoto iye ducu.”
Yocwa 1:10 Yocwa ociko ludito ma giloyo lwak ni,
Yocwa 1:11 “Wuwot i dye gony ka ciko lwak ni, ‘Wuyub camwu; pien odoŋ nino adek ci wucito ka ŋolo loka kulu Jordan, wucito iye ka camo lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyo botwu me bedo mewu.’ ”
Yocwa 1:12 Yocwa dok owaco bot jo Reuben, jo Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace ni,
Yocwa 1:13 “Wupo lok ma yam Moses latic pa Rwot ocikowu kwede kun wacci, ‘Rwot Lubaŋawu doŋ otyeko miyowu kabedo me yweyowu, en doŋ omiyowu lobo man.’
Yocwa 1:14 Monwu ki litinowu ki dyaŋiwu gibidoŋ i lobo ma yam Moses omiyo botwu i ŋe Jordan kany; ento oteka lweny ma gitye i kinwu ducu gibikato loka ca ki jami lwenygi ducu i nyim omegigi pi konyogi,
Yocwa 1:360 
Yocwa 1:15 nio ka Rwot omiyo yweyo bot omegiwu macalo omiyo botwu-ni, ci gin bene gicamo lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyogi. Ka doŋ wubidok i lobo ma mewu-ni, ci doŋ wubibedo iye matwal, en aye lobo ma yam Moses latic pa Rwot omiyo botwu i ŋe Jordan kany ma tuŋ wokceŋ.”
Yocwa 1:16 Ci gugamo dog Yocwa ni, “Gin ma doŋ iciko ducu wabitiyo, dok ka ma icwalowa iye ducu wabicito.
Yocwa 1:17 Kit macalo yam waworo dog Moses i lok ducu-ni, wabiworo dogi bene kit meno. Rwot Lubaŋa keken aye obed kwedi, kit ma yam obedo ki Moses!
Yocwa 1:18 Dano mo ka okwero lokki ce ojemo i kom cikki ki gin ducu ma iciko, gibineke woko. In aye ibed oteka ma cwinyi nwaŋ.”
Yocwa 2:1 Yocwa wod pa Nun ocwalo jo aryo nia ki i Citim i muŋ ka roto piny kun waco botgi ni, “Wucit ka neno lobo, makatone aye Jeriko.” Ka gucito, ci gutiro i ot pa dako ma lakwele ma nyiŋe Rakab, gubuto kunnu.
Yocwa 2:2 Gitito pigi bot kabaka me Jeriko ni, “Nen, jo Icrael mogo gubino kany ka roto piny.”
Yocwa 2:3 Ci kabaka me Jeriko ocwalo kwena bot Rakab ma kun wacce ni, “Kel dano ma gubino boti kany, dano ma gudonyo i odi-ni, pien gubino ka roto lobowa ducu.”
Yocwa 2:4 Ento dako-nu onoŋo otero jo aryo-nu okanogi woko, ci en ogamo ni, “Ada, jo-nu gubino bota, ento onoŋo pe aŋeyo ka ma gua iye.
Yocwa 2:5 I kare ma dog gaŋ gicok lorone woko, ma piny col-li, jo-nu gukato woko, ci ka ma gucito iye aye pe aŋeyo. Wuryem korgi oyotoyot, ci wubimakogi iyo,”
Yocwa 2:6 kun onoŋo oterogi i wi ot malo, ci okanogi i kin tol tworo ma ocano kikore i wi ot kunnu.
Yocwa 2:7 Kit meno dano gucako ryemo korgi i yo ma kemo kulu Jordan nio kwede wa i waŋ wat. Ka luryem korgi gukato woko, ci dog gaŋ giloro woko cut.
Yocwa 2:8 I kare ma jo-nu peya gubuto piny, en ocito botgi i wi ot,
Yocwa 2:9 ci owaco botgi ni, “Aŋeyo ni Rwot otyeko miyowu lobo man, lworo bene otyeko makowa piwu, ki jo ma gibedo i lobo-ni komgi oonyo koyo woko piwu,
Yocwa 2:10 pien wawinyo kit ma Rwot otwoyo ki pii me Nam Makwar woko i nyimwu i kare ma wua woko ki i Ejipt, ki gin ma wutiyo i kom luker aryo pa jo Amor ma yam gibedo loka Jordan tuŋ kany, gin aye Cikon ki Og, ma wujwerogi woko liweŋ- ŋi.
Yocwa 2:361 
Yocwa 2:11 I kare ma wawinyo pire-ni cwinywa ocako ŋabbe aŋaba cut, tipo kom dano oto woko lirut piwu, pien Rwot Lubaŋawu aye Lubaŋa ma tye malo i polo ki piny i wi lobo bene.
Yocwa 2:12 Kombeddi doŋ wukwoŋŋa kwoŋ ki nyiŋ Rwot ni, kit macalo atyeko timowu maber-ri, wun bene wubitimo jo me ot pa wora maber, ci wumiya lanyut ma moko adane,
Yocwa 2:13 wek wular kwo pa wora ki pa maa, ki pa omegina ki lumegina, ki jo ducu ma gitye botgi, wek wular kwowa wawek to.”
Yocwa 2:14 Jo meno gugamo ni, “Wan aye wabito ma ka wun. Ka pe wubitito gin ma watimo kany-nyi, ci wan wabitimowu maber ki gen madwoŋ ka Rwot bimiyowa lobo-ni.”
Yocwa 2:15 Lacen dako-nu omiyo gukato woko ki i waŋ dirica ma noŋo en cwalogi piny ki tol, pien onoŋo ode gigero okubbe i kom cel murumo gaŋ-ŋi, omiyo en yam bedo i kom cel.
Yocwa 2:16 Ci en ocikogi ni, “Koŋ wucit wa i kin godi, wek luryem korwu pe gurwatte kwedwu iyo. Koŋ wukanne kunnu pi nino adek, nio ka luryem korwu gudwogo; ka lacen wun doŋ wucit giwu.”
Yocwa 2:17 Jo-nu guwaco bote ni, “Pe wabibedo ki bal mo i kom kwoŋ man ma imiyo wakwoŋo boti-ni.
Yocwa 2:18 Nen ba, ka monywa obino i lobo-ni, ci ibitweyo tol man makwar-ri i waŋ dirica ma imiyo wakato woko kun wawok ki iye-ni. Ci ibilwoŋo woru ki meni ki omegini ki jo ma i ot pa woru ducu, icokogi i ot boti kany.
Yocwa 2:19 Ka ŋat acel mo okato gire woko ki i doggola odi ocito i gudo, bal me remone bidok i wiye, wan pe wabibedo ki bal mo iye.
Yocwa 2:20 Ento ka ce itito gin ma watimo kany-nyi, ci pe wabibedo ki bal mo pi kwoŋ ma imiyo wakwoŋo-ni.”
Yocwa 2:21 Dako ogamo ni, “Doŋ obed kumeno kit macalo wuloko-ni.” Ka ocwalogi gucito, ci en otweyo tol makwar-ri i waŋ dirica ode.
Yocwa 2:22 Ka gucito ci guwoto atir wa i godi, gubedo kunnu pi nino adek, nio ka luryem korgi gudok woko; lulub korgi gubedo ka yenyogi kwe i waŋayo, ci pe gumedo ki noŋogi.
Yocwa 2:23 Jo aryo-nu gulor piny ki i wi godi, gukato loka ca ci gucito bot Yocwa wod pa Nun, gutito bote lok ducu ma otimme i komgi.
Yocwa 2:24 Ka dok guwaco bot Yocwa ni, “Adada Rwot doŋ otyeko miyo lobo meno ducu i ciŋ wa; dok nen ni jo ducu ma gibedo i lobo-nu piwa oneko komgi woko lirut.”
Yocwa 3:362  Jo Icrael gukato loka Jordan
Yocwa 3:1 Yocwa oa malo odiko con ci otiŋo wot kun a ki i Citim, kacel ki jo Icrael ducu, guo kwede wa i dog kulu Jordan, gubuto kenyo ma peya gukato loka tuŋ ca.
Yocwa 3:2 Ka gutyeko kunnu nino adek, ci ludito guwoto i dye gaŋ
Yocwa 3:3 kun giciko lwak ni, “Ka doŋ wuneno ajwagi ma Lulevi doŋ gutiŋo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot Lubaŋawu, ci wun bene doŋ wubicako wot, wua ki i kabedowu wulubo kore,
Yocwa 3:4 wek wuŋe yo ma wubilubo-ni, pien yam peya wulubo yo meno. Ento kinwu ki canduk pa Rwot aye obed ma oŋadde; ber kinwu opokke ma romo yadi alip acel kulu, pe wunyik cok bote.”
Yocwa 3:5 Ci Yocwa ociko lwak ni, “Wulonnye kekenwu wek wubed maleŋ, pien diki Rwot bitiyo jami taŋo i kinwu.”
Yocwa 3:6 Yocwa owaco bot ajwagi ni, “Doŋ wutiŋ canduk me gicikke, wukat kwede i nyim lwak.” Gutiŋo canduk me gicikke, gucito kwede wa i nyim lwak.
Yocwa 3:7 Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni, “Tin doŋ acako miyo ibedo dano madit ki i nyim jo Icrael ducu, wek guŋe ni, kit ma yam abedo ki Moses, abibedo kwedi bene kit meno.
Yocwa 3:8 Ibiciko ajwagi ma gitiŋo canduk me gicikke ni, ‘Ka doŋ wuo i dog pii me Jordan, ci wubicuŋ mot i kulu Jordan.’”
Yocwa 3:9 Ci Yocwa owaco bot lwak ni, “Wubin kany ka winyo lok pa Rwot Lubaŋawu.”
Yocwa 3:10 Ka dok owaco ni, “Kombeddi doŋ wubiŋeyo ni Lubaŋa makwo tye i kinwu, dok ni en biryemo jo magi woko ki i nyimwu ada, jo Kanaan, jo Kit, jo Kiv, jo Periji, jo Girgac, jo Amor ki jo Jebuc.
Yocwa 3:11 Canduk me gicikke pa Rwot me lobo ducu doŋ biŋolo kulu Jordan ki i nyimwu.
Yocwa 3:12 Koni doŋ wukwany dano apar wiye aryo ki i kin kaka pa jo Icrael, dano acel pi kaka acel acel.
Yocwa 3:13 I kare ma tyen ajwagi ma gutiŋo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot, ma Rwot me lobo ducu-ni, bicuŋ i pii me Jordan, ci pii me Jordan biŋol woko ma pe doŋ mol; pii ma mol a ki malo yo tuŋ cel-li bigut gurre kacel.”
Yocwa 3:14 Kit meno lwak gua ki i kemagi gucako wot pi ŋolo loka Jordan kacel ki ajwagi ma gutiŋo canduk me gicikke ma gutelo kwede nyim lwak.
Yocwa 3:15 Noŋo pii me kulu Jordan poŋ woko libyeny o wa i wi tura mwaka ki mwaka pi kare malac i kare me kac. Ka doŋ ajwagi ma gutiŋo canduk me gicikke-ni guo i Jordan, guluto tyengi i pii ma i doge-ni,
Yocwa 3:16 ci pii ma mol piny ma a ki tuŋ malo-ni ogut ocuŋ woko ma opoŋ otiŋŋe malo likuŋ ma ojer wa i Adam, en gaŋ ma cok ki Jaretan. Pii mogo ma mol kemo nam
Yocwa 3:363  me Araba, ma Nam me Kado-ni, kingi ducu oŋol woko, ci lwak gukato loka tuŋcel, mukemo Jeriko.
Yocwa 3:17 I kare ma jo Icrael ducu gimol gikato ki i lobo mutwo-ni, onoŋo ajwagi ma gutiŋo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot-ti gucuŋ i dye Jordan, nio ka rok ducu otyeko kato loka Jordan.
Yocwa 4:1 Ka lwak ducu gutyeko kato loka Jordan, ci Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni,
Yocwa 4:2 “Kwany dano apar wiye aryo ki i kin lwak, dano acel pi kaka acel acel,
Yocwa 4:3 ci icikgi ni, ‘Wukwany godi apar wiye aryo ki kany ki i dye Jordan, ki i kabedo ma tyen ajwagi ocuŋ iye-ni, wutiŋ wukat kwedgi wa loka ca, ci wuketgi piny i kabedo ma wucibuto iye tin-ni.’ “
Yocwa 4:4 Yocwa olwoŋo dano apar wiye aryo ki i kin jo Icrael ma nene en oyerogi, ma laco acel oa ki i kaka acel acel.
Yocwa 4:5 Owaco botgi ni, “Wukat wucit wa i nyim canduk me gicikke pa Rwot Lubaŋawu ma i dye Jordan-ni, dano acel acel otiŋ iye got oket i wi gwoke, muporo wel kaka pa jo Icrael ducu,
Yocwa 4:6 wek gubed me lanyut i kinwu, I kare me anyim ka waŋ mo litinowu gibipenyowu ni, ‘Godi magi kono nyuto gin aŋo?’
Yocwa 4:7 Wun wubitito botgi ni, pii me Jordan yam iye opokke oŋol wo ko ki i nyim canduk me gicikke pa Rwot, i kare ma en ŋolo Jordan kato kwede loka ca-ni. Kit meno godi magi bibedo gin me po bot jo Icrael.”
Yocwa 4:8 Jo Icrael gutiyo kit ma Yocwa ocikogi kwede. Gutiŋo godi apar wiye aryo ki i dye Jordan, muporo wel kaka pa jo Icrael, kit ma nene Rwot otito bot Yocwa-nii gutiŋo gucito kwedgi loka ca, wa i kabedo ma gicibuto iye-ni, ci guketogi piny kunnu.
Yocwa 4:9 Yocwa ocibo godi apar wiye aryo-nu i dye Jordan, i kabedo ka ma tyen ajwagi ma gutiŋo canduk me gicikke ocuŋ iye; pud gitye kunnu wa onyoo.
Yocwa 4:10 Pien onoŋo ajwagi ma gutiŋo canduk-ki gucuŋ kenyo i dye Jordan nio ka gin ducu ma nene Rwot ociko Yocwa ni otit bot lwak otum, ma rom ki cik ma yam Moses ocikoki Yocwa-ni. Lwak ducu gumol oyotoyot wa loka ca.
Yocwa 4:11 Ka lwak ducu gumol gukato loka ca, ci canduk ki ajwagi bene gukato loka i nyim lwak.
Yocwa 4:12 Jo pa Reuben ki pa Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace onoŋo guruko jami lwenygi gutelo kwede nyim lwak jo Icrael kit ma yam Moses ocikogi kwede-ni.
Yocwa 4:364 
Yocwa 4:13 Jogi ma gurukke me lweny guromo alip pyeraŋwen, ci gukato loka ca I nyim Rwot ka lweny i lobo bar me Jeriko.
Yocwa 4:14 Rwot omiyo Yocwa obedo dano madit i nyim jo Icrael ducu; ci lwak guwore Wa i kare me kwone ducu kit ma yam giworo ki Moses.
Yocwa 4:15 Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni,
Yocwa 4:16 “Cik ajwagi ma gitiŋo canduk me caden doŋ gua woko ki i Jordan.”
Yocwa 4:17 Yocwa ociko ajwagi ni, “Doŋ wua woko ki i Jordan.”
Yocwa 4:18 Ka ajwagi ma gutiŋo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot gua woko ki i dye Jordan gukato wi tura; ma tyengi ocako nyono lobo ma wi tura mutwo-ni, ci pii me Jordan ocorre odwogo cen i kabedone, opoŋo piny obyennye wa i wi tura kit ma yam ca.
Yocwa 4:19 Lwak gua woko ki i Jordan gukato wi tura i nino dwe apar me dwe mukwono, ci gutoŋo gonygi i Gilgal i waŋ lobo Jeriko ma tuŋ wokceŋ.
Yocwa 4:20 Ki godi apar wiye aryo ma gutiŋo ki i Jordan, Yocwa ocibogi i Gilgal.
Yocwa 4:21 Ci owaco bot jo Icrael ni, “I kare me anyim, ka likwayowu gupenyo wegigi ni, ‘Godi magi kono nyuto gin aŋo?’
Yocwa 4:22 ci wubitito bot litinowu ni, ‘Jo Icrael yam gumol gukato ki i Jordan kany ma lobone otwo woko.’
Yocwa 4:23 Pien Rwot Lubaŋawu omiyo pii me Jordan otwo odwon woko piwu nio ka wumol wukato loka kany, kit ma yam Rwot Lubaŋawu otiyo ki Nam Makwar-ri, ma yam omiyo piine otwo odwon woko piwa nio ka wamol wakato loka tuŋcel,
Yocwa 4:24 wek rok ducu ma wi lobo-ni guŋe atir ni ciŋ Rwot tye ki tek; wek wubed ka lworo Rwot Lubaŋawu matwal.”
Yocwa 5:1 Ka luker pa jo Amor ducu ma gibedo loka Jordan ma tuŋ potoceŋ, ki luker pa jo Kanaan ducu ma gitye i dog nam, guwinyo ni Rwot otyeko dwono pii me Jordan otwo woko pi jo Icrael nio ka gumol gukato loka tuŋcel, ci cwinygi ocako ŋabbe aŋaba, ki tipo komgi oto woko, pi lworo jo Icrael.
Yocwa 5:2 I kare meno Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni, “Tim pala kidi lela mabitte ci ilir ki jo Icrael tyen me aryone.”
Yocwa 5:3 Ci Yocwa otimo pala kidi lela mabitte, oliro ki jo Icrael i Gibea-aralot.
Yocwa 5:4 Man aye tyen lok mumiyo Yocwa olirogi: lwak co ducu ma gua ki i Ejipt, lulwenygi ducu, onoŋo gutyeko to woko ki i tim i kare ma doŋ gutyeko a woko ki i Ejipt.
Yocwa 5:365 
Yocwa 5:5 Jo ma gua ki kunnu onoŋo yam gilirogi, ento jo ducu ma ginywalogi ki i waŋayo ma onoŋo doŋ gua woko ki i Ejipt, gubedo ma pe gilirogi.
Yocwa 5:6 Pien jo Icrael gubedo ka wot i tim mwaka pyeraŋwen, nio ka jo me rokgi ducu, co ducu ma lumony ma yam gua ki i Ejipt, guto gutum woko, pien onoŋo pe gubedo ka woro dog Rwot. Rwot yam okwoŋo ni pe ebiye ni gin gunen lobo ma yam okwono bot kwarogi ni ebimiyo botgi, en aye lobo ma mol cak ki moo kic.
Yocwa 5:7 Kit meno jo ma Yocwa oliro gubedo litinogi ma Rwot omiyo gudoŋo guleyo ka tyengi; pien onoŋo gubedo ma pe gilirogi, pe gilirogi ki i waŋayo.
Yocwa 5:8 Ka liro jo Icrael doŋ otum, ci gubedo i gony nio ka gucan.
Yocwa 5:9 Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni, “Tin doŋ akwanyo lewic me lobo Ejipt woko ki i komwu,” mumi yo nyiŋ kabedo-nu pud gilwoŋo ni Gilgal wa onyoo. Kwero nino madit me Kato (Paska)
Yocwa 5:10 I kare ma jo Icrael gitye i gony me Gilgal gukwero nino madit me Kato i nino dwe apar wiye aŋwen otyeno i bar me Jeriko.
Yocwa 5:11 Orwone ki i ŋe kwero Kato, i nino meno kikome, gucako camo cam ma ocek i lobo-nu, capat ma tobi pe iye ki bel ma gicelo.
Yocwa 5:12 I nino meno ma gucamo iye cam ma ocek ki i lobo-nu en aye nino ma manna bene, ogik iye; jo Icrael pe dok gumedde ki camo manna matwal, ento doŋ gubedo ka camo cam ma ocek i lobo Kanaan i mwaka meno. Dano ma owoto pala lucwan
Yocwa 5:13 Ka Yocwa onyiko cok ki Jeriko, otiŋo wane malo oneno piny, ci oneno dano mo ocuŋ i nyime ma onoŋo owoto pala lucwan omako i ciŋe. Yocwa ocito bote, openye ni, “In itye tuŋ botwa nyo tuŋ bot lumerokwa?”
Yocwa 5:14 En ogamo ni, “Pe; ento an aye lawimony pa Rwot ma tin doŋ abino.” Yocwa oryebbe piny i ŋom, owore, ci owaco bote ni, “Ladit, an laticci, icika ki lok aŋo?”
Yocwa 5:15 Lawimony pa Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni, “Luny war woko ki i tyeni, pien kabedo ma icuŋ iye-ni kabedo maleŋ.” Ci Yocwa otimo kit meno.
Yocwa 6:1 I kare meno onoŋo Jeriko gicego woko matek twatwal pi lworo jo Icrael; dano mo pe kato woko, ki dano mo pe donyo i iye.
Yocwa 6:2 Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni, “Nen, doŋ atyeko miyo Jeriko i ciŋi kacel ki kabakane ki twoni oteka lwennye.
Yocwa 6:3 Wubiwot wurumo gaŋ; lulweny ducu gibiwot kun girumo gaŋ tyen acel. Wubitiyo kit meno tyeko nino abicel,
Yocwa 6:366 
Yocwa 6:4 kun ajwagi abiro bimako obute me tuŋ romi gitelo kwede nyim canduk me gicikke, I nino me abirone wubiwot wurumo gaŋ tyen abiro kun ajwagi gikuto obute.
Yocwa 6:5 Ka doŋ gikuto tuŋ nyogi romi, ka doŋ wuwinyo dwan obute maloŋo-ni, ci lwak ducu gibidaŋŋe ki dwangi maloŋo mapek; cel gogo me gaŋ bimuk, poto woko piny ducu, ci lwak gibicorre gicito iye kun dano acel acel kemo nyime atir.”
Yocwa 6:6 Ci Yocwa wod pa Nun olwoŋo ajwagi, owaco botgi ni, “Wutiŋ canduk me gicikke. Ajwagi abiro gumak obute tuŋ nyogi romi gutel kwede nyim canduk pa Rwot.”
Yocwa 6:7 Ka dok owaco ki lwak ni, “Wuwot anyim, wuwot wurum gaŋ, wumi jo ma guruko jami lwenygi gukat wa i nyim canduk pa Rwot.”
Yocwa 6:8 Kit ma Yocwa ociko ki lwak-ki, ajwagi abiro gumako obute tuŋ nyogi romi abiro ci gutelo kwede nyim Rwot kun gicito anyim kacel ki canduk me gicikke pa Rwot ma lubo korgi.
Yocwa 6:9 Lumony gutelo nyim ajwagi ma gikuto obute-ni, ci lugwok ŋec gulubo kor canduk, kun obute gikuto gimedde kwede ameda.
Yocwa 6:10 Ento Yocwa ociko lumony ni, “Pe wubidaŋŋe ki woo, kadi wa dwanwu pe biwinnye, wa lok mo pe bia ki i dogwu, o kwede wa i nino ma abicikowu ni doŋ wudaŋŋe ki woo; ka doŋ wubidaŋŋe.”
Yocwa 6:11 Kit meno Yocwa omiyo canduk pa Rwot ocako wot me rumo gaŋ, kun rumo tyen acel keken. Lacen gudok i gony, gubuto kunnu.
Yocwa 6:12 Yocwa dok oa malo odiko con, ki ajwagi bene gucako tiŋo canduk pa Rwot.
Yocwa 6:13 Ajwagi abiro gumako obute tuŋ nyogi romi abiro gukato kwede i nyim canduk pa Rwot, kun gimedde ki kuto obute nakanaka. Lumony gutelo nyimgi, ki lugwok ŋec gulubo kor canduk, kun ajwagi gikuto obute nakanaka.
Yocwa 6:14 I nino me aryone guwoto gurumo gaŋ tyen acel ci gudok i gony, Gubedo ka rumo gaŋi kit meno otyeko nino abicel.
Yocwa 6:15 I kom nino me abirone gua malo kwarpiny, guwoto gurumo gaŋ kit ma yam ca tyen abiro; i nino meno keken aye gurumo iye gaŋ tyen abiro.
Yocwa 6:16 I kom tyen me abirone en aye ajwagi gucako kuto iye obute, ka Yocwa owaco bot lumony ni, “Wudaŋŋe, wuwo, pien Rwot doŋ omiyo gaŋ man botwu.
Yocwa 6:17 Ento gaŋ man ki gin ducu ma tye iye gibidyerogi bot Rwot ci gibijwero woko ducu. Rakab ma lakwele-ni keken, ki jo ducu ma gitye i ode, aye gibidoŋ makwo, pien en yam okano lurot-piny ma wacwalo kunnu.
Yocwa 6:18 Ento wun aye wugwokke kekenwu i kom gin ducu ma gidyero me ajwera woko, pe dok wukwany gin mo ki i kom gin ma wudyero-ni, miyo gony pa jo Icrael doko me ajwera woko ducu, ci kelo ayela i kome.
Yocwa 6:367 
Yocwa 6:19 Ento ryal ki jabu ducu ki jami me mola-gu ki me nyonyo gu, gin ducu jami maleŋ pa Rwot; gibiterogi i ot kano lim pa Rwot.”
Yocwa 6:20 Kit meno lumony gudaŋŋe ki woo ki ajwagi gukuto tum obute, Tekki lumony guwinyo dwan obute ci gutugi daŋŋe ki woo matek, ci cel me gaŋ omuk opoto woko piny ducu, ka doŋ lumony gudonyo i gaŋ kun dano acel acel woto tiko nyime atir, gumako gaŋ woko.
Yocwa 6:21 Gujwero co wa ki mon, litino ki ludoŋo ducu, ki dyaŋi ki romi ki kana-gu; gin ducu gutum woko kun gineko ki pala lucwan. Gilaro Rakab
Yocwa 6:22 Ci Yocwa owaco bot jo aryo ma yam guroto lobo ni, “Wucit i ot pa dako ma lakwele-ni, wukele woko ki jone ducu, kit ma yam wukwoŋo boteni.”
Yocwa 6:23 Kit meno awobe ma yam guroto lobo gudonyo i ot, gukelo Rakab woko kacel ki wonne ki minne ki omegine ki jone ducu. Gutero ludoggolane ducu, guketogi woko i ŋe gony pa jo Icrael.
Yocwa 6:24 Lacen lumony guwaŋo gaŋ woko ki mac, ki gin ducu ma tye iye; ento guweko ryal ki jabu ki jami me mola ki me nyonyo-gu, guketogi i ot ma gikano iye lim pa Rwot.
Yocwa 6:25 Ento Rakab ma lakwele-ni ki jo me ot pa wonne kacel ki jone ducu, Yocwa owekogi makwo. Gibedo i kin jo Icrael nio wa onyoo, pien Rakab yam okano lukwena ma Yocwa onoŋo ocwalogi ka roto Jeriko.
Yocwa 6:26 I kare meno Yocwa omiyo dano gukwoŋo kwoŋ i nyim Rwot kun wacci, “Cen opot i kom dano ma bitiŋŋe pi gero gaŋ man me Jeriko doki. Latin kayone bito, ci gibiketo gutine i wiye; wode ma cogone bito, ci gibicibo dog gaŋ i wiye.”
Yocwa 6:27 Kit meno Rwot obedo ki Yocwa, omiyo nyiŋe oywek oromo lobo ducu.
Yocwa 7:1 Ento jo Icrael guŋayo waŋ Rwot i lok ma mako jami ma onoŋo gidyero bote. Akan wod pa Karmi, wod pa Jabdi, wod pa Jera ma i kaka pa Juda okwanyo jami mogo ma gidyerogi bot Rwot, omiyo kiniga omako Rwot i kom jo Icrael.
Yocwa 7:2 Yocwa ocwalo dano ki i Jeriko me cito wa i Ai ma cok ki Bet-awen, i ŋet Betel yo tuŋ wokceŋ, owaco botgi ni, “Wucit ka roto lobo kuca.” Jo-nu gucito guroto Ai.
Yocwa 7:3 Ka gudwogo bot Yocwa ci gutito bote ni, “Pe iwek mony ducu gucit kunnu, ento wek dano alip aryo nyo adek gucit ka lweny i kom Ai; pe imi mony ducu guyelle gucit kunnu, pien jo ma tye kunnu ginok mo.”
Yocwa 7:4 Mumiyo dano alip adek ki i kin lumony aye gucito kunnu; ci guriŋo woko ki i nyim jo Ai.
Yocwa 7:368 
Yocwa 7:5 Jo Ai guneko jo pyeradek wiye abicel ki i kingi; guryemo korgi cakke ki i dog gaŋ o kwede wa i Cebarim, ci gunekogi i kor got kunnu. Ci cwiny jo Icrael oballe woko, tekgi okwe woko macalo pii.
Yocwa 7:6 Yocwa oyeco boŋone woko, opoto piny aryeba cwiny i nyim canduk pa Rwot nio wa otyeno, en ki Ludoŋo pa jo Icrael, kun gionyo apwa i wigi.
Yocwa 7:7 Ci Yocwa owacci, “Maa do, ai Rwot Lubaŋa, piŋo ikelo lwak man loka Jordan kany pi miyowa i cin jo Amor wek gutyekwa woko? Twora yam waye giwa bedo loka Jordan kuca!
Yocwa 7:8 Ai Rwot, ka man dok awaco lok aŋo, ma jo Icrael doŋ gutyeko loko ŋegi woko i nyim lumerokgi-ni?
Yocwa 7:9 Pien jo Kanaan ki jo ducu ma gibedo i lobo-ni ka gibiwinyo pire, gibicorre girumowa woko dyere, gijwayo nyiŋwa woko ki i wi lobo. Ci gin aŋo mono ma dok ibitiyo pi nyiŋi madit-ti?”
Yocwa 7:10 Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni, “A malo, piŋo ipoto aryeba cwiny kit man?
Yocwa 7:11 Jo Icrael gutimo bal. Gutyeko turo gicikkena ma yam acikogi kwede. Gukwanyo jami mogo ma yam gidyerogi-ni, gukwalo woko, guŋinnye kwede, guketo i kin jamigi.
Yocwa 7:12 En aye lok mumiyo jo Icrael pe gitwero cuŋ i nyim lumerokgi; gin mumiyo guloko ŋegi ki i nyim lumerokgi noŋo gin kikomgi gudoko gin me ajwera woko, Pe doŋ abimedde ki bedo kwedwu, nio waŋ ma wukwanyo jami ma gidyerogi woko ki i kinwu.
Yocwa 7:13 A malo wek ilony lwak gubed maleŋ kun iwaco ni, ‘Diki myero wulonnye kekenwu wubed maleŋ, pien Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael owaco kuman ni, “Jami ma gidyero tye i kinwu, wun jo Icrael. Pienno pe wutwero cun i nyim lumerokwu nio waŋ ma wukwanyo jami ma gidyerogi woko ki i kinwu.”
Yocwa 7:14 Diki odiko gibikelowu i nyim Rwot kaka ki kaka, ci kaka ma Rwot okwanyo gibibino cok doggola ki doggola; doggola ma Rwot okwanyo bibino ot ki ot; ki ot ma Rwot okwanyo dano ma tye iye gibibino ki acel acel.
Yocwa 7:15 Ŋat ma gikwanyo ma tye ki jami ma gidyero-ni gibiwaŋo woko ki mac, en kacel ki jone ki jamigi ducu, pien oturo gicikke pa Rwot, dok otimo gin me lewic i Icrael.’ ”
Yocwa 7:16 Kit meno Yocwa oa malo odiko con, okelo jo Icrael cok i nyim Rwot kaka ki kaka, ci gukwanyo kaka pa Juda aye.
Yocwa 7:17 Okelo jo pa Juda, ci gikwanyo doggola jo pa Jera. Okelo doggola pa Jera kun kelo dano ma iye ki acel acel, ka dok gikwanyo Jabdi.
Yocwa 7:18 Ka dok okelo dano ma i ode ki acel acel, ci gikwanyo Akan wod pa Karmi, likwayo pa Jera ma i kaka pa Juda.
Yocwa 7:369 
Yocwa 7:19 Yocwa owaco bot Akan ni, “Woda, mi deyo bot Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael kun ituco balli. Titta kombeddi gin ma itimo; pe imuŋŋa.”
Yocwa 7:20 Akan ocako dok iye ki Yocwa ni, “Ada, abalo i nyim Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, man aye gin ma atiyo:
Yocwa 7:21 ka aneno boŋo maber mua ki i Cinar ki i kin jami ma giyakoni, ki cekel me ryal miya aryo, ki dul jabu ma pekke romo cekel pyerabic, pigi obedo mitta, ci akwanyogi. Nen, akanogi i ŋom i kemana, ryal tye piny i tergi.”
Yocwa 7:22 Yocwa ocwalo lukwena ci guriŋo i kema pa Akan, gunoŋo jami-nu gikano i kema, kun ryal tye i tere piny.
Yocwa 7:23 Gukwanyogi woko ki i kema, gukelogi bot Yocwa ki jo Icrael ducu, ci guketogi piny i nyim Rwot.
Yocwa 7:24 Ci Yocwa ki jo Icrael ducu gukwanyo Akan lakwar Jera kacel ki ryal ki boŋo ca ki dul jabu, ki awo bene ki anyirare, ki twoni dyaŋine, ki kanane ki romine, ki kemane ki jami ma en tye kwede ducu, gutero wa i nota me Akor .
Yocwa 7:25 Yocwa owacci, “Piŋo ikelo ayela i komwa? Tin doŋ Rwot bikelo ayela i komi.” Ci jo Icrael ducu gucelogi ki got. Guwaŋo jamigi ki mac, ci gucelogi ki got.
Yocwa 7:26 Lacen gucano got i kome madwoŋ likuŋ ma pud tye wa onyoo, ci kiniga pa Rwot malyet-ti okwe woko. Pienno nyiŋ kabedo-nu pud gilwoŋo ni nota me Akor nio wa onyoo.
Yocwa 8:1 Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni, “Pe ilwor, cwinyi pe opoti. Ter jo ma lulweny ducu kacel kwedi, doŋ wutugi a, wucit wa i Ai. Nen, doŋ atyeko miyo kabaka me Ai i ciŋi, ki lwakke ducu ki gaŋŋe ki lobone.
Yocwa 8:2 Ibitimo Ai ki kabakane kit macalo itimo i kom Jeriko ki kabakane-ni; ento jamine ma giyako, ki limme makwo, wubitero bedo mewu, Mi dano gubut gukanne i ŋet gaŋ yo tuŋ ŋeye.”
Yocwa 8:3 Yocwa oa malo ki jo ma lulweny ducu pi cito ka lweny i kom Ai. Oyero twoni matego ma oteka lweny alip pyeradek ci ocwalogi ki i dyewor.
Yocwa 8:4 Ocikogi ni, “Wubibuto wukanne i ŋet gaŋ yo tuŋ ŋeye, Pe wucit ka mabor ki gaŋ, ento wun ducu wubed ma wuterre,
Yocwa 8:5 ci an ki jo ducu ma gitye kweda wabinyiko cok ki gaŋ, Ka ce jo kunnu gubino woko ka lweny i komwa, ci wan wabiriŋo woko ki i nyimgi,
Yocwa 8:6 miyo gin gibibino woko ka ryemo korwa nio ka gin ducu gukato woko ki i gaŋ, pien gibitamo ni wariŋo woko ki i nyimgi kit ma yam watimo-ni, Ka wan watye ka riŋo woko ki i nyimgi,
Yocwa 8:370 
Yocwa 8:7 wun doŋ wubia malo ki ka ma wubuto wukanne iye-ni, ci wutugi mako gaŋ woko cut, pien Rwot Lubaŋawu bimiyo i ciŋwu.
Yocwa 8:8 Ka doŋ wutyeko mako, wubiwaŋo woko ki mac; kit meno wubicobo gin ma Rwot ociko. Nen, doŋ acikowu en.”
Yocwa 8:9 Yocwa ocwalogi woko kit meno, ci guwoto ka ma gicikanne iye-ni, Gubuto i kin Betel ki Ai, i ŋet Ai yo tuŋ potoceŋ; ento Yocwa obuto kacel ki lwak i dyewor meno.
Yocwa 8:10 Odiko con Yocwa oa malo ocoko mony, ocako cito i nyim jo Ai kacel ki ludoŋo pa Icrael.
Yocwa 8:11 Jo ma lulweny ducu ma gitye kwede gucito gunyiko cok ki gaŋ, gutoŋo gony i ŋet Ai yo tuŋ acam, kun nota tye i kingi ki Ai.
Yocwa 8:12 Yocwa otero dano ma romo alip abic oketogi gubuto gukanne i kin Betel ki Ai i ŋet Ai yo tuŋ potoceŋ.
Yocwa 8:13 Guketo mony i kabedogi kit meno kun gony madit tye i nyim gaŋ yo tuŋ acam ki dul mukanne tye i ŋe gaŋ yo tun potoceŋ. Yocwa obuto i nota i dyewor meno.
Yocwa 8:14 Ka kabaka me Ai oneno man, ci en ki lwakke ducu, dano me gaŋ meno, gurune gucito gulor piny odiko con i luŋ mukemo Araba ka lweny i kom jo Icrael; ento kabaka pe ŋeyo ni jo mogo gubuto gukanne woko i ŋe gaŋ.
Yocwa 8:15 Yocwa ki jo Icrael guporo ŋwec ki i nyimgi ni doŋ giryemogi woko, kun giriŋo gidok yo tuŋ tim.
Yocwa 8:16 Gilwoŋo dano ducu ma i gaŋ gucokke kacel ka lubo korgi, ka guryemo kor Yocwa gucito ka mabor ki gaŋ.
Yocwa 8:17 Dano acel mo pe odoŋ i Ai nyo i Betel ma pe okato woko i kor jo Icrael. Gubwoto dog gaŋ odoŋ ma twolo pi ryemo kor jo Icrael.
Yocwa 8:18 Ka doŋ Rwot ociko Yocwa ni, “Tir toŋ alwiro ma tye i ciŋi-ni malo, ikem ki Ai, pien abimiyo woko i ciŋi.” Yocwa otiro toŋ alwiro ma tye i ciŋe-ni malo, okemo ki gaŋ.
Yocwa 8:19 Oyotoyot jo ma gukanne-ni gua malo ki i kabedogi tekke Yocwa oryeyo ciŋe malo, ci gutwarre guriŋo gudonyo i gaŋ, gumako woko, ka gurune gucwinyo mac me wano gaŋ woko.
Yocwa 8:20 Ka jo Ai guneno yo ŋegi, ci nen, yito mac ma waŋo gaŋ tye ka duny mutiŋŋe wa malo i polo; ci ŋwec me riŋo yo tuŋŋi nyo tuŋŋi oloyogi woko, pien onoŋo jo ma guriŋo gudok yo tuŋ tim-mi gulokke gudwogo cen i kom luryem korgi.
Yocwa 8:21 Ka doŋ Yocwa ki jo Icrael ducu guneno ni jo ma gubuto aŋec-ci doŋ gumako gaŋ woko, ki yito mac ma waŋo gaŋ bene doŋ duny cito malo, ci gudwogo cen ka neko jo Ai.
Yocwa 8:371 
Yocwa 8:22 Jo mukene gua ki i gaŋ gulwenyo bene i kom jo Ai; kit meno onoŋo jo Icrael gurumogi dyere, jo mukene ki yo tuŋcel ki jo mukene yo tuŋ mukene. Jo Icrael gunekogi nio ka pe gubwoto dano acel mo mudoŋ makwo nyo muriŋo obwot.
Yocwa 8:23 Ento gumako kabaka me Ai makwo, gutero bot Yocwa.
Yocwa 8:24 Ka jo Icrael doŋ gutyeko neko jo Ai ducu ma ginoŋogi i bar nyo i tim ka ma guryemo iye korgi-ni, nio ka gunekogi ducu ki pala lucwan, mo pe odoŋ, ci jo Icrael ducu gulokke gudok i gaŋ, guneko dano mudoŋ iye ki pala lucwan.
Yocwa 8:25 Jo ducu ma guto i nino meno, co ki mon, guromo alip apar wiye aryo, jo Ai ducu.
Yocwa 8:26 Yocwa pe odwoko ciŋe piny ma noŋo oryeyo otiro ki toŋ alwiro-ni, nio waŋ ma gijwero jo ma gibedo i Ai woko Liweŋ.
Yocwa 8:27 Kono nyo lim makwo ki jami mogo ma giyako ki i gaŋ meno aye jo Icrael gutero obedo megi, macalo lok ma yam Rwot ociko ki Yocwa.
Yocwa 8:28 Kit meno Yocwa owaoŋ Ai woko, oweko odoŋ odur ma odurre lipim matwal, kit ma tye kwede wa onyoo-ni.
Yocwa 8:29 Odeyo kabaka me Ai, oŋabo malo i wi yat o wa otyeno. Ka ceŋ doŋ cito ka poto, Yocwa ociko dano ci gukwanyo kome woko ki i kom yat, gubolo piny i dog gaŋ ka ma gidonyo kwede i gaŋ-ŋi, ka gucano got i kome madwoŋ Likuŋ, ma pud tye kenyo o kwede wa i kare man. Gicoyo cik i kom got Ebal (Nwo 27.1-26)
Yocwa 8:30 Yocwa ocano keno tyer i wi got Ebal pi Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael,
Yocwa 8:31 kit ma yam Moses Latic pa Rwot ociko ki jo Icrael. Olubo lok ma gicoyo i buk me cik pa Moses ni, “Wucan keno tyer ki got ma pe gipayo komgi, ma danomo pe otiŋo nyonyo i kome.” En aye gutyero iye gitum awaŋa bot Rwot, ci gutumo gityer lakwecwiny.
Yocwa 8:32 Ci Yocwa ocoyo kopi me cik pa Moses i kom godi kunnu ki i nyim jo Icrael kun lubo kit ma yam Moses ocoyo.
Yocwa 8:33 Ci jo Icrael ducu, lubedo ki anywalli, kacel ki ludoŋo ki ludito tic ki luŋolkopgi, gin ducu gucuŋ i get canduk pa Rwot tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi ki i nyim ajwagi ma Lulevi ma gutiŋo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot. Nucu dano gucuŋ i nyim got Gerijim ki nucu dano gucuŋ i nyim got Ebal, kit ma Moses latic pa. Rwot okwono cikogi kwede kit ma myero gilam kwede gum i kom jo Icrael.
Yocwa 8:34 Ka lacen Yocwa okwano lok ducu ma i cik, wa lok me lamo gum ki lok me ceno dano ducu kikore macalo yam gicoyo ducu i buk me cik.
Yocwa 8:35 Lok acel mo pe odoŋ i kom lok ducu ma Moses yam ociko ma Yocwa pe okwano i nyim kacokke pa jo Icrael ducu, kacel ki mon ki litino ki lubedo ma gibedo i kingi.
Yocwa 8:372 
Yocwa 9:1 Ka luker ducu ma nene gitye loka Jordan i lobo godi ki i lobo ma i pwor ma orabo ŋet Nam Madit mukemo Lebanon, ki jo Kit, jo Amor, jo Kanaan, jo Periji, jo Kiv ki jo Jebuc guwinyo lok man,
Yocwa 9:2 gucokke kacel pi lweny i kom Yocwa ki jo Icrael.
Yocwa 9:3 Ento ka jo ma gibedo i Gibeon guwinyo gin ma Yocwa otimo i kom Jeriko ki i kom Ai,
Yocwa 9:4 ci gin ki tuŋ botgi gutiyo ki ryeko mamalo mada. Guyubo peke me wot ki kicaa muti me atweya i wi kanagi, ki opiru kono ma guti woko, ma oyec atata ma gidabogi bene,
Yocwa 9:5 ki war tyengi muti ma gidabogi, ki boŋŋi arukagi muti woko; ki pekegi ducu obedo mutwo woko, opuro woko bene.
Yocwa 9:6 Gucito kwede bot Yocwa i gony ma i Gilgal, ci guwaco bot Yocwa ki bot jo Icrael ni, “Wan wabino ma waa ki i lobo mabor; pienno walegi ni icikke kwedwa kombeddi.”
Yocwa 9:7 Ento jo Icrael guwaco bot jo Kiv ni, “Gwok nyo wubedo i kinwa, ci dok watwero cikke kwedwu niŋniŋ?”
Yocwa 9:8 Guwaco bot Yocwa ni, “Wan doŋ luticci.” Ci Yocwa openyogi ni, “Wun kono wu jo kwene kaa? Dok bene wua ki kwene mono?”
Yocwa 9:9 Gugamo doge ni, “Wan waa ki i lobo mabor mada, ladit, pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋawu ma wawinyo gitito pire, ki pi gin ducu ma yam otimo i lobo Ejipt,
Yocwa 9:10 ki pi gin ducu ma en otimo i kom luker aryo pa jo Amor ma yam gitye loka Jordan ca, Cikon kabaka me Kecbon ki Og kabaka me Bacan ma yam bedo i Acitarot.
Yocwa 9:11 Ci ludoŋowa ki jo ducu ma gibedo i lobowa guwaco botwa ni, ‘Wumak peke me wot i ciŋwu wek wucirwatte kwedgi, ci wuwac botgi ni, Wan luticwu, wek doŋ wacikke kwedwu.’
Yocwa 9:12 Kwonwa ene; wakwanyo ma onoŋo pud lyet i kare ma wa-a ki pacowa me acama i yo i nino ma wacako bino botwu-ni, ento kombeddi, nen, tye ma doŋ otwo dok opuro woko bene.
Yocwa 9:13 Wa opiru koŋo vino ducu onoŋo pud ginyen i kare ma wapiko koŋo vino i igi-ni; doŋ wunen ba ka guyec woko. Ki ginarukawa ki war mewa doŋ guti woko pi wot man mabor-ri.”
Yocwa 9:14 Ludito gugamo pekegi gucamo, ma pe koŋ gupenyo dog Rwot.
Yocwa 9:373 
Yocwa 9:15 Ci Yocwa oturo ki yubo lok me kuc i kingi, ocikke kwedgi pi wekogi makwo; lutel wi lwak bene gukwoŋo kwoŋ botgi.
Yocwa 9:16 Ka nino okato adek nia ki i kom nino ma gucikke kwedgi, lacen guwinyo ni jo- nu gitye kacel kwedgi kun gibedo i dyegi.
Yocwa 9:17 Jo Icrael gucako wot ci guo i gaŋgi i nino me adekke. Gunoŋo gaŋ magi, Gibeon, Kepira, Beeroth ki Kiriat-jearim.
Yocwa 9:18 Ento jo Icrael pe doŋ gunekogi, pien lutel wi lwak onoŋo doŋ gutyeko kwoŋo botgi i nyiŋ Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael. Ci lwak ducu gucako ŋur i kom lutel wi lwak- ki.
Yocwa 9:19 Ento lutel wi lwak ducu guwaco bot lwak ducu ni, “Watyeko doŋ kwoŋo kwoŋ botgi i nyiŋ Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, pienno kombeddi pe doŋ watwero gudo komgi.
Yocwa 9:20 Doŋ wabitimogi kit man; wabiwekogi gubed makwo wek pe wakel kiniga pa Lubaŋa i komwa pi kwoŋ ma doŋ wakwoŋo botgi-ni.”
Yocwa 9:21 Ci guwaco bot lwak ni, “Wuwek gubed makwo, ento gibibedo lubar yen ki lutwom pii pi lwak ducu.”
Yocwa 9:22 Yocwa olwoŋogi ci owaco botgi ni, “Piŋo wubwola kun wuwaco ni, ‘Wan watye ka mabor kwedwu,’ kun kono wutye i dyewa?
Yocwa 9:23 Pienno kombeddi doŋ gicenowu woko; pi kare ducu wubibedo opii, lubar yen ki lutwom pii i ot pa Lubaŋana.”
Yocwa 9:24 Gugamo dog Yocwa ni, “Pien onoŋo doŋ gitito botwa lok me ada, ladit, ni Rwot Lubaŋa yam ociko laticce Moses pi miyowu lobo man ducu, dok ociko ni myero wujwer jo ma gibedo i lobo man woko ki i nyimwu; omiyo walworowu matek twatwal, en aye omiyo watimo man pi laro kwowa.
Yocwa 9:25 Ci doŋ kombeddi in aye doŋ inen giri. Doŋ watye i ciŋi, in doŋ itim gin ma ineno ni ber dok oporre me atima i komwa.”
Yocwa 9:26 Otimogi kit man, olarogi ki i ciŋ jo Icrael, pe ginekogi.
Yocwa 9:27 Ento cakke i nino meno Yocwa oketogi me bedo lubar yen ki lutwom pii pi lwak ki pi keno tyer pa Rwot, medde kwede o wa i kare man, i kabedo ma Rwot biyero.
Yocwa 10:1 Adoni-jedek kabaka me Jerucalem owinyo kit ma Yocwa otyeko mako kwede Ai, ki kit ma ojwero woko liweŋ kun tiyo i kom Ai ki kabakane kit ma otyeko tiyo i kom Jeriko ki kabakane, owinyo bene kit ma jo Gibeon guyubo kwede lok me bedo ki jo Icrael ki kuc, doŋ gitye bene i kingi.
Yocwa 10:374 
Yocwa 10:2 Ci lworo omake matek twatwal, pien onoŋo Gibeon gaŋ madit ma rom ki gaŋ kal kulu, dok onoŋo dit makato Ai, ki jo ma gibedo iye gubedo twoni matego.
Yocwa 10:3 Mumiyo Adoni-jedek kabaka me Jerucalem ocwalo kwena bot Kokam kabaka me Kebron, Piram kabaka me Jarmut, Japia kabaka me Lakic ki Debir kabaka me Eglon kun wacci,
Yocwa 10:4 “Wubin bota, wukonya, wubin walwenyu i kom jo Gibeon, pien doŋ guyubo lok me bedo ki kuc i kingi ki Yocwa: ki jo Icrael.”
Yocwa 10:5 Ci luker pa jo Amor abic-ci gucoko monygi, gucito kacel ki lulwenygi ducu, gutoŋo gony cok ki Gibeon, gucako lweny i kome.
Yocwa 10:6 Ci jo Gibeon gucwalo kwena bot Yocwa wa i gony ma i Gilgal kun giwaco ni, “Pe ikwany ciŋi woko ki i komwa, wan luticci; bin botwa oyotoyot wek ilarwa. Konywa pien luker ducu pa jo Amor ma gibedo i lobo godi-ni gucokke ka monyowa.”
Yocwa 10:7 Mumiyo Yocwa oa ki i Gilgal ocito kunnu kacel ki lumony ducu ki twoni oteka lweny ducu.
Yocwa 10:8 Ci Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni, “Pe ilwor, pien atyeko miyogi i ciŋi. Pe tye dano mo ma bicuŋ i nyimi.”
Yocwa 10:9 Yocwa orune obino i komgi oyotoyot, kun oa ki i Gilgal owoto kwede dyewor benebene.
Yocwa 10:10 Ci Rwot oonyo atiba lworo i kom jo-nu i nyim jo Icrael, omiyo gunekogi ki cwar nek madit twatwal i Gibeon; guryemo korgi i yo ma dok yo tuŋ malo ma kemo Bet-koron, kun ginekogi o kwede wa i Ajeka ki i Makeda.
Yocwa 10:11 I kare ma giriŋo i nyim jo Icrael ma gilor kwede i luŋ me Bet-koron, Rwot ocako coro lwak gweŋi madito i komgi mua ki i polo o kwede wa i Ajeka, ci merok guto mapol; pee meno oneko lwak merok mapol makato dano ma jo Icrael gunekogi ki pala lucwan.
Yocwa 10:12 I nino ma Rwot omiyo iye jo Amor i ciŋ jo Icrael, Yocwa oloko bot Rwot i nyim jo Icrael kun wacci, “In cen, cuŋ mot i wi Gibeon, ki in dwe, cuŋ i nota me Aijalon.”
Yocwa 10:13 Ci ceŋ ocuŋ mot atir, ki dwe bene obedo mot, nio ka jo Icrael guculo kwor i kom lumerokgi. Lok man gicoyo i buk pa Jacar. Ceŋ ocuŋ mot i dye polo, pe orune me poto woko oyot ma cok romo nino acel kulu.
Yocwa 10:14 Nino mo yam peya obedo kit man nia wa i kare macon o kwede wa i kare man, ma Rwot owinyo iye dog dano; pien onoŋo Rwot aye obedo ka lweny pi Icrael.
Yocwa 10:15 Lacen Yocwa ki jo Icrael ducu gudok cen i gony me Gilgal.
Yocwa 10:16 Luker meno abic guriŋo, gukanne woko i boro ma i ŋet Makeda.
Yocwa 10:17 Ci gitito bot Yocwa ni, “Luker abic-ci ginoŋogi gukanne i boro ma i ŋet Makeda.”
Yocwa 10:375 
Yocwa 10:18 Yocwa owacci, “Wulor dog boro woko ki kidi madoŋo, ci wuket dano gubed cok ka kurogi.
Yocwa 10:19 Ento wun pe wubed kunnu abeda, wuciryem kor lumerokwu, wulweny i kom jo mudoŋ cen i ŋegi, pe dok wuwek gudony i gaŋigi; pien Rwot Lubaŋa doŋ otyeko miyogi i ciŋwu.”
Yocwa 10:20 Ka Yocwa ki jo Icrael gutyeko neko lukworgi madwoŋ twatwal, nio ka guyweyogi woko ducu, ki jo ma gubwotte noŋo gudonyo i gaŋgi ma gicelo ki cel gogo,
Yocwa 10:21 ci lwak ducu gudok cen bot Yocwa ma onoŋo tye i gony i Makeda; pe doŋ tye dano mo ma loko lok mo me lweny i kom jo Icrael.
Yocwa 10:22 Yocwa dok owacci, “Doŋ wuyab dog boro woko, ci wukwany luker abic-ci ki i boro, wukelgi bota kany.”
Yocwa 10:23 Gutimo kit meno; gukwanyo luker abic-ci ki i boro gukelogi bote, kabaka me Jerucalem, kabaka me Kebron, kabaka me Jarmut, kabaka me Lakic ki kabaka me Eglon.
Yocwa 10:24 Ka doŋ gikwanyo luker-ru woko, gikelogi bot Yocwa, Yocwa olwoŋo jo Icrael ducu, ci owaco bot ludito mony ma yam gucito kwede ni, “Wubin cok, wuket tyenwu i ŋut luker abic-ci.” Gubino cok, guketo tyengi i ŋutgi.
Yocwa 10:25 Yocwa dok owaco botgi ni, “Pe wulwor, pe cwinywu opoti; wubed oteka ma cwinywu nwaŋ, pien Rwot bitimo lumerokwu ducu ma wubilwenyo kwedgi kit meno.”
Yocwa 10:26 Ka doŋ Yocwa ocobogi onekogi woko, ka oŋabo komgi malo i wi yadi abic, gulyerre i wi yadi nio wa otyeno.
Yocwa 10:27 Ento i kare ma ceŋ doŋ mito poto, Yocwa ociko, ci gikwanyogi woko ki i wi yadi, gibologi i boro ma nene gukanne iye-ni, ci giloro dog boro woko ki godi madito ma pud gitye kunnu nio wa onyoo.
Yocwa 10:28 Yocwa omako Makeda i nino meno, oneko jo Makeda ki kabakagi ki pala lucwan, ojwerogi woko liweŋ, pe oweko iye dano mo ma obwot; otimo kabaka me Makeda kit ma yam otimo kwede kabaka me Jeriko-ni.
Yocwa 10:29 Yocwa oa woko ki i Makeda, okato ocito i Libna kacel ki jo Icrael ducu, olwenyo i kome.
Yocwa 10:30 Rwot dok omiyo gaŋ, meno kacel ki kabakane i cin jo Icrael. Guneko jo Libna ducu ki pala lucwan, i kom dano ducu ma tye iye pe guweko acel mo mubwot; gutimo kabaka me kunnu kit ma nene gutimo kwede kabaka me Jeriko.
Yocwa 10:31 Yocwa oa woko ki i Libna, okato ocito wa i Lakic kacel ki jo Icrael ducu, ci obuto orumo woko likiŋ ka olwenyo i kome.
Yocwa 10:376 
Yocwa 10:32 Rwot omiyo Lakic i ciŋ jo Icrael ci Yocwa omako woko i nino me aryone, oneko jo Lakic woko ki pala lucwan, dano ma tye iye ducu, kit ma nene otimo i kom Libna-ni.
Yocwa 10:33 Koram kabaka me Gejar obino ka konyo jo Lakic, ci Yocwa olwenyo i kome, oneke kacel ki jone ducu, pe oweko dano mo obwot.
Yocwa 10:34 Yocwa dok oa woko ki i Lakic okato ocito i Eglon kacel ki jo Icrael ducu; obuto orumo woko likiŋ ci olwenyo i kome.
Yocwa 10:35 Gumako woko i nino meno, guneko jo Eglon ki pala lucwan, gujwero dano ducu ma gitye iye woko liweŋ, kit ma nene gutimo i kom Lakic.
Yocwa 10:36 Yocwa dok oa woko ki i Eglon, ocito wa i Kebron kacel ki jo Icrael, olwenyo i kome,
Yocwa 10:37 omako woko oneko jo Kebron woko ki pala lucwan kacel ki kabakane ki gaŋi ducu ma i ŋete. Guneko dano ducu ma tye iye, pe guweko mo acel obwot. Yocwa ojwero woko liweŋ kacel ki dano ma gitye iye ducu, kit ma nene otimo i kom Eglon.
Yocwa 10:38 Yocwa ki jo Icrael ducu gulokke gudwogo cen i kom Debir, gulwenyo i kome,
Yocwa 10:39 gumako woko kacel ki kabakane ki gaŋi ma i ŋete ducu, gunekogi woko ki pala lucwan. Yocwa ojwero dano ducu ma gitye iye woko liweŋ, pe oweko iye dano acel mo mubwot. Otimo Debir ki kabakane kit ma nene otimo i kom Kebron ki i kom Libna ki kabakane.
Yocwa 10:40 Yocwa oloyo lobo-nu ducu kit meno, lobo godi ki Negeb ki pwor got ki luŋ ki lukergi ducu, pe oweko gin mo makwo obwot. Ojwero gin makwo woko ducu liweŋ kit ma yam Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael ociko-ni.
Yocwa 10:41 Yocwa oloyogi cakke i Kadec-bamea o kwede wa i Gaja, kacel ki lobo Gocen ducu o wa i Gibeon.
Yocwa 10:42 Omako luker-ru ducu ki lobogi ducu lawaŋacel, pien Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael aye noŋo obedo ka lweny pi Icrael.
Yocwa 10:43 Lacen Yocwa odok cen kacel ki jo Icrael i gony ma i Gilgal.
Yocwa 11:1 Ka Jabin kabaka me Kajor owinyo pire, ci ocwalo kwena bot Jobab kabaka me Madon, ki bot kabaka me Cimron ki kabaka me Akicap,
Yocwa 11:2 ki bot luker ma gitye yo tuŋ acam i lobo godi, ki i Araba i ŋet nam me Kinerot yo tun acuc, ki i lobo ma i pwor, ki i Napot-dor ma yo tun potoceŋ,
Yocwa 11:377 
Yocwa 11:3 bot jo Kanaan ma yo tun wokceŋ ki tun potoceŋ, ki bot jo Amor, jo Kit, jo Perej, jo Jebuc ma i lobo godi, ki jo Kiv ma i te got Kermon i lobo Mijpa.
Yocwa 11:4 Luker meno ducu gubino ki buca monygi ducu, mony madwoŋ ma welgi rom ki kweyo me dog nam, ki lwak aguragura ki gadigadi lweny mapol.
Yocwa 11:5 Gutoro monygi ducu kacel, ci gubino gugony kacel i ŋet pii me Merom pi lweny i kom jo Icrael.
Yocwa 11:6 Rwot owaco bot Yocwa ni, “Pe lworo omaki i komgi, pien diki ca onyoo noŋo doŋ amiyogi i ciŋ-jo Icrael, noŋo doŋ gunekogi woko ducu. Wubitoŋo odoŋ aguraguragi ducu, wuwaŋo gadigadi lwenygi woko ki mac.”
Yocwa 11:7 Yocwa ocito opoto i komgi atura ki lwak monnye ducu ki i ŋet pii me Merom, olwenyo kwedgi.
Yocwa 11:8 Ci Rwot omiyogi i ciŋjo Icrael, gulwenyo i komgi matek, guryemo korgi o kwede wa i Cidon Maditte ki i Micrepot-maim, yo tun potoceŋ ki wa i nota me Mijpe yo tuŋ wokceŋ kun ginekogi waŋ ma acel mo pe guweko obwot.
Yocwa 11:9 Yocwa otimogi kit ma nene Rwot ocike kwede; otoŋo odoŋ aguraguragi ducu, owaŋo gadigadi lwenygi woko awaŋa.
Yocwa 11:10 Ka man otum, Yocwa odok cen ka mako Kajor, oneko kabakane ki pala lucwan. I kare ca onoŋo Kajor aye gaŋ madit ma loyo lwak ker meno ducu.
Yocwa 11:11 Jo Icrael guneko jo ma onoŋo gitye iye ducu ki pala lucwan, gujwerogi woko liweŋ, pe guweko gin mo makwo obwot; ci guwaŋo Kajor woko.
Yocwa 11:12 Kit meno Yocwa omako luker meno ducu, ki gaŋigi, onekogi woko ki pala lucwan, omedo ki jwerogi woko liweŋ macalo gin ma gidyero bot Rwot, kit ma Moses latic pa Rwot onoŋo ocike kwede-ni.
Yocwa 11:13 Ento jo Icrael pe guwaŋo gaŋi ma gigero i wi lobo ma gitoro malo macalo got-ti, kono Kajor keken aye Yocwa owaŋo woko.
Yocwa 11:14 Jo Icrael guyako gaŋi meno ducu, gutero lim makwo ki jami ma guyako obedo megi; ento guneko dano woko ducu ki pala lucwan nio ka gutyekogi woko ducu, pe guweko gin mo makwo obwot.
Yocwa 11:15 Kit macalo Rwot yam ociko ki laticce Moses, Moses bene ociko ki Yocwa kit meno, ci Yocwa oketo i tic; otiyo gin ducu ma yam Rwot ociko ki Moses, pe oweko cik mo odoŋ ma pe ocobo kakare.
Yocwa 11:16 Yocwa omako lobo meno ducu kit meno, lobo godigodi, ki Negeb ducu, lobo Gocen, pwor got. Araba ki lobo godi me Icrael ki lobo pwor-gu ma i ŋete,
Yocwa 11:17 cakke wa i kom got Kalak ka ma lobo otiŋŋe odok kwede tuŋ Ceir, o wa i Baal- gad ma i nota Lebanon ma i te got Kermon. Omako lukergi ducu, onekogi woko.
Yocwa 11:18 Yocwa obedo ka lweny ki luker meno pi kare malac.
Yocwa 11:378 
Yocwa 11:19 Pe tye gaŋ mo ma oyubo lok me kuc ki jo Icrael, kono nyo jo Kiv ma gibedo i Gibeon keken; gaŋi ducu gumakogi ki lweny,
Yocwa 11:20 pien Rwot aye obedo ka miyo cwinygi obedo tek wek gubin ka lweny i kom jo Icrael ka wek gujwergi woko liweŋ ma pe kica mako dano mo i komgi, ento ginekgi woko, mo pe odoŋ, kit ma yam Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Yocwa 11:21 I kare meno bene Yocwa ocito ka jwero jo Anak woko ki i lobo godi; ojwerogi ki i Kebron, Debir ki Anab, i lobo godi me Juda ki me Icrael; ojwerogi woko liweŋ kacel ki gaŋigi ducu.
Yocwa 11:22 Pe guweko jo Anak mo obwot, ki i lobo pa jo Icrael; kono nyo i Gaja keken ki i Gat ki i Acidod, kunnu aye jo Anak mogo gudoŋ iye.
Yocwa 11:23 Yocwa omako lobo ducu kit meno, kit macalo yam Rwot oloko bot Moses; lacen omiyo bot jo Icrael me bedo ginaleyagi i kakagi, ma lubo kit ma kwir omakogi kwede, ci lobo doŋ ocako ywe, lweny doŋ obedo pe.
Yocwa 12:1 Magi aye nyiŋ luker ma i lobo-nu ma jo Icrael guloyogi ci gumako lobogi ma i loka Jordan yo tuŋ wokceŋ, gucamo odoko megi, cakke wa i kulu Amon o kwede wa i got Kermon, kacel ki Araba ducu ma yo tuŋ potoceŋ:
Yocwa 12:2 en aye Cikon kabaka pa jo Amor ma yam bedo i Kecbon kun loyo kwede lobo cakke wa i Aroer ma tye i dog nota me kulu Amon, dok cakke ki i dye nota-nu o kwede i kulu Jabok ma waŋ lobo pa jo Ammon, en aye nucu lobo Gilead;
Yocwa 12:3 kacel ki Araba o wa i nam me Kinerot tuŋ wokceŋ ki tuŋ yo mukemo Bet-jecimot o wa i nam me Araba, ma en aye nam me Kado, cito kwede wa i pwor got Piciga.
Yocwa 12:4 Ka doki Og kabaka me Bacan, en aye ŋat acel ma yam odoŋ ki i kom jo Repaim, ma yam bedo i Acitarot ki i Edrei.
Yocwa 12:5 En yam loyo got Kermon ki Caleka ki Bacan o kwede wa i waŋ lobo pa jo Gecur ki jo Maaka, ki nucu lobo Gilead o wa i waŋ lobo pa Cikon kabaka me Kecbon.
Yocwa 12:6 Moses ma latic pa Rwot yam oloyogi kacel ki jo Icrael; ci Moses latic pa Rwot omiyo lobogi bot jo pa Reuben ki jo pa Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace obed megi. Luker ma Yocwa oloyogi
Yocwa 12:7 Magi aye luker ma i lobo-nu ma yam Yocwa ki jo Icrael guloyogi loka Jordan yo tuŋ potoceŋ, cakke ki i Baal-gad i nota me Lebanon o wa i got Kalak ka ma lobo otiŋŋe odok kwede yo tuŋ Ceir, Yocwa omiyo lobogi bot jo Icrael me bedo megi kun gipoko ma lubo kwir ma gibolo,
Yocwa 12:8 i lobo godi, ki i lobo ma i nota, i Araba, i lobo ma i pwor got, i tim, i Negeb ki i lobo pa jo Kit, jo Amor, jo Kanaan, jo Periji, jo Kiv ki jo Jebuc; nyiŋgi ene:
Yocwa 12:379 
Yocwa 12:9 kabaka me Jeriko, kabaka me Ai ma tye i ŋet Betel;
Yocwa 12:10 kabaka me Jerucalem, kabaka me Kebron;
Yocwa 12:11 kabaka me Jarmut, kabaka me Lakic;
Yocwa 12:12 kabaka me Eglon, kabaka me Gejer;
Yocwa 12:13 kabaka me Debir, kabaka me Geder;
Yocwa 12:14 kabaka me Korma, kabaka me Arad;
Yocwa 12:15 kabaka me Libna, kabaka me Adulam;
Yocwa 12:16 kabaka me Makeda, kabaka me Betel;
Yocwa 12:17 kabaka me Tapua, kabaka me Keper;
Yocwa 12:18 kabaka me Apek, kabaka me Apek ma i Caron;
Yocwa 12:19 kabaka me Madon, kabaka me Kajor;
Yocwa 12:20 kabaka me Cimronmeron, kabaka me Akicap;
Yocwa 12:21 kabaka, me Taanak, kabaka me Megido;
Yocwa 12:22 kabaka me Kedec, kabaka me Jokneam ma i Karmel;
Yocwa 12:23 kabaka me Dor ma i Napat-dor, kabaka me Goyim ma i Galilaya;
Yocwa 12:24 ki kabaka me Tirija; gin ducu guromo pyeradek wiye acel.
Yocwa 13:1 I kare ma Yocwa doŋ oti woko, ma mwaka me ditte doŋ dwoŋ, Rwot owaco bote ni, “In doŋ iti woko ma mwaka me ditti doŋ dwoŋ, ento pud lobo odoŋ mabup ma myero obed mewu.
Yocwa 13:2 Magi aye nyiŋ lobo ma pud gudoŋ: lobo pa jo Pilciti ducu ki berre, ki lobo pa jo Gecur ducu.
Yocwa 13:3 (Lobo meno ducu gikwano ni pa jo Kanaan, cakke wa i Cikor ma i ŋet Ejipt yo tuŋ wokceŋ dok kwede i yo tuŋ acam o wa i waŋ lobo me Ekron; tye i te loc pa rwodi abic pa jo Piliciti, rwodi me Gaja, Acidod, Acikelon, Gat ki Ekron.) Pud odoŋ lobo ducu pa jo Ayi bene
Yocwa 13:4 yo tuŋ acuc; ka doki lobo ducu pa jo Kanaan cakke ki i Me-ara pa jo Cidon cito kwede wa i Apek ma i waŋ lobo pa jo Amor;
Yocwa 13:5 ki lobo pa jo Gebal, ki Lebanon ducu ma tuŋ kunyaŋo, cakke ki i Baal-gad ma i te got Kermon o kwede i yo ma donyo i Kamat.
Yocwa 13:380 
Yocwa 13:6 An ki koma abiryemo woko ki i nyim jo Icrael jo ducu ma gibedo i lobo godi, cakke ki i Lebanon o kwede i Micrepot-maim, en aye jo Cidon ducu. In aye ipok lobo-ni bot jo Icrael ki bolo kwir wek obed ginaleyagi, kit ma yam aciki kwede-ni.
Yocwa 13:7 Kombeddi doŋ ipok lobo man obed me aleya pa kaka aboŋwen mudoŋ ki pa nucu kaka pa Manace.” Lobo ma yam gipoko loka Jordan tug wokceg
Yocwa 13:8 Nucu kaka mukene pa jo Manace, kacel ki jo pa Reuben ki jo pa Gad onoŋo doŋ gutyeko gamo ginaleyagi ki i loka Jordan tuŋ wokceŋ, kit macalo Moses latic pa Rwot omiyo botgi,
Yocwa 13:9 cakke ki i Aroer ma tye i dog nota me kulu Amon ki gaŋ ma tye i dye nota-nu, kacel ki abami me Medema o wa i Dibon;
Yocwa 13:10 ki gaŋi ducu pa Cikon kabaka pa jo Amor ma yam obedo ka loc i Kecbon o kwede i waŋ apokki lobo pa jo Ammon;
Yocwa 13:11 ki lobo Gilead bene, ki lobo pa jo Gecur ki jo Maaka, got Kermon ducu, ki lobo Bacan ducu o wa i Caleka;
Yocwa 13:12 ki ker ducu pa Og ma gaŋ kalle yam gubedo Acitarot ki Edrei i lobo Bacan. En kene aye yam odoŋ ki i kin jo Repaim; kabaka aryonu Moses oloyogi, oryemogi woko.
Yocwa 13:13 Ento jo Icrael pe guryemo jo Gecur ki jo Maaka; jo Gecur ki jo Maaka pud gibedo i dye jo Icrael o wa onyoo.
Yocwa 13:14 Kaka pa Levi keken aye Moses pe omiyo botgi lobo mo me aleya; gityer ma giwaŋo ki mac bot Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael aye gubedo ma ka ginaleyagi, kit ma Rwot yam owaco bote-ni. Kaka pa Reuben
Yocwa 13:15 Moses yam omiyo ginaleya bot kaka pa jo pa Reuben muporo dogolagi ducu.
Yocwa 13:16 Pienno waŋ lobogi ocakke ki i Aroer ma tye i dog nota kulu Amon, ki gaŋ ma tye i dye nota-nu, okwako lobo abami ducu ma orabo ŋet Medeba;
Yocwa 13:17 kacel ki Kecbon ki gaŋine ducu ma guryeyo wi abami kunnu, Dibon, Bamot- baal, Bet-baalmeon,
Yocwa 13:18 Jakaj, Kedemot, Mepat,
Yocwa 13:19 Kiriataim, Cibma, Jeret-cakar ma gigero i wi got ma i dye nota,
Yocwa 13:20 Betpeor, pwor got Piciga, ki Bet-jecimot,
Yocwa 13:21 meno aye gaŋi ducu ma gitye i wi abami, ki ker ducu pa Cikon kabaka pa jo Amor ma gaŋ kalle yam tye i Kecbon, ma yam Moses olwenyo kwede oloyo woko,
Yocwa 13:381  kacel ki ludito pa jo Midian ma gubedo i lobo-nu i te loc pa Cikon; nyiŋgi aye Eyi, Rekem, Jur, Kur ki Reba,
Yocwa 13:22 Balaam wod pa Beor bene, ma Latyet, obedo i kin jo ma jo Icrael gunekogi ki pala lucwan.
Yocwa 13:23 Kulu Jordan obedo waŋ lobo pa jo Reuben. Meno aye obedo ginaleya pa jo pa Reuben ma oporo wel doggolagi, meno aye gaŋigi ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi. Kaka pa Gad
Yocwa 13:24 Moses omiyo ginaleya bot jo pa Gad bene muporo wel doggolagi.
Yocwa 13:25 Lobogi obedo Jajer ki gaŋi me lobo Gilead ducu, ki nucu lobo pa jo Ammon o wa i Aroer ma tye i ŋet Raba, yo tuŋ wokceŋ,
Yocwa 13:26 cakke ki i Kecbon cito kwede wa i Ramat-mijpe ki Betonim, dok cakke ki i Makanaim cito kwede i waŋ lobo me Lo-debar,
Yocwa 13:27 kacel ki Bet-aram, Bet-nimra, Cukot ki Japon, gaŋi ma i nota, en aye lobo mudoŋ ki i kom ker pa Cikon kabaka me Kecbon. Waŋ lobogi obedo kulu Jordan cito kwede wa i but nam me Kineret tuŋ acuc, loka Jordan tuŋ wokceŋ.
Yocwa 13:28 Meno aye obedo ginaleya pa jo pa Gad muporo wel doggolagi, meno aye gaŋigi ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi. Nucu kaka pa Manace
Yocwa 13:29 Moses omiyo ginaleya bot nucu kaka pa. Manace bene; opoko bot nucu kaka pa Manace muporo wel doggolagi.
Yocwa 13:30 Lobogi ocakke ki i Makanaim, okwako lobo Bacan ducu, en aye ker pa Og kabaka me Bacan ducu liweŋ, ki gaŋi me Jair ducu ma gitye i Bacan, gaŋi pyerabicel,
Yocwa 13:31 ki nucu lobo Gilead, kacel ki Acitarot ki Edrei ma gin aye gaŋ kal pa Og i lobo Bacan. Meno ducu gipoko bot jo pa Makir wod pa Manace, pi nucu kaka pa jo Makir muporo wel doggolagi.
Yocwa 13:32 Meno aye ginaleya ma yam Moses opoko i lobo aroo me Moab ma loka Jordan tuŋ wokceŋ mukemo Jeriko.
Yocwa 13:33 Ento ki tun bot jo Levi Moses pe omiyogi ginaleya mo; onoŋo Rwot Lubaŋagi aye obedo ginaleyagi, kit ma yam owaco botgi-ni.
Yocwa 14:1 Magi aye ginaleya ma jo Icrael gulimo ki i lobo Kanaan, ma jo magi aye gupoko botgi: ajwaka Eleajar, Yocwa wod pa Nun ki ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi.
Yocwa 14:382 
Yocwa 14:2 Ginaleyagi gipoko ki bolo kwir kit ma yam Rwot ociko bot Moses ni myero gipok kwede bot kaka aboŋwen ki nucu mudoŋ-ŋi.
Yocwa 14:3 Moses onoŋo yam opoko lobo aleya bot kaka aryo ki nucu ki i loka Jordan. Jo Levi keken aye pe gimiyo botgi lobo mo me aleyagi.
Yocwa 14:4 Likwayo pa Yucepu onoŋo gupokke i kaka aryo, jo Manace ki jo Epraim; ento pe gimiyo dul lobo mo bot jo Levi me aleyagi; gimiyogi gaŋi me bedogi keken ki olet me kwayo dyaŋigi ki Limgi mukene makwo.
Yocwa 14:5 Jo Icrael gupoko lobo i kingi kun gitiyo kit ma onoŋo Rwot ociko ki Moses. Gimiyo Kebron bot Kaleb
Yocwa 14:6 I kare meno jo pa Juda gubino bot Yocwa i Gilgal, ci Kaleb wod pe Jepune ma jo Keniji owaco bote ni, “In iŋeyo gin ma yam Rwot ociko bot Moses ma dano pa Lubaŋa-ni, ma ociko ki i Kadec-bamea, lok ma dok i komi ki i koma.
Yocwa 14:7 Onoŋo doŋ mwaka me ditta romo pyeraŋwen i kare ma Moses latic pa Lubaŋa ocwala ki i Kadec-bamea pi roto lobo, ci adwogo ki lok kit ma yam tye kwede i cwinya.
Yocwa 14:8 Utmegiwa ma yam gucito kweda-ni gumiyo cwiny lwak oŋabbe aŋaba, ento an yam alubo gin ma Rwot Lubaŋana mito ducu kikore.
Yocwa 14:9 Moses okwoŋo kwoŋ i nino meno kun wacci, ‘Adada, lobo ma yam inyono ki tyeni bibedo ginaleyani ki pa likwayi matwal, pien ibedo ka lubo gin ma Rwot Lubaŋana omito ki cwinyi ducu.’
Yocwa 14:10 Kombeddi nen ka Rwot pud ogwoka atye makwo wa onyoo kit ma yam owaco- ni, odoko doŋ mwaka pyeraŋwen wiye abic a kwede wa i kare ca ma Rwot owaco iye lok man bot Moses, ma onoŋo jo Icrael pud gitye ka wirre i tim kuca; kombeddi doŋ inen, mwaka me ditta doŋ oromo pyeraboro wiye abic.
Yocwa 14:11 Ento koma pud tek wa i kare man ma rom ki i kare ma yam Moses ocwala kwede ca; i kare-ni tek koma pud rom ki tek koma macon ca, pud aromo lweny, aromo cito ka mo-ni ci adwogo bene.
Yocwa 14:12 Pienno miya lobo-ni ma bedo lobo godi, ma yam Rwot owaco pire i kare ca. Yam iwinyo i kare meno ni jo Anak gitye kunnu kun gitye ki cog gaŋigi madito ma girumogi woko ki cel matego; ka gwok nyo Rwot bibedo kweda ci abiryemogi woko kit macalo Rwot yam owaco.”
Yocwa 14:13 Yocwa olamo gum i kome, ci omiyo Kebron bot Kaleb wod pa Jepune wek obed ginaleyane.
Yocwa 14:14 Kit meno Kebron odoko ginaleya pa likwayo pa Kaleb wod pa Jepune ma jo Keniji o wa onyoo, pien obedo ka lubo gin ma Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael mito ducu kikore.
Yocwa 14:383 
Yocwa 14:15 Nyiŋ Kebron okwoŋo bedo Kiriat-arba, dok Arba meno yam obedo dano madit makato ducu ki i kin jo Anak. Ci lobo doŋ oywe, lweny obedo pe.
Yocwa 15:1 Dul lobo ma gipoko bot kaka pa jo Juda ki bolo kwir muporo doggolagi obedo yo tuŋ acuc cok ki waŋ lobo pa jo Edom, i tim Jin ci ogik i Negeb tuŋ acuc.
Yocwa 15:2 Waŋ lobogi yo tuŋ acuc ocakke i agikki nam me Kado ki i wen nam ma okemo tuŋ acuc;
Yocwa 15:3 ka dok ocito kwede yo tuŋ acuc ka ma giito iye malo i Akrabim, ka okato wa i Jin, ocito kwede malo i ŋet Kadec-bamea yo tuŋ acuc, orabo ŋet Kejeron o wa i Adar, ka dok olokke odok kwede Karka.
Yocwa 15:4 Ka dok okato ocito i Ajimon, oo i nota ora me Ejipt, ka ogik i dog nam Meno aye waŋ lobogi yo tuŋ acuc.
Yocwa 15:5 Waŋ lobogi yo tuŋ wokceŋ aye nam me Kado o ka ma kulu Jordan gik iye. Waŋ lobo yo tuŋ acuc ocakke i wen nam ka ma Jordan ogik iye,
Yocwa 15:6 ka dok cito Bet-kogla, kato kwede i ŋet Bet-araba yo tuŋ acam, o wa i got ma Boan wod pa Reuben ocibo.
Yocwa 15:7 Ka dok cito malo Debir kun oa ki i nota me Akor, kemo kwede yo tuŋ acam, ka doŋ lokke ka kemo Gilgal ma i nyim kor got ka ma giito iye malo i Adumim ma i ŋet nota ora yo tuŋ acuc, Ka doŋ kato cito wa i pii me En-cemec ci gik kwede i En- rogel.
Yocwa 15:8 Ki kunnu waŋ lobo lubo nota pa wod pa Kinom i kor got pa jo Jebuc yo tuŋ acuc (en aye Jerucalem). Ka dok waŋ lobo cito malo i wi got ma okemo nota pa Kinom yo tuŋ potoceŋ, i agikki luŋ me Repaim yo tuŋ acuc,
Yocwa 15:9 ci medde kun a ki i wi got cito i waŋ pii me Neputoa, kato kwede wa i gaŋi ma i got Epron, ci lokke mano yo tuŋ Baala (en aye Kiriat-jearim);
Yocwa 15:10 ka oa ki i Baala ci gono cito kun kemo tuŋ potoceŋ o kwede i got Ceir, kato kwede i kor got Jearim yo tuŋ acam (en aye Kecalon). Ka dok cito piny i Bet- cemec, kato kwede i ŋet Timna.
Yocwa 15:11 Waŋ lobo a ki kunnu cito i kor got ma i ŋet Ekron tuŋ acam, ka dok lokke cito Cikeron, kato kwede wa i got Baala, cito i Jabneel; ka dok gik woko i dog nam
Yocwa 15:12 Waŋ lobo yo tuŋ potoceŋ lubo dog Nam Madit ki Waŋ watte. Meno aye waŋ lobo ducu mukwako lobo pa jo Juda ma oporo doggolagi. Kaleb oloyo Kebron ki Debir (Luŋol 1.10-15)
Yocwa 15:384 
Yocwa 15:13 Kaleb wod pa Jepune yam gimiyo dul lobo i kin jo pa Juda, kit ma onoŋo Rwot ociko ki Yocwa. Yocwa omiye Kiriat-arba, en aye Kebron. Arba obedo kwaro pa jo Anak.
Yocwa 15:14 Ci Kaleb oryemo likwayo adek pa Anak ma yam tye kunnu, gin Cecai, Akiman ki Talmai.
Yocwa 15:15 Oa ki kunnu ocito olwenyo i kom jo ma gibedo Debir. Nyiŋ Debir yam obedo Kiriat-ceper.
Yocwa 15:16 Ci Kaleb owacci, “Ka ŋatti mo olwenyo i kom Kiriat-ceper ce oloyo, ci abimiye nyara Akaca obed dakone.”
Yocwa 15:17 Otiniel wod pa Kenaj omin Kaleb aye oloyo, ci Kaleb omiye nyare Akaca obedo dakone.
Yocwa 15:18 Ka nyako ocito bot cware, ci odiye ni openy poto mo bot wonne. Opye piny ki i wi kanane ci Kaleb openye ni, “Imito gin aŋo?”
Yocwa 15:19 Nyare ogamo ni, “Miya mot mo. Macalo doŋ iketa wa i lobo Negeb, dok imiya waŋ it mo bene.” Kaleb omiye Waŋ it ma tuŋ malo ki waŋ it ma tuŋ piny bene. Gaŋi pa jo Juda
Yocwa 15:20 Man aye ginaleya pa jo me kaka pa Juda ma oporo doggolagi.
Yocwa 15:21 Gaŋigi ma obedo ka ma lobogi ogik iye yo tuŋ acuc i Negeb, ma dok yo tuŋ waŋ lobo pa jo Edom gin ene: Kabeel, Eder, Jagur,
Yocwa 15:22 Kina, Dimona, Adada,
Yocwa 15:23 Kedec, Kajor, Itnan,
Yocwa 15:24 Jip, Telem, Bealot,
Yocwa 15:25 Kajor-kadata, Keriot-kejeron, ma en aye Kajor,
Yocwa 15:26 Amam, Cema, Molada,
Yocwa 15:27 Kajar-gada, Kecmon, Betpelet,
Yocwa 15:28 Kajar-cual, Beer-ceba, Bijiotia,
Yocwa 15:29 Baala, Iyim, Ejem,
Yocwa 15:30 Eltolad, Kecil, Korma,
Yocwa 15:31 Jiklag, Madmana, Cancana,
Yocwa 15:32 Lebaot, Cilim, Ain ki Rimmon; gin ducu gaŋi pyeraryo ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:33 Gaŋigi ma obedo i pwor gin ene: Ectaol, Jora, Acna,
Yocwa 15:34 Janoa, Enganim, Tapua, Enam,
Yocwa 15:385 
Yocwa 15:35 Jarmut, Adulam, Coko, Ajeka,
Yocwa 15:36 Caaraim, Aditaim, Gedera, ki Gederotaim; gaŋi apar wiye aŋwen ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:37 Jenan, Kadaca, Migdal-gad,
Yocwa 15:38 Dilean, Mijpe, Jokteel,
Yocwa 15:39 Lakic, Bojkat, Eglon,
Yocwa 15:40 Kabon, Lamam. Kitlic,
Yocwa 15:41 Gederot, Bet-dagon, Naama ki Makeda; gaŋi apar wiye abicel ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:42 Libna, Eter, Acan,
Yocwa 15:43 Ipta, Acna, Nejib,
Yocwa 15:44 Keila, Akijib ki Mareca; gaŋi aboŋwen ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:45 Ekron ki gaŋi madito ki matinone ma i ŋete;
Yocwa 15:46 dok cakke ki i Ekton cito kwede i dog nam gaŋi ducu ma gibedo yo tuŋ Acidod ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:47 Acidod kacel ki gaŋi madito ki matino ma i ŋete; Gaja ki gaŋi madito ki matino ma i ŋete cito wa i nota ora me Ejipt ki Nam Madit ki waŋ watte.
Yocwa 15:48 I lobo godi, Camir, Jatir, Coko,
Yocwa 15:49 Dana, Kiriat-cana, en aye Debir,
Yocwa 15:50 Anab, Ectemo, Anim,
Yocwa 15:51 Gooen, Kolon ki Gilo; gaŋi apar wiye acel ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:52 Arab, Duma, Eean,
Yocwa 15:53 Janim, Bettapua, Apeka,
Yocwa 15:54 Kumta, Kiriat-arba, en aye Kebron, ki Jior; gaŋi aboŋwen ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:55 Maon, Karmel, Jip, Juta,
Yocwa 15:56 Jejreel, Jokdeam, Janoa,
Yocwa 15:57 Kain, Gibea ki Timna; gaŋi apar ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:58 Kalkul, Bet-jur, Gedor,
Yocwa 15:59 Maarat, Bet-anot ki Eltekon; gaŋi abicel ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:60 Kiriat-baal, en aye Kiriat-jearim, ki Raba; gaŋi aryo ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:386 
Yocwa 15:61 Ka dok i tim, Bet-araba, Midin, Cekaka,
Yocwa 15:62 Nibcan ma gilwoŋo ni gaŋ me Kado, ki En-gedi; gaŋi abicel ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 15:63 Ento jo Jebuc, ma gin aye jo ma gibedo i Jerucalem, jo Juda pe guryemogi woko ki i lobogi, mumiyo jo Jebuc gunywako bedo kacel ki jo Juda i Jerucalem o kwede wa onyoo.
Yocwa 16:1 Waŋ lobo pa likwayo pa Yucepu ma gipoko ki bolo kwir ocakke ki i kulu Jordan i ŋet Jeriko, oweko pii me Jeriko odoŋ tuŋ wokceŋ, ocito tuŋ tim, kun oa ki i Jeriko ocito wa i lobo godi me Betel;
Yocwa 16:2 oa ki i Betel ocito Luj, ka okato ocito Atarot ma i lobo pa jo Arki;
Yocwa 16:3 dok okato kwede yo tuŋ piny ma yo tuŋ potoceŋ, i lobo pa jo Japuleti, oo i lobo ma i ŋet Bet-koron Mapiny, ocito Gejer, ka ogik kwede i nam
Yocwa 16:4 Meno-aye obedo ginaleya pa likwayo pa Yucepu, jo Manace ki jo Epraim.
Yocwa 16:5 Lobo pa jo Epraim muporo doggolagi obedo kit man: waŋ lobogi yo tuŋ wokceŋ ocakke i Atarot-adar ocito kwede i Bet-koron Mamalo;
Yocwa 16:6 Oa ki kunnu okemo yo tuŋ nam, oo i Mikmetat yo tuŋ acam; ka dok olokke okemo Taanat-eilo yo tuŋ wokceŋ, orabo ŋete okato kun weko Janoa bene yo tuŋ wokceŋ.
Yocwa 16:7 Oa ki i ŋet Janoa ocito Atarot ki Naara, ogudo Jeriko, ocito ogik kwede i kulu Jordan
Yocwa 16:8 Waŋ lobo dok ocakke Tapua okemo yo tuŋ potoceŋ o kwede i nota ora ma nyiŋe Kana ka ogik kwede i nam Meno aye ginaleya pa jo Epraim muporo wel doggolagi,
Yocwa 16:9 kacel ki gaŋi mogo ma gikoyo pi jo Epraim i dye lobo pa jo Manace, gaŋi meno ducu ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 16:10 Ento jo Epraim pe guryemo jo Kanaan woko ma gibedo i Gejer, mumiyo jo Kanaan gibedo i dye jo Epraim o wa onyoo, ento gudoko opiigi me tiyo tic matek.
Yocwa 17:1 Dok gibolo kwir me poko dul lobo pa jo Manace, pien en aye latin kayo pa Yucepu. Yam onoŋo gimiyo Gilead ki Bacan bot Makir won Gilead, latin kayo pa Manace, pien onoŋo en lalweny.
Yocwa 17:387 
Yocwa 17:2 Ka dok gibolo kwir pi poko lobo bot jo me kaka pa Manace ma pud Odoŋ muporo doggolagi ducu, doggola pa Abiejer, Kelek, Aciriel, Cekem, Keper ki Cemida; gin aye likwayo ma co pa Manace wodpa Yucepu.
Yocwa 17:3 Jelopekad wod pa Keper onywalo anyira keken, awobene pe. Nyiŋ anyirane Makala, Noa, Kogla, Mirika ki Tirja.
Yocwa 17:4 Gin gubino i nyim ajwaka Eleajar ki Yocwa wod pa Nun, ci guwacci, “Rwot yam ociko Moses ni myero gimi ginaleya botwa kacel ki utmegiwa.” Mumiyo Yocwa omiyogi ginaleya kacel ki omegi wongi, kit ma Rwot onoŋo ociko-ni.
Yocwa 17:5 Kit meno jo pa Manace gugamo dul lobo apar medo i kom Gilead ki Bacan ma loka Jordan tuŋ wokceŋ,
Yocwa 17:6 pien anyira pa Manace bene dok gulimo ginaleya kacel ki awobene. Lobo Gilead onoŋo doŋ gimiyo bot likwayo mukene pa Manace.
Yocwa 17:7 Waŋ lobo pa jo Manace ocakke ki i Acer ocito kwede Mikmetat ma tye i ŋet Cekem yo tuŋ wokceŋ. Ka dok ocito, yo tuŋ acuc o kwede En-tapua.
Yocwa 17:8 Lobo Tapua obedo bot jo Manace, ento gaŋ Tapua kikome ma i waŋ lobo pa jo Manace onoŋo gimiyo bot jo Epraim.
Yocwa 17:9 Waŋ lobo dok ocito wa i nota ora Kana. Gaŋi ma tye kunnu i ŋet kulu-nu yo tuŋ acuc gimiyogi bot jo Epraim, kadi bed gitye i dye gaŋi pa jo Manace. Waŋ lobo pa jo Manace orabo ŋet kulu-nu yo tuŋ acam ocito kwede i nam
Yocwa 17:10 Lobo ma yo tuŋ acuc obedo pa jo Epraim ki lobo ma tuŋ acam obedo pa jo Manace, kun nam aye obedo waŋ lobogi yo tuŋ potoceŋ. Lobo pa jo Manace orwatte ki lobo pa jo Acer yo tuŋ acam, ki yo tuŋ wokceŋ orwatte ki lobo pa jo Icakar.
Yocwa 17:11 Ento i lobo pa jo Icakar ki jo Acer jo Manace gubedo ki gaŋi magi: Bet-cean ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, ki Ibleam ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete; gimiyogi bene dano ma gibedo i Dor ki En-dor ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi, ki dano ma gibedo i Taanak ki Megiddo ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi. (Me adekke obedo Napat.)
Yocwa 17:12 Ento gamo gaŋi meno loko doko megi oloyo jo Manace woko; jo Kanaan gucerre gumedo ki bedo i lobo kunnu.
Yocwa 17:13 Ento lacen ka jo Icrael gudoko tek, guketogi i tic muroni, pe guryemogi woko ducu liweŋ.
Yocwa 17:14 Kaka pa Yucepu guloko bot Yocwa kun giwaco ni, “Piŋo imiyo gibolo kwir piwa tyen acel keken, mumiyo walimo dul lobo acel keken me bedo ginaleyawa? Wan watye ki lwak dano madwoŋ mada, macalo Rwot doŋ obedo ka miyowa gum o wa onyoo.”
Yocwa 17:388 
Yocwa 17:15 Yocwa ogamo ni, “Ka wutye ki lwak dano mapol, ci wucit i buŋa wucijwer dul lobo mo ma i lobo pa jo Perej ki jo Repaim, kit macalo lobo godi pa jo Epraim pe romowu-ni.”
Yocwa 17:16 Ento jo me kaka pa Yucepu gugamo ni, “Lobo godi pe biromowa; dok bene jo Kanaan ma gibedo i bar gitye ki gadigadi nyonyo me lweny, Jo Kanaan ma gibedo Bet-cean ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋete ki gin ma gibedo i nota me Jejreel bene.”
Yocwa 17:17 Yocwa dok owaco bot likwayo pa Yucepu, jo Epraim ki jo Manace, ni, “Wun wutye ki lwak dano madwoŋ mada, dok wutye ki tek madwoŋ bene; pienno pe wubibedo ki dul lobo acel keken.
Yocwa 17:18 Lobo godi aye bibedo mewu, kadi obedo buŋa; wubijwero woko wucamo doko mewu o kwede wa i agikki waŋ lobo; pien wubiryemo jo Kanaan woko, kadi bed gitye ki gadigadi nyonyo me lweny, dok kadi bed gin jo matego.”
Yocwa 18:1 Lacen jo Icrael gucokke i Cilo, ci guguro kema me rwatte kunnu, Onoŋo gityeko loyo lobo woko ducu,
Yocwa 18:2 ento pud odoŋ kaka abiro ma peya gipoko dul lobo mo botgi me aleyagi.
Yocwa 18:3 Mumiyo Yocwa owaco bot jo Icrael ni, “Wubibedo ka juŋŋe o kwede wa awene ma pe wucito ka camo lobo ma Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwarowu doŋ omiyo botwu-ni?
Yocwa 18:4 Wukwany dano adek ki i kaka acel acel wek gucit guwirre i lobo-ni ducu, guco lok i kome kun gipo ni bibedo ginaleya pa kakagi, ka dok gudwog bota.
Yocwa 18:5 Myero gipok i dul abiro, kun noŋo jo Juda pud bimedde ki bedo i lobogi ma yo tuŋ acuc, jo pa Yucepu bene bibedo i megi ma yo tuŋ acam.
Yocwa 18:6 Wubicoyo lok i kom lobo kun wunyuto kit ma lobo tye kwede i dul acel acel i kom dul abiro-nu, wukel gin ma wucoyo-ni bota, ci abibolo kwir piwu kany i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawa.
Yocwa 18:7 Jo pa Levi pe gibilimo dul lobo mo i kinwu, pien ginaleyagi aye ticgi me bedo ajwagi pa Rwot; dok jo Gad, jo Reuben ki nucu kaka pa Manace gutyeko limo ginaleyagi loka Jordan yo tuŋ wokceŋ, ma Moses latic pa Rwot omiyo botgi.”
Yocwa 18:8 Jo meno ma gucito ka coyo lok i kom lobo gucako wotgi, ci Yocwa ocikogi kun waco ni, “Wucit wuciwirre ka coyo kit ma lobo-ni tye kwede, ka wudwog bota; ci abibolo kwir piwu kany i Cilo ki i nyim Rwot.”
Yocwa 18:9 Jo-nu gucito ka wirre i lobo-nu, kun gicoyo lok i kom gaŋ acel acel i buk ma lubo dul lobo abiro ma gupoko iye. Lacen gudwogo cen bot Yocwa i gony ma i Cilo,
Yocwa 18:10 ci Yocwa obolo kwir pigi i Cilo ki i nyim Rwot. Opoko lobo bot jo Icrael ki kunnu, kun kaka acel acel limo dullobone.
Yocwa 18:389  Lobo ma gipoko bot jo Benjamin
Yocwa 18:11 Dul lobo ma kwir okwanyo pi kaka pa Benjamin muporo doggolagi obedo kit man. Lobo ma gimiyo botgi obedo i kin lobo me kaka pa Juda ki me kaka pa Yucepu.
Yocwa 18:12 Ki yo tuŋ acam waŋ lobogi ocakke i kom kulu Jordan, ka ocito malo wa i kor got ma i get Jeriko yo tug acam, ka ocito kwede obaro kin lobo godi ma yo tuŋ potoceŋ, ka ogik kwede i tim me Bet-awen.
Yocwa 18:13 Ki kunnu waŋ lobogi ocito yo tuŋ acuc kun kemo Luj nio wa i kor got ima i jet Luj, en aye Betel, ka jog ocito Atarot-adar, kun wok ki i wi got ma tye i get Bet- koron Mapiny yo tuŋ acuc.
Yocwa 18:14 Ka dok waŋ lobo olokke omano ŋe got ma okemo Bet-koron yo tuŋ acuc kun kato i ŋet got cito kemo yo tuŋ acuc o kwede i Kiriat-baal, ma en aye Kiriat- jearim, ma gaŋ pa kaka pa Juda, ci ogik kunnu. Meno waŋ lobo ma tun potoceŋ.
Yocwa 18:15 Ki yo tuŋ acuc waŋ lobo ocakke ki i agikki gag Kiriat-jearim ocito kwede yo tun piny nio i waŋ pii me Neputoa;
Yocwa 18:16 ka dok ocito i waŋ agikki got ma okemo nota pa wod pa Kinom ma tye i agikki nota me Repaim yo tuŋ acam. Ka dok ocito piny kun lubo nota pa Kinom ma i ŋet kor got pa jo Jebuc yo tuŋ acuc o kwede En-rogel.
Yocwa 18:17 Ka dok olokke odok yo tuŋ acam wa i En-cemec, Ki kunnu dok ocito Gelilot ma i nyim kor got ka ma giito iye malo i Adumim; ka, dok cito i got ma Boan wod pa Reuben ocibo,
Yocwa 18:18 ka okato kwede ocito yo tuŋ acam ma orabo kwede kor got me Bet-araba, ocito wa i Araba.
