Yocwa 18:19 Ka dok orabo ŋet kor got me Bet-kogla kun wok yo tuŋ acam, ocito ogik i wen nam me Kado ma i but nam yo tuŋ acam ka ma kulu Jordan gik iye-ni, Meno aye waŋ lobo yo tuŋ acuc;
Yocwa 18:20 kulu Jordan aye obedo waŋ lobogi yo tuŋ wokceŋ, Meno aye ginaleya pa jo Benjamin ma oporo doggolagi, ki waŋ lobo ducu mukwako lobogi.
Yocwa 18:21 Gaŋi pa jo Benjamin muporo doggolagi gin ene; Jeriko, Bet-kogla, Emek-kejij,
Yocwa 18:22 Bet-araba. Jemaraim, Betel,
Yocwa 18:23 Avim, Para, Opra,
Yocwa 18:24 Keparammoni, Opni, Geba, gaŋi apar wiye aryo ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 18:25 Gibeon, Rama, Beerot,
Yocwa 18:26 Mijpe, Kepira, Moja,
Yocwa 18:27 Rekem, Irpeel, Tarala,
Yocwa 18:390 
Yocwa 18:28 Jela, Elep, Jebuc, ma en aye Jerucalem, Gibea ki Kiriat-jearim, gaŋi apar wiye aŋwen ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi. Meno aye ginaleya pa jo Benjamin muporo doggolagi ducu.
Yocwa 19:1 Kwir ma gibolo me aryone opoto i kom Cimeon, pi kaka pa jo Cimeon muporo doggolagi; ginaleyagi obedo i dye lobo ma gimiyo bot jo me kaka pa Juda.
Yocwa 19:2 Ginaleya pa jo Cimeon obedo gaŋ magi: Beer-ceba, Ceba, Molada,
Yocwa 19:3 Kajar-cual, Bala, Ejem,
Yocwa 19:4 Eltolad, Betul, Korma,
Yocwa 19:5 Jiklag, Betmarkabot, Kajar-cuca,
Yocwa 19:6 Bet-lebaot ki Caruken, gagi apar wiye adek ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi;
Yocwa 19:7 En-rimmon, Eter, ki Acan, gaŋi aŋwen ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi,
Yocwa 19:8 kacel ki lwak pacci ducu ma orumo ŋet gaŋi-nu o kwede wa Baalat-beer, ma gilwogo bene ni Rama me Negeb. Meno aye obedo ginaleya pa jo Cimeon ma oporo doggolagi.
Yocwa 19:9 Ginaleya pa jo Cimeon obedo dul ma gipoko ki i kom ginaleya pa jo Juda; onoŋo dullobo ma gipoko bot jo Juda obedo lac mada ma obwono komgi woko, mumiyo jo Cimeon gulimo ginaleyagi i dyegi. Lobo ma gipoko bot jo Jabulon
Yocwa 19:10 Kwir ma gibolo me adekke opoto i kom kaka pa jo Jabulon muporo doggolagi ducu, ci lobo me ginaleyagi oo wa i Carid.
Yocwa 19:11 Wag lobogi owoto yo tun potoceg oo wa i Mareal, ka ogudo kwede Dabecet ki nota ora ma i ŋet Jokneam yo tun wokceŋ.
Yocwa 19:12 Cakke ki i Carid bene waŋ lobone mukene mukemo wokceŋ ma yo tuŋ kunyaŋo ocito oo wa i waŋ lobo me Kiclot-tabor,
Yocwa 19:13 ka ocito kwede Dabera, ka oo i Japia. Ka oa ki kunnu okato yo tuŋ wokceŋ oo kwede Gat-keper ki Etkajin, ka ocito Rimmon ci olokke odok Nea.
Yocwa 19:14 Waŋ lobo yo tun acam ogom woko ocito Kanaton ci ogik i nota Iptakel.
Yocwa 19:15 Medde i kom meno gubedo ki Katat, Nakalal, Cimron, Iddat ki Beterekem; gubedo ki gaŋi apar wiye aryo ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 19:16 Meno aye ginaleya pa jo Jabulon ma oporo doggolagi, gaŋi magi ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi. Lobo ma gipoko bot jo Icakar
Yocwa 19:391 
Yocwa 19:17 Kwir ma gibolo me aŋwenne opoto i kom Icakar pi kaka pa jo Icakar muporo doggolagi.
Yocwa 19:18 I lobogi onoŋo tye iye gaŋi magi: Jejreel, Kecuiot, Cunem,
Yocwa 19:19 Kaparaim, Sion, Anakarat,
Yocwa 19:20 Rabit, Kicion, Ebej,
Yocwa 19:21 Remet, Enganim, En-kada, Bet-pajej.
Yocwa 19:22 Waŋ lobogi ogudo Tabor bene, Cakajuma ki Bet-cemec, ci ogik i kulu Jordan. Gaŋigi ducu obedo apar wiye abicel, ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 19:23 Meno aye ginaleya pa jo Icakar muporo doggolagi, gaŋi magi ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi. Lobo ma gipoko bot jo Acer,
Yocwa 19:24 Kwir ma gibolo me abicce opoto i kom kaka pa jo Acer muporo doggolagi.
Yocwa 19:25 Lobogi onoŋo tye iye gaŋi magi: Kelkat, Kali, Beten, Akicap,
Yocwa 19:26 Alam melek, Amad ki Mical. Waŋ lobogi ogudo Karmel yo tuŋ potoceŋ, ki Cikor- libnat;
Yocwa 19:27 lacen olokke odok tuŋ wokceŋ ocito Bet-dagon, ci ogudo lobo pa jo Jabulon ki nota Iptakel yo tuŋ acam i Bet-emek ki Neiel. Waŋ lobo ma yo tuŋ acam ocito Kabul,
Yocwa 19:28 Ebron, Rekob, Kamon ki Kana ci oo wa i Cidon Maditte;
Yocwa 19:29 lacen olokke ocito Rama oo kwede Turo ma gicelo ki cel gogo-ni, ci olokke ocito Koca ka ogik i dog nam. Gaŋigi mukene obedo Makalab,
Yocwa 19:30 Umma, Apek ki Rekob, ducu pyeraryo ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 19:31 Meno aye ginaleya pa jo Acer muporo doggolagi, gaŋi magi ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi. Lobo ma gipoko bot jo Naputali
Yocwa 19:32 Kwir ma gibolo me abicel opoto i kom kaka pa jo Naputali muporo doggolagi.
Yocwa 19:33 Waŋ lobogi ocakke i Kelep i te yat kworo ma i Jaananim owok ki i Adami-nekeb ki Jabneel, ocito wa i Lakun ka ogik kwede i kulu Jordan.
Yocwa 19:34 Ki kunnu waŋ lobo olokke okemo yo tuŋ potoceŋ ocito Ajinot-tabor, oa ki kunnu ocito Kukok; kumeno ogudo lobo pa jo Jabulon yo tuŋ acuc, lobo pa jo Acer yo tuŋ potoceŋ ki kulu Jordan yo tuŋ wokceŋ.
Yocwa 19:35 Gaŋigi ma gicelo ki cel gogo obedo Jidim, Jer, Kammat, Rakat, Kineret,
Yocwa 19:36 Adama, Rama, Kajor,
Yocwa 19:392 
Yocwa 19:37 Kedec, Edrei, En-Kajor,
Yocwa 19:38 Yiron, Migdalel, Korem, Bet-anat ki Bet-cemec: Gaŋigi ducu obedo apar wiye aboŋwen ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 19:39 Meno aye ginaleya pa jo Naputali ma oporo doggolagi, gaŋi magi ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi. Lobo ma gipoko bot jo Dan
Yocwa 19:40 Kwir, ma gibolo me abiro opoto i kom kaka pa jo Dan muporo doggolagi.
Yocwa 19:41 I lobo me ginaleyagi onoŋo tye iye gaŋi magi Jora, Ectaol, Ir-cemec,
Yocwa 19:42 Caalahin, Aijalon, Itla,
Yocwa 19:43 Elon, Timna, Ekron,
Yocwa 19:44 Elteke, Gibeton, Baalat,
Yocwa 19:45 Jekud, Bene-barak, Gat-rimmon,
Yocwa 19:46 Mejarkon ki Rakon ki lobo ma i nyim Jopa.
Yocwa 19:47 Ento ka lobo pa jo Dan orwenyo woko ki i ciŋgi, gucito gulwenyo i kom gaŋ mo ma nyiŋe Lecem, gumayo, guneko dano ma gubedo iye ducu ki pala lucwan, guloko gaŋ meno odoko megi, gucako bedo iye. Guloko nyiŋ Lecem gucako ni, Dan macalo nyiŋ kwarogi Dan.
Yocwa 19:48 Meno aye ginaleya pa jo Dan ma oporo doggolagi, gaŋi magi ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi. Lobo ma gimiyo bot Yocwa
Yocwa 19:49 Ka doŋ gutyeko poko lobo i dul mapatpat me bedo ginaleyagi, jo Icrael gumiyo dul lobo bot Yocwa wod pa Nun obed ginaleyane i kingi.
Yocwa 19:50 Gumiyo bote gaŋ ma en olego ki botgi kit ma Rwot ocikogi kwede, en aye Timnatcera ma i lobo godi pa jo Epraim. En dok ogero gaŋŋe odoco ci obedo iye.
Yocwa 19:51 Meno aye ginaleya ma ajwaka Eleajar ki Yocwa ki ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi gupoko bot jo Icrael i Cilo i nyim Rwot i doggola kema me rwatte kun gibolo iye kwir; gutyeko poko lobo kit meno.
Yocwa 20:1 Rwot dok owaco bot Yocwa ni,
Yocwa 20:2 “Wac bot jo Icrael ni, ‘Wu yer gaŋi me laro lunek dano ma yam aloko pigi botwu ki i dog Moses,
Yocwa 20:393 
Yocwa 20:3 wek lunek ma pe guneko dano akaka, nyo ma pe gupiro pi nekone apira, guriŋ gular iye komgi. Gaŋi magi bibedo me laro lanek dano ki bot lacul kwor remo.
Yocwa 20:4 Lanek biriŋo laro gaŋ mo i kingi, ci bicuŋ i nyim dog gaŋ ma gidonyo kwede-ni wek otit lokke bot ludoŋo me gaŋ meno. Ka gin gibi tere wa i gaŋ, gimine kabedo mo, ci en bibedo kwedgi kunnu.
Yocwa 20:5 Ka ce wat macok pa lato ma lacul kwor remo-ni olubo kore, pe gibimiyo lanek meno i ciŋgi, pien pe oneko lawote ma onoŋo opiro pi nekone apira, dok onoŋo en yam pe tye ki kit mone mo i kome i kare macon ca.
Yocwa 20:6 En bibedo i gaŋ meno nio ka bicuŋ i nyim kacokke wek giŋol koppe, ci bikuro nio wa i kare ma ajwaka madit ma onoŋo tye ka tic i kare meno otyeko to. Lacen en twero dok i gaŋŋe wa tugi kikome, i gaŋ ma yam en oa ki iye i kare ma oriŋo olaro kome-ni.’ ”
Yocwa 20:7 Ci jo Icrael guyero gaŋi magi, gukwerogi pi tic man: Kedec ma i Galilaya i lobo godi pa jo Naputali, Cekem i lobo godi pa jo Epraim, ki Kiriat-arba, en aye Kebron, i lobo godi pa jo Juda.
Yocwa 20:8 Ki loka Jordan ma i ŋe Jeriko yo tuŋ wokceŋ guyero Bejer ma i tim ma bedo cerecere i lobo pa jo Reuben, Ramot ma i Gilead i lobo pa jo Gad, ki Golan ma i Bacan i lobo pa jo Manace.
Yocwa 20:9 Meno aye gaŋi ma giyerogi pi kaka pa jo Icrael ducu kacel ki welo ma lubedo i kingi, wek lanek dano ma pe oneko akaka oriŋ olar iye kome, wek pe oto i ciŋ lacul kwor remo nio waŋ ma ocuŋ i nyim kacokke.
Yocwa 21:1 Ludito wi kaka pa kwaro pa Lulevi gubino bot ajwaka Eleajar ki Yocwa wod pa Nun ki ludito wi kaka pa jo Icrael mukene ducu.
Yocwa 21:2 Gubino botgi i Cilo i lobo Kanaan, guwaco botgi ni, “Rwot yam ociko ki i dog Moses ni myero gimi botwa gaŋi me bedowa kacel ki lobo ma i ŋetgi me olet-gu pi kwayo limwa makwo.”
Yocwa 21:3 Ci jo Icrael gulubo cik pa Rwot, gumiyo gaŋi magi bot Lulevi kacel ki lobo me oletgi kun gikwanyo ki i kom ginaleyagi:
Yocwa 21:4 Kwir okwoŋo poto i kom jo Kokat ci Lulevi ma likwayo pa ajwaka Aron gulimo gaŋi apar wiye adek ki bot jo Juda, jo Cimeon ki jo Benjamin kun onoŋo giyerogi ki bolo kwir.
Yocwa 21:5 Jo Kokat mudoŋŋe gulimo gaŋi apar ki bot jo Epraim, jo Dan ki nucu kaka pa jo Manace muporo doggolagi.
Yocwa 21:394 
Yocwa 21:6 Jo Gercon gulimo gaŋi apar wiye adek ki bot jo Icakar, jo Acer, jo Naputali ki nucu kaka pa Manace ma i Bacan muporo doggolagi.
Yocwa 21:7 Jo Merari gulimo gaŋi apar wiye aryo ki bot jo Reuben, jo Gad ki jo Jabulon muporo doggolagi.
Yocwa 21:8 Gaŋi magi ki lobo olet ma i ŋetgi jo Icrael gumiyo bot jo Levi kun gibolo kwir, kit macalo Rwot yam ociko ki i dog Moses.
Yocwa 21:9 Gaŋi ma gulimo ki bot kaka pa Juda ki Cimeon,
Yocwa 21:10 gaŋi ma gimiyo bot likwayo pa Aron, ma gin aye doggola acel i kin jo Kokat ma Lulevi-ni nyiŋgi ene.
Yocwa 21:11 Kwir okwoŋo poto i komgi ci gimiyo botgi Kiriat-arba, en aye Kebron, ma i lobo godi me Juda, kacel ki lobo olet ma orume dyere. Arba obedo kwaro pa jo Anak.
Yocwa 21:12 Ento potti ducu ma i ŋet gaŋ meno, ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete yam onoŋo gimiyogi woko bot Kaleb wod pa Jepune me bedo mere.
Yocwa 21:13 Gimiyo Kebron ki lobo olet ma i ŋete bot likwayo pa ajwaka Aron, en aye gaŋ me laro lunek dano, Libna ki lobo olette,
Yocwa 21:14 Jatir ki olette, Ectemoa ki olette,
Yocwa 21:15 Kolon ki olette, Debir ki olette,
Yocwa 21:16 Ain ki olette, Juta ki olette, Bet-cemec ki olette, gaŋi aboŋwen mua ki bot kaka aryo-nu.
Yocwa 21:17 Ka doki gimiyo botgi gaŋi magi mua ki bot jo Benjamin: Gibeon, Geba,
Yocwa 21:18 Anatot ki Almon, gaŋi aŋwen ki olet ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 21:19 Gaŋi ducu ma gimiyo bot likwayo pa ajwaka Aron gubedo apar wiye adek, kun gaŋ acel acel tye ki lobo me olet i ŋete.
Yocwa 21:20 Lulevi me doggola mogo pa jo Kokat mudoŋ gulimo gaŋi magi ma i lobo pa jo Epraim:
Yocwa 21:21 Cekem, gaŋ me laro lunek dano ma i lobo godi me Epraim, ki olette, Gejer ki olette,
Yocwa 21:22 Kibjaim ki olette, Bet-koron ki olette, gaŋi aŋwen.
Yocwa 21:23 Ki bot kaka pa Dan gulimo Elteke, Gibeton,
Yocwa 21:24 Aijalon ki Gat-rimmon, gagi aŋwen ki olet ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 21:25 Ki bot nucu kaka pa Manace gulimo Taanak ki Gat-rimmon ki olet ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 21:26 Kumeno gaŋi ducu ma gimiyo bot doggola mukene pa jo Kokat gubedo apar, kun gaŋ acel acel tye ki lobo olet i ŋete.
Yocwa 21:395 
Yocwa 21:27 Jo Gercon ma doggola mukene pa Lulevi gulimo gaŋi aryo ki bot nucu kaka pa Manace, gin aye Golan ma i Bacan ma gaŋ me laro lunek dano ki olet ma i ŋete, ki Be-eciterot ki olette.
Yocwa 21:28 Ki bot jo Icakar gulimo Kicion, Oaberat,
Yocwa 21:29 Jarmut ki En-ganim, gaŋi aŋwen ki olet ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 21:30 Ki bot jo Acer gulimo Mical, Abdon,
Yocwa 21:31 Kelkat ki Rekob, gaŋi aŋwen ki olet ma i ŋeti.
Yocwa 21:32 Ki bot jo Naputali gulimo Kedec i Galilaya, gaŋ me laro lunek dano, Kamot-dor ki Kartan, gaŋi adek ki olet ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 21:33 Kumeno gaŋi ducu ma gimiyo bot doggola mapatpat pa jo Gercon obedo apar wiye adek, kun gaŋ acel acel tye ki lobo olet i ŋete.
Yocwa 21:34 Lulevi mukene, ma gin aye doggola pa jo Merari, gulimo ki bot jo Jabulon Jokneam, Karta,
Yocwa 21:35 Dimna ki Nakalal, gaŋi aŋwen ki olet ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 21:36 Ki bot jo Reuben gulimo Bejer, Jakaj,
Yocwa 21:37 Kedemot ki Mepat, gaŋi aŋwen ki olet ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 21:38 Ki bot jo Gad gulimo Ramot ma i Gilead ma gaŋ me laro lunek dano, Makanaim,
Yocwa 21:39 Kecbon ki Jajer, gaŋi aŋwen ki olet ma i ŋetgi.
Yocwa 21:40 Gaŋi ducu ma gimiyo bot doggola mapatpat pa jo Merari, en aye bot doggola pa Lulevi mudoŋŋe, obedo apar wiye aryo.
Yocwa 21:41 Gaŋi ducu pa Lulevi ma gitye i dye lobo pa jo Icrael gubedo pyeraŋwen wiye aboro, ki oletgi.
Yocwa 21:42 Gaŋ acel acel onoŋo tye ki lobo olet ma orume dyere; gaŋigi ducu gubedo kit meno. Jo Icrael gucamo lobo
Yocwa 21:43 Kit meno Rwot omiyo bot jo Icrael lobo ducu ma yam okwoŋo pire ni ebimiyo bot kwarogi-ni; gucamo lobone kit meno, ci gubedo iye.
Yocwa 21:44 Rwot omiyogi yweyo i kabedogi ducu kit ma yam okwoŋo bot kwarogi; pe lamerokgi acel mo ocun i nyimgi, pien Rwot onoŋo omiyo lumerokgi ducu i ciŋgi.
Yocwa 21:45 Lok mabeco ducu ma yam onoŋo Rwot ociko ki jo Icrael ocobbe kakare, pe onen lok mo ma pe otimme.
Yocwa 22:396 
Yocwa 22:1 Lacen Yocwa olwoŋo jo Reuben, jo Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace,
Yocwa 22:2 ci owaco botgi ni, “Wutyeko cobo gin ducu ma yam Moses latic pa Rwot ocikowu kwede, dok wubedo ka woro doga bene i lok ducu ma acikowu kwede.
Yocwa 22:3 Pe wubwoto utmegiwu i lwak kare man ducu o kwede wa onyoo, ento wuketo cwinywu ka lubo lok ma Rwot Lubaŋawu ocikowu kwede.
Yocwa 22:4 Kombeddi Rwot Lubaŋawu doŋ otyeko miyo yweyo bot utmegiwu kit ma yam ocikogi kwede-ni; pienno wun doŋ wulokke wudok cen i pacowu ka ma lobo ma yam wucamo odoko mewu tye iye, i lobo ma yam Moses latic pa Rwot omiyo botwu loka Jordan.
Yocwa 22:5 Ber wugwokke ka lubo cik ki lok ducu ma yam Moses latic pa Rwot ocikowu kwede, ni, wumar Rwot Lubaŋawu, kun wulubo yone ducu ki lok ma en ociko, wumok i kome likiŋ kun wutiyo bote ki cwinywu ducu ki tipo komwu ducu.”
Yocwa 22:6 Kit meno Yocwa ocikogi kun lamo gum i komgi, ka ocwalogi kwede tugi, ci gudok i pacogi.
Yocwa 22:7 Onoŋo Moses yam omiyo dul lobo bot nucu kaka pa Manace i Bacan, ento nucu kakane mukene Yocwa aye omiyo lobo botgi ma ka ŋet utmegigi ma i lobo ma loka Jordan yo tuŋ potoceŋ, I kare ma Yocwa ocwalogi i pacogi, olamo gum i komgi,
Yocwa 22:8 kun waco botgi ni, “Doŋ wudok cen i pacowu ki lonyo madwoŋ, ki lwak lim makwo mapol, ki ryal, jabu, mola, nyonyo ki boŋŋi-gu, wucit wupok jami ma wuyako ki bot lukworwu i kinwu ki utmegiwu.”
Yocwa 22:9 Kit meno jo Reuben, jo Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace gucako dok i pacogi; gupokke woko ki jo Icrael i Cilo ma tye i lobo Kanaan, gucito i lobo Gilead, en aye lobogi kikome ma yam gulimo, kit ma Rwot onoŋo ociko ki Moses.
Yocwa 22:10 Ka guo i Gelilot i ŋet kulu Jordan, ma tye i lobo Kanaan, ci jo Reuben, jo Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace gucano keno tyer i ŋet Jordan, keno tyer madit mada.
Yocwa 22:11 Ci jo Icrael guwinyo lok ni, “Jo Reuben, jo Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace gucano keno tyer i waŋ lobo me Kanaan, i Gelilot ma i ŋet Jordan mukemo lobo pa jo Icrael.”
Yocwa 22:12 Ka jo Icrael guwinyo pire, ci lwak jo Icrael ducu gucokke i Cilo ka yubo lweny i komgi.
Yocwa 22:13 Jo Icrael gucwalo Finekaci wod pa ajwaka Eleajar bot jo Reuben, jo Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace i lobo Gilead,
Yocwa 22:14 kacel ki rwodi apar. Gucwalo rwot acel ki i kaka acel acel pa jo Icrael, kun rwot acel acel obedo ladit ma loyo doggola mo i kin kaka pa jo Icrael.
Yocwa 22:397 
Yocwa 22:15 Ka doŋ guo bot jo Reuben, jo Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace ma i lobo Gilead, ci guwaco botgi ni,
Yocwa 22:16 “Lwak pa Rwot ducu guwaco botwu kit man ni, ‘Man kit robo dog aŋo ma wutimo i kom Lubaŋa pa Icrael-li, mumiyo wulokke woko wuweko lubo kor Rwot, wucano keno tyer piwu kenwu, wucako jemo woko i kom Rwot?
Yocwa 22:17 Bal ma otimme i Peor pud pe oromowu ce, ma yam two gemo opoto pire i kom lwak pa Rwot? Pud peya walonnye i kom bal meno wa onyoo,
Yocwa 22:18 ci dok pud wumedde ki weko lubo kor Rwot i kare man? Ka ce dok wujemo woko i kom Rwot tin, ci diki kiniga bimake i kom lwak jo Icrael ducu.
Yocwa 22:19 Ento koni ka lobowu obedo keni, ci wudok cen i lobo pa Rwot ka ma kema pa Rwot ocuŋ iye-ni, wuyer dul lobo mo i kinwa kunnu wek wubed iye; ento pe dok wujem i kom Rwot aye, nyo pe wulokwa wadok lujemo pi cano keno tyer mukene ma dok pat ki keno tyer pa Rwot Lubaŋawa kikome.
Yocwa 22:20 Akan wod pa Jera yam pe oŋayo waŋ Rwot ce pi lok ma dok i kom jami ma onoŋo gidyerogi woko bot Rwot, ci omiyo akemo opoto i kom lwak jo Icrael ducu? Dok en pe oto kene pi ballenu.’ ”
Yocwa 22:21 Jo Reuben jo Gad ki nucu kaka ka Manace gudok iye bot ludito wi doggola pa jo Icrael ni,
Yocwa 22:22 “Rwot aye Lubaŋa ma loyo lubaŋa ducu! Rwot aye Lubaŋa ma loyo lubaŋa ducu! En ŋeyo, dok en weko Icrael bene ŋeyo! Ka ce man otimme pi jemo nyo pi ŋayo waŋ Rwot, ci tin pe wubwotwa makwo.
Yocwa 22:23 Ka ce wacano keno tyer pi weko lubo kor Rwot, nyo ka ce wacano pi tyero iye gitum awaŋa, nyo gityer me moko kwon, nyo gityer lakwecwiny, ci wek Rwot kikome aye ocul kwor i komwa.
Yocwa 22:24 Pe kumeno gire, ento wan onoŋo watimo pi lworo pi kare ma bibino anyim, pien likwayowu gibiwaco bot likwayowa ni, ‘Wun wuwaco ni Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael obedo Lubaŋawu niŋniŋ?
Yocwa 22:25 Rwot doŋ otyeko keto kulu Jordan obedo waŋ lobo i kin wan ki wun; pienno wun jo Reuben ki jo Gad pe wutye ki waŋ pok mo i kom Rwot.’ Lok macalo meno bimiyo likwayowu gijuko likwayowa, ci miyo giweko woro Rwot woko.
Yocwa 22:26 En aye lok mumiyo wawaco ni, ‘Wek wacanu keno tyer, pe pi gitum awaŋa nyo pi tumo iye gitum mo,
Yocwa 22:27 ento watim me bedo caden i kin wan ki wun, ki i kin yalwak ma bilubowa i anyim, ma nyuto ni wan bene waworo Rwot ki gitum awaŋa ki gitum mukene ki gityer lakwecwiny ina watyero i nyime; wek likwayowu pe guwac bot likwayowa i kare ma bibino anyim ni, “Wun pe wutye ki waŋ pok mo i kom Rwot.” ‘
Yocwa 22:398 
Yocwa 22:28 Onoŋo watamo ni, ka giloko botwa kit meno, nyo bot likwayowa i kare me anyim, ci wabidok iye ni, ‘Nen kit keno tyer ma yam kwarowa gucano muporo keno tyer pa Rwot kikome. Pe gucano pi gitum awaŋa nyo pi tyero kit gitum mo, ento me bedo caden i kin wan ki wun.’
Yocwa 22:29 Wanonoŋo pe wayubbe pi jemo i kom Rwot wacel, nyo me weko lubo kor Rwot i kare man pi cano keno tyer me tumo gitum awaŋa, nyo me tyero gityer me moko kwon nyo kadi kit gitum mo me ameda i kom keno tyer pa Rwot Lubaŋawa ma i nyim kemane-ni!”
Yocwa 22:30 Ka ajwaka Finekaci ki rwodi ma luwi lwak, ki ludito kaka ma i Icrael ma onoŋo gitye kacel kwede guwinyo lok pa jo Reuben, jo Gad ki jo Manace ma gudok iye- ni, ci cwinygi obedo yom mada.
Yocwa 22:31 Finekaci wod pa ajwaka Eleajar owaco bot jo Reuben, jo Gad ki jo Manace ni, “Tin doŋ waniaŋ atir ni, Rwot tye i dyewa, pien wun pe wutimo man pi robo dog Rwot; kombeddi doŋ wutyeko laro jo Icrael woko ki i cin Rwot.”
Yocwa 22:32 Lacen Finekaci wod pa ajwaka Eleajar ki rwodi ducu gua ki bot jo Reuben ki jo Gad ma i lobo Gilead, gudok i Kanaan bot jo Icrael ma tye kunnu, ci gudwoko lok botgi.
Yocwa 22:33 Lok ma gudwoko botgi oyomo cwiny jo Icrael mada, ci gupwoyo Lubaŋa, pe dok gumedde ki loko me cito ka lweny i komgi nyo pi balo lobo ma jo Reuben ki jo Gad gibedo iye-ni woko.
Yocwa 22:34 Jo Reuben ki jo Gad gucako nyiŋ keno tyer ma gucano ni, Caden, pien guwaco ni, “Man aye bedo me caden i kin wan ki wun ma moko ni, Rwot en aye Lubaŋa.”
Yocwa 23:1 Ka kare okato malac ma Rwot doŋ otyeko miyo yweyo bot jo Icrael i kom lumerokgi ducu ma yam orumogi dyere-ni, onoŋo Yocwa doŋ oti woko, mwaka me ditte doŋ dwoŋ.
Yocwa 23:2 Olwoŋo jo Icrael ducu, ki ludoŋogi, ludito wigi, luŋolkopgi ki ludito ticgi ducu, ci owaco botgi ni, “An kombeddi doŋ ati woko, mwaka me ditta doŋ dwoŋ.
Yocwa 23:3 Wun doŋ wutyeko neno gin ducu ma Rwot Lubaŋawu otiyo piwu i kom rok magi ducu, pien Rwot Lubaŋawu aye obedo ka lweny i komgi piwu.
Yocwa 23:4 Nen ka doŋ atyeko poko rok mapatpat ma, pud gudoŋ i kinwu me bedo ginaleya pa kakawu, kacel ki rok ducu ma yam doŋ aloyogi woko, cakke ki i Jordan o kwede wa i Nam Madit ma yo tuŋ potoceŋ.
Yocwa 23:5 Rwot Lubaŋawu bidirogi woko cen kun ryemogi woko ki i nyimwu, ci wubicamo lobogi kit ma yam Rwot Lubaŋawu ocikke kwede botwu-ni.
Yocwa 23:399 
Yocwa 23:6 Pienno wucuŋ matek kun, wulubo gin ducu ma gicoyo i buk me cik pa Moses, pe wuŋak wudok yo tuŋ acuc nyo yo tuŋ acam.
Yocwa 23:7 Pe wunyebbe ki bedo kacel ki lurok ma pud gudoŋ i kinwu-ni, pe wutuc nyiŋ Iubanagi, pe wukwoŋ kwoŋ mo ki nyiŋ lubaŋagi, pe wuworgi, pe wuryebbe i nyimgi.
Yocwa 23:8 Ento wumok likiŋ i kom Rwot Lubaŋawu kit ma wubedo ka timone o kwede wa onyoo-ni.
Yocwa 23:9 Rwot doŋ otyeko ryemo rok madito ki matego woko ki i nyimwu; ŋat mo peya onen ma obedo ki twero me cuŋ i nyimwu.
Yocwa 23:10 Dano acel mo ki i kinwu romo ryemo jo alip kulu, pien Rwot Lubaŋawu aye tye ka lweny piwu kit ma yam owaco botwu-ni.
Yocwa 23:11 Doŋ ba, myero wugwokke matek, wunen ni wumaro Rwot Lubaŋawu;
Yocwa 23:12 pien ka wudok cen kun wuribbe ki lurok ma gudoŋ i kinwu, ka ce wucako nyomme kwedgi kun wunyomo anyiragi ka dok gin bene ginyomo anyirawu,
Yocwa 23:13 ci wuŋe atir ni, Rwot Lubaŋawu pe dok bimedde ki ryemo lumerokwu woko ki i nyimwu; ento gin aye gibidoko macalo owic ki layutta me cikowu, ki odoo gayi me jwato pyerwu ki okuto me cobo waŋwu, nio ka wubito wutum woko ki i lobo man maber ma Rwot Lubaŋawu doŋ omiyo botwu-ni.
Yocwa 23:14 “Kombeddi an doŋ atye cok ka lubo yo ma gin me wi lobo ducu mol ci to iye-ni, wun bene wuŋeyo ki i cwinywu wa ki tipo komwu ducu ni, gin mabeco ducu ma yam Rwot Lubaŋawu ociko piwu gin ducu gucobbe kakare, pe tye acel mo ma pe otimme.
Yocwa 23:15 Ento kit ma yam Rwot Lubaŋawu ocobo lok ducu mabeco ma yam ociko piwu- ni, kit meno bene Rwot dok bikelo gin ducu maraco i komwu, nio ka, bityekowu woko ki i lobo man maber ma en omiyo botwu-ni,
Yocwa 23:16 ka ce wuturo gicikke pa Rwot Lubaŋawu ma yam ocikowu kwede kun wucito ka woro lubaŋa mogo mukene, wuryebbe i nyimgi. Kiniga bimako Rwot i komwu, ci wubito wutum woko oyotoyot ki i lobo man maber ma en omiyo botwu.”
Yocwa 24:1 Lacen Yocwa dok ocoko kaka pa jo Icrael ducu kacel i Cekem; olwoŋo ludoŋo ki luwi lwak, luŋolkop ki ludito tic ma i Icrael ducu, ci gubino guryeyo i nyim Lubaŋa.
Yocwa 24:2 Yocwa owaco bot lwak ducu ni, “Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael owaco kuman ni, ‘Kwarowu yam con gubedo i lobo ma loka kulu Euprate, ci gubedo ka woro lubaŋa mogo mukene. Ŋat acel i kingi obedo Tera ma won Abraim ki Nakor.
Yocwa 24:400 
Yocwa 24:3 An yam akwanyo kwarowu Abraim woko ki i lobo ma loka kulu Euprate, ci atelo wiye awok kwede i lobo Kanaan ducu, dok amiyo likwaye gunya mapol. Amiyo bote Icaka,
Yocwa 24:4 dok amiyo bot Icaka litinone Yakobo ki Ecau. Amiyo lobo godi me Ceir bot Ecau me bedo mere, ento Yakobo ki litinone gucito megi wa i Ejipt.
Yocwa 24:5 Ka dok acwalo Moses ki Aron, ci ayelo jo Ejipt ki gemo mapol ki kit gin ducu ma atimo i kingi; ka lacen akwanyowu woko ki kunnu.
Yocwa 24:6 Akwanyo kwarowu woko ki i Ejipt ci wuo wa i dog nam: io Ejipt guryemo kor kwarowu ki gadigadi lweny ki aguragura o kwede wa i dog Nam Makwar.
Yocwa 24:7 Ka kwarowu gukok bot Rwot, en oketo piny macol i kin wun ki jo Ejipt, ka dok odwoko nam cen i komgi ci omwonyogi woko ducu. Yam wuneno ki waŋwu gin ma atimo i kom jo Ejipt, dok wubedo i tim pi lwak kare malac.
Yocwa 24:8 “ ‘Ka dok akelowu i lobo pa jo Amor ma gubedo loka Jordan tuŋcel. Gulwenyo kwedwu ento amiyogi i ciŋwu; wumako lobogi wucamo odoko mewu, ci atyekogi woko ki i nyimwu.
Yocwa 24:9 I ŋe meno Balak wod pa Jipor, kabaka me Moab, otiŋŋe olwenyo i kom jo Icrael; ka dok ocwalo kwena olwoŋo Balaam wod pa Beor ni obin wek ocenwu woko,
Yocwa 24:10 ento an pe awinyo dog Balaam, mumiyo en dok olamo gum i komwu; kit meno alarowu woko ki i ciŋ Balak.
Yocwa 24:11 Wukato loka Jordan, wubino i Jeriko, ci jo Jeriko gulwenyo i komwu, kacel ki jo Amor, jo Periji, jo Kanaan, jo Kit, jo Girgac, jo Kiv ki jo Jebuc, ento amiyogi ducu i ciŋwu.
Yocwa 24:12 I kare meno acoro pino jobi i nyimwu pi ryemo luker pa jo Amor aryo ducu woko ki i nyimwu; pe wun aye wuloyogi ki pala lucwanwu nyo atumwu.
Yocwa 24:13 Amiyo botwu lobo ma yam pe wutiyo iye gin mo, ki gaŋi ma yam pe wun aye wugerogi, ci wubedo iye; wutye ka camo nyig olok ki nyig jeituni ma yam pe wupitogi.’
Yocwa 24:14 “Pi meno doŋ wulwor Rwot, wuti bote ki leŋcwiny ki gen madwoŋ, Wubol woko lwak lubaŋa ma yam kwarowu gubedo ka worogi i lobo ma loka kulu Euprate ki i lobo Ejipt wek doŋ wuwor Rwot.
Yocwa 24:15 Ka pe wumito woro Rwot, ci tin doŋ wuyer ŋat ma wubitiyo bote, ka nyo wubiyero lubaŋa ma yam kwarowu gutiyo botgi i lobo ma loka kulu Euprate, nyo lubaŋa pa jo Amor ma wubedo i lobogi-ni; ento an gira ki jo ma i oda ducu wabitiyo bot Rwot.”
Yocwa 24:16 Lwak gudok iye ni, “Wan pe wabedo ki tam mo me bwoto Rwot pi tiyo bot lubaŋa mukene,
Yocwa 24:401 
Yocwa 24:17 pien Rwot Lubaŋawa aye yam okwanyowa kacel ki kwarowa ki i lobo Ejipt, ki i ot kol me bedo opii. Otiyo lwak lanyut madito kun wan waneno, ogwokowa i yo ducu ma wawoto iye ki i kom rok ducu ma wakato wawok i kingi-ni.
Yocwa 24:18 Rwot oryemo rok meno ducu woko ki i nyimwa, gin jo Amor ma yam gubedo i lobo-ni, mumiyo wan wabitiyo bot Rwot, pien en aye Lubaŋawa.”
Yocwa 24:19 Ento Yocwa dok owaco bot lwak ni, “Pe wutwero tiyo bot Rwot, pien en Lubaŋa maleŋ, en Lubaŋa ma lanyeko. Pe bitimowu kica i kom tim aranyiwu ki balwu.
Yocwa 24:20 Ka ce wubwoto Rwot kun wutiyo bot lubaŋa mogo pa lurok, ci en bilokke ka timowu marac ci tyekowu woko, kadi bed yam koŋ onoŋo otimowu maber.”
Yocwa 24:21 Lwak gugamo dog Yocwa ni, “Pe kumeno; wan giwa wabitiyo bot Rwot.”
Yocwa 24:22 Yocwa dok owaco bot lwak ni, “Wun aye wudoko caden i komwu kekenwu, pien doŋ wutyeko yero Rwot kun wuwacci wubitiyo bote keken.” Lwak gugamo ni, “Wan aye caden giwa.”
Yocwa 24:23 Yocwa owaco botgi ni, “Wubol lubaŋa pa lurok ducu ma gitye i kinwu woko, wek wulok cwinywu odwog i kom Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael.”
Yocwa 24:24 Lwak guwaco bot Yocwa ni, “Wabitiyo bot Rwot Lubaŋawa, dok wabiworo doge.”
Yocwa 24:25 Kit meno Yocwa oketo gicikke ki lwak i nino meno, ci omiyo botgi cik mapol i Cekem i nino meno kun nyuto kit ma myero gulub ki cik mapatpat ducu.
Yocwa 24:26 Yocwa ocoyo lok magi ducu i buk me cik pa Lubaŋa; ci okwanyo got madit, ocibo ocuŋ kunnu i te yat kworo ma i kabedo maleŋ pa Rwot.
Yocwa 24:27 Yocwa dok owaco bot lwak ducu ni, “Nenu, got man aye bibedo caden i komwa, pien otyeko winyo lok pa Rwot ducu ma en owaco botwa; mumiyo en bedo lacaden i komwu wek pe dok wukwer Lubaŋawu.”
Yocwa 24:28 Ka meno otum Yocwa ociko lwak ci guket woko kun ŋat acel acel odok i lobo ma oleyo-ni. To pa Yocwa ki pa Eleajar (Luŋol 2.6-10)
Yocwa 24:29 Ki i ŋe lok meno ducu Yocwa wod pa Nun ma latic pa Rwot oto woko ma onoŋo mwaka me ditte oromo miya acel ki apar.
Yocwa 24:30 Guyiko kome i lobone kikome, i ginaleya ma yam gimiyo bote, i Timnat-cera i lobo godi pa jo Epraim i ŋet got Gaac, yo tuŋ acam.
Yocwa 24:31 Jo Icrael gutiyo bot Rwot i kare pa Yocwa ducu ki i kare pa ludoŋo ducu ma yam gudoŋ ka Yocwa doŋ oto, gin jo ma guŋeyo tic ducu ma yam Rwot otiyo pi jo Icrael.
Yocwa 24:402 
Yocwa 24:32 Cogo kom Yucepu ma onoŋo jo Icrael yam gukelo ki i Ejipt giyiko i Cekem i dullobo ma yam Yakobo owilo ki bot awobe pa Kamor ma won Cekem; owilo ki dullim miya acel. Dul lobo-nu odoko ginaleya pa likwayo pa Yucepu matwal.
Yocwa 24:33 Ka Eleajar wod pa Aron bene oto, ci giyiko kome i Gibea, i gaŋ pa wode Finekaci ma yam onoŋo gimiyo bote i lobo godi pa jo Epraim.
Yocwa 24:403  Luŋolkop Luŋolkop 1 Jo Juda ki jo Cimeon gumako Adoni-bejek
Yocwa 24:1 Ka Yocwa doŋ oto, jo Icrael gucako penyo dog Rwot ni, “Aŋa ma bikwoŋo cito piwa ka lweny i kom jo Kanaan?”
Yocwa 24:2 Ci Rwot ogamo ni, “Jo Juda aye gibicito; nen, atyeko miyo lobo-ni i ciŋgi.”
Yocwa 24:3 Jo Juda guwaco bot utmegigi jo Cimeon ni, “Wubin wunywak kwedwa wot i lobo ma gipoko botwa ki kwir-ri, wek walweny i kom jo Kanaan, Wan bene wabinywako kwedwu wot kit meno i lobo ma gipoko botwu,” Mumiyo jo Cimeon gucito kwedgi.
Yocwa 24:4 Ka jo Juda gucito kunnu, Rwot omiyo jo Kanaan ki jo Periji i ciŋgi, ci guloyo dano alip apar i Bejek.
Yocwa 24:5 Gurwatte ki Adoni-bejek kabaka me Bejek i gaŋŋe kunnu, gulwenyo i kome, ci guloyo jo Kanaan ki jo Periji.
Yocwa 24:6 Adoni bejek oriŋo woko, ento gulubo kore, gumake, guŋolo twoni ciŋe woko, ki twoni tyene.
Yocwa 24:7 Adoni-bejek owacci, “Yam luker pyerabiro ma giŋolo twoni ciŋgi ki twoni tyengi gubedo ka coko ŋide cam i te mejana; kit ma yam atimo i komgi-ni, Lubaŋa oculla kit meno.” Gitere i Jerucalem, ci oto kunnu. Jo Juda guloyo Jerucalem ki Kebron
Yocwa 24:8 Ka dok jo Juda gulwenyo i kom Jerucalem, gumako woko, guneko jo ma tye iye ki pala lucwan, ka guwaŋo woko ki mac.
Yocwa 24:9 Ka lacen jo Juda dok gucito ka lweny i kom jo Kanaan ma gibedo i lobo godi, ki i Negeb, ki i pwor got.
Yocwa 24:10 Jo Juda gucito bene ka lweny i kom jo Kanaan ma gibedo i Kebron, ci guloyo Cecai, Akiman ki Talmai. Gaŋ ma koni gilwoŋo ni Kebron, yam nyiŋe obedo Kiriat-arba. Otiniel oloyo Debir ci gimiye Akaca obed dakone (Yoc 15.15-19)
Yocwa 24:11 Ka gua ki kunnu, gucito ka lweny i kom jo ma gibedo i Debir. Nyiŋ Debir yam obedo Kiriat-ceper.
Yocwa 24:12 Ci Kaleb owacci, “Ka ŋatti mo olwenyo i kom Kiriat-ceper ce omako, ci abimiye nyara Akaca obed dakone.”
Yocwa 24:13 Otiniel wod pa Kenaj, ma omin Kaleb matidine, aye omako, ci Kaleb omiye nyare Akaca obedo dakone.
Yocwa 24:404 
Yocwa 24:14 Ka nyako ocito bot cware, ci odiye ni openy poto mo bot wonne. Opye piny ki i wi kanane ci Kaleb openye ni, “Imito gin aŋo?”
Yocwa 24:15 Nyare ogamo ni, “Miya mot mo; macalo doŋ iketa wa i lobo Negeb, dok imiya waŋ it mo bene.” Kaleb omiye waŋ it ma tuŋ malo ki waŋ it ma tuŋ piny bene. Kabedo ma jo Juda ki Benjamin gumayo
Yocwa 24:16 Likwayo pa jo Keni, ma jo pa oc Moses, gucito kacel ki jo Juda kun gia ki i gaŋ Otit, gucito wa i tim me lobo Juda ma tye i Negeb ma cok ki Arad; gucito, gubedo kacel ki jo Amalek.
Yocwa 24:17 Jo Juda gucito kacel ki utmegigi jo Cimeon, ci guloyo jo Kanaan ma gibedo i Jepat, Gudyero gaŋ meno i ciŋ Rwot, gujwero woko; mumiyo nyiŋ gaŋ meno gilwoŋo ni Korma .
Yocwa 24:18 Juda dok omako Gaja ki lobo ma i ŋete, Acikelon ki lobo ma i ŋete ki Ekron ki lobo ma i ŋete.
Yocwa 24:19 Rwot obedo ki Juda, mumiyo ocamo lobo godi odoko mere; ento ryemo jo ma gibedo i bar oloye, pien onoŋo gitye ki gadigadi lweny me nyonyo.
Yocwa 24:20 Kebron gimiyo bot Kaleb, kit ma yam Moses ociko-ni; en oryemo likwayo pa Anak adek woko ki kunnu.
Yocwa 24:21 Ento jo Benjamin pe guryemo jo Jebuc ma gibedo i Jerucalem, mumiyo jo Jebuc gunywako bedo i Jerucalem kacel ki jo Benjamin o kwede wa onyoo. Likwayo pa Yucepu gumayo Betel
Yocwa 24:22 Jo me ot pa Yucepu bene gucito ka lweny i kom Betel, ci Rwot obedo kwedgi.
Yocwa 24:23 Gucwalo lurot-piny i Betel, meno aye gaŋ ma yam gilwoŋo ni Luj.
Yocwa 24:24 Ka lurot-piny guneno dano mo ka bino kun oa ki i gaŋ, guwacce ni, “Nyut botwa yo me donyo i gaŋ ba, ci wabitimi maber.”
Yocwa 24:25 En onyuto botgi yo me donyo i gaŋ, ci guneko dano ina gitye iye ki pala lucwan; ento guweko laco meno ki ludoggolane gucito.
Yocwa 24:26 Dano meno ocito i lobo pa jo Kit, ogero iye gaŋ, ocako nyiŋe ni Luj; meno aye obedo nyiŋe o kwede wa onyoo. Kabedo ma jo Manace ki jo Epraim gumayo
Yocwa 24:27 Jo Manace pe guryemo jo ma gibedo i Bet-cean ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, kadi jo ma gibedo i Taanak, Dor, Ibleam ki Megido ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋetgi; ento jo Kanaan gucerre ci gubedo i lobo-nu.
Yocwa 24:28 Ka jo Icrael gudoko tek, ci gudiyo gin jo Kanaan ki tic muroni, ento pe guryemogi woko ducu.
Yocwa 24:405 
Yocwa 24:29 Jo Epraim pe guryemo jo Kanaan ma gubedo i Gejer, ento jo Kanaan gubedo i kingi i Gejer. Kabedo ma kaka mukene gutero
Yocwa 24:30 Jo Jabulon pe guryemo jo ma gibedo i Kitron, kadi jo ma gibedo i Nakalol; ento jo Kanaan gubedo i kingi, ci guketogi i tic muroni.
Yocwa 24:31 Jo Acer pe guryemo jo ma gibedo i Akko, kadi jo ma gubedo i Cidon, Aklab, Akijib, Kelba, Apik ki Rekob.
Yocwa 24:32 Ento jo Acer gubedo i kin jo Kanaan ma gin wegi lobo-nu, pien pe guryemogi woko.
Yocwa 24:33 Jo Naputali pe guryemo jo ma gibedo i Bet-cemec ki Bet-anat, ento gubedo i kin jo Kanaan ma gin wegi lobo-nu. Kadi bed kumeno, guketo jo Bet-cemec ki Bet- anat i tic muroni.
Yocwa 24:34 Jo Amor gudiyo jo Dan, gudwokogi wa i lobo godi, pe guye ni gucit i bar.
Yocwa 24:35 Jo Amor gucerre gubedo i got Kerec, i Aijalon ki i Calabim. Ento jo me ot pa Yucepu gubedo ka diyogi matek, ci guketogi i tic muroni.
Yocwa 24:36 Waŋ lobo pa jo Amor ocakke ka ma giito iye malo i Akrabim, oa ki i Cela ocito malo. Luŋolkop 2 Lok pa lamalaika pa Rwot i Bokim
Yocwa 24:1 Lamaika pa Rwot oa ki i Gilgal ocito i Bokim, ci owacci, “Yam akwanyowu ki i Ejipt, ci akelowu wa i lobo ma yam akwoŋo pire ni abimiyo bot kwarowu. Yam awacci, ‘Pe abituro gicikkena kwedwu matwal,
Yocwa 24:2 wun bene pe wuket gicikke mo i kinwu ki jo ma gibedo i lobo man. Wubimuko keno jogigi woko.’ Ento wun pe wulubo cikka Man doŋ wutimo aŋo?
Yocwa 24:3 Kombeddi doŋ awaco ni, pe doŋ abiryemogi woko ki i nyimwu; gibidoko lumonewu, ki lubaŋagi bibedo owic me makowu.”
Yocwa 24:4 Ka lamalaika pa Rwot oloko lok meno bot jo Icrael ducu, jo Icrael guwo ki koko.
Yocwa 24:5 Gucako nyig kabedonu ni Bokim ci gutumo gitum bot Rwot kunnu. To pa Yocwa (Yoc 24.29-31)
Yocwa 24:6 Ka Yocwa ociko lwak ci guket woko kun ŋat acel acel ocito i lobo ma ginaleyane ka camone.
Yocwa 24:7 Jo Icrael gutiyo bot Rwot i kare pa Yocwa ducu ki i kare pa ludoŋo ducu ma yam gudoŋ ka Yocwa doŋ oto, gin jo ma guneno tic madito ducu ma yam Rwot otiyo pi jo Icrael.
Yocwa 24:406 
Yocwa 24:8 Yocwa wod pa Nun ma latic pa Rwot oto woko ma noŋo mwaka me ditte oromo miya acel ki apar.
Yocwa 24:9 Guyiko kome i lobone kikome, i ginaleya ma yam gimiyo bote i Timnat-kerec i lobo godi pa jo Epraim i ŋet got Gaac, yo tuŋ acam.
Yocwa 24:10 Ci yalwak meno ducu guto, gudok bot kwarogi, ka dok yalwak mukene olubogi ma pe gigeyo Rwot, kadi tic ma yam en otiyo pi jo Icrael. Jo Icrael guweko woro Rwot
Yocwa 24:11 Jo Icrael gucako timo gin ma nen marac i wag Rwot pi woro jogi ma nyiŋgi Baal.
Yocwa 24:12 Gubwoto Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwarogi woko, ma yam okwanyogi ki i lobo Ejipt, ci gucako lubo kor lubaŋa mukene ki i kin lwak lubaŋa pa rok mapatpat ma orumogi dyere-ni; guryebbe i nyimgi, gumiyo kiniga omako Rwot.;
Yocwa 24:13 Gubwoto Rwot woko, guworo jogi Baal mapatpat ki jogi ma mon-gu.
Yocwa 24:14 Pienno kiniga omako Rwot i kom jo Icrael ci omiyogi i ciŋ Iuyak-jamigi, ma gubedo ka yako jamigi, Dok omiyogi woko i te twero pa lumerokgi ma orumogi dyere, omiyo pe doŋ gitwero cuŋ i nyim lumerokgi.
Yocwa 24:15 Ka ma gicito iye ducu i kare-nu, ciŋ Rwot onoŋo tye i komgi likiŋ pi timogi rac, kit ma yam Rwot owaco-ni, kun lubo kit ma Rwot onoŋo okwoŋo botgi; ci piny orem kwedgi woko. Tic pa luŋolkop
Yocwa 24:16 Rwot ocako keto luŋolkop ma gularo jo Icrael ki i twero pa jo ma yam giyako jamigi-ni.
Yocwa 24:17 Ento pe guworo dog luŋolkopgi; gubedo ka woro lubaŋa mogo mukene ki tim kwele kwele ki ryebbe i nyimgi, Gulokke gubarre woko oyot ki i yo ma yam kwarogi gulubo. Kwarogi onoŋo yam gulubo cik pa Rwot, ento gin pe gulubo cikke.
Yocwa 24:18 I kare ducu ma Rwot omiyo botgi Laŋolkop mo, ci Rwot obedo ki laŋolkop meno; obedo ka larogi ki i ciŋ lumerokgi pi kare pa Laŋolkop meno ducu. Kica yam mako Rwot i komgi kare ki kare ka gicur i kom jo ma unogi kun gidiyogi ki tek.
Yocwa 24:19 Ento ka laŋolkop mo oto woko, ci gitarre, gidok cen ka timo tim maraco makato kwarogi ducu, kun gilubo kor lubaŋa mogo mukene, giworogi kun giryebbe piny i nyimgi; pe gibwoto timgi mo, kadi wa kit ducu ma gibedo ka lubo pi nwaŋ ŋutgi- ni.
Yocwa 24:20 Mumiyo kiniga omako Rwot i kom jo Icrael, ci owacci, “Jo man guturo gicikkena ma yam acikke kwede ki kwarogi, dok gukwero woro doga.
Yocwa 24:407 
Yocwa 24:21 Pi meno cakke tin an pe doŋ abiryemo rok mo woko ki i nyimgi ma i kin lwak rok mapatpat ma yam Yocwa oto oweko-ni,
Yocwa 24:22 wek atem ki cwiny jo Icrael, anen ka gibigwokke kun gilubo yo pa Rwot macalo kwarogi yam gugwokke iye, nyo pe.”
Yocwa 24:23 Kit meno Rwot oweko rok meno ducu gubedo, pe oryemogi woko ducu lawaŋacel, dok pe omiyogi i te twero pa Yocwa. Luŋolkop 3 Rok ma gudoŋ pi temo jo Icrael
Yocwa 24:1 Magi aye rok ma Rwot oweko gudoŋ i lobo me temo kwede cwiny jo Icrael, makato ducu dano ma i Icrael ducu ma peya gulwenyo lweny mo i Kanaan.
Yocwa 24:2 Owekogi pi lok man keken wek yalwak ma i Icrael ducu gunyebbe ki lweny, wek en opwonygi ki lweny, makato ducu jo ma yam pe guŋiyo kwede.
Yocwa 24:3 Magi aye rok ma Rwot oweko gudoŋ: rwodi pa jo Piliciti abic, jo Kanaan ducu, jo Cidon ki jo Kiv ma yam gibedo i godi me Lebanon, cakke ki i got Baal-kermon o kwede wa i yo ma donyo i Kamat.
Yocwa 24:4 Gin aye gubedo me temo cwiny Luicrael pi ŋeyo ka gibilubo cik pa Rwot ducu ma yam en ociko bot kwarogi ki i dog Moses.
Yocwa 24:5 Kit meno jo Icrael gubedo i dye jo Kanaan, jo Kit, jo Amor, jo Periji, jo Kiv ki jo Jebuc.
Yocwa 24:6 Gucako nyomo anyiragi, gin bene gumiyo anyiragi bot awobegi, gunyomo; ci gucako woro lwak lubaŋagi. Otiniel olaro jo Icrael ki i elo Kucan-ricataim
Yocwa 24:7 Jo Icrael gutimo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot, kun wigi owil woko i kom Rwot Lubaŋagi, guworo jogi Baal mapatpat ki Aciterot-gu.
Yocwa 24:8 Pienno omiyo kiniga omako Rwot i kom jo Icrael, ci omiyogi woko i cin Kucan- ricataim kabaka me Mecopotamia. Jo Icrael gutiyo bot Kucan-ricataim mwaka aboro.
Yocwa 24:9 Ento ka jo Icrael gukok bot Rwot, en omiyogi dano ma olarogi, en Otiniel wod pa Kenaj, ma omin Kaleb matidine.
Yocwa 24:10 Cwiny pa Rwot obino i kome, ci obedo ka ŋolo kop i Icrael. Ka ocito ka lweny, Rwot omiyo Kucan-ricataim kabaka me Mecopotamia i ciŋe, obwoyo Kucan- ricataim woko.
Yocwa 24:11 Kit meno omiyo lobo oywe pi mwaka pyeraŋwen, ci lacen Otiniel wod pa Kenaj oto. Ekud olaro jo Icrael ki i do jo Moab
Yocwa 24:408 
Yocwa 24:12 Jo Icrael dok gutimo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot, ci Rwot omiyo tek bot Eglon kabaka me Moab me lweny i kom jo Icrael, pien onoŋo gutimo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot.
Yocwa 24:13 Eglon ocoko jo Ammon ki jo Amalek, ocito kwedgi, oloyo jo Icrael, omayo gaŋ Otit woko.
Yocwa 24:14 Jo Icrael gutiyo bot Eglon kabaka me Moab pi mwaka apar wiye aboro kulu.
Yocwa 24:15 Ento ka jo Icrael gukok bot Rwot, en omiyogi dano ma olarogi, en Ekud wod pa Gera ma jo Benjamin, dano ma lacam. Jo Icrael gumiyo en aye otero mucorogi bot Eglon kabaka me Moab.
Yocwa 24:16 Ekud oteto pala lucwanne ma lake bit ryoryo ma borre oromo futi acel ki nucu, ci orwako i te boŋone, otweyo i kom eme tuŋ lacuc,
Yocwa 24:17 ocito otero mucoro bot Eglon. Eglon onoŋo obedo dano ma ocwe mada.
Yocwa 24:18 Ka Ekud otyeko miyo mot me mucoro bot kabaka, ocwalo dano ma gutiŋo mot meno gucito woko.
Yocwa 24:19 Ento en kikome, ka oo i godi ma gipayo apaya ma cok ki Gilgal, olokke odok cen, owacci, “Atye ki lok mo me muŋ ma gicwala kwede boti, kabaka.” Kabaka ociko ni, “Wuliŋ koŋ!” Ci lwak luticce ducu ma gucuŋ i nyime gukato woko.
Yocwa 24:20 Ka Ekud obino bote, onoŋo en obedo kene i kicikane maŋic ma malo i wi ot. Ekud owacci, “Atye ki kwena ma oa ki bot Lubaŋa ma akelo boti,” ci kabaka oa malo ki i wi komme.
Yocwa 24:21 Ekud oroyo ciŋe ma lacam, omako pala lucwan, owoto ki i eme ma tuŋ lacuc, ocobo ki i kabaka.
Yocwa 24:22 Lak pala odonyo wa ki lokke, ci moo iye opuyo lak pala woko. Pe owoto pala lucwan woko ki i i kabaka, dok wee iye okatti woko.
Yocwa 24:23 Ekud okato woko ki ka ma gidonyo kwede i ot-ti, ci oloro doggola me kicika me wi ot ka ma kabaka tye iye-ni, otweyo woko.
Yocwa 24:24 Ka en doŋ ocito woko, ci lutic gubino. Ka guneno ni doggola me kicika ma i wi ot doŋ gitweyo woko, ci gubedo ka tamo ni, “Laditwa tye ka konnye i ot matidi ma i kicika manic-ci.”
Yocwa 24:25 Gubedo ka kurone nio ka doggi otwo woko; ento ka en pud ori kun pe oyabo doggola me kicika me wi ot, gukwanyo layab, guyabo kwede, ci nen, rwotgi obuto i dye ot ma doŋ oto.
Yocwa 24:26 Ma pud gigalle, Ekud olwi oriŋo woko, okato wa i ŋe godi ma gipayo apaya ca, oriŋo olaro Ceira.
Yocwa 24:27 Ka doŋ oo kunnu, okuto tum i lobo godi me Epraim; ci jo Icrael gucito kwede gua ki i lobo godi, kun en telo wigi.
Yocwa 24:409 
Yocwa 24:28 Owaco botgi ni, “Wulub kora, pien Rwot doŋ omiyo lumerokwu, jo Moab, i ciŋwu.” Gucito kwede, gumako waŋ wat me Jordan me geŋo jo Moab: pe guye dano acel mo oŋolo kulu.
Yocwa 24:29 I kare meno guneko jo Moab ma mito romo alip apar, ma gin ducu twoni co matego; acel mo pe obwot.
Yocwa 24:30 Kit meno gutayo jo Moab woko i nino meno, Gubedo i te loc pa jo Icrael ci lobo oywe pi mwaka pyeraboro. Camgar olaro jo Icrael ki i ciŋ jo Piliciti
Yocwa 24:31 Ŋat mulubo kore en Camgar wod pa Anat ma oneko jo Piliciti miya abicel ki dim lalek dyaŋ; en bene olaro jo Icrael. Luŋolkop 4 Debora ki Barak guloyo Cicera
Yocwa 24:1 Jo Icrael dok gutimo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot ma Ekud doŋ oto woko,
Yocwa 24:2 ci Rwot omiyogi i ciŋ Jabin kabaka mo pa jo Kanaan ma yam obedo ka loc i Kajor. Lawimonnye nyiŋe Cicera, ma bedo i Karocet pa Lurok.
Yocwa 24:3 Jo Icrael dok gukok bot Rwot ni okonygi, pien onoŋo Jabin tye ki gadigadi lweny me nyonyo miya aboŋwen, ci obedo ka uno jo Icrael matek pi mwaka pyeraryo.
Yocwa 24:4 I kare meno Debora, lanebi ma dako ma cware Lapidot, aye obedo laŋolkop pa jo Icrael.
Yocwa 24:5 En bedo i te otit pa Debora, ma tye i kin Rama ki Betel ma i lobo godi me Epraim, ci jo Icrael gibino bote wek en oŋol kopgi.
Yocwa 24:6 Debora ocwalo kwena, olwoŋo Barak wod pa Abinoam ki i Kedec i lobo pa jo Naputali, owacce ni, “Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael ociko in ni, ‘Cit icok joni i wi got Tabor kun ikwanyo jo alip apar ki i kaka pa Naputali ki kaka pa Jabulon.
Yocwa 24:7 Abiywayo Cicera, lawimony pa Jabin, akelo ka romo kwedi i dog kulu Kicon kacel ki gadigadi lwennye ki buca monynye ducu, ci abimiye i ciŋi.’ “
Yocwa 24:8 Barak owaco bot Debora ni, “Ka in aye ibicito kweda, ci abicito; ento ka in pe ibicito kweda, an pe abicito.”
Yocwa 24:9 Debora ogamo ni, “An abicito kwedi ada; ento wot ma icito iye-ni deyone pe bibedo meri, pien Rwot bimiyo Cicera i cin dako.” Ci Debora oa, owoto ki Barak wa i Kedec.
Yocwa 24:10 Barak olwoŋo jo Jabulon ki jo Naputali ki i Kedec, ci jo alip apar gucito bote gulubo kore; ki Debora bene ocito kacel kwedgi.
Yocwa 24:410 
Yocwa 24:11 I kare meno onoŋo Keber ma jo Keni opokke woko ki bot jo Keni mukene-ni ma gin likwayo pa Kobab ma jo pa oc Moses, ci onoŋo oguro kemane ka mabor i ŋet yat kworo ma i Jaananim, ma cok ki Kedec.
Yocwa 24:12 Ka gitito bot Cicera ni Barak wod pa Abinoam ocito i got Tabor,
Yocwa 24:13 ci Cicera olwoŋo wegi gadigadi nyonyone ducu ma giromo miya aboŋwen, ki jo ducu ma gitye bote, ni gua ki i Karocet pa Lurok gubin i kulu Kicon.
Yocwa 24:14 Debora owaco bot Barak ni, “A malo, pien tin aye nino ma Rwot omiyo iye Cicera i ciŋi. Rwot aye bitelo nyimi.” Kit meno Barak ocako lor piny ki i wi got Tabor kacel ki dano alip apar ma gilubo kore.
Yocwa 24:15 Ci Rwot obwaŋo kom Cicera ki wegi gadigadine ducu, kacel ki monnye ducu i nyim Barak, ci guto ki pala lucwan. Ento Cicera opye woko piny ki i gadigadine, oriŋo woko ki tyene.
Yocwa 24:16 Barak olubo kor gadigadi ki monygi o wa i Karocet pa Lurok; mony pa Cicera ginekogi woko ducu ki pala lucwan, pe dano acel mo odoŋ.
Yocwa 24:17 Cicera oriŋo ki tyene nio wa i kema pa Yayeri, dako pa Keber ma jo Keni; pien yam onoŋo kuc tye i kin Jabin kabaka me Kajor ki jo me ot pa Keber ma Lakeni.
Yocwa 24:18 Yayeri okatti woko ka jolo wiye ci owaco bote ni, “Lokke idwog kany, laditta, pe ilwor.” Kit meno omiyo Cicera odok bote wa i kemane, ci dako oume woko ki boŋo.
Yocwa 24:19 Cicera owaco bote ni, “Koŋ imiya pii mo manok me amata, pien orwo pii tye ka neka.” Dako oyabo dog opiru cak, omiyo en omato, ka dok oume woko.
Yocwa 24:20 Ka Cicera dok owaco bote ni, “Cun i doggola kema. Ka ŋat mo obino ce openyi ni, ‘Ŋatti mo tye kany?’ wacci, ‘Pe.’ “
Yocwa 24:21 Ento Yayeri dako pa Keber okwanyo loc lagur kema, ka dok omako nyol i ciŋe, ocito bote mot, oguro loc i tur nyime tuŋcel, nio ka otuc pil wa i nom, pien onoŋo onino matek pi olo. Kit meno omiyo oto.
Yocwa 24:22 Ci nen, ka Barak obedo ka lubo kor Cicera. Yayeri ocito woko ka jolo wiye ci owacci, “Bin, wek anyutt i dano ma it ye ka yenyone-ni.” Odonyo i kemane, ci onoŋo Cicera oto woko, obuto piny kenyo kun loc ocuŋ i tur nyime.
Yocwa 24:23 Kit meno Lubaŋa otayo Jabin kabaka me Kanaan ki i nyim jo Icrael i nino meno,
Yocwa 24:24 ci jo Icrael gumedde ki diyo Jabin kabaka me Kanaan matek nio ka gutyeke woko. Luŋolkop 5 Wer pa Debora gin ki Barak
Yocwa 24:1 Debora ki Barak wod pa Abinoam guwayo wer akero i nino meno ni,
Yocwa 24:411 
Yocwa 24:2 “Luwimony gutelo wi Icrael, dano gubino ma gudyero komgi kekengi; wupwo Rwot!
Yocwa 24:3 “Wuwiny, wun luker! Wuter itwu, wun luloc! Abiywayo akero bot Rwot abiwero ki dwan mamit bot Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Yocwa 24:4 “Rwot, i kare ma ikato woko ki i Ceir, i kare ma icoro la ki i dye lobo Edom, lobo ocako yeŋŋe, polo bene ocwero pii; ada do, pol ocako cwer,
Yocwa 24:5 Godi guyemje ki i nyim Rwot, Cinai oyeŋŋe kuca ki i nyim Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Yocwa 24:6 “I kare pa Camgar wod pa Anat, ki i kare pa Yayeri, luwot gubedo pe i yo gudo, jo ma giwoto ka mo giwirre i yo matino.
Yocwa 24:7 Dano gutum woko ki i Icrael i kin paco, gutum, gutum woko do, nio ka in Debora ibino, ituc ma in i mego i Icrael.
Yocwa 24:8 I kare ma guyero lubaŋa mogo manyen, ci mony oo wa i dog gaŋ. Kwot mo, nyo toŋ, yam onen mono i kin io Icrael alip pyeraŋwen?
Yocwa 24:9 Cwinya olwodo lok i kom luwimony pa Icrael ma gudyero komgi i kin lwak. Wupwo Rwot!
Yocwa 24:10 “Wun lubed i wi kana makwar-ri ma wuumo komgi ki boŋŋi me bedowu, ki wun luwot ki tyenwu iyo, wutit lokke ba.
Yocwa 24:11 Wuwiny dwan luwer ka ma gitwomo iye pii; kunnu gipako kit ma Rwot oloyo ki mony, kit ma danone ma ikin gaŋ guloyo ki lukworgi i Icrael. “I kare-nu jo pa Rwot gucito piny wa i dog gaŋ.
Yocwa 24:12 “Deborawe, co woko, co woko! Co woko, co woko, icak wer! A malo, Barak, itel wi opiini ma iyako, in wod pa Abinoam!
Yocwa 24:13 Ludito mudoŋ gucako wot, jo pa Rwot gucito ka lwenypire i kom oteka.
Yocwa 24:14 Jo Epraim gucito gubino i nota, i korwu wunjo Benjamin ki lutuwu; luwimonypajo Makir gubino piny, lumak odoo ker gua i Jabulon.
Yocwa 24:15 Rwodi pa jo Icakar gubino ki Debora. Jo Icakar gucuŋ matek i kom Barak; gutwarre i nota i kore. Ento jo me kaka pa Reuben gubedo ki guŋ-ic.
Yocwa 24:16 Piŋo ibedo i dye dwol romi ka winyo nyamulere ma gikuto i kor lim? Jo me kaka pa Reuben gubedo ki guŋ-ic.
Yocwa 24:17 Gilead odoŋ loka Jordan; gin aŋo mumiyo Dan obedo mere i mel? Acer obedo mere mot i dog nam, obedo otoyo toke i Waŋ watte.
Yocwa 24:18 Jo Jabulon aye lwak ma gudyero komgi i to; ki jo Naputali bene i wi cere ma i dye bar.
Yocwa 24:19 Luker gubino, gulwenyo, luker me Kanaan gulwenyo matek i kare-nu i Taanak, i ŋet pii me Megido, ento pe gunoŋo lonyo me ayaka.
Yocwa 24:412 
Yocwa 24:20 Lakalatwe gulwenyo ki i polo, gulwenyo i kom Cicera kun gilubo gergi.
Yocwa 24:21 Kulu Kicon oterogi woko, wi biamwonyi mager-ri, Kicon mager-ri. Abimedo ki woto anyim ki tekka ducu!
Yocwa 24:22 “Aguragura gimoro piny ki oboŋ tyengi, kun gipye, gikirre kwede; aguragurane gipye, gikirre.
Yocwa 24:23 “Lamalaika pa Rwot owacci, gicen Meroj, gicen lubedo iye matek, pien pe guriŋo i oduru pa Rwot, pi konyo Rwot ki lweny i kom oteka.
Yocwa 24:24 “Yayeri gimiye gum makato mon ducu, dako pa Keber Lakeni; i kin mon ducu ma bedo i kema kome gum.
Yocwa 24:25 Olego pii, dok omiye cak, okelle cak lukulu i awal maber ma ma oporre pi rwot.
Yocwa 24:26 Omako loc kema i ciŋe, ciŋe malacuc otiŋo nyol pa lutic; Ogoyo wi Cicera, otyero, ocanyo, otuco tur nyime pil.
Yocwa 24:27 Okulle piny, opoto, obuto lilwe ka tyene; okulle ka tyene, opoto; opoto oto ka ma okulle iye-ni.
Yocwa 24:28 “Dako opiro wane ki i waŋ dirica min Cicera okiyo ki i waŋ ot, owacci, ‘Piŋo gadigadine pe odwogo oyot? Piŋo tyen gadigadine pe mor, bino oyot?’
Yocwa 24:29 Mon ma luryeko gudok iye, en bene ogamo doge kene, ni,
Yocwa 24:30 ‘Gunoŋo lim, gitye ka pokone, anyaka acel pi twon acel acel, nyo dodo aryo; boŋo manwala nwala pi Cicera, ma giyako, boŋo manwala nwala ma gidero, boŋŋi aryo ma gidero me abola i ŋuta.’
Yocwa 24:31 “Lumerokki ducu myero gutum woko kit meno, ai Rwot! Ento luremi gubed macalo cen ma tuc ki kerone.” I ŋe meno lobo oywe pi mwaka pyeraŋwen. Luŋolkop 6 Lubaŋa olwoŋo Gideon
Yocwa 24:1 Jo Icrael gutimo gin ma nen marac i nyim Rwot; ci Rwot omiyogi i ciŋ jo Midian pi mwaka abiro.
Yocwa 24:2 Jo Midian gubwoyo jo Icrael woko, mumiyo jo Icrael guyubo ka-kannegi i kin godi, dok guyubo borogi ki kabedo ma gicelo matek, pi lworo jo Midian.
Yocwa 24:3 I kare ducu ma jo Icrael gicoyo kodi, ci jo Midian ki jo Amalek ki jo ma tun wokceŋ gicorre gibino ka monyogi.
Yocwa 24:4 Gitoŋo gonygi cok kwedgi, gibalo cam ma i potogi o kwede ka ma cok ki Gaja, kun pe giweko cam mo doŋ ma konyo jo Icrael, kadi wa romo nyo twon nyo kana.
Yocwa 24:5 Gibino ki limgi makwo, ki kemagi; kun gibino macalo bonyo, ma kwanogi ki kwaŋo wei kinagagi loyo dano; ka gibino gibalo lobo woko liweŋ.
Yocwa 24:413 
Yocwa 24:6 Kit meno jo Midian gumiyo piny orem ki jo Icrael woko, oweko jo Icrael gukok bot Rwot ni okonygi.
Yocwa 24:7 I kare ma jo Icrael gukok bot Rwot pi aroma pa jo Midian,
Yocwa 24:8 ci Rwot ocwalo lanebi botgi. Owaco botgi ni, “Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael owaco kit man ni, Yam atelo wiwu akwanyowu ki i Ejipt ki i ot kol me bedo opii.
Yocwa 24:9 Yam alarowu ki i ciŋ jo Ejipt ki i ciŋ jo ma gubedo ka unowu ducu; aryemogi woko ki i nyimgi kun amiyo lobog botwu.
Yocwa 24:10 I kare ca awaco botwu ni, ‘An aye a Rwot Lubaŋawu: pe wubilworo lwak lubaŋa pa jo Amor ma wubedo i lobogi-ni.’ Ento pe wumedde ka woro doga.”
Yocwa 24:11 I kare meno lamalaika pa Rwot obino obedo i te kworo ma tye i Opra, gaŋ pa Yoaci ma jo Abiejer. Onoŋo wode Gideon tye ka dino ŋano i bur biyo olok wek jo Midian pe gunen.
Yocwa 24:12 Lamalaika pa Rwot onen bote, owaco bote ni, “Rwot tye kwedi, in twon oteka lweny.”
Yocwa 24:13 Ci Gideon owaco bote ni, “Tima kica ba, ladit. Ka Rwot tye kwedwa, piŋo lok magi ducu opoto i komwa? Lwak tic ducu me aura ma yam Rwot otiyo, ma kwarowa gutitowa pire-ni, doŋ tye kwene? Giwacci yam Rwot aye okwanyowa ki i lobo Ejipt, ento kombeddi Rwot doŋ obolowa woko, omiyowa i ciŋ jo Midian.”
Yocwa 24:14 Ci Rwot olokke tuŋ bote, owacce ni, “Cit ki tek komi-ni, icilar jo Icrael ki i ciŋ jo Midian. An kikoma aye acwali.”
Yocwa 24:15 Gideon ogamo doge ni, “Tima kica ba, Rwot. An atwero laro jo Icrael niŋniŋ? Nen, kakawa tye matidi mo i kin jo Manace, dok an aye latin matidine ki i doggolawa.”
Yocwa 24:16 Ci Rwot owaco bote ni, “Ento an aye abibedo kwedi; dok ibineko jo Midian ducu macalo obedo dano acel keken.”
Yocwa 24:17 Gideon owaco ni, “Ka doŋ anoŋo gum ki boti, doŋ imiya anyut mo ma moko ni in aye iloko kweda.
Yocwa 24:18 Tim ber, pe ia woko ki kany nio ka abino boti kun akelo ki motta me aketa i nyimi.” Ogamo ni, “Abibedo nio ka idwogo.”
Yocwa 24:19 Gideon ocito i ode, otedo latin dyel mo, ki capat ma tobi pe iye ma otedo ki moko kwoŋ ma oromo debe aryo. Oketo riŋo i aduku, oonyo pige i agulu, ka okelo bot lamalaika pa Rwot i te kworo, oketo i nyime.
Yocwa 24:20 Lamalaika pa Rwot owaco bote ni, “Kwany riŋo ki capat ma to bi pe iye-ni, iketgi i kom pata got man, ka ionyo pige i wiye.” Gideon otimo kit meno.
Yocwa 24:414 
Yocwa 24:21 Ka doŋ lamalaika pa Rwot ocwalo odoo ma tye i ciŋe, omiyo wiye ogudo riŋo ki capat ma tobi pe iye-ni. Ci mac olyel, oa ki i pata got, owaŋo riŋo ki capat ma tobi pe iye-ni woko. Lacen lamalaika pa Rwot orwenyo woko ki i waŋe.
Yocwa 24:22 Mumiyo Gideon oniaŋ ni lamalaika pa Rwot; ci owacci, “Maa do, ai Rwot Lubaŋa! Pien doŋ aneno lamalaika pa Rwot waŋ ki waŋ.”
Yocwa 24:23 Ento Rwot owaco bote ni, “Kuc obed boti. Pe ilwor; pe ibito.”
Yocwa 24:24 Ci Gideon ocano keno tyer kunnu pi Rwot, ocako nyiŋe ni, Rwot aye kuc. Pud tye, ocun i Opra, gaŋ pa jo Abiejer, wa onyoo.
Yocwa 24:25 I dyewor meno Rwot owaco bote ni, “Kwany twon pa woru, twon me aryone ma mwaka me ditone oromo abiro, ci imuk keno tyer pa jok Baal ma tye bot woru woko, itoŋ yat ma gicomo i ŋete pi woro jok ma dako ma gilwoŋo ni Acera.
Yocwa 24:26 Ci icuŋ keno tyer pi Rwot Lubaŋani i wi lobo ma gitoro ma otiŋŋe malo, kun icaŋo got kikore. Ka doŋ ikwany twon me aryone, ityer me gitum awaŋa; yat me awora ma ibitoŋo ireto woko piny-nyi bidoko yen me waŋo gitum.”
Yocwa 24:27 Kit meno Gideon otero jo apar ki i kin luticce, otimo kit ma Rwot ocike kwede; ento pi lworo lutugi ki jo ma i gaŋ kunnu pe otiyo dyeceŋ, otiyo dyewor.
Yocwa 24:28 Ka dano ma i gaŋ gua malo odiko con, ci nen, keno tyer pa jok Baal gimuko woko, ki yat me awora ma ka ŋete bene gitoŋo woko, ki twon me aryone gityero woko i wi keno tyer ma gicaŋo-ni.
Yocwa 24:29 Gucako lok kekengi ni, “Aŋa mono ma otimo kuman-ni?” Lacen ka doŋ gutyeko yenyo kore kun gipenyo dano, ci guwacci, “Gideon wod pa Yoaci aye otimo kuman-ni.”
Yocwa 24:30 Ci jo ma i gaŋ meno guwaco bot Yoaci ni, “Kel wodi wo ko wek gineke, pien omuko keno tyer pa Baal woko, dok otoŋo yat me awora ma ka ŋete-ni.”
Yocwa 24:31 Ento Yoaci owaco bot jo ducu ma guryeyo cok i kome ni, “Wun wubilweny pi Baal bo? Wun wubicuŋ i kome? Ŋat ma bilweny pire gibineko woko ki odiko-ni. Ka en aye lubaŋa, wek en olweny gire kene, pien keno tyerre doŋ gimuko woko.”
Yocwa 24:32 Pi meno gicako nyiŋ Gideon ni Jerubaal i nino meno, ma te lokke ni, “Wek Baal olweny kwede,” pien omuko keno tyerre woko.
Yocwa 24:33 Ka doŋ jo Midian ducu ki jo Amalek ki jo ma tuŋ wokceŋ gucokke, guŋolo kulu Jordan ci gugony i nota me Jejreel.
Yocwa 24:34 Ento Cwiny pa Rwot obino i kom Gideon; okuto tum ci jo Abiejer gucokke i kore.
Yocwa 24:35 Ci ocwalo kwena oromo kin jo Manace ducu, gin bene gucokke i kore, Ka dok ocwalo kwena bot jo Acer, jo Jabulon ki jo Naputali; ci gucito ka rwatte kwedgi.
Yocwa 24:415 
Yocwa 24:36 Ci Gideon owaco bot Lubaŋa ni, “Ka ce ibilaro jo Icrael ki ciŋa kit ma iwaco-ni ba,
Yocwa 24:37 nen, aketo yer romo piny i laro moyo eno Ka ce toyo opoŋ i yer romo keken, kun i nom ducu otwo woko, ci abiŋeyo ni ibilaro jo Icrael ki ciŋa, kit macalo iwaco-ni.”
Yocwa 24:38 Ci obedo kit meno, Ka oa malo odiko con, obiyo yer romo, oliyo toyo ki i yer romo ma opoŋo awal kwoŋ woko.
Yocwa 24:39 Ka dok Gideon owaco bot Lubaŋa ni, “Pe kiniga omaki i koma, Wek dok alok tyen man acel-li. Wek dok atem ki yer romo kicel. Alegi ni, wek yer romo keken aye obed ma otwo, ento toyo oluk i kom nom ducu ma kenyo.”
Yocwa 24:40 Ci Lubaŋa otimo kit ennu i dyewor meno; onoŋo yer romo keken aye otwo, ento ŋom ducu toyo oluk iye. Luŋolkop 7 Jo pa Gideon guloyo jo Midian
Yocwa 24:1 Jerubaal, ma en aye Gideon, ki jo ducu ma onoŋo gitye bote gua malo odiko con, ci gugony i ŋet waŋ pii me Karod. Gony pa jo Midian onoŋo tye i nyimgi yo tuŋ acam, i ŋet got More ki i nota.
Yocwa 24:2 Rwot owaco bot Gideon ni “Jo ma gitye kwedi-ni gipol mada ki tuŋ bota. Ka abimiyo jo Midian i ciŋgi gibiwakke ginwette i koma ni meno, ‘Ciŋa kikoma gire aye olara.’
Yocwa 24:3 Pi meno kombeddi doŋ itit bot lwak ni, ‘Ŋatti mo ma lworo omako, ma kome myel ber odok i gaŋŋe.’ ” Kit meno Gideon oomo cwinygi, ci dano alip pyeraryo wiye aryo gudok woko, ki dano alip apar gudoŋ.
Yocwa 24:4 Rwot dok owaco bot Gideon ni “Lwak pud pol mada; tergi i dog pii ci abitemo cwinygi ki kunnu. Ŋat ma abiwacci, ni, ‘Dano man bicito kwedi’ en aye bicito kwedi; ki ŋat ma abiwacel ni, ‘Dano man pe bicito kwedi,’ en pe bicito kwedi.”
Yocwa 24:5 Kit meno Gideon otero dano i dog pii; ci Rwot owaco bote ni, “Dano acel acel ma gamo pii ki lebe macalo gwok gamo kwede ibiketo en cuŋ kene; ki ŋat ma orumo coŋe piny ka mato pii bene kit meno.”
Yocwa 24:6 Ci wei dano ma gugamo pii kun giketo ciŋgi i doggi oromo miya adek; ento lwak jo mudoŋ ducu gurumo coŋgi ka mato pii.
Yocwa 24:7 Rwot owaco bot Gideon ni, “An abilarowu ki jo miya adek ma gugamo pii ki i ciŋgi-ni, pi miyo jo Midian i ciŋwu. Doŋ iwek jo mukene-ni ŋat acel acel odok gire i pacone.”
Yocwa 24:416 
Yocwa 24:8 Gideon ogamo abino pa lwak wo ko ki i ciŋgi wa ki tumgi; ci ocwalo jo Icrael mudoŋ, kun dano acel acel cito i kemane. En odoŋ ki jo miya adek-ki, kun gony pa jo Midian tye piny i nota.
Yocwa 24:9 I dyewor meno Rwot owaco bote ni, “A malo, icit ilweny i kom gony pa jo Midian, pien doŋ atyeko miyone i ciŋi.
Yocwa 24:10 Ento ka ilworo cito piny kunnu, ci icit i gonygi kacel ki laticci Pura.
Yocwa 24:11 Ibiwinyo gin ma jo-nu giloko, ci lacen cwinyi bilimo tek me cito ka monyo gonygi.” Ocito piny ki laticce Pura, ci guo i agikki gony ka ma lumony gubuto iye.
Yocwa 24:12 Jo Midian, jo Amalek ki jo ducu ma gua wokceŋ onoŋo guryeyo gonygi i nota ma gumoo calo lwak bonyo; ki kinagagi bene welgi pe kwanne, gipol macalo kweyo me dog nam.
Yocwa 24:13 Ka Gideon oo, dano mo ocako tito lek mo bot lawote, kun waco ni, “Nen, aleko lek mo; mugati me cayiri ma oluŋŋe opoto i gony kun lor alora, obino kwede wa i kom kema, ci oreto kema woko piny, oloko ataro, kema opyelle woko piny.”
Yocwa 24:14 Lawote ogamo ni, “Man pala lucwan pa Gideon wod pa Yoaci, Laicrael; en ennu kikome. Lubaŋa otyeko miyo jo Midian ki lwak monygi ducu i ciŋe.”
Yocwa 24:15 Ka Gideon owinyo kit ma gitito kwede lek ki kit ma gigonyo kwede tere, ci omiyo woro bot Lubaŋa. Lacen odwogo kwede i gony pa jo Icrael, ci owacci, “Wua malo, pien Rwot doŋ omiyo mony pa jo Midian woko i ciŋwu.”
Yocwa 24:16 Opoko kin jo miya adek-ki lwak buca mony adek, ka omiyo tum i ciŋgi ducu, ki abino ma igi noŋo, ki mac raa i abino ducu.
Yocwa 24:17 Ka doŋ ocikogi ni, “Wunena, ci wun bene wutim kit ma an atimo ka doŋ ao iŋet gony cok.
Yocwa 24:18 Ka akuto tum, an kacel ki jo ma atye kwedgi ducu, ci wun bene wukut tum murumo gony ducu kun wudaŋŋe ni, ‘Pi Rwot ki pi Gideon!’ ”
Yocwa 24:19 Gideon ki jo miya acel ma gitye bote guo i ŋet gony cok ki cwiny dyewor ma onoŋo pud giketo Lukur-piny aketa; ci gucako kuto tum ki tyero abino ma tye i ciŋgi ducu.
Yocwa 24:20 Buca mony adek ducu gukuto tumgi, gutyero abinogi woko ci gumako mac raa i ciŋgi malacam ki tum me akuta i ciŋgi malacuc, kun gidaŋŋe kwede ni, “Pala lucwan pi Rwot ki pi Gideon!”
Yocwa 24:21 Dano acel acel ocuŋ mot i kabedone ma gurumo gony ducu, ci mony pa jo Midian guriŋo woko ducu; gucako daŋŋe guriŋo kwede woko.
Yocwa 24:22 Ka dano miya adek ca gitye ka kuto tumgi, Rwot oloko pala lucwan pa jo. Midian i kom lutugi kekengi ki i kom monygi ducu. Monygi oriŋo o wa i Bet-cita, ma yo tuŋ Jerera, ki o kwede wa i waŋ lobo me Abel-mekola i ŋet Tabat.
Yocwa 24:417 
Yocwa 24:23 Gilwoŋo jo Icrael ki i Naputali, ki i Acer wa ki i Manace ducu, ci guryemo kor jo Midian.
Yocwa 24:24 Gideon ocwalo kwena i lobo godi ducu me Epraim kun waco ni, “Wubin, wulweny i kom jo Midian, wukurgi i waŋ wat ducu o wa i Bet-bara ki i Jordan bene.” Kit meno gilwoŋo jo Epraim ducu ci gumako waŋ wat ducu o wa i Bet-bara ki Jordan bene.
Yocwa 24:25 Gumako luker pa jo Midian aryo, Oreb ki Jeeb; ci guneko Oreb i pata got pa Oreb, ki Jeeb guneko i bur biyo olok pa Jeeb. Lacen gukelo wi Oreb ki Jeeb loka Jordan bot Gideon. Luŋolkop 8 Guloyo jo Midian matwal
Yocwa 24:1 Jo Epraim guwaco bot Gideon ni, “Itimowa kuman piŋo? Nen pe ilwoŋowa ka onoŋo icito ka lweny i kom jo Midian.” Ci gugerre i kome matek.
Yocwa 24:2 Ento en owaco botgi ni. “Gin aŋo ma tin atimo ma giporo ki wun kulu? Pe gwero kor olok pa Epraim ber makato olok ducu ma Abiejer opwono?
Yocwa 24:3 Lubaŋa omiyo luker pa jo Midian i ciŋwu, Oreb ki Jeeb, ci gin aŋo ma abedo ka timo ma porre ki wun?” Ka oloko kit meno, ci kinigagi ocako dok cen i kome.
Yocwa 24:4 Ka Gideon obino i Jordan, okato loka ca, en kacel ki dano miya adek ma gitye bote-ni. Komgi oloc woko, ento pud giryemo kor jo Midian.
Yocwa 24:5 Omiyo owaco bot jo me Cukot ni. “Alegowu wumi mugati bot dano ma gilubo kora-ni, pien komgi doŋ oloc woko, dok atye ka ryemo kor Jeba ki Jalmuna ma luker pa jo Midian.”
Yocwa 24:6 Ento rwodi ma i Cukot gugamo ni, “Jeba ki Jalmuna doŋ gitye i ciŋi bo, ma weko wamiyo mugati bot joni?”
Yocwa 24:7 Gideon ogamo ni, “Ber yo, ka Rwot omiyo Jeba ki Jalmuna i ciŋa, ci abipwodo komwu ki okuto me tim ki okuto laŋo.”
Yocwa 24:8 Ka oa woko ki kunnu, ci ocito i Penuel, ci dok oloko kwedgi laki te acel-lu. Jo me Penuel bene guwacce lok ma rom ki kit ma jo Cukot gudok iye bote.
Yocwa 24:9 Ci owaco bot jo ma i Penuel ni, “Ka adwogo kany ki kuc, abimuko ot man ma ocudo malo-ni woko.”
Yocwa 24:10 I kare meno onoŋo Jeba ki Jalmuna gitye i Karkor, kacel ki monygi ma romo jo alip apar wiye abic, gin jo ducu ma yam gubwot ki i kom mony ducu pa jo me tuŋ wokceŋ. Onoŋo doŋ gineko jogi ma romo alip miya acel ki pyeraryo ma gin wegi lweny ki pala lucwan.
Yocwa 24:11 Gideon olubo yo ma jo ma gibedo i kema gimaro wok ki iye ma wok ki i ŋet Noba ki Jogbea yo tuŋ wokceŋ, ci olwenyo ki monygi ma gutoyo tokgi ata.
Yocwa 24:418 
Yocwa 24:12 Jeba ki Jalmuna guriŋo woko ci oryemo korgi, omako gin luker pa jo Midian aryo ducu, oonyo kwede atiba i kom monygi ducu.
Yocwa 24:13 Lacen Gideon wod pa Yoaci odwogo ki i lweny kun lubo yo ma giito iye i Kerec.
Yocwa 24:14 Omako awobi mo ma Lacukot, openye, ci awobi-ni ocone nyiŋ rwodi ki ludoŋo me Cukot ducu, ma giromo dano pyerabiro wiye abiro.
Yocwa 24:15 Gideon obino boŋo me Cukot, owaco botgi ni, “Doŋ wunen Jeba ki Jalmuna ma yam wunala pigi kun wuwaco ni, ‘Jeba ki Jalmuna doŋ gitye i ciŋi bo, ma weko wamiyo mugati bot joni ma komgi oloc woko-ni?’ “
Yocwa 24:16 Ci omako ludoŋo ma i gaŋ meno, ka okwanyo okuto me tim ki okuto laŋo, opwodo kwede jo Cukot.
Yocwa 24:17 Ka dok omuko ot ma ocudo malo ma i Penuel, ka oneko ki jo ma i gaŋ meno woko.
Yocwa 24:18 Ka dok owaco bot Jeba ki Jalmuna ni, “Jo ma yam wunekogi i Tabor onoŋo gubedo kit dano aŋo?” Gudokke iye ni. “Kit ma it ye kwede-ni, gin bene onoŋo gitye kit meno; ŋat acel acel i kingi onoŋo nen calo awobi pa kabaka.”
Yocwa 24:19 Gideon ogamo ni, “Gin omegina kikome, awobe pa maa. Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, kono yam pe wunekogi, kono pe anekowu bene.”
Yocwa 24:20 Ka dok owaco bot wode Jeter ma latin kayone ni, “A malo, inekgi woko.” Ento latin awobi pe owoto pala lucwanne, pien lworo omake; onoŋo pud tidi mo.
Yocwa 24:21 Ci Jeba ki Jalmuna guwaco ni, “In aye ia malo kikomi, ipot i komwa; pien kit ma laco tye kwede, tek kome bene tye kit meno.” Mumiyo Gideon oa malo oneko Jeba ki Jalmuna woko, ci okwanyo mola cal dwe ma yam giruko i ŋut kinagagi.
Yocwa 24:22 I ŋe meno jo Icrael guwaco bot Gideon ni, “Doŋ ibed lalocwa, in kikomi, ki wodi ki likwayi bene, pien ityeko larowa ki i ciŋ jo Midian.”
Yocwa 24:23 Ento Gideon owaco botgi ni, “An pe abiloyowu, ki woda bene pe biloyowu; Rwot aye biloyowu gire.”
Yocwa 24:24 Ka dok Gideon owaco botgi ni, “Wek alegwu gin mo acel. Ber ŋat acel acel omiya mola it me jabu ma oyako.” (Onoŋo lumerokgi gitye ki jabu me aruka i it, pien onoŋo gin Io Icmael.)
Yocwa 24:25 Gugamo ni, “Wabimiyo ki yomcwiny.” Gupeto ginaruka piny, ci dano acel acel obolo iyemolaiŋabu ma oyako.
Yocwa 24:26 Pek me jabu me aruka i it ma en olego-ni oromo cekel alip acel ki miya abiro, ma pe giribo iye mola cal dwe, ki mola aruka ma ryeny aryenya, ki boŋŋi aruka ma lamar lamar ma luker me Midian aye giruko, dok ma pe giribo iye mola ma gitweyo i ŋut kinagagi.
Yocwa 24:419 
Yocwa 24:27 Gideon otimo ki epod, ocibo i gaŋŋe Opra, ci jo Icrael ducu guworo ki tim kwele kwele, mumiyo odoko owic me ciko Gideon ki jo me ode.
Yocwa 24:28 Kit meno jo Icrael guloyo jo Midian, pe doŋ guilo wigi malo matwal. I kare pa Gideon lobo oywe woko pi mwaka pyeraŋwen. To pa Gideon
Yocwa 24:29 Jerubaal, ma en aye Gideon wod pa Yoaci, ocito, obedo i ode.
Yocwa 24:30 Onoŋo Gideon tye ki awobene pyerabiro ma gin nyodone kikome, pien onoŋo tye ki moo mapol.
Yocwa 24:31 Obedo ki dakone ma aŋeca bene ma bedo i Cekem. Dako-nu onywalo kwede latin ma laco ci Gideon ocako nyiŋe Abimelek.
Yocwa 24:32 Gideon wod pa Yoaci oto ma doŋ oti woko maber, ci giyike i lyel pa wonne Yoaci i Opra ma gaŋ pa jo Abiejer.
Yocwa 24:33 Ka Gideon doŋ oto, cutcut jo Icrael gulokke doki, gucako woro jogi Baal mapatpat ki tim kwete kwele, ci guketo Baal-berit me bedo lubaŋagi.
Yocwa 24:34 Jo Icrael pe doŋ gupo i kom Rwot Lubaŋagi, ma yam olarogi ki i ciŋ lumerokgi yo tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi;
Yocwa 24:35 dok pe gubedo ki cwiny maber bot litino pa Jerubaal, ma en aye Gideon, pi gin ducu maber ma yam otimo pi jo Icrael. Luŋolkop 9 Loc pa Abimelek
Yocwa 24:1 I kare meno Abimelek wod pa Jerubaal ocito i Cekem bot jo pa neyone ci otito botgi, ki bot jo ma i doggola pa minne ducu ni,
Yocwa 24:2 “Wuwac lok wek jo ma i gaŋ me Cekem ducu guwiny ni, ‘Mene maber ki botwu? Myero awobe pa Jerubaal ma giromo pyerabiro ducu gubed lulowu, nyo myero ŋat acel aye olowu?’ Ento wupo ni, an a cogowu, dok a riŋo komwu.”
Yocwa 24:3 Jo paneyone guloko lok meno ducu pire, kun gimiyo jo Cekem ducu guwinyo; ci cwinygi olokke ka lubo kor Abimelek, pien guwacci, “En aye ominwa.”
Yocwa 24:4 Gimiyo bote lim ryal pyerabiro ma gikwanyo ki i ot pa Baalberit. En aye Abimelek obedo ka culo kwede jo ma kitgi atata ma lubwami ma guribbe i kome.
Yocwa 24:5 Ocito i gaŋ pa wonne i Opra, oneko omegine awobe pa Jerubaal, jo pyerabiro, ki i kom pata got mo acel. Ento Yocam wode matidine aye odoŋ, pien onoŋo okanne woko.
Yocwa 24:6 Lacen jo Cekem ducu gubino gucokke kacel, kacel ki jo Bet-millo ducu, ci gucito guketo Abimelek me bedo kabaka i ŋet kworo ma i Cekem ma wir jok ocuŋ i ŋete- ni.
Yocwa 24:420 
Yocwa 24:7 Ka gitito lokke bot Yocam, en ocito ocuŋ malo i wi got Gerijim, odaŋŋe matek kun waco botgi ni. “Koŋ wuwiny lokka, wun jo Cekem, wek Lubaŋa bene owiny dogwu.
Yocwa 24:8 I nino mo acel lwak yadi gucito ka wiro moo ker i kom kabakagi. Guwaco bot yat jeituni ni, ‘In aye ilowa.’
Yocwa 24:9 Ento yat jeituni ogamo doggi ni, ‘Abiweko moona mabup-pi ma gimiyo kwede deyo bot lubaŋa ki bot dano, acit alyerre i wi yadi bo?’
Yocwa 24:10 Yadi dok guwaco bot oduro ni, ‘In aye ibin ilowa.’
Yocwa 24:11 Ento oduro ogamo doggi ni, ‘Abiweko nyiga mamit-ti ki mabeco-ni, acit alyerre i wi yadi bo?’
Yocwa 24:12 Ka yadi guwaco bot olok ni, ‘In aye ibin ilowa.’
Yocwa 24:13 Ento olok ogamo doggi ni, ‘Abiweko kono vinona ma yomo cwiny lubaŋa ki dano-ni, acit alyerre i wi yadi bo’?
Yocwa 24:14 Ka dok yadi ducu guwaco bot abelwinyo ni, ‘In aye ibin ilowa.’
Yocwa 24:15 Ci abelwinyo owaco bot yadi ni, ‘Ka wutye ka wira ki moo me bedo kabakawu ki cwiny me ada, ci doŋ wubin, wunoŋ ka-larre i te tipona; ento ka pe kumeno, ci wek mac oa ki bot abelwinyo owaŋ yadi cedar me Lebanon woko.’
Yocwa 24:16 “Doŋ apenyowu ba. I kare ma wuketo Abimelek me bedo kabaka, yam wutiyo ki cwiny me ada, kun iwu leŋ? Yam wutimo Jerubaal maber mono, kacel ki jo me ode, ma rwatte ki ticce macon ca?
Yocwa 24:17 Pien ada, wora olwenyo piwu kun odyero kome, olarowu ki iciŋ jo Midian,
Yocwa 24:18 ci tin wutwarre ka lweny i kom ot pa wora, wuneko awobene woko ma giromo pyerabiro ki i kom, pata got acel-lu, dok wuketo Abimelek ma wod pa aŋecane me bedo kabaka ma loyo Cekem pi bedo watwu.
Yocwa 24:19 Pi meno, ka wutiyo ki Jerubaal ki jo me ode ki cwiny me ada tin kun iwu leŋ, ci wubed ki yomcwiny i kom Abimelek, en bene cwinye obed yom i komwu.
Yocwa 24:20 Ento ka pe kumeno, wek mac obin oa ki bot jo Cekem ki Bet-millo, owaŋ Abimelek woko.”
Yocwa 24:21 Ka Yocam oriŋo gire woko, olaro kome, ci ocito wa i Beer, pi lworo ominne Abimelek.
Yocwa 24:22 Abimelek oloyo jo Icrael pi mwaka adek.
Yocwa 24:23 Lacen Lubaŋa ocwalo cwiny marac i kin Abimelek ki jo Cekem, ci jo Cekem gucako tim me robo dog i kom Abimelek.
Yocwa 24:24 Kit meno tim bwami ma yam gitimo i kom awobe pa Jerubaal ma romo pyerabiro ca opoto i kom Abimelek ma omingi-ni ma yam onekogi, wek alii me
Yocwa 24:421  remogi obed i kome ki i kom jo Cekem ma yam gumiye tekcwiny me neko omegine.
Yocwa 24:25 Jo Cekem guketo dano gubuto ka kure i yo i wi godi. Jo-nu gubedo ka yako jo ducu ma guwokgukato ki i ŋetgi i yo kunnu; ci Abimelek owinyo Jokke.
Yocwa 24:26 I kare meno Gaal wod pa Ebed odako kacel ki lutugi, gubino i Cekem, ci jo Cekem gugene.
Yocwa 24:27 Gucito i poto, gupwono nyig olokgi, gunyono, gubiyo pige, guyubo nino madit, gudonyo kwede i ot pa lubaŋagi, gucamo, gumato kun giyeto Abimelek.
Yocwa 24:28 Gaal wod pa Ebed owacci, “Abimelek kono aŋa? Wan jo Cekem wan aŋa-gi? Lok aŋo kono ma miyo waworo en? Wod pa Jerubaal ki Jebul laticce yam pe guworo jo pa Kamor ma won Cekem? Piŋo myero wabed ka woro en?
Yocwa 24:29 Kono jo kany tye i te locca, kono akwanyo Abimelek woko. Kono awaco bot Abimelek ni, ‘Med monnyi ci ikatti woko!’ ”
Yocwa 24:30 Ka Jebul ma lalo gaŋ meno owinyo lok pa Gaal wod pa Ebed, ci kiniga omake cut.
Yocwa 24:31 Ocwalo kwena bot Abimelek i Aruma kun waco bote ni, “Nen, Gaal wod pa Ebed ki lutugi gubino i Cekem, gitye ka rubo gaŋ woko pi lweny i komi.
Yocwa 24:32 Pi meno wua woko, in kacel ki jo ma tye boti, ibut ikurgi i poto.
Yocwa 24:33 Odiko ka ceŋ pud tuc atuca-ni, a woko con, ipot i kom gaŋ, Ka en ki jo ma tye bote gubino ka lweny i komi, ci in doŋ itimgi ka komgi owec.”
Yocwa 24:34 Abimelek ki jo ma gitye kwede ducu gua i dyewor, gucito gubuto pi lweny i kom Cekem kun noŋo opoko buca monnye i dul aŋwen.
Yocwa 24:35 Gaal wod pa Ebed okato woko, ocuŋ ka ma gidonyo kwede i dog gaŋ; ci Abimelek ki dano ma gitye bote gua ki ka ma gubuto iye ka kurogi-ni.
Yocwa 24:36 Ka Gaal oneno jo-nu, owaco bot Jebul ni, “Nen dano ca ma gibino gilor piny ki i wi godi!” Ento Jebul owaco ni, “In ibeneno meri tipo godi macalo dano-ni.”
Yocwa 24:37 Gaal dok owacci, “Nen, dano gitye ka lor piny ki i dye lobo malo ca, kun buca acel bino a ki i yo tuŋ te Kworo Waŋ Ayweya ca.”
Yocwa 24:38 Jebul dok owaco bote ni, “Dogi dok tye kwene tin, in ma yam iwacci, ‘Abimelek kono aŋa, wek wawore?’ Meno pe gin jo ma in icayogini? Koŋ ikat woko kombeddi, icilweny kwedgi.”
Yocwa 24:39 Ci Gaal ocito kun telo wi, mony pa jo Cekem, ocako lweny i kom Abimelek.
Yocwa 24:40 Abimelek ocako ryeme, ci oriŋo olaro kome. Jo mapol gupoto ma ret omakogi, o wa i dog gaŋ.
Yocwa 24:422 
Yocwa 24:41 Abimelek odok obedo Aruma; ci Jebul oryemo Gaal ki lutugi woko, pe dok gubedo i Cekem.
Yocwa 24:42 Orwone dano dok gucito i potogi, ci gitito pire bot Abimelek.
Yocwa 24:43 Ocito ki jone, opokogi i buca adek, ci gubuto gukuro yo poto. Oneno dano gibino gia ki i gaŋ, ci oa opoto i komgi, onekogi woko.
Yocwa 24:44 Abimelek ki dul dano ma gitye bote gucorre anyim, gucuŋ i dog gaŋ ka ma gidonyo ki iye-ni, kun buca aryo mukene-ni gicorre i kom jo ducu ma gitye I poto, ginekogi woko.
Yocwa 24:45 Abimelek olwenyo i kom gaŋ meno dyeceŋ benebene, omako woko, oneko jo ma gitye iye, omuko odi woko liweŋ, opworo kado i ŋom.
Yocwa 24:46 Ka jo ducu ma gibedo Migdalcekem guwinyo lokke, ci gudonyo i kicika ma gigolo piny ma i ot pa jokgi El-berit.
Yocwa 24:47 Ci gitito bot Abimelek ni, jo ducu me Migdal-cekem gucokke kacel.
Yocwa 24:48 Abimelek ocito i wi got Jalmon, en kacel ki jo ducu ma gitye bote, ci Abimelek omako latoŋ i ciŋe, ocito otoŋo kwede riddo yen, otino i wi gwoke ci owaco bot jo ma gitye kwede ni, “Kit ma wuneno atimo-ni, wun bene wutim oyot kumene.”
Yocwa 24:49 Kit meno dano acel acel otoŋo riddo yen, olubo ki kor Abimelek, Guketo i wi kabedo matek ma gigolo piny-nyi, gucwinyo mac i kom jo-nu, mumiyo dano ducu ma gubedo i Migdal-cekem guto woko, ma mito romo ka alip acel, co wa ki mon.
Yocwa 24:50 Abimelek dok ocito Tebej, oguro woko, omako.
Yocwa 24:51 Yam tye ot matek ma ocudo malo i dye gaŋ meno, ci lwak dano ma i gaŋ ducu guriŋo gularo iye, co ducu wa ki mon, ci gucego wigi woko iye, gucito malo wa i dan ot ma ocudo malo-ni.
Yocwa 24:52 Ento Abimelek ocito i ot ma ocudo malo-ni, ocako lweny i kome, ci onyiko cok ki doggolane wek eciwan woko ki mac.
Yocwa 24:53 Ci dako mo obayo lakidi rego madit, ocelo wi Abimelek, otyero, obaro cogo wiye woko.
Yocwa 24:54 Oyotoyot olwoŋo awobi ma tiŋo jami lwennye, owaco bote ni, “Wot pala lucwanni, ineka woko, wek dano pe guwacci, ‘Dako mamwa-ni aye oneke.’ ” Awobi-nu ocobo kome pil, oneke woko.
Yocwa 24:55 Ka jo Icrael guneno ni Abimelek oto woko, ci guket, kun dano acel acel dok i gaŋŋe.
Yocwa 24:56 Kit meno Lubaŋa oculo waŋ bal ma Abimelek otimo i kom wonne pi neko omegine pyerabiro.
Yocwa 24:423 
Yocwa 24:57 Dok Lubaŋa odwoko tim pa jo Cekem maracce ducu i wigi, omiyo lok pa Yocam wod pa Jerubaal ma ocenogi kwede ocobbe i komgi kakare. Luŋolkop 10 Tola ki Jair
Yocwa 24:1 Ki i ŋe Abimelek dano ma dok olaro jo Icrael en aye Tola wod pa Puwa, wod pa Dodo, ma jo Icakar. En yam bedo i Camir ma i lobo godi me Epraim.
Yocwa 24:2 Obedo ka ŋolo kop i Icrael pi mwaka pyeraryo wiye adek. Ka oto, giyike i Camir.
Yocwa 24:3 Dano ma olubo kore en aye Jair ma Lagilead. En obedo laŋolkop i Icrael pi mwaka pyeraryo wiye aryo.
Yocwa 24:4 En yam tye ki awobene pyeradek ma giwoto ki kanagi pyeradek. Dok gibedo ki gaŋigi pyeradek bene ma pud gilwoŋo ni Kavot-jair o wa onyoo, ma gitye i lobo Gilead.
Yocwa 24:5 Ka Jair oto, ci giyike i Kamon. Jo Ammon guuno jo Icrael
Yocwa 24:6 Jo Icrael dok gutimo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot kun giworo jogi Baal mapatpat ki jogi ma mon-gu, ma gin lubaŋa pa jo Ciria, jo Cidon, jo Moab, jo Ammon ki jo Piliciti; gubwoto Rwot woko, pe dok giwore.
Yocwa 24:7 Pienno kiniga omako Rwot i kom jo Icrael, ci omiyogi i ciŋ jo Piliciti ki jo Ammon.
Yocwa 24:8 Jo-nu guninyo jo Icrael guunogi matek i mwaka meno. Gubedo ka uno jo Icrael ducu ma gibedo loka Jordan i lobo pa jo Amor ma tye i lobo Gilead pi mwaka apar wiye aboro kulu.
Yocwa 24:9 Jo Ammon guŋolo kulu Jordan ka lweny i kom jo Juda bene, ki jo Benjamin ki jo me doggola pa Epraim, mumiyo piny orem ki jo Icrael woko atika.
Yocwa 24:10 Lacen jo Icrael gukok bot Rwot kun giwaco ni, “Doŋ wabalo i komi, pien wabwoto Lubaŋawa woko, waworo jogi Baal mapatpat.”
Yocwa 24:11 Ci Rwot owaco bot jo Icrael ni, “Yam pe an aye alarowu ki bot jo Ejipt, jo Amor, jo Ammon ki jo Piliciti?
Yocwa 24:12 Jo Cidon bene ki jo Amalek ki jo Maon yam giunowu, ento i kare ma yam wukok bota, alarowu ki i ciŋgi.
Yocwa 24:13 Kadi bed kumeno, pud wubwota woko aye, wuworo lwak lubaŋa mukene. Pienno an pe dok abimedde ki larowu.
Yocwa 24:14 Wucit wukok bot lwak lubaŋa ma yam wuyero-ni, Wek gin aye gularwu ki i kare ma piny orem kwedwu.”
Yocwa 24:424 
Yocwa 24:15 Ento jo Icrael guwaco bot Rwot ni, “Wapoto i bal: in itim i komwa kit ma imito, ento walegi ilarwa tin.”
Yocwa 24:16 Ci gubolo lwak Iubana pa lurok ma i kingi-ni woko, gucako woro Rwot; ci Rwot cwinye oton matek pi atwom ma jo Icrael gubedo kwede.
Yocwa 24:17 I kare meno jo Ammon guywayo mony, gugony i Gilead, ci jo Icrael gucokke kacel, gugony i Mijpa.
Yocwa 24:18 Ludito pa jo Gilead gucako lok kekengi ni, “Dano mene ma bicako lweny i kom jo Ammon? En bibedo lalo wi jo ma gibedo i Gilead ducu.” Luŋolkop 11 Jeputa olaro jo Icrael ki i ciŋ jo Ammon
Yocwa 24:1 I kare meno Jeputa ma Lagilead obedo twon oteka lweny. Wonne nyiŋe Gilead, ento minne obedo dako ma lakwele.
Yocwa 24:2 Dako pa Gilead ma dakone kikome onywalo awobe bene. Ka awobe pa dako-nu gudoŋo, ci guryemo Jeputa woko, kun giwaco bote ni, “In pe ibileyo gin mo ma i ot pa wonwa, pien in i wod pa dako mukene.”
Yocwa 24:3 Ci Jeputa oriŋo omegine woko, obedo gire i lobo Tob. Lwak jo mogo ma kitgi obedo atata aye gucokke bote ci en cito ka mony kwedgi.
Yocwa 24:4 Ka kare doŋ okato, jo Ammon gucako lweny i kom jo Icrael.
Yocwa 24:5 Ka meno otimme, ci ludoŋo pa jo Gilead gucito i lobo Tob ka omo Jeputa.
Yocwa 24:6 Guwaco bote ni, “Bin ibed latel wi monywa, wek walweny ki jo Ammon.”
Yocwa 24:7 Ento Jeputa owaco botgi ni, “Yam wukwera woko, wuryema woko ki i ot pa wora. Ka dok tin wubino bota piŋo ma doŋ wutye ki can-ni?”
Yocwa 24:8 Ci ludoŋo pa jo Gilead guwaco bot Jeputa ni, “Meno aye gin mumiyo tin wadwogo boti, ni, wek icit kwedwa ka lweny i kom jo Ammon, ibed ladit ma loyo jo ducu ma gibedo i Gilead.”
Yocwa 24:9 Ci Jeputa owaco botgi ni, “Ka wudwoka paco pi lweny ki jo Ammon, ka ce Rwot omiyogi i ciŋa, ci abibedo ladit ma loyo wiwu.”
Yocwa 24:10 Ludoŋo me Gilead guwaco bot Jeputa ni, “Rwot aye bibedo lacaden i kinwa; dok wabitiyo kit ma iwaco-ni i ada.”
Yocwa 24:11 Kit meno Jeputa odok cen ki ludoŋo me Gilead, ci lwak gukete me bedo lalo wigi ki latel wi monygi. Jeputa onwoyo lok ma yam owaco ducu i nyim Rwot ki i Mijpa.
Yocwa 24:12 Ci Jeputa ocwalo lukwena bot kabaka pa jo Ammon kun waco ni, “An abalo gin aŋo boti, mumiyo ibino ka lweny ki lobona-ni?”
Yocwa 24:425 
Yocwa 24:13 Kabaka pa jo Ammon ogamo dog lukwena pa Jeputa ni, “Pien i kare ma jo Icrael gua ki i Ejipt gumayo lobona woko, cakke wa i kulu Amon o kwede wa i kulu Jabok ki i Jordan; ber tin wudwok lobona bota mot ki kuc.”
Yocwa 24:14 Jeputa dok ocwalo lukwena bot kabaka pa jo Ammon,
Yocwa 24:15 kun waco bote ni, “Jeputa owaco kit man ni, Jo Icrael yam pe gumayo lobo pa jo Moab kadi lobo pa jo Ammon,
Yocwa 24:16 ento i kare ma gua ki i Ejipt, jo Icrael guwok gubaro gigi i dye tim o wa i Nam Makwar, ka gucito i Kadec.
Yocwa 24:17 Lacen jo Icrael gucwalo lukwena bot kabaka me Edom ma guwaco ni, ‘Ber iwek wawok wakat ki i loboni.’ Ento kabaka me Edom okwero winyo. Dok gucwalo kwena bot kabaka me Moab bene, en pe oye. Kit meno omiyo jo Icrael gubedo gigi i Kadec.
Yocwa 24:18 Ka dok guwoto gubaro dye tim, gurabo lobo Edom ki lobo Moab araba, ka guo kwede i ŋet lobo Moab yo tuŋ wokceŋ, ci gugony loka kulu Amon tuŋcel, Ento pe gudonyo i lobo Moab, pien Amon aye waŋ lobo pa jo Moab.
Yocwa 24:19 Jo Icrael dok gucwalo kwena bot Cikon, kabaka pa jo Amor, ma gaŋ kalle Kecbon. Jo Icrael guwaco bote ni, ‘Ber iwek wawok wakat ki i loboni, wacit i lobowa.’
Yocwa 24:20 Ento Cikon iye ogun i kom jo Icrael, omiyo pe oye ni guwok gukat ki i loboner- omiyo Cikon ocoko jone ducu, ogurogi kacel, gugony i Jakaj, ci olwenyo i kom jo Icrael.
Yocwa 24:21 Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael omiyo Cikon ki lwakke ducu i cin jo Icrael, ci guloyogi. Kit meno jo Icrael gucamo lobo pa jo Amor ducu ma yam gibedo i lobo-ni, odoko megi.
Yocwa 24:22 Gucamo lobo pa jo Amor ducu cakke ki i kulu Amon o kwede wa i Jabok, ki dok cakke ki i tim o wa i Jordan.
Yocwa 24:23 Kit meno Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael oryemo jo Amor woko ki i lobogi ki i nyim jone Icrael, ci in dok imito ile kaka-gi bo?
Yocwa 24:24 Wun myero wucam lobo ma lubaŋawu Kemoc omiyowu me acama, ento wan wabicamo lobo ducu ma Rwot Lubaŋawa otyeko ryemo jo iye ki i nyimwa.
Yocwa 24:25 In aye iber makato Balak wod pa Jipor, kabaka me Moab? En yam otubbe i kom jo Icrael? Nyo en yam ocako lweny i komgi?
Yocwa 24:26 I kare ma jo Icrael gubedo i Kecbon ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, ki i Aroer ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, ki i gaŋi ducu ma i dog kulu Amon pi mwaka miya adek kulu, piŋo yam pe imayogi woko i kare ca?
Yocwa 24:426 
Yocwa 24:27 Kit meno an gira pe atimo bal mo i komi; in giri aye itima rac pi cako lweny i koma. Rwot ma Laŋolkop aye ber oŋol kop i kin jo Icrael ki jo Ammon tin.”
Yocwa 24:28 Ento kabaka pa jo Ammon pe oketo cwinye i kom kwena ma Jeputa ocwalo bote.
Yocwa 24:29 Ci Cwiny pa Rwot obino i kom Jeputa, omiyo obaro dye Gilead ki Manace, okato kwede wa i Mijpa ma i lobo Gilead. Ki kunnu en dok okato kwede i kom jo Ammon.
Yocwa 24:30 Jeputa onoŋo okwoŋo kwoŋ bot Rwot kun waco ni, “Ka ibimiyo jo Ammon i ciŋa,
Yocwa 24:31 ci ŋat ma okatti woko ki i doggola oda ma bino ka rwatte kweda ma doŋ adwogo ma aloyo jo Ammon, en aye bibedo pa Rwot ci abimiye me bedo gitum awaŋa.”
Yocwa 24:32 Kit meno Jeputa oŋolo loka kulu i kom jo Ammon ka lweny kwedgi, ci Rwot omiyogi i ciŋe.
Yocwa 24:33 Onekogi cakke ki i Aroer o kwede wa i lobo ma cok ki Minit, gaŋi pyeraryo madito, ki o wa i Abel-keramim, kun ginekogi matek twatwal. Kit meno Lubaŋa omiyo jo Icrael guloyo jo Ammon. Nya pa Jeputa
Yocwa 24:34 Ka Jeputa odwogo cen i pacone i Mijpa, nen, nyare okato woko ka rwatte kwede ki ajaa ki myel. Nyare en acel keken, pe tye ki wode nyo nyare mo mukene.
Yocwa 24:35 Ka oneno nyare, oyeco boŋone woko pi cwercwiny kun wacci, “Maa do, nyara! Ituro tekka woko do, iketa i cwar can madwoŋ kuman, pien onoŋo doŋ atiŋo doga bot Rwot ma doŋ pe atwero loko kwonna.”
Yocwa 24:36 Ci nyare owaco bote ni, “Wora, ka onoŋo itiŋo dogi bot Rwot ba, ci doŋ itima kit ma itiŋo ki dogi-ni, pien Rwot doŋ oculo kwor i kom jo Ammon ma lumerokki-ni.”
Yocwa 24:37 Dok oloko ki wonne, owacci, “Koŋ itima man; weka abedi pi dwe aryo, wek koŋ acit awirre i kor godi, wek acikok akum pi tidina, an kacel ki luwota, pien abito ma peya ginyoma.”
Yocwa 24:38 Ogamo ni, “Citi”, ocwalo nyare pi dwe aryo. Nyako ocito, en ki luwote, ci gukok i wi godi kun gikumo pi tidine.
Yocwa 24:39 Ka dwe aryo-nu otum, odwogo cen bot wonne, ci otime kit ma yam okwoŋo-ni. Nyare yam pe obedo ki meye mo, Ci lok-ki odoko kit ki bot jo Icrael.
Yocwa 24:40 Anyira Icrael yam gicito ka kumo pi nya pa Jeputa ma Lagilead nino aŋwen i mwaka acel acel. Luŋolkop 12 Jeputa ki jo Epraim
Yocwa 24:427
