Yocwa 24:1 Jo Epraim guywayo mony, guŋolo loka, guo i Japon, guwaco bot Jeputa ni, “Piŋo icito ka lweny i kom jo Ammon, ci pe ilwoŋowa wacito kwedi? Wabiwaŋo wii woko i odi.”
Yocwa 24:2 Jeputa ogamo doggi ni, “An ki lwakka yam wabedo ki mone madit ki jo Ammon, ento ka alwoŋowu, wun pe wulara ki i ciŋgi.
Yocwa 24:3 Ka aneno ni pe wutwero lara, ci adyero koma aŋolo loka ca i kom jo Ammon, ci Rwot omiyogi i ciŋa, Piŋo tin dok wubino bota ka lweny i koma?”
Yocwa 24:4 Ci Jeputa ocoko jo Gilead ducu, olwenyo ki jo Epraim, ci jo Gilead guloyo jo Epraim. Onoŋo jo Epraim guwacci, “Wun jo Gilead ma wubedo i kin jo Epraim ki Manace, wun giwu jo Epraim aye ma yam wuriŋo wularo komwu.”
Yocwa 24:5 Mumiyo jo Gilead gumako waŋ wat ducu me kulu Jordan pi geŋo jo Epraim. Ka dano mo i kin jo Epraim ma oriŋo olaro kome owacci, “Wek aŋol akat loka ca,” ci jo Gilead giwaco bote ni, “In i jo Epraim?” Ka ogamo ni, “Pe,”
Yocwa 24:6 ci giwaco bote ni, “Koŋ iwac Cibolet,” ci en wacci, “Sibolet,” pien pe twero lwoŋone maber matir; ci gimake, gineke woko i waŋ wat kunnu. Jo Epraim guto ma romo alip pyeraŋwen wiye aryo i nino meno.
Yocwa 24:7 Jeputa obedo laŋolkop i Icrael pi mwaka abicel, Ka Jeputa ma Lagilead oto, ci giyike i gaŋŋe ma i Gilead. Ibijan Elon ki Abudon
Yocwa 24:8 Dano ma olube me bedo laŋolkop i Icrael obedo Ibijan, dano me Beterekem.
Yocwa 24:9 En yam tye ki awobene pyeradek, ki anyira pyeradek. Omiyo anyirane ginyomogi i kaka mukene, dok okelo anyira ma i kaka mukene pyeradek pi awo bene. Obedo ka ŋolo kop i Icrael pi mwaka abiro.
Yocwa 24:10 Ka Ibijan oto, ci giyike i Beterekem.
Yocwa 24:11 Ci Elon Lajabulon dok olubo kore, obedo laŋolkop i Icrael. Obedo ka ŋolo kop i Icrael pi mwaka apar.
Yocwa 24:12 Ka Elon Lajabulon oto, ci giyike i Aijalon i lobo pa jo Jabulon.
Yocwa 24:13 Ki I ŋeye dok Abudon wod pa Ilel ma Lapiraton aye obedo laŋolkop i Icrael.
Yocwa 24:14 Yam tye ki awobene pyeraŋwen ki likwaye pyeradek ma giwoto ki kanagi pyerabiro. Obedo ka ŋolo kop i Icrael pi mwaka aboro.
Yocwa 24:15 Ka dok Abudon wod pa Ilel ma Lapiraton oto, ci giyike i Piraton ma i lobo Epraim, i lobo godi pa jo Amalek. Luŋolkop 13 Ginywalo Samson
Yocwa 24:428 
Yocwa 24:1 Jo Icrael dok gutimo gin ma nen marac i Waŋ Rwot, ci Rwot omiyogi i ciŋ jo Piliciti pi mwaka pyeraŋwen.
Yocwa 24:2 Yam tye laco mo i Jora ma i kaka pa jo Dan, nyiŋe Manoa. Dakone onoŋo lalur, pe tye ki latin mo.
Yocwa 24:3 Lamalaika pa Rwot onen bot dako, ci owaco bote ni, “Nen, in lalur ma pe it ye ki latinni mo. Ento ibiyac, ibinywalo latin laco.
Yocwa 24:4 Pi meno myero igwokke, pe imat koŋo vino nyo gin ma mero dano, dok pe icam gin mo ma keni;
Yocwa 24:5 pien, nen, ibiyac, ci ibinywalo latin ma laco. Pe lyedi bigudo wiye, pien bibedo ajula pa Lubaŋa cakke ki i kare ma ginywale, dok en bicako laro jo Icrael ki i ciŋ jo Piliciti.”
Yocwa 24:6 Dako ocito otito bot cware ni, “Dano pa Lubaŋa obino bota kun waŋe nen calo waŋ lamalaika pa Lubaŋa; neno lik twatwal. Pe apenye ka ma oa iye, en pe otitta nyiŋe.
Yocwa 24:7 Ento owaco bota ni, ‘Nen, ibiyac inywalo latin laco; pi meno pe imat koŋo vino nyo gin ma mero dano, pien latin-nu bibedo ajula pa Lubaŋa cakke ki i kare ma ginywale o kwede wa i nino me tone.’ ”
Yocwa 24:8 Manoa olego Rwot kun waco ni, “Ai Rwot, alegi ba, wek dano pa Lubaŋa ma ne ne icwalo-ni odwog botwa, wek opwonywa ki gin ma myero wati i kom awobi ma gibinywalo-ni.”
Yocwa 24:9 Lubaŋa owinyo koko pa Manoa, ci lamalaika pa Lubaŋa obino bot dako doki ma en obedo i poto; ento cware Manoa onoŋo pe tye kacel kwede.
Yocwa 24:10 Dako oriŋo oyotoyot, otito bot cware ni, “Dano ma nene onen bota i kare ca dok onen bota kombeddi.”
Yocwa 24:11 Manoa oa ocito kun lubo kor dakone. Ka obino bot dano-nu, ci owacce ni, “In aye i dano ma yam oloko ki dakoni?” Ogamo ni, “An.”
Yocwa 24:12 Ci Manoa owacci, “Ka lokki doŋ ocobbe kakare, kit kwo pa awobi-ni bibedo niŋniŋ, dok en bitiyo kit gin aŋo?”
Yocwa 24:13 Lamalaika pa Rwot owaco bot Manoa ni, “Gin ducu ma doŋ awaco bot dako en ogwoki.
Yocwa 24:14 Pe ocam gin mo ma oa i kom olok, pe omat koŋo vino nyo gin ma mero dano, pe ocam gin mo ma keni; ento olub gin ducu ma yam acike iye.”
Yocwa 24:15 Manoa owaco bot lamalaika pa Rwot ni, “Wek koŋ wagali man ok ba, pi yubo latin dyel mo piri.”
Yocwa 24:429 
Yocwa 24:16 Ento lamalaika pa Rwot owaco bot Manoa ni, “Kadi bed igala, pe abicamo camwu. Ento ka ibiyubo gitum awaŋa, ci doŋ itum bot Rwot.” Onoŋo Manoa pe ŋeyo ni en lamalaika pa Rwot.
Yocwa 24:17 Ci Manoa openyo Lamalaika pa Rwot ni, “Nyiŋi aŋa, wek ka lokki ocobbe kakare wamiyi deyo?”
Yocwa 24:18 Lamalaika pa Rwot owacce ni, “Piŋo ipenyo nyiŋa, kun nyiŋa obedo me aura twatwal?”
Yocwa 24:19 Manoa otero latin dyel kacel ki gityer me moko kwon, ci otyero i kom pata got bot Rwot ma ticce me aura-ni.
Yocwa 24:20 Ka leb mac olyel ocito malo tuŋ polo ki i wi keno tyer, ci lamalaika pa Rwot oito malo i leb mac me keno tyer-ri kun Manoa ki dakone gineno; ci gupoto piny aryeba ic.
Yocwa 24:21 Lamalaika pa Rwot pe dok onen bot Manoa ki dakone tyen mukene, mumi yo Manoa oniaŋ ni en lamalaika pa Rwot.
Yocwa 24:22 Ci Manoa owaco bot dakone ni, “Wan wabito ada, pien waneno Lubaŋa.”
Yocwa 24:23 Ento dakone ogamo doge ni, “Ka onoŋo Rwot oyubbe me nekowa, kono pe ogamo gitum awaŋa ki gityer me moko kwoŋ ki i ciŋwa, dok kono pe onyuto botwa lok magi ducu, kadi tuco lok macalo magi.”
Yocwa 24:24 Ka dako onywalo wode, ci ocako nyiŋe Samson. Ci awobi-nu odoŋo kun Rwot miye gum.
Yocwa 24:25 Cwiny pa Rwot ocako tic i kome i Gony pa Dan ma i kin Jora ki Ecitaol. Luŋolkop 14 Samson ki dako mo me Timna
Yocwa 24:1 Samson ocito Timna, ci oneno nyako mo kunnu ma anyira jo Piliciti.
Yocwa 24:2 Ka odwogo cen, ci otito bot wonne ki minne ni, “Aneno nyako mo i kin anyirajo Piliciti i Timna; ber wunyomma obed dakona.”
Yocwa 24:3 Ento wonne ki minne guwaco bote ni, “Nyako mo pe i kin lwak anyira ma tuwu ce, nyo i kin rokwa ducu, en aye omiyo icito ka kelo dako ki i kin jo Piliciti ma pe gulirre-ni?” Ento Samson ogamo dog wonne ni, “Ber wunyomma nya-nu, pien mwonya twatwal.”
Yocwa 24:4 Wonne ki minne onoŋo pe guŋeyo ni lokke oa bot Rwot; pien onoŋo obeyenyo tyen alii mo i kom jo Piliciti. I kare meno jo Piliciti giloyo jo Icrael.
Yocwa 24:5 Samson ocito Timna ki wonne ki minne. Ka oo i potti olok ma i Timna, ci latin labwor omor i kome.
Yocwa 24:430 
Yocwa 24:6 Cwiny Rwot obino opoto i kome ki tek, ci oyeco kom labwor, obaro iye woko macalo yeco latin dyel, kun pe tye ki gin mo i ciŋe. Ento pe otito gin ma en otimo- ni bot wonne nyo minne.
Yocwa 24:7 Ka ocito kunnu, oloko ki nyako ca, ci oyomo cwinye matek.
Yocwa 24:8 Ka kare okato manok, odok kunnu ka omo dakone, ci oŋak ocito ka neno kom labwor ma oneko-ni, Ci nen, lwak kic odonyo i kom labwor, moo kic bene tye.
Yocwa 24:9 Ototo ki ciŋe, ka opyelo i dye ciŋe kun camo woto kwede. Ka oo kwede bot wonne ki minne, omiyogi mogo, gin bene gucamo. Ento pe otito botgi ni etoto ki i kom labwor ma oneko-ni.
Yocwa 24:10 Lacen wonne ocito bot dako-nu, ci Samson otedo karama kunnu, pien latin awobi yam timo kit ennu.
Yocwa 24:11 Ka jo kunnu gunene, gukelo bote jo pyeradek wek gubed kwede.
Yocwa 24:12 Samson owaco botgi ni, “Wek koŋ awacciwu koc lit: ka wubigonyo tere i kin nino abiro-ni me karama, ma wunoŋo tyen lokke, ci an abiminiwu boŋŋi camanini pyeradek, ki boŋŋi mabeco pyeradek bene me aruka i nino madito.
Yocwa 24:13 Ento ka Wo tyen lokke oloyowu, ci wun aye wubimina boŋŋi camanini pyeradek, ki boŋŋi mabeco pyeradek bene me aruka i nino madito.” Guwacce ni, “Wac koc litti, wek koŋ wawiny mono.”
Yocwa 24:14 Owaco botgi ni, “Lacam dano oa iye cam, latekkom oa iye gin ma lim.” Gutyeko nino adek ma pe gitwero gonyo tyen koc lit meno.
Yocwa 24:15 I nino me aŋwenne guwaco bot dako pa Samson ni, “Bit cwari, wek otit botwa tyen koc litte. Ka pe, ci wawaŋi woko ki mac wa ki jo me ot pa woru bene. Wun wulwoŋowa; kany pi yako jamiwa woko bo?”
Yocwa 24:16 CI dako pa Samson ocako kok i nyime kun waco bote ni, “In idaga giri, pe imara. Iwaco koc lit bot lutuwa kun pe ititta te lokke.” Ogamo doge ni, “Nen, yam pe atito bot wora wa maa bene, ci in aye doŋ abititti bo?”
Yocwa 24:17 Dako obedo ka kok bote pi nino abiro, kit ma karama obedo kwede; ci i kom nino me abirone otito bot dakone, pien onoŋo doŋ odiye matek. Dako ocito otito koc lit bot lutugi,
Yocwa 24:18 mumiyo jo me gaŋ meno guwacce tyen koc litte ma peya cen opoto i kom nino me abirone, kun giwacci, “Gin aŋo ma lim makato moo kic? Gin aŋo ma tek makato labwor?” En owaco botgi ni, “Kono yam pe wubedo ka pur ki royana, kono pe wugonyo tyen koc litta.”
Yocwa 24:19 Ci Cwiny pa Rwot obino opoto i kome ki tek. Ocito i Acikelon, oneko dano pyeradek ma i gaŋ meno, oyako jamigi, omiyo boŋŋigi mabeco me aruka i nino madito bot jo ma gugonyo koc lit-ti, ci odok i paco pa wonne ki akemo madwoŋ.
Yocwa 24:20 Ci gimiyo dako pa Samson bot lawote ma onoŋo obedo ka ŋete i kare me nyom.
Yocwa 24:431  Luŋolkop 15
Yocwa 24:1 Ka kare okato manok, i kare ma gikayo iye naŋo, Samson ocito ka limo dakone ki latin dyel mo, ci owacci, “Abidonyo bot dakona i kicikane.” Ento won dako pe oye en odonyo.
Yocwa 24:2 Owacci, “Onoŋo atamo mera ada ni ityeko kwere woko, mumiyo doŋ amiye woko bot lawoti. Laminne matidi dok ber kato en. Ber ibed kwede ma kakare.”
Yocwa 24:3 Ento Samson owaco botgi ni, “Tin pe abibedo labal ka atimo gin marac i kom jo Piliciti.”
Yocwa 24:4 Samson ocito omako lwak too miya adek, ci oriyo raa. Oloko too omiyo yibgi okemme ki wadi, otweyo raa i kin yibgi aryo aryo.
Yocwa 24:5 Ka ocwinyo mac i kom raa, ci oweko too gucito kwede i poto naŋo pa Lupiliciti ma peya gikayo-ni. Mac owaŋo wic larita ma gigurogi woko, ki naŋo ma peya gikayo, wa ki potti jeituni bene.
Yocwa 24:6 Ka Lupiliciti gupenyo ni, “Man aŋa ma otimo?” ci giwacci, “Samson ma cwar dako pa Latimna aye otimo, pien gikwanyo dakone, gimiyo bot lawote.” Mumiyo jo Piliciti gubino, guwaŋo anyaka ki wonne woko ki mac.
Yocwa 24:7 Ci Samson owaco botgi ni, “Ka ce wutimo kit meno, ci akwoŋo akwoŋa botwu ni abiculo kwor i komwu, ka doŋ abiweko lobo bedo.”
Yocwa 24:8 Ocako datogi ki toŋ, onekogi matek; lacen ocito obedo i boro got ma i Etam. Samson oloyo jo Piliciti i Leki
Yocwa 24:9 Jo Piliciti gubino, gugony i Juda, ci gumonyo Leki.
Yocwa 24:10 Jo Juda guwacci, “Piŋo wun wubino ka monyowa?” Ci gugamo ni, “Wabino ka tweyo Samson, wek watim en kit ma en otimowa-ni.”
Yocwa 24:11 Jo Juda alip adek gucito i boro got ma i Etam, guwaco ni, “In pe iŋeyo ni jo Piliciti aye gitye ka loyowa? Ci itimowa kuman mono piŋo?” Ogamo doggi ni, “Kit ma gutimo i koma-ni, an bene atimogi kumene.”
Yocwa 24:12 Guwacce ni, “Wan wabino ka tweyi, wek wamiyi i ciŋ jo Piliciti.” Samson owaco botgi ni, “Koŋ wukwoŋŋa kwoŋ ni pe wun aye wubineka wun kikomwu.”
Yocwa 24:13 Gugamo ni, “Pe; wan wabitweyi atweya keken, ci wabimiyi i ciŋgi.” Ci gutweye ki tol aryo manyen, gukele woko ki i boro got.
Yocwa 24:14 Ka oo i Leki, Lupiliciti gubino ka romo kwede kun gidaŋŋe, ci Cwiny pa Rwot obino opoto i kome ki tek, tol ma gitweyo ki ciŋe odoko calo tol obira ma mac owaŋo, opoto ome woko ki i ciŋe.
Yocwa 24:15 Ocop i kom cogo cwak kana manyen, owoto ciŋe, okwanyo, ci oneko kwede dano alip kulu.
Yocwa 24:432 
Yocwa 24:16 Ci Samson owaco ni, “Pi cogo cwak kana odurre kom wadi lipimpim; ki cogo cwak kana aneko kwede co alip.”
Yocwa 24:17 Ka otyeko loko lokke, obolo cogo cwak kana ma i ciŋe-ni piny, ci gicako nyiŋ kabedo-nu ni, Ramat-leki .
Yocwa 24:18 Lacen orwo pii oneke matek, ci okok bot Rwot kun waco ni, “ityeko larowa matek kit man ki ciŋa, Rwot ci dok ata kombeddi ki orwo pii? Doŋ apot i ciŋ jo ma pe gilirogi bo?”
Yocwa 24:19 Ci Lubaŋa obaro waŋ got matwolo ma yam tye i Leki, pii onyette ki iye. Ka omato, ci cwinye odwogo, olimo tek doki. Pienno nyiŋ kabedo-nu gilwoŋo ni, En- akore; pud tye i Leki waonyoo.
Yocwa 24:20 Samson obedo laŋolkop i Icrael i kare pa jo Piliciti pi mwaka pyeraryo. Luŋolkop 16 Samson ocito Gaja
Yocwa 24:1 I nino mo Samson ocito Gaja, ci oneno lakwele mo, ocito odonyo bote.
Yocwa 24:2 Gitito bot jo Gaja ni, “Samson obino kany,” ci gurumo kabedo-nu woko, gubuto gukure i dog cel me gaŋ meno dyewor benebene. Guliŋ woko litik i dyewor meno, kun gikwilo lok ni, “Weku wakure nio wa kwar piny, ka doŋ wabineke.”
Yocwa 24:3 Ento Samson obuto kunnu o wa i cwiny dyewor, ci ba malo i cwiny dyewor, omako dog cel me gaŋ-ŋu, ki pagi wirre aryo ducu, oputogi woko ki pal gwoke, ki rii me cegone ki jamine ducu, otiŋogi woko, oterogi wa i wi got ma i nyim Kebron.
Yocwa 24:4 Lacen dok omaro dako mo ma i nota me Corek, ma nyiŋe Delila.
Yocwa 24:5 Ci rwodi pa jo Piliciti gubino bot dako, guwaco bote ni, “Bit en mot, wek inoŋ ka ma tek kome madwoŋ-ŋi ocuŋ iye, ka dok wabiloye ki yo aŋo, wek watweye, wabwoye; ci wan ki acel acel wabimini lim ryal alip acel ki miya acel.”
Yocwa 24:6 Ci Delila ocako waco bot Samson ni, “Opwoyo ititta ka ma tek komi madwoŋ-ŋi ocuŋ iye do, ki kit ma myero gitweyi kwede, wek gibwoyi.”
Yocwa 24:7 Samson owaco bote ni, “Ka ce gitweya ki tol atum abiro, manyenne, ma pe otwo, ci abidoko goro macalo dano mukene ducu.”
Yocwa 24:8 Rwodi pa Lupiliciti gukelo tol atum manyen abiro ma peya otwone, ci Delila otweyo ki Samson woko.
Yocwa 24:9 Onoŋo dako-nu tye ki jo mukanne i kicika ma i tyelo me kiye. Owaco bot Samson ni, “Samson, Lupiliciti gubino i komi!” Ento en ocodo tol atum woko ducu, macalo tol tworo ma ogudo mac. Kit meno ka ma tek kome ocuŋ iye pe omedo ki ŋene.
Yocwa 24:10 Ci Delila owaco bot Samson ni, “Nen ka ibwola ba, ilokka giri lok goba. Opwoyo ititta kit ma myero gitweyi kwede do.”
Yocwa 24:433 
Yocwa 24:11 Ci dok owaco bote ni, “Ka ce gitweya ki tol ma peya gitiyo kwedgi, ci abidoko goro macalo dano mukene ducu.”
Yocwa 24:12 Delila okwanyo tol manyen, otweye kwede, ci owacce ni “Samson, Lupiliciti gubino i komi!” Koŋ onoŋo dano gukanne i kicika ma i tyelo ka kiye, Ento Samson ocodo tol woko ki i ciŋe macalo uci me kwoyo boŋo.
Yocwa 24:13 Ka Delila dok owaco bot Samson ni “Pud ibwola aye o wa onyoo, kun ilokka goba. Titta kit ma myero gitweyi kwede mono.” Ci owacceni, “Ka ce imako dog yer wiya abiro, icweyo irwako i boŋo ma it ye ka cweyoni, igoyo ki yat ma lacwe- boŋo goyo ki uci ma orwako wek omok matek, ci abidoko goro macalo dano mukene ducu.”
Yocwa 24:14 Kit meno ka doŋ onino, Delila omako dog yer wiye abiro, ocweyo kun orwako i boŋo ma etye ka cweyo, ogoyo ki yat wek omok iye matek. Ci owaco ni, “Samson, Lupiliciti gubino i komi!” Ento en oco ki i waŋ nino owoto yat, oputo kwede yat cweyo boŋo, ki boŋo ma i kome ma gitye ka cweyone.
Yocwa 24:15 Lacen dako owaco bote ni, “Itwero waco niŋniŋ ni imara kun noŋo pe igena ki cwinyi ducu? Man doŋ ibwola tyen me adekke, kun pe ititta ka ma tek komi madwoŋ-ŋi ocuŋ iye.”
Yocwa 24:16 Ka dako obedo ka dide matek ki lokke nino ki nino, kun lokke ki tek, omiyo cwinye obelle me to woko.
Yocwa 24:17 Ci otito bot dakone gin ducu ma tye i cwinye, kun wacce ni, “Lyedi peya ogudo wiya, pien abedo ajula pa Rwot cakke ki i kare ma ginywala iye. Ka ce gilyelo yer wiya, ci tek koma biweka woko, abidoko goro, abedo macalo dano mukene ducu.”
Yocwa 24:18 Ka Delila oneno ni doŋ otyeko titte lok ma i cwinye ducu, ocwalo kwena olwoŋo rwodi pa jo Piliciti kun wacci, “Wubin koŋ doŋ k icel-li, pien doŋ otitta lok ma i cwinye ducu.” Rwodi pa jo Piliciti gubino kun gikelo ki lim bene i ciŋgi.
Yocwa 24:19 Delila omiyo Samson onino i coŋe, ci gilwoŋo laco mo omiye olyelo dog yer wiye abiro-ni woko, Ci dako ocako time malitlit, ci tek kome oa woko ki i kome.
Yocwa 24:20 Ka dako owaco ni, “Samson, Lupiliciti gubino i komi!” ci oco woko ki i waŋ nino kun tamo ni, “Abikato woko i kit macon ca, ateŋogi woko ki i koma.” Onoŋo pe ŋeyo ni Rwot otyek o a woko ki i kome.
Yocwa 24:21 Lupiliciti gumake, gukolo waŋe woko, gutere Gaja. Gutweye ki atego mola, obedo ka rego bel i mabuc.
Yocwa 24:22 Ento yer wiye ocako lot doki i ŋe lyelone. To pa Samson
Yocwa 24:23 I kare mo rwodi pa Lupiliciti gucokke ka tyero gitum madwoŋ bot Dagon ma lubaŋagi ma cwinygi yom, pien gubedo ka waco ni, “Lubaŋawa doŋ omiyo lamerokwa Samson i ciŋwa.”
Yocwa 24:434 
Yocwa 24:24 Ka lwak gunene, gupako lubaŋagi-ni kun giwacci, “Lubaŋawa doŋ omiyo lamerokwa i ciŋwa ma lanek pinywa, ma otyeko lwak jowa mapol.”
Yocwa 24:25 Ka cwinygi doŋ yom, ci guwacci, “Gilwoŋ Samson wek otuk tuko mo ogal ki waŋwa.” Kit meno gilwoŋo Samson ki i ot mabuc, ci obedo ka tuko i nyimgi, Ci giweko en ocuŋ i kin wir ot aryo.
Yocwa 24:26 Samson owaco bot awobi ma peye ni, “Wek koŋ aboŋ kom wir ma ot ocuŋ iye- ni, wek ajeŋŋe i komgi.”
Yocwa 24:27 Onoŋo ot opoŋ ki co ki mon, ki rwodi ducu pa Lu piliciti onoŋo gitye kunnu. Malo i wi ot bene onoŋo tye co ki mon alip adek ma gubedo ka neno ka Samson tye ka tuko.
Yocwa 24:28 Ka doŋ Samson okok bot Rwot kun waco ni. “Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, po pira, alegi ba do, ci imiya tekkom doki tyen man acel-li. Ai Lubaŋa alegi iwek acul kwor i kom jo Piliciti pi waŋa aryo-ni lawaŋacel.”
Yocwa 24:29 Ci Samson omako wil ot aryo ma i dyere ma ot ocuŋ i komgi-ni, otyelle ki tekke ducu, ojeŋŋe i komgi, kun ciŋe malacuc omako wir acel, ki ciŋe malacam omako mukene.
Yocwa 24:30 Ka doŋ Samson owacci, “Wek doŋ ato kacel ki jo Piliciti.” Ci okulle ki tekke ducu, omiyo ot opoto i kom rwodi ki i kom lwak ma gitye iye-ni. Kit meno, jo ma onekogi i kare me tone obedo pol makato jo ma yam onekogi ma pud en kwo.
Yocwa 24:31 Omegine ki kakagi ducu gubino, gutiŋo kome, gukelo lyel ci guyiko i kin Jora ki Ectaol, i lyel pa wonne Manoa. Obedo laŋolkop i Icrael pi mwaka pyeraryo. Luŋolkop 17 Mika ki cal apayane
Yocwa 24:1 Yam tye dano mo i lobo godi me Epraim ma nyiŋe Mika.
Yocwa 24:2 Owaco bot minne ni, “Lim ryal alip apar wiye acel ma yam gikwalo ki boti-ni, ma yam iloko iceno iye dano-ni, kun an bene awinyo, nen, ryal-lu tye bota, an aye yam akwanyo.” Minne ogamo ni. “Rwot omiyi gum, latinna.”
Yocwa 24:3 Odwoko lim ryal alip apar wiye acel bot minne, ci minne owaco ni, “An kikoma adyero ryal man bot Rwot pi woda me timo cal apaya ki cal ryal ma giliyo aliya; ci kombeddi doŋ omiyo adwoko boti.”
Yocwa 24:4 Mika dok odwoko lim bot minne, ci minne okwanyo lim ryal miya aryo, omiyo bot latet ryal, en otiyo ki cal apaya ma gimwono kome ki ryal, ki cal ryal ma giliyo aliya, ci giketo i ot pa Mika.
Yocwa 24:5 Laco man, Mika, onoŋo tye ki ot woro Lubaŋa i gaŋŋe, ci otiyo epod ki cal lubaŋa , oketo wode acel me bedo ajwakane.
Yocwa 24:435 
Yocwa 24:6 I kare meno onoŋo kabaka pe i Icrael; dano acel acel tiyo gin ma en tamo ni tye atir.
Yocwa 24:7 I kare meno onoŋo tye latin laco mo ma bedo i Beterekem, i lobo Juda. En onoŋo Lalevi ci bedo kunnu macalo welo.
Yocwa 24:8 En odak oa woko ki i Beterekem ma i Juda wek ecibed i kabedo mo ma ebinoŋo, Ka owoto, ci oo i lobo godi me Epraim, i gaŋ pa Mika.
Yocwa 24:9 Mika openye ni, “In ia ki kwene?” Ogamo ni, “An Lalevi me Beterekem ma i Juda, abibedo i kabedo mo ma abinoŋone.”
Yocwa 24:10 Ci Mika owaco bote ni, “Bed doŋ bota, wek ibed wora ki ajwakana, ci abimini litn ryal apar mwaka ki mwaka, ki boŋŋi me aruka, dok abigwoki.”
Yocwa 24:11 Lalevi oye bedo bote; ci latin laco meno ocako bedo kwede macalo ŋat acel i kom litinone.
Yocwa 24:12 Mika oketo Lalevi me bedo ajwakane, ci obedo i gaŋ pa Mika.
Yocwa 24:13 I kare-nu Mika owacci, “Kombeddi doŋ aŋeyo ni Rwot bibedo kweda maber, pien doŋ atye ki Lalevi me bedo ajwakana.” Luŋolkop 18 Mika ki jo Dan
Yocwa 24:1 I kare meno onoŋo kabaka mo pe i Icrael. Dok i kare meno jo ma i kaka pa Dan gubedo ka yenyo kabedo me bedo ginaleyagi, wek gubed iye, pien onoŋo peya gunoŋo dul lobo mo me aleya i kin kaka me Icrael.
Yocwa 24:2 Kit meno jo Dan gucwalo dano abic makwiri ki i kin doggolagi ducu, gua ki i Jora ki Ectaol pi roto lobo ki tatone maber, kun giwaco botgi ni, “Wuciti ka tato lobo maber.” Ci gubino i lobo godi me Epraim, i gaŋ pa Mika, gubuto kunnu.
Yocwa 24:3 Ka onoŋo gitye i gaŋ pa Mika, ci guŋeyo dwan Lalevi matidi-ni, guŋak gucito bote, gupenye ni, “Aŋa mono ma okeli wa kany? Itimo aŋo i kabedo-ni? Ibedo kany piŋo mono?”
Yocwa 24:4 Owaco botgi ni, “Mika aye obedo ka tima kuman, kuman; dok en aye cula gire, ci adoko ajwakane.”
Yocwa 24:5 Ci gulege ni, “Koŋ ipeny dog Lubaŋa, wek wane ka wotwa ma wacito iye-ni bibedo maber.”
Yocwa 24:6 Ajwaka owaco botgi ni, “Wucit ki kuc. Rwot bigwokowu i wot ma wucito iye-ni.”
Yocwa 24:7 Ci jo abic-cu gucito guo i Laic, ci guneno jo ma gitye kenyo, kit ma gibedo kwede mot i kit bedo pa jo Cidon, ma gibedo mot gutoyo ki tokgi ata, dok ni pe gin mo orem botgi i wi lobo, ento gitye gigi ki lonyo madwoŋ. Dok onoŋo gitye ka mabor ki bot Jo Cidon, pe gimer ki ŋatti mo.
Yocwa 24:436 
Yocwa 24:8 Ka gudwogo bot omegigi i Jora ki Ectaol, omegigi gupenyogi ni, “Wukelo kit lok aŋo?”
Yocwa 24:9 Gugamo ni, “Wua, wek wacitu i komgi, pien waneno lobo ca, lobone ber twatwal. Pe wumito timo iye gin mo? Pe wugalle ka cito kunnu ka donyo iye, ki camo lobone woko.
Yocwa 24:10 Ka wubicito, ci wubituc i kom jo ma gutoyo tokgi ata. Lobone lac; ada Lubaŋa otyeko miyone woko i ciŋwu, kabedone tye iye gin ducu ma mitte i wi lobo.”
Yocwa 24:11 Ci jo miya abicel ma i kaka pa Dan gukwanyo jami lwenygi, gua ki i Jora ki Ectaol,
Yocwa 24:12 gukato, gugony i Kiriat-jearim i Juda, Pi lok meno omiyo kabedo-nu gilwoŋo Gony pa Dan o wa onyoo. Nen, tye i ŋet Kiriaŋearim, yo tuŋ potoceŋ.
Yocwa 24:13 Lacen gukato gucito i lobo godi me Epraim, ci gubino i gaŋ pa Mika.
Yocwa 24:14 Ka doŋ jo abic-cu ma yam onoŋo gucito ka roto lobo Laic guwaco bot omegigi ni, “Wuŋeyo mono ni i odi kany tye iye epod, cal lubaŋa, cal apaya ki cal me ryal ma giliyo aliya? Kombeddi doŋ wutam gin ma wubitimo.”
Yocwa 24:15 Ci guŋak gucito kunnu, guwoto i ot pa latin Lalevi ma i paco pa Mika, ci gupenye ka en tye maber.
Yocwa 24:16 Jo Dan miya abicel gumako jami lwenygi, gucuŋ kwede i dog gaŋ ka ma gidonyo iye-ni,
Yocwa 24:17 ci jo abic ca ma yam gucito ka roto lobo-ni gucito gudonyo i ot, gukwanyo cal apaya ki epod, ki cal lubaŋa, ki cal me ryal ma giliyo aliya, kun ajwaka ocuŋ i dog gaŋ kacel ki jo miya abicel ma gumako jami lwenygi.
Yocwa 24:18 Ka jo-nu gudonyo i ot pa Mika, gukwanyo cal apaya, ki epod, ki cal lubaŋa ki cal me ryal ma giliyo aliya, ci ajwaka openyogi ni, “Wutimo gin aŋo mono?”
Yocwa 24:19 Gugamo doge ni, “Liŋ mot, um dogi woko ki ciŋi, ci ibin kacel kwedwa, ibed wonwa ki ajwakawa. Hamo ni bedo ber ka ibedo ajwaka i ot pa dano acel, nyo ibedo ajwaka i doggola nyo i kaka kulu ma i Icrael?”
Yocwa 24:20 Cwiny ajwaka obedo yom; otero epod ki cal lubaŋa ki cal apaya, owoto kwedgi i dye lwak.
Yocwa 24:21 Kit meno gulokke gucako wot, kun gicwalo litino ki lim makwo ki jamigi ducu i nyimgi.
Yocwa 24:22 Ka doŋ gucito ma oŋado ki paco pa Mika, jo ma gibedo i gaŋ ma cok ki gaŋ pa Mika onoŋo guriŋo i oduru, gumako jo Dan iyo.
Yocwa 24:23 Gudaŋŋe bot jo Dan, ci gin gulokke, guwaco bot Mika ni, “Aŋo mutimi mumiyo ibino ki lwak macalo man?”
Yocwa 24:437 
Yocwa 24:24 Ogamo ni, “Wukwanyo lubaŋana ma apayo, ki ajwakana, wucito kwede woko, doŋ adoŋ ki gin aŋo? Ka dok wupenya akaka ni, ‘Aŋo mutimi?’”
Yocwa 24:25 Emo jo Dan gugamo ni, “Pe iwek dwani owinnye i kinwa, miyo kiniga mako jowa ci gipoto i komwu, gineki ki jo paconi ducu.”
Yocwa 24:26 Ci jo Dan gucito gigi woko. Ka Mika oneno ni gitek pe eromo loyogi, en bene odok paco.
Yocwa 24:27 Jo Dan gutero jami ma yam Mika opayo; ki ajwakane ma yam tye bote, guo kwede wa i Laic, bot jo ma gubedo mol ma gutoyo tokgi ata, gunekogi ki pala lucwan, guwaŋo gaŋgi woko ki mac.
Yocwa 24:28 Dano mo pe ma oriŋo oduru ka larogi, pien onoŋo gitye bor ki Cidon, dok yam pe gumer ki ŋatti mo, Onoŋo gitye i nota ma cok ki Bet-Rekob. Jo Dan gugero gaŋ meno odoco, gubedo iye.
Yocwa 24:29 Ci gucako nyiŋ gaŋ ni, Dan, macalo nyiŋ Dan ma kwarogi, ma yam Icrael onywalo. Ento yam con nyiŋ gaŋ-ŋu gilwoŋo ni Laic.
Yocwa 24:30 Jo Dan gucibo cal ma gutero-ni me aworagi. Ci Yonacan lakwar Gercom ma wod pa Moses, ki likwaye, gubedo ajwagi i kaka pa Dan o wa i kare ma gitero jo Icrael i opii.
Yocwa 24:31 Cal ma yam Mika opayo obedo kunnu pi kare ducu ma ot pa Lubaŋa obedo i Cilo. Luŋolkop 19 Lalevi mo ki dakone ma aŋeca
Yocwa 24:1 I kare meno ma onoŋo-kabaka pud pe i Icrael, yam tye Lalevi mo ma bedo i lobo godi me Epraim macalo welo, i kabedo mo ma tye teŋe i lum ka mabor. Okwanyo nya jo Beterekem ma i Juda me bedo dakone ma aŋeca.
Yocwa 24:2 Ka dakone okeco i kome, ci oa woko ki bote, odok i ot pa wonne i Beterekem ma i Juda, obedo kunnu pi dwe aŋwen.
Yocwa 24:3 Lacen cware oa ocito ka lubo kore kunnu, wek elok kwede mot, edwog kwede gaŋ, Owoto ki laticce ki kana aryo, ci obino i ot pa won nyako. Ka won nyako onene, obino ka jole ki yomcwiny.
Yocwa 24:4 Ci won dakone odiye, omiyo obedo kunnu pi nino adek; gubedo ka camo cam ki mat, kun en buta kunnu.
Yocwa 24:5 I nino me aŋwenne gua malo con, ci en oyubbe pi wot. Ento won nyako owaco bot cwar nyare ni, “Koŋ igal dogi ki latin kwoŋ mo, ka lacen doŋ wuwoti.”
Yocwa 24:6 Jo aryo-nu gubedo gucamo ki mat kacel, ci won nyako owaco bot laco-nu ni, “Ber ibut kany tin, wek koŋ cwinyi opye mot.”
Yocwa 24:438 
Yocwa 24:7 Ka laco-nu oa malo me wot, won nyako dok ojuke, omiyo dok obuto kunnu.
Yocwa 24:8 I nino me abicce doŋ oa malo odiko con me cako wot; ci won nyako owacci, “Koŋ igal dogi ki gin mo; ibed nio ka piny okwe.” Kit meno gin aryo ducu gucamo cam.
Yocwa 24:9 Lacen laco-nu ki dakone ki laticce gua malo me cako wot. Won dakone owaco bo te ni, “Nen, piny doŋ mito yuto woko, ber wubut kany do, Nen ka piny doŋ oyuto woko ayuta, but kany wek koŋ cwinyi opye mot, ci diki wubia odiko con, wucako wot me cito paco.”
Yocwa 24:10 Ento laco-nu pe dok oye buto kunnu. Oa, ocako wot, ci oo i nyim Jebuc, ma en aye Jerucalem. Onoŋo en tye ki kana aryo ma doŋ gitweyo kom me bedo i wigi, kun dakone tye kwede kacel.
Yocwa 24:11 Ka doŋ gitye cok ki Jebuc, onoŋo piny doŋ oyuto woko, ci laticce owaco bote ni, “Wek waŋak i gaŋ man pa jo Jebuc, wabut kunnu tin.”
Yocwa 24:12 Ento rwode ogamo ni, “Pe wabidok bot lurok ma pe gin jo Icrael; ento wabikato wacito Gibea.”
Yocwa 24:13 Ci owaco bot laticce ni, “Bin wek wacit i kabedo mo mukene, wabut i Gibea nyo i Rama.”
Yocwa 24:14 Gukato gucito gigi, ci cen opoto woko ma gitye cok ki Gibea, ma gaŋ pa jo Benjamin.
Yocwa 24:15 Guŋak kunnu pi wot buto i Gibea. Ka gudonyo iye, Lalevi ocito obedo piny i dye gaŋ ka maleŋ: ento dano mo pe oterogi i ode wek gubut bote.
Yocwa 24:16 Ka lacen dano mo ma oti obino kun oa ki ka tic i potone. Dano-nu tugi tye i lobo godi me Epraim; onoŋo en labedo i Gibea, wegi gaŋ kikomgi gin jo Benjamin.
Yocwa 24:17 Otiŋo waŋe oneno dano ca ma lawot ma obedo i dye gaŋ ka maleŋ, openye ni, “Icito kwene? la ki kwene?”
Yocwa 24:18 Lalevi ogamo ni, “Waa ki i Beterekem ma i Juda, wadok i lobo godi me Epraim ka mo teŋe i lum ka mabor ka ma an abedo iye. Onoŋo acito i Beterekem ma i Juda-ni, kombeddi abedok gaŋ; ento ŋatti mo pe otera i ode.
Yocwa 24:19 Watye ki reŋ kal ki cam pa kanawa, wa ki kwoŋ ki koŋo vino ma romowa, an ki aŋecana ki awobi-ni ma konya; gin mo murem peke.”
Yocwa 24:20 Ci dano muti-ni ogamo ni, “Kuc obed i komi; abicobo gin ma wumito ducu; ento pe wubut wo ko i dye gaŋ aye.”
Yocwa 24:21 Kit meno ocako tere i ot, ci omiyo cam ki kana. Gin gulwoko tyengi, ka gucamo, gumato.
Yocwa 24:22 Ka gitye ka yomo cwinygi, ci nen, jo ma i gaŋ meno ma lutim aranyi gurumo ot woko, gugoyo doggola kun giwaco bot ladit ma won ot ni, “Kel dano ma obino i odi-ni woko, wek wanene kwede.”
Yocwa 24:439 
Yocwa 24:23 Won ot okato woko, ocito botgi, owaco botgi ni, “Pe kumeno, utmega, pe wutim tim marac kit meno; pien dano man doŋ odonyo i oda, pe wutim tim man me aranyi.
Yocwa 24:24 Nen, nyara tye ene ma peya oŋeyo co, ki aŋeca pa laco-ni bene. Wek akelgi woko kombeddi, wuronygi kun wutimogi kit ma wumito; ento i kom dano man pe wutim aranyi i kome.”
Yocwa 24:25 Ento jo-nu pe gumedo ki winyone, mumiyo Lalevi omako dakone ci ocwalo woko i ciŋgi, Guronye, gutiyo kwede kit ma igi mito i dyewor benebene nio wa odiko, guweke ka piny doŋ mito ru.
Yocwa 24:26 Ka te piny oyabbe, dako-nu obino opoto piny i doggola ot pa laco ma rwode tye bote-ni, nio ka piny odoko leŋ.
Yocwa 24:27 Rwode oa malo odiko, oyabo doggola, okato woko pi medo wotte. Ci nen, dako tye obuto i doggola me ot, kun ciŋe tye i doggola.
Yocwa 24:28 Owaco bot dako ni, “A malo wek waciti,” ento pe ogamo doge. Ci otiŋo kom dakone muto oketo i wi kana; lacen oa ocito kwede i gaŋŋe.
Yocwa 24:29 Ka doŋ odonyo i ode, okwanyo pala, omako kom dakone muto-ni, oŋido woko i dul ma romo apar wiye aryo, ocwalo i lobo pa jo Icrael ducu.
Yocwa 24:30 Jo ducu ma guneno guwacci, “Gin macalo man yam peya otimme, peya yam onen, cakke i kare ma yam jo Icrael gua ki i Ejipt, o wa onyoo; wutam, wupor lokke, ci wuloki.” Luŋolkop 20 Lweny i kom jo Benjamin
Yocwa 24:1 Jo Icrael ducu gukatti woko, cakke wa i Dan o kwede i Beer ceba, medo ki lobo Gilead bene, ci lwak ocokke bot Rwot i Mijpa ki cwiny acel.
Yocwa 24:2 Rwodi pa lwak ducu ma i kaka ducu pa jo Icrael gucuŋ i dye jo pa Lubaŋa ma gucokke, co alip miya aŋwen ma gilwenyo ki pala lucwan, ma giwoto ki tyengi.
Yocwa 24:3 Jo Benjamin bene guwinyo ni jo Icrael mukene gucito i Mijpa. Jo Icrael guwacci, “Tit botwa kit ma tim aranyi man otimme kwede.”
Yocwa 24:4 Ci Lalevi ma cwar dako ma gineko-ni owacci, “Nino mo acito i Gibea pa jo Benjamin, an ki dakona, wek abut iye.
Yocwa 24:5 Ci jo Benjamin gubino i koma, gurumo ot ma atye iye i dyewor kun gimito neka; ci guronyo dakona, omedo ki to woko.
Yocwa 24:6 Atero dakona muto-ni aŋido kome woko, acwalo dul kome oromo lobo ducu ma jo Icrael guleyo odoko megi; pien gitimo kipyeda ki tim me aranyi i Icrael.
Yocwa 24:7 Nen ba, wun jo Icrael, wun ducu, wupor lokke ki kany, wumi tamwu.”
Yocwa 24:440 
Yocwa 24:8 Lwak ducu gutwarre malo lawaŋacel kun giwaco ni, “Wan ducu pe ŋat acel mo bidok i kemane, dano acel mo pe bidok i ode.
Yocwa 24:9 Ento kombeddi wabitimo jo Gibea kit man: wabicito i komgi kun gikwanyo dano ki kwir.
Yocwa 24:10 Dok wabikwanyo dano apar i kom jo miya ki i kom kaka ducu ma i Icrael, ki dano miya acel i kom jo alip, ki dano alip i kom jo alip apar, wek gukel cam pi lwak, wek gubin gucul kwor i kom Gibea pa jo Benjamin pi bal aranyi ma gutimo i Icrael.”
Yocwa 24:11 Kit meno jo Icrael ducu gucokke ka lweny i kom gaŋ meno, ma guribbe ki cwiny acel.
Yocwa 24:12 Ci kaka ducu ma i Icrael gucwalo jo i dye kaka pa Benjamin ducu kun giwaco ni, “Kit tim aranyi aŋo ma otimme i kinwu-ni?
Yocwa 24:13 Kombeddi doŋ wumi jo meno ciŋwa, lutim aranyi ma i Gibea, wek wanekgi woko, wajwer kwede gin marac woko ki Icrael.” Ento jo Benjamin pe gumedo ki winyo dog utmegigi jo Icrael.
Yocwa 24:14 Ci jo Benjamin gua ki i gaŋgi, gucokke i Gibea me cito ka lweny i kom jo Icrael.
Yocwa 24:15 I nino meno ka jo Benjamin gukwano jo mua ki i gaŋgi, guromo jo alip pyeraryo wiye abicel ma gilwenyo ki pala lucwan, ma pe gikwano iye jo me Gibea kikome ma gucoko co miya abiro ma giyerogi ayera.
Yocwa 24:16 I kin jo meno ducu onoŋo tye co miya abiro ma giyerogi ma gin ciŋgi Lacam; ŋat acel acel i kingi bayo lagwen celo yer wic cut, pe bayo piny.
Yocwa 24:17 Jo Icrael ducu ma pe gikwano iye jo Benjamin guromo co alip miyaaŋwen ma gilwenyo ki pala lucwan; gin jo meno ducu onoŋo gin jo ma guŋiyo ki lweny.
Yocwa 24:18 Jo Icrael gua gucito Betel, gupenyo dog Lubaŋa ni, “Aŋa i kinwa ma bikwoŋo cito ka lweny i kom jo Benjamin?” Ci Rwot owacci, “Jo Juda aye gibikwoŋo cito.”
Yocwa 24:19 Ci jo Icrael gua odiko con, gugony ma gikemo Gibea.
Yocwa 24:20 Gucito ka lweny i kom jo Benjamin, guryeyo ki tyen i nyim Gibea me lweny i komgi.
Yocwa 24:21 Jo Benjamin gukatti woko ki i Gibea, guneko jo Icrael ma romo jo alip pyeraryo wiye aryo i nino meno.
Yocwa 24:22 -23Ci jo Icrael gucito, gukok i nyim Rwot o wa otyeno. Ka dok gupenyo dog Rwot ni, “Wan dok wacit ka lweny i kom utmegiwa, jo Benjamin?” Rwot owacci, “Wucit, wulweny i komgi.” Mumiyo jo Icrael gucamo co, ci dok guryeyo i tyen i kabedo ma onoŋo guryeyo iye i nino mukwoŋo-ni.
Yocwa 24:24 Kit meno jo Icrael gurwayo cok i kom jo Benjamin i nino me aryone.
Yocwa 24:441 
Yocwa 24:25 Jo Benjamin gukatti woko ki i Gibea i nino me aryone, guneko jo alip apar wiye aboro ki i kin jo Icrael; gin ducu gubedo jo ma lulweny ki pala lucwan.
Yocwa 24:26 Ci dok jo Icrael gucito Betel ki monygi ducu, gukok; ci gubedo piny kunnu i nyim Rwot, guri kec i nino meno owa otyeno. Gutumo gitum awaŋa bene ki gityer lakwecwiny i nyim Rwot.
Yocwa 24:27 Jo Icrael dok gupenyo dog Rwot, pien canduk me gicikke pa Lubaŋa onoŋo tye kunnu i kare meno,
Yocwa 24:28 kun Finekaci wod pa Eleajar ma wod pa Aron aye tiyo i nyime i kare meno, Gupenyo ni, “Pud dok wacito ka lweny i kom utmegiwa jo Benjamin aye, nyo wawek lweny doŋ ogik woko?” Rwot owacci, “Wuciti, pien diki abimiyogi i ciŋwu.”
Yocwa 24:29 Kit meno jo Icrael guketo dano gubuto gurumo Gibea woko.
Yocwa 24:30 Ci jo Icrael gucito ka lweny i kom jo Benjamin i nino me adekke, gutiŋo mony i kom Gibea kit ma yam ca.
Yocwa 24:31 Jo Benjamin gukatti woko i kom jo Icrael, ci gumol woko wa i ne gaŋ. Gucako neko jo Icrael kit ma yam ca ki i yo gudo, i yo me cito Betel ki i yo mukene bene ma cito Gibea, wa ki i bar bene, dano ma mito romo ka pyeradek.
Yocwa 24:32 Mumiyo jo Benjamin guwacci, “Gutwarre, guriŋo woko i nyimwa kit ma yam ca.” Ento jo Icrael guwacci, “Wek koŋ warin woko, wek waywagi woko ki i gaŋ o wa i yo gudo.”
Yocwa 24:33 Ci jo Icrael ducu gutwarre woko ki i kabedogi, guryeyo i Baaltamar; ki jo Icrael ma yam gubuto gukanne ka kurogi i ŋet Gibea tuŋ potoceŋ gutwarre wo ko ki i kabedogi.
Yocwa 24:34 Jo alip apar ma giyerogi ki i kin jo Icrael ducu gubino i kom Gibea, ci lweny odoko tek; ento jo Benjamin pe guŋeyo ni to pacogi doŋ onyiko cok.
Yocwa 24:35 Rwot omiyo jo Icrael guloyo jo Benjamin; ci jo Icrael gujwero jo Benjamin ma romo alip pyeraryo wiye abic ki mi ya acel i nino meno, gin ducu jo ma lulweny ki pala lucwan.
Yocwa 24:36 Pienno jo Benjamin guneno ni doŋ guloyogi. Jo Icrael gujer, guweko kabedo ki jo Benjamin, pien gigeno jo ma giketo gubuto i ŋet Gibea-ni.
Yocwa 24:37 Ci jo ma gubuto ka kurogi-ni gurune ci gucorre i kom Gibea, guneko jo ducu ma i gaŋ woko ki pala lucwan.
Yocwa 24:38 Onoŋo jo Icrael ki jo mubuto gurumo gaŋ guyubo lanyut ni, ka doŋ gumiyo yito mac oduny ocito malo ki i gaŋ,
Yocwa 24:39 ci jo Icrael gibidwogo cen ka lweny, Jo Benjamin gucako lweny ki neko jo Icrael pyeradek kun giwacci, “Ada ya, watye ka loyogi macalo i lweny mukwoŋo ca.”
Yocwa 24:442 
Yocwa 24:40 Ento ka lanyut ocako duny ki i gaŋ, yito mac ma ocuŋ macalo wir, jo Benjamin guneno yo ŋegi: ci nen, gaŋgi ducu tye ka waŋ duny malo o wa i polo.
Yocwa 24:41 Ci jo Icrael gulokke, gudwogo, omiyo kom jo Benjamin obaŋŋe woko, pien guneno ni to pacogi doŋ onyiko cok.
Yocwa 24:42 Pi meno guloko ŋegi bot jo Icrael gidok i yo tuŋ tim ata. Ento lweny onukogi woko, ka dok jo Icrael ma gumol gukatti woko ki i gaŋ bene gutyekogi woko ki i dyere kunnu.
Yocwa 24:43 Gujwero jo Benjamin woko, guryemo korgi guradogi woko piny laboŋo ywe o kwede tuŋ ka ma okemo Gibea yo tuŋ wokceŋ.
Yocwa 24:44 Jo Benjamin ma romo alip apar wiye aboro guto woko, gin ducu oteka lweny.
Yocwa 24:45 Jo mukene gulokke guriŋo yo tuŋ tim ata o wa i got Rimmon; dok gineko jo alip abic ki i komgi ma gitoŋogi gireto woko piny i yo gudo. Ci guryemo korgi matek nio wa Gidom, guneko jo alip aryo.
Yocwa 24:46 Jo Benjamin ducu ma gineko ma oradde piny i nino meno guromo alip pyeraryo wiye abic ma lulweny ki pala lucwan; gin ducu oteka lweny.
Yocwa 24:47 Ento jo miya abicel gulokke guriŋo gularo yo tuŋ tim wa i got Rimmon, gubedo i got Rimmon pi dwe aŋwen.
Yocwa 24:48 Jo Icrael dok gudwogo cen ka lweny i kom jo Benjamin, gunekogi ki pala lucwan, dano ki lee ki gin ducu ma ginoŋo; gaŋi ducu ma ginoŋo giwaŋo woko ki mac. Luŋolkop 21 Ginoŋo mon pi jo Benjamin
Yocwa 24:1 Onoŋo jo Icrael yam gukwoŋo kwoŋ i Mijpa ni, “Pe dano mo ki i kinwa bimiyo nyare me anyoma bot jo Benjamin.”
Yocwa 24:2 Ci lwak gubino i Betel, gubedo kunnu i nyim Lubaŋa o wa otyeno, gutiŋo dwangi malo ki koko matek,
Yocwa 24:3 kun giwaco ni, “Ai Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, piŋo lok man otimme i Icrael, ma tin wi kaka acel doŋ pe i Icrael?”
Yocwa 24:4 Ka dok orwone lwak gua odiko con ka caŋo keno tyer kunnu, ki tyero gitum awaŋa ki gityer lakwecwiny.
Yocwa 24:5 Ci jo Icrael guwacci, “I kin kaka me Icrael ducu jo mene ma yam pe gubino i kare ma wacokke bot Rwot?” Pien onoŋo gukwoŋo kwoŋ madit ni, “Ka dano mo pe obino bot Rwot i Mijpa gibineke woko.”
Yocwa 24:6 Kica omako jo Icrael i kom utmegigi jo Benjamin kun giwaco ni, “Kaka acel doŋ waŋe orwenyo woko tin ki i kin jo Icrael.
Yocwa 24:443 
Yocwa 24:7 Wabitimo niŋniŋ pi noŋo mon pi jogi ma gudoŋ, ma doŋ watyeko kwoŋo kwoŋ i nyiŋ Rwot ni, pe wabimiyo nyarwa mo botgi me anyoma-ni?”
Yocwa 24:8 Mumiyo guwacci, “Jo mene ma i kin kaka ma i Icrael ma yam pe gubino bot Rwot i Mijpa?” Ci gunoŋo ni i kare ma gucokke dano acel mo pe obino i gony ma oa ki i Jabec-Gilead.
Yocwa 24:9 Pien i kare ma gikwano dano, dano acel mo pe onen ma oa ki bot jo ma bedo i Jabec-gilead.
Yocwa 24:10 Pienno lwak gucwalo twoni co ma lulweny alip apar wiye aryo kun gicikogi ni, “Wucit wunek jo ma bedo i Jabec-gilead ki pala lucwan, wa mon ki litino.
Yocwa 24:11 Wubitimo kit man: co ducu ki mon ducu ma yam gubuto ki laco wubijwero woko liweŋ.”
Yocwa 24:12 I kin jo me Jabec-Gilead gunoŋo anyira miya aŋwen ma peya gubuto ki co, gukelogi i gony ma i Cilo, ma tye i lobo Kanaan.
Yocwa 24:13 Ka doŋ lwak ducu gucwalo lok bot jo Benjamin ma gitye i got Rimmon kun giloko botgi lok me kuc.
Yocwa 24:14 Jo Benjamin gudwogo i kare meno ci gumiyo botgi anyira me Jabec-Gilead ma guwekogi makwo-ni; ento pe guromogi ducu.
Yocwa 24:15 Kica omako lwak i kom jo Benjamin, pien onoŋo Rwot oketo ariya i kom kaka me Icrael ducu.
Yocwa 24:16 Ka dok ludoŋo me lwak guwacci, “Wabitimo niŋniŋ pi noŋo mon pi dano mudoŋ, ma doŋ gityeko mon ma i kin jo Benjamin woko ducu-ni?”
Yocwa 24:17 Ci guwacci, “Luleyo myero noŋŋe pi jo Benjamin ma gubwot, wek kaka mo pe gijwa woko ki Icrael.
Yocwa 24:18 Ento pe watwero miyo anyirawa botgi me bedo mongi.” Pien yam jo Icrael gukwoŋo kwoŋ ni, “Gicen ŋat ma omiyo dako mo bot jo Benjamin.”
Yocwa 24:19 Pi meno guwacci, “Nen, tye nino madit me woro Rwot ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka i Cilo.” Cilo onoŋo tye i ŋet Betel yo tuŋ acam, cok ki yo gudo ma a ki Betel cito Cekem; ka it ye Lebona, Ci lo tye yo tuŋ acuc.
Yocwa 24:20 Guciko jo Benjamin ni, “Wucit wubut i potti olok, wukur dano,
Yocwa 24:21 ci wuki. Ka ce anyira Cilo gibino ka myel, ci wubin, wumakgi woko, kun dano acel acel mako dakone ki i kin anyira Cilo, ci wucit kwedgi wa i lobo Benjamin.
Yocwa 24:22 Ka ce wegigi nyo omegigi gibino ka laro lokke botwa, ci wabiwaco botgi ni, ‘Wutim ber wumigi botwa; pien yam pe wakelo anyira ki i mony ma romogi ducu, wun bene pe wumiyo mogo botgi; kono wumiyogi botgi, kono wuroco.’ “
Yocwa 24:444 
Yocwa 24:23 Jo Benjamin gutimo kit meno; gutero mongi ma oporo welgi, ma gumako ki i kin lumyel, gutiŋo yo, gucito, gudok i lobo ma yam guleyo-ni, ka gugero gaŋgi odoco, gubedo iye.
Yocwa 24:24 Jo Icrael guket woko ki kunnu i kare meno; ŋat acel acel odok i kakane ki i doggolane. Guket, gucito woko ki kenyo, kun dano acel acel ci to i lobo ma yam oleyo.
Yocwa 24:25 I kare meno onoŋo kabaka pe Icrael; dano acel acel tiyo gin ma co tamo ni tye atir.
Yocwa 24:445  Ruth
Ruth 1:1 I kare ma luŋolkop giloyo lobo-ni onoŋo kec tye i lobo, ci laco mo me Beterekem ma i Juda ocito i lobo Moab, obedo kunnu, en ki dakone ki awobegi aryo.
Ruth 1:2 Nyiŋ laco meno Elimelek, ki nyiŋ dakone Naomi; nyiŋ awobegi aryo-ni Malon ki Kilion. Yam gin jo Eprata; gaŋgi Beterekem ma i Juda. Gucito i lobo Moab, gubedo kunnu.
Ruth 1:3 Ento Elimelek ma cwar Naomi oto woko, ci dako odoŋ ki awobene aryo-ni.
Ruth 1:4 Gin gunyomo anyira Moab; nyiŋ acel gilwoŋo ni Orupa ki nyiŋ mukene Ruth. Gubedo kunnu kine ka mwaka apar;
Ruth 1:5 lacen Malon ki Kilion guto woko, gin aryo ducu, mumiyo dako odoŋ kene laboŋo awobene aryo-nu ki laboŋo cware bene.
Ruth 1:6 En ocako a woko ki i lobo Moab wek edok cen ki mon pa awo bene aryo ducu, pien onoŋo owinyo ki i lobo Moab ni Rwot doŋ otyeko limo jone, omiyogi cam.
Ruth 1:7 Kit meno en oa woko ki i kabedo ma onoŋo gitye iye-ni ki mon pa awobene, gucako lubo yo ma dok i lobo Juda.
Ruth 1:8 Ento Naomi owaco bot mon wote ni, “Wudok cen, ŋat acel icel odok gire i ot pa minne. Rwot otimwu maber, kit ma wun wutimo jona ma waŋgi orwenyo woko ki bota, kacel ki an bene.
Ruth 1:9 Rwot omiwu wunoŋ ot, wek ŋat acel acel i kinwu obed gire i ot pa cware.” Onoto lemgi me cikogi, ci gucako kok matek.
Ruth 1:10 Guwacce ni, “Pe kumeno; wan wabidok kwedi wa bot jowu.”
Ruth 1:11 Ento Naomi owacci, “Wudok cen, anyirana, wubicito kweda piŋo? Pud dok atye ki litino co i iya ma myero gudok cogwu?
Ruth 1:12 Wudok cen, anyirana, citu giwu, pien an doŋ ati, pe aromo bedo ki cwara mo, Dok kono awacci, pud ageno ni atwero nywalo litino, kadi abed ki cwara mo i dyewor man, kadi anywalo awo be,
Ruth 1:13 kono wun wuye kurogi nio ka gudoŋo mono? Wun kono wubikwero gero co? Pe kumeno, anyirana, pien toncwiny dwoŋ i cwinya mada piwu, pi kipwola ma Rwot omiyo opoto i koma-ni.”
Ruth 1:14 Dok gucako kok matek ki dwangi maloŋo; lacen Orupa onoto lem daane ocike kwede, ento Ruth ocerre i kore matwal.
Ruth 1:15 Naomi owacce ni, “Nen, nyeki otyeko dok cen bot lutugi ki bot lubaŋane; dok Cen i kor nyeki.”
Ruth 1:446 
Ruth 1:16 Ento Ruth owacci, “Pe ibed ka lega ni aweki, nyo ni adok cen awek lubo kori; pien ka ma in icito iye, an bene abicito iye; ka ma ibuto iye, an bene abibuto iye; jo tuwu gibibedo jo tuwa bene, dok Lubaŋani bibedo Lubaŋana.
Ruth 1:17 Ka ma ibito iye, an bene abito iye, gibiyika kunnu. Myero Rwot oket can i koma kit meno ki makato bene, ka to kikome aye bipoko an kwedi.”
Ruth 1:18 Ka Naomi oneno ni en atyeko moko tamme me cito kwede, pe doŋ oloko gin mo.
Ruth 1:19 Kit meno mon aryo-nu gucako wot nio ka guo wa i Beterekem, Ka guo i Beterekem, ci gaŋ ducu orubbe woko pigi. Ci mon gucako wacci, “Man en aye Naomi?”
Ruth 1:20 En owaco botgi ni. “Pe dok wulwoŋa ni, Naomi. Wulwoŋa ni Kipwola , pien Won Twer Ducu okelo kipwola i koma.
Ruth 1:21 Yam acito ma abup, Rwot omiyo adwogo cen ma alam. Piŋo wulwoŋa ni Naomi ma Rwot ouna-ni, Woti Twer Ducu oketa i can mapek?”
Ruth 1:22 Kit meno odwogo cen, ki Ruth ma ci-wode kacel kwede, ma con odwogo nia ki i lobo Moab. Guo i Beterekem i kare ma gicako kayo bel cayiri.
Ruth 2:1 Naomi con tye ki wat ma ladoggola pa cware, dano ma lalonyo ma i doggola pa Elimelek, ma nyiŋe Boaj.
Ruth 2:2 Ruth ma anyira Moab owaco ki Naomi ni, “Wek acit i poto acibek wit cayiri ki i kor dano mo ma biparo pira.” Ci en owaco ni, “Cit, nyara.”
Ruth 2:3 Ocito i poto ka beko kor lukac, ci ocob i kom poto pa Boaj ma ladoggola pa Elimelek.
Ruth 2:4 Ci nen, Boaj oa ki i Beterekem, obino owaco ki lukac ni, “Rwot obed kwedwu.” Gudok iye ni, “Rwot omiyi gum.”
Ruth 2:5 Boaj dok openyo latic ma loyo lukac ni, “Man nya pa aŋa?”
Ruth 2:6 Ci latic ma loyo lukac ogamo ni, “Man nya jo Moab, ma yam odwogo ki Naomi ki i lobo Moab.
Ruth 2:7 Ci en openya ni, ‘Alegi, wek abek korgi, kun abeko ki i kin larita ma i kor lukac.’ Kit meno en obino kun tiyo medde kwede nia wa odiko con nio wa onyoo, kun pe ywe kadi matidi mo.”
Ruth 2:8 Ci Boaj owaco ki Ruth ni, “Koŋ iwiny, nyara, pe doŋ icit ibed i poto mukene, nyo pe iwek poto man, ento bed cocok ki anyirana.
Ruth 2:447 
Ruth 2:9 Ket waŋi i kom poto ma gitye ka kayo-ni, bed ka lu bo korgi. Doŋ atyeko ciko awobe ni pe gugud komi. Dok ka orwo pii neki, ci cit ka ma agulu pii tye iye, icimat pii ma awobe gutwomo-ni.”
Ruth 2:10 Ruth oguŋo oryebbe piny, owacce ni, “Piŋo luguma okaya i nyimi, omiyo iparo pira ma an larok ata-ni?”
Ruth 2:11 Ento Boaj ogamo ni, “Gin ducu ma ibedo ka tiyone pi daani nia ma cwari oto ca gibedo ka titta ducu kikore, ki kit ma iweko kwede woru ki meni ki lobo tinoni pi bino i rok ma yam pe iŋeyo.
Ruth 2:12 Rwot myero oculli gin ma doŋ itiyo maber-ri! Rwot ma en Lubaŋa pa Icrael ka ma iriŋo ilaro i te bwome-ni, omiyi mot muromo maber!”
Ruth 2:13 Ruth ogamo ni, “Rwoda, in kica omaki i koma, pien doŋ ityeko kweyo cwinya woko pi lok ki aŋecani lok me kica, kadi bed an pe a ŋat acel i kom lwak aŋecani.”
Ruth 2:14 I kare me cam Boaj dok owacce ni, “Bin kany, wek icam kwon mo, igwe ki koŋo vino,” Kit meno Ruth ocako nywako bedo ki lukac, ci Boaj omiye cayiri ma gicelo acela. En ocamo nio ka oyeŋ, ci oweko mogo odoŋ.
Ruth 2:15 Ka en oa malo ka beko cam, Boaj ociko awobe kun waco ni, “Wuwek en obeki wa i kin larita, pe wule wiye.
Ruth 2:16 Dok bene wuwot wi te mogo wo ko ki i kom larita, ci wuwek en obeki, kun pe wucoko wiye.”
Ruth 2:17 Kit meno en obeko cam i poto nio wa otyeno, ci odino bel cayiri ma obeko-ni woko; omito romo debe aryo.
Ruth 2:18 Ci otiŋo ocito kwede i gaŋ, onyuto bot daane gin ma ebeko; dok ocako kelo cam ma odoŋ ma onoŋo en doŋ oyeŋ, omiyo ki daane.
Ruth 2:19 Ci daane openye ni. “Tin ibeko kwene? Itiyo kwene? Gum obed i kom ŋat ma oparo piri-ni.” En otito ki daane ŋat ma etiyo bote-ni kun wacci, “Nyiŋ dano ma tin atiyo bote-ni aye Boaj.”
Ruth 2:20 Ci Naomi owaco ki ci-wode ni, “Myero Rwot omiye gum, Rwot ma kicane peya otenyo jo makwo ki jo muto-ni.” Dok Naomi owacce ni, “Dano meno aye omegiwa macok ma romo laki.”
Ruth 2:21 Ci Ruth ma anyira Moab owacci, “Medo ki meno, dok owacca bene ni, ‘In ibinywako bedo ki luticca nio ka gutyeko kayo kacca ducu.’ “
Ruth 2:22 Ci Naomi owaco ki ci-wode Ruth ni, “Man ber, nyara, ka ibecito kacel ki anyirane, wek pe jo gubed ka gudo komi i poto mukene.”
Ruth 2:23 Kit meno en obedo ki anyira pa Boaj kun beko cam nio ka kayo bel cayiri ki ŋano otum, kun obedo kacel ki daane.
Ruth 3:448  Ruth ki Boaj i laro me dino bel
Ruth 3:1 Daane Naomi dok owacce ni, “Nyara, pe myero ayennyi ot, wek ibed maber?
Ruth 3:2 Boaj ma onoŋo ibedo ki anyirane-ni en aye ladoggolawa. Nen ba, en bipyeto cayirine tin otyeno i laro moyo.
Ruth 3:3 Ber in ilwokke, iwirre ki moo, irukke ki boŋŋini mabeco-ni, ci icit kunnu wa i laro. Ento pe inyutte kekeni bo te nio ka otyeko cam ki mat-gu.
Ruth 3:4 Lacen ka doŋ obuto piny, in inen ka ma obuto iye-ni, ci icit iye, iel tuŋ ka tyene, ibut iye; ci en bititti gin ma ibitiyo.”
Ruth 3:5 Ruth ogamo ni, “Abitiyo gin ma iwaco ducu.”
Ruth 3:6 Kit meno Ruth ocako cito wa i laro moyo, ci otiyo kit ma daane otitte-ni kikome.
Ruth 3:7 Ka Boaj otyeko camo cam ki mat-gu, ma kun cwinye yom, ocito obuto Ka ŋet cayiri ma giguro kacel. Ci Ruth okwalle ocito mot, oelo tuŋ tyene, obuto piny.
Ruth 3:8 Ki i cwiny dyewor laco ocako po; ka olokke, ci nen, dako mo obuto ka tyene!
Ruth 3:9 Owacci, “In aŋa?” Ogamo ni, “An a Ruth, aŋecani. Yar dog boŋoni, iuma kwede, pien in aye imyero ka lako an.”
Ruth 3:10 En owacce ni, “Rwot omiyo gum, nyara; man inyutta berri madit makato macon, pien pe icito i kor awobe matino, ma lucan nyo ma lulonyo.
Ruth 3:11 Ci tin, nyara, pe doŋ ilwor, pien abitimo piri gin ducu ma ilego-ni, pien lutuwa ma i gaŋ-ŋi giŋeyo kit berri.
Ruth 3:12 Me adane an aye a watwu macok, ento tye omegiwa ma dok cok makato an ma romo lako in.
Ruth 3:13 Koŋ ibut i dyewor man, ci diki odiko ka ce omegiwa mukene aye bilaki, wek en olaki; ento ka omegiwa mukene-ni pe mito laki, macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, ci an abilaki ma ka en. Doŋ ibut piny nio wa odiko.”
Ruth 3:14 Obuto piny ka tyene nio wa odiko, ento oa woko con ma piny pud ribiribi; ci Boaj ociko ni, “Pe ŋatti mo oŋe ni dako man obino wa i laro moyo.”
Ruth 3:15 Ci owacci, “Kel boŋo ma iruko-ni, iyar iye.” Oyaro iye, ci Boaj opimo cayiri agwata moko abicel, ocibo i wiye, ci en ocito kwede gaŋ.
Ruth 3:16 Ka en obino bot daane, daane openye ni, “Wotti obedo niŋniŋ, nyara?” Ci otitte gin ducu ma laco meno otimo i kome,
Ruth 3:17 kun waco ni, “En omiya cayiri agwata moko abicel kun wacci, ‘Pe myero idok bot daani ki ciŋi noŋo.’ “
Ruth 3:18 Ci daane odok iye ni, “Nyara, koŋ ikur nio ka iniaŋ ka ma lok bicuŋ iye, pien laco meno pe biliŋ mot, ento bityeko lok woko tin.”
Ruth 3:449 
Ruth 4:1 Boaj ocito i dog gaŋ, obedo piny kunnu. Ci nen, lalako ma Boaj oloko pire-ni okato akata. Boaj owacci, “Bin, omera, ibed piny kany,” ci obino obedo piny.
Ruth 4:2 Ci Boaj okwanyo ludoŋo me gaŋ meno apar, owaco botgi ni, “Wubed piny kany,” ci gubedo piny.
Ruth 4:3 Lacen owaco ki dano ma en lalako-ni ni, “Naomi, ma doŋ odwogo cen nia ki i lobo Moab, tye ka cato but dul lobo mo yam pa ominwa Elimelek.
Ruth 4:4 Pienno omiyo atamo ni koŋ atitti, kun awacci, In iwil ki i nyim jo man ma gibedo kany-nyi, ki i nyim ludoŋowa-ni. Ka ce ibikokone, ci koki; ento ka pe, ci titta wek aŋe, pien pe tye ŋat mo ma myero okoki, kono in, ci an aye alubi.” Ogamo ni, “An abikokone.”
Ruth 4:5 Boaj dok owacci, “I nino ma iwilo iye dul lobo meno ki bot Naomi, noŋo in iwilo wa ki Ruth ma anyira Moab bene, ma dako pa lato-ni, pi dwoko nyiŋ lato i kom ginaleyane.”
Ruth 4:6 Mumiyo lalako owacci, “An pe atwero koko ne pira, miyo abalo ginaleyana woko. In ikoki; doŋ ajalo twerona me kokone boti, pien an pe atwero kokone.”
Ruth 4:7 Man aye kit macon ma yam gitimo i Icrael i kare me koko dul lobo, nyo loko ki dul mukene: pi moko lok mo-ni, con dano acel lunyo warre woko, ci miyo ki ŋat mukene; meno aye yam obedo lok me caden i Icrael.
Ruth 4:8 Ka lalako dok owaco ki Boaj ni, “In aye iwil,” ci olunyo warre woko.
Ruth 4:9 Boaj owaco ki ludoŋo ki bot lwak ducu ni, “Wun aye wucaden ma moko ni, atyeko wilo jami ducu ma yam pa Elimelek, ki jami ducu ma yam pa Kilion, ki jami ducu ma yam pa Malon nia ki i ciŋ Naomi.
Ruth 4:10 Ki Ruth anyira Moab bene ma yam dako pa Malon doŋ atyeko warone woko wek obed dakona, pi dwoko nyiŋ lato i kom ginaleyane, wek nyiŋ lato pe gijwa woko ki i kin utmege, nyo ki i dog gaŋ ka ma ginywalo iye-ni. Tin wun aye wucaden.”
Ruth 4:11 Ci jo ducu ma yam gitye i dog gaŋ kacel ki ludoŋo guwacci, “Wan aye lucaden. Rwot omi dako meno ma bino i odi-ni obed macalo Lakeri ki Lea, ma gin aryo ducu gutiŋo wi ot pa Icrael malo. Myero ibed matek i Eprata, nyiŋi bene oywek i Beterekem,
Ruth 4:12 odi bene obed rom ki ot pa Perej ma yam Tamar onywalo ki Juda, pi litino ma Rwot bimiyi ma a ki i latin dako-ni.”
Ruth 4:13 Kit meno Boaj otero Ruth, odoko dakone. Odonyo obedo kwede, ci Rwot omiyo ogamo ic, onywalo latin laco.
Ruth 4:450 
Ruth 4:14 Mon guwaco ki Naomi ni, “Doŋ gipwo Rwot ma pe oweki ibedo laboŋo wat macok kwedi tin. Wek nyiŋe oywek i Icrael!
Ruth 4:15 En biroco kwoni odoco, dok bikuri ka iti; pien ci-wodi ma mari, ma pire tekki makato awobe abiro-ni, en aye onywale.”
Ruth 4:16 Naomi otiŋo latin, opyelo i kore, ci odoko lapidine.
Ruth 4:17 Mon wadi gucako nyiŋe, kun giwacci, “Ginywalo ki Naomi latin laco.” Ci gucako nyiŋe ni Obed; en aye obedo won Yece, ma won Daudi.
Ruth 4:18 Man aye likwayo pa Perej: Perej onywalo Kejeron,
Ruth 4:19 Kejeron onywalo Ram, Ram onywalo Aminadab,
Ruth 4:20 Aminadab onywalo Nakucon, Nakucon onywalo Calmon,
Ruth 4:21 Calmon onywalo Boaj, Boaj onywalo Obed,
Ruth 4:22 Obed onywalo Yece, Yece onywalo Daudi.
Ruth 4:451 
Ruth 4:1 Camuel
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 1 Nywalo Camuel
Ruth 4:1 Yam tye dano mo i Ramataimjopim ma i lobo godi me Epraim nyiŋe Elkana wod pa Jerokam, ma wod pa Eliu wod pa Toku, ma en aye wod pa Jupi ma jo Epraim.
Ruth 4:2 Onoŋo tye ki mon aryo; nyiŋ ŋat acel Anna, ki nyiŋ dako mukene Penina. Penina onoŋo tye ki litino, ento Anna onoŋo litinone peke.
Ruth 4:3 Dano man yam a ki i gaŋŋe mwaka ki mwaka ci cito ka woro Rwot me mony ki ka tyero gitum i Cilo, ka ma onoŋo tye iye awobe pa Eli aryo, Kopuni ki Finekaci, ma gin ajwagi pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:4 I nino ma Elkana tyero iye gitumme-ni, en miyo dul riŋo bot dakone Penina ki bot awo bene ki anyirane ducu.
Ruth 4:5 Ento kadi bed en maro Anna mada en bedo ka miyo bote dul acel keken, pien Rwot onoŋo otweyo iye woko, pe nywal.
Ruth 4:6 Nyeke bedo ka ŋeto iye marac ki cwero cwinye, pien Rwot otweyo iye woko, pe nywal.
Ruth 4:7 Kit tim meno obedo ka timme mwaka ki mwaka; i kare ducu ma Anna cito kunnu i ot pa Rwot, nyeke bedo ka ŋeto iye. Yam miyo Anna bedo ka koko, ci pe camo.
Ruth 4:8 I nino mo acel cware Elkana openye ni, “Anna, ikok piŋo? Piŋo pe icamo? Cwinyi cwer piŋo? An pe ayomo cwinyi makato awobe apar?”
Ruth 4:9 Ka doŋ gutyeko camo cam ki mat i Cilo, ci Anna oa malo. I kare-nu onoŋo ajwaka Eli obedo i wi komme i ŋel okar doggola me ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:10 Anna onoŋo cwinye cwer matek, ci ocako lego Rwot kun kok matek twatwal.
Ruth 4:11 Okwoŋo kwoŋ kun waco ni, “Ai Rwot me mony, ka ce ibineno aroma ma aŋecani tye kwede, kun ipo pira, ma wii pe wil i koma, ce imiya latin laco ci abitiŋo am iyo bot Rwot pi kare me kwone ducu, dok lyedi mo bene pe bigudo wiye.”
Ruth 4:12 Ka en pud omedde ki lega i nyim Rwot, Eli obedo ka neno doge.
Ruth 4:13 Anna obedo ka lega ki i cwinye, kun del doge aye yeŋŋe, ento dwane pe winnye; mumiyo Eli otamo ni en dako ma lamero.
Ruth 4:14 Ci Eli owaco bote ni, “Ibimer pi kare ma rom mene? Juk mero ki koŋo yinoni-ni woko.”
Ruth 4:452 
Ruth 4:15 Ento Anna odok iye ni, “Pe kumeno, rwoda, An a dako ma cwercwiny aye oneka woko, Pe amato koŋo yino nyo gin ma mero dano, ento abedo ka yako lok ma iiya woko i nyim Rwot.
Ruth 4:16 Pe iloka abed dako ma kile rac, pien gin ma abedo ka loko-ni ducu dwoŋŋe parra ki cwercwinya.”
Ruth 4:17 Ci Eli odok iye ni, “Wot ki kuc. Lubaŋa pa Icrael myero oye legani ma ikelo bote- ni.”
Ruth 4:18 Anna ogamo ni, “Wek gum okaya i nyimi, ladit,” Ka okato ocito woko, ocako cam, ci waŋe odoko leŋ.
Ruth 4:19 Gupuk woko odiko con, gucito ka woro Rwot; ka lacen gudok paco tugi i Rama. Elkana obedo ki dakone Anna, ci Rwot ogamo lega pa Anna.
Ruth 4:20 Anna ogamo iye, Ka kare oromo, onywalo latin laco, ci ocako nyiŋe Camuel, pien Dwacci, “Alego alega ki bot Rwot.”
Ruth 4:21 Elkana ki jo ma i ode ducu dok gucito ka tyero gitum me mwaka bot Rwot, ki pi cobo kwoŋŋe.
Ruth 4:22 Ento Anna pe ocito, Owaco bot cware ni, “Ka latin doŋ obwoto deto cak, abitere, wek ocinen i nyim Rwot, obed kunnu doŋ matwal.”
Ruth 4:23 Cware Elkana ogamo ni, “Tim gin ma ineno ni ber; koŋ doŋ ikur waŋ ma obwoto dot. Ento Rwot aye ocob lokke kakare.” Ci Anna odoŋ ka doto latinne, nio ka oweko doto cak.
Ruth 4:24 Ka doŋ wode obwoto dot ci otere, kacel ki twon ma ditte romo mwaka adek, ki moko kwon ma romo debe aryo, ki opiro koŋo vino, ci okele i ot oa Rwot ma i Cilo, kun onoŋo latin pud tidi.
Ruth 4:25 Guneko twon, ka gutero latin bot Eli.
Ruth 4:26 Ci Anna owaco bote ni, “A rwoda, tika ipo i koma? An aye a dako ma yam ocuŋ i nyimi kany kun alego Rwot-ti.
Ruth 4:27 Yam alego pi latin man, ci Rwot oye legana ma akok kwede bote.
Ruth 4:28 Mumiyo an adyero en woko i ciŋ Rwot pi kare me kwone ducu; doŋ adyere woko i cin Rwot en.” Ci guworo Rwot kunnu.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 2 Wer pa Anna
Ruth 4:1 Anna olego bene kun wacci, “Aum ki yomcwiny pi Rwot; tekka omedde woko pi Rwot. Doga nyedo lok i kom lumerokka, cwinya yom pien in Rwot ilara.
Ruth 4:2 “Pe tye ŋatti mo maleŋ macalo Rwot, ŋatti mo pe, kono in keken; got mo pe ma rom ki Lubaŋawa.
Ruth 4:453 
Ruth 4:3 Pe wumedde ka lok ki wakke twatwal, pe lok me nyatte okatti ki i dogwu; pien Rwot aye Lubaŋa won ŋec, en pimo gin ducu ma dano timo.
Ruth 4:4 Atum pa twoni doŋ gituro, jo magoro gudoko lutekkom.
Ruth 4:5 Jo ma yam giyeŋ gudoko lutic me noŋo cam, ento kec doŋ pe bot jo ma yam kec nekogi. Lalur onywalo litino abiro, ento megi awobe mapol doŋ odoko goro.
Ruth 4:6 Rwot neko dano dok cero woko bene, tero i lyel dok dwoko makwo.
Ruth 4:7 Rwot miyo can, dok miyo lonyo; en lanyo dano dok pilo wiye.
Ruth 4:8 En ilo lucan woko ki i apwa, dok tiŋo jo ma piny obwoyogi kwanyogi woko ki i wi odur, wek gubed kacel ki rwodi, gunoŋ kabedo me deyo. Rwot aye won wir ma teno lobo, ocibo lobo ocuŋ i wigi.
Ruth 4:9 “Rwot bigwoko tyen jone ma gene; ento lutim aranyi gibirido wigi woko i piny macol; pien dano pe loyo lweny pi tek kome.
Ruth 4:10 Lulweny i kom Rwot gibininyogi woko; en bimor i komgi ki i polo macalo mor kot. Rwot biŋolo kop wa i agikki lobo ducu; en bimiyo tek bot kabakane, bipilo wi lakerre ma giwiro ki moo.”
Ruth 4:11 Ka Elkana odok i gaŋŋe i Rama, latin odon ka tic bot Rwot i te loc pa ajwaka Eli. Lok ma Rwot onyuto i kom jo me ot pa Eli
Ruth 4:12 Onoŋo awobe pa Eli kitgi raco; pe giparo pi Rwot wacel.
Ruth 4:13 Kit ma yam ajwagi gitiyo kwede i kom lwak i kare-nu onoŋo tye kit man: ka dano mo otyero gitum, ci latic pa ajwaka bino ma pud gitye ka tedo riŋo, ma omako lacob riŋo ma lake okarre adek.
Ruth 4:14 Ci rwako i otako, nyo i atabo, nyo i cupuriya, nyo i agulu. Riŋo ducu ma lacob riŋo ocobo okelo woko bedo pa ajwaka. Yam gubedo ka timo kit meno i Cilo i kom jo Icrael ducu ma gibino iye.
Ruth 4:15 Dok bene latic pa ajwaka yam bino ma moo dwolo peya giwaŋo, ci waco bot dano ma tyero gitumme ni, “Mi riŋo bot ajwaka me abula, pien en pe ye gamo riŋo ma doŋ gitedo, kono manumone keken.”
Ruth 4:16 Ka ce dano-nu owacce ni, “Koŋ iwek giwaŋ dwolo, ka doŋ ikwany madit kit ma imito-ni,” ci latic gamo ni, “Pe kumeno; myero imi kombeddi. Ka pe, ci abikwanyo ki tek.”
Ruth 4:17 Kit meno bal pa awo be-nu obedo dit twatwal i nyim Rwot, pien jo-nu gubedo ka cayo gityer pa Rwot acaya.
Ruth 4:18 Camuel obedo ka tic i nyim Rwot ma onoŋo pud tidi, kun tweyo epod boŋo camanini i pyere.
Ruth 4:454 
Ruth 4:19 Minne kwoyo kanyi matidi mwaka ki mwaka ci tero bote ka en cito kacel ki cware ka tyero gitum me mwaka.
Ruth 4:20 Ci. Eli lego gum i kom Elkana ki dakone kun wacci, “Lubaŋa omi inoŋ litino ki i kom dako man ma ka latin ma en odyero bot Rwot-ti;” ka lacen gidok paco tugi.
Ruth 4:21 Rwot dok olimo Anna ci Anna ogamo ic, onywalo litino awobe adek ki anyira aryo. Ci latin man Camuel odoŋo i nyim Rwot.
Ruth 4:22 I kare-nu onoŋo Eli doŋ oti mada. Obedo ka winyo kit ma awobene tiyo kwede i kom jo Icrael ducu, ki kit ma gibuto ki mon ma gitiyo i doggola kema me rwatte.
Ruth 4:23 Owaco botgi ni, “Piŋo wutimo gin macalo meno? Pien abedo ka winyo ki bot lwak ducu pi gin maraco ma wutimo.
Ruth 4:24 Pe kumeno, litinona; lok ma awinyo i komwu ma lwak pa Rwot gunyayo oromo piny-nyi pe ber.
Ruth 4:25 Ka dano mo obalo i kom dano wadi, ci Lubaŋa biteko kingi. Ento ka dano obalo i kom Rwot, aŋa ma twero bako doge pire?” Ento gin yam pe giworo dog wongi, pien onoŋo Rwot mito ni enekgi woko.
Ruth 4:26 Ci latin man Camuel omedde ki doŋo, kun yo mo cwiny Rwot kacel ki dano.
Ruth 4:27 Dano pa Lubaŋa mo obino bot Eli, owaco bote ni, “Rwot owaco kit man ni, ‘Yam anyutte kekena boŋo me ot pa kwaru i kare ma gitye i Ejipt, ma gubedo opii i ot pa Parao.
Ruth 4:28 Yam ayere ki i kin kakawu ducu ma i Icrael wek obed ajwakana, ocit cok ki keno tyerra, obed ka waŋo odok eceta, ki ruko epod i nyima. Ci yam amiyo bot jo me ot pa kwaru gityer ducu pa jo Icrael ma giwaŋo ki mac.
Ruth 4:29 Piŋo dok wucayo gitumma ki gityerra ma yam aciko? Dok piŋo iworo litinoni makato an, pi weko gicwe ki dul mabeco twatwal ki i kom gityer ducu ma jona Icrael gityero.’
Ruth 4:30 Pi meno Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael otuco atyer ni, ‘Yam aciko ni, jo me odi ki jo me ot pa kwaru gibimedde ta tiyo ticgi i nyima matwal’; ento kombeddi Rwot otuco atyer ni, ‘Lok me cikke meno pire obotti woko ki bota, pien jo ma giketo deyo i koma an bene abiketo deyo i komgi, ento jo ma gicaya pe abiketo cwinya i komgi.
Ruth 4:31 Nen, kare bibino ma abituro iye tekki woko ki tek me ot pa kwaru, wek dano mo muti pe obed i odi.
Ruth 4:32 Ka can doŋ opoto i komi, nyeko bimaki i kom jo Icrael pi lonyo ducu ma gibinoŋo, kun dano mo muti pe bibedo i odi matwal.
Ruth 4:33 Danoni mo ma abiweko doŋ i ŋet keno tyerra, wane bicor woko ki koko, kun cwinye ton; likwayowu ducu dano binekogi woko ki pala lucwan.
Ruth 4:455 
Ruth 4:34 Gin ma bipoto i kom awobeni aryo. Kopuni ki Finekaci, en aye bibedo lanyut boti; gin aryo ducu gibito i nino acel.
Ruth 4:35 Dok abiketo ajwaka ma lagen pira kena ma ticce birwatte ki lok ma tye i cwmya ki i tamma, Abigerre ot matek atika, ci en biri i dog ticce nakanaka i nyim danona ma giwiro ki moo.
Ruth 4:36 Dok ka dano mo odoŋ ki i odi, bibino ka bako doge bote pi nucu lim mo, nyo kwon mo kun wacci, Tim ber, iketa i kabedo mo pa ajwaka, wek acam latin kwon mo.’ ”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 3 Rwot olwoŋo Camuel
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno onoŋo Camuel tye ka tic pi Rwot i te loc pa Eli. Onoŋo lok pa Rwot bino kicel kicel keken, ginanyuta ma Rwot cwalo macalo lek pe nen ata.
Ruth 4:2 I kare meno onoŋo waŋ Eli ocido woko, pe doŋ neno piny, I nino mo onoŋo obuto piny ka ma en buto iye,
Ruth 4:3 kun mac tara pa Lubaŋa pud lyel, dok kun Camuel obuto piny i ot pa Rwot ka ma canduk pa Lubaŋa bedo iye-ni.
Ruth 4:4 Ci Rwot olwoŋo ni, “Camuel! Camuel!” Camuel ogamo ni, “An atye ene!”
Ruth 4:5 Ci oriŋo bot Eli owaco ni, “An atye ene, ibedo ka lwoŋa.” Ento Eli ogamo ni, “An pe alwoŋi, cibut piny doki.” Camuel odok obuto piny.
Ruth 4:6 Ci Rwot dok olwoŋo ni, “Camuel! Camuel!” Ci Camuel oa ocito bot Eli, owaco ni, “An atye ene, ibedo ka lwoŋa.” Eli ogamo ni, “An pe alwoŋi, latinna, cibut piny doki.”
Ruth 4:7 I kare-nu onoŋo Camuel peya ŋeyo Rwot, onoŋo Rwot peya oyabo lokke bote.
Ruth 4:8 Ci Rwot dok olwoŋo Camuel tyen me adekke, ci Camuel dok oa ocito bot Eli kun waco ni, “An atye ene, ibedo ka lwoŋa.” Ci Eli oniaŋ ni Rwot aye obedo ka lwoŋo awobi-nu,
Ruth 4:9 mumiyo Eli owaco bot Camuel ni, “Cibut piny. Ka ce dok olwoŋi, ci ibiwaco ni, ‘Rwot, wac lokki. An laticci, atye ka winyone.’ ” Kit meno Camuel odok obuto piny i kabutone.
Ruth 4:10 Rwot obino ci ocuŋ cok kun lwoŋo kit ma olwoŋo i kare ca ni, “Camuel! Camuel!” Ci Camuel ogamo ni, “Rwot, wac lokki. An laticci, atye ka winyone.”
Ruth 4:11 Dok Rwot owaco bot Camuel ni, “Nen ba, an doŋ atye cok ka tiyo gin mo i Icrael ma bimiyo dano ducu ma winyo komgi bito lirut.
Ruth 4:12 I nino meno abicobo gin ducu ma yam aloko i kom ot pa Eli, cakke i acakkine o wa i agikki.
Ruth 4:456 
Ruth 4:13 An doŋ atito bote ni abiketo can i kom jo me ode matwal pi gin ma guroco ma en ŋeyo wa con, pien litinone gubedo ka yeto Lubaŋa kun en pe jukogi.
Ruth 4:14 Mumiyo akwoŋo kwoŋ bot jo me ot pa Eli ni, pe tye gitum mo nyo gityer mo ma bikwanyo bal ki i kom jo me ot pa Eli matwal.”
Ruth 4:15 Camuel obuto nio wa odiko, ci ocako yabo doggola me ot pa Rwot. Onoŋo en lworo tito bot Eli lok ma Lubaŋa onyuto bote.
Ruth 4:16 Ento Eli olwoŋe kun waco ni “Camuel, latinna.” Camuel ogamo ni, “An atye ene.”
Ruth 4:17 Ci Eli openye ni, “Rwot otitti lok aŋo? Pe imuŋŋa lokke. Lubaŋa myero oket can i komi kit meno ki makato bene, ka ce imuŋŋa lok mo i kom lok ducu ma en otito boti.”
Ruth 4:18 Kit meno Camuel otitte lok ducu, kun pe omuŋo lok mo bote. Eli ogamo ni, “En aye Rwot; wek otim gin ma oneno ni ber.”
Ruth 4:19 Camuel omedde ki doŋo kun onoŋo Rwot tye kwede, Rwot pe oweko lok mo ma Camuel owaco obut opoto piny i nom ma pe ocobbe kakare.
Ruth 4:20 Ci jo Icrael ducu cakke ki i Dan o wa i Beer-ceba guŋeyo ni, Camuel doŋ gimoko me bedo lanebi pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:21 Rwot omedde ki nen doki i Cilo, ka ma yam onoŋo onyutte iye bot Camuel kun tito lokke bote.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 4
Ruth 4:1 Ci lok ma Camuel bedo ka loko cito romo lobo Icrael ducu. Jo Piliciti guyako canduk pa Lubaŋa I kare meno jo Icrael gucito ka lweny ki jo Piliciti, ci gutoŋo gony i Ebenejer, ki jo Piliciti gutoŋo gonygi i Apek.
Ruth 4:2 Jo Piliciti gurye ki tyen ka lweny i kom jo Icrael. Ka mony ogeto matek, ci jo Piliciti guloyo jo Icrael, guneko jo ma mito romo alip aŋwen i bar lweny.
Ruth 4:3 Ka lumony gudwogo i gony, ludoŋo pa jo Icrael guwacci, “Piŋo Rwot aye jo Piliciti guloyowa tin? Wek wacikel canduk me gicikke pa Rwot ki i Cilo, wek en Rwot obin obed i dyewa, olarwa ki i ciŋ lumerokwa-ni.”
Ruth 4:4 Ci lwak gucwalo dano Cilo, gukelo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot me mony ki kunnu, ma Rwot bedo-i wi komkerre malo ka wi lukerubi-ni, kun awobe pa Eli, Kopuni ki Finekaci, bene onoŋo gubino kacel ki canduk me gicikke pa Lubaŋa.
Ruth 4:5 Ka canduk me gicikke pa Rwot obino i gony, jo Icrael ducu guwo ki daŋŋe matek, omiyo lobo bene omor.
Ruth 4:457 
Ruth 4:6 Ka jo Piliciti guwinyo woo ki daŋŋe, ci guwacci, “Woo man madit ma a ki i gony pa jo Ibru-ni te lokke aŋo?” Ka guŋeyo ni canduk pa Rwot otyeko bino i gony pa jo Icrael,
Ruth 4:7 ci jo Piliciti gubedo ki lworo, pien gubedo ka waco ni, “Lubaŋagi doŋ oo i gonygi.” Ci guwacci, “Oii, watum woko ba! Gin macalo man yam peya otimme.
Ruth 4:8 Oii, watum woko ba! Aŋa ma bilarowa ki i ciŋ lubaŋa magi matek-ki? Meno gin aye lubaŋa ma yam gupwodo jo Ejipt ki lwak can mapol i tim.
Ruth 4:9 Wucam co, wuka lakwu matek macalo co, wun jo Piliciti, wek pe wudok opii pa jo Ibru kit ma gin gubedo kwede opiiwu-ni. Wuka lakwu matek macalo co, ci wulweny.”
Ruth 4:10 Kit meno jo Piliciti gucako lweny, ci guloyo jo Icrael. Jo Icrael guriŋo woko, kun dano acel acel riŋo laro pacone. Nek obedo dwoŋ twatwal, pien Luicrael guto kunnu ma romo jo alip pyeradek ma woto ki tyengi.
Ruth 4:11 Ki canduk pa Lubaŋa bene giyako woko; ki awobe pa Eli aryo, Kopuni ki Finekaci, ginekogi woko bene.
Ruth 4:12 Dano mo ma Labenjamin oriŋo oa ki i waŋ mony, obino i Ci lo i nino meno kikome, ma boŋŋine oyec woko, wiye bene ojuko ki ŋom.
Ruth 4:13 Ka en oo, onoŋo Eli obedo i wi komme i ŋet yo ka kuro lok, pien onoŋo cwinye oŋabbe aŋaba pi canduk pa Lubaŋa, Ka dano-nu obino odonyo i gaŋ, otito lokke, ci gaŋ ducu omor ki koko.
Ruth 4:14 Ka Eli owinyo dwan ma mor ki koko-ni, owacci, “Man woo me ŋo?” Ka dano-nu orune, obino otito bot Eli.
Ruth 4:15 Onoŋo Eli ditte romo mwaka pyeraboŋwen wiye aboro, ki wane bene ocor woko, omiyo doŋ pe neno piny.
Ruth 4:16 Dano-nu owaco bot Eli ni, “An aye aa ki i waŋ mony, ariŋo aa ki i mony tin.” En ogamo ni, “Ci doŋ obedo niŋniŋ, latinna?”
Ruth 4:17 Lakellok-ki ogamo owacci, “Jo Icrael guriŋo woko ki i nyim jo Piliciti, dok bene gineko jo tuwa madwoŋ twatwal, ki canduk pa Lubaŋa bene giyako woko.”
Ruth 4:18 Ka otuco lok i kom canduk pa Lubaŋa, ci Eli opoto ataro ki i wi komme ma obedo kwede i ŋet dog gaŋ; ci ŋute otur, oto woko, pien onoŋo doŋ oti mada, dok kome dit. Obedo laŋolkop i Icrael pi mwaka pyeraŋwen.
Ruth 4:19 I kare-nu ci-wode ma dako pa Finekaci onoŋo iye odoŋo, cok nywal. Ka owinyo lok ni canduk pa Lubaŋa doŋ giyako woko, dok ni kwarone ki cware guto woko, oturre piny, onywal, pien onoŋo mwoc ogoyo.
Ruth 4:20 I kare ma en mito to woko, mon ma gucuŋ ka ŋete guwaco bote ni, “Pe ilwor, pien inywalo latin awobi.” Ento en pe ogamo doggi, pe oketo iye cwinye bene.
Ruth 4:458 
Ruth 4:21 Ci ocako nyiŋ latin ni, Ikabod, kun wacci, “Deyo otyeko a woko ki i Icrael!” pien canduk pa Lubaŋa doŋ giyako woko, ki pi kwarone bene ki pi cware.
Ruth 4:22 Dok owacci, “Deyo oa woko ki i Icrael, pien canduk pa Lubaŋa doŋ giyako woko.”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 5 Canduk pa Lubaŋa i lobo pa jo Piliciti
Ruth 4:1 Ka jo Piliciti guyako canduk pa Lubaŋa, gutiŋo ki i Ebenejer, gutero Acidod.
Ruth 4:2 Ka dok jo Piliciti gukobo canduk pa Lubaŋa, gutero i ot pa jokgi Dagon, ci gucibo ka ŋet cal Dagon.
Ruth 4:3 Orwone ka jo Acidod gua malo odiko con, ci nen, cal Dagon tye opoto aryeba cwiny i nyim canduk pa Rwot. Ci gutiŋo cal Dagon, gudwoko kakare.
Ruth 4:4 Ento orwone doki ka gua odiko con, ci nen, cal Dagon tye opoto aryeba i nyim canduk pa Rwot. Wi cal Dagon ki bade ryoryo oŋun woko, opoto i kom larii doggola; cal Dagon odoŋ ma kome odul.
Ruth 4:5 Man aye mumiyo ajwagi pa Dagon ki jo ducu ma gidonyo i ot pa Dagon pe dok ginyono larii doggola me ot pa Dagon ma i Acidod wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:6 Ciŋ Rwot opoto mapek i kom jo Acidod ma omiyogi lworo madwoŋ; dok Rwot omiyogi akwota bur lebba, ki i lobo ma i ŋete ducu.
Ruth 4:7 Ka jo Acidod guneno kit ma piny tye kwede, guwacci, “Canduk pa Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael pe obed i kinwa, pien ciŋe opoto mapek i komwa, ki i kom Dagon ma lubaŋawani.”
Ruth 4:8 Mumiyo gucwalo kwena, ci gucoko rwodi pa jo Piliciti ducu kacel kun giwacci, “Wabitimo canduk pa Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael niŋniŋ?” Ci gudok iye ni, “Wek canduk pa Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael giter wa i Gat.” Ci gutero canduk pa Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael kunnu.
Ruth 4:9 Ento ka doŋ gitero kunnu, ci ciŋ Rwot opoto i kom gaŋ meno, obaŋo komgi woko. Ci otimo jo Gat malit, omiyo akwota bur Lebba ocorre i kom litino wa ki ludito.
Ruth 4:10 Dok gucwalo canduk pa Lubaŋa i Ekron. Ka canduk pa Lubaŋa oo i Ekron, ci jo Ekron gukok matek ni, “Gukelo canduk pa Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael kany me nekowa woko wa ki rokwa ducu.”
Ruth 4:11 Ci dok gicwalo lok, gucoko rwodi pa jo Piliciti ducu kacel kun giwacci, “Wucwal canduk pa Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael woko, wek odok gire i kabedone, wek pe obed ka nekowa kacel ki rokwa ducu.” Pien onoŋo to me nino ducu doŋ obaŋo kom dano ma i gaŋ-ŋu ducu. Cin Rwot opoto kunnu mapek,
Ruth 4:459 
Ruth 4:12 kun jo ma pe guto gubedo ki akwota bur lebba maraco i komgi. Ci koko me gaŋ meno oo wa malo i polo.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 6 Jo Piliciti gudwoko canduk pa Lubaŋa kakare
Ruth 4:1 Canduk pa Rwot obedo i lobo pa jo Piliciti pi dwe abiro.
Ruth 4:2 Lacen jo Piliciti gulwoŋo ajwagi ki lutyet ci guwacci, “Wabitimo canduk pa Rwot niŋniŋ? Wutit botwa kit gin ma myero wami ma wabidwoko kwede canduk i kabedone.”
Ruth 4:3 Ci guwacci, “Ka wucwalo canduk pa Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael;: pe wucwal nono, ento atikane wudwok ki gitum me tiŋo alii. Ci doŋ wubican ci wubiniaŋ gin mumiyo Rwot pe okwanyo ciŋe woko ki i komwu.”
Ruth 4:4 Gugamo ni, “Kit gin aŋo ma wabidwokke me gitum me tiŋo alii?” Gudok iye ni, “Cal jabu abic ma oporo kit akwota bur lebba, ki cal oyoo adeŋ abic muporo wel rwodi pa Lupiliciti; pien kit two gemo acel-lu onoŋo omakowu ducu, ki rwodiwu bene.
Ruth 4:5 Pienno myero wutet cal akwota bur lebba ki cal oyoo adeŋ ma gitye ka tyeko lobowa woko-ni ki kela deyo i kom Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael; ci gwok nyo en bikwanyo ciŋe woko ki i komwu, ki i kom lubaŋawu ki lobowu.
Ruth 4:6 Pe wumi cwinywu obed tek kit macalo yam jo Ejipt ki Parao cwinygi obedo tek kwede.
Ruth 4:7 Kombeddi doŋ wucikwany gadigadi manyen, ki megi dyaŋi aryo ma ginyeto ma yam peya gitiyo kwedgi me pur, ci wutwe dyaŋi i nyim gadigadi me ywayone, ento wuter litino dyaŋi paco, pe gubed kacel ki megigi.
Ruth 4:8 Ci wukel canduk pa Rwot wuket i wi gadigadi, ci wuket cal jabu ma wuteto-ni i canduk mukene ka ŋete, ma wubidwoko bo te macalo tyer me tiŋo alii. Ka doŋ wucwal, ociti.
Ruth 4:9 Ci doŋ wunen kore; ka ce ocito okemo yo tugi, wa i Bet-cemec, ci Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael aye okelo can man madit i komwa; ento ka pe kit meno ci miyo waŋeyo ni pe ciŋe aye ma obedo ka pwodowa; meno otimme i komwa pi keckom.”
Ruth 4:10 Jo-nu gutimo kit meno; gukwanyo megi dyaŋi aryo ma ginyeto, gutweyogi i nyim gadagadi, ci guloro wi litinogi woko paco.
Ruth 4:11 Ci gucibo canduk pa Rwot i wi gadigadi, kacel ki canduk mukene ki cal oyoo adeŋ ma giteto ki jabu, ki cal akwota bur lebbagi.
Ruth 4:12 Dyaŋi gucito gukemo yo atir ma dok yo tuŋ Bet-cemec, kun lubo yo ger madit. Giwoto kun gikok, pe gumedo ki dok yo tuŋ acuc nyo yo tuŋ acam, kun rwodi pa jo Piliciti gilubo korgi, nio ka guo kwede wa i waŋ lobo me Betcemec.
Ruth 4:460 
Ruth 4:13 Onoŋo jo Bet-cemec gitye ka kayo nanogi i nota. Ka gutiŋo wangi ci guneno canduk pa Rwot, cwinygi obedo yom pi nenone.
Ruth 4:14 Gadigadi obino wa i poto pa Yocwa ma Labet-cemec, ci ocuŋ kenyo, Onoŋo kidi madit tye kenyo; ci gubaro gadigadi woko me yen, gutyero dyaŋi me gitum awaŋa bot Rwot.
Ruth 4:15 Ka dok Lulevi gutero canduk pa Rwot ki canduk mukene ma onoŋo tye ka ŋete- ni, ka ma onoŋo tye iye cal jabu, ci guketogi i wi kidi madit-ti. Ci jo Bet-cemec gutyero gitum awaŋa ki gitum mukene mogo bot Rwot i nino meno.
Ruth 4:16 Ka rwodi pa jo Piliciti abic-ci guneno kite, ci gudok Ekron i nino meno.
Ruth 4:17 Cal akwota bur lebba me jabu ma jo Piliciti gudwoko bot Rwot me gityer me tino alii obedo kit man; acel pa jo Acidod, acel pa jo Gaja, acel pa jo Acikelon, acel pa jo Gat, acel pa jo Ekron.
Ruth 4:18 Gucwalo cal oyoo adeŋ me jabu bene muporo wei gaŋ ducu pa jo Piliciti ma rwodigi abic loyo-ni, gaŋi ma gicelogi ki cel matego, wa ki gaŋi matitino ma pe girumogi ki cel, Kidi madit ma yam giketo canduk pa Rwot ka ŋete-ni en aye caden o wa i nino man; pud tye i poto pa Yocwa Labetcemec.
Ruth 4:19 Rwot oneko jo Bet-cemec mogo, pien guŋiyo i canduk pa Rwot. Oneko jo pyerabiro i kingi, ci dano gukumo, pien Rwot onekojo mapol i kingi. Gitero canduk pa Rwot Kiriat-jearim
Ruth 4:20 Ka dok jo Bet-cemec guwacci, “Aŋa ma twero cuŋ i nyim Rwot ma Lubaŋa maleŋ-ŋi? Dok ka bia ki botwa, ci bicito bot jo mene?”
Ruth 4:21 Pi meno gucwalo lukwena bot jo ma gibedo i Kiriat-jearim, kun giwaco ni, “Jo Piliciti doŋ gudwoko canduk pa Rwot. Wubin, wuter botwu kunnu.”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 7
Ruth 4:1 Ci jo Kiriat-jearim gucito guomo can duk pa Rwot, gutero i ot pa Abinadab ma i wi got. Ci gukwero wode Eleajar pi gwokone. Camuel oŋolo kop i Icrael
Ruth 4:2 Canduk pa Rwot obedo i Kiriajearim pi kare malac ma mito romo mwaka pyeraryo, ci jo me otpa Icrael ducu gucako dwogo bot Rwot ki kumo.
Ruth 4:3 Ci Camuel owaco bot jo Icrael ni, “Ka doŋ wudwogo bot Rwot ki cwinywu ducu, ci doŋ wubol lwak lubaŋa pa lurok ki cal jogi ma mon-gu woko ki i kinwu, wek cwinywu okem bot Rwot atir kun wuworo en keken, cien bilarowu ki i ciŋ jo Piliciti.”
Ruth 4:4 Kit meno jo Icrael gubolo lwak cal jok Baal ki cal jogi ma mon-gu ma tye botgi-ni woko, ci gucako woro Rwot keken.
Ruth 4:5 Camuel dok owacci, “Wucok jo Icrael ducu i Mijpa ci abilego piwu bot Rwot.”
Ruth 4:461 
Ruth 4:6 Mumiyo dano gucokke i Mijpa ka dok gutwomo pii ci guonyo piny i nyim Rwot macalo gityer, ci guri kec i nino meno kun giwacci, “Watimo bal i nyim Rwot.” Dok Camuel oŋolo kop pa jo Icrael pigi i Mijpa.
Ruth 4:7 I kare meno ka jo Piliciti guwinyo ni jo Icrael gucokke i Mijpa, ci rwodi pa jo Piliciti gucito ka lweny i kom jo Icrael. Ka jo Icrael guwinyo, ci gubedo ki lworo i kom jo Piliciti.
Ruth 4:8 Ci jo Icrael guwaco bot Camuel ni, “Pe iwek koko piwa bot Rwot Lubaŋawa wek olarwa ki i ciŋ jo Piliciti.”
Ruth 4:9 Camuel okwanyo latin romo ma pud dot, otyero bot Rwot obed gitum ma giwaŋo ki berre. Ka Camuel okok kwede bot Rwot pi jo Icrael, ci Rwot owinyo kokone.
Ruth 4:10 I kare ma Camuel tye ka tyero gitum awaŋa, jo Piliciti gucako bino cok ka lweny i kom jo Icrael; ento Rwot omor macalo mor kot ki dwan madit i nino meno i kom jo Piliciti, obaŋo komgi woko; ci jo Icrael guryemogi woko ki i nyimgi.
Ruth 4:11 Jo Icrael gumol woko ki i Mijpa, guryemo kor jo Piliciti, gurwadogi woko nio wa i te Bet-kar.
Ruth 4:12 Lacen Camuel okwanyo got, ocibo ocuŋ i kin Mijpa ki Jecana, ci ocako nyiŋe Ebenejer , kun owacci, “Rwot obedo ka konyowa o wa kany.”
Ruth 4:13 Guloyo jo Piliciti kit meno; pe dok gudonyo i lobo pa jo Icrael. Rwot obedo ka lweny i kom jo Piliciti i kare pa Camuel ducu.
Ruth 4:14 Gaŋi ducu ma yam jo Piliciti gumayo woko ki bot jo Icrael gidwokogi bot jo Icrael, cakke wa i Ekron o kwede i Gat. Jo Icrael gularo lobogi ki i ciŋ jo Piliciti i kare-nu. Kuc onoŋo tye i kinjo Icraelkijo Amor bene.
Ruth 4:15 Camuel oŋolo kop pa jo Icrael i kare me kwone ducu.
Ruth 4:16 Yam woto kun wirre i kin Betel ki Gilgal ki Mijpa mwaka ki mwaka kun ŋolo kop pa jo Icrael i kabedo meno ducu.
Ruth 4:17 Ka doŋ lokke dok Rama, pien gaŋŋe onoŋo tye kunnu. En ŋolo kop pa jo Icrael kunnu bene, dok ocano keno tyer pi Rwot kunnu.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 8 Jo Icrael gulego kabaka
Ruth 4:1 I kare ma Camuel doŋ oti woko, oketo awobene gubedo luŋolkop pa jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:2 Nyiŋ wode me kayone Joel, ki nyiŋ wode me aryone Abija; yam gubedo luŋolkop ki i Beer-ceba.
Ruth 4:3 Ento awobene pe gulubo kite; gubwoto woko, gudok ka yenyo lim. Gubedo ka gamo lim me wilo loyo kop, kun gibalo te pido pa dano woko.
Ruth 4:462 
Ruth 4:4 Ci ludoŋo pa jo Icrael ducu gucokke kacel bot Camuel i Rama,
Ruth 4:5 guwaco bote ni, “Nen ba, in doŋ iti woko, dok awobeni pe gilubo kiti. In iket kabaka piwa wek en aye olowa, macalo tye i rok mukene ducu.”
Ruth 4:6 Ento lok meno pe oyomo i Camuel ka guwacci, “Miniwa kabaka wek en aye olowa.” Ka Camuel ocako lego Rwot.
Ruth 4:7 Ci Rwot owaco bot Camuel ni, “Winy dog lwak i gin ducu ma guwaco boti; pien gin pe gukwero in, ento gukwero an, ni pe abed kabaka ma loyogi.
Ruth 4:8 Kit tim ducu ma gubedo ka timone i koma cakke i nina ma yam akwanyogi iye ki i Ejipt o kwede wa tin, ma gibwoto an gidok ka woro lubaŋa mukene, gitye ka timone i komi bene kit meno.
Ruth 4:9 Koni doŋ koŋ iwiny doggi; lok acel keken, ber ilok kwedgi kun inyuto botgi atyer kit ma kabaka ma biloyogi bibedo kwede.”
Ruth 4:10 Kit meno Camuel otito lok pa Rwot ducu bot lwak ma gulego kaba ka ki bote.
Ruth 4:11 Owacci, “Man aye bibedo kit ma kabaka biloyowu kwede; en bitero awobewu ci ketogi i gadigadine me lweny, ki me bedo wegi aguragurane, ki jo ma riŋo i nyim gadigadine.
Ruth 4:12 Dok en biketo ludito wi monnye ma loyo dano alip, ki ma loyo dano pyerabic, ki jo mukene pi puro potone ki pi kayo kacce, ki pi teto jami lwennye ki jami kom gadigadine.
Ruth 4:13 En bitero anyirawu ka rubo moo ma ŋwece kur, ki pi tedo cam ki pi tedo mugati.
Ruth 4:14 En bi mayo pottiwu mabecone woko, ki poto olokwu ki poto jeituni, bitiŋo mi yo bot luticce.
Ruth 4:15 Bikwanyo dul acel me apar me kalwu ki me olokwu, ci tiŋo miyo bot ludito ticce ki bot luticce mukene.
Ruth 4:16 Bitero opiiwu ki aŋecawu, ki dyaŋiwu ki kanawu mabecone, ci biketogi ka tiyo ticce.
Ruth 4:17 En bitero dul acel me apar me romiwu ki dyegiwu, ci doŋ wubibedo opiine.
Ruth 4:18 I kare meno wubikok giwu i kom kabakawu, ma wun aye wuyero piwu kenwu; ento Rwot pe bidok iye botwu i nino meno.”
Ruth 4:19 Ento dano gukwero winyo dog Camuel, guwaco bote ni, “Pe; wan wabibedo ki kabaka ma loyowa,
Ruth 4:20 wek wan bene wabed macalo rok mukene ducu, wek kabakawa aye olowa, ci okat anyim pi telo wiwa ki ka lweny piwa i mony.”
Ruth 4:21 Ka Camuel otyeko winyo lok pa lwak ducu, ci odwoko lokke bot Rwot.
Ruth 4:463 
Ruth 4:22 Ka Rwot dok owaco bot Camuel ni, “Winy doggi, imigi kabaka,” Camuel dok owaco bot jo Icrael ni; “Doŋ wuciti, ŋat acel acel odok i gaŋŋe.”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 9 Caulo orwatte ki Camuel
Ruth 4:1 Yam tye dano mo ma Labenjamin ma nyiŋe Kic, wod pa Abiel, ma wod pa Jeror, wod pa Bekorat, wod pa Apia, ma Labenjamin, dano ma lalonyo.
Ruth 4:2 Onoŋo tye ki wode ma nyiŋe Caulo, awobi ma oputte ma mwonya, ma pe tye dano mo ma i kin jo Icrael ducu ma mwonya makato en; odoŋo mabor makato dano ducu cakke ki i wi gwoke dok kwede malo.
Ruth 4:3 I kare mo megi kana pa Kic won Caulo gurwenyo, ci Kic owaco bot wode Caulo ni, “Ter latic mo acel, ci wua wucit ka yenyo kana.”
Ruth 4:4 Ka gukato guwok i lobo godi me Epraim, ci gubaro dye lobo Calica, pe gunoŋo komgi. Ka dok gukato guwok i lobo Caalim, ento pe onoŋo gitye kenyo, Ka dok gukato gubaro dye lobo Benjamin, ento pe gunonogi.
Ruth 4:5 Ka guo i lobo Jup, Caulo owaco bot latic ma onoŋo gitye kwede-ni ni, “Bin wadok cen, wek wora pe ocak paro piwa, kun weko paro pi kana.”
Ruth 4:6 Ento en odok iye ni, “Nen, dano pa Lubaŋa tye i gaŋ man, en dano ma giworo; gin ducu ma en waco bedo me ada, Wek koŋ wacit kunnu; gwok en bitito botwa lok mo i kom wot ma watye iye-ni.”
Ruth 4:7 Ento Caulo owaco bot laticce ni, “Ka wacito bote, wabiterre gin aŋo? Pien kwon doŋ otum woko ki i kicaawa, dok mot mo pe ma wabitero bot dano pa Lubaŋa ca.”
Ruth 4:8 Laticce dok ogamo doge ni, “Nen kany, atye ki dul acel me aŋwen me cekel me ryal; abimiyo bot dano pa Lubaŋa wek onyut botwa yo,”
Ruth 4:9 (I kare pa jo Icrael macon, ka dano mo yam ci to ka penyo dog Lubaŋa ci wacci, “Bin, wek wacit bot lanen-piny;” pien dano ma gilwoŋo ni lanebi i kare man, yam con gilwoŋo ni dano ma neno piny.)
Ruth 4:10 Ci Caulo owaco bot laticce ni, “Iwaco maber, Bin wek waciti.” Kit meno gucako ci to i gaŋ ka ma yam dano pa Lubaŋa tye iye-ni.
Ruth 4:11 I kare ma giito kor got pi donyo i gaŋ ci gurwatte ki anyira ma gicito ka twomo pii, ci gupenyogi ni, “Lanenpiny tye kany?”
Ruth 4:12 Gugamo ni, “En tye. Nen, tye i nyimwa ca, Wurune oyot; pud obino i gaŋ kombeddi, pien tin dano tye ka tyero gityer i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma tye i wi got.
Ruth 4:13 Ka wucito, wudonyo i gaŋ, ci wunoŋo kome cut, ma noŋo peya ocito ka cam i wi got. Pien dano peya gibicam ka en peya obino, nio ka en olego gum i kom gitum;
Ruth 4:464  ka doŋ jo ma gilwoŋogi gicako cam. Wun doŋ wuciti, ci wubirwatte kwede oyotoyot.”
Ruth 4:14 Kit meno gumedde ki ito malo wa i gaŋ, Ka gitye ka donyo i gaŋ, ci guneno Camuel; tye ka bino tun botgi kun onoŋo obecito i kabedo ma i wi got-ti.
Ruth 4:15 Onoŋo Rwot onyuto lok bot Camuel ma pud onoŋo Caulo odon ki nino acel me bino bote kun wacci,
