Ruth 4:16 “Diki ka onyoo abicwalo boti dano mo ma oa ki i lobo pa jo Benjamin, ci ibiwiro en ki moo wek obed laker ma loyo jona Icrael. En bilaro jona ki i ciŋ jo Piliciti; pien atyeko neno aroma pa jona, kokogi doŋ oo bota.”
Ruth 4:17 Ka Camuel oneno Caulo, Rwot otito bote ni, “Man aye dano ma onoŋo atitti pire-ni. En aye biloyo lwakka.”
Ruth 4:18 Ka Caulo doŋ oo cok bot Camuel i dog gaŋ, openye ni, “Titta ba, ot pa lanenpiny tye kwene?”
Ruth 4:19 Camuel ogamo ni, “An aye lanen-piny. Cit itel nyima nio i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma i wi got, pien ibicam kweda kacel tin, ka odiko abiweki icito, dok abititti lok ducu ma tye i cwinyi.
Ruth 4:20 Lok i kom kana ma gurwenyo okato nino adek-ki, pe cwinyi obed ka paro pigi, pien gityeko noŋogi. Gin ma pire mit i Icrael-li ducu pa aŋa? Pe gin ducu meri? Gin ducu pe me ot pa woru?”
Ruth 4:21 Caulo ogamo ni, “An gira Labenjamin, ma kakawa tidi twatwal i kin jo Icrael. Doggolawa onyoŋo anyoŋa ki i kin doggola ducu pa jo Benjamin. Ci piŋo ilokka lok ma rom meno?”
Ruth 4:22 Camuel otero Caulo ki laticce, okelogi i kicika, ka omiyogi kabedo me dito makato jo ma gilwoŋogi ducu, ma giromo jo pyeradek.
Ruth 4:23 Ci Camuel owacobot latedo ni, “Kel wan pok ma nanen amini, kun aciki ni iket pat-ti.”
Ruth 4:24 Latedo okwanyo em ki bam, aciba i nyim Caulo, ci Camuel owaco bot Caulo ni, “Nen, gin ma gikano piri gityeko cibone i nyimi. Cam; pien onoŋo gikano piri nio wa i kare ma giciko, wek icam kacel ki welo.” Kit meno Caulo ocamo kacel ki Camuel i nino-nu.
Ruth 4:25 Ka doŋ gulor gudwogo piny ki i kabedo ma i wi got, ci gucito i gaŋ. Gipeto kabuto pa Caulo malo i wi at, ci obuto piny, onino wako.
Ruth 4:26 Kate piny oyabbe, Cainuel olwoŋo Caulo ma onoŋo pud tye malo i wi at kun wacci, “A malo, wek doŋ alwoki, iciti.” Caulo aa malo, ci en ki Camuel gucito i yo gin aryo. Camuel owiro Caulo me bedo kabaka
Ruth 4:465 
Ruth 4:27 Ka onoŋo gitye ka lor piny, ma doŋ guo i agikki gaŋ, Camuel owaco bot Caulo ni, “Wac ki laticci ni okat ocit i nyimwa, Ka doŋ okato anyim, ci icuŋ kany manok, wek amiyi iŋe lok pa Lubaŋa.”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 10
Ruth 4:1 Ci Camuel okwanyo kicere me moo, oonyo i wi Caulo, amate kun noto leme ci owacci, “Rwot doŋ oonyo moo i komi wek ibed laker ma loyo lwakke jo Icrael. In ibiloyo lwak pa Rwot, ci ibilarogi ki i ciŋ lumerokgi ma gurumogi-ni. Man aye bibedo gin ma nyuto bati ni Rwot doŋ owiri me bedo laker ma loyo gipinnye:
Ruth 4:2 Ka ibia wako ki bata tin, ci ibirwatte ki co aryo i ŋet lyel pa Lakeri ma i Jelja, i lobo Benjamin, Gibiwaco bati ni, ni, ‘Kana ma ibedo ka yenyogi-ni doŋ ginoŋogi, dok kombeddi cwiny woru doŋ aa wako ki i kom kana, doŋ tye ka paro piwu kun baka doge ni, “Atim gin aŋo pi woda-ni?” ‘
Ruth 4:3 Dok ibimedde ka wot anyim ka laki kenya, ci ibio i te kworo me. Tabor; ci co adek ma gicito i Betel bot Lubaŋa gibirwatte kwedi kunnu, kun ŋat acel otiŋo litino dyegi adek, ŋat acel otiŋo mugati adek, ŋat acel otiŋo opiru koŋo vino.
Ruth 4:4 Gin gibimoti, ci gibimini mugati aryo, in ibigamo, ki i ciŋgi.
Ruth 4:5 Ka lacen ibio i Gibea-eloim, ka ma cel gogo mony pa jo Piliciti tye iye-ni, Ka ibidonyo i gaŋ kunnu, ibirwatte ki lwak lunebi ma gibino gilor piny kun gia ki i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma i wi got, ma gitye ki dano ma gigoyo naŋa ki ajaa ki nyamulere ki opuk ma gitelo kwede nyimgi, kun lunebi giwoto ki tito lok pa Lubaŋa.
Ruth 4:6 Ci Cwiny pa Rwot bibino i komi ki tek, ci ibicako tito lok pa Lubaŋa kacel kwedgi, ci ibilokke idoko dano mapat.
Ruth 4:7 Ka lanyut meno ducu doŋ otimme i komi ci doŋ icak timo gin ma ciŋi orwatte kwede, pien noŋo Lubaŋa tye kwedi.
Ruth 4:8 In icit ikwoŋ nyima i Gilgal; nen, abibino bati ka tyero gitum awaŋa ki gityer lakwecwiny Ibikuro nino abiro nio ka abio bati ka nyu to bati gin ma myero iti.”
Ruth 4:9 Ka Caulo oloko ŋeye pi weka Camuel, Lubaŋa omine kit cwiny mapat; ci lanyut meno gutimme ducu i nino meno.
Ruth 4:10 Ka guo i Gibea, ci nen, lwak lunebi gurwatte kwede; ci Cwiny pa Lubaŋa obino i kome ki tek, ci ocako tito lok pa Lubaŋa i kingi.
Ruth 4:11 Ka jo ma yam gineye guneno kit ma en tito kwede lok pa Lubaŋa kacel ki lunebi, ci dano gucako lok kekengi ni, “Gin aŋo ma opoto i kom wod pa Kic? Caulo bene doŋ tye i kin lunebi?”
Ruth 4:12 Ci dano mo me kunnu ogamo ni, “Onoŋo wongi kono aŋa?” Mumiyo odoko carolok abola ni, “Caulo bene doŋ tye i kin lunebi?”
Ruth 4:466 
Ruth 4:13 Ka doŋ otyeko tito lok pa Lubaŋa ci ocito i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma i wi got.
Ruth 4:14 Omin won Caulo openyo en ki laticce ni, “Onoŋo wucito wa kwene?” Ci ogamo ni, “Wacito ka yenyo kana; ka waneno ni pe gibinoŋŋe, ci wacito wa bot Camuel.”
Ruth 4:15 Ci omin won Caulo dok owacci, “Koŋ itit bota gin ma Camuel owaco boti mono.”
Ruth 4:16 Ci Caulo owaco bot omin wonne-ni ni, “Otito botwa atir ni kana doŋ ginoŋo.” Ento pe otito lok me camo ker ma onoŋo Camuel oloko bote-ni. Kwir okwanyo Caulo me bedo kabaka
Ruth 4:17 I kare-nu Camuel olwoŋo lwak ocokke kacel bot Rwot i Mijpa.
Ruth 4:18 Ka owaco bot jo Icrael ni, “Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael owaco kit man ni, ‘Yam akwanyo jo Icrael ki i Ejipt, alarowu ki i ciŋ jo Ejipt ki i ciŋ Luker ducu ma gubedo ka unowu.’
Ruth 4:19 Ento tin wutyeko kwero Lubaŋawu wo ko ma bedo ka larowu ki i can ki ayelawu ducu, ci doŋ wuwacci, ‘Pe kumeno; ento imiwa kabaka ma biloyowa.’ Doŋ wubin wucuŋ i nyim Rwot kun wurye kaka ki kaka ki doggola ki doggola.”
Ruth 4:20 Camuel okelo kaka ma i Icrael ducu cok, ci kwir okwanyo kaka pa Benjamin.
Ruth 4:21 Okelo kaka pa Benjamin cok doggola ki doggola, ci kwir okwanyo doggola pa jo Matri. Ka lacen doŋ okelo doggola pa jo Matri cok ki acel acel, ci kwir okwanyo Caulo wod pa Kic, Ento ka gibedo ka yenye, pe ginoŋo kome.
Ruth 4:22 Mumiyo gucito, gupenyo dog Rwot doki ni, “Dano-nu tika obino kany?” Ci Rwot ogamo ni, “Nen, tye okanne i kin jami.”
Ruth 4:23 Guriŋo gucito, guomo en ki kunnu, Ka ocuŋ i dye lwak, nen, odoŋo mabor makato dano ducu, cakke ki i wi gwoke dok kwede malo.
Ruth 4:24 Ci Camuel owaco bot lwak ducu ni, “Doŋ wuneno ŋat ma Rwot oyero-ni? Pe tye ŋatti mo i kin wun lwak ducu ma cal kwede.” Ci lwak ducu gudaŋŋe ki woo ni, “Kabaka obed kwo nakanaka!”
Ruth 4:25 Camuel dok otito bot lwak kit cik ma myero me aluba ka kaba ka biloyogi; ci ocoyogi i buk, ka opyelo i nyim Rwot, Lacen Camuel ocwalo lwak woko ducu, wek ŋat acel acel odok i pacone.
Ruth 4:26 Caulo bene odok i pacone i Gibea. Jo mo go ma twoni oteka bene gucito kwede, gin jo ma Lubaŋa ogudo cwinygi.
Ruth 4:27 Ento jo mogo ma kitgi obedo atata guwacci, “Dano-ni bilarowa niŋniŋ?” Gubedo ka caye, pe gumedo ki tero mot mo bote.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 11 Caulo oloyo mony pa jo Ammon
Ruth 4:467 
Ruth 4:1 Ka dwe acel doŋ okato, Nakac ma jo Ammon ocito orumo gaŋ me Jabec-gilead ki monnye; ci jo ducu ma i Jabec guwaco bot Nakac ni, “Ber icikke kwedwa, ci wabidoko luticci.”
Ruth 4:2 Ento Nakac ogamo doggi ni, “Abicikke kwedwu kit man: abikolo waŋwu tuŋ acuc woko ducu, wek aket ki lewic i kom jo Icrael ducu.”
Ruth 4:3 Ludoŋo ma i Jabec gugamo kun giwacci, “Koŋ imiwa nino abiro wek wacwal lukwena i lobo Icrael ducu, Ka pe onen ŋatti mo ma larowa, ci wabimine kenwa boti.”
Ruth 4:4 Ka lukwena gubino i Gibea i gaŋ pa Caulo, gutito lokke bot lwak; ci lwak ducu guwo ki koko matek.
Ruth 4:5 I kare meno onoŋo Caulo oa ki i poto, obedo ka lubo ŋe twoni pur, ci owacci, “Aŋo mutimme? Piŋo dano tye ka koko?” Ci gititte lok kom jo Jabec.
Ruth 4:6 Ka Caulo owinyo lokke, ci Cwiny pa Lubaŋa obino ki tek i kome, kun kiniga omake madwoŋ.
Ruth 4:7 Okwanyo twoni pur aryo, otoŋogi, matitino, ci ocwalo i ciŋ lukwena oromo kwede i lobo Icrael ducu kun giwaco ni, “Dano mo ma pe obino olubo kor Caulo ki Camuel, gibitimo twon purre kit menol” Lworo omako dano matek pi Rwot, mumiyo gumol gubino ki cwiny acel.
Ruth 4:8 Ka Caulo oryeyo lwak i Bejek, okwanogi, ci jo Icrael guromo alip miya adek, ki jo Juda guromo alip pyeradek.
Ruth 4:9 Ci guwaco bot lukwena ma gubino botgi ni, “Wuwac bot jo Jabec-gilead ni, ‘Dikki ka cen odoko lyet gibilarowu.’ ” Ka lukwena gucito gutito bot jo Jabec, cwinygi obedo yom matek.
Ruth 4:10 En aye omiyo jo Jabec guwaco bot jo Ammon ni, “Wabimine kenwa di ki i ciŋwu, ci wubitimowa kit ma wumito ducu.”
Ruth 4:11 Orwone Caulo opo ko mony i buca adek; ci gucoro i dye gony pa jo Ammon kwarpiny, gucako nekogi o wa i dyeceŋ, Jo ma gubwotte guket woko, pe inoŋo jo aryo ma gudoŋ kacel.
Ruth 4:12 Ka otum, lwak owaco bot Camuel ni, “Aŋagi ma yam owacci, ‘Caulo aye biloyowa bo?’ Gikel jo-nu wek wanekgi woko.”
Ruth 4:13 Ento Caulo ogamo ni, “Pe tin gineko iye dano mo, pien tin aye Rwot olaro jo Icrael.”
Ruth 4:14 Ka Camuel dok owaco bot lwak ni, “Wubin, wacitu i Gilgal, wek wacikweru ker odoco kunnu.”
Ruth 4:468 
Ruth 4:15 Mumiyo lwak ducu gucito i Gilgal, ci guketo Caulo me bedo kabaka i nyim Rwot kunnu. Gutyero gityer lakwecwiny kunnu i nyim Rwot, ci Caulo ki jo Icrael ducu cwinygi obedo yom mada.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 12 Lok pa Camuel bot lwak
Ruth 4:1 Camuel owaco bot jo Icrael ducu ni, “Nen, doŋ atyeko winyo dogwu i lok ducu ma wuwaco bota; doŋ amiyowu kabaka me loyowu.
Ruth 4:2 Koni doŋ wunen, kabaka tye ka telo wiwu. An doŋ ati woko ma wiya ki lwar; dok, wunen, awobena bene gitye kwedwu. Abedo ka tic i nyimwu cakke wa ka tinona o kwede wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:3 An atye ene, wutit lok ma mako koma i nyim Rwot ki i nyim lakerre ma giwiro ki moo, Aŋa ma akwanyo twonne? Aŋa ma akwanyo kanane? Nyo aŋa ma abumo jamine? Aŋa ma yam aburo? Nyo aŋa ma yam agamo lim me wilo loyo kop ki i ciŋe me laum waŋa? Wutit lok ma mako koma, ci abidwoko waŋe botwu.”
Ruth 4:4 Gugamo ni, “In yam pe ibumo jamiwa mo, kadi burowa, nyo gamo jami mo ki i ciŋ dano mo.”
Ruth 4:5 Ci owaco botgi ni, “Rwot aye lacaden i komwu, ki lakerre ma giwiro ki moo bene aye lacaden tin ma moko ni, pe wunoŋo gin mo i ciŋa.” Gugamo ni, “En aye caden.”
Ruth 4:6 Camuel dok owaco bot lwak ni, “Rwot aye caden ma yam oyero Moses ki Aron ci okwanyo kwarowa woko ki i Ejipt.
Ruth 4:7 Mumiyo kombeddi doŋ wucuŋ mot, wek apid kop i komwu i nyim Rwot i kom tim ducu ma Rwot olarowu kwede, ma yam otimo piwu ki pi kwarowu.
Ruth 4:8 Ka yam Yakobo ki jone gucito i Ejipt, ci jo Ejipt gubwoyogi ki tek, mumi yo kwarowu gukok bot Rwot. Ka doŋ Rwot ocwalo Moses ki Aron ma gukwanyo kwarowu ki i Ejipt ci gumiyogi gubedo i kabedo man.
Ruth 4:9 Ento wigi ocako wil i kom Rwot Lubaŋagi woko; ci omiyogi i ciŋ Cicera ma lawimony pa Jabin, kabaka me Kajor, ki i ciŋ jo Piliciti, ki i ciŋ kabaka me Moab, ci gucako lweny i komgi.
Ruth 4:10 Ci gukok bot Rwot kun giwacci, ‘Wan doŋ wabalo, pien wabwoto Rwot woko, waworo jogi Baal ki jogi ma mon-gu, Ento doŋ ilarwa ki i cin lukworwa, ci wabiworo in keken.’
Ruth 4:11 Ka dok Rwot ocwalo Jerubaal ki Barak, ki Jeputa ki Camuel, olarowu ki i ciŋ lumerokwu tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi, ci wubedo mot ki kuc.
Ruth 4:469 
Ruth 4:12 Lacen ka wuneno ni Nakac kabaka pa jo Ammon obino ka lweny i komwu, ci wuwaco bota ni, ‘Pe kumeno; ento kabaka aye biloyowa,’ ma onoŋo Rwot Lubaŋawu aye kabakawu.
Ruth 4:13 Kombeddi doŋ wunen kabakawu ma wuyero-ni, ma yam wupenya pireni. Nen, Rwot doŋ oketo kabaka ma loyowu.
Ruth 4:14 Ka ce wubilworo Rwot ci wutiyo bote kun wuwinyo doge, ma kun pe wujemo nyo wukwero cik pa Rwot woko, dok ka wun ki kabakawu ma loyowu-ni ce wubilubo kor Rwot Lubaŋawu, ci bibedo ber.
Ruth 4:15 Ento ka ce pe wubiwinyo dog Rwot, nyo wujemo ma wukwero cik pa Rwot woko, ci ciŋ Rwot bipoto i komwu ki i kom kabakawu.
Ruth 4:16 Kombeddi wun doŋ wucuŋ mot wek wunen kit gin madit ma Rwot bitiyo i nyimwu.
Ruth 4:17 Kare-ni kare me kayo ŋano; pe kumeno? Doŋ an abilego Rwot wek ocwal kot ma mor kun cwer kwede, ci wubiŋeyo dok wubineno kit ma balwu dit kwede ma wutimo i nyim Rwot pi penyo pi kabaka piwu kenwu.”
Ruth 4:18 Kit meno Camuel olego Rwot, ci Rwot ocwalo kot ma mor kun cwer kwede i nino meno; mumiyo lwak ducu gubedo ki lworo madwoŋ mada i kom Rwot ki i kom Camuel.
Ruth 4:19 Ci lwak ducu guwaco bot Camuel ni, “Ladit, leg piwa bot Rwot Lubaŋani wek pe wato, pien wapoŋo wi bal wa ki tim marac man me penyo pi kabaka piwa kenwa.”
Ruth 4:20 Ci Camuel owaco bot lwak ni, “Pe wulwor, Wutyeko timo gin maraco magi ducu, ento pe dok wulokke wubarre woko ki ka lubo kor Rwot, ento doŋ wuti bot Rwot ki cwinywu ducu.
Ruth 4:21 Pe wulokke wubarre woko wudok ka lubo kor gin atata ma pe konyo, ma pe laro dano mo, pien gin atata.
Ruth 4:22 Pien Rwot pe bibolo lwakke woko ata, pi nyiŋe madit-ti keken, pien yomcwiny oa ki i i Rwot ma oketowu me bedo jone kikome.
Ruth 4:23 Dok bene ki tuŋ bota pe myero atim bal bot Rwot me weko lego piwu; dok abipwonyowu kit me lubo yo atir ki maber.
Ruth 4:24 Wulwor Rwot keken, dok wuti bote ki gen madwoŋ ki cwinywu ducu; pienno wubedo ka tamo kit gin madito ma yam Rwot obedo ka tiyone piwu.
Ruth 4:25 Ento ka pud wumedde ka timo tim maraco, ci gibijwerowu woko, wun kacel ki kabakawu.”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 13 Lweny ki jo Piliciti
Ruth 4:470 
Ruth 4:1 Caulo onoŋo tye ki mwaka kare ma ocamo ker ci oloyo jo Icrael pi mwakaiye aryo .
Ruth 4:2 Caulo oyero jo Icrael alip adek; jo alip aryo gubedo bote i Mikmac ki i lobo godi me Betel, ki alip acel gubedo bot Yonacan i Gibea i lobo Benjamin. Jo mudoŋ ocwalogi paco, ni ŋat acel acel odok i kemane.
Ruth 4:3 Yonacan oloyo jo Piliciti i cel gogo monygi mo ma tye i Geba, ci jo Piliciti guwinyo pire. Caulo okuto tum okwanne oromo lobo ducu kun wacci, “Wek jo Ibru ducu guwiny.”
Ruth 4:4 Ci jo Icrael ducu guwinyo ka giwaco ni, Caulo oloyo jo Piliciti i cel gogo monygi, dok bene ni, nyiŋ jo Icrael odoko ŋwe lituny bot jo Piliciti. Ci gilwoŋo lwak gucokke bot Caulo i Gilgal.
Ruth 4:5 Jo Piliciti gurwayo ka lweny ki jo Icrael ki gadigadi lweny alip pyeradek, ki wegi aguragura alip abicel, ki lwak mony madwoŋ macalo kweyo me dog nam, Gubino guguro gonygi i Mikmac ma tye i ŋet Bet-awen yo tun wokceŋ.
Ruth 4:6 Ka jo Icrael guneno ni doŋ gidinogi matek ma doŋ gitye marac twatwal, ci dano gukanne i boro ki i bur, ki i kin godi ki i lyel ki i bur pii-gu.
Ruth 4:7 Jo mogo guŋolo kulu Jordan, gucito wa i lobo Gad ki Gilead, Onoŋo Caulo pud tye i Gilgal, ci lwak ducu gilubo kore ki myelkom.
Ruth 4:8 Okuro pi nino abiro ma onoŋo Camuel ociko-ni; ento Camuel pe obino i Gilgal, ci lwak ocako ket woko ki bot Caulo.
Ruth 4:9 Mumiyo Caulo owacci, “Wukella gitum awaŋa kany, ki gityer lakwecwiny.” Ci otyero gitum awaŋa.
Ruth 4:10 Ka onoŋo pud otyeko tyero gitum awaŋa, ci nen, Camuel oturo kibi no cut. Ka Caulo okato woko ka rwatte kwede ki mote.
Ruth 4:11 Camuel owaco bo te ni, “Ibedo ka timo gin aŋo?” Caulo ogamo ni, “Ka aneno ni dano gucako ket woko ki bota, dok bene pe ibino i nino ma onoŋo iciko-ni, kun jo Piliciti doŋ gurwayo woko cok ki Mi kmac,
Ruth 4:12 ci atamo ni, ‘Jo Piliciti doŋ gibipoto i koma ki i Gilgal kany, ma peya ataŋo ciŋa akwayo Rwot;’ ci doŋ aturre pira kena ka tyero gitum awaŋa.”
Ruth 4:13 Ci Camuel owaco bot Caulo ni, “Itimo gin me miŋo keken. In pe igwoko cik pa Rwot Lubaŋani ma yam ociki kwede; kono onoŋo igwoko, kono Lubaŋa omoko kerri me loyo Icrael matwal.
Ruth 4:14 Ento kombeddi kerri doŋ pe bicuŋ; Rwot doŋ otyeko yero dano ma bitimo gin ma cwinye mito. Dok Rwot oketo en me bedo laker ma loyo lwakke, pien in pe igwoko gin ma Rwot yam ociki kwede.”
Ruth 4:471 
Ruth 4:15 Ci Camuel oa malo, oa ki i Gigal ocito i Gibea i lobo pa jo Benjamin. Caulo okwano wel dano ma gitye bote, ci guromo miya abicel.
Ruth 4:16 Caulo ki wode Yonacan ki jo ma gitye bote gubedo i Geba i lobo pa jo Benjamin, ento jo Piliciti gugony i Mikmac.
Ruth 4:17 Luyak gua ki i gony pa jo Piliciti buca mony adek; buca acel odok yo tuŋ Opra ma i lobo Cual,
Ruth 4:18 buca mukene odok yo tuŋ Bet-koron, ki buca mukene odok yo tuŋ waŋ lobo ma neno piny i nota Jeboim ma yo tuŋ tim ata.
Ruth 4:19 I kare-nu latet mo pe inoŋo i lobo Icrael ducu, pien yam jo Piliciti guwacci, “Pe wawek jo Ibru gutet pala lucwangi nyo toŋigi pigi kengi.”
Ruth 4:20 Ento ŋat acel acel ki i kin jo Icrael obedo ka cito bot jo Piliciti ka twero lak kweri dyaŋŋe, nyo kweri kidima, nyo latoŋ nyo pala kacce.
Ruth 4:21 Ci giŋolo gikok bedo dul aryo me adek me cekel pi lak kweri dyaŋ ki pi kidima, ka dok acel me adek me cekel pi twero lak latoŋ ki pi como dim.
Ruth 4:22 Kit meno omiyo i kare me lweny pala lucwan nyo toŋ pe ginoŋo i Ciŋ dano mo ki i kin jo ma gitye bot Caulo ki Yonacan. Ento Caulo ki wode Yonacan onoŋo gitye ki megi.
Ruth 4:23 Ci jo ma gitye i cel gogo mony pa jo Piliciti gumol gukato woko, gucito i waŋ apidin me Mikmac me gwokone.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 14 Yonacan oito i cel gogo pa jo Piliciti
Ruth 4:1 I nino mo acel Yonacan wod pa Caulo owaco bot awobi ma tino jami lwennye ni, “Bin wek wakat bot mony ma i cel gogo pa jo Piliciti ma tye loka ca-ni.” Ento pe otito bot wonne.
Ruth 4:2 Onoŋo Caulo bedo i agikki gaŋ me Gibea i te yat okwer pomegranat ma yam tye i Migron. Onoŋo jo ma gitye kwede giromo miya abicel,
Ruth 4:3 kacel ki Akija wod pa Akitub, omin Ikabod wod pa Finekaci ma wod pa Eli. En aye obedo ajwaka pa Rwot i Cilo ma ruko epod. Lwak pe guneye ni Yonacan ocito.
Ruth 4:4 I waŋ apidin ma Yonacan obedo ka yenyo yo me kato kwede i kom mony ma i cel gogo pa jo Piliciti-ni, onoŋo tye iye got ma oculle tuŋcel ki got ma oculle tuŋ mukene bene, Nyiŋ got acel Bojej ki nyiŋ mukene Cene.
Ruth 4:5 Got acel ocuŋ oculle yo tuŋ acam i nyim Mikmac, ki mukene yo tuŋ acuc i nyim Geba.
Ruth 4:472 
Ruth 4:6 Yonacan owaco bot awobi ma tiŋo jami lwennye ni, “Bin wek wakat bot mony ma i cel gogo pa jo-ni ma pe giŋeyo Lubaŋa; gwok Rwot bitiyo gin mo piwa kunnu, pien pe tye gin mo ma geŋo Rwot laro dano kadi gipol kadi ginok.”
Ruth 4:7 Latin jami lwennye owaco bote ni, “Tim gin ducu ma cwinyi oteri iye. Nen, an atye kacel kwedi; kit macalo cwinyi otamo kwede, mera bene kit meno.”
Ruth 4:8 Yonacan dok owaco ni, “Wabiwok wakato bot jo ca, ci wabinyutte kenwa botgi.
Ruth 4:9 Ka ce guwacci, ‘Wukur nio ka wao botwu,’ ci wabicuŋ giwa mot i kabedowa, pe wabiito malo botgi.
Ruth 4:10 Ento ka guwacci, ‘Wubin malo botwa kany,’ ci wabiito malo kunnu, pien noŋo Rwot doŋ otyeko miyogi i ciŋwa. Meno aye bibedo lanyut botwa.”
Ruth 4:11 Kit meno gin aryo ducu gunyutte kekengi bot mony pa jo Piliciti ma tye i cel gogo; ci jo Piliciti guwacci, “Nen, jo Ibru gubebino ca, tye ka kato woko ki i bur ma gukanne iye.”
Ruth 4:12 Ci co me mony ma i cel gogo gulwoŋo Yonacan ki latin jami lwennye kun giwacci, “Wubin malo botwa, ci wabinyuto gin mo botwu.” Yonacan owaco bot latin jami lwennye ni, “Bin ilub kora, pien Rwot otyeko miyogi i ciŋ jo Icrael.”
Ruth 4:13 Ka doŋ Yonacan ocako ito malo kun ci to kobo ki ciŋe ki tyene, ki latin jami lwennye lubo kore. Yonacan otoŋo Lupiliciti ci gupoto woko piny i nyime, kun latin jami lwennye obedo ka nekogi ki i kore.
Ruth 4:14 I nek meno mukwoŋo-ni ma Yonacan ki latin jami lwennye gutimo, guneko dano pyeraryo macalo kweri dyaŋ ma ŋolo dye poto ma romo nucu eka.
Ruth 4:15 Dano gutwarre ki lworo madwoŋ i gony pa jo Piliciti, ki jogi ma gitye woko i bar, ki mony ma i gogo, kadi wa luyak bene komgi omyel. Lobo oyeŋŋe, ci lworo mutwaro dano odoko madwoŋ twatwal.
Ruth 4:16 Ka lukur-piny pa Caulo ma i Gibea i lobo Benjamin guneno lwak jo Piliciti guket gigwennye atata, gidok tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi,
Ruth 4:17 ci Caulo owaco bot lwak ma gitye bote ni, “Koŋ wukwan dano wek wanen aŋa ma okato woko ki botwa.” Gukwano dano, ci nen, Yonacan ki latin jami lwennye onoŋo gipe kunnu.
Ruth 4:18 Ci Caulo owaco bot Akija ni, “Kel canduk pa Lubaŋa kany.” Pien onoŋo canduk pa Lubaŋa woto kacel ki jo Icrael i kare meno.
Ruth 4:19 I kare ma Caulo obedo ka lok ki ajwaka-ni, woo obedo ka medde ameda i gony pa jo Piliciti, mumiyo Caulo owaco bot ajwaka ni, “Wek doŋ obedi.”
Ruth 4:20 Caulo ki jo ducu ma gitye kwede gucako wayo, ci gucito gudonyo ka lweny. Ci nen, dano acel acel i kin jo Piliciti co bo lawote ki pala lucwanne; kom dano obaŋŋe woko twatwal.
Ruth 4:473 
Ruth 4:21 Jo Ibru ma yam con gubedo bot jo Piliciti, ma yam gumol gucito kwedgi i gonygini, gin bene gulokke gudwogo i kom jo Icrael ma gitye kacel ki Caulo ki Yonacan.
Ruth 4:22 Kit meno wa jo Icrael ma yam onoŋo gukanne i kin godi me lobo Epraim, ka guwinyo ni jo Piliciti gitye ka riŋo woko, gin bene guryemo korgi matek ka lweny i komgi.
Ruth 4:23 Rwot olaro jo Icrael i nino meno; ci lweny omedde wa i ne Bet-awen.
Ruth 4:24 Can dok opoto i kom jo Icrael i nino meno; pien Caulo okwoŋo kwoŋ ki dano kun wacci, “Cen opot i kom dano mo ma ocamo cam ma peya piny oyuto, ma noŋo pud atye ka culo kwor i kom lukworra.” Kit meno pe onen ŋatti mo ma obilo cam.
Ruth 4:25 Ci dano ducu gucorre gudonyo i buŋa, gunoŋo moo kic opoto i ŋom.
Ruth 4:26 Ka dano gudonyo i buŋa, ci nen, moo kic tye ka ton piny. Ento dano mo pe oketo ciŋe i doge, pien lwak obedo ka lworo kwon ma gikwono-ni.
Ruth 4:27 Ento Yonacan onoŋo pe owinyo ka wonne kwoŋo kwoŋ kun ciko ki dano. Kit meno en oluto iye wi odoo ma onoŋo tye i ciŋe, ci orwako i peda kic, orwako ciŋe i doge; ci waŋe ocako gony woko.
Ruth 4:28 Ŋat acel ma i lwak owacci, “Woru ociko dano kun kwoŋo kwoŋ matek ni, ‘Cen obed i kom dano ma ocamo cam i nino man.’” Onoŋo kec obwoyo dano woko.
Ruth 4:29 Yonacan ogamo ni, “Wora okelo can i lobo. Nen kit ma waŋa ogony kwede pien atyeko bilo moo kic man manok.
Ruth 4:30 Kono pe obedo ber twatwal kono dano gucamo tin ki kuc gin ma guyako ki bot lumerokgi? Pien kombeddi pud peya gineko jo Piliciti mapol.”
Ruth 4:31 Gineko jo Piliciti i nino meno cakke ki i Mikmac o wa i Aijalon. Onoŋo kec obwoyo dano mada;
Ruth 4:32 ci dano gucako mwomme i kom I im ma giyako, ci gumako romi ki twoni ki roci-gu guradogi woko piny, ci lwak gucako mwodo riŋone kacel ki remo.
Ruth 4:33 Ka gitito bot Caulo ni, “Nen, dano gubalo i nyim Rwot pi mwodo riŋo ki remo,” ci en ogamo ni, “Wutimo me dwalo dog! Wulor kidi madit tuŋ bota kany.”
Ruth 4:34 Caulo dok owacci, “Wuket wurom kin dano kun wuwaco botgi ni, ‘Dano acel acel okel twonne nyo romone, wunekgi kany wek wucam, Pe dok wubal i nyim Rwot pi mwodo riŋo ki remo.’ ” Pi meno dano acel acel okelo twonne i wor meno ci gunekogi kunnu.
Ruth 4:35 Caulo ocano keno tyer pi Rwot; en aye keno tyer mukwoŋo ma en ocano pi Rwot.
Ruth 4:474 
Ruth 4:36 Caulo dok owacci, “Wek walubu kor jo Piliciti i dyewor, waciyakugi nio ka piny oru. Pe waciweku dano mo odoŋ i komgi.” Dano gugamo ni, “Tim gin ma ineno ni berri.” Ento ajwaka owacci, “Weku koŋ wanyiku cok bot Lubaŋa kany.”
Ruth 4:37 Caulo openyo dog Lubaŋa ni, “Myero acilub kor jo Piliciti? Ibimiyogi i ciŋ jo Icrael?” Ento Lubaŋa pe odokke iye i nino-nu.
Ruth 4:38 Caulo owacci, “Wubin kany, wun lutel wi lwak ducu, wek wuŋi wuniaŋ kit ma bal obino kwede tin.
Ruth 4:39 Pien macalo Rwot ma lalar jo Icrael tye makwo-ni, kadi ka bal tye i kom woda Yonacan, ci en bito ada.” Ento pe natu mo odokke iye ki i kin lwak.
Ruth 4:40 Dok owaco bot jo Icrael ducu ni, “Wun wubiwalle wubedo tuŋcel, ki an ki Yonacan wabiwalle wabedo tuŋcel.” Ci lwak guwaco bot Caulo ni, “Tim gin ma ineno ni berri.”
Ruth 4:41 Mumiyo Caulo owacci, “Ai Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, piŋo tin pe idok iye bota, laditta? Ka ce bal man tye i koma nyo i kom Yonacan ma woda-ni, ai Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, mi Urim, Ento ka bal man tye i kom joni Icrael, ci imi Tumim.” Ci kwir omako Yonacan ki Caulo, kun lwak obwot.
Ruth 4:42 Caulo dok owacci, “Bolu kwir i kin an ki woda Yonacan,” ci kwir opoto omako Yonacan.
Ruth 4:43 Caulo dok owaco bot Yonacan ni, “Titta gin ma itimo,” ci Yonacan otito bote ni, “Abilo moo kic manok ki i wi odoo ma onoŋo amako i ciŋa-ni, An doŋ atye ene, abito doŋ.”
Ruth 4:44 Caulo owacci, “Lubaŋa myero oket can i koma kit meno ki makato bene ka pe gineki woko, Yonacan.”
Ruth 4:45 Ento lwak gugamo dog Caulo ni, “Yonacan bi to doŋ ada, ma otiyo matek me kelo ki Icrael loc man madit-ti? Pe twero timme! Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, yer wi ye mo acel pe bipoto i ŋom, pien obedo ka tic kacel ki Lubaŋa i nino man,” Kit meno lwak gularo Yonacan, pe omedo ki to.
Ruth 4:46 Caulo oweko ryemo kor jo Piliciti, ci odok cen; ki jo Piliciti bene gudok woko i kabedogi. Loc pa Caulo
Ruth 4:47 Ka Caulo doŋ otyeko camo ker pa jo Icrael me bedo kabaka, obedo ka lweny i kom lumerokke ducu ma gurume. Olwenyo i kom jo Moab, jo Ammon, jo Edom, i kom luker me Joba ki i kom jo Piliciti. Ka ma olokke odokiye ducu, onekogi marac.
Ruth 4:48 Obedo ka lweny matek, oloyo wa jo Amalek, ci olaro Jo Icrael ki i ciŋ jo ma yam gibedo ka yakogi.
Ruth 4:49 Caulo yam tye ki awobene Yonacan, Icivi, Malkicua. Niŋ anyirane ene: latin nyako mukwoŋo nyiŋe Merab, nyiŋ matidine Mikal.
Ruth 4:475 
Ruth 4:50 Nyiŋ dako pa Caulo onoŋo Akinoam, nya pa Akimaj. Nyiŋ ladit wi monnye onoŋo Abneri wod pa Ner, ma omin won Caulo.
Ruth 4:51 Kic en aye won Caulo, ki Ner ma won Abneri-ni onoŋo en aye wod pa Abiel.
Ruth 4:52 Lweny obedo magwa i kom jo Piliciti i kare pa Caulo ducu. Ka Caulo oneno dano mo ma oteka lweny, ci kelo, bedo kwede cok.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 15 Lweny i kom jo Amalek
Ruth 4:1 Camuel owaco bot Caulo ni, “Rwot yam ocwala ka wiri ki moo ker me bedo kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael, mumiyo tin ber iwiny lok pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:2 Rwot me mony owaco kuman ni, ‘Abiketo can i kom jo Amalek pi gin ma yam gutimo i kom jo Icrael, pien yam gulwenyo kwedgi ma gitye iyo, i kare ma gua ki i Ejipt.
Ruth 4:3 Cit ilweny ki jo Amalek, idyergi i ciŋ Rwot, ijwergi woko liweŋ ki gin ducu ma gitye kwede. Pe kica omaki i komgi, ento inen co wa ki mon, litino wa ki gin ma pud dot, twoni ki romi, kinaga wa ki kana-gu.’ ”
Ruth 4:4 Caulo olwoŋo dano ka lweny, ci okwanogi i Telaim. Jo ma giwoto ki tyengi onoŋo giromo alip miya aryo, ki jo pa Juda alip apar.
Ruth 4:5 Ka Caulo obino i nyim gaŋ pa jo Amalek, ci obuto i nota, okurogi iye.
Ruth 4:6 Dok Caulo owaco bot jo Keni ni, “Wua, wucit woko ki i kin jo Amalek, wek pe atyekwu woko kacel kwedgi; pien yam kica omakowu i kom jo Icrael ducu i kare ma gua woko ki i Ejipt.” Mumiyo jo Keni gua woko ki i kin jo Amalek.
Ruth 4:7 Caulo oloyo jo Amalek cakke ki i Kavila o kwede wa i Cur ma cok ki lobo Ejipt yo tuŋ wokceŋ.
Ruth 4:8 Omako Agag kabaka pa jo Amalek otere makwo, ci odyero jo-nu, ojwerogi woko ki pala lucwan.
Ruth 4:9 Ento Caulo ki lwak kica omakogi i kom Agag, ci guweko en kacel ki romi mogo ma gibeco, ki twoni, ki roci mucwe, ki litino romi-gu, ki jami mukene ma gibeco ducu, pe guye ni myero gijwergi woko liweŋ, Gin ducu ma gicayo, ki gin maracone, gin aye gujwerogi woko. Lubaŋa okwero Caulo me bedo kabaka
Ruth 4:10 Ka doŋ lok pa Rwot obino bot Camuel ni,
Ruth 4:11 “Atyeko ŋut pi miyo Caulo bedo kabaka, pien obarre woko ki ka lubo kora odok woko cen, pe ocobo cikka.” Ci kiniga omako Camuel, obedo ka kok bot Rwot dyewor benebene.
Ruth 4:476 
Ruth 4:12 Camuel oa odiko con pi rwatte ki Caulo. Ka gitito bot Camuel ni, Caulo doŋ owoto i Karmel, ocibo gin me po pire kene, ci olokke okato anyim, ocito wa i Gilgal.
Ruth 4:13 Ka Camuel oo bot Caulo, ci Caulo owaco bote ni, “Gum pa Rwot obed i komi. Atyeko cobo cik pa Rwot.”
Ruth 4:14 Camuel owacci, “Man dok kit koko romi aŋo ma awinyo ki ita-ni, ki koko dyaŋi ma awinyoni?”
Ruth 4:15 Caulo owacci, “Gikelogi ki bot jo Amalek, pien dano guŋoyo romi ki dyaŋi mabecone me gitum bot Rwot Lubaŋani; ki mudoŋŋe wajwerogi woko ducu liweŋ.”
Ruth 4:16 Ento Camuel owaco bot Caulo ni, “Liŋ! Abititti gin ma Rwot otito bota tin dyewor.” Caulo ogamo ni, “Doŋ itit bota do.”
Ruth 4:17 Camuel owacci, “Kadi inen i waŋi kekeni ni itidi, pe in aye iloyo kaka ducu ma i Icrael? Rwot yam owiri ki moo me bedo kabaka pa jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:18 Rwot ocwali kun waco boti ni, ‘Cit icidyerra jo Amalek ma lubalo, ijwergi woko ducu liweŋ.’
Ruth 4:19 Piŋo yam pe iworo dog Rwot? Piŋo icorre i kom gin ma giyako, ki timo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot?”
Ruth 4:20 Caulo owaco bot Camuel ni, “Atyeko woro dog Rwot. Acito ka ma gicwala iye, akelo Agag kabaka me Amalek, dok ajwero jo Amalek woko ducu liweŋ.
Ruth 4:21 Ento dano gukwanyo romi ki twoni ki i kin gin ma giyako, gukwanyo gin mabecone ki i kin jami ma onoŋo gidyero me ajwera woko liweŋ, gutero wek gubed gitum bot Rwot Lubaŋani i Gilgal.”
Ruth 4:22 Camuel ogamo ni, “Cwiny Rwot bedo yom i gitum awaŋa ki gityer-gu ma rom ki kit ma cwinye bedo yom kwede ka giworo doge? Nen, woro dog Rwot ber kato gitum, winyo cik ber kato dwolo nyogi romi ma giwaŋo me gityer.
Ruth 4:23 Pien jemo rom ki bal me tyet, tekwic rom ki bal me woro cal jogi. Macalo in ikwero winyo lok pa Rwot, en doŋ okwero in me bedo kabaka.”
Ruth 4:24 Caulo owaco bot Camuel ni, “Apoto i bal, pien akalo wi cik pa Rwot ki wi lokki, pien onoŋo alworo lwak, aworo doggi.
Ruth 4:25 Doŋ kombeddi alegi ni itima kica i kom balla, ci wadok kwedi wek aciwor Rwot.”
Ruth 4:26 Camuel ogamo dog Caulo ni, “Pe abidok kacel kwedi, pien ityeko kwero lok pa Rwot woko, ki Rwot bene otyeko kwero in me bedo kabaka pa jo Icrael.”
Ruth 4:27 Ka Camuel olokke me cito woko, Caulo omako dog kanyine, ci oyec woko.
Ruth 4:477 
Ruth 4:28 Camuel owaco bote ni, “Rwot doŋ oyeco ker pa Icrael woko ki boti tin, doŋ otyeko miyone bot lawoti ma en ber makato in.
Ruth 4:29 Lubaŋa ma en Deyo pa Icrael pe bi loko goba, kadi ŋut bene; en pe dano ma kono oŋut-ti.”
Ruth 4:30 Caulo owacci, “Apoto i bal; ento tin koŋ iket deyo i koma i nyim ludoŋo pa lwakka ki i nyim jo Icrael, wek wadok kwedi, aciwor Rwot Lubaŋani.”
Ruth 4:31 Mumiyo Camuel odok cen olubo kor Caulo, ci Caulo oworo Rwot.
Ruth 4:32 Camuel dok owacci, “Kella Agag, kabaka pa jo Amalek, bota kany.” Agag ocako bi no bote ma tipo kome pe kun wacci, “Lit me to doŋ peke.”
Ruth 4:33 Camuel owacci, “Kit ma yam pala lucwanni omiyo mon gudoŋ laboŋo litinogi-ni, kit meno meni bene bibedo laboŋo latin i kin mon wadi.” Ka doŋ Camuel oŋido Agag woko matitino i nyim Rwot i Gilgal.
Ruth 4:34 Lacen Camuel odok i Rama; Caulo ocito mere i ode i Gibea pa Caulo.
Ruth 4:35 Camuel pe omedo ki neno Caulo o wa i nino me tone, ento Camuel obedo ka kumo pi Caulo. Ci Rwot oŋut pi keto Caulo me bedo kabaka pa jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 16 Giwiro Daudi me bedo kabaka
Ruth 4:1 Rwot owaco bot Camuel ni, “Cwinyi bikumo pi Caulo pi kare ma rom mene, kun an doŋ atyeko kwero en me bedo kabaka pa jo Icrael? Pik moo i tuŋ dyaŋ, ci iciti. Abiori bot Yece ma jo Beterekem, pien anoŋo kabaka pira kena i kin awobene.”
Ruth 4:2 Camuel ogamo ni, “Abiwot kunnu niŋniŋ? Ka Caulo biwinyone, bineka woko.” Rwot owaco bote ni, “Cit ki roya kun iwacci, ‘Abino ka tyero gitum bot Rwot.’
Ruth 4:3 Ci ilwoŋ Yece obin i ka tumo gitum. An abinyutti gin ma myero iti. Ibiwiro pira dano ma abituco nyiŋe boti.”
Ruth 4:4 Camuel otimo kit ma Rwot ocike-ni, ocito i Beterekem. Ludoŋo ma i gaŋ meno gucito ka jolo wiye kun komgi myel. Guwacci, “Ibino ki kuc bo?”
Ruth 4:5 Ogamo ni, “Abino ki kuc. Abino ka tyero gitum bot Rwot. Wulonnye kekenwu wubed maleŋ, ka wubin kacel kweda ka tyero gitum.” Olonyo Yece ki awobene gubedo maleŋ ci olwoŋogi i ka tyero gitum.
Ruth 4:6 Ka gubino, Camuel oneno kom Eliab ci otamo ni, “Ada, ŋat ma Rwot biwiro ki moo tye i nyime.”
Ruth 4:7 Ento Rwot owaco bot Camuel ni, “Pe ibed ka neno ber me kome nyo kit borre, pien atyeko kwere woko; pien Rwot pe neno piny kit ma dano neno-ni, Dano neno kome ki woko, ento Rwot neno cwinye.”
Ruth 4:478 
Ruth 4:8 Yece dok olwoŋo Abinadab, oweko en okato ki i nyim Camuel; ci Camuel owacci, “Kadi man bene Rwot pe oyero.”
Ruth 4:9 Yece dok oweko Cama okato ki ka ŋete; Camuel dok owacci, “Kadi man bene pe Rwot oyero.”
Ruth 4:10 Yece omiyo awobene abiro ducu gukato i nyim Camuel. Ci Camuel owaco bot Yece ni, “Rwot pe oyero jo-ni.”
Ruth 4:11 Dok openyo Yece ni, “Awobeni ducu gitye kany?” Ogamo ni, “Matidine aye pud odoŋ; ento en tye ka kwayo romi,” ci Camuel owaco bot Yece ni, “Cwal kwena giome; pien pe wabibedo piny nio ka en oo kany.”
Ruth 4:12 Ocwalo kwena, ci gikele. Otuc ma kome kwar, waŋe mwonya ma neno ber. Rwot owacci, “Doŋ ia malo, iwire ki moo, pien man aye en.”
Ruth 4:13 Camuel okwanyo tuŋ dyaŋ ma moo tye iye, owiro Daudi ki moo ki i dye omegine. Ci Cwiny pa Rwot obino i kom Daudi ki tek cakke i nino meno. Lacen Camuel oa odok i Rama. Daudi ogoyo opuk pi Caulo
Ruth 4:14 I kare meno Cwiny pa Rwot oa woko ki i kom Caulo, ci cen marac ma oa ki bot Rwot opoto i kome, obedo ka lanye.
Ruth 4:15 Lutic pa Caulo guwaco bote ni, “Nen ba, cen marac ma oa ki bot Lubaŋa opoto i komi, obedo ka lanyi.
Ruth 4:16 Laditwa, ber icikwa wan luticci ma watye kany-nyi wek waciyeny dano mo ma ladiro goyo opuk; ci ka cen marac ma a ki bot Lubaŋa opoto i komi, en bigoyo opuk, mi yo ibedo maber.”
Ruth 4:17 Mumiyo Caulo ociko luticce ni, “Wun wuciyennya dano mo ma ŋeyo goyo opuk maberre, ci wukel en bota.”
Ruth 4:18 Ŋat acel i kin awobene ogamo ni, “Nen ba, aneno wod pa Yece ma Labeterekem ma ladiro goco. En laco ma oteka ma oŋiyo ki lweny, ma iye olil i lok, ma nen mwonya, dok Rwot tye kwede.”
Ruth 4:19 Mumiyo Caulo ocwalo lukwena bot Yece kun waco bote ni, “Cwalla wodi Daudi ma lakwat romi-ni.”
Ruth 4:20 Yece okwanyo kana me yeyo mugati, ki opiro koŋo vino, ki latin dyel, ci ocwalogi bot Caulo kacel ki wode Daudi.
Ruth 4:21 Ka Daudi ocito bot Caulo ci ocako ticce, Caulo ocako mare matek twatwal, ka odoko lamak jami lwennye.
Ruth 4:22 Caulo ocwalo kwena bot Yece kun waco bote ni, “Wek Daudi obed doŋ ka tiyo tic bota, pien aneno ticce, oyomo cwinya.”
Ruth 4:479 
Ruth 4:23 I kare ducu ma cen marac ma a ki bot Lubaŋa opoto i kom Caulo, ci Daudi kwanyo opuk, cako goyone, miyo Caulo bedo maber, doko dano, ci cen marac a woko ki i kome.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 17 Goliac otaro jo Icrael
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno jo Piliciti gucoko monygi kacel pi lweny. Gucokke i Coko i lobo pa Juda, ci gugony i kin Coko ki Ajeka, i Epec-damim.
Ruth 4:2 Caulo ki jo Icrael gucokke kacel, gugony i nota Ela, ci gurye ki tyen me lweny i kom jo Piliciti.
Ruth 4:3 Lupiliciti gucuŋ i wi got tuŋcel, ki Luicrael gucuŋ i wi got tuŋ mukene, kun nota tye i kingi.
Ruth 4:4 Ci twon oita lweny mo obino oa ki i gony pa Lupiliciti ma nyiŋe Goliac, dano me Gat. Borre kato ka futi aboŋwen.
Ruth 4:5 Oruko otaŋ mola i wiye, dok oruko koti mola lagen kore; pek pa koti molane onoŋo romo ratili miya acel ki pyerabic.
Ruth 4:6 Oruko mola mukwako tyene, kun okacce ki toŋ alwiro mola wi gwoke.
Ruth 4:7 Bol toŋŋe mito rom ki rii yat me cweyo boŋo; lak toŋŋe pekke romo ratili apar wiye aboŋwen, kun lamak kwotte otelo nyime.
Ruth 4:8 En ocuŋ ci odaŋŋe matek i wi mony pa jo Icrael ma gurye i tyen ni, “Kaa wubino ma wurye i tyen pi lweny piŋo? Pe an Lapiliciti? Pe wun lutic pa Caulo bo? Wuyer danowu mo acel, wek en olor piny obin bota.
Ruth 4:9 Ka en twero lweny kweda ce oneka, ci wan wabibedo luticwu; ento ka an aye aloye, ce aneke, ci wun wubibedo luticwa pi tiyo tic botwa.”
Ruth 4:10 Lapiliciti meno dok owacci, “Ataro mony pa jo Icrael ma tin gurye i tyengi! Wumiya dano mo wek walweny kwede kacel.”
Ruth 4:11 Ka Caulo ki jo Icrael ducu guwinyo lwak lok pa Lapiliciti-nu, ci cwinygi oballe woko, gubedo ki lworo madwoŋ twatwal. Daudi obino i gony pa lumony
Ruth 4:12 Daudi obedo wod pa dano mo me Eprata ma gaŋŋe Beterekem i lobo Juda; nyiŋe Yece, yam tye ki awobene aboro. I kare pa Caulo, onoŋo en doŋ oti woko, mwaka me ditte doŋ dwoŋ.
Ruth 4:13 Onoŋo awobe pa Yece adek muteggine gulubo kor Caulo i mony, Nyiŋ awobene adek ma gucito i mony-nyi gin ene: Eliab ma latin kayo, ki ma olube Abinadab, ki me adekke Cama.
Ruth 4:14 Daudi aye matidine; jo muteggi adek-ki gulubo kor Caulo,
Ruth 4:480 
Ruth 4:15 ento Daudi obedo ka wirre bot Caulo, ka dok paco ka kwayo romi pa wonne i Beterekem.
Ruth 4:16 Lapiliciti obedo ka bino anyim ci cuŋ kunnu odiko ki otyeno pi nino pyeraŋwen.
Ruth 4:17 Yece owaco bot wode Daudi ni, “Ber iter nyig bel ma gicelo acela-ni bot omegini, ma romo agwata adek, kacel ki mugati man apar, itiŋ itergi oyot bot omegini ma i gony ca.
Ruth 4:18 Dok iter cak mutwo muluŋŋe-ni apar bot laditgi me mony ma loyo dano alip, Nen kit ma omegini tye kwede, ci imak gin mo idwog kwede ki botgi.”
Ruth 4:19 I kare-nu onoŋo Caulo ki omegi Daudi wa ki jo Icrael ducu gubedo i nota Ela, kun gilwenyo ki jo Piliciti.
Ruth 4:20 Daudi oa odiko con oweko rorru bot lagwokone, ci ocako wot otero cam ma giyubo kit macalo Yece ocike kwede oo i gony ma onoŋo mony doŋ cito ka rye i tyen, kun giwayo me lweny.
Ruth 4:21 Ci jo Icrael ki jo Piliciti gurwayo cok ka romo; mony okemme ki mony wadi.
Ruth 4:22 Daudi oweko jami i ciŋ lagwok jami, ocito i ka ryeyo i mony, ci omoto omegine ducu.
Ruth 4:23 Ka pud tye ka lok kwedgi, ci twon oita mony Lapiliciti me Gat ma nyiŋe Goliac otuc ka maleŋ i nyim mony pa jo Piliciti ma guryeyo, kun loko lok ma rom ki macon ca, ci Daudi owinyo lokke.
Ruth 4:24 Jo Icrael ducu guriŋo laco meno woko ka gunene, ci gubedo ki lworo matek.
Ruth 4:25 Lwak jo Icrael guwacci, “Wuneno dano man ma obino-ni? Ada, en obino ka taro jo Icrael. Ka ŋat mo oneko, kabaka bimiye doko lalonyo madit, dok bimine nyare bene obed dakone, dok bimiyo jo me ot pa wonne pe doŋ giculo mucoro.”
Ruth 4:26 Daudi owaco bot jo ma gucuŋ ka ŋete ni, “Gin aŋo ma gibitimo ka dano mo oneko Lapiliciti-ni, okwanyo kwede cac woko ki i Icrael? Lapiliciti ma pe ŋeyo Lubaŋa-ni aŋa mono, ma myero obed ka taro Lubaŋa makwo-ni?”
Ruth 4:27 Lwak dok gudokke iye lakite acel-lu ni, “Gibitimo dano ma oneko-ni kit meno.”
Ruth 4:28 Ka Eliab omin Daudi maditte owinyo ka loko ki dano, kiniga omake i kome ci owacci, “Piŋo ibino? Iweko romiwa manok-ki i tim bot aŋa? Aŋeyo etteni ki keccwinyi; ibino kany ka neno lweny.”
Ruth 4:29 Daudi ogamo ni, “Atimo gin aŋo kombeddi? Pud aloko aloka keken.”
Ruth 4:30 Oloko ŋeye oneno ka mukene dok oloko lakite acel-lu, Dano ducu dok gudokke iye kit mukwoŋo-ni.
Ruth 4:31 Ka lok ma Daudi obedo ka lokoneni owinnye, gutito bot Caulo; ci Caulo ocwalo kwena olwoŋe.
Ruth 4:481 
Ruth 4:32 Daudi owaco bot Caulo ni “Pe iwek cwiny dano mo opoti pi Lapiliciti-nu, ladit; an abicito ka lweny kwede.”
Ruth 4:33 Caulo owaco bot Daudi ni, “In pe itwero cito ka lweny ki Lapiliciti man, pien in pud latin awobi.”
Ruth 4:34 Ento Daudi ogamo dog Caulo ni, “Ladit, abedo ka kwayo romi pa wora. Ka yam labwor mo obino, nyo ŋuu mukene, ce omako latm romo mo ki i kin romiwa,
Ruth 4:35 aryemo kore ci agoyo, alaro latin romo, akwanyo woko ki i doge. Ka ce otokke otiŋŋe i koma, apoto amako yer tike, agoyo aneko woko.
Ruth 4:36 Ladit, aneko labwor ki ŋuu mukene mapol. Lapilicitini ma pe ŋeyo Lubaŋa bibedo ma rom ki ŋat acel i kingi. Nen, en doŋ otaro nmony pa Lubaŋa makwo woko.”
Ruth 4:37 Daudi dok owacci, “Rwot yam olara ki i lwet ciŋ labwor ki ŋuu mukene: bilara bene ki i ciŋ Lapiliciti man.” Caulo owaco bot Daudi ni, “Citi. Rwot aye obed kwedi!”
Ruth 4:38 Caulo oruko Daudi ki jami lwennye, oruko otaŋ mola i wiye, ka oruke ki koti mola.
Ruth 4:39 Daudi otweyo pala lucwan pa Cauloi wi jami lwennye, otemo wot kwede me noŋo, pien pe oŋiyo wot kwede. Ci owaco bot Caulo ni “An pe atwero wot ki man ducu pien pe aŋiyo kwede.” Olunyogi woko,
Ruth 4:40 ka okwanyo odoone omako i ciŋe, ci oyero litino gweŋi abic muluŋŋe mapwot ki i laora kulu, opikogi i opiro kwatte, ma en kicaane; omako latandiyone i ciŋe, ka onyiko cok bot Lapiliciti. Daudi oloyo Goliac
Ruth 4:41 Lapiliciti obino onyiko cok ki Daudi ki latin kwotte i nyime.
Ruth 4:42 Ka Lapiliciti oneno kom Daudi, ci otuki cayone woko, pien onoŋo pud latin awobi, kome kwar, dano ma neno mwonya.
Ruth 4:43 Owaco bot Daudi ni, “An adoko gwok bo, mumiyo ilima ki odoo-ni?” Ka ocako ceno Daudi ki nyiŋ lwak lubaŋane.
Ruth 4:44 Lapiliciti dok owaco bot Daudi ni, “Bin bota ci abimiyo riŋo komi bot winyo me polo ki bot ŋuu ma i tim.”
Ruth 4:45 Daudi bene owaco bot Lapiliciti ni, “In ibino bota ki pala lucwan ki toŋ ki toŋ alwiro, ento an abino boti i nyiŋ Rwot me mony, i nyiŋ Lubaŋa me mony pa jo Icrael ma ibedo ka tarone-ni.
Ruth 4:46 Tin Rwot bimiyo in i ciŋa, abireti woko piny, ci aŋolo wii woko; dok abimiyo kom lumony pa Lupiliciti ma guto tin bot winyo me polo ki bot ŋuu ma wi lobo, wek lobo ducu oneni, Lubaŋa tye i Icrael,
Ruth 4:482 
Ruth 4:47 dok wek lwak man guŋe ni, Rwot pe laro dano ki pala lucwan kadi ki toŋ, pien lweny Rwot aye ma loyo gire, ci en bimiyowu i ciŋwa.”
Ruth 4:48 Lapiliciti oa obino ka romo ki Daudi, ci Daudi oriŋo oyotoyot i nyim mony ma orye i tyen pi romo ki Lapiliciti.
Ruth 4:49 Orwako ciŋe i opirone, okwanyo lagwen, obayo, ocelo tur nyim Goliac. Lagwen odonyo woko i tur nyime ci opoto piny aryeba cwiny.
Ruth 4:50 Kit meno Daudi oloyo Goliac ki lataŋdiyo ki lagwen, ocelo, oneko woko. Pala lucwan onoŋo pe i ciŋ Daudi.
Ruth 4:51 Oriŋo, ocuŋ i wi Goliac, owoto pala lucwan pa Goliac ki i akurane, oneke kwede, ka oŋolo kwede wiye woko. Ka jo Piliciti guneno ni twon oita monygi oto, ci guriŋo woko.
Ruth 4:52 Lwak jo Icrael ki Juda gutwarre ki oduru gulubo kor jo Piliciti nio wa i Gat, ki i dog gaŋ me Ekron. Omiyo Lupiliciti ma ret omakogi gupoto woko i dog yo cakke ki i Caaraim o wa i Gat ki Ekron.
Ruth 4:53 Lacen jo Icrael gucako dwogo cen ki ka ryemo Lupiliciti, ci guyako gonygi.
Ruth 4:54 Daudi okwanyo wi Goliac okelo i Jerucalem, ento oketo jami lwennye I kemane. Ginyuto Daudi bot Caulo
Ruth 4:55 Ka Caulo oneno ka Daudi cito ka lweny ki Goliac, ci openyo Abneri ma ladit wi monnye ni, “Abneri, latin awobi-ni wod pa aŋa?” Abneri ogamo doge ni, “Macalo in ikwo-ni, kabaka, pe aŋeyo.”
Ruth 4:56 Kabaka dok owacci, “Peny pi awobi-ni, ni en wod pa aŋa?”
Ruth 4:57 Ka Daudi odwogo ki ka neko Lapiliciti, ci Abneri okwanye otere i nyim Caulo, ki wi Goliac i ciŋe.
Ruth 4:58 Caulo openye ni, “In wod pa aŋa, latin awobi?” Daudi odok iye ni, “An a wod pa laticci Yece ma Labeterekem.”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 18 Yonacan ocikke ki Daudi
Ruth 4:1 Ka doŋ Daudi otyeko lok ki Caulo, ci tipo kom Yonacan omoko i kom Daudi matek, omare macalo tipo kome kene.
Ruth 4:2 Caulo otero Daudi i nino meno, pe dok oweke odok i gaŋ pa wonne.
Ruth 4:3 Yonacan dok oketp gicikke ki Daudi, pien onoŋo mare macalo tipo kome kene.
Ruth 4:4 Olunyo jorre woko ki i kome, omiyo bot Daudi kacel ki jami lwennye, wa pala lucwanne bene ki atum aterone ki del pyere.
Ruth 4:483 
Ruth 4:5 Ka ma Caulo ooro Daudi iye ducu co cito, tiyo maber, mumiyo Caulo okete oloyo jo me mony. Ket man oyomo cwiny lwak ducu, dok oyomo cwiny lutic pa Caulo bene. Nyeko ocako mako Caulo i kom Daudi
Ruth 4:6 Ka onoŋo gidwogo i gaŋ paco, i kare ma Daudi dwogo ki ka ma oneko iye Lapiliciti-ni, ci mon gumol woko ki i gaŋi ducu ma i Icrael ma kun giwero, gimyelo pi jolo kabaka Caulo ki ajaa, ki wer me waya pi yomcwiny, ki jami agoya me wer.
Ruth 4:7 I tukogi mon giwero kun gileyo aleya ni, “Caulo oneko mere dano alip, ento Daudi oneko alip apar.”
Ruth 4:8 Lok man ocwero cwiny Caulo, kiniga omake matek twatwal. Owacci, “Ma gubedo ka waco ni Daudi oneko alip apar, ki tuŋ bota giwaco ni alip keken, gin aŋo mukene ma en dok twero limo? Man odon camo ker.”
Ruth 4:9 Cakke i kare meno, Caulo neno Daudi agaya.
Ruth 4:10 Orwone cen marac oturo ki poto i kom Caulo, ci obedo ka po ki lok i ode, kun onoŋo Daudi goyo opuk i kit me nino ducu. Caulo onoŋo tye ki toŋŋe i ciŋe,
Ruth 4:11 ci obaye ki toŋ, pien obedo ka tamo ni, “Wek acob Daudi, adi woko i kor ot.” Ento Daudi oloye tyen aryo.
Ruth 4:12 Caulo obedo ka lworo Daudi, pien Rwot tye kwede, ento Rwot onoŋo oa woko ki bot Caulo.
Ruth 4:13 Caulo okwanyo Daudi woko ki i nyime, okete me bedo ladit lalo dano alip; ci obedo ka telo nyim lwak ka gicito i mony.
Ruth 4:14 Gin ducu ma Daudi tiyo en cobo maber, pien Rwot tye kwede.
Ruth 4:15 Ka Caulo oneno ni gin ducu ma Daudi tiyo cobo maber twatwal, ci obedo ka lwore.
Ruth 4:16 Ento Jo Icrael ki jo Juda ducu gumaro Daudi pien obedo ka telo rryimgi ka ma giwoto iye ducu. Daudi onyomo nya pa Caulo
Ruth 4:17 Caulo dok owaco bot Daudi ni, “Atye ki nyara madit Merab ene; abimiye boti obed dakoni. Bed oteka lwennya keken, kun ilwenyo matek pi Rwot.” Caulo onoŋo tamo ni, “Wek ciŋa pe opot i kome, wek ciŋ jo Piliciti aye opot i kome.”
Ruth 4:18 Daudi owaco ni, “An aŋa, ki kwarina jo mene, ki doggola pa kwaragi gin aŋa-gi i kin jo Icrael, ma miyo abedo cwar nya pa kabaka-ni?”
Ruth 4:19 Ento i kare ma kono gimi Merab nya pa Caulo bot Daudi, dok gimiyo bot Adriel ma jo Mekola pi bedo dakone.
Ruth 4:484 
Ruth 4:20 Mikal nya pa Caulo dok omaro Daudi, Ka gitito bot Caulo, lokke oyomo iye.
Ruth 4:21 Caulo onoŋo otamo ni, “Wek amiye bot Daudi, wek obed owic me make, wek ciŋ jo Piliciti aye opot i kome.” Mumiyo Caulo dok owaco bot Daudi tyen me aryo ni, “In doŋ ibibedo cwar nyara.”
Ruth 4:22 Caulo oloko ki luticce bene, ocikogi ni, “Wulok ki Daudi i muŋ ni, ‘Nen, cwiny kabaka yom i komi, ki luticce ducu gimari; doŋ ibed cwar nya pa kabaka.’ “
Ruth 4:23 Lutic pa kabaka guwacce lok meno ducu. Daudi ogamo ni, “Lok me doko cwar nya pa kabaka nen botwu ni tidi mono, kun an lacan, peya aywek?”
Ruth 4:24 Lutic pa Caulo gutito bote lok ma Daudi odwoko.
Ruth 4:25 Dok Caulo owaco lok ni, “Wubiwaco bot Daudi ni, ‘Kabaka pe mito lim me nyom. En mito del kom nyim jo Piliciti me co miya acel, wek icul kwor i kom lumerok pa kabaka.’ ” Onoŋo Caulo otamo ni, jo Piliciti aye myero gunek Daudi.
Ruth 4:26 Ka luticce gutito lok man bot Daudi, bedo cwar nya pa kabaka oyomo cwinye. Ma peya kare ma gimoko okato, ocito ki lwakke,
Ruth 4:27 oneko jo Piliciti miya aryo, odwogo ki del kom nyimgi me co, omiyogi bot kabaka kun mo pe orem, wek odok cwar nya pa kabaka. Caulo omiye nyare Mikal me bedo dakone.
Ruth 4:28 Ento ka Caulo oneno dok oniaŋ maber ni Rwot tye ki Daudi, dok ni jo Icrael ducu gimare,
Ruth 4:29 lworo omako Caulo i kom Daudi makato yam con, mumiyo Caulo obedo lamerok pa Daudi i kare ducu.
Ruth 4:30 Rwodi pa jo Piliciti dok gubino ka lweny, ci i kare ducu ma gibino, noŋo Daudi loyogi maber makato lutic pa Caulo mukene ducu, ma omiyo nyiŋe oywek matek.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 19 Caulo otemo neko Daudi
Ruth 4:1 Caulo ocako loko ki wode Yonacan ki luticce ducu ni myero gunek Daudi woko. Ento cwiny Yonacan wod pa Caulo onoŋo maro Daudi matek.
Ruth 4:2 Yonacan otito bot Daudi ni, “Wora tye ka yenyo yo me neki woko; pienno myero igwok komi diki odiko, bed ma ikanne keni i muŋ.
Ruth 4:3 An abicito i bar, acuŋ i ŋet wora ka ma ikanne iye-ni, ci abiloko piri bot wora; ka aniaŋ lok mo, ci abitito boti.”
Ruth 4:4 Yonacan oloko pi Daudi mamit bot wonne Caulo kun waco ni, “Kabaka, pe itim bal i kom laticci Daudi, pien pe otimo bal mo i komi, obedo ka timmi tic ducu mabeco.
Ruth 4:485 
Ruth 4:5 Yam odyero kwone, oneko Goliac ma Lapiliciti, ci Rwot omiyo jo Icrael oloyo loc madit. Yam ineno, cwinyi obedo yom iye. Piŋo imito timo bal kun ioyo remo pa dano ma pe ki bal, pi neko Daudi noŋo laboŋo tere?”
Ruth 4:6 Caulo owinyo dog wode Yonacan, ci okwoŋo kwoŋ ni, “Macalo Rwot tye makwo- ni, pe doŋ gibineko.”
Ruth 4:7 Yonacan olwoŋo Daudi, otito bote lok meno ducu, ci okelo Daudi bot Caulo, obedo i nyime kit macon.
Ruth 4:8 Lweny dok ocakke. Daudi ocito olwenyo ki jo Piliciti, onekogi mapol, omiyo guriŋo woko.
Ruth 4:9 I kare meno cen marac dok oa ki bot Rwot opoto i kom Caulo, i kare ma en obedo i ode ki toŋŋe i ciŋe, kun Daudi tye ka goyo opuk.
Ruth 4:10 Caulo oyubbe woko me guro Daudi i kor ot ki toŋ; ento Daudi oŋeyo waŋ Caulo woko, omiyo Caulo ocobo kor ot ki toŋŋe. Daudi onno, obwot gire.
Ruth 4:11 I dyewor meno Caulo ocwalo lukwena ka kuro Daudi i ode, wek enek woko odiko, Ento Mikal dako pa Daudi owaco bote ni, “Ka tin dyewor pe igwoko komi, ci gibineki woko diki.”
Ruth 4:12 Kit meno Mikal ocwalo Daudi owok ki i waŋ dirica oriŋo woko obwot gire.
Ruth 4:13 Mikal okwanyo cal apaya opyelo i wi kitanda pa Daudi, ka oketo laten wic me yer dyegi opyelo ka wiye, ka oumo woko ki boŋo.
Ruth 4:14 Ka Caulo ocwalo lukwena me omo Daudi, Mikal owacci, “Kome lit.”
Ruth 4:15 Caulo dok ocwalo lukwena ka neno Daudi kun waco ni, “Wutine ki kitanda wukel bota, wek aneke woko.”
Ruth 4:16 Ka lukwena gudonyo i kicika, ci nen, cal apaya aye tye i wi kitanda, ki laten wic me yer dyegi ka wiye.
Ruth 4:17 Caulo openyo Mikal ni “Piŋo ibwola kit man iweko lamerokka ocito?” Mikal odok iye bot Caulo ni, “Owacca ni, ‘Wek aciti; ka pe, ci aneki woko.’ ”
Ruth 4:18 I kare-nu Daudi oriŋo ci obwot gire, ocito bot Camuel i Rama, otitte gin ducu ma Caulo otimo i kome. Ci en kacel ki Camuel gucito gubedo i Nayot.
Ruth 4:19 Dok gitito bot taulo ni, “Daudi tye i Nayot i Rama.”
Ruth 4:20 Caulo dok ocwalo lukwena ka omo Daudi. Ka lukwena pa Caulo guneno lwak lunebi ma gitito lok pa Lubaŋa, kun Camuel ocuŋ ka telo wigi, ci Cwiny pa Lubaŋa opoto i kom lukwena pa Caulo, gin bene gucako tito lok pa Lubaŋa macalo lunebi.
Ruth 4:21 Ka gitito lokke bot Caulo, ci dok ocwalo lukwena mukene. Gin bene gucako tito lok pa Lubaŋa kit macalo lunebi gitito-ni. Caulo dok ocwalo lukwena tyen me adekke, gin bene gutito lok pa Lubaŋa aye.
Ruth 4:486 
Ruth 4:22 Ka lacen Caulo kikome ocito i Rama, obino ka ma waŋ pii madit tye iye ma tye i Ceku-ni, ci openyo ni, “Camuel ki Daudi gitye kwene?” Ŋat acel owacci, “Gitye i Nayot, i Rama.”
Ruth 4:23 Caulo oa ki kunnu, ocito i Nayot ma i Rama. Cwiny pa Lubaŋa obino opoto i kome bene, obedo ka wot kun tito lok pa Lubaŋa macalo lanebi, kun woto oo kwede wa i Nayot ma i Rama.
Ruth 4:24 En bene ocako lunyo boŋone woko, otito lok pa Lubaŋa macalo lanebi i nyim Camuel. Obuto munero i nino meno dyeceŋ ki dyewor benebene. Mumiyo giwacci, “Caulo bene tye i kin lunebi?”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 20 Yonacan okonyo Daudi
Ruth 4:1 Daudi olwi oriŋo woko ki i Nayot ma i Rama, ocito bot Yonacan owacci, “An atimo gin aŋo? Aroco gin aŋo? Abalo gin aŋo i nyim woru mumiyo en mito neka- ni?”
Ruth 4:2 Yonacan ogamo ni, “Meno pe twero timme! Pe myero ito. Nen; wora pe tiyo gin mo madit nyo matidi ma pe otito bota; ci lok aŋo ma miyo wora munna lok man? Pe tye kit meno.”
Ruth 4:3 Ento Daudi odok iye ni, “Woru ŋeyo maber ni doŋ ayomo cwinyi; dok en tamo ni, ‘Pe giwek Yonacan oŋe lok man, wek pe obed ki kumo.’ Ento me adane, macalo Rwot tye makwo, dok macalo tiponi bene tye makwo-ni, an ki to kinwa doŋ cok.”
Ruth 4:4 Yonacan dok owaco bot Daudi ni, “Gin ducu ma iwaco abitiyo piri.”
Ruth 4:5 Daudi ogamo dog Yonacan ni, “Nen, dwe diki por; pe myero bedo ki kabaka i dog cam oloya. Ento wek koŋ aciti, acikanne woko i bar nio Wa i nino me adekke wi otyeno.
Ruth 4:6 Ka woru openyo pira, ci iwac ni, ‘Daudi openya matek ni giyene me cito wa i gaŋgi Beterekem oyoto, pien timo gitum tye ma bedo kunnu i doggolagi mwaka ki mwaka.’
Ruth 4:7 Ka ce ogamo ni, ‘Ber!’ ci abibedo maber; ento ka obedo ki kiniga, ci ber iŋe ni tim marac doŋ otyeko mo ko i cwinye.
Ruth 4:8 Mumiyo in itima ber, pien doŋ iketo gicikke maleŋ i kin in ki an. Ento ka roc mo tye i koma, ci in kikomi aye ineka. Piŋo iweko apoto i ciŋ woru?”
Ruth 4:9 Yonacan ogamo ni, “Pe twero timme i komi! Ka ce aŋeyo ni tim marac doŋ otyeko moko i cwiny wora, ci pe atito boti?”
Ruth 4:10 Daudi dok owaco bot Yonacan ni, “Aŋa mono ma doŋ bititta ka woru ogammi lok taro?”
Ruth 4:487 
Ruth 4:11 Yonacan owaco bot Daudi ni, “Bin wek wacit i bar.” Ci gin aryo ducu gucito i bar.
Ruth 4:12 Yonacan owaco bot Daudi ni, “Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael obed caden i kinwa! Ka doŋ atyeko ŋeyo tam pa wora, diki ka onyoo, nyo i nino me adekke, nen, ka tamme ber i komi in Daudi, ci abicwalo lok atito boti.
Ruth 4:13 Ento ka wora mito timi marac, Rwot myero oket can i koma kit meno ki makato bene ka pe atito lokke boti ci acwali woko cen wek icit giri maber. Rwot aye obed kwedi kit ma yam obedo ki wora-ni.
Ruth 4:14 Ka ce pud atye makwo, ci ibed kweda ki mar pa Rwot ma pe lokke-ni, wek pe ato.
Ruth 4:15 Dok pe ikwany marri woko ki i kom jo me oda matwal. Ka ce Rwot bikwanyo lumerokki ducu ki i lobo,
Ruth 4:16 pe iwek gicikkewa wan kwedi gitur. Ka ce gituro, Rwot biculo kwor i komi.”
Ruth 4:17 Ci Yonacan dok omiyo Daudi okwoŋo kwoŋ kun ocikke kwede pi mare, pien Yonacan onoŋo maro Daudi kit ma maro kwede tipo kome kekene.
Ruth 4:18 Yonacan dok owaco bot Daudi ni, “Dwe por diki. In doŋ ibibedo pe, kom bedoni bidoŋ noŋo.
Ruth 4:19 I nino me adekke gibipenyi matek; in doŋ icit, i kabedo ma yam ikanne iye i kare ma lok gilaro ci ibed i ŋet got ma giguro-ni.
Ruth 4:20 An abibayo atero adek ka ŋete ma nen calo abecelo gin mo.
Ruth 4:21 Nen, abicwalo latin awobi kun awacci, ‘Cit ka yenyo atero.’ Ka ce awaco bot latin awobi-nu ni, ‘Nen, atero tye tuŋ boti kany, putgi woko,’ ci in ibidwogo, pien macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, noŋo gin mo pe ma timi marac.
Ruth 4:22 Ento ka awaco bot awobi ni, ‘Nen atero tye wa i nyimi kuca,’ ci pe idwogi, pien noŋo Rwot aye ocwali woko cen.
Ruth 4:23 Dok lok ma in ki an watyeko lokone, nen, Rwot tye i kin in ki an matwal.”
Ruth 4:24 Kumeno Daudi okanne woko i bar, Ka dwe opor, ci kabaka obedo piny ka cam.
Ruth 4:25 Obedo i komme me nino ducu ma cok ki kor ot, ka Yonacan bedo kemo kabaka, ki Abneri dok bedo ka ŋet Caulo, ento kabedo pa Daud i tye noŋo.
Ruth 4:26 Caulo pe oloko iye gin mo i nino meno, pien otamo ni, “Gin mo opoto i kome, omiyo pe etye ma elonnye, pe tye ma elonnye ada.”
Ruth 4:27 Ento i nino me aryone, orwone i nino mulubo por dwe, kom bedo pa Daudi obedo noŋo, ci Caulo ocako penyo wode Yonacan ni, “Piŋo wod pa Yece pe obino ka cam, cakke wa laworo ki tin bene?”
Ruth 4:488 
Ruth 4:28 Yonacan ogamo dog Caulo ni, “Daudi openya matek ni giyene me cito Beterekem.
Ruth 4:29 Olego ni, ‘Wek aciti, pien jo me doggolawa gitye ka tumo gitum i gaŋ, omera ociko ni abed kunnu. Kombeddi, ka gum omaka i nyimi, ci wek aciti, acinen omegina.’ Pi lok meno omiyo en pe obino i dog cam boti, kabaka.”
Ruth 4:30 Kiniga otugi mako Caulo i kom Yonacan cut. Owaco bote ni, “In i wod pa dako ma ŋute oteŋ, ma lajemo; pe Onoŋo an doŋ aŋeyo ni cwinyi otyeko maro wod pa Yece, ma lewicce bimaki giri, ma lewicce bimako wa meni bene?
Ruth 4:31 Pien Kitma wod pa Yece bedo kwede i wi lobo-ni, kadi in nyo kerri pe bimoko matwal. Pienno cwal dano wek okele bota, pien en bi to ada.”
Ruth 4:32 Yonacan ogamo dog wonne Caulo ni, “Gibineke woko pi gin aŋo? Otimo gin aŋo?”
Ruth 4:33 Ento Caulo obaye ki toŋ, mumiyo Yonacan oŋeyo ni cwiny wonne otyeko moko pi neko Daudi.
Ruth 4:34 Yonacan oa woko ki i dog cam ki kiniga madwoŋ, ci pe dok ocamo cam mo i nino dwe me aryone, pien cwinye obedo ka kumo pi Daudi, pien wonne onoŋo oyeto Daudi.
Ruth 4:35 Orwone Yonacan ocito i bar ka ma ocikke iye ki Daudi, kacel ki latin awobi mo.
Ruth 4:36 Owaco bot awobine ni, “Riŋ iciput atero, ma abibayo-ni.” Ka awobi-nu oberiŋo, ci obayo atero ocuŋ wa i nyime.
Ruth 4:37 Ka latin awobi-nu oo ka ma Yonacan obayo iye atero-ni, Yonacan olwoŋo awobi-nu kun wacci, “Atero tye wa i nyimi kuca.”
Ruth 4:38 Dok olwoŋo awobi-nu kun wacci, “Rune itim oyoto, pe iru!” Awobi pa Yonacan ocoko atero ducu, odwogo kwedgi bot laditte.
Ruth 4:39 Ento awobi pe oŋeyo iye gin mo; kono Yonacan ki Daudi aye giŋeyo lokke.
Ruth 4:40 Yonacan omiyo jamine ducu bot awobine, ocike ni, “Doŋ icit, idwokgi wa gaŋ.”
Ruth 4:41 Ka awobi ocito, ci Daudi otugi a malo ki i ŋet got ma giguro-ni, opoto i ŋom aryeba cwiny, okulo wiye piny k idek, Gucako noto lemgi kekengi ki mot me mar, ka gukok ki pig waŋgi kekengi ento Daudi aye obedo ki kumo madwoŋ.
Ruth 4:42 Yonacan dok owaco bot Daudi ni, “Cit giri ki kuc, macalo doŋ watyeko kwoŋo kwoŋ kekenwa i nyiŋ Rwot, kun wawacci, ‘Rwot bibedo i kin an ki in, ki i kin likwaya ki likwayi matwal.’ ” Ka lacen Daudi oa opokke kwede, ci Yonacan odok i gaŋ.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 21 Daudi oriŋo woko ki bot Caulo
Ruth 4:489 
Ruth 4:1 Daudi ocito i Nob bot Akimelek ma ajwaka pa Lubaŋa, Akimelek obino ka jolo wi Daudi ki myelkom kun penye ni, “Piŋo it ye keni ma ŋat acel mo pe kacel kwedi?”
Ruth 4:2 Daudi ogamo dog ajwaka Akimelek ni, “Kabaka ocika ki lok mo kun waco bota ni, ‘Pe iwek ŋatti mo oŋe lok ma acwali pire-ni, ki lok ma aciki kwede.’ Pienno doŋ acikke ki jona pi kabedo ma abirwatte iye kwedgi.
Ruth 4:3 Kombeddi it ye ki gin aŋo i ciŋi? Miya mugati abic, nyo gin mo keken ma tye boti.”
Ruth 4:4 Ajwaka odok iye bot Daudi ni, “Pe tye mugati mo me nino ducu-ni i ciŋa, ento atye ki mugati maleŋ, Ka ce gin awobeni gupokke woko ki mon i kin kare-ni, atwero mini.”
Ruth 4:5 Daudi ogamo dog ajwaka ni, “Me adane, mon gipokke woko kwedwa kare ducu ka wacito ka mo, ki kom awobe gibedo leŋ kadi bed wot me nino ducu. Pe myero komgi obed leŋ makato tin ma wacito i lok ma pire tek-k i?”
Ruth 4:6 Kit meno ajwaka omine mugati maleŋ; pien onoŋo mugati mo pe bote, kono mugati me aketa i nyim Lubaŋa keken, en aye gikwanyo ki i nyim Rwot, ma gidwoko waŋe ki mugati manyen ma pud lyet i nino meno kikome ma gikwanyo- ni.
Ruth 4:7 Laco mo ma i kin lutic pa Caulo onoŋo tye kunnu i nino meno, obedo ka dikke i nyim Rwot, Nyiŋe Doeg, Laedom, ma ladit pa lukwat pa Caulo.
Ruth 4:8 Daudi dok owaco bot Akimelek ni, “Itye ki pala lucwan nyo toŋ mo kany? Pe akelo kadi pala lucwan kadi wa jami lweny mo, pien or pa kabaka obedo rucurucu.”
Ruth 4:9 Ajwaka ogamo kun wacci, “Pala lucwan pa Goliac ma Lapiliciti ma yam ineko i nota Ela tye kany, Nen, tye ma giboyo kome woko ki boŋo giketo i ŋe epod. En ene; ka imito terone, ter do, pien mukene pe, ennu keken tye kany.” Daudi owacci, “Pe tye mo ma rom ki meno; mina do.”
Ruth 4:10 Daudi oa woko ki kunnu i nino meno kun riŋo ki bot Caulo, ocito bot Akic, kabaka me Gat.
Ruth 4:11 Lutic pa Akic guwaco bote ni, “Man aye Daudi ma kabaka me lobo-ni. Yam giwere kun mon gimyelo kwede ma giwero ni, ‘Caulo oneko mere dano alip, ento Daudi oneko alip apar.’ ”
Ruth 4:12 Daudi okano lok meno i cwinye, ci obedo ki lworo madwoŋ i kom Akic, kabaka me Gat.
Ruth 4:13 Oloko kit bedone i nyimgi pi lworo, ocako banne woko i ciŋgi macalo lapoya, obedo ka goro kom kika me doggola ma i dog gaŋ, kun oweko laa doge mol i tike.
Ruth 4:14 Akic owaco bot luticce ni, “Nenu, laco-ni lapoya; piŋo dok wukelo bota kany?
Ruth 4:490 
Ruth 4:15 An can lupoya omaka bo, mumiyo wukelo laco man ka nyuto apoyane i nyima? Wumito laco man odony wa i oda?”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 22 Gineko ajwagi pa Lubaŋa
Ruth 4:1 Daudi oa woko ki kunnu, ocito i boro got ma tye Adulam. Ka omegine guwinyo pire, ki jo mukene me doggola pa kwarogi, gucito bote.
Ruth 4:2 Wa ki dano ducu ma can odiŋogi ki dano ma gucamo banya, ki dano ma piny oloyogi, gucokke botgi, en odoko ladit ma loyogi, obedo ki dano ma cok romo miya aŋwen.
Ruth 4:3 Daudi oa ki kunnu, ocito i Mijpe ma i lobo Moab. Owaco bot kabaka me Moab ni, “Alegi iwek wora ki maa gubed boti, nio ka abiŋeyo gin ma Lubaŋa bitiyo i koma.”
Ruth 4:4 Owekogi bot kabaka me Moab, ci gubedo kwede i kare ducu ma Daudi tye ka kanne i godi.
Ruth 4:5 Lanebi Gad dok owaco bot Daudi ni, “Pe ibed ka kanne i godi, A woko, icit i lobo Juda.” Mumiyo Daudi oa woko ki kunnu, ocito i buŋa Keret.
Ruth 4:6 Caulo onoŋo bedo i Gibea, i te yat anaŋa ma i kabedo mutiŋŋe malo. Cen mo ka obedo kunnu ki toŋŋe i ciŋe, kun luticce ducu gucuŋ cok kwede, owinyo ni ginoŋo kom Daudi ki jo ma gitye kwede.
Ruth 4:7 Owaco bot luticce ma gucuŋ i ŋete ni, “Tin wuwiny, wun jo pa Benjamin, Wutamo ni wod pa Yece bimiyo poto me apura bot ŋat acel acel i kinwu, ki poto olok? En biketowu ducu wubedo lulo dano alip nyo lulo dano miya,
Ruth 4:8 mumiyo wun ducu wupiro lok i koma? Pe tye ŋat mo mutito bota ni woda ocikke ki wod pa Yece. Pe tye ŋat mo ma cwinye cwer pira. Ŋat mo pe mutitta ni woda orubo cwiny dano ma yam laticca wek oliba, macalo i nino man.”
Ruth 4:9 Doeg ma Laedom ogamo doge ki ka ma ocuŋ iye ka ŋet lutic pa Caulo, owacci, “An aye aneno wod pa Yece ka ocito Nob bot Akimelek wod pa Akitub,
Ruth 4:10 ci Akimelek openyo dog Rwot pire, dok omiye cam, ki pala lucwan pa Goliac ma Lapiliciti.”
Ruth 4:11 Kabaka ocwalo kwena pi lwoŋo ajwaka Akimelek wod pa Akitub ki ludoggola pa kwarone ducu, gin ajwagi pa Lubaŋa ducu ma gitye i Nob; ci gin ducu gubino bot kabaka.
Ruth 4:12 Caulo owaco ni, “Doŋ iwiny, in wod pa Akitub.” En ogamo ni, “An atye ene, rwoda.”
Ruth 4:13 Caulo openye ni, “Piŋo wupiro lok i koma, in ki wod pa Yece, dok imine cam ki pala lucwan, ka ipenyo dog Rwot pire, omiyo obino ka lweny i koma ki ka liba, macalo en tye ka timo i kare-ni?”
Ruth 4:491 
Ruth 4:14 Akimelek ogamo dog ka baka ni, “Kabaka, aŋa ma i kin luticci ma lagen macalo Daudi, ma obedo oru bene, dok ladit pa lugwok kwoni, dano ma giworo mada i odi?
Ruth 4:15 Tin aye tyen mukwono ma apenyo kwede dog Lubaŋa pire? Pe kumeno, ladit kabaka, Pe itam lok mo marac i koma nyo i kom jo me doggola pa kwarona, Pe aŋeyo lok mo wacel i kom lok ma iwaco-ni.”
Ruth 4:16 Kabaka owacce ni, “Ibito ada, Akimelek, in kacel ki jo me doggolawu ducu.”
Ruth 4:17 Ci kabaka owaco bot dano ma gigwoke ma gucuŋ cok kwede ni, “Wunek ajwagi pa Rwot woko, pien guribo ciŋgi ki Daudi. Giŋeyo ni olwi woko, ci pe gutito bota.” Ento lutic pa ka baka gukwero gudo kom ajwagi pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:18 Kabaka dok owaco bot Doeg ma Laedom ni, “In aye inek ajwagi-ni.” Ci Doeg ma Laedom oneko ajwagi ducu. I nino meno oneko dano pyeraboro wiye abic ma giromo ruko epod me boŋo camanini ma ajwagi pa Lubaŋa giruko-ni.
Ruth 4:19 Caulo dok omiyo gineko dano ducu ma i Nob ma gaŋ pa ajwagi; gityekogi woko ducu ki pala lucwan, co wa ki mon, litino ki litino lukere ma pud dot, kacel ki twoni dyaŋi ki kana ki romi-gu.
Ruth 4:20 Ento ŋat acel ki i kin awobe pa Akimelek wod pa Akitub obwot, nyiŋe Abiatar. Oriŋo olubo kor Daudi,
Ruth 4:21 ci otito bote ni, Caulo otyeko neko ajwagi pa Rwot woko.
Ruth 4:22 Daudi owaco bot Abiatar ni, “Onoŋo yam aŋeyo lokke wa i nino ma aneno Doeg ma Laedom kunnu. I nino-nu yam aniaŋ ni bitito bot Caulo ada. An aye akelo to man i kom doggola pa kwarowu.
Ruth 4:23 Doŋ ibed kweda, pe ilwor, pien ŋat ma mito neka noŋo mito neki bene. Ka ibedo kweda abigwoki maber.”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 23 Daudi obedo i Keila
Ruth 4:1 I kare ca gitito bot Daudi ni “lo Piliciti gitye ka lweny i kom jo Keila, gitye ka yako kalgi woko ki i laro moyo.”
Ruth 4:2 Pienno Daudi openyo dog Rwot ni, “Acit ilweny i kom jo Piliciti meno?” Rwot ogamo dog Daudi ni, “Cit icilweny i kom jo Piliciti wek ilar jo Keila.”
Ruth 4:3 Ento jo pa Daudi guwaco bote ni, “Nen, kany i Juda wabedo ki lworo madwoŋ, Pe bedo rac mada ka dok wacito i Keila ka lweny ki mony pa jo Piliciti?”
Ruth 4:4 Ci Daudi dok openyo dog Rwot. Rwot owaco bote ni, “A malo, icit i Keila pien abimiyo jo Piliciti i ciŋi.”
Ruth 4:492 
Ruth 4:5 Daudi kijone gucito i Keila, gulwenyo i kom jo Piliciti, gudwogo cen ki dyaŋigi, ma onoŋo guneko lwak jo mapol i komgi. Daudi olaro jo Keila kit meno.
Ruth 4:6 Ka Abiatar wod pa Akimelek oriŋo bot Daudi i Keila, ocito ki epod i ciŋe.
Ruth 4:7 Dok gitito bot Caulo ni Daudi doŋ ocito i Keila. Caulo ogamo ni, “Lubaŋa doŋ otyeko miye woko i ciŋa, pien odonyo i gaŋ ma tye ki doggola ma gicego ki rii, ci oloro iye wiye kekene.”
Ruth 4:8 Caulo olwoŋo lwak ducu ka lweny wek gucit i Keila ka rumo wi Daudi ki jone kunnu.
Ruth 4:9 Daudi oniaŋ ni Caulo tye ka piro lok marac i kome, ci owaco bot ajwaka Abiatar ni, “Kel epod kany.”
Ruth 4:10 Ci Daudi olego ni, “Ai Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, awinyo ni Caulo tye ka yenyo yo me bi no Keila wek etyek gaŋ man woko pira.
Ruth 4:11 Ci doŋ apenyo ni, jo Keila gibimiya i ciŋ Caulo? Caulo bibino, kit ma awinyoni? Ai Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, abako doga boti, titta ba. Rwot owaco bote ni, ‘En bibino.’ “
Ruth 4:12 Daudi dok openyo ni, “Jo Keila gibimiya ki jona i cin Caulo?” Rwot ogamo ni, “Gibimiyi bote.”
Ruth 4:13 Ci Daudi ki jo ma gitye bote ma giromo miya abicel gua woko ki i Keila, guket, gucito ka ma giromo wot iye. Ka dok gitito bot Caulo ni, Daudi doŋ oriŋo woko ki i Keila, ci pe doŋ ocito kunnu.
Ruth 4:14 Daudi obedo i kakannene i dye tim, i lobo godi ma i tim Jip. Caulo obedo ka yenye jwijwi, ento Lubaŋa pe omiye i ciŋe. Daudi obedo i tim i lobo godi
Ruth 4:15 Daudi obedo ki lworo pien onoŋo Caulo tye ka yenye me aneka. I kare ca onoŋo. Daudi obedo i Korec ma tye i tim Jip,
Ruth 4:16 ci Yonacan wod pa Caulo obino bote, ojiŋo cwinye i nyiŋ Lubaŋa kun waco bote ni,
Ruth 4:17 “Pe ilwor, pien ciŋ wora pe bipoto i komi. Ibibedo kabaka ma loyo Icrael, an abibedo lalub kori. Wora Caulo bene ŋeyo kumeno.”
Ruth 4:18 Ci gin aryo ducu guketo gicikkegi i nyim Rwot. Lacen Daudi odoŋ i Korec, ci Yonacan odok paco.
Ruth 4:19 Jo Jip gucito bot Caulo i Gibea, guwaco bote ni, “Daudi tye i kakannene i kinwa, i Kortec, i kom got Kakila ma i Jecimon yo tuŋ acuc.
Ruth 4:20 In kabaka bin doŋ, kit macalo cwinyi mito bino-ni, ci wan aye wabimiye i ciŋi.”
Ruth 4:21 Caulo ogamo ni, “Rwot aye omiwu gun pien kica omakowu i koma.
Ruth 4:493 
Ruth 4:22 Wun wucit ka penyo kakare maber wek wuŋe kabedo ma en bedo iye, ki ŋat munene kunne; pien gitta ni en kwiri mada.
Ruth 4:23 Koŋ wucinen, wuŋi kabedo ducu ma en maro kanne iye, wek wudwog ma donŋ wuniaŋ atir. Ka doŋ abicito kunnu kacel kwedwu. Tekke en tye i lobo man ka mo, ci abiyenye ki i kin kaka ducu ma gitye i Juda.”
Ruth 4:24 Ci gua gukwoŋo nyim Caulo gucito i Jip. I kare-nu onoŋo Daudi ki jone gitye i Maon, i Araba cok ki Jecimon, yo tuŋ acuc.
Ruth 4:25 Caulo ocito kacel ki jone ka yenye, ento gitito bot Daudi, omiyo ocito obedo i luŋ matut i kin godi ma i tim Maon. Ka Caulo owinyo pire, ci olubo kor Daudi wa kunnu.
Ruth 4:26 Caulo woto rabo ŋet luŋ tuŋcel kun Daudi ki jone onoŋo girabo ŋet luŋ tuŋcel. Daudi orune me a woko ki ka ŋet Caulo, pien onoŋo jo pa Caulo ginyiko cok ki Daudi ki jone wek gimakgi woko.
Ruth 4:27 Ci lakwena mo dok obino bot Caulo ma wacci, “Rune ibin oyoto, pien jo Piliciti gubino ka monyo lobo.”
Ruth 4:28 Caulo oa woko ki ka lubo kor Daudi, ociko ka lweny ki jo Piliciti; mumiyo gicato nyiŋ kabedo-nu ni, Got me Pokke.
Ruth 4:29 Daudi oa ki kunnu, ocito obedo i En-gedi i kakannene.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 24 Daudi oweko Caulo obwot i En-gedi
Ruth 4:1 Ka Caulo odwogo ki ka lubo kor jo Piliciti, ci gitito bote ni, “Daudi tye i tim En- gedi.”
Ruth 4:2 Caulo ocoko dano alip adek ma giyerogi ki i kin jo Icraelducu, ci ocito kwedgi ka yenyo Daudi i nyim godi Ladyel-tim.
Ruth 4:3 Ocito ka ma dwol romi tye tye i ŋet yo, ka ma boro bene tye iye; ci Caulo oŋak woko i boro ka konnye. Onoŋo Daudi ki jone bene gitye i boro meno, wa i tyelone.
Ruth 4:4 Jo pa Daudi guwacce ni, “Tin aye nino ma yam Rwot owacci pire ni, ‘Nen abimiyo lamerokki i ciŋi, in doŋ ibitime kit ma imito.’ ” Daudi oa malo okwalle, ci oŋolo dog boŋo jor pa Caulo.
Ruth 4:5 Lacen cwiny Daudi opoto, pien oniaŋ ni etimo bal.
Ruth 4:6 Ci owaco bot jone ni, “Lubaŋa okwero ni pe atim kit gin macalo man i kom rwoda ma en dano ma Rwot owiro; pe myero aket ciŋa i kome, pien Rwot doŋ owire woko.”
Ruth 4:7 Daudi ojuko jone ki lok meno, ci pe oye ni gulweny i kom Caulo. Caulo oa molo, oa woko ki i boro got, omedde ki wotte.
Ruth 4:494 
Ruth 4:8 Lacen Daudi bene oa malo, ocito i dog boro, olwoŋo Caulo kun wacci, “Rwoda ki kabakana!” Ka Caulo oneno ŋeye, ci Daudi okulo wiye piny i ŋom, omiye woro.
Ruth 4:9 Daudi owaco bot Caulo ni, “Laditta, piŋo ibedo ka winyo lok pa jo ma ŋiwaco ni atye ka yenyi wek atimi rac?
Ruth 4:10 Nen, ka tin Rwot omiyi i ciŋa i boro man, kun onoŋo jo mukene guwaco bota ni aneki woko. Ento an aye aweki omiyo ibwot. Awacci pe atwero keto ciŋa i komi, rwoda, pien in dano ma Rwot owiro.
Ruth 4:11 Doŋ inen, wora, nen dog jorri i ciŋa en. Nen, aŋolo dog jorri ci pe aneki. Myero doŋ iŋe dok inen atir ni, pe atye ki gin mo marac nyo roro mo i cwinya. Pe atimo bal mo i komi, kadi ka itye ka yenya ma imito neka woko.
Ruth 4:12 Ber Rwot aye oŋol kop i kin an ki in, ber Rwot aye ocul kworra i komi; ento ciŋa pe bigudo komi.
Ruth 4:13 Kit ma carolok pa ludoŋo wacci, ‘Bal nywalo bal wadi;’ ento pe abiketo can i komi.
Ruth 4:14 In kabaka pa Icrael kulu ibino ka lubo kor aŋa? Ilubo kor gwok muto, kor ladep mamwa-ni!
Ruth 4:15 Peinno Rwot aye doŋ obed laŋolkop en oŋol i kin an ki in, onen kite, dok opid ma kakara, wek olara ki i ciŋi.”
Ruth 4:16 Ka Daudi otyeko waco lok meno ducu bot Caulo. Caulo openyo ni, “Meno dwani bo, Daudi, latinna?” Ci ocako koko kun waco bot Daudi ni,
Ruth 4:17 “In cwinyi leŋ kato cwinya woko, pien itima maber kun an atimi marac.
Ruth 4:18 Tin doŋ inyuto woko ka maleŋ kit ma itima kwede maber, en aye omiyo pe ineka i kare ma Rwot omiya woko i ciŋi.
Ruth 4:19 Ada, ka dano mo onoŋo kom lamerokke owec, ci biweko bwot ma pe opoto i kome? Myero Rwot omini mot maber, kit macalo tin itimo kwede i koma-ni.
Ruth 4:20 Tin doŋ aŋeyo ada ni, in ibibedo kabaka, dok ker me Icrael bimoko matek i ciŋi.
Ruth 4:21 Doŋ ikwonna kwoŋ ki nyiŋ Rwot ni, pe ibijwero likwayo ma gilubo ŋeya woko, dok pe ibijwayo nyiŋa woko ki i doggola pa kwara.”
Ruth 4:22 Daudi okwoŋo kwoŋ kit ma Caulo omito-ni, Lacen Caulo odok paco, ento Daudi ki jone gudok i kakannegi.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 25 Daudi ki Abigail
Ruth 4:1 Ka Camuel oto, ci jo Icrael ducu gucokke, gukumo pire, ci giyike i gaŋŋe ma i Rama. Lacen Daudi dok oa ocito i tim Paran.
Ruth 4:495 
Ruth 4:2 Laco mo onoŋo tye kunnu i Maon, ma tiyo ticce i Karmel. Lacone lalonyo mada; tye ki romi alip adek ki dyegi alip acel. I kare ca en obedo ka ŋolo yer romine i Karmel.
Ruth 4:3 Nyiŋ laconu Nabal, ki nyiŋ dakone Abigail. En dako ma ŋeyo piny mada, dok mwonya bene, ento cware aye lakolo dok ger. Doggolane jo Kaleb.
Ruth 4:4 Ka Daudi owinyo ki i tim ni Nabal tye ka ŋolo yer romine,
Ruth 4:5 ci ocwalo awobe apar bote. Ocikogi ni, “Wucit i Karmel bot Nabal, wucwal motta bote,
Ruth 4:6 wuwac bote ni, ‘Daudi omoti, owacci, kuc obed i komi, omera, ki i kom jo me odi, ki jo ducu ma gitye boti.
Ruth 4:7 Awinyo ni it ye ka ŋolo yer romini. I kare ducu ma lukwatti gubedo i Karmel wabedo kacel kwedgi. Pe watimogi marac, dok bene gin mo pe oloyogi.
Ruth 4:8 Peny awobeni, ci gibititti. Pienno wek awobena gunoŋ gum boti tin, pien gubino i nino me camo karama, Alegi imi botgi gin ma itwero noŋo pigi ki pira, an wodi Daudi.’ ”
Ruth 4:9 Ka awobe pa Daudi guo kunnu, guwaco lok meno ducu bot Nabal ma ka-ka Daudi; ci gubedo ka kurone.
Ruth 4:10 Nabal odok iye bot lutic pa Daudi ni, “Daudi en aŋa? Aŋa ma wod pa Yece-ni? I kare man tye lwak lutic mapol ma gutenyo luditogi.
Ruth 4:11 Ci an dok akwany mugatina ki piina, ki riŋo ma aneko pi luŋol yer romina, ami bot dano mo ata ma gua ka ma pe aneyoni?”
Ruth 4:12 Pi lok meno awobe pa Daudi gulokke gudok woko cen ci gutito lok man ducu bote.
Ruth 4:13 Daudi owaco bot jone ni, “Dano acel acel otwe pala lucwanne!” Ci dano acel acel otweyo pala lucwanne ki Daudi bene otweyo mere. Jo miya aŋwen gucito i kor Daudi, kun jo miya aryo gudoŋ ka kuro jami.
Ruth 4:14 Ento awobi mo acel otito bot Abigail dako pa Nabal ni, “Nen, Daudi ocwalo lukweria ki i tim gubino ka moto laditwa; ci en otugge i komgi magwa,
Ruth 4:15 kun kono jo-nu giber i komwa, pe wabedo ki can mo, ki gin mo pe orem botwa i kare ma watye i bar kwat, i kare ducu ma wawoto kacel kwedgi.
Ruth 4:16 Gin aye gubedo celwa dyewor ki dyeceŋ bene i kare ducu ma wabedo ka kwayo romi.
Ruth 4:17 Ber in aye iŋe lok-ki, wek inen gin ma myero itim, pien can bipoto i kom laditwa ki i kom jo me ode ducu; en tye ki gero keken, ma dano mo pe twero lok kwede.”
Ruth 4:496 
Ruth 4:18 Abigail oa malo liwic, okwanyo mugati miya aryo, opiru kono vino aryo, riŋo romi abic ma gitedo, nyig bel ma gicelo aduku abic, tuga olok mutwone miya acel ki poki otini miya aryo, ci oketogi i wi kana wek gutiŋ.
Ruth 4:19 Owaco bot awobene ni, “Wucit wutel nyima, abibino alubo korwu.” Ento pe otito lokke bot cware Nabal.
Ruth 4:20 Oito i wi kana, ocako wot, ci olor piny ka ma got ocego iye piny. Ci nen, Daudi ki lwakke bene gitye ka lor piny gikemo en, ci en oromo kwedgi.
Ruth 4:21 Onoŋo Daudi owacci, “Kara ada abedo ka gwoko lim pa laco-ni i tim noŋo, ma kun jamine mo pe orwenyo i kom wadigi. En otima marac kun an atime maber.
Ruth 4:22 Lubaŋa myero oket can i koma kit meno ki makato bene, ka ce diki odiko aweko laco acel mo obwot ki i kom jo ma en tye kwedgi-ni.”
Ruth 4:23 Ka Abigail oneno Daudi, ci orune, olor woko piny ki i wi kanane, opoto i ŋom aryeba ic i nyim Daudi, okulo wiye piny.
Ruth 4:24 Oryebbe piny ka tyene kun wacci, “Wek bal obed i koma keken Laditta. Alegi ni wek koŋ alok kwedi mot, laditta, iwiny lokka.
Ruth 4:25 Pe ibed ka tamo lok pa Nabal ma lagikome-ni, pien kit ma nyiŋe tye kwede, kite bene tye kit meno, Nabal aye nyiŋe, miŋo bene oniaŋ woko i kome. An onoŋo pe aŋeyo, ladit, pe aneno kom awobe ma icwalogi.
Ruth 4:26 Kombeddi, laditta, macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, ki tipo komi bene tye makwo-ni, doŋ inen ba, Rwot otyeko juki woko ni pe icitiŋ alii me remo kun iculo kwor ki ciŋi kikome. Wek lumerokki ki jo ma gimito timi marac gubed macalo laditta Nabal.
Ruth 4:27 Doŋ igam mot ma luticca gukelo boti, rwoda, wek gimi bot awobe ma gilubo kori.
Ruth 4:28 Tima kica pi balla, ladit; pien Rwot bimiyo odi cuŋ matek, pien it ye ka lwenyo pi Rwot, bal mo pe gibinoŋo i komi i kare me kwoni ducu.
Ruth 4:29 Kadi jo mapol gubin ka lubo kori kun gimito neki woko, gibinoŋo kwoni giboyo kome woko i kin boc pa jo makwo ma Rwot Lubaŋani aye gwokogi. En bibayo kwo pa lumerokki wo ko macalo labaa lataŋdiyo.
Ruth 4:30 I kare ma Rwot doŋ otiyo i komi gin ducu maber ma oloko i komi-ni, laditta, ma doŋ oket i me bedo laker ma loyo jo Icrael,
Ruth 4:31 ci doŋ pe ibibedo ki gin mo ma miyo ikumo, kadi tam marac mo ma obino pien yam ioyo remo noŋo, nyo iculo kworri in kikomi. I kare ma Rwot bitimi ber, ci ipo pira, ladit.”
Ruth 4:32 Daudi owaco bot Abigail ni, “Gipwo Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma tin ocwali ka rwatte kweda-ni!
Ruth 4:497 
Ruth 4:33 Gipwoyi mulil, gum obed i komi, pi ryekoni maber, mumiyo ijuka tin, omiyo pe atiŋo alii me oyo remo, ki pi culo kworra kekena ki ciŋa kikome!
Ruth 4:34 Ada, kit ma Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael tye makwo-ni, en doŋ ojuka, pe atimi marac. Kono in pe irune ibino irwatte kweda, me adane kono tin laco mo acel pe obwot ki bot Nabal.”
Ruth 4:35 Daudi ogamo gin ma Abigail okelo, ci owaco bote ni, “Cit giri ki kuc idok i odi. Atyeko winyo dogi, dok ajolo legani.”
Ruth 4:36 Abigail ka odwogo bot Nabal, onoŋo tye ka camo karamane i ode, ma rom ki karama pa kabaka kulu. Cwinye obedo yom matek pien onoŋo omer woko twatwal, omiyo Abigail pe otito lok mo bote nio ka piny oru.
Ruth 4:37 Odiko ka koŋo vino doŋ owarre woko ki i waŋe, en otito lok ducu bote. Kom Nabal oto woko lirut, kome ojiŋ woko matek calo got.
Ruth 4:38 Ka nino okato apar, ci Rwot ogoyo Nabal oto woko.
Ruth 4:39 Ka Daudi owinyo ni Nabal doŋ oto woko, ci owacci, “Gipwo Rwot ma oculo kworra pi anywar ma yam alimo ki bot Nabal, dok ojuka pe atimo bal mo. Rwot odwoko bal pa Nabal i wiye gire!” Ci Daudi ocwalo kwena me cako cunane i kom Abigail wek obed dakone.
Ruth 4:40 Ka lutic pa Daudi guo bot Abigail i Karmel, ci guwaco bote ni, “Daudi ocwalowa boti ni wacit kwedi wek icibed dakone.”
Ruth 4:41 Abigail oa malo ci oryebbe piny i ŋom, owacci, “Nen, an aŋecane me Lwoko tyen luticce.”
Ruth 4:42 Orune oito i wi kanane, ocako wot i kor lukwena pa Daudi kacel ki anyirane abic ma konye, ci odoko dakone.
Ruth 4:43 Onoŋo Daudi onyomo Akinoam me Jejreel bene, ci gin aryo ducu gubedo monne.
Ruth 4:44 Ento onoŋo Caulo otyeko kwanyo nyare Mikal ma dako pa Daudi, omiyo bot Palti wod pa Laic ma bedo i Gallim.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 26 Daudi oweko Caulo obwot tyen me aryone
Ruth 4:1 Jo Jip dok gubino bot Caulo i Gibea, guwaco bo te ni, “Daudi tye okanne i wi got Kakila i Jecimon yo tuŋ wokceŋ.”
Ruth 4:2 Caulo oa ocito i tim Jip ki jo Icrael ma giyerogi ma romo alip adek; gucito ka yenyo Daudi i tim Jip.
Ruth 4:3 Caulo ogony i wi got Kakila ma tye i ŋet gudo i Jecimon yo tuŋ wokceŋ; ento onoŋo Daudi tye mere i tim. Ka oneno Caulo olubo kore wa i tim,
Ruth 4:498 
Ruth 4:4 ocwalo lurot-piny kunnu, ci gumoko atir ni Caulo obino ada.
Ruth 4:5 Daudi oa obino i kabedo ka ma Caulo ogony iye, oneno kabedo ma Caulo obuto iye kacel ki Abneri wod pa Ner ma ladit ma loyo monnye. Caulo onoŋo obuto i kabedo ma gigeŋo ŋete, kun mony ogure dyere.
Ruth 4:6 Ci Daudi owaco bot Akimelek ma Lakit, ki Abicai ma omin Joab wod pa Jeruya ni, “Aŋa ma bicito kacel kweda i gony bot Caulo?” Abicai ogamo ni; “An aye abicito kacel kwedi.”
Ruth 4:7 Daudi ki Abicai gucito i gony pa Caulo i nino meno, Caulo onoŋo obuto i kabedo ma gigeŋo ŋete, ki toŋŋe ocuŋ ka ŋete ma giguro i nom. Abneri ki lumony gubuto gugu re dyere.
Ruth 4:8 Abicai owaco bot Daudi ni, “Tin Lubaŋa omiyo lamerokki i ciŋi, Wek doŋ aneke woko kombeddi kun aguro woko ki toŋ pil wa i nom kicel keken; pe abicobo kiryo.”
Ruth 4:9 Ento Daudi owaco bot Abicai ni, “Wek nekone obedi. Aŋa ma twero keto ciŋe i kom dano ma Rwot owiro ci pe bitiŋo alii?”
Ruth 4:10 Dok owacci, “Kit macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, Rwot aye bipwode gire; nyo ka nino me tone biromo, nyo bicito i mony ka mo, ci to ki kunnu.
Ruth 4:11 Rwot pe ye ni aket ciŋa i kom dano ma en owiro. Ento ber waput toŋŋe ma tye ka wiye-ni, ki opoko piine, wek wacit woko.”
Ruth 4:12 Kit meno Daudi ocako puto toŋ pa Caulo, ka otino opoko piine ma onoŋo tye ka wiye, ci gucito woko. Dano mo pe onenogi nyo oŋeyo gin mutimme, ŋatti mo bene pe oco ki i waŋ nino; pien gin ducu gunino woko ki nino mapek mua ki bot Rwot, opoto i komgi ducu.
Ruth 4:13 Daudi obaro dye nota, okato tuŋcel, ci ocuŋ ki ka mabor i wi got, ma kingi lac.
Ruth 4:14 Ci Daudi ocako lwoŋo mony pa Caulo ki Abneri wod pa Ner kun waco ni, “Abneri, pe igamo doga ce?” Abneri ogamo ni, “In aŋa ma ilwoŋo kabaka-ni?”
Ruth 4:15 Daudi owaco bot Abner ni, “Pe in laco ce? Aŋa ma rom kwedi i Icrael? Ci piŋo pe ibedo ka gwoko laditti ma kabaka-ni? Pien dano mo obino wa botwu ka neko rwodi woko ki i kinwu.
Ruth 4:16 Gin ma itimoni pe ber wacel. Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, myero gineki woko, pien pe ibedo ka gwoko laditti, ma en aye dano ma Rwot owiro. Kombeddi doŋ inen ka ma toŋ pa kabaka tye iye, ki opoko piine ma onoŋo tye ka wiye-ni!”
Ruth 4:17 Caulo oŋeyo dwan Daudi woko ci owacci, “Man aye dwani, Daudi, latinna?” Daudi ogamo ni, “En aye dwana, laditta, kabaka.”
Ruth 4:18 Daudi dok owacci; “Piŋo ibedo ka lubo kora, laditta? An mono atimo gin aŋo? Atiŋo kit alii aŋo?
Ruth 4:499 
Ruth 4:19 Kombeddi doŋ iwiny lokka, laditta kabaka. Ka ce Rwot aye opiyo in i koma, ci wek en ogam gityer, ento ka dano aye gupiyo in, ci wek gicengi woko ki i nyim Rwot, pien gutyeko ryema woko wek pe anywak bedo kwedgi i lobo ma Rwot omiyo botwa me aleya-ni, kun giwacci, ‘Cit woko icitii ki lubaŋa mukene-gu.’
Ruth 4:20 Kombeddi pe iwek remona ocwer i ŋom i lobo pa lurok ka mabor ki i nyim Rwot; pien kabaka me Icrael obino ka lubo kora kun mito neka woko, macalo dano ma dwaro anyeri i kin godi.”
Ruth 4:21 Caulo dok ogamo ni, “Atimo rac, Doŋ idwog cen, Daudi, latinna, pe doŋ abitimi rac matwal, pien kwona tin obedo me wel i nyimi. Nen, abedo ka nyuto minona, omiyo aŋak ka mabor twatwal.”
Ruth 4:22 Daudi ogamo ni, “Toŋŋi doŋ ennu, kabaka! Wek ŋat acel ki i kin awobe obin kany ka omone.
Ruth 4:23 Rwot culo dano ki acel acel kit ma cwinye atir kwede ki ma lubo kit genne; pien tin doŋ Rwot omiyi i ciŋa, ci an pe atiŋo ciŋa aketo i komi pien in dano ma Rwot owiro.
Ruth 4:24 Kit macalo tin kwoni obedo me wel i nyima-ni, kit meno kwona bene myero obed me wel i nyim Rwot, dok myero en aye olara i aromana ducu.”
Ruth 4:25 Caulo dok ogamo dog Daudi ni, “Gum obed i komi, Daudi, latinna! Ibitiyo gin mapol, dok ibiloyogi ducu maber.” Ci Daudi ocito gire, ki Caulo bene odok i kabedone.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 27 Daudi obedo i kin jo Piliciti
Ruth 4:1 Daudi olwodo lok ki i cwinye ni, “An ba, olo Caulo biketo ciŋe i koma i nino mo keken ci neka woko cut, Pienno yo mu kene pe, myero alwi ariŋ acit woko wa i lobo pa jo Piliciti; ci cwiny Caulo bia woko i koma, pe doŋ biyenya ki i waŋ lobo pa jo Icrael, miyo abilaro kwona ki i ciŋe.”
Ruth 4:2 Daudi ocako a woko ki kunnu, en ki jone miya abicel ma onoŋo gitye bote, ci gucito bot Akic wod pa Maok, kabaka me Gat.
Ruth 4:3 Daudi obedo ki Akic i Gat, en ki lwakke ducu, kun dano acel acel ocito ki jo me ode. Daudi onoŋo otero monne aryo, Akinoam me Jejreel ki Abigail me Karmel, ma yam obedo dako pa Lyel Nabal.
Ruth 4:4 Ka gitito bot Caulo ni Daudi doŋ oriŋo woko wa i Gat, ci pe dok obedo ka yenyo kore matwal.
Ruth 4:5 Daudi dok owaco bot Akic ni, “Ka bedona boti oyomo cwinyi, ci gimiya kabedo mo ma i kin gaŋi ma i lobo-ni wek abed iye kunnu, Piŋo an laticci abedo kwedi kacel i gaŋ kaili?”
Ruth 4:500 
Ruth 4:6 Akic omiye Jiklag, mumiyo Jiklag odoko gaŋ pa luker me Juda nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:7 Kare ma Daudi obedo kwede i lobo pa jo Piliciti oromo mwaka acel ki dwe aŋwen.
Ruth 4:8 I kare-nu Daudi ki, jone gubedo ka monyo mony i kom jo Gecur, jo Girij ki jo Amalek ma gin aye wegi lobo kunnu cakke wa con, guo kwede i Cur wa ki i Ejipt.
Ruth 4:9 Ka Daudi omonyo lobo-nu, pe oweko laco mo kadi dako mo odoŋ makwo; oyako romi, dyaŋi, kana, kinaga wa ki boŋŋi ka odwogo kwede bot Akic.
