Ruth 4:10 Ka Akic openye ni, “Tin icito ka monyo jo mene?” Daudi ogamo ni, “Amonyo lobo Negeb ma tye i lobo Juda,” nyo ni, “Alwenyo i kom Negeb pa jo Jeramel,” nyo ni, “Amonyo Negeb pa jo Keni.”
Ruth 4:11 Daudi pe oweko laco mo nyo dako mo obwot makwo, pien onoŋo olworo ni, “Miyo gibitito lok ma i komwa, ni, ‘Daudi otimo gin munyo.’ ” Meno aye obedo kite i kare ma obedo kwede i lobo pa jo Piliciti.
Ruth 4:12 Akic obedo ka geno Daudi kun tamo ni, “Jo tugi doŋ gidage matek twatwal, pienno en doŋ bibedo laticca matwal.”
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 28
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno jo Piliciti guoto monygi pi lweny i kom jo Icrael. Akic owaco bot Daudi ni, “Ber iŋe ni in ki joni wubicito ka mony kacel kwedwa.”
Ruth 4:2 Daudi ogamo dog Akic ni, “Ber matek, laditta, doŋ ibiŋeyo gin ma atwero tiyone.” Akic dok owaco bot Daudi ni, “Abiketi ibedo lagwok kwona matwal.” Caulo olimo ajwaka lakor tipo i En-dor
Ruth 4:3 I kare meno onoŋo Camuel doŋ oto woko. Jo Icrael ducu gukumo pire ci guyike i Rama i gaŋŋe kikome. Caulo yam koŋ onoŋo oryemo lukor tipo ki megi jogi woko ki i lobone.
Ruth 4:4 Jo Piliciti gucokke ci gutoŋo gonygi i Cunem, Caulo bene ocoko jo Icrael ducu ci gin gutoŋo gonygi i Gilboa.
Ruth 4:5 Ka Caulo oneno mony pa jo Piliciti, ci obedo ki lworo, cwinye ocako myel matek.
Ruth 4:6 Ka Caulo openyo dog Rwot, Rwot pe odokke iye lok mo, kadi wa, ki lek-gu, nyo ki Urim, nyo ki lok pa lunebi.
Ruth 4:7 Ci Caulo owaco bot luricce ni, “Koŋ wuyennnya dako mo ma lakor tipo, wek acit bote, acipeny doge.” Luticce guwacce ni, “Lakor tipo tye wa i En-dor.”
Ruth 4:8 Caulo oloko kite woko mapat, pien oruko ginaruka mapat, ci ocako wot ki jone aryo, Gucito guo bot dakonu dyewor. Caulo owaco bote ni, “Ber ikorra tipo. Mi jokki okella dano mo ma abituco nyiŋe boti.”
Ruth 4:501 
Ruth 4:9 Dako-nu ogamo doge ni, “Iŋeyo gin ma Caulo otiyo, kit ma oryemo kwede lukor tipo ki megi jogi-gu woko ki i lobone, Ci piŋo in dok ibino ka cika ki owic lamak kwona wek ineka woko?”
Ruth 4:10 Ento Caulo okwoŋo kwoŋ bo te ki nyir; Rwot kun wacci, “Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, pe can mo bipoto i komi pi lok man.”
Ruth 4:11 Ci dako-nu ogamo ni, “Abikelo aŋa boti?” Caulo ogamo ni, “Kella Camuel.”
Ruth 4:12 Ka dako-nu oneno: kom Camuel, ci odaŋŋe ki dwan matek, owaco bot Caulo ni, “Ibwola piŋo? In i Caulo kikome.”
Ruth 4:13 Kabaka owaco bot dako ni, “Pe ibed ki lworo, Ineno kom aŋo kaa?” Dako ogamo ni, “Aneno tipo mo obebino kun katti a ki piny i ŋom.”
Ruth 4:14 Caulo dok openyo ni, “Kite nen niŋniŋ mono?” Ogamo ni, “Dano ma oti aye obebino-ni; oumo kome woko ki jor.” Ci Caulo oniaŋ ni en aye Camuel kikome, okulo wiye piny oryebbe i nyime.
Ruth 4:15 Camuel ocako lok ki Caulo ni, “Piŋo iyela kit man, idwoka dok woko?” Caulo ogamo ni, “Can aye tye odiŋa matek; pien jo Piliciti gitye ka lweny i koma, Lubaŋa bene otenya woko ata, Pe doŋ dokka iye kit lok mo, kadi wa lok pa lunebi, kadi wa lek-gu doŋ pe. En aye omiyo alwoŋi wek ititta gin ma myero atim.”
Ruth 4:16 Camuel ogamo ni, “Piŋo dok ipenyo an ma Rwot doŋ oweki woko-ni, odoko lamerokki?
Ruth 4:17 Rwot doŋ otimo i komi kit ma yam ocika kwede ci an bene atito lokke boti wa con ca, Rwot doŋ oyeco kerri woko okwanyo ki i ciŋi, ci doŋ otyeko miyone woko bot lawoti, en aye Daudi.
Ruth 4:18 In yam pe iworo dog Rwot, pe icobo kiniga magwa pa Rwot i kom jo Amalek; en gin mumiyo Rwot tye ka timi kit man i kare-ni.
Ruth 4:19 Rwot bimiyo jo Icrael ki in bene i ciŋ jo Piliciti; di ki in ki awobeni wubibedo kacel kweda. Rwot bimiyo mony pa jo Icrael i ciŋ jo Piliciti.”
Ruth 4:20 Caulo otugi poto woko piny i ŋom, ci obuto piny Iibat pi lworo ma omake matek pi lok pa Camuel. Tipo kome oto woko lirut, pien onoŋo pe ocamo cam mo i dyeceŋ ki dyewor meno ducu.
Ruth 4:21 Dako-nu ocito bot Caulo cok, oneno kome doŋ obaŋŋe woko, ci owaco bote ni, “Nen ba ladit, an doŋ awinyo dogi, adyero pi kwona woko pi timo gin ma iwacca.
Ruth 4:22 In bene, ladit, doŋ iwiny doga. Wek koŋ aket latin cam mo i nyimi icam, ka wek dok ilim kero pi wotwu.”
Ruth 4:23 En okwero woko kun wacci, “Pe abicam.” Ento luticce gubako doggi bote kacel ki dako-nu, ci owinyo lokgi, ocako a malo ki i ŋom obedo i wi kitanda.
Ruth 4:502 
Ruth 4:24 Dako-nu onoŋo tye ki latin roya mo ma ocwe i ode. Ocako nekone woko oyotoyot, ka ojobo moko kwon, onywaŋo, otedo mugati ma tobi pe iye.
Ruth 4:25 Oketo i nyim Caulo ki luticce ci gucamo, ka gua woko i dyewor meno gucito.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 29 Jo Piliciti pe gugeno Daudi
Ruth 4:1 Jo Piliciti gucoko monygi ducu i Apek; ki jo Icrael gutoŋo gonygi i ŋet waŋ it ma tye i Jejreel.
Ruth 4:2 Rwodi pa jo Piliciti gumol gukato ki jogi miya miya ki alip alip, ki Daudi ki jone bene gumol gukato lacen kacel ki Akic.
Ruth 4:3 Ludito mony pa jo Piliciti gupenyo ni, “Jo Ibru gitimo gin aŋo kany?” Akic ogamo doggi kun wacci, “Man aye Daudi ma yam latic pa Caulo kabaka me Icrael. Otyeko doŋ bedo kweda pi kare malac mada. Cakke ki i nino ma olaro bota o kwede wa onyoo peya anoŋo roc mo i kome.”
Ruth 4:4 Ento ludito mony pa jo Piliciti gubedo ki kiniga i kom Akic; guwacce ni, “Cwal laco meno odok paco. Myero odok cen i kabedo ma yam imiyo bote, En pe bicito kwedwa i mony, miyo en bilokke doko lamerokwa ki kunnu, Ka nyer-ri mito dok ribbe ki laditte bitimo aŋo? Pe neko jowa, coko wigi tero bo te?
Ruth 4:5 Man aye Daudi kikome, ma yam giwere kun mon gimyelo kwede ma giwero ni, ‘Caulo oneko mere dano alip, ento Daudi oneko alip apar.’ ”
Ruth 4:6 Akic olwoŋo Daudi, owaco bote ni, “Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni in ibedo dano ma ageno. An aneno ni ber iwot kacel kwedwa i mony, pien pe anoŋo gin mo marac i komi cakke ki i nino ma ibino iye bota o wa onyoo. Ento pe cwiny rwodi oniaŋ i komi.
Ruth 4:7 Pienno ber itugi dok cen cut. Dok cen ki kuc keken, wek pe imi cwiny rwodi pa Lupiliciti obed ka cwer.”
Ruth 4:8 Daudi owaco bot Akic ni, “Ento an atimo gin aŋo? Gin aŋo ma inoŋo i koma laditta, cakke wa i nino ma adonyo kwede i dog ticci nio koni, ma miyo pe acito ka lweny ki lumerokki, rwoda kabaka?”
Ruth 4:9 Akic dok omedo dok iye ki Daudi ni, “Aŋeyo maber ni bal mo pe i komi; ki i nyima in icalo lamalaika pa Lubaŋa, Ento ludito monywa gutyeko waco ni, in pe ibicito kwedwa i mony.
Ruth 4:10 Kombeddi doŋ itugi a ki odiko-ni, kacel ki joni ma iloyogi ma gubino kwedi. Cak wot ki odiko-ni, a woko ki kany oyotoyot tekke piny leŋ ma romo wot.”
Ruth 4:11 Daudi ocako a woko odiko con ki jone, ci odok i lobo pa jo Piliciti. Ento jo Piliciti gucito i Jejreel.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 30
Ruth 4:503  Daudi oloyo jo Amalek
Ruth 4:1 Daudi ki jone guo i Jiklag i nino me adekke, ci gunoŋo jo Amalek gumonyo Negeb ki Jiklag. Guloyo Jiklag woko, guwaŋo woko ki mac,
Ruth 4:2 dok guyako mon ducu ki jami ducu ma tye kunnu, wa dano ducu matino ki madito. Pe guneko dano mo, ento guterogi makwo, gucito kwedgi woko.
Ruth 4:3 Ka Daudi ki jone guo i gaŋ ci gunoŋo tye ka waŋ awaŋa, dok mongi ki awobegi ki anyiragi ducu giterogi woko,
Ruth 4:4 gucako wo ki koko, nio ka tek me koko otum woko.
Ruth 4:5 Mon pa Daudi aryo-nu bene giterogi woko, Akinoam me Jejreel ki Abigail me Karmel, dako pa Lyel Nabal.
Ruth 4:6 Piny oloyo Daudi woko matek, pien jone bene gubedo ka lok pi cele woko ki got, pien cwinygi ducu obedo kec matek kun dano acel acel tamo pi awo bene ki anyirane. Ento Daudi olimo tekcwiny ki bot Rwot Lubaŋane.
Ruth 4:7 Daudi owaco bot ajwaka Abiatar wod pa Akimelek ni, “Kella epod.” Ci okelo bot Daudi.
Ruth 4:8 Daudi openyo dog Rwot ni, “Aryem kor mony man? Abimakogi woko iyo?” Rwot odokke iye ni, “Ryem korgi, pien ibimakogi woko i yo ada, dok ibilaro jowu.”
Ruth 4:9 Daudi ocako wot ki jone miya abicel-li kacel kwede. Ka guo i kulu Becor, ci jo ma doŋ guol ma pe gitwero ŋolo kulu gudoŋ kenyo, gubedo iye.
Ruth 4:10 Ento Daudi omedde ka ryemo kor jo Amalek ki jone miya aŋwen kacel kwede, kun jo miya aryo ma komgi oloc, ma ŋolo kulu oloyogi gudoŋ cen.
Ruth 4:11 Gunoŋo Laejipt mo i dye bar ci gukele bot Daudi, Gucako mine mugati ocamo, ka gimiye pii amata omato,
Ruth 4:12 dok gimiye nucu poki oduro mutwone ki tuga olok aryo mutwone. Ka doŋ otyeko cam ci cwinye odwogo; pien onoŋo pe ocamo cam mo kadi wa pii bene pe omato pi nino adek dyeceŋ ki dyewor.
Ruth 4:13 Lacen Daudi ocako penye ni, “In kono i dano pa aŋa? la ki kwene?” En ogamo ni, “An wod jo Ejipt, latic pa La-amalek mo. Laditta otenya woko ata, pien onoŋo two aye omaka, ma ari kwede nino adek mukato-ni.
Ruth 4:14 Wan wamonyo Negeb pa jo Keret, ki pa jo Juda, ki Negeb pa jo Kaleb, ka dok wawaŋo Jiklag woko.”
Ruth 4:15 Daudi openye ni, “In ibitera bot mony meno?” Awobi-nu ogamo ni, “Kwoŋŋa kwoŋ ki nyiŋ Lubaŋa kun iwaco ni pe ibineka, dok pe ibidwoka i ciŋ laditta, ci abiteri bot monygi.”
Ruth 4:504 
Ruth 4:16 Otero Daudi kunnu, ci onoŋogi guket woko ata i kabedo meno ducu kun gicamo, gimatte ki myel-gu, ma cwinygi yom pi lwak jami ma giyako madwoŋ ki i lobo pa jo Pilciti ki i lobo Juda.
Ruth 4:17 Daudi opoto i komgi kwarpiny, olwenyo kwedgi nio wa otyeno. Dano mo i komgi pe obwot makwo, kono nyo awobe miya aŋwen ma guito wi kinagani, guriŋo kwede woko.
Ruth 4:18 Daudi oyako gin ducu ma jo Amalek onoŋo guyako, olaro bene monne aryo ducu.
Ruth 4:19 Gin mo pe orwenyo kadi wa gin matidi nyo maditte; awobe ducu wa anyira ducu ki jami ma giyako ducu, ki gin mo keken ma jo-nu gutero, Daudi odwokogi ducu cen.
Ruth 4:20 Omayo wa dyegi ki romi ki dyaŋi ducu, ci jone guleko lim meno ducu i nyimgi kun giwacci, “Man aye lim ma Daudi oyako.”
Ruth 4:21 Ka Daudi odwogo bot jo miya aryo-ni ma yam komgi oloc woko ma pe doŋ gitwero lubo kore, ma onoŋo giwekogi i dog kulu Becor-ni, ci jo-nu gukato ka jolo Daudi ki lwak ma gucito kwede-ni. Ka Daudi onyiko cok, en bene omotogi.
Ruth 4:22 Ci jo maraco ducu ki lutim aranyi ma i kin lwak ma gucito ki Daudi guwacci, “Jo- ni pe gucito kwedwa, pienno wan pe wabimiyogi gin mo i kom jami ma wayako wadwogo kwede-ni. Wek dano acel acel oter dakone ki litinone ci guciti.”
Ruth 4:23 Ento Daudi ogamo ni, “Pe wubitimo kit meno, utmegina, ki gin ma Rwot omiyo botwa. En aye obedo ka gwokowa, ci otiŋo mony ma gubino ka monyowa, omiyogi i ciŋwa.
Ruth 4:24 Aŋa ma twero ye lokwu i kom lok man? Kit ma gipoko ki jami bot dano ma ocito i mony-nyi, gibipoko bot dano mudoŋ ka gwoko jami bene kit meno, Gibipoko bot dano ducu ma rom.”
Ruth 4:25 Meno odoko cik matwal cakke i kare meno, ma jo Icrael gibedo ka lubo nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:26 Ka Daudi odwogo i Jiklag, ci ocwalo dul jami ma giyako-ni bot lureme ma gin ludoŋo pa jo Juda kun wacci, “Motwu ene ma wayako ki bot lumerok pa Rwot.”
Ruth 4:27 Ocwalo jami pi jo ma i Betel, ki i Ramot ma i Negeb, i Jatir,
Ruth 4:28 i Aroer, i Cipmot, i Ectemoa,
Ruth 4:29 ki i Rakal, bot jo ma bedo i gaŋi pa jo Jeramel ki pa jo Keni,
Ruth 4:30 bot jo ma i Korma, Boracan, Atak.
Ruth 4:31 Kebron ki i lwak kabedo ducu ma yam Daudi ki jone guwok ki iye.
Ruth 4:1 Camuel 31
Ruth 4:505  To pa Caulo ki awobene (1 Tek 10.1-12)
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno jo Piliciti gulwenyo i kom Icrael. Jo Icrael guriŋo woko ki i nyim jo Piliciti, ci ginekogi i wi got Gilboa.
Ruth 4:2 Jo Piliciti guriŋo gudiŋo kor Caulo ki awobene, ci guneko Yonacan, Abinadab ki Malkicua, gin ducu awobe pa Caulo.
Ruth 4:3 Lweny ogeto matek i kor Caulo, ci wegi atero gucele woko, guketo ret i kome marac mada.
Ruth 4:4 Caulo owaco bot latin jami lwennye ni, “Wot pala lucwanni woko, icoba kwede pil, wek jo ma pe giliro-ni, ma pe giŋeyo Lubaŋa, pe gubin i koma gucoba, mi yo giyarre i koma,” Ento latin jami lwennye pe oye, pien lworo omake matek, omiyo Caulo okwanyo pala lucwanne kikome opoto ogurre kwede kekene.
Ruth 4:5 Ka latin jami lweny oneno ni Caulo doŋ oto, en bene opoto ogurre kene ki pala lucwanne, onywako to kwede kacel.
Ruth 4:6 Kit meno Caulo ki awobene adek-ki, ki latin jami lwennye, ki lwakke ducu guto woko lawaŋacel i nino acel.
Ruth 4:7 Ka jo Icrael ma onoŋo gitye loka nota tuŋcel, ki jo mukene ma onoŋo gitye loka Jordan, guneno ni mony pa jo Icrael guriŋo woko, dok ni Caulo ki awobene ginekogi woko, ci guriŋo guweko gaŋigi woko; ci jo Piliciti gubino gucako bedo i gaŋi-nu.
Ruth 4:8 Orwone jo Piliciti gupuk odiko ka lunyo boŋŋi ki i kom jo ma ginekogi, ci gunoŋo kom Caulo ki kom awobene adek-ki i kom got Gilboa.
Ruth 4:9 Guŋolo wi Caulo woko, ka gulunyo jami lwennye ki i kome, ci gucwalo kwena oromo i lobo pa jo Piliciti ducu, pi tero lok me yomcwiny bot jogigi ki bot lwakgi ducu.
Ruth 4:10 Guketo jami lweny pa Caulo i ot pa jokgi ma dako ma gilwoŋo ni Acitarot, ka dok guguro kome i kom cel murumo gaŋ me Bet-can.
Ruth 4:11 Ento ka jo ma gibedo i Jabec-gilead guwinyo gin ma jo Piliciti gutimo i kom Caulo,
Ruth 4:12 ci oteka lwenygi ducu gua, gucito guwoto dyewor benebene, gukwanyo kom Caulo ki kom awo bene woko, gugonyo woko ki i kom cel me Bet-can, guo kwedgi wa i Jabec, ci guwaŋo komgi woko kunnu.
Ruth 4:13 Lacen gukwanyo cogogi, guyiko i te yat anaŋa ma tye i Jabec, ci guri kec pi nino abiro.
Ruth 4:506 
Ruth 4:2 Camuel
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 1 Daudi owinyo pi to pa Caulo
Ruth 4:1 Ka Caulo doŋ oto, ma Daudi bene odwogo ki ka neko jo Amalek, Daudi odikke nino aryo i Jiklag.
Ruth 4:2 I nino me adekke laco mo obino kun oa ki i gony pa Caulo, ma boŋone oyec woko, wi ye bene ojuko ki ŋom, Ka obino bot Daudi, ci oryebbe piny, owore.
Ruth 4:3 Daudi openye ni, “Ia ki kwene?” Ogamo ni, “An abwot ki i gony pa jo Icrael.”
Ruth 4:4 Daudi dok openye ni, “Ci doŋ kunnu tye niŋniŋ? Titta.” Ogamo ni, “Dano guriŋo woko ki i waŋ mony, ci gineko lwak jo mapol, giradogi woko piny; Caulo ki wode Yonacan bene guto.”
Ruth 4:5 Daudi dok openyo awobi ma otitte lok-ki ni, “In kono iŋeyo niŋniŋ ni Caulo ki wode Yonacan bene guto woko?”
Ruth 4:6 Awobi-nu ogamo ni, “Onoŋo atye kunnu i wi got Gilboa ci acob i kom Caulo ma ojeŋŋe ki toŋŋe, kun gadigadi lweny ki wegi aguragura bene gudiŋo kore.
Ruth 4:7 Ka obolo waŋe i ŋeye, onena, ci olwoŋa, An agamo ni, ‘An atye ene.’
Ruth 4:8 Openya ni, ‘In aŋa?’ Agamo ni, ‘Anjo Amalek.’
Ruth 4:9 Dok owacca ni, ‘cuŋ ka ŋeta, icuda woko, pien to doŋ waŋo koma, ento pud akwo.’
Ruth 4:10 Ci acuŋ ka ŋete, acude woko, pien onoŋo doŋ aniaŋ ni pe doŋ twero bedo kwo ma doŋ opoto woko piny-nyi, Ci akwanyo lalukana ma onoŋo tye i wiye, ki ogul ma tye i ŋut ciŋe, doŋ akelogi boti, laditta, gin ene.”
Ruth 4:11 Daudi ocako mako boŋŋine kene, oyecogi woko pi cwercwiny ma omake, Jo ma gitye kwede bene gutimo kit meno.
Ruth 4:12 Gubedo ka kumo ki koko ki ri kec pi Caulo ki pi Yonacan, ki pi lwak pa Rwot ki pi jo me ot pa Icrael, gukok nio wa otyeno, pien gityekogi woko ki pala lucwan.
Ruth 4:13 Daudi dok owaco bot awobi ma otito lokke ni, “In mono ia ki kwene?” Ogamo ni, “An latin pa labedo mo ma jo Amalek.”
Ruth 4:14 Daudi owacce ni, “Piŋo pe koŋ ilworo tiŋo ciŋi pi neko dano ma Rwot owiro?”
Ruth 4:15 Daudi olwoŋo ŋat acel i kin awobe orobone, owacce ni, “Cit ipot i keme.” Ci oneko woko.
Ruth 4:16 Daudi owaco bot La-amalek ni, “Remoni aliine bedo i wii, pien dogi aye okelo lok i komi kun iwacci, ‘Aneko dano ma Rwot owiro-ni.’ ” Daudi okoko Caulo ki Yonacan
Ruth 4:507 
Ruth 4:17 Daudi okoko Caulo ki wode Yonacan ki wer man me koko,
Ruth 4:18 ci owacci, myero gipwony ki jo Juda. Lokke gicoyo i buk pa Jacar. Okoko ni,
Ruth 4:19 “Icrael do, deyoni gibalo woko i wi cere mutiŋŋe! Twoni oteka gupoto wokokuman!
Ruth 4:20 Pe itit pire i Gat, pe ituc pire i yo me Acikelon; miyo anyira pa jo Piliciti gium kwede, miyo anyira pa jo ma pe giŋeyo Lubaŋa giwakke.
Ruth 4:21 “Wun godi me Gilboa, toyo pe obed i komwu, kot pe doŋ myero ocwer i cerewu! Pien kwot pa otekawa olannye kunnu, kwot pa Caulo pe doŋ gijwayo ki moo.
Ruth 4:22 “Atum pa Yonacan pe yam dwogo paco ma pe ooyo remo pa dano; pala lucwan pa Caulo yam pe dwogo nono ma pe onywanne ki moo kom oteka.
Ruth 4:23 “Caulo ki Yonacan luyomewiny dano, jo ma gimaro! I kare me kwo ki i kare me to gin pe gupokke. Gin ludwiro makato ocur, gubedo lutekkom makato labwor.
Ruth 4:24 “Wun anyira me Icrael, wukok Caulo, ma yam rukowu ki boŋo makwar, ma dero ginarukawu ki jabu.
Ruth 4:25 “Twoni oteka gupoto woko kuman ki i dye mony! “Yonacan gineko opoto piny i wi cere mutiŋŋe.
Ruth 4:26 Omera Yonacan, piny orem kweda woko i komi do! Mar meri i koma yam obedo me aura, kato mar pa dako woko.
Ruth 4:27 “Twoni oteka guto woko kuman! Jami lwenygi gitenyo woko ata.”
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 2 Daudi odoko kabaka me Juda
Ruth 4:1 Lacen Daudi openyo dog Rwot ni, “An doŋ acit abed i gaŋ mo ma i Juda?” Ci Rwot ogamo ni, “Citi,” Daudi dok openyo ni, “Abicito i gaŋ mene?” Rwot owacce ni, “I Kebron.”
Ruth 4:2 Ci Daudi ocito i Kebron, ki monne aryo bene, Akinoam me Jejreel ki Abigail ma yam dako pa lyel Nabal me Karmel.
Ruth 4:3 Otero benejone ma yam gitye kwede, kun tero dano acel acel ki jo ma i ode ducu; ci gubedo i gaŋ me Kebron.
Ruth 4:4 Ci jo Juda gucito kunnu, guwiro Daudi me bedo kabakagi ma loyo jo me ot pa Juda. Ka gitito bot Daudi ni, “Jo me Jabec-gilead aye guyiko kom Caulo,”
Ruth 4:5 ci Daudi ocwalo lukwena bot jo me Jabec-gilead, owaco botgi ni, “Rwot omi gumme opot i komwu, pien wunyuto mar madwoŋ i kom laditwu Caulo, pi yiko kome.
Ruth 4:6 Kombeddi Rwot doŋ onyut botwu mar mere ma pe lokke, ma genne! An bene abitimowu maber pi kit tim man.
Ruth 4:508 
Ruth 4:7 Doŋ wuliŋ komwu, wubed oteka lweny, pien laditwu Caulo doŋ oto woko, ki jo Juda gutyeko wira me bedo kabakagi.” Icbocet odoko kabaka me Icrael
Ruth 4:8 I kare meno Abneri wod pa Ner, ma lawimony pa Caulo, okwanyo Icbocet wod pa Caulo otero i Makanaim,
Ruth 4:9 ci okete me bedo kabaka ma loyo lobo Gilead, Acer, Jejreel, Epraim ki Benjamin wa lobo Icrael ducu.
Ruth 4:10 Icbocet wod pa Caulo onoŋo mwaka me ditte oromo pyeraŋwen ma en cako loyo jo Icrael, ci oloyogi pi mwaka aryo. Ento jo me ot pa Juda gubedo i te ker pa Daudi.
Ruth 4:11 Kare ma Daudi obedo kwede kabaka kun loyo ot pa Juda i Kebron oromo mwaka abiro ki dwe abice!. Lweny i kin jo Icrael ki jo Juda
Ruth 4:12 Abneri wod pa Ner ki lutic pa Icbocet wod pa Caulo gua ki i Makanaim gucito i Gibeon.
Ruth 4:13 Ki Joab wod pa Jeruya ki lutic pa Daudi gucito gurwatte kwedgi i kut me Gibeon, ci gubedo piny, kun ŋat acel bedo loka kut tuŋcel ki ŋat acel bene bedo loka kut tuŋcel.
Ruth 4:14 Abneri owaco bot Joab ni, “Wek koŋ litino orobo gua malo, gutuk i nyimwa.” Joab ogamo ni, “Wek gua malo do.”
Ruth 4:15 Ci gua gukato loka tuŋcel kun gikwano welgi, jo apar wiye aryo ma tuŋ bot Benjamin ki Icbocet wod pa Caulo, ki lutic pa Daudi bene apar wiye aryo.
Ruth 4:16 Ci ŋat acel acel ocako mako wi lakworre, ka cobo bute pil ki pala lucwan, ka gin ducu girwomo poto piny lawaŋacel; omiyo kabedo meno gilwoŋo ni Kelkatajurim, ma tye i Gibeon.
Ruth 4:17 Ci lweny obedo gwa matek i nino meno; lutic pa Daudi guloyo lwak pa Abneri ki jo Icrael woko.
Ruth 4:18 Awobe pa Jeruya adek ducu onoŋo gitye kunnu, Joab ki Abicai ki Acael. Onoŋo Acael dwir calo til ma i tim.
Ruth 4:19 En oryemo kor Abneri, kun riŋo ke mo en atir, pe lokke yo tuŋ acuc nyo yo tuŋ acam.
Ruth 4:20 Ka Abneri olokke oneno yo ŋeye, owacce ni, “Meno in Acael?” Ogamo ni, “Meno an yo.”
Ruth 4:21 Abneri ocike ni, “Lokke idok yo tuŋ acuc nyo yo tuŋ acam, wek imak latin orobo mo ci iyak jamine.” Ento Acael pe oye weko kore.
Ruth 4:509 
Ruth 4:22 Abneri dok onwoyo ci ko Acael ni, “Lokke idok ka mukene, pe ibed ka lubo kora, Lok aŋo ma mi yo acobo in areti woko piny-nyi? Ka aneki ci abitiŋo waŋa me neno waŋ omeru Joab niŋniŋ?”
Ruth 4:23 Ento Acael pe oye weko kore, omiyo Abneri ocobo iye ki dim toŋŋe, ci dim otuc wa i ŋeye pi!. Otugi poto kenyo, ci oto ki kenyo bene, Dano ducu ma guo i kabedo ka ma Acael oto iye-ni, gibino ci gicuŋ mot laliŋ.
Ruth 4:24 Ento Joab ki Abicai gubedo ka ryemo kor Abneri; guo wa i got Amma i kare ma ceŋ doŋ mito poto, Got meno onoŋo orine yo tuŋ Gia, i yo ma cito i tim me lobo Gibeon.
Ruth 4:25 Jo pa Benjamin gucokke kacel i kor Abneri, gudoko buca acel, ci gucuŋ i wi got kunnu.
Ruth 4:26 Abneri ocako lwoŋo Joab kun wacci, “Pala lucwan bibedo ka camo dano nakanaka ce? Pe iŋeyo ni agikkine bibedo rac mukato kare? Ibiryemo korwa pi kare ma rom mene ka wek doŋ ijuk lwak guwek ryemo kor omegigi?”
Ruth 4:27 Joab ogamo ni, “Macalo Lubaŋa tye makwo-ni, kono pe iwaco dogi, kono lwak guryemo kor omegigi nio kwede wa diki ada.”
Ruth 4:28 Ci Joab okuto tumme, ci lwak gucuŋ woko, pe dok gumedde ki lubo kor jo Icrael, kadi wa lweny bene doŋ ogik woko kumeno.
Ruth 4:29 Abneri ki jone gucako wot i dyewor meno guwoto dyewor benebene, kun giwok ki i Araba, ka guŋolo kwede kulu Jordan, guwoto nakanaka cakke odiko nio wa dyeceŋ guo kwede i Makanaim.
Ruth 4:30 Joab oweko lubo kor Abneri, odok woko cen. Ka ocoko lwak ogurogi kacel, ci ginoŋo lutic pa Daudi ma doŋ wangi orwenyo woko giromo apar wiye aŋwen, kacel ki Acael bene.
Ruth 4:31 Ento lutic pa Daudi onoŋo guneko jo Benjamin ma gin aye lwak pa Abneri ma romo dano miya adek ki pyerabicel.
Ruth 4:32 Joab ki jone gutiŋo kom Acael, guyiko i lyel pa wonne ma onoŋo tye i Beterekem, Ka gudwogo ki kunnu, guwoto dyewor benebene, nio ka piny oru botgi wa i Kebron.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 3
Ruth 4:1 Lweny obedo i kin jo me ot pa Caulo ki lwak pa Daudi pi kare malac, kun ker pa Daudi doŋo medde ameda ki tek, ento ot pa Caulo jwik ajwika dok kwede piny kun goro bene,. Awobe pa Daudi ma onywalogi i Kebron
Ruth 4:2 Litino awobe pa Daudi ma onywalogi i Kebron gin ene: latin kayone aye Ammon, minne Akinoam me Jejreel;
Ruth 4:510 
Ruth 4:3 me aryone Kileab, minne Abigail dako pa lyel Nabal me Karmel; me adekke Abcalom, minne Maaka ma nya pa Talmai kabaka me Gecur;
Ruth 4:4 me aŋwenne Adoniya, minne Kagit; me abicce Cepatia, minne Abital;
Ruth 4:5 ki me abicelle Itream, minne Egla, ma dako pa Daudi. Gin ducu Daudi onywalogi i Kebron. Abneri oribbe ki Daudi
Ruth 4:6 I kare ma lweny tye i kin ot pa Caulo ki lwak pa Daudi, Abneri omedde odoko dano matek i kin jo me ot pa Caulo.
Ruth 4:7 Onoŋo Caulo yam obedo ki dako ma aŋecane ma nyiŋe Rijpa, nya pa Aiya, ci Icbocet ma wod pa Caulo-ni ocako kelo lok i kom Abneri ni obedo ki ci-wonne.
Ruth 4:8 Kiniga omako Abneri matek pi lok pa Icbocet, omiyo owacci, “An aye a gwok pa jo Juda bo? I kare man abedo ka nyuto mar madwoŋ i kom ot pa woru Caulo, ki i kom omegine ducu ki lureme ducu, pe ya am iyi i ciŋ Daudi bene ci tin doŋ icika pi balo wi dako man!
Ruth 4:9 Lubaŋa myero oket can i koma kit meno ki makato bene, ka ce pe acobo kwoŋ ma yam Rwot okwoŋo i kom Daudi,
Ruth 4:10 pi kwanyo ker woko ki i ot pa Caulo, ki pi moko ker pa Daudi wek olo Icrael ki Juda ducu, cakke wa ki i Dan nio kwede i Beer-ceba.”
Ruth 4:11 Icbocet pe dok ogamo dog Abneri ki lok mukene, pien obedo ka lwore.
Ruth 4:12 Abneri ocwalo lukwena bot Daudi i Kebron kun waco bote ni, “Lobo mono tye i ciŋ aŋa doki? Ket gicikke kweda, ci nen, ciŋa bidok yo tuŋ boti pi kelo lobo Icrael ducu boti.”
Ruth 4:13 Daudi ogamo ni, “Meno ber, abiketo gicikke kwedi; ento gin mukwoŋo ma amito ki tuŋ boti tye kit man; peya ibineno waŋa, nio waŋ ma ikelo Mikal nya pa Caulo, bota, ibino kwede ka ibino ka nena.”
Ruth 4:14 Daudi dok ocwalo lukwena bot Icbocet wod pa Caulo kun waco ni, “Miya dakona Mikal ma yam anyomo ki del kom nyim jo Piliciti me co miya acel.”
Ruth 4:15 Icbocet ocwalo dano okwanyo dako wo ko ki bot cware Paltiel wod pa Laic.
Ruth 4:16 Paltiel olubo kor dakone kun kok pire nio kwede wa i Bakurim. Ka lacen Abneri ojuke ni odok cen, ci laco-nu odok cen.
Ruth 4:17 Abneri ocako yubo lok ki ludoŋo pa jo Icrael kun wacci, “Nen, cakke wa i kare ma okato ca wubedo ki miti me keto Daudi obed kabaka ma loyowu.
Ruth 4:18 Doŋ wutim ba, pien Rwot yam ociko pi Daudi kun wacci, ‘Abimiyo laticca Daudi aye bilaro jo Icrael ki i ciŋ jo Piliciti ki i ciŋ lumerokgi ducu.’ “
Ruth 4:511 
Ruth 4:19 Abneri owaco bot jo pa Benjamin bene kit meno, ci lacen ocito i Kebron ka tito bot Daudi kit lok ducu ma jo Icrael kacel ki jo ducu me ot pa Benjamin gutamo ni ber doŋ gitim.
Ruth 4:20 Ka Abneri oo bot Daudi i Kebron ki jo pyeraryo, ci Daudi otedo karama pi Abneri ki jo ma en tye kwedgi ducu.
Ruth 4:21 Ci Abneri otito bot Daudi ni, “Koni doŋ amito dok cen, ci abicoko jo Icrael ducu aketogi i ciŋi, rwoda kaba ka, wek guket gicikke kwedi, ka doŋ icak loyo lwak ducu kit ma cwinyi mito.” Kit meno Daudi ocwalo Abneri ocito, kun dok gire ki kuc. Joab oneko Abneri
Ruth 4:22 Ki iŋe wot pa Abneri, Joab ki lutic pa Daudi gudwogo ki i mony, gukelo lwak jami mapol ma guyako. Ento onoŋo Abneri doŋ pe bot Daudi i Kebron, pien Daudi onoŋo otyeko cwale ocito woko, ocito ki kuc.
Ruth 4:23 Ka Joab odwogo kacel ki lumony ducu ma onoŋo ocito kwede, gitito bo te ni, “Abiner wod pa Ner obino kany bot kabaka, ci kabaka oweko en ocito woko, ocito ki kuc.”
Ruth 4:24 Joab ocito bot kabaka owacce ni, “In ibedo ka timo gin aŋo? Nen ba, Abneri obino boti, ci piŋo icwale odok woko cen, omiyo en doŋ ocito woko?
Ruth 4:25 In mono pe iŋeyo ni Abneri wod pa Ner obino ka bwoli, wek ene ka ma icito iye ducu ki gin ducu ma itiyo?”
Ruth 4:26 Ka Joab oa woko ki i nyim Daudi, ci ocwalo lukwena i kor Abneri, gudwogo kwede cen nia ki i waŋ pii me Cira, ento Daudi pe oŋeyo iye lok mo.
Ruth 4:27 Ka Abneri odwogo cen, oo i Kebron, Joab otere woko cen i dog gaŋ macalo mito lok kwede i muŋ, ci otugi cobo iye ki kunnu, oto woko. Oneke pi culo kwor remo pa ominne Acael.
Ruth 4:28 Ka Daudi owinyo pire, owacci, “An ki kerra ducu pe watye ki alii mo wacel i nyim Rwot pi to pa Abneri wod pa Ner.
Ruth 4:29 Aliine opot gire i kom Joab, ki i kom jo me ot pa wonne, Ot pa Joab kare ducu pe myero obed laboŋo dano mo iye ma kome cwer tut, nyo ladobo, nyo dano ma bwoc, nyo dano ma gineko ki pala lucwan, nyo dano ma lakec cam!”
Ruth 4:30 Joab ki ominne Abicai guneko Abneri kit meno, pien yam oneko omingi Acael i mony ma obedo i Gibeon.
Ruth 4:31 Daudi dok owaco bot Joab ki lwak ducu ma gitye kwede ni, “Wuyec ginarukawu, wutwe boŋo cola i pyerwu, wek wukum i nyim Abneri.” I kare ma giyiko kom Abneri Daudi ma kabaka-ni olubo kor kitarane.
Ruth 4:32 Giyiko i Kebron, ci kabaka odaŋŋe ki koko matek i wi lyelle, ki lwak ducu bene gukok.
Ruth 4:512 
Ruth 4:33 Kabaka okoko Abneri kun wacci, “Abneri myero oto kit ma lamiŋ to-ni mono?
Ruth 4:34 Badi yam pe gitweyo woko do; kit ma dano kome wee i nyim latim bwami, in bene komi owec kit meno do.” Ci lwak ducu dok gunwoyo koke.
Ruth 4:35 Lwak ducu gubino ka bito Daudi wek ocam kwon ma piny pud dyeceŋ, ento Daudi okwono kwon kun wacci, “Lubaŋa myero oket can i koma kit meno ki makato bene, ka ce abilo kwon mo ma ceŋ peya opoto!”
Ruth 4:36 Ci lwak guniaŋ lok ma i cwinye, omiyo cwinygi okwe; pien kit gin ducu ma kabaka tiyo yomo cwiny lwak ducu.
Ruth 4:37 Kit meno omiyo lwak ducu guniaŋ i nino meno ni pe kabaka aye ma omiyo ni ginek Abneri wod pa Ner.
Ruth 4:38 Kabaka owaco, bot luticce ni, “Wun pe wuŋeyo ni oteka madit ma lawimony doŋ oto woko tin ki i Icrael?
Ruth 4:39 An adoko nyap woko i kare man, kadi an kabaka ma giwiro. Awobe pa Jeruya gin aye guketa i peko, Rwot myero ocul kwor i kom latim marac muporo kit bwamine!”
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 4 Kit ma gineko kwede Icbocet
Ruth 4:1 Ka Icbocet wod pa Caulo owinyo ni Abneri doŋ gineko woko i Kebron, ci kome oto woko lirut, ki cwiny jo Icrael bene oballe woko.
Ruth 4:2 I kare meno onoŋo Icbocet tye ki lutel wi buca monnye aryo; nyiŋ ŋat acel Baana ki nyiŋ mukene: Rekab. Gin ducu awobe pa Rimmon ma jo Benjamin, gaŋ tugi Beerot. Beerot gikwano bot jo Benjamin.
Ruth 4:3 Jo Beerot kikome guriŋo gularo i Gitaim, ci gudoko lubedo kunnu nio wa i kare man.
Ruth 4:4 Yonacan wod pa Caulo yam tye ki wode mo ma tyene okwe woko. I kare ma gikelo lok ki i Jejreel i kom gin mutimme i kom Caulo ki Yonacan, onoŋo en doŋ ditte romo mwaka abic. Ci lapidine otiŋe, oriŋo kwede woko, ci latin opoto woko piny i kare ma co tye ka ŋwec matek-ki, omiyo odoko Laŋolo; nyiŋe Mepibocet.
Ruth 4:5 Awobe pa Rimmon ma jo Beerot, Rekab ki Baana, gua ci gucito ki i cwiny dyeceŋ malyet-ti, gucito wa i ot pa Icbocet i kare ma en tye ka yweyo i dyeceŋ.
Ruth 4:6 Onoŋo lagwok doggola obedo ka pyeto ŋano, ci nino omako waŋe, onino woko; omiyo Rekab ki ominne Baana gulwitte gudonyo.
Ruth 4:7 Ka gudonyo i ot, gunoŋo Icbocet obuto i ot butone i wi kitandane, ci gucobo, guneko woko, ka guŋolo wiye. Gutiŋo wiye, gulubo kwede yo Araba dyeworwor,
Ruth 4:513 
Ruth 4:8 ci gukelo wi Icbocet bot Daudi i Kebron, guwaco bot kabaka ni, “Wi Icbocet wod pa Caulo doŋ wakelo ene, wod pa Caulo ma lamerokki ma yam mito neki, Rwot doŋ oculo kworri tin, rwotwa, i kom Caulo ki i kom litinone.”
Ruth 4:9 Ento Daudi ogamo dog Rekab ki ominne Baana, awobe pa Rimmon ma jo Beerot ni, “Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, ma yam olaro kwona ki i ciŋ lumerokka ducu,
Ruth 4:10 i kare ma yam dano mo obino otitta lok ni, ‘Nen ba, Caulo doŋ oto woko,’ ma onoŋo en tamo ni ekella lok maber, ci an amake aneke woko i Jiklag; meno aye obedo mot ma amiyo bote pi lok ma okelo-ni.
Ruth 4:11 Ento lok man doŋ dit makato ducu, ka ce lutim aranyi doŋ guneko dano ma cwinye leŋ ki i ode i wi kitandane, ci wutamo ni an pe abiculo kworre i komwu, atyekowu wo ko ki i wi lobo?”
Ruth 4:12 Ci Daudi ociko litino orobone, guneko jo-nu woko, guŋolo cing: ki tyengi woko, ka guŋabo komgi i ŋet kulu me Kebron. Ento gukwanyo wi Icbocet, guyiko Lyel pa Abneri i Kebron.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 5 Daudi odoko kabaka me Icrael ki me Juda (1 Tek 11.1-3)
Ruth 4:1 Kaka ducu ma i Icrael gucokke gubino bot Daudi i Kebron, ci guwacci, “Nen ba, wan aye wacogo komi ki riŋo komi.
Ruth 4:2 I kare macon ca, ma onoŋo Caulo aye kabaka ma loyowa, in aye yam itelo wi jo Icrael ka gicito ka lweny, idwokowa pa co bene, Rwot bene ne ne owaco boti ni, ‘In aye ibibedo lakwa lwak ka jo Icrael, dok ibibedo laker ma loyogi.’ “
Ruth 4:3 Kit meno ludoŋo pa jo Icrael ducu gubino bot kabaka i Kebron, Kabaka Daudi oketo gicikke kwedgi i Kebron i nyim Rwot, ci guwiro Daudi obedo kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:4 Daudi ocako locce ma onoŋo mwaka me ditte romo pyeradek, ci obedo ka loc pi mwaka pyeraŋwen,
Ruth 4:5 oloyo jo Juda i. Kebron pi mwaka abiro ki dwe abicel, dok oloyo jo Icrael ki jo Juda ducu ki i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyeradek wiye adek. Daudi omayo got Cion (1 Tek 11.4-9)
Ruth 4:6 Kabaka ki lwakke gucito i Jerucalem ka lweny i kom jo Jebuc ma gibedo i lobo kunnu, Gin onoŋo guwaco bot Daudi ni, “In pe ibidonyo kany. Ka ibino, ci luŋolo ki lutowaŋ aye gibiryemi woko ki cen.” Onoŋo gitamo ni Daudi pe twero donyo kunnu.
Ruth 4:7 Ento Daudi ocito omayo gogo me Cion woko, ci odoko gaŋ kalle.
Ruth 4:514 
Ruth 4:8 I nino meno Daudi owacci, “Dano ducu ma gimito neko jo Jebuc gudony ki i waŋ otul pii, gucak lweny i kom luŋolo ki lutowaŋ-ŋu ma tipo koma okwerogi-ni.” En gin mumiyo giwacci, “Lutowaŋ ki luŋolo pe gibidonyo i ot pa Lubaŋa.”
Ruth 4:9 Daudi ocako bedo i cel go go kunnu, ci olwoŋo ni, Gaŋ kai pa Daudi. Daudi ogero gaŋ madit orumo wo ko likiŋ cakke ki i Millo.
Ruth 4:10 Daudi omedde odoko dit twatwal, pien onoŋo Rwot ma Lubaŋa me mony tye kwede. Kiram opwoyo ker pa Daudi (1 Tek 14.1-2)
Ruth 4:11 Kiram kabaka me Turo ocwalo kwena bot Daudi kun miyo bao yat cedar, ki lupac bene ki lupa-godi me gero ode en Daudi.
Ruth 4:12 Omiyo Daudi oniaŋ ni, Rwot otyeko moko en me bedo kabaka ma loyo Icrael, dok ni Rwot omiyo kerre obedo ki deyo madwoŋ pi pilo wi jone Icrael. Litino ma Daudi onywalogi i Jerucalem (1 Tek 3.5-9;14.3-7)
Ruth 4:13 Daudi dok omedde ki kwanyo mon aŋeca ki mon anyoma ki i Jerucalem ki i kare ma doŋ oa woko ki i Kebron, ci onywalo awobe ki anyira mukene.
Ruth 4:14 Magi aye nyiŋ awobe pa Daudi ma onywalogi i Jerucalem: Cobab, Natan, Solomon,
Ruth 4:15 Ibar, Elicua, Nepeg, Japia,
Ruth 4:16 Elicama, Eliada ki Elipelet. Daudi oloyo jo Piliciti (1 Tek 14.8-17)
Ruth 4:17 I kare ma jo Piliciti guwinyo ni Daudi doŋ gityeko wiro ki moo, odoko kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael, ci gucokke ducu gucito ka yenye; ento Daudi owinyo pigi ci odonyo woko i cel gogo.
Ruth 4:18 Jo Piliciti gumol gubino ci guket guromo i nota Repaim woko.
Ruth 4:19 Daudi openyo dog Rwot ni, “Ber acit ka lweny i kom jo Piliciti? Ibimiyogi i ciŋa?” Rwot ogamo dog Daudi ni, “Citi, pien abimiyo jo Piliciti i ciŋi ada.”
Ruth 4:20 Daudi ocito wa i Baal-perajim, oloyogi kunnu, ci owacci, “Rwot obaro dye lumerok woko ki i nyima, macalo lalele mucorre.” Mumiyo nyiŋ kabedo meno gilwoŋo ni, Baal-perajim.
Ruth 4:21 Jo Piliciti gutenyo cal jogigi kenyo, Daudi ki lwak ke gutiŋo gutero woko.
Ruth 4:22 Jo Piliciti dok gudwogo, gumol guket i nota Repaim ducu.
Ruth 4:23 Ka Daudi dok openyo dog Rwot, ci ogamo ni, “Pe ibicito atir. Ber icit iman ne monygi ma odoŋ cen ca, wek ipot i komgi ki ka ma okemo yadi owak.
Ruth 4:515 
Ruth 4:24 Ka ce iwinyo woo macalo lwak dano ma gitye ka dorre i wi yadi owak, ci rune anyim oyot, noŋo Rwot doŋ bitelo nyimwu pi neko mony pa jo Piliciti woko ducu.”
Ruth 4:25 Daudi otiyo kit meno kit macalo Rwot ocike kwede, ci oneko jo Piliciti cakke ki i Geba o kwede wa i Gejer.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 6 Daudi ocito ka omo canduk pa Rwot (1 Tek 13.5-14)
Ruth 4:1 Daudi dok ocoko lulweny mabeco ma giyerogi ki i kin jo Icrael ma giromo alip pyeraŋwen.
Ruth 4:2 Ci Daudi ocako a ki jone ducu ma gitye kwede, gucito i Baale-juda ka omo canduk pa Lubaŋa, ma gilwoŋo ki nyiŋ Rwot me mony ma bedo wi komkerre malo ka wi lukerubi.
Ruth 4:3 Gutiŋo canduk i wi gadigadi manyen, ci gukelo woko ki i ot pa Abinadab, ma gaŋŋe onoŋo tye i wi got-ti, Uja ki Akio, ma gin awobe pa Abinadab, aye gubedo ka leko twoni ma ywayo gadigadi manyen-ni
Ruth 4:4 ma gitiŋo ki canduk pa Lubaŋa, kun Akio aye telo nyime.
Ruth 4:5 Daudi ki jo me ot pa Icrael ducu gubedo ka yarre ki myel ki yomcwiny i nyim Lubaŋa ki kero komgi ducu, ki wero wer, ki go yo opuk ki naŋa ki ajaa ki bul ki atego agoya-gu.
Ruth 4:6 Ka guo i laro moyo pa Nakon, ci Uja ocwalo ciŋe, ogudo kom canduk pa Lubaŋa, omako kome, pien onoŋo twoni gucato,
Ruth 4:7 ci kiniga omako Lubaŋa i kom Uja, oneke woko ki kunnu, pien onoŋo oketo ciŋe i kom canduk; ci oto woko ki kunnu i ŋet canduk pa Lubaŋa.
Ruth 4:8 Kiniga omako Daudi pien Rwot otugge i kom Uja; mumi yo kabedo-nu gilwoŋo ni Perej-uja nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:9 Daudi obedo ki lworo i kom Rwot i nino meno; owacci, “Canduk pa Rwot doŋ gibitero bota niŋniŋ?”
Ruth 4:10 Kit meno omiyo Daudi okwero tero canduk pa Rwot i gaŋ kalle; ento oŋak kwede woko, otero i ot pa Obededom ma jo Gat.
Ruth 4:11 Canduk pa Rwot obedo i ot pa Obed-edom pi dwe adek; ci Rwot omiyo gum bot Obed-edom ki jo ma i ode ducu. Gikelo canduk pa Lubaŋa i Jerucalem (1 Tek 15.1–16.6)
Ruth 4:516 
Ruth 4:12 Ka gitito bot Daudi ni, “Rwot omiyo gum i kom jo ma i ot pa Obededom ki gin ducu ma tye bote, pi canduk pa Lubaŋa,” omiyo Daudi ocito ka omo canduk ki i ot pa Obed-edom ci okelo i gaŋ kalle ma cwinye yom matek.
Ruth 4:13 Ka jo ma gutiŋo canduk pa Rwot gudako tyengi ki wot tyen abicel, ci Daud i otumo twon ki romo mucwe bot Rwot:
Ruth 4:14 Lacen ocako myel i nyim Rwot ki tipo kome ducu, kun noŋo otweyo pyere ki epod me boŋo camanini.
Ruth 4:15 Kit meno Daudi ki jo me ot pa Icrael ducu gukelo canduk pa Rwot i Jerucalem ki waya ki kuto bila.
Ruth 4:16 Ka canduk pa Rwot obino i gaŋ kal pa Daudi, ci Mikal ma nya pa Caulo obolo wane ki i waŋ dirica, ci oneno ka Daudi pye kirre ki myel i nyim Rwot; ci obedo ka caye ki i cwinye.
Ruth 4:17 Gukelo canduk pa Rwot wa paco, ci gucibo i kabedone, ma en kema ma Daudi onoŋo oguro pire. Daudi ocako tyero gitum awaŋa mapol ki gityer lakwecwiny i nyim Rwot.
Ruth 4:18 Ka Daudi otyeko tyero gitum awaŋa-gu ki gityer lakwecwiny, ci olamo gum i kom lwak i nyim Rwot me mony.
Ruth 4:19 Lacen opoko cam bot lwak ducu, bot jo Icrael ma gucokke ducu, co wa ki mon. Dano acel acel gimiye mugati acel, riŋo mucekke, ki poki olok mutwo. Ka lwak gucako ket, kun ŋat acel acel dok i gaŋŋe.
Ruth 4:20 Ka Daudi odok cen ka lamo gum i kom jo ma i ode, Mikal nya pa Caulo okato woko ka jole, ci owaco bote ni, “Kabaka me Icrael tin oketo deyo i kome kene ba! Pe tin obumo kome i waŋ aŋeca magi ducu! Kabaka obedo macalo ŋatti mo ma lamalgaŋ ata ma lewic pe mako, ma pe obumo wa kome bene.”
Ruth 4:21 Daudi ogamo dog Mikal ni, “An abedo ka myel i nyim Rwot, ma oketo an abedo kabaka ma ka woru, kun aloyo ode ducu. En oketa abedo laker ma loyo jo Icrael, ma lwak pa Rwot. Abimyelo myel ki yomcwiny i nyim Rwot.
Ruth 4:22 An amito abed yot makato man, wek abed ginanyerani; ento aŋeca ma iloko i komgi-ni aye dok gibiketo deyo i koma makato.”
Ruth 4:23 Mikal nya pa Caulo pe onywalo latin mo, nio ka oto.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 7 Lubaŋa oketo gicikke ki Daudi (1 Tek 17.1-27)
Ruth 4:1 I kare ma doŋ kabaka Daudi obedo i ode, ma onoŋo Rwot omiye yweyo i kom lumerokke ma gurume dyere-ni,
Ruth 4:517 
Ruth 4:2 owaco bot lanebi Natan ni, “Nen ba, an doŋ abedo i ot bao cedar, ento canduk pa Lubaŋa pud bedo i kema.”
Ruth 4:3 Natan odok iye bot kabaka ni. “Cit iciti gin ducu ma tye i cwinyi, pien Rwot tye kwedi.”
Ruth 4:4 Ento i dyewor acel-lu en aye lok pa Rwot obino kwede bot Natan ni,
Ruth 4:5 “Cit icitit bot laticca Daudi ni Rwot owaco kuman ni, ‘In imito gerra ot me bedona?
Ruth 4:6 An peya abedo i ot mo cakke ki i kare ma yam akwanyo jo Icrael ki i Ejipt o kwede wa onyoo-ni, ento gibedo ka wirre kweda kun abedo i kema.
Ruth 4:7 I lwak kabedo ducu ma abedo ka wirre iye ki jo Icrael ducu, onoŋo yam koŋ aloko lok mo bot luŋolkop pa jo Icrael, ma acikogi pi kwayo lwak ka jo Icrael, kun awacci, “Piŋo pe koŋ wugerra ot mo me bao cedar?” ‘
Ruth 4:8 Mumiyo ibiwaco bot laticca Daudi ni, ‘Rwot me mony owaco k it man ni, An yam akwanyo in ki ka kwat i olet, ka ma ibedo iye ka leko romi, wek ibed laker ma loyo jona jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:9 Dok abedo ka Ionne kwedi i kabedo ma icito iye ducu, abedo ka jwero lumerokki woko ki i nyimi. An dok abimiyo nyiŋi ywek ma rom ki nyiŋ jo madito ma i wi lobo-ni.
Ruth 4:10 Dok abimiyo kabedo ki jona jo Icrael, ci abiketogi iye, wek doŋ gubed i kabedogi kikome, ma pe doŋ giyelogi matwal, wa lulweny magwa bene pe dok bipoto i komgi i kare mo, kit ma con ca,
Ruth 4:11 cakke ki i kare ma yam aketo iye luŋolkop ma guloyo jona jo Icrael; doŋ abimiyo iywe ki lweny i kom lumerokki ducu. Dok Rwot otyeko tuco boti ni en ebimiyo jo ma i odi gibedo mapol,.
Ruth 4:12 Ka kareni oromo ma doŋ ibuto kacel ki kwariwu-ni, ci abimiyo wodi mo ma in kikumi inywalo bedo madit, ci abimoko kerre bedo matek.
Ruth 4:13 En aye bigero ot pi nyiŋa, an abimoko komkerre bedo matwal.
Ruth 4:14 An abibedo wonne, ki en bibedo woda. Ka ce otimo bal, ci abipwode ki odoo pa dano, ki kit goco pa awobe pa dano.
Ruth 4:15 Ento pe abikwanyo mar mera ma pe lokke woko ki i kome, kit ma yam akwanyo ki i kom Caulo, ma yam aryemo woko ki i nyima-ni.
Ruth 4:16 Odi ki kerri bimoko i nyima nakanaka; ki komkerri bene bimoko matwal.’”
Ruth 4:17 Natan otito lok magi ducu bot Daudi, ki kit ginanyuta ma onen bote ducu.
Ruth 4:518 
Ruth 4:18 Lacen Daudi ocito obedo piny i nyim Rwot i kema ma Rwot bedo iyeni, ci owacci, “Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, an aŋa, oda bene kono gin aŋo, mumiyo ikonya nio wa onyoo-ni?
Ruth 4:19 Ento in pud ibwono kony man ni tidi ki tuŋ boti, ai Rwot Lubaŋa ibedo ka lok i kom dano ma i oda kit ma gibibedo kwede pi kare malac ma tye anyim, inyuto bota kit ma likwaya gibibedo kwede i anyim, ai Rwot Lubaŋal
Ruth 4:20 An Daudi dok abiwacci kit lok aŋo? In iŋeyo an, ai Rwot Lubaŋa ma an laticci-ni.
Ruth 4:21 Itiyo gin madit magu ducu pi lubo lok ma yam iloko pi mitti keni, wek an laticci anen ki waŋa.
Ruth 4:22 In idit mada, ai Rwot Lubaŋa; pe tye ŋatti mo macalo in, pe tye Lubaŋa mo, kono in keken, kit ma yam wawinyo ki itwani.
Ruth 4:23 Rok mene ma i wi lobo ma rom ki joni jo Icrael, ma yam in Lubaŋa icito ka kokogi ki i opii wek gubed joni wek nyiŋi oywek pigi, pi tim madito ma itimo ma miyo lworo, ki pi ryemo rok mukene mapol woko ki i nyimgi, kacel ki lubaŋagi?
Ruth 4:24 In ityeko moko lwakki jo Icrael wek gubed joni nakanaka; dok in, ai Rwot, idoko Lubaŋagi.
Ruth 4:25 “Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, kombeddi doŋ imok lok ma yam iwaco i koma ki i kom jo ma i oda matwal, ci doŋ itim kit ma iwaco-ni.
Ruth 4:26 Kumeno dano gibidworo nyiŋi nakanaka kun giwacci, ‘Rwot Lubaŋa me mony aye Lubaŋa ma loyo jo Icrael,’ ki ot pa laticci Daudi bimoko i nyimi matwal.
Ruth 4:27 Ai Rwot me mony, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, in aye inyuto tammi bota, an laticci, kun iwacci ibimiyo oda bedo madit; en gin mumiyo an laticci alirrio tekcwiny me kelo lega man i nyimi.
Ruth 4:28 Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, in aye Lubaŋa, lokki bedo me ada, ci in doŋ ityeke cikke me timo gin man maber pira.
Ruth 4:29 Pi meno, alegi ni imi gum i kom jo ma i oda, wek gumedde ameda ki bedo i nyimi nakanaka; pien in, ai Rwot Lubaŋa, doŋ iwaco, dok pi lokki me gum miyo likwaya gibibedo ki gum nakanaka.”
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 8 Daudi omedo kerre odoko malac (1 Tek 18.1-12)
Ruth 4:1 Lacen Daudi dok otayo jo Piliciti, ocako loyogi, dok omayo Meteg ama ki i ciŋgi.
Ruth 4:2 Daudi dok otayo jo Moab, ka opimogi ki tol, kun omiyo gubuto piny i nom. Opimo tol aryo me aneka ki tol acel me aweka makwo. Ci jo Moab gubedo i te loc pa Daudi, kun giculo mucoro bote.
Ruth 4:519 
Ruth 4:3 Daudi dok otayo Adadejer wod pa Rekob kabaka me Joba, ma onoŋo ocito ka roco kerre odoko tek i dog kulu Euprate.
Ruth 4:4 Daudi omako wegi aguragurane alip acel ki miya abiro, ki askari ma giwoto ki tyengi alip pyeraryo. Oŋolo odoŋ tyen aguragura ma yam ywayo gadigadi lwenygi, ento oweko mogo manok odoŋ ma romo ywayo gadigadi miya acel.
Ruth 4:5 Ka jo Ciria me Damaciko gubino ka konyo kor Adadejer me Joba, Daudi oneko jo Ciria alip pyeraryo wiye aryo.
Ruth 4:6 Daudi oketo lumony i cel gogo i lobo Ciria ma i ŋet Damaciko; ci jo Ciria ma gitye kunnu gubedo i te loc pa Daudi kun giculo mucoro bote. Rwot obedo ka miyo tek me bwoyo lobo bot Daudi ka ma en cito iye ducu.
Ruth 4:7 Daudi oyako lwak kwodi me jabu ma yam lutic pa Adedejer tiŋogi, ci oterogi i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:8 Dok kabaka Daudi oyako lwak jami mapol me mola ki i Beta ki Berotai, ma yam obedo gaŋi pa Adadejer.
Ruth 4:9 I kare ma Toi kabaka me Kamat owinyo ni Daudi otyeko tayo mony pa Adadejer woko ducu liweŋ,
Ruth 4:10 ci Toi ocwalo wode Joram bot Daudi ka mote, ki pi pwoye pi lweny i kom Adadejer ki pi loyo en woko; pien yam Adadejer obedo ka lweny ki Toi tyen mapol. Joram onoŋo obino ki jami me ryal ki jabu ki mola-gu;
Ruth 4:11 jami meno bene kabaka Daudi odyerogi bot Rwot, kacel ki ryal ki jabu mukene ma en odyero ma oyakogi ki bot rok ducu ma en otayogi,
Ruth 4:12 bot jo Edom, jo Moab, jo Ammon, jo Piliciti ki jo Amalek, kacel ki jami ma oyako ki bot Adadejer wod pa Rekob, kabaka me Joba.
Ruth 4:13 Daudi olimo yweka pi tekke kekene. I kare ma doŋ en tye ka dwogo, oneko jo Edom alip apar wiye aboro i nota me Kado.
Ruth 4:14 Oketo lumony i cel gogo i Edom, oromo i lobo Edom ducu, ci jo Edom gubedo i te loc pa Daudi. Rwot omiyo Daudi obwoyo lobo ka ma ocito iye ducu. Ludito pa Daudi (1 Tek 18.14-16)
Ruth 4:15 Daudi oloyo jo Icrael ducu kit meno; dok obedo ka ŋolo kop atir dok kakare i kom lwakke ducu:
Ruth 4:16 Joab wod pa Jeruya obedo ladit me mony; ki Yekocapat wod pa i Akilud obedo laco lok ma timme.
Ruth 4:17 Jadok wod pa Akitub ki Akimelek wod pa Abiatar gubedo ajwagi; Ceraya obedo karan;
Ruth 4:520 
Ruth 4:18 Benaya wod pa ekoyada obedo ladit ma loyo jo Keret ki jo Pelet; ki awobe pa Daudi gubedo ajwagi.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 9 Kica omako Daudt i, kom Mepibocet.
Ruth 4:1 Daudi openyo ni. “Tye ŋati mo ma odoŋ ki i ot pa Caulo, wek anyut cwinyme mar i kome pi Yonacan?”
Ruth 4:2 I kare meno latic pa Caulo mo ma nyiŋe Jiba onoŋo tye kenyo. Gilwoŋo en gikelo bot Daudi, ci kabaka openye ni, “In aye liba bo?” Ogamo ni, “An do, ladit.”
Ruth 4:3 Kabaka openyo ni, “Pe tye ŋatti mo ma odoa ki i ot pa Caulo, wek anyut cwiny me mar pa Lubaŋa i kome?” Jiba owaco bot kabaka ni, “Wod pa Yonacan pud tye, ento tyene aye okwe woko.”
Ruth 4:4 Kabaka openyo ni, “En kono tye kwene?” Jiba ogamo ni, “En bedo i ot pa Makir wod pa Amiel, i Lo-debar.”
Ruth 4:5 Ci kabaka ocwalo dano giome ki i Lodebar.
Ruth 4:6 Ka Mepibocet wod pa Yonacan ma wod pa Caulo obino bot Daudi, ci opoto oryebbe piny omiye woro. Daudi owacce ni, “Mepibocet!” En ogamo ni, “An laticci en do.”
Ruth 4:7 Daudi owaco bote ni, “Pe ibed ki lworo mo. An abinyutti cwiny me mar pi woru Yonacan, abidwoko boti lobo ducu ma yam pa kwaru Caulo, dok ibicam i wi mejana jwijwi.”
Ruth 4:8 Ci Mepibocet dok omiye woro kun wacci, “An kono aŋa, ma miyo itamo pi gwok muto macalo an-ni?”
Ruth 4:9 Daudi dok olwoŋo Jiba latic pa Caulo, ci owacce ni, “Jami pa Caulo ki jo ma i ode ducu atiŋo amiyo bot Mepibocet.
Ruth 4:10 In ki awobeni ki luticci wubipuro potone ducu, wek cam ocek iye, wek wod pa laditti onoŋ iye ginacama. Ento en Mepibocet wod pa laditti bicam i wi mejana jwijwi.” Onoŋo Jiba tye ki awobene apar wiye abic, ki luticce pyeraryo;
Ruth 4:11 Jiba owaco bot kabaka ni, “An abitiyo kit ma icika ducu, ladit kabaka.” Kit meno Mepibocet ocako cam i wi meja pa Daudi ma rom ki ŋat acel mo i kin awobe pa kabaka.
Ruth 4:12 Mepibocet onoŋo tye ki wode mo matidi ma nyiŋe Mika. Ci jo ducu ma gibedo i ot pa Jiba gudoko lutic pa Mepibocet.
Ruth 4:13 Mepibocet ocako bedo i Jerucalem, pien obedo ka cam jwijwi i wi meja pa kabaka. Onoŋo tyene aryo ducu okwe woko.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 10
Ruth 4:521  Daudi otayo jo Ammon ki jo Ciria (1 Tek 19.1-19)
Ruth 4:1 Ka man otum, kabaka me Ammon oto, ci wode Kanun oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:2 Daudi owacci, “Abinyuto cwiny me mar bot Kanun wod pa Nakac, kit ma yam wonne onyuto kwede cwiny me mar beta-ni,” Mumiyo Daudi ocwalo luticce ka kweyo cwiny Kanun pi to pa wonne, ci lutic pa Daudi guo i lobo pa jo Ammon.
Ruth 4:3 Ento rwodi pa jo Ammon guwaco bot laditgi Kanun ni, “In itamo ni Daudi ocwalo lukwe cwinyi pi keto deyo i kom woru? Daudi mono pe ocwalo luticce ka ŋiyo gaŋ ki ka roto kite ducu, wek etur woko?”
Ruth 4:4 Kit meno omiyo Kanun omako lutic pa Daudi, ci olyelo yer tik ŋat acel acel woko tuŋ cel, ka dok Oŋolo dye boŋogi i kom pyergi, ka ocwalogi kwede woko.
Ruth 4:5 Ka gitito pire bot Daudi, ocwalo dano ka jologi, pien onoŋo gitye ki lewic madwoŋ twatwal. Ci kaba ka owacpi, “Koŋ wubed i Jeriko, nio ka yer tikwu otwi olot, ka doŋ wudwog kany.”
Ruth 4:6 Ka jo Ammon guneno ni pigi odoko ŋwe marac bot Daudi, ci gucwalo dano ka wilo jo Ciria ma i Betrekob, ki jo Ciria ma i Joba, gukelo askari alip pyeraryo ma giwoto ki tyengi, ki kabaka me Maaka ma obino ki dano alip acel, ki jo Tob ma giromo alip apar wiye aryo.
Ruth 4:7 Ka Daudi owinyo pigi, ci ocwalo Joab kacel ki buca mony pa twoni oteka lweny ducu.
Ruth 4:8 Ci jo Ammon gubino gurwayo cok ka gurye i dogcel; ci jo Ciria me Joba ki me Rekob, ki jo Tob ki jo Maaka gupokke kengi, gurye i dye bar.
Ruth 4:9 Ka Joab oneno mony okacce woko ryoryo, tuŋ nyime ki yo tuŋ ŋeye bene, ci oyero jo Icrael ma oyita lweny, ocako ryeyogi gukemo jo Ciria.
Ruth 4:10 Oketo jo mudoŋŋe bot ominne Abicai, gin bene guryeyo gukemo jo Ammon.
Ruth 4:11 Joab owacci, “Ka ce jo Ciria gubedo tek i koma, ci ibikonya; ento ka jo Ammon aye gubedo tek i komi, ci an abibino ka konyi.
Ruth 4:12 Bed oteka ma cwinyi nwaŋ, wek walweny lweny me co pi lutuwa, ki gaŋi pa Lubaŋawa, Rwot bene otim gin ma oneno ni ber.”
Ruth 4:13 Kit meno Joab ki jo ma gitye kwede ducu gurwayo cok ka lweny i kom jo Ciria; ci jo Ciria guriŋo woko ki i nyime.
Ruth 4:14 Ka jo Ammon guneno jo Ciria guriŋo woko, ci gin bene gucako riŋo woko ki i nyim Abicai, gudonyo i gaŋ. Ci Joab oa woko ki i ka lweny i kom jo Ammon, odok i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:15 Ka jo Ciria guneno jo Icrael guloyogi, gucako cokke kacel.
Ruth 4:522 
Ruth 4:16 Ka Adadejer ocwalo kwena, ci gukelo jo Ciria ma gitye loka kulu Euprate; gucako bino i Kelam, kacel ki Cobak ma lawimony pa Adadejer ma obedo latel wigi.
Ruth 4:17 Ka gitito pigi bot Daudi, ci en bene ocoko jo Icrael ducu, Oŋolo kwedgi kulu Jordan, ka ocito wa i Kelam. Jo Ciria gurwayo i kom Daudi, gulwenyo i kome.
Ruth 4:18 Ento jo Ciria gucako riŋo woko ki i nyim jo Icrael; Daudi oneko jo Ciria ma romo riŋo ki gadigadi lweny miya abiro, ki wegi aguragura alip pyeraŋwen, Gucobo bene Cobak lawimony pa jo-nu, ci oto woko ki kunnu.
Ruth 4:19 Ka luker ma gubedo i te loc pa Adadejer guneno ni jo Icrael gutyeko loyogi woko, ci guketo kuc i kingi ki jo Icrael, gubedo i te locgi. Kit meno jo Ciria gucako bedo ki lworo, pe dok gumedde ki konyo jo Ammon.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 11 Daudi ki Batceba
Ruth 4:1 I dog oro ma en aye kare ma luker gicito kwede ka mony, Daudi ocwalo Joab ki luticce ki jo Icrael ducu, ci guneko jo Ammon, guyako pacogi woko, ka gurumo gaŋ me Raba, kun Daudi odon mere paco i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:2 I kare me dyeceŋ abwora, ka Daudi oa malo ki i kabutone, ci ocako wot malo i wi ot pa kabaka, Ka obolo wane oneno dako mo ma tye ka lwok, kun kome nen ma mwonya twatwal.
Ruth 4:3 Daudi ocwalo dano wek eniaŋ i kom dako-nu, Ci ŋat acel owacci, “Meno aye Batceba nya pa Eliam, ma dako pa Uria ma Lakit.”
Ruth 4:4 Daudi ocwalo lukwena ci gukwanyo dako, gutero bot Daudi, Daudi obedo kwede, I kare-nu en pud olwoko kwer monne alwoka. Lacen dako odok i ode.
Ruth 4:5 Dako-nu ogamo ic: ocwalo kwena otito lokke bot Daudi ni, “Doŋ atye ki remo.”
Ruth 4:6 Kit meno Daudi ocwalo lok bot Joab, kun wacci, “Cwalla Uria ma jo Kit.” Joab ocwalo Uria bot Daudi.
Ruth 4:7 Ka Uria oo bote, Daudi openyo gin ma Joab tye ka tiyone, ki kit ma dano gubedo kwede, ki kit ma mony tye ka wot kwede.
Ruth 4:8 Lacen Daudi owaco bot Uria ni, “Koŋ doŋ icit i odi, icilwok tyeni.” Ka Uria okato woko ki i ot pa kabaka, kabaka ocwalo mot i kore.
Ruth 4:9 Ento Uria obuto i ŋet doggola pa kabaka kacel ki lutic pa laditte, en pe ocito i ode.
Ruth 4:10 Ka gitito pire bot Daudi, ni, “Uria pe ocito gire in ode,” Daudi owaco bot Uria ni, “In pe ia ki ka wot ce? Ci piŋo pe koŋ icito wa i od i?”
Ruth 4:523 
Ruth 4:11 Uria ogamo dog Daudi ni, “Canduk pa Lubaŋa ki jo Icrael ki Juda gibedo i bolo kunnu, ki laditta Joab ki luticce ducu gibuto woko i tim, ka an aye dok acii i oda kuca ka cam ki ka mat ki ka bedo ki dakona? Macalo it ye makwo-ni, ki tipo komi tye makwo-ni, pe atwero tiyo lok macalo meno.”
Ruth 4:12 Daudi owaco bot Uria ni, “Tin dok koŋ ibed kany, ci diki doŋ aweki icito.” Omiyo Uria dok obedo i Jerucalem i nino meno, ki orwone bene.
Ruth 4:13 Daudi olwoŋe, ci ocamo ka omato i nyime, ci Daudi omiyo en omer woko. I dyewor meno en dok ocito obuto i kabutone kacel ki lutic pa laditte; pe ocito i ode.
Ruth 4:14 Daudi ocoyo waraga bot Joab odiko, ci omiyo bot Uria me atera.
Ruth 4:15 I waraga meno ocoyo ni, “Ket Uria anyim ka ma lweny gwa iye, ci wujer, wudwog cen ki ŋeye, wuweke kunnu, wek gicobe, oto woko.”
Ruth 4:16 I kare ma Joab orumo gaŋ, otugi keto Uria ka ma en ŋeyo ni oteka lweny gitye iye.
Ruth 4:17 Jo ma i gaŋ meno gubino gulwenyo i kom Joab, ci lutic pa Daudi mogo ginekogi woko. Uria ma Lakit bene gineko woko.
Ruth 4:18 Joab ocwalo kwena otito bot Daudi gin ducu ma otimme i waŋ lweny.
Ruth 4:19 Joab ociko lakwena ma ocwalo kunnu kit man ni, “Ka doŋ ityeko tito bot kabaka lok ducu mutimme i waŋ lweny,
Ruth 4:20 ka ce kiniga omako kabaka ce openyi ni, ‘Piŋo wunyiko cok wa i kom gaŋ ka lweny iye kunnu? Pe onoŋo wuŋeyo ni gibicelowu ki malo i wi cel?
Ruth 4:21 Aŋa ma yam oneko Abimelek wod pa Jerubecet? Pe dako mo aye obayo lakidi rego madit ocele kwede ki malo i wi cel, omiyo en oto woko i Tebej? Piŋo wunyiko cok i kom cel?’ Ka owaco kit man, ci in dok ibiwacce ni, ‘Laticci Uria ma Lakit bene oto woko.’ ”
Ruth 4:22 Lakwena ocito, obino otito bot Daudi gin ducu ma Joab ocwale kwede.
Ruth 4:23 Lakwena otito bot Daudi ni, “Merok olwenyo i komwa magwa, gucorre i komwa i dye bar, ento wajerogi, wadwokogi cen wa i dog gaŋ.
Ruth 4:24 Ci wegi atero gucako celowa ki malo i wi cel, guneko luticci mogo woko; wa laticci Uria bene gineko woko.”
Ruth 4:25 Daudi ogamo dog lakwena ni, “Ibiwaco bot Joab kit man ni, ‘Pe ibed ka paro lok meno, pien pala lucwan neko dano tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi. Wek mony olweny matek i kom gaŋ meno, ci imak woko, iret woko piny.’ Ci ititte ni myero oka lake matek.”
Ruth 4:26 Ka dako pa Uria owinyo ni gineko cware woko, ci ocako koko cware.
Ruth 4:524 
Ruth 4:27 Ka kwero cola otum, Daudi ocwalo kwena ci okelo Batceba i ode, odoko dakone, onywalo kwede latin laco. Ento gin ma Daudi otimo pe oyomo cwiny Rwot.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 12 Natan ojuko Daudi
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno Rwot ocwalo lanebi Natan bot Daudi, ci ocito otito bote ni, “Jo aryo yam gubedo i gaŋ mo, acel lalonyo, acel lacan.
Ruth 4:2 Lalonyo onoŋo tye ki lwak romi ki dyaŋi mapol;
Ruth 4:3 ento lacan onoŋo obedo ki bwoŋ romone acel loko ma onoŋo owilo. Ci odoŋo ki i ciŋe kacel ki litinone; romone obedo ka camo ŋide camme, kun mato pii i kikopone, dok buta bene wa i kore, obedo macalo nyare.
Ruth 4:4 I kare mo lawot obino bot dano ma lalonyo-ni, ci en pe oye kwanyo limme mo ma i kin romone kikome me tedo welone ma obino boteni, ento dok okwanyo romo pa dano ma lacan-ni, en aye otedo pi welo ma obino bote-ni.”
Ruth 4:5 Kiniga omako Daudi i kom lalonyo meno matek; ci owaco bot Natan ni, “Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, dano ma otimo kit meno ber ginek woko.
Ruth 4:6 Dok en biculo waŋ romo meno tyen aŋwen, pien otimo kumeno, ma pe otimo kica.”
Ruth 4:7 Natan owaco bot Daudi ni, “In aye i dano meno kikome. Ci Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, owaco ni, ‘Yam awiro in ki moo me bedo kabaka ma loyo Icrael. Alaro in ki i ciŋ Caulo,
Ruth 4:8 ci amiyo ot pa laditti i ciŋi, ki monne ducu amiyogi i kori, dok amiyo boti ot pa Icrael ki pa Juda. Ka ce meno ducu pud ibwonogi, kono nene ameddi makato meno.
Ruth 4:9 In icayo lok pa Rwot piŋo, ki tiyo gin marac i nyime? Nen, ityeko neko Uria ma Lakit-ti woko ki pala lucwan, ka dok ikwanyo dakone woko odoko dakoni. In aye ineko en woko ki pala lucwan pa jo Ammon.
Ruth 4:10 Pala lucwan doŋ pe biweko odi, pien ityeko cayo an pi kwanyo dako pa Uria Lakit me bedo dakoni.’
Ruth 4:11 Rwot dok owaco kit man ni, ‘Nen, abimiyo gin marac poto i komi ma bia ki i odi kikome; dok abikwanyo monni ki i nyimi, ci amiyogi bot lawoti, ci en bibuto ki monni i dyeceŋ ka maleŋ.
Ruth 4:12 In itiyo i muŋ, ento an abitiyo man atyer i nyim jo Icrael ducu, ki i dyeceŋ bene.’ “
Ruth 4:13 Daudi ogamo dog Natan ni, “An atiyo bal i kom Rwot.” Ci Natan owaco bot Daudi ni, “Rwot doŋ otyeko jwayo balli woko, pe doŋ ibito.
Ruth 4:525 
Ruth 4:14 Ento pi kit tim man nyuto atir ni ityeko cayo Rwot ibito. Ento pi kit tim man nyuto atir ni ityeko cayo Rwot marac adada; pi lok meno latin ma ginywalo-ni bito woko.”
Ruth 4:15 Lacen Natan odok i ode. Ci Rwot omiyo two ocelo latin ma dako pa Uria onywalo ki Daudi, ci two ori i kome.
Ruth 4:16 Daudi obedo ka bako doge pi latin bot Lubaŋa, kun ri kec bene; odonyo i ot obuto piny i ŋom dyewor benebene.
Ruth 4:17 Ludoŋo ma i ode gucuŋ ka ŋete pi tiŋe woko malo ki i ŋom, ento en okwero woko, pe ocamo cam mo kwedgi.
Ruth 4:18 I nino me abirone latin oto woko. Lutic pa Daudi gulworo tito pi to pa latin, pien gutamo ni, “I kare ma latin pud kwo waloko kwede, pe owinyo dogwa. Ci watwero wacce niŋniŋ ni latin otyeko to woko? Gwok nyo bitimme marac kekene.”
Ruth 4:19 Ento Daudi ka oneno luticce gitye ka kwilo lok kacel, ci oniaŋ ni latin doŋ oto woko. Owaco bot luticce ni, “Latin doŋ oto woko ce?” Gugamo ni, “En doŋ oto.”
Ruth 4:20 Ci Daudi ocako a woko ki i ŋom, olwokke, owiro kome ki moo, ka oloko boŋŋine bene. Okato woko ocito i ot pa Rwot, oworo Lubaŋa; ka dok okato woko ocito i ode kikome. Ka openyo pi cam, guketo cam i nyime ci ocamo.
Ruth 4:21 Luticce guwaco bote ni, “Man kit gin aŋo ma itiyo, ladit? In ibedo ka ri kec ki ka koko pi latin ma onoŋo pud kwo; ento ka latin doŋ oto woko, ci doŋ ia malo icako camo cam.”
Ruth 4:22 Daudi ogamo ni, “I kare ma latin pud tye makwo-ni, abedo ka ri kec ki ka koko pi latin kun atamo ni, ‘Aŋa mono ma ŋeyo ka nyo kica bimako Rwot i koma, wek latin pe oto?’
Ruth 4:23 Ento kombeddi doŋ latin otyeko to woko; pud dok ari kec piŋo kono? An dok atwero dwoko en cen bo? Wayi an aye doŋ abicito bote yo, ento en pe dok bidwogo bota.”
Ruth 4:24 Daudi okweyo cwiny dakone Batceba, ci obedo kwede. Onywalo kwede latin laco, ocako nyiŋe Solomon. Rwot bene omaro latin-nu.
Ruth 4:25 Ocwalo lanebi Natan, ci ocako nyiŋ latin ni Jedidia , pi Rwot. Daudi omako Raba (1 Tek 20.1-3)
Ruth 4:26 I kare meno Joab obedo ka lweny i kom Raba, ma en gaŋ pa jo Ammon, ci omako gaŋ piine.
Ruth 4:27 Ocwalo lukwena bot Daudi ka wacce ni, “Abedo ka lweny i kom Raba, atyeko mako gaŋ piine bene.
Ruth 4:526 
Ruth 4:28 In doŋ icok lwak mudoŋŋi kacel, ci ibin irum gaŋ man wek imak woko, wek pe an aye amaki, miyo gilwoŋo ki nyiŋa.”
Ruth 4:29 Kit meno Daudi ocoko lwak kacel ci ocito kunnu kwedgi i Raba, olwenyo i kome ci omako woko.
Ruth 4:30 Daudi okwanyo lalukana me jabu ki i wi Milkom ma jokpa jo Ammon. Pekke romo ratili miyaacel, got me wel bene onoŋo tye iye, ci gicibo i wi Daudi. Daudi Odwogo ki jami ma giyako i gaŋ-ŋu madwoŋ twatwal.
Ruth 4:31 Dok okelo dano ma giyakogi ki i gaŋ meno, oketogi ka tic ki mucumeno ki cururu nyonyo ki latoŋ-gu, ka dok oketigi ka tic matek me waŋo matafali; en obedo ka timo dano ma i gaŋi pa jo Ammon kit meno. Lacen Daudi ki lwak ducu gudok cen i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 13 Amnon gin ki Tamar
Ruth 4:1 Abcalom onoŋo tye ki laminne mamwonya twatwal ma nyiŋe Tamar. Ci Amnon wod pa Daudi ocako maro nyako-nu.
Ruth 4:2 Amnon obedo ki miti madwoŋ i kome; pi paro lamininne Tamar ocako kelle two. Onoŋo Tamar pud latin nyako ma peya oŋeyo laco dok Amnon oneno ni pe etwero noŋo kare me bedo kwede.
Ruth 4:3 Ento Amnon onoŋo tye ki lareme mo ma nyiŋe Jonadab, wod pa Cimea ma omin Daudi. Jonadab aye dano mo maryek twatwal.
Ruth 4:4 Openyo Amnon ni, “Wod pa kabaka, gin aŋo mono ma jonyo in jwijwi-ni? Pe ititta lokke ce?” Amnon ogamo ni, “An amaro Tamar ma lamiŋ omera Abcalom.”
Ruth 4:5 Jonadab owaco bote ni, “But piny i wi kitandani, ipor two. Ka woru Daudi obino ka limo twoni, ci iwacce ni, ‘Wek lamera Tamar aye obin omiya cam ka wek acam, kun en yubo ki i nyima, ma aneno, ka dok acamo ki i ciŋe.’ “
Ruth 4:6 Kit meno Amnon oyako buto piny kun poro two. Ka kabaka obino ka limo two, ci Amnon olego kabaka kun wacci, “Alegi iwek lamera Tamar aye obin oted capat mogo aryo ki i nyima, ka wek acam ki i ciŋe.”
Ruth 4:7 Daudi ocwalo lok paco bot Tamar kun wacci, “Cit i ot pa omeru Amnon, wek iciyubbe cam kunnu.”
Ruth 4:8 Mumiyo Tamar ocito wa i ot ca ominne Amnon, ci otedo capat ki i nyime. Ka capat ocek,
Ruth 4:9 ci otiŋo otako woko, oloko capat ocibo i nyim Amnon wek ocam. Ento Amnon okwero camo. O wacci, “Gicwal dano ducu woko cen ki i nyima.” Kit meno dano ducu gucito gua woko ki i nyime.
Ruth 4:527 
Ruth 4:10 Ka Amnon dok owaco bot Tamar ni, “Kel cam wa i tyelo bota kany, wek acak camone ki i ciŋi.” Tamar otero capat ma otedo-nii tyelo bot ominne Amnon.
Ruth 4:11 Ento ka Tamar okelo cam ka ma cok kwede wekocam, ci oa malo opoto i kome kun wacce ni, “Bin wek ibut kwede, lamera.”
Ruth 4:12 Tamar oagmo ni, “Pe kumeno, omera, pe imaka tektek, pien kit tim macalo ma peya onen i Icrael kulu. Pe itim tim me miŋo kit man.
Ruth 4:13 Ci an mono, abitero lakit lewic-ci wa kwene? In bene ibibedo ŋat mutimo tim me kipyeda i Icrael kulu. Alegi ni, ipeny kabaka; en pe bikwero i koma.”
Ruth 4:14 Ento Amnon pe owinyo lokke; dok obedo ki tek makato nyako-nu, ci omake ki tek, obedo kwede.
Ruth 4:15 Lacen Amnon ocako kwero Tamar ki kwer madit twatwal; dok kweroen obedo madit makato mar ma yam omare kwede. Amnon owacce ni, “Doŋ ikat woko iciti.”
Ruth 4:16 Ento Tamar owacce ni, “Pe kumeno, omera. Cwala woko tektek aye dok rac makato tim kipyeda ma doŋ itimo i koma-ni.” Amnon pe omedo ki winyo lokke.
Ruth 4:17 Olwoŋo awobi ma tiyo bote, owacce ni, “Cwal dako-ni woko ki i nyima, ci irwak lalor doggola iceg woko ki i yo ŋeye.”
Ruth 4:18 Onoŋo Tamar oruko boŋo gomci mabor ki bade bene boco, pien meno aye kit ruk pa anyira pa kabaka ma peya giŋeyo co. Latic pa Amnon ocwalo Tamar woko, oloro doggola ocego woko ki i yo ŋeye.
Ruth 4:19 Tamar ocako onyo buru i wiye, la oyeco gomci ma oruko-ni, okwako wiye ki ciŋe, ocito kwede kun kok matek.
Ruth 4:20 Abcalom openya laminne ni, “Omeru Amnon obedo kwedi co? Kombeddii doŋ iliŋ mot, lamera.” En obedo Abcalom ki cwercwiny madwoŋ kun bedo kene.
Ruth 4:21 Ka kabaka Daudi owinyo lok meno ducu, obedo ki kiniga madwoŋ.
Ruth 4:22 Abcalom pe omedo ki loko lok mo bot Amnon maber nyo marac, ento cwinye okwero Amnon matek pi mako laminne ki tek. Abcalom oculo kwor pa Tamar ci oriŋo woko
Ruth 4:23 Ka doŋ mwaka okato aryo, Abcalom obedo ki lunyar yer romine i Baalkajor ma cok ki Epraim, ci olwoŋo awobe pa kabaka ducu me bino iye.
Ruth 4:24 Ocito wa bot kabaka owacce ni, “Nen, atye ki lunyar yer romina, Alego in kabaka ki Tuticci wubin wucit iye kacel kweda.”.
Ruth 4:25 Ento kabaka owaco bot Abcalom ni, “Pe ku meno, latinna, pe iwek wan ducu wacit kunnu, miyo wacikelli peko.” Abcalom odiye ki tek, ento pe oye cito kunnu, olamme gum keken.
Ruth 4:528 
Ruth 4:26 Abcalom dok owacci, “Ka doŋ pe icito, alegi iwek Amnon ma omera aye ocit kwedwa.” Kabaka ogamo ni, “Piŋo imito ni en bene ocit kwedwu?”
Ruth 4:27 Ento Abcalom odiye ki tek, mumiyo lacen oweko Amnon ocito kwede, ki awobe pa kabaka ducu.
Ruth 4:28 Abcalom ociko luticce ni. “Wunen maber ka doŋ cwiny., Amnon edoko yom ki koŋo vino. Ka ce doŋ awacciwu ni ‘Wucob Amnon,’ ci doŋ wuneke woko. Pe wulwor iye gin mo, pien an aye acikowu. Wubed ma cwinywu nwaŋ, Wubed twoni lweny matego.”
Ruth 4:29 Lutic pa Abcalom guneko Amnon kit ma ocikogi kwede, Awobe pa kabaka mukene ducu gutwarre malo ki ŋwec, ci ŋat acel acel opye i wi kanane oriŋo kwede woko.
Ruth 4:30 Lok okwoŋo o bot Daudi ma pud peya guo paco ni, “Abcalom oneko awobe pa kabaka woko ducu liweŋ, ma cel mo pe obwot.”
Ruth 4:31 Kabaka oa malo, ocako yeco boŋŋine woko pi cwercwiny, obuto piny i nom. Lutticce ma gucuŋ ka ŋete bene guyeco boŋŋigi woko.
Ruth 4:32 Ento Jonadab wod pa Cimea omin Daudi, owacci, “Laditta, pe ibed ka tamo ni gineko litino awobeni woko ducu. Amnon kene aye gineko. Gineko pi cik pa Abcalom, pien omoko lok man i cwinye cakke ki i kare ma Amnon omako iye laminne Tamar tektek-ki.
Ruth 4:33 Kombeddi, rwoda kabaka, pe ibed ka tamo ni awobeni ducu doŋ guto woko; Amnon kene aye oto.”
Ruth 4:34 Abcalom oriŋo woko. Ci awobi ma kuro piny otiŋo waŋe oneno piny, ci nen, lwak dano gibino ki i yo ma a ki i Koronaim kun girabo ŋet got.
Ruth 4:35 Jonadab dok owaco bot kabaka ni, “Doŋ inen ba, litino awobeni doŋ gitye ka bino kit macalo awacci-ni. Lokka doŋ ocobo kakare.”
Ruth 4:36 Ka doŋ otyeko waco lokke, ki i ŋeye cut, awobe pa kabaka gutuc paco. Gucako daŋŋe ki koko, ci kabaka bene wa ki luticce ducu gukok matek twatwal.
Ruth 4:37 Ento Abcalom oriŋo woko, ocito bot Talmai wod pa Amikud, kabaka me Gecur. Daudi obedo ka koko pi wode pi nino mapo!.
Ruth 4:38 Kit meno Abcalom oriŋo ocito i Gecur, obedo kunnu mwaka adek.
Ruth 4:39 Lacen ka cwiny kabaka doŋ okwe pi to pa Amnon, cwinye ocako pido pi Abcalom.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 14 Joab oyubo lok wek Abcalom odwog cen
Ruth 4:529 
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno. Joab wod pa Jeruya onoŋo doŋ otyeko niaŋ maber ni cwiny kabaka tye ka pido pi Abcalom.
Ruth 4:2 Ci Joab ocwalo kwena i Tekoa ka omo dako mo ma laryeko ma tye kunnu. Ka obino ci owacce ni, “Ber ipor koko, dok iruk ginaruka me cola. Pe iwir komi ki moo, ento bed macalo dako ma obedo ka koko lato pi kare malac,
Ruth 4:3 ka icit kwede bot kabaka, icilok kwede kit man.” Kumeno Joab opiko dako-nu ki lok.
Ruth 4:4 Ka dako me Tekoa obino bot kabaka, ci oryebbe piny i ŋom, omiye woro, kun wacci, “Konya, ai kabaka.”
Ruth 4:5 Kabaka owacce ni, “Gin aŋo ma tye ka yeli?” Dako-nu ogamo ni, “Ada, an a dalako; cwara doŋ oto woko.
Ruth 4:6 Onoŋo atye ki awobe aryo, ci ceŋ mo gubedo ka da kekengi i poto, ma latek kingi peke; ci ŋat acel ogoyo wadi oneko woko.
Ruth 4:7 Ci kaka ducu gutwarre gubino i koma, gucako lok ni, ‘Kel dano ma ogoyo ominne oneko woko-ni, wek wanek woko.’. Nen, gimito neko laleyo woko, pi culo kwor pa ominne. Kit meno gimito neko dog macca mudoŋŋi, ci doŋ pe giweko gin mo pi nyiŋ cwara, en doŋ pe bibedo ki danone mo ma doŋ i wi lobo.”
Ruth 4:8 Kabaka owaco bot dako-nu ni, “Dok wa i odi, ci abicwalo cik ma mako lok komi.”
Ruth 4:9 Dako me Tekoa dok owaco bot kabaka ni, “Aliine opot i koma, laditta kabaka, ki i kom ot pa wora. Wek alii mo pe opot i kom kabaka ki i kom kom kerre.”
Ruth 4:10 Kabaka ogamo ni, “Ka ce ŋatti mo owacci lok mo, ci ikel en bota, ci doŋ en pe bigudo komi matwal.”
Ruth 4:11 Dako-nu ogamo ni, “Ladit kabaka, tim ber ikwoŋ i nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋani, kun iwacci, Lacul kwor remo pa lato owek neko woda obedi, wek latinna pe oto doki.” Kabaka ogamo ni, “Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, yer wi wodi mo pe bipoto i ŋom.”
Ruth 4:12 Dako-nu dok owaco ni, “Alegi ni iwek dok alok lok mo acel boti, laditta kabaka.” Kabaka ogamo ni, “Waci.”
Ruth 4:13 Dakonu owacci, “Piŋo cwinyi oteri ka tiyo gin marac i kom lwak pa Lubaŋa? Pi kit ŋol ma iŋolo-ni omiyo in kabaka iŋolo kop i komi keni ni oloyi, pien pe idwoko latin ma giryemo woko-ni paco.
Ruth 4:14 Wan ducu wabito woko, wan wacalo pii ma okir piny i ŋom, ma pe dok gitwero gurone kacel. Ento Lubaŋa pe twero kwanyo kwa pa ŋat mo ma yenyo yo wek danone ma giryemo pe giryem woko matwal.
Ruth 4:15 An abino kany ka lok kwedi, laditta kabaka pien dano gumiya lworo, omiyo atamo ni, ‘Abilok ki kabaka; gwok kabaka bitiyo iye gin mo i kom lok ma alego dok bicobone.
Ruth 4:530 
Ruth 4:16 Pien kabaka biwinyo, ci bilaro laticce ki i ciŋ dano ma gimito jwayo an kacel ki woda woko ki i lobo pa Lubaŋa.’
Ruth 4:17 Dok onoŋo atamo ni, ‘Lok pa laditta kabaka bimiyo cwinya kwe.’ Pien in, laditta kabaka, irom ki lamalaika pa Lubaŋa ma poko kin lok maber ki maracce. Rwot Lubaŋani obed kwedi.”
Ruth 4:18 Kabaka dok ogamo dog dako-nu ni, “Pe imuŋŋa lok ducu ma apenyi kwede.” Dako-nu ogamo ni, “Lok ba, laditta kabaka.”
Ruth 4:19 Kabaka openye ni, “Wun wuribo dogwu ki Joab i kom lok man ducu?” Dako-nu ogamo kun wacci, “Lok me adane, kit ma it ye makwo-ni, laditta kabaka, dano pe twero lokke yo tuŋ acuc nyo yo tuŋ acam i kom lok ma in kabaka ipenyoni, Laticci Joab aye ociko an; en kikome aye oketo lok magi ducu i doga.
Ruth 4:20 Laticci Joab otimo man wek tam manyen obin. Ento in, laditta kabaka, ryekoni rom ki ryeko pa lamalaika pa Lubaŋa, pien iŋeyo gin ducu ma timme i wi lobe-ni.”
Ruth 4:21 Lacen kabaka owaco bot Joab ni, “Nen ba, tin ajolo lokki. Ber icit iciom latin man Abcalom, idwok en paco.”
Ruth 4:22 Ci Joab opoto oryebbe piny i ŋom omiyo woro, olamo gum i kom kabaka. Joab owacci, “Tin an laticci doŋ aŋeyo ni ayomo cwinyi, laditta kabaka, pien ityeko jolo gin ma alego boti.”
Ruth 4:23 Joab ocito i Gecur, oomo Abcalom okele paco i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:24 Ento kabaka ociko ni, “Wek en koŋ obed ki cen i ode, pe obin i nyima kany.” Ci Abcalom obedo gire ki cen i ode, pe omedo ki bino i nyim kabaka.
Ruth 4:25 I kare-nu pe tye ŋatti mo ma giboro mwonyane makato Abcalom ki i lobo Icrael ducu; kome mwonya cakke ki i tyene nio wa i cwiny dye wiye, kome ducu nen mwonya matek.
Ruth 4:26 En yam ŋolo yer wiye i tum mwaka ducu; ka oneno ni yer wiye doŋ odoko pek, ci doŋ ŋolo woko. Ka ce olyelo yer wiye, en pimo ki mijan pa kabaka, ci pekke kato ratili adek ki nucu.
Ruth 4:27 Abcalom onoŋo tye ki litino awobe adek ki nyako acel ma nyiŋe Tamar; nyako- nu bene mwonya matek.
Ruth 4:28 Abcalom obedo i Jerucalem pi mwaka aryo ma pe cito i nyim kabaka.
Ruth 4:29 Lacen ocwalo kwena bot Joab wek otere bot kabaka, ento Joab pe omedo ki cito bote. Dok ocwalo kwena tyen me aryone, Joab dok pe ocito bote.
Ruth 4:30 Ci Abcalom owaco bot luticce ni, “Nen, poto pa Joab tye cok ki mera, ocoyo bel cayiri iye. Wucit wuwaŋ woko.”
Ruth 4:31 Joab oa ocito bot Abcalom, odonyo i ode, ci openye ni, “Piŋo luticci guwaŋo potona woko?”
Ruth 4:531 
Ruth 4:32 Abcalom ogamo dog Joab ni, “Abedo ka cwalo lok boti ni ibin kany wek acwali bot kabaka, wek ipenye ni, ‘Piŋo aa woko ki i Gecur. Kono nene abedo gira kunnu.’ Kombeddi amito cito i nyim kabaka. Ka roc mo tye i koma, wek en oneka woko.”
Ruth 4:33 Joab ocito bot kabaka, owacce lokke, ci kabaka olwoŋo Abcalom. Abcalom ocito bot kabaka, oryebbe piny i nyime, ci kabaka ojole onoto leme.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 15 Abcalom otemo mayo ker pa wonne
Ruth 4:1 I ŋe meno Abcalom ocako noŋo gadigadine ki aguragura me ywayone, ki dano pyerabic ma giriŋo i nyime.
Ruth 4:2 Obedo ka a malo odiko con jwijwi, ci cuŋ i ŋet yo i dogcel me Jerucalem. Ka oneno dano mo ma okelo lok me alara bot kabaka, en lwoŋo dano-nu ci waco bote ni, “In ia ki gaŋ mene?” Ka ce dano meno owaco ni, “An aa ki i Icrael i kaka munyo,”
Ruth 4:3 ci Abcalom waco bote ni, “Nen ba, lokki nen mit dok tye atir, ento ŋatti mo pe tye ma kabaka oketo ma biwinyo lokki.”
Ruth 4:4 Abcalom dok waco ni, “Kono yam giketo an aye abedo laŋolkop i lobo-ni, kono ber twatwal! Kono ŋat ma tye ki lokke nyo pidone tugi bino bota, ci aŋolle kop matir cut.”
Ruth 4:5 I kare ducu ka dano bino ryebbe piny ka miye woro, ci en cwalo ciŋe kwako ki dano-nu, ci mote ki mot me mar.
Ruth 4:6 Abcalom obedo ka timo jo Icrael ducu kit meno ka gibino ka pidogi bot kabaka; ci oywayo cwiny jo lerael ducu odwoko i kome.
Ruth 4:7 I agikki me mwaka me aŋwenne, Abcalom openyo kabaka ni, “Alegi wek acit Kebron ka cobo kwoŋŋa ma yam akwoŋo bot Rwot.
Ruth 4:8 Pien yam akwoŋo kwoŋ, ladit, i kare ma abedo i Gecur i lobo Ciria kun awacci, ‘Ka Rwot odwoka tuwa i Jerucalem ada, ci abicito ka miye woro.’ “
Ruth 4:9 Kabaka ogamo ni, “Ber icit ki kuc.” Ci Abcalom ocito i Kebron.
Ruth 4:10 Ento Abcalom ocwalo lukwena i muŋ ci guwoto gurumo i kaka pa jo Icrael ducu, kun en ciko ni, “Ka tekke wuwinyo dwan tum okok, ci wuwacci, ‘Abcalom doŋ odoko kabaka i Kebron!’”
Ruth 4:11 Abcalom ocito ki dano ma gua ki i Jerucalem ma giromo miya aryo ma olwoŋogi macalo welo. Gin gucito ata ma pe giŋeyo tere.
Ruth 4:12 I kare ma Abcalom tye ka tyero gitum, ocwalo kwena olwoŋo Akitopel ma jo Gilo, ma lami-tam pa Daudi, ci en oa ki i gaŋgi Gilo, obino. Ci piro lokgi omedde matek, lwak gubedo ka medde bot Abcalom ameda.
Ruth 4:532 
Ruth 4:13 Kwena obino bot Daudi ma wacce ni, “Cwiny jo Icrael odak woko ka lubo kor Abcalom.”
Ruth 4:14 Daudi owaco bot jo ducu ma gitye kwede i Jerucalem ni, “Wutugi a wek wariŋu woko. Ka pe wurune wacito woko oyoto, ci dano mo pe bibwot ki i ciŋ Abcalom, miyo bipoto i komwa, ci bikelo can madwoŋ i komwa. En bineko dano ma i gaŋ tyeko woko ki pala lucwan.”
Ruth 4:15 Ci lutic pa kabaka guwaco bote ni, “Nen ba, wan luticci watye ka kuro gin ducu ma in imoko.”
Ruth 4:16 Kabaka ocito woko ki jo ma i ode ducu i kore, ento oweko mon aŋeca ma giromo apar ka gwoko ot.
Ruth 4:17 Kabaka ocito woko ki lwak ducu i kore; ci ocuŋ cok ki ot me agikkine.
Ruth 4:18 Luticce ducu gumol gukato ki i nyime; ki jo Keret ducu, ki jo Pelet ducu ki jo Gat miya abicel ma yam gulubo kore nia ki i Gat; gin ducu gumol gukato ki i nyim kabaka.
Ruth 4:19 Kabaka owaco bot Itayi, dano me Gat, ni, “Piŋo in bene icito kweda? Dok cen icibed ki kabaka manyen; pien in larok ma ia woko ki i lobowu.
Ruth 4:20 Pud ibino abina laworo maca, ka an tin dok amiyi ibed ka wirre ka mal ata kwedwa? Nen, an abiwoto ka ma pe aŋeyo. Dok cen, ikwany omegiwu gudok kwedi. Myero Rwot omi marre ma pe lokke, ma genne, obed i komwu.”
Ruth 4:21 Ento Itayi odok iye bot kabaka ni, “Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, dok macalo in kabaka it ye makwo-ni, kabedo ducu ma ibibedo iye, laditta, kadi bed to kadi bed kwo, an bene abibedo kunnu.”
Ruth 4:22 Daudi owaco bot Itayi ni, “Doŋ ikat wacit kacel,” ci Itayi me Gat okato kacel ki jone ducu ki litinone matino ma gitye bote ducu.
Ruth 4:23 Dano ducu gubedo ka koko matek i kare ma jo pa Daudi gikato ka ŋetgi, Kabaka Oŋolo laora kulu Kidron, ci lwak ducu gukato gukemo yo tim.
Ruth 4:24 Ka Abiatar obino, ci Jadok bene otugi bi no ki jo Levi ducu, ma gutiŋo canduk me gicikke pa Lubaŋa. Guketo canduk pa Lubaŋa piny, nio ka lwak ducu gumol ki i gaŋ, gukato woko.
Ruth 4:25 Kabaka owaco bot Jadok ni, “Tiŋ canduk pa Lubaŋa, idwok cen i gaŋ, Ka ce alimo gum bot Rwot, ci abidwogo paco ci dok aneno kome ki ka ma en bedo iye.
Ruth 4:26 Ento ka Rwot owacci pe etye ki yomcwiny mo i koma, ci nen, an doŋ atye ene, wek en doŋ otim i koma gin ducu ma en neno ni ber ki tuŋ bote.”
Ruth 4:27 Kabaka dok owaco bot ajwaka Jadok ni, “Nen ba, wudok i gaŋ, wun ki Abiatar ki awobewu aryo, Akimaj ma wedi-ni ki Yonacan wod pa Abiatar.
Ruth 4:28 Abikurogi ki i waŋ wat ma i tim, nio ka lok bia ki botwu ma miya ŋec mogo.”
Ruth 4:533 
Ruth 4:29 Kit meno Jadok ki Abiatar gutiŋo canduk pa Lubaŋa, gudok kwede cen i Jerucalem, ci gubedo kunnu.
Ruth 4:30 Ento Daudi ocako ito malo i wi got Jeituni. En ito malo ki koko, ki tyene noŋo, ma oumo wiye; ki jo ma gitye kwede ducu guumo wigi, ma giwoto kun gikok.
Ruth 4:31 Ka dok gitito bot Daudi ni, “Akitopel bene tye i kin lupir lok ki Abcalom.” Daudi olego Rwot ni, “Ai Rwot, alegi imi tam ma Akitopel miyo obed lok me miŋmiŋ.”
Ruth 4:32 Daudi oito malo, oo i wi got ka ma giworo iye Lubaŋa. Ci nen, Kucai ma La-arki otuc, obino ka rwatte kwede ma kanyine oyec woko, ki ma ojuko wiye ki ŋom.
Ruth 4:33 Daudi owacce ni, “In ka iwoto kweda ibimiya peko.
Ruth 4:34 Ento ber idok i gaŋ ci iwac bot Abcalom ni, ibibedo laticce, kit ma yam ibedo laticca i kare ma an abedo kabaka. Ci in aye ibibalo tam ma Akitopel miyo bote.
Ruth 4:35 Jadok ki Abiatar ajwagi pa Lubaŋa gibibedo kwedi kunnu.
Ruth 4:36 Awobegi aryo bene gitye kunnu, Akimaj wod pa Jadok ki Yonacan wod pa Abiatar. Ibicwalla lok ducu ma iwinyo, wok ki botgi.”
Ruth 4:37 Kit meno Kucai ma larem Daudi obino i Jerucalem ki i kare ma Abcalom donyo kwede i gaŋ.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 16 Daudi gin ki Jiba
Ruth 4:1 Ka Daudi okato cwiny wi got manok, ci Jiba laticpa Mepibocet orwatte kwede kun tye ki kana aryo ma gitweyo kom me bedo i wigi, dok guyeyo mugati miya aryo, tuga olok mutwo miya acel, nyig yat mucek i oro miya acel ki opiro koŋo vino acel.
Ruth 4:2 Kabaka openyo Jiba ni, “Ikele jami-ni me ŋo?” Jiba ogamo ni, “Akelo kana pi konyo jo ma i odi, kabaka, wek gubed i wigi me wotgi, ki mugati me acama pa awobeni, ki koŋo vino me amata pa jo ma komgi oloc i tim.”
Ruth 4:3 Kabaka dok openye ni, “Latin pa Laditti Caulo tye kwene?” Jiba ogamo dog kabaka ni, “Aweko en tye odoŋ i Jerucalem; pien en tye ka tamo ni, tin doŋ jo me ot pa Icrael gibidwoko ker pa wonne i ciŋe.”
Ruth 4:4 Kabaka owaco bot Jiba ni, “Nen ba, jami ma yam pa Mepibocet ducu tin doŋ gudoko meri.” Jiba ogamo ni. “An doŋ apoto aryebbe piny i nyimi, wek amedde ki noŋo gum i nyimi, laditta kabaka.” Daudi gin ki Cimei
Ruth 4:5 Ka kabaka oo i Bakurim, ci laco mo obino bote, dano me ot pa Caulo, Nyiŋe Cimei wod pa Gera, En woto bino kun ceno dano medde kwede ameda,
Ruth 4:534 
Ruth 4:6 kun celo Daudi ki got-gu, wa lutic pa kabaka ducu, ki lwak ducu, ki twoni lweny ducu ma gitye i ŋet Daudi yo tuŋ lacuc ki yo tuŋ lacam.
Ruth 4:7 Cimei obedo ka ceno dano kunwacci, “Wot iciti, wot iciti, in lao remo, in dano ma kite peke!
Ruth 4:8 Rwot doŋ oculo kwor i komi pi oyo remo i ot pa Caulo ma koni it ye ka loc makakare. Rwot doŋ otiŋo ker omiyo woko i ciŋ wodi Abcalom. Neri ka to-piny doŋ opoto i komi, pien in i dano ma lao Remo.”
Ruth 4:9 Abicai wod pa Jeruya owaco bot kabaka ni, “Piŋo gwok muto-ni bedo ka ceni, laditta kabaka? Wek akat i kome aciŋol wiye woko.”
Ruth 4:10 Ento kabaka ogamo ni, “An alaro aŋo kwedwu, wun awobe pa Jeruya? Ka ce en tye ka ceno an ma onoŋo Rwot aye ocike ni, ‘Cit icen Daudi,’ ci aŋa ma dok biwacci, ‘Piŋo itimo kit meno?’ “
Ruth 4:11 Daudi dok owaco bot Abicai ki luticce ducu ni, “Nen ba, woda aye mito neka, ci Labenjamin man pe doŋ bimito neka makato? Wuwek en obedi, wek obed ka cena gire, pien Rwot aye ocike.
Ruth 4:12 Gwok nyo Rwot aye bineno kit atwom ma tye i koma, ci Rwot aye biculla ki gin maber ma ka cen ma gicena kwede tin.”
Ruth 4:13 Kit meno Daudi ki lwak ke gulubo yo gucito gigi; kun kono Cimei woto rabo ŋet got ma woto porre ki Daudi, kun woto cene kwede, ka bayo got celo ki kome, ka onyo apwa bene i kome.
Ruth 4:14 Kabaka ki jo ducu ma gitye kwede guwoto guo i dog kulu Jordan ma guol matek, ci kabaka ocako jiŋ maber ki kenyo.
Ruth 4:15 Abcalom ki lwak ke ducu, ma gin jo Icrael, gubino gucorre i Jerucalem kacel ki Akitopel.
Ruth 4:16 Ka Kucai ma La-arki, ma larem Daudi, obino bot Abcalom, Kucai owaco bot Abcalom ni, “Kabaka obed kwo nakanaka. Kabaka obed kwo nakanaka!”
Ruth 4:17 Abcalom owaco bot Kucai ni, “Meno aye yo me nyuto mar bot laremi bo? Piŋo pe icito kacel kilaremi?”
Ruth 4:18 Kucai owaco bot Abcalom ni, “Pe kumeno, pien ka ŋat ma Rwot ki lwak man kacel ki jo Icrael ducu gutyeko yerone, an abibedo danone dok abibedo kwede bene.
Ruth 4:19 An dok abitiyo bot aŋa? Pe myero abed bot wode kikome? Kit ma yam abedo ka tic bot woru-ni, abitic boti bene kit meno.”
Ruth 4:20 Abcalom dok owaco bot Akitopel ni, “Ŋolla ryeko ba; doŋ wabitimo gin aŋo?”
Ruth 4:535 
Ruth 4:21 Akitopel owaco bot Abcalom ni, “Doŋ itugi cito bot mon aŋeca pa woru, ma owekogi ka gwoko ot-ti. Ci jo Icrael ducu gibiwinyo ni, in piri doŋ odoko uwe bot woru, miyo jo ducu ma gitye tuŋ boti komgi biyarre woko ki tek.”
Ruth 4:22 Kit meno giguro kema pi Abcalom malo i wi ot, ci Abcalom ocako donyo i, wi moo aŋeca pa wonne ma Jo Icrael ducu gineno.
Ruth 4:23 I kare meno tam ducu ma Akitopel miyo nen calo lok pa Lubaŋa kikome. Tam me ryeko ma Akitopel miyo nen ber kit meno bot Daudi wa bot Abcalom bene.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 17 Kucai obalo tam me ryeko pa Akitopel
Ruth 4:1 Akitopel dok owaco bot Abcalom ni, “Wek ayer dano alip apar wiye aryo, wek an kikoma acak wot me lubo kor Daudi tin, i dyewor.
Ruth 4:2 Abio bote ma noŋo pud ool woko, ma tamme bene goro; wek atugi baŋo kome woko, ci jo ma gitye bote ducu gibiriŋo woko. Abineko en kabaka keken,
Ruth 4:3 ci abidwoko lwak ducu boti, macalo nyako ger ma bino paco bot cware, Tye dano acel keken ma imito neko, ci lwak ducu gibibedo ki kuc.”
Ruth 4:4 Tam meno me ryeko oyomo cwiny Abcalom ki ludoŋo pa jo Icrael ducu.
Ruth 4:5 Abcalom dok owacci, “Wulwomja Kucai La-arki bene, wek wawinyu bene gin ma en biwaco.”
Ruth 4:6 Ka gilwoŋo Kucai, obino bot Abcalom, ci Abcalom owacce ni, “Akitopel owaco kuman kuman, wabitic ki kit tamme-ni? Ka pe, ci in iwaci.”
Ruth 4:7 Kucai owaco bot Abcalom ni, “Tam ma Akitopel okeloni pe ber.”
Ruth 4:8 Kucai dok omedde ki lokke ni, “In iŋeyo maber ni, woru ki jone ducu gin lulweny matego, gin gitwoni ma lugero magwa, macalo ŋuu ma ger pi litinone ka gimako i tim. Dok pud amedo ni, woru oyita lweny, en pe twero buto ki lwak kacel i dyewor.
Ruth 4:9 Nen ba, kadi wa kombeddi en tye mukanne woko i bur kaikene, nyo i kabedo mo kunnu. Ka ce owinnye ni jo mogo ginekogi woko ki i lweny mukwoŋo-ni, ka dano mo owinyo biwacci, gibedo ka neko dano ma gubedo ka lubo kor Abcalom.
Ruth 4:10 Ci kadi bed dano mo yam oteka lweny, ma cwinye nwaŋ macalo cwiny labwor, cwiny me lworo bimiyo kome to woko lirut; pien jo Icrael ducu giŋeyo ni woru oyi ta lweny, ki jone ma gitye bote ducu gin oteka lweny.
Ruth 4:11 Ento an amiyo tamma kit man ni, wek jo Icrael ducu gucokke boti, cakke ki i Dan nio wa i Beer-ceba, wek gubed mapol ma rom ki kweyo ma i dog nam, in kikomi bene icit kwedgi ka lweny.
Ruth 4:536 
Ruth 4:12 Kit meno miyo wabipoto i kome ki i kabedo mo ma kome binoŋŋe iye, ci wabicorre i kome macalo toyo ma poto luk i ŋom: ci en kikome ki jo ducu ma gitye kwede ŋatti mo acel i kingi pe bibwot.
Ruth 4:13 Ka ce oriŋo woko odonyo i gaŋ mo, ci jo Icrael ducu gibikelo tol girumo ki gaŋ meno, gicako ywayo gicoro woko wa i nota; kadi wa kidi laliŋliŋ mo pe gibinoŋo mudoŋ kunnu.”
Ruth 4:14 Ci Abcalom ki lwak ducu ma i Icrael gugamo ni, “Tam ma Kucai La-arki omiyo- ni aye ber makato pa Akitopel.” Pien onoŋo Rwot yam doŋ oketo ni, gibibalo te tam pa Akitopel woko kadi bed ber twatwal, ka wek Rwot oket can mapek i kom Abcalom. Gimiyo ŋec bot Daudi ci obwot woko
Ruth 4:15 Lacen Kucai dok otito lok bot ajwaka Jadok ki Abiatar ni, “Akitopel onoŋo omiyo tam me ryeko bot Abcalom ki Ludoŋo pa jo Icrael kuman; ki an bene dok amiyo tamma kuman.
Ruth 4:16 Kombeddi doŋ wucwal kwena oyotoyot bot Daudi wutitte ni, tin pe dok obut i waŋ wat ma i tim, ento oa woko oyoto okat wa loka ca, wek pe mony omak kabaka ki jo ma en tye kwedgi onekgi woko ducu.”
Ruth 4:17 I kare meno onoŋo Yonacan ki Akimaj gubedo ka kuro lok i En-rogel. Kunnu aŋeca mo wirre iye jwijwi ka tero lok botgi, ka gikwano lokke gitero gitito bot Daudi; ento gigwokke ma komgi pe nen ka gidonyo i gaŋ.
Ruth 4:18 Ento latin awobi mo waŋe ocob i komgi ci onenogi, ocito otito pigi bot Abcalom. Gin aryo ducu gurune gucito i paco pa dano mo ma i Bakurim ma onoŋo tye ki waŋ itte i dyekalle, ci gudonyo gulutte iye.
