Ruth 4:19 Dakone otiŋo laum dog waŋ it opeto oumo ki wiye, ka okelo kai omoyo i wiye; pe tye dano mo ma ŋeyo.
Ruth 4:20 Ka lutic pa Abcalom gubino ci gudonyo i gaŋ meno bot dako, ci gupenye ni, “Akimaj ki Yonacan gitye kwene?” Dako-nu owaco botgi ni, “Doŋ gityeko kato nota ora ma pii tye iye-ni woko.” Ka gubedo ka yenyo korgi ci pe gumedo ki noŋogi, lacen gudok woko cen i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:21 Ka jo-nu doŋ gucito, ci Akimaj ki Yonacan gukato woko ki i waŋ it, gucito gutito lok ducu bot kabaka Daudi, Guwaco bote ni, “A woko ki kany oyot wek iŋol kulu ikat loka ca; pien Akitopel aye omiyo tamme kit man kun mi yo tamme i komi.”
Ruth 4:22 Daudi otugi a malo cut, kacel ki lwak ducu ma gitye kwede, ci guŋolo loka kulu Jordan, Kwarpiny pe tye dano acel mo ma odoŋ ma pe oŋolo loka kulu Jordan.
Ruth 4:23 Ka Akitopel oneno ni tamme me ryeko-ni pe giye lubone, otweyo kom bedo i wi kanane, oito i wiye oriŋo kwede i gaŋŋe. Ka oyubo ode ducu maber, ci ocito odene woko, ci oto woko cut, giyiko i lyel pa wonne.
Ruth 4:537  Daudi obedo i Makanaim
Ruth 4:24 Daudi ocito i Makanaim. Ci Abcalom oŋolo loka kulu Jordan kacel ki jo Icrael ducu.
Ruth 4:25 I kare meno onoŋo Abcalom oketo Amaca aye dok obedo ladit ma lawimony ma ka Joab. Amaca aye wod pa laco mo ma nyiŋe Itra ma La-icmael, ma onyomo Abigal nya pa Nakac, ma lamin Jeruya ma min Joab.
Ruth 4:26 Jo Icrael kacel ki Abcalom gugony i lobo Gilead.
Ruth 4:27 Ka Daudi obino i Makanaim, ci Cobi wod pa Nakac ma gaŋgi Raba, gaŋ pa jo Ammon, ki Makir wod pa Amiel ma gaŋgi Lo-debar, ki Baŋilai ma jo Gilead ma gaŋgi Rogelim,
Ruth 4:28 gukelo ki tanda buto mapol, ki becengu, agulu-gu, ŋano bel cayiri, moko kwon, bel ma gicelo, muraŋa ki nor-gu,
Ruth 4:29 moo kic, cak lukulu, romi, cak mutwo ma giyubo ki cak dyaŋ, ci gumiyo bot Daudi ki lwak ke wek gucam, pien gutamo ni kec obedo ka neko lwak, omiyo komgi oloc woko, orwo ii bene onekogi i tim.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 18 To pa Abcalom
Ruth 4:1 Daudi oŋiyo lwak ma tye bote, oketo ludito ma giloyo wi mony pi dano alip ki dano miya.
Ruth 4:2 Ci ocwalo mony okato woko, dul acel me adek obedo i te twero pa Joab, dul acel me adek i te twero pa Abicai wod pa Jeruya ma omin Joab, ki dul acel me adek i te twero pa Itayi dano nie Gat. Kabaka owaco bot jone ni, “An kikoma bene abicito kacel kwedwu.”
Ruth 4:3 Ento dano gugamo ni, “Pe ibikato icito kwedwa. Pien ka wariŋo woko, ci gin pe gibiparo piwa; kadi bed nucu dano oto, pe giparo piwa. Ento in kikomi aye piri tek ma rom ki pi jo alip apar; pienno myero ibed ka cwalowa kony ma a ki i gaŋ man.”
Ruth 4:4 Kabaka owaco botgi ni, “Gin ducu ma wuneno maberre en aye abitiyo.” Kit meno kabaka ocuŋ i ŋet doggaŋ kun lumony ducu gimol gikato ki i dulgi, jo miya miya ki jo alip alip.
Ruth 4:5 Kabaka ociko Joab ki Abicai ki Itayi ni, “Macalo an a wonne, awacci, wutim ber ki latin awobi-nu, en Abcalom.” Ci lwak ducu guwinyo ka kabaka ociko ludito wi mony pi Abcalom.
Ruth 4:6 Kit meno mony okato woko i tim ka lweny ki jo Icrael; ci gucako lweny i buŋa me Epraim.
Ruth 4:538 
Ruth 4:7 Lumony pa Daudi guloyo jo Icrael, ci neko dano obedo madit i nino meno; guneko dano ma romo alip pyeraryo kulu.
Ruth 4:8 Lweny oromo i lobo ducu, dok kadi wa buŋa bene oneko dano otyeko woko, makato pala lucwan.
Ruth 4:9 Ka Abcalom otugi rwatte ki lumony pa Daudi, kun en tye ka ŋwec ki kanane, ci kana oriŋo ocorre kwede i te kworo madit ma jaŋe oluk oculle woko. Wi Abcalom orwakke omoko woko i kin jaŋ kworo, ci kana oweke kun Lyerre i kin polo ki lobo, kana ma en oito i wiye-ni obedo ka medde ki ŋwec.
Ruth 4:10 Ka dano mo onene ci otito bot Joab ni, “Nen, aneno Abcalom tye ka lyerre malo i wi yat kworo.”
Ruth 4:11 Joab owaco bot dano mutitte lok-ki ni, “Iwacci ŋo? Ineno kome? Ci piŋo pe icobo ireto woko piny i nom? Kono itimo kumeno, kono cwinya obedo yom i komi, amiyo mot boti ma romo dul ryal apar, ki del pyer bene.”
Ruth 4:12 Ento laco-nu ogamo dog Joab ni, “Kadi ciŋa tiŋ dul ryal ma pekke alip acel kulu, pe atwero tiŋo ciŋa aketo i kom wod pa kabaka. Wan bene wawinyo ka kabaka ciko in ki Abicai ki Itayi ni, ‘Macalo an a wonne, awacci wugwok latin awobi-nu en Abcalom.’
Ruth 4:13 Dok bene ka nene atimo bwami ce aneke woko, (kun kono pe tye gin mo ma kabaka pe ŋeyo), kadi in kikomi bene iwene iye woko.”
Ruth 4:14 Joab ogamo ni, “Pe abibalo kare ma rom man ka lok kwedi.” Ci okwanyo toŋi adek i ciŋe, ocobo kor Abcalom i adunone ki gin adek ducu, ma onoŋo tye olyerre i wi kworo makwo.
Ruth 4:15 Lacen awobe apar ma gin lutiŋ jami lweny pa Joab gubino gurumo Abcalom gucobo guneko woko.
Ruth 4:16 Joab okuto tum, mony ducu odwogo woko cen ki ka ryemo kor jo lerael; pien Joab doŋ ojukogi woko.
Ruth 4:17 Gutiŋo kom Abcalom gubolo i te bur matut ma i buŋa, guyweko lwak godi madwoŋ gutoro i wiye, Ci jo Icrael guket woko, kun dano acel acel dok i gaŋŋe.
Ruth 4:18 Onoŋo Abcalom yam ocibo wir got ocuŋ i nota pa Kabaka, pien obedo ka wacci, “An pe atye ki woda mo me po nyiŋa.” Ocako nyiŋ wir meno ki nyiŋe kene, ci pud gilwoŋo ni got me po Abcalom nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:19 Akimaj wod pa Jadok owacci, “Wek ariŋ ater lok bot kabaka, aciwacce ni, ‘Rwot doŋ otyeko lari ki i ciŋ lumerokki.’ “
Ruth 4:20 Joab ogamo ni, “Pe ibitero lok tin. Ibitero i nino mukene, ento tin pe ibitero lok mo, pien wod pa kabaka aye doŋ oto woko.”
Ruth 4:539 
Ruth 4:21 Joab owaco bot dano mo me lobo Kuc ni, “Riŋ icitit bot kabaka gin ma doŋ ineno.” Lakuc okulo wiye i nyim Joab, ka ocako ŋwec.
Ruth 4:22 Akimaj wod pa Jadok dok openyo Joab ni, “Gin ma mito timme myero otimme i koma, ento wek an bene ariŋ i kor Lakuc.” Joab ogamo ni, “Imito riŋo kunnu piŋo ce, latinna? Nen, pe ibinoŋo iye mot mo pi tero lok man.”
Ruth 4:23 Akimaj dok owacci, “Gin ma mito timme onen. An abiriŋo.” Joab owacce ni, “Riŋ do.” Akimaj ocako riŋo i kora yo ma i yo bar, ci okato Lakuc woko ki ŋwec.
Ruth 4:24 I kare meno onoŋo Daudi obedo piny i kin doggaŋ me iye ki en me wokoni, kun lakur-piny onoŋo oito malo i wi ot ma i wi doggaŋ, ma cok ki cel ma orumo gaŋ- ŋi. Ka lakur-piny otiŋo waŋe ka neno piny, ci oneno dano mo ka riŋo bino en kene.
Ruth 4:25 Lakur-piny odaŋŋe owaco bot kabaka. Kabaka ogamo ni, “Ka ce en tye kene, ci tye ki lok ma okelo.” Dano ca omedde ki ŋwec bino kwede cok.
Ruth 4:26 Lakur-piny dok oneno dano mukene ka riŋo bino. Ci odaŋŋe bot dano ma i doggaŋ ni, “Dano mukene dok tye ka bino ki ŋwec, en kene!” Kabaka owacci, “En bene obekelo lok mo.”
Ruth 4:27 Lakur-piny owacci, “Atamo ni, laŋwec mutelo yo-ni nen calo Akimaj wod pa Jadok.” Kabaka owacci, “En dano maber, en obebino ki lok mabeco.”
Ruth 4:28 Akimaj odaŋŋe matek ni, “Kabaka, piny tye maber.” Ci okulo wiye piny i nyim kabaka oryebbe kwede piny i ŋom kun waco ni, “Pwoc obed bot Rwot Lubaŋani, ma doŋ olari ki i ciŋ dano ma gutiŋo ciŋgi ka lweny i komi, laditta kabaka.”
Ruth 4:29 Kabaka openyo ni, “Lok mo marac pe i kom awobina Abcalom?” Akimaj ogamo ni, “I kare ma Joab cwala ki lok, awinyo woo madwoŋ ki yo ŋeya, ento pe doŋ aniaŋ i gin mutimme-ni.”
Ruth 4:30 Kabaka owacci, “Koŋ ilokke icuŋ ki kenyo.” Ci olokke ocun mot.
Ruth 4:31 Nen, Lakuc bene obino, ci otugi wacci, “Akelo lok maber bot laditta kabaka! Pien Rwot otyeko lari ki i tek pa jo ducu ma onoŋo gutiŋo lweny i komi.”
Ruth 4:32 Kabaka openyo Lakuc ni, “Lok mo pe marac i kom latinna Abcalom?” Lakuc ogamo ni, “Lumerokki ki jo ducu ma gutiŋŋe ka lweny i komi marac-ci gubed macalo latin awobi-ni, laditta kabaka.”
Ruth 4:33 Cwiny kabaka opoto lirim, ci oa malo oito malo i kicika ma tye i ot ma i wi doggaŋ, ocako koko kun woto kwede, ma koko wode ni, “A woda Abcalom, woda Abcalom! Kono nene an aye ato ma kakari do! Oii Abcalom, woda, woda do!”
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 19 Joab ojuko Daudi
Ruth 4:1 Gitito bot Joab ni kabaka tye ka koko ki ka kun o pi Abcalom.
Ruth 4:540 
Ruth 4:2 Kit meno loyo mony me nino-nu olokke odoko me kumo palwak ducu, pien lwak ducu guwinyo i nino meno ni, “Cwiny kabaka tye ka ton pi wode.”
Ruth 4:3 Ci dano gubedo macalo jo ma mony aye oryemogi, pien gikwalle akwala ka gidonyo kwede i gaŋ ki lewic i nino meno.
Ruth 4:4 Kabaka oumo wane woko, obedo ka koko ki dwan maloŋo ni, “Ai woda Abcalom, ai Abcalom, woda, woda do!”
Ruth 4:5 Joab odonyo i ot bot kabaka Daudi, owaco bote ni, “In tin i mako luticci ducu ki lewic, ma gin aye tin gularo kwoni, ki kwo pa awobeni ki anyirani, ki kwo pa monni ki mon aŋecani ducu.
Ruth 4:6 In kara imaro jo ma dag waŋi, idag jo ma gimari. Tin doŋ inyuto woko ka maleŋ ni, ludito wi monnyi ki luticci ducu pe gitye ki kony mo boti. Tin doŋ aniaŋ atir ni, kono nene Abcalom aye obwot makwo, kun wan wato woko ducu, kono tin cwinyi obedo yom maka to.
Ruth 4:7 Ber ia malo kombeddi, ikat woko wek icilok ki luticci lok mabeco, pien akwoŋo ki nyiŋ Rwot ni, ka pe iye kato woko, ci pe dano mo tin bidoŋ boti i dyewor man; dok man aye bibedo rac boti makato can madoŋo ma ilimo ducu cakke ki ka tinoni nio kwede wa onyoo.”
Ruth 4:8 Kabaka otugi a malo cut, ocito obedo i kabedone i doggaŋ, Ci gitito bot lwak ducu ni, “Nen, kabaka tye obedo i doggaŋ.” Ci dano ducu gucako bino i nyim kabaka. Daudi odwogo i Jerucalem Onoŋo jo Icrael guriŋo woko ducu, kun dano acel acel odok i gaŋŋe:
Ruth 4:9 Dano ducu gubedo ka pyein ki i kaka ma i Icrael ducu, kun gipyem ni, “Kabaka aye yam olarowa ki i cin lumerokwa, dok en aye olarowa ki i cin jo Piliciti. I kare- ni en doŋ oriŋo oweko lobowa pi lworo Abcalom.
Ruth 4:10 Ento Abcalom ma yam wawiro ki moo wek olowa-ni doŋ oto woko i mony. Ci piŋo pe doŋ giloko iye lok mo kombeddi pi dwoko kabaka paco?”
Ruth 4:11 Ka lok ma jo Icrael ducu gubedo ka waco oo bot kabaka Daudi, ocwalo kwena bot Jadok ki ajwaka Abiatar kun wacci, “Wuwac bot ludoŋo pa jo Juda ni, ‘Piŋo wun aye wudoŋ cen ka gidwoko kabaka paco i ode?
Ruth 4:12 Nen, wun aye utmega, wun aye wucogona ki riŋo koma; ci piŋo wun aye dok wudoŋ cen ka gidwoko kabaka paco?’
Ruth 4:13 Dok wuwac bot Amaca ni, ‘In giri ibedo watta. Lubaŋa myero oket can i koma kumeno ki maka to, ka pe in aye idoko ladit ma loyo monnya ma ka Joab, cakke tin cito kwede anyim.’ “
Ruth 4:14 Kumeno omiyo dano ducu ma i Juda gumoko i kom Daudi ki cwiny acel, ci gucwalo lok bote ni, “Doŋ idwog cen, in kacel ki luticci ducu.”
Ruth 4:541 
Ruth 4:15 Mumiyo kabaka ocako dwogo cen oo i kulu Jordan. Ci jo Judagubino i Gilgal ka jolo wiye ki ka dwoko kabaka cen loka kulu Jordan.
Ruth 4:16 Cimei wod pa Gera, ma jo Benjamin, dano me Bakurim, en bene orune obino kacel ki jo Juda ka jolo kabaka Daudi,
Ruth 4:17 kun bino ki jo Benjamin ma romo alip acel. Ki Jiba ma, latic ma loyo ot pa Caulo, ki awo bene apar wiye abic, ki luticce pyeraryo, gin bene gucorre i kulu Jordan ci gutuc i nyim kabaka.
Ruth 4:18 Gukato ki i waŋ wat pi kelo dano pa kabaka loka kulu, ki pi tiyo gin ducu ma kabaka mito. Daudi otimo kica bot Cimei Ka Cimei wod pa Gera obino, ci opoto piny i nyim kabaka i kare ma kabaka doŋ mito ŋolo Jordan.
Ruth 4:19 Owaco bot kabakani, “Kabaka, pe imak balla i cwinyi, pe ibed ka po i kom gin ma yam atimo i komi marac, laditta kabaka, i kare ma ia kwede i Jerucalem. Pe iket lokke i cwinyi.
Ruth 4:20 An laticci aŋeyo maber ni atimo bak Pienno, nen an doŋ tin abino, dok an aye akwoŋo bino ki i kin dano me ot pa Yucepu ka joli.”
Ruth 4:21 Abicai wod pa Jefuya ogamo ni, “Pe gibineko Cimei woko pi lok mari, pien yam obedo ka ceno dano ma Rwot owiro?”
Ruth 4:22 Ento Daudi ogamo ni, “Gin aŋo ma alaro kwedwu, wun awobe pa Jeruya, ma wun bene tin wulokke wudoko lumerokka? Tin dok gibineko dano i kin jo Icrael? Tin aye doŋ aniaŋ atir ni, an kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael.”
Ruth 4:23 Kabaka dok owacci, “In Cimei pe ibito.” Ci okwoŋŋe kwoŋ lamok lokke.
Ruth 4:24 Mepibocet wod pa Caulo bene obino ka jolo kabaka. Obino ma pe oŋolo Lwet tyene-gu, dok pe okido yer tike, pe ojwero bene wek obed maleŋ, pe olwoko wa boŋŋine cakke ki i kare ma kabaka oriŋo kwede nio i kare me dwogone ki kuc.
Ruth 4:25 Ka oa ki i Jerucalem obino ka jolo kabaka, kabaka openye ni, “Mepibocet, piŋo yam pe icito kweda?”
Ruth 4:26 Mepibocet ogamo ni, “Laditta, laticca aye obwola. Onoŋo awaco hote ni, ‘Twenakom bedo i wi kanana, wek abed iye, acit kacel ki kabaka.’ Pien tyena okwe woko.
Ruth 4:27 En ocoko lok me goba i koma owaco boti, laditta kabaka. Ento in icalo lamalaika pa Lubaŋa, mumiyo in itim gin ma ineno ni ber.
Ruth 4:28 Onoŋo yam jo ma i ot pa wora ducu kwogi okemo to keken ki i nyimi, ento in iketa i kin dano ma gicamo i wi mejani. Doŋ kit gin aŋo ma myero dok akok iye boti?”
Ruth 4:542 
Ruth 4:29 Kabaka ogamo ni, “Piŋo ibedo ka titta lok i komi twatwal? An doŋ atyeko ŋolo atir ni, wun ki Jiba wubipoko lobo.”
Ruth 4:30 Mepibocet owacci, “Kabaka, ka kumeno keken, ci wek en oter ducu, macalo in laditta kabaka doŋ idwogo paco ki kuc-ci.”
Ruth 4:31 I kare-nu Barjilai ma Lagilead bene obino ma oa ki i Rogelim; ci olwoko kabaka oo kwede i dog kulu Jordan, wek enol kwede loka tuŋcel.
Ruth 4:32 Baŋilai onoŋo doŋ oti woko, mwaka me ditte doŋ romo pyeraboro. En aye yam obedo ka miyo cam bot kaba ka i kare ma kabaka tye i Makanaim, pien onoŋo en lalonyo mada.
Ruth 4:33 Kabaka owaco bot Baŋilai ni, “Bin wakat kwedi loka ca, abigwoki i Jerucalem.”
Ruth 4:34 Baŋilai owaco bot kabaka ni, “An pud adoŋ ki mwaka adi me bed ona wi lobo, ma miyo dok acito wa i Jerucalemmi?
Ruth 4:35 I kare man an ditta doŋ romo mwaka pyeraboro. An pud dok atwero poko kin gin ma yomo cwinya nyo ma pe yomo cwinya? Pud dok abilo mit pa cam ma acamo, nyo gin ma amato? An pud dok atwero winyo wer ma co nyo mon giwero? Ci lok aŋo ma miyo amedo peko i komi, laditta kabaka?
Ruth 4:36 Abinywako yo kwedi manok me lwoki nio ka iŋolo loka kulu Jordan. Dok piŋo icula ki mot macalo meno?
Ruth 4:37 Doŋ alego ni, wek adok cen i gaŋŋa, acit ato ki kunnu, i ŋet lyel pa wora ki maa. Ento atye kany ki laticci Kimkam; wek en aye ocit oŋol kwedi kulu, ci icitim en kit ma ineno ni ber.”
Ruth 4:38 Kabaka ogamo ni, “Kimkam biwot kweda loka ca, ci abitimo en kit ma ineno ni ber yo tuŋ boti; ki gin ducu ma imito ki tuŋ bota abitiyone piri.”
Ruth 4:39 Ka lwak ducu guŋolo Jordan, ci k ibaka bene oŋolo. Lacen kabaka ocik Baŋilai ki mot me mar, ka olamme gum; ci Baŋilai odok i pacone. Jo Juda ki jo Icrael gupyem pi kabaka
Ruth 4:40 Kabaka ocito i Gilgal, ki Kimkam bene onywako wot kwede. Ki lwak ma i Juda ducu ki nucu jo Icrael bene gunywako wot kacel ki kabaka.
Ruth 4:41 Jo Icrael ducu gubino bot kabaka, guwaco bote ni, “Piŋo utmegiwa ma i Juda gukwalo in kabaka woko akwala, kacel ki jo ma i odi ducu, ci gukelowu loka kulu Jordan in Daudi ki lwakki ducu?”
Ruth 4:42 Lwak ma i Juda gugamo dog jo Icrael ni, “Pien kabaka aye watwa macok, ci piŋo kiniga makowu i kom lok macalo man, Onoŋo doŋ wacamo ciŋ kabaka bo? Nyo en doŋ otyeko miyowa mot mo bo?”
Ruth 4:43 Jo Icrael dok gudok iye bot jo Juda ni, “Wan watye ki dul apar i te ker man, ki i te loc pa Daudi wan wadwoŋ wakatowu. Ci piŋo wun aye dok wucayowa? Pe
Ruth 4:543  myero nene wan aye wakwoŋ waco pi dwoko kabaka paco?” Ento jo pa Juda lokgi obedo gwa makato lok pa jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 20 Ceba ojemo i kom Daudi
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno onoŋo tye dano mo marac mada ma nyiŋe Ceba wod pa Bikri ma Labenjamin. Ocako kuto kum kun wacci, “Wan pe watye ki waŋ pokwa mo i kom Daudi, pe watye ki dul mo i kom latin pa Yece; Wun jo Icrael, dano acel acel odok i kemane!”
Ruth 4:2 Kit meno jo Icrael gutwarre wo ko guweko Daudi, gucako lu bo kor Ceba wod pa Bikri. Ento jo Juda gubedo ka lubo kor kabakagi ma cwinygi omoko i kome, cakke ki i Jordan o kwede i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:3 Ka Daudi oo i ode ma i Jerucalem, okwanyo mon aŋeca apar ma onoŋo owekogi ka gwoko ode-ni, ci oketogi i ot ma gigwokogi iye kun en miyo cam botgi, ento pe omedo ki bedo kwedgi. Kit meno giloro wigi woko i ot nio wa i ka togi, kun gibedo macalo mon-to.
Ruth 4:4 Kabaka dok owaco bot Amaca ni, “Cilwoŋ jo ma i Juda ducu gubin bota i kin nino adek-ki, in kikomi bene ibed tye kany.”
Ruth 4:5 Amaca ocito ka lwoŋo jo ma i Juda, ento odikke okato nino ma giciko-ni woko.
Ruth 4:6 Daudi owaco bot Abicai ni, “Ceba wod pa Bikri bitimowa marac twatwal makato Abcalom. Cit ki danona wutugi ryemo kore, wek pe oma gaŋi mogo ma gicelo ki gogo, miyo bikelowa ayela.”
Ruth 4:7 Jo ma gulubo kor Abicai obedo Joab ki jo Keret ki jo Pelet, ki twoni oteka lweny ducu. Gucito gua ki i Jerucalem pi ryemo kor Ceba wod pa Bikri.
Ruth 4:8 Ka doŋ guo i got mo madit ma i Gibeon, ci Amaca otuc i komgi. Onoŋo Joab orukke ki boŋo me askari, kun otweyo del pala lucwan i pyere, ma orwako pala lucwan i akurane. Ka en ocito anyim, ci pala opoto piny.
Ruth 4:9 Joab openyo Amaca ni, “It ye maber bo, omera?” Ka Joab omako yer tik Amaca ki ciŋe malacuc ka omoto kun noto leme.
Ruth 4:10 Ento Amaca pe oneno kom pala ma tye i ciŋ Joab. Joab ocobo iye, cin iye ocako wukke piny; pe dok onwoyo cobone tyen me aryo, ci oto woko. Ci Joab ki ominne Abicai guryemo kor Ceba wod pa Bikri.
Ruth 4:11 Dano pa Joab mo ocuŋ ka ŋet Amaca ci owacci, “Ŋat ma cwinye omaro Joab, ki ma cwinye tye i kom Daudi, olub kor Joab.”
Ruth 4:12 Amaca obuto kun pwodde ŋenne kwede piny i remone i ŋet gudo. Tek dano mo oo kenyo, ka oneno, ci koŋ cuŋ. Ka dano pa Joab oneno lwak ducu koŋ gicuŋ, ci obino otiŋo Amaca woko ki i gudo otero i lum, ci obolo boŋo mo i kome.
Ruth 4:544 
Ruth 4:13 Ka doŋ gikwanyo kome woko ki i gudo lwak gucako mol gilubo kor Joab pi ryemo kor Ceba wod pa Bikri.
Ruth 4:14 Ceba ocito kun baro kin kaka ducu ma i Icrael nio wa i Abel ma i ŋet Betmaaka; ci jo Bikri ducu gucokke, gulubo tamme.
Ruth 4:15 Ci jo ducu ma gulubo kor Joab gucito gurumo gaŋ ma Ceba tye iye, en Abel ma i ŋet Bet-maaka. Gucako toro cel lobo orumo gaŋ woko, cel meno gitoro otenne wa i kom cel gogo me gaŋ, Dok gubedo ka twomo cel me gaŋ me amuka woko.
Ruth 4:16 Dako mo ma laryeko odaŋŋe ki i gaŋ ni “Wuwiny ya! Wuwiny ya! Wuwac bot Joab koŋ obin kany, wek koŋ alok kwede mono.”
Ruth 4:17 Joab ocito cok bote ki dako-nu openyo ni, “In aye Joab bo?” Ogamo ni, “An do.” Dako-nu owacce ni, “Koŋ iwiny lokka, ladit.” Ogamo ni, “Atye ka winyone.”
Ruth 4:18 Dako-nu dok owacci, “Carolok macon wacci, ‘Wek gupeny dog jo Abel’; miyo giyubo lok tum mupye.
Ruth 4:19 An ŋat acel i kom jo ma gimito kuc, ki jo ma lugen i Icrael. In imito balo gaŋ man woko ma en aye mego i Icrael kulu; piŋo ityeko lwak pa Rwot woko?”
Ruth 4:20 Joab ogamo ni, “Pe kumeno gire, pe kumeno; pe abino ka tyeko gaŋ nyo ka balone woko.
Ruth 4:21 Lok meno pe ada. Ento dano mo ma i lobo godi me Epraim ma gilwoŋo Ceba wod pa Bikri aye otiŋo ciŋe i kom kabaka Daudi. Wumiwa en keken, ci abia aweko gaŋwu woko.” Dako-nu odok iyi bot Joab ni, “Nen ba, gibibolli wiye wok ki i wi cel.”
Ruth 4:22 Dako-nu ocito bot jo-nu ducu ki ryekone. Ci guŋolo wi Ceba wod pa Bikri woko, gubolo woko bot Joab. Joab okuto tum, ci mony oket woko oweko gaŋ, kun dano acel acel dok i pacone. Ki Joab bene odok i Jerucalem bot kabaka. Ludito pa Daudi
Ruth 4:23 I kare-nu onoŋo Joab aye ladit ma loyo mony pa jo Icrael ducu; ki Benaya wod pa Yekoyada aye loyo jo Keret ki jo Pelet.
Ruth 4:24 Adoram aye onoŋo ladit ma loyo tic muroni; ki Yekocapat wod pa Akilud onoŋo laco lok ma timme.
Ruth 4:25 Ceva obedo karan, ki Jadok ki Abiatar gubedo ajwagi pa Lubaŋa;
Ruth 4:26 ki Ira ma jo Jair obedo ajwaka pa Daudi.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 21 Culo kwor pa jo Gibeon
Ruth 4:545 
Ruth 4:1 Kec opo to i kare pa Daudi mwaka ki mwaka pi mwaka adek. Mumiyo Daudi openyo dog Rwot, ci Rwot owacce ni, “Tye alii me remo i kom Caulo ki i kom jo me ode, pien oneko jo Gibeon.”
Ruth 4:2 Kabaka olwoŋo jo Gibeon ni gubin bote. Jo Gibeon pe gin jo Icrael kikome, ento gin jo Amor ma yam odon, Onoŋo yam jo Icrael gukwoŋo kwoŋ ni pe gibinekogi, ento kadi bed kumene, Caulo otemo nekogi woko, pien nyeko omake pi jo Icrael ki jo Juda.
Ruth 4:3 Daudi openyo jo Gibeon ni, “Gin aŋo ma myero atim piwu? Dok abiculo kwor meno i kit yo aŋo, ka wek doŋ wulam gum i kom lwak pa Rwot?”
Ruth 4:4 Jo Gibeon guwacce ni, “Lok ma i kinwa ki Caulo ki jo me ode pe lok ma gitwero tyekone ki culo limo Kadi wa wan bene pe myero wanek dano mo ma i Icrael.” Daudi ogamo ni, “Wun doŋ wuwacci, atimmiwu kit gin aŋo?”
Ruth 4:5 Guwaco bot kabaka ni, “Dano ma obedo ka nekowa, ma en aye oyubo pi tyekowa woko wek pe wabed ki kabedo mo i lobo ma Icrael loyo-ni,
Ruth 4:6 wek gimi botwa awobene abiro, wek wagurgi woko guŋabbe malo i nyim Rwot ki i Gibeon i kom got pa Rwot.” Ci kabaka ogamo ni, “Abimiyogi.”
Ruth 4:7 Ento kabaka oŋoyo Mepibocet wod pa Yonacan wod pa Caulo oweko odon, pien yam gukwoŋo kwoŋ i nyim Rwot ma tye i kingi, en Daudi ki Yonacan wod pa Caulo.
Ruth 4:8 Kabaka okwanyo awobe aryo ma mingi nyiŋe Rijpa nya pa Aiya, ma onywalogi ki Caulo, nyiŋgi Armoni ki Mepibocet; ki awobe abic pa Merab ma nya pa Caulo, ma en onywalo ki Adriel wod pa Baŋilai ma jo Mekola.
Ruth 4:9 Omiyogi ducu i cin jo Gibeon, ci gugurogi guŋabogi malo i wi got i nyim Rwot. Gin abiro ducu guto woko lawaŋacel. Ginekogi i nino ina gikwoŋo kayo iye kac, i nino ma gicako kayo iye bel cayiri.
Ruth 4:10 Ka Rijpa nya pa Aiya okwanyo boŋo cola, oyaro i wi got me butone, ci ori kunnu cakke i acakki kayo kac nio ka kot ocako cwer i komgi ki i polo. Pe oweko winyo mo opye i komgi dyeceŋ, kadi wa ŋuu mo pe oo i komgi dyewor.
Ruth 4:11 Ka gitito bot Daudi kit gin ma dako aŋeca pa Caulo, Rijpa nya pa Aiya, obedo ka timone.
Ruth 4:12 Daudi ocito okwanyo cogo pa Caulo ki pa Yonacan ki bot jo Jabec-gilead, ma yam onoŋo gukwalo komgi ki i dye gaŋ me Bet-can ka ma yam Lupiliciti guŋabogi malo i kare ma Lupiliciti guneko iye Caulo i wi got Gilboa.
Ruth 4:13 Okwanyo cogo pa Caulo ki pa wode Yonacan otero, ka gucoko cogo pa jo abiro ma gigurogi bene.
Ruth 4:546 
Ruth 4:14 Guyiko cogo pa Caulo ki pa wode Yonacan i lobo Benjamin i Jela, i lyel pa wonne Kic; ci gutiyo gucobo kit ma kabaka ociko ducu. Ka lacen Lubaŋa ocako winyo lega pa dano ma gilego pi lobo. Abicai olaro Daudi ki i ciŋ twon oyita lweny
Ruth 4:15 Jo Piliciti dok gubedo ka lweny ki jo Icrael, ci Daudi ocito kunnu kacel ki jone, gucako lweny ki jo Piliciti. I kare mo Daudi ocako ol woko,
Ruth 4:16 ka Icbibenob ma ŋat acel i kin likwayo pa twoni oluma-ni obino ma tye ki toŋŋe ma pekke romo cokcok ratili apar kulu, dok otweyo del pyere ma tye iye pala Lucwan manyen. Oa otirre, i kom Daudi wek enek woko.
Ruth 4:17 Ento Abicai wod pa Jeruya omwomme oriŋo ka lare ci ocobo Lapiliciti oneko woko. I ŋe meno jo pa Daudi gucike i nyiŋ Rwot ni, “In pe dok ibibino kacel kwedwa i mony mo, miyo ibineko mac tara pa Icrael woko.” Jo pa Daudi guneko oteka lweny (1 Tek 20.4-8)
Ruth 4:18 Lacen lweny dok ocakke i kom jo Piliciti ma i Gob; ci Cibekai Ina Lakucat oneko Cap woko ma ŋat acel i kin likwayo pa twoni oluma-ni.
Ruth 4:19 Ka lweny dok ocakke i kom Lupiliciti ma i Gob, ci Elkanan wod pa Jair, ma jo Beterekem, oneko Goliac ma jo Gat, ma bol toŋŋe rom ki rii yat me cweyo boŋo.
Ruth 4:20 Lweny dok obedo i Gat ka ma tye iye dano mo ma oputte mabor liwawo, ma tye ki nyig ciŋe abicel, ki nyig tyene bene abicel, tuŋ ryoryo ducu, omiyo nyig Iwe te ducu romo pyeraryo wiye aŋwen, En bene obedo lakwar twoni oluma-nu.
Ruth 4:21 Ka okatti ka nywaro jo Icrael ki ŋalane, ci Yonacan wod pa Cimei ma omin Daudi oneke woko.
Ruth 4:22 Gin jo aŋwen-nu ducu gubedo likwayo pa twoni oluma ma yam bedo i Gat. Gin ducu Daudi ki jone guryekogi woko.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 22 Wer me wayo pa Daudi (Jab 18)
Ruth 4:1 Daudi owero lok ma i wer man bot Rwot i kare ma Rwot olare iye ki i ciŋ lumerokke ducu, ki i ciŋ Caulo bene.
Ruth 4:2 Owero kit man ni, “Rwot aye gotta, en cel gogona matek, en lalarra.
Ruth 4:3 En Lubaŋana, ki gotta, ariŋo alaro bote; en gwoka macalo kwot, en kalarrena matek; en gaŋ gogona ka ma ariŋo alaro iye, en lalarra; in aye ilara ki i lweny magwa.
Ruth 4:4 Akok bot Rwot, ci en lara ki ciŋ lukworra. Pi meno myero gipak Rwot.
Ruth 4:547 
Ruth 4:5 “Biamwonyi me to otwagge oruma woko dyere, kulu ma piine ger ma neko dano ocorre woko i wiya limuk.
Ruth 4:6 Tol lyel odwala woko, owic me to bene orine woko i nyima.
Ruth 4:7 “I kare ma atye ki can akok bot Rwot; akok gira bot Lubaŋana. Owinyo dwana ki i ot mere maleŋ, kokona pi kony odonyo i ite.
Ruth 4:8 “Cutcut lobo oyeŋe ma morre pe twerre, te godi bene ducu guyegge woko ma giyeŋŋe matek, pien kiniga onoŋo omako Lubaŋa.
Ruth 4:9 Yito oduny okatti ki i ume, mac ma waŋ malyet okatti ki i doge ma lodine bene olyel, olyelmatek mada.
Ruth 4:10 Oywayo polo odwoko cen, ci olor obino piny, kun piny macol mapek oryene i te tyene.
Ruth 4:11 Oito i wi lakerubi ci otuk kwede, kome onen i dye yamo.
Ruth 4:12 Oketo piny macol orume dyere, kemane obedo pol mapek mupoŋ ki pii.
Ruth 4:13 Lodi mac ma lyel okatti, onen i piny ma ryeny maleŋ ki i nyime.
Ruth 4:14 Rwot omiyo polo omor, dwan ŋat Mamalo Twal owinnye.
Ruth 4:15 Obayo aterone, okeyo lumerok woko; omiyo lutkot owil, ci orwadogi woko piny.
Ruth 4:16 Dye nam opokke, tere onen, guti me te lobo bene odoŋ twolo, i kare ma Rwot ojukogi, i kare ma okutogi ki yweyo ma okatti ki i ume.
Ruth 4:17 “Rwot ocwalo ciŋe piny ki i polo, ci omaka, oywaya okela woko ki i pii matut.
Ruth 4:18 Olara ki i cin lakworra matek, olara ki i ciŋ jo ma gidaga, pien onoŋo gitek mada giloya woko.
Ruth 4:19 Gupoto i koma i kare ma can obwoya matek, ento Rwot aye obedo ka konya.
Ruth 4:20 Okwanya woko okela i kabedo malac; olara pien onoŋo ayomo cwinye.
Ruth 4:21 “Rwot omiya bakacic pien oneno ni kita atir, oculla muporo leŋcwinya;
Ruth 4:22 pien abedo ka lubo cik pa Rwot, pe apokke woko ki bot Lubaŋa pi bal mo.
Ruth 4:23 Alubo cikke ducu, pe aŋak aweko gin ma en ociko.
Ruth 4:24 Pe atimo bal mo i nyime, dok agwokke mada pe atim obal alii mo.
Ruth 4:25 Mumiyo Rwot omiya bakacic pien oneno ni kita atir, oculla muporo leŋcwinya ma abedo kwede i nyime.
Ruth 4:26 “Rwot, in lagen bot jo ma lugen; bot ŋat maber ma pe ki bal inyutte bote bene calo ŋat maber ma pe ki bal.
Ruth 4:27 Cwinyi leŋ i kom jo ma cwinygi leŋ, ento iger i kom dano ma tamme ogom.
Ruth 4:548 
Ruth 4:28 Ilaro jo mamwol, ento jo ma luwakke idwokogi woko piny.
Ruth 4:29 Iyo, in aye ibedo mac tarana, ai Rwot; Lubaŋana aye menya ki i colpiny.
Ruth 4:30 Iyo, atwero tyeko buca mony kulu ka ikonya; pi teko pa Lubaŋana miyo apye akalo wi cel.
Ruth 4:31 Lubaŋa man, gin ducu ma co tiyo tye atir, lok pa Rwot ma en cikke me tiyo bedo ada; en tye macalo kwot pa jo ducu ma giriŋo gilaro bote.
Ruth 4:32 “Aŋa ma Lubaŋa, kono Rwot kene? Aŋa ma got, pe Lubaŋawa aye keken gire?
Ruth 4:33 Lubaŋa man aye ka-larrena matek, en aye ma omiyo awoto ki kuc.
Ruth 4:34 Oketo tyena obedo macalo tyen til, ociba malo ka ma acuŋ iye matek.
Ruth 4:35 En pwonyo ciŋa pi lweny, mumiyo atwero gomo wa atum mola.
Ruth 4:36 Doŋ ityeko miya kwot me larri, kony ma in imiya omiyo adoko dit.
Ruth 4:37 Imiya kabedo malac ka ma awoto iye ducu, omiyo tyena pe ocer.
Ruth 4:38 Aryemo kor lukworra ci anekogi woko; pe alokke adok cen nio ka atyekogi ducu.
Ruth 4:39 Atyekogi woko, acobogi woko pil, ci gupoto piny ka tyena; pe doŋ gitwero a malo.
Ruth 4:40 In aye iruka ki tek pi lweny; imiyo lulweny i koma guto gutum woko ka tyena.
Ruth 4:41 Imiyo lumerokka guloko ŋeg bota, imiyo atyeko jo ma gidaga woko.
Ruth 4:42 Guciko wangi, ento ŋat mo pe ma olarogi, gukok bot Rwot, ento en pe ogamo doggi.
Ruth 4:43 Adinogi woko gudoko macalo apwa me ŋom; abologi woko macalo coto ma tye i yo gudo-gu.
Ruth 4:44 “Yam ilara ki i kom rok mapol ma gilwenyo kweda; iketa abedo ladit ma loyo rok ducu; jo ma yam pe aŋeyogi gudoko jona ma an aye aloyogi.
Ruth 4:45 Lurok gubino bota ma gimwolle amwola; cutcut ka giwinyo pira ci gilubo cikka.
Ruth 4:46 Tekcwiny orwenyo woko ki botgi, gua ki ka ma gukanne iye gubino ma komgi myel amyela.
Ruth 4:47 “Rwot tye kwo; gipwo gotta, gipil wi Lubaŋa ma en lalarra.
Ruth 4:48 En Lubaŋa ma omiya aculo kwor i kom lukworra, dok ma obwoyo rok mapol, omiyo gubedo i te locca;
Ruth 4:49 ci olara ki i cin lumerokka. In ipilo wiya makato lukworra, ilara ki i ciŋ lulweny ma lubwami.
Ruth 4:50 “Pi meno abikori i kin lurok, ai Rwot, dok abiwero wer me pako nyiŋi.
Ruth 4:549 
Ruth 4:51 Lubaŋa miyo deyo me loc bot kabakane, dok nyuto mar mere ma pe lokke i kom danone ma en oyero ka giwiro, bot Daudi ki likwaye ducu matwal.”
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 23 Lok pa Dandi me agikkine
Ruth 4:1 Man aye lok ma Daudi oloko me agikkine: Lok pa Daudi wod pa Yece, lok pa dano ma gipilo wiye twatwal, dano ma Lubaŋa pa Yakobo owiro, lawer jabuli mamit i Icrael.
Ruth 4:2 “Cwiny pa Rwot aye miyo aloko, lokke winnye ki ileba.
Ruth 4:3 Lubaŋa pa Icrael oloko, Lubaŋa ma obedo got matek pa Icrael owacca ni, Ka dano mo loyo lwak maber, kun loyo ma lworo Lubaŋa,
Ruth 4:4 deyone nen i komgi macalo ceŋ ma ryeny odiko, macalo ceŋ ma ryeny odiko ma pol pe, dok bedo calo kot ma twiyo lum i wi lobo.
Ruth 4:5 Iyo, oda pe ocuŋ kit meno kacel ki Lubaŋa? Pien otyeko keto gicikke kweda ma bedo nakanaka, ma oyubo kikore, dok bigwoko maber. En bimiyo gin ma konya ki gin ma amito medde ameda.
Ruth 4:6 Ento jo ma pe gilworo Lubaŋa ducu gicalo okuto ma gibolo woko, ma dano pe twero mako ki ciŋe noŋo.
Ruth 4:7 Dano ma gudo komgi makogi ki nyonyo nyo bol toŋ ci mac aye waŋogi tyeko woko.” Twoni oteka lweny pa Daudi (1 Tek 11.10-41)
Ruth 4:8 Magi aye nyiŋ twoni oteka lweny ma yam gibedo bot Daudi: Jocebbacebet ma jo Takemon, en aye ladit pa jo adek-ki. En yam okato ki toŋŋe i kom dano miya aboro ci onekogi woko ducu lawaŋacel.
Ruth 4:9 Ŋat ma lubo en ki i kin twoni lweny adek-ki aye Eleajar wod pa Dodo ma jo Akoki. En obedo kacel ki Daudi i kare ma gicayo jo Piliciti ma gucokke ka lweny kunnu, ci jo Icrael guriŋo gujer ki ŋegi.
Ruth 4:10 Ci en Eleajar ocako neko jo Piliciti nio waŋ ma ciŋe ojony omoko i kom pala lucwanne. Rwot omiyo loc obedo dit twatwal i nino meno, Lacen jo Icrael gudwogo cen ka lubo kore, ento gubino pi lunyo jami ki ginaruka-gu i kom dano ma ginekogi keken.
Ruth 4:11 Twon oteka lweny ma olube aye Cama wod pa Agee ma jo Karar. I kare ca jo Piliciti dok gucokke kacel i Leki ka ma poto ŋor tye iye, ci mony dok oriŋo jo Piliciti woko.
Ruth 4:12 Ento Cama ocamo co, ocuŋ i dye poto ŋor pi laro, ocako neko jo Piliciti, ci Rwot dok omiyo loc obedo dit twatwal.
Ruth 4:550 
Ruth 4:13 I kare ma gikayo kac jo adek ki i kin jo pyeradek-ki gucako wot, ci gucito bot Daudi i boro got ma tye Adulam; onoŋo buca mony pa jo Piliciti ogony i nota Repaim.
Ruth 4:14 I kare nu onoŋo Daudi tye i kakannene, dok cel gogo pa lumony pa jo Piliciti onoŋo tye i Beterekem.
Ruth 4:15 Daudi oloko ki miti madwoŋ ni, “Kono ŋatti mo ocito ka twomo pii amata ki i waŋ it me Beterekem ma tye cok ki dog gaŋ ca, omiya amati, kono ber mada!”
Ruth 4:16 Ci twoni lweny adek-ku gucito gubaro dye gony pa jo Piliciti, gutwomo pii ki i waŋ it me Beterekem ma tye cok ki dog gaŋ ci gukelo bot Daudi. Ento Daudi pe omato; otino oliyo i nyim Rwot pi gityer amata,
Ruth 4:17 kun wacci, “Pe kumeno, ai Rwot. An pe myero atim kit man, An dok am at remo pa dano ma gudyero komgi-ni?” En aye lok mumiyo pe omato pii-nu. Twoni lweny adek-ku yam autimo kit meno.
Ruth 4:18 Abicai omin Joab, wod pa Jeruya, onoŋo en ladit i kin jo pyeradek-ki. Otiŋo toŋŋe olwenyo i kom jo miya adek ci onekogi woko ducu, mumiyo nyiŋe oywek ma mito romo jo adek ca.
Ruth 4:19 Pienno olimo yweka madit makato ki i kom jo pyeradek-ki, ci odoko ladit me WI monygi; ento pe olimo rwom pa jo adek ca.
Ruth 4:20 Benaya wod pa Yekoyada obedo twon oteka ma i Kabjeel, latim tim madito. En oneko awobe aryo ma gin twoni labwor me Moab. En bene olor odonyo i bur ci oneko iye labwor i kare ma pee ocwer mapek.
Ruth 4:21 Ka dok oneko Laejipt mo, dano mamwonya, Laejipt meno onoŋo tye ki toŋŋe i ciŋe, ento en Benaya ocito bote ki odoone, oyuto toŋ woko ki i ciŋ Laejipt, ka oneke kwede woko ki toŋŋe-nu.
Ruth 4:22 Benaya wod pa Yekoyada otimo gin madito kit meno, omiyo nyiŋe olimo yweka madit ma mito rom ki twoni lweny adek-ki.
Ruth 4:23 Nyiŋe oywek i kin jo pyeradek-ki, ento pe olimo rwom pa jo adek ca, Daudi oketo en obedo ladit pa jo ma gwoko en kabaka.
Ruth 4:24 Acael ma omin Joab bene yam tye i kin jo pyeradek-ki; ki Elkanan wod pa Dodo me Beterekem,
Ruth 4:25 Cama me Karod, Elika me Karod,
Ruth 4:26 Kelej ma jo Palti, Ira wod pa Ikec me Tekoa,
Ruth 4:27 Abiejer me Anatot, Mebunai ma Lakucat,
Ruth 4:28 Jalmon ma jo Akoki, Makarai me Netopa,
Ruth 4:29 Keleb wod pa Baana me Netopa, Itayi wod pa Ribai me Gibea pa jo Benjamin,
Ruth 4:551 
Ruth 4:30 Benaya me Piraton, Kidai ma bedo i nota ora me Gaac,
Ruth 4:31 Abialbon me Arba, Ajimavet me Bakurim,
Ruth 4:32 Eliaba me Caalbon ma wod pa Jacen, Yonacan,
Ruth 4:33 Cama ma jo Karar, Akiam wod pa Carar ma jo Karar,
Ruth 4:34 Elipelet wod pa Akacbai me Maaka, Eliam wod pa Akitopel me Gilo,
Ruth 4:35 Kejero me Karmel, Parai ma jo Arbi,
Ruth 4:36 Igal wod pa Natan me Joba, Bani ma jo Gad,
Ruth 4:37 Jelek ma jo Ammon, Nakarai me Beerot, ma latin jami lweny pa Joab wod pa Jeruya,
Ruth 4:38 Ira ma jo Itri, Gareb ma jo Itri.
Ruth 4:39 Uria ma jo Kit: gin ducu pyeradek wiye abiro.
Ruth 4:2 Camuel 24 Daudi okwano wel jo Icrael ki Juda (1 Tek 21.1-27)
Ruth 4:1 Kiniga dok omako Rwot i kom jo Icrael, ci opiyo Daudi i komgi kun owaco ni; “Cit ikwan wei jo Icrael ki Juda.”
Ruth 4:2 Kit meno kabaka owaco bot Joab ki ludito wi mony ducu ma gitye bo te ni, “Wucit ka kwano dano i kin kaka ducu ma i Icrael, cakke i Dan nio kwede wa i Beer-ceba, kun wukwano dano ducu.”
Ruth 4:3 Ento Joab ojuko kaba ka kun owacce ni, “Myero Rwot Lubaŋani aye omed wel lwak tyen miya kulu, kun in kabaka ineno ki waŋi, ento piŋo cwinyi mito kwano dano kit man, laditta kaba ka?”
Ruth 4:4 Ento lok pa kabaka obedo tek makato pa Joab ki pa ludito wi mony ducu, omiyo Joab ki ludito wi mony gukato woko ki i nyim kabaka, gucito ka kwano wel jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:5 Guŋolo loka kulu Jordan, ci gucako kwano dano cakke ki i Aroer ki i gaŋ ma tye i dye nota, ci gukemo Gad, guo kwede wa i Jajer.
Ruth 4:6 Ka gumedde wa i Gilead ki i Kadec ma i lobo pa jo Kit; ka guo kwede i Dan, gulokke gudok yo tuŋ Cidon,
Ruth 4:7 ka, gumedde kwede wa i gaŋ gogo me Turo ki i gaŋi ducu pa jo Kiv ki jo Kanaan; ka dok gucito kwede i Negeb me Juda kun giwok ki i Beer-ceba.
Ruth 4:8 Ka gurumo ki lobo ducu, ci guo kwede i Jerucalem ma onoŋo otero dwe aboŋwen ki nino pyeraryo.
Ruth 4:552 
Ruth 4:9 Ka Joab omiyo wel dano ma okwano-ni bot kabaka, i Icrael onoŋo tye iye oteka lweny ma wegi pala lucwan alip miya aboro, ki i Juda alip miya abic.
Ruth 4:10 Ka Daudi okwano wel dano otum, ci cwinye ocako poto. Obako doge bot Rwot kun wacci, “Abalo twon bal mo madit pi gin ma doŋ atimo. Ento, ai Rwot, kombeddi doŋ alegi ni ikwany roc man woko ki i koma, pien atimo lok me miŋo twatwal.”
Ruth 4:11 Ka doŋ Daudi oa malo odiko con, ci lok pa Rwot obino bot lanebi Gad, ma lanenpiny ma konyo Daudi. Rwot owacci,
Ruth 4:12 “Cit iciwac bot Daudi ni, ‘Rwot owaco kuman ni, Amiyi lok adek; in ikwany acel i kingi wek ami opot i korrii.’ “
Ruth 4:13 Kit meno Gad obino bot Daudi, otitte lok meno kun wacce ni, “Imito kec aye opot i lobowu otyek mwaka adek? Nyo imito lumerok guryemwu wek wuriŋ i nyimgi pi dwe adek kulu? Nyo two gemo aye opot i lobowu otyek nino adek? In koŋ itam wek inoŋ kit ma abidok iye bot Rwot ma ocwala boti-ni, ka wek adwokke lok.”
Ruth 4:14 Daudi owaco bot Gad ni, “An doŋ adonyo i twon can madit ma pe wacce. Wek wapot i ciŋ Rwot, pien kicane dwoŋ; ento pe apot i cin dano.”
Ruth 4:15 Rwot ocwalo two gemo opoto i kom jo Icrael cakke odiko nio kwede i nino ma ociko-ni. Dano guto cakke ki i Dan o kwede wa i Beer-ceba ma romo alip pyerabiro kulu.
Ruth 4:16 I kare ma lamalaika pa Rwot ma tye ka neko dano oryeyo ciŋe okemo Jerucalem wek etyek woko, ci Rwot oŋut i kom gin man marac, Ojuko lamalaika kun waco ni, “Man doŋ oromo; doŋ ikul ciŋi piny.” Onoŋo lamalaika pa Rwot tye i ŋet laro moyo pa Arauna ma jo Jebuc.
Ruth 4:17 Ka Daudi oneno kom lamalaika ma tye ka neko lwak ki, ci owaco bot Rwot ni, “Nen, atyeko tiyo bal, atimo roc madit; ento lwak romi man gutimo kit roc aŋo? Alegi ni, wek ciŋi opot i koma ki i kom jo me ot pa wora keken.”
Ruth 4:18 Gad dok obino bot Daudi i nino meno, owacce ni, “Doŋ icit ka ca no keno tyer pi Rwot i laro moyo pa Arauna ma jo Jebuc.”
Ruth 4:19 Daudi ocito kunnu kit ma Rwot ocike kwede pi lok pa Gad.
Ruth 4:20 Arauna obolo wane piny ci oneno kabaka ki luticce ka gibino gikemo en atir, ci ocito omiyo woro bot kabaka kun oryebbe piny i nyime.
Ruth 4:21 Arauna openyo ni, “Piŋo ibino bota tin, laditta kabaka?” Daudi ogamo ni, “Abino ka wilo laro moyoni wek acan iye keno tyer pi Rwot wek two gemo oke woko ki i kom lwak.”
Ruth 4:553 
Ruth 4:22 Arauna owaco bot Daudi ni, “Laditta kabaka in iter larona, ityer iye gin ma ineno ni ber. Twon me gitum awaŋa bene ene, ki opam me dino bel ki rii ŋut twoni gubed me yen.
Ruth 4:23 Magi ducu an Arauna amiyo boti, kabaka.” Arauna dok owaco bot kabaka ni, “Rwot Lubaŋani aye ogam motti.”
Ruth 4:24 Ento kabaka ogamo dog Arauna ni, “Pe kumeno, Abiwilogi ki boti awila, aculo ki lim; pien pe atwero tyero gitum awaŋa mo bot Rwot Lubaŋana ma, pe awilo ki, limma.” Kit meno Daudi owilo laro moyo ki twoni bene, oculo cekel me ryal pyerabic.
Ruth 4:25 Daudi ocano iye keno tyer pi Rwot, ka otyero gitum awaŋa, ki gityer lakwecwiny, Pienno Rwot owinyo bako-dog pa lwak pi lobogi, ci two gemo oke woko ki i lobo Icrael.
Ruth 4:554 
Ruth 4:1 Luker
Ruth 4:1 Luker 1 Abicagi okonyo Daudi
Ruth 4:1 I kare ma kabaka Daudi doŋ oti twatwal, ki mwaka me ditte bene dwoŋ, kadi bed gium kome ki lwak boŋŋi mapol, pe winyo lyeto mo i kome.
Ruth 4:2 Luticce guwaco hote ni, “Ladit kabaka, giyeny nyako mo matidi gikel boti, wok omur kori, ogwoki bene, Wek en obut i kori, ladit kabaka, omiyi lyeto.”
Ruth 4:3 Guyenyo nyako mo mamwonya ki i lobo Icrael ducu, ci gunoŋo Abicagi anyira Cunam, gukele bot kabaka.
Ruth 4:4 Nyako meno onoŋo mwonya mada. Otugi doko lagwok kabaka cut, kun tiyo tic ducu; ento kabaka pe oloko odoko dakone. Adoniya oette i ker
Ruth 4:5 I kare meno Adoniya wod pa Kagit oŋwette ki dwoŋ wiye kene kun wacci, “Abibedo kabaka.” Ocako yubo gadigadi lweny ki wegi aguragura, ki co pyerabic, oketogi me riŋo i nyime.
Ruth 4:6 Yam wonne pe ocwero cwinye i kare mo ducu pi penye ni, “Piŋo itimo gin munyo-ni!” En odoŋo nia kome mwonya mada ma neno mit; yam minne onywalo olubo ŋe Abcalom.
Ruth 4:7 En oyubo lok ki Joab wod pa Jeruya ki ajwaka Abiatar, ci gulubo kor Adoniya gukonye.
Ruth 4:8 Ento ajwaka Jadok, Benaya wod pa Yekoyada, lanebi Natan, ki Cimei ki Rei ki oteka lweny pa Daudi yam pe gitye bot Adoniya.
Ruth 4:9 Adoniya otyero romi ki twoni ki lim ma gucwe bot Lubaŋa i nyim got Twol ma tye i ŋet En-rogel, ka olwoŋo iye omege ducu ma awobe pa kabaka ki ludito ducu ma i Juda ma gitiyo bot kabaka.
Ruth 4:10 Ento pe olwoŋo lanebi Natan, kadi Benaya, kadi twoni oteka lweny pa Daudi, kadi wa ominne Solomon.
Ruth 4:11 Natan owaco bot Batceba min Solomon ni, “In peya iwinyo ni Adoniya wod pa Kagit otyeko doko kabaka ma rwotwa Daudi bene pe ŋeyo lok mo iye?
Ruth 4:12 Iyo, koŋ doŋ ibin wek amiyi ryeko, ka wek alar kwoni ki kwo pa wodi Solomon.
Ruth 4:13 Cit oyot bot kabaka Daudi, iwacce ni, ‘Yam ikwoŋo kwoŋ bota, ladit, kun iwacci, woda Solomon aye bicamo kerri, en aye bibedo i wi komkerri, Piŋo Adoniya aye odoko kabaka?’
Ruth 4:14 I kare ma noŋo pud it ye ka lok ki kabaka-ni, an bene abibino i kori ka moko lokki.”
Ruth 4:555 
Ruth 4:15 Batceba ocito bot kabaka wa i kicikane. Onoŋo kabaka doŋ oti twatwal, kun Abicagi anyira Cunam obedo ka tic i kome.
Ruth 4:16 Batceba okulo wiye oryebbe piny me woro kabaka. Kabaka openye ni, “Gin aŋo ma cwinyi mitoni?”
Ruth 4:17 Batceba ogamo ni, “Rwoda, yam ikwoŋo kwoŋ bota ki nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋani kun iwacci, Solomon ma woda aye bicamo kerri, en aye bibedo i wi komkerri.
Ruth 4:18 Kombeddi nen ba, Adoniya aye odoko kabaka, kadi bed in rwoda pe iŋeyo iye gin mo.
Ruth 4:19 Otyeko tyero twoni ki lim ma ocwe-gu ki lwak romi mapol twatwal, olwoŋo awobe pa kabaka ducu, ki ajwaka Abiatar, ki Joab ladit me mony bene; ento pe olwoŋo laticci Solomon.
Ruth 4:20 Rwoda kabaka, kombeddi waŋ jo lerael ducu gineno boti pi tito botgi ŋat ma bibedo i wi komkerri ka in doŋ ipe.
Ruth 4:21 Gwok nyo kare biromo ma noŋo in rwoda kabaka ito woko, iywe kacel ki kwariwu, ci an ki woda Solomon aye gibinenowa macalo wan luba!.”
Ruth 4:22 I kare ma Batceba tye ka lok ki kabaka-ni, lanebi Natan bene obino i ot.
Ruth 4:23 Giwaco bot kabaka ni, “Lanebi Natan bene tye kany.” Ka Natan odonyo i ot, oryebbe i nyim kabaka kun okulo wiye piny i ŋom.
Ruth 4:24 Owacci, “Rwoda kabaka, onoŋo in iwacci, ‘Adoniya aye bileyo ka tyena, en aye bibedo i wi komkerra’?
Ruth 4:25 Gin mumiyo apenyo, pien en doŋ ocito woko, otyero twoni ki lim ma ocwe, ki romi mapol twatwal, olwoŋo awobe pa kabaka ducu, ki Joab ladit me mony, ki ajwaka Abiatar. Nen, gin gitye ka cam ki mat i nyime kun giwacci, ‘Kabaka Adoniya obed kwo nakanaka!’
Ruth 4:26 Ento an ma laticci, ki ajwaka Jadok, ki Benaya wod pa Yekoyada, ki laticci Solomon, en pe olwoŋowa.
Ruth 4:27 Lok man in rwoda kabaka aye imiyo otine kece, kun pe itito botwa wan luticci aŋa ma bibedo i wi komkerri ka in doŋ ipe?”
Ruth 4:28 Kabaka Daudi ogamo ni, “Lwoŋ Batceba obin bota.” Ci Batceba obino bot kabaka, ocuŋ i nyime.
Ruth 4:29 Kabaka okwono kwon kun wacci, “Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, ma yam okoko kwona ki iciŋ lukworra,
Ruth 4:30 macalo yam akwoŋo kwoŋ boti ki nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael kun awacci, ‘Wodi Solomon aye bileyo ka tyena, en aye bibedo i wi komkerra me leyo kakara,’ tin doŋ abiketo i tic.”
Ruth 4:556 
Ruth 4:31 Batceba okulo waŋe oryebbe piny oworo kaba ka kun wacci, “Myero rwoda kabaka Daudi obed kwo matwal!”
Ruth 4:32 Kabaka Daudi dok owacci, “Wulwoŋ ajwaka Jadok obin bota, ki Benaya wod pa Yekoyada.” Ci gubino bot kabaka.
Ruth 4:33 I Kabaka owaco botgi ni, “Wucit ki askarina, wuket woda Solomon i wi kanana kikome, ci wutere i Gikon.
Ruth 4:34 Wumi ajwaka Jadok ki lanebi Natan guwire kunnu ki moo me bedo kabaka me Icrael, lacen wukut tum kun wuwacci, ‘Kabaka Solomon obed kwo nakanaka!’
Ruth 4:35 Ka wun doŋ wubilubo kore, ka en bino ci bedo i wi komkerra; pien en aye bibedo kabaka kakara, an doŋ atyeko kete me bedo laloc i wi Icrael ki i wi Juda bene.”
Ruth 4:36 Benaya wod pa Yekoyada ogamo dog kabaka ni, “Amen, Myero Rwot Lubujani rwoda kabaka omok lok ma iwaco-nu.
Ruth 4:37 Kit ma Rwot yam obedo kwedi, rwoda kabaka, en dok obed ki Solomon bene kit meno, omi komkerre obed dit makato meri.”
Ruth 4:38 Ajwaka Jadok ki lanebi Natan, ki Benaya wod pa Yekoyada, ki jo Keret ki jo Pelet, gucito guketo Solomon obedo i wi kana pa kabaka Daudi, ka gukelo kwede i Gikon.
Ruth 4:39 Ajwaka Jadok okwanyo moo ma i tun romo ma onoŋo okwanyo ki i kema pa Rwot, owiro ki Solomon ki kunnu, Lacen gikuto tum, ci lwak ducu gugamo ni, “Kabaka Solomon obed kwo nakanaka!”
Ruth 4:40 Dano gucako mol i kore kun gikuto nyamulere-gu ma cwinygi yom adada, omiyo lobo mito bar woko likwak pi dwangi.
Ruth 4:41 Adoniya ki welone ducu guwinyo i ŋe tyeko karamagi. Ka Joab owinyo dwan tum ci openyo ni, “Woo madit ma i gaŋ kai-Ii nyuto aŋo?”
Ruth 4:42 I kare ma en pud tye ka lok, Yonacan wod pa ajwaka Abiatar otuc, ci Adoniya owacce ni, “Dony, pien in dano ma gigeno, myero ikel lok maber.”
Ruth 4:43 Yonacan ogamo dog Adoniya ni, “Pe kumeno, ladit, pien rwotwa kabaka Daudi doŋ otyeko keto Solomon me bedo kabaka.
Ruth 4:44 Ocwalo ajwaka Jadok, ki lanebi Natan, ki Benaya wod pa Yekoyada, ki jo Keret ki jo Pelet, guketo Solomon obedo i wi kana pa kabaka.
Ruth 4:45 Ajwaka Jadok ki lanebi Natan gutyeko wire ki moo i Gikon me bedo kabaka; gucito nia ki kunnu ma cwinygi yom, en aye omiyo woo tye i gaŋ kal, Man aye dwan ma wuwinyo-ni.
Ruth 4:46 Solomon doŋ obedo i wi komker,
Ruth 4:557 
Ruth 4:47 dok bene lutic pa kabaka gucito ka pwoyo rwotwa, kabaka Daudi, kun giwacci, ‘Lubaŋani omi nyiŋ Solomon oywek mada makato meri, dok omi komkerre obed dit makato komkerri!’ Ci kabaka okulle piny i wi kitandane,
Ruth 4:48 owaco bene ni, ‘Gipwo Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma otyeko keto ŋat acel ki i kin litinona obedo i wi komkerra tin, ma kun aneno ki waŋa.’ ”
Ruth 4:49 Lwak welo pa Adoniya ducu komgi ocako myel, ci gutwarre, ŋat acel acel okemo yone kene.
Ruth 4:50 Adoniya ocako lworo Solomon, ci oa ocito, omako ten keno me keno tyer.
Ruth 4:51 Gitito pire bot Solomon kun giwacci, “Nen, Adoniya doŋ lwori, kabaka Solomon, pien ocito omako ten keno me keno tyer kun wacci, ‘Waŋ ma kabaka Solomon okwoŋo kwoŋ bota ni pe ebineka, an laticce, ki pala lucwan, ci abia.’ “
Ruth 4:52 Solomon owacci, “Ka ebibedo dano ma genne, pe yer wiye mo bipoto piny; ento ka rac mo onen i kome, ci bito.”
Ruth 4:53 Kit meno kabaka ocwalo dano ci gukwanyo Adoniya woko ki i kom keno tyer, ci ocito oworo kabaka Solomon, Solomon owaco bote ni, “Cit wa i odi.”
Ruth 4:1 Luker 2 Daudi ociko Solomon
Ruth 4:1 Ka kare me to pa Daudi onyiko cok ci ociko Solomon kun wacci,
Ruth 4:2 “An doŋ acok cito ka lubo yo ma jo me lobo ducu lubo-ni. Bed matek, nyutte ni in laco.
Ruth 4:3 Mak cik pa Rwot Lubaŋani kun iwoto i yone, ma ilubo lok ma en ociko ducu, dok omiyo botwa obed lok me caden, kit ma gicoyo kwede i buk pa Moses, wek ibed ki gum i kom gin ducu ma itiyo, ki ka ma idok iye ducu.
Ruth 4:4 Rwot omok lokke ma yam oloko i komi, ma owacci, ‘Ka ce awobeni gibigwoko kitgi maber, kun gibedo dano ma gin lugen i nyima ki cwinygi ducu ki tipo komgi ducu, ci pe ibibedo laboŋo danoni mo ma bibedo i wi komker me Icrael!’
Ruth 4:5 “Ento in iŋeyo gin ma yam Joab wod pa Jeruya otiyo i koma, kit ma otimo ki ludito mony pa jo Icrael aryo-ni. Abneri wod pa Ner ki Amaca wod pa Jeter, ma en onekogi wo ko pi culo kwor i kare me kuc pi remo ma yam oo i mony macon ca. En omiyo remo pa jo ma gipe ki bal onyobo del pyera ki war tyena bene.
Ruth 4:6 In itim muporo ryekoni; ento pe iwek lwar wiye ocit i lyel ki kuc.
Ruth 4:7 Ento bed maber ki awobe pa Baŋilai ma jo Gilead, wek gubed i kin dano ma gicamo i wi mejani; gin bene yam gubedo maber kweda kumeno i kare ma gunoŋa ka ariŋo omeru Abcalom.
Ruth 4:558 
Ruth 4:8 Dok bene pud it ye ki Cimei wod pa Gera ma Labenjamin ma gaŋgi Bakurim. En yam obedo ka lamo an ki cen marac twatwal i kare ma onoŋo acito i Makanaim; ento ka obino ka rwatte kweda i dog kulu Jordan, ci akwoŋo kwon bote ki nyiŋ Rwot kun awacci, pe abineke ki pala lucwan.
Ruth 4:9 Iyo, pe ibed kwede macalo en pe tye ki bal mo, In laryeko, ibiŋeyo kit ma ibitime kwede, ibitero lwar wiye i lyel ki remo.” To pa Daudi (1 Tek 29.26-30)
Ruth 4:10 Lacen Daudi oto, oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyike i gaŋ kalle.
Ruth 4:11 Kare ma Daudi oloyo kwede jo Icrael oromo mwaka pyeraŋwen; obedo ka loc i Kebron pi mwaka abiro, ka dok i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyeradek wiye adek.
Ruth 4:12 Kit meno Solomon obedo i wi komker pa wonne Daudi, ci kerre omoko matek. To pa Adoniya
Ruth 4:13 Adoniya wod pa Kagit obino bot Batceba ma min Solomon. Batceba openye ni, “Ibino ki kuc?” Ogamo ni, “Abino ki kuc.”
Ruth 4:14 Dok owacci, “Atye ki gin mo ma amito wacci.” Batceba ogamo ni, “Wac do.”
Ruth 4:15 Adoniya owacci, “Iŋeyo ni ker yam mera, dok jo Icrael oye ni alogi; ento ker dok olokke odoko pa, omera, pien onoŋo Rwot aye omiye.
Ruth 4:16 An atye ki peny mo acel me penyi kwede; pe ikwer doga.” Batceba ogamo ni, “Wac do.”
Ruth 4:17 Ci owacci, “Alegi ipennya kabaka Solomon, pien en pe bikwero dogi, en omiya Abicagi ma Laeunam wek obed dakona.”
Ruth 4:18 Batceba ogamo ni, “Ber matek; abitito lokki bot kabaka.”
Ruth 4:19 Batceba ocito bot kabaka Solomon pi lok kwede pi Adoniya. Kabaka oa malo pi jole, okulle piny bot minne; ka obedo i wi komkerre, ka dok gikelo kom pi min kabaka bene, ci obedo i ŋete tuŋ acuc.
Ruth 4:20 Batceba owacci, “Atye ki peny mo acel ma apenyi kwede; pe ikwer.” Kabaka ogamo doge ni, “Peny pennyinu, maa; pien pe abikwero dogi.”
Ruth 4:21 Minne owacci, “Wek Abicagi ma Laeunam gimi bot Adoniya obed dakone.”
Ruth 4:22 Kabaka Solomon ogamo dog minne ni, “Piŋo ipenyo ni gimi Abicagi ma Laeunam bot Adoniya? Peny wa pi kerra bene ducu; pien en omera maditte, en onoŋo tye ki ajwaka Abiatar ki Joab wod pa Jeruya ka ŋete.”
Ruth 4:23 Ci kabaka Solomon okwoŋo kwoŋ ki nyiŋ Rwot kun wacci, “Lubaŋa oket can i koma kit meno ki makato ka ce lok man pe amiyo Adoniya oculo ki kwone!
Ruth 4:559 
Ruth 4:24 Kombeddi, macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, ma doŋ omoko kerra, ma oketa i wi komker pa wora Daudi, ma oketa adoko kabaka, dok omiyo jo me oda gicuŋ matek kit ma yam ociko-ni, Adoniya tin gibinekone woko.”
Ruth 4:25 Kabaka Solomon ocwalo Benaya wod pa Yekoyada, ci Benaya ocobo Adoniya oreto woko piny, oneko woko. Giryemo Abiatar ci gineke Joab woko
Ruth 4:26 Kabaka dok owaco bot ajwaka Abiatar ni, “Cit i Anatot, i paconi, pien imyero ki to. Ento peya abineki i kare-ni, pien yam ibedo ka tiŋo canduk pa Rwot Lubaŋa i nyim wora Daudi, dok pien yam iribbe ki wora ka neno can madwoŋ.”
Ruth 4:27 Ci Solomon okwanyo Abiatar woko ki i tic me bedo ajwaka pa Rwot. Lok pa Rwot ma yam oloko i Cilo ma mako jo me ot pa Eli ocobbe kit meno.
Ruth 4:28 Ka Joab owinyo gin mutimme, oriŋo olaro i kema pa Rwot, omako ten keno me keno tyer; pien Joab onoŋo obedo ka konyo Adoniya, kadi bed yam pe okonyo Abcalom.
Ruth 4:29 Ka gitito pire bot kabaka Solomon ni, “Joab oriŋo olaro i kema pa Rwot, tye wa i ka ŋet keno tyer,” Solomon ocwalo Benaya wod pa Yekoyada kun wacci, “Cit icobe iret woko piny.”
Ruth 4:30 Ci Benaya ocito i kema pa Rwot, owacce ni, “Kabaka ociko ni ikat woko.” Joab ogamo ni, “Pe, abito ki kany.” Benaya dok otero lok bot kabaka kun wacci, “Joab dok owaco kuman-ni, ka dok odokka iye kit man.”
Ruth 4:31 Kabaka odok iye bote ni, “Tim kit ma en owaco-ni, cob iret woko piny. Ci ibiyike woko, wek gikwany alii woko ki i koma ki i kom ot pa wora pi remo pa dano ma yam Joab onekogi laboŋo bal mo ma gin gutimo.
Ruth 4:32 Rwot bidwoko tim me oyo remo meno i wiye kikome, pien en yam opoto i kom twoni aryo ma cwinygi atir ma gibeco gikato en, ci onekogi woko ma wora Daudi pe ŋeyo en aye Abneri wod pa Ner ma lawimony ma loyo mony pa jo Icrael, ki Amaca wod pa Jeter ma lawiwmony ma loyo mony pa jo Juda.
Ruth 4:33 Alii me togi bidok i wi Joab ki i wi likwaye matwal; ento ki bot Daudi ki bot likwaye ki jo me ode ducu, ki bot komkerre, kuc ma a ki bot Rwot bibedo iye nakanaka.”
Ruth 4:34 Benaya wod pa Yekoyada ocito kunnu, ocobo Joab oreto woko piny oneko woko; ci giyike i pacone kikome ma tye i dye tim.
Ruth 4:35 Kabaka oketo Benaya wod pa Yekoyada me bedo ladit ma loyo mony ma ka Joab, dok oketo Jadok me bedo ajwaka pa Lubaŋa ma ka Abiatar.
Ruth 4:36 Lacen kabaka ocwalo kwena ka lwoŋo Cimei, owaco bote ni, “Ger odi piri keni i Jerucalem, ibed iye kunnu, pe ia ki kunnu icit i kabedo mukene.
Ruth 4:560 
Ruth 4:37 Ento i nino mo keken ma icito iye woko, ma iŋolo iye nota ora Kidron, ci myero iŋe atir ni ibito iye; alii me toni bidok gire i wii.”
Ruth 4:38 Cimei ogamo dog kabaka ni, “Lok ma iwaco-ni ber, rwoda kabaka; abitimo kit ma iwaconi.” Ci Cimei obedo i Jerucalem pi kare malac.
Ruth 4:39 Ka mwaka adek okato, opii aryo pa Cimei guriŋo woko bot Akic wod pa Maaka, ma kabaka me Gat. Ka gitito bot Cimei ni, “Opiini gitye i Gat bot Akic.”
Ruth 4:40 Cimei oa, otweyo kom me bedo i ŋe kana, ci ocito i Gat bot Akic ka yenyo kor opiine. Ka onoŋogi, odwokogi cen ki i Gat.
Ruth 4:41 Ka gitito bot Solomon ni Cimei otyeko a woko ki i Jerucalem, ocito wa i Gat ka olokke odwogo,
Ruth 4:42 kabaka ocwalo dano ka lwoŋo Cimei, ci, owaco bote ni, “Yam pe amiyo ikwoŋo kwon i nyiŋ Rwot, kun ajuki matek ma awacci, ‘Ŋe atir ni, i nino ma ibicito iye woko i kabedo mo mukene, ibito’? Ci in igamo doga ni, ‘Lok ma iwaco-ni ber; abilubo.’
Ruth 4:43 Ci piŋo nene pe doŋ igwoko kwoŋŋi ma ikwoŋo i nyim Rwot, ki cik ma yam aciki kwede?”
Ruth 4:44 Kabaka dok owaco bot Cimei ni, “In iŋeyo ki i cwinyi kit tim maraco ducu ma yam itimo i kom wora Daudi; Rwot bene bidwoko tim maraco meno poto i wii kikome.
Ruth 4:45 Ento an abibedo ki gum, ci komker pa Daudi bimoko matwal i nyim Rwot.”
Ruth 4:46 Kabaka dok ociko Benaya wod pa Yekoyada; ci okato woko ocobo Cimei oreto woko piny oneko woko. Kumeno ker omoko matek i ciŋ Solomon.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 3 Solomon onyomo nya pa Parao
Ruth 4:1 Solomon oribbe ki Parao kabaka me Ejipt kun onyomo nyare; ci otero nya pa Parao i gaŋ kai pa Daudi nio ka doŋ otyeko gero ode kikome ki ot pa Rwot, ki cel ma orumo Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:2 Ento lwak gubedo ka tyero gitum i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma i wi godi, pien onoŋo peya gigero ot mo pi nyiŋ Rwot. Solomon olego pi ryeko (2 Tek 1.1-13)
Ruth 4:3 Solomon yam omaro Rwot, kun lubo cik pa wonne Daudi, ento onoŋo pud tumo gitum dok Waŋo odok eceta i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma i wi godi.
Ruth 4:4 I nino mo acel kabaka ocito i Gibeon ka tumo gitum kunnu, pien meno aye kabedo me woro Lubaŋa maditte. Solomon yam obedo ka tyero gitum awaŋa alip acel kulu i wikeno tyer kunnu.
Ruth 4:561 
Ruth 4:5 Rwot onyutte bot Solomon i Gibeon i wag let dyewor, ci owacci “Peny gin ma abimiyo boti.”
Ruth 4:6 Solomon ogamo ni, “In yam inyuto mar meri madwoŋ ma pe lokke bot wora Daudi ma laticci, pien obedo ka kwo i nyimi ki gen madwoŋ ki tim ma atir, ma cwinye leŋ; in bene igwoko mar meri madit ma pe lokke pire, dok ityeko miyo wode obedo i wi komkerre i kareni.
Ruth 4:7 Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, kombeddi doŋ iketa, an laticci, adoko kabaka ma ka wora Daudi, kadi bed pud an latin, ma peya aŋeyo loyo dano.
Ruth 4:8 An doŋ atye i kin joni ma yam iyero, rok madit ma pe kwanne, ma welgi pe ŋene pi polgi.
Ruth 4:9 Ber in Rwot imiya cwiny me ryeko me loyo lwakki, wek aŋe poko kin gin maber ki gin marac; aŋa ma twero loyo rok man madit-ti?”
Ruth 4:10 Rwot cwinye obedo yom i kom Solomon pi peny man.
Ruth 4:11 Lubaŋa owaco bote ni, “Pien ipenyo kit man, ma pe ilega ni ami iri i wi lobo nakanaka, pe ilego lonyo, kadi pi kwo pa lumerokki, ento ilego ni gimiyi cwiny me ryeko me poko gin ma tye atir,
Ruth 4:12 abitiyo kit ma iloko-ni. Nen, doŋ amiyi ryeko ki cwiny me poko kin lok mapatpat kit ma peya onen i kom dano mo nia wa con, dok bene ŋat macalo in pe binen ki i ŋeyi.
Ruth 4:13 Dok abimiyi gin ma pe ilego bene, abimiyi lonyo ki deyo, wek kabaka mo pe obinen ma gibiporo ki in pi kwoni ducu.
Ruth 4:14 Ka ce ibilubo yona kun imako cikka ki lok ma aciko ducu, kit ma yam woru Daudi olubo-ni, abimedo kwoni ri i wi lobo kare malac.”
Ruth 4:15 Ka Solomon oco, ci onoŋo ni kara ebedo ka leko lek. Ka obino i Jerucalem, ocuŋ i nyim canduk me gicikke pa, Rwot, otyero gitum awaŋa ki gityer lakwecwiny, ci otedo karama pi luticce ducu. Solomon oŋolo kop ki ryeko
Ruth 4:16 I kare meno mon aryo ma lukwele gubino bot kabaka, gucuŋ i nyime.
Ruth 4:17 Dako acel owacci, “Ai rwoda, dako man ki an wabedo i ot acel, ci an anywalo latinna ma onoŋo en tye i ot kweda.
Ruth 4:18 Dok i ne nino adek cakke i kare ma agonnye kwede, en bene onywal; dano mo onoŋo pe tye kwedwa i ot, onoŋo watye wan aryo keken.
Ruth 4:19 Ci dako man obuto i kom latinne i dyewor, omiyo latin oto.
Ruth 4:20 En oa malo ki i dyewor, ci otiŋo woda woko ki ka ŋeta; ma onoŋo an anino woko, ka opyelo i kore, ka dok opyelo kom wode muto-ni i kora.
Ruth 4:562 
Ruth 4:21 Ka oo odiko, ci aa malo ka doto latinna; ci nen, anoŋo doŋ oto woko, Ka abedo ka ŋiyo kome, nen, pe en aye latinna ma anywalo-ni.”
Ruth 4:22 Ento dako mukene-ni owacci, “Pe kumeno; latin makwo-ni: aye mera, latin muto-ni meri.” Dako mukwoŋo-ni owacci, “Pe, latin muto-ni aye meri, latin makwo-ni aye mera.” Gubedo ka lok kumeno i nyim kabaka.
Ruth 4:23 Kabaka dok owacci, “Man wacci, ‘Man makwo-ni aye latinna, latinni en oto-ni’; mu kene gamo ni, ‘Pe; ento muto-ni aye latinni, makwo-ni aye mera.’ “
Ruth 4:24 Kabaka dok owacci, “Kella pala lucwan.” Ci gikelo pala lucwan i nyim kabaka.
Ruth 4:25 Kabaka ociko ni, “Gipok i latin makwo-ni aryo, wek gimi dul acel bot dako acel, ki dulle tuŋcel bot lawote.”
Ruth 4:26 Ci dako ma wode tye makwo-ni owaco bot kabaka ni, “A, rwoda, mi latin makwo-ni hote, pe inek aneka,” pien cwinye tye ka cwer pi latinne. Ento mukene- ni ogamo ni, “Gipok iye wek pe doŋ obed mera nyo meri.”
Ruth 4:27 Kabaka ogamo lokgi owacci, “Mi latin makwo bot dako mukwoŋo-ni. Pe ginek woko, en aye min latin-nu.”
Ruth 4:28 Ka jo Icrael guwinyo k it kop ma kabaka onolo-ni, ci gubedo ki lworo i kom kabaka; pien guniaŋ ni ryeko pa Lubaŋa tye i iye, omiyo oŋolo kop atir.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 4 Ludito wi tic pa Solomon ki lulo dul lobo
Ruth 4:1 Kabaka Solomon obedo kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael ducu.
Ruth 4:2 Dano magi aye gubedo ludito wi ticce: Ajaria wod pa Jadok obedo ajwaka pa Lubaŋa;
Ruth 4:3 Elikorep ki Akija ma awobe pa Cica gubedo lukarani, Yekocapat wod pa Akilud obedo laco lok ma timme;
Ruth 4:4 Benaya wod pa Yekoyada obedo ladit me mony; Jadok ki Abiatar gubedo ajwagi pa Lubaŋa;
Ruth 4:5 Ajaria wod pa Natan obedo ladit ma loyo lulo dul lobo; Jabud wod pa Natan obedo ajwaka ki larem kabaka;
Ruth 4:6 Akica obedo ladit ma gwoko gaŋ kai; ki Adoniram wod pa Abda obedo ladit ma loyo tic muroni.
Ruth 4:7 Solomon obedo ki lulo dul lobo apar wiye aryo ma giloyo wi Icrael ducu, ma ticgi obedo me coko cam pi kabaka ki jone ducu; dano acel acel miyo cam tyeko dwe acel i mwaka.
Ruth 4:8 Nyiŋgi ene: Ben-kur onoŋo loyo lobo godi me Epraim;
Ruth 4:563 
Ruth 4:9 Ben-deker onoŋo loyo Makaj, Caalbim, Bet-cemec ki Elon-bet-kanan;
Ruth 4:10 Ben-keced oloyo Arubot ki Coko ki lobo Keper ducu;
Ruth 4:11 Ben-abinadab oloyo Napat-dor ducu. (Onoŋo dakone obedo Tapat ma nya pa Solomon.)
Ruth 4:12 Baana wod pa Akilud oloyo Taanak, Megido ki Bet-cean ducu ma tye ka ŋet Jaretan ma i luŋ me Jejreel, ki cakke i Bet-cean nio i Abel-mekola ki nio kwede wa ka ŋet Jokmeam tuŋcel;
Ruth 4:13 Ben-geber oloyo Ramot-gilead, ki gaŋi matino pa Jair wod pa Manace ma gitye i lobo Gilead, kacel ki lobo Argob ma i Bacan ma tye iye gaŋi madito pyerabicel ma gicelo ki cel, ma dogcelgi gicego ki rii mola;
Ruth 4:14 Akinadab wod pa Iddo oloyo Makanaim;
Ruth 4:15 Akimaj oloyo lobo Naputali. En onoŋo onyomo Bacemat ma nya pa Solomon.
Ruth 4:16 Baana wod pa Kucai oloyo Acer ki Bealot;
Ruth 4:17 Yekocapat wod pa Parua oloyo lobo Icakar;
Ruth 4:18 Cimei wod pa Ela oloyo lobo Benjamin;
Ruth 4:19 Geber wod pa Uri oloyo dul lobo Gilead ma yam obedo lobo pa Cikon kabaka pa jo Amor ki pa Og kabaka me Bacan. Dok onoŋo tye lalo lobo acel ma loyo lobo Juda. Ryeko pa Solomon ki lonyone
Ruth 4:20 Jo Juda ki jo Icrael yam gidwoŋ ma rom ki kweyo ma i dog nam; gubedo ka cam ki ka mat ki yomcwiny.
Ruth 4:21 Solomon obedo ka loyo ker mapatpat ducu cakke ki i kulu Euprate nio wa i lobo pa jo Piliciti, ki nio wa i lobo Ejipt. Jo me ker meno gubedo ka tyero mot bot Solomon kun gitiyo bote i kare me kwone ducu.
Ruth 4:22 Cam ma gimiyo bot Solomon pi nino acel acel onoŋo romo moko kwon mapwotte guniya miya acel, moko kwon mukene guniya miya aryo,
Ruth 4:23 twoni mucwe apar, dyaŋi pyeraryo ma gikwayogi i-olet, romi miya acel, ma pe iribo iye til ki bure ki abur, ki gweni mucwe.
Ruth 4:24 En onoŋo bwoyo lobo ducu cakke ki i kulu Euprate dok kwede yo tuŋ potoceŋ, en aye cakke ki i Tipica nio wa i Gaja, kun loyo ki luker ducu cakke ki i kulu Euprate dok kwede yo tuŋ potoceŋ; obedo ki kuc i kabedo ducu murumo lobone.
Ruth 4:25 Juda ki Icrael bene gubedo mot ki kuc cakke ki i Dan nio kwede wa i Beer-ceba, kun dano acel acel bedo gire i te olokke ki i te odurone i kare pa Solomon ducu.
Ruth 4:564 
Ruth 4:26 Solomon obedo ki kabedo me gwoko aguragurane ma giromo gwoko iye aguragura alip pyeraŋwen pi ywayo gadigadine me lweny, ki lulweny alip apar wiye aryo ma giriŋo ki aguragura.
Ruth 4:27 Lulo dul lobo mapatpat gubedo ka miyo cam bot kabaka Solomon ki pi jo ducu ma gicito ka cam bote, kun dano acel acel miyo i dwene; pe gimiyo gin mo rem.
Ruth 4:28 Ki bel cayiri bene ki Teŋ kal pi cam pa aguragura ki pi aguragura madwirre gitero ducu i kabedo ma gimitogi iye, kun ŋat acel acel kelo kit ma giciko.
Ruth 4:29 Lubaŋa omiyo Solomon obedo ki ryeko ki niaŋ matut mada; tamme lac ma rom ki kweyo ma oyarre i dog nam.
Ruth 4:30 Kit meno ryeko pa Solomon okato ryeko pa jo ducu ma yo tuŋ wokceŋ, wa ki ryeko pa jo Ejipt ducu.
Ruth 4:31 En onoŋo ryek makato jo mu kene ducu, en laryeko makato Etan ma jo Jera, ki Eman, ki Kalkol ki Darda ma gin awobe pa Makol; ci nyiŋ Solomon oywek oromo i rok ducu ma orumogi.
Ruth 4:32 En bene obolo carolok ma romo alip adek; ki wer ma en ocako oromo alip acel ki abic.
Ruth 4:33 Oloko i komi yadi ocako ki i kom yat cedar ma tye i Lebanon nio kwede wa i kom anyero ma twi doŋo i kom cel got; oloko i kom lee tim bene, ki i kom winyo- gu, ki i kom gin ma lakalaka piny-gu, ki i kom rec-gu:
Ruth 4:34 Ci dano ma i rok ducu gubino ka winyo ryeko pa Solomon, dok gua ki bot luker ducu ma i wi lobo, ma guwinyo pi ryekone.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 5 Solomon ocikke ki kabaka Kiram (2 Tek 2.1-18)
Ruth 4:1 Kiram kabaka me Turo ocwalo luticce bot Solomon ka owinyo ni giwire ki moo me bedo kabaka me leyo ka tyen wonne, pien Kiram obedo ka maro Daudi nia wa con.
Ruth 4:2 Ci Solomon ocwalo lok bot Kiram ni,
Ruth 4:3 “Iŋeyo ni wora Daudi pe yam ogero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋane, pien lweny ki mony pa lumerok ma gurume omiyo gerone oloye, nio ka Rwot omiyo en oloyogi ducu.
Ruth 4:4 Ento i kare-ni Rwot Lubaŋa doŋ omiya yweyo i kabedo ducu; i kare-ni lamonewa mo doŋ pe, kadi wa peko mo.
Ruth 4:5 Pienno omiya atamo pi gero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋana, kit ma yam Rwot owaco bot wora Daudi ni, ‘Wodi ma abiketo i komkerri aye bigero ot pi nyiŋa.’
Ruth 4:565 
Ruth 4:6 Iyo, doŋ icik pi toŋŋa lwak yadi cedar me Lebanon. Luticca bene gibiribbe ki luticci, an abiculli lim me mucara pa luticci kit ma iyubo; pien iŋeyo ni pe tye dano mo ma i kinwa ma ŋeyo toŋo yadi macalo jo Cidon.”
Ruth 4:7 Ka Kiram owinyo lok pa Solomon lokke okweyo cwinye matek twatwal, ci owacci, “Gipwo Rwot Lubaŋa i kare man, ma doŋ omiyo bot Daudi wode ma laryeko me bedo Lalo rok man madit twatwal-li.”
Ruth 4:8 Kiram ocwalo lok bol Solomon kun wacci, “Atyeko winyo kwena ma icwalo bota; an atye ma aterre atera pi tiyo gin ducu ma imito 325 i kom lok ma dok kom bao yat cedar ki bao yat ciprec.
Ruth 4:9 Luticca aye gibikelone i dog nam nia ki i Lebanon; ka doŋ wabitweyo bao kacel ci gibikwan i wi pii macalo bwoda nio kwede i kabedo ma ibinyutta, ka doŋ wabigonyo kingi wo ko ka in doŋ ibigamogi ki kunnu; ci ibimiya cam pi jo ma i oda kit ma abimito kwede.”
Ruth 4:10 Kiram ocwalo lwak bao cedar ki ciprec bot Solomon kit ma en mito-ni,
Ruth 4:11 ci Solomon ocako miyo bot Kiram naŋo ma nyige ma romo guniya alippyerabicel me acama pa jone ma i ode, ki moo nyig jeituni ma giodo ma romo debe alip pyeraŋwen. Solomon obedo ka miyo jami magi ducu bot Kiram mwaka ki mwaka.
Ruth 4:12 Rwot obedo ka miyo ryeko bot Solomon kit ma yam ocikke kwede; ci kuc obedo i kin Kiram ki Solomon; gin aryo guketo gicikke i kingi.
Ruth 4:13 Kabaka Solomon ocako muroni pi tiyo tic matek i lobo Icrael ducu; girono dano alip pyeradek pi tic muroni.
Ruth 4:14 Ocwalogi i Lebanon, kun cwalogi ki alip apar apar dwe ki dwe pi leyo dog tic pa luwotgi. Gibedo i Lebanon dwe acel, dok gibedo paco tugi dwe aryo; Adoniram en aye ladit ma loyo lutic muroni ducu.
Ruth 4:15 Solomon onoŋo tye ki lutiŋ yec alip pyerabiro, ki jo ma gipayo godi ma i lobo godi ma giromo alip pyeraboro,
Ruth 4:16 ka dok imed iye ludito ma giloyo dog tic alip adek ki miya adek ma Solomon oketo, ma gin lulo lwak ma gitiyo tic.
Ruth 4:17 Gimuko godi madoŋo me wei, kit ma kabaka ociko, me keto guti me te ot ki godi ma gipayo mabeco.
Ruth 4:18 Kit meno lugedo pa Solomon ki pa Kiram, kacel ki jo Gebal, gubedo ka payo godi ki yu bo bao ki godi me gero ot.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 6 Solomon ogero ot pa Lubaŋa (2 Tek 3.1-14)
Ruth 4:566 
Ruth 4:1 Lacen ka mwaka okato miya aŋwen ki pyeraboro cakke ki i kare ma jo Icrael gua iye ki i lobo Ejipt, i mwaka me aŋwenne me ker pa Solomon me loyo jo Icrael, i dwe Jib , ma en aye dwe me aryone, en aye Solomon ocako gero iye ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:2 Ot ma kabaka Solomon ogero pi Rwot onoŋo borre romo futi pyerabo ŋwen, ki lacce futi pyeradek ki borre tuŋ malo romo futi pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
Ruth 4:3 Kicika ot ma i doggola me donyo, ma i nyim kicika me dye ot, borre romo futi pyeradek, ma rom ki lac me ot kikome, ki lac me kicika ma i nyim ot romo futi apar wiye abic.
Ruth 4:4 Oketo lwak dirica ot ki frem ma giketo odonyo i iye.
Ruth 4:5 Ogero gedo mukene ki woko ma orumo kicika ot ducu, en aye orumo dye ot, ki kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo; ci oketo iye kicika odi matino ma orumo ot ducu.
Ruth 4:6 Kicika odi matino ma piny lacgi romo futi abiro ki nucu, kicika odi ma i dyere lacgi romo futi aboŋwen, ki me adekke lacgi romo futi apar ki nucu; pien noŋo ojwiko kicika ot ki woko kun bwoto ka ma rii me kicika odi matino buto iye, wek rii pe odony i kicika kor ot kikome.
Ruth 4:7 I kare ma gigero ot, gibedo ka gero ki godi ma giyubo woko cut ki i bur gweŋ ka ma gipayogi iye; mumi yo i kare ma gitye ka gero ot pa Lubaŋa-ni, nyol ki latoŋ ki jami tic ducu me nyonyo pe giwinnye i ye wacel.
Ruth 4:8 Doggola me donyo i kicika odi matino ma tye piny onoŋo tye yo acuc ka idonyo i ot, ci gidonyo i grofa ma i dyere kun giito ki rwom, ka dok gia ki i grofa ma i dyere giito i me adekke.
Ruth 4:9 Kit meno Solomon ogero or ci otyeko. Ogoyo dan ot ki rii yat cedar ma gipeto ki bao cedar bene.
Ruth 4:10 Ogero gedo mukene ki woko ma orumo ot ducu. Grofane acel acel borre ki malo romo futi abiro ki nucu; gikubo i kom ot kikome ki rii bao cedar.
Ruth 4:11 I kare-nu lok pa Rwot obino bot Solomon ma waco ni,
Ruth 4:12 “Pi ot ma it ye ka gerone, ka ce ibilubo cikka, kun ilubo kit ma aciko ducu, kun itiyo kwede, ci abimiyo lokka moko i kin an ki in, kit ma yam aloko kwede bot woru Daudi.
Ruth 4:13 Dok abibedo i kin jo Icrael, pe abibwoto jona jo Icrael.” Jami me i ot pa Lubaŋa (2 Tek 3.1-14)
Ruth 4:14 Solomon ogero ot kit meno ci otyeko.
Ruth 4:15 Ki i i ot oguro kor kicika ot ki bao yat cedar, cakke ki i dye ot piny nio kwede wa i kwori dan ot; opeto kicika ot me i ot ki bao kumeno, dok opeto dye ot piny ki bao ciprec.
Ruth 4:567 
Ruth 4:16 Dok ogero kicika ot ma i tyelo ki bao yat cedar, cakke kii dye ot piny nio kwede wa i kwori dan ot, kun bor me ot romo futi pyeradek. Ogero man ki i i ot wek obed kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo, en aye kabedo maleŋ makato ducu.
Ruth 4:17 Ci kicika maditte, ma en aye dye ot ma i nyim kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo-ni, borre romo futi pyerabicel.
Ruth 4:18 Bao cedar ma i i ot gigoro iye cal, cal keno munyak ki cal ature. I ot ducu obedo bao cedar keken, ma kom got pe nen.
Ruth 4:19 Oyubo kabedo maleŋ i i ot, i tyelo ot kikome, me keto canduk me gicikke pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:20 Kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo-ni borre romo futi pyeradek, ki lacce futi pyeradek, ki borre tuŋ malo bene romo futi pyeradek; omwono kome woko ducu ki jabu ma giliyo maber. Otiyo bene keno tyer me bao cedar.
Ruth 4:21 Solomon omwono i ot woko ki jabu ma giliyo maber, dok oketo nyor jabu ma oŋolo dye ot arii i nyim kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo, ka omwono kome woko ki jabu.
Ruth 4:22 Omwono kom ot woko ducu ki jabu, nio ka kom ot ducu otum maber. Ki keno tyer ma i kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo bene en omwono kome woko ducu ki jabu.
Ruth 4:23 Ka dok opayo cal lukerubi aryo ki yat jeituni, oketogi i kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo; lakerubi acel acel borre romo futi apar wiye abic.
Ruth 4:24 Ki bwom lakerubi muyarre, bwome acel romo futi abiro ki nucu, ki bwome mukene bene romo futi abiro ki nucu; cakke i kom lano wi bwome tuŋcel nio wa i lano wi bwome tuŋ mukene lacgi romo futi apar wiye abic.
Ruth 4:25 Lukerubi aryo ducu bocogi rorom, ki komgi bene rom.
Ruth 4:26 Bor kom lakerubi acel acel romo futi apar wiye abic.
Ruth 4:27 Oketo Lukerubi aryo ducu i kicika ma i tyelo ot-ti, kun bwom lukerubi aryo ducu guyaro woko wek bwom ŋat acel ogud kom kicika ot tuŋcel, ki bwom lakerubi me aryone bene ogud kom kicika ot tuŋ mukene-ni; ki bwomgi mukene lano wigi rwatte ki i dye ot.
Ruth 4:28 Ci omwono kom lukerubi woko ki jabu.
Ruth 4:29 Ogoro cal i kor kicika ot orumo woko ducu, cal lukerubi, ki cal yadi otit, ki cal ature; ogoro cal i kor kicika ot ma i tyelo ki kicika maditte bene.
Ruth 4:30 Dok omwono dye ot ki jabu, i kicika ma i tyelo ki i kicika maditte bene.
Ruth 4:31 Doggola me donyo i kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo otiyo kikane aryo ki bao yat jeituni; rii me doggola ki okar doggola ryoryo gubedo latwoke abic.
Ruth 4:568 
Ruth 4:32 Oumo kom kika aryo me bao jeituni-ni ki cal lukerubi ma gigoro, ki cal yadi otit, ki cal ature. Omwono komgi woko ki jabu, ka olilo jabu i kom cal lukerubi ki i kom cal yadi otit ducu.
Ruth 4:33 Otiyo bene okar doggola me bao yat jeituni pi doggola me donyo i kicika maditte; otiyo latwoke aŋwen.
Ruth 4:34 Ka dok otiyo kika aryo ki bao yat ciprec; bao kika aryo-nu ducu gibanne abana.
Ruth 4:35 Ogoro cal lukerubi i komgi, ki cal yadi otit, ki cal ature. Omwono kom kika woko ki jabu ma oreyo, ka olilo mapwot i kom cal ma gigoro i komgi.
Ruth 4:36 Ogero dyekal ma i dyere ki godi apa ya latyeŋ adek, ki bao yat cedar tyeŋ acel.
Ruth 4:37 Onoŋo giketo guti me te ot pa Rwot i mwaka me aŋwen, i dwe Jib,
Ruth 4:38 ka dok i mwaka apar wiye acelle, i dwe Bul , ma en aye dwe me aboro-ni, en aye gityeko iye tic i kom ot ducu, kun onoŋo gityeko tic ducu iye kit ma onoŋo yam giporo kwede, Gerone otero mwaka abiro.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 7 Solomon ogero odi me gao bile
Ruth 4:1 Solomon dok ogero ode kikome pi mwaka apar wiye adek, ka otyeko ode ducu kakare.
Ruth 4:2 Ogero ot ma gicako nyiŋe Buŋa me Lebanon. Borre romo futi miya acel ki pyerabic, lacce romo futi pyerabiro wiye abic, ki borre tuŋ malo romo futi pyeraŋwen wiye abic; gigero ot-te ocuŋ i wi lwak wir yat cedar muryeyo latyeŋ adek, ki rii bao cedar ma giriyo i wigi.
Ruth 4:3 Dok giguro bao cedar me umo wi rii ma giriyo i wi wir pyeraŋwen wiye abic, ma guryeyo apar wiye abic i tyeŋ acel acel.
Ruth 4:4 Dok giketo frem me wan dirica ma guryeyo latyeŋ adek, kun dirica gikemme ki luwotgi ma guryeyo latyeŋ adek-ki.
Ruth 4:5 Doggola ducu ki dirica ducu gitiyogi latwoke aŋwen, kun dirica kemo dirica wadgi i tyeŋ adek.
Ruth 4:6 Dok otiyo ot mukene ma oketo iye wir mapol. Borre romo futi pyerabiro wiye abic, ki lacce romo futi pyeraŋwen wiye abic; dok tye ki latin of ma i doggola me donyo, ma oryeyo iye wir bene, ki bolo ma tye i nyime.
Ruth 4:7 Ka dok ogero ot mukene pi komker ka ma en biŋolo iye kop, en kicika me ŋolo kop kikome. Giguro bao cedar giumo kwede kom kicika ot, i i ot, cakke ki i dye ot piny nio kwede wa i kwori dan ot.
Ruth 4:569 
Ruth 4:8 Dok ode kikome ma en bedo iye, ma tye i dyekal mukene ma i ne ot ŋolo kop, gigero lakite acel-lu. Solomon dok ogero ot macalo odi mukene-nu pi nya pa Parao ma en onyomo-ni.
Ruth 4:9 Odi magi ducu gigerogi ki godi me wel ma gipayogi muporo kit por ma gimito, kun gibaro ki mucumeno, kun gipayo ŋegi ki igi gubed mapwot, cakke ki i kom guti te ot nio kwede wa i kom godi ma giriyo i wiye, doko cakke ki i dyekal me ot pa Rwot nio kwede wa i dyekal madit.
Ruth 4:10 Guti te ot obedo godi mabeco me wel, godi madoŋo mada ma ditogi romo futi apar wiye aryo ki apar wiye abic.
Ruth 4:11 I wi guti te ot bene giketo iye godi me wel ma gipayogi muporo kit por ma gimito, kacel ki bao cedar.
Ruth 4:12 Cel me dyekal madit bene giryeyo iye godi apaya latyeŋ adek ma gurumo dyekal woko, ki bao yat cedar tyeŋ acel. Cel me dyekal ma i iye ma tye i nyim ot pa Rwot bene onoŋo tye kit meno, ki kicika ot ma i doggola me donyo i ot pa Rwot bene. Tic pa Kiram i ot pa Lubaŋa
Ruth 4:13 Kabaka Solomon ocwalo kwena ci gikelo Kiram ki i Turo.
Ruth 4:14 En onoŋo wod pa daa-to mo ma i kaka pa Naputali, wonne aye dano me Turo ma ladiro tic me teto jami mola. Kiram dano ma laryeko mada, ma ladiro tic bene, ma opit pi tiyo gin ducu ma dok i kom tic ki mola. Obino bot: kabaka Solomon, ci otiyo ticce ducu. Wir-mola (2 Tek 3.15-17)
Ruth 4:15 Oliyo wir mola aryo. Wir acel acel borre romo futi pyeraryo wiye abiro. Gipimo kore ki tol ci ditte oromo futi apar wiye aboro, kun iye twolo, kome ducu kinoŋ ma romo nyig cin aŋwen.
Ruth 4:16 En dok otiyo lalukana wigi ki mola ma giliyo me aketa i wi wir aryo ducu. Lalukana acel acel borre romo futi abiro ki nucu.
Ruth 4:17 Dok otiyo obwo aryo ma gikedogi ki nyor pi lalukana aryo ducu ma gitye i wi wir; otiyo obwo acel pi lalukana acel, ki acel pi lalukana mukene bene.
Ruth 4:18 Otiyo cal okwer pomegranat bene kit meno, Ka otiyo, ci odwalogi i kom nyor latyeŋ aryo i kom obwo me laum kom lalukana ma gicibo i wi wir; otimo lalukana mukene bene kit meno.
Ruth 4:19 Lalukana ma gitye i wi wir ma i kicika ot ma i doggola-ni bocogi romo futi abicel, ma gitiyo calo ature leŋa.
Ruth 4:570 
Ruth 4:20 Giketo lalukana aryo ducu i wi wir aryo, i wi doge ma gilulo ma ka ŋet obwo ma giumo kwede-ni; onoŋo tye iye cal okwer pomegranat miya aryo, ma gidwalo latyeŋ aryo; ki lalukana mukene bene tye ki mere ma rom meno.
Ruth 4:21 Ocibo wir i nyim kicika ot ma i doggola me donyo i ot pa Lubaŋa. Oketo wir acel yo tuŋ acuc, ci ocako nyiŋe Jakin, ka dok oketo wir mukene yo tuŋ acam, ci ocako nyiŋe Boaj.
Ruth 4:22 Giketo cal ature leŋa i wi wir aryo ducu. Tic i kom wir otum kumeno. Nam mola (2 Tek 4.2-5)
Ruth 4:23 Kiram dok otiyo nam ki mola ma giliyo. Otwodde aduno ma lacce romo futi apar wiye abic cakke i doge tuŋcel nio i doge tuŋ mukene; borre tuŋ malo romo futi abiro ki nucu. Gipimo doge ki tol ci oromo futi pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
Ruth 4:24 Ki i te doge ki piny tye iye cal keno munyak ma orumo kom nam ducu, ma romo futi pyeraŋwen wiye abic; cal keno giryeyo latyeŋ aryo. I kare ma giliyo nam, giliyo ki cal keno i kome lawaŋacel.
Ruth 4:25 Gicibo nam ocuŋ i wi cal twoni dyaŋi apar wiye aryo. Giketo twoni adek gineno yo tuŋ acam, ki adek gineno yo tuŋ potoceŋ, adek gineno yo tuŋ acuc, ki adek gineno yo tuŋ wokceŋ. Gicibo nam ocuŋ i kom cal twoni-nu kun ŋegi ducu odok tuŋ iye.
Ruth 4:26 Kome kinoŋ ma romo incic adek; doge gitiyo macalo dog kikopo, ma rom ki ature leŋa; dok piine romo debe alip aŋwen. Litino gadigadi
Ruth 4:27 Dok otiyo litino gadigadi apar me mola, Acel acel borre futi abicel, lacce bene futi abicel, ki borre tuŋ malo futi aŋwen ki nucu.
Ruth 4:28 Man aye kit ma gitiyo kwede gadigadi matino-ni: gipeto mola ma apada i bute ducu, ma okubbe ki rii mola.
Ruth 4:29 I kom mola ma apada ma okubbe ki rii mola-ni gigoro iye cal labwor, ki cal twoni dyaŋi, ki cal lukerubi, Rii mola bene gidero doggi ki cal nyor mudwalle ka wi labwor ki dyaŋi, ki ka tyengi bene.
Ruth 4:30 Latin gadigadi acel acel obedo ki lawala mola aŋwen ki bolti me mola. Ka dok i twoke aŋwen ducu tye iye laten otako. Laten-ni giliyo aliya kun gidwalo cal nyor i butgi.
Ruth 4:31 Doge onamme ki i i gin muluŋŋe ma ocuŋ malo, kun borre romo futi acel ki nucu. Doge-ni otwodde atwoda macalo gitiyo tedi te gin mo-ni, tutte romo futi aryo ki incic mogo. Doge-ni gidero kun gigoro iye cal, dok mola apada ma gipeto i kom litino gadigadi-ni obedo latwoke aŋwen, pe otwodde atwoda.
Ruth 4:571 
Ruth 4:32 Lawala aŋwen tye i te mola apada-ni; bolti pa lawala gukubbe ki gadigadi; bor pa lawala romo futi aryo ki incic mogo.
Ruth 4:33 Gitiyo lawalane macalo lawala me gadigadi lweny; boltigi, ki doggi, ki cilligi, ki abbugi giliyogi aliya.
Ruth 4:34 Giketo latyelle aŋwen i twoke aŋwen ma i kom gadigadi acel acel; latyelle ducu okubbe kacel ki gadigadi.
Ruth 4:35 Ki i wi gadigadi giketo iye gin muluŋŋe ma borre tuŋ malo romo incic aboŋwen; dok tuŋ wi gadigadi latyelle ki mola ma apadane gukubbe kacel kwede.
Ruth 4:36 I kom latyelle ki i kom mola ma apada gigoro iye cal lukerubi, ki cal labwor-gu, ki cal yadi otit, ka ma romo gorone, ki cal nyor mudwalle i ŋetgi.
Ruth 4:37 Kiram otiyo kit gadigadi macalo meno apar; gin ducu giliyogi marom, kun ditogi rom, calgi bene rom.
Ruth 4:38 Ka dok otiyo otako mola apar, kun otako acel acel gitwero onyo iye pii ma romo debe pyeraboro. Otako mola acel acel lacce romo futi abicel. Otiyo otako mola acel acel me aluta i gadigadi mola apar ducu.
Ruth 4:39 Oryeyo gadigadi abic i ŋet ot pa Lubaŋa yo tuŋ acuc, ki abic yo tuŋ acam ka oketo nam i twok ot ka ma bute yo tuŋ acuc ki bute yo tuŋ wokceŋ gurwatte iye. Nyiŋ jami ducu ma gitiyo pi ot pa Lubaŋa (2 Tek 4.11–5.1)
Ruth 4:40 Kiram dok otiyo lwak agulu ki akwaya Latokke ki becen-gu. Kit meno otyeko tic ducu ma i kom ot pa Rwot pi kabaka Solomon.
Ruth 4:41 Otiyo wir aryo, ki lalukana aryo ma oluŋŋe macalo agulu ma giketo i wi wir, ki obwo aryo me umo kom lalukana aryo ma oluŋŋe ma obedo i wi wir-ri.
Ruth 4:42 Dok otiyo cal okwer pomegranat miya aŋwen pi obwo aryo-nu, kun cal okwer pomegranat giryeyo latyeŋ aryo i kom obwo acel acel me umo kom lalukana aryo ma oluŋŋe ma obedo i wi wir.
Ruth 4:43 Dok otiyo litino gadigadi apar ki otako mola apar ma giluto i gadigadi;
Ruth 4:44 ki nam acel, ki cal twoni dyaŋi apar wiye aryo ma giketo nam ocuŋ i komgi.
Ruth 4:45 Lwak agulu ducu, ki akwaya latokke-gu, ki becen-gu, jami magi ducu ma i ot pa Rwot, ma Kiram otiyogi pi kabaka Solomon, obedo me mola ma gijwane maleŋ.
Ruth 4:46 Kabaka omiyo giliyo mola meno i pwor kulu Jordan, ka ma lobo agulu tye iye, i kin Cukot ki Jaretan.
Ruth 4:47 Solomon oweko jami-ni ducu ma pe gipimo pekgi, pien onoŋo jami dwoŋ twatwal, omiyo pek me mola ma gitiyo kwede pe giŋeyo.
Ruth 4:572 
Ruth 4:48 Kit meno bene Solomon omiyo gitiyo jami ducu ma mitte i ot pa Rwot, gin ene: keno tyer me jabu, meja me jabu pi mugati me aketa i nyim Rwot.
Ruth 4:49 Okar-mac me jabu ma giliyo maber ma guryeyogi i nyim kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo, abic yo tuŋ acuc ki abic yo tuŋ acam; ki lwak cal ature ki laput-gu, ki boyi lakar mac, ducu me jabu;
Ruth 4:50 ki kikopo-gu, magac-gu, becengu, atabo me odok aceta ki weer me waŋo mac, ducu me jabu ma giliyo maber; ki pata jabu ma giketo i kom kika me donyo i kicika ma i tyelo, en aye kabedo maleŋ makato ducu, ki i kom kika me kicika maditte ma i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Ruth 4:51 Tic ducu ma kabaka Solomon otiyo i kom ot pa Rwot otum kit meno, Solomon dok okelo iye jami ducu ma yam wonne Daudi odyerogi bot Rwot; okelo ryal ki jabu ki jami mukene-gu ducu, okanogi i ot kano lim ma i ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 8 Solomon okelo canduk me gicikke i ot pa Lubaŋa (2 Tek 5.2–6.2)
Ruth 4:1 Solomon ocoko ludoŋo pa jo Icrael ki ludito wi kaka ducu, ma gin aye rwodi kaka ma i doggola pa kwarogi ma i kin jo Icrael, ci gubino i nyim kabaka Solomon i Jerucalem pi kwanyo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot ki i gaŋ kal pa Daudi ma gilwoŋo ni Cion.
Ruth 4:2 Lwak jo Icrael ducu gucokke bot kabaka Solomon i kare me kwero nino madito me dwe Etanim, ma en aye dwe me abiro.
Ruth 4:3 Ci ludoŋo ducu pa jo Icrael gubino, ka ajwagi pa Lubaŋa gucako tino canduk.
Ruth 4:4 Gutero canduk pa Rwot, ki kema me rwatte, kacel ki jami maleŋ ducu ma yam tye i kema; ajwagi ki Lulevi guterogi.
Ruth 4:5 Kabaka Solomon ki lwak jo Icrael ducu ma gucokke bote-ni gin ducu gitye kacel kwede i nyim canduk, kun gitumo lwak romi ki twoni-gu mapol ma welgi pe kwanne dok pe nene bene.
Ruth 4:6 Kit meno ajwagi gukelo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot wa i kabedone, i kabedo maleŋ me ot pa Lubaŋa, ma en aye kabedo maten makato ducu-m, CI guketo piny i te bwom Lukerubi.
Ruth 4:7 Pien Lukerubi guyaro bwomgi ka wi kabedo me canduk wek Lukerubi guum wi canduk woko, kacel ki tal latiŋŋe ducu.
Ruth 4:8 Tal latiŋŋe onoŋo giboco, omiyo wigi nen ki i kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo-ni, ento onoŋo pe gitwero nenogi ki woko; dok pud gitye kunnu wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:9 Gin mo onoŋo pe i canduk, kono kidi aryo ma apada keken ma yam Moses oketo iye i Koreb, ka ma yam Rwot oketo iye gicikke ki jo Icrael, i kare ma gia ki i lobo Ejipt.
Ruth 4:573 
Ruth 4:10 Ka ajwagi gukato woko ki i kabedo maleŋ, ci pol obino opoŋo i ot pa Rwot woko;
Ruth 4:11 pienno omiyo ajwagi pe gitwero cuŋ ka tiyo ticgi, pi pol meno pien deyo pa Rwot noŋo opoŋo i ot pa Rwot woko.
Ruth 4:12 Ci Solomon owacci, “Rwot yam oketo cen i polo, ento en owacci ebedo i pol macol licuc.
Ruth 4:13 Agerri doŋ ot ma ocudo malo, wek obed kabedoni ma ibedo iye matwal.” Lok pa Solomon bot lwak (2 Tek 6.3-11)
Ruth 4:14 Ka dok kabaka olokke, ci olamo gum i kom lwak jo Icrael ma gucokke ducu, kun jo Icrael ma gucokke-ni gucuŋ mot.
Ruth 4:15 Kabaka owacci, “Gipwo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma doŋ ciŋe otyeko cobo gin ma yam oloko ki doge bot wora Daudi-ni, kun owacci,
Ruth 4:16 ‘Nia wa i kare ma akwanyo jona jo Icrael ki i Ejipt, peya ayero gaŋ mo ma i kaka ma i Icrael ducu pi gero iye ot mo, wek nyiŋa obed iye; ento ayero mera Daudi wek olo lwakka jo Icrael.’
Ruth 4:17 I kare-nu onoŋo wora Daudi obedo ki tam i cwinye me gero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
