Ruth 4:18 Ento Rwot aye owaco bot wora Daudi ni, ‘Kit macalo onoŋo doŋ tam tye i cwinyi me gero ot pi nyiŋa, itimo ber pi keto lok meno i cwinyi.
Ruth 4:19 Ento pe in aye dok ibigerra ot; wodi ma ibinywalo aye bigero ot pi nyina.’
Ruth 4:20 Ci Rwot doŋ otyeko cobo gin ma en ociko; pien an doŋ atyeko leyo ka tyen wora Daudi, an doŋ abedo i wi komker pa Icrael, kit ma yam Rwot ociko-ni, dok atyeko gero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Ruth 4:21 Doŋ atyeko keto iye kabedo pa canduk pa Rwot ma tye iye gicikke ma Rwot con oketo ki kwariwa, i kare ma kwanyogi woko ki i lobo Ejipt.” Lega pa Solomon (2 Tek 6.12-42)
Ruth 4:22 Solomon dok ocuŋ i nyim keno tyer pa Rwot ki i nyim lwak jo Icrael ma gucokke ducu, otaŋo ciŋe malo okemo polo.
Ruth 4:23 Ci owacci, “Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, pe tye Lubaŋa mo macalo in, kadi malo i polo nyo piny i wi lobo, ma tye ka gwoko gicikkene macalo in, ma inyuto mar meri ma pe lokke bot luticci ma gibedo ka lubi ki cwinygi ducu.
Ruth 4:24 Ibedo ka lubo gin ma yam itito bot wora Daudi; iyo gin ma yam iloko ki dogi, icako doŋ tiyo i kare man ki ciŋi, ci icobo ducu maber.
Ruth 4:574 
Ruth 4:25 Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, doŋ ilub gin ma yam iciko bot laticci Daudi ma wora, kun iwacci, ‘Pe ibibedo laboŋo danoni mo ma bibedo i wi komker me Icrael, tekke awobeni gugwoko kitgi maber, kun gibedo ki kit kwo i nyima kit ma in ibedo kwede i nyima-ni.’
Ruth 4:26 Ai Lubaŋa pa Icrael, kombeddi mi lokki doŋ omok matek, kit ma yam iloko bot wora Daudi ma laticci.
Ruth 4:27 “Ento Lubaŋa bibedo i wi lobo-ni ada? Nen, kadi polo bene kulu ma malone twatwal-li pe romo in me bedo iye, ci ot ma agero-ni tidine rom mene kono!
Ruth 4:28 Kadi bed kit meno, an alegi iwiny legana, an Laticci, ki kit ma abako kwede doga, ai Rwot Lubaŋana; winy koko ki lega ma atye ka lego i nyimi tin.
Ruth 4:29 Waŋi aye iwek obed twolo dyewor ki dyeceŋ benebene me neno yo tuŋ bot ot man, en aye kabedo ma yam iwaco pire ni, ‘Nyiŋa bibedo kunnu,’ wek ibed ka winyo legana ma akelo boti kun alokke akemo kabedo man.
Ruth 4:30 Dok iwiny legana ki lega pa joni jo Icrael i kare ma wabako dogwa, ma walego wakemo kabedo man atir; iyo in doŋ ibed ka winyo bako doga ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni; ci ka doŋ ityeko winyone, doŋ iwek balwa.
Ruth 4:31 “Ka ce dano mo otimo bal i kom wadi mo, ci gimiye okwoŋo kwoŋo pire, ka obino ce okwoŋo kwoŋo ki i nyim keno tyerri ma i ot man,
Ruth 4:32 ci in Lubaŋa iwiny ki i polo, ci iti gin ma mitte. Ŋol kop pa laticci-ni, imi kop olo dano mutiŋo alii, kun iketo gin ma en otimo i wiye kene, dok imi dano ma pe obalo olo kop kun itime ber ma oporo leŋcwinye.
Ruth 4:33 “Ka ce mony pa lumerok guloyo joni jo Icrael pi balgi ma gutimo i komi, ka ce guŋut, gudwogo boti, ci gucako tuco nyiŋi, ma gilego in ka gibako doggi boti i ot man,
Ruth 4:34 ci in iwinygi ki i polo, iwek bal pa joni jo Icrael, ka dok idwokgi cen wa i lobo ma yam imiyo bot kwarogi.
Ruth 4:35 “Ka ce polo ocegge woko, ma kot mo pe ocwer pi lakit balgi mo i komi, ka ce lwakki gucako lega kun gikemo in i kabedo man, kun gituco nyiŋi, ka guŋut ci gubwoto balgi woko i kare ma iketo can i komgi-ni,
Ruth 4:36 ci in Lubaŋa iwinygi ki i polo, iwek balgi, gin joni jo Icrael, dok ipwonygi ki kit yo maber ma myero gulubi; ci doŋ imi kot ocwer i loboni-ni ma yam imiyo bot lwakki obed megi.
Ruth 4:37 “Ka ce kec opoto i lobo, ka kono two gemo opoto, nyo ka bel obwarre nyo odoko ocone, nyo ka bonyo opoto nyo okwil obino, ka ce merok pa joni orumogi woko i gaŋgi mo, nyo kadi bed kit gemo aŋo, nyo kit two mo-ni,
Ruth 4:575 
Ruth 4:38 ka ce lwakki gucako lego nyo bako doggi boti, kadi bed dano acel kok boti, nyo joni jo Icrael ducu, kun dano acel acel ŋeyo kit atwom ma i cwinye, ka ce otaŋo ciŋe okemo ot man;
Ruth 4:39 ci in Lubaŋa iwinygi ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni, iwek balgi, ci iti gin ma mitte. Tim dano acel acel kit ma iŋeyo kwede cwinye, ma rwatte ki kit kwone ducu, pien in aye, in keni, iŋeyo kit cwiny pa dano ducu.
Ruth 4:40 Meno bimiyo gibedo ka lwori nino ducu ma gibedo iye i lobo ma yam imiyo bot kwarowa.
Ruth 4:41 “Obed kit meno bene ka ce larok mo, ma pe joni jo Icrael, obino kany ma oa ki i lobo mo mabor, kun obino pi yweka me nyiŋi;
Ruth 4:42 pien gibiwinyo pi nyiŋi madit-ti, ki pi twero me badi ki kit ma iryeyo ki ciŋi pi konyo joni, Ka ce larok mo obino ce ocako lega ma okemo ot man,
Ruth 4:43 ci in Lubaŋa iwiny ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni, itim kit gin ducu ma larok-ki okok kwede i nyimi, wek rok ma wi lobo ducu guŋe nyiŋi, galwori, kit ma lwakki jo Icrael gilwori-ni, dok wek guŋe maber ni, ot man ma agero-ni gilwoŋo ki nyiŋi keken.
Ruth 4:44 “Ka ce lwakki gucito ka lwenyo ki lumerokgi i kabedo mo ducu ma icwalogi iye, ka ce gukelo legagi boti in Rwot ma gukemo gaŋ man ma in iyero, ki ot man ma agero pi nyiŋi-ni,
Ruth 4:45 ci in iwiny legagi ki bako doggi ki i polo, ikony korgi ka ineno lokgi tye atir.
Ruth 4:46 “Ka ce gutimo bal i komi, pien pe tye dano mo ma pe balo, ka ce kiniga omaki i komgi, ci imiyogi i ciŋ lamerok mo ma oyakogi ci oterogi i opii wa i lobo pa lumerokgi, ka mabor nyo ka macok, iwiny legagi.
Ruth 4:47 Ka cwinygi otamo lok ki i lobo ma giterogi iye i opii-ni, ce guŋut ci gubako doggi boti ki i lobo ma gitye iye i ciŋ luyakgi, kun gikok ni, ‘Wabalo, waŋak woko ata, wati yo lwak bal-gu mapol’,
Ruth 4:48 ka ce guŋut ki tamgi ducu ki cwinygi ducu i lobo pa lumerokgi ma yam oterogi i opii-ni, kun doŋ gilego i nyimi ma gukemo lobogi ma yam imiyo bot kwarogi, ki gaŋ ma nene iyero, ki ot man ma agero pi nyiŋi;
Ruth 4:49 ci in Lubaŋa iwiny legagi ki bako doggi ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni, ci iye konyo korgi ka ineno lokgi tye atir.
Ruth 4:50 Dok iwek bal pa joni ma gubalo i komi pi tim aranyigi ducu ma gibalo kwede i nyimi, imi kica omak jo ma yam guterogi i opii-ni, kica ocak makogi i komgi.
Ruth 4:51 Pien gin aye lwakki kikome, gin joni kikome ma yam ikwanyogi ki i Ejipt, ma obedo calo buk mac me teto nyonyo ma otwak me waŋogi.
Ruth 4:576 
Ruth 4:52 Wek waŋi onen kit bako dog pa laticci, ki bako dog pa lwakkijo Icrael, cik iti i komgi i kare ducu ma gikok boti.
Ruth 4:53 Pien yam dok ikoyogi pat ki i kin rok ma wi lobo ducu wek gubed joni kikome, kit ma yam ituco lokke ki i dog laticci Moses i kare ma yam ikwanyo kwarowa ki i Ejipt, ai Rwot Lubaŋa.” Lega me agikki
Ruth 4:54 Ka doŋ Solomon otyeko lego lega meno ducu kacel ki bako doge-gu i nyim Rwot, ci oa malo ki i nyim keno tyer pa Rwot ka ma onoŋo orumo iye coŋe, kun otaŋo ciŋe malo okemo polo.
Ruth 4:55 Ka doŋ ocuŋ, ci olamo gum i kom jo Icrael ma gucokke ducu kun daŋŋe ki dwane maloŋo ma waco ni.
Ruth 4:56 “Gipwo Rwot ma doŋ omiyo jone jo Icrael guywe, kit ma yam ociko ducu! I kom lok ducu mabeco ma yam ociko ki i dog laticce Moses, pe tye lok mo acel ma pe ocobo kakare.
Ruth 4:57 Rwot Lubaŋawa obed kwedwa kit ma yam obedo ki kwarowa-ni; pe obwotwa, pe otenywa ata,
Ruth 4:58 wek olok cwinywa odwok i kome. Kit meno wabilubo yone ducu, kun wagwoko lok ma en ociko, ki cikke ducu ma yam ociko ki kwarowa.
Ruth 4:59 Wek lok ma doŋ aloko ducu, ma abako ki doga i nyim Rwot-ti, obed cok i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawa dyeceŋ ki dyewor, wek en otim pira ma an laticee-ni, ki pi lwakke jo Icrael, gin ma tye atir i nino acel acel.
Ruth 4:60 Meno bimiyo rok ma wi lobo ducu ŋeyo ni, Rwot aye Lubaŋa kene; mukene peke.
Ruth 4:61 Wun wubed ki leŋic i kom Rwot Lubaŋawa, wulub cik ma en oketo, kun wugwoko lok ma en ociko ducu macalo wutiyo tin-ni.” Kwero ot pa Lubaŋa wek obed maleŋ (2 Tek 7.4-10)
Ruth 4:62 Ka dok kabaka ki jo Icrael ducu gucako tyero gitum i nyim Rwot.
Ruth 4:63 Solomon otyero gityer lakwecwiny bot Rwot ma romo twoni dyaŋi alip pyeraryo wiye aryo, ki romi alip miya acel ki pyeraryo. Kabaka kacel ki jo Icrael ducu gukwero ot pa Rwot kit meno.
Ruth 4:64 I nino meno bene kaba ka okwero kabedo ma i cwiny dyekal ma tye i nyim ot pa Rwot-ti, Otyero kunnu gitum awaŋa ki gityer me moko kwon ki moo dwolo me gityer lakwecwiny, pien keno tyer mola ma i nyim Rwot-ti onoŋo tidi twatwal, pe romo keto iye gitum awaŋa kacel ki gityer me moko kwon ki dwolo me gityer lakwecwiny-gu.
Ruth 4:577 
Ruth 4:65 Kit meno Solomon okwero nino madito i kare meno, kacel ki jo Icrael ducu. Onoŋo lwak gucokke mapol kun gua wa i yo ma donyo i Kamat nio wa i laora kulu me Ejipt, ci gubedo i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawa pi nino abiro.
Ruth 4:66 I kom nino me aborone Solomon ocwalo lwak gudok woko tugi. Lwak gupwoyo kabaka, ci gudok i pacogi ki yomcwiny madwoŋ, ma igi okwe pi gin ducu mabeco ma Rwot otimo pi laticce Daudi ki pi lwakke jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 9 Rwot onen bot Solomon tyen me aryo (2 Tek 7.11-22)
Ruth 4:1 Ka Solomon otyeko gero ot pa Rwot, ki ode en kabaka, ki odi mukene ducu ma onoŋo en mitogi,
Ruth 4:2 ci Rwot dok onen bote tyen me aryone, kit ma yam onen bote i Gibeon ca.
Ruth 4:3 Rwot owacce ni, “Atyeko winyo legani, ki bako dogi ma iketo i nyima; atyeko lonyo ot man ma igero-ni obed maleŋ, aketo iye nyina wek obed iye matwal; dok waŋa ki cwinya bikemo kunnu nino ducu.
Ruth 4:4 Ki ma tuŋ boti, ka ce ibibedo ki kit kwo i nyima ma yam woru Daudi obedo kwede-ni, kun ii Ien dok cwinyi atir, ce ka itiyo gin ma aciko ducu kun igwoko cik ma aketo,
Ruth 4:5 ci an Lubaŋani abimoko komkerri me loyo jo Icrael matwal, kit ma yam aciko bot woru Daudi-ni kun awaco bote ni, ‘Pe ibibedo laboŋo danoni mo ma bibedo i wi komker me Icrael.’
Ruth 4:6 Ento ka ce in nyo likwayi wuŋak wuweko lubo kora, ma wukwero mako lok ma aciko ki cik ma aketo i nyimwu, ce wukobo woko ka tiyo bot lubaŋa mogo mukene kun wuworogi,
Ruth 4:7 ci miyo abityekojo Icrael woko ki i lobo ma yam amiyo botgi-ni; dok abikwanyo waŋa woko, pe doŋ aneno ot man, ma doŋ alonyo bedo maleŋ pi nyiŋa-ni; miyo nyiŋ jo Icrael bi doko carolok ki lok aboka i kin rok ducu.
Ruth 4:8 Ot man bi doko obur ma odurre lipim; miyo dano ducu ma gibikato ka ŋete gibiuro ki jwat kun giwacci, ‘Kit lok aŋo ma omiyo Rwot otimo lobo-ni ki ot man ki tim macalo man?’
Ruth 4:9 Ka dok gibiwacci, ‘Pien gubwoto Rwot Lubaŋagi ma yam okwanyo kwarogi ki i lobo Ejipt, ci gukobo i te loc pa lubaŋa mogo mukene, dok gubedo ka worogi ma kun gitiyo botgi bene; en aye lok mumiyo Rwot omiyo can opoto i komgi magwa- ni.’ ” Tic mukene ma Solomon otiyo (2 Tek 8.1-18)
Ruth 4:578 
Ruth 4:10 Gero odi aryo-ni ma Solomon ogero, gin aye ot pa Rwot ki ot pa kabaka, otero mwaka pyeraryo kulu,
Ruth 4:11 kun Kiram kabaka me Turo obedo ka miyo bot Solomon bao yat cedar ki bao yat ciprec, ki jabu bene kit ma en mito ducu. Lacen ka doŋ otum Solomon omiyo bot Kiram gaŋi pyeraryo ma i lobo Galilaya.
Ruth 4:12 Ento i kare ma Kiram oa ki i Turo ocito ka neno gaŋi ma Solomon omiyo bote- ni, oneno gaŋine pe guyomo cwinye.
Ruth 4:13 Kiram owaco bot Solomon ni, “Omera, man kono kit gaŋi aŋo ma imiya-ni?” Kit meno omiyo lobone gilwoŋo ni Kabul nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:14 Kiram onoŋo yam ocwalo bot Solomon jabu ma romo talanta miya acel ki pyeraryo.
Ruth 4:15 Man aye lok i kom tic muroni ma kabaka Solomon omiyo girono pi gero ot pa Rwot, ki ode kikome, ki Millo, ki cel me Jerucalem, kacel ki gaŋi magi, Kajor, Megido ki Gejer.
Ruth 4:16 Onoŋo Parao kabaka me Ejipt yam ocito omako Gejer ka owaŋo woko ki mac, ka dok oneko Lukaanan ma gibedo i gaŋ meno ci omiyo bot nyare ma Solomon onyomo, wek obed mot me nyommegi;
Ruth 4:17 ci Solomon ogero Gejer odoco. Girono bene dano pi gero Betkoron Mapiny,
Ruth 4:18 kacel ki Baalat, Tamar ma tye i tim me lobo Juda,
Ruth 4:19 ki gaŋi ducu me kano cam ma yam Solomon tye kwedgi, ki gaŋi me gadigadine me mony, gaŋi pa lulweny ma giriŋo ki aguragurane, ki kit gedo ducu ma Solomon omito gerogi i Jerucalem ki i Lebanon ki i lobo ma en loyo ducu.
Ruth 4:20 Likwayo pa jo ma pe gin jo Icrael ma yam gubwot ci gudoŋ i lobo ki i kom jo Amor, jo Kit, jo Perej, jo Kiv ki jo Jebuc,
Ruth 4:21 ma jwerogi woko liweŋ yam oloyo jo Icrael, gin aye Solomon oketo tic muroni i wigi macalo gin opii, kit macalo tye-ni nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:22 Ento Solomon pe omiyo jo Icrael tiyo tic macalo opii: gin gubedo askarine, ki ludito ticce, ludito wi mony, lukapten, ludito ma loyo gadigadi lweny, ki lulweny ma riŋo ki aguragura.
Ruth 4:23 Ludito pa Solomon ma giloyo dog tic ducu onoŋo giromo miya abic ki pyerabic; gin aye giloyo lwak ducu ma gitiyo tic ducu.
Ruth 4:24 Nya pa Parao odak woko ki i gaŋ kai pa Daudi, okobo i ode kikome ma Solomon ogero pire; ka dok lacen Solomon ogero Millo.
Ruth 4:25 Solomon obedo ka tyero gitum awaŋa ki gityer lakwecwiny tyen adek i mwaka acel acel, kun tyerogi i wi keno tyer ma otiyo pi Rwot-ti, ka dok wano odok eceta i nyim Rwot. Solomon otyeko tic me gero ot pa Rwot kit meno.
Ruth 4:579 
Ruth 4:26 Kabaka omiyo gipayo lwak mel i Ejion-geber, ma tye cok ki Elot i dog Nam Makwar i lobo Edom.
Ruth 4:27 Kiram ocwalo luticce ma gin lunam ma guŋiyo ki tic i nam wek guwot ki mel meno kacel ki jo pa Solomon.
Ruth 4:28 Gucito i Opir ka omo jabu ki kunnu; gukelo ma romo talanta miya aŋwen ki pyeraryo ci gudwogo kwede gumiyo bot kabaka Solomon.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 10 Kabaka ma dako me lobo Ceba olimo Solomon (2 Tek 9.1-12)
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno kabaka ma dako me Ceba owinyo pi yweka pa Solomon, ci obino bote ka temo iye ki peny matego.
Ruth 4:2 Obino i Jerucalem ki lwak jo madito ma gicom i kore, kacel ki kinaga-gu ma giyeyo aŋwece, ki jabu madwoŋ twatwal, ki litino godi me wel, Ka obino bot Solomon, ci otitte lok ducu ma onoŋo tye i cwinye.
Ruth 4:3 Solomon odok iye i pennye ducu; pe onoŋo tye lok mo wacel ma okanne ki bot kabaka, ma tucone oloye.
Ruth 4:4 Ka kabaka ma dako me Ceba oneno ryeko pa Solomon ducu, ki ot ma en ogero,
Ruth 4:5 ki cam ma i wi mejane, ki kit kabedo pa luditone, ki tic pa luticce ducu, ki boŋŋigi, ki lutiŋ kikopo-gu, ki gitum awaŋa ma en tyero i ot pa Rwot, ci tam otum woko ki i cwinye.
Ruth 4:6 Owaco bot kabaka ni, “Lok ducu ma i komi ma yam gitero bota ki i lobona, ki lok i kom ryekoni bene, onoŋo lokke tye kakare;
Ruth 4:7 ento yam pe aye lok ma gitero bota, nio ka abino aneno ki waŋa. Nen, pe gititta kadi wa nucune kulu, pien ryekoni ki lonyoni kato lok dog ma gitero bota.
Ruth 4:8 Monni gitye ki yomcwiny kuman! Luticci ducu gitye ki yomcwiny ma rom mene, ma gibedo ka cuŋ i nyimi jwijwi ka winyo lok me ryekoni!
Ruth 4:9 Gipwo Rwot Lubaŋani ma cwinye opwoyo in ci oketi i wi komker me Icrael! Pien Rwot omaro Icrael matwal, en aye mumiyo oketi ibedo kabaka, wek ibed ka ŋolo kop atir dok kakare.”
Ruth 4:10 En omiyo bot Solomon jabu madwoŋ ma romo talanta miya acel ki pyeraryo, ki lwak aŋwece mapatpat madwoŋ twatwal, ki lwak litino godi me wel, Aŋwece pe dok obino madwoŋ ma rom meno ma kabaka ma dako me Ceba omiyo bot Solomon.
Ruth 4:11 Dok bene mel ma Kiram kelo ki jabu ma i Opir okelo bao me yat almug madwoŋ twatwal, ki lwak godi matino me wel.
Ruth 4:580 
Ruth 4:12 Kabaka otiyo ki bao yat almug pi jeŋo kor ot pa Rwot ki kor ot pa kabaka. Otiyo kwede opuk bene ki naŋa pa luwer. Kit bao me almug macalo meno pe dok obino i lobo, pe dok onen, nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:13 Kabaka Solomon omiyo bot kabaka ma dako me lobo Ceba jami ducu ma cwinye omito, omiye gin ducu ma openyo, omedo ki gin ma en Solomon oyubo pi miyo bote muporo lonyone. Kit meno kaba ka me Ceba ocako wot me dok i lobone kacel ki luticce ducu. Lonyo pa Solomon ki ywekane (2 Tek 9.13-28)
Ruth 4:14 Lwak jabu ma obino bot Solomon i mwaka acel acel pekke onoŋo cok romo ratili alip pyerabiro,
Ruth 4:15 ma pe giribo iye ma obino ki tuŋ bot lucat-wil me paco ki me lobo ma woko, ki ma oa ki bot luker me lobo Arabia ki bot lulo dul lobo mapatpat me lobo Icrael.
Ruth 4:16 Kabaka Solomon otiyo kwodi madoŋo miya aryo me jabu, ma gitetogi ki nyol; i kom kwot acel acel odonyo iye jabu ma pekke cok romo ratili pyeraryo.
Ruth 4:17 Dok otiyo kwodi matinone miya adek ma gitetogi ki nyol, kun kwot acel acel giteto ki jabu ma pekke cok romo ratili abicel. Kabaka oketogi i ot ma gilwoŋo ni Buŋa me Lebanon.
Ruth 4:18 En dok otiyo komker madit me lak lyec, ci omwono kome woko ki jabu ma giliyo maber.
Ruth 4:19 Komker meno onoŋo tye ki rwomme abicel, ki i ŋe komker giketo iye cal wi wod twon. Ka ŋete tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi giketo iye ka teno ciŋ dano, ki cal labwor aryo gucuŋ ka ŋet bad kom me teno ciŋ tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi.
Ruth 4:20 Onoŋo tye bene cal labwor apar wiye aryo ma gucuŋ i agikki rwom abicel-li, tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi tye komker mo ma yam gitiyo ma cal ki meno i te ker ducu.
Ruth 4:21 Jami ducu ma yam kabaka Solomon mato kwede onoŋo me jabu keken, wa jami ducu ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot Buŋa me Lebanon obedo me jabu ma giliyo maber. Pe tye iye jami me ryal mo acel, pien i kare pa Solomon pe tye ŋatti mo ma otamo pi ryal ni obedo gin mo.
Ruth 4:22 Onoŋo co tye ki lwak mel madonone ma giwoto i nam kacel ki mel pa Kiram. Mel man madoŋo-ni ma gilwoŋo ni mel me Tarcic yam dwogo cen ka mwaka okato adek adek kun gikelo jabu ki ryal ki lak lyec-gu, ki ayom-gu ki gunya-gu.
Ruth 4:23 Kabaka Solomon obedo dit makato luker ma wi lobo ducu pi lonyone ki pi ryekone.
Ruth 4:24 Dano me lobo ducu gubedo ka yenyo kit yo me neno wan Solomon, ki pi winyo kit ryekone ma Lubaŋa oketo i cwinye-ni.
Ruth 4:581 
Ruth 4:25 Dano acel acel tero motte bote, kun gitero jami me ryal ki me jabu-gu, ki ginaruka-gu, ki odok murra, ki aŋwece, ki aguragura ki kanagu mwaka ki mwaka. Solomon lacat aguragura ki gadigadi lweny (2 Tek 1.14-17;9.28)
Ruth 4:26 Solomon ocoko gadigadi lweny ki lulweny ma giriŋo ki aguragura. Obedo ki gadigadi lweny alip acel ki miya aŋwen, ki wegi aguragura alip apar wiye aryo, Oketo mogo i kingi i gaŋi me gadigadi lweny, ki mukene gubedo bote i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:27 Kabaka Solomon Omiyo ryal odoko gin malam ma rom ki gweŋ-gu i Jerucalem, dok okelo yadi cedar mapol ata ma rom ki olam ma i bar Cepela.
Ruth 4:28 En yam limo aguragura ma a ki i Ejipt ki Kuc; lucat-wil pa kabaka gamogi ki i Kuc i wel lim ma onoŋo giyubo.
Ruth 4:29 Gadigadi lweny ma gia ki i Ejipt welgi onoŋo romo cekel me ryal miya abicel, ki aguragura acel welle cekel miya acel ki pyerabic; ka dok lucat-wil pa kabaka catogi bot luker ducu pa jo Kit ki bot luker me Ciria.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 11 Bal pa Solomon me bwoto woro Lubaŋa
Ruth 4:1 Kabaka Solomon obedo ka maro mon mapol: ma anyira rok mapatpat, Onyomo nya pa Parao, ki anyira Moab, ki anyira Ammon, ki me Edom ki me Cidon ki pa jo Kit-gu.
Ruth 4:2 Onyomogi ki i rok ma yam Rwot ojuko jo Icrael i komgi kun waco ni, “Pe wubinyomo anyiragi, kadi wa gin bene pe gibinyomo anyirawu, pien ada miyo giloko cwinywu dok cen ka lubo lubaŋagi.” Ento Solomon cwinye omaro anyira- nu matek.
Ruth 4:3 En obedo ki mon miya abiro ma gin ducu anyira pa luker, ki mon mukene ma aŋeca miya adek; ci monne guloko cwinye woko ada.
Ruth 4:4 Ka Solomon doŋ oti woko, ci monne guloko cwinye odok i kom lubaŋa mogo mukene, omiyo pe obedo ki leŋic i kom Rwot Lubaŋane, kit ma yam wonne Daudi obedo kwede.
Ruth 4:5 Solomon ocako lubo kit pa jok ma dako pa jo Cidon ma nyiŋe Acitoret, ki jok kipyeda pa jo Ammon ma gilwoŋo Milkom.
Ruth 4:6 Kit meno Solomon otiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot, pe doŋ tiyo gin ma Rwot mito ki cwinye ducu, kit ma yam wonne Daudi otiyo-ni.
Ruth 4:7 Solomon dok ogero wan jok me woro Kemoc ma jok kipyeda pa jo Moab, ki me woro Molek ma jok kipyeda pa jo Ammon; oketo wan jogigi i wi got ma i ŋet Jerucalem yo tuŋ wokceŋ.
Ruth 4:582 
Ruth 4:8 Obedo ka timo kit meno pi monne ducu me rok mukene ma giwaŋo odok eceta dok gityero gitum bot lubaŋagi.
Ruth 4:9 Rwot okeco i kom Solomon, pien onoŋo cwinye doŋ oweko Rwot Lubaŋane woko, ma yam onen bote tyen aryo-ni,
Ruth 4:10 ma yam bene ociko Solomon i kom lok man kun waco bote ni pe olub kor lubaŋa mukene; ento en pe omako cik ma Rwot omiye-ni.
Ruth 4:11 Omiyo Rwot owaco bot Solomon ni, “Kit macalo cwinyi tye kit man, ma ikwero mako gicikkena ki cik ma aketo ma aciki kwede, an doŋ abimayo kerri woko, amiyo bot laticci.
Ruth 4:12 Ento pi woru Daudi miyo pe abitimo i kare-ni, ento abimayo woko ki i ciŋ wodi.
Ruth 4:13 Kadi bed kumeno, pe abikwanyo kerri woko ducu, ento abimiyo kaka acel bot wodi, pi nyiŋ laticca Daudi, ki pi Jerucalem ma yam ayero.” Lumerok pa Solomon
Ruth 4:14 Rwot okelo merok i kom Solomon, Adad ma jo Edom ma obedo wat pa Luker me Edom.
Ruth 4:15 Onoŋo yam i kare ma Daudi obedo i Edom, Joab ma ladit me mony ocito kunnu pi yiko kom dano ma gineko, ci oneko co woko ducu ma i Edom.
Ruth 4:16 I kare ca Joab ki jo Icrael gubedo kunnu dwe abicel kulu, nio ka gutyeko co ma i Edom woko ducu.
Ruth 4:17 Ento Adad oriŋowoko kacel ki jo Edom mogo ma gin Lutic pa wonne. I kare meno onoŋo Adad pud tidi.
Ruth 4:18 Gua woko ki i Midian gucito i Paran, ci gukwanyo co mogo ki i Paran gucito kwedgi i Ejipt bot Parao kabaka me Ejipt. Parao omiyo ot bot Adad ki cam, wa ki lobo bene.
Ruth 4:19 Adad olimo gum madwoŋ ki bot Parao, Parao dok omiye onyomo ywere ma Lamiŋ dakone kikome ma daker-ri, ma nyiŋe Tapanec.
Ruth 4:20 Lamiŋ Tapanec onywalo latin laco ki Adad, nyiŋe Genubat, ci Tapanec omiyo Genubat odoŋo i ot pa Parao kun bedo kacel ki awobe pa Parao.
Ruth 4:21 Ento ka Adad owinyo ki i Ejipt ni Daudi doŋ oto, ma giyike kacel ki kwarine, ki Joab ma ladit me mony bene otyeko to woko, ci Adad openyo Parao ni, “Wek doŋ aa woko ki boti, adok doŋ i lobowa.”
Ruth 4:22 Parao openye ni, “Gin aŋo ma pe inoŋo kany ma, ormyo imito dak woko i lobo tuwu-ni?” Adad ogamo ni, “Koŋ iwek acit mono.”
Ruth 4:23 Lubaŋa dok okelo merok mukene bot Solomon. Okelo Rejor ma wod pa Eliada, ma onoŋo yam oriŋo woko ki bot rwode Adadejer kabili ma Joba.
Ruth 4:583 
Ruth 4:24 En ocoko dano mapol ma gibedo bote, ci odoko ladit me buca mony pa luyak ki i ŋe nek ma Daudi onekogi kwede, Gucito i Damaciko, gubedo kunnu, ci guketo en obedo kabaka i Damaciko.
Ruth 4:25 En obedo Lamerok pa jo Icrael i kare pa Solomon ducu, obedo ka timo tim aranyi kit ma yam Adad timo-ni. Obedo ka loyo lobo Ciria, kun cwinye dagjo Icrael. Lok ma Lubaŋa oloko bot Jeroboam
Ruth 4:26 Dano mukene ma otiŋo ciŋe i kom kabaka Solomon obedo Jeroboam wod pa Nebat, ma jo Epraim me Jereda. En yam obedo latic pa Solomon; minne nyiŋe Jerua ma nene cware oto.
Ruth 4:27 Jeroboam otiŋo ciŋe i kom kabaka pi tyen lok man. I kare ca onoŋo Solomon obedo ka gero Millo dok ocego wan cel me gaŋ kal pa wonne Daudi ka ma yam gimuko woko-ni.
Ruth 4:28 Jeroboam onoŋo tye ki kero kome ki kwiri bene. Ka Solomon oneno ni en latin awobi ma kome mit i tic, ci omiye dit me loyo tic muroni ducu pa jo me ot pa Yucepu.
Ruth 4:29 I kare mo ma Jeroboam oweko Jerucalem okato woko, ci lanebi Akija ma Lacilo orwatte kwede iyo, kun onoŋo Akija oruko boŋo manyen. Gin aryo onoŋo girye kengi i dye tim.
Ruth 4:30 Ci Akija olunyo boŋo manyen ma oruko i kome-ni, oyeco iye dul apar wiye aryo.
Ruth 4:31 Ka ocako lok ki Jeroboam, owacci, “Gam dul boŋo apar-ri iter obed meri, pien Rwot Lubaŋa me Icrael owaco kuman ni. ‘Nen, an acok mayo ker woko ki i ciŋ Solomon, ci abimiyo kaka apar i ciŋi.
Ruth 4:32 Ento en bidoŋ ki kaka acel pi nyiŋ laticca Daudi, ki pi Jerucalem ma yam ayero- ni, en aye gaŋ ma yam ayero ki i kin kaka ma i Icrael ducu.
Ruth 4:33 Pien Solomon doŋ otyeko bwota woko, ocako woro gire Acitoret ma jok ma dako ma jo Cidon giworo-ni, ki Kemoc ma jok pa jo Moab, ki Milkom majok pa jo Ammon. En pe doŋ tye ka lubo kora, pe dok tiyo gin ma nen atir i waŋa, pe dok mako cik ma aketo, pe doŋ lubo cikka kit ma yam wonne Daudi olubo-ni.
Ruth 4:34 Ento pe abikwanyo ker woko ducu ki i ciŋe kikome; abimiyo en bedo laloc i kare me kwone ducu, pi laticca Daudi ma yam ayero, ma yam gwoko cikka ki cik ma aketo ducu.
Ruth 4:35 Ento abikwanyo ker woko ki iciŋ wode, abimiyo boti, gin kaka apar-ri ducu.
Ruth 4:36 Ci abimiyo kaka mo acel bot wode, wek laticca Daudi obed ki mac tara i nyima jwijwi i Jerucalem, i gaŋ ma yam ayero me keto iye nyiŋa.
Ruth 4:37 Abiketo in Jeroboam ibedo kabaka me Icrael, ci ibiloyo gin ma cwinyi mito ducu.
Ruth 4:584 
Ruth 4:38 Ka ce ibiwinyo cikka ma aciki kwede, ce ilubo yona, kun itiyo gin ma nen atir i waŋa, pi gwoko cikka ki gin ma aciko ducu kit ma yam laticca Daudi ogwoko-ni, ci abibedo kwedi; an aye abimiyo odi cuŋ matek atika, kit ma yam atimo pi Daudi- ni, dok abimiyo jo Icrael i ciŋi.
Ruth 4:39 Abiketo can i kom likwayo pa Daudi, ento canne pe bibedo matwal.’ “
Ruth 4:40 Solomon otemo neko Jeroboam ento Jeroboam oa woko, oriŋo i Ejipt bot Cicak kabaka me Ejipt, ci obedo gire i Ejipt nio ka Solomon oto. To pa Solomon (2 Tek 9.29-31)
Ruth 4:41 Lok kom Solomon mudoŋŋe ducu, ki gin ducu ma yam otiyo, ki ryekone, gityeko coyone ducu i buk me kwo pa Solomon.
Ruth 4:42 Kare ma Solomon oloyo kwede jo Icrael ducu kun bedo i Jerucalem oromo mwaka pyeraŋwen.
Ruth 4:43 Solomon oto ci oywe kacel ki kwarine, ka giyiko i gaŋ kal pa wonne Daudi. Rekoboam ma wode aye oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 12 Jo Icrael gujemo i kom Rekoboam (2 Tek 10.1-19)
Ruth 4:1 Rekoboam ocito i Cekem, pien onoŋo jo Icrael ducu gumol gucito i Cekem ka keto en me bedo kabaka.
Ruth 4:2 Ka Jeroboam wod pa Nebat owinyo pire, ci oa ki i Ejipt odok cen; pien onoŋo Jeroboam pud tye i Ejipt ka ma yam oriŋo iye kabaka Solomon.
Ruth 4:3 Gicwalo lukwena ka lwoŋe, ci Jerobaom ki lwak jo Icrael ma gucokke ducu guwaco bol Rekoboam ni,
Ruth 4:4 “Woru oketo yec mapek i komwa. In doŋ ilok tic matego ma woru omiyowa, ki yec mapek ma en oketo i komwani obed mayot, ci wan wabibedo luticci.”
Ruth 4:5 Rekoboam ogamo ni, “Koŋ wudok cen wubed kunnu nino adek, ka dok wudwog bota kany.” Ci lwak gudok cen.
Ruth 4:6 Kabaka Rekoboam ocako poro lok ki ludoŋo muteggi, ma yam gicuŋ i nyim wonne ka miye tam i kare ma en pud kwo, ci openyogi ni, “Wun wumiya kit tam aŋo wek adok iye bot lwak man?”
Ruth 4:7 Gin guwacce ni, “Ka ce tin imito bedo latic pa lwak man kun itiyo pi konyogi, iloko botgi lok mabeco i kare ma ibidok iye i penygi, ci gin bene gibibedo luticci matwal.”
Ruth 4:8 Ento en obwoto lam pa ludoŋo muteggi woko, ocako dok poro lok ki awobe ma yalwakke, ma gicuŋ i nyime.
Ruth 4:585 
Ruth 4:9 Openyogi ni, “Wun wumiya kit tam aŋo wek adok iye ki lwak man ma gupenyo ni, ‘Wek yec ma woru oketo i komwa mapek-ki obed yot’?”
Ruth 4:10 Ci awobe ma yalwakke guwacce ni, “Ibidok iye bot lwak ma gupenyi kit man ni, ‘Woru yam omiyo yecwa odoko pek, ento in imi obed yot botwa’; in ibidok iye ki gin kit man ni, ‘Nyig ciŋa kinoŋ makato pyer wora.
Ruth 4:11 Doŋ abitiyo kit man: wora yam oketo yec mapek i komwu, an doŋ abimedo bedo mapek; wora yam pwodowu ki del anino, an abipwodowu ki yib oton.’ ”
Ruth 4:12 Jeroboam ki lwak ducu gubino bot Rekoboam i kom nino me adekke, kit ma onoŋo kabaka ocikogi.
Ruth 4:13 Kabaka odok i peny pa lwak ki gero, pien oweko tam ma ludoŋo muteggi gumiye.
Ruth 4:14 Oloko kwedgi kit ma awobe guyubo kun wacci, “Wora yam omiyo yecwu odoko pek, ento an abimedo bedo mapek. Wora yam pwodowu ki del anino an abipwodowu ki yib oton.”
Ruth 4:15 Gin mumiyo kabaka pe owinyo lok pa lwak, pien Rwot aye omiyo okwero, wek lokke ocobbe kakare ma yam en oloko bot Jeroboam wod pa Nebat kun ocwalo Akija ma jo Cilo ocito otito bote-ni.
Ruth 4:16 Ka jo Icrael guneno ni kabaka pe owinyogi, ci lwak gudok iye bote ni, “Wan watye ki wan po kwa aŋo i kom Daudi? Pe watye ki dul mo i kom latin pa Yece. Wun jo Icrael wudok i kemawu! In Daudi, doŋ inen odi keni.” Ci jo Icrael gupokke woko gudok i pacogi.
Ruth 4:17 Ento Rekoboam pud loyo jo Icrael ma gibedo i gaŋi ma i Juda.
Ruth 4:18 Kabaka Rekoboam ocwalo Adoram botgi, ladit ma loyo t ic muroni, ci jo Icrael ducu gucele ki got, guneke woko, Kabaka Rekoboam orune oito i gadigadi lwennye oriŋo kwede woko i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:19 Kit meno-jo Icrael gujemo woko i kom luker me ot pa Daudi cakke ki i kare-nu nio kwede wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:20 Ka jo Icrael guwinyo ni Jeroboam odwogo, ci gucwalo kwena gulwoŋe, ci obino bot lwak ma gucokke, lwak gukete me bedo kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael ducu, Pe tye ŋatti mo ma dok olubo kor ot pa Daudi, kono kaka pa Juda keken. Lok ma lanebi Cemaya otito (2 Tek 11.1-4)
Ruth 4:21 Ka Rekoboam odwogo cen Jerucalem, ocoko jo ma giyero ki i kaka pa Juda ducu ki i kaka pa Benjamin, twoni lweny alip miya acel ki pyeraboro, pi lweny ki jo me ot pa Icrael wek gudwok ker bot Rekoboam wod pa Solomon.
Ruth 4:22 Ento lok pa Rwot obino bot dano pa Lubaŋa ma nyiŋe Cemaya kun wacci,
Ruth 4:586 
Ruth 4:23 “Wac bot Rekoboam wod pa Solomon ma kabaka me Juda, ki bot jo ducu me ot pa Juda, ki jo pa Benjamin, ki bot jo mukene ducu ni,
Ruth 4:24 ‘Rwot owaco ku man ni, Wun pe wubicito ka lweny i kom lutuwu ma gin jo Icrael. Wek dano acel acel odok cen i pacone, pien lok man oa ki bota.’ ” Gin ducu guwinyo lok pa Rwot, ci gudok cen i pacogi, kit ma Rwot owaco-ni. Jeroboam omiyo jo Icrael gubwoto woro Lubaŋa i Jerucalem
Ruth 4:25 Jeroboam ogero gaŋ Cekem i lobo godi me Epraim, ci obedo kunnu; ka dok oa ki kunnu ocito ogero gaŋ Penuel.
Ruth 4:26 Ka dok ocako lwodo lok ki i cwinye ni, “Kit ma tye-ni, ker bidok woko cen i ot pa Daudi.
Ruth 4:27 Pien ka ce lwak gibedo ka wirre ka tyero gitum wa i Jerucalem ka ma ot pa Rwot tye iye-ni, ci miyo cwiny lwak man bidok woko i kom rwotgi Rekoboam ma kabaka me Juda, ci miyo gibineka woko ka gidok bot Rekoboam kabaka me Juda.”
Ruth 4:28 Kit meno kabaka ocako yubo lok ci otiyo cal litino twoni aryo me jabu, ka owaco bot lwak ni, “Wun doŋ wubedo ka wirre wa i Jerucalem twatwal, meno doŋ oromowu, Doŋ wunen lubaŋawu, wun jo Icrael, ma yam gukwanyowu woko ki i lobo Ejipt.”
Ruth 4:29 Jeroboam oketo cal wod twon acel i Betel, ka dok oketo acel i Dan.
Ruth 4:30 Lok man odoko bal, pien jo Icrael gucako mol gicito bot wod twon acel ma tye i Betel, ki bot mukene ma tye i Dan.
Ruth 4:31 Jeroboam dok ogero odi me woro Lubaŋa i wi godi, kun keto iye ajwagi ma okwanyogi ki i kin lwak ata, ma pe gin jo Levi.
Ruth 4:32 Dok oketo nino madit obedo i dwe me aboro, i kom nino dwe apar wiye abic, ma rom ki nino madit ma bedo i Juda-ni, ci ocako tyero gitum i kom ke no tyer. Obedo ka tiyo kit meno i Betel, kun tyero gitum bot cal litino twoni ma en otiyo- ni. Dok oketo i Betel ajwagi ma okwanyo ki i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa i wi godi ma en oyubo-ni.
Ruth 4:33 Oito i keno tyer ma en otiyo i Betel i dwe me aboro, i nino dwe apar wiye abic, i nino ma cwinye otamo-ni; oketo nino madit pi jo Icrael, dok oito bene i keno tyer ka wano odok eceta.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 13 Lanebi mua ki i Juda ojuko Jeroboam
Ruth 4:1 Dano pa Lubaŋa mo oa ki i Juda ma Rwot ocwalo ki lokke wa i Betel, ka ma Jeroboam onoŋo ocuŋ iye ka ŋet keno tyer ka waŋo odok eceta.
Ruth 4:2 Dano meno ocako lok ki gero kun tito lok pa Lubaŋa i kom ke no tyer. Owacci, “Ai keno tyer, keno tyer, Rwot owaco kuman ni, ‘Nen ba, gibinywalo latin laco i ot
Ruth 4:587  pa Daudi ma nyiŋe Yocia. Ajwagi me kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma i wi godi ma gibedo ka waŋo odok eceta i komi en binekogi woko i komi macalo gitum, ki cogo pa dano bene gibiwaŋogi i komi.’ “
Ruth 4:3 Omiyo lanyut i nino meno kun wacci, “Man aye bibedo gin ma nyuto ni Rwot aye oloko lok man: Gibimuko keno tyer-ri woko, ki buru ma i wiye-ni gibionyo woko piny.”
Ruth 4:4 Ka kabaka Jeroboam owinyo lok ma dano pa Lubaŋa owaco kun loko ki gero i kom 338 keno tyer ma i Betel, oryeyo ciŋe ki i ner keno tyer kun wacci, “Wumak dano-nu woko.” Ci bade ma oryeyo pi cimo dano-nu otugi tal woko cut, ma dolone wek odwog cen oloye woko.
Ruth 4:5 Ki keno tyer bene otugi muk woko, ki buru bene otugi ukke woko piny nia ki i wi keno tyer. Kumeno lanyut me lok pa Rwot ma dano pa Lubaŋa otito-ni ocobo kakare.
Ruth 4:6 Jeroboam owaco bot dano pa Lubaŋa ni, “Leg Rwot Lubaŋani kombeddi, wek odwok cwinye, ka doŋ ileg pira, wek bada odolle odwog i koma kakare.” Dano pa Lubaŋa olego Rwot, ci bad kabaka odolle odwogo cen kakare, obedo kit ma con ca.
Ruth 4:7 Kabaka owaco bot dano pa Lubaŋa ni, “Bin doŋ wacit paco, wek iciywe kunnu, ci abimiyi mot mo me pwoc.”
Ruth 4:8 Ento dano pa Lubaŋa ogamo dog kabaka ni, “Kadi bed imiya nucu jami ma i odi kulu, pe abiye donyo i odi wan kwedi. Dok pe abicamo kwon kadi wa mato pii-gu i kabedo man;
Ruth 4:9 pien Rwot ocika kit meno kun wacci, ‘In pe ibicamo kwon kadi wa mato pii-gu kunnu, dok pe ibidwogo ki yo ma icito kwede kunnu.’ “
Ruth 4:10 Kit meno en okwanyo yo mukene; pe odok cen ki yo ma ocito kwede i Betel-li.
Ruth 4:11 Onoŋo tye lanebi mo ma oti woko ma bedo i Betel. Awobene gucito gutitte gin ducu ma dano pa Lubaŋa otiyo i Betel i nino meno; ki lok ma oloko bot kabaka bene gutito bot wongi.
Ruth 4:12 Ci wongi openyogi ni, “En kono okwanyo yo mene?” Awobene gunyutte yo ma dano pa Lubaŋa ma oa i Juda-ni odok kwede cen.
Ruth 4:13 Ci owaco bot awobene ni; “Wutwena kom me bedo i wi kana,” Gutwene kom me bedo i wi kanane, ci en obedo i wiye.
Ruth 4:14 Ocita i kor dano pa Lubaŋa-nu, onoŋe obedo i te yat kworo. Owaco bote ni, “In aye i dano pa Lubaŋa ma oa i Juda-ni?” Ogamo ni, “An do!”
Ruth 4:15 Dok owacce ni, “Bin wacit paco kacel kweda ka camo kwon.”
Ruth 4:588 
Ruth 4:16 Dano pa Lubaŋa ogamo ni, “Pe myero adok kwedi cen, nyo donyo kwedi i ot, dok pe abicamo kwon kwedi kadi wa mato pii-gu i kabedo man;
Ruth 4:17 pien lok pa Rwot obino bota ma ocika ni. ‘In pe ibicamo kwon kadi wa mato pii- gu kunnu, dok pe ibidwogo ki yo ma icito kwede kunnu.’ “
Ruth 4:18 Lanebi muti ca ogamo doge ni, “An bene lanebi macalo in, dok lamalaika owacca lok pa Rwot kun wacci, ‘Cit icidwog ki lanebi ca paco, en obin kacel kwedi wa i odi wek ocam kwon ka omat pii-gu.’ ” Ento noŋo en obedo ka bwolo dano ca abwola.
Ruth 4:19 Dano ca odok cen kacel kwede, ci ocamo kwon i ode, ka omato pii-gu,
Ruth 4:20 kare ma gubedo ka cam wi meja, lok pa Rwot obino bot lanebi muti ca ma omiyo lawote odwogo cen i ode.
Ruth 4:21 Ocako lok ki gero bot dano pa Lubaŋa ma oa ki i Juda kun wacci, “Rwot owaco kuman ni, ‘In pe iworo dog Rwot, pe imako cik ma Rwot Lubaŋani ociki kwede,
Ruth 4:22 ento iye dwogo wako cen, dok ibedo ka camo kwon bene ki mato pii-gu i kabedo ma awacct m pe myero icam iye kwon kadi wa mato pii-gu. Pi meno pe gibiyiko komi i Lyel pa kwariwu.’ “
Ruth 4:23 Ka doŋ gityeko cam ki mat, won ot otweyo kom me bedo i wi kanane pi lanebi ma en omiyo odwogo cen.
Ruth 4:24 Ka dano meno ocito, labwor mo orwatte kwede i yo, ci omake oneke woko. Kome obuto i yo kun kana ocun ka ŋete, ki labwor bene ocun ka ŋet kom dano- nu.
Ruth 4:25 Dano ma gukato ka ŋete guneno kom dano ma obuto i yo, ki labwor ma ocuŋ ka ŋet kom dano-ni. Gubino gutito pire i gaŋ ma lanebi muti bedo iye-ni.
Ruth 4:26 I kare ma lanebi ma omiyo dano ca odwogo cen-ni owinyo pire, ci owacci, “Meno aye dano pa Lubaŋa ma pe oworo lok pa Rwot-ti; omiyo Rwot omiye i ciŋ labwor ma okaye oneke woko-ni, kit macalo Rwot oloko kwede bote.”
Ruth 4:27 Ci owaco bot awobene ni, “Doŋ wutwe kom i wi kana,” ci gutweyo kom i wi kana.
Ruth 4:28 Ocito onoŋo kom dano-nu gibolo iyo, kun kana ki labwor gucuŋ ka ŋet kome. Labwor bene pe omwodo kome, pe okayo kana bene.
Ruth 4:29 Lanebi muti-ni otino kom dano pa Lubaŋa-ni, oketo i wi kanane, ci okelo kome i gaŋŋe, wek gukum pire ka guyiko kome.
Ruth 4:30 Lanebi meno oyiko kom dano pa Lubaŋa i lyeŋe kikome; ci gukumo pire kun giwacci, “Can madit opoto i komi do, omera!”
Ruth 4:31 Ka doŋ gityeko yiko kome, ci lanebi-nu ociko awo bene ni, “Ka an doŋ ato, ci wuyika i lyel ma giyiko iye kom dano pa Lubaŋa-ni, wuket cogona ka ŋet cogone.
Ruth 4:589 
Ruth 4:32 Pien lok ma en ogerre kwede matek-ki onoŋo lok pa Rwot ma oloko i kom keno tyer ma i Betel, ki i kom odi ducu ma i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma gitye i gaŋi ma i Camaria. Lokke ducu bicobbe kakare ada.”
Ruth 4:33 I ne lok man mutimme-ni Jeroboam pe omedo ki weko kite maraco-ni. En dok omedde ki keto ajwagi me tic i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma i wi godi ma okwanyogi ki i kin lwak ata, Tekke onoŋo ŋat ma mito keken, ci kwere me bedo ajwaka cut, ci keto i ka woro Lubaŋa ma i wi godi-ni.
Ruth 4:34 Kit tim man aye odoko bal i kom jo me ot pa Jeroboam, mumiyo ode gikwanyo woko nio ka gityeko woko liweŋ ki i wi lobo man.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 14 Lok ma lanebi Akija otito i kom Jeroboam
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno two omako Abija wod pa Jeroboam.
Ruth 4:2 Jeroboam owaco bot dakone ni, “Cit iruk boŋŋi mapat wek pe ŋatti mo oŋe ni in i dako pa Jeroboam, ci icit i Cilo. Akija ma lanebi-ni tye kunnu, en aye yam owaco bo ta ni abibedo kabaka ma loyo lwak man.
Ruth 4:3 Ber iter mugati apar, ki capat bene, ki agulu moo kic, wek icit kwede bote, ci en birirti gin ma bitimme i kom latin.”
Ruth 4:4 Dako pa Jeroboam otimo kit meno, Ocito i Cilo ci ka doŋ oo kunnu ocito i ot pa Akija. Onoŋo Akija pe doŋ twero neno piny, pien wane doŋ ocor woko pi tiyone.
Ruth 4:5 Rwot owaco bot Akija ni, “Nen ba, dako pa Jeroboam tye ka bino boti. Obebino ka penyo dogi pi two pa wode, pien two omako malit.” Ci Rwot otito bote lok ducu ma myero owac bot dako-nu. Ka dako meno obino, onoŋo olokke odoko macalo dako mua ki ka mukene.
Ruth 4:6 Ento ka Akija owinyo kor tyene i kare ma en obino kwede i doggola-ni, ci otugi jole ni, “Dony ba, in dako pa Jeroboam. Piŋo ilokke idoko macalo dako mua ki ka mukene? Rwot ocika ki lok mapek i komi.
Ruth 4:7 In idok icitit bot Jeroboam ni, Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael owaco kuman ni, ‘An yam apilo wii aketi kwede i dit, ma kun akwanyi ki i kin lwak, ci aketi ibedo lalo lwakka ma gin jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:8 Yam amayo ker woko ki i ot pa Daudi, amiyo boti; ento in pe ibedo macalo laticca Daudi ma yam omako cikka ducu, kun lubo kora ki cwinye ducu, dok tiyo gin ma nen atir i waŋa keken.
Ruth 4:9 In aye doŋ itiyo bal ma okato jo ducu ma gukwoŋo nyimi, kun itiyo lwak lubaŋa piri keni, ki cal lubaŋa aliya-gu ma omiyo kiniga emaka, dok ityeko bola woko yo ŋeyi.
Ruth 4:590 
Ruth 4:10 Pienno abiketo can i kom jo me odi, in Jeroboam, abineko co ducu ma i odi ma i lobo Icrael, opii wa ki anywalli, Abijwero jo ma i odi ducu atyeko woko liweŋ, kit macalo dano wano cet dyaŋ nio ka owaŋo okur woko liweŋ-ŋi.
Ruth 4:11 Danoni ducu ma gibito i gaŋ, gwogi aye bimwodo komgi; ento dano ma gibito i dye tim ata, winyo aye bicamogi, an Rwot aye doŋ atyeko loko kit meno.’
Ruth 4:12 “In dako doŋ ia, icit i odi, Ka ce tyeni odonyo i gaŋ, ci latin bito woko.
Ruth 4:13 Jo Icrael ducu gibikumo pire, ka giyiko kome, En kene aye gibiyiko kome i Lyel ki i kin jo pa Jeroboam pien en kene aye i kin jo me ot pa Jeroboam ma Rwot Lubaŋa me Icrael onoŋo k it gin mo i kome ma oyomo cwinye.
Ruth 4:14 Rwot bikwanyo dano mo mukene ma bibedo kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael, en aye dano ma bityeko ot pa Jeroboam woko i kare man. Lacen aŋo doki?
Ruth 4:15 Rwot bipwodo Icrael nio wan ma kome myel calo lagada ma kwan i wi pii. En biputo jo Icrael woko ki i lobo man maber-ri ma yam omiyo bot kwarigi, ci bikeyogi woko ata loka kulu Euprate, pien gumiyo kiniga omako Rwot pi payo cal jok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera.
Ruth 4:16 Rwot bibwoto Icrael woko pi bal pa Jeroboam ma en obalo, ka dok omiyo jo Icrael bene gubalo-ni.”
Ruth 4:17 Dako pa Jeroboam oa ocako wot me cito i Tiŋa. Ka en oo i doggola ot ci latin otugi to woko cut.
Ruth 4:18 Jo Icrael ducu guyiko kome, ka dok gukumo pire kit ma yam Rwot owaco, ma laticce lanebi Akija oloko lokke.
Ruth 4:19 Lok kom Jeroboam mudoŋŋe ducu, ki kit ma olwenyo kwede i mony-gu, ki kit locce ducu, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Icrael.
Ruth 4:20 Kare ma Jeroboam obedo kwede ka loc oromo mwaka pyeraryo wiye aryo; ci oto, oywe kacel ki kwarine. Wode Nadab aye oleyo ka tyene. Loc pa Rekoboam kabaka me Juda (2 Tek 12.1-16)
Ruth 4:21 I kare meno Rekoboam wod pa Solomon obedo ka loyo lobo Juda. Rekoboam ocamo ker ma noŋo mwaka me ditte romo pyeraŋwen wiye acel, obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka apar wiye abiro, Jerucalem aye gaŋ ma yam Rwot oyero ki i kin kaka ma i Icrael ducu pi keto iye nyiŋe. Nyiŋ min Rekoboam Naama, ma anyira Ammon.
Ruth 4:22 Jo Juda gutiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot, ci gumiyo nyeko omake pi balgi ma gutiyo, ma okato bal ma yam kwarigi gutiyo ducu.
Ruth 4:23 Gugero wan jogigi i wi godi, gucibo wir jogi-gu ki cal jok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera i wi godi mabocone ducu, ki i wan ayweya ma pote oluk-gu.
Ruth 4:591 
Ruth 4:24 I lobogi onoŋo tye bene awobe ma lutim kwele i kom awo be wadgr i wan jogi. Lwak gutiyo kit tim kipyeda ducu ma rom ki bal pa rok ma yam Rwot oryemogi wo ko ki i nyim jo Icrael-li.
Ruth 4:25 I mwaka me loc pa Rekoboam me abicce en aye Cicak kabaka me Ejipt obino iye ka lweny i kom Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:26 Oyako jami ma gikano i ot lim pa Rwot, ki jami ma gikano i ot lim pa kabaka, Oyako jami woko ducu, oyako ki kwodi jabu ma yam Solomon otiyogi.
Ruth 4:27 Kabaka Rekoboam dok otiyo kwodi mukene ma kakagi; otiyo kwodi mola ci omiyogi i ciŋ ludito pa Lugwok kabaka, ma gigwoko doggola ot pa kabaka.
Ruth 4:28 I kare ducu ma noŋo kabaka cito i ot pa Rwot, lugwok en gimako kwodi, ka dok gidwokogi kakagi i ot kicika pa lugwok kabaka.
Ruth 4:29 Lok kom Rekoboam mudoŋŋe, ki gin ma en otiyo ducu gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Juda.
Ruth 4:30 Lweny obedo i kin Rekoboam ki Jeroboam kare mapol.
Ruth 4:31 Rekoboam oto oywe kacel ki kwarine ci giyike kacel ki kwarine i gaŋ kal pa Daudi. Nyiŋ minne Naama ma anyira Ammon, Wode Abijam aye oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 15 Loc pa Abijam kabaka me Juda (2 Tek 13.1-22)
Ruth 4:1 I mwaka me apar wiye aboro me loc pa Jeroboam wod pa Nebat en aye Abijam ocako loyo iye jo Juda.
Ruth 4:2 Obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka adek. Nyiŋ minne Maaka ma nya pa Abicalom.
Ruth 4:3 En otimo kit bal ducu ma wonne ma otelo nyime yam obedo ka timogi; pe obedo ki leŋic i kom Rwot Lubaŋane kit ma yam kwarone Daudi obedo kwede.
Ruth 4:4 Kadi bed kumeno, Rwot Lubaŋane omiye obedo ki mac tara i Jerucalem pi Daudi, kun omiyo wode oleyo ka tyene, dok omiyo Jerucalem ocuŋ matek.
Ruth 4:5 Rwot otiyo man pien Daudi yam otiyo gin ma nen atir i wan Rwot, pe oweko lubo gin ma yam Rwot ociko i kare me kwone ducu, ento oroco i lok kom Uria ma Lakit keken.
Ruth 4:6 Onoŋo lweny tye i kin Rekoboam ki Jeroboam i kare me kwone ducu.
Ruth 4:7 Lok kom Abijam mudoŋŋe ducu, ki gin ma en otiyo ducu, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Juda, Lweny obedo i kin Abijam ki Jeroboam.
Ruth 4:8 Abijam oto, oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyike i gaŋ kal pa Daudi. Wode Aca aye oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:592  Loc pa Aca kabaka me Juda (2 Tek 14.1-5;15.16-19)
Ruth 4:9 I mwaka me pyeraryo me loc pa Jeroboam kaba ka me Icrael en aye Aca ocako loyo iye jo Juda.
Ruth 4:10 Obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyeraŋwen wiye acel. Nyiŋ minne Maaka ma nya pa Abicalom.
Ruth 4:11 Aca otiyo gin ma nen atir i wan Rwot kit ma kwarone Daudi yam otiyo-ni.
Ruth 4:12 Oryemo woko ki i lobone awobe ma lutim kwele i kom awobe wadgi i wanjogi kadok okwanyo cal jogi ducu ma yam kwarine gutiyo.
Ruth 4:13 Oryemo wa minne Maaka woko, pe oye ni omed bedo daker, pien onoŋo Maaka omiyo gitine cal me kipyeda pi Acera ma jok ma dako; ci Aca otoŋo cal jokke oŋido woko, ci owaŋo woko i laora kulu Kidron.
Ruth 4:14 Ento waŋ jogi ma i wi godi pe gimuko woko. Kadi bed kumeno, Aca obedo ki leŋic i kom Rwot pi kare me kwone ducu.
Ruth 4:15 Okelo i ot pa Rwot mot ma yam wonne odyero bot Lubaŋa, kacel ki mere kikome bene ma odyero, ryal ki jabu ki weer-gu. Aca oribbe ki Ben-adad (2 Tek 16.1-14)
Ruth 4:16 Lweny obedo i kin Aca ki Baaca kabaka me Icrael pi kare me kwogi ducu.
Ruth 4:17 Baaca kabaka me Icrael otiŋo lweny i kom Juda, ci ogero gaŋ Rama, wek ogeŋ dano mo pe okat woko ki i lobo Juda nyo donyo iye bot Aca kabaka me Juda.
Ruth 4:18 Aca okwanyo jami ducu me ryal ki me jabu ma onoŋo odoŋ i ot kano lim pa Rwot, ki jami ma i ot kano lim pa kabaka, omiyogi i cin luticce. Ocwalogi bot Ben- adad wod pa Tabrimmon, wod pa Kejion kabaka me Ciria ma bedo i Damaciko, kun waco bote ni,
Ruth 4:19 “Wek waket gicikke i kinwa an ki in, kit ma yam bedo i kin kwara ki kwaru. Nen ba, an doŋ acwalli ryal ki jabu me mot; ber icit itur gicikkewu ki Baaca kabaka me Icrael, wek en oa woko ki i lobona.”
Ruth 4:20 Ben-adad owinyo dog kabaka Aca, ocwalo ludito wi monnye ka lweny i kom gaŋi pa jo Icrael, ci omayo Ijon, Dan, Abel-bet-maaka ki lobo Kinerot ducu, ki lobo pa jo Naputali ducu.
Ruth 4:21 Ka Baaca owinyo pire, ci obwoto gero Rama woko, odok obedo i Tiŋa.
Ruth 4:22 Kabaka Aca olwoŋo jo Juda ducu kun ociko ni ŋatti mo pe odoŋ, ci guyweko godi ki bao ma i Rama ducu, ma onoŋo Baaca obedo ka gero ki Rama-ni; ci kabaka Aca ocako gero kwede gaŋ Geba ma i lobo pa jo Benjamin, ki Mijpa.
Ruth 4:593 
Ruth 4:23 Lok kom Aca mudoŋŋe ducu, tekke ducu ki gin ducu ma en otiyo, ki gaŋi ma ogerogi, giryeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Juda. Ento two aye omako tyene i kare ma en doŋ oti.
Ruth 4:24 Aca oto, oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyike kacel ki kwarine i gaŋ kai pa kwarone Daudi, Yekocapat ma wode aye oleyo ka tyene. Loc pa Nadab kabaka me Icrael
Ruth 4:25 Nadab wod pa Jeroboam ocako loyo Icrael i mwaka me aryo me loc pa Aca kabaka me Juda, oloyogi pi mwaka aryo.
Ruth 4:26 Otiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot, pien obedo ka lubo kit pa wonne, ki balle ma en omiyo jo Icrael bene gubalo-ni.
Ruth 4:27 Baaca wod pa Akija ma i dog ot pa Icakar opiro lok kofi Nadab, ci ocobe oneke woko i Gibeton ma gaŋ pa jo Piliciti. Onoŋo Nadab ki jo Icrael ducu gurumo gaŋ Gibeton woko.
Ruth 4:28 Baaca oneko Nadab i mwaka me adek me loc pa Aca kabaka me Juda, ci oleyo ka 341 tyene.
Ruth 4:29 Ka otyeko doko kabaka, oneko jo me dog ot pa Jeroboam woko ducu, pe oweko dano mo obwot i kingi, nio ka orido wi Jeroboam woko ducu, kit ma yam Rwot owaco ki i dog laticce Akija me Cilo.
Ruth 4:30 Can meno opoto pi bal pa Jeroboam ma yam obalo-ni, ma en omiyo jo Icrael bene gubalo, dok pien omiyo kiniga omako Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Ruth 4:31 Lok kom Nadab mudoŋŋe ducu, ki gin ducu ma en otiyo, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Icrael.
Ruth 4:32 Lweny obedo i kin Aca ki Baaca kabaka me Icrael pi kare me kwogi ducu. Loc pa Baaca kabaka me Icrael
Ruth 4:33 I mwaka me adek me loc pa Aca kabaka me Juda en aye Baaca wod pa Akija ocako loyo iye jo Icrael ducu ki i Tiŋa, ci obedo ka loc pi mwaka pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Ruth 4:34 Otiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot, pien obedo ka lubo kit pa Jeroboam, ki balle ma en omiyo jo Icrael bene gubalo-ni.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 16
Ruth 4:1 Lok pa Rwot obino bot Yeko wod pa Kanani ma lokke okemo kom Baaca, kun wacci,
Ruth 4:2 “I kare ma apilo wii aketi kwede i dit, ma kun akwanyi ki i apwa ci aketi ibedo latel wi jona jo Icrael, icako lubo kit pa Jeroboam, imiyo jona jo Icrael bene gudoko lubalo, mumiyo kiniga omaka pi balgi ducu.
Ruth 4:594 
Ruth 4:3 Nen ba, abiyweyo in Baaca woko liweŋ ki jo me odi ducu, dok abimiyo odi bedo calo ot pa Jeroboam wod pa Nebat.
Ruth 4:4 Danoni ducu ma gibito i gaŋ, gwogi aye bimwodo komgi, ento dano ma gibito i dye tim ata, winyo aye bicamogi.”
Ruth 4:5 Lok kom Baaca mudoŋŋe ducu, ki gin ma en otiyo, ki tekke, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Icrael.
Ruth 4:6 Baaca oto, oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyike i Tiŋa. Ela ma wode aye oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:7 Lok pa Rwot obino bot lanebi Yeko wod pa Kanani ma okemo Baaca ki jo ma i ode pi lok aryo, pi gin ma otimo ma nen marac i wan Rwot, kun orruyo kmiga omako Rwot i kome pi gin ma otiyo ma rom ki tim pa jo me ot pa Jeroboam, ento doki pien oneko jo me ot pa Jeroboam woko ducu. Loc pa Ela kabaka me Icrael
Ruth 4:8 I mwaka ma pyeraryo wiye abicel me loc pa Aca kabaka me Juda en aye Ela wod pa Baaca ocako loyo iye jo Icrael ki i Tiŋa, ci obedo ka loc pi mwaka aryo.
Ruth 4:9 Ento laticce Jimri, ma ladit ma loyo nucu gadigadi lwennye, opiro lok i kome. I kare ma Ela tye i Tiŋa en obedo ka mat ci omer woko i ot pa Aŋa ma lalo jami ma i ode ma i Tiŋa.
Ruth 4:10 Jimri odonyo i ot, ocobo Ela otugi neko woko cut, i mwaka me pyeraryo wi ye abiro me loc pa Aca kabaka me Juda, ci Jimri oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:11 Ka Jimri ocako loyo lobo, tekke obedo i wi komkerre, ci otugi neko jo me ot pa Baaca woko liweŋ; pe oweko latin laco mo makwo ma i doggolagi, kadi wa i kin lureme.
Ruth 4:12 Jimri oneko jo me ot pa Baaca otyeko woko ducu kit meno, kit ma lok pa Rwot owaco-ni ma yam obino i dog lanebi Yeko ma okemo kom Baaca,
Ruth 4:13 pi bal pa Baaca ducu ki pi bal pa Ela ma wode, ma gin gubalo ka dok omiyo jo Icrael bene gubalo-ni, kun gimiyo kiniga omako Rwot Lubaŋa me Icrael pi cal jogi ma giworogi.
Ruth 4:14 Lok kom Ela mudoŋŋe ducu, ki gin ducu ma en otiyo, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Icrael. Loc pa Jimri kabaka me Icrael
Ruth 4:15 I mwaka me pyeraryo wiye abiro me loc pa Aca kaba ka me Juda en aye Jimri obedo ka loc i Tiŋa pi nino abiro, Onoŋo mony pa jo Icrael gutoŋo gonygi ma gikemo Gibeton ma gaŋ pa jo Piliciti,
Ruth 4:595 
Ruth 4:16 ci lumony guwinyo ki i gonygi ni Jimri opiro lok, oneko kabaka woko. En aye lok mumiyo jo Icrael ducu guketo Omri ma ladit me mony aye odoko kaba ka ma loyo Icrael i nino meno i kare ma gitye i gony kunnu.
Ruth 4:17 Omri oa woko ki i Gibeton ki jo Icrael ducu kacel kwede, ci guwoto gurumo gaŋ Tiŋa.
Ruth 4:18 Ka Jimri oneno ni mony doŋ omako gaŋ woko, ci owoto i gogo me ot pa kabaka, owaŋo ot i wiye kene, oto iye.
Ruth 4:19 Oto pi balle ma otiyo dok pi tiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot kun lubo kit pa Jeroboam ki balle ma co omiyo jo Icrael gubalo-ni.
Ruth 4:20 Lok kom Jimri mudoŋŋe ducu, ki lok ma en opiro, gityeko co yo ne i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Icrael. Loc pa Omri kabaka me Icrael
Ruth 4:21 I kare meno onoŋo jo lerael gupokke woko dul aryo; nucu lwak tuŋcel aye gudok i kom Tibni wod pa Ginat pi keto en me bedo kabakagi, ki nucu tuŋcel gupokke gudok i kom Omri.
Ruth 4:22 Ento lwak ma gudok i kom Omri guloyo lwak ma gudok i kom Tibni wod pa Ginat; kit meno Tibni oto woko, ci Omri odoko kabaka.
Ruth 4:23 I mwaka pyeradek wiye acel me loc pa Aca kabaka me Juda en aye Omri ocako loyo iye jo Icrael, ci obedo ka loc pi mwaka apar wiye aryo, kun oloyo mwaka abicel i Tiŋa.
Ruth 4:24 Owilo got me Camaria ki bot Cemer ki lim ryal ma romo talanta aryo, ka ogero iye gaŋ gogo matek, ocako nyiŋe Camaria, macalo nyiŋ Cemer ma yam obedo won got meno.
Ruth 4:25 Omri otiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot, otiyo gin marac makato jo ma gutelo nyime ducu.
Ruth 4:26 Obedo ka lubo kit pa Jeroboam wod pa Nebat ducu, ki bal ducu ma en omiyo jo Icrael gubalo, kun gimiyo kiniga omako Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael pi cal jogigi.
Ruth 4:27 Lok kom Omri mudoŋŋe ducu, ki gin ma en otiyo, ki tekke ducu, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Icrael.
Ruth 4:28 Omri oto, oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyike i Camaria; Akab ma wode aye oleyo ka tyene. Loc pa Akab kabaka me Icrael
Ruth 4:29 I mwaka me pyeradek wiye aboro me loc pa Aca kabaka me Juda en aye Akab wod pa Omri ocako loyo iye jo Icrael, ci obedo ka loc i Camaria pi mwaka pyeraryo wiye aryo.
Ruth 4:596 
Ruth 4:30 Akab wod pa Omri otiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot makato jo ma gutelo nyime ducu.
Ruth 4:31 Dok macalo en otamo ni lubo kit bal pa Jeroboam wod pa Nebat obedo gin manok mo, omiyo en onyomo Jejebel ma nya pa Etibaal kabaka pa jo Cidon, dok en bene ocito kunnu oworo jok Baal kun oryebbe i nyime.
Ruth 4:32 Ogero ot pi jok Baal i Camaria, ocano keno tyer iye.
Ruth 4:33 Akab ocibo cal jok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera, dok otiyo gin ma omiyo kiniga omako Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael makato luker me Icrael ducu ma gutelo nyime.
Ruth 4:34 I karene aye Kiel, dano me Betel, ogero iye Jeriko odoco. Abiram ma latin kayone okwoŋo to ci oketo gutine i wiye, ci wode matidine oto, ma nyiŋe Cegub, ka giketo dog gaŋ i wiye, macalo lok ma Rwot yam oloko ki i dog Yocwa wod pa Nun.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 17 Elia ojuko kot pe ocwer
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno Elia Laticbe, ma gaŋgi Ticbe ma i Gilead, owaco bot Akab ni, “Macalo Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael tye makwo-ni, ma an acuŋ i nyime, i mwaka ma bino-ni toyo bibedo peke kadi wa kot bene, nio ka doga aye dok biloko.”
Ruth 4:2 Lok pa Rwot obino bot Elia ni,
Ruth 4:3 “A woko ki kany, idok yo tun wokceŋ, icikanne i ŋet laora kulu Ketit ma i ne kulu Jordan tun wokceŋ.
Ruth 4:4 Ibimato pii ma i kulu-nu, dok atyeko ci ko winyo agak ma gibipiti kunnu.”
Ruth 4:5 Elia ocito kit ma Rwot owacce-ni, ocito obedo i ŋet laora kulu Kerit ma i ne kulu Jordan yo tuŋ wokceŋ.
Ruth 4:6 Agak gutero kwon ki riŋo-gu bote i odiko, ka dok otyeno bene guterre kwon ki riŋo. En obedo ka mato pii i kulu Kerit.
Ruth 4:7 Lacen pii ma i kulu otwo woko, pien kot doŋ pe cwer i lobo. Elia ki dako me Jarepat
Ruth 4:8 Lok pa Rwot dok obino bot Elia ni,
Ruth 4:9 “A malo, icil wa i Jarepat, ma cok ki Cidon, ici bed kunnu, Atyeko ciko dako mo kunnu ma cware oto ma bimiyi cam.”
Ruth 4:10 Elia oa malo ocito i Jarepat. Ka oo cok ki dog gaŋ, nen, daa-to mo tye ka coko yen riddo. Elia olwoŋe kun waco bote ni, “Cikella pii mo i agwata wek amati.”
Ruth 4:11 Ka dako ocako wot me kela pii, ci dok olwoŋe, owacce ni, “Cikella kwon mo man ok i ciŋi.”
Ruth 4:597 
Ruth 4:12 Dako ogamo ni, “Macalo Rwot Lubaŋani tye makwo-ni, pe atye ki kwon mo ma amyeno, ento atye ki moko kwon poŋ ciŋ acel keken ma odon i abino, ki moo tedo manok mo i atabo moo; man atye ka coko yen riddo mogo wek adok kwede ka acited pira ki pi woda, ka wek doŋ wacam ci wato kwede.”
Ruth 4:13 Elia ogamo ni, “Pe ilwor, cit icitim kit ma iwaco-ni; ento koŋ idolla kwon manok ikella, ka dok lacen icidol piri ki pi wodi.
Ruth 4:14 Pien Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael ocika kuman ni, ‘Moko kwon pe bitum woko i abino, moo pe birem woko i atabo, nio ka Rwot ocwalo kot ocwer i lobo.’ “
Ruth 4:15 Dako-nu ocito otedo kit ma Elia owacce-ni, ci dako-nu ki Elia ki jo ma i ode ducu gubedo ka camone pi nino mapol,
Ruth 4:16 kun moko kwon pe tum ki i abino, moo bene pe rem i atabo, kit ma Rwot owaco ki dog Elia-ni.
Ruth 4:17 Lacen ki i ŋe man, latin pa dako ma min ot meno two omako, ci twone omedde malit mada, nio ka pe doŋ ywe-gu.
Ruth 4:18 Dako-nu owaco bot Elia ni, “Itima rac kuman piŋo, in dano pa Lubaŋa? Ibino bota ka poyo wi balla macon, omiyo balla oneko woda woko do!”
Ruth 4:19 Elia owaco bot dako-nu ni, “Miya wodi kany.” Ci otino latin woko ki i kore, ocito kwede i kicika ma malo ka ma en buto iye, opyelo latin i wi kabutone kikome.
Ruth 4:20 Ocako kok bot Rwot ni, “Ai Rwot Lubaŋana, in aye dok ikelo can i kom daa-to ma abedo bote-ni pi neko wode?”
Ruth 4:21 Ci Elia oryene i kom latin kidek, kun kok kwede bot Rwot ni, “Ai Rwot Lubaŋana, wek tipo kom latin man odwog cen i kome ba.”
Ruth 4:22 Rwot owinyo koko pa Elia, omiyo tipo kom latin odwogo cen i kome, ka cwinye odwogo.
Ruth 4:23 Elia otiŋo latin ki i kicika ma malo, okele piny i ot, omiyo bot minne, owacci, “Nen, wodi tye makwo ene.”
Ruth 4:24 Dakonu owaco bot Elia ni, “Ai rwoda, kombeddi doŋ aŋeyo atir ni in i dano pa Lubaŋa, dok Jok pa Rwot ma iwaco ki dogi bene me ada.”
Ruth 4:1 Luker 18 Elia odok bot Akab
Ruth 4:1 Ka kare okato malac, ci lok pa Rwot dok obino bot Elia, i mwaka me adekke, ma wacci, “Cit icinyutte kekeni bot Akab; an doŋ abicwalo kot i lobo.”
Ruth 4:2 Elia ocito ka nyutte bot Akab. I kare-nu onoŋo kec doŋ dwoŋ i Camaria.
Ruth 4:3 Akab olwoŋo Obadia ma ladit ma loyo jami ma i ode-ni. Onoŋo Obadia woro Rwot matek twatwal.
Ruth 4:598 
Ruth 4:4 I kare ma yam Jejebel tye ka neko lunebi pa Rwot, Obadia otero lunebi miya acel kulu, okanogi i boro, opo ko kingi pyerabic pyerabic, opitogi ki kwon ki pii-gu.
Ruth 4:5 Akab owaco bot Obadia ni, “Wot icit i dye lobo ducu ka ma waŋ pii tye iye, wa ki i nota ducu; gwok nyo wabinoŋo iye lum wek walar aguragura ki kana madonone gubed makwo, wek leewa mogo pe guto woko.”
Ruth 4:6 Gucako poko lobo ma ŋat acel acel i kingi biwot iye; ci Akab ocito mere tuŋcel en kene, ki Obadia bene odok yo tuŋcel en kene.
Ruth 4:7 I kare ma Obadia tye ka wot iyo, nen, Elia otuc, orwatte kwede, Obadia otugi ŋeye woko cut, opoto piny aryeba cwiny kun wacci, “Man aye in kikomi Elia, rwoda?”
Ruth 4:8 Elia ogamo ni, “Iyo an kikoma. Ento cit icitit bot rwodi ni Elia tye kany.”
Ruth 4:9 Obadia ogamo ni, “An abalo kit bal aŋo boti, rwoda? Piŋo imito miya i ciŋ Akab wek oneka?
Ruth 4:10 Macalo Rwot Lubaŋani tye makwoni, pe tye rok mo nyo ker mo ma rwoda Akab pe ocwalo iye dano ka yenyi, Ka gudwoko lok ni, ‘Elia pe tye kany,’ en koŋ miyo ladit me rok meno nyo me ker meno kwoŋo kwoŋ ma nyuto ni pe gunoni kunnu.
Ruth 4:11 Ci in dok iwacci, ‘Wot icit bot rwodi icititte ni Elia tye kany.’
Ruth 4:12 Ki i ŋeya ma noŋo doŋ acito woko, Cwiny pa Rwot bitiŋi woko ci teri ka ma pe aŋeyo. Pienno, ka acito atito bot Akab, ka ce pe ginoŋo komi, en bi neka woko, kadi bed abedo ka woro Rwot cakke ka tinona.
Ruth 4:13 Peya gititti ce, rwoda, kit gin ma abedo ka tiyone i kare ma Jejebel tye ka neko lunebi pa Rwot? Yam akano lunebi pa Rwot miya acel kulu i boro, kun apoko kingi pyerabic pyerabic, ci abedo ka miyogi kwon ki pii-gu.
Ruth 4:14 Ka in dok iwacci, ‘Wot itit bot rwodi ni Elia tye kany,’ man miyo en neka woko.”
Ruth 4:15 Elia ogamo ni, “Macalo Rwot me mony tye makwo-ni, ma an acuŋ i, nyime, abinyuto koma bo te tin i nyime.”
Ruth 4:16 Obadia ocito ka rwatte ki Akab, otitte, ci Akab ocito ka rwatte ki Elia.
Ruth 4:17 Ka Akab oneno kom Elia, owaco bote ni, “Man en in kikomi, in ma layel Icrael- li?”
Ruth 4:18 Elia ogamo ni, “An pe ayelo Icrael; in aye it ye ka yelone, in ki jo me doggola pa woru, pien ibwoto lubo cik pa Rwot woko, icako lubo kor Baal-gu.
Ruth 4:19 Kombeddi icwal kwena wek icok jo Icrael ducu i nyima i wi got Karmel. Cok ki lunebi pa jok Baal bene mi ya aŋwen ki pyerabic-ci, ki lunebi pa Acera ma jok ma dako-ni ma gitye ka cam i wi meja pa Jejebel.” Elia opyem ki lunebi pa Baal i wi got Karmel
Ruth 4:599 
Ruth 4:20 Akab ocwalo kwena bot jo Icrael ducu, ci ocoko lunebi pa Baal ducu i wi got Karmel.
Ruth 4:21 Elia ociro cok bot lwak ci owaco bot dano ni, “Wun mono wubicabbe atara i cwinywu nio kwede wa awene? Ka ce Rwot aye Lubaŋa, ci wulub en keken; ento ka Baal, ci wutugi lubo en cur.” Emo lwak pe gudokke iye lok mo.
Ruth 4:22 Elia dok owaco bot lwak ni, “An kena aye pud adoŋ ki i kom lunebi pa Rwot, kun lunebi pa Baal gitye miya aŋwen kulu ki pyerabic.
Ruth 4:23 Wek gikel twoni aryo botwa kany, Wek lunebi pa Baal guyer twon acel obed megi, gunek ci guŋid woko, gucan riŋone i wi yen i wi keno tyer, ento pe gumok iye mac mo, Ki an bene abiyubo twon acel, abicano riŋone i wi yen, pe amoko iye mac mo.
Ruth 4:24 Wun wubed ka lwoŋo nyiŋ; lubaŋawu, ki an bene abilwoŋo nyiŋ Rwot; ci lubaŋa ma bidok iye ki cwalo mac, en aye Lubaŋa ada.” Lwak ducu gugamo ni, “Iloko mamit.”
Ruth 4:25 Elia dok owaco bot lunebi pa Baal ni, “Wun wuyer twonwu acel wek wucak yubone; wun aye wukwoŋ, pien wupol, ento pe wumok iye mac mo.”
Ruth 4:26 Lunebi pa Baal gukwanyo twon ma gimiyogi-ni, guyubo, gulwoŋo iye nyiŋ Baal, cakke odiko nio kwede wa i cwiny dyeceŋ, kun giwacci, “Ai Baal, dokkiwa iye do ya!” Ento dwan mo pe ma winnye, ki ŋatti mo ma dokkigi iye bene peke, Gubedo ka myel ma girumo kwede keno tyer ma gucano-ni.
Ruth 4:27 Elia ocako cayogi i dyeceŋ kun wacci, “Wudaŋŋe matek, pien en aye lubaŋa. Gwok nyo pud iye tye ka Lwodo lok, nyo pud ocito woko, nyo tye i wotte ka mo, nyo pud onino, ci myero koŋ wucoye woko ki i waŋ ninone.”
Ruth 4:28 Ka dok gudaŋŋe matek, kun giŋolo komgi kekengi ki pala lucwan ki atero-gu macalo kitgi tye kwede; guŋolle nio ka remo komgi ocako cwer kun mol i komgi.
Ruth 4:29 Gubedo ka daŋŋe matek ka cwiny dyeceŋ okato kun gidaŋŋe adaŋa, nio wa i cawa me tyero gityer me otyeno, ento piny oliŋ litik; ŋat ma dok iye botgi peke, ki ŋat ma paro pigi bene peke.
Ruth 4:30 Lacen Elia owaco bot lwak ducu ni, “Wubin doŋ bota cok kany,” ci lwak ducu gucito bote cok, En ocako yubo keno tyer pa Rwot ma yam gimuko gireto woko piny-nyi.
Ruth 4:31 Okwanyo godi apar wiye aryo muporo wel kaka pa awobe pa Yakobo ima yam lok pa Rwot obino bote kun wacci, “Nyiŋi bibedo Icrael.”
Ruth 4:32 Ocano keno tyer ki godi meno pi nyiŋ Rwot. Okwinyo bur orumo ŋet keno tyer, ma ditte romo awal kodi aryo.
Ruth 4:600 
Ruth 4:33 Ka otyeko caŋo yen kikore, ci oŋido riŋo twon, ocano i wi yen. Owacci, “Doŋ wutwom pii ma romo abino aŋwen, ka wuony piine i wi gitum awaŋa, ki i kom yen-gu.”
Ruth 4:34 Ka dok owacci, “Dok wumed onyo iye pii”; ci gunwoyo onyo pii tyen me aryone, Dok owacci, “Wumed tyen me adekke”; ci gumedo tyen me adekke.
Ruth 4:35 Pii obedo ka mol kun rumo keno tyer, opoŋ i bur woko ducu.
Ruth 4:36 Ka cawa me tyero gityer me otyeno doŋ oromo, lanebi Elia onyiko cok i kom keno tyer, owacci, “Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Abraim, pa kaka ki pa Icrael, wek tin doŋ oŋene atir ni in aye Lubaŋa i Icrael, dok ni an abedo laticci, ci atiyo man ducu pi lok ma iwaco bota.
Ruth 4:37 Dokka iye, ai Rwot, dokka iye, wek lwak man oŋe atir ni, in Rwot aye in Lubaŋa keni, dok ni ityeko dwoko cwinygi i komi.”
Ruth 4:38 Ci mac oa ki bot Rwot opoto piny, owaŋo gitum awaŋa woko ducu liweŋ, ki yen- gu, ki godi-gu, ki apwa, ka dok onaŋo pii woko ma onoŋo opoŋo bur-ri.
Ruth 4:39 Ka lwak ducu guneno, gupoto woko piny aryeba cwiny, kun giwacci, “Rwot aye Lubaŋa; Rwot aye Lubaŋa.”
Ruth 4:40 Elia owaco bot lwak ni, “Wumak lunebi pa Baal ducu, pe wuwek mo obwoti.” Gimakogi woko ducu, ci Elia oterogi piny i laora kulu Kicon, onekogi woko kunnu. Elia olego pi kot
Ruth 4:41 Elia owaco bot Akab ni, “Cit doŋ ka cam ki ka mat, pien dwan kot ma mito cwer doŋ mor winnye.”
Ruth 4:42 Akab ocito woko ka cam ki ka mat, Elia ocito malo i wi got Karmel, okulo wiye piny i ŋom, orwako wiye i kin coŋe.
Ruth 4:43 Owaco bot laticce ni, “Cit koŋ icinen yo tuŋ nam.” Ka ocito woko oneno, ci owacci, “Gin mo pud peke.” Elia dok owacce ni, “Cit doki tyen abiro.”
Ruth 4:44 I kom tyen me abirone laticce owacci, “Aneno latin pol mo otiŋŋe ki i nam, tidi rom ki cin dano keken.” Elia dok owacci, “Cit bot Akab, iciwacce ni, ‘Yub gadigadini idok gaŋ wek kot pe ogeŋi wot.’ “
Ruth 4:45 Polo ocako cido woko ki pol oyotoyot twatwal, kun yamo kodo, ci kot ocako cwer madwoŋ. Akab oito wi gadigadine odok i Jejreel.
Ruth 4:46 Ento Rwot onoŋo odiyo Elia ki ciŋe, omiyo otweyo pyere oriŋo kwede i nyim Akab nio kwede wa i dog gaŋ me Jejreel.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 19 Elia oriŋo woko i Koreb
Ruth 4:601 
Ruth 4:1 Akab otito bot dakerre Jejebel gin ducu ma Elia otiyo, ki kit ma oneko kwede lunebi pa jok Baal ducu ki pala lucwan.
Ruth 4:2 Jejebel ocwalo lakwena bot Elia kun wacce ni, “Ka pe di ki ka onyoo atyeko kwoni woko, kit ma ityeko kwede kwo pa lunebina woko-ni, ci lubaŋana myero guket can i koma kit meno ki makato bene.”
Ruth 4:3 Lworo omako Elia, omiyo oriŋo woko olaro kwone, ocito i Beer-ceba ma i lobo Juda, oweko laticce kunnu.
Ruth 4:4 Ento en aye ocito kene i tim, kun owoto wot me nino acel kulu, Ocito obedo i te yat laywe mo, olego Rwot ni, “Doŋ otum, ai Rwot, tin doŋ ikwany kwona woko; pien an pe aber akato kwarina ducu.”
Ruth 4:5 Obuto woko piny otugi nino woko i te yat laywe meno, Ci nen, lamalaika ogudo kome, owaco bote in, “Elia, a malo wek icam.”
Ruth 4:6 Ka oa oneno piny, oneno capat ma gitedo i kom got malyet, ki pii i abino tye ka wiye. Ocako camone ka dok omato pii, ka dok obuto piny.
Ruth 4:7 Lamalaika pa Rwot dok odwogo bote tyen me aryone; ogudo kome kun dok owacce ni, “Elia, a malo wek icam, ka dok imat pii, pien wotti pud dit mada.”
Ruth 4:8 Elia oa malo, ocamo dok omato pii, ci olimo tek mua i cam meno omiyo omedde ki wot ci oo kwede wa i Koreb ma got pa Lubaŋa-ni. Owoto pi nino pyeraŋwen dyeceŋ ki dyewor.
Ruth 4:9 Ka oo kunnu, odonyo i boro mo, obedo iye. Lok pa Rwot obino bote kun waco bote nii “Itimo gin aŋo kany, Elia?”
Ruth 4:10 Ogamo ni, “Nyeko obedo ka maka mada pi Rwot, ma Lubaŋa me mony; pien jo Icrael gubwoto gicikkeni woko, dok gumuko keno tyerri woko ducu, guneko lunebini woko ki pala Lucwan-gu, An aye doŋ adoŋ kena, dok bene gimito neka woko.”
Ruth 4:11 Dok Rwot owaco bote ni, “Wot icit anyim, icuŋ i wi got i nyim Rwot.” Ci nen, Rwot oka to ka ŋete kun yamo madwoŋ mager tye ka baro godi, dok ŋido lela matitino i nyim Rwot; ento Rwot onoŋo pe i yamo-nu. Ki i ŋe yamo oyeŋyeŋ obino, ento onoŋo Rwot pe tye i oyeŋyeŋ meno.
Ruth 4:12 Ki i ŋe oyeŋyeŋ mac obino, ento Rwot pe tye i mac. Ki i ŋe mac dwan matidi mo obino.
Ruth 4:13 Ka Elia owinyo, oumo waŋe ki boŋone, ci ocito kwede ocuŋ i dog boro. Nen, dwan obino bote ma waco bote ni, “Itimo gin aŋo kany, Elia?”
Ruth 4:14 Elia ogamo ni, “Nyeko aye obedo ka maka mada pi Rwot, Lubaŋa me mony; pien jo Icrael gubwoto gicikkeni woko, dok gumuko keno tyerri woko ducu, guneko lunebini ki pala lucwan-gu, ci an aye doŋ adoŋ kena, dok bene gimito neka woko.”
Ruth 4:602 
Ruth 4:15 Rwot owacce ni, “Wot idok cen kun ilubo yo ma cito i tim Damaciko. Ka io kunnu, ibiwiro Kajael wek obed kabaka me Ciria.
Ruth 4:16 Ka dok ibiwiro Yeko wod pa Nimci obed kabaka me Icrael; ka dok Elica wod pa Capat me Abel-mekola ibiwiro me bedo lanebi ma bileyo kakari.
Ruth 4:17 Dano ma bibwot ki pala lucwan pa Kajael, Yeko binekone; dok dano ma bibwot ki pala lucwan pa Yeko, Elica binekone.
Ruth 4:18 Ento abibwoto dano alip abiro i Icrael, jo ducu ma peya gurumo coŋgi i nyim jok Baal, ma doggi bene pe gunoto lem cal Baal pi nyuto woro bote.” Lwoŋo Elica
Ruth 4:19 Elia oa woko ki kunnu, ocito onoŋo Elica wod pa Capat. Elica tye ka pur kun tye ki kweri dyaŋ apar wiye aryo ma guryeyo i nyime, ma twoni pur giywayogi aryo aryo; en kikome aye tye ki me apar wiye aryone. Elia okato ki ka ŋete, obolo boŋone i kome.
Ruth 4:20 Elica otugi weko twonine woko, ocako ŋwec i kor Elia kun wacci, “Wek koŋ acicik wora ki maa, ka doŋ adwogo alubo kori.” Elia ogamo ni, “Dok giri cen do, an kono atimo kit gin aŋo i komi?”
Ruth 4:21 Elica oweko lubo kor Elia, odok cen, ogonyo twonine aryo onekogi woko, ka otedo riŋogi ki rii ŋutgi ma ka yen, opoko bot dano ma gitye kunnu, ci gucamo. Ka doŋ oa ocito ka lubo kor Elia, ocako konye macalo laticce.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 20 Akab oloyo jo Ciria
Ruth 4:1 Ben-adad ma kabaka pa jo Ciria ocoko monnye ducu, ogu rogi kacel, kun luker pyeradek wiye aryo bene gitye kwede, ki lwak aguragura ki gadigadi lweny-gu, Otero monynye orumo Camaria woko ocako I weny i kome.
Ruth 4:2 Ocwalo lukwena i gaŋ bot Akab kabaka me Icrael ka wacce ni, “Ben-adad owaco kumanni,
Ruth 4:3 ‘Ryalli ki jabuni ducu mera; ki monni ma gibeco-ni ki litinoni bene ducu mera.’ “
Ruth 4:4 Kabaka me Icrael ogamo ni “Ai kabaka, in i rwoda, an a danoni, kacel ki jami ma atye kwedgi ducu.”
Ruth 4:5 Lukwena dok gudok kunnu tyen me aryone, guwacci, “Ben-adad owaco kuman ni, ‘Yam acwalo lok kun awacci imiya ryal ki jabuni, ki monni ki litinoni.
Ruth 4:6 Doŋ di ki i kin cawa man abicwalo luticca boti, gibiyenyo i odi ki i odi pa luticci, ci gibimako gin ducu ma yomo cwinygi, giyako, gitero woko.’ ”
Ruth 4:7 Kabaka me Icrael olwoŋo ludoŋo me lobone ducu, owaco botgi ni, “Koŋ wunen kit ma dano man tye ka yenyo kwede kolo. Ocwalo lok bota ni amiye monna ki litinona, ki ryal ki jabu-gu, ci peya akwerre lok mo.”
Ruth 4:603 
Ruth 4:8 Ludoŋo ducu ki lwak ducu gugamo ni, “Pe itam kom lokke-nu, pe iye bene.”
Ruth 4:9 Mumiyo kabaka owaco bot lukwena pa Ben-adad ni, “Wun wuwac bot rwoda kabaka ni, ‘Gin ma ikwoŋo mitone ki bota abimiyone ducu, ento man aye pe atwero ye.’” Lukwena gudok ka tero lokke.
Ruth 4:10 Ben-adad ocwalo lok owaco bote ni, “Abiloko Camaria doko apwa, ento apwane pe biromo lwak dano ma abibino kwede, wek ŋat acel acel ojob poŋ ciŋe, Ka pe kumeno, lubaŋawa myero guket can i koma kit meno ki makato bene.”
Ruth 4:11 Kabaka me Icrael ogamo ni, “Dano ma pud tye ka tweyo jami lweny i pyere peya wakke ma rom ki dano ma doŋ obelunyo jamine woko.”
Ruth 4:12 Ben-adad owinyo lok man kun tye ka mato konone ki luker ma gitye ka gony i bolo. Owaco bot lwakke ni, “Doŋ wucak ryeyo ki tyeŋ i kabedowu,” ci guryeyo ki tyeŋ i kabedogi pi lweny i kom gaŋ Camaria.
Ruth 4:13 Lanebi mo obino cok bot Akab kabaka me Icrael ci owaco bote ni, “Rwot owaco kuman ni, Ityeko neno lwak man madwoŋ? Tin abimiyogi i ciŋi, miyo ibiŋeyo atir ni an a Rwot.”
Ruth 4:14 Akab ogamo ni. “En bitiyo ki jo mene?” Ogamo ni, “Rwot owaco kuman ni, en bitiyo ki awobe ma gikonyo tulo dul lobo acel acel.” Akab dok omedde ki peny ni, “Aŋa ma bicako lweny?” Lanebi ogamo ni, “In.”
Ruth 4:15 Akab olwoŋo awobe ma gikonyo lulo dul lobo mapatpat; onoŋo giromo miya aryo ki pyeradek wiye aryo. Ka dok oryeyo jo Icrael ducu i ŋegi, ma giromo dano alip abiro.
Ruth 4:16 Lwak gumol gukato woko ki i dyeceŋ, kun Ben-adad tye mere ka mato koŋo ma omer ki kono i bolo bedone, en kacel ki luker pyeradek wiye aryo-nu ma gucokke ka konye-ni.
Ruth 4:17 Lukony pa ludito ma giloyo dullobo ducu gin aye gukwoŋo kato woko. Ben- adad ocwalo lurot-piny ci gudwoko lok ni, “Lwak dano gitye ka mol gikato woko ki i Camaria.”
Ruth 4:18 Kabaka ogamo ni, “Ka ce gubino pi yubo lok me kuc, wumakgi amaka makwo; kadi bed gubino ka lweny bene wumakgi makwo.”
Ruth 4:19 Lukony pa ludito ma giloyo dul lobo gumol woko ducu ki i gaŋ, ci lwak mony gulubo korgi.
Ruth 4:20 Dano acel acel oneko dano mukemo nyime. Jo Ciria gucako riŋo woko, kun jo Icrael giryemo korgi; ento Ben-adad kabaka me Ciria obwot, pien oriŋo woko ki aguragura kacel ki wegi aguragura mogo.
Ruth 4:21 Ci kabaka me Icrael okato woko, omako lwak aguragura ki gadigadi lweny mapol, kun neko jo Ciria ki nek madit twatwal.
Ruth 4:604 
Ruth 4:22 Lanebi dok obino bot kabaka me Icrael ci owaco bote ni, “Ber imed monnyi obed matek, kun itamo maber pi gin ma myero itim, pien jo Ciria dok gibidwogo i dog oro ka cako lweny i komi.” Jo Ciria gudwogo ka lweny ki jo Icrael
Ruth 4:23 Lutic pa kabaka me Ciria guwaco bote ni, “Jo man lubaŋagi lubaŋa me wi godi, omiyo gin yam tek, guloyowa; ento wek dok walweny kwedgi ki i dye bar, ci wan aye wabibedo tekmakatogi.
Ruth 4:24 Wamiyiryeko kit man: Kwany luker ducu woko ki i ka ticgi, wek iket ludito ma loyo mony ma kakagi.
Ruth 4:25 Dok iywa mony mukene ma rom ki mony ma doŋ gityekogi woke-ni, Cok aguragura ki gadigadi lweny ma welgi rom ki gin macon ca, ci wek walweny ki jo Icrael i dye bar, ci wabibedo matek makatogi.” En owinyo doggi, otiyo kit ma guwaconi.
Ruth 4:26 Ben-adad ocoko mony pa jo Ciria i dog oro, ci gutiro i Apek pi lweny ki jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:27 Jo Icrael bene guryeyo monygi, ci gutiŋo mony i kom jo Ciria, ma guyubbe ki camgi bene. Jo Icrael guyubo gonygi i nyim lumerokgi macalo lwak dyegi manok ma gipokogi i dul aryo keken, ento jo Ciria gupoŋo lobo woko.
Ruth 4:28 Dano pa Lubaŋa dok obino cok ci owaco bot kabaka me Icrael ni, “Rwot owaco kuman ni, Pien jo Ciria gubedo ka waco ni, ‘Rwot en Iubana me godi, pe lubaŋa me nota-gu,’ en aye lok mumiyo abimiyo monygi madit-ti i ciŋi, ci ibiŋeyo atir ni an aye a Rwot.”
Ruth 4:29 Mony aryo ducu gugony gukemme ki mony pa lumerokgi pi nino abiro kulu, ci lweny ocakke i nino me abirone. Jo Icrael guneko askari pa jo Ciria ma giwoto ki tyengi ma romo alip miya acel kulu i kom nino meno acel-lu.
Ruth 4:30 Jo mudoŋŋe guriŋo gularo gaŋ Apek, ci cel murumo gaŋ dok opoto i kom jo mapol ma gudoŋŋe ma giromo alip pyeraryo wiye abiro. Ben-adad bene oriŋo kunnu, odonyo i kicika ma i tyelo ot mo ma i gaŋ kunnu.
Ruth 4:31 Luticce guwacce ni, “Nen ba, watyeko winyo ni luker ma i ot ker me Icrael gin lukica. Wek koŋ waruk boŋo cola i pyerwa ki tol-gu ma watweyo i wiwa wacit kwede bote en kabaka me Icrael, ci gwok nyo en pe bineki.”
Ruth 4:32 Gutweyo pyergi ki boŋo cola, ki tol i wigi ducu, gucito kwede bot kabaka me Icrael. Guwaco bote ni, “Laticci Ben-adad owacci, ebako doge boti ber iweke, pe doŋ ineke.” Kabaka ogamo ni, “En pud tye makwo bo? En omera.”
Ruth 4:33 Onoŋo jo-nu gitye ka yenyo Lanyut mo wek guniaŋ kit ma piny tye kwede. Ka guwinyo nyiŋ man, “omera”, ci gugamo oyotoyot ni, “Iyo, omeru Ben-adad.” En dok owacci, “Wucit wukele.” Ben-adad obino bote, ci kabaka Akab otiŋe i gadigadine.
Ruth 4:605 
Ruth 4:34 Ben-adad owacce ni, “Gaŋi ma yam wora oyako ki, bot woru abidwokogi ducu i ciŋi: ka dok in bene itwero bedo ki dukani me cato wil i Damaciko kit ma yam wora obedo kwede i Camaria.” Akab ogamo ni, “Abibwoti icito pi lok ma iciko-ni.” Kit meno oketo gicikke kwede, ci obwote ocito. Lanebi mo ojuko Akab
Ruth 4:35 Laco mo ma i kin lwak pa lunebi owaco bot lawote ni, “Amito igoya malit,” kun Rwot aye onoŋo ocike kumeno. Ento lawote okwero goye.
Ruth 4:36 Ka dok owacce ni, “In pe iworo lok pa Rwot. Pi meno, nen ba, ka ce ibia ki bota kombeddi, labwor mo bineki woko cut.” Ka dano meno oa woko ki bote, ci labwor orwatte kwede, oneke woko cut.
Ruth 4:37 Lanebi dok onoŋo dano mukene, owaco bote ni, “Amito igoya malit,” ci laco meno otugi goye cut, ogoye oketo ret i kome bene.
Ruth 4:38 Lanebi-nu ocito, obedo ka kuro kabaka Akab i ŋet yo, kun oloko kit kome woko pi umo waŋe woko ki kitambara ma otweyo iye.
Ruth 4:39 Ka kabaka obekato, odaŋŋe bote kun wacci, “An laticci acito i mony, ci adonyo wa i dyere ka ma lweny tye malyet. Ci nen, askari mo odwogo ki dano mo ma okelo bota ci ocika ni, ‘Gwokka dano man. Ka ce iweko orwenyo woko pi tyen lok mo, ci in aye ibito ma kakare, nyo ibiculo ki talanta acel me ryal.’
Ruth 4:40 Kit meno, kit ma abedo ka yelle kany ki kuca-ni, ladit, omiyo en ocito gire woko.” Kabaka me Icrael owacce ni, “Gibiŋolo koppi kit meno; in kikomi aye ityeko ŋolone.”
Ruth 4:41 Dano-nu okwanyo kitambara woko oyotoyot ki i waŋe, ci kabaka otugi ŋeyo cut ni en ŋat acel i kin lunebi.
Ruth 4:42 Dano-nu owaco bot kabaka ni, “Rwot owaco kuman ni, Pien in ityeko bwoto dano ma onoŋo an aciko ni myero ginek woko, pienno gibineko in ma kakare, gibineko lwakki bene ma ka lwakke.”
Ruth 4:43 Kabaka me Icrael odok gaŋ, oo i Camaria ki toncwiny ma wane oballe woko.
Ruth 4:1 Luker 21 Akab omayo poto olok pa Nabot
Ruth 4:1 Onoŋo Nabot me Jejreel tye ki poto olokke i Jejreel i ŋet cel pa Akab kabaka me Camaria.
Ruth 4:2 Lacen i ŋe lok mutimme-ni, Akab openyo Nabot ni, “Ber imiya poto olokki obed mera, wek apit iye dekka, pien tye cok ki oda; ci abimiyi poto olok mukene ma kakare, maber makato en-nu, nyo ka ce imito abiculo welle ki lim.”
Ruth 4:3 Ento Nabot ogamo dog Akab ni, “Pe twerre; Rwot pe twero ye ni ami lobo pa kwariwa boti.”
Ruth 4:606 
Ruth 4:4 Akab odok i ode ki kiniga ma waŋe oballe woko pi lok ma Nabot me Jejreel owaco bote-ni; pien onoŋo odok iye bo te ni pe ebimiyo lobo ma eleyo ki bot kwarine. Kabaka ocito obuto piny wi kitandane kun oloko waŋe neno woko, pe ocamo cam mo bene.
Ruth 4:5 Ento ka dakone Jejebel obino bote, openye ni, “Cwinyi ton pi lok aŋo ma ogeŋi wa cam-mi?”
Ruth 4:6 Akab otitte ni, “Pien nane aloko ki Nabot me Jejreel kun apenye ni omiya poto olokke wek awil ki lim, nyo kono ka en mito ci abimiye poto olok mukene ma kakare. Ci en okwero woko, owacci pe ebimiya poto olokke.”
Ruth 4:7 Dakone Jejebel ogamo ni, “Pe in aye i loyo Icrael kombeddi bo? A malo icam, wek cwinyi obed mayom. An aye abimiyi poto olok pa Nabot me Jejreel.”
Ruth 4:8 Ci Jejebel ocoyo waraga ki nyiŋ Akab, omwono kun odiyo agit pa Akab i kom odok; ci ocwalo waraga bot ludoŋo ki ludito mukene ma gibedo bot Nabot i gaŋŋe.
Ruth 4:9 Waragane onoŋo ocoyo kit man ni, “Wucik pi kare me ri kec, ci wucib Nabot obed wi kom me dito i kin lwak.
Ruth 4:10 Ka doŋ wukel lutim aranyi aryo gucuŋ kun gikemo nyime atir, wek gukel kop i kome kun giwacci, ‘In iceno Lubaŋa ki kabaka.’ Ka doŋ wutere woko, wucele ki got wuneke woko.”
Ruth 4:11 Jo ma i gaŋŋe, ludoŋo ki ludito mukene ma gibedo i gaŋŋe, gutimo kit ma Jejebel ocwalo kwede lok botgi.
Ruth 4:12 Guciko kare me ri kec, ka guketo Nabot i wi kom me dito i kin lwak.
Ruth 4:13 Lubwami aryo gubino gucuŋ gukemo nyime. Gukelo kop i kom Nabot ki i nyim lwak ducu kun giwacci, “Nabot oceno Lubaŋa ki kabaka bene.” Ka gutere woko i ŋe gaŋ, gucele ki got guneke woko.
Ruth 4:14 Ka gucwalo kwena bot Jejebel pi titte ni, “Nabot doŋ gityeko celone woko ki got; doŋ oto.”
Ruth 4:15 Ka Jejebel owinyo ni Nabot doŋ gicelo woko ki got gineko woko, owaco not Akab ni, “A malo, icam poto olok pa Nabot me Jejreel, ma yam okwero miyone boti wek iwil ki lim-mi; kombeddi Nabot doŋ pe, doŋ oto.”
Ruth 4:16 Ka Akab owinyo ni Nabot doŋ oto woko, oa malo ocito i poto olok pa Nabot i Jejreel ka camone woko cut.
Ruth 4:17 Lok pa Lubaŋa dok obino bot Elia ma Laticbe ma waco bote ni,
Ruth 4:18 “A malo, icit irwatte ki Akab kabaka me Icrael ma tye i Camaria. Nen, en tye i poto olok pa Nabot.
Ruth 4:607 
Ruth 4:19 Ibiwaco bote ni Rwot owaco kuman ni, ‘Ineko dano woko ka dok icamo wa potone bene?’ Dok ibiwacce ni, ‘I kabedo ka ma gwogi gunaŋo iye remo pa Nabot, en aye in bene gwogi biŋano iye remoni.’ ”
Ruth 4:20 Akab owaco bot Elia ni, “In doŋ inoŋa bo, in lamerokka-ni?” Elia ogamo ni, “An doŋ anoŋi, pien in aye imiyo komi kekeni pi tiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot.
Ruth 4:21 Nen, abikelo can i komi; abiyweyo in woko liweŋ, abineko co woko ducu ma tye boti in Akab, ma i lobo Icrael, opii wa ki anywalli.
Ruth 4:22 Abimiyo odi bedo calo ot pa Jeroboam wod pa Nebat, ma rom bene ki ot pa Baaca wod pa Akija, pi kiniga ma imiyo omaka, dok pien imiyo jo Icrael gubalo.
Ruth 4:23 Dok Rwot owaco lok i kom Jejebel bene kit man ni, ‘Gwogi aye bimwodo kom Jejebel woko i lobo ma i ŋet Jejreel.’
Ruth 4:24 Dano ma wat pa Akab ma oto i gaŋ, gwogi aye bimwodo komgi, ento dano ma gibito i dye tim ata, winyo aye bicamogi.”
Ruth 4:25 Pe tye dano mo ma yam omiyo kome kekene pi tiyo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot macalo Akab, ma dakone Jejebel odiye iye ki tek.
Ruth 4:26 Otimo bal me kipyeda marac twatwal pi lubo kor jogi-gu, macalo jo Amor yam gutimo, ma Rwot oryemogi woko ki i nyim jo Icrael-li.
Ruth 4:27 Ka Akab owinyo lok meno, ci oyeco boŋŋine woko, oruko boŋo cola cut i kome, obedo ka wot ma kome odem woko.
Ruth 4:28 Lok pa Rwot dok obino bot Elia ma Laticbe ma waco bo te ni,
Ruth 4:29 “In mono ineno kit ma Akab obedo kwede ka mwolle i nyima? Pien en doŋ omwolle kene i nyima, pe abikelo can i karene kikome; ento i kare pa wode aye abikelo can i kom jo me ode.”
Ruth 4:1 Luker 22 Lanebi Mikaya ociko Akab i nyiŋ Lubaŋa (2 Tek 18.2-27)
Ruth 4:1 Jo Ciria ki jo Icrael gubedo mot laboŋo lweny mo i kingi pi mwakaadek.
Ruth 4:2 Ento i mwaka me adekke Yekocapat kaba ka me Juda ocito ka limo kabaka me Icrael.
Ruth 4:3 Kabaka me Icrael owaco bot luticce ni, “Wun mono atika pe wuŋeyo ni Ramot- gilead mewa? Wan waliŋ woko ata, ma pe koŋ wacikwanyo woko ki i ciŋ kabaka me Ciria?”
Ruth 4:4 Ka dok olokke openyo Yekocapat ni, “In bene ibicito kwedwa ka lweny i kom gaŋ Ramot-gilead?” Yekocapat ogamo dog Akab, kabaka me Icrael, kun wacce ni, “An ki in wan acel. Lwakka aye lwakki, ki aguragurana gin aguragurani bene.”
Ruth 4:608 
Ruth 4:5 Yekocapat owaco bot kabaka me Icrael ni, “Koŋ ikwoŋ penyo lok ki bot Rwot wek wawiny doge.”
Ruth 4:6 Kabaka Akab ocoko lwak lunebi ducu kacel, ci gucokke miya aŋwen, Owaco botgi ni, “Acit ka lweny i kom Ramot-gilead, nyo pe aciti?” Lunebi gugamo ni, “Tugi cito cut, kabaka, pien Rwot bimiyo i ciŋi.”
Ruth 4:7 Ento Yekocapat dok owaco ni, “Lanebi mo mukene pa Rwot pe kany, wek koŋ dok wapeny doge?”
Ruth 4:8 Kabaka me Icrael ogamo dog Yekocapat ni, “Pud tye dano mo ma omyero wapenye wek wawiny dog Rwot ki bote, en Mikaya wod pa Imla; ento cwinya dage matek, pien peya otitta kit lok mo maber, en titta lok maracce keken.” Yekocapat ogamo ni, “Pe kumeno, kabaka, wek lok kit meno obedi.”
Ruth 4:9 Kabaka me Icrael olwoŋo ladit mo ci owacce ni, “Cit icikel Mikaya wod pa Imla oyotoyot.”
Ruth 4:10 Onoŋo Akab kabaka me Icrael ki Yekocapat kabaka me Juda gubedo wi komkergi ma guruko jor kergi mabeco; gubedo kwede i laro moyo me dino bel ma i ŋet dogcel ma gidonyo kwede i Camaria, kun lunebi ducu gitye ka tito lok i nyimgi.
Ruth 4:11 Jedekia wod pa Kenaana oyubo cal tuŋ lee ki nyonyo ci owacci, “Rwot owaco kuman ni, ibitwomo jo Ciria kit man macalo dyaŋ twomo wadi ki rune, nio ka ityekogi woko ducu.”
Ruth 4:12 Lunebi ducu gutito lok ma kit meno kun giwacci, “Tugi cito i Ramot-gilead, kabaka ci ibiloyo; Rwot bimiyo i ciŋi.”
Ruth 4:13 Lakwena ma ocito ka lwoŋo Mikaya-ni obino owacci, “Nen ba, Mikaya, lok pa lunebi ducu obedo me cuko cwiny kabaka; pienno wek lokki bene obed ma romki megi, lokki bene obed lok me cuko cwiny.”
Ruth 4:14 Mikaya ogamo doge ni, “Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, gin ducu ma Rwot owacca, en aye abilokone.”
Ruth 4:15 Ka Mikaya oo bot kabaka, kabaka openye ni, “Wacit ka lweny i kom Ramot- gilead, nyo pe waciti?” Ogamo ni, “Tugi cito cut, ci ibiloyo; Rwot bimiyo i ciŋi, kabaka.”
Ruth 4:16 Ento kabaka dok owaco ni, “An mono abiciki i nyiŋ Lubaŋa tyen adi ni ilokka lok me ada keken i nyiŋ Rwot?”
Ruth 4:17 Ci Mikaya owacci, “Aneno jo Icrael ducu guket woko lijayi i wi godi, macalo romi ma gipe ki lakwat. Dok Rwot bene owacci, ‘Jo-ni laditgi peke; wek ŋat acel acel odok gire i pacone ki kuc.’ “
Ruth 4:18 Kabaka me Icrael owaco bot Yekocapat ni, “An pe onoŋo awacci ni, Mikaya pe bitito lok mo maber ma otika, ento bitito maracce?”
Ruth 4:609
