Ruth 4:15 Gubedo ka cayo cikke mapol, ki gicikke ma yam oketo ki kwarigi, ki lok ma obedo ka poyo ki wigi. Gubedo ka luko kor cal jogi ma konygi pe, mumiyo gin bene gudoko jo ma konygi pe. Gubedo ka lubo kit pa lurok ma yam orumogi dyere-ni, jo ma yam Rwot ojukogi i komgi, ni pe gutim kit ma gin gitiyo-ni.
Ruth 4:16 Gubwoto cik ma Rwot Lubaŋa ociko woko ducu, gutimo pigi kengi cal litino twoni aryo me jabu ma giliyo aliya; ka dok gucomo yadi me woro jok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera; gucako woro mony ma i polo ducu, kun gitiyo bot Baal bene.
Ruth 4:17 Gubedo ka waŋo awobegi ki anyiragi me gityergi, kun gityeto bene bot lutyet ki luŋi i dyel; gumine kekengi pi tiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot, kun gimiyo kiniga make.
Ruth 4:18 Kiniga omako Rwot matek i kom jo Icrael, ci oryemogi woko ki i nyime; iŋatti mo pe odoŋ, kono kaka pa Juda keken aye odoŋ.
Ruth 4:19 Jo Juda bene yam pe gumako lok ma Rwot Lubaŋagi ociko, ento gubedo ka lubo kit ma jo Icrael gukelo.
Ruth 4:20 Rwot ocako kwero likwayo pa Icrael woko ducu, ci oketogi i atwom mapek, omiyogi i ciŋ luyakgi, nio ka oryemogi woko ki i nyime.
Ruth 4:21 Ka yam Rwot omayo ker me Icrael woko ki bot likwayo pa Daudi, gin guketo Jeroboam wod pa Nebat odoko kabakagi. Jeroboam oryemo jo Icrael woko ki ka lubo kor Rwot, ci omiyo gupoto i bal madito.
Ruth 4:22 Jo Icrael gubedo ka lubo bal ducu ma yam Jeroboam otiyo; pe gubwoto tiyogi,
Ruth 4:23 nio ka Rwot oryemo jo Icrael woko, macalo yam oloko i dog luticce ducu ma lunebi. Kit meno gikwanyo jo Icrael ki i lobogi, giterogi wa i Aciria me bedo opii nio wa onyoo. Gikelo rok mukene me bedo i camaria
Ruth 4:646 
Ruth 4:24 Kabaka me Aciria yam okelo dano ki i Babilon, i Kuta, i Aya, i Kamat ki i Ceparvaim, ci oketogi gubedo i gaŋi me Camaria, guleyo kabedo pa jo Icrael. Gucamo lobo me Camaria odoko megi, gubedo i gagine ducu.
Ruth 4:25 I kare ma gucako bedo i loba-nu, pe gulworo Rwot; omiyo Rwot ocwalo lwak labwor, ma oneko jo mogo i kingi.
Ruth 4:26 Gitito lokke bot kabaka me Aciria ni, “Rok ducu ma iterogi ci iketogi i gagi me Camaria-ni gin pe gigeyo cik pa lubaŋa me lobo-nu, omiyo ocwalo lwak labwor i kingi, ci nen, gitye ka nekogi woko, pien gin pe gigeyo cik pa lubaŋa me lobo-nu.”
Ruth 4:27 Kabaka me Aciria ocako ciko ni, “Wucwal ajwaka mo acel ki i kin jo ma yam wukelogi ki kunnu, wek en ocit obed kunnu, ocipwonygi ki cik pa lubaŋa me lobo-nu.”
Ruth 4:28 Ci ajwaka mo acel ki i kin ajwagi ma yam giterogi kunnu mua ki i Camaria ocako dwogo, obedo i Betel, ci opwonyogi ki kit ma myero gilwor kwede Rwot.
Ruth 4:29 Ento rok acel acel pud obedo ka tiyo cal lubaŋane kene, kun giketogi i waŋ jogi ma i wi godi ma yam Lucamaria gutiyo, kun rok acel acel tye ki megi i gagi ma gibedo iye-ni.
Ruth 4:30 Jo Babilon gutiyo Cal jok Cukot-benot, jo Kut gutiyo cal jok Nergal, jo Kamat gutiyo cal jok Acima;
Ruth 4:31 jo Aya gutiyo cal jok Nibaj ki jok Tartak. Jo Ceparvaim gubedo ka waŋo litinogi ki mac bot Adramelek ki Anamelek ma gin jogi pa jo Ceparvaim.
Ruth 4:32 Gilworo Rwot bene, kun gikwanyo kwa dano ducu ki i kingi me bedo ajwagi me waŋ jogi ma i wi godi, ma gitiyo pigi i nyim waŋ jogi ma i wi godi.
Ruth 4:33 Kit meno gin yam gilworo Rwot kun gitiyo bene bot lubaŋagi kikome, kun gilubo kit pa rok mapatpat ma yam gikwanyogi ki i kingi-ni.
Ruth 4:34 Kadi wa i kare man gin pud gilubo kitgi macon. Gin pe gilworo Rwot, pe gilubo cikke ducu, nyo lok ma en oŋolo, nyo cik ma en oketo, kadi wa cik mo ma yam Rwot ociko ki likwayo pa Yakobo ma ocako nyige ni Icrael-li.
Ruth 4:35 Rwot yam oketo gicikke kwedgi, kun cikogi ni, “Pe wubilworo lubaŋa mukene ducu; pe wuryebbe i nyimgi, pe wuti botgi, pe wutum gitum botgi.
Ruth 4:36 Ento wubilworo Rwot ma yam okwanyowu woko ki i lobo Ejipt ki tek madwoŋ ki ciŋe ma oryeyo; en aye wubiryebbe i nyime, en aye wubitumo gitum bote.
Ruth 4:37 Cik matino ducu ki lok ma Rwot oŋolo, ki cik ma en oketo, ki ginacika ma con ocoyo piwu, wubigwokke ka lubogi kare ducu pe wubilworo lubaŋa mukene ducu.
Ruth 4:38 Pe wiwu biwil i kom gicikke ma doŋ atyeko ketone kwedwu. Pe wubilworo lubaŋa mukene ducu,
Ruth 4:647 
Ruth 4:39 ento wubilworo Rwot Lubaŋawu, en bene aye bilarowu ki i ciŋ lumerokwu ducu.”
Ruth 4:40 Ento yam gukwero woro doge woko, pud gubedo ka lubo kitgi macon ca aye.
Ruth 4:41 Kit meno rok meno ducu gubedo ka lworo Rwot kun giworo bene Cal lubaŋagi ma gipayo; litinogi ki likwayogi bene kit meno gubedo ka fiyo kit ma yam kwarigi gutiyo-ni, pud gitiyo kit meno nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:2 Luker 18 Loc pa Kejekia (2 Tek 29.1-2)
Ruth 4:1 I mwaka me adek me loc pa Kocea wod pa Ela kabaka me Icrael, en aye Kejekia wod pa Akaj kabaka me Juda ocako iye loc.
Ruth 4:2 Ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeraryo wiye abic, ci obedo ka loc pi mwaka pyeraryo wiye aboŋwen ki i Jerucalem. Nyiŋ minne Abi, ma nya pa Jekaria.
Ruth 4:3 Kejekia obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen atir i wag Rwot kun lubo gin ducu ma yam kwarone Daudi otiyo.
Ruth 4:4 Omuko lwak waŋ jogi ma i wi godi, oturo wir jogi-gu ducu, ka otoŋo yadi ma gicomo pi woro jok ma dako ma gilwogo Acera woko, ka dok oŋido twol mola ma yam Moses otiyo-ni, pien nio wa i kare meno onoŋo jo Icrael gubedo ka waŋo odok eceta pi worone. Yam gilwogo ni Nekucitan.
Ruth 4:5 En obedo ka geno Rwot, Lubaŋa me Icrael, mumiyo pe gatti mo onen ma rom ki en ki i kin luker me Juda ducu ma gulubo geye, kadi wa i kin luker ma gukwogo nyime bene.
Ruth 4:6 Omoko i kom Rwot matek; pe obwoto lubo kor Rwot, ento obedo ka lubo cik ducu ma yam Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Ruth 4:7 Rwot bene yam tye kwede; wa ka ma cito iye ducu, en noŋo iye gum. En ocako jemo woko i kom kabaka me Aciria, okwero bedo i te locce.
Ruth 4:8 Olwenyo ki jo Piliciti nto wa i Gaja ki lobo ma i ŋete; oloyogi i kabedogi ducu, cakke ki i kom lubele pa lukur-piny nio kwede wa i gaŋi ma girumo ki cel gogo. Camaria opoto i cio jo Aciria
Ruth 4:9 I mwaka me aŋwen me loc pa Kejekia, ma en aye mwaka me abirone me loc pa Kocea wod pa Ela kabaka me Icrael, Calmanecer kabaka me Aciria obino ka lweny i kom Camaria ci orumo woko ki monnye.
Ruth 4:10 Oloyo ma onoŋo mwaka adek okato. I mwaka me abicel me loc pa Kejekia, ma en aye mwaka me aboŋwenne me loc pa Kocea kabaka me Icrael, en aye giloyo kwede gaŋ Camaria.
Ruth 4:648 
Ruth 4:11 Kabaka me Aciria otero jo Icrael i opii wa i Aciria, ci oketogi i Kala, ki i ŋet Kabor, ma en aye kulu ma i Gojan, ki i gaŋi pa jo Medi,
Ruth 4:12 pien gukwero woro dog Rwot Lubaŋagi, ento gukalo wi gicikkene, kacel ki lok ducu ma yam Moses ma latic pa Rwot ocikogi kwede; pe guwinyo kadi ki woro doge. Cenakerib omonyo lobo Juda (2 Tek 32.1-19; Ic 36.1-22)
Ruth 4:13 I mwaka me apar wiye aŋwen me loc pa kabaka Kejekia en aye Cenakerib kabaka me Aciria obino kwede ka lweny i kom gaŋi ducu me Juda ma girumogi ki cel gogo, ci omayogi ducu.
Ruth 4:14 Kejekia kabaka me Juda ocwalo kwena bot kabaka me Aciria wa i Lakic kun wacci, “An atimo bal; dok cen, wek lweny i koma obedi, gin ducu ma ibiŋolo i wi ya abiculone.” Kabaka me Aciria oŋolo i wi Kejekia kabaka me Juda wel me ryal ma romo talanta miya adek, ki jabu ma romo talanta pyeradek.
Ruth 4:15 Kejekia ocako miye ryal ducu ma onoŋo i ot pa Rwot, ki i ot kano lim ma i ot pa kabaka.
Ruth 4:16 I kare meno Kejekia omuko jabu woko ducu ma yam gimwono i kom kika me ot pa Rwot, ki jabu ma yam en Kejekia kabaka me Juda omwono kwede okar me doggola, ci otino omiyo bot kabaka me Aciria.
Ruth 4:17 Kabaka me Aciria ocwalo ludito wi monnye ma gilwoŋo Tartan, Larabcaric ki Larabcake ki mony madit ma gua ki Lakic gucito Jerucalem. Gucako mol gucito wa i Jerucalem. Ka guo kunnu, gucito gucuŋ i ŋet yo pii ma mol a ki i joro ma malo, i yo gudo ma woto i poto pa Lalwok-boŋo.
Ruth 4:18 Ka gulwoŋo kabaka, ci Eliakim wod pa Ilkia aye obino botgi, ma en aye ladit ma loyo jami ma i ot pa kabaka, kacel ki Cebna ma karan, ki Joa wod pa Acap, laco lok matimme.
Ruth 4:19 Larabcake owaco botgi ni. “Wuwac bot Kejekia ni, ‘Kabaka madit, kabaka me Aciria, owaco kuman ni, In ijeŋo genni i kom gin aŋo?
Ruth 4:20 In itamo ni lok dog noŋo bedo rom ki ryeko me lweny ki mony madit me loyo lweny? In kombeddi ijeŋŋe i kom aŋa, mumiyo ijemo woko i koma-ni?
Ruth 4:21 Nen, kombeddi iloko Ejipt obedo odoo ma ijeŋŋe i kome, kun en lagada ma otur otyer woko, ma bituco cin dano mo ma ojeŋŋe i kome. Meno kit ma Parao kabaka me Ejipt bedo ka timo kwede jo ducu ma gijeŋŋe i kome.
Ruth 4:22 Ento ka wuwacca ni, “Wan wajeŋŋe giwa i kom Rwot ma Lubaŋawa,” pe en aye waŋ jogine ma i wi godi, ki keno tyerre ma Kejekia doŋ omukogi woko, kun waco bot jo Jerucalem ki Juda ni, “Wubiworo Lubaŋa i nyim keno tyer man ma i Jerucalem”?
Ruth 4:649 
Ruth 4:23 Koŋ ijeŋ gin me camme ki laditta kabaka me Aciria! An abimiyi aguragura alip aryo, ka ce in ki tuŋ boti bene itwero noŋo lubed i wigi.
Ruth 4:24 In itwero dwoko ladit me lweny acel mo cen ki i kin lutic pa laditta matinone niŋniŋ ka ce ijeŋŋe i kom Ejipt pi noŋo gadigadi lweny ki wegi aguragura?
Ruth 4:25 Dok bene itamo ni an abino ka lweny i kom kabedo man wek atyek woko, laboŋo twero pa Rwot? Wai Rwot aye ma owacca ni, Cit icilweny i kom lobo man ityek woko yo!’ ”
Ruth 4:26 Cutcut Eliakim wod pa Ilkia, ki Cebna ki Joa guwaco bot Larabcake ni, “Walegi ilok ki wan luticci i leb Aram, pien wawinyo. Pe ibed ka lok kwedwa i leb Juda ma lwak ma gitye i wi cel bene giwinyo.”
Ruth 4:27 Ento Larabcake ogamo doggi ni, “Itamo ni rwoda ocwala ka loko lok magi bot laditwu ki botwu keken bo, pe bot lwak ma gubedo i wi cel-li bene, ma gin kacel ki wun gukemo can me camo cetgi kengi ki mato lacgi kengi?”
Ruth 4:28 Larabcake ocun ocako daŋŋe ki dwan maloŋo i leb Juda ni, “Wuwiny lok pa kabaka madit, kabaka me Aciria!
Ruth 4:29 Kabaka owaco kuman ni, ‘Pe wuwek Kejekia obed ka bwolowu, pien en pe bitwero larowu ki i ciŋa.
Ruth 4:30 Pe wuwek Kejekia omi wujeŋŋe i kom Rwot kun wuwacci, Rwot aye bilarowa, gaŋ man pe gibimiyo i ciŋ kabaka me Aciria.’
Ruth 4:31 Pe wubed ka winyo lok pa Kejekia; pien man aye lok ma kabaka me Aciria owaco, ni meno, ‘Wuyub lok me kuc kweda, ci wukatti woko bota; kit meno ŋat acel acel bicamo nyig olok ma i potone, ŋat acel acel bicamo nyig odurone, ki ŋat acel acel bimato pii ma i taŋine kikome;
Ruth 4:32 nio ka abiterowu wa i lobo ma rom ki mewu-ni, lobo ma ceko kai ki koŋo vino, lobo ma miyowu kwon ma tye iye poto olok-gu, lobo ma moo jeituni ki moo kic dwoŋ iye, wek wubed ma komwu yot, wek pe wubed ka to atoya, Pe wubed ka winyo lok pa Kejekia ma tye ka bwolowu kwede marac kun wacci, Rwot bilarowa.
Ruth 4:33 Tye lubaŋa pa lurok mo ma yam olaro lobone ki i ciŋ kabaka me Aciria?
Ruth 4:34 Lubaŋa pa jo Kamat ki Arpad gitye kwene kaa? Lubaŋa pa jo Ceparvaim, nyo Kena ki iya gitye kwene? Gin gularo Camaria ki i ciŋa bo?
Ruth 4:35 Lubaŋa me lobo mene ki i kin lubaŋa ducu ma gitye ki lobogi, ma yam koŋ olaro lobone ki i ciŋa mono, mumiyo wutamo ni Rwot bilaro Jerucalem ki i ciŋa-ni?’ ”
Ruth 4:36 Ento lwak ducu guliŋ aliŋa, pe gudokke iye lok mo kadi ki acel, pien onoŋo kabaka ociko ni, “Pe wubigamo doge.”
Ruth 4:650 
Ruth 4:37 Eliakim wod pa Ilkia ma en aye ladit ma loyo jami ma i ot pa kabaka, kacel ki Cebna ma karan, ki Joa wod pa Acap ma laco lok matimme guyeco boŋŋigi, gucito kwede wa bot Kejekia gutitte lok ducu ma Rabcake owaco.
Ruth 4:2 Luker 19 Lobo Juda obwot ki i ciŋ Cenakerib (2 Tek 32.20-23; Ic 37.1-38)
Ruth 4:1 Ka Kejekia owinyo, ci oyeco boŋŋine woko, ocako umme ki boŋo cola, ocito kwede wa i ot pa Rwot
Ruth 4:2 Ci ooro Eliakim ma lalo jami ma i ode, kacel ki Cebna ma karan, ki ajwagi pa Lubaŋa ma guteggi ma guumo komgi woko ki boŋo cola, ocwalogi guwoto bot Icaya wod pa Amoj, ma lanebi.
Ruth 4:3 Guwaco bote ni, “Kejekia owaco kuman ni, Tin piny loŋ oloyowa woko, giburowa, lewic omakowa mada. Latin doŋ obino i yo nyodo, ci tek me nywalone aye peke.
Ruth 4:4 Gwok nyo Rwot Lubaŋani doŋ otyeko winyo lok pa Lara bcake ducu, ma laditte kabaka me. Aciria ocwale kwede ka nywaro Lubaŋa makwo-ni, ci bimiyo lokke, ma Rwot Lubaŋani owinyo-ni, bedo me ajuya. Pienno, tin legani malo pi jo ma gubwot, ma gudoŋ-ŋi.”
Ruth 4:5 Kalutic pa kabaka Kejekia guo bot Icaya.
Ruth 4:6 Icaya owaco botgi ni, “Wuwac bot laditwu ni, ‘Rwot owaco kuman ni, pe ibed ki lworo mo pi lok ma iwinyo-ni, ma lutic pa kabaka me Aciria gubedo ka yeta kwede.
Ruth 4:7 Nen, abikete cwiny mo i iye, ci biwinyo lok mo ma oywek, ci dok woko wa i lobo tugi; ci abimiyo gineko en woko ki pala lucwan ki i lobo tugi kunnu.’ ”
Ruth 4:8 Ka Larabcake odok, ci onoŋo kabaka me Aciria tye ka lweny i kom Libna; pien onoŋo owinyo ni kabaka otyeko a woko ki i Lakic.
Ruth 4:9 Ka ce kabaka owinyo lok i kom Tiraka kabaka me Etiopia, ni otiŋo yo me bino ka lwenyi kome, en dok ocwalo lukwena bot Kejekia kun wacci,
Ruth 4:10 “Wubiwaco bot Kejekia kabaka me Juda kit man ni, ‘Pe iwek Lubaŋani ma ijeŋŋe i kome-ni obed ka bwoli, kun ciko ni Jerucalem pe gibimiyo i cin kabaka me Aciria.
Ruth 4:11 Nen, ityeko winyo gin ma yam luker me Aciria gutiyo i kom lobo ducu, ma gutyekogi woko ducu liweŋ, ci in aye gibilari?
Ruth 4:12 Lubaŋa pa lurok yam gularogi, lurok ma yam kwarina gutyekogi woko ducu, ma gin aye jo Gojan, jo Karan, jo Recep ki jo Eden ma yam gitye i Telacar?
Ruth 4:651 
Ruth 4:13 Kabaka me Kamat tye kwene, nyo kabaka me Arpad, kabaka me gaŋ Ceparvaim, kabaka me Kena, nyo kabaka me Iva?’ ”
Ruth 4:14 Kejekia ogamo waraga ki i ciŋ lukwena-nu, ci okwano. Ka oa ocito i ot pa Rwot, ci oyaro waraga woko i nyim Rwot.
Ruth 4:15 Ocako lego i nyim Rwot kun wacci, “Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma ibedo i wi komkerri ka wi lukerubi, in aye Lubaŋa, in keni ma iloyo lwak ker ducu ma i lobo; in aye iketo polo ki lobo.
Ruth 4:16 Cik iti tuŋ botwa, ai Rwot, rwmywa; yab waŋi, ai Rwot, inenwa; koŋ iwiny lok pa Cenakerib ma ocwalo me cayo Lubaŋa makwo-ni.
Ruth 4:17 Adada, ai Rwot, luker me Aciria gujwero rok ducu wa ki lobogi ducu,
Ruth 4:18 dok gutyeko bolo lubaŋagi woko i mac; pien onoŋo gin pe Lubaŋa kikome, gin tic me ciŋ dano, yen ki got-gu, mumiyo gityekogi woko.
Ruth 4:19 Kit meno, ai Rwot, abako doga boti, ilarwa ki i ciŋe, wek ker ma wi lobo ducu Oŋe ni in, ai Rwot, in Lubaŋa in keni.”
Ruth 4:20 Icaya wod pa Amoj odwoko lok bot Kejekia kun waco ni, “Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, owaco kuman ni, Atyeko winyo legani ma ilego i kom Cenakerib kabaka me Aciria.
Ruth 4:21 Man aye lok ma Rwot owaco i kome, ni, “ ‘Jo Cion gicayi calo nyako ma obedo ka cayi kun jeri; jo Jerucalem bene gicayi, calo nyako ma tye ka yeŋo wiye ki i ŋeyi.
Ruth 4:22 “ ‘In icayo aŋa, aŋa mono ma iyetoni? Imoro dwani i kom aŋa, ma itiŋo waŋi ki wakke-ni? I kom ŋat Maleŋ me Icrael kulu!
Ruth 4:23 In aye ma imiyo lukwenani giŋalo Rwot, dok iwaco ni, in iito malo i wi godi kun it ye ki lwak gadigadi lwennyi, nio wa malo i wi got Lebanon. Iwakke bene ni itoŋo yadi cedar maboco ki kunnu woko, ki yadi ciprec mabecone mada-ni; dok iwacci, Adonyo bene i buŋane ka mabor, ka ma yadi oculle iye likiŋ.
Ruth 4:24 Akwinyo waŋ pii, amato pii pa lurok; anyono lobo Ejipt, atwoyo pii ma i jaŋ kulu Nail ducu.
Ruth 4:25 “ ‘In peya iwinyo bo? ni atyeko yubo wa con kuca? Gin ma atye ka timo kombeddi yam ayubo tamma wa i kare macon ca, ni in myero itur gaŋi ma gicelo ki cel gogo, ilokgi odok obur ma odurre lipim,
Ruth 4:26 kun jo ma gibedo iye gidoko goro, cwinygi oballe, lewic omakogi, gudoko macalo ginapita ma i poto, gicalo lum alita macalo lum ma otwi i wi ot, ma bwarre woko ma pud otwi atwiya.
Ruth 4:27 “ ‘Ento aŋeyo bedoni piny, ki citoni woko ki donyoni i ot, ki jennyeni i koma.
Ruth 4:652 
Ruth 4:28 Pien ibedo ka jennye i koma, lok anywarri otyeko donyo i ita, mumiyo abirwako golina i umi, abiketo tolla i dogi abidwoki cen i yo ka ma yam iwok ki iye.’ ”
Ruth 4:29 Lacen Icaya owaco bot kabaka Kejekia ni, “Man aye bibedo gin lanyut boti: i mwaka man ibicamo gin ma otwi kene, i mwaka me aryone ibicamo gin ma dok otwi i okaŋ, ento i mwaka me adekke ibicoyo kodi ci ikayo, ibipito olok ci icamo nyige.
Ruth 4:30 Ki jo ma gubwot ma gudoŋ ki i ot pa Juda gibibedo calo yat ma cwalo lwite piny, dok ma nyako nyige lamalo.
Ruth 4:31 Pien jo ma gudoŋ gibikato woko ki i Jerucalem, lwak jo mubwot gibikato woko ki i wi got Cion. Man bitimme pi nyeko ma Rwot me mony tye kwede piwu.
Ruth 4:32 “Pienno Rwot owaco kuman i kom kabaka me Aciria, ni, En pe bidonyo i gaŋ man, pe bibayo atero mo iye, pe binyiko cok kwede ki kwot, pe bitoro cel lobo me rumone.
Ruth 4:33 Yo ma yam obino kwede-ni, en yo acel-lu en bidok kwede bene, pe dok bidwogo i gaŋ man. Man lok pa Rwot kikome.
Ruth 4:34 An abilwenyo pi gaŋ man me larone, pira kena ki pi laticca Daudi.”
Ruth 4:35 I dyewor meno lamalaika pa Rwot ocito, oneko jo Aciria alip miya acel ki pyeraboro wiye abic ki i gonygi. Ka dano gua malo odiko con, nen, gunoŋo kom jo Aciria muto oradde lirat.
Ruth 4:36 Cenakerib kabaka me Aciria ocako a ocito, odok wa i gaŋŋe, ci obedo i Nineve.
Ruth 4:37 Ka yam en tye ka woro i ot pa lubaŋane Nicirok ci awobene magi, Adramalek ki Carejer, guneke woko ki pala lucwan, ci guriŋo gularo komgi wa i Ararat. Wode Ecarkadon aye oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:2 Luker 20 Two pa Kejekia (2 Tek 32.24-26; Ic 38.1-22)
Ruth 4:1 I kare meno two omako Kejekia ma onoŋo cok to woko. Icaya wod pa Amoj ocito bote, owacce ni, “Rwot owaco kuman ni. ‘Yub odi obed maber, pien ibito woko, pe twoni bicaŋ.’ “
Ruth 4:2 Kejekia ocako loko wane i kom kicika ot kun wacci,
Ruth 4:3 “Ai Rwot abako doga boti, koŋ ipo, inen kit kwo ma abedo kwede i nyimi, kun abedo ŋat ma geni, alubo in ki cwinya ducu, kun abedo ka tiyo gin ma nen maber i waŋi.” Ci Kejekia ocako koko matek twatwal kun cwinye cwer.
Ruth 4:4 I kare ma Icaya peya okato woko ki i dyekal ma i dyere, lok pa Rwot obino bote ni,
Ruth 4:653 
Ruth 4:5 “Dok cen, ici wac bot Kejekia ma laker ma loyo lwakka ni, ‘Rwot, ma Lubaŋa pa woru Daudi owaco kuman ni, Atyeko winyo kokoni, aneno pig waŋi; nen, abicaŋo twoni woko; i kom nino me adekke en aye ibicito kwede wa i ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:6 Dok abimedo mwaka apar wiye abic i kom wel mwaka me kwo meri. Abilaro in ki gaŋ man ki i cin kabaka me Aciria; abilweny pi gaŋ man pira kena ki pi laticca Daudi.’ “
Ruth 4:7 Icaya ocako wacci, “Kella poki oduro ma giŋino, wek giter giket i wan odeke, wek ocaŋ woko.”
Ruth 4:8 Kejekia owaco ki Icaya ni, “Gin aŋo ma binyuto ni Rwot bicano twona, ci abicito wa i ot pa Rwot i nino me adekke?”
Ruth 4:9 Icaya ogamo ni, “Man en aye gin ma nyuto ma oa wa ki bot Rwot, ma nyuto ni Rwot bitiyo gin ma otyeko ciko pire: tipo ocit anyim ma rom ki rwom apar, nyo odok ki ŋeye rwom apar?”
Ruth 4:10 Kejekia odok iye ni, “Bedo yot ka tipo woto medde anyim rwom apar; pe kumeno gire, ber odok ki ŋeye rwom apar.”
Ruth 4:11 Lanebi Icaya okok bot Rwot, ci Rwot odwoko tipo cen rwom apar ka ma nene oryene omedde i kom gin me poro cen pa Akaj. Kejekia ojolo lukwena ma gua ki i Babilon (2 Tek 32.27-31; Ic 39.1-8)
Ruth 4:12 I kare meno Merodak-baladan wod pa Baladan kabaka me Babilon, ocwalo lukwena ma gukelo waraga kacel ki mot bot Kejekia; pien onoŋo owinyo ni Kejekia kome lit.
Ruth 4:13 Kejekia ojologi maber, ci onyuto botgi ot Limme ducu, ki ryal ki jabu ki aŋwece, moo me wel, ki jami lwennye. Kejekia onyuto gin ducu ma onoŋo tye i ot kano jamine; gin mo pe odoŋ ma pe onyutogi, ma i ode nyo ma i te kerre ducu.
Ruth 4:14 Lacen lanebi Icaya obino bot kabaka Kejekia, openye ni, “Jo meno guwacci lok aŋo? Dok gua ki kwene?” Kejekia ogamo ni, “Gua ki i lobo mabor, gua wa i Babilon.”
Ruth 4:15 Ci owacci, “Guneno gin aŋo ki i odi?” Kejekia ogamo ni, “Gutyeko neno jami ducu ma tye i oda; gin mo pe odon ki i ot kano jamina ma pe anyuto botgi.”
Ruth 4:16 Icaya dok owaco bot Kejekia ni, “Doŋ iwiny lok pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:17 Nen ba, kare doŋ romo ma jami ducu ma i odi, ki ma yam kwarini gukano nio wa onyoo gibiterogi woko wa i Babilon; gin mo pe bidoŋ, man Rwot ma owaco.
Ruth 4:18 Ki awobeni mogo bene, ma in inywalo, gibiterogi woko; gibikolo mangi woko, ci gibidoko lutic i gaŋ kal pa kabaka me Babilon.”
Ruth 4:654 
Ruth 4:19 Kejekia owaco bot Icaya ni, “Lok pa Rwot ma iwaco-ni ber mere.” Pien obedo ka tamo ni, “Racce tye kwene, tekke ka wabedo ki kuc ma lobo okwe mot i kare ma pud akwo?” To pa Kejekia (2 Tek 32.32-33)
Ruth 4:20 Lok kom Kejekia mudoŋŋe ducu, kt tekke ducu, ki kit ma yam okwinyo kwede joro ki yo pii ma kelo pii wa i dye Jerucalem gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Juda.
Ruth 4:21 Kejekia oto, oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci wode Manace aye oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:2 Luker 21 Loc pa Manace (2 Tek 33.1-20)
Ruth 4:1 Manace ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte romo apar wiye aryo, ci obedo ka loc ki i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyerabic wiye abic. Nyiŋ minne Kepjiba.
Ruth 4:2 Manace obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot, kun lubo kwede tim me kwer pa rok ducu ma Rwot yam oryemogi woko ki i nyim jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:3 En dok oroco waŋ jogi ma i wi godi, ogero odoco ka ma yam wonne Kejekia ojwerogi woko-ni. Ogero keno tyer pa Baal, ka dok ocomo yat pi woro jok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera, kit ma yam Akab kabaka me Icrael otiyo-ni, ocako woro mony ma i polo ducu, kun tiyo botgi.
Ruth 4:4 Dok ocano lwak keno tyer i ot pa Rwot, ka ma yam Rwot owacci, “Abiketo nyina bedo i Jerucalem.”
Ruth 4:5 Ka dok ocano lwak keno tyer pa mony ma i polo ducu i dyekal aryo me ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:6 Ocako wano wode ki mac me gityer, obedo ka tyet ki ajaa ki ŋiyo i dyel-gu, kun tiyo ki lukor tipo-gu ki megi jogi. Obedo ka tiyo kit tim mapol ma nen marac i wan Rwot, kun miyo kiniga mako Rwot.
Ruth 4:7 Ka dok omiyo gipayo cal Acera ma jok ma dako-ni, ocibo i ot ma yam Rwot owaco i kome bot Daudi ki wode Solomon ni, “I ot man, ki i Jerucalem, ma yam ayero ki i kin kaka ma i Icrael ducu, abiketo nyiŋa bedo iye matwal.
Ruth 4:8 Pe doŋ abimiyo tyen jo Icrael bedo ka wirre woko i ŋe lobo ma yam amiyo bot kwarigi-ni, tekke gibigwokke gilubo kit lok ducu ma atyeko cikogi kwede, kun gilubo cik ducu ma yam laticca Moses ocikogi kwede.”
Ruth 4:9 Ento pe yam guwinyo, dok Manace obitogi omiyo gubedo ka timo gin marac, makato lurok ma Rwot yam ojwerogi woko ki i nyim jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:10 Rwot ocako lok ki i dog lunebi ma luticce kun waco ni,
Ruth 4:655 
Ruth 4:11 “Pien Manace kabaka me Juda obedo ka timo tim magi me kwer, kun timo tim maraco makato ma yam jo Amor ma gukwono nyime gubedo ka tiyone, dok omiyo jo Juda bene gubalo pi woro lwak cal lubaŋane;
Ruth 4:12 pienno Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael owaco kuman ni, Nen, abikelo gin marac i kom Jerucalem ki i kom Juda ma bimwoco it ŋat acel acel ma biwinyo rwone.
Ruth 4:13 Dok abiryeyo tol i kom Jerucalem ma rom ki tol ma yam apimo kwede Camaria, abiporo ki birigi ma yam aporo kwede ot pa Akab; dok abijwayo Jerucalem kit ma dano jwayo ki caani-ni, kun jwayo kome ka dok ryebo iye umo woko piny.
Ruth 4:14 Abibolo jona mudoŋ-ŋi woko ma gin aye lwakka, ci amiyogi woko i i ciŋ lumerokgi. Gibidoko ginayaka ma lumerokgi giyako,
Ruth 4:15 pien gubedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i waŋa, kun gimiyo kiniga bedo ka maka nia wa i kare ma kwarigi oa kwede i Ejipt nio kwede wa onyoo.”
Ruth 4:16 Ento Manace obedo ka oyo remo pa jo mapol ma pe gitye ki bal mo, nio ka oromo i Jerucalem woko tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi, ka dok gimedo iye bal ma omiyo jo Juda gubalo, mumi yo gin bene gubedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac waŋ Rwot.
Ruth 4:17 Lok kom Manace mudoŋŋe ducu, ki gin ducu ma yam otiyo, ki bal ma otiyo, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Juda.
Ruth 4:18 Manace oto, oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyiko i poto ma i ŋet ode, i poto pa Uja; wode Amon aye oleyo ka tyene. Loc pa Amon (2 Tek 33.2-25)
Ruth 4:19 Amon ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeraryo wiye aryo, ci obedo ka loc ki i Jerucalem pi mwaka aryo. Nyiŋ minne Meculemet ma nya pa Karuj, dano me Jotba.
Ruth 4:20 Amon obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot, kit macalo wonne Manace obedo ka tiyo.
Ruth 4:21 Obedo ka lubo kit pa wonne ducu, kun tiyo bot cal lubaŋa-gu ma yam wonne otiyo botgi, kun worogi bene.
Ruth 4:22 En obwoto Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarine woko, pe obedo ka lubo kit pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:23 Lutic pa Amon gupiro lok i kome, ci guneko en woko i ode.
Ruth 4:24 Ento lwak ma i lobo guneko jo ducu ma gupiro lok i kom kabaka Amon ci gin lwak me lobo-nu guketo wode Yocia me bedo kabaka ma kakare.
Ruth 4:25 Lok kom Amon mudoŋŋe ducu ki gin ma yam otiyo ducu gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Juda.
Ruth 4:26 Giyike i lyel ma i poto pa Uja; wode Yocia oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:656 
Ruth 4:2 Luker 22 Loc pa Yocia (2 Tek 34.1-2)
Ruth 4:1 Yocia ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte aboro, ci obedo ka loc ki i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyeradek wiye acel. Nyiŋ minne Yedida, ma nya pa Adaya me Bojkat.
Ruth 4:2 Yocia obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen atir i waŋ Rwot; obedo ka lubo kit pa kwarone Daudi ducu, pe obedo ka cabbe yo tuŋ acuc nyo yo tuŋ acam. Ginoŋo buk me cik i ot pa Rwot (2 Tek 34.8-28)
Ruth 4:3 I mwaka me apar wiye aboro me loc pa kabaka Yocia, en ocwalo Capan wod pa Ajalia, wod pa Meculam ma karan, wa i ot pa Rwot, kun wacci,
Ruth 4:4 “Cit wa bot Ilkia, ajwaka madit, en okwan wei lim ma gikelo i ot pa Rwot, ma lukur-doggola gugamo ki bot lwak,
Ruth 4:5 wek gimi i ciŋ lutic ma giloyo dog tic me ot pa Rwot. Ci gin gumi i ciŋ lutic ma gitye kunnu ka tic i kom ot pa Rwot, pi yubo ka ma oballe,
Ruth 4:6 gin aye lupac ki lugedo, ki lugedo ki godi wek guti kwede me wilo bao bene, ki godi ma gimuko pi yu bo ot ka ma oballe.
Ruth 4:7 Ento pe gupeny lok kom lim mo ma gimiyo i ciŋgi, pien gin gitiyo kwede ki gen.”
Ruth 4:8 Ilkia, ajwaka madit, owaco bot Capan ma karan ni, “Atyeko noŋo buk me cik i ot pa Rwot.” Ilkia omiyo buk bot Capan, ci okwano.
Ruth 4:9 Capan ma karan ocito kwede bot kabaka, ci odwoko lok bot kaba ka ni, “Ladit, watyeko kwanyo lim ma ginoŋo i ot pa Rwot, ci wamiyo i cin lutic ma giloyo dog tic me ot pa Rwot.”
Ruth 4:10 Capan ma karan dok otito ki kabaka ni, “Ilkia ajwaka madit otyeko miya buk mo.” Ka Capan ocako kwanone i nyim kabaka.
Ruth 4:11 Ka kabaka owinyo lok ma i buk me cik, ci oyeco boŋŋine woko.
Ruth 4:12 Kabaka ocako ciko Ilkia, ajwaka madit, ki Akikam wod pa Capan, ki Akbor wod pa Mikaya, ki Capan ma karan, ki Acaya ma latic pa kabaka kun waco ni,
Ruth 4:13 “Wucit ka penyo dog Rwot pira, ki pi lwak, ki pi ker me Juda ducu, pi lok ma i buk man ma gityeko noŋone-ni. Akemo pa Rwot kara doŋ olyetto i komwa matek, pien kwariwa pe gubedo ka woro lok ducu ma i buk man, pi tic kwede i kit ducu ma yam gicoyo kwede ma mako komwa.”
Ruth 4:14 Ilkia, ajwaka madit, ki Akikam, ki Akbor, ki Capan ki Acaya gucito bot Kulda ma lanebi ma dako, ma cware Calum wod pa Tikva, ma wod pa Karkac ma lagwok boŋŋi pa kabaka, ci guloko kwede. Dako-nu onoŋo bedo i Jerucalem, i dul gaŋ ma gilwoŋo Dul gaŋ me Aryone.
Ruth 4:657 
Ruth 4:15 En owaco botgi ni, “Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, owaco kuman ni, ‘Wutit bot dano ma ocwalowu bota ni.
Ruth 4:16 Rwot owaco kuman ni, Nen ba, abikelo gin marac poto i kom kabedo man, ki i kom jo ma gibedo iye, pi cobo lok ducu ma gicoyo i buk ma kabaka me Juda okwano;
Ruth 4:17 pien gutyeko bwota woko kun giwaŋo odok eceta bot lwak lubaŋa mukene, wek gimi kiniga obed ka maka pi jogi ducu ma gitiyo ki ciŋgi-ni. Pienno akemona bilyetto matek i kom kabedo man, ma pe doŋ bikwe.
Ruth 4:18 Ento lok ma dok i kom kabaka me Juda ma ocwalowu ka penyo dog Rwot, wun wubiwacce kit man ni, Rwot Lubaŋa me Icrael owaco kit man ni, i kom lok ma iwinyoni,
Ruth 4:19 doŋ ityeko ŋut ki i cwinyi, ci imwolle keni i nyim Rwot i kare ma iwinyo kit lok ma yam aloko i kom kabedo man, ki i kom jo ma gibedo iye, ni bidoko obur, miyo gibitic ki nyiŋe macalo lok lacen dano, ci icako yeco boŋŋini woko kun ikok kwede i nyima; pienno an bene atyeko winyo kokoni, man lok pa Rwot kikome.
Ruth 4:20 Nen ba, an abidwoki i kin kwarini, ci gibiyiki i lyelli ki kuc, dok waŋi pe bineno gin marac ducu ma abikelo i kom kabedo man.’ ” Ci gin gudwoko lok bot kabaka.
Ruth 4:2 Luker 23 Yocia ojwero ka woro jok-gu woko (2 Tek 34.3-7,29-33)
Ruth 4:1 Kabaka ocwalo kwena, ci ludoŋo me Juda ducu ki me Jerucalem gucokke bote.
Ruth 4:2 Kabaka ocito malo wa i ot pa Rwot, kacel ki jo Juda ducu, ki jo ducu ma gibedo i Jerucalem, ki ajwagi, ki lunebi, ki lwak ducu, jo matino ki jo madito. Ci ocako kwano lok ducu ma i buk me gicikke ma ginoŋo i ot pa Rwot, kun gin ducu giwinyo.
Ruth 4:3 Lacen kabaka ocun i ŋet wir ci oketo gicikke, omoko i nyim Rwot ni, ebilubo kor Rwot, kun emako lok ma Rwot ociko ducu, ki lok me caden, ki cik matinone ducu. Ocikke ni ebimako ki cwinye ducu ki tipone ducu, kun ecobo kwede lok me gicikke meno, ma yam gicoyo i buk meno. Ci lwak ducu guribbe ka moko gicikke.
Ruth 4:4 Kabaka ociko Ilkia, ajwaka madit, ki ajwagi ma i dul me aryo, ki lukurdoggola ni gukel jami ducu ma tye i ot pa Rwot ma yam gitiyogi pi Baal, ki pi jok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera, ki pi mony ma i polo ducu, Gucako waŋogi woko i ŋe Jerucalem, i potti ma i ora kulu Kidron, gutero burugi wa i Betel.
Ruth 4:5 Orido wi ajwagi me waŋ jogi ma yam luker me Juda guketogi me waŋo odok eceta i waŋ jogi ma i wi godi ma i ŋet gaŋi madito ma i Juda, ki ma gurumo Jerucalem, kacel ki jo ma giwaŋo odok eceta bot jok Baal, ki bot ceŋ ki dwe, ki lakalatwe ki mony ducu ma i polo.
Ruth 4:658 
Ruth 4:6 Ka dok okwanyo cal Acera ma jok ma dako-ni woko ki i ot pa Rwot, otero woko wa i ŋe Jerucalem, i kulu Kidron, ci owaŋo woko i ora me Kidron, oluro matitino twatwal, ci oonyo ka ma giyiko iye dano ata.
Ruth 4:7 Omuko odi pa lutim kwele ma luwor jogi, ma onoŋo gukubbe i kom ot pa Rwot, ka ma yam mon gicweyo iye boŋo pi Acera.
Ruth 4:8 Ka dok okwanyo lwak ajwagi woko ki i gaŋi madito ma i Juda, ka obalo lwak waŋ jogi ma i wi godi ka ma yam ajwagi gubedo ka waŋo iye odok eceta; obalo cakke wa i Geba nio kwede wa i Beer-ceba. Omuko bene waŋ jogi pa jogi ma calo nyogi oyima, ma yam gitye i dog gaŋ ma gidonyo kwede i gaŋ pa Yocwa ma laloyo me gaŋ Jerucalem, yo tuŋ acam ka idonyo i dogcel.
Ruth 4:9 Ajwagi ducu ma i waŋ jogi ma i wi godi yam pe gibino i nyim keno tyer pa Rwot i Jerucalem, ento gubedo ka camo mugati ma tobi pe iye ki i kin utmegigi.
Ruth 4:10 Kabaka dok obalo Topet, ma onoŋo tye i nota pa wod pa Kinom, wek dano mo pe dok owaŋ iye wode nyo nyare ki mac me gityer bot jok Molek.
Ruth 4:11 Ka dok omuko lwak cal aguragura ma yam luker me Juda gudyero bot cen, ka ma gidonyo kwede i ot pa Rwot, i ŋet kicika pa Natan-melek, dano ma gikolo ma tiyo i ot pa kabaka, ma i dyekal me ot pa Rwot; ka owaŋo gadigadi pa cen ki mac.
Ruth 4:12 Lwak keno tyer ma yam obedo i wi kicika ma malo me ot pa Akaj, ma yam luker me Juda gutiyo, kacel ki Reno tyer ma yam Manace ocano i dyekal aryo ducu me ot pa Rwot, magi ducu omuko oreto woko piny, oŋido woko matitino, oonyo lurugi i nota me kulu Kidron.
Ruth 4:13 Kabaka dok obalo waŋ jogi ma i wi godi ma yam gitye i ŋet Jerucalem yo tun wokceŋ, yo tuŋ acuc me got me bal, ma en aye got Jeituni, ma yam Solomon kabaka me Icrael ogero pi Acitoret ma jok kipyeda pa jo Cidon, ki pi Kemoc ma jok kipyeda pa jo Moab, ki pi Milkom ma jok kipyeda pa jo Ammon.
Ruth 4:14 Ka dok oturo wir jogi ducu oŋido woko, ka otoŋo yadi ma gicomo pi woro Acera ma jok ma dako-ni, ka opoŋo kabedogi ki cogo kom dano. Yocia omuko keno tyer wa i lobo Icrael bene
Ruth 4:15 Keno tyer ma i Betel bene, ki wan jok ma yam Jeroboam wod pa Nebat ocano, ma yam omiyo jo Icrael gupoto i bal-li, keno tyer meno bene en omuko oreto woko piny, kacel ki waŋ jokke; godi ma gicano kwede en oŋido woko matino, ci orego woko odoko luru; ka dok owaŋo cal jok Acera bene.
Ruth 4:16 Ka Yocia oloko waŋe malo, oneno lwak Lyel i wi got; ci ocwalo dano okwanyo lwak cogo ma giyiko i lyel kunnu, ocako waŋogi i wi keno tyer, obalo kenone woko, ocobo ki lok pa Rwot ma yam dano pa Lubaŋa otito kun nyuto kwede gin ma bitimme anyim.
Ruth 4:659 
Ruth 4:17 Dok openyo ni, “Got ma gitiyo me po ma ocuŋ loka ca-ni pa aŋa?” Jo me gaŋ meno gutitte ni, “Meno Lyel pa dano pa Lubaŋa ma yam oa ki i Juda, ma okwoŋo tito lok magi ducu ma doŋ ityeko cobogi i kom keno tyer ma i Betel-li.”
Ruth 4:18 Ci ogamo ni, “Wek obedi; pe dano mo okwany cogone.” Ci guweko cogone, pe gugudo, kacel ki cogo pa lanebi ma yam oa ki i Camaria-ni.
Ruth 4:19 Wa ki odi jogi ducu ma i waŋ jogi ma i wi godi ma i gaŋi ducu ma i Camaria, ma yam luker me Icrael gugero, kun gimiyo kiniga mako Rwot, Yocia omukogi woko; otiyo i komgi kit ma yam otimo i Betel ducu.
Ruth 4:20 Dok oneko ajwagi ducu ma i wan jogi ma i wi godi, onekogi i wi keno tyergi, ka owaŋo cogo kom dano i komgi; ka odok woko i Jerucalem. Gikwero Nino madit me Kato (Paska) (2 Tek 35.1-19)
Ruth 4:21 Kabaka dok ociko lwak ducu ni, “Wukwer nino madit me Kato pa Rwot Lubaŋawu, kit ma yam gicoyo i buk man me gicikke.”
Ruth 4:22 Pe tye nino mo madit me Kato (Paska) ma gikwero kit man i Icrael, cakke ki i kare pa luŋolkop ma yam giŋolo kop ki jo Icrael, kadi wa i kare pa luker me Icrael nyo wa i kare pa luker me Juda;
Ruth 4:23 ento i mwaka me apar wiye aboro me loc pa Yocia en aye gikwero iye nino madit me Kato pa Rwot i Jerucalem. Alokaloka mukene ma Yocia okelo
Ruth 4:24 Ka dok medo i kom ennu, Yocia dok otyeko jwero lukor tipo woko, ki megi jogi- gu, kacel ki cal jogi matinone ma dano gubedo kwede i pacogi, ki cal jogi-gu mukene, ki gin me kipyeda ducu ma gunen i lobo Juda ki i Jerucalem, wek emok lok me cik ducu ma yam gicoyo i buk ma ajwaka Ilkia nene onoŋo i ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:25 Pe tye kabaka mo ma rom kwede ki i kin luker ducu ma gutelo nyime, ma yam koŋ olokke bot Rwot ki cwinye ducu ki tipo kome ducu, ki tekke ducu kun lubo cik pa Moses ducu; dok pe tye dano mo ma olubo ŋeye ma obedo ma rom kwede.
Ruth 4:26 Kadi bed ku meno, cwiny Rwot ma opoŋ ki akemo mager-ri peya owarre woko, kit ma yam kinigane olyetti kwede matek i kom Juda pi kit ŋeto-ic ma yam kabaka Manace obedo ka ŋeto ki iye-ni.
Ruth 4:27 Rwot ocako waco ni, “Abikwanyo Juda bene woko ki i nyima, kit macalo atyeko kwanyo Icrael woko ki i nyima-ni, dok abibayo gaŋ man ma ayero-ni woko, en aye Jerucalem, kacel ki ot ma yam aloko i kome ni, Nyiŋa bibedo kunnu.” To pa Yocia (2 Tek 35.20–36.1)
Ruth 4:28 Lok kom Yocia mudoŋŋe ducu, ki gin ma yam otiyo ducu, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Juda.
Ruth 4:660 
Ruth 4:29 I karene en aye Parao Neko kabaka me Ejipt ocito kwede bot kabaka me Aciria wa i dog kulu Euprate. Kabaka Yocia owoto ka rwatte kwede; ci Parao Neko, ka onene, otugi neke woko cut i Megido.
Ruth 4:30 Luticce gutiŋo kome ki gadigadi nia wa i Megido, gutero Jerucalem, ci guyiko i lyelle kikome. Lwak ma wegi lobo gukwanyo Yekoakaj wod pa Yocia guwiro ki moo, ci guketo en me bedo kabaka, oleyo ka tyen wonne. Loc pa Yekoakaj ki tone (2 Tek 36.2-4)
Ruth 4:31 Yekoakaj ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeraryo wiye adek, ci obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi dwe adek. Nyiŋ minne Kamutal, nya pa Jeremia me Libna.
Ruth 4:32 En obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot, kun lubo kit ducu ma yam kwarine gutiyo.
Ruth 4:33 Parao Neko otweyo en woko ki nyor ki i Ribla i lobo Kamat, wek pe obed ka loc i Jerucalem oketo wel ajog i kom lobo Juda ma romo talanta me ryal miya acel ki talanta me jabu acel.
Ruth 4:34 Parao Neko oketo Eliakim wod pa Yocia obedo kabaka me leyo ka tyen wonne Yocia ocako loko nyiŋe Yekoyakim, Ento otero Yekoakaj wa i Ejipt, ci oto woko ki kunnu.
Ruth 4:35 Yekoyakim yam omiyo ryal ki jabu meno bot Parao, ento koŋ ojogo ajog i lobone pi noŋo wellim ma Parao ociko. En ojogo ryal ki jabu ki bot wegi lobo, kun gamo ki bot dano acel acel muporo wel ma giŋolo i kome me amiya bot Parao Neko. Loc pa Yekoyakim (2 Tek 36.5-8)
Ruth 4:36 Yekoyakim ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeraryo wiye abic, ci obedo ka loc ki i Jerucalem pi mwaka apar wiye acel. Nyiŋ minne Jebida, nya pa Pedaya me Ruma.
Ruth 4:37 Obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot kun lubo gin ducu ma yam kwarine gutiyo.
Ruth 4:2 Luker 24
Ruth 4:1 I kare pa Yekoyakim en aye Nebukadnejar, kabaka me Babilon, obino kwede, ci Yekoyakim odoko laticce pi mwaka adek; lacen olokke ojemo woko i kome.
Ruth 4:2 Rwot ocwalo buca mony pa jo Kaldaya i kome, ki buca mony pa jo Ciria ki buca mony pa jo Moab, ki buca mony pa jo Ammon; ocwalogi ka lweny i kom jo Juda pi jwerogi woko ducu, kit ma yam Rwot oloko ki i dog luticce ma lunebi.
Ruth 4:3 Meno ducu opoto i kom jo Juda pi cik pa Rwot, wek okwanygi woko ki i nyime, pi bal pa Manace, ki pi gin ducu ma yam otiyo.
Ruth 4:661 
Ruth 4:4 Ka dok pi remo pa io ma pe ki bal ma en ooyo noŋo; pien opoŋo Jerucalem ki remo pa jo ma pe ki bal, ma Rwot pe twero timo iye kica.
Ruth 4:5 Lok kom Yekoyakim mudoŋŋe ducu, ki gin ma yam otiyo, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro pa Luker me Juda.
Ruth 4:6 Yekoyakim oto, oywe, kacel ki kwarine ci wode Yekoyakm aye oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:7 Kabaka me Ejipt pe dok onwoyo a ki i lobone, pien onoŋo kabaka me Babilon otyeko mayo lobo woko ki i cin kabaka me Ejipt, cakke ki i nota ora me Ejipt mo kwede wa i kulu Euprate ducu. Yekoyakin ki rwodi ducu gitero i Babilon i opii (2 Tek 36.9-10)
Ruth 4:8 Yekoyakin ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte apar wiye aboro, ci obedo ka loc ki i Jerucalem pi dwe adek. Nyiŋ minne Nekocita, nya pa Elnatan me Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:9 Obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot, kun lubo gin ducu ma yam wonne otiyo.
Ruth 4:10 I kare meno en aye lutic pa Nebukadnejar, kabaka me Babilon, obino kwede i Jerucalem, ci monnye orumo gaŋ woko.
Ruth 4:11 Kabaka Nebukadnejar ocito i Jerucalem I kare ma luticce gurumo woko-ni.
Ruth 4:12 Ci Yekoyakin kabaka me Juda oye mine kekene i ciŋ kabaka me Babilon, en kikome, ki minne ki luticce, ki rwodine, ki ludito ma i kalle. Kabaka me Babilon otweyo en macalo lamabuc i mwaka me locce me aborone.
Ruth 4:13 Otero bene jami ducu ma gikano i ot lim ma i ot pa Rwot, ki jami ma gikano i ot lim pa kabaka, ka otoŋo jami me jabu ma i ot, pa Rwot oŋidogi woko ducu, gin jarm ma yam Solomon kabaka me Icrael otiyo, kit ma yam Rwot oloko.
Ruth 4:14 Otero jo me Jerucalem ducu i opii, rwodi ducu, tworu oteka lweny ducu. Jo ma giyakogi guromo alip apar, kacel ki ludiro tic mapatpat ducu ki lutet nyonyo. Pe dano acel mo odoŋ, kono jo ma lucan atika aye gudoŋ i lobo.
Ruth 4:15 Ka doŋ otero Yekoyakin woko i opii wa i Babilon; min kabaka ki mon pa kabaka, luditone ki rwodi ma giloyo lwak ma i lobo-nu, oterogi i rok me bedo opii nia ki i Jerucalem nio wa i Babilon.
Ruth 4:16 Kabaka me Babilon otero lwak opii ma gin ducu oteka lweny ma giromo alip abiro, ludiro tic mapatpat ki lutet ma giromo alip acel, gin ducu jo matego ma giromo mony.
Ruth 4:17 Kabaka me Babilon dok oketo Matania ma omin won Yekoyakin obedo kabaka ma oleyo ka tyene, ci oloko nyiŋe odoko Jedekia. Loc pa Jedekia (2 Tek 36.11-16; Jer 52.1-3a)
Ruth 4:662 
Ruth 4:18 Jedekia ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeraryo wiye acel, ci obedo ka loc ki i Jerucalem pi mwaka apar wiye acel. Nyiŋ minne Kamutal, nya pa Jeremia me Libna.
Ruth 4:19 En obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot, kun Lubo gin ducu ma yam Yekoyakm otiyo.
Ruth 4:20 Pi kiniga ma omako Rwot, ka kare oromo, omiyo Rwot obayo Jerucalem ki Juda woko ki i nyime.
Ruth 4:2 Luker 25 Jerucalem opoto i ciŋ jo Babilon (Jer 39.1-7;52.3b-11)
Ruth 4:1 Lacen Jedekia ocako jemo woko i kom kabaka me Babilon. I mwaka me aboŋwen me locce, i dwe me apar, i nino dwe apar, en aye Nebukadnejar kabaka me Babilon obino kwede ki monnye ducu i kom Jerucalem, ci orumo gaŋ woko, ka dok gutoro cel lobo orumo woko dyere.
Ruth 4:2 Gaŋ girumo kit meno nio wa i mwaka me apar wiye acel me loc pa kabaka Jedekia.
Ruth 4:3 I kom nino dwe aboŋwen me dwe me aŋwen onoŋo kec odoko marac i Jerucalem, ma omiyo cam pe dok nen pi lwak.
Ruth 4:4 Ka gumuko cel me gaŋ woko, ci kabaka ki lwak lulweny ducu gumol gurmo woko ki i dyewor, kun giwok ki i dog gaŋ ma i kin cel aryo me Jerucalem, ma i ŋet poto pa kabaka, kadi onoŋo jo Kaldaya gurumo gaŋ woko. Gucito gulubo yo ma dok tuŋ Araba.
Ruth 4:5 Ento mony pa jo kaldaya guryemo kor kabaka, ci gumake wa i bar me Jeriko; ci monnye guket woko ducu ki i kome.
Ruth 4:6 Ka gumako kabaka, ci gukelo en bot kabaka me Babilon i Ribla, ka ma oŋolle iye kop.
Ruth 4:7 Ka gucako neko awobe pa Jedekia woko ki i nyime ma wane neno, ka gikolo wane giloyo woko, ka gitweye ki nyor, gitere kwede wa i Babilon. Gitero jo Juda i opii (2 Tek 36.17-21; Jer 39.8-10;52.12-30)
Ruth 4:8 I dwe me abic, i kom nino dwe me abirone, ma en aye mwaka me aboŋwenne me loc pa kabaka Nebukadnejar kabaka me Babilon, en aye Nebujaradan ma ladit pa lugwok kabaka, ma latic pa kabaka me Babilon, obino i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:9 Ocako wano ot pa Rwot woko, ki ot pa kabaka, ki odi ducu ma tye i Jerucalem; owaŋo odi madito woko ducu ki mac.
Ruth 4:10 Ki mony pa jo Kaldaya ducu, ma yam gitye kacel ki ladit pa lugwok kabaka, gumuko kicika cel murumo Jerucalem woko.
Ruth 4:663 
Ruth 4:11 Ki lwak ma yam gudoŋ i gaŋ, ki jo ma yam gukobo gigi kengi bot kabaka me Babilon, kacel ki lwak ma gudoŋŋe ducu, Nebujaradan ma ladit pa lugwok kabaka oterogi woko i opii.
Ruth 4:12 Ento owe ko lucan mogo gudoŋ i lobo wek gubed lugwok poto olok ki lupur ki kweri dyaŋ.
Ruth 4:13 Ki wir mola aryo ma yam gitye i ot pa Rwot, ki litino gadigadi ki nam me mola ma yam gitye i ot pa Rwot, jo Kaldaya guturo, guŋido woko ka gutero molane wa i Babilon.
Ruth 4:14 Gutero lwak agulu ducu, ki akwaya latokke-gu, ki magac-gu ki atabo me odok eceta, ki jami mola ducu ma yam gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Rwot,
Ruth 4:15 ki weer me waŋo mac bene, ki becen-gu. Gin ma yam gitiyo ki jabu, ladit pa lugwok kabaka otero macalo jabu, gin ma yam gitiyo ki ryal, otero macalo ryal.
Ruth 4:16 Lok ma dok i kom wir aryo-ni, ki nam acel, ki litino gadigadi ducu, ma yam Solomon otiyo pi ot pa Rwot, pek me mola ma oa ki i kom jami magi ducu dwoŋ, pe pimme.
Ruth 4:17 Bor pa wir acel romo futi pyeraryo wiye abiro. I wiye yam giketo iye lalukana me mola, kun lalukana borre romo futi aŋwen ki nucu. I kom lalukana onoŋo giketo iye obwo ki cal nyig okwer pomegranat, ma gin ducu gitiyogi ki mola, ma girumo lalukana dyere. Wir me aryo bene rom ki lawote, kun tye ki obwone me mola.
Ruth 4:18 Ladit pa lugwok kabaka otero Ceraya bene ma ajwaka madit, ki Jepania, ajwaka me aryone, ki lukurdoggola me ot pa Rwot gin adek.
Ruth 4:19 Ka dok okwanyo ladit ma loyo lumony ki i dye gaŋ, ki lumemba abic me lukiko pa kabaka ma onoŋogi i dye gaŋ; ki karan pa ladit me mony ma yam coko jo me lobo pi lweny, ki jo pyerabic i kin wegi lobo ma ginoŋogi i dye gaŋ.
Ruth 4:20 Nebujaradan ladit pa lugwok kabaka omakogi, oterogi wa i Ribla bot kabaka me Babilon.
Ruth 4:21 Kabaka me Babilon ocako nekogi woko ducu; onekogi i Ribla ma i lobo Kamat. Jo Juda yam gikwanyogi woko ki i lobogi giterogi i opii kit meno. Jo mudoŋ gulwi woko i Ejipt (Jer 40.7-9;41.1-3)
Ruth 4:22 Nebukadnejar kabaka me Babilon oketo Gedalia wod pa Akikam ma wod pa Capan me loyo jo mudoŋ i lobo Juda, ma yam owekogi gubwot.
Ruth 4:23 Ka ludito me mony ducu ma i kin gaŋi guwinyo ni kabaka me Babilon otyeko keto Gedalia me bedo laloyo, ci gubino ki lwakgi bot Gedalia wa i Mijpa. Nyiŋgi ene: Icmael wod pa Netania, Yokanan wod pa Karea, Ceraya wod pa Tankumet ma jo Netopa, ki Jajania wod pa jo Maaka.
Ruth 4:664 
Ruth 4:24 Gedalia ocako kwoŋo kwoŋ botgi ki bot lwakgi ducu kun wacci, “Pe wulwor ludito tic pa jo Kaldaya. Wubed i lobo, wuti bot kabaka me Babilon, ci wubibedo maber laboŋo ayela mo.”
Ruth 4:25 Ento i dwe me abiro, Icmael wod pa Netania, wod pa Elicama, ma tye i kaka pa luker, obino kacel ki jo apar, ci gulwenyo ki Gedalia, guneko woko, kacel ki Lujudaya ki jo Kaldaya ma gitye kwede i Mijpa.
Ruth 4:26 Lacen lwak ducu, jo matino ki jo madito, ki ludito me mony gua gucito wa i Ejipt, pien gulworo jo Kaldaya. Giketo deyo bot Yekoyakin ki i Babilon (Jer 52.31-34)
Ruth 4:27 I kare me mwaka pyeradek wiye abirone nia ma gitero kwede Yekoyakin kabaka me Juda i opii, i dwe me apar wiye aryo, i kom nino dwe pyeraryo wiye abiro, en aye Evil-merodak, kabaka me Babilon, otimo kica ki Yekoyakin kabaka me Juda, ogonye woko ki i mabuc, i mwaka ma en ocamo iye ker.
Ruth 4:28 Obedo ka lok kwede mot maber, oketo en obedo i kom madit makato ducu ma i kin kom pa luker ma onoŋo gibedo kwede i Babilon.
Ruth 4:29 Kit meno omiyo Yekoyakin olunyo boŋo mabuc mere woko, obedo ka cam i wi meja pa kabaka jwijwi, pi kare me kwone ducu.
Ruth 4:30 Pi miye gin me konye kwede, kabaka dok obedo ka miye lim me tic kwede jwijwi, nino ducu me kwo mere.
Ruth 4:665 
Ruth 4:1 Tekwaro
Ruth 4:1 Tekwaro 1 Likwayo pa Adam (Acak 5.1-32)
Ruth 4:1 Adam onywalo Ceji, Ceji onywalo Enoci, Enoci onywalo Kenan;
Ruth 4:2 Kenan onywalo Maalalel, Maalalel onywalo Jared;
Ruth 4:3 Jared onywalo Enoka, Enoka onywalo Metucela, Metucela onywalo Lamek;
Ruth 4:4 Lamek onywalo Nua, Nua onywalo Cem, Kam ki Yafeci. Likwayo pa litino pa Nua (Acak 10.1-32)
Ruth 4:5 Litino awobe pa Yafeci aye Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Mecek ki Tirac,
Ruth 4:6 Litino awobe pa Gomer aye Acikenaj, Dipat ki Togarma,
Ruth 4:7 Litino awobe pa Javan gin Elica, Tarcic, Kitim ki Rodanim.
Ruth 4:8 Litino awobe pa Kam gin aye Kuc, Ejipt, Put ki Kanaan,
Ruth 4:9 Litino awobe pa Kuc aye Seba, Kavila, Cabta, Raama ki Cabteka, Litino awo be pa Raama gin aye Ceba ki Dedan.
Ruth 4:10 Kuc onywalo mere Nimulodi; en aye okwoŋo bedo oteka i wi lobo.
Ruth 4:11 Likwayo pa Ejipt gin aye jo Lud, jo Anam, jo Leab, jo Naptuk,
Ruth 4:12 jo Patruc, jo Kacluk ki jo Kaptor, ma gin aye kaka ma jo Piliciti gua ki i komgi.
Ruth 4:13 Kanaan onywalo Cidon, latin kayone, ki Ket ma likwaye gilwoŋo ni jo Kit.
Ruth 4:14 Likwayo mu kene pa Kanaan gin aye jo Jebuc, jo Amor, jo Girgac,
Ruth 4:15 jo Kiv, jo Arki, jo Cin,
Ruth 4:16 jo Arvad, jo Jemar ki jo Kamat.
Ruth 4:17 Litino awo be pa Cem gin aye Elam, Acur, Arpakcad, Lud, Aram, Uj, Kul, Geter ki Mecek.
Ruth 4:18 Arpakcad onywalo Cela, Cela onywalo Eber.
Ruth 4:19 Eber onywalo litino awobe aryo; acel nyiŋe Peleg, pien i karene aye gipoko iye lobo, ki nyiŋ ominne onoŋo Yokotan.
Ruth 4:20 Yokotan onywalo Almodad, Celep, Kajarmavet, Jera,
Ruth 4:21 Adoram, Ujal, Dikla,
Ruth 4:22 Obal, Abimael, Ceba,
Ruth 4:666 
Ruth 4:23 Opir, Kavila ki Jobab; magi ducu gin litino awobe pa Yokotan. Likwayo pa Cem (Acak 11.10-26)
Ruth 4:24 Cem onywalo Arkpacad, Arpakcad onywalo Cela, Cela onywalo Eber;
Ruth 4:25 Eber onywalo Peleg, Peleg onywalo Reu, Reu onywalo Cerug;
Ruth 4:26 Cerug onywalo Nakor, Nakor onywalo Tera;
Ruth 4:27 Tera onywalo Abram, meno aye Abraim. Likwayo pa Icmael ki pa Ketula (Acak 25.12-16)
Ruth 4:28 Litino awobe pa Abraim gin aye Icaka ki Icmael.
Ruth 4:29 Litino pa Icmael gin ene: Nebayof ma latin kayone, ki Kedar, Adbeel, Mibcam,
Ruth 4:30 Micima, Duma, Maca, Adad, Tema,
Ruth 4:31 Jetur, Napic ki Kedema. Jo magi ducu aye litino awobe pa Icmael.
Ruth 4:32 Litino awobe pa Ketula ma obedo dako pa Abraim ma aŋeca gin ene: en onywalo Jimran, Yokocan, Medan, Midian, Icibak ki Cua, Litino awobe pa Yokocan gin aye Ceba ki Dedan.
Ruth 4:33 Litino awobe pa Midian gin aye Epa, Eper, Kanok, Abida ki Eldaa, Magi ducu aye likwayo pa Ketula. Likwayo pa Ecau (Acak 36.1-43)
Ruth 4:34 Abraim onywalo Icaka, Litino awobe pa Icaka gin aye Ecau ki Icrael.
Ruth 4:35 Litino awobe pa Ecau aye Erifaji, Reuel, Jeuc, Jalam ki Kora.
Ruth 4:36 Litino awobe pa Erifaji aye Teman, Omar, Jepi, Gatam, Kenaj, Timna ki Amalek.
Ruth 4:37 Litino awobe pa Reuel gin Nakat, Jera, Ca ma ki Mija.
Ruth 4:38 Litino awobe pa Ceir aye Lotan, Cobal, Jibeon, Aŋa, Dicon, Ejer ki Dican.
Ruth 4:39 Litino awobe pa Lotan aye Kori ki Komam; lamiŋ Lotan aye Timna.
Ruth 4:40 Litino awobe pa Co bal gin aye Alian, Manakat, Ebal, Cepi ki Onam, Litino awobe pa Jibeon aye Aiya ki Aŋa.
Ruth 4:41 Latin awobi pa Aŋa aye Dicon, Litino awobe pa Dicon aye Kamram, Eciban, Itran ki Keran.
Ruth 4:42 Litino awobe pa Ejer aye Bilan, Jaavan ki Jaakan, Litino awobe pa Dican aye Uj ki Aran.
Ruth 4:43 Magi aye luker ma guloyo lobo Edom ma onoŋo pud peya kabaka mo oloyo jo Icrael: Bela wod pa Beor ma nyiŋ gaŋ kalle Dinkaba.
Ruth 4:667 
Ruth 4:44 Ka Bela oto, ci Jobab wod pa Jera me Bojra oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:45 Ka Jobab oto, ci Kucam mua ki i lobo pa jo Teman oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:46 Ka Kucam oto, ci Adad wod pa Bedad oleyo ka tyene. En aye yam olwenyo ki jo Midian, ci oloyogi i lobo Moab; nyiŋ gaŋ kalle aye Avit.
Ruth 4:47 Ka Adad oto, ci Camla me Macireka oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:48 Ka Camla oto, Caul me Rekobot ma tye i dog kulu Euprate oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:49 Ka Caul oto, ci Baal-kanan wod pa Akbor oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:50 Ka Baal-kanan oto, ci Adad oleyo ka tyene; nyiŋ gaŋ kalle Pai. Nyiŋ dakone Meketabel nya pa Matred, ma nya pa Mejakab.
Ruth 4:51 Ci Adad oto woko. Rwodi ma i Edom gin ene: Timna, Alia, Jetet,
Ruth 4:52 Okolibama, Ela, Pinon,
Ruth 4:53 Kenaj, Teman, Mibjar,
Ruth 4:54 Magdiel ki Iram; magi aye rwodi ma i Edom.
Ruth 4:1 Tekwaro 2 Litino awobe pa Icrael (Acak 35.22-26)
Ruth 4:1 Magi aye litino awobe pa Icrael: Reuben, Cimeon, Levi, Juda, Icakar, Jabulon,
Ruth 4:2 Dan, Yucepu, Benjamin, Naputali, Gad ki Acer. Likwayo pa Juda
Ruth 4:3 Litino awobe pa Juda gin aye Er, Onan ki Cela. Jomagi adek-ki Bat-Cua ma nya jo Kanaan aye onywalogi. Er ma en aye latin kayo pa Juda obedo dano marac i wan Rwot, omiyo Rwot oneke woko.
Ruth 4:4 Juda dok onywalo Perej ki Jera ki Tamar ma ci-wode; litino awobe pa Juda gin ducu abic.
Ruth 4:5 Litino awobe pa Perej gin aye Kejeron ki Kamul.
Ruth 4:6 Litino awobe pa Jera aye Jimri, Etan, Eman, Kalkol ki Dara, gin ducu abic.
Ruth 4:7 Latin awobi pa Karmi en aye Akar, layel Icrael, ma yam obalo i kom jami ma gidyero bot Rwot.
Ruth 4:8 Wod pa Etan obedo Ajaria.
Ruth 4:9 Litino awobe pa Kejeron ma en onywalo gin aye Jeramel, Ram ki Kelubai.
Ruth 4:10 Ram onywalo Aminadab, Aminadab onywalo Calma,
Ruth 4:11 Calma onywalo Boaj,
Ruth 4:668 
Ruth 4:12 Boaj onywalo Obed, Obed onywalo Yece,
Ruth 4:13 Yece onywalo Eliab ma latin kayone, me aryone Abinadab, me adekke Cimea,
Ruth 4:14 me 385 aŋwenne Netanel, me abicce Radai,
Ruth 4:15 me abicelle Ojem, me abirone Daudi.
Ruth 4:16 Lumegigi gin aye Jeruya ki Abigail. Litmo awobe pa Jeruya gin Abicai, Joab ki Acael, gin adek.
Ruth 4:17 Abigail onywalo Amaca; won Amaca obedo Jeter ma jo Icmael.
Ruth 4:18 Kaleb wod pa Kejeron onywalo Jeriot ki dakone Ajuba. Litino awobe pa Ajuba gin aye Jecer, Cobab ki Ardon.
Ruth 4:19 Ka Ajuba oto, Kaleb onyomo Eprat ma onywalo Kur.
Ruth 4:20 Kur onywalo Uri, Uri onywalo Bejalel.
Ruth 4:21 Lacen Kejeron obedo ki nya pa Makir ma won Gilead. Onyomo ma onoŋo mwaka me ditte romo pyerabicel; dako meno onywalo Cegub.
Ruth 4:22 Cegub onywalo Jair ma yam obedo ki gaŋine pyeraryo wiye adek i lobo Gilead.
Ruth 4:23 Ento jo Gecur ki jo Aram gumayo gaŋi pa Jair ki bot wegine, kacel ki Kenat ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, gaŋi ducu pyerabicel. Jo magi ducu gin likwayo pa Makir ma won Gilead.
Ruth 4:24 Ka Kejeron doŋ oto, ci Kaleb obedo ki Eprata ma ci-wonne dako pa Kejeron, ci onywalo kwede Acikur ma ocako gaŋ Tekoa.
Ruth 4:25 Litino awobe pa Jeramel ma latin pa Kejeron gin aye Ram ma latin kayone, ki Buŋa, Oren, Ojem ki Akija.
Ruth 4:26 Jeramel onoŋo tye ki dakone mukene bene ma nyiŋe Atara; en aye min Onam.
Ruth 4:27 Litino awobe pa Ram ma latin kayo pa Jeramel gin aye Naaj, Jamin ki Eker.
Ruth 4:28 Litino awobe pa Onam gin aye Camai ki Jada. Litino awobe pa Camai aye Nadab ki Abicur.
Ruth 4:29 Nyiŋ dako pa Abicur obedo Abikail; en aye onywalo Aban ki Molid.
Ruth 4:30 Litino awobe pa Nadab gin aye Celed ki Apaim. Celed oto ma pe ki latin mo.
Ruth 4:31 Latin awobi pa Apaim aye Ici. Latin awobi pa Ici aye Cecan. Latin awobi pa Cecan en aye Aklai.
Ruth 4:32 Litino awobe pa Jada ma omin Camai gin aye Jeter ki Yonacan; Jeter oto ma pe ki latin mo.
Ruth 4:33 Litino awobe pa Yonacan gin aye Pelet ki Jaja. Jo magi ducu gin likwayo pa Jeramel.
Ruth 4:669 
Ruth 4:34 Cecan yam pe ki litino awobe; onywalo anyira keken. Ento Cecan onoŋo tye ki opiine ma Laejipt ma nyiŋe Jara.
Ruth 4:35 Cecan omiyo nyare mo bot opiine Jara, ci onywalo kwede Atai.
Ruth 4:36 Atai onywalo Natan, Natan onywalo Jabad.
Ruth 4:37 Jabad onywalo Eplal, Eplal onywalo Obed,
Ruth 4:38 Obed onywalo Yeko, Yeko onywalo Ajaria.
Ruth 4:39 Ajaria onywalo Kelej, ki Kelej onywalo Eleaca,
Ruth 4:40 Eleaca onywalo Cicimai, ki Cicimai onywalo Calum.
Ruth 4:41 Calum onywalo Jekamia, Jekamia onywalo Elicama.
Ruth 4:42 Litino awobe pa Kaleb ma omm Jeramel gin ene: Meca ma latin kayone obedo won Jip. Latin awobi pa Jip aye Mareca ma won Kebron.
Ruth 4:43 Litino awobe pa Kebron aye Kora, Tapua, Rekem ki Cema.
Ruth 4:44 Cema onywalo Rakam ma won Jorkeam, Rekem onywalo Camai.
Ruth 4:45 Latin awobi pa Camai en aye Maon; Maon onywalo Beŋur.
Ruth 4:46 Kaleb obedo ki dako ma aŋeca bene ma nyiŋe Epa; en aye onywalo Karan, Moja ki Gajej; Karan bene obedo ki wode ma nyiŋe Gajej.
Ruth 4:47 Litino awobe pa Jadai gin aye Regem, Yocam, Gecan, Pelet, Epa ki Caap.
Ruth 4:48 Maaka ma dako pa Kaleb ma aŋeca onywalo Ceber ki Tirkana.
Ruth 4:49 Dako meno bene dok onywalo Caap ma ocako gaŋ Madmana, ki Ceva ma ocako gaŋi Makbena ki Gibea, Akaca obedo nya pa Kaleb.
Ruth 4:50 Jo man ducu gin likwayo pa Kaleb. Litino awobe pa Kur ma latin kayo pa Eprata gin aye Cobal ma ocako gaŋ ma gilwoŋo Kiriat-jearim,
Ruth 4:51 Calma ma ocako Beterekem, ki Karep ma ocako Bet-gader.
Ruth 4:52 Likwayo pa Cobal ma ocako Kiriat-jearim gin aye jo Karoe ki nucu pa jo Menukot.
Ruth 4:53 Doggola pa jo Kiriat-jearim ducu gin aye jo Itri, jo Put, jo Cumat ki jo Micra; jo Jora ki jo Ectaol bene gua ki i kom jo meno.
Ruth 4:54 Likwayo pa Calma ma ocako gaŋ Beterekem gin aye jo Netopa, jo Atrotbet-joab, nucu pa jo Manakat, ki jo Jora.
Ruth 4:55 Doggola pa lukaran bene ducu ma gibedo i Jabej gin aye jo Tira, io Cimea ki jo Cuka. Magi aye jo Keni ma gunyomme ki jo ma i dog ot pa Rekab.
Ruth 4:1 Tekwaro 3
Ruth 4:670  Litino awobe pa Daudi (2 Cam 3.2-5;5.13-16;1 Tek 14.3-7)
Ruth 4:1 Magi aye litino awobe pa Daudi ma en onywalo i Kebron: latin kayone aye Amnon, ma minne obedo Akinoam me Jejreel; me aryone Daniel, ma minne obedo Abigail me Karmel;
Ruth 4:2 me adekke obedo Abcalom, ma minne Maaka ma nya pa Talmai kabaka me Gecur; me aŋwenne Adoniya, ma minne Kagit;
Ruth 4:3 me abicce Cepatia, ma minne Abital; me abicelle Itream, ma minne Egla.
Ruth 4:4 Daudi onywalo jo abicelli i Kebron, ka ma yam obedo ka loc iye pi mwaka abiro ki dwe abicel. Ka dok obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyeradek wiye adek.
Ruth 4:5 Dano magi en onywalogi i Jerucalem: Cimea, Cobab, Natan ki Solomon; gin aŋwen-ni ducu mingi Bat-cua ma nya Amiel.
Ruth 4:6 Ka dok onywalo Ibar, Elicama, Elipelet,
Ruth 4:7 Noga, Nepeg, Japia,
Ruth 4:8 Elicama, Eliada ki Elipelet, gin aboŋwen.
Ruth 4:9 Magi ducu gin litino awobe pa Daudi, ma pe gikwano iye litino pa mon aŋecane; ki lamingi en aye Tamar. Likwayo pa Solomon
Ruth 4:10 Likwayo pa Solomon gin ene: en onywalo wode Rekoboam, ma wode Abija, ma wode Aca, ma wode Yekocapat,
Ruth 4:11 ma wode Joram, ma wode Akajia, ma wode Yoaci,
Ruth 4:12 ma wode Amajia, ma wode Ajaria, ma wode Yocam,
Ruth 4:13 ma wode Akaj, ma wode Kejekia, ma wode Manace,
Ruth 4:14 ma wode Amon, ma wode Yocia.
Ruth 4:15 Litino awobe pa Yocia gin aye Yokanan ma latin kayone, me aryone Yekoyakim, me adekke Jedekia me aŋwenne Calum.
Ruth 4:16 Likwayo pa Yekoyakim gin ene: en onywalo wode Yekonia, ma wode Jedekia.
Ruth 4:17 Ka dok litino awobe pa Yekonia ma yam gitere i opii-ni gin ene: Cealtiel,
Ruth 4:18 Malkiram Pedaya, Cenajar, Jekamia, Kocama ki Nedabia.
Ruth 4:19 Litino awobe pa Pedaya gin aye Jerubabel ki Cimei. Litino awobe pa Jerubabel aye Meculam ki Anania, ma lamingi aye Celomit;
Ruth 4:20 ki Kacuba, Okel, Berekia, Kacadia ki Jucab-keced, gin abic.
Ruth 4:671 
Ruth 4:21 Likwayo pa Anania gin ene: en onywalo Pelatia ki Jecaya, ma wode Repaya, ma wode Aman, ma wode Obadia, ma wode Cekania.
Ruth 4:22 Latin awobi pa Cekania aye Cemaya, Ki litino awobe pa Cemaya gin aye Katuc, Igal, Baria, Nearia ki Capat, gin abicel.
Ruth 4:23 Litino awobe pa Nearia gin aye Elioenai, Kijikia ki Ajrikam, gin adek.
Ruth 4:24 Litino awo be pa Elioenai gin aye Kodavia, Eliacib, Pelaya, Akub, Yokanan, Delaya ki Anani, gin abiro.
Ruth 4:1 Tekwaro 4 Likwayo pa Juda
Ruth 4:1 Litino awobe pa Juda aye Perej, Kejeron, Karmi, Kur ki Cobal.
Ruth 4:2 Reaya ma wod pa Cobal onywalo Jakat, Jakat onywalo Akumai ki Lakad. Meno aye doggola pa jo Jora.
Ruth 4:3 Magi aye litino awobe pa Etam: Jejreel, Icima ki Idibac; nyiŋ lamingi obedo Kajelelponi.
Ruth 4:4 Penuel ocako gaŋ Gedor, ki Ejer ocako gaŋ Kuca. Magi aye litino awobe pa Kur ma obedo latin kayo pa minne Eprata; en aye ocako Beterekem.
Ruth 4:5 Acikur ma ocako gaŋ Tekoa, yam tye ki mon aryo, Kela ki Naara.
Ruth 4:6 Naara onywalo Akujam, Keper, Temeni ki Akactari. Meno aye litino awobe pa Naara.
Ruth 4:7 Litino awobe pa Kela gin aye Jeret, Ijar ki Etanan.
Ruth 4:8 Koj onywalo Anub ki Jobeba; jo me doggola pa Akarkel ma wod pa Karum ducu gubedo likwaye.
Ruth 4:9 Jabej onoŋo giworo maka to omegine ducu. Minne ocako nyiŋe Jabej kun wacci, “Pien anywale ki arem madwoŋ.”
Ruth 4:10 Jabej okok bot Lubaŋa me Icrael kun wacci, “Tim ber, imiya gum ci imi wan lobona obed malac. Bed kweda, igwoka i kom gin marac ducu wek pe otima malit.” Ci Lubaŋa oye gin ma en olego.
Ruth 4:11 Kelub ma omin Cuka onywalo Mekir, Mekir onywalo Eciton.
Ruth 4:12 Eciton onywalo Bet-rapa, Pacea ki Tekina ma ocako gaŋ ma gilwoŋo Ir-Nakac, Magi aye jo Reka.
Ruth 4:13 Litino awobe pa Kenaj gin aye Otiniel gin ki Ceraya. Litino awobe pa Otiniel aye Katat ki Meonatai.
Ruth 4:14 Meonatai onywalo Opra, ki Ceraya onywalo Joab ma ocako nota pa lutic diro. Gin mumiyo gilwoŋo kit meno, pien gin ducu lutic diro.
Ruth 4:672 
Ruth 4:15 Litino awobe pa Kaleb ma wod pa Jepune gin aye Iru, Ela ki Naam. Latin awobi pa Ela aye Kenaj.
Ruth 4:16 Litino awobe pa Jekalelel gin aye Jip, Jipa, Tiria ki Acarel.
Ruth 4:17 Litino awobe pa Ejra gin aye Jeter, Mered, Eper ki Jalon. Mered onyomo Bitia ma nya pa Parao; en ogamo ci onywalo nyare Miriam ki litino awobe aryo, Camai ki Iciba ma ocako gaŋ Ectemoa.
Ruth 4:18 Ki dakone ma Lajuda Mered dok onywalo Jered ma ocako gaŋ Gedor, Keber ma ocako gaŋ Coko, ki Jekutiel ma ocako gaŋ Janoa.
Ruth 4:19 Litino awobe pa dako pa Kodia ma lamiŋ Nakam gunywalo jo magi, Keila ma obedo kwaro pa jo Garmi, ki Ectemoa ma obedo kwaro pa jo Maaka.
Ruth 4:20 Litino awobe pa Cimon gin aye Amnon, Rina, Ben-kanan ki Tilon. Litino awobe pa Ici gin aye Joket ki Ben-joket. Likwayo pa Cela
Ruth 4:21 Likwayo pa Cela ma wod pa Juda aye Er ma ocako gaŋ Leka, Laada ma ocako gaŋ Mareca, ki doggola pa lucwe boŋo camanini ducu ma gibedo i Bet-acibea;
Ruth 4:22 ki Jokim, ki jo Koceba, ki Yoaci, ki Carap ma yam obedo laloc i Moab ka dok odwogo obedo i Beterekem. (Meno lok macon twatwal.)
Ruth 4:23 Jo-nu aye lucwe agulu, ki jo ma gubedo i Netaim ki i Gedera. Onoŋo gibedo kunnu kacel ki kabaka pi tiyo ticce. Likwayo pa Cimeon
Ruth 4:24 Litino awobe pa Cimeon gin aye Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Jera ki Caul.
Ruth 4:25 Caul onywalo wode Calum, ma wode Mibcam, ma wode Micima.
Ruth 4:26 Litino awobe pa Micima gin aye wode Kamuel, ma wode Jakur, ma wode Cimei.
Ruth 4:27 Cimei onoŋo tye ki awobene apar wiye abicel ki anyirane abicel; ento omegine pe gubedo ki litino mapol, kadi wa ludoggolagi ducu pe gunya mapol ma rom ki jo Juda.
Ruth 4:28 Gin yam gibedo i Beer-ceba, Molada, Kajar-cual,
Ruth 4:29 Bila, Ejem, Tolad,
Ruth 4:30 Becweri, Korma, Jiklag,
Ruth 4:31 Bet-markabot, Kajar-cucim, Bet-biri ki Caaraim. Magi aye obedo gaŋigi nio wa i kare me loc pa Daudi.
Ruth 4:32 Kabedo mukene ma gin gubedo iye gin aye Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Token ki Acan, gagi ducu abic,
Ruth 4:673 
Ruth 4:33 kacel ki gagi matino ma orumo gagi man ducu nio kwede wa i Baalat, Magi aye kabedogi, dok gin aye gubedo ki buk me tekwarogi.
Ruth 4:34 Mecobab, Jamlek, Joca ma wod pa Amajia,
Ruth 4:35 Joel, Yeko ma wod pa Jocibia, wod pa Ceraya, ma wod pa Aciel,
Ruth 4:36 Elionia, Jaakona, Jecokaya, Acaya, Adiel, Jecimiel, Benaya,
Ruth 4:37 Jija wod pa Cipi ma wod pa Alon, wod pa Jedaya, wod pa Cimri, ma wod pa Cemaya,
Ruth 4:38 jo magi ducu ma gicoyo nyiŋgi malo-ni gin aye lutel me doggolagi. Dog odi pa kwarogi onya madwoŋ,
Ruth 4:39 ci gucako wot nio wa i yo ma donyo i Gerar, kun girabo dog nota yo tuŋ wokceŋ pi yenyo ka kwayo romigi ki dyegigi.
Ruth 4:40 Gunoŋo kakwat maber kunnu ma lum olot iye madwoŋ, lobone bene lac ma obedo mot ki kuc. Jo ma gukwoŋo bedo kunnu aye jo Kam.
Ruth 4:41 Jo meno ma gicoyo nyiŋgi-ni guo kunnu i kare pa Kejekia kabaka me Juda, ci guneko jo Kam woko, kacel ki jo Meuni ma gunoŋo kunnu, gutyekogi woko liweŋ nio wa i kare-ni, Kit meno guleyo kabedogi woko, pien onoŋo ka kwayo romigi ki dyegigi tye kunnu maber.
Ruth 4:42 Jo mogo ma i kingi, jo Cimeon ma giromo miya abic, gucito wa i got Ceir kun gitye ki jo magi ma lutel wigi: Pelatia, Nearia, Repaya ki Ujiel ma gin litino awobe pa Ici.
Ruth 4:43 Guneko jo Amalek ma yam guriŋo ci gubwot ma gudoŋ kunnu, ci gucako bedo kunnu nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:1 Tekwaro 5 Likwayo pa Reuben
Ruth 4:1 Man lok kom likwayo pa Reuben ma latin kayo pa Icrael. En aye latin kayo, ento otimo kir pi bedo ki ci-wonne. Pi meno ditte me anywalli gimiyo bot litino awobe pa Yucepu wod pa Icrael, pe doŋ gicoyo nyiŋe i buk me tekwaro ma lubo kit ma ginywale kwede.
Ruth 4:2 Dok kadi bed Juda yam obedo oteka i kin omegine, dok laker bene onoŋŋe ki i kin likwaye, ento dit me anywalli onoŋo tye bot Yucepu.
Ruth 4:3 Litino awobe pa Reuben ma latin kayo pa Icrael gin aye Kanok, Pallu, Kejeron ki Karmi.
Ruth 4:4 Litino awobe pa Joel gin ene: wode obedo Cemaya, ma wode Gog, ma wode Cimei,
Ruth 4:5 ma wode Mika, ma wode Reaya, ma wode Baal,
Ruth 4:674 
Ruth 4:6 ma wode Beera ma yam Tiglat-pilecer kabaka me Aciria otero woko i opii; en yam obedo ladit pa jo Reuben.
Ruth 4:7 Lukakagi yam gicoyo tekwarogi kun lubo yalwakgi ki doggolagi, gin ene: laditgi Jeyel, ki Jekaria,
Ruth 4:8 ki Bela wod pa Ajaj ma wod pa Joel; en yam bedo i Aroer, ma lobone oo wa i Nebo ki Baal-meon.
Ruth 4:9 En yam obedo bene yo tuŋ wokceŋ ma lobone o wa i dog tim ma i ŋet kutu Euprate tuŋ kany, pien onoŋo doŋ limgi onya madwoŋ i lobo Gilead.
Ruth 4:10 I kare pa Caulo gubedo ka lweny ki jo Agri ci gunekogi, ka gucako bedo i kemagi i lobo ducu ma i ŋet lobo Gilead yo tuŋ wokceŋ. Likwayo pa Gad
Ruth 4:11 Likwayo pa Gad gubedo i lobo Bacan nio kwede wa i Caleka, kun gukemme ki jo Reuben.
Ruth 4:12 Joel obedo laditgi, me aryone Capamo Janai ki Capat bene gubedo i Bacan.
Ruth 4:13 Lukakagi gupokke i doggola mapatpat ma kwarogi obedo Mikael, Meculam, Ceba, Jorai, Jakan, Jia ki Eber, gin abiro.
Ruth 4:14 Magi aye gubedo likwayo pa Abikail wod pa Kuri, ma wod pa Jaroa, wod pa Gilead, wod pa Mikael, wod pa Jecicai, wod pa Jado, wod pa Buj.
Ruth 4:15 Aki wod pa Abdiel ma wod pa Guni, en aye obedo ladit ma loyo dog odi pa kwarogi.
Ruth 4:16 Gin gubedo i Gilead, i Bacan ki i gaŋi ma i lobo meno, ki i kakwat ducu ma i lobo Caron, nio wa i waŋ lobo kikome.
Ruth 4:17 Jo magi ducu gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwaro i kare pa Yocam kabaka me Juda, ki i kare pa Jeroboam kabaka me Icrael. Lok kom kaka aryo ki nucu
Ruth 4:18 Jo pa Reuben, jo pa Gad, ki nucu kaka pa Manace yam gitye ki twoni oteka lweny ma gitye ki kwotgi ki pala lucwangi, ma gutelo atumgi bene, ma gin oyita lweny, dano alip pyeraŋwen wiye aŋwen, ki miya abiro ki pyerabicel ma guyubbe pi lweny.
Ruth 4:19 Gulwenyo ki Jekur, Napic ki Nodab, ma gin jo Agri.
Ruth 4:20 Lubaŋa okonyogi ka lweny kwedgi, pien gukok bote i kare ma gilwenyo, ci en oye legagi pien onoŋo gigene, ci omiyo jo Agri ki lwakgi ducu i ciŋgi.
Ruth 4:21 Guyako limgi makwo ma romo kinaga alip pyerabic kulu, romi alip miya aryo ki pyerabic, ki kana alip aryo, kacel ki dano alip miya acel ma guyakogi makwo.
Ruth 4:675 
Ruth 4:22 Guneko jo mapol, pien mony meno obedo mony pa Lubaŋa. Ci gubedo i lobo pa jo-nu nio wa i kare ma giterogi i opii.
Ruth 4:23 Jo me nucu kaka pa Manace gubedo i lobo meno. Gubedo mapol mada cakke ki i lobo Bacan nio kwede wa i Baal-kermon, Cenir ki got Kermon
Ruth 4:24 Magi aye ludito wi kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi: Eper, Ici, Eliel, Ajriel, Jeremia, Kodavia ki Jadiel, twoni oteka lweny ma nyiggi oywek, ma gin aye ludito i odi pa kwarogi.
Ruth 4:25 Ento guŋayo waŋ Lubaŋa pa kwarogi, gubedo ka woro lubaŋa pa jo me lobo meno ki tim kwele kwele-gu, gin jo ma onoŋo Lubaŋa otyekogi woko ki i nyimgi.
Ruth 4:26 Pi meno Lubaŋa opiyo Pul kabaka me Aciria, ma en aye Tiglat-Pilecer kabaka me Aciria, ci oterogi i opii, gin jo Reuben, jo Gad ki nucu kaka pa jo Manace. Oterogi wa i Kalak, Kabor, Kara ki i kulu Gojan, pud gitye kunnu nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:1 Tekwaro 6 Likwayo pa Levi
Ruth 4:1 Litino awobe pa Levi gin aye Gercom, Kokat ki Merari.
Ruth 4:2 Litino awobe pa Kokat aye Amram, Ijur, Kebron ki Ujiel.
Ruth 4:3 Litino pa Amram aye Aron, Moses ki Miriam. Litino awobe pa Aron gin aye Nadab, Abiu, Eleajar ki Itamar.
Ruth 4:4 Eleajar onywalo Finekaci, Finekaci onywalo Abicua,
Ruth 4:5 Abicua onywalo Buki, Buki onywalo Uji,
Ruth 4:6 Uji onywalo Jerakia, Jerakia onywalo Merayot,
Ruth 4:7 Merayot onywalo Amaria, Amaria onywalo Akitub,
Ruth 4:8 Akitub onywalo Jadok, Jadok onywalo Akimaj,
Ruth 4:9 Akimaj onywalo Ajaria, Ajaria onywalo Yokanan,
Ruth 4:10 Yokanan onywalo Ajaria, ma en aye obedo ajwaka ma tiyo i ot pa Lubaŋa ma yam Solomon ogero i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:11 Ajaria onywalo Amaria, Amaria onywalo Akitub,
Ruth 4:12 Akitub onywalo Jadok, Jadok onywalo Calum,
Ruth 4:13 Calum onywalo Ilkia, Ilkia onywalo Ajaria,
Ruth 4:14 Ajaria onywalo Ceraya, Ceraya onywalo Yekojadak.
Ruth 4:15 Yekojadak gitero woko i opii i kare ma Rwot omiyo Nebukadnejar otero jo Juda ki jo Jerucalem i opii.
Ruth 4:676 
Ruth 4:16 Litino awobe pa Levi aye Gercom, Kokat ki Merari.
Ruth 4:17 Magi aye nyig litino awobe pa Gercom: Libni ki Cimei.
Ruth 4:18 Litino awobe pa Kokat gin aye Amram, Ijar, Kebron ki Ujiel.
Ruth 4:19 Litino awobe pa Merari aye Makali ki Muci. Magi aye doggola pa jo Levi, ma lubo kwarogi.
Ruth 4:20 Likwayo pa Gercom gin ene: en onywalo wode Libni, ma wode Jakat, ma wode Jima,
Ruth 4:21 ma wode Joa, ma wode Iddo, ma wode Jera, ma wode Jeaterai.
Ruth 4:22 Likwayo pa Kokat gin ene: en onywalo wode Aminadab, ma wode Kera, ma wode Acir,
Ruth 4:23 ma wode Elkana, ma wode Ebiacap, ma wode Acir,
Ruth 4:24 ma wode Takat, ma wode Uriel, ma wode Ujia, ma wode Caul.
Ruth 4:25 Likwayo pa Elkana gin aye Amacai ki Akimot,
Ruth 4:26 ma wode Elkana, ma wode Jopai, ma wode Nakat,
Ruth 4:27 ma wode Eliab, ma wode Jerokam, ma wode Elkana.
Ruth 4:28 Litino awobe pa Camuel gin aye Joel ma latin kayone, ki me rayone Abija.
Ruth 4:29 Likwayo pa Merari gin ene: en onywalo Makali ma wode Libni, ma wode Cimei, ma wode Uja,
Ruth 4:30 ma wode Cimea, ma wode Kagia, ma wode Acaya. Luwer i ot pa Lubaŋa ma Daudi oketogi
Ruth 4:31 Magi aye jo ma Daudi oketogi me loyo tic me wer i ot pa Lubaŋa, i ge kare ma gitero canduk pa Rwot giketo obedo iye.
Ruth 4:32 Ticgi obedo me wer i nyim kema, ma en aye kema me rwatte, nio wa i kare ma Solomon doŋ ogero ot pa Rwot i Jerucalem; gubedo ka tiyo ticgi kun gilubo cik ma gimiyogi.
Ruth 4:33 Magi aye nyig dano ma gitiyo tic meno, ki nyig likwayogi. Likwayo pa Kokat gin ene: Eman ma lawer, ma wod pa Joel, wod pa Camuel,
Ruth 4:34 wod pa Elkana, wod pa Jerokam, wod pa Eliel, wod pa Toa,
Ruth 4:35 wod pa Jup, wod pa Elkana, wod pa Makat, wod pa Amacai,
Ruth 4:36 wod pa Elkana, wod pa Joel, wod pa Ajaria, wod pa Jepania,
Ruth 4:37 wod pa Takat, wod pa Acir, wod pa Ebiacap, wod pa Kora,
Ruth 4:38 wod pa Ijar, wod pa Kokat, wod pa Levi, wod pa Icrael;
Ruth 4:677 
Ruth 4:39 ki ominne Acap ma yam Cuŋ ka gete tuŋ bade malacuc, en aye Acap ma wod pa Berekia, wod pa Cimea,
Ruth 4:40 wod pa Mikael, wod pa Baaceya, wod pa Malkija,
Ruth 4:41 wod pa Etini, wod pa Jera, wod pa Adaya,
Ruth 4:42 wod pa Etan, wod pa Jima, wod pa Cimei,
Ruth 4:43 wod pa Jakat, wod pa Gercom, wod pa Levi.
Ruth 4:44 Omegigi ma likwayo pa Merari yam gicuŋ tuŋ lacam; gin ene: Etan wod pa Kici, wod pa Abdi, wod pa Maluk,
Ruth 4:45 wod pa Kacabia, wod pa Amajia, wod pa Ilkia,
Ruth 4:46 wod pa Amji, wod pa Bani, wod pa Cemer,
Ruth 4:47 wod pa Makali, wod pa Muci, wod pa Merari, wod pa Levi.
Ruth 4:48 Yam giketo omegigi mukene ma gin Lulevi me tiyo tic ducu ma i kema, ma en aye ot pa Lubaŋa. Likwayo pa Aron
Ruth 4:49 Ento Aron ki awobene aye gityero gityer i wi keno tyer me gitum awaŋa, ki i keno tyer me waŋo odok eceta. Gin aye onoŋo gitiyo tic ducu ma i kabedo maleŋ makato ducu, ki tic me kwanyo bal ki i kom jo Icrael, kit ma Moses latic pa Lubaŋa yam ociko kwede ducu.
Ruth 4:50 Magi aye likwayo pa Aron: en onywalo wode Eleajar, ma wode Finekaci, ma wode Abicua,
Ruth 4:51 ma wode Buki, ma wode Uji, ma wode Jerakia,
Ruth 4:52 ma wode Merayot, ma wode Amaria, ma wode Akitub,
Ruth 4:53 ma wode Jadok, ma wode Akimaj. Gaoi pa Lulevi (Yoc 21.1-42)
Ruth 4:54 Magi aye kabedo ma likwayo pa Aron ma i doggola pa jo Kokat yam gubedo iye, ma oporo kit bedogi ki wan lobogi, kit ma kwir opoto kwede:
Ruth 4:55 yam gimiyo botgi Kebron ma i lobo Juda, kacel ki olet ma orumo ducu;
Ruth 4:56 ento potti ducu ma tye pi gaŋ meno, ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, onoŋo gimiyogi woko bot Kaleb wod pa Jepune.
Ruth 4:57 Ka dok likwayo pa Aron gimiyo botgi Kebron ma en aye gaŋ me laro lunek dano, Libna ki olette bene, Jatir, Ectemoa ki olette,
Ruth 4:58 Kilen ki olette, Debir ki olette,
Ruth 4:678 
Ruth 4:59 Acan ki olette, ki Bet-cemec ki olette.
Ruth 4:60 Ka dok gimiyo botgi gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki i lobo me kaka pa Benjamin: Geba ki olette, Alemet ki olette, Anatot ki olette. Kumeno gaŋi ma i doggolagi ducu onoŋo giromo apar wiye adek.
Ruth 4:61 Jo Kokat mudoŋ gimiyo botgi gaŋi apar ma gipokogi ki kwir, ma gikwanyogi ki bot nucu kaka pa Manace.
Ruth 4:62 Jo Gercom gimiyo botgi gaŋi apar wiye adek macalo doggolagi tye, ma gikwanyo ki i kaka pa Icakar, Acer, Naputali ki Manace i lobo Bacan.
Ruth 4:63 Jo Merari gimiyo botgi gaŋi apar wiye aryo macalo doggolagi tye, ma gikwanyo ki i kaka pa Reuben, Gad ki Jabulon.
Ruth 4:64 Kit meno jo Icrael gumiyo gaŋi bot jo Levi kacel ki oletgi ducu, wek gubed iye.
Ruth 4:65 Gumiyo botgi gaŋi ma gicoyo nyiŋgi malo-ni ma gikwanyogi ki bot kaka pa Juda, Cimeon ki Benjamin kun gibolo kwir.
Ruth 4:66 Ka dok doggola mogo pa likwayo pa Kokat gimiyo botgi gaŋi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Epraim.
Ruth 4:67 Gimiyo botgi Cekem ma en aye gaŋ me laro lunek dano ma i lobo godi me Epraim, ki olette, Gejer ki olette,
Ruth 4:68 Jokmeam ki olette, Bet-koron ki olette,
Ruth 4:69 Aijalon ki olette, Gat-Rimmon ki olette.
Ruth 4:70 Ka dok doggola pa jo Kokat mudoŋŋe ducu gimiyo botgi gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot nucu kaka pa Manace: Aner ki olette, Bileam ki olette.
Ruth 4:71 Jo pa Gercom gimiyo botgi gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot nucu kaka pa Manace: Golan ma i Bacan ki olette, Acitarot ki olette;
Ruth 4:72 ka dok gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Icakar: Kedec ki olette, Daberat ki olette,
Ruth 4:73 Ramot ki olette, Anem ki olette;
Ruth 4:74 ka dok gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Acer: Macal ki olette, Abudon ki olette,
Ruth 4:75 Kukok ki olette, Rekob ki olette;
Ruth 4:76 ka dok gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Naputali: Kedec ma i Galilaya ki olette, Kamon ki olette, Kiriataim ki olette.
Ruth 4:77 Jo pa Merari mudoŋ gimiyo botgi gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Jabulon kun gibolo kwir: Rimmono ki olette, Tabor ki olette;
Ruth 4:679 
Ruth 4:78 ka dok i loka kulu Jordan yo tuŋ wokceŋ ma cok ki Jeriko gimiyo botgi gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Reuben: Bejer ma i tim aroo kacel ki olette, Jaja ki olette,
Ruth 4:79 Kedemot ki olette, Mepaat ki olette;
Ruth 4:80 ka dok gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Gad: Ramot ma i Gilead ki olette, Makanaim ki olette,
Ruth 4:81 Kecbon ki olette, Jajer ki olette.
Ruth 4:1 Tekwaro 7 Likwayo pa Icakar
Ruth 4:1 Litino awobe pa Icakar aye Tola, Puwa, Jacub ki Cimron, gin aŋwen.
Ruth 4:2 Litino awobe pa Tola aye Uji, Repaya, Jeriel, Jamai, Ibcam ki Cemuel, Gin aye ludito kaka pa jo Tola ki i odi pa kwarogi ma gubedo twoni oteka lweny i yalwakgi. I kare pa Daudi welgi oromo alip pyeraryo wiye aryo ki miya abicel.
Ruth 4:3 Latin awobi pa Uji aye Ijrakia. Litino awobe pa Ijrakia aye Mikael, Obadia, Joel ki Icia, gin abic, ma gin ducu jo madito.
Ruth 4:4 Ka dok onoŋo tye lwak buca mony pa lulweny ma gicoyo nyiŋgi ma lubo yalwakgi ma i dog odi pa kwarogi; welgi obedo alip pyeradek wiye abicel, pien onoŋo gitye ki mon mapol ki litino awobe mapol.
Ruth 4:5 Lukakagi ma i doggola pa Icakar ducu onoŋo giromo twoni oteka lweny alip pyeraboro wiye abiro ma gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwarogi. Likwayo pa Benjamin
Ruth 4:6 Litino awobe pa Benjamin gin aye Bela, Beker ki Jediael, gin adek.
Ruth 4:7 Litino awobe pa Bela aye Ejibon, Uji, Ujiel, Jerimot ki Iri, gin abic, ma gin ducu ludito wi kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi, twoni oteka lweny, I kare ma yam gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwaro, welgi oromo alip pyeraryo wiye aryo ki pyeradek wiye aŋwen.
Ruth 4:8 Litino awobe pa Beker gin aye Jemira, Yoaci, Eliejer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremot, Abija, Anatot ki Alemet; jo magi ducu gin awobe pa Beker.
Ruth 4:9 Yam gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwaro ma lubo yalwakgi, kun gin ludito wi kaka i odi pa kwarogi, twoni oteka lweny; welgi onoŋo romo alip pyeraryo ki miya aryo.
Ruth 4:10 Latin awobi pa Jediael aye Bilan. Litino awobe pa Bilan aye Jeuc, Benjamin, Ekud, Kenaana, Jetan, Tarcic ki Akicakar.
Ruth 4:11 Magi ducu likwayo pa Jediael ma gin ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi, twoni oteka lweny; welgi oromo alip apar wiye abiro ki miya aryo ma guyubbe pi lweny.
Ruth 4:12 Cupim ki Kupim gin aye litino awobe pa Ir, Kucim obedo latin awobi pa Aker.
Ruth 4:680  Likwayo pa Naputali
Ruth 4:13 Litino awobe pa Naputali gin aye Jajiel, Guni, Jejer ki Calum, gin aye likwayo pa Bila. Likwayo pa Manace
Ruth 4:14 Litino awo be pa Manace aye Aciriel ki Makir ma obedo won Gilead. Gin aryo ducu dako aŋecane ma anyira jo Aram aye onywalogi.
Ruth 4:15 Makir onyomo dako ki Kupim ki Cupim bene. Nyiŋ laminne aye Maaka. Nyiŋ wode me aryone Jelopekad. Jelopekad onywalo anyira keken.
Ruth 4:16 Maaka ma dako pa Makir onywalo wode ma ocako nyiŋe Perec; nyiŋ ominne Cerec. Litino awobe pa Perec aye Ulam ki Rakem.
Ruth 4:17 Latin awobi pa Ulam aye Bedan. Magi gin likwayo pa Gilead wod pa Makir, ma wod pa Manace.
Ruth 4:18 Kamoleket ma lamiŋ Gilead onywalo Icikod, Abiejer ki Makala.
Ruth 4:19 Litino awobe pa Cemida gin aye Akian, Cekem, Liki ki Aniam. Likwayo pa Epraim
Ruth 4:20 Likwayo pa Epraim gin aye Cutela ma wode Bered, ma wode Takat, ma wode Eleada, ma wode Takat,
Ruth 4:21 ma wode Jabad, ma wode Cutela. Litino awobe mukene pa Epraim aye Ejer ki Elead ma jo Gat ma gin wegi lobo-nu guneko woko i kare ma awo be-nu gucito ka yako dyaŋigi.
Ruth 4:22 Wongi Epraim obedo ka kokogi pi kare malac, dok omegine bene gubino ka kweyo cwinye.
Ruth 4:23 Lacen Epraim obedo ki dakone ci dako ogamo, onywalo wode. Wonne ocako nyiŋe Beria, pien onoŋo can opoto i ode.
Ruth 4:24 Nyare obedo Ceera; en aye ogero gaŋ Bet-koron mapiny ki mamalone bene, ki Ujen-Ceera.
Ruth 4:25 Wod pa Beria aye Repa ma wode Recep, ma wode Tela, ma wode Takan,
Ruth 4:26 ma wode Ladan ma wode Amikud, ma wode Elicama,
Ruth 4:27 ma wode Nun, ma wode Yocwa.
Ruth 4:28 Lobogi ki kabedogi gin aye Betel ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, ka dok yo tuŋ wokceŋ Naaran, ki yo tuŋ potoceŋ Gejer ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Cekem ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Aya ki gaŋi ma i ŋete:
Ruth 4:29 ka dok i wan lobo pa jo Manace, Bet-cean ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Taanak ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Megido ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Dor ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Likwayo pa Yucepu wod pa Icrael yam gubedo i kabedo magi.
Ruth 4:681  Likwayo pa Acer
Ruth 4:30 Litino awobe pa Acer gin aye Imna, Iciva, Icivi, Beria ki Cera ma lamingi.
Ruth 4:31 Litino awobe pa Beria gin aye Keber ki Malkiel ma ocako gaŋ Bir-jait.
Ruth 4:32 Keber onywalo Japulet, Gomer, Kotam ki Cua ma lamingi.
Ruth 4:33 Litino awobe pa Japulet aye Racak, Bimal ki Acivat. Magi gin Iiiino pa Japulet.
Ruth 4:34 Litino awobe pa ominne Cemer aye Roga, Jekuba ki Aram.
Ruth 4:35 Litino awobe pa ominne Keler gin aye Jopa, Imna. Celec ki Ama!.
Ruth 4:36 Litino awobe pa Jopa aye Cua, Kameper, Cual, Beri, Imra,
Ruth 4:37 Bejer, Kod, Cama, Ciloa, Itran ki Beera.
Ruth 4:38 Litino awobe pa Jeter aye Jepune, Picpa ki Ara,
Ruth 4:39 Litino awobe pa Ula aye Ara, Kaniel ki Rijia.
Ruth 4:40 Magi ducu jo pa Acer, ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi, jo ma giyerogi, twoni oteka lweny, jo madito i kin lutel wi kaka. I kare ma gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwaro pi tic i lweny, welgi onoŋo romo alip pyeraryo wiye abicel.
Ruth 4:1 Tekwaro 8 Likwayo pa Benjamin
Ruth 4:1 Benjamin onywalo Bela ma latin kayone, me aryone Acibel, me adekke Akara,
Ruth 4:2 me aŋwenne Noka, me abicce Rapia.
Ruth 4:3 Bela onywalo litino awobe bene ma gin aye Adar, Gera, Abikud,
Ruth 4:4 Abicua, Naaman, Akoa,
Ruth 4:5 Gera, Cepupan ki Kuram.
Ruth 4:6 Magi aye likwayo pa Ekud; gin gubedo ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi i kin jo ma yam gibedo i Geba, ma giterogi i opii wa i Manakat. Gin ene:
Ruth 4:7 Naaman, Akija ki Gera, ma en aye Keglam, ma obedo won Uja ki Akikud.
Ruth 4:8 Cakaraim onywalo litino awobe i lobo Moab, ma doŋ otyeko ryemo monne Kucim ki Baara woko.
Ruth 4:9 Onywalo litino awobe ki dakone Kedec, gin aye Jobab, Jibia, Meca, Malkam,
Ruth 4:10 Jeuj, Cakia ki Mirma. Magi aye litino awobene ma gubedo ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi.
Ruth 4:11 Cakaraim onywalo litino awobe bene ki dakone Kucim, gin aye Abitub ki Elpaal.
Ruth 4:682 
Ruth 4:12 Litino awobe pa Elpaal aye Eber, Micam ki Cemed. Cemed ogero gaŋ Ono, ki Lod, ki gaŋi ma i ŋete.
Ruth 4:13 Beria ki Cema aye gubedo ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi i kin jo ma gibedo i Aijalon, ma guryemo jo ma yam gubedo i Gat woko.
Ruth 4:14 Akio, Cacak, Jeremot,
Ruth 4:15 Jebedia, Arad, Eder,
Ruth 4:16 Mikael, Icipa ki Joka gin aye likwayo pa Beria.
Ruth 4:17 Jebadia, Meculam, Kijiki, Keber,
Ruth 4:18 Icimerai, Ijilia ki Jobab gin aye likwayo pa Elpaal.
Ruth 4:19 Jakim, Jikri, Jabdi,
Ruth 4:20 Elienai, Jiletai, Eliel,
Ruth 4:21 Adaya, Beraya ki Cimrat aye likwayo pa Cimei.
Ruth 4:22 Icipan, Eber, Eliel,
Ruth 4:23 Abudon, Jikri, Kanan,
Ruth 4:24 Anania, Elam, Antotija,
Ruth 4:25 Ipedaya ki Penuel gin aye likwayo pa Cacak,
Ruth 4:26 Camcerai, Cekaria, Atalia,
Ruth 4:27 Jarecia, Elia ki Jikri gin aye likwayo pa Jerokam.
Ruth 4:28 Jo magi gubedo ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi i yalwakgi; gin jo madito. Jo magi ducu gubedo i Jerucalem. Tekwaro pa Caulo
Ruth 4:29 Jeyel ma ocako gaŋ Gibeon yam bedo i Gibeon. Nyiŋ dakone Maaka.
Ruth 4:30 Latin awobine me kayo aye Abudon, ka dok Jur. Kic, Baal, Nadab,
Ruth 4:31 Gedor, Akio, Jeker,
Ruth 4:32 ki Miklot, ma en aye won Cimea. Jo magi bene kacel ki lukakagi yam gubedo ma gukemme ki lukakagi ma gibedo i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:33 Ner onywalo Kic. Kic onywalo Caulo, Caulo onywalo Yonacan, Malkicua, Abinadab, ki Ecibaal.
Ruth 4:34 Yonacan onywalo Meribaal, Meribaal onywalo Mika.
Ruth 4:35 Litino awobe pa Mika aye Piton, Melek, Tarea ki Akaj:
Ruth 4:683 
Ruth 4:36 Akaj onywalo Yekoada, Yekoada onywalo Alemet, Ajimavet ki Jimri. Jimri onywalo Moja,
Ruth 4:37 Moja onywalo Binea ma wode Rapa, ma wode Eleaca, ma wode Ajel.
Ruth 4:38 Ajel yam tye ki litino awobe abicel ma nyiŋgi ene: Ajrikam, Bokeru, Icmael, Cearia, Obadia ki Kanan. Jo magi ducu aye litino awobe pa Ajel.
Ruth 4:39 Litino awobe pa ominne Ecek gin ene: Ulam ma latin kayone, me aryone Jeuc, me adekke Elipelet.
Ruth 4:40 Litino awobe pa Ulam yam gin twoni oteka lweny, wegi atum, ma litino awobegi ki likwayogi pol mada, gin ducu miya acel ki pyerabic. Jo magi ducu gin jo pa Benjamin.
Ruth 4:1 Tekwaro 9 Dano ma gudwogo cen ki i Babilon
Ruth 4:1 Yam gicoyo nyiŋ jo Icrael ducu i buk me tekwarogi, ma gicoyogi i buk pa Luker me Icrael. Jo Juda yam giterogi i opii i Babilon pien onoŋo guŋayo waŋ Lubaŋa.
Ruth 4:2 Jo ma gukwono dwogo cen ka bedo i dul lobo ma yam gimiyo botgi i gaŋigi gin aye jo Icrael kacel ki ajwagi pa Lubaŋa, Lulevi, ki lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Ruth 4:3 Jo mogo me kaka pa Juda, Benjamin, Epraim ki Manace gucako bedo i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:4 Gin aye Utai wod pa Amikud, ma wod pa Omri, wod pa Imri, wod pa Bani ki i kin likwayo pa Perej ma wod pa Juda.
Ruth 4:5 Dok i kin likwayo pa Cela, Acaya ma latin kayo ki litino awobene.
Ruth 4:6 Ki i kin likwayo pa Jera, Jeuel ki lukakagi, gin miya abicel ki pyeraboŋwen noŋo.
Ruth 4:7 Ki i kin jo Benjamin Calu ma wod pa Meculam, wod pa Kodavia, wod pa Kacenua.
Ruth 4:8 Ibneya wod pa Jerokam, Ela wod pa Uji ma wod pa Mikri, ki Meculam wod pa Cepatia ma wod pa Reuel, wod pa Ibinija,
