Ruth 4:12 ryeko ki ŋeyo piny doŋ amiyogi boti. Dok abimiyi lwak lonyo ki lim ki deyo, ma pe tye ŋat acel mo i kin luker ma gukwoŋo nyimi ma yam olimo gin ma rom meno, kadi wa kabaka mo ma bilubo kori pe bilimo kumeno.”
Ruth 4:13 Solomon ocako a woko ki i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma i wi got ma tye i Gibeon, kun oa woko ki i nyim kema me rwatte, odok i Jerucalem, ci obedo ka loyo jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:721  Solomon lacat aguragura ki gadigadi lweny (1 Luker 10.26-29)
Ruth 4:14 Solomon yam ocoko gadigadi lweny ki lulweny ma riŋo ki aguragura, Obedo ki gadigadi lweny alip acel ki miya aŋwen, ki wegi aguragura alip apar wiye aryo, Oketo mogo i kingi i gaŋi me gadigadi lweny, ki mukene gubedo bote i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:15 Kabaka Solomon yam omiyo ryal odoko gin ma lam ma rom ki gweŋ-gu i Jerucalem, dok okelo yadi cedar mapol ata ma rom ki olam ma i bar Cepela.
Ruth 4:16 En yam limo aguragura ma a ki i Ejipt ki Kuc; lucat-wil pa kabaka gamogi ki i Kuc i wel lim ma onoŋo giyubo.
Ruth 4:17 Gadigadi ma gia ki i Ejipt welgi onoŋo romo cekel me ryal miya abicel, ki aguragura acel welle cekel miya acel ki pyerabic; ka dok lucat-wil pa kabaka catogi bot luker ducu pa jo Kit, ki bot luker me Ciria.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 2 Solomon ocikke ki kabaka Kuram (1 Luker 5.1-18)
Ruth 4:1 Solomon otamo pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa pi nyiŋ Rwot, kacel ki gaŋ kalle kikome.
Ruth 4:2 Solomon oyero jo alip pyerabiro me yweko yec, ki jo alip pyeraboro me muko godi i lobo ma obedo gotgot, ki jo alip adek ki miya abicel me bedo ludito ma loyo lutic.
Ruth 4:3 Solomon dok ocwalo lok bot Kuram kabaka me Turo ni, “Kit ma yam ibedo ki wora Daudi kun icwalle bao cedar me gero ode me bedone, ber ibed kweda bene kit meno.
Ruth 4:4 Nen, ayubbe pi gero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋana, ci abidyero bote pi waŋo iye odok eceta ma ŋwece kur i nyime, ki pi tyero iye mugati me gitum awaŋa odiko ki otyeno, ki i ceŋ cabit ducu, ki i por dwe, ki i nino madito ma Rwot Lubaŋawa oketo, ma yam en ociko pi jo Icrael matwal.
Ruth 4:5 Ot ma abigero-ni bibedo dit mada, pien Lubaŋawa du makato lubaŋa mukenegu ducu.
Ruth 4:6 Ento aŋa ma twero gero ot pi Lubaŋa? Kadi polo kulu ma tye malo twal-li, pe twero romo en bedo iye. An kono an aŋa ma atwero gero ot pire? Ento kono atwero tiyo ot mo macalo kabedo me waŋo odok eceta i nyime keken.
Ruth 4:7 Pienno amito icwalla dano mo makwiri ma twero tic i kom jabu, ki ryal, ki mola, ki nyonyo, ki boŋo ma lamar lamar, ki makwar ki ma bulu, ki dano ma gipwonyo ki goro kom jami, wek oti ki lutic makwiri ma gitye kweda i Juda ki i Jerucalem, ma yam wora Daudi oyubogi.
Ruth 4:8 Dok icwalla bao cedar, ki ciprec, ki bao algum ma gia i Lebanon, pien aŋeyo ni luticci giŋeyo toŋo yadi ma i Lebanon. Dok luticca gibibedo ki luticci,
Ruth 4:722 
Ruth 4:9 wek guyubba bao madwoŋ, pien ot ma abigero-ni bibedo dit dok me aura.
Ruth 4:10 Abimiyo bot joni ma gitiŋo bao ŋano ma nyige ma romo guniya alip pyerabicel, ki cayiri ma romo guniya alip pyerabicel, ki koŋo vino ma romo debe alip pyeraŋwen, ki moo jeituni bene debe alip pyeraŋwen, obed pi luticci me acamagi.”
Ruth 4:11 Kuram kabaka me Turo odok iye ki waraga ma ocwalo bot Solomon ni, “Pien Rwot maro jone omiyo oketo in ibedo kabaka ma loyogi.”
Ruth 4:12 Kuram dok owacci, “Gipwo Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma con otiyo polo ki lobo, ma omiyo ki Daudi wode maryek, ma tye ki niaŋ matut, ma bigero ot pi Rwot, kacel ki gaŋ kalle kikome.
Ruth 4:13 “An doŋ acwalli dano ma ladiro ma tye ki ŋec matut, en Kuram-abi,
Ruth 4:14 ma wod pa dako ma anyira Dan, ma wonne dano me Turo, Gipwonyo en ki tic i kom jabu, ki ryal, ki mola, ki nyonyo ki godi, ki bao, ki boŋo ma lamar lamar, ki ma bulu ki makwar ki camanini maberre, En ŋeyo bene tic ducu me goro coc i kom jami, ŋeyo lubo kit cal mo me tic ma gimiye, kun tiyo kacel ki ludironi, ki ludiro pa rwoda Daudi ma woru.
Ruth 4:15 Pienno gin ma rwoda owaco-ni, doŋ ocwal ki luticce, ŋano ki cayiri, ki moo ki koŋo vino;
Ruth 4:16 Ci wan wabitoŋo kit bao ducu ma imito ki i Lebanon, wabitweyogi ci gibikwan i wi pii macalo bwoda nio wa i Jopa, wek in doŋ iom iter i Jerucalem.”
Ruth 4:17 Solomon dok ocako kwano wel jo ducu me rok mukene ma gibedo i lobo Icrael, kit ma yam wonne Daudi koŋ okwanogi-ni. Ginoŋo ni welgi romo jo alip miya acel ki pyerabic wiye adek ki miya abicel.
Ruth 4:18 En oyero jo alip pyerabiro ki i kingi me yweko yec ducu, ki jo alip pyeraboro me muko godi i lobo ma obedo gotgot, ki jo alip adek ki miya abicel me bedo ludito ma loyo lutic, pi cuko cwiny dano wek guti tic.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 3 Solomon ogero ot pa Lubaŋa (1 Luker 6.1-38)
Ruth 4:1 Solomon ocako gero ot pa Rwot i Jerucalem i wi got me Moria, ka ma yam Rwot onyutte iye bot wonne Daudi, i kabedo ma yam Daudi oyero, i kom laro moyo pa Oman ma jo Jebuc.
Ruth 4:2 En ocako gerone i dwe me aryo i mwaka me aŋwen me locce.
Ruth 4:3 Solomon opimo ot pa Lubaŋa ma en omito gerone-ni kit man: borre romo futi pyeraboŋwen, ki lacce futi pyeradek.
Ruth 4:723 
Ruth 4:4 Ki kicika ma i doggola me donyo ma i nyim kicika me ot lacce romo futi pyeradek, ma roni ki lac me ot maditte; borre tuŋ malo roma futi miya acel ki pyeraboro. Omwono iye woko ki jabu ma giliyo maber.
Ruth 4:5 Solomon oguro kor ot me kicika maditte ki bao ciprec, ci omwono kom bao woko ki jabu maberre, ma gigoro iye cal yadi otit ki nyor.
Ruth 4:6 Odeyo i ot mamwonya mada ki godi matino me wel ma gimwono i kom jabu. Jabune obedo jabu ma gikelo ki i Parvaim.
Ruth 4:7 Kit meno en omwono i ot ducu ki jabu, riine, rii doggolane, kor kicika ot ducu, ki doggolane; ka dok ogoro cal lukerubi i kor kicika ot.
Ruth 4:8 En dok otiyo kabedo maleŋ makato ducu; borre futi pyeradek, ma rom ki lac me kicika ot maditte, ki lacce bene futi pyeradek. Omwono kome woko ki jabu maberre ma romo talanta miya abicel.
Ruth 4:9 Pek me mucumar me jabu ma giguro kwede obedo cekel pyerabic. En dok omwono kicika ma malo ducu ki jabu.
Ruth 4:10 I kabedo maleŋ makato ducu en oketo iye cal lukerubi aryo me bao ma gipayo, ci omwono komgi woko ki jabu.
Ruth 4:11 Bwom lukerubi ducu borre muyarre romo futi pyeradek. Bwomgi acel acel borre romo futi abiro ki nucu. Wi bwom lakerubi acel ogudo kor ot, kun bwome tuŋcel ma borre futi abiro ki nucu, wiye ogudo wi bwom lakerubi wadi;
Ruth 4:12 ki bwom lakerubi man bwome acel ma borre futi abiro ki nucu-ni, wiye bene ogudo kicika ot, ki bwome mukene, ma romo futi abiro ki nucu-ni, wiye orwatte ki bwom lakerubi mukwoŋo-ni.
Ruth 4:13 Bwom cal lukerubi magi borgi muyarre oromo futi pyeradek. Gucuŋ ki tyengi ma gineno tuŋ kicika ot maditte.
Ruth 4:14 Okwoyo boŋo kicika ki boŋo ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwarre, ki boŋo camanini maberre, ma odero ki callukerubi. Tic pa Kuram i ot pa Lubaŋa (1 Luker 7.5-51)
Ruth 4:15 En dok otiyo wir aryo ma bocogi romo futi pyerabic wiye aryo, ki lalukana i wigi ma bocogi romo futi abiro ki nucu, ci oketogi i nyim ot.
Ruth 4:16 Ka dok otiyo nyor macalo tiko ŋut, ci oketogi i wi wir aryo ducu, ka dok otimo cal nyig okwer pomegranat miya acel, ci oketogi i kom nyor.
Ruth 4:17 Ocibo wir magi i nyim ot pa Lubaŋa, acel yo tuŋ acuc, ki mukene yo tuŋ acam. Ocako nyiŋ ma yo tuŋ acuc-ci ni, Jakin, ki ma yo tuŋ acam-mi olwoŋo ni Boaj.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 4 Jami ma gitiyo pi ot pa Lubaŋa
Ruth 4:724  (1 Luker 7.23-51)
Ruth 4:1 Otiyo keno tyer me mola ma borre romo futi pyeradek, ki lacce bene futi pyeradek; borre ma dok malo romo futi apar wiye abic.
Ruth 4:2 Ka dok otiyo nam me mola ma giliyo ma otwodde aduno, ma lacce romo futi apar wiye abic, nia i doge tuŋcel nio i doge tuŋcel; borre tuŋ malo romo futi abiro ki nucu. Gipimo doge ki tol ci oromo futi pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
Ruth 4:3 Ki i tere piny tye iye cal keno munyak ma orumo kom nam ducu, ma borre futi pyeraŋwen wiye abic; cal keno magi giryeyogi latyeŋ aryo, I kare ma gitiyo nam, gitiyo ki cal keno i kome lawanace!.
Ruth 4:4 Gicibo nam ocuŋ i wi cal twoni dyaŋi apar wiye aryo; giketo adek gineno yo tuŋ acam, adek gineno yo tuŋ potoceŋ, adek gineno yo tuŋ acuc, ki adek gineno yo tuŋ wokceŋ. Gicibo nam ocun i ŋe twoni-nu, kun ŋegi ducu odok tuŋ iye.
Ruth 4:5 Kome kinoŋ maromo incic adek; ki doge bene calo dog kikopo, ma, rom ki cal ature leŋa, Piine romo debe makato alip abicel.
Ruth 4:6 Ka dok otiyo otako apar me lwok, oketo abic yo tuŋ acuc, ki abic yo tuŋ acam. Magi obedo me lako jami ducu ma gitiyo kwedgi pi gitum awaŋa: nam giketo me lwok pa ajwagi.
Ruth 4:7 Dok otiyo okar-mac me jabu apar kit ma giciko-ni, oketogi i ot pa Lubaŋa; oketo abic yo tuŋ acuc ki abic yo tuŋ acam.
Ruth 4:8 En dok otiyo meja apar, oketogi i ot pa Lubaŋa, abic yo tuŋ acuc ki abic yo tuŋ acam. Dok otiyo becen me jabu miya acel.
Ruth 4:9 Ka dok oyubo dyekal pa ajwagi, ki dyekal maditte, ki kika me dyekal, omwono kom ki ka ducu ki mola;
Ruth 4:10 ka oketo nam i twok ot i kin tuŋ acuc ki tuŋ wokceŋ.
Ruth 4:11 Kuram ocweyo agulu mapol bene, ki akwaya, ki becen-gu, Kit meno Kuram otyeko tic i kom ot pa Lubaŋa pi kabaka Solomon.
Ruth 4:12 Otiyo wir aryo, ki lalukana aryo ma oluŋŋe macalo agulu ma giketo i wi wir, ki obwo aryo me umo kom lalukana aryo ma oluŋŋe ma obedo i wi wir-ri.
Ruth 4:13 Dok otiyo cal okwer pomegranat miya aŋwen pi obwo aryo-nu, kun cal pomegranat giryeyo latyeŋ aryo i kom obwo acel acel me umo kom lalukana aryo ma oluŋŋe ma obedo i wi wir.
Ruth 4:14 Otiyo bene litino gadigadi apar, ki otakomola apar ma giluto i litino gadigadi,
Ruth 4:15 ki nam acel, ki cal twoni dyaŋi apar wiye aryo ma i te nam.
Ruth 4:16 Lwak agulu ki akwaya latokke-gu, ki gin lacob riŋo, ki jami ducu ma mitte pi tic ki jami magi ma Kuram-abi otiyogi pi ot pa Rwot ki pi kabaka Solomon obedo me mola ma gijwane maleŋ.
Ruth 4:725 
Ruth 4:17 Kabaka omiyo giliyo mola meno i pwor kulu Jordan, ka ma lobo agulu tye iye, i kin Cukot ki Jereda.
Ruth 4:18 Solomon otimo gin lwak jami-nu madwoŋ twatwal, ma pek pa molane pe gikwano.
Ruth 4:19 Solomon otiyo jami ducu ma tye i ot pa Lubaŋa kit man: keno tyer me jabu, ki lwak meja me caŋo mugati ma giketo i nyim Rwot,
Ruth 4:20 okar-mac ki lwak laputgi me jabu ma giliyo maber, ma myero gubed ka lyel i kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo, kit ma giciko-ni;
Ruth 4:21 ki lwak cal ature, ki laput-gu, ki boyi lakar mac, ducu me jabu ma giliyo maber makato.
Ruth 4:22 Magac-gu, becen-gu, atabo me odok eceta, ki weer me waŋo mac otiyogi ki jabu ma giliyo maber; ki pata me ot pa Lubaŋa ma giketo i kom kika me kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo, ki i kika me kicika maditte bene, gubedo me jabu.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 5
Ruth 4:1 Tic ma Solomon otiyo i kom ot pa Rwot otum kit meno. Solomon okelo jami ma yam wonne Daudi odyero ki Rwot-ti, ci okano ryal, ki jabu, ki jami tic-gu ducu i ot kano lim ma i ot pa Lubaŋa. Solomon okelo canduk pa Rwot i ot pa Lubaŋa (1 Luker 8.1-11)
Ruth 4:2 Solomon ocoko ludoŋo pa jo Icrael ki ludito wi kaka ducu, ma gin aye lutel wi doggola pa kwarogi ma i kin jo Icrael, ci gubino i Jerucalem pi kwanyo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot ki i gaŋ kal pa Daudi, ma gilwoŋo ni Cion.
Ruth 4:3 Ci lwak jo Icrael ducu gucokke i nyim kabaka pi nino madito ma tye i dwe me abiro-ni.
Ruth 4:4 Ludoŋo pa jo Icrael ducu gubino, ci Lulevi gucako tino canduk me gicikke.
Ruth 4:5 Gutero canduk ki kema me rwatte, kacel ki jami maleŋ ducu ma yam tye i kema; ajwagi ki Lulevi gukelogi.
Ruth 4:6 Kabaka Solomon ki lwak jo Icrael ducu ma gucokke bote-ni, gubedo i nyim canduk kun gitumo romi ki twoni-gu mapol ma welgi pe kwanne dok pe nene bene.
Ruth 4:7 Kit meno ajwagi gucako kelo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot wa i kabedone ma i tyelo me ot, en aye kabedo maleŋ makato ducu-ni, ci guketo piny i te bwom lukerubi.
Ruth 4:8 Lukerubi guyaro bwomgi ka wi kabedo me canduk wek lukerubi guum wi canduk woko kacel ki tal latiŋŋe ducu.
Ruth 4:726 
Ruth 4:9 Dok tal latiŋŋe yam wigi nen ki i kabedo maleŋ ma i nyim kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo-ni; ento pe gitwero nenogi ki woko; pud gitye kunnu nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:10 Gin mo onoŋo pe tye i canduk, kono kidi aryo ma apada keken ma yam Moses oketo i iye ki i Koreb, ka ma yam Rwot oketo iye gicikke ki jo Icrael, i kare ma gia ki i lobo Ejipt.
Ruth 4:11 Ajwagi gukato woko ki i kabedo maleŋ, pien ajwagi ducu ma onoŋo gitye-ni doŋ gutyeko lonnye kekengi, ma pe giparo pi dul ticgi;
Ruth 4:12 ci Lulevi ducu ma gin luwer, Acap ki Eman, ki Jedutun, ki awobegi, ki utmegigi, onoŋo gurukke ki boŋŋi camanini mabecone, ci gimako atego agoya, ki naŋa ki opuk. Kacel kwedgi obedo ajwagi ma giromo miya acel ki pyeraryo ma gin lukut tumo
Ruth 4:13 Tic pa lukut tum ki luwer en aye me ribo dwangi kacel ka pako ki ka pwoyo Rwot, ki dwangi ma winnye maloŋo. I kare ma gucako wer, kacel ki tum ki atego agoya ki jami mukene ducu me wer, pi pako Rwot kun giwero ni, “Pien en ber, mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka,” ci deyo pa Rwot opoŋo i ot woko, en ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:14 Pienno omiyo ajwagi pe gitwero cuŋ ka tiyo ticgi, pi pol meno, pien deyo pa Rwot noŋo opoŋo i ot pa Lubaŋa woko.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 6 Kwero ot pa Lubaŋa pi tic maleŋ (1 Luker 8.12-66)
Ruth 4:1 I nino meno Solomon owacci, “Rwot otyeko wacci en ebibedo i pol macollicuc.
Ruth 4:2 Agerri doŋ ot ma ocudo malo, wek obed kabedoni ma ibedo iye matwal.”
Ruth 4:3 Ka dok kabaka olokke, ci olamo gum i kom lwak jo Icrael ma gucokke ducu, kun jo Icrael ma gucokke-ni gucuŋ mot.
Ruth 4:4 En ocako lamo gum ni, “Gipwo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma doŋ ciŋe otyeko cobo gin ma am oloko ki doge bot wora Daudi-ni, kun wacci,
Ruth 4:5 ‘Nia wa i kare ma akwanyo ki jona jo Icrael ki i Ejipt, peya ayero gaŋ mo ma i kaka ma i Icrael pi gero iye ot mo, wek nyina obed iye. Dok pe ayero laker mo me loyo jona jo Icrael;
Ruth 4:6 ento doŋ atyeko yero Jerucalem wek nyina obed kenyo, ka dok ayero Daudi me bedo lalo lwakka jo Icrael.’
Ruth 4:7 I kare-nu onoŋo wora Daudi obedo ki tam i cwinye me gero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Ruth 4:8 Ento Rwot aye owaco bot wora Daudi ni, ‘Kit macalo onoŋo doŋ tam tye i cwinyi me gero ot pi nyina, itimo ber pi keto lok meno i cwinyi.
Ruth 4:727 
Ruth 4:9 Ento pe in aye dok ibigerra ot, ento wodi ma ibinywalo aye bigero ot pi nyiŋa.’
Ruth 4:10 I kare-ni Rwot doŋ otyeko cobo gin ma en ociko i cikkene; pien an doŋ atyeko leyo ka tyen wora Daudi, doŋ atyeko bedo i wi komker pa Icrael, kit ma yam Rwot ociko-ni, dok atyeko gero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Ruth 4:11 Doŋ atyeko keto iye kabedo pa canduk pa Rwot, ma tye iye gicikke ma Rwot con oketo ki jo Icrael.”
Ruth 4:12 Solomon dok ocuŋ i nyim keno tyer pa Rwot ki i nyim lwak jo Icrael ma gucokke ducu, ocako taŋo ciŋe aryo ducu malo.
Ruth 4:13 Solomon onoŋo otiyo abam mola ma borre futi abiro ki nucu, ki acee futi abiro ki nucu, ki borre nia piny dok malo futi aŋwen ki nucu, ocibo i dyekal; en ocuŋ i wiye. Ka dok orumo coŋe piny i nyim lwak jo Icrael ducu ma gucokke, ka ocako taŋo ciŋe aryo ducu malo okemo polo,
Ruth 4:14 kun wacci, “Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, pe tye Lubaŋa mo macalo in, kadi malo i polo nyo piny i wi lobo, ma tye ka gwoko gicikkene macalo in, ma inyuto mar meri ma pe lokke bot luticci ma bedo ka lubi ki cwinygi ducu.
Ruth 4:15 Ibedo ka lubo kit gin ma yam itito bot wora Daudi, iyo, gin ma yam iloko ki dogi, icako doŋ tiyo i kare man ki ciŋi, ci ico bo ducu maber.
Ruth 4:16 Kombeddi ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, doŋ ilub gin ma yam iciko ki laticci wora Daudi, kun iwacci, ‘Pe ibibedo laboŋo danoni mo i nyima ma bibedo i wi komker pa Icrael, tekke awobeni gugwoko kitgi maber, kun gilubo cikka kit macalo ibedo kwede i nyimani.’
Ruth 4:17 Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, kombeddi mi lokki doŋ omok matek, kit ma cen iloko ki wora Daudi ma laticci.
Ruth 4:18 “Ento Lubaŋa bibedo i wi lobo-ni kacel ki dano ada? Nen, kadi oolo bene kutu ma malone twatwal-li pe romo in me bedo iye, ci ot ma agero-ni tidine rom mene kono!
Ruth 4:19 Dok in pud iciko iti ka winyo legana, an laticci, ki kit ma abako kwede doga, ai Rwot Lubaŋana, doŋ iwiny koko ki lega ma atye ka lego i nyimi tin;
Ruth 4:20 wek waŋi obed twolo onen ot man dyeceŋ ki dyewor, en aye kabedo ma yam iwaco pire ni ibiketo iye nyiŋi, wek ibed ka winyo legana ma akelo boti kun alokke akemo kabedo man atir.
Ruth 4:21 Dok iwiny bako dog laticci ki pa joni jo Icrael, i kare ma walego wakemo kabedo man atir; iyo, in doŋ ibed ka winyone ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni; ci ka doŋ ityeko winyone, doŋ iwek balwa.
Ruth 4:22 “Ka ce dano mo otimo bal i kom wadi mo, ci gimiye okwono kwon mo pire, ka obino ce okwoŋo kwoŋŋe ki i nyim keno tyerri ma i ot man,
Ruth 4:728 
Ruth 4:23 ci in Lubaŋa iwiny ki i polo, iket i tic; ŋol kop pa laticci-ni, imi kop olo dano mutiŋo alii, kun iketo gin ma en otimo i wiye kene, dok imi dano ma pe obalo olo kop, kun itime ber muporo leŋcwinye.
Ruth 4:24 “Ka ce mony pa lumerok guloyo jonijo Icrael pi balgi ma gutimo i komi, ka ce guŋut gudwogo boti, ci gucako tuco nyiŋi, ma gilego in ka gibako doggi boti ki i ot man,
Ruth 4:25 ci iwinygi ki polo, iwek bal pa joni jo Icrael, ka dok idwokgi cen wa i lobo ma yam i miyo bot kwarogi.
Ruth 4:26 “Ka ce polo ocegge woko, ma kot mo pe ocwer pi lakit balgi mo i komi, ka ce lwakki gucako lega kun gukemo kabedo man, kun gituco nyiŋi, ka guŋut ci gubwoto balgi, ki i kare ma iketo can i komgi-ni,
Ruth 4:27 ci in Lubaŋa iwinygi ki i polo, iwek bal pa luticci, gin joni jo Icrael, dok ipwonygi ki yo maber ma myero gulubi; ci doŋ imi kot ocwer i loboni-ni ma yam imiyo bot lwakki obed megi.
Ruth 4:28 “Ka ce kec opoto i lobo, ka two gemo opoto, nyo ka bel obwarre nyo odoko ocone, nyo ka bonyo opoto nyo okwil obino, ka ce merokgi orumogi i gaŋigi mogo nyo kadi bed kit gemo aŋo, nyo kit two mo-ni,
Ruth 4:29 ka ce lwakki gucako lega nyo bako doggi, kadi bed dano acel kok boti, nyo joni jo Icrael ducu, kun dano acel acel ŋeyo kit atwomme kene, ki cwercwinye bene, ka ce otaŋo ciŋe okemo ki ot man;
Ruth 4:30 ci in Lubaŋa iwinygi ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni, iwek balgi. Tim dano acel acel kit ma iŋeyo kwede cwinye, ma rwatte ki kit kwone ducu, pien in aye, in keni, iŋeyo kit cwiny pa dano ducu;
Ruth 4:31 meno bimiyo gibedo ka lworo in kun gilubo yo meri nino ducu ma gibedo, iye i lobo ma yam imiyo bot kwarowa.
Ruth 4:32 “Obed kit meno bene ka ce larok mo, ma pe joni jo Icrael, obino kany ma oa ki i lobo mo mabor, ma obino pi nyiŋi madit-ti, ki badi matek-ki, ki ciŋi ma iryeyo, ka ce larok obino ce ocako lega ma okemo ot man,
Ruth 4:33 ci in Lubaŋa iwiny ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni, itim kit gin ducu ma larok-ki okok kwede i nyimi, wek rok ma wi lobo ducu guŋe nyiŋi, gucak lwori, kit ma I wakki jo Icrael gilwori-ni, dok wek guŋe maber ni, ot man ma agero-ni, gilwoŋo ki nyiŋi keken.
Ruth 4:34 “Ka ce lwakki gucito ka lwenyo i kom lumerokgi i kabedo mo ducu ma icwalogi iye, ka ce gukelo legagi boti ma gukemo gaŋ man ma in iyero, ki ot man ma agero pi nyiŋi-ni,
Ruth 4:35 ci in iwiny legagi ki bako doggi ki i polo, ci ikony korgi macalo ineno ni lokgi tye atir.
Ruth 4:729 
Ruth 4:36 “Ka ce gutimo bal i komi, pien pe tye dano mo ma pe balo, ka ce kiniga omaki i komgi, ci imiyogi i ciŋ lamerok mo, ma oyakogi ci oterogi i opii wa i lobo mo ka mabor nyo ka ma cok;
Ruth 4:37 ento ka cwinygi otamo lok ki i lobo ma giterogi iye i opii-ni, ce guŋut ci gubako doggi boti ki i lobo ma gitye iye i opii, kun gikok ni, ‘Wabalo, watyeko ŋak woko ata, watiyo lwak bal-gu mapol’,
Ruth 4:38 ka ce gutyeko ŋut Ici tamgi ducu ki cwinygi ducu, ki i lobo ka ma giterogi iye i opii-ni, kun doŋ gilego i nyimi ma gukemo lobogi, ma yam imiyo bot kwarogi-ni, ki gaŋ ma nene iyero, ki ot ma atyeko gerone pi nyiŋi,
Ruth 4:39 in Lubaŋa iwiny legagi ki bako doggi ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni, ci iye konyo korgi ka ce ineno ni lokgi tye atir, dok iwek bal pa joni ma gubalo i komi.
Ruth 4:40 Ai Lubaŋa, kombeddi doŋ wek waŋi obed twolo ci icik iti iwiny lega ma gilego i kabedo man.
Ruth 4:41 “A malo, ai Rwot Lubaŋa, ci idony i kabedo me yweyoni, in ki canduk me tekki. Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, wek ajwagini gurukke ki larre, wek joni maleŋ cwinygi obed yom pi berri.
Ruth 4:42 Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, pe ikwer lega pa lakerri ma giwiro! Po pi mar meri ma pe lokke i kom laticci Daudi.”
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 7
Ruth 4:1 Ka Solomon doŋ otyeko legane, ci mac obino piny ma a ki i polo, owaŋo gitum awaŋa ki gitum mu kene ducu, ci deyo pa Rwot opoŋo i ot pa Lubaŋa woko.
Ruth 4:2 Ajwagi doŋ pe gitwero donyo i ot pa Rwot, pien deyo pa Rwot opoŋo i ot pa Rwot woko.
Ruth 4:3 Ka jo Icrael ducu guneno mac obino piny, ki deyo pa Rwot oboyo kom ot pa Lubaŋa woko, gukulo wigi piny aryeba ic i dyekal ma gipeto iye godi, gumiyo woro ki pwoc bo! Rwot, kun giwacci, “Pien en ber, mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka.”
Ruth 4:4 Ka dok kabaka ki jo Icrael ducu gucako tyero gitum i nyim Rwot.
Ruth 4:5 Kabaka Solomon otyero gityer ma romo twoni dyaŋi alip pyeraryo wiye aryo, ki romi alip miya acel ki pyeraryo. Kabaka ki jo Icrael ducu gukwero ot pa Lubaŋa kit meno.
Ruth 4:6 Ajwagi gucuŋ i kabedogi, kacel ki Lulevi ma gumako jami me wer megi me pako Rwot, kit ma yam kabaka Daudi oyubo pi miyo pwoc bot Rwot, ni, pien mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka. Meno timme i kare ducu ma yam Daudi pako iye Lubaŋa, kun gin gikonye ki jami wergi. Ki jo ma gucuŋ ma gukemogi gin ajwagi ma gikuto tum, kun noŋo jo Icrael ducu gucuŋ mot.
Ruth 4:730 
Ruth 4:7 Solomon dok ocako kwero kabedo ma i cwiny dyekal ma tye i nyim ot pa Rwot- ti. En otyero kunnu gitum awaŋa, ki moo dwolo-gu me gityer lakwecwiny, pien keno tyer me mola ma Solomon otiyo-ni onoŋo tidi twatwal, pe romo keto iye gitum awaŋa kacel ki gityer me moko kwon ki dwolo-gu.
Ruth 4:8 I kare meno Solomon okwero nino madito pi nino abiro kulu, kacel ki jo Icrael ducu. Onoŋo lwak gucokke madwoŋ, kun gua wa i yo ma donyo i Kamat nio wa i nota ora me Ejipt.
Ruth 4:9 I nino me aborone gubedo ki cokke madit; pien gubedo ki lega me kwero keno tyer nino abiro kulu, ki nino madito mukene bene nino abiro.
Ruth 4:10 I kom nino dwe pyeraryo wiye adek i dwe me abiro en aye Solomon ocwalo lwak gudok woko tugi. Lwak gudok i pacogi ki yomcwiny madwoŋ, ma igi okwe pi gin ducu mabeco ma Rwot otimo pi Daudi ki pi Solomon ki pi lwakke jo Icrael. Rwot onyutte bot Solomon tyen me aryo (1 Luker 9.1-9)
Ruth 4:11 Kit meno Solomon otyeko gero ot pa Rwot ki ode en kabaka bene; tic ducu ma yam en oyubo me atiya i ot pa Rwot ki i ode en ocobo maber twatwal.
Ruth 4:12 Ci Rwot onen bot Solomon i dyewor kun wacce ni, “Atyeko winyo legani, doŋ atyeko yero kabedo man obed mera me bedo ot ka ma gibityero iye gitum bota.
Ruth 4:13 Ka ce acego polo ma kot doŋ pe cwer, nyo ka ce aciko ni bonyo ocam cam ma i lobo otyek woko, nyo ka ce acwalo two gemo opoto i kom lwakka,
Ruth 4:14 ka ce lwakka ma gilwoŋogi ki nyiŋa-ni gumwolle woko, ce gulego ma gimito an kikoma, ka guweko kit timgi maraco, ci dok abiwinyogi ki i polo, ci abikwanyo gin ma tye ka balo lo bogi, ka dok abiweko balgi.
Ruth 4:15 Cakke tin waŋa bibedo twolo, dok abiciko ita ka winyo lega ma gibilego i kabedo man.
Ruth 4:16 Pien tin an doŋ atyeko yero ot man, dok atyeko lonyone odoko maleŋ, wek nyiŋa obed iye matwal; dok waŋa ki cwinya bikemo kunnu matwal.
Ruth 4:17 Ki ma tuŋ boti, ka ce ibibedo ki kit kwo i nyima ma yam woru Daudi obedo kwede-ni, ce ka itiyo gin ma aciko ducu, kun igwoko cik ma aketo, ki gin ma doŋ aŋolo,
Ruth 4:18 ci an Lubaŋani abimoko komkerri me loyo Icrael matwal, kit ma yam aciko bot woru Daudi kun awacce ni, ‘Pe ibibedo laboŋo danoni mo ma biloyo jo Icrael.’
Ruth 4:19 “Ento ka ce wuŋak woko, ma wubwoto lubo cikka ki mako lok ma aciko ma aketogi i nyimwu, ce wukobo woko ka tiyo bot lubaŋa mogo mukene kun wuworogi,
Ruth 4:731 
Ruth 4:20 ci miyo abiputowu woko ki i lobo ma yam amiyowu-ni; dok abikwanyo waŋa woko, pe dok neno kom ot man ma atyeko lonyo odoko maleŋ pi nyiŋa-ni; miyo nyiŋ Icrael bi doko carolok ki lok aboka i kin rok ducu.
Ruth 4:21 Jo ducu ma bikato ki ka ŋet ot man madit twatwal-li gibiuro ki jwat kun giwacci; ‘Kit lok aŋo mumiyo Rwot otimo lobo-ni ki ot man ki tim macalo man?’
Ruth 4:22 Ka dok gibiwacci, ‘Pien gubwoto Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwarogi ma yam okwanyogi ki, i lobo Ejipt, ci gukobo bot lubaŋa mogo mukene, dok gubedo ka worogi ma kun gitiyo botgi bene; en aye lok mumiyo Rwot omiyo can opoto i komgi magwa- ni.’ ”
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 8 Tic mukene ma Solomon otiyo (1 Luker 9.10-28)
Ruth 4:1 Gero odi aryo-ni ma Solomon ogero, gin aye ot pa Rwot ki ot pa kabaka, otero mwaka pyeraryo kulu.
Ruth 4:2 Solomon dok ogero gaŋi odoco ma yam Kuram omiyogi bote, ci omiyo jo Icrael gubedo i igi.
Ruth 4:3 Solomon dok ocito i Kamat-joba, ci omako woko.
Ruth 4:4 En ogero Tadmor ma i tim, ki gaŋi ducu me kano cam ma ogerogi i Kamat.
Ruth 4:5 Dok en ogero Bet-koron Mamalo ki Bet-koron Mapiny orumo gaŋi magi ki cel gogo, oketo iye doggola ma gicego ki rii.
Ruth 4:6 Ogero Baalat bene, ki gaŋi ducu me kano cam ma yam Solomon tye kwedgi, ki gaŋi me keto gadigadi mony, ki gaŋi pa lulweny ma giriŋo ki aguragura, ki kit gedo ducu ma yam Solomon omito gerogi i Jerucalem, ki i Lebanon, ki i lobo ma en loyo ducu.
Ruth 4:7 Jo ducu ma yam gubwot ci gudoŋ ki i kom jo Kit, jo Amor, jo Periji, jo Kiv ki jo Jebuc, ma pe gin jo Icrael,
Ruth 4:8 gin aye Solomon oketo tic muroni i wigi, kit macalo tye-ni nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:9 Ento Solomon pe odiyo jo Icrael i tic me opii; gin gubedo askari, ki luditone, ki ludito me gadigadi monnye, ki lulweny ma giriŋo ki aguragurane.
Ruth 4:10 Jo magi gin aye ludito tic pa Kabaka Solomon ma giloyo dog tic ducu; giromo miya aryo ki pyerabic, gin aye giloyo lwak.
Ruth 4:11 Solomon okelo nya pa Parao nia ki i gaŋ kal pa Daudi otero i ot ma en ogero pire, pien owacci, “Dakona pe bibedo i ot pa Daudi kabaka me Icrael, pien kabedo ducu ma doŋ canduk pa Rwot obino iye-ni odoko kabedo maleŋ.”
Ruth 4:12 Dok Solomon obedo ka tyero gitum awaŋa i wi keno tyer pa Rwot ma yam en ocano i nyim kicika ot ma i doggola me ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:732 
Ruth 4:13 En obedo ka miyo gityer kit ma tic me nino acel acel mito kwede, kun lubo cik pa Moses i cen cabit ducu, ki i por dwe, ki i nino madito adek me mwaka ki mwaka-ni, ma gin aye nino madito me Mugati ma Tobi Pe Iye, nino madit me kwero Agikki Cabit Abiro, ki nino madito me Bolo.
Ruth 4:14 Kit macalo yam wonne Daudi ociko, en oketo lwak dul pa ajwagi ki dog ticgi, ki Lulevi gi dog ticgi me pako Lubaŋa ki me tic i nyim ajwagi, muporo tic me nino acel acel. Opoko bene tic pi lugwok doggola ducu ki dulgi i doggola acel acel, kit ma Daudi ma dano pa Lubaŋa yam ociko.
Ruth 4:15 Gin gubedo ka lubo cik ma kabaka ociko ki ajwagi ki Lulevi, pe guweko gin mo ma mako lok ducu, ki ma mako kano lim.
Ruth 4:16 Solomon otyeko ticce ducu kit meno, cakke i nino ma giketo iye guti me te ot pa Rwot nio ka otum, Ot pa Rwot otum kit meno.
Ruth 4:17 Solomon dok ocito wa i Ejiongeber ki i Elot ma i dog nam, ma i lobo Edom.
Ruth 4:18 Kuram yam ocwalo luticce ki mel bot Solomon; en ocwalo luticce ma guŋiyo ki nam, ci gucito wa i Opir kacel ki lutic pa Solomon, guomo jabu ma romo talanta miya aŋwen ki pyerabic ki kunnu, gukelo bot kabaka Solomon.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 9 Kabaka ma dako me lobo Ceba olimo Solomon (1 Luker 10.1-13)
Ruth 4:1 I kare ma kabaka ma dako me lobo Ceba owinyo pi yweka pa Solomon, en obino bote i Jerucalem ka temo iye ki peny matego, Obino ki lwak jo madito mapol ma gicom i kore, kacel ki lwak kinaga-gu ma giyweyo aŋwece, ki jabu madwoŋ twatwal, ki litino godi me wel-gu. Ka obino bot Solomon, ci ocako titte lok ducu ma onoŋo tye i cwinye.
Ruth 4:2 Solomon odok iye i pennye ducu; pe onoŋo tye lok mo wacel ma okanne ki bot Solomon ma pe romo tucone bot dako-nu.
Ruth 4:3 Ka kabaka ma dako me Ceba oneno ryeko pa Solomon ducu, ki ot ma en ogero,
Ruth 4:4 ki cam ma i wi mejane, ki kit kabedo pa luditone, ki tic pa luticce, ki boŋŋime arukagi, ki lutiŋ kikopo-gu, ci tam otum woko ki i cwinye.
Ruth 4:5 Owaco bot kabaka ni, “Lok ducu ma i komi ma yam gitero bota ki i lobona, ki lok i kom ryekoni bene, onoŋo lokke tye kakare,
Ruth 4:6 ento yam pe aye lok ma gitero bota ducu, nio ka abino aneno ki waŋa. Ci nen, kadi wa nucu ryekoni maditte onoŋo pe gititta kulu, pien ryekoni ki lonyoni kato lok dog ma giterra awinyo-ni.
Ruth 4:7 Monni gitye ki yomcwiny kuman! Luticci magi ducu gitye ki yomcwiny ma rom mene, ma gibedo ka cuŋ i nyimi jwijwi ka winyo lok me ryekoni!
Ruth 4:733 
Ruth 4:8 Gipwo Rwot Lubaŋani ma cwinye opwoyo in ci oketi i wi komker me bedo kabaka pi Rwot Lubaŋani! Pien Lubaŋani omaro jo Icrael matwal, dok omito mokogi gubed matek, en aye omiyo en oketi ibedo kabaka ma loyogi, wek ibed ka ŋolo kop atir dok kakare.”
Ruth 4:9 En omiyo bot Solomon jabu madwoŋ ma romo talanta miya acel ki pyeraryo, ki lwak aŋwece mapatpat madwoŋ twatwal, ki lwak litino godi me wel, I kare ca onoŋo pe tye aŋwece mukene macalo meno ma kabaka me Ceba omiyo bot Solomon-ni.
Ruth 4:10 Ka dok lutic pa Kuram ki lutic pa Solomon ma onoŋo gukelo jabu nia ki i Opir, gukelo wa ki bao yat algum ki lwak godi matino me wel.
Ruth 4:11 Kabaka otiyo ki bao yat algum pi jeŋo kor ot pa Rwot ki kor ot pa kabaka. Otiyo kwede opuk bene ki naŋa pa luwer. Kit jami macalo meno onoŋo peya yam onen kulu i lobo Juda.
Ruth 4:12 Kabaka Solomon omiyo bot kabaka ma dako me Ceba jami ducu ma cwinye omito, omiye gin ducu ma openyo, ma pe giribo iye jami ma onoŋo en okelo bot kabaka. Kit meno kabaka me Ceba ocako wot me dok wa i lobone kikome, kacel ki luticce ducu. Lonyo pa Solomon ki ywekane (1 Luker 10.14-29)
Ruth 4:13 Lwak jabu ma obino bot Solomon i mwaka acel acel pekke oromo talanta miya abicel ki pyerabicel wiye abicel
Ruth 4:14 ma pe giribo iye ma lucat-wil gukelo; luker pa jo Arabia, ki ludito ma loyo lobo bene gukelo jabu ki ryal bot Solomon.
Ruth 4:15 Kabaka Solomon otiyo lwak kwodi madoŋo miya aryo me jabu, ma gitetogi ki nyol; i kom kwot acel acel odonyo iye jabu ma pekke romo cekel miya abicel.
Ruth 4:16 Dok otiyo kwodi matinone miya adek me jabu ma gitetogi ki nyol, kun kwot acel acel giteto ki jabu ma pekke cok romo ratili apar, Kabaka oketogi i ot ma gilwoŋo ni, Buŋa me Lebanon.
Ruth 4:17 Kabaka dok otiyo komker madit me lak lyec, ci omwono kome woko ki jabu ma giliyo maber.
Ruth 4:18 Komker meno onoŋo tye ki rwomme abicel ki kom me jabu me teno tyen, ma gikubogi i kom komker. Ka ŋete tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi giketo iye ka teno ciŋ dano, ki labwor aryo gucuŋ ka ŋet bad kom me teno ciŋ,
Ruth 4:19 kun tye bene lwak labwor apar wiye aryo ma gucuŋ i agikki rwom abicel-li, tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi. Pe tye kom mo ma gitiyo ma cal ki meno i te ker ducu.
Ruth 4:734 
Ruth 4:20 Jami ducu ma yam kabaka Solomon mato kwede onoŋo me jabu keken, wa jami ducu ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot Buŋa me Lebanon yam gitiyogi ki jabu ma giliyo maber; i kare pa Solomon pe tye ŋatti mo ma tamo pi ryal.
Ruth 4:21 Onoŋo kabaka tye ki lwak mel ma giwoto Tarcic kacel ki mel pa Kuram, Mel me Tarcic yam dwogo cen ka mwaka okato adek adek kun gikelo lwak jabu ki ryal ki lak lyec-gu, ki ayom-gu ki gunya-gu.
Ruth 4:22 Kabaka Solomon obedo dit makato lwak luker ma wi lobo ducu pi lonyone ki pi ryekone.
Ruth 4:23 Lwak luker ducu me wi lobo gubedo ka yenyo kit yo me neno waŋ Solomon ki pi winyo kit ryekone-gu ma Lubaŋa oketo i cwinyeni.
Ruth 4:24 Dano acel acel yam tero motte bote, kun gitero jami me ryal ki me jabu-gu, ki ginaruka-gu, ki odok murra, ki aŋwece, ki aguragura-gu, ki kana-gu, mwaka ki mwaka.
Ruth 4:25 Solomon tye ki loc aguragura alip aŋwen pi aguragura ki gadigadi lwennye, ki lulweny ma giriŋo ki aguragura alip apar wiye aryo, En yam oketo mogo i gaŋi me gadigadi lweny ki mukene gubedo bot kabaka i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:26 En oloyo luker ducu cakke wa i kulu Euprate nio kwede i lobo pa jo Piliciti, ki i wan lobo me Ejipt.
Ruth 4:27 Kabaka yam omiyo ryal odoko gin ma lam ma rom ki gweŋ-gu i Jerucalem, dok okelo yadi cedar mapol ata ma rom ki olam ma i bar Cepela.
Ruth 4:28 Solomon yam limo aguragura ma a ki i Ejipt ki i lobo ducu. To pa Solomon (1 Luker 11.41-43)
Ruth 4:29 Lok kom Solomon mudoŋŋe ducu, nia i acakki nio i agikkine, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro ma lanebi Natan ocoyo, ki i kin lok pa Lubaŋa ma Akija ma jo Cilo otito, ka dok i buk me lok kom gin ma Iddo ma lanen oneno ma okemo kom Jeroboam wod pa Nebat.
Ruth 4:30 Kare ma Solomon oloyo kwede jo Icrael kun bedo i Jerucalem oromo mwaka pyeraŋwen.
Ruth 4:31 Solomon oto ci oywe kacel ki kwarine, ka giyike i gaŋ kai pa wonne Daudi. Rekoboam ma wode aye oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 10 Jemo pa jo Icrael i kom Rekoboam (1 Luker 12.1-24)
Ruth 4:1 Rekoboam ocito i Cekem, pien onoŋo jo Icrael gumol gucito i Cekem ka keto en me bedo kabaka.
Ruth 4:735 
Ruth 4:2 Ka Jeroboam wod pa Nebat owinyo pire, ci oa ki i Ejipt odok cen; pien onoŋo Jeroboam yam pud tye i Ejipt ka ma yam oriŋo iye kabaka Solomon.
Ruth 4:3 Gicwalo lukwena ka lwoŋe, ci Jeroboam ki lwak jo Icrael ma gucokke ducu guwaco bot Rekoboam ni,
Ruth 4:4 “Woru oketo yec mapek i komwa. In doŋ ilok tic matego ma woru omiyowa, ki yec mapek ma en oketo i komwa-ni, obed mayot, ci wan wabibedo luticci.”
Ruth 4:5 En ogamo ni, “Wudwog bota kany i ŋe nino adek.” Ci lwak gudok cen.
Ruth 4:6 Kabaka Rekoboam ocako yubo lok ki ludoŋo muteggi, ma yam gicuŋ i nyim wonne Solomon i kare ma en pud kwo, ci openyogi ni, “Wun wumiya kit tam aŋo wek adok iye ki lwak man?”
Ruth 4:7 Gin guwacce ni, “Ka ce kica bimaki i kom lwak man, ma ikweyo cwinygi, kun iloko botgi lok ducu mabeco, ci gin bene gibibedo Luticci matwal.”
Ruth 4:8 Ento en obwoto tam pa ludoŋo muteggi woko, ocako dok yubo lok ki awobe ma yalwakke, ma gicuŋ i nyime.
Ruth 4:9 Openyogi ni, “Wun wumiya kit tam aŋo wek adok iye ki lwak man ma gupenya ni, ‘Wek yec ma woru oketo i komwa mapek-ki obed yot’?”
Ruth 4:10 Ci awobe ma yalwakke guwacce ni, “Ibidok iye ki lwak ma gupenyi kit man ni, ‘Woru yam omiyo yecwa odoko pek, ento in imi obed yot botwa’; in ibidok iye ki gin kit man ni, ‘Nyig ciŋa kinoŋ makato pyer wora.
Ruth 4:11 Doŋ abitiyo kit man: wora yam oketo yec mapek i komwu, an dok abimedone bedo mapek. Wora yam opwodowu ki del anino, an abipwodowu ki yib oton.’ ”
Ruth 4:12 Jeroboam ki lwak ducu gubino bot Rekoboam i kom nino me adekke, kit ma yam kabaka ociko ni, “Wudwog cen bota i nino me adekke.”
Ruth 4:13 Kabaka ocako dok i peny pa lwak ki gero, pien oweko tam ma ludoŋo muteggi gumiye.
Ruth 4:14 Kabaka Rekoboam oloko ki lwak kit ma awobe guyubo kun wacci, “Wora yam omiyo yecwu odoko pek, ento an abimedone bedo mapek; wora yam pwodowu ki del anino, an abipwodowu ki yib oton.”
Ruth 4:15 Kabaka pe owinyo lok pa lwak; pien Rwot aye omiyo okwero, wek lokke ocobbe kakare ma, yam en oloko bot Jeroboam wod pa Nebat kun ocwalo Akija ma jo Cilo ocito otitte-ni.
Ruth 4:16 Ka jo Icrael ducu guneno ni kabaka pe owinyogi, ci lwak gudok iye ki kaba ka ni, “Wan watye ki waŋ pokwa aŋo i kom Daudi? Pe watye ki dul mo i kom latin pa Yece. Wun jo Icrael wudok i kemawu! In Daudi, doŋ inen odi keni.” Ci jo Icrael gucako pokke woko, gudok i pacogi.
Ruth 4:17 Ento Rekoboam pud loyo jo Icrael ma gibedo i gaŋi ma i Juda.
Ruth 4:736 
Ruth 4:18 Kabaka Rekoboam ocwalo Adoram, ladit ma loyo tic muroni, ci jo Icrael ducu gucako cele ki got, guneke woko, Kabaka Rekoboam orune oito i wi gadigadi lwennye, ci oriŋo kwede woko wa i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:19 Kit meno jo Icrael gucako jemo woko i kom ot pa Daudi nio kwede wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 11 Lok ma lanebi Cemaya otito (1 Luker 12.21-24)
Ruth 4:1 Ka Rekoboam odwogo cen i Jerucalem, ci ocoko jo ma giyero ki i ot pa Juda ki i kin jo Benjamin, twoni lweny alip miya acel ki pyeraboro, pi lweny i kom jo Icrael wek gidwok ker bot Rekoboam.
Ruth 4:2 Ento lok pa Rwot obino bot dano pa Lubaŋa ma nyiŋe Cemaya, kun wacci,
Ruth 4:3 “Wac ki Rekoboam wod pa Solomon ma kabaka me Juda, ki bot jo ducu me ot pa Juda ki jo Benjamin ni,
Ruth 4:4 ‘Rwot owaco kuman ni, Wun pe wubicito ka lweny i kom lutuwu ma gin jo Icrael. Wek dano acel acel odok cen i pacone, pien lok man oa ki bota.’ ” Gin ducu guwinyo lok pa Rwot, ci gudok cen i pacogi, pe dok gucito ka lweny i kom Jeroboam. Lonyo pa Rekoboam
Ruth 4:5 Rekoboam obedo i Jerucalem, ogero gaŋi gogo me mony i Juda.
Ruth 4:6 Ogero Beterekem, Etam, Tekoa,
Ruth 4:7 Bet-jur, Coko, Adulam,
Ruth 4:8 Gat, Mareca, Jip,
Ruth 4:9 Adoraim, Lakic, Ajeka,
Ruth 4:10 Jora, Aijalon, ki Kebron, gin ducu gaŋi ma girumo ki cel gogo ma gitye i Juda ki i Benjamin.
Ruth 4:11 En oyubo cel gogo ducu obedo matek, oketo ludito mony i igi, okano iye cam, ki moo ki koŋo vino.
Ruth 4:12 Ka dok oketo kwodi ki toŋi i gaŋi ducu, ci omiyogi gubedo matek mada. Kit meno Juda ki Benjamin gudoŋ i te locce.
Ruth 4:13 Ajwagi ducu pa Lubaŋa ki Lulevi ma yam gitye i lobo Icrael gua ki i kabedogi ducu, gubino ka bedo i ŋete.
Ruth 4:14 Lulevi gubwoto lobo ma gibedo iye gudok wa i Juda ki i Jerucalem, pien Jeroboam ki likwayone gukwero woko ni pe doŋ guti tic macalo ajwagi pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:737 
Ruth 4:15 Jeroboam oketo ajwagine ma en oyero me tic i wan jogi ma i wi godi, ki bot jogi ma calo nyogi dyegi, ki bot cal litino twoni ma en otiyo.
Ruth 4:16 Jo ma yam guketo cwinygi ka cito bot Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael gulubo kor ajwagi pa Rwot ki Lulevi, nia ki i kaka pa jo Icrael ducu, guwoto Jerucalem ka tyero gitum bot Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarogi.
Ruth 4:17 Gujiŋo ker pa Juda matek, gumiyo Rekoboam wod pa Solomon obedo matek pi mwaka adek, pien gubedo ka lubo kit pa Daudi ki Solomon pi mwaka adek.
Ruth 4:18 Rekoboam onyomo Makalat nya pa Jerimot wod pa Daudi, Min Makalat obedo Abikail nya pa Eliab ma wod pa Yece.
Ruth 4:19 Makalat onywalo ki Rekoboam litino awobe magi, Jeuc, Cemaria ki Jakam.
Ruth 4:20 Ka dok ki i ŋeye en onyomo Maaka nya pa Abcalom ci onywalo kwede Abija, Atai, Jija, ki Celomit.
Ruth 4:21 Rekoboam omaro Maaka nya pa Abcalom makato monne ducu ki mon aŋecane- gu. En yam onyomo mon apar wiye aboro ci obedo ki mon aŋecane pyerabicel kulu; onywalo awobe pyeraryo wiye aboro ki anyira pyerabicel.
Ruth 4:22 Rekoboam oketo wode Abija latin pa Maaka me bedo ladit ma loyo wi omegine, pien yam onoŋo omito keto en me bedo kabaka.
Ruth 4:23 Rehoboain obedo ka tic ki ryeko, opoko awobene mogo i dul lobo ducu ma i Juda ki Benjamin, oketogi i gaŋi me cel gogo ducu, opoko botgi cam madwoŋ, dok bene onyomo botgi mon.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 12 Cicak omonyo jo Juda (1 Luker 14.21-31)
Ruth 4:1 Ka ker pa Rekoboam doŋ omoko maber, kun medde ki cuŋ matek, en kacel ki jo Icrael ducu gucako bwoto cik pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:2 I mwaka me loc pa Rekoboam me abicce, en aye Cicak kabaka me Ejipt obino kwede ka lweny i kom jo Jerucalem, pien gubwoto Rwot woko.
Ruth 4:3 Gubino ki gadigadi lweny alip acel ki miya aryo, ki lulweny ma giriŋo ki aguragura alip pyerabicel. Lwakjo ma welgi pe kwanne gubino kwede ma gua ki i Ejipt, jo Libya, jo Cukiim, ki jo Etiopia.
Ruth 4:4 Ci omako gaŋi ma girumo ki cel gogo ma i Juda ducu nio kwede wa i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:5 Cemaya ma lanebi ocito bot Rekoboam ki bot rwodi me Juda, ma onoŋo gucokke i Jerucalem pi Cicak owaco botgi ni, “Rwot owaco kuman ni, ‘Wun wuryeko bwoto an woko, pi meno an bene atyeko miyowu i ciŋ Cicak.’ “
Ruth 4:6 Rwodi me Icrael kacel ki kabaka gumwolle woko, omiyo guwacci, “Rwot lokke tye kakare.”
Ruth 4:738 
Ruth 4:7 Ka Rwot oneno ni gumwolle kengi, lok pa Rwot obino bot Cemaya ma wacci, “Gin gumwolle kengi; pe doŋ abityekogi woko, ento doŋ abilarogi, pe doŋ abitoyo akemona i kom Jerucalem ki cin Cicak.
Ruth 4:8 Ento gibibedo luticce, ka wek guŋe tic kweda ki dok me tic ki luloc me lobo mukene bene.”
Ruth 4:9 Kit meno Cicak kabaka me Ejipt ocako bino ka lweny i kom Jerucalem, ci oyako jami ma gikano i ot lim pa Rwot, ki jami ma gikano i ot lim pa kabaka. En oyako woko ducu, dok oyako lwak kwodi me jabu ma yam Solomon otiyogi.
Ruth 4:10 Kabaka Rekoboam dok otiyo lwak kwodi mukene; otiyo kwodi mola, ci omiyogi i ciŋ ludito pa lugwok kabaka ma gigwoko doggola ot pa kabaka.
Ruth 4:11 I kare ducu ma noŋo kabaka cito i ot pa Rwot, lugwok en yam gimako kwodi, ka dok gidwoko kakagi i ot kicika pa lugwok kabaka.
Ruth 4:12 Ka doŋ en omwolle kene ci akemo pa Rwot oa woko i kome, ci pe miyo gityekogi woko liweŋ, dok piny onoŋo ber i Juda.
Ruth 4:13 Kit meno Rekoboam omoko ker mere matek i Jerucalem dok obedo ka loc bene, Rekoboam ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte romo pyeraŋwen wiye acel, obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka apar wiye abiro, Jerucalem ma en aye gaŋ ma yam Rwot oyero ki i kin kaka ducu me lerael pi keto iye nyiŋe. Nyiŋ minne Naama ma anyira Ammon.
Ruth 4:14 En con obedo ka tiyo gin marac, pien pe oketo cwinye ka yenyo Rwot.
Ruth 4:15 Lok kom Rekoboam mudoŋŋe ducu, nia i acakki nio i agikkine, gityeko coyone i buk me Tekwaro ma lanebi Cemaya ocoyo, ki i buk pa Iddo ma lanen, Lweny yam obedo tye i kin Rekobo am ki Jeroboam pi kare ducu ma pe gik.
Ruth 4:16 Rekoboam oto, oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyiko kacel ki kwarine i gaŋ kai pa Daudi; wode Abija aye oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 13 Loc pa Abija (1 Luker 15.1-8)
Ruth 4:1 I mwaka me apar wiye aboro me loc pa kabaka Jeroboam, en aye Abija ocako loyo iye jo Juda.
Ruth 4:2 Obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka adek, Nyiŋ minne Mikaya ma nya pa Uriel me Gibea. Lweny obedo tye i kin Abija ki Jeroboam.
Ruth 4:3 Abija yam ocito ka lweny kun woto ki monnye ma gin oteka lweny, ma giromo alip miya aŋwen ma giyerogi ayera, Ci Jeroboam orwayo monnye cok ka lweny i ko me ki jo ma giyerogi matego alip miya aboro, ma gin twoni lweny.
Ruth 4:739 
Ruth 4:4 Abija ocuŋ i wi got Jemaraim ma tye i lobo gotgot ma i lobo Epraim, kun wacci, “Winy lokka, in Jeroboam ki wun jo Icrael ducu!”
Ruth 4:5 Pe wuŋeyo mono ni Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael omiyo ker bot Daudi ki likwaye i gicikke ma gimoko ki kado, me loyo Icrael matwal?
Ruth 4:6 Jeroboam wod pa Nebat, ma latic pa Solomon wod pa Daudi, pud dok ojemo woko i kom rwode.
Ruth 4:7 Jo mogo ma konygi pe ma kitgi obedo atata gucokke bote, ci gubalo Rekoboam wod pa Solomon woko. Pien onoŋo Rekoboam pud t idi ma timme bene pud woto atata, dok pe otwero kwero tamgi.
Ruth 4:8 “Nen kombeddi wumito kwanyo ker pa Rwot woko ki i cin likwayo pa Daudi, pien wun wutye lwak madwoŋ, dok wutye bene ki cal litino twoni me jabu ma Jeroboam otiyo me bedo lubaŋawu.
Ruth 4:9 Wun pe doŋ wuryemo ajwagi pa Rwot woko, ma gin likwayo pa Aron, ki Lulevi, ka dok wuketo ajwagi piwu kenwu macalo jo ma i lobo mukene-ni? Ka ŋat mo obino, tekke okwero ko me kekene ki wod twon nyo nyogi romi abiro, ci tugi doko ajwaka cut pi jogiwu ma pe gin Lubaŋa kikome.
Ruth 4:10 Ento ki tun botwa, Rwot en aye Lubaŋawa, peya wabwoto en, Wan watye ki ajwagi ma gitiyo ki Rwot ma gin aye likwayo pa Aron, ki Lulevi ma gikonyogi ki tic.
Ruth 4:11 Odiko odiko ki otyeno otyeno, giwaŋo gitum awaŋa ki odok eceta ma ŋwece kur, gicano mugati i nyim Rwot i wi meja me jabu ma giliyo maber, dok gigwoko okar mac me jabu wek macce obed ka lyel otyeno otyeno; wan watye ka gwoko cik ma mako tic pa Rwot Lubaŋawa, ento wun wutyeko bwoto en woko.
Ruth 4:12 Nen, Lubaŋa tye kwedwa, tye ka telo wiwa, ki ajwagine gitye ki tum ma gikuto me ywayo mony me lweny i komwu, Aa wun awobe pa Icrael, pe wulweny i kom Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwariwu: pien pe wutwero loyo mony.”
Ruth 4:13 Jeroboam onoŋo ocwalo dul mony gukanne woko me bino i komgi ki yo ŋegi; kit meno onoŋo monnye tye i nyim jo Juda, ki jo mubuto gurumo piny woko tye yo tuŋ ŋegi.
Ruth 4:14 Ka jo Juda guneno, gunoŋo ni mony tye i nyimgi ki i ŋegi bene; ci gucako kok bot Rwot, kun ajwagi gikuto tum.
Ruth 4:15 Jo Juda gucako wayo me lweny. I kare ma jo Juda gudaŋŋe, Lubaŋa oloyo Jeroboam woko, omiyo jo Icrael ducu guriŋo woko i nyim Abija ki jo Juda.
Ruth 4:16 Jo Icrael guriŋo woko, ci Lubaŋa omiyogi i ciŋ Abija.
Ruth 4:17 Abija ki jone gunekogi ki nek malit twatwal; jo ma guto giromo alip miya abic ki i kom jo ma giyerogi ayera ki i kin jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:740 
Ruth 4:18 Giloyo jo Icrael kit meno, pien jo Juda ma oloyogi onoŋo gujeŋŋe i kom Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwarigi.
Ruth 4:19 Abija olubo kor Jeroboam ci omayo gaŋi mogo pa jo Icrael woko ki bote, Betel ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, Jecana ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, ki Epron ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete.
Ruth 4:20 Jeroboam pe dok olimo tek mo wacel i kare pa Abija; dok Rwot opwode, ci oto woko.
Ruth 4:21 Ento Abija omedde odoko tek, Onyomo mon apar wiye aŋwen, onywalo kwedgi litino awobe pyeraryo wiye aryo ki anyira apar wiye abicel.
Ruth 4:22 Lok kom Abija mudoŋŋe ducu, ma nyuto kite ma yam oloko, gityeko coyone i lok pa lanebi Iddo.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 14 Loc pa Aca (1 Luker 15.9-12)
Ruth 4:1 Abija oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyike i gaŋ kal pa Daudi; wode Aca aye oleyo ka tyene. I karene lobo oywe mot ki kuc pi mwaka apar.
Ruth 4:2 Aca yam obedo ka tiyo gin maber dok ma nen atir i wan Rwot Lubaŋane.
Ruth 4:3 En okwanyo keno tyer ki waŋ jogi ma i wi godi pa lurok woko, omuko wir jogigi bene, ka dok otoŋo yadi ma gicomo pi woro lok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera ducu oreto woko piny,
Ruth 4:4 ka dok ociko jo Juda ni gubin bot Rwot, ma Lubaŋa pa kwarigi, dok gugwok cikke ki gin ma en ociko.
Ruth 4:5 En bene yam omuko waŋ jogi ma i gaŋi ducu ma i Juda, okwanyo keno tyer me waŋo odok eceta ducu, Ker okwe mot i karene.
Ruth 4:6 Ogero gaŋi ma girumo ki cel gogo i Juda, pien lobo onoŋo okwe mot. Pe obedo ki lweny i lwak mwaka-nu ducu, pien Rwot omiyo kuc.
Ruth 4:7 En owaco bot jo Juda ni, “Wageru gaŋi magi, warumogi woko ki cel ma wagero i kome odi matego ma ocudo malo, waket bene doggola iye ma gicego ki rii; lobo doŋ pud mewa, pien wabedo ka bino bot Rwot Lubaŋawa, wabedo ka bino bote ci en omiyowa kuc i kabedo ducu.” Gugedo dok gubedo ki lonyo madwoŋ.
Ruth 4:8 Aca obedo ki lumony ma gua ki i Juda ma giromo alip miya adek, ma gitye ki kwodi ki toŋi, ki lumony ma gua ki i Benjamin ma giromo alip miya aryo ki pyeraboro ma gutiŋo kwodi, ma gin bene lucel atum; gin ducu twoni oteka lweny ma gitego.
Ruth 4:9 Jera ma Laetiopia obino ka lweny i komgi ki mony ma romo jo milion acel ki gadigadi miya adek; gubino guo cok ki Mareca.
Ruth 4:741 
Ruth 4:10 Ci Aca ocito ka rwatte kwede, kun monygi oryeyo i nota Jepata i Mareca.
Ruth 4:11 Aca okok bot Rwot Lubaŋane ni, “Ai Rwot, pe tye lakony mo macalo in, ma koriyo jo magoro ka lweny i kom jo matego, Konywa, ai Rwot Lubaŋawa, pien wageno in, wabino ka lweny i kom lwak man madwoŋ-ŋi pi nyiŋi. Ai Rwot, in aye Lubaŋawa; pe iye dano mo oloyi.”
Ruth 4:12 Kit meno omiyo Rwot oryemo jo Etiopia woko ki i nyim Aca ki i nyim jo Juda, omiyo jo Etiopia guriŋo woko.
Ruth 4:13 Aca ki monnye guryemo korgi nio wa i Gerar, ci guneko jo Etiopia matek ma dano mo acel pe obwot makwo; pien guket woko ata ki i nyim Rwot ki monnye. Jo Juda gutiŋo lwak jami madwoŋ ma guyako gucito kwede.
Ruth 4:14 Guturo gaŋi ducu ma gurumo Gerar, pien Rwot omiyo lworo opoto i komgi. Guyako gaŋi ducu, pien onoŋo jami me ayaka dwoŋ i igi twatwal.
Ruth 4:15 Guputo kema pa jo ma yam wegi dyaŋi, guyako romi madwoŋ twatwal ki kinaga-gu, Gudok kwede cen i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 15 Aca odwoko cwiny jone i kom Rwot (1 Luker 15.13-15)
Ruth 4:1 Cwiny pa Lubaŋa obino i kom Ajaria wod pa Oded,
Ruth 4:2 omiyo en ocito orwatte ki Aca, ci otitte ni, “Winy an, Aca, ki jo Juda ki Benjamin ducu. Rwot tye kwedwu, ka ce wun wutye kwede. Ka wuyenyo en, ci wubinoŋo en, ento ka wubwoto en, en bene bibwotowu.
Ruth 4:3 Jo Icrael onoŋo gubedo laboŋo Lubaŋa me ada pi kare malac, wa ajwaka ma pwonyogi bene onoŋo pe, dok gubedo laboŋo cik;
Ruth 4:4 ento i kare ma arubaruba madwoŋ odiyogi gulokke bot Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, kun giyenyo en, omiyo gunoŋo en.
Ruth 4:5 I kare meno ducu onoŋo nar mo pe tye ki kuc me kato woko nyo kadi me dwogo gaŋ, pien cwiny dano orubbe woko pi can mapatpat ma obedo ka poto i kom jo ma gibedo i lobo ducu.
Ruth 4:6 Kingi opokke woko atata, rok lwenyo ki rok wadi ki gaŋ i kom gaŋ wadi, pien Lubaŋa odiyogi ki can i kit yo mapatpat.
Ruth 4:7 Ento wun, cwinywu obed nwaŋ! Pe wuwek badwu okwe woko, pien Lubaŋa biculo waŋ ticwu.”
Ruth 4:8 Ka Aca owinyo lok meno ducu, ma lanebi Ajaria wod pa Oded otito-ni, ci cwinye odoko nwaŋ, ocako jwero cal jogi me kipyeda woko ducu ki i lobo Juda ki Benjamin ki i gaŋi ducu ma en omayogi i lobo godi ma i Epraim, ci oyubo keno tyer pa Rwot ma yam tye i nyim kicika ma gidonyo kwede i ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:742 
Ruth 4:9 En ocoko jo Juda ducu ki jo pa Benjamin, ki jo ma gua i Epraim ki Manace ki Cimeon, ma onoŋo gibedo i kingi, pien onoŋo jo mapol gudak gua ki i Icrael gukobo bote pien guneno ni Rwot Lubaŋa tye kwede.
Ruth 4:10 Gucokke i Jerucalem i dwe me adek i mwaka me apar wiye abic me loc pa Aca.
Ruth 4:11 Gutyero gitum bot Rwot i nino meno, kun gikwanyo ki i kom jami ma gukelo, ma yam guyako, twoni ma romo miya abiro ki romi alip abiro.
Ruth 4:12 Ci gucako keto gicikke me cito bot Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarigi, ki cwinygi ducu ki tipogi ducu;
Ruth 4:13 dok guciko matek ni ŋat ma pe bicito bot Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, myero ginek woko, kadi bed dano matidi nyo dano muteggi, laco nyo dako.
Ruth 4:14 Gucako kwoŋo kwoŋ bot Rwot ki dwan maloŋo, kun gidaŋŋe, ma gikuto tum-gu ki tuŋ romi-gu.
Ruth 4:15 Ci jo Juda ducu cwinygi obedo yom pi kwoŋo kwoŋ; pien gukwoŋo kwoŋ ki cwinygi ducu, gubedo ka yenyo Rwot ki mitgi ducu, ci gunoŋo en, ka Rwot ocako miyogi yweyo i kabedo ducu.
Ruth 4:16 Kabaka Aca oryemo wa minne Maaka woko, pe oye ni omed bedo daker pien en otiyo cal me kipyeda pi Acera ma jok ma dako. Aca otoŋo cal jokke oŋido woko, ci owaŋo woko i nota kulu Kidron.
Ruth 4:17 Ento waŋ jogi ma i wi godi pe gimukogi woko ki i Icrael Kadi bed kumeno, Aca obedo ki leŋic i kom Rwot pi kare me kwone ducu.
Ruth 4:18 En okelo i ot pa Rwot mot ma wonne odyero, kacel ki mere kikome bene ma odyero, ryal ki jabu ki weer-gu.
Ruth 4:19 Lweny koŋ dok obedo pe nio kwede wa i mwaka me pyeradek wiye abic me loc pa Aca.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 16 Aca oribbe ki Ben-adad (1 Luker 15.16-24)
Ruth 4:1 I mwaka me pyeradek wiye abicel me loc pa Aca, Baaca kabaka pa jo Icrael ocito ka monyo jo Juda, ci orumo gaŋ me Rama ki cel matek, wek ogeŋ dano cito woko nyo bino bot Aca kabaka me Juda.
Ruth 4:2 Ci Aca okwanyo ryal ki jabu ma i ot kano lim pa Rwot ki ma i ot pa kabaka, ci ocwalo bot Ben-adad kabaka me Ciria, ma yam bedo i Damaciko, kun wacci,
Ruth 4:3 “Wek an ki in waribbe kacel, kit macalo ribbe obedo tye i kin wora ki woru-ni, Nen, acwalli ryal ki jabu; cit wek icitur ribbe ma tye i kin in ki Baaca kabaka me Icrael-li woko, wek en oa woko ki bota.”
Ruth 4:743 
Ruth 4:4 Ben-adad owinyo lok pa kabaka Aca, ci ocwalo ludito monnye ka monyo gaŋi pa jo Icrael, ci guloyo Ijon, Dan, Abelmaim, ki gaŋi ducu me kano cam ma i lobo pa jo Naputali.
Ruth 4:5 Ka Baaca owinyo lokke ci oweko gero cel Rama woko, ogiko ticce iye.
Ruth 4:6 Kabaka Aca owoto ki jo Juda ducu, guyweko litino godi ducu ma i Rama kacel ki lwak baone, ma yam Baaca obedo ka gedo kwede, ci ogero kwede cel i Geba ki Mijpa.
Ruth 4:7 I kare meno Kanani ma lanen obino bot kaba ka Aca, owacce ni, “Pien in doŋ igeno kabaka me Ciria, pe igeno Rwot Lubaŋani, omiyo mony pa kaba ka me Ciria guriŋo woko ki boti.
Ruth 4:8 Onoŋo mony pa jo Etiopia ki pa jo Libya yam dit twatwal ma gitye ki lwak gadigadi lweny ki wegi aguragura-gu? Ento in ibedo ka geno Rwot, oweko omiyogi i ciŋi.
Ruth 4:9 Pien wan Rwot neno lobo ducu, me nyuto tekke bot jo ma gibedo ki leŋic i kome. In itimo lok me miŋo mada i lok man; pienno cakke tin in ibibedo ki lweny.”
Ruth 4:10 Cut kiniga omako Aca i kom lanen, ci okete i mabuc, otweye ki okol, pien ojul i kome pi lok meno, Ka dok oketo can i kom jo mogo ma i kin lwak bene i kare meno.
Ruth 4:11 Lok kom Aca nia i acakkine nio i agikkine gityeko coyone i buk pa Luker me Juda ki me Icrael.
Ruth 4:12 I mwaka pyeradek wiye aboŋwen me loc pa Aca, en aye two omako iye tyene, ci twone omedde marac mada; ento i twone-ni en pe oyenyo kony bot Rwot, obedo mere ka yenyo kony ki bot ludaktar.
Ruth 4:13 Aca oto i mwaka me pyeraŋwen wiye acel me locce, oywe kacel ki kwarine.
Ruth 4:14 Giyike i lyel ma onoŋo en okwinyo pire kene i gaŋ kal pa Daudi, Gupyelo kome i wi kitara ma giketo iye lwak aŋwece mapatpat ma giyubo ki diro pa luyub aŋwece; ka dok gumoko mac madit mada pi miye deyo.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 17 Ker pa Yekocapat omoko matek
Ruth 4:1 Yekocapat ma wode aye oleyo ka tyen Aca, ci odoko tek mada i kom Icrael.
Ruth 4:2 Oketo mony i gaŋi ma girumo ki cel gogo ma i Juda ducu, ka dok oketo ludito wi mony oromo i lobo Juda ducu ki gaŋi ma i Epraim ma yam wonne Aca omayogi- ni.
Ruth 4:3 Rwot ogwoko Yekocapat, pien en obedo ka lubo kit pa wonne ma con-ni; pe obedo ka yenyo kony ki bot lwak Baal-gu.
Ruth 4:744 
Ruth 4:4 En obedo ka yenyo kony ki bot Lubaŋa pa wonne ki lubo cikke ducu, pe obedo ka lubo kit pa jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:5 Pienno omiyo Rwot omoko ker matek i ciŋe; ki jo Juda ducu gubedo ka kelo lim ajog bot Yekocapat; onoŋo en tye ki lonyo madwoŋ wa ki deyo bene.
Ruth 4:6 Obedo ki tekcwiny pi lubo yo pa Rwot; dok omuko waŋ jogi ma i wi godi woko ki i Juda, kacel ki yadi ma gicomo pi woro Acera ma jok ma dako-ni.
Ruth 4:7 I mwaka me adek me locce ocwalo rwodine Ben-kail, Obadia, Jekaria, Netanel ki Mikaya ka pwony i gaŋi ma i Juda.
Ruth 4:8 Medo i komgi dok ocwalo Lulevi magi, Cemaya, Netania, Jebadia, Acael, Cemiramot. Yekonatan, Adoniya, Tobiya ki Tobadoniya; ki ajwagi ma onoŋo guwoto kwedgi obedo Elicama ki Jekoram.
Ruth 4:9 Gucako pwony i Juda, ma gitye ki buk me cik pa Rwot; gubedo bene ka wot i gaŋi ducu me Juda kun gipwonyo dano.
Ruth 4:10 Lworo ocako mako ker ducu me lobo ma gurumo Juda, ci pe guero lweny i kom Yekocapat.
Ruth 4:11 Lupiliciti mogo gukelo mot bot Yekocapat, guculo bote ryal, Jo Arab bene gutero bote nyogi romi alip abiro ki miya abiro, ki nyogi dyegi alip abiro ki mi ya abiro.
Ruth 4:12 Yekocapat ocako doŋo medde doko madit mada. En ogero cel gogo ki gaŋi me kano jami i Juda.
Ruth 4:13 En obedo ki odi madito me kano jami i Juda, Obedo ki lwak askari i Jerucalem ma gin twoni oteka lweny.
Ruth 4:14 Man aye onoŋo welgi ma giryeyo ma lubo dog odi pa kwarogi. I ot pa Juda ludito mony ma loyo jo alip gin ene: Adna ladit me mony, kacel ki twoni oteka lweny alip miya adek;
Ruth 4:15 ki ma lubo en obedo Yekokanan ladit me mony, ma loyo jo alip miya aryo ki pyeraboro;
Ruth 4:16 ki ma olube obedo Amacia wod pa Jikri, ma odyero kome pi tic pa Rwot, kacel ki jo alip miya aryo ma gin twoni oteka lweny.
Ruth 4:17 I ot pa Benjamin onoŋo tye Eliada, ma en twon oteka lweny, kacel ki jo alip miya aryo ma gitye ki atum ki kwodi;
Ruth 4:18 ki ŋat ma olubo en obedo Yekojabad, kacel ki jo alip miya acel ki pyeraboro ma gurukke pi lweny.
Ruth 4:19 Magi aye jo magubedo lutic pa kabaka, medo i kom jo ma yam kabaka oketogi i gaŋi ma girumo ki cel gogo ma i Juda.
Ruth 4:745 
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 18 Lanebi Mikaya otito ni gibiloyo Akab ki Yekocapat (1 Luker 22.1-40)
Ruth 4:1 Yekocapat onoŋo tye ki lwak lonyo madwoij wa ki deyo bene; ocako ribbe ki Akab, ci omiyo wode onyomo nya pa Akab.
Ruth 4:2 Lacen i ne mwaka mogo manok ocito bot Akab i Camaria. Akab oneko lwak romi ki twoni dyaŋi mapol ata pire ki pi lwak ducu ma onoŋo gitye kwede, Man oti mo pi bito en wek ocit kwede ka lweny i kom Ramot-gilead.
Ruth 4:3 Akab kabaka me Icrael open yo Yekocapat kabaka me Juda ni, “Ibicito kweda ka lweny i kom gaŋ Ramot-gilead?” Yekocapat ogamo dog kabaka me Icrael kun wacce ni, “An ki in wan acel, lwakka gin aye lwakki. Wabibedo kwedi i mony.”
Ruth 4:4 Yekocapat owaco bot kaba ka me Icrael ni, “Koŋ ikwoŋ penyo lok ki bot Rwot.”
Ruth 4:5 Kabaka me Icrael ocoko lwak lunebi ducu kacel, gucokke miya aŋwen, En owaco botgi ni, “Wacit ka lweny i kom Ramot-gilead, nyo pa aciti?” Gin lu ne bi gugamo ni, “Tugi cito cut, kabaka, pien Lubaŋa bimiyo i ciŋi.”
Ruth 4:6 Ento Yekocapat dok owaco ni, “Lanebi mo mukene pa Rwot pe tye ka ny, wek koŋ dok wapeny doge?”
Ruth 4:7 Kabaka me Icrael ogamo dog Yekocapat ni, “Pud tye dano mo ma myero wapenye wek wawiny dog Rwot ki bote, en Mikaya wod pa Imla; ento cwinya dage matek, pien peya otitta kit lok mo maber, en titta lok maracce keken.” Yekocapat ogamo ni, “Pe kumene, kabaka, wek lok kit meno obedi.”
Ruth 4:8 Kabaka me Icrael ocak o lwoŋo ladit mo ci owacce ni, “Cit icikel Mikaya wod pa Imla oyotoyot.”
Ruth 4:9 Onoŋo kabaka me Icrael ki Yekocapat kabaka me Juda gubedo wi komkergi, ma guruko jor kergi mabeco; gubedo kwede i laro moyo me dino bel ma i ŋet dogcel ma gidonyo kwede i Camaria, kun lunebi ducu gitye ka tito lok i nyimgi.
Ruth 4:10 Jedekia wod pa Kenaana otiyo cal tuŋ lee me nyonyo pire kene, ci owacci, “Rwot owaco kuman ni, ‘Ibitwomo jo Ciria ki magi nio ka ityekogi woko ducu.’ “
Ruth 4:11 Ci lunebi ducu gutito lok ma kit meno, kun giwacci, “Tugi cito i Ramot-gilead, ci ibiloyo; Rwot bimiyo i ciŋi, kabaka.”
Ruth 4:12 Lakwena ma ocito ka lwoŋo Mikaya-ni obino owacci, “Nen ba, lok pa lunebi ducu obedo me cuko cwiny kabaka; pienno wek lokki bene obed ma rom ki megi, lokki bene obed lok me cuko cwmy.”
Ruth 4:13 Mikaya ogamo doge ni, “Macalo Rwot tye makwo-ni, gin ducu ma Lubaŋana owacca, en aye abilokone.”
Ruth 4:746 
Ruth 4:14 Ka Mikaya oo bot kabaka, kabaka openye ni, “Mikaya, wacit ka lweny i kom Ramot-gilead, nyo pe aciti?” En ogamo ni, “Tugi cito cut, ci ibiloyo; Rwot bimiyogi i ciŋi.”
Ruth 4:15 Ento kabaka dok owacce ni, “An mono abiciki i nyiŋ Lubaŋa tyen adi ni ilokka lok ada keken i nyiŋ Rwot?”
Ruth 4:16 Ci Mikaya owacci, “Anene jo Icrael ducu guket woko lijayi i wi godi, macalo romi ma gipe ki lakwat; dok Rwot bene owacci, ‘Jo-ni laditgi peke; wek ŋat acel acel odok gire i pacone ki kuc.’ “
Ruth 4:17 Kabaka me Icrael owaco ki Yekocapat ni, “An pe onoŋo awacci ni, Mikaya pe bitito lok mo maber ma otika, ento bitito maracce?”
Ruth 4:18 Mikaya ogamo ni, “Pi meno koŋ dok iwiny lok pa Rwot mono. Abedo ka neno Rwot ma obedo i wi komkerre, kun lwak mony me polo ducu gucuŋ ka ŋete ki yo tuŋ bade malacuc ki yo tuŋ bade malacam.
Ruth 4:19 Rwot owacci, ‘Aŋa mono ma bibito Akab kabaka me Icrael, wek ocit oto i Ramot-gilead?’ Ci giwaco lok mapatpat.
Ruth 4:20 Lacen kit cwiny mo obino ci okato anyim ocuŋ wa i nyim Rwot, kun wacci, ‘An aye abibito en.’ Rwot openye ni, ‘Ibibito en niŋniŋ?’
Ruth 4:21 En ogamo ni, ‘An abicito, ci abibedo cwiny ma lagoba kun aloko ki i dog lunebine ducu.’ Rwot ogamo ni, ‘In ibibite, ci biye lokk i; doŋ icitim kumeno.’
Ruth 4:22 Kombeddi in doŋ inen ka Rwot otyeko keto cwiny ma lagoba i dog lunebini magi ducu; Rwot doŋ otyeko ciko pi kelo lok marac i komi.”
Ruth 4:23 Ci Jedekia wod pa Kenaana ocito bot Mikaya cok ci odoŋo leme ki ciŋe, kun wacci, “Cwiny Rwot dok oa ki i koma niŋniŋ ka okobo oloko boti?”
Ruth 4:24 Mikaya owaco ni. “Meno ibiniaŋ iye i nino ma ibidonyo i kicika ma i tyelo wek ikanne iye.”
Ruth 4:25 Kabaka me Icrael owacci, “Wumak Mikaya woko, wudwoke cen wa bot Amon ma laloyo me gaŋ, ki bot Yoaci ma wod pa kabaka.
Ruth 4:26 Iciwacogi ni, ‘Kabaka owaco kuman ni, Wuket dano man i mabuc, dok wumiye ocam cam me mabuc, mugati ki pii keken, nio ka abidwogo paco ki kuc.’ “
Ruth 4:27 Mikaya ogamo ni, “Ka ce idwogo paco ki kuc, ci pe Rwot aye oloko ki i doga.” Dok owacci, “Wun rok ducu doŋ wuwiny!” To pa Akab (1 Luker 22.29-35)
Ruth 4:28 Kit meno kabaka me Icrael ki Yekocapat kabaka me Juda gucako cito i Ramot- gilead.
Ruth 4:747 
Ruth 4:29 Kabaka me Icrael owaco bot Yekocapat ni, “An abirukke macalo dano mo ata ka doŋ acako cito ka lweny, ento in iruk jorri me ker.” Kabaka ocako rukke macalo dano mo ata, ka ocito kwede i mony.
Ruth 4:30 Onoŋo kabaka me Ciria otyeko ciko ludito mony ma giloyo gadigadine me lweny ni, “Pe wucilweny i kom dano mo matidi nyo madit, ento wucilweny i kom kabaka me Icrael keken.”
Ruth 4:31 Ka ludito mony ma giloyo gadigadi lweny guneno Yekocapat, ci guwacci, “Meno aye kabaka me Icrael kikome.” Ci gulokke ka lweny i kome. Yekocapat ocako daŋŋe ki mwoc, ci Rwot okonye. Ci Lubaŋa okwanyogi woko ki bote.
Ruth 4:32 Ka ludito mony guneno ni pe en kabaka me Icrael, ci gulokke gudok woko cen gubwoto lubo kore.
Ruth 4:33 Ento dano mo otelo atumme ocelo ata, ci ocelo kwede kabaka me Icrael atura; atero obaro kin nyonyo me geŋo kore ki nyonyo mukene me geŋo kome ma obedo macalo pok rec. Kabaka owaco ki laryem gadigadine ni, “Lokke idok cen wek icikwanya woko ki i waŋ lweny, pien ret otyeko maka woko.”
Ruth 4:34 Ci lweny odoko malyet i nino meno, kabaka me Icrael obedo ojeŋŋe i gadigadine kun waŋe okemo jo Ciria nio wa otyeno, ka ocako to ma ceŋ cito ka poto.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 19 Lanebi Yeko ojuko Yekocapat
Ruth 4:1 Yekocapat kabaka me Juda odok cen maber wa i ode i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:2 Ento Yeko wod pa Kanani ma lanen-piny aye ocito ka rwatte kwede, ci owaco bot kabaka Yekocapat ni, “In imyero ka konyo jo maraco, ki maro jo ma gidag Rwot? Akemo pa Rwot doŋ otyeko bino ka lweny i komi.
Ruth 4:3 Ento gin maber tye i kin jami ma itiyogi, pien ityeko jwero yadi ma gicomo pi woro jok Acera woko ducu ki i lobo, ma iketo cwinyi ka yenyo Lubaŋa.” Yekocapat oyero luŋolkop
Ruth 4:4 Yekocapat obedo i Jerucalem; dok owoto i kin dano cakke ki i Beer-ceba nio kwede wa i lobo godi me Epraim, odwoko cwiny dano i kom Lubaŋa pa kwarigi.
Ruth 4:5 Dok oyero luŋolkop ki i gaŋi ducu ma girumo ki cel gogo ma tye i Juda, gaŋ ki gaŋ,
Ruth 4:6 ka ociko luŋolkop ni, “Wubed ki tam i kom gin ma wutiyo, pien pe wubiŋolo kop pi dano ento pi Rwot; en tye kwedwu ka wuŋolo kop.
Ruth 4:7 Pi meno wulwor Rwot kun wugwokke bene i kom gin ducu ma wutiyo, pien Rwot Lubaŋawa pe mito giŋol kop ki go ba ma noŋo lok pe tye atir, nyo kadi dworo kor dano, ki dok pe mito gigam lim me wilo loyo kop.”
Ruth 4:748 
Ruth 4:8 Ki i Jerucalem Yekocapat dok oyero Lulevi mogo, ajwagi, ki ludito wi kaka ma i Icrael ducu, me bedo luŋolkop pi Rwot ki me winyo pido ma pyem tye iye ma ŋolo koppe tek. Gubedo ka tic i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:9 Ocikogi ni. “Wubitiyo kun wulworo Rwot, ki gen, dok ki cwinywu ducu.
Ruth 4:10 Ka ce utmegiwu ma gibedo i gaŋigi gukelo lok me pido mo ma mako lok me oyo remo, ki ma mako cik pa Lubaŋa, nyo lok mo ma Lubaŋa ociko nyo oŋolo, wun aye wubipwonyogi, wek pe gutiŋ alii mo i nyim Rwot, wek akemo pa Lubaŋa pe obin i komwu ki i kom utmegiwu. Wubitiyone kit meno, wek pe wutiŋ bal alii mo.
Ruth 4:11 Dok wunen, Amaria ajwaka madit en aye ma loyowu i kom lok pa Rwot ducu; Jebadia wod pa Icmael, ma laloyo ma i ot pa Juda, en aye ma loyo lok ma bot kabaka ducu; ki Lulevi gibitic botwumacalo lukaraniwu, Wuti ki tekcwinywu ducu, Rwot myero okony jo ma cwinygi atir!”
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 20 Yekocapat oloyo jo Moab ki jo Ammon
Ruth 4:1 Lacen jo Moab ki jo Ammon ki jo mogo me Meun gubino ka lweny i kom Yekocapat.
Ruth 4:2 Jo mogo gucito gutito bot Yekocapat ni, “Mony madwoŋ tye ka bino ka lweny i komi ma gia ki i Edom, gua ki loka nam; nen, doŋ gitye wa i Kajajon-tamar” (en aye En-gedi).
Ruth 4:3 Lworo ocako mako Yekocapat, en kikome ocako yenyo kony ki bot Rwot cut, ka dok ociko pi ri kec oromo i lobo Juda ducu.
Ruth 4:4 Ci jo Juda gucokke kacel pi yenyo kony ki bot Rwot; dano ma gua ki i gaŋi ducu me Juda gucito ka yenyo kony ki bot Rwot.
Ruth 4:5 Yekocapat oa malo ocuŋ i nyim jo Juda ki jo Jerucalem ma gucokke, ocuŋ i ot pa Rwot, ki i nyim dyekal manyen,
Ruth 4:6 olego ni, “Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwariwa, in aye pe Lubaŋa ma i polo-ni? Pe in aye iloyo lwak ker ducu ma i lwak rok-ki ducu? Tek ki twero tye i ciŋi, pienno pe tye ŋatti mo ma twero cuŋ i nyimi.
Ruth 4:7 Pe in aye Lubaŋawa, ma oryemo jo ma i lobo-ni ki i nyim joni jo Icrael, ci omiyo bot likwayo pa Abraim laremi matwal-li?
Ruth 4:8 Ka gubedo iye, ci gugero piri kabedo maleŋ pi nyiŋi, kun giwacci,
Ruth 4:9 ‘Ka gin mo marac opoto i komwa, macalo lweny nyo lok ma iŋolo i komwa, nyo two gemo, nyo kec, ci wan wabicuŋ i nyim ot man, pien nyiŋi tye i ot man, ci wabikok boti pi aroma can wa i nyimi; in ibiwinyo ci ilarowa.’
Ruth 4:749 
Ruth 4:10 Doŋ inen jo Ammon, jo Moab, ki jo Lugot Ceir, ma yam in pe iye Icrael omonyogi i kare ma gua ki i lobo Ejipt, ma yam gubwoto odoŋ ma pe gijwerogi woko-ni.
Ruth 4:11 Nen ka doŋ giculowa waŋe ki bino ka ryemowa woko ki i loboni ma wacamo ma yam imiyowa me bedo ginaleyawa.
Ruth 4:12 Ai Lubaŋawa in pe ibinologi kop? Pien wan pe watye ki tek me lweny i kom mony man madwoŋ ma gubino ka lweny i komwa-ni. Pe waŋeyo gin ma watiyo, ento waketo waŋwa i komi.”
Ruth 4:13 I kare-nu onoŋo jo Juda gucuŋ i nyim Rwot, ki jo ma gikwo i komgi, mongi ki litinogi.
Ruth 4:14 Cwiny Rwot obino opoto i kom Jakajiel wod pa Jekaria, wod pa Benaya, wod pa Jeyel, wod pa Matania, ma Lalevi ma jo pa Acap; onoŋo en tye i dye cokke.
Ruth 4:15 En owaco ni, “Wuwiny, wun jo Juda ki jo Jerucalem, ki in kabaka Yekocapat: Rwot owaco botwu kuman ni, ‘Pe wulwor, dok bene cwinywu pe opoti pi kom lwak man madwoŋ-ŋi; pien lweny man pe mewu ento pa Lubaŋa gire.
Ruth 4:16 Diki wucit ka lweny i komgi; nen, gibibino kun giwok ki i wi cere me Jij; wubinoŋogi wa ka ma nota ogik iye, yo tuŋ wokceŋ me tim Jeruel.
Ruth 4:17 Lweny man pe wun aye wubilwenyo, wun wubed i kabedowu, wucuŋ iye mot, wek wunen kit ma Rwot bilarowu kwede tin, wun jo Juda ki Jerucalem.’ Pe wulwor, pe cwinywu opoti, diki wucit ka lweny i komgi, Rwot bibedo kwedwu.”
Ruth 4:18 Yekocapat okulo wiye oluŋo waŋe piny i ŋom, ci jo Juda ducu ki jo Jerucalem guryebbe piny i nyim Rwot, kun giworo Rwot.
Ruth 4:19 Lacen Lulevi ma jo pa Kokat ki jo pa Kora, gucuŋ ka pako Rwot. Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ki dwangi maloŋo.
Ruth 4:20 Gua malo odiko con ci gucito i tim Tekoa. I kare ma gicito, Yekocapat ocuŋ ci owacci, “Wuwiny an, wun jo Juda kacel ki wun jo ducu ma wubedo i Jerucalem! Wuye Rwot Lubaŋawu, ci wubicuŋ matek; wuyelok pa lunebine, ci wubiloyo.”
Ruth 4:21 Ka otyeko noŋo tam ki bot lwak, ocako yero jo ma myero gubed ka wer bot Rwot kun gipake ma guruko bone maleŋ kun gitelo kwede nyim mony, ma giwero kuman ni, “Wumi pwoc bot Rwot, pien mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka.”
Ruth 4:22 Ka gucako wer ki pwoc, Rwot oketo mony ma gubuto pi kuro lweny ki jo Ammon, ki jo Moab, ki jo got Ceir, ma gubino i kom Juda-ni, ci giloyogi woko.
Ruth 4:23 Pien jo Ammon ki jo Moab gubino ka lweny i kom jo ma gibedo i lobo godi me Ceir, gujwerogi woko liweŋ. I kare ma lweny tum i kom jo ma gibedo i Ceir, gin bene gucako nekke kekengi.
Ruth 4:750 
Ruth 4:24 Ka jo Juda gua malo guito wa i wi lubele ma yo tuŋ tim, ka guneno tuŋ bot lwak mony-nyi, guneno lwak kom dano muto ka guradde piny; acel mo pe obwot.
Ruth 4:25 Ka Yekocapat ki lwakke gucito ka yako jamigi, ci gunoŋo dyaŋ i mapol, ki jami ki boŋŋi ki jami me wel-gu, ma gubedo ka yako ne me bedo megi nio ka tiŋone oloyogi. Gubedo ka yako jami pi nino adek, ento jami obedo dwoŋ mukato kare.
Ruth 4:26 I nino me aŋwenne gucokke i nota Beraka, pien gubedo ka pwoyo Rwot ki kenyo; mumiyo nyiŋ kabedo meno gilwoŋo ni nota Beraka nio wa onyoo.
Ruth 4:27 Dano gudok cen, jo Juda ducu ki jo Jerucalem kun Yekocapat telo wigi; gudok cen i Jerucalem ki nyatte, pien Rwot omiyo gubedo ki nyatte pi loyo lumerokgi.
Ruth 4:28 Gubino i Jerucalem ki nanagi ki opuk ki obute wa i ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:29 Lubaŋa omiyo lworo omako ker ducu ma i lobo mapatpat i kare ma guwinyo ni Rwot obedo ka lweny ki lumerok pa jo Icrael.
Ruth 4:30 Kit meno ker pa Yekocapat obedo mupye mot, pien Lubaŋa omiye yweyo i kabedo ma orumo ŋete ducu. Loc pa Yekocapat (1 Luker 22.41-50)
Ruth 4:31 Kit meno Yekocapat oloyo lobo Juda. Yekocapat ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeradek wiye abic, ci obedo, ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyeraryo wiye abic. Nyiŋ minne Ajuba ma nya pa Cilki.
Ruth 4:32 En obedo ka lubo k it pa wonne Aca ducu; pe olokke oweko lubo kore; en obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen atir i wan Rwot.
Ruth 4:33 Ento wan jogi ma i wi godi pe gimuko woko; lwak ducu onoŋo pud peya guketo cwinygi i kom Lubaŋa pa kwarigi.
Ruth 4:34 Lok kom Yekocapat mudoŋŋe ducu, nia i acakkine nio i agikkine, gityeko coyo i lok me tekwaro pa Ye ko wod pa Kanani, ma gicoyo i buk pa Luker me Icrael.
Ruth 4:35 Lacen Yekocapat kabaka me Juda oribbe gin ki Akajia kabaka me Icrael, ma yam obedo ka tiyo bal maraco.
Ruth 4:36 Oribbe kwede pi payo mel mapol me cito i Tarcic; gubedo ka payo mel i Ejion- geber.
Ruth 4:37 Eliejer wod pa. Dodayaku me Mareca otito lok ma kemo Yekocapat, kun wacci, “Rwot bijwero gin ma wutiyo-ni woko, pien ityeko ribbe ki Akajia.” Ci mel ducu gutur woko, pe gucito i Tarcic.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 21 Loc pa Jekoram kabaka me Juda (2 Luker 8.16-24)
Ruth 4:751 
Ruth 4:1 Yekocapat ote, oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyiko kacel ki kwarine i gaŋ kal pa Daudi; wode Jekoram aye oleyo ka tyene.
Ruth 4:2 En yam tye ki omegine, ma gin awobe pa Yekocapat: Ajaria, Jekiel, Jekaria, Ajaria, Mikael, ki Cepatia; gin ducu onoŋo awobe pa Yekocapat kabaka me Juda.
Ruth 4:3 Wongi omiyogi mot madito, me ryal, me jabu, ki me jami mabeco me wel, ki gaŋi mogo ma i Juda ma girumogi ki cel gogo; ento en omiyo ker bot Jekoram, pien Jekoram obedo latin kayone.
Ruth 4:4 Ka Jekoram obedo wi komker pa wonne ma doŋ kerre omoko matek, ci oneko omegine woko ducu ki pala lucwan, kacel ki rwodi mogo ma i Icrael.
Ruth 4:5 Jekoram ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeradek wiye aryo, ci obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka aboro.
Ruth 4:6 Obedo ka lubo kit pa luker me Icrael, kun tiyo kit macalo jo me ot pa Akab gutiyo; pien dakone nya pa Akab. Obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot.
Ruth 4:7 Ento Rwot pe omito tyeko Juda woko ducu, pi laticce Daudi, kit ma con ocikke bote ni ebimiye bedo ki mac tara, en ki likwaye matwal.
Ruth 4:8 I karene en aye jo Edom gujemo iye woko i kom loc pa Juda, ci guketo kabakagi pigi kengi.
Ruth 4:9 Jekoram okato loka kacel ki ludito monnye ki ludito ma giloyo gadigadi lwennye ducu; en oa woko i dyewor olwenyo i kom jo Edom. Jo Edom onoŋo gurumo en woko kacel ki ludito ma giloyo gadigadi lwennye.
Ruth 4:10 Kit meno Edom ojemo woko i kom loc pa Juda nio wa onyoo. Ka dok Libna bene ocako jemo woko i kom locce i kare-nu, pien en otyeko bwoto Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarine.
Ruth 4:11 Dok bene en ogero waŋ jogi i wi godi i lobo godi me Juda; en omiyo jo ma gibedo i Jerucalem gucako woro jogi, ma pe doŋ gitye ki gen i kom Rwot, omiyo Juda oŋak.
Ruth 4:12 Cut olimo waraga ma oa ki bot lanebi Elia, ma wacce ni, “Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwaru Daudi owaco kuman ni, ‘In pe ilubo kit pa woru Yekocapat, nyo kit pa Aca kabaka me Juda,
Ruth 4:13 ento ibedo ka lubo kit pa luker me Icrael, ityeko miyo jo Juda ki jo ma gibedo i Jerucalem guworo jogi, macalo jo me ot pa Akab gumiyo jo Icrael guworo jogi; dok bene ityeko neko omegini woko ducu, jo me ot pa woru, ma onoŋo gibeco gikato in.
Ruth 4:14 Nen, Rwot bikelo can madwoŋ i kom lwakki, i kom litinoni, i kom monni, ki i kom jamini ducu;
Ruth 4:752 
Ruth 4:15 in kikomi ibibedo ki two matek two ma i cin ii-gu ducu, nio ka min ii bikatti woko jwijwi pi two meno.’ ”
Ruth 4:16 Rwot omiyo kiniga omako jo Piliciti ki jo Arab ma gibedo cok ki jo Etiopia; ci gubino gulwenyo i kom Jekoram.
Ruth 4:17 Ka gubinoka lweny i kom Juda gumonyo lobogi, ci guyako jami ducu ma gunoŋo, Gutero jami ma i of pa kabaka, ki awo bene ki monne, guweko wode acel keken mudoŋ, en aye Yekoakaj, ma wode matidine.
Ruth 4:18 I ŋe magi ducu Rwot opwode omiye two i cin iye ma pe twero can.
Ruth 4:19 Ka omedde i ŋe mwaka aryo, ci min iye obino woko pi two meno, ci oto ki arem kom madwoŋ. Lwakke pe gumoko mac wacel pi miye deyo kit ma gimoko kwede mac pi kwarine.
Ruth 4:20 En ooamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeradek wiye aryo, ci obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka aboro; cwiny dano mo pe ocwer pi tone. Giyike i gaŋ kai pa Daudi, ento pe giyiko kome i Lyel pa luker.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 22 Loc pa Akajia kabaka me Juda (2 Luker 8.25-29)
Ruth 4:1 Jo ma gibedo i Jerucalem guketo Akajia ma wode matidine odoko kabaka ma oleyo ka tyene; pien mony pa jo ma yam gubino i gony kacel ki jo Arab gutyeko neko awobe madito woko ducu. En gin mumiyo Akajia wod pa kabaka Jekoram me Juda ocamo ker.
Ruth 4:2 Akajia onoŋo ditte romo mwaka pyeraŋwen wiye aryo ka ocamo ker, ci obedo ka loci Jerucalem pi mwaka acel. Minne nyiŋe Atalia; en yam lakwar Omri.
Ruth 4:3 Akajia bene obedo ka lubo kit pa jo me ot pa Akab, pien minne aye obedo ka miye tam me tiyo gin maraco.
Ruth 4:4 Obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot, kit macalo jo me ot pa Akab gubedo ka tiyone; pien gin aye gubedo ka miye tam me tiyo gin marac i kare ma wonne doŋ oto, ci gutere i to.
Ruth 4:5 En bene oye tamgi, ocito gin ki Jekoram wod pa Akab kabaka me Icrael ka lweny ki Kajael kabaka me Ciria i Ramot-gilead. Jo Ciria guketo ret i kom Joram,
Ruth 4:6 ci en odwogo ka mado rette i Jejreel, en aye waŋ ret ma jo Ciria guketo i kome ki i Rama i kare ma en olwenyo i kom Kajael kabaka me Ciria. Akajia wod pa Jekoram kabaka me Juda ocito ka limo Joram wod pa Akab i Jejreel, pien onoŋo kome lit. Yeko oneko Akajia (2 Luker 9.27-29)
Ruth 4:753 
Ruth 4:7 Lubaŋa onoŋo doŋ otyeko yubo ni Akajia bito i kare ma en bicito ka limo Joram. Pien ka ocito kunnu ci onywako wot gin ki Jekoram pi rwatte ki Yeko wod pa Nimci, ma Rwot onoŋo owiro wek omuk jo me ot pa Akab woko.
Ruth 4:8 I kare ma Yeko tye ka cobo lok ma Rwot oŋolo i kom jo me ot pa Akab, en orwatte ki ludito me Juda bene ki awobe pa omegi Akajia, ma gitiyo bot Akajia, ci onekogi woko.
Ruth 4:9 En obedo ka yenyo Akajia, ci gimako en ki i Camaria ka ma okanne iye, gikelo en bot Yeko ci Yeko oneke woko, Guyike, pien guwacci, “En lakwar Yekocapat, ma yam obedo ka yenyo Rwot ki cwinye ducu.” Dano mo pe odoŋ i ot pa Akajia ma romo camo ker. Atalia omayo ker tektek (2 Luker 11.1-21)
Ruth 4:10 Ka Atalia min Akajia oneno ni wode oto woko, ci en ocako jwero jo me dog ot ker pa Juda woko ducu.
Ruth 4:11 Ento Yekocabeat nya pa kabaka, otiŋo Yoaci wod pa Akajia, ci okwalo woko ki i kin awobe pa kabaka ma gibenekogi-ni, ci okano en ki lapidine i kicika mo me buto. Yekocabeat, ma nya pa kabaka Jekoram obedo dako pa ajwaka Yekoyada, en lamiŋ Akajia; okano Yoaci woko ki bot Atalia kit meno, omiyo Atalia pe oneke.
Ruth 4:12 En obedo kwedgi mwaka abicel, kun gikano en i ot pa Lubaŋa i kare ma Atalia tye ka loyo lobo.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 23
Ruth 4:1 Ento i mwaka me abirone Yekoyada obedo ki tekcwiny, oketo gicikke ki ludito ma lulo buca mony pa jo miya, Ajaria wod pa Jerokam, Icmael wod pa Yekokanan, Ajaria wod pa Obed, Maceya wod pa Adaya, ki Elicapat wod pa Jikri.
Ruth 4:2 Ci guket i lobo Juda, gubedo ka coko Lulevi ki i gaŋi me Juda woko ducu, ki ludito wi kaka ma i dog odi me Icrael ducu, ci gubino wa i Jerucalem.
Ruth 4:3 Lwak mucokke ducu guketo gicikke ki kabaka ki i ot pa Lubaŋa, Ci Yekoyada owaco botgi ni, “Nen, wod pa kabaka ene! Wuwek en aye obed laloc, kit ma yam Rwot oloko i kom likwayo pa Daudi.
Ruth 4:4 Man aye gin ma wubitiyo: ki tuŋ botwu wun ajwagi ki Lulevi ma wua woko ki i dog tic i nino me cabit, dul acel me adek gubed lugwok doggola,
Ruth 4:5 ki dul acel me adekke mukene gibikuro ot pa kabaka, ki dul acel me adek gubed i doggola ma gilwoŋo ni Guti ot; ki lwak ducu gubed i dyekalme ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:6 Pe wuwek dano mo-odony i ot pa Rwot, kono ajwagi ki Lulevi ma lutic keken aye wuwek gudony, pien gin jo maleŋ; ento lwak ducu gibigwoko cik pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:754 
Ruth 4:7 Lulevi gibirumo kabaka dyere, kun dano acel acel omako jami lwennye i ciŋe; ento dano mo ma odonyo i ot gibineko woko. Wubibedo ki kabaka ka ma en bicito iye ducu.”
Ruth 4:8 Lulevi ki jo Juda ducu gutiyo gin ducu kit macalo ajwaka Yekoyada ociko botgi. Dano acel acel okelo lwakke, ma onoŋo giweko dog ticgi i nino me cabit, gubino kacel ki jo ma gibino ka tic i nino me cabit; pien ajwaka Yekoyada pe oye ni guwek dog ticgi ducu.
Ruth 4:9 Ajwaka Yekoyada ocako miyo ki ludito me mony lwak toŋi ki kwodi madito ki matino ma onoŋo yam pa kabaka Daudi, ma onoŋo tye i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Ruth 4:10 En oketo lwak ka gwoko kabaka, kun dano acel acel omako jami lwennye i ciŋe, cakke wa yo tuŋ acuc me ot ki nio kwede wa yo tuŋ acam me ot, kun girumo keno tyer ki ot bene.
Ruth 4:11 Ka doŋ ocako kelo wod pa kabaka, oketo lalukana i wiye, ka omiye lok me caden pa Lubaŋa i ciŋe, ka gituco atir ni en doŋ kabaka. Yekoyada ki awo bene guwiro en ki moo, ci dano gudaŋŋe ni, “Kabaka obed kwo nakanaka!”
Ruth 4:12 Ka Atalia owinyo woo pa lwak ma giriŋo kun gipako kabaka, ci en ocito bot lwak wa i ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:13 Ka oŋiyo piny, ci oneno kabaka Ocuŋ ka ŋet wir ki i dog ot, kun ludito me mony ki lukut-tum gurumo kabaka, ki lwak jo ducu ma gua ki i kin gaŋ gubedo ka wo ki tum kun cwinygi yom, ki luwer ma gumako jami wergi gutelo wer me kwero eno Atalia ocako yeco boŋone kun kok ni, “Roro yai! Roro!”
Ruth 4:14 Ajwaka Yekoyada okelo ludito mony ma gubedo kacel ki mony, ocikogi ni, “Wukel dako-nu woko ki i kin tyenwu. Ka ŋatti mo o lubo kore, ci wuneke woko ki pala lucwan.” Pien ajwaka onoŋo tamo ni, “Pe myero gineke ki i ot pa Rwot.”
Ruth 4:15 Gucako keto ciŋgi i kom Atalia, ci guwok kwede ki i doggola ma aguragura donyo kwede, guo wa i ot pa kabaka ci guneke kenyo.
Ruth 4:16 Yekoyada ocako keto gicikke i kin en ki lwak ducu ki kabaka wek gubed lwak pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:17 Lwak ducu gucako mol gucito i ot pa jok Baal, ci gumuko gureto woko piny; guturo keno tyerre ducu, dok guŋido cal jogine woko ducu matitino, ci guneko Matan ajwaka pa Baal ki i nyim kena tyer.
Ruth 4:18 Lacen Yekoyada oketo lukurpiny me gwoko ot pa Rwot i te twero pa ajwagi ma Lulevi, ki Lulevi ma yam Daudi opoko tic botgi pi bedo lugwok ot pa Rwot, kun gityero gitum awaŋa bot Rwot, macalo gicoyo i cik pa Moses, ki yomcwiny kacel ki wer, kit ma yam Daudi oyubo-ni.
Ruth 4:19 Oketo lugwok doggola i doggola ot pa Rwot, wek dano mo ma ko me ki keni pe odony iye.
Ruth 4:755 
Ruth 4:20 En dok okwanyo ludito mony, ki rwodi, ki lulo wi lwak, kacel ki lwak ducu, ci gucako kela ka baka woko ki i ot pa Rwot kun gidorre giwok ki i doggola ma malo nio kwede wa i ot pa kabaka, Ci guketo kabaka obedo piny i wi komker pa luker.
Ruth 4:21 Kit meno lwak ma i lobo-nu ducu cwinygi obedo yom; gaŋ ocako kwe mot ki i ŋe to pa Atalia ma gineko ki pala lucwan.
Ruth 4:2 Tekwaro 24 Loc pa Yoaci kabaka me Juda (2 Luker 12.1-21)
Ruth 4:1 Yoaci ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte abiro, ci obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyeraŋwen, Nyiŋ minne Jibia me Beer-ceba.
Ruth 4:2 Yoaci obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen atir i waŋ Rwot pi kare me kwo pa ajwaka Yekoyada ducu.
Ruth 4:3 Yekoyada onyomo bote mon aryo, onywalo kwedgi litino co ki anyira.
Ruth 4:4 Lacen Yoaci obedo ki tam pi yubo ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:5 Ocoko ajwagi ki Lulevi, ocako waco botgi ni, “Wucit wa i gaŋi pa jo Juda, wek wucok lim ki bot jo Icrael ducu pi yu bo ot pa Lubaŋawu mwaka ki mwaka; ber wunen ni wutiyo tic man oyotoyot.” Ento Lulevi pe guruyo tiyone oyotoyot.
Ruth 4:6 Mumiyo kabaka olwoŋo Yekoyada ajwaka madit, openye ni, “Piŋo pe iweko Lulevi gujogo lim ki bot jo ma bedo i Juda ki Jerucalem kit ma yam Moses latic pa Rwot ociko ni myero gigam ki bot lwak jo Icrael pi tic me kema lok me caden?”
Ruth 4:7 Pien jo pa Atalia, ma en dako ma latim marac-ci, onoŋo yam guturo ki donyo i ot pa Lubaŋa, ci gutero jami ducu ma yam gidyero pi ot pa Rwot, gutiyo kwedgi pi woro Baal-gu.
Ruth 4:8 Pi meno kabaka ociko ni myero gipaa canduk, ci giguro ki woko i nyim doggola me ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:9 Gitito lok oromo i Juda ki Jerucalem ducu, ni myero dano gukellim ajog pa Rwot kit ma Moses latic pa Lubaŋa ociko ki jo Icrael i kare ma gitye i tim.
Ruth 4:10 Pienno rwodi kacel ki lwak ducu cwinygi obedo yom, ci gukelo lim ajog megi, gubolo i canduk nio ka gin ducu gumiyo.
Ruth 4:11 I kare ducu ma Lulevi gikelo canduk bot ludito ma kabaka ocimo, ka ce guneno ni lim tye i canduk madwoŋ, ci karan pa kabaka, kacel ki ajwaka madit, gibino gikwanyo lim woko ki i canduk gicito kwede, ka gidwoko canduk kakare i kabedone. Gubedo ka timo kit meno nino ki nino, ci gucoko lim madwoŋ.
Ruth 4:12 Kabaka ki Yekoyada gumiyo lim i ciŋ lutic ma giloyo dog tic me ot pa Rwot, giculo ki lupa-godi ki lupa bao pi yu bo ot pa Rwot, giculo kwede bene lutic ki nyonyo ki mola pi yu bo ot pa Rwot.
Ruth 4:756 
Ruth 4:13 Jo ma gimiyogi tic gutiyo ticgi matek ci yubone owoto oyot i ciŋgi maber, ci guyubo ot pa Rwot odoko maber kit ma yam con, odoko tek kakare.
Ruth 4:14 Ka doŋ gutyeko ticgi, ci gukelo lim mudoŋŋe bot kabaka ki Yekoyada, ka gutiyo ki jami ot pa Rwot, pi tic mapatpat ki pi gitum awaŋa, ki atabo me waŋo odok eceta, ki jami me jabu ki me ryal. Gutyero gitum awaŋa i ot pa Rwot jwijwi i kare me kwo pa Yekoyada ducu.
Ruth 4:15 Ento ka Yekoyada doŋ oteggi, oti woko, ci oto; i kare ma en to onoŋo mwakane romo miya acel ki pyeradek.
Ruth 4:16 Giyike i gaŋ kal pa Daudi i kin luker, pien en obedo ka tiyo tic maber i Icrael, kun tiyo pi Lubaŋa ki pi ot legane.
Ruth 4:17 Lacen i ŋe to pa Yekoyada, rwodi me Juda gubino guryebbe i nyim kabaka, ci kabaka owinyo lokgi.
