Ejira 6:19 Jo ma gudwogo cen ki i opii gukwero nino madit me Kato (Paska) i nino dwe apar wiye aŋwen me dwe mukwoŋo.
Ejira 6:792 
Ejira 6:20 Onoŋo ajwagi ducu kacel ki Lulevi doŋ gutyeko lonnye kekengi; gin ducu gudoko leŋ. Omiyo guneko litino romi me gitum pi jo ducu ma yam gudwogo gua ki i opii, ki pi ajwagi luwotgi, ki pigi kengi.
Ejira 6:21 Jo Icrael ma gudwogo ma gua ki i opii i rok aye gubedo ka camone, kacel ki jo ducu ma doŋ guweko kwo me kafiri ma gupokke woko ki i kin lwak ma gin wegi lobo, gubino ka woro Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Ejira 6:22 Ka dok gukwero nino madito me Mugati ma Tobi Pe Iye ki yomcwiny pi nino abiro; pien Rwot omiyogi yomcwiny, dok oloko cwiny kabaka me Aciria i komgi, wek okonygi ki tic me gero ot pa Lubaŋa, Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Ejira 7:1 Lacen ki i ne lok man, ma onoŋo Aritakcec kabaka me Percia aye loyo lobo, Ejira yam oa ki i lobo Babilon ocito i Jerucalem. En yam obedo wod pa Ceraya, wod pa Ajaria, wod pa Ilkia,
Ejira 7:2 wod pa Calum, wod pa Jadok, wod pa. Akitub,
Ejira 7:3 wod pa Amaria, wod pa Ajaria, wod pa Merayot,
Ejira 7:4 wod pa Jerakia, wod pa Uji, wod pa Buki,
Ejira 7:5 wod pa Abicua, wod pa Finekaci, wod pa Eleajar, wod pa Aron ajwaka madit.
Ejira 7:6 En aye Ejira ma yam obedo karan dok laryeko i cik pa Moses ma con Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael omiyo ki Moses; kabaka omiye jami ducu ma yam en olego, pien Rwot Lubaŋane onoŋo tye ka konye.
Ejira 7:7 Jo ma gucito kwede i Jerucalem bene i mwaka me abiro me loc pa Aritakcec, obedo ajwagi ki Lulevi, luwer, lugwok-doggola, ki lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Ejira 7:8 En oo i Jerucalem i dwe me abic, me mwaka me abiro me loc pa kabaka.
Ejira 7:9 Gua woko ki i lobo Babilon i nino dwe acel me dwe me acel bene, ci guo i Jerucalem i dwe me abic ninone acel, pien Rwot Lubaŋane onoŋo tye ka konye.
Ejira 7:10 Ejira yam oketo cwinye ka kwano ki niaŋ cik pa Rwot, kun tiyo, lubo, dok pwonyo cikke ki gin ma en ociko ducu bot jo Icrael. Lok ma kabaka Aritakcec ocwalo bot Ejira
Ejira 7:11 Man aye kopi me waraga ma kabaka Aritakcec yam omiyo bot ajwaka Ejira, ma lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa, dano ma opwonnye i tyen lok me cik pa Rwot ki cik ma en ociko pi jo Icrael:
Ejira 7:12 ni, “An Aritakcec kabaka ma loyo luker ducu, amiyo waraga man bot ajwaka Ejira, ma lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa me polo.
Ejira 7:793 
Ejira 7:13 An kombeddi amiyo twero ni dano mo keken ki i kom jo Icrael nyo ajwagigi nyo Lulevigi ma gitye i te locca ma oye mine kene me cito i Jerucalem, myero ocit kacel kwedi.
Ejira 7:14 An kabaka kacel ki lumi-tam ma mera abiro aye wacwalli wek icipeny lok ma tye i Juda ki i Jerucalem, me neno kit macalo cik pa Lubaŋawu, ma yam omiyo i ciŋini, gitye ka lubone kwede.
Ejira 7:15 Myero iter ryal ki jabu ma an kacel ki lumitamma wamiyo ki yomcwiny me atyera bot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma ode tye i Jerucalem.
Ejira 7:16 Dok bene myero iter ryal ki jabu ma in icoko ki i lobo Babilon ducu, ki gityer ma ic opwoyo ma jo Icrael kacel ki ajwagi gumiyo, ma gukwoŋo kwoŋ me miyo gin mo kit macalo cwiny dano acel acel omito pi ot pa Lubaŋagi ma tye i Jerucalem.
Ejira 7:17 Doŋ myero igwokke iti ki lim man maber me wilo twoni dyaŋi, nyogi romi, ki gityer me moko kwon ki koŋo vino, ka icak tyerogi i kom keno tyer ma i ot pa Lubaŋawu ma tye i Jerucalem.
Ejira 7:18 Dok in ki utmegi wutwero tic ki ryal ki jabu mogo ma odon kit macalo wuneno ni ber, kun wulubo cik pa Lubaŋawu.
Ejira 7:19 Dok myero iter lwak jami tic ma gimiyo boti me tic kwedgi i ot pa Lubaŋa-ni, ibiterogi ducu i nyim Lubaŋa me Jerucalem.
Ejira 7:20 Ka tye gin mo mukene ma mitte pi ot pa Lubaŋawu, ma myero in inoŋ, ci itwero wilone ki lim ma gikwanyo ki i ot kano lim pa kabaka.
Ejira 7:21 “An kabaka Aritakcec, amiyo twero bot lukan lim ducu ma gitye i lobo me Loka Kulu ni, Gin ducu ma ajwaka Ejira, ma lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa me polo, bimito ki botwu, myero wumi bote oyotoyot ki mitkom,
Ejira 7:22 ma welle pe kato talanta me ryal miya acel, guniya ŋano miya adek, ki koŋo vino debe miya aryo, ki debe me moo miya aryo, ki kado ma welle pe ginyuto.
Ejira 7:23 Gin ducu ma Lubaŋa me polo ociko, wuti kakare kikore i tic i kom ot pa Lubaŋa me poto, wek akemo pe omake i koma ki i kom jo ma bibedo i loc i anyim ki i ŋeya.
Ejira 7:24 Dok bene wagenowu ni pe myero wujog lim me mucoro mo ki bot ajwagi, Lulevi, luwer, lugwok-doggola, ki lutic ma gitiyo i ot pa Lubaŋa, nyo lutic mukene ma gitiyo i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Ejira 7:25 “In, Ejira, ti ki ryeko ma Lubaŋani omiyi, ket luŋolkop madito ki luŋolkop matino wek gubed ka ŋolo kop pa lwak ducu ma gibedo i lobo me Loka Kulu; myero gubed jo ma ŋeyo cik pa Lubaŋawu. Jo ma pe giŋeyo cik pa Lubaŋawu, in ipwonygi wek guŋe.
Ejira 7:794 
Ejira 7:26 Ka ce ŋat mo pe bilubo cik pa Lubaŋawu kacel ki cik me lobona, myero gimiye pwod magwar, macalo kop me to, nyo kop me ryeme woko ki i lobo-ni, nyo me yako jamine woko, nyo pi tweyo en i mabuc.” Ejira opako Lubaŋa
Ejira 7:27 Gipwo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarowa! En aye muketo gin maca lo man i cwiny kabaka, pi deyo ot pa Rwot ma i Jerucalem maber.
Ejira 7:28 Dok onyuto bota mar mere ma pe lokke i nyim kabaka kacel ki lumi-tamme ducu, ki i nyim ludito ma gin twoni oteka pa kabaka. Abedo ki tekcwiny pien Rwot Lubaŋana onoŋo tye ka konya dok abito ludito wi kaka pa jo Icrael adwogo kacel kwedgi.
Ejira 8:1 Magi aye nyiŋ ludito ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi, ma gudwogo kacel kweda ki i lobo Babilon, i kare me loc pa kabaka Aritakcec:
Ejira 8:2 ma gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwarogi: Gercom, ki i kin likwayo pa Finekaci. Daniel, ki i kin likwayo pa Itamar. Katuc, ki i kin likwayo pa Daudi,
Ejira 8:3 ma i kin likwayo pa Cekania. Jekaria, ki i kin likwayo pa Paroc, kacel jo megi ma gicoyo nyiŋgi giromo miya acel ki pyerabic.
Ejira 8:4 Eliekoenai wod pa Jerakia, ki i kin likwayo pa Pakat-moab, kacel ki jone ma welgi oromo miya aryo.
Ejira 8:5 Cekania wod pa Jakajiel, ki i kin likwayo pa Jatu, kacel ki jone miya adek.
Ejira 8:6 Ebed wod pa Yonacan, ki i kin likwayo pa Adin, kacel ki jone pyerabic.
Ejira 8:7 Jecaya wod pa Atalia, ki i kin likwayo pa Elam, kacel ki jone pyerabiro.
Ejira 8:8 Jebadia wod pa Mikael, ki i kin likwayo pa Cepatia, kacel ki jone pyeraboro.
Ejira 8:9 Obadia wod pa Jekiel, ki i kin likwayo pa Joab, kacel ki jone miya aryo ki apar wiye aboro.
Ejira 8:10 Celomit wod pa Jocipia, ki i kin likwayo pa Bani, kacel ki jone miya acel ki pyerabicel.
Ejira 8:11 Jekaria, wod pa Bebai, ki i kin likwayo pa Bebai, kacel ki jone pyeraryo wiye aboro.
Ejira 8:12 Yokanan wod pa Kakatan, ki i kin likwayo pa Ajgad, kacel kijone miya acel ki apar.
Ejira 8:13 Elipelet, Jeuel, ki Cemaya, ki i kin likwayo pa Adonikam, jo ma gucito lacen, kacel ki jo megi pyerabicel.
Ejira 8:795 
Ejira 8:14 Utai ki Jakur, ki i kin likwayo pa Bigvai, kacel ki jo megi pyerabiro. Ejira onoŋo Lulevi pi tic i ot pa Lubaŋa
Ejira 8:15 An yam acokogi kacel i dog kulu ma mol dok yo tuŋ Akava, wagony iye wabedo kunnu pi nino adek. Ka abedo ka ŋiyo dano anoŋo ni ajwagi gitye, ento Lulevi pe gitye kadi ki acel mo.
Ejira 8:16 Ka dok acwalo kwena me lwoŋo jo magi, Eliejer, Ariel, Cemaya, Elnatan, Jarib, Elnatan, Natan, Jekaria, ki Meculam, gin aye ludito wi lwakgi dok alwoŋo Joyarib ki Elnatan ma yam gin jo ma tye ki niaŋ matut,
Ejira 8:17 ka acwalogi bot Iddo, ma en ladit ma loyo kabedo me Kacipia, kun atito botgi lok ducu ma myero gin gucilok bot Iddo ki utmegine ma gin lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa ma i kabedo me Kacipia, me cwalo botwa dano ma gibitic i ot pa Lubaŋawa.
Ejira 8:18 Pi Rwot Lubaŋawa ma onoŋo tye ka konyowa omiyo gucwalo botwa Cerebia dano ma ŋeyo piny, ma en tye i kin likwayo pa Makali ma en lakwar pa Levi dok lakwar Icrael bene; en obino ki litinone kacel ki utmegine, gin ducu apar wiye aboro;
Ejira 8:19 ka dok gucwalo Kacabia ki Jecaya ma gitye i kin likwayo pa Merari, kacel ki utmegigi, ki litinogi gin ducu pyeraryo.
Ejira 8:20 Doŋ medo i kom lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa miya aryo ki pyeraryo, ma con Daudi ki luditone guketo pi tic bot Lulevi, gin ducu gicoyo nyiŋgi woko piny kikore. Ejira otelo wi lwak i kare me ri kec ki lega
Ejira 8:21 An dok aciko pi ri kec kunnu, ki i dog kulu Akava, wek wamwolle kenwa i nyim Lubaŋawa, wek waleg en omiwa wawot maber, wan kikomwa, litinowa, kacel ki jamiwa ducu.
Ejira 8:22 Kono nene apenyo kabaka ni omiya lwak askari ki wegi aguragura me gwokowa i kom lumerokwa ma iyo, lewic onoŋo twero maka; pien onoŋo doŋ watito bot kabaka woko ni, “Lubaŋawa bibedo ki jo ma giyenye pi konyogi, ki tek me akemone bedo i kom jo ducu ma gibwoto en woko.”
Ejira 8:23 Wari kec kun walego Lubaŋawa ni ogwokwa, ci en owinyo legawa bene. Mot pi ot pa Lubaŋa
Ejira 8:24 Ka dok aketo ludito magi apar wiye aryo ma giloyo ajwagi: Cerebia, Kacabia, ki jo apar mukene ma gin utmegigi kacel kwedgi.
Ejira 8:25 Ci apimo botgi ryal ki jabu ki jami me tic, amiyogi gityer me ot pa Lubaŋawa ma con kabaka ki lumi-tamme ki luditone ki jo Icrael ducu ma gitye i kare-nu gumiyo.
Ejira 8:26 Apimo ryal ma romo talanta miya abicel ki pyerabic, ki jami mukene ma romo talanta miya acel, ki jabu ma romo talanta miya acel,
Ejira 8:796 
Ejira 8:27 ki atabo jabu pyeraryo ma acel acel peke romo darik alip acel, ki atabo mola aryo ma giliyo maber ma rom ki jami me jabu.
Ejira 8:28 Awaco botgi ni, “Wun dano maleŋ i nyim Rwot, ki jami ducu bene leŋ; ryal ki jabu ducu gin aye mot me gityer ma cwiny dano opwoyo me miyone bot Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarowu.
Ejira 8:29 Wugwokgi, wunengi maber nio ka wupimogi i nyim ajwagi madito ki Lulevi kacel ki ludito ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi ma i Jerucalem, kun wupimo ki i kicika ma i ot pa Rwot.”
Ejira 8:30 Ajwagi ki Lulevi gutiŋo ryal ki jabu ma gupimo kacel ki jami mukene ducu, guterogi guketo i ot pa Lubaŋawa i Jerucalem. Wot me dok i Jerucalem
Ejira 8:31 Lacen wacako wot ki i dog kulu Akaya i nino me apar wiye aryo me dwe me acel, me cito i Jerucalem; Lubaŋawa aye obedo ka konyowa, dok ogwokowa ki i ciŋ lumerok ki i ciŋ luli bo ma gubuto ka kiyowa iyo.
Ejira 8:32 Ka wao i Jerucalem, ci wabedo kunnu pi nino adek.
Ejira 8:33 I nino me aŋwenne, wacito i ot pa Lubaŋawa, wacako pimo iye ryal ki jabu ki jami tic ducu wamiyogi i ciŋ ajwaka Meremot, ma wod pa Uria. Onoŋo en tye kacel ki Eleajar wod pa Finekaci, kacel ki Lulevi ma gitye kwedgi, ma gin aye Jojabad wod pa Yecwa ki Noadia wod pa Binui.
Ejira 8:34 Gikwano jami woko liweŋ, dok gipimogi bene ka gicoyo pekgi i buk i cawa meno.
Ejira 8:35 I kare meno jo ma yam gudwogo ki i opii i rok, gucako tyero gitum awaŋa bot Lubaŋa pa Icrael. Gutyero twoni dyaŋi apar wiye aryo pi jo Icrael ducu, ki nyogi romi pyeraboŋwen wiye abicel, ki litino nyogi romi pyerabiro wiye abiro, ki nyogi dyegi apar wiye aryo pi gitum me bal; meno ducu obedo gitum awaŋa bot Rwot.
Ejira 8:36 Gin gumiyo cik pa kabaka bot rwodi ki bot luloc ma gitye i lobo me Loka Kulu; gin bene gukonyo dano kacel ki ot pa Lubaŋa.
Ejira 9:1 I kare ma gin meno gityeko timone, ludito gubino bota gutitta ni, “Jo Icrael, ajwagi, kacel ki Lulevi, pud peya gupokke woko ki i kom jo mukene ma gibedo i lobo-nu me bedo kengi ki pi tim me kipyedagi jo Kanaan, jo Kit, jo Periji, jo Jebuc, jo Ammon, jo Moab, jo Ejipt, ki jo Amor.
Ejira 9:2 Co ma gin Lujudaya gubedo ka nyomo anyiragi mogo gubedo mongi kikomgi ki mon pa litinogi; omiyo kwa jo maleŋ pa Lubaŋa guribbe woko kacel ki jo mukene
Ejira 9:797  ma gibedo i lobo-nu ma gin jo maraco. Ludito ma giloyo lwak kacel ki rwodi aye gubedo lubal madoŋo i lok man.”
Ejira 9:3 Ka awinyo lok meno, ci ayeco ginarukana woko, ka aputo yer wiya ki i wiya ki dok aputo yer tika ki i tika bene, acako bedo ma piny orem kweda woko.
Ejira 9:4 Lacen jo ducu ma komgi omyel ka guwinyo lok pa Lubaŋa pa Icrael, pi ŋayo waŋ Lubaŋa ma jo ma gudwogo ki i opii gubedo kwede, ci gucako gurre guruma woko dyere ma abedo ma piny orem kweda woko nio wa i kare ma gityero gitum me otyeno.
Ejira 9:5 I kare meno ma gityero gitum me otyeno en aye aa woko kwede ki ka ma onoŋo abedo ka ri kec iye-ni, ma ginarukana ducu guyec woko, ka arumo coŋa piny ma ataŋo ciŋa bot Rwot Lubaŋana,
Ejira 9:6 kun awacce ni, “Ai Lubaŋa, lewic maka mada me ilo wiya ka atye i nyimi, ai Lubaŋana, pien bal ma wan watimo odurre madit lipim ma kato wiwa woko, ki alii mewa otorre madit lipim malo oo wa i polo.
Ejira 9:7 Cakke i kare pa kwarowa nio wa kombeddi wan ki lwakki wabedo ka timo lwak bal mapol, Doŋ pi balwa, omiyo wan ki lukerwa, ki ajwagiwa yam gimiyowa i Ciŋ luker ma i lobo pa lurok, ginekowa ki pala lucwan, ki i rok kunnu giyakowa, dok gitimowa ki tim me lewic, macalo watye i kare man.
Ejira 9:8 Ento pi kare manok keken Rwot Lubaŋawa, kica omaki i komwa, ci imiyo jo mukene ki i kinwa gubwot dok gubedo i kabedo maleŋ-ŋi mot maber. Lubaŋawa iweko wabwot ki i opii dok imiyowa kwo manyen.
Ejira 9:9 Onoŋo wan opii, ento in Lubaŋawa pe yam iwekowa ata i kare ma watye i opii, Dok inyuto mar meri ma pe lokke i nyim luker me Percia, omiyo guwekowa makwo dok guye ni wager ot pa Lubaŋawa odoco, ki yubo jami muballe i oburre, gumiyo gigwokowa bene maber i Judaya ki i Jerucalem.
Ejira 9:10 “Kombeddi ai Lubaŋawa, wan dok wawaco aao ki i ŋe lok man mutyeko timme- ni? Doŋ wabwoto lubo cikki woko ducu,
Ejira 9:11 gin cik ma yam iciko dok imiyo owok ki i dog luticci ma lunebi, kun iwacci, ‘Lobo ma wubidonyo iye ka camone me bedo mewu matwal-li, en aye lobo pa jo ma komgi ki keni, pien jo ma gibedo iye gupoŋo lobo meno woko ki tim me kipyeda nia tuŋcel nio kwede i agik lobo tuŋcel dok gubedo jo ma komgi ki keni.
Ejira 9:12 Mumiyo wun pe wumi litinogi gunyom anyirawu, ki litinowu bene pe gunyom anyiragi, wun pe myero wuyeny kuc ki lonyogi ma gitye kwede; wek wubed jo matego, ki dok wucam gin maber ma i lobo, ma wubiweko bene bot litinowu me bedo ginaleyagi matwal.’
Ejira 9:13 Lacen i ŋe lok magi ducu ma opoto i komwa pi balwa ma watimogi ki pi alii madit ma watiŋo, kadi bed in, ai Lubaŋawa ineno maber, ci doŋ iketo can i
Ejira 9:798  komwa manok ma pe oporo lwak bal ma watimo, dok ikonyowa omiyo wabwot watye makwo-ni.
Ejira 9:14 Wan dok pud wabituro cikki aye kun wamedde ki nyom i kinwa ki jo ma gitiyo bal kipyeda-ni? Ka watimo meno, kiniga pe bimaki i komwa matek nio ka Ityekowa ducu, ma dano mo acel i kinwa pe bibwot?
Ejira 9:15 Ai Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, in iporre, pien imiyo wabwot ki i lak to. Nen, watuco bal aliiwa boti, pe watye ki kit twero mo me cuŋ i nyimi pi bal man.”
Ejira 10:1 I kare ma Ejira tye i ot ka lega kun tuco bal, kun kok, poto kwede piny, dok Lwak jo Icrael mapol, co, mon ki litinogi gucokke gukok matek twatwal.
Ejira 10:2 Cutcut Cekania wod pa Jekiel, ma i kin likwayo pa Elam, owaco bot Ejira ni, “Waŋayo waŋ Lubaŋawa woko pi nyomo mon ma gin lurok ma gitye i lobo-ni, ento kadi bed kumeno jo Icrael pud gitye ki gen i kom Lubaŋa kadi lok meno otimme.
Ejira 10:3 Wan koŋ doŋ waketu gicikke ki Lubaŋawa me ryemo mon magi woko ducu kacel ki litinogi. Wabitiyo gin ma in kacel ki jo mukene ma giworo cik pa Lubaŋawa wutito botwa ni wati; wabitiyo gin ducu ma cik pa Lubaŋa mito.
Ejira 10:4 In ia malo, pien man ticci, wan bene wacuŋ i ŋeyi; myero ibed tek dok itim kumeno.”
Ejira 10:5 Ka Ejira oa malo ci omiyo lutel pa ajwagi ki pa Lulevi ki pa jo Icrael ducu gukwoŋo kwoŋ ni gibitiyo gin ma Cekania doŋ oyubo ni giti. Kit meno gucako kwoŋo kwoŋ.
Ejira 10:6 Ejira oa woko ki i nyim ot pa Lubaŋa, odonyo i kicika pa Yekokanan wod pa Eliacib, obuto kunnu nino acel, kun pe camo gin mo kadi wa mato pii bene. Dok obedo ka kumo pi jo ma gua ki i opii ma guŋayo waŋ Lubaŋa woko.
Ejira 10:7 Ka doŋ gitito lok oromo i lobo Juda ki Jerucalem ki bot jo ducu ma cen gudwogo ki i opii ni gin ducu myero gucokke i Jerucalem.
Ejira 10:8 Giciko ni ka dano mo pe obino i kin nino adek-ki, ludito ma giloyo lwak ki ludoŋo guwacci jamine ducu myero giyak gidyer ki Lubaŋa, ki en kikome bene myero giryeme oa woko ki i kin lwak ma gudwogo ki i opii.
Ejira 10:9 Cutcut jo Juda ki jo Benjamin ducu gucokke i Jerucalem i kin nino adek-ki, i nino dwe pyeraryo me dwe me aboŋwen, Lwak ducu gubedo i dyekal ma i nyim ot pa Lubaŋa. Onoŋo kot obedo ka cwer matek; pi lok man ma pire tek ki pi ŋico, omiyo kom dano acel acel obedo ka myel amyela.
Ejira 10:799 
Ejira 10:10 Ajwaka Ejira oa Ocuŋ owaco bot lwak ni, “Wun wuturo cik pa Lubaŋa omiyo wukelo alit wumedo i kom bal alii pa jo Icrael pi nyomo mon ma gin lurok.
Ejira 10:11 Wutuc balwu kombeddi i nyim Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwarowu, kun wutiyo gin ma en mito; dok myero wupokke woko pat ki i kom jo ma gibedo i lobo-ni, wuryem monwu ma gin lurok-ki bene woko.”
Ejira 10:12 Lwak ducu gugamo ki dwan maloŋo ni, “Obed kit meno, wabitiyo gin ducu ma doŋ iwaco-ni.”
Ejira 10:13 Gin gumedde guwacce ni, “Lwak tye dwoŋ mada dok bene obedo kare ma kot cwer iye madwoŋ; pe watwero cuŋ i dyekal ata kit man. Man pe gin ma gitwero tiyo nino acel nyo aryo keken, pien wan watyeko timo bal madit twatwal i lok man.
Ejira 10:14 Wek ludito ma giloyowa aye gucuŋ pi nyiŋ lwak ducu ma gucokke; wek gicik jo ducu ma gibedo i gaŋiwa ma gunyomo mon ma gin lurok gubin i nino mo ma giciko, kacel ki ludoŋo ma loyogi ki luŋolkop ma i gaŋi ducu, nio waŋ ma gikwanyo kiniga pa Lubaŋa mager ki i komwa pi lok man.”
Ejira 10:15 Ŋat mo onoŋo pe okwero yub man, ento kono Yonacan wod pa Acakel ki Jakijeya wod pa Tikva keken aye gukwero, dok Meculam ki Cabetai ma gin Lulevi bene gukonyo korgi iye.
Ejira 10:16 Jo ma gudwogo ki i opii gutimo kit meno. Ajwaka Ejira oyero dano, ludito ma loyo dog odi pa kwarogi, dano acel acel ma giyero en ocoyo nyiŋe woko piny, kun lubo dog odi pa kwarogi. I kom nino dwe acel me dwe me apar en aye gubedo iye piny ka neno lok meno;
Ejira 10:17 i nino dwe acel me dwe me acel onoŋo doŋ gutyeko yenyo lok i kom co ducu ma yam gunyomo mon ma gin lurok.
Ejira 10:18 Magi aye nyiŋ co ma yam gunyomo mon ma gin lurok ma gitye i kin likwayo pa ajwagi, gin aye Maceya, Eliejer, Jarib, ki Gedalia, ma gitye i kin likwayo pa Yecwa wod pa Jojadak kacel ki utmegine.
Ejira 10:19 Gin gucikke pigi kengi me ryemo mongi woko, ki dok gutyero gitum pi tiŋo aliigi ma obedo nyok romo ma gukwanyo ki i kom romigi pi tino aliigi.
Ejira 10:20 Ki i kin likwayo pa Imer gin aye Kanani ki Jebadia.
Ejira 10:21 Ki i kin likwayo pa Karim: gin aye Maceya, Elija, Cemaya, Jekiel, ki Ujia.
Ejira 10:22 Ki i kin likwayo pa Packur gin aye Elioenai, Maceya, Icmael, Natanel, ki Elaca.
Ejira 10:23 Jo ma i kin likwayo pa Lulevi: gin aye Jojabad, Cimei, Kelaya ma gilwoŋo bene ni, Kelita, ki Petakia, Juda, ki Eliejer.
Ejira 10:24 Ki i dul pa luwer gin aye Eliacib. Ki i dul pa lugwokdoggola gin aye Calum, Telem, ki Uri.
Ejira 10:800 
Ejira 10:25 Ki i kom likwayo pa jo Icrael: Ki i kin likwayo pa Paroc gin aye Ramia, Ijia, Malkija, Mijamin, Eleajar, Kacabia, ki Benaya.
Ejira 10:26 Ki i kin likwayo pa Elam gin aye Matania, Jekaria, Jekiel, Abdi, Jeremot, ki Elija.
Ejira 10:27 Ki i kin likwayo pa Jatu gin aye Elioenai, Eliacib, Matania, Jeremot, Jabad, ki Ajija.
Ejira 10:28 Ki i kin likwayo pa. Bebai gin aye Yekokanan, Anania, Jabai, ki Atlai.
Ejira 10:29 Ki i kin likwayo pa Bani gin aye Meculam, Maluk, Adaya, Jacub, Ceal, ki Jeremot.
Ejira 10:30 Ki i kin likwayo pa Pakatmoab: gin aye Adna, Celal, Benaya, Maceya, Matania, Bejalel, Binui, ki Manace.
Ejira 10:31 Ki i kin likwayo pa Karim gin aye Eliejer, Icija, Malkija, Cemaya, Cimeon.
Ejira 10:32 Benjamin, Maluk, ki Cemaria.
Ejira 10:33 Ki i kin likwayo pa Kacum gin aye Matenai, Matata, Jabad, Elipelet, Jeremai, Manace, ki Cimei.
Ejira 10:34 Ki i kin likwayo pa Bani gin aye Madai, Amram, Uel,
Ejira 10:35 Benaya, Bedeya, Keluki,
Ejira 10:36 Vania, Meremot, Eliacib,
Ejira 10:37 Matania, Matenai, ki Jacu.
Ejira 10:38 Ki i kin likwayo pa Binui gin aye Cimei,
Ejira 10:39 Celemia, Natan, Adaya,
Ejira 10:40 Maknadebai, Cacai, Carai,
Ejira 10:41 Ajarel, Celemia, Cemaria,
Ejira 10:42 Calum, Amaria, ki Yucepu.
Ejira 10:43 Ki i kin likwayo pa Nebo gin aye Jeyel, Matitia, Jabad, Jebina, Jadai, Joel, ki Benaya.
Ejira 10:44 Jo magi ducu onoŋo yam gunyomo mon ma gin lurok, ci guryemogi woko kacel ki litinogi ducu.
Ejira 10:801  Nekemia
Nekemia 1:1 Man lok pa Nekemia wod pa Kakalia. I dwe me Kiclev, i mwaka me pyeraryo me loc pa kabaka Aritakcec, an Nekemia onoŋo atye i gaŋ madit me Cuca,
Nekemia 1:2 ci Kanani, ma ŋat acel ma i kom utmegina, obino bota kacel ki jo mogo ma gua ki i Juda. An apenyogi lok i kom Jerucalem ki i kom jo ma gubwot, ma yam giterogi i opii ci gudok cen kunnu.
Nekemia 1:3 Gm guwacca ni, “Jo ma gitye i lobowa kunnu ma gubwot ma yam giterogi i opii gitye ki peko madit ma jo mukene cayogi bene; ki dogcel me Jerucalem gimuko opoto woko piny, dok dog gaŋŋe ducu giwaŋo woko ki mac.”
Nekemia 1:4 Ka awinyo lok meno ducu, ci abedo piny akok matek. Abedo ka kumo pi nino mapol; kun ari kec ma pe acamo cam ento abedo ka lego Lubaŋa me polo.
Nekemia 1:5 Alego kun awacci, “Ai Rwot Lubaŋa me polo, in idit, dok wabedo ki lworo i nyimi. In Lubaŋa me ada dok igwoko gicikkeni ki mar meri ma pe lokke pi jo ma gimari dok ma gilubo cik meri.
Nekemia 1:6 Rwot, nen an, dok iwiny legana, ma atye ka legone dyeceŋ ki dyewor pi luticci, lwak me Icrael. Atuco balwa i nyimi ni, wan jo Icrael, watyeko timo bal i nyimi. Iyo, an ki jo me doggola pa kwara watimo bal.
Nekemia 1:7 Wan watimo gin marac mada nyimi, pe wabedo ka tiyo gin ma iciko, pe walubo cik meri ma yam imiyo botwa kun wok ki bot laticci Moses.
Nekemia 1:8 Po i kom lok ma yam iciko ki laticci Moses, kun iwacci, ‘Ka pe wulubo cikka; ci abikeyowu woko ata i kin lurok;
Nekemia 1:9 ento ka wulokke wudwogo bota kun wulubo cikka, kadi bed gikeyowu giketowu woko ata nio wa i agikki piny, an abicokowu adwokowu cen wa i kabedo ma doŋ atyeko yerone pi nyiŋa wek wuwora iye.’
Nekemia 1:10 Rwot, jo man gin luticci, dok gin lwakki ma yam ilarogi ki tweroni madwoŋ dok ki tekki.
Nekemia 1:11 Ai Rwot, kombeddi winy legana ki lega pa luticci mukene-gu ma gitye ki cwiny me woro in, Mina gum tin, imi kica omak kabaka i koma.” Nekemia ocito Jerucalem I kare meno onoŋo an abedo ladit ma loyo lok i kom kono yino ma kabaka mato.
Nekemia 2:802 
Nekemia 2:1 I dwe me Nican, i mwaka me pyeraryo meloc pa kabaka Aritak cec, ma onoŋo kabaka tye ka cam, akwanyo koŋo vino atero bote. Onoŋo yam peya abedo ki cwercwiny mo i nyime.
Nekemia 2:2 Kabaka ocako penya ni, “Piŋo waŋi nen ki can, inen calo komi yot do? Man can mo aye tye i cwinyi.” Cutcut lworo ocako maka woko marac.
Nekemia 2:3 Ci agamo dog kabaka ni, “Kabaka obed kwo nakanaka! Waŋa pe twero nen ki can piŋo, ma kun kono gaŋ kal ka ma giyiko iye kwarowa ducu doŋ odoko obur, ma dog gaŋŋe giwaŋo woko liweŋ ki mac?”
Nekemia 2:4 Kabaka dok openya ni, “Doŋ imito gin aŋo kono?” Cutcut alego Lubaŋa me polo.
Nekemia 2:5 Ka doŋ agamo dog kabaka ni, “Ka ce ineno ni ber, laditta kabaka, ka itwero ye legana, wek acit i lobo me Juda i gaŋ kal ka ma kwarowa giyikogi iye, wek aciyub gaŋ meno odoco.”
Nekemia 2:6 Kabaka odokka iye ma onoŋo daker mere obedo ka ŋete, owacci, “Wot meno biteri kare ma rom mene, dok ibidwogo awene?” Ci atitte bene nino ma abia iye kikome; kabaka oye pi citona kunnu.
Nekemia 2:7 Ka dok awaco bot kabaka ni, “Ka ce ineno ni ber, myero gico waraga ci imiya ater bot luloc ma i lobo ma tye Loka Kulu, ma tito botgi ni myero guye akat acit i Juda.
Nekemia 2:8 Dok apenyo kabaka bene ni myero oco waraga omiya ater bot Acap, ma lagwok buŋa pa kabaka, wek omiya yadi wek giti ki bao pi dogcel me gogo ma gwoko ot pa Lubaŋa, ki pi cel ma orumo gaŋ, ki pi ot ma an abibedo iye.” Kabaka oye ci omiya gin ducu ma alege pire, pien Lubaŋa onoŋo tye ka konya.
Nekemia 2:9 Kabaka ocwalo an kacel ki ludito me mony ki dul pa wegi aguragura, ci acito i lobo ma tye Loka Kulu tuŋ potoceŋ, ci amiyo waraga pa kabaka bot luloc me lobo.
Nekemia 2:10 Ento Canbalat ma jo Bet-koron, ki Tobia ma en jo Ammon, ka guwinyo lok man, ci gubedo ki keco i cwinygi matek pien guŋeyo ni dano mo obino pi konyo kor jo Icrael. Nekemia ocuko cwiny lwak me gero cel odoco
Nekemia 2:11 Acito i Jerucalem ci ari kunnu pi nino adek,
Nekemia 2:12 ma pe atito bot ŋat mo tam ma Lubaŋa otyeko keto i cwinya ma myero ati kwede pi Jerucalem. Cutcut i cwiny dyewor aa malo wacako wot kacel ki lurema mogo. Pe onoŋo watye ki lee mo mukene kono kana ma abedo i wiye-ni keken.
Nekemia 2:13 Akato acito woko i dyewor kun awok i dogcel me cito i nota nio kwede i waŋ It pa Too ki i dogcel ma cito wi odur, ci acako ŋiyo cel me Jerucalem ducu ma yam gimuko opoto woko piny, kacel ki dogcel ducu ma yam giwaŋo woko liweŋ ki mac-ci.
Nekemia 2:803 
Nekemia 2:14 Ka dok alokke acito i Dogcel me Wan It ki i Kut pa Kabaka. Kana ma abedo i wiye-ni onoŋo pe twero noŋo yo mo ma myero ekat ki iye.
Nekemia 2:15 Kit meno aa i dyewor acito ka ŋiyo cel kun awok ki i nota; ka adok cen i gaŋ ki i dogcel ma ci to i nota, ki yo ma acito kwede.
Nekemia 2:16 Pe tye ŋat mo i kin ludito ma giloyo lwak ma oŋeyo ka ma acito iye ki gin ma abedo ka tiyone. Onoŋo peya atito gin mo bot Lujudaya, ajwagi, ludito ma giloyo lwak ducu, kadi ki bot jo mukene ma onoŋo myero guti tic meno.
Nekemia 2:17 Ka doŋ awaco botgi ni, “Wunen kit ayela ma watye kwede kombeddi, wunen Jerucalem doŋ odoko obur, wa dog celle ducu giwaŋo woko. Wubin wacaku gero cel me Jerucalem odoco, wek lewic pe obed ka makowa.”
Nekemia 2:18 Ka dok atitogi kit macalo Lubaŋa obedo kweda dok okonya maber, kacel ki lok ducu ma cen kabaka owacca. Gin gugamo ni, “Wacaku gerone odoco.” Ci guyubbe me cako tic cut, gujiŋo badgi me tiyo tic maber.
Nekemia 2:19 Ento ka Canbalat ma jo Bet-koron, Tobia ma latic, ma jo Ammon, ki Gecem ma Laarab guwinyo pi gin ma watye ka tiyone, gucako nywarowa kun gicayowa bene ma giwacci, “Man gin aŋo ma wutye ka tiyone-rii? Wun wumito jemo i kom kabaka?”
Nekemia 2:20 An adok iye botgi ni, “Lubaŋa me polo aye bikonyowa, wan luticce, wabicako gedo. Ento pe tye dul mo ma gipoko ki wun i Jerucalem, kadi wa twero mo, nyiŋwu bene pe gipo pire.”
Nekemia 3:1 Eliacib ma ajwaka madit, ki ajwagi ma gin utmegine, gugero Dogcel me Romo, Gukwero wek obed maleŋ dok guketo kikane. Gugero nio wa i lubele me Miya ki Lubele ma gilwoŋo Kananel.
Nekemia 3:2 Jo Jeriko gugero dul mukene ma cok kwede ki Jakur wod pa Imri ogero bene dul ma lubo enno.
Nekemia 3:3 Likwayo pa Acena gugero dogcel me Rec; guriyo baone ka guketo kikane, bolti, ki rii me doggola me lorone.
Nekemia 3:4 Dano ma olubogi obedo Meremot wod pa Uria, ma wod pa Kakoj, ma oyubo dul ma i ŋete. Dano ma oyubo dul ma i ŋete obedo Meculam wod pa Berekia ma wod pa Mecejabel. Dano mukene ma oyu bo dul ma i ŋete obedo Jadok wod pa Baana.
Nekemia 3:5 Jo ma guyubo dul mukene ma i ŋete malubo gin aye jo Tekoa, ento luditogi me awora pe guye tiyo tic mapek ma jo ma loyogi gumiyogi.
Nekemia 3:6 Ka dok Joyada wod pa Pacea, ki Meculam wod pa Beeodeya guyubo Dogcel Macon: guriyo baone ka guketo kikane, ki bolti ki rii me doggola me lorone.
Nekemia 3:804 
Nekemia 3:7 Jo ma guyubo dul mukene ma i ŋete obedo Melatia jo Gibeon, ki Jadon jo Meronot kacel ki jo ma i gaŋi me Gibeon ki Mijpa, ma gitye i te loc pa laloc me lobo ma Loka Kulu.
Nekemia 3:8 Ujiel wod pa Karaya ma en latet jabu bene oyubo dul mukene ma i ŋete. Ŋat mukene ma olube obedo Anarua ma layub moo ma ŋwece kur, oyubo dul mukene; ci guroco Jerucalem odwogo kakare nio kwede wa i kom cel malacce.
Nekemia 3:9 Ŋat mukene ma olubogi en aye Repaya wod pa Kur, ma en loyo nucu lobo ma orumo Jerucalem, en bene oyu bo dul nukene.
Nekemia 3:10 Ŋat mukene ma olubo obedo Jedaya wod pa Karumap, en oyubo mere dul ma okemo ode; ki ŋat ma olube obedo Katuc wod pa Kacabneya, en oyubo dul mukene.
Nekemia 3:11 Ki Malkija wod pa Karim ki Kacub wod pa Pakat-moab guyubo dul mukene ki cel Gogo me Keno me tedo mugati ducu.
Nekemia 3:12 Ŋat mukene ma olubo obedo Calum wod pa Kalokeci, ma loyo nucu lobo ma orumo Jerucalem, en oyu bo dul mukene ki anyirane bene gukonye.
Nekemia 3:13 Kanun ki jo ma gibedo i Janoa guyubo dogcel ma cito i nota. Guroco cel odok kakare ka guketo kikane, ki bolti ki rii me doggola me lorone, ka guyubo cel gogo ma borre romo yadi miya abic, nio kwede wa i dogcel ma cito wi odur.
Nekemia 3:14 Malkija wod pa Recab, ma laloc me lobo ma orumo Bet-akerem, oyubo dogcel ma cito wi odur; ogero odoco ka oketo kikane, ki bolti ki rii me doggola me lorone ducu.
Nekemia 3:15 Calum wod pa Kolkoje, laloc me lobo Mijpa, oyubo Dogcel me Waŋ It; ogero odoco dok oumo wiye ka oketo kikane, ki bolti ki rii me doggola me lorone ducu; ka dok en ogero cel orumo Kut Cela ma cok ki po to pa kabaka, nio kwede wa i rwom ma lor piny nia ki i gaŋ kal pa Daudi.
Nekemia 3:16 Ŋat ma olubo en obedo Nekemia wod pa Ajbuk, ma laloc me nucu lobo Bet-jur; en oyubo ka ma okemme ki Lyel pa Daudi, ma cok ki kut ma gikwinyo akwinya ki ciŋ, yo tuŋ odi pa twoni oteka lweny. Lulevi ma gubedo ka tiyo tic i kom cel
Nekemia 3:17 Jo ma olubo en obedo Lulevi magi: Rekum wod pa Bani, ki ŋat ma olube obedo Kacabia, ma laloc me nucu lobo ma orumo Keila; guyubo pi nyiŋ lobone.
Nekemia 3:18 Lacen utmegigi bene guyubo, gin ene: Bavai wod pa Kenadad, ma laloc me nucu lobo ma orumo Keila.
Nekemia 3:19 Ŋat ma lubo en obedo Ejer wod pa Yecwa, ma laloc me Mijpa; en oyubo dulle me aryone mukene mukemme ki ot kano jami lweny me mony ma i twok cel.
Nekemia 3:20 Dano ma olubo en obedo Baruk wod pa Jabai; en oyubo dulle mukene nia ki i twokke ma yo tuŋ doggola me ot pa Eliacib ajwaka madit.
Nekemia 3:805 
Nekemia 3:21 Dano ma olubo en obedo Meremot wod pa Uria, ma wod pa Kakoj; oyubo dul ot mukene nia ki i doggola me ot pa Eliacib nio wa i agikki ot. Ajwagi ma gutiyo tic i kom cel
Nekemia 3:22 Jo ma gulube obedo ajwagi, jo ma gibedo i lobo bar; guyubo dul mukene.
Nekemia 3:23 Jo ma olubogi obedo Benjamin ki Kacub; guyubo dul mukemo ot megi. Ŋat ma olubogi obedo Ajaria wod pa Maceya, ma wod pa Anania ma oyubo mere ki yo tuŋ ode kikome.
Nekemia 3:24 Dano ma olubo en obedo Binui wod pa Kenadad; en oyubo dul mukene, nia ki i kom ot pa Ajaria nio kwede i twok cel
Nekemia 3:25 nio kwede ka ma ogonne. Ka Palal wod pa Ujai oyu bo gulle ma i iye, kacel ki cel ma ocudo malo mukemo ot pa kabaka ma i dyekal pa: lukur-piny, Dano ma olubo en obedo Pedaya wod pa Paroc.
Nekemia 3:26 Lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa ma gibedo i kom Opel, guyubo dulle mu kene mukemo Dogcel me Pii tuŋ wokceŋ, mukemo dul cel ma ocudo malo Lugedo mukene
Nekemia 3:27 Jo ma gulubo en obedo jo Tekoa; guyubo dul mukene mukemo cel gogo madit ma wiye ocudo malo likuŋ nio kwede wa i kom cel ma cok ki Opel.
Nekemia 3:28 Ajwagi guyubo ka wi Dogcel me Aguragura, kun ŋat acel acel yu bo mukemo tuŋ ode kikome.
Nekemia 3:29 Ŋat ma olubogi obedo Jadok wod pa Imer ma oyubo mere ka ma okemo ode kikome. Ŋat ma olubo en obedo Cemaya wod pa Cekania, ma lagwok dogcel ma tuŋ wokceŋ: en oyubo bene dul mu kene.
Nekemia 3:30 Jo ma gulube obedo Anania wod pa Celemia, ki Kanun wod pa Jalap me abicelle; guyubo dul mukene, ŋat ma olubo en obedo Meculam wod pa Berekia ma oyubo ka ma okemo kicikane.
Nekemia 3:31 Ŋat mulubo en obedo Malkija, ŋat acel i kom lutet jabu; en oyubo dul mu kene nia ki i ot pa lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa ki pa lucat-wil, ma okemo dogcel me coyo nyiŋ jo nio kwede wa i kicika ma malo ma i twoke.
Nekemia 3:32 I kin kicika ma malo ma i twoke ki Dogcel me Romo, jo ma giliyo jabu, ki lucatwil aye guyubo dul mukene.
Nekemia 4:1 I kare-nu ka Canbalat owinyo ni wan Lujudaya watye ka gero cel me Jerucalem odoco, ci kiniga ki akemo madwoŋ omake, ocako cayowa.
Nekemia 4:806 
Nekemia 4:2 Ki kinigane-ni en ocako nywarowa ki i nyim luwote ki i nyim mony me Camaria kun waco ni, “Man Lujudaya ma gigoro-ni gitye ka tiyo aŋo kaa? Gitamo ni gitwero gero gaŋ man odoco? Gibityero gitum mo? Gitwero tyeko tic man i nino acel keken? Gitwero payo godi me gedo ducu ki i kom godi ma gudurre i wi odur yugi ma giwaŋo-ni?”
Nekemia 4:3 Tobia ma Laammon onoŋo ocun ka ŋete, owacci, “Kit cel aŋo ma gin twero gerone? Kadi too mamwa-ni ka owoto ki i wiye, ci muko cel gotgi-ni reto woko piny!”
Nekemia 4:4 Ai Lubaŋawa, winy ka gicayowa ba; lok cac ma gicayo ki wan odok i wigi, imi giyak jamigi woko ducu dok gimakgi gitergi i opii i lobo pa lurok.
Nekemia 4:5 Pe iwek bal megi, dok wii pe myero owil i kom balgi, pien guyetowa wan ma watye ka gedo-ni.
Nekemia 4:6 Kit meno wan wamedde ki gero cel; ci watyeko gero cel woko oyotoyot oo wa malo i nucu me borre ma yam con ca, Man otimme pien lwak onoŋo gitye ki cwiny me tic kikome.
Nekemia 4:7 Ento i kare ma Canbalat ki Tobia ki jo Arab, jo Ammon ki jo Acidod guwinyo ni watye ka wot anyim ki tic me yubo cel me Jerucalem ki dok ni wacako culo ka ma twolone woko ducu, ci kiniga omakogi matek.
Nekemia 4:8 Ci gucokke kacel ka piro lok me cito ka lweny i kom Jerucalem, ki kelo anyobanyoba bot dano ma gitye kunnu.
Nekemia 4:9 Ento wan wamedde ki lego Lubaŋawa, dok waketo co me kuro piny me gwokowa dyeceŋ ki dyewor ki i komgi.
Nekemia 4:10 Ento jo Juda gubedo ka wacci, “Kero kom luywek godi doŋ otum woko; dok yugi bene odurre iye lipim; pe doŋ watwero gero cel.”
Nekemia 4:11 Lukworwa gutamo ni wan pe wabitwero nenogi dok pe wabitwero ŋeyo gin ma tye ka timme, nio ka gibio wa botwa kany, ci ginekowa dok gigiko ticwa woko.
Nekemia 4:12 Lujudaya ma gibedo i kin lumerokwa gubedo ka bino botwa kare ki kare kun gitito botwa tyen ma romo apar kulu yub ma lumerokwa gitye kwede i komwa; kun gibino ma gia ki i kabedo ducu ka ma gibedo iye.
Nekemia 4:13 Oyotoyot acako poko jami lweny magi bot lwak, pala lucwan, toŋi ki atum, ci aketogi gubedo i kabedo mo ma i ŋe cel kun lubo doggolagi, ka ma pud odoŋ twolo.
Nekemia 4:14 Aneno gin ma tye ka timme, ci aa malo awaco bot ludito ma gin lutel wic, ki ludito ma giloyo lwak, ki bot lwak ducu ni, “Pe wubed ki lworo mo i kom lukworwa. Wupo ni Rwot dit dok gilworo; pienno wun wulweny matek pi jo me lobowu, pi litinowu, pi monwu, ki pi pacowu.”
Nekemia 4:807 
Nekemia 4:15 Ka lumerokwa guwinyo ni lok me yubgi otyeko winnye botwa ci guniaŋ ni Lubaŋa oturo yubgi woko, ci wan ducu wacako dok cen ka tic i kom cel, dano acel acel odok i dog ticce.
Nekemia 4:16 Cakke i kare meno nucu pa lwakka gubedo ka gedo, ki nucugi mukene gumako toŋi, kwodi, ki atum-gu, ka guruko koti me nyonyo pi lweny, kun ludoŋo pa lwak gucwako jo me ot pa Juda ducu,
Nekemia 4:17 ma onoŋo gitye ka gero cel odoco. Jo ma gin lutiŋ yec bene gabedo ka tic kit man, dano acel acel tiŋo jami ma mitte pi gedo ki ciŋe acel, ki jami lwennye noŋo omako i ciŋe tuŋ cel.
Nekemia 4:18 Ka dok dano acel acel i kinjo ma gin lugedo bedo ki pala lucwanne ma otweyo woko i pyere kun noŋo tye kwede ka gedo. Dano ma en lakut tum onoŋo bedo mere cok ka ŋeta.
Nekemia 4:19 Atito ki rwodi kacel ki ludito ma giloyo lwak i dog tic ni, “Tic doŋ onya odoko dwoŋ twatwal, omiyo kinwa odon malac ki kinwa opokke woko ki i kom cel, kin dano odoko bor ki lawote.
Nekemia 4:20 I kabedo ma wuwinyo tum okok iye, myero wucokke botwa kunnu. Lubaŋawa bilweny piwa.”
Nekemia 4:21 Kit meno nino ducu cakke okogweno nio i dyewor ka lakalatwe otuc wabedo ka tic i kom cel, ma noŋo nucu pa lwakwa mukene gucuŋ ki toŋi i ciŋgi gikuro piny.
Nekemia 4:22 An dok awaco ki lwak i kare-nu ni, “Wek dano acel acel ki laticce gudoŋ gubut i Jerucalem, ci gubed ka kuro piny piwa i dyewor ka dok guti tic i dyeceŋ.”
Nekemia 4:23 Pe tye dano mo i kinwa, kadi an kikoma nyo utmegina nyo lukur-piny ma gulubo kora ma olunyo boŋŋine. Dano acel acel obedo ki jami lwennye i ciŋe.
Nekemia 5:1 Lacen jo mapol, co kacel ki mongi, gucako ŋur i kom Lujudaya wadigi.
Nekemia 5:2 Jo mogo guwacci, “Wan kacel ki litino awobewa ki anyirawa doŋ wadoko dwoŋ; wamito kal me acama wek wabed kwo.”
Nekemia 5:3 Jo mukene bene guwacci, “Wan wajeŋo pottiwa, potti olokwa, kacel ki odiwa ducu, wek wanoŋ kal wacam, pien kec tye marac.”
Nekemia 5:4 Dok jo mukene bene guwacci, “Wan doŋ watyeko deno lim me culo mucoro pa kabaka kun wajeŋo pottiwa ki potti olokwa pire.
Nekemia 5:5 Wan mono pe wamito jami ma rom aroma ki jami ma Lujudaya wadiwa gimito? Litinowa kono pe giber ma rom ki litinogi? Ento watye ka miyo litinowa gibedo opii. Doŋ watyeko cato anyirawa mukene woko macalo opii. Wan pe watye ki twer mo, pien doŋ gityeko kwanyo pottiwa ki potti olokwa woko ducu ki botwa.”
Nekemia 5:808 
Nekemia 5:6 I kare ma an Nekemia awinyo koko megi kacel ki lok pa lwak,
Nekemia 5:7 kiniga omaka matek, abedo ka lwodo lok ki i cwinya kekena, acako laro lok ki rwodi kacel ki ludito ma giloyo lobo, kun awaccigi ni, “Wun wutye ka noŋo magoba i kom omegiwu.” Alwoŋo cokke madit me neno lok i komgi,
Nekemia 5:8 kun awaco botgi ni, “Wabedo ka koko omegiwa ma gin Lujudaya ki lim kit macalo watwero, ma yam gicatogi woko bot lurok. Ento wun wutye ka cato omegiwu kikome ni wan Lujudaya wadigi aye dok wawilgi!” Ludito guliŋ aliŋa litik, ma pe gitwero noŋo lok mo ma myero guwaci.
Nekemia 5:9 Ka dok awaccigi ni, “Gin ma wutye ka tiyone-ni pe ber. Wun pe myero wulwor Lubaŋawa i timwu ducu? Ka pe wulworo Lubaŋawa, ci miyo lumerokwa gicayowa.
Nekemia 5:10 Ento an kacel ki utmegina ki luticca ducu wamiyo gideno lim ki kai ki botwa. Wan waweku tam ducu me limo magoba-ni obedi.
Nekemia 5:11 Tin wudwok pottigi odok i ciŋgi, potti olokgi, potti jeitunigi kacel ki odigi ducu, Dok wuŋol banya ma gitye kwede botwu macalo me lim ryalgi, kai, kono vino, nyo moogu ma wubedo ka jogone ki botgi-ni.”
Nekemia 5:12 Ludito gugamo ni. “Wan wabitiyo kit ma iwaco-ni, wabidwoko jami magi ducu botgi, dok pe wabipenyogi ni gucul banyawa.” Alwoŋo ajwagi, ci amiyo ludito gukwoŋo kwoŋ ma moko ni gibigwoko cikkegi.
Nekemia 5:13 Acako yeŋo kitambara ki i pyera kun adoŋo taca ma awacci, “Man aye kit ma Lubaŋa biyeŋo kwede dano mo ma i kinwu ma pe bicobo kwoŋ kun gwoko cikke. Ci Lubaŋa biyeŋo odiwu ki jami ducu ma wutye kwede, biweko wudoŋ noŋo laboŋo gin mo.” Jo ducu ma onoŋo gitye i cokke gugamo ni, “Amen” dok gupako Rwot. Lwak gutiyo kit macalo gucikke kwede.
Nekemia 5:14 Pi mwaka apar wiye aryo ma onoŋo an laloc me lobo Juda, cakke i mwaka me pyeraryo nio kwede i mwaka pyeradek wiye aryo me loc pa kabaka Aritakcec, pe tye utmegina mo kadi ki an mucamo kit cam ma giyubo ni gimi bota macalo laloc me lobo.
Nekemia 5:15 Luloc ma yam gubedo i loc ma gutelo nyima guketo peko madwoŋ i kom lwak pi jogo lim me ryal pyeraŋwen, ki koŋo vino, ki cam. Luticgi guloko lwak gudoko opiigi, guketo peko madwoŋ bene i kom lwak. Ento an pe atimo kumeno, pien an abedo ka lworo Lubaŋa.
Nekemia 5:16 An aketo tekona ducu ka tero cel meno odoco, pe alimo dullobo mo me bedona. Dok luticca ducu gucokke kunnu gubedo megi ka tiyo tic me gedo.
Nekemia 5:17 Dok onoŋo atye ki jo ma romo miya acel ki pyerabic, ma gin Lujudaya ki ludito ma loyo lwak, ma wabedo kwedgi dok ma wacamo kwedgi cam kacel i wi me jana, medo i kom jo ma gubino bota ma gua ki i kin lurok ma gurumowa.
Nekemia 5:809 
Nekemia 5:18 Nino acel acel onoŋo aneko twon acel, ki romi mabeco abicel, ki dok gineko gweni mapol pira kit meno dok pi nino apar apar aonyo koŋo vino manyen. Ento i kom jami magi ducu ma atiyo pe abedo ki miti mo ni gim iya dul cam mo ma giciko ni laloc myero onoŋ, pien onoŋo lwak doŋ gitye ki peko madwoŋ atika ma obwoyo komgi woko.
Nekemia 5:19 Alegi, ai Lubaŋana, po pi gin ducu ma atiyo pi lwak man, wek anoŋ pwoc pire.
Nekemia 6:1 Ka Canbalat, Tobia, Gecem, kacel ki jo ducu ma gin lukworwa guwinyo ni atyeko gero cel woko, dok ni ka mo ma omuk ma twolone doŋ pe, i kare meno onoŋo pud peya aketo rii me doggola me loro dog gaŋ ducu,
Nekemia 6:2 ci Canbalat ki Gecem gucwalo lok bota, kun giwacci, “Bin wek wabed kacel i gaŋ mo ma i bar me Ono.” Ento gin onoŋo gimito timma marac.
Nekemia 6:3 An acwalo kwena botgi kun awaccigi ni, “An atye ka tiyo tic mo ma pire dit mada, pe atwero bino kunnu ka rwatte kwedwu. Pe atwero weko tic man cuŋ pi bino me nenowu keken.”
Nekemia 6:4 Gubedo ka cwalo kwena bota ma rom kit meno tyen aŋwen kulu, an bene adwoko botgi lagam lakite acel.
Nekemia 6:5 Dok Canbalat ocwalo laticce bota ki waraga i ciŋe ma pe gimwono doge lakite acel-lu pi tyen me abicce.
Nekemia 6:6 Lok ma gicoyo iye tye kit man ni, “Gecem otitta ni cwinyo lok tye ka wot i kin lwak ma gicok kwedwa ni meno, in kacel ki lwak pa Lujudaya wumito jemo; meno aye gin mumiyo wutye ka gero cel odoco-ni. Lok man tito bene ni in ikette keni me bedo kabakagi.
Nekemia 6:7 Dok bene lok man otittiwa ni in doŋ ityeko keto lunebi me tuco lok atyer i Jerucalem i komi ni, ‘Kabaka doŋ tye i Juda.’ Lok meno doŋ gibitito bot kabaka, Pienno ber ibin warib tam wayub lokke kacel kwedi.”
Nekemia 6:8 An dok adwoko lok bote, kun awacce ni, “Pe tye gin mo macalo meno ma otimme, lok meno wun wunwaro ki wiwu.”
Nekemia 6:9 Onoŋogutemme me burowa wek wagik tic, kun gitamo ni, “Komgi bidoko nyap i tic, ci bimiyo tic doŋ pe bitine.” Ento kombeddi, ai Lubaŋa, doŋ imiya abed matek.
Nekemia 6:10 Ka acito wa i ot pa Cemaya wod pa Delaya, ma wod pa Meketabel, ma pe twero weko ode, ci cut an acito ka Lime. En owacca ni, “Wek wacit kwedi kacel i kabedo maleŋ ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, ci walor doggola me ot pa Lubaŋa woko; pien gin bibino ka neki woko. I dyewor mo keken gibibino gineki woko.”
Nekemia 6:810 
Nekemia 6:11 Ento an agamo doge ni, “An pe acal ki dano ma riŋo lawote ci kanne woko. In itamo ni abitemo laro kwana ki kanne i ot pa Lubaŋa? Pe atwero cito.”
Nekemia 6:12 Ka abedo ka tamo lok man, lacen, ci aniaŋ atir ni Lubaŋa onoŋo pe oloko kwede, ento onoŋo Tobia ki Canbalat aye kara guwile ki lim wek otit lok macalo meno me bito an.
Nekemia 6:13 Guwile ki lim wek obur an abed ki lworo apot i bal, wek gicak balo nyiŋa kun gicaya kwede-gu.
Nekemia 6:14 Ai Lubaŋana, po i kom Tobia ki Canbalat, pi gin ma gubedo ka timone i koma, ci iket can i komgi. Dok ipo i kom lanebi ma dako ma nyiŋe Noadia kacel ki lwak lunebi mukene ducu ma yam gutemo buro an ki miya lworo. Agikki me tic
Nekemia 6:15 I ŋe tic pi nino pyerabic wiye aryo tic me gero cel otum woko, i nino dwe pyeraryo wiye abic me dwe me Elul .
Nekemia 6:16 I kare ma lumerokwa ma gibedo i rok murumowa guwinyo lok man, ci lworo omakogi ma komgi oto woko lirut; pien dano acel acel onoŋo oŋeyo atir ni tic man otine pi kony pa Lubaŋa.
Nekemia 6:17 Ento i kare-nu ducu ludito pa Lujudaya gubedo ka coyo waraga mapol gucwalo bot Tobia, ki Tobia bene coyo waraga cwalo botgi.
Nekemia 6:18 Lwak mapol ma i Juda onoŋo gitye tuŋ bote ma gucikke bote ki kwoŋo kwoŋ, dok en onoŋo obedo oro Cekania ma wod pa Ara. Dok wode Yekokanan bene onoŋo yam onyomo nya pa Meculam wod pa Berekia.
Nekemia 6:19 Jo mogo bene guloko i nyima lok kom tic maber ma Tobia yam otiyo, ka gidwoko bote lok ducu ma an awaco botgi, Tobia yam omedde ki cwalo waraga bota pi miyo lworo bota.
Nekemia 7:1 Ka tic me gero cel doŋ otum, ma aketo doggola lalor dogcel ducu, aketo lugwok- doggola, ki luwer, ka dok ayero Lulevi aketogi i dog ticgi,
Nekemia 7:2 ci aketo jo aryo me loyo gaŋ me Jerucalem, omera Kanani, ki Anania, ma ladit wi mony ma loyo gaŋ me cel gogo. Anania obedo dano ma genne, dok ŋat ma lworo Lubaŋa makato lwak mukene-gu ducu.
Nekemia 7:3 Ci awaco botgi ni, “Pe wuwek giyab dogcel me Jerucalem nie ka ceŋ doŋ odoko lyet, ka dok gilor dogcel woko giceggi ki rii ma noŋo pud peya lukur-piny guweko dog ticgi ma ceŋ cito ka poto. Ka dok bene atito botgi ni guyer lukur-piny ki i kin lwak ma gibedo i Jerucalem, ci guketgi i dog tic ma mitte, dano acel acel myero obed i kabedone, kun kuro piny ka ma okemme ki ode kikome.”
Nekemia 7:811 
Nekemia 7:4 Gaŋ meno onoŋo lac dok dit mada, ento jo ma gibedo iye onoŋo pe gidwoŋ, dok onoŋo pud peya gigero odi mapol iye. Wel dano ma gudwogo cen ki opii (Ejira 2.1-70)
Nekemia 7:5 Lubaŋa dok oketo tam i cwinya me guro lwak, rwodi ki ludito ma giloyo wi lwak kacel, wek gico nyiŋgi i buk me tekwarogi. Ci anoŋo i buk me tekwaro nyiŋ jo ma gilubo jo mukwoŋo dwogo cen ki i opii, anoŋo gicoyo nyiŋgi kit man:
Nekemia 7:6 Magi gin aye lwak ma gibedo i lobo Juda ma ceŋ gudwogo cen ki i opii ka ma yam Nebukadnejar kabaka me Babilon oterogi iye macalo lumabuc.
Nekemia 7:7 Gin gudwogo kacel ki Jerubabel, ki Yecwa, Nekemia, Ajaria, Raamia, Nakamani, Mordekai, Bilcan, Micperet, Bigvai, Nekum, ki Baana. Man aye wel co ma i kin jo Icrael.
Nekemia 7:8 Likwayo pa Paroc, alip aryo ki miya acel ki pyerabiro wiye aryo.
Nekemia 7:9 Likwayo pa Cepatia, miya adek ki pyerabiro wiye aryo.
Nekemia 7:10 Likwayo pa Ara, miya abicel ki pyerabic wiye aryo.
Nekemia 7:11 Likwayo pa Pakat-moab, ma gin aye likwayo pa Yecwa ki Joab, alip aryo ki miya aboro ki apar wiye aboro.
Nekemia 7:12 Likwayo pa Elam, alip acel ki miya aryo ki pyerabic wiye aŋwen.
Nekemia 7:13 Likwayo pa Jatu, miya aboro ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
Nekemia 7:14 Likwayo pa Jakaj, miya abiro ki pyerabicel.
Nekemia 7:15 Likwayo pa Binui, miya abicel ki pyeraŋwen wiye aboro.
Nekemia 7:16 Likwayo pa Bebai, miya abicel ki pyeraryo wiye aboro.
Nekemia 7:17 Likwayo pa Ajgad, alip aryo ki miya adek ki pyeraryo wiye aryo.
Nekemia 7:18 Likwayo pa Adonikam, miya abicel ki pyerabicel wiye abiro.
Nekemia 7:19 Likwayo pa Bigvai, alip aryo ki pyerabicel wiye abiro.
Nekemia 7:20 Likwayo pa Adin, miya abicel ki pyerabic wiye abic.
Nekemia 7:21 Likwayo pa Ater, ma en aye likwayo pa Kejekia, pyeraboŋwen wiye aboro.
Nekemia 7:22 Likwayo pa Kacum, miya adek ki pyeraryo wiye aboro.
Nekemia 7:23 Likwayo pa Bejai, miya adek ki pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Nekemia 7:24 Likwayo pa Karip miya acel ki apar wiye aryo.
Nekemia 7:25 Likwayo pa Gibeon, pyeraboŋwen wiye abic.
Nekemia 7:26 Jo Beterekem kacel ki jo Netopa, miya acel ki pyeraboro wiye aboro.
Nekemia 7:812 
Nekemia 7:27 Jo Anatot, miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye aboro.
Nekemia 7:28 Jo Betajimavet, pyeraŋwen wiye aryo.
Nekemia 7:29 Jo Kiriatarim, jo Kepira, ki jo Beerot, miya abiro ki pyeraŋwen wiye adek.
Nekemia 7:30 Jo Rama ki jo Geba, miya abicel ki pyeraryo wiye acel.
Nekemia 7:31 Jo Mikmac, miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye aryo.
Nekemia 7:32 Jo Betel ki jo Ai, miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye adek.
Nekemia 7:33 Jo Nebo mukene-ne, pyerabic wiye aryo.
Nekemia 7:34 Jo Elam mukene-ne, alip acel ki miya aryo ki pyerabic wiye aŋwen.
Nekemia 7:35 Likwayo pa Karim, miya adek ki pyeraryo.
Nekemia 7:36 Jo Jeriko, miya adek ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
Nekemia 7:37 Jo Lod, jo Kadid, ki jo Ono, miya abiro ki pyeraryo wiye acel.
Nekemia 7:38 Jo Cenaa, alip adek ki miya aboŋwen ki pyeradek.
Nekemia 7:39 Man aye wel ajwagi: likwayo pa Jedaya, ma i dog ot pa Yecwa, miya aboŋwen ki pyerabiro wiye adek.
Nekemia 7:40 Likwayo pa Imer, alip acel ki pyerabic wrye aiyo.
Nekemia 7:41 Likwayo pa Packur, alip acel ki miya aryo ki pyeraŋwen wiye abiro.
Nekemia 7:42 Likwayo pa Karim, alip acel ki apar wiye abiro.
Nekemia 7:43 Man aye wel Lulevi: likwayo pa Yecwa ki Kadmiel, ma i kin likwayo pa Kodeva, pyerabiro wiye aŋwen.
Nekemia 7:468 
Nekemia 7:44 Luwer ma gin likwayo pa Acap, miya acel ki pyeraŋwen wiye aboro.
Nekemia 7:45 Likwayo pa lugwok-doggola ma gin aye likwayo pa Calum, likwayo pa Ater, likwayo pa Talmon, likwayo pa Akub, likwayo pa Katita, likwayo pa Cobai, gin ducu onoŋo giromo miya acel ki pyeradek wiye aboro.
Nekemia 7:46 Magi gin aye lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa: likwayo pa Jika, likwayo pa Kacupa, likwayo pa Tabaot,
Nekemia 7:47 likwayo pa Keroc, likwayo pa Cia, likwayo pa Padon,
Nekemia 7:48 likwayo pa Lebana, likwayo pa Agaba, likwayo pa Camlai,
Nekemia 7:49 likwayo pa Kanan, likwayo pa Gidel, likwayo pa Gakar,
Nekemia 7:50 likwayo pa Reaya, likwayo pa Rejin, likwayo pa Nekoda,
Nekemia 7:51 likwayo pa Gajam, likwayo pa Uja, likwayo pa Pacea,
Nekemia 7:813 
Nekemia 7:52 likwayo pa Becai, likwayo pa Meunim, likwayo pa Nepucecim,
Nekemia 7:53 likwayo pa Bakbuk, likwayo pa Akupa, likwayo pa Arur,
Nekemia 7:54 likwayo pa Bajlit, likwayo pa Mekida, likwayo pa Arca,
Nekemia 7:55 likwayo pa Barkoc, likwayo pa Cicera, likwayo pa Tema,
Nekemia 7:56 likwayo pa Nejia, ki likwayo pa Katipa.
Nekemia 7:57 Likwayo pa lutic pa Solomon gin ene: likwayo pa Cotai, likwayo pa Coperet, likwayo pa Perida,
Nekemia 7:58 likwayo pa Jaala, likwayo pa Darkon, likwayo pa Gidel,
Nekemia 7:59 likwayo pa Cepatia, likwayo pa Katil, likwayo pa Poceret-kajebaim, ki likwayo pa Amon.
Nekemia 7:60 Jo ma gitiyo i ot pa Lubaŋa ki likwayo pa lutic pa Solomon, onoŋo welgi romo miya adek ki pyeraboŋwen wiye aryo.
Nekemia 7:61 Magi aye gin jo ma gubino ma gua ki i Tel-mela, Tel-karca, Kerub, Adon ki Imer, ento onoŋo pe gitwero nyuto dog odi pa kwarogi, ka ce onoŋo yam gin jo Icrael:
Nekemia 7:62 likwayo pa Delaya, likwayo pa Tobia, ki likwayo pa Nekoda, gin ducu miya abicel ki pyeraŋwen wiye aryo.
Nekemia 7:63 Dok jo magi gitye i kin likwayo pa ajwagi: likwayo pa Kobaya, likwayo pa Kakoj, likwayo pa Baŋilai ma yam onyomo dakone ki i kin anyira pa Baŋilai ma jo Gilead; yam gilwoŋo en ki nyiŋgi.
Nekemia 7:64 Gin gubedo ka yenyo nyiŋgi i kin lwak nyiŋ ma gicoyogi i buk me tekwaro, ento pe gunoŋo iye nyiŋgi, omiyo gikwanyogi woko ki i kin ajwagi calo jo ma komgi ki keni.
Nekemia 7:65 Laloyo otito botgi ni gin pe gunywak camo cam maleŋ makato, nio waŋ ma ajwaka binen ma bipenyo dog Rwot ki Urim ki Tumim.
Nekemia 7:66 Lwak ma gucokke ducu welgi romo alip pyeraŋwen wiye aryo ki miya adek ki pyerabicel,
Nekemia 7:67 ma pe gikwano iye lwak luticgi ki aŋecagi ma welgi romo alip abiro ki miya adek ki pyeradek wiye abiro. Onoŋo gitye bene ki luwer ma co ki ma mon miya aryo ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
Nekemia 7:68 Aguraguragi yam tye miya abiro ki pyeradek wiye abicel, ki kanagi maditone miya aryo ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic
Nekemia 7:69 kinagagi romo miya aŋwen ki pyeradek wiye abic, ki kanagi romo alip abicel ki miya abiro ki pyeraryo.
Nekemia 7:814 
Nekemia 7:70 I kare meno jo mogo ma i kin ludito wi kaka ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi gumiyo kony me lim pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa. Laloyo omiyo lim i ot kano lim ma romo darik me jabu alip acel, becen pyerabic, ki boŋŋi aruka pa ajwagi ma romo miya abic ki pyeradek.
Nekemia 7:71 Jo mogo ma i kin ludito wi kaka ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi bene gumiyo lim i ot kano lim pi tic, lim ma roino darik me jabu alip pyeraryo ki mina me ryal alip aryo ki miya aryo.
Nekemia 7:72 Jo mukene mudoŋŋe gumiyo lim ma romo darik me jabu alip pyeraryo, ki mina me ryal alip aryo, ki boŋŋi aruka pa ajwagi ma romo pyerabicel wiye abiro.
Nekemia 7:73 Ajwagi, Lulevi, ki lugwok-doggola, luwer, ki jo mogo mukene, lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa ki jo Icrael ducu gubedo i gaŋigi.
Nekemia 8:1 I kare ma dwe me abiro oromo, onoŋo jo Icrael doŋ gitye i gaŋigi. Ci lwak gucokke ki cwiny acel i dyekal ma i nyim Dogcel me Pii; ci gutito bot Ejira ma lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa ni okel buk me cik pa Moses ma yam Lubaŋa omiyo bot jo Icrael.
Nekemia 8:2 Ci Ejira okelo buk me cik i nyim cokke, ma tye iye co ki mon ki jo ducu ma yam giromo winyone ki niaŋ iye maber, i nino dwe mukwoŋo me dwe me abiro.
Nekemia 8:3 Ejira ocako kwanone i nyimgi, kun ocuŋ okemo dyekal ma i nyim Dogcel me Pii- ni, ocako kwanone odiko nio wa dyeceŋ, kun kwano i nyim co ki mon ducu ki jo ma gitwero niaŋ lokke maber, kun dano ducu guciko itgi ka winyo lok ma i buk me cik.
Nekemia 8:4 Ejira ma lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa ocuŋ i wi abam bao ma gitiyo pi kwano lok meno, Jo magi yam gucuŋ ka ŋete tuŋ lacuc, Matitia, Cema, Anaya, Uria, Ilkia, ki Maceya; ka dok jo magi gucuŋ ka ŋete tuŋ lacam, Pedaya, Micael, Malkija, Kacum, Kacbadana, Jekaria, ki Meculam.
Nekemia 8:5 I kare ma Ejira ocuŋ malo ka maleŋ i kabedo me kwano buk, lwak ducu guciko waŋgi i kome, Oyabo buk ci dano ducu gua malo gucuŋ.
Nekemia 8:6 Ejira okwoŋo ki pwoyo Rwot, Lubaŋa madit; ci lwak ducu gugamo ni, “Amen, Amen,” kun giriŋo ciŋgi malo; ka dok guryebbe piny, ci guworo Rwot ma gukulo wigi piny i ŋom.
Nekemia 8:7 Ka dok lwak gucuŋ i kabedogi, ci Lulevi magi: Yecwa, Bani, Cerebia, Jamin, Akub, Cebetai, Kodia, Maceya, Kelita, Ajaria, Jojabad, Kanan, ki Pelaya, gukonyo lwak me niaŋ te cik maber, kun onoŋo lwak gubedo i kabedogi mot.
Nekemia 8:8 Gukwano lok me cik nia ki i buk me cik, en aye buk me cik pa Lubaŋa, dok gugonyo te lokke matir bot lwak, wek guniaŋ lok ma gikwano.
Nekemia 8:815 
Nekemia 8:9 Ka lwak doŋ guwinyo lok ma gikwano ki i buk me cik, gucako koko cut. Ci Nekemia ma onoŋo en laloc, ki Ejira ma onoŋo ajwaka dok bene lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa, kacel ki Lulevi ma gupwonyo lwak guwaco bot lwak ni, “Man aye nino maleŋ bot Rwot Lubaŋawa; pe wukum dok bene pe wukoki.”
Nekemia 8:10 Dok owaco botgi ni, “Doŋ wuwot, wucit wucam moo ki wumat koŋo vino maliŋo, wucwal cam mogo bot dano mo ma pe ki cam; pien tin aye nino maleŋ bot Rwotwa; pien yomcwiny pa Rwot en aye tek mewu.”
Nekemia 8:11 Lulevi gujuko dano guliŋ mot, kun giwacci “Wubed mot laliŋ, pien man aye nino maleŋ; pe wubed ki cwercwiny.”
Nekemia 8:12 Lwak guket gucito i gaŋigi ka cam ki ka mat, dok gucwalo cam mogo ma gitye kwede bot luwotgi mukene, pi bedo ki yomcwiny madwoŋ, pien guwinyo lok ma gikwano gitito botgi ci guniaŋ maber.
Nekemia 8:13 I kom nino me aryone ludito ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi ma i kin lwak ducu, kacel ki ajwagi ki Lulevi, gucito bot Ejira ma lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa pi ŋiyo lok ducu ma tye i buk me cik.
Nekemia 8:14 Ci gunoŋo ka ma gicoyo i buk me cik ni Rwot yam ociko Moses ni jo Icrael myero gubed i bolo pi kwero nino madito me dwe me abirone,
Nekemia 8:15 dok myero guywek lokke wek gutit i gaŋigi ducu ki i Jerucalem, kun giwacci, “Wucit i wi godi ka kela jaŋ jeituni, ki jeituni ma i tim, ki yadi ma ŋwecgi kur, yat otit ki yadi ma potgi oluk wek wayub bolo mapol, kit ma gicoyo i buk me cik.”
Nekemia 8:16 Lwak ducu gucito ka kelo jami ma gitito pire-ni ci gutiyo bolo mapol me bedogi, kun dano acel acel timo mere, i wi odigi, i dyekalgi, ki i dyekal me ot pa Lubaŋa, ki i dyekal ma i Dogcel me Pii, ki i dyekal ma i dogcel ma gilwoŋo ni pa Epraim.
Nekemia 8:17 Ki cokke pa lwak ma con gudwogo ki i opii i rok mukene gutiyo bologi ci gubedo iye; cakke i kare pa Yocwa wod pa Nun nio kwede wa i nino meno jo Icrael pe gutiyo kit meno. Ci gubedo ki yomcwiny madit twatwal.
Nekemia 8:18 Dok nino ki nino gikwano lok ma tye i buk me cik pa Lubaŋa i kom nino mukwoŋo nio kwede wa i nino me agikkine. Gukwero nino me cokke maleŋ pi nino abiro; i kom nino me aborone ci gubedo ki cokke maleŋ, ma lubo cik kikome.
Nekemia 9:1 I dwe man ninone pyeraryo wiye aŋwen jo Icrael gucokke, kun giri kec ma guruko boŋo cola, ma gunywano wigi ki lobo ma nyuto cwercwinygi.
Nekemia 9:2 Jo Icrael gupokke woko kengi ki i kom lurok ducu, ka gucuŋ ka tuco balgi kacel ki bal pa kwarogi ma yam gutimo.
Nekemia 9:816 
Nekemia 9:3 Gucuŋ i kabedogi, kun gikwano botgi lok ma tye i buk me cik pa Rwot Lubaŋagi pi cawa adek; ka i ŋeye gutuco balgi ci guworo Rwot Lubaŋagi pi cawa adek mukene.
Nekemia 9:4 Lulevi magi gucuŋ i wi abam, Yecwa, Bani! Kadmiel, Cebania, Buni. Cerebia, Bani ki Kenani; gin ducu gudaŋŋe ki dwan maloŋo bot Rwot Lubaŋagi.
Nekemia 9:5 Dok gin Lulevi magi, Yecwa, Kadmiel, Bani, Kacabneya, Cerebia, Kodia, Cebania ki Petakia guwacci, “Wua malo wupak Rwot Lubaŋawu; wupake nakanaka. Wek dano acel acel opak nyiŋi me deyo makato ducu, ai Rwot, kadi bed pwoc ki pak pa dano pe rom ki ditti.” Lega me tuco bal
Nekemia 9:6 Ka doŋ gulego lega man ni, “In aye i Rwot, in keni; in ma iketo polo ma malo makato ducu, ki lwak lakalatwe ma tye i polo-gu ducu, dok iketo lobo ki nam ki jami ducu ma tye i igi; in aye imiyo kwo botgi ducu; ki mony me polo ducu giryebbe piny ka woro in.
Nekemia 9:7 In aye i Rwot, Lubaŋa ma yam iyero Abram ci ikwanyo en woko ki Or lobo pa Lukaldaya, ka icako miyo bote nyiŋ man Abraim.
Nekemia 9:8 Dok con inoŋo ni en ŋat ma lagen, ka doŋ iketo gicikke kwede pi miyo lobo pa jo Kanaan, lobo pa jo Kit, lobo pa jo Amor, lobo pa jo Periji, lobo pa jo Jebuc ki lobo pa jo Girgac, me bedo lobo ma likwaye gibibedo iye, In ico bo lok ma iciko, pien in Lubaŋa muporre.
Nekemia 9:9 “In yam ineno atwom ma kwarowa gubedo kwede i Ejipt, dok bene iwinyo kokogi ki i dog Nam Makwar,
Nekemia 9:10 in itiyo bene lanyut ki taŋo me aura i kom Parao ki luticce ducu, ki i kom jo ducu ma i lobone, pien in onoŋo iŋeyo kit ma gubedo kwede ka uno kwarowa; ma omiyo in ilimo iye yweka, macalo tye kwede nio wa onyoo.
Nekemia 9:11 In yam ipoko i dye nam pi lwakki, ka itelogi imiyo gukato ki iye i wi ŋom mutwo. Dok ibolo merok ma gulubo korgi woko i pii, imiyo gumwony ci gulwiny woko i kut matut, macalo gweŋ ma lwiny piny i i pii mager.
Nekemia 9:12 In yam itelo nyimgi i dyeceŋ ki pol mucuŋ macalo wir, ka dok itelo wigi i dyewor ki mac mucuŋ macalo wir me menyo botgi yo ka ma myero guwot gucit iye.
Nekemia 9:13 In ilor ibino piny i kom got Cinai, ci iloko ki lwakki ki kunnu ki i polo; ka imiyo botgi cik maber ki pwony ma myero gin gulubi kacel ki gin ma iciko ducu.
Nekemia 9:14 In ipwonyogi ni gugwok cabitti obed maleŋ, ka dok imiyogi cik kacel ki gin ma in iciko ni gugwoki, kun wok ki bot laticci Moses.
Nekemia 9:817 
Nekemia 9:15 I kare ma kec onekogi in ipitogi ki kwon mua ki i polo, ka dok imiyo gumato pii mua ki i kom pata got i kare ma orwo pii onekogi. Itito botgi bene ni gudony gucam lobo ma yam ikwoŋo pire ni ibimiyo botgi.
Nekemia 9:16 “Ento gin kacel ki kwarowa wigi obedo tek ci gubedo ki wakke, omiyo gukwero lubo cikki.
Nekemia 9:17 Gukwero lubone; dok wigi owil woko i kom taŋo mapol me aura ma ibedo ka tiyo i kingi; wigi obedo tek ci guyero dano mo acel me bedo laditgi wek otel wigi odwokgi cen i opii i Ejipt. Ento in Lubaŋa ma weko bal pa danoi in iber dok lakica, kiniga pe maki oyot, mar meri dwoŋ ma pe lokke, yam pe ibwotogi ata.
Nekemia 9:18 Kadi bed yam gucweyo cal wod twon dyaŋ ma giliyo aliya, kun giwacci, ‘Man aye Lubaŋawa mukwanyowa woko ki i Ejipt,’ gin ma gutiyo gutiyo me yeto in,
Nekemia 9:19 ento in pe ibwotogi ata Him pi kicani; ki pol mucuŋ macalo wir ma obedo ka telo wigi iyo-ni, onoŋo pe orwenyo woko ki botgi i dyeceŋ, kadi mac mucuŋ macalo wir ma obedo ka menyo botgi yo ma giwoto iye i dyewor bene pe orwenyo woko ki botgi.
Nekemia 9:20 In imiyo Cwiny meri maber me pwonyogi, dok pe iweko pitogi ki manna, imiyogi bene gumato pii me kweyo orwo.
Nekemia 9:21 In yam igwokogi maber i tim pi mwaka pyeraŋwen, kun imiyo botgi gin ducu ma gin mito, dok boŋŋigi yam pe guti guyec woko ducu, ki tyengi bene yam pe okwot.
Nekemia 9:22 In imiyo gulwenyo ci guloyo lwak rok mapol, ipoko botgi lobo ma cok ki wan apokki lobogi, kun gumayo lobo pa Cikon kabaka me Kecibon kacel ki lobo pa Og kabaka me Bacan.
Nekemia 9:23 In imiyo likwayogi gunya mapol gudoko macalo lwak lakalatwe ma i polo, in yam imiyogi lobo ma myero gubed iye, en lobo ma yam ikwoŋo pire ni ibimiyo bot kwarogi wek gucam obed megi.
Nekemia 9:24 Likwayogi gudonyo ci gumayo lobo pa jo Kanaan woko; dok in iloyo wegi lobo ma gibedo kunnu, ci i niyogi i ciŋgi gin kacel ki lukergi ki lwakgi ducu wek guti kwedgi gin ma gimito.
Nekemia 9:25 Lwakki yam gumako gaŋi cel gogo kacel ki lobo ma ceko cam, ka gukwanyo odi ki lonyo ducu ma tye iye, ki bur pii ma gituco odonyo i nom piny, ki potti me yadijeituni ki lwak yadi ducu ma nyako nyiggi, kacel ki potti olok ma ginyako nyiggi madwoŋ; ma yam gucamo guyeŋ kwede ka gucako cwe ma cwinygi obedo yom twatwal pi jami mapol mabeco ma imiyogi-ni.
Nekemia 9:26 “Ento lwakki gujemo dok gukwero lubo cikki; gubolo cikki odok yo tuŋ i ŋegi, kun gineko lunebini, ma gujukogi ni gulokke gudwog boti, ci pe guwinyo, gubedo ka yeti kare ducu.
Nekemia 9:818 
Nekemia 9:27 Pi meno omiyo iweko lukworgi oloyogi i lweny, dok gudiyogi matek; gukok boti i kare ma gitye i can ni ikonygi bene, ci in iwinyo kokogi ki i polo. Doŋ pi kicani madwoŋ omiyo icwalo botgi jo ma myero otel wigi, gin jo ma yam olarogi ki i ciŋ lumerokgi-ni.
Nekemia 9:28 Ento i kare ma kuc dok odwogo botgi, gin gucako timo bal dok aye i nyimi, oweko in dok imiyogi i ciŋ lumerokgi, guloyogi. Kadi bed kumeno i kare ma guŋut gulokke gudwogo gukok boti, ci iwinyo kokogi ki i polo pi tyen mapol ci ilarogi pi kicani madwoŋ.
Nekemia 9:29 In itito botgi ni gulokke gudwog cen boti dok gulub cikki. Ento gin gubedo ki wakke ci gukwero lubo cikki ducu, kadi bed nene atir ni mako cikki aye miyo dano bedo ki kwo, ento gin gutimo bal i kom gin ma in iciko. Gubedo ki tekwic gukwero lubo cikki.
Nekemia 9:30 Ibedo ka jukogi pi mwaka mapol, kun ijukogi ki Cwiny meri ma con otiyo i i lunebini; ento gin pe guwinyo. Omiyo iwekogi gubedo i te loc pa lwak me lobo me rok mukene.
Nekemia 9:31 Ento pi kicani madwoŋ omiyo pe ityekogi woko, dok bene pe ibwotogi ata; pien onoŋo in Lubaŋa ma i won kica madwoŋ, ma kica maki twatwal.
Nekemia 9:32 “Kombeddi, ai Lubaŋawa madit, ma won twero, dok in Lubaŋa ma gilworo, pien igwoko gicikkeni ki mar meri ma pe lokke, can mapek twatwal-li pe iwek obed gin matidi mo ki tuŋ boti, can meno opoto i komwa, ki i kom lukerwa, ki i kom rwodiwa, ki i kom ajwagiwa, ki i kom lunebiwa, ki i kom kwarowa, ki i kom lwakki ducu, nia wa i kare pa luker me Aciria nio kwede wa onyoo.
Nekemia 9:33 Ento in itimo gin ma tye atir pi pwodowa kit meno; in ibedo ka tic kwedwa ki ada, ento wan aye ma watyeko timo bal.
Nekemia 9:34 Lukerwa, rwodiwa, kacel ki ajwagiwa, ki kwarowa ducu yam pe gugwoko cikki, dok, pe gulubo gin ma iciko kadi wa jukki ducu ma onoŋo ijukogi kwede.
Nekemia 9:35 Luker guloyo lwakki pi gum madit ma imiyo botgi, i kare ma gubedo ka malac i ŋom maber ma ceko cam ma imiyo botgi, ento gin pe gulokke, pe guweko timgi marac wek guti gin ma imito.
Nekemia 9:36 Nen, kombeddi wan doŋ wadoko opii i lobo ma yam imiyowa ni wacam gin ma ocek i potone ki yomcwiny, kacel ki jami ducu mabeco ma noŋŋe iye.
Nekemia 9:37 Lonyo me lobo ducu wamiyo bot luker ma in iketogi me loyowa pi balwa; gin gitye ki tek me loyo komwa ki Umwa makwo ducu, kit ma gimito, omiyo wan kombeddi watye ki atwom madwoŋ.” Lwak guketo ciŋgi i cikke
Nekemia 9:38 Pi gin ducu ma doŋ otyeko timme, wan Lujudaya kombeddi waketo ciŋwa i cikke ma wacoyo acoya i buk, dok rwodiwa, Lulevi ki ajwagiwa ducu guketo ciŋgi i cikke man me mokone matwal.
Nekemia 9:819 
Nekemia 10:1 Ŋat mukwoŋo keto ciŋe obedo Nekemia wod pa Kakalia, ma en laloc me lobo, ka i ŋeye Jedekia bene oketo ciŋe.
Nekemia 10:2 Jo ma guketo ciŋgi bene obedo ajwagi magi: Ceraya, Ajaria, Jeremia,
Nekemia 10:3 Packur, Amaria, Malkija,
Nekemia 10:4 Katuc, Cebania, Maluk,
Nekemia 10:5 Karim, Meremot, Obadia,
Nekemia 10:6 Daniel, Gineton, Baruk,
Nekemia 10:7 Meculam, Abija, Mijamin,
Nekemia 10:8 Maajia, Bilgai, Cemaya.
Nekemia 10:9 Lulevi ma guketo ciŋgi obedo Yecwa wod pa Ajania, Binui ma i kin likwayo pa Kenadad, Kadmiel;
Nekemia 10:10 ki utmegigi, Cebania, Kodia, Kelita, Pelaya, Kanan,
Nekemia 10:11 Mika, Rekob, Kacabia,
Nekemia 10:12 Jakur, Cerebia, Cebania,
Nekemia 10:13 Kodia, Bani, Beninu.
Nekemia 10:14 Jo magi aye gubedo ludito ma loyo lwak: Paroc, Pakat-moab, Elam, Jatu, Bani,
Nekemia 10:15 Buni, Ajgad, Bebai,
Nekemia 10:16 Adoniya, Bigvai, Adin,
Nekemia 10:17 Ater, Kejekia, Ajur,
Nekemia 10:18 Kodia, Kacum, Bejai,
Nekemia 10:19 Karip, Anatot, Nebai,
Nekemia 10:20 Magpiac, Meculam, Kejir,
Nekemia 10:21 Mecejabel, Jadok, Jadua,
Nekemia 10:22 Pelatia, Kanan, Anaya,
Nekemia 10:23 Kocea, Anania, Kacub,
Nekemia 10:24 Kalokeci, Pilka, Cobek,
Nekemia 10:25 Rekum, Kacabna, Maaceya,
Nekemia 10:26 Akia, K anan, Anan,
Nekemia 10:27 Maluk, Karim, Baana.
Nekemia 10:820  Cikke
Nekemia 10:28 Wan jo Icrael, ajwagi, Lulevi, lugwok-doggola me ot pa Lubaŋa, luwer, ki lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa ki jo mukene ducu ma wapokke woko kenwa ki i kom jo ma gibedo i lobo meno, wek walub cik pa Lubaŋa, wan kacel ki monwa ki litinowa awobe ki anyira ducu ma doŋ gin dito ma giromo niaŋ lok,
Nekemia 10:29 kombeddi waribbe ki utmegiwa, ki luditowa kun wakwoŋo kwoŋ ma walamme kekenwa ni wek can opot i komwa ka ce pe wabilubo cik man, kun pe walubo cik pa Lubaŋa ma yam Moses latic pa Lubaŋa omiyo botwa. Wakwoŋo ni wabibedo kun watiyo gin ma Rwot ma en R wotwa yam ociko, ki dok ni wabigwoko cikke ducu ki gin ma en mito.
Nekemia 10:30 Wan pe wabimiyo lurok ma gibedo i lobowa ginyomo anyirawa, ki wan bene pe wabinyomo anyiragi bot awobewa.
Nekemia 10:31 Ka ce lurok ma gitye i lobo man gukelo jamigi mo nyo kai, nyo kit nyig cam mo me catone botwa i nino me cabit, nyo i nino mo maleŋ, ci wan pe wabiwilo jamigi. Dok pe wabipuro pur i mwaka me abirone, i kare meno bene wabiŋolo banya ducu ma myero gicul.
Nekemia 10:32 Wan waye me miyo dul me adek i cekel acel mwaka ki mwaka me konyo tic i ot pa Lubaŋawa.
Nekemia 10:33 Wabimiyo jami magi pi woro Lubaŋa; mugati me aketa i nyim Rwot, gityer me moko kwon pi nino ducu, ki gityer me gitum awaŋa me nino ducu, gityer maleŋ pi nino me cabit ducu, nino madito me por dwe, nino madito ma giciko ducu, jami maleŋ-gu ducu, ki gitum me bal pi kwanyo bal pa jo Icrael, ki jami ma mitte pi tic ducu ma gitiyo i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Nekemia 10:34 Wan lwak, kacel ki ajwagi, ki Lulevi, wabibolo kwir mwaka ki mwaka me moko kaka mene ma myero gukel yen i ot pa Lubaŋa me wano gitum awaŋa ma gityero bot Rwot Lubaŋawa, kit macalo cik mito, kun gilubo dog odi pa kwarogi, i kare ma giciko.
Nekemia 10:35 Wan waye me tero kai manyen ma wakayo, kacel ki nyig yadi ducu mukwoŋo cek, macalo gityer i ot pa Lubaŋa mwaka ki mwaka.
Nekemia 10:36 Dok bene ŋat acel acel i kinwa bitero latin laco ma en latin me kayone, miyo bot ajwagi gin lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa, me dyerone bot Lubaŋa, ki dok bene wabimiyo litino dyaŋiwa me kayo ma dyaŋiwa gunywalo ki litino kayo romi nyo dyegi ma romiwa nyo dyegiwa gunywalo, kit macalo cik mito.
Nekemia 10:37 Wabitero mo ko kwon me kai manyen mukwoŋo cek wamiyo bot ajwagi, kacel kijami me kony mewa ma wamiyo, ki gityer mukene ducu macalo me koŋo vino, moo nyig yat jeituni ki kit kwa nyig yadi ducu mapatpat, mwaka ki ki mwaka, kun waketo i kicika odi matino me ot pa Lubaŋa, Wabimiyo dul acel me apar me kwa cam mapatpat ma wapuro bot Lulevi ma gin lujog dul acel me apar ki bot lupur ma tye i gaŋiwa.
Nekemia 10:821 
Nekemia 10:38 Ajwagi ma gin likwayo pa Aron gubed kacel ki Lulevi i kare ma noŋo gigamo dul acel me apar. Lulevi myero gutyer dul acel me apar me jami ma gijogo i ot pa Lubaŋa, i kicika me odi matino, ki i odi me kano jami.
Nekemia 10:39 Jo Icrael kacel ki Lulevi myero gumi kai, koŋo vino, ki moo me nyig jeituni gukel i odi me kano jami, ka ma gigwoko iye jami ma gitiyo kwedgi i kabedo maleŋ, ka ma ajwagi gitye iye i dog tic, lugwok-doggola, ki dul pa luwer. Wan pe wabibwoto ot pa Lubaŋawa ata.
Nekemia 11:1 Lutel wi lwak onoŋo gibedo i Jerucalem, ki lwak mukene-gu gubolo kwir me yero ŋat acel i kom jo apar me cito ka bedo i gaŋ maleŋ me Jerucalem, ma kun noŋo jo mukene mudoŋŋe gibedo i gaŋi mukene.
Nekemia 11:2 Lwak gupwoyo jo ma gumine pigi kengi me bedo i Jerucalem.
Nekemia 11:3 Magi aye ludito me lobo Juda ma gubedo i Jerucalem. Ento i gaŋi mukene ducu ma i Juda dano acel acel con obedo i lobone ma i gaŋigi, jo Icrael, ajwagi, Lulevi, lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa, ki likwayo pa lutic pa Solomon.
Nekemia 11:4 Likwayo pa Juda ki likwayo pa Benjamin bene gubedo i Jerucalem. Magi aye likwayo pa Juda ma gubedo i Jerucalem: Ataya ma wod pa Ujia, ma wod pa Jekaria, ma wod pa Amaria, ma wod pa Cepatia, ma wod pa Makalalel, ma i kin likwayo pa Perej;
Nekemia 11:5 ki Maaceya wod pa Baruk, ma wod pa Kolkoje, ma wod pa Kajaya, ma wod pa Adaya, ma wod pa Joyarib, ma wod pa Jekaria, ma i kin likwayo pa Cela.
Nekemia 11:6 Likwayo pa Perej ducu ma gubedo i Jerucalem onoŋo giromo miya aŋwen ki pyerabicel wiye aboro ma gin twoni oteka.
Nekemia 11:7 Magi aye likwayo pa Benjamin: Calu wod pa Meculam, ma wod pa Joed, wod pa Pedaya, ma wod pa Kolaya, ma wod pa Maaceya, ma wod pa Itiel, ma wod pa Jecaya.
Nekemia 11:8 Jo ma gulubo en obedo Gabai, Calai, ki jo miya aboŋwen ki pyeraryo wiye aboro.
Nekemia 11:9 Joel wod pa Jikri obedo laditgi: ki Juda wod pa Kacenua obedo ladit me aryo ma loyo gaŋ.
Nekemia 11:10 Magi aye likwayo pa ajwagi: Jedaya wod pa Joyarib, Jakin,
Nekemia 11:11 Ceraya wod pa Ilkia ma wod pa Meculam ma wod pa Jadok, ma wod pa Merayot, ma wod pa Akitub, laloc me ot pa Lubaŋa,
Nekemia 11:822 
Nekemia 11:12 ki utmegigi ma gutiyo tic i kom ot, gin ducu miya aboro ki pyeraryo wiye aryo; ki Adaya wod pa Jerokam, ma wod pa Pelalia, ma wod pa Amji, ma wod pa Jekaria, ma wod pa Packur, ma wod pa Malkija,
Nekemia 11:13 ki utmegine, ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi, gin ducu giromo miya aryo ki pyeraŋwen wiye aryo; ki Amacai, ma wod pa Ajarel, ma wod pa Imer,
Nekemia 11:14 ki utmegigi, ma gin twoni oteka ma nene, gin ducu giromo miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye aboro. Jabdiel wod pa Kagedolim aye obedo laditgi.
Nekemia 11:15 Magi aye likwayo pa Lulevi: Cemaya wod pa Kacub, ma wod pa Ajrikam, ma wod pa Kacabia, ma wod pa Buni;
Nekemia 11:16 ki Cabetai, ki Jojabad, ma gin ludito i kin ludito pa Lulevi, ma gubedo ka loyo dano i dog tic ma yo tuŋ woko ma gitiyo i kom ot pa Lubaŋa;
Nekemia 11:17 ki Matania wod pa Mika, ma wod pa Jabdi, ma wod pa Acap, ma obedo latel ma cako lega me pwoc, ki Bakbukia, ma en dano me aryone i kin utmegine; ki Abda wod pa Camua, ma wod pa Galal, ma wod pa Jedutun.
Nekemia 11:18 Lulevi ducu ma gubedo i gaŋ maleŋ giromo miya aryo ki pyeraboro wiye aŋwen.
Nekemia 11:19 Lugwok-doggola me ot pa Lubaŋa obedo Akub, Talmon ki utmegigi ma yam gigwoko doggola; onoŋo giromo miya acel ki pyerabiro wiye aryo.
Nekemia 11:20 Jo Icrael mukene ma gudoŋ kacel ki Lulevi ki ajwagi gubedo i dul lobo ma yam gimiyo me bedo megi matwal i gaŋi mukene ma tye i Juda.
Nekemia 11:21 Ento lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa gubedo i kabedo ma tye i Jerucalem ma gilwoŋo ni Opel; kun ludito ma loyogi i dog tic gin aye Jika ki Gicpa.
Nekemia 11:22 Ladit ma obedo lanen ma onoŋo loyo Lulevi i dog tic i Jerucalem obedo Uji wod pa Bani, ma wod pa Kacabia, ma wod pa Matania, ma wod pa Mika, ma i kin likwayo pa Acap, ma gin yam luwer pi tic ma i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Nekemia 11:23 Kabaka onoŋo oketo cik ma t iko gin luwer kun tito botgi kit macalo kaka mapatpat myero guwer kwede wer i ot pa Lubaŋa, kun gileyo aleya nino ki nino.
Nekemia 11:24 Petakia wod pa Mecejabel, ma en ŋat acel i kin likwayo pa Jera ma i kaka pa Juda, yam obedo lami-tam pa kabaka i kom lok ducu ma mako lwak.
Nekemia 11:25 Jo mapol ma i kom lwak gubedo i gaŋi matino ma cok kipottigi. Jo Juda gubedo i gaŋ ma gilwoŋo ni Kiriat-arba ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, ki i Dibon ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, ki i Jekabjeel ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋete.
Nekemia 11:26 Gin bene gubedo i gaŋi magi: Yecwa, Molada ki Bet-pelet,
Nekemia 11:27 Kajacual ma i Beer-ceba ki i gaŋi matino ma i ŋete,
Nekemia 11:28 Jiklag Mekona ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete,
Nekemia 11:823 
Nekemia 11:29 En-rimmon, Jora, Jarmut,
Nekemia 11:30 Janoa, Adulam ki gaŋi matinoma i ŋetgi ducu, Lakic ki poto ma i ŋete, ki Ajeka ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete. Gin gugony gubedo nia Beer-ceba nio kwede wa i no ta pa Kinom.
Nekemia 11:31 Jo Benjamin bene gubedo i Geba nio kwede yo tuŋ anyim, i Mikmac, Aija, Betel ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete.
Nekemia 11:32 Anatot, Nob, Anania,
Nekemia 11:33 Kajor Rama, Gitaim,
Nekemia 11:34 Kadid, Jeboim, Nebalat,
Nekemia 11:35 Lod, ki Ono, nota pa lutic diro.
Nekemia 11:36 Dok dul jo pa Lulevi mukene ma i Juda giribogi woko i kom jo Benjamin.
Nekemia 12:1 Magi aye ajwagi pa Lubaŋa ki Lulevi ma yam gua ki i opii ma gudwogo kacel ki Jerubabel wod pa Cealtiel ki Yecwa: Ceraya, Jeremia; Ejira,
Nekemia 12:2 Amaria, Maluk, Katuc,
Nekemia 12:3 Cekania, Rekum, Meremot,
Nekemia 12:4 Iddo, Ginetoi, Abija,
Nekemia 12:5 Mijamin, Maadia, Bilga,
Nekemia 12:6 Cemaya, Joyarib, Jedaya,
Nekemia 12:7 Calu, Amok, Ilkia, Jedaya. Jo magi aye gubedo ludito pa ajwagi ki pa utmegigi i kare pa Yecwa.
Nekemia 12:8 Jo magi aye Lulevi: Yecwa, Binui, Kadmiel, Cerebia, Juda, ki Matania, ma en ki utmegine obedo ŋat acel ma loyo lok i kom wer me lega me pwoc ma giwero bot Lubaŋa.
Nekemia 12:9 Bakbukia, ki Uno ma utmegigi bene gicuŋ tuŋcel ma gikemme kwedgi i kare me lega.
Nekemia 12:10 Yecwa onywalo Joyakim, Joyakim onywalo Eliacib, Eliacib onywalo Joyada,
Nekemia 12:11 Joyada onywalo Yonacan; ki Yonacan onywalo Jadua. Ludito ma giloyo doggola pa ajwagi
Nekemia 12:12 I kare ma Joyakim obedo ajwaka madit, ajwagi magi aye onoŋo gin ludito ma loyo doggola pa kwarogi: i kaka pa Ceraya, Meraya, i kaka pa Jeremia, Anania;
Nekemia 12:824 
Nekemia 12:13 i kaka pa Ejira, Meculam, i kaka pa Amaria, Yekokanan;
Nekemia 12:14 i kaka pa Maluki, Yonacan; i kaka pa Cebania, Yucepu;
Nekemia 12:15 i kaka pa Karim, Adna; i kaka pa Merayot, Kelkai;
Nekemia 12:16 i kaka pa Iddo, Jekaria; i kaka pa Gineton, Meculam;
Nekemia 12:17 i kaka pa Abija, Jikri; i kaka pa Miniamin, i kaka pa Moadia, Peletai;
Nekemia 12:18 i kaka pa Bilga, Camua; i kaka pa Cemaya, Yekonatan;
Nekemia 12:19 i kaka pa Joyarib, Matenai; i kaka pa Jedaya, Uji;
Nekemia 12:20 i kaka pa Calai, Kalai; i kaka pa Amok, Eber;
Nekemia 12:21 i kaka pa Ilkia, Kacabia; i kaka pa Jedaya, Netanel. Ludito ma giloyo doggola pa Lulevi
Nekemia 12:22 Gicoyo nyiŋ ludito ma giloyo jo me doggola pa kwaro pa Lulevi woko ducu kikore, i kare me kwo pa Eliacib, Joyada, Yokanari, ki Jadua. Dok bene gicoyo nyiŋ ajwagi ducu nio wa i kare me loc pa kabaka Dario me Percia.
Nekemia 12:23 Likwayo pa Levi ma giloyo doggola pa, kwarogi gicoyo nyiŋgi woko i buk me Tekwaro nio wa i kare pa Yokanan wod pa Eliacib. Poko tic ma myero giti i ot pa Lubaŋa kikore
Nekemia 12:24 Lulevi onoŋo giribogi woko gubedo i dul mapatpat ma lulocgi i dog tic obedo Kacabia, Cerebia, ki Yecwa wod pa Kadmiel. Dul aryo gipako Lubaŋa ki wer lawaŋacel kun giloco wer aloca, ma gimiyo pwoc bot Lubaŋa, kun gilubo cik ma kabaka Daudi ma en dano pa Lubaŋa yam ociko.
Nekemia 12:25 Jo magi aye gubedo lugwok-doggola me ot: pa Lubaŋa, dok bene onoŋo gikuro ot kano jami ki i doggola me ot pa Lubaŋa: Matania, Bakbukia, Obadia, Meculam, Talmon, ki Akub.
Nekemia 12:26 Jo magi gubedo i kare pa Joyakim, wod pa Yecwa ma en wod pa Yekojadak, ki i kare pa Nekemia ma obedo laloc, ki i kare pa Ejira ma en obedo ajwaka dok bene obedo lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa. Kwero cel me gaŋ ma giyubo
Nekemia 12:27 I kare me kwero cel me Jerucalem, gikelo Lulevi ducu ki i kabedo ducu ma yam gibedo iye, wek dano acel acel okwer nino man ki yomcwiny, ki wer me miyo pwoc, kacel ki wer ma gigoyo ki atego agoya-gu, ki naŋa ki opuk-gu.
Nekemia 12:28 Jo me doggola pa luwer gua ki i kabedo ducu murumo Jerucalem, ki i gaŋi ducu pa jo Netopa;
Nekemia 12:29 ki jo mukene gua ki i Bet-gilgal ki i lobo murumo Geba ki Ajimavet, ka ma onoŋo yam doŋ gugero iye pacogi murumo Jerucalem.
Nekemia 12:825 
Nekemia 12:30 Ajwagi kacel ki Lulevi gulonnye kekengi; ka dok gulonyo lwak ki dogcel ducu ki cel me gaŋ bene.
Nekemia 12:31 An akelo rwodi me Juda aketo gucuŋ malo i wi cel me gaŋ, ka acako ketogi i dul madito aryo guwoto gurumo gaŋ, kun giwero wer me miyo pwoc bot Lubaŋa. Jo ma i buca acel guwoto ki i wi cel me gaŋ nio kwede wa i dogcel ma cito wi odur;
Nekemia 12:32 ki Kocaya owoto kun lubo ŋegi, ka dok nucu pa rwodi me Juda gulube.
Nekemia 12:33 Ajwagi magi ma gubedo ka kuto tum aye dok gulubo: Ajaria, Ejira, Meculam,
Nekemia 12:34 Juda, Benjamin, Cemaya, ki Jeremia.
Nekemia 12:35 Ka dok ajwagi ma gubino gulubogi ma gubedo ka kuto tum obedo Jekaria wod pa Yonacan, ma wod pa Cemaya, ma wod pa Matania, ma wod pa Mikaya, ma wod pa Jakur, ma wod pa Acap,
Nekemia 12:36 kacel ki jo magi ma gin jo me kaka ne ma gulube: Cemaya, Ajarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Netanel, Juda ki Kanani; gubino ma gumako jami me wer pa Daudi ma en dano pa Lubaŋa. Ejira ma en lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa owoto mere anyim obedo ka telo wigi.
Nekemia 12:37 Ka guo i Dogcel me Waŋ It guwoto atir guito i kom rwom ma cito i gaŋ kai pa Daudi, ci gukato ot kai pa Daudi woko guwok ki malo, ka gudok cen i kom cel ma cok ki Dogcel me Pii ma tye yo tuŋ wokceŋ me Jerucalem.
Nekemia 12:38 Jo ma i dul mu kene ma gubedo ka miyo pwoc bot Lubaŋa guwoto gudok yo tuŋ lacam, ka doŋ an, kacel ki nucu pa lwak wacako lubogi. Wawoto ki i wi cel ma malo i nyim Lubele me Keno, wao kwede i kom cel malac,
Nekemia 12:39 ki kunnu wawoto wakato ki i wi dogcel pa Epraim wawok ki i dog gaŋ macon, ka wao kwede i Dogcel me Rec, ka wawok ki i ŋet Lubele ma gilwoŋo Kananel ki i ŋet Lubele ma gilwoŋo Miya, ka wacito wao kwede wa i Dogcel me Romo; ka doŋ wabino wagiko wotwa cok ki dogcel pa lukurpiny.
Nekemia 12:40 Kit meno lwak ducu ma gitye i dul aryo-ni ma gubedo ka miyo pwoc bot Lubaŋa guo i kabedo ka ma ot pa Lubaŋa tye iye, an kacel ki nucu ludito pa lwak onoŋo watye kacel.
Nekemia 12:41 Ajwagi magi onoŋo gitye i dul ma mera: Eliakim, Maaceya, Miniamin, Mikaya, Elioenai, Jekaria ki Anania, ma gumako tum;
Nekemia 12:42 ki Maaceya, Cemaya, Eleajar, Uji, Yekokanan, Malkija, Elam ki Ejer, Luwer guwero wer ki dwangi maloŋo adada ma Jejrakia aye obedo ka telogi ki wer.
Nekemia 12:43 I nino meno gityero gitum mapol, dok lwak bene gubedo ki yomcwiny madwoŋ, pien Lubaŋa omiyo cwinygi obedo yom twatwal. Mon kacel ki litino bene cwinygi obedo yom matek i kare meno me kwero cel me gaŋ. Mumiyo woo me yomcwiny ma jo gubedo ka daŋŋe kwede i Jerucalem owinnye wa i kabedo ma tye ka mabor.
Nekemia 12:826  Jami ma gimiyo pi ajwagi ki Lulevi
Nekemia 12:44 I kom nino meno giyero jo ma giloyo kicika odi me kano jami, ka ma gigwoko iye jami ma gimiyo me kony pi ot pa Lubaŋa, kal manyen ki nyig yat mukwoŋo cek i mwaka acel acel, kacel ki dul acel me apar, me keto i igi jami ducu kit macalo cik mito pi konyo ajwagi ki Lulevi, kun lubo kit wei potti ma i gaŋi matino. Jo Juda cwinygi obedo yom twatwal i kom ajwagi ki Lulevi ma gubedo ka tic.
Nekemia 12:45 Gin gutiyo gin ma Lubaŋagi ocikogi, dok bene gutiyo tic me lonyo dano, kit macalo yam luwer ki lugwok-doggola gutimo, kit macalo con Daudi ki wode Solomon guciko.
Nekemia 12:46 I kare pa Daudi ki Acap ma onoŋo ladit me wer, luwer onoŋo giwero wer me pak ki me miyo pwoc bot Lubaŋa.
Nekemia 12:47 I kare pa Jerubabel ki i kare pa Nekemia jo Icrael ducu gubedo ka miyo jami macalo mot nino ducu pi konyo luwer me ot pa Lubaŋa, ki pi lugwok ot pa Lubaŋa. Lwak gumiyo gityer maleŋ bot Lulevi, ki Lulevi Pene gumiyo dul ma mitte bot ajwagi ma gin likwayo pa Aron.
Nekemia 13:1 I kare meno gikwano cik pa Moses bot lwak wek guwiny; ci gunoŋo i dul mo ka ma gicoyo ni pe giye dano mo ma en jo Ammon kadi ki jo Moab mo me donyo i cokke pa lwak ma gin jo pa Lubaŋa.
Nekemia 13:2 Lok man gicoyo pien onoŋo jo Ammon ki jo Moab yam gukwero miyo cam ki pii bot jo Icrael i kare ma gia woko ki i Ejipt. Gin guwilo Balaam me ceno jo Icrael, ento Lubaŋawa oloko cenowaŋi odoko gum botwa.
Nekemia 13:3 I kare ma jo Icrael doŋ guwinyo gikwano cik, ci gucako poko jo ma gin likwayo pa lurok woko ducu ki i kom jo Icrael.
Nekemia 13:4 I kare ma lok man peya otimme, onoŋo ajwaka Eliacib ma yam giketo en me loyo kicika ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, omako larem gin ki Tobia.
Nekemia 13:5 En oyu bo kicika acel malac pi Tobia, ma yam onoŋo obedo me gwoko jami macalo gityer me moko kwon ki odok luban ma gityero, jami ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Lubaŋa, ki dul acel me apar me kal, koŋo vino ki moo ma yam gimiyo bot Lulevi ki luwer ki lugwok-doggola pi lubo cik, kacel ki jami me mot pi konyo ajwagi.
Nekemia 13:6 I kare ma lokke timme onoŋo an ape i Jerucalem, pien i mwaka me pyeradek wiye aryo me loc pa Aritakcec kabaka me Babilon onoŋo acito ka tito lok man bot kabaka. I kare mo alego kabaka ni adok cen,
Nekemia 13:7 ci en oye omiyo adok cen i Jerucalem, ci cut anoŋo ni Eliacib otimo bal me ye ni Tobia obed i kicika acel i dyekal ma i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Nekemia 13:827 
Nekemia 13:8 Kiniga omaka matek, ci abolo jami pa Tobia me ot woko ducu ki i kicika meno.
Nekemia 13:9 Dok amiyo cik cut me lonyo kicika ducu; ka doŋ acako dwoko iye jami ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Lubaŋa, kacel ki gityer me moko kwon ki odok luban.
Nekemia 13:10 Dok bene anoŋo ni Lulevi kacel ki luwer ma gubedo ka tic gua woko ki i Jerucalem gudok cen i pottigi, pien lwak pe gumiyo dul ma giciko me amiya ki Lulevi.
Nekemia 13:11 Ci an acako da i kom ludito ma giloyo lwak kun awacci, “Piŋo wuweko gibwoto ot pa Lubaŋa?” Acako coko Lulevi kacel ki luwer adwokogi cen i ot pa Lubaŋa ci aketogi i dog ticgi i kabedogi.
Nekemia 13:12 Jo Juda ducu gukelo dul acel me apar me kai, kono yino ki moo i kicika odi me kano jami.
Nekemia 13:13 Aketo jo magi me loyo tic i kom kicika odi me kano jami: Celemia ma en ajwaka, Jadok ma lapwony-cik ki Pedaya ma en Lalevi. Dok aketo Kanan wod pa Jakur, ma wod pa Matania, me bedo lakonygi, pien onoŋo dano ducu giŋeyo ni gin jo ma lugen; ticgi obedo me poko jami bot utmegigi.
Nekemia 13:14 Ai Lubaŋana, po pira i kom lok man, pe ijwa ticca mabeco ma doŋ atyeko tiyone me yubo ot pa Rwot Lubaŋana ki pi ticce woko.
