Jabuli 27:1 Rwot aye ceŋ mera ki lalarra; abilworo aŋa? Rwot gwoka-ki igin marac ducu: pi meno abibedo ki lworo it, kom aŋa
Jabuli 27:2 Ka lutim maraco gipote i koma ma gitemo neka woko, ma giloko lok maraco me kwot i koma, gin lukworra ki lumonena, gibicato ci gipoto woko piny.
Jabuli 27:3 Kadi dul mony mo ruma woko dyere, pe abibedo ki lworo i cwinya; kadi gier lweny i koma, pud abibedo ki gen aye i kom Rwot.
Jabuli 27:4 Onoŋo alego Rwot pi jami acel, abiyenyo en jami acel-li keken, ni, myero abed i ot pa Rwot pi kare me kwona ducu wek abed ka neno ber pa Rwot, dok apeny doge ki i ode.
Jabuli 27:5 En bikana i ode, dok gwoka, i kare me can; biuma woko i kemane, dok biketa acuŋ malo i kom got.
Jabuli 27:6 Pi meno abiloyo lukworra woko ducu ma giruma woko dyere-ni; dok abi tyero gitum i kema pa Rwot kun adaŋŋe ki yomcwiny madwoŋ; abiwero wer kun apako Rwot ki dwan mamit.
Jabuli 27:7 Winya, ai Rwot, ka akok boti matek nyut berri bota dok igam doga!
Jabuli 27:8 Iwaco ni, “Bin bota.” Agamo ki i cwinya kun awacci ni, “Abibino boti, ai Rwot.”
Jabuli 27:911 
Jabuli 27:9 Pe ikanne woko ki bota. Pe iryem laticci woko ki kiniga; in aye ibedo lakonya. Pe ibola woko, dok pe ibwota, ai Lubaŋa lalarra!
Jabuli 27:10 Wora ki maa dok gubwota woko, ento Rwot gire bigwoka.
Jabuli 27:11 Pwonya wek aŋe yoni, ai Rwot, tela awot i yo ma opirre maber, wek lukworra pe guliba.
Jabuli 27:12 Pe imiya bot lumonena; pien lucaden ma lugoba gucuŋ ka loko lok gobagoba i koma, ma giloko lokke ducu ki gero.
Jabuli 27:13 Aye ni abineno ber pa Rwot ma pud abedo i kin jo makwo i lobo.
Jabuli 27:14 Kur Rwot; bed matek, dok ibed ki tekcwiny; iyo, kur Rwot!
Jabuli 28:1 Akok boti do ai Rwot; pe idiŋ iti woko ka winyo kokona do, in gotta, pien ka iliŋ woko ma pe igamo doga, miyo adoko ŋat acel i kin jo ma gidonyo piny i bur.
Jabuli 28:2 Winy dwan me lega me bako doga boti, ka akok boti pi kony, kun ataŋo ciŋa malo boti ma akemo kwede kabedoni maleŋ twarwal-Ii.
Jabuli 28:3 Pe imaka itera woko kacel ki jo maraco, ki jo ma timo gin marac, gin jo ma giloko ki luwotgi lok ma kelo kuc kun gitamo ki i cwinygi me timo tim aranyi,
Jabuli 28:4 Culgi muporo kit timgi, mi gunoŋ can pi gin marac ma gutimo.
Jabuli 28:5 Pe giparo pi gin ma Rwot otimo, kadi pi jami ma en oketo; pi meno en biiyekogi woko ma calo ot magimuko ma pe dok gigero matwal.
Jabuli 28:6 Gipak Rwot pien doŋ otyeko winyo kokona me bako dog.
Jabuli 28:7 Rwot aye tekka dok kwotta; agene ki cwinya ducu. En okonya omiyo cwinya opoŋ ki yomcwiny madwoŋ, awero wer me pak kun amiyo pwoc bote.
Jabuli 28:8 Rwot aye tek pa lwakke, en aye ŋat ma danone ma giwiro riŋo laro bote.
Jabuli 28:9 Lar lwakki, dok imi gum i kom jo ma gin meri. Bed lakwatgi, dok igwokgi nakanaka.
Jabuli 29:1 Wupak Rwot, wun gin makwo ducu ma wubedo i polo, wupak Rwot pi deyone ki pi tekke.
Jabuli 29:2 Wupak nyiŋ Rwot ma tye ki deyo; wuwor Rwot kun wuruko ginaruka maleŋ.
Jabuli 29:3 Dwan Rwot mor winnye wa i wi pi i: dwan Lubaŋa me deyo tye ka mor, Rwot dwane tye ka winnye i wi nam madoŋo.
Jabuli 29:912 
Jabuli 29:4 Dwan Rwot winnye ma opoŋ ki tek dok ki dit me loc.
Jabuli 29:5 Dwan Rwot baro wa yadi cedar woko, kadi wa yadi cedar madoŋo me Lebanon.
Jabuli 29:6 En miyo godi me Lebanon pye calo laroya dyaŋ, ki Cirion bene en miyo pye calo wod jubi ma i tim.
Jabuli 29:7 Dwan Rwot meny ci miyo leb mac puk woko lipil.
Jabuli 29:8 Dwan Rwot miyo tim yeŋŋe, Rwot yeŋo tim Kadec.
Jabuli 29:9 Dwan Rwot miyo til nywal, dok jwero yadi me buŋa wo ko ducu; dano ducu ma gicokke i ode gidane ni, “Deyo obed bot Lubaŋa!”
Jabuli 29:10 Rwot aye ma loyo pii matut ducu ma tye i nam; en bedo i wi komkerre matwal macalo kabaka.
Jabuli 29:11 Rwot myero omi teko bot lwakke! En myero omi gum me kuc i kom jone!
Jabuli 30:1 Amito paki, ai Rwot, pien doŋ ilara, dok pe imiyo lukworra gubedo ki yomcwiny pira.
Jabuli 30:2 Ai Rwot Lubaŋana, onoŋo akok boti ni ikonya, ci in doŋ ityeko caŋa woko.
Jabuli 30:3 Ai Rwot, in aye ma ilara ikwanya woko ki i lobo pa jo muto, iroco kwona odoko nyen ki i kin jo ma gudonyo piny i bur.
Jabuli 30:4 Wuwer wer me pako Rwot wun jone ma gene, dok wumiye pwoc pi nyiŋe maleŋ.
Jabuli 30:5 Kinigane pe ri, bedo pi kare manok keken, ento berre bedo pi kare me kwowa kulu. Gwok koko twero bedo i dyewor, ento yomcwiny bino i odiko.
Jabuli 30:6 Doŋ an i kare ma atye ki lonyo awacci, “Pe gibidira cen.”
Jabuli 30:7 Pi berri bota, ai Rwot, omiyo iciba acuŋ likiŋ macalo got matek. Ento i kare ma ikanne woko ki bota, abedo ki lworo madwoŋ.
Jabuli 30:8 Akok boti, ai Rwot, dok alego lega me bako dog bot Rwot kun awaco ni,
Jabuli 30:9 “Kit kony aŋo ma tona twero miyo boti ka adonyo piny i bur? Apwa me ŋom mono bipaki? Dok binyuto berri ki adani?
Jabuli 30:10 Ai Rwot, winy kokona, wek kica omaki i koma! Ai Rwot, bed lakonya!”
Jabuli 30:11 Ityeko loko kumo ma atye kwede odoko myel me yomcwiny madwoŋ: igonyo bene boŋo colana woko ka doŋ iruka ki yomcwiny.
Jabuli 30:12 Pi meno pe abibedo liŋ; abiwero wer me pak boti. Ai Rwot Lubaŋana, abimiyi pwoc nakanaka.
Jabuli 31:913  Lega me geno Lubaŋa
Jabuli 31:1 Ai Rwot, ariŋo alaro boti wek igwoka; pe iwek giket lewic i wiya. In Lubaŋa ma kiti atir, alegi, lara do!
Jabuli 31:2 Cik iti, iwiny legana, lara oyotoyot! Bed got ma ariŋo alaro iye, dok ibed cel gogona matek ma laro an!
Jabuli 31:3 Iyo, in aye i gotta ki cel gogona; tela dok igwoka pi nyiŋi.
Jabuli 31:4 Gonya woko ki i obwo ma giciko gikano pira, in aye ka larrena.
Jabuli 31:5 Amiyo kwona doŋ i ciŋi; ai Rwot, in doŋ ityeko koka, in Lubaŋa me ada.
Jabuli 31:6 In idag jo ma giworo cal lubaŋa mamwa-ni; ento an ageno mera Rwot.
Jabuli 31:7 Abibedo ki yomcwiny madwoŋ pi mar meri ma pe lokke, pien doŋ ityeko neno can ma omaka, dok ityeko winyo koko me can ma odiya.
Jabuli 31:8 Pe imiyo lukworra gumaka; imiya abedo i kabedo malac.
Jabuli 31:9 Ai Rwot, kica omaki i koma do, pien atye i can; waŋa doŋ olwal woko pi koko madwoŋ, koma ducu doŋ oloc woko marac.
Jabuli 31:10 I kwona ducu abedo ki cwercwiny, dok mwaka me bedona opoŋ ki cur keken. Tekona otum woko pi ayelayela ma atye kwede, cogona ducu guballe woko.
Jabuli 31:11 Lumonena ducu giŋala aŋala, ki luwota bene gicaya; jo ma giŋeya doŋ gilwora alwora, ka ginena i gudo ci giriŋo woko ki bota.
Jabuli 31:12 Luwota doŋ wigi owil woko i koma calo doŋ onoŋo ato woko atoya; alokke adoko calo otako agulu ma oto.
Jabuli 31:13 Iyo, awinyo jo mapol gikwoto nyiŋa; omiyo lworo bene ogura woko dyere! Guribbe gitye ka yubo lok i koma, ma gipiro lok me neka woko.
Jabuli 31:14 Ento genna pud tye i komi, ai Rwot, kun awaco ni, “In Lubaŋana.”
Jabuli 31:15 Kare me kwona tye i ciŋi; lara ki bot lukworra, ki i cin jo ma giketo ayela, i koma.
Jabuli 31:16 An laticci, nena ki waŋ me kica; lara pi mar meri ma pe lokke!
Jabuli 31:17 Akok boti, ai Rwot, pe iwek lewic omaka; wek lewic omak jo maraco, wek guto gucit i lobo pa jo mu to gubed mot laliŋ.
Jabuli 31:18 Juk gin jo ma loko lok goba-ni woko, ma giloko lok marac i kom jo ma kitgi atir ki wakke kacel ki cac.
Jabuli 31:19 Berri dit rom kwene, ma igwoko pi jo ma gilwori! Gin ma itiyo bedo me aura rom kwene i waŋ ŋat acel acel, ma itiyo pi jo ma giriŋo gilaro boti!
Jabuli 31:20 Igwokogi woko maber i kabedo ma it ye iye, igwokogi bene ki i piro lok ma dano gipiro; ikanogi woko gibedo mol ki kuc i odi ki i yet pa lukworgi.
Jabuli 31:914 
Jabuli 31:21 Gipwo Rwot, pien doŋ otyeko nyuto marre bota i yo me aura, ka onoŋo gigura woko dyere macalo gaŋ ma girumo.
Jabuli 31:22 I kare ma adoŋo oduru awaco ni, “Doŋ giryema woko ki i nyimi ka mabor.” Ento in iwinyo lega me bako dogga, i kare ma akok boti pi kony.
Jabuli 31:23 Wumar Rwot, wun lwakke ducu ma gene! Rwot gwoko jo ma lugen, ento pwodo jo ma gilyerre ma giwakke awaka.
Jabuli 31:24 Wubed tek, dok wubed ma cwinywu nwaŋ, wun jo ma wukuro Rwot!
Jabuli 32:1 Dano ma doŋ giweko balle tye kigum, ma balle doŋ gikwanyo woko.
Jabuli 32:2 Dano ma Rwot pe doŋ kwano bal mo i wiye tye ki yomcwiny, ma pe tye ki bwola i cwinye.
Jabuli 32:3 I kare ma akwero tuco balla, anoŋo ni koma oballe woko pi cur ma abedo ka cur dyeceŋ jwi.
Jabuli 32:4 Imiya pwod malit i dyeceŋ ki i dyewor; tekona ducu otwo woko macalo toyo two woko ki Lyeto me oro.
Jabuli 32:5 Cut atuco balla boti, pe amuŋo gin marac ducu ma onoŋo atimo; awaco ni, “Abituco balla ducu bot Rwot”; ci in bene iweko balla ducu.
Jabuli 32:6 Pi meno wek jo ducu ma gigeni gukel legagi boti; i kare me can ma noŋo lalele me pii madwoŋ mito mwonyogi woko, pii meno pe bio i komgi.
Jabuli 32:7 In aye kakannena, igwoka ki i ayela; igura woko dyere ki larri.
Jabuli 32:8 Abipwonyi dok abicimmi yo ma myero ilubi; abimiyi ryeko dok abineni.
Jabuli 32:9 Pe ibed calo aguragura nyo kana ma pe niaŋ, ma myero gitwe doge ki wiye, wek olub gin ma iwaco.
Jabuli 32:10 Jo maraco gibilimo arem madwoŋ; ento jo ma gigeno Rwot en gwokogi ki mar mere ma pe lokke.
Jabuli 32:11 Wubed ki yomcwiny madwoŋ i Rwot, wun jo ma kitwu atir, wudaŋŋe pi yomcwiny, wun jo ducu ma cwinywu atir!
Jabuli 33:1 Wuwer matek ki yomcwiny i Rwot, wun jo ma kitwu atir! Myero wupake, wun jo ducu ma cwinywu leŋ.
Jabuli 33:2 Wumi pwoc bot Rwot kun wupake ki opuk, wupake ki wer naŋa ma tolle tye apar.
Jabuli 33:915 
Jabuli 33:3 Wuwer wer manyen bote, wugo naŋa ki kit kwiriwu ducu kun wuwero ki dwanwu maloŋo.
Jabuli 33:4 Lok pa Rwot tye ada, dok ticce ma en tiyo ducu tiyo ki gen.
Jabuli 33:5 Rwot maro kit ma atir ki ŋolo kop atir; lobo opoŋ ki mar mere ma pe lokke.
Jabuli 33:6 Rwot oketo polo pi lokke, ka oketo cen, dwe ki lakalatwe ki lok ma en oloko ki doge.
Jabuli 33:7 Ocoko pii me nam woko ducu oguro kacel i kabedo acel calo opiko i opoko; ka okano nam madoŋo bene i kicika odine me kano jami.
Jabuli 33:8 Wek lobo ducu omi woro bot Rwot, wek jo ducu ma Jibedo i lobo gulwore.
Jabuli 33:9 I kare ma en olok, ci lobo okette; gin ma en ociko otiŋe, dok ocuŋ matek likiŋ.
Jabuli 33:10 Rwot geŋo yub pa lurok pe cobbe, dok geŋo lwak me rok mapol me keto yubgi i tic.
Jabuli 33:11 Yub pa Rwot bedo matwal; yub ducu ma en tamo ki i cwinye bedo matwal i kare pa yalwak ducu.
Jabuli 33:12 Lwak me rok ma Rwot aye Lubaŋagi tye ki gum, gin aye jo ma en oyero me bedo jone kikome!
Jabuli 33:13 Rwot neno piny ki i polo; en neno dano ducu.
Jabuli 33:14 En lworo waŋe ki i wi komker ka ma obedo iye, neno jo ducu ma gibedo i lobo.
Jabuli 33:15 En aye ma oketo cwinygi ducu, dok en neno gin ducu ma gitiyo.
Jabuli 33:16 Kabaka pe twero loyo lweny pi dul mony matek ma en tye kwede; lalweny pe twero loyo Lweny pi tekkom madit ma en tye kwede.
Jabuli 33:17 Pe gitwero geno aguragura me lweny ni romo miyo loc; tekke-ni ducu pe twero laro dano.
Jabuli 33:18 Nen, Rwot nenojo ma giwore, gin jo ma gigeno mar mere ma pe lokke,
Jabuli 33:19 wek olargi ki i to, dok ogwokgi gubed makwo i kare me kec.
Jabuli 33:20 Genwa ducu tye i kom Rwot en lakonywa, dok en kwot ma gwokowa.
Jabuli 33:21 Iro, wabedo ki yomcwiny pi en, pien wageno nyiŋe maleŋ.
Jabuli 33:22 Ai Rwot, wek mar meri ma pe lokke obed i komwa, kit macalo wageno in-ni.
Jabuli 34:1 Abipwoyo Rwot kare ducu; dok abibedo ka pake nakanaka.
Jabuli 34:916 
Jabuli 34:2 Abipako en pi gin ma doŋ otyeko tiyo; wek jo ma gitye ki can guwiny dok gubed ki yomcwiny.
Jabuli 34:3 Wuribbe kweda me pako dit pa Rwot, wek wapaku nyiŋe kacel!
Jabuli 34:4 Ayenyo Rwot, ci en ogamo legana dok olara ki i kit lworo ducu ma onoŋo atye kwede.
Jabuli 34:5 Wunen bote, wek waŋwu oryeny ma noŋo cwinywu yom, wek lewic pe omakwu.
Jabuli 34:6 An lacan akok bot Rwot, ci en ogamo doga, dok olara ki i canna ducu.
Jabuli 34:7 Lamalaika pa Rwot cuŋ kun gwoko jo ma gilworo Rwot, dok larogi bene woko ki i can.
Jabuli 34:8 Tem koŋ inen ni Rwot oor. Dano mariŋo laro bote bedo ki yomcwiny!
Jabuli 34:9 Wulwor Rwot, wun jo maleŋ mere ducu, gin mo pe ma rem bot jo ma gilwore.
Jabuli 34:10 Litino labwor kare mogo camgi pe, dok kec nekogi; ento jo ma giyenyo Rwot gin mabeco mo pe birem botgi.
Jabuli 34:11 Wubin litinona, wuwiny lokka, abipwonyowu kit me woro Rwot.
Jabuli 34:12 Aŋa ma maro kwo, ma paro ni eri pi kare malac wek enoŋ yomcwiny i kom jami mabeco?
Jabuli 34:13 Gwok lebi pe ilok gin marac, dok dogi bene pe olok lok me bwola.
Jabuli 34:14 A woko ki i gin marac, ci iti gin maber; yeny kuc, dok iti matek macalo itwero wek inoŋ.
Jabuli 34:15 Rwot neno jo ma kitgi atir, dok ciko ite winyo koko ma gikok bote pi kony.
Jabuli 34:16 Rwot dag neno jo ma lutim maraco; en miyo wi dano wil woko i komgi matwal i lobo-ni.
Jabuli 34:17 Ka jo ma kitgi atir okok bote pi kony, en winyo kokogi, dok larogi bene woko ki i cangi ducu.
Jabuli 34:18 Rwot tye cok ki jo ma cwinygi goro, eci laro jo ma gitye ki arem madwoŋ i cwinygi.
Jabuli 34:19 Dano ma kite atir limo can madwoŋ; ento Rwot lare ki i canne ducu.
Jabuli 34:20 En gwoko cogo ma i kome ma ber wek kadi acel mo pe otur woko.
Jabuli 34:21 Gin marac bineko jo maraco; dok jo ma gidag jo ma kitgi atir gibipwodogi.
Jabuli 34:22 Rwot koko kwo pa luticce; en pe miyo pwod bot ŋat mo i kom jo ma giriŋo gilaro bote.
Jabuli 35:917 
Jabuli 35:1 Ai Rwot, pid ki jo ma gidota; dok ilweny ki jo ma gilwenyo i koma.
Jabuli 35:2 Mak kwot ki gin me geŋo kori, ci ibin ikonya.
Jabuli 35:3 Bed ma iyubbe ki toŋ ki latoŋ me lweny me rwatte ki jo ma giryemo kora. Titta ni, “An lalarri.”
Jabuli 35:4 Wek lewic omak jo ma gimito neka woko dok alee myero otwodgi. Wek gin jo ma gipiro lok marac i koma gulokke gudok cen ki lewic madwoŋ!
Jabuli 35:5 Wek gubed calo cuŋ kal ma yamo tiŋo woko, ma kun lamalaika pa Rwot tye ka ryemogi.
Jabuli 35:6 Mi yogi ocid woko dok obed pwot ma cerogi acera, dok iwek lamalaika pa Rwot oryem korgi.
Jabuli 35:7 Guciko obwo gukano woko pira laboŋo balla mo; dok bene gukwinyo bur wek apot iye ate woko.
Jabuli 35:8 Wek can opot i komgi atura otyekgi woko; ki obwo ma gukano-ni bene omakgi, gupot i bur gutum woko!
Jabuli 35:9 Abibedo ki yomcwiny i Rwot, abibedo ki yomcwiny pien Rwot olara.
Jabuli 35:10 Abiwaco lok man ki cwinya ducu ni, “Ai Rwot, aŋa mono ma calo in, in ma ilaro dano magoro ki i cin jo ma gitek giloye woko? Ilaro ŋat magoro ki ma piny obwoyo ki i ciŋ jo ma yako jamine woko.”
Jabuli 35:11 Caden ma cwinygi rac gikatti ka maleŋ pitito lok i koma, kun gipenya pi gin ma pe aŋeyo.
Jabuli 35:12 Giculla gin marac pi gin maber; piny doŋ orem kweda woko.
Jabuli 35:13 Ento an aruko boŋo cola i kare ma onoŋo komgi lit, dok amine kena i can me ri kec. Alego ma agoyo kora akulo wiya piny,
Jabuli 35:14 macalo onoŋo akumo pi larema nyo pi omera. Abedo ka wot atata macalo dano ma koko minne, kun akulle piny ka kumo.
Jabuli 35:15 I kare ma ayokke gin ducu gubedo ki yomcwiny, gucokke kacel i koma; luput ma yam pe aŋeyogi gucokke i koma ka yeta ma pe gitwero liŋ.
Jabuli 35:16 Gumedde ka ŋala ma noŋo doggi bit i koma, ma gukayo lakgi wo ko likiŋ.
Jabuli 35:17 Ai Rwot, ibibedo ka nena anena pi kare ma rom mene? Lara woko ki i gerogi, lar kwona ki i dog labwor.
Jabuli 35:18 Abimiyi pwoc madit mada i cokke madit; abipaki ka ma lwak jo mapol gugurre iye,
Jabuli 35:19 Pe iwek lukworra ma gin lutim marac gubed ki yomcwiny ikoma, pe iwek jo ma gimiyo wangi lirwitrwit guloya, gin jo ma daga laboŋo bal mo-ni.
Jabuli 35:918 
Jabuli 35:20 Pe giloko lok ma kelo kuc, ento gipiro megi lok maraco i kom jo ma gibedo mot i lobo, gupoŋ ki lok me bwola keken.
Jabuli 35:21 Giŋamo doggi malac me lok i koma, kun giwacci, “Aa! Aa! Watyeko neno gin ma itimo!”
Jabuli 35:22 Ai Rwot, doŋ iŋeno, pe myero iliŋ aliŋa do! Pe ibed bor kweda, ai Rwot!
Jabuli 35:23 Co woko, cukke me ŋolo koppa; pid pita, in Rwoda ki Lubaŋana!
Jabuli 35:24 In iporre, ai Rwot, pi meno kwany kop woko ki i wiya; pe iwek lukworra gunoŋ yomcwiny i koma do, Lubaŋanal
Jabuli 35:25 Pe iwek gulok kekengi kun giwacci, “Aa! Doŋ wanoŋo gin ma cwinywa mito.” Dok pe iwek guwacci, “Doŋ watyeko mwonye woko.”
Jabuli 35:26 Wek lewic omakgi dok gubed ki anyobanyoba lawaŋacel, gin jo ma gibedo ki yomcwiny pi can ma omaka! Wek gupoŋ ki lewic ma alee bene otwodgi, gin jo ma giwakke i koma-ni!
Jabuli 35:27 Wek jo ma cwinygi mito ni alo kop gudaŋŋe pi yomcwiny kun giwaco nakanaka ni, “Rwot dit, cwinye yom ka neno ni laticce bedo ki kuc!”
Jabuli 35:28 Abitito pi porreni, dok abipako nyiŋi dyeceŋ jwi.
Jabuli 36:1 Bal me turo cik tye loko ka matut i cwiny dano marac; en pe neno gin ma miyo elworo Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 36:2 Bal miyo en bwolle kekene dok umo waŋe woko kun tamo ni pe gibinoŋo gin marac ma en otimo, miyo dano kwere woko.
Jabuli 36:3 Lok ma en loko obedo lok me tim aranyi ki me bwola keken; pe doŋ tye ki ryeko mo ma: romme tiyo gin maber.
Jabuli 36:4 En piro lok me timo gin marac ma obuto i wi kitandane; oloko kite wo ko i yo mapat ma pe doŋ ber; dok pe kwero kit gin mo marac.
Jabuli 36:5 Ai Rwot, mar meri ma pe lokke o wa i polo, dok adani bene o i pol.
Jabuli 36:6 Porreni ocuŋ matek likiŋ macalo godi madoŋo, ki ŋolo koppi tye calo tut-piny madit. Ai Rwot, igwoko dano kacel ki lee ducu.
Jabuli 36:7 Ai Rwot, ber me mar meri ma pe lokke dit rom mene! Jo ducu riŋo gilaro ka kanne i te bwomi.
Jabuli 36:8 Giyeŋ ki lwak cam madwoŋ ma tye i odi, mnyo gimato pii mua i kulu me yomcwiny ma tye boti.
Jabuli 36:9 In aye i waŋ it me kwo ducu, i ceŋŋi wan bene waneno iye ceŋ.
Jabuli 36:919 
Jabuli 36:10 Med mar meri ma pe lokke bot jo ma giŋeyi, dok imed lar meri bot jo ma cwinygi atir. ki ciŋe. malo.
Jabuli 36:11 Pe iwek dano ma lawakke onyona ki tyene, pe iwek dano marac oryema woko
Jabuli 36:12 Lutim maraco gibuto kunnu aryeba ic, gidiyogi woko piny ma pe dok gitwero a
Jabuli 37:1 Pe myero ibed ka paro pi jo maraco; pe ibed ki mone i kom jo ma gitiyo gin marac;
Jabuli 37:2 pien gibitwo woko calo lum, dok gibiner woko calo pot dek madyak.
Jabuli 37:3 Gen Rwot, dok iti gin maber; bed i lobo ki kuc.
Jabuli 37:4 Bed ki yomcwiny i Rwot, ci en bimiyi gin ducu ma cwinyi mito.
Jabuli 37:5 Mi kwoni bot Rwot; gen en, ci en bikonyi.
Jabuli 37:6 En bikwanyo kop woko ki i wii miyo berri ryeny calo ceŋ, doŋ loyo koppi bibedo calo ceŋ ma ryeny i cwiny dyeceŋ.
Jabuli 37:7 Bed mot i nyim Rwot, dok idi cwinyi ikure. Pe ipar pi ŋat ma tye ka lony oyotoyot, kadi pi ŋat ma cobo yubbe me timo gin maraco.
Jabuli 37:8 Pe iwek kiniga omaki, dok ibwot akemo obedi; pe ibed ki par iye, pien tim ma kit meno kelo gin marac keken.
Jabuli 37:9 Lutim maraco gibityekogi woko; ento jo ma gigeno Rwot gibicamo lobo.
Jabuli 37:10 Odoŋ kare manok, ci dano marac doŋ bibedo pe matwal; kadi iŋi i kabedone maber, ibinoŋo ni en doŋ pe kunnu.
Jabuli 37:11 Ento jo mamwol aye gibicamo lobo; gibibedo ki yomcwiny pi lonyo madwoŋ ma gibilimo.
Jabuli 37:12 Dano marac piro lok i kom dano ma kite atir, dok kayo lake i kome matek.
Jabuli 37:13 Ento Rwot nyero dano marac anyera, pien neno ni nino me ŋolo kop i kom dano marac doŋ tye ka bino.
Jabuli 37:14 Jo maraco giwoto pala lucwangi dok gitelo atumgi, me neko lucan kacel ki jo ma piny obwoyogi, ki pi neko jo ma cwinygi atir.
Jabuli 37:15 Pala lucwangi bicobo komgi kekengi, ki atumgi bene gibituro woko.
Jabuli 37:16 Gin mo manok ma dano ma kite atir tye kwede ber kato lonyo madwoŋ ma jo maraco mapol gitye kwede.
Jabuli 37:920 
Jabuli 37:17 Twero ma jo maraco gitye kwede gibituro woko; ento Rwot bigwokojo ma kitgi atir.
Jabuli 37:18 Rwot gwoko jo ma lubo cikke; dok gipinygi biri nakanaka.
Jabuli 37:19 Lewic pe bimakogi i kare me can, dok gibibedo ki cam madwoŋ i kare me kec.
Jabuli 37:20 Ento jo maraco, ma gin lukwor pa Rwot, gibito gitum woko macalo lum i olet dyaŋ, gibiduny woko calo yito ma duny.
Jabuli 37:21 Dano marac mako banya, ento pe twero culo waŋe, ento dano ma kite atir lakica, miyo mere jami amiya noŋo.
Jabuli 37:22 Jo ma Rwot omiyo gum botgi aye gibicamo lobo, ento jo ma doŋ en ocenogi gibityekogi woko.
Jabuli 37:23 Ka Rwot telo dano i kit kwo ma myero en obed kwede, ci en moko dano ma kwone yomo cwinye.
Jabuli 37:24 Kadi oyokke, ci pe bipoto piny aryeba ic, pien Rwot tye jole woko ki ciŋe.
Jabuli 37:25 Yam abedo latin, ento man doŋ adit; pud peya aneno gibwoto dano ma kite atir, kadi ki litinone bene pe aneno ka gilego kwon alega.
Jabuli 37:26 En nino ducu ber, miyo jami amiya, dok dano gimako banya bote, ki litinone bene gidoko joma kelo gum bot dano.
Jabuli 37:27 A woko ki i gin marac, iti gin maber, ci ibibedo iri nakanaka.
Jabuli 37:28 Rwot maro ŋolo kop atir; pe bibwoto jo ma gigeno eno En bigwoko jo ma kitgi atir matwal, ento gibityeko litino pa jo maraco woko ducu.
Jabuli 37:29 Jo ma kitgi atir gibicamo lobo, dok gibibedo iye matwal.
Jabuli 37:30 Dano ma kite atir loko lok me ryeko, dok loko gin ma tye atir.
Jabuli 37:31 En gwoko cik pa Lubaŋane i cwinye; pe ŋak woko ento bedo ki kit maber kare ducu.
Jabuli 37:32 Dano marac neno ŋat ma kite atir, ci yenyo yo me neke woko.
Jabuli 37:33 Ento Rwot pe bibwoto en ata i ciŋ lakworre, nyo ni giŋol kop oloye ka gikelo en ka pido.
Jabuli 37:34 Kur Rwot, dok ilub cikke, en bimiyi twero me camo lobo; ibineno bene ka gityeko jo marac woko.
Jabuli 37:35 Aneno dano marac tye ka keto gero mukato kare, kun tye ka doŋo medde ameda calo yat cedar me Lebanon.
Jabuli 37:36 Lacen ka akato ki kenyo, anoŋo ni en doŋ pe matwal; kadi bed ayenye, ento pe doŋ twero noŋŋe.
Jabuli 37:921 
Jabuli 37:37 Nen dano ma pe ki bal mo, dok inen dano ma cwinye atir; dano ma kelo kuc Likwaye bedo tye.
Jabuli 37:38 Ento jo ma lubalo gibityekogi woko liweŋ; ki likwayo pa jo maraco bene gibijwerogi woko.
Jabuli 37:39 Rwot aye ma laro jo ma kitgi atir; en bene ma gwokogi i kare me can.
Jabuli 37:40 Rwot konyogi, dok larogi ki bot jo maraco, pien giriŋo gilaro bote.
Jabuli 38:1 Ai Rwot, pe ijuka ki kiniga, dok pe ipwoda ki akemo!
Jabuli 38:2 Ateroni doŋ gucela, gumwony woko iiya, kun in bene icwalo ciŋi piny idiya kwede woko.
Jabuli 38:3 Pi kinigani omiyo atwo matek, pe atye ki yotkom i cogona ducu; man obino pi balla.
Jabuli 38:4 Balla doŋ oketo koma woko; gipek calo yec ma pe aromo tiŋone.
Jabuli 38:5 Waŋ burra kwok maŋwe pi minona,
Jabuli 38:6 atyeko kulle woko piny adada ma abuto i ŋom aryeba cwiny; dyeceŋ jwi awoto kun akumo akuma.
Jabuli 38:7 Pyera bene waŋŋe awaŋa calo mac, koma pe tye ki kit yotkom mo wacel.
Jabuli 38:8 Koma oloc dok onyoŋŋe woko adada; acur pien atye ki remcwiny madwoŋ twatwal.
Jabuli 38:9 Ai Rwot, iŋeyo gin ma amito ducu, gin ma abedo ka cur pire-ni pe obedo me muŋ ki boti.
Jabuli 38:10 Adunona tye ka gone matek lituktuk, miyo tekone bene tum woko waŋa bene ocor woko, pe neno piny doŋ maber.
Jabuli 38:11 Lurema ki luwota ma wabedo kwedgi gicuŋ cen ka mabor pi bur ma oonyo: i koma, ki lutuwa bene gicuŋ cen ka mabor adada.
Jabuli 38:12 Jo ma giyenyo yo meneka guciko owicgi pira, jo ma gimito keto ret i koma giloko lok me tyeko kwona woko, gibedo ka piro lok marac i koma dyeceŋ jwi.
Jabuli 38:13 Ento an abedo macalo ladiŋit, pe awinyo lokgi, dok abedo calo ladoge-oto ma pe ŋamo doge ka lok.
Jabuli 38:14 Iyo, adoko calo dano ma pe winyo, ma pe loko kit lok mo me juk.
Jabuli 38:15 Ento genna ducu tye i komi, ai Rwot; ai Rwot Lubaŋana, in aye ma ibigamo doga.
Jabuli 38:922 
Jabuli 38:16 Alegi alega keken ni, “Pe iwek jo ma ginyatte i koma ka tyena ocer, gunoŋ yomcwiny i koma!”
Jabuli 38:17 Doŋ acok poto, atye ka winyo arem i koma kare ducu.
Jabuli 38:18 Atuco balla, kun cwinya cwer mada pire.
Jabuli 38:19 Lukworra ma gidaga noŋo laboŋo gin mo ma abalo botgi gitek, jo ma gidaga laboŋo te lok mo gipol.
Jabuli 38:20 Jo ma giculo gin maber pi gin marac gudoko lukworra, pien amito ni ati gin maber.
Jabuli 38:21 Ai Rwot, pe ibwota: ai Lubaŋana, pe ibed bor kweda!
Jabuli 38:22 Bin oyot ikonya, ai Rwot, lalarra!
Jabuli 39:1 Awaco ni, “Abigwokke i kit gin ducu ma anyo, wek pe atim bal ki lok ma aloko; abiliŋ ma pe aŋamo doga ka waco lok mo, ka ce atye kacel ki jo maraco.”
Jabuli 39:2 Aliŋ aliŋa ma pe awaco lok mo, dok bene ajukke kekena kadi me waco gin mo maber; ento cwercwinnya dok omedde ameda marac,
Jabuli 39:3 cwinya olyetti woko dok owaŋ matek. I kare ma pud alwodo lok, ci mac olyel; ci acako lok maber laboŋo lworo.
Jabuli 39:4 “Rwot, mi aŋe agikkina, dok imiya aŋe wel ninona; wek aŋe bene kit macalo kwona rwenyo kwede oyot.
Jabuli 39:5 Nen, Iŋolo ninona obedo manok, dok kare me kwona pe gin mo ki boti. Adada dano acel acel cuŋ mere macalo yweyo nono!
Jabuli 39:6 Adada dano woto wirre calo tipo! Adada gicanne nono pi gin ma pe konyo; dano kano lonyo madwoŋ, kun pe ŋeyo aŋa ma bileyo.
Jabuli 39:7 “Doŋ kombeddi mono, Rwot, akuro gin aŋo? Genna tye i komi.
Jabuli 39:8 Lara ki i balla ducu. Pe imi adok gin aŋala pa lumiŋ.
Jabuli 39:9 Aliŋ woko litik, pe aromo ŋamo doga ka lok; pien in aye ma imiya peko ma kit man.
Jabuli 39:10 Pe dok imedde ka pwoda ki odooni; adoŋ me ciŋi ma idoŋa kwede doŋ mito neka woko.
Jabuli 39:11 Ka ipwodo dano kun ijuke pi bal, ityeko berre woko macalo nyenye ma camo gin mo ma pire tek bot dano meno; adada dano obedo mere rom ki yweyo mamwa.
Jabuli 39:923 
Jabuli 39:12 “Ai Rwot, winy legana, icik iti iwiny kokona; pe iliŋ woko aliŋa ka akok boti! An a weloni pi kare manok, dok an labedo macalo kwarowa ducu.
Jabuli 39:13 Pe inena, nen ka mukene, wek koŋ abed ki yomcwiny mo, ma pud peya aa aweko lobo man woko matwal.”
Jabuli 40:1 Akuro Rwot kun adiyo cwinya; ci en okulle piny owinyo kokona.
Jabuli 40:2 En owota woko ki i bur marac, ki i coto manwaŋ, ci oketa acuŋ i wi got, omiyo abedo ka wot atir.
Jabuli 40:3 Opwonya ki wer manyen, en wer me pak bot Lubaŋawa. Jo mapol gibineno ci lworo makogi woko, ci gibigeno Rwot.
Jabuli 40:4 Tye ki gum dano ma geno Rwot, ma pe lokke ribbe ki jo ma luwakke, dok ma pe ribbe ki jo ma ŋak woko kun giworo cal lubaŋa-gu!
Jabuli 40:5 Ai Rwot Lubaŋana, itiyo tic madito me aura mapol, dok iyubo lwak tam mapol pi konyowa; pe tye ŋat mo macalo in! Ka onoŋo ne ne atuc dok atit pigi, onoŋo gibedo pol makato ma pe gitwero kwano welgi.
Jabuli 40:6 Pe imito gitum kadi gityer; ento ityeko yabo ita wek awiny. In pe ipenyo pi gitum awaŋa nyo pi gitum me bal.
Jabuli 40:7 Ka doŋ agamo ni, “Nen, an a en; gicoyo lok ma mako koma i buk adolani.
Jabuli 40:8 Cwinya bedo yom me tiyo gin ducu ma imito, ai Lubaŋa; amako cikki dok agwoko tye cwinya.”
Jabuli 40:9 Doŋ atyeko tito lok maber me yomcwiny me larri i dye lwak i cokke madit; nen, pe am iyo doga woko aliŋ aliŋa, kit macalo in bene ineyo-ni, ai Rwot.
Jabuli 40:10 Pe akano lok me larri pira kena, ento aloko pi ada ki pi larri; dok pe amuŋo mar meri ma pe lokke kacel ki adani bot lwak ma i cokke madit.
Jabuli 40:11 Ai Rwot, pe itwonna kicani, wek mar meri ma pe lokke, ki adani, gugwoka nakanaka.
Jabuli 40:12 Gin marac ma welgi pe kwanne guruma woko dyere; balla doŋ obwoyo koma woko, miyo pe doŋ aneno piny; gipol gikato yer wi ya woko; tekcwiny doŋ orwenyo woko ki bota. Lega pi kony (Jab 70.1-5)
Jabuli 40:13 Ai Rwot, mi cwinyi obed yom me lara! Ai Rwot, bin oyotoyot ikonya!
Jabuli 40:14 Wek lewic omak jo ma gimito neka, dok gubed ki anyobanyoba bene; wek gidwokgi cen, wek alee otwodgi, gin jo ma mito tima marac-ci!
Jabuli 40:924 
Jabuli 40:15 Wek gubed ma piny orem kwedgi woko pi lewic ma doŋ omakogini, gin jo ma giwacca ni, “Aa, Aa!”
Jabuli 40:16 Ento mi jo ducu ma giyenyo in gubed ki yomcwiny madwoŋ komi; dok imi jo ma gimaro larri gumedde ki waco nakanaka ni, “Rwot dit!”
Jabuli 40:17 An gira lacan, dok piny obwoya woko; ento Rwot tamo pira. In aye lakony ki lalarra; ai Lubaŋana, pe igalle!
Jabuli 41:1 Tye ki gum dano ma paro pi lucan! Rwot lare woko i kare me can.
Jabuli 41:2 Rwot bigwoko en dok miyo bedo kwo; gilwoŋe ni ŋat ma kome gum i lobo; pe ibimiyo en bot lukworre wek gutime rac macalo gitwero.
Jabuli 41:3 Rwot gwoke ka two ma tye i wi kitanda; en caŋo twone woko liweŋ maber.
Jabuli 41:4 Ento an, awaco ni, “Ai Rwot, kica omaki i koma; caŋa, pien atimo bal i komi!”
Jabuli 41:5 Lukworra giwaco lok marac i koma, ni, “En bi to awene, wek nyiŋe orweny woko?”
Jabuli 41:6 Ka ŋat mo obino ka lima, ci loko lwak lok ma tere pe, kun noŋo cwinye opoŋ ki lok me tim aranyi; ka doŋ okato ocito woko, ci tito lokke woko ka maleŋ.
Jabuli 41:7 Jo ma daga ducu gigurre kacel ka kwoto nyiŋa; dok gipiro lok marac i koma.
Jabuli 41:8 Giwaco ni, “Two marac adada doŋ omake, pe doŋ bitwero a ki i kabuto kadi ki acel.”
Jabuli 41:9 Kadi larema maber atika ma yam ageno, ma ocamo kwonna bene, en aye dok olokke ka timo gin marac i koma.
Jabuli 41:10 Ento in, ai Rwot, kica omaki i koma, caŋa i kom twona-ni wek aa malo, ci abiculo kwor i komgi.
Jabuli 41:11 Ka ce lakworra pe loya dok bedo ki wakke i koma, ci miyo aŋeyo ni in kara cwinyi yom i koma.
Jabuli 41:12 Ento doŋ ityeko konya pi leŋcwinya, ka doŋ iketa me bedo i nyimi matwal.
Jabuli 41:13 Gipak Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, gipake nakanaka! Amen, dok Amen.
Jabuli 42:1 Kit macalo til yenyo kwede kulu ma piine tye ka mol, an bene atye ka yenyo ki i cwinya kit meno, ayenyo in, ai Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 42:925 
Jabuli 42:2 Cwinya mito anen Lubaŋa, en Lubaŋa makwo-ni Abicito ka neno waŋ Lubaŋa awene wek awore?
Jabuli 42:3 Pig waŋa doŋ odoko camma i dyeceŋ naka wa i dyewor ducu, ma noŋo dano gipenya teretere ni, “Lubaŋani tye kwene?”
Jabuli 42:4 Cwinya dem woko, ka apo i kom lok magi: kit macalo acito kacel ki lwak kun atelo wigi, ma wawoto i rek ma gurye aryeya me cito i ot pa Lubaŋa, kun lwak gidaŋŋe ki yomcwiny ma giwero wer me pwoc, i kare me kwero nino madito.
Jabuli 42:5 Piŋo cwinya poto, dok abedo ki cwercwiny? Dok piŋo awinyo lwak par madwoŋ i cwinya? Pud abigeno Lubaŋa aye, dok abipake bene, Lalar mera ki Lubaŋana.
Jabuli 42:6 Cwinya poto, miyo apo piri ki i lobo me Jordan ki Kermon, ki i got Mijar.
Jabuli 42:7 Nam madoŋo matut lwoŋo nam wadigi ki i mor pii ki i waŋ acurcurri; biamwonyini ducu me pii ma twagge doŋ otyeko mwonya woko licwic.
Jabuli 42:8 Rwot miyo mar mere ma pe lokke ryeny i koma i dyeceŋ; ci i dyewor awero wer me pake, kun alego Lubaŋa ma miyona kwo.
Jabuli 42:9 Abiwaco bot Lubaŋa ni, “In gotta; piŋo wii owil woko i koma? Piŋo awoto ma akumo akuma kun lakworra bene una twatwal?”
Jabuli 42:10 Nen calo atye ki bur marac twatwal mudet i koma pien lukworra gibedo ka yeta, kun gipenya teretere ni, “Lubaŋani-ni tye kwene?”
Jabuli 42:11 Piŋo cwinya poto, dok abedo ki cwercwiny? Piŋo awinyo lwak par madwoŋ i cwinya? Pud abigeno Lubaŋa aye, dok abipake bene. Lalar mera ki Lubaŋana.
Jabuli 43:1 Ai Lubaŋa, pid pira dok imi alo kop i kom lwak me rok ma pe giŋeyi; lara ki i cin jo maraco ma lubwola.
Jabuli 43:2 In aye Lubaŋa ma ariŋo alaro boti; piŋo ibola woko cen ka mabor? Piŋo awoto ma akumo akuma kun lakworra una twatwal?
Jabuli 43:3 Doŋ icwal ceŋŋi ki adani; wek gutela, wek gukela i kom got meri maleŋ, wa i odi ka ma ibedo iye!
Jabuli 43:4 Ci abicito wa i kom keno tyer pa Lubaŋa, bot Lubaŋa ma yomo cwinya mada; ka doŋ abipaki ki opul agoya, ai Lubaŋa, Lubaŋana.
Jabuli 43:5 Piŋo cwinya poto, dok abedo ki cwercwiny? Piŋo awinyo lwak par madwoŋ i cwinya? Pud abigeno Lubaŋa aye, dok abipake bene, Latar mera ki Lubaŋana.
Jabuli 44:926 
Jabuli 44:1 Ai Lubaŋa, doŋ watyeko winyone ki itwa, dok kwarowa bene gutito botwa, tic ducu ma yam itiyo i karegi, i kare macon muka to:
Jabuli 44:2 iryemo lurok woko ki twero ii kikomi, imiyo joni gubedo i lobogi macalo yadi ma ipito; iuno lwak me rok mapol ento imiyo kwarowa gubedo ki kuc.
Jabuli 44:3 Lwakki pe guloyo lobo meno ki pala lucwangi, pe gulimo Loc pi twerogi; ento meno obedo pi tweroni ki pi tekki, dok pi ceŋŋi ma oryeny i komgi; pien onoŋo in cwinyi yom i komgi.
Jabuli 44:4 In keken aye Kabakana ki Lubaŋana, ma yam iciko pi loc bot Yakobo.
Jabuli 44:5 Pi konnyi miyo wabiryemo lukworwa gidok piny, dok wabinyono jo ma gibino ka monyowa pi nyiŋi.
Jabuli 44:6 Pe ageno atumma, dok pala lucwanna bene pe twero Lara.
Jabuli 44:7 Ento in aye ma ilarowa ki i cin lukworwa, ci imiyo lewic omako jo ma gidagwa.
Jabuli 44:8 Wabedo ka nyatte i Lubaŋa teretere, dok wabimedde ka pwoyo nyiŋi matwal.
Jabuli 44:9 Ento in doŋ ityeko bolowa woko dok imiyo wadoko mayot, pe inywako yo me ci to ka lweny kacel ki monywa.
Jabuli 44:10 Imiyo walokke ki bot lumerokwa wadwogo woko cen; ci imiyo lukworwa guyako jami mapol ata.
Jabuli 44:11 Imiyo wadoko calo romi me aneka, dok ikeyowa woko i kin lurok.
Jabuli 44:12 Icato lwakki i wel manok mo, pe imito ni gicul wel madwoŋ pigi.
Jabuli 44:13 Imiyo luwotwa ma gibedo cok kwedwa giloko lok aŋec i komwa, imiyo jo ma gibedo i kabedo murumowa gicayowa dok giŋalowa.
Jabuli 44:14 Imiyo wadoko lok aboka i kin lurok, wadoko ginanyera i kin rok ducu.
Jabuli 44:15 Abedo ki cwercwiny dyeceŋ jwi, ma noŋo waŋa olwal woko ki lewic,
Jabuli 44:16 pi winyo lok cac pa jo ma giloko lok aŋec i komwa, ki lok pa jo ma ginywarowa, dok pi neno lukworwa ma gin lucul kwor ma gubino ka lewny i komwa.
Jabuli 44:17 Man ducu doŋ otimme i komwa, kadi bed wiwa pe owil i komi, dok bene kadi pe watero gicikkeni.
Jabuli 44:18 Cwinywa pe oa ki i komi wacel, dok bene pe waŋak wabwoto lubo cikki.
Jabuli 44:19 Itenyowa woko liyak i kabedo pa too, iumowa woko lipuk ki colpiny mapek.
Jabuli 44:20 Ka ce nene wiwa owil woko i kom nyiŋ Lubaŋawa, nyo ka onoŋo wacako woro lubaŋa mukene ma yam pe waŋeyo,
Jabuli 44:21 kono Lubaŋa mono pe oroto man oŋeyo woko? En ŋeyo muŋ ducu ma tye i cwiny dano.
Jabuli 44:927 
Jabuli 44:22 En to gibedo ka nekowa dyeceŋ jwi piri, gikwanowa macalo romi me aneka.
Jabuli 44:23 Co woko, ai Rwot! Piŋo inino anina? Co woko! Pe ibolwa woko matwal!
Jabuli 44:24 Piŋo ikanne woko ki botwa? Piŋo wii wil woko i kom can ma watyekwede kun iŋeno anena ka giunowa?
Jabuli 44:25 Wapoto woko ducu piny i ŋom; waryebbe piny i apwa pien tipowa doŋ ool.
Jabuli 44:26 A malo, bin ilarwa! Larwa pi mar meri ma pe lokke!
Jabuli 45:1 Cwinya opoŋ ki lok mabeco adada; lok magi ducu atye ka lokone bot kabaka; leba bit calo leb kal am pa karan ma ladiro.
Jabuli 45:2 In keken aye iber ikato co mukenegu woko, pien lok ma iloko ducu obedo me kica keken; pi meno Lubaŋa doŋ otyeko miyi gum woko matwal.
Jabuli 45:3 Twe pala lucwanni i emi, in twon oteka, i deyoni ki dit meri!
Jabuli 45:4 Riŋ ŋwec me loc kikome ki deyo ka lweny pi ada dok pi gwoko kit ma atir; wek ciŋi malacuc otim tim ma kelo lworo.
Jabuli 45:5 Ateroni bit, icelo ateroni tuco aduno pa lukworri woko pil; lwak me rok ducu gipoto i te locci,
Jabuli 45:6 Komkerri cal ki komker pa Lubaŋa ci bedo nakanaka. Odoo kerri aye odoo me kit ma atir
Jabuli 45:7 imaro kit ma atir, idag tim maraco. Pi meno Lubaŋa, ma Lubaŋani, doŋ, otyeko wiri ki moo, owiri ki moo me yomcwiny ma kato luwoti mukene ducu.
Jabuli 45:8 Ginarukani ducu gikiro iye murra ma ŋwece kur, ki kit moo makur ducu, ki kacia mamit. I gaŋ kaili ma gideyo ki lak Lyec wer pa lugo naŋa-gu miyo cwinyi bedo yom.
Jabuli 45:9 Anyira pa kabaka bene gitye i kin monni me awora; daker ocuŋ yo tuŋ ciŋi malacuc ma oruko ruk ma gidero ki jabu me Opir.
Jabuli 45:10 Nyara, koŋ iwiny, ci itam mot, dok icik iti; wii myero owil woko i kom lutuwu ki i kom jo me doggola pa kwaru.
Jabuli 45:11 Berri bimiyo kabaka miti; en obedo rwodi, gun i nyime iwore.
Jabuli 45:12 Jo Turo gibikelo mot mapol boti pi ber ma itimo bot dano, jo ma lulonyo gibilego kony ki boti kun gikelli lwak lonyo mapatpat.
Jabuli 45:13 Nyako ker orukke woko maber ki i kicikane ki boŋo ma gideyo maber ki jabu.
Jabuli 45:14 Oruko boŋŋi ma raŋigi patpat ma gitere kwede bot kabaka, kun anyira luwote ma gilwoke gilubo kore.
Jabuli 45:928 
Jabuli 45:15 Gitelo wigi kun gitye ki yomcwiny madwoŋ i kare ma gicito ka donyo i gaŋ kal pa kabaka.
Jabuli 45:16 Ma ka kwaru ibibedo ki litino awobe; ibiketogi gibedo rwodi i lobo ducu.
Jabuli 45:17 Abimiyo gipo pi ywekani i yalwak ducu; dok lwak me rok ducu gibipaki nakanaka.
Jabuli 46:1 Lubaŋa aye ka-larrewa dok tekwa bene, en oyubbe me konyowa i kare me can.
Jabuli 46:2 Pi meno pe wabibedo ki lworo mo kadi bed lobo lokke, kadi bed godi gupot woko i dye nam
Jabuli 46:3 kadi bed pii me nam mor dok twagge, kadi bed godi giyeŋŋe pi twagge mere matek.
Jabuli 46:4 Tye kulu mo ma litino orane kelo yomcwiny i gaŋ pa Lubaŋa, i kabedo maleŋ pa ŋat Mamalo Twa!
Jabuli 46:5 Lubaŋa bedo i dye gaŋŋe, pi meno pe gibitwero balone wacel; Lubaŋa konye woko oyotoyot okogweno.
Jabuli 46:6 Rok ducu komgi oonyo koyo, ki ker-gu ducu oyeŋŋe woko; Lubaŋa daŋŋe ki dwan maloŋo, ci lobo leny woko.
Jabuli 46:7 Rwot me mony tye kwedwa; Lubaŋa pa Yakobo aye ka-larrewa.
Jabuli 46:8 Bin inen gin ma Rwot otiyo, kit macalo omiyo lobo odoŋ obur.
Jabuli 46:9 En juko lweny woko i wi lobo ducu; turo atum-gu dok ŋinyo wa toŋ woko, waŋo lwak kwot woko liweŋ ki mac.
Jabuli 46:10 “Wubed mot, dok wuŋe ni an Lubaŋa. Atye malo i wi rok ducu, dok gidwora i wi lobo ducu!”
Jabuli 46:11 Rwot me mony tye kwedwa; Lubaŋa pa Yakobo aye ka-larrewa.
Jabuli 47:1 Wudoŋ ciŋwu, wun lwak ducu me wi lobo ducu! Wudaŋŋe kun wuwero wer me yomcwiny bot Lubaŋa ki dwan maloŋo!
Jabuli 47:2 Rwot, ma en ŋat Mamalo Twal, aye myero gilwor, en kabaka madit ma loyo wi lobo ducu.
Jabuli 47:3 En aye omiyo waloyo lwak me rok ducu, oketowa me bedo luloc pa lurok.
Jabuli 47:929 
Jabuli 47:4 En aye ma oyero lobo man ma wabedo iye-ni piwa, man aye gipiny me wakke pa Yakobo ma en maro.
Jabuli 47:5 Lubaŋa doŋ oito malo kun lwak gidaŋŋe matek, Rwot oito malo ma lwak gikuto tum-gu.
Jabuli 47:6 Wuwer wer me pako Lubaŋa, wuwer wer me pake! Wuwer wer me pako Kabakawa, wuwer wer me pake!
Jabuli 47:7 Lubaŋa aye kabaka ma loyo wi lobo ducu; wuwer wer me pak ki jabuli!
Jabuli 47:8 Lubaŋa loyo rok ducu; Lubaŋa bedo i wi komkerre maleŋ.
Jabuli 47:9 Rwodi ma giloyo lwak me rok ducu gucokke ma guribbe kacel ki jo pa Lubaŋa pa Abraim. Kwot me wi lobo ducu obedo jami pa Lubaŋa; gidwore matek twatwal!
Jabuli 48:1 Rwot dit, pi meno myero gipake matek i gaŋ pa Lubaŋawa!
Jabuli 48:2 Got mere maleŋ ber, dok wiye bor, ma yomo cwiny lwak me wi lobo ducu, en got Cion ma tye ka mabor tun acam, en aye gaŋ pa Kabaka madit.
Jabuli 48:3 Ki i gogone Lubaŋa onyutte ni en aye cel matek ma gwoko dano maber.
Jabuli 48:4 Nen, luker gucokke, gubino gugurre kacel.
Jabuli 48:5 I kare ma guneno, cutcut gubedo ki ur madit mada, lworo omakogi marac, ci guriŋo woko ata.
Jabuli 48:6 Komgi omyel matek ki kunnu, arem madwoŋ macalo pa dako ma rem ka nywal omakogi.
Jabuli 48:7 Ituro mel me Tarcic ki yamo ma oa tuŋ wokceŋ.
Jabuli 48:8 Kit ma watyeko winyone, doŋ bene waneno i gaŋ pa Rwot me mony, i gaŋ pa Lubaŋawa, ma Lubaŋa miyo cuŋ likiŋ nakanaka.
Jabuli 48:9 Wabedo ki tam i kom mar meri ma pe lokke, ai Lubaŋa, i dye odi.
Jabuli 48:10 Kit macalo nyiŋi oywek kwede-ni, ai Lubaŋa, omiyo pak ma gipaki kwede oromo wi lobo ducu. Ciŋi malacuc opoŋ ki twero meloc;
Jabuli 48:11 wek got Cion obed ki yomcwiny! Wek gaŋi ma i Juda gubed ki yomcwiny pi kit ma iŋolo kwede kop!
Jabuli 48:12 Wucit i Cion, wuwot wurum celle woko, wukwan wel lubelene,
Jabuli 48:13 ka dok wutam maber i kom celle, wucit wuwot wa i gogone bene; wek wutit bot yalwak ma bilubowu ni,
Jabuli 48:14 man aye Lubaŋa, en Lubaŋawa ma bedo nakanaka. En bibedo latelwa matwal.
Jabuli 48:930 
Jabuli 49:1 Wuwiny lok man, wun lwak me rok ducu! Wuwiny, wun jo ducu ma wubedo i wi lobo,
Jabuli 49:2 jo ma tye ki rwom ma malo ki jo me rwom ma piny, lulonyo kacel ki lucan.
Jabuli 49:3 Abibedo ka tamo tam wek aniaŋ maber ki i cwinya, dok abiloko lok me ryeko keken.
Jabuli 49:4 Abiciko ita me winyo carolok; abigonyo te lok me koc-lit ki wer ma agoyo agoya ki opuk.
Jabuli 49:5 Omyero abed ki lworo piŋo i kare me can, ma kun noŋo lumonena ma gitima marac guruma woko dyere,
Jabuli 49:6 gin jo ma geno lonyogi, ma ginyatte pi lwak lonyo madwoŋ ma gitye kwede?
Jabuli 49:7 Adada, pe tye dano mo ma twero kokke kekene, nyo ma twero miyo wel mo bot Lubaŋa me wilo kwone,
Jabuli 49:8 pien gin kok me kwo pa dano welle dit mada, dok pe twero romo
Jabuli 49:9 me miyo en medde ki bedo nakanaka, wek pe ocit i bur.
Jabuli 49:10 Iyo, en bineno ki waŋe ni kadi wa jo maryek bene gito, lamiŋ kacel ki ŋat ma wiye odiŋ bene gito kit meno, ci giweko lonyogi doŋ bot jo mukene.
Jabuli 49:11 Lyelgi bedo pacogi matwal, bibedo kabedogi pi kare pa yalwak ducu, kadi bed gucak nyiŋ lobo ma gibedo iye ni megi kikomgi.
Jabuli 49:12 Dano pe bedo ki deyone matwal; en obedo macalo lee tim ma gito gitum woko.
Jabuli 49:13 Man aye can ma poto i kom jo ma tye ki gen me miŋo; man agikki pa jo ma cwinygi yom pi dul jami ma gitye kwede.
Jabuli 49:14 Giyerogi giterogi i lyel macalo romi; to aye ma bibedo ka kwayogi. Gibicito atir gidonyo wa i lyel, ci komgi bitop woko; lyel bibedo pacogi.
Jabuli 49:15 Ento Lubaŋa bikoko tipona ki i twero pa lyel, pien en gire bigama.
Jabuli 49:16 Pe myero lworo omaki ka ce iŋeno ŋat mo doko lalonyo, kadi bed deyo me jami ma i ode tye ka medde ameda.
Jabuli 49:17 Pe bitiŋo gin mo cito kwede i kare ma en to; deyo ma en obedo kwede pe bicito lube i bur kunnu.
Jabuli 49:18 Kadi bed en tamo ni etye ki yomcwiny i kare ma pud ekwo, ci kadi bed dano gipake pi ticce ma konyo en keken,
Jabuli 49:19 en bicito ka bedo kacel ki yalwak pa kwarine i lyel ma pe doŋ gibimedo ki neno cen matwal.
Jabuli 49:931 
Jabuli 49:20 Dano pe bedo ki deyone matwal; en obedo macalo lee tim ma gito gitum woko.
Jabuli 50:1 Lubaŋa Matwero-ducu, ma en Rwot, doŋ oloko; en lwoŋo jo me wi lobo ducu cakke ki tuŋ wokceŋ nio kwede tuŋ potoceŋ.
Jabuli 50:2 Lubaŋa tye ka ryeny ki i Cion, en gaŋ maber twatwal-li.
Jabuli 50:3 Lubaŋawa tye ka bino, en pe biliŋ, mac mager tye ka waŋ i nyime, yamo magwa ma kodo matek orume woko dyere.
Jabuli 50:4 En Lwoŋo polo ki malo, ka dok lwoŋo lobo, wek doŋ ecak ŋolo kop i kom lwakke.
Jabuli 50:5 En wacci, “Wucok jona ma lugen, wukelgi bota, jo ma guketo gicikke kweda ki gitum!”
Jabuli 50:6 Polo otuco ni Lubaŋa oporre, pien Lubaŋa aye laŋolkop.
Jabuli 50:7 “Wuwiny, wun jona, an doŋ abilok, wun jo Icrael, abimiyo lok me caden i komwu. An Lubaŋa, Lubaŋawu.
Jabuli 50:8 Pe ajukowu pi lwak gitumwu mapol, ki gitum awaŋa ma wutyero bota kare ki kare.
Jabuli 50:9 Pe abigamo twon mo ma wukelo ki i gaŋwu, kadi nyok dyel ma wukwanyo ki i dwolwu.
Jabuli 50:10 Lee me buŋa ducu mera, wa lwak dyaŋi ma gitye i wi cere alip kulu-ni bene mera.
Jabuli 50:11 Aŋeyo winyo ducu ma gitpk i dye yamo, ki gin mak wo ma gibedo i tim ducu mera.
Jabuli 50:12 “Ka ce nene kec neka, pe onoŋo atwero tito botwu; pien lobo ki jami ducu ma tye iye mera.
Jabuli 50:13 An mono acamo riŋo twoni, nyo wuneno amato remo nyogi romi?
Jabuli 50:14 Wutyer gityer me miyo pwoc bot Lubaŋa, wucob kwoŋwu bot En Mamalo Twal.
Jabuli 50:15 Wukok bota i kare me can; abilarowu, ci wubipaka.”
Jabuli 50:16 Ento bot dano marac Lubaŋa owacci, “Kit twer aŋo ma it ye kwede me kwano cikka, ki me bedo ka loko lok i kom gicikkena?
Jabuli 50:17 In ikwero ni pe myero gijuki, dok ibolo lok ma aciko odok yo tuŋ ŋeyi.
Jabuli 50:18 Ka ce iŋeno lak wo, ci imak o doko laremi; dok ibedo kacel ki lutim abor.
Jabuli 50:19 “Kare ducu iyubbe me loko gin marac; lok ma a ki i dogi obedo lok goba.
Jabuli 50:932 
Jabuli 50:20 Ka ma ibedo iye icako loko lok marac i kom omeru; ikwoto omeru kikome ma latin pa meru.
Jabuli 50:21 Meno ducu itiyo ento an aliŋ aliŋa: itamo ni gwok abedo ŋat mo ma kite rom ki meri-ni. Ento kombeddi ajuki, dok anyutti balli kore kikore.
Jabuli 50:22 “Koŋ wutam man, wunjo ma wiwu wil woko i kom Lubaŋa-ni, wek pe atyekwu woko, ci doŋ ŋat mo ma bilarowu bibedo pe.
Jabuli 50:23 Ŋat ma miya pwoc macalo gitumme noŋo keto deyo i koma; ki ŋat ma bedo ki kit atir kun lubo cikka abinyuto larra bote.”
Jabuli 51:1 Ai Lubaŋa, tima kica pi mar meri ma pe lokke; dok pi kicani madwoŋ jwa balla woko ducu.
Jabuli 51:2 Lwok gin marac woko ki i koma, dok ilonya i kom balla.
Jabuli 51:3 Aŋeyo balla ducu maber, dok kare ducu wiya po i kom bal ma atimo.
Jabuli 51:4 Doŋ atyeko timo bal i komi, i komi keken, kun atimo gin ma nen marac i waŋi; pi meno lok ma iwaco tye atir, dok kop ma iŋolo i kuma tye kakare.
Jabuli 51:5 Nen, abedo labalo cakke i kare ma ginywala, i kare ma maa ogamo ic onoŋo an doŋ atye ki bal.
Jabuli 51:6 Nen, in imito ni dano obed ki ada i iye; pi meno pwonya ki lok me ryeko wek odony matuti cwinya.
Jabuli 51:7 Lonya ki anyero, ci abidoko leŋ; lwoka ci abidoko tar makato pee.
Jabuli 51:8 Miya abed ki yomcwiny madwoŋ; mi cogo koma ducu ma yam ituro woko gubed ki yomcwiny bene.
Jabuli 51:9 Mi waŋi woko, pe inen rocca, dok ijwa balla woko ducu.
Jabuli 51:10 Ai Lubaŋa ma Lacwec, miya abed ki cwiny mulony, ket cwiny manyen ma pe lokke obed iiya.
Jabuli 51:11 Pe iryema woko ki i nyimi, dok pe ikwany Cwiny meri maleŋ woko ki bota.
Jabuli 51:12 Lara, ci imi dok abed ki yomcwiny; miya cwiny me lubo cikki wek acuŋ matek.
Jabuli 51:13 Ci abipwonyo lujemo me lubo yoni, lubalo gibilokke gidwogo boti.
Jabuli 51:14 Ai Lubaŋa, lara ki i kom bal alii me oyo remo, in Lubaŋa lalarra, dok abiwero wer me paki ki dwan maloŋo pi kiti ma atir.
Jabuli 51:15 Ai Rwot, yab doga, ci abiwero wer me paki.
Jabuli 51:933 
Jabuli 51:16 Gitum ma dano kelo pe mini yomcwiny mo; kadi bed atyer boti gitum awaŋa, pe ibipwoyo.
Jabuli 51:17 Gitum ma Lubaŋa pwoyo aye cwiny ma oŋut; ai Lubaŋa, in pe ibicayo ŋat ma cwinye cwer ki ma oŋut.
Jabuli 51:18 Tim ber ki Cion muporo bercwinyi, dok icwe cel me Jerucalem odoco.
Jabuli 51:19 Ci doŋ cwinyi bibedo yom pi gitum ma atir, pi gitum awaŋa ki gitum ma giwaŋo woko ducu ki berre; ka doŋ gibityero twoni i wi keno tyerri.
Jabuli 53:1 Dano ma lamiŋ waco ki i cwinye ni, “Lubaŋa gire pe,” Gin jo ma kitgi raco ma gitimo gin me kwer; pe tye ŋat mo ma tiyo gin maber.
Jabuli 53:2 Lubaŋa neno dano ducu kun neno piny ki i polo, me neno ka ce tye jo mogo i kingi ma giryek, ma gimito Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 53:3 Gin ducu doŋ guŋak woko, gudoko jo ma kitgi raco; pe tye ŋat mo ma tiyo gin maber, pe, kadi ki acel.
Jabuli 53:4 Gin lutim maraco-ni, pe gitye ki ŋec? Giyako lim pa jona calo gicamo kwon, ma pe bene gilwoŋo nyiŋ Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 53:5 Gitye kunnu ki lworo madwoŋ kit lworo ma yam peya onen! Lubaŋa biketo cogo pa jo ma pe giŋeyo en woko ata; lewic bimakogi, pien Lubaŋa doŋ okwerogi woko.
Jabuli 53:6 Iyo, kono bedo ber ka larre pa jo Icrael bino ki i Cion! Ka Lubaŋa bidwoko gum bot jone. Yakobo bibedo ki yomcwiny madwoŋ, ki Icrael bene cwinye bibedo yom.
Jabuli 54:1 Ai Lubaŋa, lara pi nyiŋi, dok imi alo kop pi tweroni.
Jabuli 54:2 Winy legana, ai Lubaŋa; cik iti iwiny lok ma awaco.
Jabuli 54:3 Jo ma luwakke gubino ka lweny i koma, jo mager gimito neka woko; gin jo ma pe tamo pi Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 54:4 Aŋeyo ni Lubaŋa aye lakony mera; Rwot aye ma gwoko kwona.
Jabuli 54:5 En biculo kwor i kom lukworra ki gin marac; tyekgi woko liweŋ pien in Lubaŋa ma genne.
Jabuli 54:6 Abityero gityer boti pi yomcwiny; abimiyi pwoc, ai Rwot, pien in iber.
Jabuli 54:934 
Jabuli 54:7 Nen doŋ ityeko lara ki i kit can ducu, mumiyo aneno lukworra macalo jo ma doŋ aloyogi woko.
Jabuli 55:1 Cik iti iwiny legana, ai Lubaŋa; pe ikanne woko ka abako doga boti!
Jabuli 55:2 Winya, dok igam doga; can doŋ obwoya woko.
Jabuli 55:3 Cwinya oballe woko pi winyo woo pa lukworra, ki pi aroma ma jo maraco giuna kwede. Gin aye ma gikelo can i koma kiniga omakogr i koma, guloka adoko lamonegi.
Jabuli 55:4 Atye ki arem madwoŋ i cwinya, lworo me to doŋ opoto woko ikoma.
Jabuli 55:5 Lworo omaka dok koma bene myel amyela, doŋ tipo koma oto woko lirut.
Jabuli 55:6 Omiyo awacci, “Kono nene atye ki bwoma calo akuri! Kono atuk acito woko wek aywe.
Jabuli 55:7 Ada, kono atuk acito wa ka mabor, onoŋo atwero buto i dye tim ata.
Jabuli 55:8 Onoŋo kono arune oyotoyot pi noŋo kalarre, wek agwokke ki yamo lapiru mager ki yamo ma kodo matek.”
Jabuli 55:9 Ai Rwot, bal yubgi ducu, dok irub lebgi woko; pien atye ka neno tim bwami ki lweny ma tye i gaŋ.
Jabuli 55:10 Dyeceŋ ki dyewor giwoto ki i wi cel girumo gaŋ woko; dok tim aranyi ki can madwoŋ tye ka nen iye.
Jabuli 55:11 Nek tye ka nen i kabedo ducu; wa i cuk-gu gitye ka uno dano ki tim aranyi ki bwola.
Jabuli 55:12 Pe lamonena aye ma loko lok aŋec ikoma, ka kumeno kono atwero cirone; pe lakworra aye ma tye ka nywara, ka kumeno kono aa ki bote akanne woko.
Jabuli 55:13 Ento man in, ma warom kwedi-ni, ŋat ma wabedo kwede kacel, larema kikome ma doŋ waŋiyo kwede.
Jabuli 55:14 Yam wabedo ka boko lok mamit kwedi kacel; i ot pa Lubaŋa bene wawoto ma waribbe kacel.
Jabuli 55:15 Wek to obin onekgi woko; wek gulor piny i lyel ma pud gikwo, pien tim maraco tye i dye pacogi.
Jabuli 55:16 Ento akok bot Lubaŋa, ci Rwot bilara.
Jabuli 55:17 Akok bote kun acur bene, odiko, dyeceŋ ki otyeno; pi meno en biwinyo dwana.
Jabuli 55:18 En bilara dok miyo abedo ki kuc ki i lweny ma abedo ka lwenyone, pien jo mapol guero lweny i koma.
Jabuli 55:935 
Jabuli 55:19 Lubaŋa ma obedo i wi komker nia wa con biwinyo kokona, dok bimiyo lewic makogi; pien pe gigwoko cik, dok bene pe gilworo Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 55:20 Lawota ma yam ca olwenyo i kom lureme, oturo cikkene ma yam ocikke kwede woko.
Jabuli 55:21 Lokke onoŋo pwot makato moo dyaŋ, ento cwinye onoŋo opoŋ mere ki mony; lokke ducu onoŋo kweyo cwinydano macalo moo, ento giŋolo dano macalo pala lucwan.
Jabuli 55:22 Kel pekoni ducu bot Rwot, ci en bikonyi; en pe biye ni myero gidir dano ma kite atir woko wacel.
Jabuli 55:23 Ento in, ai Lubaŋa, ibiretogi woko piny i bur matut adada; gin jo ma oyo remo pa jo mukene ma gin luroro bene, pe gibibedo ma gicobo nucu kare me kwogi. Ento an abigeno mera in.
Jabuli 56:1 Kica omaki i koma, ai Lubaŋa, pien dano doŋ ginyona gidiya woko piny; lumonena giuna dyeceŋ jwi.
Jabuli 56:2 Lukworra ginyona woko dyeceŋ jwi, pien jo mapol gilwenyo i koma ma giwakke awaka.
Jabuli 56:3 Ka lworo omaka, ai Lubaŋa, agano mera in.
Jabuli 56:4 Ageno Lubaŋa, dok apake pi lokke, ageno Lubaŋa laboŋo lworo mo. Dano mamwa-ni kono timo gin aŋo bota?
Jabuli 56:5 Lukworra giketo ayela dyeceŋ jwi i gin ducu ma atiyo; tamgi ducu tye marac pi keto arem i Koma.
Jabuli 56:6 Gigurre woko kacel kun giliba, dok guketo cwinygi me neno kit gin ducu ma atimo. Kit macalo gubedo ka kiya kun gimito neka woko,
Jabuli 56:7 kumeno myero ipwodgi, iculgi pi balgi; ret lwak man woko piny ki akemoni, ai Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 56:8 In doŋ iŋeyo lwak ayelayela ma abedo kwede; dok ibedo ka neno kit ma pig waŋa cwerkwede! Meno ducu pe gicoyo i bukki?
Jabuli 56:9 I nino ma abikok iye boti, lukworra gibilokogi gidok cen. Man gin ma aŋeyo, ni, Lubaŋa tye ka lewny pira.
Jabuli 56:10 Ageno Lubaŋa, dok apake pi lokke; ageno Rwot, dok apake pi lok ma en oloko;
Jabuli 56:11 ageno Lubaŋa laboŋo lworo mo. Dano mamwa-ni kono twero timo gin aŋo bota?
Jabuli 56:12 Abicobo kwoŋŋa boti, ai Lubaŋa; abityero gityer me miyo pwoc boti.
Jabuli 56:936 
Jabuli 56:13 In aye ma ilara ki i to, pe iweko tyena ocer apoto piny. Pi meno abedo ka wot i nyim Lubaŋa i ceŋ ma ryeny i kom gin makwo ducu.
Jabuli 57:1 Tima kica, ai Lubaŋa, tima kica do, pien ariŋo ka larre boti. Abiriŋo ka larre i te tipo bwomi, nio ka yamo kot ma tyeko dano okato.
Jabuli 57:2 Akok bot Lubaŋa Mamalo Twal, bot Lubaŋa ma cobo gin ma en oyubo pira.
Jabuli 57:3 Lubaŋa bicwalo mar mere ma pe lokke, kacel ki adane, en bicwalo ki i polo ci lara; en biloyo lukworra ma ginyona woko piny-nyi, dok miyo lewic makogi bene.
Jabuli 57:4 Abuto piny i kin labwor ma guwor atika ka mwodo dano. Lakgi bit calo toŋ ki atero, lebgi bene bit calo pala lucwan.
Jabuli 57:5 Ai Lubaŋa, nyut ditti malo i polo, dok imi deyoni oryeny i wi lobo ducu!
Jabuli 57:6 Lukworra guciko obwo, gimito maka; cwinya doŋ ool woko ki can. Gukwinyo bur i yo ka ma awoto ki iye, emo gin dok gupoto iye kekengi.
Jabuli 57:7 Cwinya omoko i komi, ai Lubaŋa, cwinya omoko i komi ma pe lokke! Abiwero wer kun apaki ki dwan maloŋo!
Jabuli 57:8 In tipona, co woko! Wun naŋa ki opuk bene wuco woko! An bene abicoyo rupiny miyo ceŋ tuc!
Jabuli 57:9 Abimiyo pwoc boti i kin lwak me rok ducu, ai Rwot; abiwero wer me paki i kin lurok.
Jabuli 57:10 Mar meri ma pe lokke dit, o wa i polo, dok ada meri bene dit, o wa i pol.
Jabuli 57:11 Ai Lubaŋa, nyut ditti malo i polo, dok imi deyoni oryeny i wi lobo ducu!
Jabuli 58:1 Wun tika wumoko lok ma atir, wun luloc? Wun tika wuŋolo kop pa dano ducu ki cwiny ma atir?
Jabuli 58:2 Pe wacel, wupiro lok maraco ki cwinywu; dok wutimo bal ki tim aranyi lobo.
Jabuli 58:3 Jo maraco giŋak woko i kare me kwogi ducu, gibalo nia i kare ma ginywalogi iye kun giloko lok goba keken.
Jabuli 58:4 Gitye ki kwir marac macalo kwir pa twol, gidiŋo itgi woko akaka calo twol uwu ma diŋo ite,
Jabuli 58:5 ni wek pe cwiny dwan lutim yatyat i kom twol, wek pe cwiny dwan latim jokjok maryek.
Jabuli 58:937 
Jabuli 58:6 Ai Lubaŋa, tur lakgi woko; dok iput lak litino labwor mager-ri woko, ai Rwot!
Jabuli 58:7 Wek gutum woko macalo pii ma mol cito woko; wek ginyongi piny calo lum ci gutwo woko.
Jabuli 58:8 Wek gubed macalo okoro ma obab woko, nyo macalo latin ma gibwogo abwoga ma pe oneno cen.
Jabuli 58:9 Ma pud peya guŋeyo myero gitoŋgi woko macalo yadi okuto; Lubaŋa omi yamo okolgi otergi woko ki kiniga madwoŋ!
Jabuli 58:10 Jo ma kitgi atir gibibedo ki yomcwiny ka guneno culo kwor man; dok gibilwoko tyengi ki remo pa jo maraco.
Jabuli 58:11 Dano gibiwacci, “Adada jo ma kitgi atir gilimo bakacic; adada Lubaŋa ma ŋolo kop i lobo bene tye.”
Jabuli 59:1 Lara ki i ciŋ lukworra, ai Lubaŋa, gwoka ki i kom jo ma bino ka lweny i koma;
Jabuli 59:2 lara ki bot jo ma lutim maraco, ki i kom jo ma gioyo remo pa dano.
Jabuli 59:3 Nen, gubuto gikiya gimito neka woko; gin jo mager-ri guribbe woko ka lweny i koma. Pe pi gin marac mo nyo bal ma an atimo, ai Rwot,
Jabuli 59:4 pe atimo kit roc mo, ma omiyo giriŋo oyotoyot i kakannegi.
Jabuli 59:5 A ibin, in Rwot Lubaŋa me mony ci ilara; dok inengi piri keni, Lubaŋa pa Icrael! Co woko ipwod lwak me rok ducu; pe myero itrm kica ki ŋat mo kadi ki acel ki i kom lutim roro ma gipiro lok me timo tim maraco.
Jabuli 59:6 Otyeno otyeno gidwogo cen kun gikok calo gwogi, ka giwoto girumo kwede gaŋ.
Jabuli 59:7 Koŋ iwiny gin ma giwaco! Lok ma i doggi bit calo pala lucwan. Gttamo tam ki i cwinygi ma giwacci, “Aŋa kono ma biwinyo lok ma wawaco?”
Jabuli 59:8 Ento in inyerogi anyera, ai Rwot; dok inalo rok ducu aŋala.
Jabuli 59:9 In i tekka, abiwero wer me paki; pien in i cel gogona, ai Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 59:10 Lubaŋana ma mara ki mar mere ma pe lokke bibino bota; en bimiyo aneno lukworra macalo jo ma doŋ aloyogi woko.
Jabuli 59:11 Pe inekgi woko, miyo lutuwa wigi wil; ketgi woko ata ki tweroni ci ityekgi woko, ai Rwot, in kwotwa!
Jabuli 59:12 Doggi opoŋ ki bal, giloko lok me bal keken; mi gumok woko i owic pi wakkegi! Pi lok me ceno dano ki goba ma giloko,
Jabuli 59:13 myero ityekgi woko ki akemoni; tyekgi waŋ ma gutum woko liweŋ. Man bimiyo lwak ducu ŋeyo ni, Lubaŋa aye ma loyo jo pa Yakobo nio i agikki lobo.
Jabuli 59:938 
Jabuli 59:14 Otyeno otyeno gidwogo cen, kun gikok calo gwogi, ka giwoto girumo kwede gaŋ.
Jabuli 59:15 Giwoto atata giyenyo cam, gibedo ka ŋur aŋura ka peya guyeŋ.
Jabuli 59:16 Ento an abiwero wer ma apaki kwede pi tekki, abiwero wer matek odiko con pi mar meri ma pe lokke. In aye ibedo cel gogona, dok in kalarrena i nino ma atye ki can.
Jabuli 59:17 In i tekka, abiwero wer me paki, pien in i cel gogona, ai Lubaŋa, in Lubaŋa ma imara ki mar ma pe lokke.
Jabuli 60:1 Ai Lubaŋa, ikwerowa dok iloyowa woko do; kiniga ceŋ omaki i komwa; aya, ye wadwog boti do!
Jabuli 60:2 Imiyo lobo oyeŋŋe, ibaro dyere woko; yub ka ma obarre-ni, pien yeŋŋe, mito poto woko.
Jabuli 60:3 Imiyo lwakki gulimo arem me can matego; imiyowa koŋo vino wama to, wamer, wabaŋŋe woko.
Jabuli 60:4 Iŋabo bendera malo pi jo ma gilwori, wek guriŋ iye gularre ki i lak atum.
Jabuli 60:5 Larwa ki tekki imi walo lukworwa, dok igam legawa, wek lwak ma imaro gubwot.
Jabuli 60:6 Lubaŋa oloko ki i kabedone maleŋ ni, “Abipoko Cekem woko ki deyo madit me loc, dok abipoko nota me Cukot woko i dul i dul bot jona.
Jabuli 60:7 Gilead mera, ki Manace bene mera; Epraim aye tok nyonyo me wiya, ki Juda mere odoo kerra.
Jabuli 60:8 Ento Moab aye becen me lwokka; ki Edom mera, obedo ka bolo warra; dok abidaŋŋe matek me loc i kom jo Pilciti.”
Jabuli 60:9 Aŋa ma bikela i gaŋ man ma girumo ki cel gogo? Aŋa ma bitelo wiya tera i Edom?
Jabuli 60:10 In pe doŋ ikwerowa woko, ai Lubaŋa? In pe doŋ inywako yo ki dul monywa me cito ka lewny, ai Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 60:11 Konywa me lewny i kom lukworwa, pien kony ma dano miyo pe gin mo!
Jabuli 60:12 Ka Lubaŋa tye ka lewny kacel kwedwa ci wabiloyo; en aye ma binyono lukworwa diyogi woko piny.
Jabuli 61:939 
Jabuli 61:1 Winy kokona, ai Lubaŋa, dok iwiny legana.
Jabuli 61:2 Akok boti ki ka mabor, ki i agikki lobo, ka cwinya doŋ odem woko. Tela itera i kom got mabor ma kata;
Jabuli 61:3 pien in aye ka larrena, in cel matek ma igwoka i kom lukworra.
Jabuli 61:4 Wek abed i kemani nakanaka! Wek akanne i te bwomi abed ki kuc!
Jabuli 61:5 In doŋ ityeko winyo lokka, ai Lubaŋa, dok ityeko miya gipiny pa jo ma gilworo nyiŋi.
Jabuli 61:6 Med mwaka mapol i kom nino me kwo pa kabaka; wek obed nakanaka i kare pa yalwak ducu!
Jabuli 61:7 Mi en obed i wi komker nakanaka i nyimi, ai Lubaŋa; dok igwoke ki mar meri ma pe lokke, ki adani.
Jabuli 61:8 Pi meno abiwero wer kun apa ko nyiŋi, kun acobo bene kwoŋŋa ma akwoŋo i nyimi nino ki nino.
Jabuli 62:1 Ageno mera Lubaŋa keken kun abedo aliŋ gira mot; pien larra a ki bote.
Jabuli 62:2 En kene aye got ki Lalarra, en cel gogo ma gwoka, pe gibidira cen wacel.
Jabuli 62:3 Wun ducu mono wubiero lweny i kom dano pi kare ma rom mene, wek wuloye wo ko calo cel ma doŋ cok poto?
Jabuli 62:4 Giyubo lok me kwanye woko ki i rwom me dit wek gidwoke piny. Ginoŋo yomcwiny i loko lokgoba. Gulamo gum i kom dano ki lok doggi nono, ento ki i cwinygi giceno dano acena.
Jabuli 62:5 Ageno mera Lubaŋa keken kun abedo aliŋ gira mot, pien genna ducu a ki bote.
Jabuli 62:6 En aye got ki Lalarra, en cel gogo ma gwoka, pe gibiyena wacel.
Jabuli 62:7 Lar kacel ki deyona ducu tye bot Lubaŋa; en aye gotta matek, dok en aye kalarrena.
Jabuli 62:8 Wun dano, wugen Lubaŋa kare ducu, wuyab cwinywu woko ducu bote; Lubaŋa aye kalarrewa.
Jabuli 62:9 Dano ma rwomgi piny gubedo calo yamo me yweyo mamwa, dok jo ma tye ki rwom ma malo bene obedo gin ma pe genne. Ka gipimogi i mijan gitiŋŋe malo, ma gin ducu kacel noŋo giyot makato yamo me yweyo nono.
Jabuli 62:10 Pe wuket genwu i kom tim me bumo dano, pe wugen tim me yak, pien konnye pe; kadi bed lonyowu tye ka medde, pe wuket cwinywu iye.
Jabuli 62:11 Lubaŋa oloko lok makato tyen acel woko ni, en aye e won twero;
Jabuli 62:940 
Jabuli 62:12 dok ni in Rwot aye i won mar ma pe lokke. In, giri iculo dano acel acel muporo kit ticce.
Jabuli 63:1 Ai Lubaŋa, in Lubaŋana, atye ka yenyi, kwona ducu ocuŋ piri; koma doŋ ool woko pi miti, calo abedo i lobo mutwo, muti, ma pii pe iye.
Jabuli 63:2 Pi meno abedo ka yenyi i kabedoni maleŋ, pi neno tweroni kacel ki deyoni.
Jabuli 63:3 Mar meri ma pe lokke ber kato kwo, pi meno abipaki gira kare ducu.
Jabuli 63:4 Abipwoyi pi kare me kwona ducu; abikok boti kun ataŋo ciŋa.
Jabuli 63:5 Ayeŋ calo acamo moo ma ii cogo ki moo dwolo, abiwero wer kun apaki ki yomcwiny madwoŋ.
Jabuli 63:6 Kadi ka atye i wi kitandana wiya po i komi, dok abedo ka lwodo lok i komi dyewor benebene;
Jabuli 63:7 pien ibedo lakonya kare ducu, dok akanne i tipo te bwomi kun awero wer pi yomcwiny.
Jabuli 63:8 Amoko i komi woko likiŋ, ci ikwaka woko maber ki ciŋi malacuc.
Jabuli 63:9 Ento jo ma giyenya ma gimito neka gibidonyo gicito piny i te ŋom matut.
Jabuli 63:10 Gibinekogi woko i lweny ki pala lucwan, gibidoko cam pa too me tim.
Jabuli 63:11 Ento kabaka bibedo mere ki yomcwiny pi Lubaŋa; jo ducu ma gikwoŋo kwoŋ ki nyiŋe gibipake; ento jo ma lugoba gibiumo doggi woko lipuk.
Jabuli 64:1 Winy dwana ma akok kwede boti, ai Lubaŋa; atye ki lworo, lara do ki i cin lukworra!
Jabuli 64:2 Gwoka ki i kom lok pa jo maraco ma gipiro i koma i muŋ, konya i kom lwak lutim maraco.
Jabuli 64:3 Gipako lebgi calo gipako pala lucwan, ma giketo cwinygi i loko lok makec calo atero ma gimito celone.
Jabuli 64:4 Gikanne, gibayo aterogi kun gicelo ki dano ma pe ki bal mo, gibayo aterogi gicelo woko oyotoyot laboŋo lworo mo.
Jabuli 64:5 Tamgi omoko likiŋ i kom gin marac ma giparo me timone; gitye ka lok kekengi pi ciko owicgi i muŋ, kun gitamo ni, “Aŋa ma twero nenowa?
Jabuli 64:941 
Jabuli 64:6 Aŋa kono ma twero yenyo balwa wek enoŋ? Wabedo ki tam, omiyo wapiro lok me ryeko ma pe wacce.” Gin ma tye i tam ki i cwiny dano niaŋ Iye tek, pien tye ka matut!
Jabuli 64:7 Ento Lubaŋa bicelo aterone cito i komgi; ci gibilimo ret woko oyotoyot.
Jabuli 64:8 En bityekogi woko matwal pi lokgi ma giloko; dano ducu ma binekogi gibiyeŋo wigi.
Jabuli 64:9 Bimiyo jo ducu gibedo ki lworo; ci gibitito pi gin ma Lubaŋa otimo, kun gitamo bene mot pi gin ma en otyeko tiyone.
Jabuli 64:10 Wek jo ma kitgi atir gubed ki yomcwiny i Rwot, dok guriŋ gular bote, wek jo ducu ma cwinygi atir gupake!
Jabuli 65:1 Dano myero gupaki i Cion, ai Lubaŋa; dok myero gumini gin ducu ma yam gukwoŋo pire,
Jabuli 65:2 pien in aye ma igamo Iega-gu ducu. Dano ducu gibibino boti
Jabuli 65:3 pi balgi ma gutimo. I kare ma timwa marac doŋ obwoyowa, in itimowa kica iweko bal wa.
Jabuli 65:4 Dano ma iyero ka ikelo cok boti tye ki gum, me bedo i dyekal me kabedoni maleŋ! Wabiyen ki jami ducu mabeco ma tye i odi, ma en aye kabedoni maleŋ!
Jabuli 65:5 Igamo legawa, ai Lubaŋa Lalarwa, ilarowa kun itiyo jamimadito me aura ma kelo lworo. Jo ducu ma gibedo ilobo gigeno in, kadi wa jo ma gibedo ka ma lobo ogik iye, ki jo ma gibedo ka mabor wa i agikki nam
Jabuli 65:6 Iciba godi ocuŋ i kabedogi ki tekki, ma irukke woko ki tweroni madwoŋ.
Jabuli 65:7 In aye ma ijuko mor pa nam ki twagge pa biamwonyi bene; dok ijuko woo pa lwak me rok ducu.
Jabuli 65:8 Mumiyo dano ducu ma gibedo ka mabor i wan apokki me agikki lobo gitye ki lworo pi lanyut ma itiyo; dok Imiyo lwak gigoyo kijira pi yomcwiny cakke tuŋ wokceŋ o kwede wa i tuŋ potoceŋ.
Jabuli 65:9 Ibino i lobo ci imiyo kot cwer iye, imiyo lobo cekocam mabup; kuluni ducu ma iketo Poŋ woko ki pii; in bene ma imiyo bel cek, pien in yam iyubo kumeno.
Jabuli 65:10 Imiyo kot cwer bino i potti ma gipuro ki kweri dyaŋ, dok ipiro ŋom mutiŋŋe ma i dyere woko maber, imiyo kot cwer iye madwoŋ obido woko, dok imiyo gum i kom kodi ducu ma i poto gitwi gidoŋo maber.
Jabuli 65:11 Mwaka ki mwaka imiyo cam cek bot dano madwoŋ pi gum ma imiyo; yo ma gadigadini wok ki iye mol moo keken.
Jabuli 65:942 
Jabuli 65:12 Olet ma i tim ducu opoŋ ki dyaŋi keken, jo ma gibedo i ŋet godi ducu gitye ki yomcwiny madwoŋ.
Jabuli 65:13 Bar kwat ducu opoŋ ki lwak romi ma pe wacce, nota-gu ducu opoŋ ki kal ma tye ka doŋo iye, gigoyo kijira ma giwero wer kacel ki yomcwiny.
Jabuli 66:1 Wun jo ducu ma wubedo i wi lobo, wugo kijira bot Lubaŋa ki yomcwiny;
Jabuli 66:2 wuwer wer pi pako deyo me nyiŋe, wupake ki pak me deyo adada!
Jabuli 66:3 Wuwac bot Lubaŋa ni, “Gin me aura ducu ma itiyo ma kelo lworo ditte rom mene! Tweroni giri dit mada, miyo lumoneni ducu gimwolle amwola i nyimi.
Jabuli 66:4 Dano ducu ma i lobo giworo in; giwero wer me paki, kun giwero wer gipako nyiŋi.”
Jabuli 66:5 Wubin, wunen gin ma Lubaŋa otiyo; otiyo gin ma kela lworo mada i kin dano.
Jabuli 66:6 Oloko nam odoko ŋom mutwo; omiyo dano guwoto ki tyengi ki i dye kulu gukato loka tuŋcel, mumiyo wabedo ki yomcwiny pi gin ma en otiyo kunnu.
Jabuli 66:7 En loyo loc nakanaka ki tek me twerone, dok ciko waŋe me neno rok ducu. Jo ma gin lujemo myero pe gukette malo pigi kengi.
Jabuli 66:8 Wupwo Lubaŋa, wun lwak me rok ducu, wuwek dwan me pak ma wupake kwede owinnye.
Jabuli 66:9 En mugwokowa omiyo pud wakwo, dok pe oweko tyenwa ocer kadi ki acel.
Jabuli 66:10 In doŋ ityeko temowa, ai Lubaŋa; doŋ itemowa macalo ryal ma giliyo i mac.
Jabuli 66:11 Ikelowa imiyo wamoko i obwo; dok bene icibo yec mapek me can I ŋewa ni watiŋ.
Jabuli 66:12 Iweko lukworwa giŋweco ginyono wiwa woko piny; wawotoki i dye mac wa i dye pii, ento in doŋ ikelowa wao i kabedo malac me kuc.
Jabuli 66:13 Abibino i odi kun akelo boti gityer me gitum awaŋa; abicobo kwoŋŋa i nyimi kun amiyi gin ma yam acikke pire.
Jabuli 66:14 Abimiyo gin ma doŋ awaco ki doga ni abimini, gin ma acikke pire i kare ma onoŋo atye i can.
Jabuli 66:15 Abityero boti gitum awaŋa me lim makwo ma gucwe, dok abidunyo boti yito mac ma giwaŋo ki gitum me nyogi romi; abityero boti twoni dyaŋi kacel ki dyegi.
Jabuli 66:16 Wubin wuwiny, wun jo ducu ma wulworo Lubaŋa, ci abitito botwu gin ma Lubaŋa otiyo pira.
Jabuli 66:17 Cen akok bote matek, dok bene apake ki wer pi dworo nyiŋe.
Jabuli 66:943 
Jabuli 66:18 Ka nene aumo balla i cwinya, kono Rwot pe owinyo kokona wacel.
Jabuli 66:19 Adada Lubaŋa doŋ owinyo kokona; doŋ owinyo legana ducu.
Jabuli 66:20 Gipwo Lubaŋa, pien pe okwero winyo legana, dok bene pe okwanyo mar mere ma pe lokke woko ki i koma.
Jabuli 67:1 Lubaŋa onyutwa kicane dok omiwa gum, ci onenwa bene ki waŋ me kica,
Jabuli 67:2 wek dano ma i lobo ducu guŋe kiti; nyut bene twero me larri bot rok ducu.
Jabuli 67:3 Mi rok ducu me wi lobo gupaki, ai Lubaŋa: wek lwak me rok ducu gupaki!
Jabuli 67:4 Wek lurok ducu cwinygi obed yom kun giwero wer me pwoc, pien in aye iŋolo kop pa rok ducu maromrom, dok in aye ma it ye ka telo rok ducu me wi lobo.
Jabuli 67:5 Mi rok ducu me wi lobo gupaki, ai Lubaŋa; wek lwak me rok ducu gupaki!
Jabuli 67:6 Lobo doŋ oceko cam mabup: Lubaŋa ma Lubaŋawa doŋ omiyowa gum.
Jabuli 67:7 Lubaŋa doŋ omiyowa gum; pi meno dano ma i lobo ducu myero guwore.
Jabuli 68:1 Wek Lubaŋa oa malo, ci oket lukworre woko atata; wek jo ma kwere ducu guriŋ woko ki i nyime!
Jabuli 68:2 Macalo yito duny cito woko, gin bene gibirwenyo woko kit meno; macalo odok kic leny woko ka giketo i ŋet mac, wek jo maraco bene guto woko i nyim Lubaŋa kit meno!
Jabuli 68:3 Ento wek jo ma kitgi atir gubed ki yomcwiny; wek gunyatte ki yomcwiny madwoŋ i nyim Lubaŋa; wek gudaŋŋe ma yomcwiny mito nekogi woko!
Jabuli 68:4 Wuwer bot Lubaŋa, wuwer wer wupak nyiŋe; wuil dwanwu malo ki wer bot en ma tye ka ŋwec ki gadigadine i wi pol; nyiŋe Rwot, wudwore, dok wubed ki yomcwiny i nyime.
Jabuli 68:5 En won jo ma wongi pe, dok en bene magwoko mon to; en Lubaŋa ma bedo i ot mere maleŋ.
Jabuli 68:6 Lubaŋa miyo paco bot jo mudoŋ kengi ma piny oloyo, wek gubed iye; en aye ma kwanyo lumabuc woko ki i ot kol mot maber miyo gibedo ki kuc; ento jo ma gin lujemo gibedo i lobo mutwo.
Jabuli 68:7 Ai Lubaŋa, i kare ma itelo wi lwakki, i kare ma iwoto kwedgi ki i dye tim,
Jabuli 68:944 
Jabuli 68:8 ŋom oyeŋŋe, kot bene oa ki i polo ocorre i lobo, got Cinai bene oyeŋŋe i nyim Lubaŋa; oyeŋŋe i nyim Lubaŋa ma en Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael.
Jabuli 68:9 Imiyo kot madwoŋ ocwer i lobo, ai Lubaŋa; iroco loboni muol-li woko odoco.
Jabuli 68:10 Lwakki gubedo iye macalo pacogi; dok bene pi berri, ai Lubaŋa, ipito jo ma piny obwoyogi ki cam.
Jabuli 68:11 Rwot omiyo cik, doŋ mon mapol gutiŋo lok maber miyo nya kun giwacci,
Jabuli 68:12 “Luker kacel ki monygi gitye ka riŋo woko ariŋa!” Mon ma gudoŋ paco gupoko jami ma giyako woko i kingi.
Jabuli 68:13 Kadi gibuto i dwol romi, ginen calo akuri ma gidero bwome ki ryal, dok yece gidero ki jabu ma obedo alumalum.
Jabuli 68:14 Ka Lubaŋa Matwero-ducu oketo luker woko i wi got Jalmon, ci omiyo pee bene ocwer kunnu.
Jabuli 68:15 Got Bacan kara tek kuman, got ma lacol wiye pol, en got me Bacan!
Jabuli 68:16 In got ma lacol wii dwon-ni, piŋo iŋeno piny ki nyeko, wa i wi got ma Lubaŋa oyero me bedo iye-ni? Iyo, Rwot bibedo kunnu matwal!
Jabuli 68:17 Rwot oa ki i got Cinai bino i kabedone maleŋ ki lwak gadigadi matego ma romo alip ki alip.
Jabuli 68:18 Iito wa i wi got malo, kun icoko lwak opii cito kwedi, dok ibedo ka gamo mot ki bot dano, kadi wa ki bot jo ma yam gujemo woko. Rwot Lubaŋa doŋ bibedo kunnu.
Jabuli 68:19 Gipwo Rwot, pien nino ki nino en tinowa wa ki pekowa ducu i kore; Lubaŋa aye Lalarwa.
Jabuli 68:20 Lubaŋawa en Lubaŋa me lar; en Rwot Lubaŋawa, ma larowa ki i to.
Jabuli 68:21 Ento Lubaŋa bigoyo wi lukworre turo woko, bigoyo wi dano ma yer wigi boco- gu ma gilubo timgi me bal.
Jabuli 68:22 Rwot owacci, “Abidwokogi cen ki i Bacan, abiwotogi ka maleŋ ki i te nam matut,
Jabuli 68:23 wek wubin wulwok tyenwu ki remogi, wek gwogiwu bene gunaŋ remo pa lukwor madwoŋ macalo gimito.”
Jabuli 68:24 Ai Lubaŋa, jo ducu gitye ka neno wotti, wot pa Lubaŋa ma Lakerra, ma cito kwede i kabedone maleŋ.
Jabuli 68:25 Luwer gutelo nyim, lugo wer gudoŋ i ŋec, ka doŋ anyira ma gigoyo ajaa gubedo i dyere.
Jabuli 68:26 “Gipwo Lubaŋa i cokke madit pa lwakke, wupak Rwot, wun likwayo pa Icrael ducu!”
Jabuli 68:945 
Jabuli 68:27 Mutelo yo bino ca-ni aye Benjamin, ma en kaka matidi, ka rwodi me Juda ki lwakgi madwoŋ gulubo, ka doŋ rwodi me Jabulon ki rwodi me Naputali i korgi.
Jabuli 68:28 Nyut tweroni, ai Lubaŋa; nyut tekki, ai Lubaŋa, en tek ma itiyo kwede piwa-ni.
Jabuli 68:29 Pi odi ma tye i Jerucalem, omiyo luker gikelo mot gityero boti
Jabuli 68:30 Juk lee tim mager ma gibedo i kin lagada, gin lwak twoni ki litino dyaŋi pa lurok. Nyon jo ma yenyo lim ajog woko piny ki tyeni; ket lwak me rok ma cwinygi yom pi lweny-gu woko ata.
Jabuli 68:31 Wek gikel mola ki i Ejipt; dok wek jo Etiopia gubin oyotoyot ka ryeyo ciŋgi bot Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 68:32 Wuwer wer bot Lubaŋa, wun ker ducu ma i wi lobo; wuwer wer me pak bot Rwot;
Jabuli 68:33 Wuwer wer bot en ma tye ka wot i wi polo, en wi polo macon; winy, en tye ka daŋŋe ki dwan matek adada.
Jabuli 68:34 Wutit pi twero pa Lubaŋa, ma dit me locce tye i Icrael, ma twerone bene tye malo i polo.
Jabuli 68:35 Lubaŋa me aura ma kelo lworo tye i kabedone maleŋ, en Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma miyo twero ki tek bot jone. Gipwo Lubaŋal
Jabuli 69:1 Lara, ai Lubaŋa! Nen pii doŋ omwonya woko oo wa i ŋuta.
Jabuli 69:2 Alwiny woko i coto ka matut, ka ma gin mo pe ma atwero cuŋ i kome; amwony woko i pii matut, ki biamwonyi me pii ma tagge bene kato ki i wiya.
Jabuli 69:3 Doŋ aol woko ki koko pi kony; dwana doŋ okak woko. Waŋa-gu bene doŋ ocido woko pi kuro kony ma a ki bot Lubaŋana
Jabuli 69:4 Jo ma daga nonono laboŋo tyen lok mo gipol ma gikato yer wiya woko; jo ma gin lukworra ma giloko lok goba pi lweny i koma gitek dok gimito neka woko. Gimito adwok jami ma pe akwalo akwala cen, kun pe akwalo gin mo.
Jabuli 69:5 Ai Lubaŋa, iŋeyo minona; dok balla ducu ma atiyo pe okanne ki boti wacel.
Jabuli 69:6 Pe iwek aket lewic i kom jo ma geno in, ai Rwot Lubaŋa me mony. Dok pe iwek akel can i kom dano ma giworo in, ai Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Jabuli 69:7 Aciro yet madwoŋ mada pi nyiŋi, omiyo lewic oumo waŋa woko lipuk.
Jabuli 69:8 Adoko calolarok not utmegina, dok macalo ŋat ma labedo ki bot litino awobe pa maa.
Jabuli 69:946 
Jabuli 69:9 Arima pi odi mito neka woko, dok yet pa dano ma giyeti kwede bene doŋ otyeko poto i koma.
Jabuli 69:10 Ikare ma amwolle kena i cwinya kun ari kec, meno odoko lok anywar i koma.
Jabuli 69:11 Ikare ma abedo ka rukke ki boŋo cola, alokke adoko lok aboka i kin dano.
Jabuli 69:12 Jo ma bedo i dog cel gibedo ka loko lok i koma ma pe wacce, lumero bene giwera awera ki wer.
Jabuli 69:13 Ento ki tuŋ bota, ai Rwot, akelo legana mere boti. Gam Legana i kare ma iyero, ai Lubaŋa, pi mar meri madwoŋ ma pe lokke, pien igwoko cikkeni pi Laro joni.
Jabuli 69:14 Lara wek pe alwiny woko i coto: lara ki i ciŋ lukworra, lara bene ki i pii matut.
Jabuli 69:15 Pe iwek biamwonyi otagge omwony wiya woko, pe iwek amwony woko i pii matut, kadi ki donyo piny i bur lyel.
Jabuli 69:16 Gam doga, ai Rwot, pien mar meri ma pe lokke ber; lokke bota pi kicani madwoŋ.
Jabuli 69:17 Pe ikanne woko ki bot laticci; gam doga oyotoyot kombeddi, pien atye i can.
Jabuli 69:18 Nyik cok bota ikoka, lara ki i ciŋ lukworra.
Jabuli 69:19 Iŋeyo kit anywar ducu ma ginywara kwede, ki kit ma gimiya kwede lewic marac mada; doŋ in iŋeyo lumonena ducu.
Jabuli 69:20 Cwinya oballe woko pi yet ma giyeta kwede, omiyo doŋ pe atye ki kit gen mo. Ayenyo ŋat ma twero nyuto kicane i koma, ento pe anoŋo; ayenyo jo ma myero gukwe cwinya, ento ŋat mo pe.
Jabuli 69:21 Gumiya kwir marac ma kaka cam, dok i kare ma orwo pii oneka gumiya koŋo vino mawac ni amati.
Jabuli 69:22 Wek karamagi ma gicamo-ni otyekgi woko macalo owic; karama me gityer ma gicamo-ni myero olokke odok owic ma makogi.
Jabuli 69:23 Mi waŋgi ocor woko, wek pe gunen piny; mi pyergi onyoŋŋe obed ka myel amyela nakanaka.
Jabuli 69:24 To akemoni woko ducu i komgi, mi kinigani malyet-ti otyekgi woko.
Jabuli 69:25 Mi gonygi odok obur, pe iwek ŋat mo odoŋ obed i kemagi.
Jabuli 69:26 Giyelo dano ma in doŋ ityeko pwodo, dok giketo can gimedo ameda i kom jo ma yam doŋ ityeko keto ret i komgi.
Jabuli 69:27 Medde ki keto can i komgi muporo balgi, pe ikwany kop woko ki i wigi kadi ki acel,
Jabuli 69:28 Jwa nyiŋgi woko ki i buk ma nyiŋ jo makwo ducu gicoyo iye-ni; pe iwek gico nyiŋgi i kin nyiŋ jo ma kitgi atir.
Jabuli 69:947 
Jabuli 69:29 An doŋ atye i can ki arem madwoŋ: wek larri oketa malo, ai Lubaŋal
Jabuli 69:30 Abipako nyiŋ Lubaŋa ki wer; abidworo nyiŋe kun amiye pwoc.
Jabuli 69:31 Pwoc man biyomo cwiny Rwot makato twon dyaŋ, nyo twon ma tuŋe olot, ma oboŋe dito.
Jabuli 69:32 Wek jo ma giunogi gunen, gubed ki yomcwiny; wun jo ma wutye ka yenyo Lubaŋa, wubed ki kwo manyen i cwinywu.
Jabuli 69:33 Rwot winyo koko pa dano ma piny obwoyogi, dok pe cayo jone kikome ma gitweyogi i mabuc.
Jabuli 69:34 Wek polo ki lobo ducu gupake, nam ki jami makwo ducu ma tye ka wot iye.
Jabuli 69:35 Lubaŋa bilaro jo Cion dok bigero gaŋi me Juda odoco; luticce gibibedo kunnu, gibicamo doko megi;
Jabuli 69:36 litino pa luticce gibileyo doko megi, dok jo ma mare gibibedo iye.
Jabuli 70:1 Ai Lubaŋa, mi cwinyi obed yom me lara! Ai Rwot, bin oyotoyot ikonya!
Jabuli 70:2 Wek Lewic omak jo ma gimito neka dok gubed ki anyobanyoba bene; wek gidwokgi cen, wek alee otwodgi, gin jo ma mito tima marac-ci!
Jabuli 70:3 Wek gubed ma piny orem kwedgi woko pi lewic ma doŋ omakogini, gin jo ma giwacca ni, “Aa, Aa!”
Jabuli 70:4 Ento mi dano ducu ma giyenyo in gubed ki yomcwiny madwoŋ i komi; dok imi jo ma gimaro larri gumedde ki waco nakanaka ni, “Lubaŋa dit!”
Jabuli 70:5 An gira lacan, dok piny obwoya woko; bin bota oyotoyot, ai Lubaŋal In aye lakony ki lalarra; ai Rwot, pe igalle!
Jabuli 71:1 Ariŋo alaro boti, ai Rwot; pe imi lewic omaka!
Jabuli 71:2 Kit macalo in kiti at ir-ri, lara dok ikonya; cik iti iwiny legana, ci ilara!
Jabuli 71:3 Bed got me kalarrena, dok ibed cel gogo matek ma gwoka; pien in i got ki cel gogona.
Jabuli 71:4 Lara ki i ciŋ jo maraco do, ai Lubaŋana, lara ki i twero pa jo mager ma lubwami.
Jabuli 71:5 Genna ducu tye i komi, ai Rwot; abedo ka geno in cakke wa ka tinona.
Jabuli 71:948 
Jabuli 71:6 Cakke ma ginywala abedo ka jeŋŋe i komi; in aye ma yam ikwanya ki i ot nyodo pa maa. Abibedo ka pako in nino ducu.
Jabuli 71:7 Abedo ginaura bot jo mapol, ento in aye kalarrena matek.
Jabuli 71:8 Abedo ka paki dyeceŋ jwi, dok amiyi deyo bene.
Jabuli 71:9 Pe ibola woko i kare ma doŋ ati woko kuman; pe ibwota bene i kare ma tekka doŋ otum woko.
Jabuli 71:10 Lukworra gipiro lok mapol i koma, gin jo ma mito neka woko-ni gicokke kacel ka yubo lok i koma.
Jabuli 71:11 Giwacci, “Lubaŋa doŋ otyeko bwote woko; wuriŋ i kore wumake woko, pien pe tye ŋat mo ma myero olar en.”
Jabuli 71:12 Ai Lubaŋa, pe ibed bor kweda; ai Lubaŋana, bin oyotoyot ilara!
Jabuli 71:13 Mi lewic omak jo ma gidota-gu, dok gityekgi woko liweŋ; wek gicagi dok can omakgi malit, gin jo ma mito keto can i koma-ni.
Jabuli 71:14 Ento pud abimedde ki bedo ki gen i komi, abimedde ki paki nakanaka.
Jabuli 71:15 Abituco pi tic ma atir ducu ma itiyo, abituco bene pi tic me larri dyeceŋ jwi, pien welgi doŋ pe kwanne, okato ŋecca woko.
Jabuli 71:16 Abibino pi tito pi tic madit me aura pa Rwot Lubaŋa, abipaki pi porreni keken.
Jabuli 71:17 Ai Lubaŋa, ibedo Ka pwonya cakke ka tinona, pi meno pud atuco pi ticci me aura ducu ma itiyo.
Jabuli 71:18 Pe ibwota ata, ai Lubaŋa, kadi bed i kare ma doŋ ati ma: wiya otwi lwar; ento bed kweda nio Ka atuco pi tekki bot yalwak ducu me kare me anyim.
Jabuli 71:19 Ai Lubaŋa, twerri ki timmi ma atir doŋ otyeko o wa malo i polo. In aye ma itiyo jami madito ducu, pe tye ŋat mo macalo in, ai Lubaŋa!
Jabuli 71:20 In aye ma icwalo ayelayela ki arem madwoŋ i koma, in giri ma ibidwoko tek i koma; dok ibiwota woko ki i te ŋom ka matut, ibikela woko ka maleŋ doki.
Jabuli 71:21 Ibimiya abedo ki dit makato, dok bene ibikweyo cwinya.
Jabuli 71:22 Dok bene abipaki ki naŋa pi genni, ai Lubaŋana; abiwero wer me paki kun agoyo agoya ki opuk, in ŋat Maleŋ pa jo Icrael.
Jabuli 71:23 Abidaŋŋe matek pi yomcwiny, i kare ma noŋo atye ka wero wer me paki; abipaki ki tipo koma ducu, pien doŋ ilara.
Jabuli 71:24 Dok abitito pi timmi ma atir ma ik onya kwede dyeceŋ jwi, pien lewic ki can doŋ otyeko makogi woko, gin jo ma onoŋo giyenya wek giket can i koma.
Jabuli 72:949 
Jabuli 72:1 Pwony kabaka wek Oŋol kop atir macalo in, ai Lubaŋa, dok inyut porreni bot latin ker,
Jabuli 72:2 wek oŋol kop pa lwakki atir, dok olo lucan ki kit ma atir.
Jabuli 72:3 Wek godi ki cere-gu gukel kuc bot dano, ma en tye ka loyo lwak ki kit ma atir.
Jabuli 72:4 Myero kabaka owiny pido pa lucan dok oŋol kopgi kakare, olar bene jo ma piny obwoyogi; ento oŋiny jo ma uno dano mukenegu woko!
Jabuli 72:5 Lwakki myero guwori nakanaka i kare pa yalwakgi ducu pi kare ducu ma cen ki dwe pud tye!
Jabuli 72:6 Kabaka obed macalo kot ma cwer i kom lum ma doŋ gilwero, calo ŋido kot ma cwer bido ŋom.
Jabuli 72:7 Wek kit ma atir omedde ameda i kare me locce, dok kuc bene obed i lobone nakanaka nio wa i kare ma dwe doŋ bibedo pe!
Jabuli 72:8 En biloyo lobo cakke i dog nam tuŋŋi nio kwede wa i nam tuŋ cel, dokbiloyo cakke ki i kulu Euprate o kwede wa i agikkipiny.
Jabuli 72:9 Lumonene ducu gibiguŋo i nyime ka wore, lukworre gibibuto aryeba ic ci gibimoko apwa.
Jabuli 72:10 Luker me Tarcic ki pa jo ma bedo i cula nam, myero gucul mucoro bote, dok luker me Ceba ki me Seba gukel mot bote.
Jabuli 72:11 Luker ducu myero guryebbe piny i nyime, dok rok ducu myero guti bote!
Jabuli 72:12 En laro dano ma piny obwoyo ka okok bote, konyo Lucan ki jo ma pe gitye ki ŋat ma konyogi.
Jabuli 72:13 Kica make i kom jo magoro ki ma piny obwoyogi, ci laro kwo pa jo ma piny oloyo.
Jabuli 72:14 En kokogi ki i tim bwami ki i un ma gibedo ka unogi kwede; kwogi pire tek bote ma pe wacce.
Jabuli 72:15 Kabaka obed kwo nakanaka! Myero gimi jabu ma gikelo ki i Ceba bot kabaka; dok gibed ka lega pire kare ducu ma pe gikeŋ, gileg Lubaŋa wek oony gum i kome kareducu!
Jabuli 72:16 Cam bene myero ocek mabup i lobone, opoŋ wa wi godi-gu woko ducu; wek onyak nyig mabeco calo godi me Lebanon; wek gaŋi ducu opoŋ ki lwak dano madwoŋ ala, ma gipol calo lum ma i tim!
Jabuli 72:17 Wek nyiŋ kabakaori nakanaka, ki ywekane onya omedde ameda kit macalo cen ri kwede. Jo me rok ducu myero gulwoŋi ni lagumkom, dok myero guleg Lubaŋa ni omi gum i komgi ma rom ki gum ma omiyo i kom kabaka!
Jabuli 72:18 Gipwo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma en keken aye ma tiyo gin me aura.
Jabuli 72:950 
Jabuli 72:19 Gipak nyiŋe me deyo-ni nakanaka, wek deyone bene opoŋ lobo woko ducu! Amen ka dok Amen!
Jabuli 72:20 Lega pa Daudi wod pa Yece gugik kany.
Jabuli 73:1 Adada Lubaŋa ber bot dano ma cwmygi anr, en ber bot jo ma cwinygi leŋ.
Jabuli 73:2 Ento an, tyena ogwaŋŋe onoŋo doŋ acok poto tyena onoŋo doŋ cok cer mada.
Jabuli 73:3 Nyeko onoŋo omaka woko i kom jo ma luwakke, dok aneno jo maraco gilony alonya.
Jabuli 73:4 Pe gitye ka winyo kit arem mo liweŋ; komgi yot dok pwot apwota.
Jabuli 73:5 Pe gibedo ka neno can kit ma jo mukene gineno kwede; pe gitye ka keto ayela i komgi macalo giketo i kom jo mukene.
Jabuli 73:6 Pi meno wakke odoko calo gin deyo me ŋutgi; tim bwami bene oboyogi woko calo gubone ki boŋo.
Jabuli 73:7 Waggi nen mupoŋ ki yub me tim maraco, ki cwinygi bene opoŋ ki tam me miŋo keken.
Jabuli 73:8 Giŋalo jo mukene kun giloko lok maraco; giburo dano dok giunogi bene.
Jabuli 73:9 Giloko lok marac i kom Lubaŋa ma tye i polo-ni, lok ma a i doggi romo i lobo woko ducu.
Jabuli 73:10 Pi meno omiyo lwak pa Lubaŋa gibedo ka pakogi; pe gineno bal mo i iwmgi kadi ki acel.
Jabuli 73:11 Giwacci, “Lubaŋa kono twero ŋeyone niŋniŋ? En ŋat Mamalo Twal tye ki kit ŋec mo?”
Jabuli 73:12 Nen, meno aye kit pa jo maraco; kare ducu gilimo lwak jami mapol, dok pud gimedde ameda ki noŋo lonyo makato.
Jabuli 73:13 Abedo ma cwinya leŋ mere noŋo, dok alwoko ciŋa ma pe abalo.
Jabuli 73:14 Gibedo ka keto ayela i koma dyeceŋ jwi, kun gipwoda nino ducu odiko odiko.
Jabuli 73:15 Kono nen aloko lok macalo meno, kono pe abedo ki ada bot yalwak pa litino pa Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 73:16 Ento atemo ki tekka ducu me niaŋ lok man, kadi bed oolo koma twatwal,
Jabuli 73:17 nio ka acito i ot maleŋ pa Lubaŋa; ka doŋ acako niaŋ gin ma bitimme i kom jo maraco.
Jabuli 73:951 
Jabuli 73:18 Ada yam ik etogi i kabedo mapwot ma gicer acera ki iye; imiyo gipoto gitum woko ducu.
