Jabuli 73:19 Ityekogi woko oyotoyot laboŋo galle, irwenyogi woko oyotoyot ki gin maraco ma kelo lworo.
Jabuli 73:20 Jo-nu gibedo macalo lek ma ka ŋat mo oco ki i waŋ nino ci tamo pire; ka doŋ ico, ci calgi rwenyo woko i waŋi ki i tammi.
Jabuli 73:21 I kare ma abedo ki keccwiny, ma cwinya oton adada,
Jabuli 73:22 onoŋo amiŋ dok akwiya piny, alokke adoko macalo lee i komi.
Jabuli 73:23 Ento kare ducu abedo kwedi; in ibedo ka mako ciŋa lacuc bene.
Jabuli 73:24 Itela ki tam ma ibedo ka miya, i agikkibene ibijola ki deyo.
Jabuli 73:25 Gin aŋo mukene ma dok atye kwede i polo, kono in keken? Pe tye gin mo i lobo kany ma amito twatwal makato in.
Jabuli 73:26 Koma ki cwinya twero doko goro, ento Lubaŋa aye miya tekcwiny, dok en aye lonyona ma abigwoko matwal.
Jabuli 73:27 Adada jo ma tye ka mabor kwedi gibito gitum woko; dok ibijwero jo ducu ma pe gigeno in.
Jabuli 73:28 Ento ki tun bota, bedo cok ki Lubaŋa aye ber; in Rwot Lubaŋa aye doŋ idoko kalarrena, wek atit pi tic ducu ma in itiyo.
Jabuli 74:1 Ai Lubaŋa, piŋo ibolowa woko matwal? Piŋo imiyo akemoni duny i kom romini ma in aye ikwayogi?
Jabuli 74:2 Po pi lwakk i ma yam iyerogi cakke wa con, gin jo ma yam ikokogi ki i can wek gubed joni kikome. Po pi got Cion, kabedo ma yam ibedo iye.
Jabuli 74:3 Bin iwot i kabedo man ma doŋ odoko obur matwal-li; lukwor gujwero jami woko ducu ki i kabedoni maleŋi
Jabuli 74:4 Lukworri gudaŋŋe matek ka ma yam jo gucokke iye ka wori; guketo benderagi malo me nyuto ni doŋ odoko megi.
Jabuli 74:5 Gicalo lutoŋ-yat ma i buŋa ma gitye ka toŋo yadi ki latongi.
Jabuli 74:6 Gutoŋo bao iye ducu ma yam gipayo maber, gubaro gubalo woko ki latoŋ ki nyol.
Jabuli 74:7 Gucwinyo ot pa Lubaŋa woko ki mac; gupyedo ot meno maleŋ ka ma yam dano giworo iye nyiŋe, gumuko gureto woko piny.
Jabuli 74:8 Guwacci, “Wabiŋinyo jo-ni watyekogi woko matwal”; guwaŋo kabedo ducu woko liweŋ ki i lobowa ka ma yam lwak cokke iye ka woro Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 74:952 
Jabuli 74:9 Pe doŋ waneno kit lanyut ma yam gimiyowa-ni; pe doŋ tye lanebi mo, pe tye ŋat mo i kinwa ma ŋeyo kare ma can man bitero.
Jabuli 74:10 Ai Lubaŋa, lukworwa mono gibibedo ka ŋalowa pi kare ma rom mene? Lukworwa myero gubed ka yeto nyiŋi nakanaka, Lubaŋa?
Jabuli 74:11 Piŋo idolo ciŋi woko pe ikonyowa? Idolo ciŋi idwoko yo tuŋ ŋeyi piŋo?
Jabuli 74:12 Ento in Lubaŋa, ibedo kabakawa cakke wa con, ibedo ka tiyo ticci me laro dano i wilobo.
Jabuli 74:13 Ipoko dye nam woko ki tekki; inyoto wi megi kulu-gu woko ducu i pii.
Jabuli 74:14 Ininyo wi Leviatan ma min kulu-ni woko ducu, ka imiyo odoko cant pa Lee ma gibedo i tim.
Jabuli 74:15 Iyabo waŋ it, imiyo piine obedo ka gunnye odoko ora, ci imiyo pii otwo woko liweŋ ki i kulu mukene ma yam gimol.
Jabuli 74:16 Dyeceŋ meri ki wor bene meri; in aye iketo ceŋ ki dwe i kabedogi.
Jabuli 74:17 Iketo waŋ apokki ducu me lobo; in bene ma iketo oro ki cwir gubedo tye.
Jabuli 74:18 Ai Rwot, po i kit ma lukworwa giŋali kwede, gin jo ma pe gilwori giyeti noŋo.
Jabuli 74:19 Pe imi joni ma rom ki akuri-ni bot lukwor magi mager-ri ma rom ki lee tim; wii pe myero owil matwal i kom lwakki ma gin lucan-ni.
Jabuli 74:20 Po i kom gicikkeni ma yam icikke kwede ki wan; pien tim bwami tye i kabedo macol ducu ma tye i lobowa-ni.
Jabuli 74:21 Pe iwek lewic omak jo ma doŋ ginyonogi woko piny-nyi; wek lucan ki jo ma piny obwoyogi gupak nyiŋi.
Jabuli 74:22 A malo, ai Lubaŋa, ipid pidoni; po bene kit ma jo ma pe gilwori giŋali kwede dyeceŋ jwi!
Jabuli 74:23 Wii pe owil i kom daŋŋe me kiniga ma lumoneni gidaŋŋe kwede matek-ki, en woo pa gin lukworri ma gimedde kwede ameda ma pe giliŋ-ŋi.
Jabuli 75:1 Wapwoyi, ai Lubaŋa, wapwoyi! Watito pi dit me nyiŋi ki pi tic me aura ducu ma doŋ ityeko tiyogi.
Jabuli 75:2 “Atyeko yero kare me ŋolo kop”, Lubaŋa ma owaco, “abiŋolo kop atir dok kakare.
Jabuli 75:3 Kadi bed lobo oyeŋŋe, kacel ki jo ma bedo iye ducu, ento an abegwoko wir ma lobo ocuŋ iye ducu cuŋ matek kakargi.
Jabuli 75:953 
Jabuli 75:4 Awaco bot luwakke ni, ‘Pe wuwakke’, bot jo maraco bene awacci, ‘Pe wulyerre ma wuwakke awaka.’
Jabuli 75:5 Dok atito botgi ni pe myero gukette kengi malo twatwal, dok bene gugik loko lok anywar woko.”
Jabuli 75:6 Medo rwom pa dano pe bino kun a ki yo tuŋ wokceŋ nyo potoceŋ, kadi ki yo tuŋ tim nyo yo tuŋ godi;
Jabuli 75:7 ento Lubaŋa kene aye ma ŋolo kop pa dano, dwoko ŋat man piny dok tino dano mukene malo.
Jabuli 75:8 Rwot omako kikopo i ciŋe ma opoŋ ki koŋo vino, ma yenyo ayenya ki bwoyo, ma girubo maber; en miyo jo maraco ducu ma tye i lobo gimato, gimato nio waŋ ma gityeko woko ducu.
Jabuli 75:9 Ento an abibedo ki yomcwiny nakanaka, abiwero wer kun apako Lubaŋa pa Yakobo.
Jabuli 75:10 En bityeko twero pa jo maraco woko liweŋ, ento bimedo twero bot jo ma kitgi atir.
Jabuli 76:1 Dano giŋey Lubaŋa maber twatwal i Juda, nyiŋe bene dit i Icrael.
Jabuli 76:2 Giketo kabedone tye i Calem, ki kabedo ma en bedo iye tye i Cion.
Jabuli 76:3 En oturo atero ma lakke wil awila woko ki kunnu, oturo wa kwodigi, pala lucwan ki jami lweny-gu ducu.
Jabuli 76:4 It ye ki deyo makato, ai Lubaŋa, ki dit me loc tye i ciŋi, makato godi ducu ma ri nakanaka.
Jabuli 76:5 Askarigi macir ducu giyako jamigi woko; gitye ka nino nino matut adada; pe tye ŋat mo mudoŋ ki i kin gin lumony ma twero tic ki jami lweny.
Jabuli 76:6 I kare ma ijukogi, ai Lubaŋa pa Yakobo, aguragura ki jo ma ŋweco kwedgi gupoto guwille woko; ducu.
Jabuli 76:7 Ento in, dano lwori matek! Aŋa ma twero cun i nyimi ka onoŋo kiniga doŋ omaki woko?
Jabuli 76:8 In doŋ iŋolo kop woko ki i polo; jo ducu ma bedo i lobo gulworo, omiyo guliŋ mot,
Jabuli 76:9 i kare ma ia malo ka ŋolo kop, pi laro jo ducu ma giunogi i lobo-ni.
Jabuli 76:10 Adada akemo pa dano miyo jo gilokke gidok ka paki; jo mudoŋ ma gubwot ki i lweny ibikelo bedo cok kwedi.
Jabuli 76:954 
Jabuli 76:11 Wukwoŋ kwon bot Rwot Lubaŋawu, dok wucob gin ma wukwoŋo; wek dano ducu ma gibedo cok, i ŋete gukel bote mot; Lubaŋa myero gilwor,
Jabuli 76:12 pien en dwoko rwodi ma luwakke woko piny, dok miyo luker me lobo gibedo ki lworo madwoŋ.
Jabuli 77:1 Akok matek bot Lubaŋa, akok bote, matek, ci en winyo kokona.
Jabuli 77:2 Ayenyo Rwot i kare ma atye ki can; i dyewor ataŋo ciŋa bote kun alego ma pe aol; ento meno ducu mwa, cwinya pe romokwe.
Jabuli 77:3 Aparo pi Lubaŋa kun acur; alwodo lok, dok cwinya oballe woko.
Jabuli 77:4 Pe imiyo nino mako waŋa: atye ki par mapol twatwal omiyo pe atwero loko
Jabuli 77:5 Abedo ka tamo pi kare macon, dok apo i kom lwak mwaka ducu ma okato.
Jabuli 77:6 Abedo ka tamo lam matut ki i cwinya i dyewor; alwodo lok dok apennye kekena ki i cwinya ni,
Jabuli 77:7 “Rwot mono bikwerowa woko matwal? Cwinye doki pe bibedo yom ikomwa?
Jabuli 77:8 En doŋ pe marowa ki mar mere ma pe lokke-ni? Cikkene ducu mono doŋ ogik woko pi kare ducu?
Jabuli 77:9 Lubaŋa mono doŋ wiye owil woko pi nyuto kicane i kom dano? En doŋ mono pe romo timo kica, pi kiniga ma omake?”
Jabuli 77:10 Dok awacci, “Gin ma cwero cwinya makato ducu en ene ni, twero pa en ŋat Mamalo Twal-li doŋ olokke woko.”
Jabuli 77:11 Abipo, Rwot, abipo i kom ticci madit ma itiyo; ada, abipo i kom ticci ducu me aura ma yam itiyo i kare macon.
Jabuli 77:12 Abibedo ka tamo pi gin ducu ma doŋ itimo, dok abilwodo lok i kom ticci madito ducu ma yam itiyo.
Jabuli 77:13 Kit gin ducu ma itiyo leŋ, ai Lubaŋa! Pe tye kit lubaŋa mo madit calo in!
Jabuli 77:14 In keken aye Lubaŋa ma tiyo taŋo me aura; dok inyuto tekki i kin lwak me rok ducu.
Jabuli 77:15 Yam ikoko lwakki ki i can pi tweroni, gin likwayo pa Yakobo ki Yucepu.
Jabuli 77:16 Ka pii me nam oneni, ci obedo ki lworo, ai Lubaŋa, ka oneni obedo ki lworo adada, dok nam matut ducu oyeŋŋe.
Jabuli 77:17 Kot oa ki i pol ocwer i lobo; piny omor ki i pol matek, ci lutkot owil i kabedo ducu.
Jabuli 77:955 
Jabuli 77:18 Dwani omor owinnye wa i yamo lapiru mager; lutkotti bene omeny ocaro lobo woko ducu; lobo oyeŋŋe ki jo ma bedo iye ducu komgi omyel.
Jabuli 77:19 Iwoto ikato ki i dye nam, iŋolo ki i dye nam madoŋo matut; ento ojwe tyeni pe omedo ki nen.
Jabuli 77:20 Itelo wi lwakki macalo lakwat romi, kun imiyo Moses ki Aron me gwokogi.
Jabuli 78:1 Wucik itwu, wuwiny lok ma apwonyowu kwede, wun lwakka; wucik itwu, wuwiny lok ma abecito ka lokone-ni.
Jabuli 78:2 Abiwaco botwu lok i carolok; abitito botwu lok macon me koc lit,
Jabuli 78:3 lok ma wan kikomwa wawinyo dok waŋeyo, ma kwarowa yam gutito botwa.
Jabuli 78:4 Pe wakano lok man bedo me muŋ bot likwayogi, ento wabitito bot yalwak ma lubowa; wabitito bi twero pa Rwot, ki pi tic matego ma en otiyo ducu, ki pi taŋo mapol me aura ma en doŋ otiyo.
Jabuli 78:5 En omiyo lok me caden bot jo Icrael, dok omiyo cik bot likwayo pa Yakobo. En yam omiyo cik bot kwarowa me pwonyo ki litinogi;
Jabuli 78:6 wek yalwak ma lubo i anyim bene guŋe cik magi, gin litino ma yam pud peya ginywalogi, wek gin bene gua gutit lok man bot litinogi.
Jabuli 78:7 Ka guwinyo lok man gugen Lubaŋa, wek wigi pe owil i kom tic ducu pa Lubaŋa, dok bene gugwok cikke ducu.
Jabuli 78:8 Gin pe myero gubed macalo kwarogi, gin yalwak ma cwinygi opoŋ ki jemo, ma pe wuwinyo cik pa Lubaŋa, yalwak ma tamgi pe omoko matek ma pe gigeno Lubaŋa ki cwinygi ducu.
Jabuli 78:9 Jo Epraim ma gulwenyo ki atum ki atero gulokke gudok woko cen i nino me lweny.
Jabuli 78:10 Pe gugwoko gicikkegi ki Lubaŋa, gukwero lubo cikke woko.
Jabuli 78:11 Wigi bene owil woko i kom tic ma yam en otiyo, kadi ki lwak taŋo mapol ma yam onyuto botgi.
Jabuli 78:12 Lubaŋa yam otiyo lwak taŋo me aura ma kwarogi gineno i bar me Joan, i lobo Ejipt,
Jabuli 78:13 Opoko dye nam woko aryo, omiyo gukato ki iye wa loka tuŋ cel, en omiyo pii otiŋŋe malo likuŋ.
Jabuli 78:14 Obedo ka telo wigi ki i dyeceŋ ki pol, ento i dyewor obedo ka telo wigi ki mac ma lyel.
Jabuli 78:956 
Jabuli 78:15 Obaro got i dye tim, omiyo gumato pii madit adada macalo pii ma tye i kut matut.
Jabuli 78:16 Omiyo ora kulu mapol gumol ki i got mubar-ri, omiyo pii ocako mol ki iye cito piny macalo kulu madit.
Jabuli 78:17 Ento pud gumedde ki timo bal i kom Lubaŋa, gujemo woko i kom ŋat Mamalo Twal-li i dye tim.
Jabuli 78:18 Gutemo Lubaŋa i cwinygi kun gilege ni ominigi cam ma igi opukke iye.
Jabuli 78:19 Guloko lok marac i kom Lubaŋa kun giwacci, “Lubaŋa twero yubo meja i dye tim kany?
Jabuli 78:20 Kono ada en obaro got ci pii okatti ki iye, kulu ducu gupoŋ woko libyeny wa i wi tura. En dok twero miyowa cam, nyo twero miyo bene riŋo bot lwakke wek gucam!”
Jabuli 78:21 Pi meno akemo omako Rwot matek i kare ma owinyo lok meno; omiyo olwenyo i kom jo pa Yakobo ki mac, kinigane onya omedde ameda i kom jo Icrael,
Jabuli 78:22 pien pe gubedo ki niye i kome, dok pe gugeno ni en twero larogi.
Jabuli 78:23 En ociko pol ma tye malo, dok oyabo doggola me polo;
Jabuli 78:24 ka doŋ ocako cwalo botgi manna me acama, omiyo botgi kal mua ki i polo.
Jabuli 78:25 Dano gucamo kwon ma lumalaika gicamo; ocwalo botgi cam madwoŋ ata.
Jabuli 78:26 Omiyo yamo ma a tuŋ wokceŋ okodo ki i polo, dok bene otelo yamo ma kodo yo tuŋ acuc ki twerone.
Jabuli 78:27 Ocwalo lwak winyo opye i komgi calo apwa, gipol ma girom ki kweyo ma i dog nam;
Jabuli 78:28 omiyo gupoto woko i dye gonygi, i kabedo ducu ma orumo kemagi.
Jabuli 78:29 Lwak gucamo ci guyeŋ bene matek, pien Lubaŋa doŋ omiyo botgi gin ma igi opukke iye.
Jabuli 78:30 Ento ma pud kec riŋogi tye, ma peya guyeŋ maber, ma onoŋo cam bene pud tye i doggi,
Jabuli 78:31 kiniga omako Lubaŋa matek i komgi, ci oneko jo matego woko ki i kingi, ojwero twoni oteka ma giyerogi ki i kin jo Icrael-li woko.
Jabuli 78:32 Kadi bed kumeno, jo Icrael pud gimedde ameda ki timo bal; kadi bed Lubaŋa otiyo jami taŋo mapol, gin pe guye.
Jabuli 78:33 Pi meno ogiko nino me kwogi woko calo yweyo, ka orwenyo kwogi woko bene ki can madwoŋ ma opoto atura.
Jabuli 78:957 
Jabuli 78:34 Ka oneko jo mogo, jo mudoŋ gilokke giyenye gidwogo bote; giŋut ci giyenyo Lubaŋa ki cwinygi ducu.
Jabuli 78:35 Gucako po ni Lubaŋa aye kalarregi, Lubaŋa Mamalo Twal yam okokogi ki i can.
Jabuli 78:36 Ento gubedo ka bwole abwola ki lok doggi noŋo, lok ducu ma gubedo ka loko bote obedo goba keken.
Jabuli 78:37 Pe gimare ma gimoko i kome ki cwinygi ducu; pe bene gubedo ki ada me gwoko gicikke ma tye i kingi ki Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 78:38 Ento kica omako Lubaŋa i kom lwakke. En oweko balgi, omiyo pe otyekogi woko. Obedo ka juko kinigane pi tyen mapol, pe obedo ka tugo akemone ducu.
Jabuli 78:39 En opo oŋeyo ni gin dano mamwa, gubedo calo yamo ma kodo cito mere matwal ma pe dok dwogo cen.
Jabuli 78:40 Gujemo i kome i tim pi kare mapol; gucwero cwinye i aroo.
Jabuli 78:41 Gubedo ka temo Lubaŋa teretere, gumiyo kiniga omako ŋat Maleŋ pa Icrael.
Jabuli 78:42 Wigi owil woko i kom twerone, kadi i kom nino ma en okokogi kwede ki i ciŋ lukworgi-ni,
Jabuli 78:43 i kare ma en otiyo lanyut me jami taŋo mapol, i bar Joan, i lobo Ejipt.
Jabuli 78:44 Oloko pii ma i kulu pa jo Ejipt ducu odoko remo, wek pe gumat piine ma i ora kulu.
Jabuli 78:45 Ocwalo lwaŋi i kingi ocamogi matek, ocwalo ogwal bene ma obalo lobogi.
Jabuli 78:46 Omiyo okwil ocamo ginapitagi woko, ki camgi ma doŋ guyelle kwede i poto omiyo bonyo ocamo woko ducu.
Jabuli 78:47 Omiyo pee ogoyo olokgi obalo woko, ki yadi olamgi obalo woko ki ŋico.
Jabuli 78:48 Omiyo pee oneko dyaŋigi woko, ki lutkot bene ocelo romigi.
Jabuli 78:49 Obaŋogi woko ki akemone magerri, ki kiniga, mone ki can, kun ocwalo lumalaika me jwerogi woko.
Jabuli 78:50 En pe ojuko kinigane; pe oye laro kwogi ki i to, ento omiyo two gemo onekogi woko.
Jabuli 78:51 Oneko litino kayo ducu ki i Ejipt, ma gin jo ma gukwoŋo nywalo ki tekogi ki i kema pa Kam.
Jabuli 78:52 Ka doŋ otelo wi lwakke okelogi woko macalo lakwat romi, obedo ka telogi kun gwokogi i tim macalo lwak lim
Jabuli 78:53 Otelogi Ki kuc, omiyo pe gubedo ki lworo; ento nam aye omwonyo lukworgi woko.
Jabuli 78:54 Okelogi i lobone maleŋ, i got ma en omayo ki twerone i lweny ma en oloyo.
Jabuli 78:958 
Jabuli 78:55 Oryemo lurok woko ki i nyimgi; opoko dul lobo i kingi ma myero gucam obed megi, ci omiyo jo me kaka pa Icrael ducu gubedo doŋ mot i kemagi.
Jabuli 78:56 Ento gutemo Lubaŋa Mamalo Twal dok gujemo woko i kome, kun pe gilubo lokke me caden,
Jabuli 78:57 gulokke guŋayo waŋe woko macalo yam kwarogi gutimo; guminne woko, gubwole macalo atum ma pe celo atir.
Jabuli 78:58 Gumiyo kiniga omake pi waŋ jogigi ma giketo i wi godi-gu; gumiyo nyeko omake pi callubaŋa ma gupayo.
Jabuli 78:59 Akemo omako Lubaŋa matek i kare ma owinyo lok meno, ci okwero jo Icrael woko marac twatwal.
Jabuli 78:60 En obwoto kemane ma en bedo iye i Cilo-ni woko, ma en aye gaŋ ma en yam bedo iye i kin dano.
Jabuli 78:61 Omiyo canduk me twerone woko wek giter i opii, lanen me deyone omiyo woko bot lumerok.
Jabuli 78:62 Akemo noŋo omake twatwal i kom lwakke, omiyo lukworgi gunekogi woko ki pala lucwan.
Jabuli 78:63 Mac owaŋo awobegi otyekogi woko liweŋ, ki anyiragi bene pe doŋ giwero wer nyommo.
Jabuli 78:64 Gineko ajwagigi woko ki pala lucwan, ci mongi pe gukokogi.
Jabuli 78:65 Lacen Rwot opo litaku calo oco ki i waŋ nino, calo oteka mumer ki koŋo yino ka doŋ daŋŋe.
Jabuli 78:66 Oryemo lukworre gudok cen, dok lewic ma bedo nakanaka opoto i komgi.
Jabuli 78:67 En okwero kema pa Yucepu woko, pe oyero kaka pa Epraim.
Jabuli 78:68 Ento oyero kaka pa Juda, ki got Cion ma en maro-ni.
Jabuli 78:69 Ogero kabedone maleŋ kunnu, calo gaŋŋe ma tye i polo; ocibo ocuŋ matek liliŋ calo lobo, ma en doŋ oketo bedo matwal-li.
Jabuli 78:70 Oyero laticce Daudi, ci okwanye woko ki ka kwayo romi;
Jabuli 78:71 Okwanye okele woko ki ka gwoko megi romi ki litinogi, okete obedo lakwat pa jone Icrael, odoko kabaka pa likwayo pa Yakobo ma lwak pa Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 78:72 Daudi ogwokogi ki leŋcwinye, dok otelogi ki diro mada.
Jabuli 79:959 
Jabuli 79:1 Ai Lubaŋa, lurok gubino gumayo lobo pa lwakki woko; gubalo ot meri maleŋ-ŋi woko; gujwero Jerucalem woko odoŋ obur.
Jabuli 79:2 Gubwoto kom luticci muto me acama pa winyo me polo, dok gubwoto kom joni ma geni bot lee tim wek gucam.
Jabuli 79:3 Guonyo remogi woko macalo gionyo pii, orumo Jerucalem woko, dok dano mo pe odoŋ ma onoŋo myero oyikgi.
Jabuli 79:4 Rok ma gibedo i ŋetwa giloko lok aŋec i komwa, ma giŋalowa dok gijwiyowa.
Jabuli 79:5 Ai Rwot, kiniga bimaki nakanaka? Nyo pi kare ma rom mene? Akemoni ma nyek- ki bimedde kun waŋ macalo mac?
Jabuli 79:6 Kiniga myero omaki i kom rok ma pe giŋeyi, ki i kom ker ducu ma pe gilwoŋo nyiŋi!
Jabuli 79:7 Gutyeko jo pa Yakobo woko, gumiyo lobowa doŋ odoko obur.
Jabuli 79:8 Pe icul kwor i komwa pi bal pa kwarowa; wek kica omaki i komwa oyotoyot, pien piny doŋ obwoyowa woko.
Jabuli 79:9 Konywa, ai Lubaŋa lalarwa, pi deyo me nyiŋi; larwa, dok iwek balwa, wek dano gupak nyiŋi.
Jabuli 79:10 Piŋo lurok myero gupeny ni, “Lubaŋagi tye kwene?” Cul kwor i kom lurok i nyimwa ma waneno pi oyo remo pa luticci!
Jabuli 79:11 Winy cur pa lumabuc; gwok jo ma doŋ giŋolo kop me to i wigi ki tweroni madit- ti!
Jabuli 79:12 Ai Rwot, cul kwor ma romo tyen abiro i kom jo, ma gibedo i ŋetwa pi lok aŋec ma giyeŋ kwede.
Jabuli 79:13 Ci wan lwakki, ma wan romini ma ikwayowa-ni, wabimiyo pwoc boti nakanaka; wabipako nyiŋi nakanaka, wan ki likwayowa ducu.
Jabuli 80:1 Winywa, in lakwat pa jo Icrael, in ma itelo wi jo pa Yucepu macalo itelo wi lwak romi! In ma ibedo i wi komkerri i kom lukerubi, ryeny menypiny
Jabuli 80:2 I nyim kaka pa Epraim, pa Benjamin ki pa Manace! Nyut tekki, ci ibin ilarwa!
Jabuli 80:3 Dwokwa cen boti, ai Lubaŋa; nenwa ki waŋ me kica ci wabilarre!
Jabuli 80:4 Ai Rwot Lubaŋa me mony, ibibedo ki kiniga i kom lega pa lwakki pi kare ma rom mene?
Jabuli 80:5 Imiyo wacamo pig waŋwa macalo wacamo kwon, imiyowa pig waŋ poŋ kikopo madit niwamati.
Jabuli 80:960 
Jabuli 80:6 Imiyo jo ma bedo i ŋetwa doŋ gicayowa marac; ki lukworwa bene ginyerowa anyera i kingi kengi.
Jabuli 80:7 Dwokwa cen boti, ai Lubaŋa; nenwa ki wan me kica ci wabilarre!
Jabuli 80:8 In aye ma yam ikelo tyen olok ki i Ejipt; ka iryemo lurok woko ki, i lobogi ci ipito iye olokki.
Jabuli 80:9 Ipurokakare woko maber, ci oroyo Lwite odonyo matut i ŋom, omiyo odoŋo oumo lobo woko ducu.
Jabuli 80:10 Tipone oumo godi woko ducu, oumo bene wa yadi cedar madito ki jaŋe-gu.
Jabuli 80:11 Jaŋe ojany oo wa i nam, ki pote ma pud lot alota oo wa i kulu Euprate.
Jabuli 80:12 Piŋo imuko cel marumo-gu woko, iweko jo ducu ma kato ki kenyo gupwono nyige?
Jabuli 80:13 Opego ma gibedo i buŋa ginyono woko piny, ki lee tim ducu gicamo.
Jabuli 80:14 Lokke idwog botwa, ai Lubaŋa me mony! Nen piny ki i polo ci inenwa; bed ki tam i kom olok man,
Jabuli 80:15 bin ilar tyen olok man ma in aye ipiro-ni.
Jabuli 80:16 Gutyeko waŋone woko ki, mac, dok bene gutoŋo gureto woko piny; nengi ki kiniga ityekgi woko!
Jabuli 80:17 Ket ciŋi i kom dano ma tye i ŋeti tuŋ lacuc, en dano ma imiyo odoŋo odoko matek-ki!
Jabuli 80:18 Pe doki wabilokke-wabwoto in; gwokwa wabed kwo, ci wabipako nyiŋi.
Jabuli 80:19 Dwokwa cen boti, ai Rwot Lubaŋa memony, nenwa ki waŋ me kica ci wabilarre!
Jabuli 81:1 Wuwer wer ki dwan maloŋo bot Lubaŋa ma en tekwa; wuwer wer me pak ki yomcwiny bot Lubaŋa pa Yakobo!
Jabuli 81:2 Wuwer ci wugo ajaa-gu bene, wugo ki opuk ki naŋa-gu.
Jabuli 81:3 Wukut tum i kare ma dwe pud opor apora, dok ka doŋ ogudo got, ki i ninowa madit.
Jabuli 81:4 Pien man obedo cik i Icrael, gin ma Lubaŋa pa Yakobo yam ociko.
Jabuli 81:5 En oketo cik man i kaka pa Yucepu, i kare ma en owoto ocito ka lewny i kom lobo Ejipt. Awinyo dwan ma yam oc aneyo, ma wacci
Jabuli 81:6 “Atiŋo yec mapek woko ki i gwoki; amiyo iketo aduku woko piny.
Jabuli 81:961 
Jabuli 81:7 Ikok bota i kare ma it ye i can, ci alari; agamo dogi ki mor piny ki i kabedo me muŋ ma akanne iye, atemi bene i ŋet pii me Meriba.
Jabuli 81:8 Wuwiny, wun jona, ka ajukowu; wun jo Icrael, amito ni wuwiny gin ma awacowu-nil
Jabuli 81:9 Pe myero ginoŋ i kinwu kit lubaŋa mo ma pe ŋene, pe wuryebbe piny ka woro lubaŋa pa lurok.
Jabuli 81:10 An a Rwot Lubaŋawu, ma akwanyowu, akelowu woko ki i lobo Ejipt. Wuŋam dogwu malac, ci abipitowu ki cam.
Jabuli 81:11 “Ento jona pe guwinyo lok ma yam aloko botgi; ro Icrael onoŋo doŋ pe gitwero lubo cikka kadi ki acel.
Jabuli 81:12 Pi meno omiyo awekogi woko pi tek wigi, wek guti gin ma cwinygi mito.
Jabuli 81:13 Kono nene jona guwinyo lokka, kono jo Icrael gulubo cikka!
Jabuli 81:14 Onoŋo kono aloyo lukworgi woko oyotoyot, kono aryeyo ciŋa atayo lumerokgi woko ducu.
Jabuli 81:15 Onoŋo kono jo ma daga gimwolle amwola i nyima, dok can ma bipoto i komgi kono obedo matwal.
Jabuli 81:16 Onoŋo atwero pitowu ki ŋano maber twatwal, dok onoŋo atwero miyo wuyeŋ ki moo kic ma tye im got.”
Jabuli 82:1 Lubaŋa doŋ obedo i wi komme i kacokke i wi polo, ci ŋolo kop i dye lwak lubaŋa ma gugurre, kun wacci,
Jabuli 82:2 “Pe wubiŋolo kop kakare pi kare ma rom mene, kun wudworo kor jo maraco?
Jabuli 82:3 Wuŋol kop pa lugoro ki pa jo ma wongi pe; wutim jo ma tre ki can ki jo ma doŋ piny obwoyogi adada muporo kwogi.
Jabuli 82:4 Wular lugoro ki jo ma piny obwoyogi; wulargi ki i ciŋ jo maraco.”
Jabuli 82:5 Pe gitye ki ŋec, dok niaŋ mo bene pe, giwoto megi ata i colpiny; te guti me lobo ducu tye ka yeŋŋe.
Jabuli 82:6 Awacci, “Wun wubedo lubaŋa, wun ducu litino pa ŋat Mamalo Twa!
Jabuli 82:7 Kadi bed kumeno, wubito macalo dano, dok bene wubipoto macalo rwot mo keken.”
Jabuli 82:8 A malo, ai Lubaŋa, iŋol kop i kom lobo; rok ducu ma i wi lobo-ni meri.
Jabuli 83:962  Lega pi tyeko lukwor pa jo Icrael woko
Jabuli 83:1 Ai Lubaŋa, pe iliŋ; pe ibed mot ki kuc ma iliŋ woko, ai Lubaŋa!
Jabuli 83:2 Nen lukworri gitye ka timo gin marac; jo ma gidagi-ni doŋ gujemo woko.
Jabuli 83:3 Gitye ka yubo yub mogo i muŋ i kom lwakki; gicokke kacel giporo lok i kom joni ma doŋ igwokogi woko-ni.
Jabuli 83:4 Giwacci, “Wubin, wek watyek rokgi woko; wek pe doŋ gipo pi nyiŋ Icrael matwal!”
Jabuli 83:5 Iyo, gin ducu gipiro lok ki cwiny acel; dok bene giketo gicikke i kingi me lweny i komi.
Jabuli 83:6 Gin jo Edom, ki jo Icmael, jo Moab ki jo Agri,
Jabuli 83:7 jo Gebal, jo Ammon ki jo Amalek, jo Piliciti ki jo ma gibedo i Turo.
Jabuli 83:8 Jo Aciria bene onoŋo guribbe kwedgi; gin aye dul mony matek pa likwayo pa Lot.
Jabuli 83:9 Tim gin ma itimo i kom jo Midian-ni i komgi, macalo itimo i kom Cicera ki Jabin i dog kulu Kicon,
Jabuli 83:10 ma gityekogi woko i En-dor, ma gudoko macalo cet dyaŋ ma gionyo i poto.
Jabuli 83:11 Mi luditogi me awora gubed calo Oreb ki Jeeb, dok ilo rwodigi woko macalo iloyo Jeba ki Jalmuna;
Jabuli 83:12 ma guwacci “Wek wakwanyu obed piwa kenwa, en olet pa Lubaŋa-ni.”
Jabuli 83:13 Ai Lubaŋana, mi gubed macalo apwa ma yamo lapiru kolo, calo cuŋ kaŋ ma yamo tero.
Jabuli 83:14 Kit macalo mac waŋo kwede buŋa, dok macalo leb mac ma tye ka lyel i wi godi,
Jabuli 83:15 in bene ibiryemogi ki yamo matek gicito woko kit meno, ci ibimiyo yamo lapiru mager kodo miyogi lworo ki myelkom.
Jabuli 83:16 Mi lewic omakgi, ai Rwot; wek gulokke guyenyi ci guti boti.
Jabuli 83:17 Wek giket lewic i komgi dok omi cwinygi oballe woko, wek guto i can ki lewic madwoŋ.
Jabuli 83:18 Wek guŋe ni, in keni aye ma nyiŋi Rwot, in aye ŋat Mamalo Twal ma loyo wi lobo-ni ducu.
Jabuli 84:1 Odi ber twatwal ar Rwot me mony!
Jabuli 84:963 
Jabuli 84:2 Cwinya mito mada ni abed kunnu, dok olwoko pi donyo ka bedo i dyekal pa Rwot. Awero wer mepako Lubaŋa makwo ki yomcwiny madwoŋ kun amiyo iye kwona ducu.
Jabuli 84:3 Kadi ki lakalagwec bene tye ki ode, ki aliboro bene tye ki ode ka ma en buto iye, en ka ma etwero bolo iye toŋe, ma cok ki keno tyerri, ai Rwot me mony, kabakana ma Lubaŋana.
Jabuli 84:4 Jo ma bedo i odi gitye ki gum, ma gibedo ka wero wer kun gipaki, kare ducu!
Jabuli 84:5 Jo ma gigeno tek ma tye boti gitye ki gum, gin jo ma tye ki cwiny me cito wa i Cion.
Jabuli 84:6 I kare ma giwok i nota me Baka mutwo-ni, gimiyo doko waŋ it; kot me poto kot bene cwer iye miyo pii poŋ i kabedo ducu.
Jabuli 84:7 Gimedde gidoko tek i kare ma giwoto; Lubaŋa ma loyo lwak lubaŋa ducu binen i Cion.
Jabuli 84:8 Winy legana, ai Rwot Lubaŋa me mony; cik iti iwiny, ai Lubaŋa pa Yakobo!
Jabuli 84:9 In aye i kwotwa, ai Lubaŋa; nen danoni ma giwiro ma in aye iyero!
Jabuli 84:10 Bedo i dyekalli pi nino acel keken ber kato bedo ka mukene pi nino alip. Twora abedo lagwok doggola ot pa Rwot, kato ma abedo i kema ka ma tim maraco tye iye.
Jabuli 84:11 Rwot Lubaŋa aye cen mewa dok kwotwa; en onyo kicane i komwa dok miyo wabedo ki deyo. Rwot pe, twono dano ma gilube ma cwinygi Ien, ki gin mo maber.
Jabuli 84:12 Ai Rwot me mony, dano ma geno in tye ki gum madwoŋ!
Jabuli 85:1 Rwot, yam ibedo ki kica i kom loboni, idwoko gum i kom jo pa Yakobo.
Jabuli 85:2 Yam iweko bal pa lwakki, dok itimogi kica i kom roc ducu ma gutiyo.
Jabuli 85:3 Yam idwoko akemoni woko cwinyi, ilokke ibwoto kinigani malyet-ti.
Jabuli 85:4 Dwokwa cen boti, ai Lubaŋa lalarwa, cwinyi pe myero doŋ obed ka waŋ i komwa!
Jabuli 85:5 Kiniga mono bimaki i komwa matwal? Ibimedo kinigani bedo i kom yalwak ducu?
Jabuli 85:6 Pe ibidwoko cwinywa i komi doki aye, wek wan lwakki wabed ki yomcwiny piri?
Jabuli 85:7 Ai Rwot, nyut botwa mar meri ma pe lokke, dok imiwa larri.
Jabuli 85:964 
Jabuli 85:8 Wek awiny gin ma Rwot Lubaŋa biloko. Biloko lok me kuc bot lwakke, bot jone ma gene, ma gilokke ki i cwinygi gidwogo bote.
Jabuli 85:9 Adada, en tye oyubbe pi laro jo ma lwore, wek deyo obed i lobowa.
Jabuli 85:10 Mar ma pe lokke ki gen gibiribbe kacel, kit ma atir ki kuc bene gibirwatte.
Jabuli 85:11 Gen bia ki i lobo doŋo malo, kit ma atir bene bineno piny ki i polo.
Jabuli 85:12 Iyo, Rwot bimiyo botwa gin maber, ki lobowa bene biceko cam madwoŋ.
Jabuli 85:13 Kh ma atir bitelo nyim Rwot, dok biyubo yo ma en biwoto iye.
Jabuli 86:1 Winy legana, ai Rwot, dok igam doga, pien an lacan, piny bene obwoya woko.
Jabuli 86:2 Lar kwona ki i to, pien atye ki mar me ada i komi, lara, pien an laticci dok ageno in.
Jabuli 86:3 In Lubaŋana, pi meno bed ki kica i koma, ai Rwot, akok boti dyeceŋ jwi.
Jabuli 86:4 Mi cwiny laticci obed yom, ai Rwot, pien legana cito malo boti kun amiyi tipona ducu.
Jabuli 86:5 Ai Rwot, in iber dok iweko bal pa dano, dok mar meri ma pe lokke dwoŋ pi jo ducu ma kok boti.
Jabuli 86:6 Cik iti iwiny legana, ai Rwot; winy kokona ma abako kwede doga boti.
Jabuli 86:7 I kare ma atye i can akok boti, pien igamo doga.
Jabuli 86:8 Pe tye lubaŋa mo i kin lubaŋa mukene-gu macalo in, dok pe tye kit tic mo ma rom ki ticci.
Jabuli 86:9 Rok ducu ma iketogi gibibino gibiryebbe piny i nyimi, ai Rwot, ci gibipako nyiŋi.
Jabuli 86:10 In i dit dok itiyo jami taŋo me aura mapol, in Lubaŋa keni.
Jabuli 86:11 Pwonya ki cikki ai Rwot, wek alub adani; mi abed ki cwiny acel me lworo in.
Jabuli 86:12 Amiyo pwoc boti ki cwinya ducu, ai Rwot Lubaŋana, abibedo ka miyo deyo boti kun atuco nyiŋi nakanaka.
Jabuli 86:13 Mar meri ma pe lokke dit twatwal i koma, in aye ma ilara ma onoŋo atye ka matut i te bur lyel.
Jabuli 86:14 Ai Lubaŋa, jo ma lunywar guero lweny i koma; dul pa jo ma lubwami gimito neka woko, kun bene pe giketi anyim me telogi i gin ducu.
Jabuli 86:15 Ento in, ai Rwot, in Lubaŋa ma lakica dok imaro dano, kiniga pe maki oyot, dok mar meri ma pe lokke, ki genni, dwoŋ.
Jabuli 86:965 
Jabuli 86:16 Lokke inena ci kica omaki i koma; miya tek dok ilara, pien atiyo boti, kit macalo yam maa otiyo kwede boti.
Jabuli 86:17 Nyutta lanyut ma tito berri bota, ai Rwot, wek lewic omak jo ma gidaga ka gibineno ni in doŋ ityeko kweyo cwinya dok ikonya.
Jabuli 87:1 Rwot ogero gaŋŋe i wi got maleŋ;
Jabuli 87:2 en maro dog gaŋ me Cion makato kabedo mukene ducu ma jo pa Yakobo gibedo iye.
Jabuli 87:3 Winy, in gaŋ pa Lubaŋa, lok me aura me deyo-gu ma gitye ka lokone i komi.
Jabuli 87:4 I kin jo ma ŋeya abituco nyiŋ Rakab ki Babilon; dok abiloko i kom Piliciti, Turo ki Etiopia. Giwacci, “Ŋadi ginywalo ki kunnu.”
Jabuli 87:5 I kom Cion gibiwaco ni;: “Dano man ki maca ducu ginywalogi iye”; pien ŋat Mamalo Twal aye bimiyo Cron cuŋ likiŋ.
Jabuli 87:6 Rwot bicoyo nyiŋ rok woko ducu ki kore, kun coyo ni, “Man, ginywalo kunnu. Man ginywale-kunnu.”
Jabuli 87:7 Luwer ki lumyel ducu giwaco ni, “Waŋ it mera ducu tye i in.”
Jabuli 88:1 Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, akok: dyeceŋ jwi pi kony; kadi i dyewor bene akok boti.
Jabuli 88:2 Winy legana, cik iti iwiny kokona!
Jabuli 88:3 Lwak can mapol opoto i koma, omiyo kwona doŋ onyiko cok ki to.
Jabuli 88:4 An doŋ gikwana i kin jo ma gicok to, ma gibidonyo piny-i bur; tekona ducu otum woko.
Jabuli 88:5 Acalo ŋat mo ma gibwoto i kin jo muto; adoko calo jo ina ginekogi ma doŋ gibuto ilyelgi, calo jo ma wii doŋ pe PO i komgi matwal, ma doŋ gitye ka mabor ma pe iromo konyogi.
Jabuli 88:6 In doŋ ityeko bola woko i te bur ka matut, ka macol dok matut adada.
Jabuli 88:7 Akemoni tye mapek i koma, imiyo amwony woko i biamwonyi me akemoni boti
Jabuli 88:8 Imiyo lurema gutenya woko liyak; imiyo adoko gin malik botgi. Giloro wiya woko i ot ma pe atwero lwi akato ka mo;
Jabuli 88:9 waŋa doŋ ocido woko pi cwercwiny. Ai Rwot, akok boti nino ducu; alegi kun ataŋo ciŋa boti.
Jabuli 88:966 
Jabuli 88:10 In mono itiyo taŋo pi jo muto? Tipogi mono gra malo ka paki?
Jabuli 88:11 Tika gitito pi mar meri ma pe lokke wa i lyel, kadi ki pi genni bene gibitito i lobo pa jo muto?
Jabuli 88:12 Taŋo me aura ma itiyo-gu ducu nen kunnu i kabedo macol-li, nyo kony me larri binen i lobo me wil-wic?
Jabuli 88:13 Ai Rwot akok boti pi kony, odiko odiko ducu akelo legana i nyimi.
Jabuli 88:14 Ai Rwpt, piŋo ibola woko? Piŋo ikanne woko ki bota?
Jabuli 88:15 Cakke ma pud atidi abedo ki arem madwoŋ ma, onoŋo doŋ acok to; abedo ka ciro tim maitimo i koma ma kelo lworo, koma doŋ oloc woko.
Jabuli 88:16 Akemoni ouma woko lipuk; lwennyi i koma ma miyo lworo otyelca woko.
Jabuli 88:17 Akemoni ki Lwennyi giruma woko dyere dyeceŋ jwi calo lalele me pii, ma giuma woko lipuk tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi.
Jabuli 88:18 Imiyo lurema ma cok kweda ma amaro ducu gutenya woko liyak; luwota doŋ gin jo ma tye i colpiny.
Jabuli 89:1 Ai Rwot, abiwero wer nakanaka pi mar meri ma pe lokke; abituco pi genni ki doga bot jo me yalwak ducu.
Jabuli 89:2 Aŋeyo ni mar meri ma pe lokke bedo matwal, genni bene tye ocuŋ woko likiŋ calo polo.
Jabuli 89:3 Iwacci, “Doŋ aketo gicikke ki dano ma ayero, akwoŋo kwoŋ bot laticca Daudi ni,
Jabuli 89:4 ‘Abimoko likwayi gibedo matwal, dok abiketo komkerri cuŋ pi kare pa yalwak ducu.’ ”
Jabuli 89:5 Ai Rwot, wek lwak ma i polo gupaki pi taŋo me aura ma doŋ ityeko tiyogi-ni, wek guwer bene pi genni i cokke pa joni maleŋ!
Jabuli 89:6 Pe tye ŋat mo i polo ma gitwero poro ki Rwot; pe tye mo kadi acel i kin lwak me polo ma rom kwedi, Rwot.
Jabuli 89:7 In aye Lubaŋa ma gilworo i cokke pa jo maleŋ, in idit dok iger iloyo jo ducu ma gurumi woko-ni.
Jabuli 89:8 Ai Rwot Lubaŋa me mony, aŋa ma tek calo in? In lagen ijami ducu, ai Rwot.
Jabuli 89:9 Iloyo wa biamwonyi me nam ma twagge; ka biamwonyine otwagge, ikweyogi woko cut.
Jabuli 89:10 Inyono Rakab piny ineko woko calo inyono geŋ lee muto, ikeyo lukworri woko ducu pi tek me badi.
Jabuli 89:967 
Jabuli 89:11 Polo ki lobo ducu meri; lobo ki jami ducu ma tye iye in aye ma iketogi.
Jabuli 89:12 In aye ma iketo lobo ma tuŋ acam ki ma tuŋ acuc; got Tabor ki got Kermon gipako nyiŋi ki yomcwiny madwoŋ.
Jabuli 89:13 It ye ki twero madit mada; tekki dwoŋ, ciŋa ma lacuc oille malo.
Jabuli 89:14 Icibo komkerri i kom kit ma atir ki ŋolo kop kakare; mar ma pe lokke, ki gen, tye i gin ducu ma itiyo.
Jabuli 89:15 Gitye ki gum jo ma giwori kun giwero boti wer ki dwan maloŋo, ma giwoto i ceŋ me kicani, ai Rwot.
Jabuli 89:16 Gibedo ki yomcwiny piri dyeceŋ jwi, ma gidwori pi kiti muporre.
Jabuli 89:17 In aye ma imiyogi tek miyo gibedo ki deyo; pi berri botwa miyo tekwa bene tiŋŋe malo.
Jabuli 89:18 In aye i kwot ma gwokowa, ai Rwot; in ŋat Maleŋ pa Icrael imiyo botwa kabaka.
Jabuli 89:19 Yam con iloko ki laticci ma lagen i lek, kun iwacci, “Aketo lalukana i kom dano ma tye ki tek, amiyo ŋat ma ayero ki i kin lwak obedo i wi komker.
Jabuli 89:20 Ayero laticca Daudi, awire kimoona maleŋ, aketo obedo kabakawu.
Jabuli 89:21 Tekka bibedo bote kare oucu, twerona bimiyo en bedo tek.
Jabuli 89:22 Lukworre pe gibibwole, dok jo maraco pe gibiloye bene.
Jabuli 89:23 Abinyono lukworre woko piny ki i nyime, dok aneko jo ma dage woko liweŋ.
Jabuli 89:24 Abibedo kwede ki gen kun amare ki mar mera ma pe lokke, dok abimiye tek me loyo lukworre pi nyiŋa.
Jabuli 89:25 Abimedo kerre nia ki i nam madit nio wa i kulu Euprate.
Jabuli 89:26 En bilwoŋa ni, ‘In i Wora, ki Lubaŋana; in aye Got me kalarrena.’
Jabuli 89:27 Abiloko en bedo latin kayo, kabaka madit makato luker ducu ma i wi lobo-ni.
Jabuli 89:28 Abigwoko mar mera ma pe lokke nakanaka pire, dok gicikkena pire bicuŋ likiŋ.
Jabuli 89:29 Abimiyo lakwarre bedo kabaka kare ducu; dok abimoko komkerre bedo matwal macalo pol.
Jabuli 89:30 “Ka ce likwaye gibibwoto cikka, ma gibedo kun pe gilubo gin ma aciko;
Jabuli 89:31 ka ce guturo cikka ma pe gilubo cik ma amiyogi,
Jabuli 89:32 ci abipwodogi ki odoo pi balgi; can madwoŋ adada bipoto i komgi pi balgi.
Jabuli 89:33 Ento pe abikwanyo mar mera ma pe lokke woko ki i kome, pe abibwoto adana me kwanyo genna woko ki i kome.
Jabuli 89:34 Pe abituro gicikkena, nyo kadi loko kit lok ma yam doŋ atyeko lokone.
Jabuli 89:968 
Jabuli 89:35 “Doŋ akwoŋo kwon kicel ma bedo matwal ki nyina maleŋ; pe abiloko lok goba bot Daudi.
Jabuli 89:36 Kare ducu Likwaye bibedo tye, dok abigwoko kerre bedo nakanaka calo ceŋ ma ryeny i nyima.
Jabuli 89:37 Bibedo nakanaka ma omoko woko likiŋ calo dwe ma tye i kabedone, bicuŋ woko matek likiŋ calo polo ma oyarre malo.”
Jabuli 89:38 Ento kombeddi kiniga omaki i kom kabaka ma in aye iwiro ki moo; doŋ itenye woko liyak dok ikwere woko adada.
Jabuli 89:39 Ityeko weko gicikkeni woko ki laticci, ibolo lalukanane i apwa ibalo woko.
Jabuli 89:40 Ityeko muko cel me gaŋŋe woko ducu; cel gogone-gu ducu doŋ ireto woko piny odoko obur.
Jabuli 89:41 Jo ma giwok ki i ŋete giyako jamine; doŋ odoko gin me aŋala bot luwote ma gibedo cok kwede.
Jabuli 89:42 In doŋ imiyo loc woko bot lumonene; imiyo gin ducu gubedo ki yomcwiny.
Jabuli 89:43 Iyo, iloko lak pala lucwanne odoko gin ma konnye pe, imiyo giloye woko i lewny.
Jabuli 89:44 Ikwanyo odoo kerre woko ki i ciŋe, ka ikwanyo komkerre ituro ibolo woko piny i nom.
Jabuli 89:45 Imiyo oteggi oti woko ma pud en tidi, ci ileyo wiye woko.
Jabuli 89:46 Ai Rwot, ibikanne woko matwal? Nyo pi kare ma rom mene? Dok akemoni bibedo ka waŋ calo mac pi kare ma rom mene?
Jabuli 89:47 Ai Rwot, po i kom kit ma kare me kwo pa dano nok kwede, dok ipo ni dano ma iketo-gu ducu mwa!
Jabuli 89:48 Aŋa ma twero bedo kun pe to? Dok aŋa ma twero larre kene ki i twer me Lyel?
Jabuli 89:49 Rwot, tic ducu ma yam itiyo, ki mar meri ma pe lokke-ni, doŋ gitye kwene? Genni ma ikwoŋo kwede kwon bot Daudi-ni kono tye kwene?
Jabuli 89:50 Ai Rwot, po i koma an laticci, nen kit maginala kwede. Nen kit ma atye ka ciro kwede yet pa lwak me rok ducu.
Jabuli 89:51 Ai Rwot, nen kit ma lukworri giloko kwede lok aŋec, kun bene giŋalo dano ma in aye iwiro ki moo i kabedo ducu ma en woto iye.
Jabuli 89:52 Gipwo Rwot nakanaka! Amen dok Amen!
Jabuli 90:969 
Jabuli 90:1 Rwot, in aye ibedo kalarrewa ma con ki con.
Jabuli 90:2 In Lubaŋa ma bedo nakanaka; ma pud peya iketo godi ki lobo, onoŋo in doŋ it ye.
Jabuli 90:3 Iloko dano doko apwa, kun iwacci, “Wudok cen, wun litino pa dano!”
Jabuli 90:4 Mwaka alip kulu ki boti rom ki nino ma okato laworo; nyo rom ki cawa acel ma i dyewor.
Jabuli 90:5 Ijwero dano woko, gikato calo lek, gicalo lum ma lot odiko.
Jabuli 90:6 Odiko lot, doŋo; otyeno ner, ci two woko.
Jabuli 90:7 Akemoni otyekowa woko; kinigani omiyowa lworo madwoŋ.
Jabuli 90:8 Ityeko keto gin marac ma watimo ducu i nyimi, wa balwa ma watimo i muŋ ducu onen i waŋi ka maleŋ.
Jabuli 90:9 Kare me kwowa kato akata i te akemoni, mwakawa tum woko i kare manok twatwal.
Jabuli 90:10 Kare me kwowa romo mwaka pyerabiro, nyo pyeraboro ka komwa yot; ento gin ducu kelo can ki ayelayela keken, pien gikato oyot, waŋ bene warwenyo woko.
Jabuli 90:11 Aŋa ma paro pi tek me akemoni, ki pi lworo ma kinigani kelo?
Jabuli 90:12 Pwonywa me kwano nino me kwowa, wek wabed ki cwiny me ryeko.
Jabuli 90:13 Lok cwinyi, ai Rwot! Imito wanen can pi kare ma rom mene? Wek kica omaki i kom luticci!
Jabuli 90:14 Kwe cwinywa odiko ki mar meri ma pe lokke, wek wawer wer wabed ki yomcwiny pi kare me kwo mewa ducu.
Jabuli 90:15 Miwa yomcwiny pi kare ma rom ki nino ma imiyowa iye can; ma rom bene ki mwaka ma walimo iye ayelayela.
Jabuli 90:16 Wek wan luticci wanen tic meri, wek deyo me tek meri onen bot litinowa.
Jabuli 90:17 Rwot Lubaŋawa, wek gum meri obed i komwa; mok ticwa ducu ma watiyo wek obed maber! Iyo mok tic mewa ducu ma watiyo wek obed maber!
Jabuli 91:1 Dano ma bedo i kakanne pa En Mamalo Twal, ki ma bedo i te gwok pa Won Twer Ducu,
Jabuli 91:2 biwaco bot Rwot ni, “In kalarrena ki cella, in Lubaŋana ma ageno.”
Jabuli 91:3 En aye ma bilari ki i owic pa ladwar, ki i two gemo marac ma neko dano.
Jabuli 91:970 
Jabuli 91:4 En biumi ki bwome, ibiriŋo ka larre i te bwome, adane en kwot ki gin ma geŋo kori.
Jabuli 91:5 Pe ibilworo gin marac i dyewor, nyo kadi atero ma gicelo dyeceŋ,
Jabuli 91:6 kadi two gemo ma neko dano atura i colpiny, nyo can ma poto nekogi i dyeceŋ.
Jabuli 91:7 Jo alip apar gitwero to ka ŋeti, ki jo alip i tuŋ ciŋi ma lacuc; ento gin mo pe bigudo komi.
Jabuli 91:8 Ibibedo caden keken, ibineno kwor ma giculo i kom lutim maraco ki waŋi.
Jabuli 91:9 Inoŋo Rwot doŋ odoko kalarreni, En Mamalo Twal doŋ odoko kabedoni.
Jabuli 91:10 Can mo pe bipoto i komi, kit gemo mo bene pe bibino cok ki kemani.
Jabuli 91:11 Lubaŋa biciko lumalaikane piri me gwoki ka ma iwoto iye ducu.
Jabuli 91:12 Gibijoli ki ciŋgi, wek pe iyok tyeni i kom got.
Jabuli 91:13 Ibinyono labwor ki ororo, ibitoro latin labwor ki twol piny i nom ki tyeni.
Jabuli 91:14 Kit macalo en onyuto marre i koma, abilare; abigwoke, pien en ŋeya.
Jabuli 91:15 Ka okok bota, abigamo doge; abibedo kwede i kare me ayelayela, abilare dok abiketo deyo i kome.
Jabuli 91:16 Abikweyo cwinye kun amiye eri i lobo pi mwaka mapol, abimiyo en ŋeyo ni an lalar dano.
Jabuli 92:1 Miyo pwoc bot Rwot en gin maber, wero wer me pako nyiŋi bene en gin maber, ai In Mamalo Twal.
Jabuli 92:2 Tuco mar meri ma pe-lokke odiko, ki nyuto adani otyeno bene ber,
Jabuli 92:3 kun gigoyo naŋa ki gitta, ma gilubo dwan opuk bene.
Jabuli 92:4 Pien in, ai Rwot, pi ticci me aura ma itiyo omiya yomcwiny, pi tic ma itiyo miyo awero wer ki yomcwiny.
Jabuli 92:5 Ticci dit tom mene, ai Rwot! Dok tammi tut rom mene!
Jabuli 92:6 Dano ma lamiŋ pe twero ŋeyo lok man, dano ma wiye odiŋ pe twero niaŋ i kom lok man, ni,
Jabuli 92:7 kadi lubal gidoŋo macalo lum, dok kadi lutim maraco gibedo ki kwo maber, ento gibityekogi woko matwal.
Jabuli 92:8 Ento in, ai Rwot, ibedo dit nakanaka.
Jabuli 92:971 
Jabuli 92:9 Lumerokki, ai Rwot, ada gibinekogi woko liweŋ, jo ducu ma gin lutim maraco gibiketogi woko ata.
Jabuli 92:10 Imiyo adoko tek macalo jubi ma i tim, ityeko wira woko ki moo manyen.
Jabuli 92:11 Atyeko neno can ma poto i kom lukworra ki waŋa, dok atyeko winyo ki ita kit ma giloyo kwede jo maraco ma onoŋo gutiŋŋe i koma.
Jabuli 92:12 Jo ma kitgi atir gidoŋo calo yadi otit, gidoŋo maboco calo yadi cedar me Lebanon.
Jabuli 92:13 Gipitogi i ot pa Rwot, gituru i dyekal me ot pa Lubaŋawa.
Jabuli 92:14 Kadi guti ento pud gibinyak, piggi bibedo dwoŋ miyo pe gibiner.
Jabuli 92:15 Man binyuto ni Rwot cwinye atir en gotta ma pe tiyo gin mo marac.
Jabuli 93:1 Rwot tye ka loc, orukke ki deyo me twer; Rwot orukke, ma otweyo pyere ki tek. Iyo, lobo doŋ ocuŋ matek, pe giromo dirone;
Jabuli 93:2 komkerri omoko matek; nia wa con onoŋo in doŋ it ye.
Jabuli 93:3 Lalele doŋ otyeko mor, ai Rwot, lalele otyeko mor; lalele medde ki mol liwolwol.
Jabuli 93:4 Rwot dit kato mor me pii madwoij, tye ki twer me: deyo ma kato biamwonyi me nam. Rwot ma bedo i polo tye ki deyo.
Jabuli 93:5 Cikki obedo me ada, ai Rwot: odi myero obed maleŋ nakanaka.
Jabuli 94:1 Ai Rwot, in Lubaŋa ma lacul kwor, in Lubaŋa ma lacul kwor, ryeny imeny piny.
Jabuli 94:2 A malo, in laŋolkop me lobo; cul kwor i kom jo ma wakke muporo timgi.
Jabuli 94:3 Jo maraco gibilyerre pi kare ma rom mene, pi kare ma rom mene, ai Rwot?
Jabuli 94:4 Giloko lok me cac ki wakke, lutim maraco ducu gin jo ma luwakke.
Jabuli 94:5 Giŋinyo joni woko, ai Rwot, gibalo joni kikomi.
Jabuli 94:6 Gineko mon to ki jo ma gin lubedo, gineko wa litinokic-gu.
Jabuli 94:7 Giwaco ni, “Rwot pe neno; Lubaŋa pa Yakobo pe keto cwinye iye.”
Jabuli 94:8 Wuniaŋ, wun jo ma wiwu pe tiyo! Wun lumiŋ mono wubidoko ryek awene?
Jabuli 94:9 En ŋat muketo it mono pe winyo? En Ŋat mucweyo waŋ kono pe neno?
Jabuli 94:972 
Jabuli 94:10 En ma pwodo lurok, pe bipwodowu? En ma pwonyo dano ki ryeko, pe ŋeyo gin mo?
Jabuli 94:11 Rwot ŋeyo tam pa dano, ni gicalo alur dog me yweyo keken.
Jabuli 94:12 Dano ma in itiro tye ki gum, ai Rwot, dano ma ipwonyo ki lok me cikki,
Jabuli 94:13 wek oywe i kare me can, nio waŋ ma gikwinyo bur pi jo maraco.
Jabuli 94:14 Rwot pe bibwoto jone, pe biweko jo ma gin mere kikome.
Jabuli 94:15 Gibiŋolo kop atir pi jo ma kitgi atir, jo ma cwinygi atir gibilubo.
Jabuli 94:16 Aŋa ma twero tiŋŋe i kom jo maraco? Aŋa ma bicuŋ ma kakara i kom lutim maraco?
Jabuli 94:17 Ka kono Rwot pe okonya, tipona kono oliŋ woko licwic i lobo me liŋo.
Jabuli 94:18 I kare ma atamo ni, “Tyena ocer,” mar meri ma pe lokke otiŋa malo, ai Rwot.
Jabuli 94:19 Ka atamo pi jami mapol, in ikweyo cwinya ki kicani.
Jabuli 94:20 Jo maraco ma gin luloc gitwero ribbe kwedi niŋniŋ, ma giloko lok marac doko cik?
Jabuli 94:21 Gicokke kacel ka neko dano ma kite atir, gujolo kop me to i kom dano ma pe ki bal.
Jabuli 94:22 Ento Rwot aye doŋ cella, en got me kalarrena.
Jabuli 94:23 En bidwoko balgi i wigi kengi, ci bityekogi woko pi timgi maraco; Rwot Lubaŋawa bityekogi woko.
Jabuli 95:1 Wubin wawer bot Rwot; wek cwinywa yom kom got ma larowa!
Jabuli 95:2 Wabin i nyime ka miyo pwocwa; Wawer bote wer me pak ki yomcwiny!
Jabuli 95:3 Rwot aye en Lubaŋa madit, en kabaka madit makato lubaŋa-gu ducu.
Jabuli 95:4 Nota me lobo tye i twerone; lacol wi godi gin mere bene.
Jabuli 95:5 Nam mere pien en muti yo, lobo bene en ma ocweyo ki ciŋe.
Jabuli 95:6 Wubin, waryebbe piny wawore, warumu conwa i nyim Rwot ma oketowa.
Jabuli 95:7 Pien en aye Lubaŋawa, wan wa jone ma en aye ma kwayowa, dok wan romi ma en aye gwokowa. Ka kono tin wun wuwinyo dwane!
Jabuli 95:8 Pe myero wumi cwinywu obed nwaŋ macalo yam wutimo i Meriba, macalo wutimo i kare ma wutye i Maca i tim.
Jabuli 95:973 
Jabuli 95:9 I kare meno kwarowu yam gutema, guporo kit ma kwona tye kwede, kadi bed guneno tic ma atiyo pigi ki waŋgi.
Jabuli 95:10 Cwinya okwero lwak meno woko pi mwaka pyeraŋwen; omiyo awacci, “Gin lwak ma guŋak woko ki i cwinygi, pe gilubo cikka.”
Jabuli 95:11 Mumiyo akwoŋo kwoŋ ki kiniga, ni pe myero gudony i lobo ka ma an abimiyogi iye yweyo.
Jabuli 96:1 Wuwer bot Rwot wer manyen; wuwer bot Rwot, wun lobo ducu!
Jabuli 96:2 Wuwer bot Rwot, wupwo nyiŋe; wutit pi larre nino ducu.
Jabuli 96:3 Wutuc deyone bot lurok wutit ticce me aura bot rok ducu!
Jabuli 96:4 Rwot aye dit, myero gipake twatwal myero gilwore makato lubaŋa mukene-gu ducu.
Jabuli 96:5 Pien lubaŋa pa lurok ducu gin cal jogi apaya, ento Rwot aye oketo polo.
Jabuli 96:6 Deyo ki dit tye bote tek ki ber tye i kabedo mere maleŋ,
Jabuli 96:7 Wun kaka me rok ducu, wumi deyo bot Rwot, wumi deyo ki tek bot Rwot!
Jabuli 96:8 Wumi deyo bot Rwot muporo nyiŋe; wukel gityer, wubin wa i dyekalle!
Jabuli 96:9 Wuwor Rwot ki, boŋo maleŋ; komwu omyel i nyime, wun lobo ducu!
Jabuli 96:10 Dano guwac i kin lurok ni, “Rwot tye ka loc! Ada, lobo ocuŋ matek ma pe yeŋŋe; en biŋolo kop i kom dano maromrom.”
Jabuli 96:11 Polo iye obed yom, lobo bene obed ma cwinye-yom, wek nam omor, ki jami ducu ma tye iye;
Jabuli 96:12 wek poto obed ki yomcwiny, ki jami ducu ma tye iye! Man bimiyo yadi ma i buŋa ducu, giwero wer pi yomcwiny
Jabuli 96:13 i nyim Rwot, pien obebino ka ŋolo kop ki lobo. En biŋolo kop ma tye atir i kom lobo; biŋolo kop i kom rok ducu ki adane.
Jabuli 97:1 Rwot tye ka loc; wek lobo obed ki yomcwiny; wek lobo ma i dog nam ducu cwinygi obed yom!
Jabuli 97:2 Pol ki mutu mucido licuc ogure woko dyere; kit ma atir ki ŋolo kop ma tye atir aye miyo komkerre cuŋ matek.
Jabuli 97:974 
Jabuli 97:3 Mac telo nyime, waŋo lumerokke ma gugure dyereni woko.
Jabuli 97:4 Lutkotte mil menyo lobo; lobo neno ci yeŋŋe.
Jabuli 97:5 Godi leny i nyim Rwot calo odok kic, i nyim Rwot me lobo ducu.
Jabuli 97:6 Polo tito porrene; lwak me rok ducu gineno deyone.
Jabuli 97:7 Jo ducu ma woro cal jogi ma gipayo lewic omakogi, jo ma wakke pi cal jogi ma gupayo; lwak lubaŋa-gu ducu giryebbe piny i nyime.
Jabuli 97:8 Jo Cion giwinyo ci gibedo ki yomcwiny, anyira Juda ducu cwinygi yom ma pe twerre, pi kop ma iŋolo, ai Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 97:9 In ŋat mamalo twal i wi lobo ducu, ai Rwot; in i dit ikato lubaŋa-gu ducu.
Jabuli 97:10 Rwot maro jo ma dag gin marac; en gwoko tipo pa jone ma gene; en larogi woko ki i ciŋ jo maraco.
Jabuli 97:11 Ceŋ ryeny pi jo ma kitgi atir, yomcwiny bene tye pi jo ma cwinygi atir.
Jabuli 97:12 Wubed ki yomcwiny i Rwot, wun jo ma kitwu atir, wupwo nyiŋe maleŋ!
Jabuli 98:1 Wuwer bot Rwot wer manyen, pien doŋ otyeko tiyo jami me aura! Ciŋe ma lacuc ki bade maleŋ okelo bote loc.
Jabuli 98:2 Rwot doŋ omiyo locce oŋene, doŋ otyeko nyuto porrene ka maleŋ i nyim lurok ducu.
Jabuli 98:3 En opo i kom mar mere ma pe lokke kacel ki genne bot jo me ot pa Icrael. Agikki piny me wi lobo ducu doŋ oneno loc pa Lubaŋawa.
Jabuli 98:4 Wudaŋŋe ki yomcwiny nyim Rwot, wun lobo ducu; wupake ki wer kun wudaŋŋe ki yomcwiny.
Jabuli 98:5 Wuwer wer me pak bot Rwot ki opuk; wuwer kun wugoyo ki opuk ki dwan mamit!
Jabuli 98:6 Wukut tum ki obute, wudaŋŋe ki yomcwiny i nyim kabaka, ma en aye Rwot!
Jabuli 98:7 Wek nam omor, ki gin mupoŋ iye, lobo kacel ki jo ducu ma bedo iye!
Jabuli 98:8 Wek lalele omol otagge, wek godi ducu guwer kacel ki yomcwiny
Jabuli 98:9 i nyim Rwot, pien obebino ka ŋolo kop i kom lobo. En biŋolo kop ma atir i kom lobo, biŋolo kop pa lwak me rok ducu maromrom.
Jabuli 99:975 
Jabuli 99:1 Rwot tye ka loc, wek rok ducu komgi omyel! En obedo i WI komker mere ma gicibo i wi lukerubi; wek lobo oyeŋŋe!
Jabuli 99:2 Rwot dit i Cion; en loyo lwak me rok ducu.
Jabuli 99:3 Wek gin ducu gipak nyiŋi madit me deyo ma kelo lworo! En ŋat Maleŋ!
Jabuli 99:4 Kabaka matek, ma maro ŋolo kop kakare, in aye ma ikelo ŋolo kop maromrom: ikelo ŋolo kop kakare ki kit ma atir, imiyo omoko matek i kin jo pa Yakobo.
Jabuli 99:5 Wudwor Rwot Lubaŋawa, wuwore i nyim kom me teno tyene. En ŋat maleŋ!
Jabuli 99:6 Moses ki Aron bene onoŋo gubedo tye i kin ajwagine, Camuel bene onoŋo tye i kin jo ma gilwoŋo nyiŋe. Gukok bot Rwot, ci Rwot ogamo doggi.
Jabuli 99:7 Oloko kwedgi ki i wir pol; gugwoko lok me cadenne, ki cik ma en omiyo botgi.
Jabuli 99:8 Ai Rwot Lubaŋawa, in ceŋ igamo doggi, ibedo botgi Lubaŋa ma lawek bal, ento ibedo laculkwor me gin marac ma gutiyo.
Jabuli 99:9 Wudwor Rwot Lubaŋawa, dok wuwore i wi got mere maleŋ; pien Rwot Lubaŋawa leŋ.
Jabuli 100:1 Wuwer ki dwan me yomcwiny bot Rwot, wun lobo ducu!
Jabuli 100:2 Wuti bot Rwot ki yomcwiny, wubin i nyime ki wer!
Jabuli 100:3 Wuŋe ni Rwot en Lubaŋa! En aye oketowa, wan wa danone, wan jone dok romi ma en kwayogi.
Jabuli 100:4 Wudony i dog gaŋ mere ki pwoc, ki i dyekal mere kun wupake, wupwoye, wupwo nyiŋe!
Jabuli 100:5 Pien Rwot ber; mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka, ki ada mere bedo nakanaka bot yalwak ducu.
Jabuli 101:1 Abiwero wer pi ada ki pi ŋolo kop atir; abiwero wer boti, ai Rwot.
Jabuli 101:2 Abiketo cwinya me lubo yo ma atir ma pe tera i bal. Ibibino bota awene? I oda abibedo ma cwinya leŋ;
Jabuli 101:3 pe abiketo kit mo marac i nyima me aluba. Adag cic pa jo ma gilokke gibwoto Lubaŋa woko; pe abiye ni aribbe kwedgi wek kitgi oguda.
Jabuli 101:4 Pe abibedo ki cwiny me ŋak woko ki i yo ma atir wacel, pe abitamo tam mo me timo gin marac.
Jabuli 101:976 
Jabuli 101:5 Abineko dano ma loko lok marac kun kwoto ki lawote woko; dok pe abiciro tim pa dano ma Lyerre kun nyatte i cwinye.
Jabuli 101:6 Abineno jo ma bedo i lobo ma gigeno Lubaŋa ki kica, wek gubibed kacel kweda i gaŋ kaila; ŋat ma lubo yo ma atir ma pe tere i bal bitiyo tic bota.
Jabuli 101:7 Dano ma lagoba pe bibedo i oda; dok ŋat ma loko lok goba atata pe bimedde ki tiyo ticce i nyima.
Jabuli 101:8 Nino ki nino abityeko jo maraco woko ducu ki i lobo, kun ajwero lutim maraco woko liweŋ ki i gaŋ pa Rwot.
Jabuli 102:1 Ai Rwot, winy legana; wek kokona owinnye boti!
Jabuli 102:2 Pe ikanne woko bota do i kare ma atye ki can! Cik iti iwiny lokka, gam doga oyotoyot i nino ma akok iye boti-ni!
Jabuli 102:3 Karena tye ka rwenyo woko calo yito, ma cogona ducu waŋ awaŋa calo ruk mac.
Jabuli 102:4 Gipwoda woko calo lum mutwo, miyo wiya wil woko ka camo kwon.
Jabuli 102:5 Acur matek kit man; riŋo koma omoko woko i kom cogona likiŋ.
Jabuli 102:6 Abedo calo acut ma bedo i tim, calo tula ma bedo i wi obur.
Jabuli 102:7 Abuto ma nino pe mako waŋa, atye calo winyo ma bedo kene i wi ot malo.
Jabuli 102:8 Lukworra giloko lok aŋec i koma dyeceŋ jwi, jo ma nywara gilwoŋo nyiŋa kun giceno ki jo mukene.
Jabuli 102:9 Buru doŋ olokke odoko camma, arubo pig waŋa ki ginamatana,
Jabuli 102:10 pi lyeto me akemoni ki kinigani; in doŋ ityeko kwanya ibola woko.
Jabuli 102:11 Kwona obedo calo tipo me otyeno ma cok rwenyo; alokke doŋ adoko calo lum mutwo.
Jabuli 102:12 Ento in ibedo i wi komkerri matwal, ai Rwot; yalwak me kare ducu gibipo pi nyiŋi.
Jabuli 102:13 Ibia ci kica maki i kom Cion; kare doŋ oromo me nyuto berri bote; kare ma iciko pire doŋ oromo.
Jabuli 102:14 Luticci gimare, kadi bed onoŋo doŋ gedo ducu iye odoko odur godi, kica makogi i kome pien doŋ en odokoapwa.
Jabuli 102:15 Rok ducu bilworo Rwot, luker ducu ma i wi lobo gibilwore pi deyone.
Jabuli 102:16 Rwot bigero Cion odoco; en bituc kun nyuto deyone.
Jabuli 102:977 
Jabuli 102:17 En biwinyo lega pa jo ma piny doŋ obwoyogi woko adada, pe bicayo lega me bako dog ma gikelo i nyime.
Jabuli 102:18 Wek gico lok man gigwok maber pi yalwak me kare ma bibino anyim, wek omi jo ma pud peya ginywalogi gupak Rwot, ni.
Jabuli 102:19 Rwot oneno piny ki i kabedone maleŋ ma tye malo, en oneno piny i lobo ki i polo,
Jabuli 102:20 wek cwiny koko pa lumabuc, dok wek egony jo ma doŋ gityeko ŋolo kop me to i wigi.
Jabuli 102:21 Kumeno dano gibipako nyiŋ Rwot i Cion, gibipake i Jerucalem
Jabuli 102:22 i kare ma lwak me rok ducu cokke kacel, wa ker ducu, pi woro Rwot.
Jabuli 102:23 Rwot oturo tekka woko ma pud atidi; ojwiko nino me kwona obedo manok.
Jabuli 102:24 Awacci, “Ai Lubaŋana, pe ikwany kwona woko ma pud peya ati!” Rwot, in ibedo nakanaka i kare pa yalwak ducu.
Jabuli 102:25 I kare macon mukato aŋec iketo guti me te lobo, dok in aye ma itiyo polo ki ciŋi.
Jabuli 102:26 Gibito woko, ento in ibedo meri matwal; gibiti woko macalo boŋo. In ilokogi macalo ginaruka, ci gitum woko liweŋ;
Jabuli 102:27 ento in kiti acel, mwaka me kwoni bene pe gik.
Jabuli 102:28 Ibimiyo litinowa, wan luticci, gibibedo ki kuc laboŋo peko mo; dok in aye ma ibigwoko likwayogi.
Jabuli 103:1 Pwo Rwot, in tipona; kwona ducu myero opak nyiŋ Rwot maleŋ!
Jabuli 103:2 Pwo Rwot, in tipona; wii pe myero owil i kom mot ducu mabeco ma en omiyi.
Jabuli 103:3 En ma weko balla ducu, en bene ma caŋo two ducu ki i koma.
Jabuli 103:4 En olaro kwona omiyo pe adonyo i bur, oketo mar mere ma pe lokke kacel ki kicane i koma;
Jabuli 103:5 en miya jami mabeco pi kare me kwona ducu, kun roco tekona kare ki kare macalo pa ocur.
Jabuli 103:6 Rwot ŋolo kop kakare dok maromrom, ŋolo bene kop pa jo ma giunogi atir.
Jabuli 103:7 En otuco yubbe woko ducu bot Moses, omiyo jo Icrael guneno tic me aura ma en otiyo.
Jabuli 103:8 Rwot lakica dok maro dano, kiniga pe make oyot, mar mere ma pe lokke dwoŋ.
Jabuli 103:978 
Jabuli 103:9 En pe bibedo ka jukowa kun juyowa kare ducu, kinigane bene pe ri nakanaka.
Jabuli 103:10 En pe timowa kun poro bal ma watimo, dok pe culo kwor i komwa kun poro kit roc ducu ma watimo.
Jabuli 103:11 Kit macalo polo tye malo i wi lobo, mar mere ma pe lokke bene dit kit meno bot jo ma lwore.
Jabuli 103:12 Kit macalo tuŋ wokceŋ tye bor kwede ki tuŋ potocen-ni, en kwanyo balwa woko ducu ki i komwa cwalo ka mabor kit meno.
Jabuli 103:13 Macalo wegi litino bedo ki kica i kom litinogi, Rwot bene kica mako kit meno i kom jo ma lwore.
Jabuli 103:14 En ŋeyo kit gin ma ecweyowa kwede; en po ni wan apwa mamwa.
Jabuli 103:15 Nino me kwo pa dano obedo calo lum; en lot, turu macalo ature ma tye i okaŋ.
Jabuli 103:16 Yamo kodo yeŋo, ci rwenyo woko liweŋ, kabedo ma en ocuŋ iye-ni doŋ pe bineye matwal.
Jabuli 103:17 Ento mar pa Rwot ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka pi jo ma wore, dok berre bedo nakanaka bot jo me yalwak ducu,
Jabuli 103:18 bot jo ma gwoko gicikkene, ma gipo pi tiyo gin ma en ociko.
Jabuli 103:19 Rwot ocibo komkerre i polo; en kabaka ma loyo ducu.
Jabuli 103:20 Wupak Rwot, wun lumalaika matek, ma wulubo cikke, kun wuwinyo lok ducu ma en waco botwu!
Jabuli 103:21 Wupak Rwot, wun lwak me monnye ducu ma wutye i polo, wun luticce ma wutiyo gin ma en mito!
Jabuli 103:22 Wupak Rwot, wun ginaketane ducu, i kabedo ducu ma en loyo! Pwo Rwot, in tipona!
Jabuli 104:1 Pak Rwot, in tiponal Ai Rwot Lubaŋana, in idit twatwal! Irukke ki dit ki deyo;
Jabuli 104:2 iumo komi woko ki ceŋ calo iruko boŋo. Iyaro polo woko macalo kema ma giyaro,
Jabuli 104:3 dok igero kicika me otti malo i wi pii. Iloko pol odoko gadigadini, ituk iŋweco woko ki gadigadini i dye yamo.
Jabuli 104:4 Iloko yamo odoko laorri, kun leb mac ma lyel gubedo luticci.
Jabuli 104:5 Iketo lobo ocuŋ matek i kom gutine, ma pe biyeŋŋe wacel.
Jabuli 104:979 
Jabuli 104:6 Iumo woko ki nam matut calo giumo ki ginaruka, ki pii bene omwonyo godi woko ducu.
Jabuli 104:7 Ento i kare ma ijuko pii, ci oriŋo woko; i kare ma owinyo dwani omor kun idaŋŋe natek, ci orwenyo woko liweŋ.
Jabuli 104:8 Omol ki i wi godi okato ocito piny i luŋ, i kabedo ma yam iyero pire.
Jabuli 104:9 Iketo ki pii waŋ lobo ma pe myero oŋol okat i ŋeye, wek pe dok oum lobo woko odoco.
Jabuli 104:10 Imiyo pii nyette mol i luŋ, kun mol ki i kin godi.
Jabuli 104:11 Lee tim ducu gimato pii meno, kana me tim bene gimato gineko ki orwo.
Jabuli 104:12 Lwak winyi gigero odigi i wi yadi ki i ŋet kulu, ci gibedo ka koko i jaŋ yat.
Jabuli 104:13 Icwalo kot ki i polo cwer piny i wi godi, lobo opoŋ ki jami ducu ma in itiyo.
Jabuli 104:14 Imiyo lum lot doŋo me cam pa dyaŋ, ki ginapita ma myero dano oti kwedgi, wek dano opur lobo ci onoŋ cam,
Jabuli 104:15 ki koŋo vino ma yo mo cwiny dano, ki moo me wir wek waŋe obed ma ryeny aryenya, ki dok ocam kwon ma miye teko.
Jabuli 104:16 Yadi pa Rwot limo pii mabup, gin aye yadi cedar me Lebanon ma yam en opitogi-ni.
Jabuli 104:17 Lwak winyi mapol gigero odigi i wi yadi-kunnu; winyi aramatala bene gibedo i wi yadi maboco.
Jabuli 104:18 Dyegi me tim gibedo i wi godi ma malo twatwal, ki okile giriŋo gikanne i got.
Jabuli 104:19 Iketo dwe me poko kare; ceŋ ŋeyo kare me potone.
Jabuli 104:20 In aye ma iketo colpiny omiyo dyewor tye; i kare meno aye lee ma gibedo i buŋa gicako kwede wotgi.
Jabuli 104:21 Litino labwor gidwaro lee ki koko, kun giyenyo cam ma Lubaŋa miyo botgi.
Jabuli 104:22 Ka ceŋ otuc gidok woko cen, ci gibuto i gorogi.
Jabuli 104:23 Dano kato woko cito ka tic ci tiyo ticce nio wa otyeno.
Jabuli 104:24 Ai Rwot, in doŋ itiyo lwak jami mapol! Itiyogi ducu ki ryeko, omiyo lobo opoŋ ki ginaketani.
Jabuli 104:25 Nam madit malac bene tye kuca, lwak ginaketa ma welgi pe kwanne bedo iye, gin makwo matino ki madito.
Jabuli 104:26 Mel bene woto ki iye, dok twol ma min kulu ma iketo-ni bene tuko iye.
Jabuli 104:27 Gin ducu gineno boti, gimito imigi cam i kare ma mitte kikome.
Jabuli 104:980 
Jabuli 104:28 Ka imiyogi cam, ci gigamo gicamo woko; ka iyabo ciŋi imiyogi cam, ci giyeŋ ki jami mabeco mada.
Jabuli 104:29 Ka ikanne woko ki botgi, ci gineno can; ka ikwanyo yamo me yweyoni woko ki botgi ci gito woko, gidok i apwa ka ma yam gua ki iye.
Jabuli 104:30 Ka iketo yamo me yweyoni i igi ci gibedo kwo; dok bene imiyo lobo doko nyen.
Jabuli 104:31 Deyo pa Rwot myero ori nakanaka! Rwot myero obed ki yomcwiny pi gin ma en otiyo.
Jabuli 104:32 Rwot neno lobo ci miyo yeŋŋe, en gudo godi ci giduny yito.
Jabuli 104:33 Abiwero wer bot Rwot pi kare me kwona ducu; abiwero wer me pako Lubaŋana ka pud akwo.
Jabuli 104:34 Wek lok ma alwodo ki i cwinya oyom cwiny Rwot, pien en aye ma miyo abedo ki yomcwiny.
Jabuli 104:35 Wek gityek lubalo woko liweŋ ki i lobo, dok wek jo maraco bene gurweny woko matwal! Pwo Rwot, in tipona! Wupwo Rwot!
Jabuli 105:1 Wumi pwoc bot Rwot, wulwoŋ nyiŋe, wumi ticce oŋene i kin rok ducu!
Jabuli 105:2 Wuwer bote wer me pako en, wutit ticce me aura ducu!
Jabuli 105:3 Wuket deyo i kom nyiŋe maleŋ: jo ma yenyo Rwot cwinygi obed yom!
Jabuli 105:4 Wubin bot Rwot wek wunoŋ tek ki bote, wubed i nyime nakanaka.
Jabuli 105:5 Wupo i kom tic me aura ma en otiyo ducu, taŋo ma yam otiyo ki kop ma en oŋolo,
Jabuli 105:6 wun likwayo pa Abraim ma yam laticce, wun litino pa Yakobo ma en oyerowu.
Jabuli 105:7 En aye Rwot Lubaŋawa; kop ma en oŋolo romo i lobo ducu.
Jabuli 105:8 En cwinye omoko I kom gicikkene ma bedo nakanaka, i kom lok ma yam ociko, pi yalwak alip ki alip,
Jabuli 105:9 en gicikke ma oketo ki Abraim, ki lok ma yam okwoŋo ki Icaka,
Jabuli 105:10 ma omoko odoko cik bot Yakobo, wek obed gicikke ki Icrael matwal,
Jabuli 105:11 kun wacci, “Abimiyo lobo Kanaan botwu, obed lobo me aleyawu.”
Jabuli 105:12 I kare ma pud gin nok, ma welgi tidi, ma pud gin lubedo i lobo-nu,
Jabuli 105:13 ma giwirre i kin rok mapatpat, ma gia ki i te ker acel gikobo i rok mukene,
Jabuli 105:14 Lubaŋa pe oye ŋat mo odiyogi. Ojuko luker mapol pigi kun wacci,
Jabuli 105:981 
Jabuli 105:15 “Pe wugud kom jo ma an awirogi, pe wutim lunebina marac!”
Jabuli 105:16 I kare ma Rwot ocwalo kec opoto i lobogi, ci okwanyo camgi ma gikwo kwede woko ducu,
Jabuli 105:17 noŋo en ocwalo Yucepu okwoŋo nyimgi, en dano ma yam gicato woko macalo opii-ni.
Jabuli 105:18 Gitweyo tyene woko ki nyor matek, girwako atego nyonyo i ŋute,
Jabuli 105:19 nio waŋ ma lok ma en oloko-ni ocobbe kakare; lok pa Rwot oteme onoŋo ni en tye atir.
Jabuli 105:20 Kabaka ocwalo dano ci gigonye woko, laloc me lobo ogonyo nyor woko oweko en ocito gire.
Jabuli 105:21 Kabaka oketo en obedo rwot ma loyo ode, ki ŋat ma loyo jamine ducu;
Jabuli 105:22 omiye bene twero me pwonyo rwodi kit ma cwinye mito, dok me pwonyo ludito ma gimiye tam ki ryeko.
Jabuli 105:23 Omiyo Icrael obino i Ejipt, en Yakobo odoko labedo i lobo pa Kam.
Jabuli 105:24 Rwot omiyo lwakke gunywalo litino mapol, dok omiyo gudoko tek ma kato lukworgi.
Jabuli 105:25 Oloko cwiny jo Ejipt omiyo gukwero jone, ci gutiyo ki luticce i kit me bwolo.
Jabuli 105:26 En ocwalo laticce Moses, ki Aron ma en aye oyero.
Jabuli 105:27 Gutiyo lanyut pa Lubaŋa madito, gutiyo taŋo mapol i lobo pa Kam.
Jabuli 105:28 Ocwalo colpiny, ci lobo ocido woko odoko collicuc; ento gujemo woko pe guwinyo lokke.
Jabuli 105:29 Oloko pii ma i kulu megi odoko remo, omiyo rec ma tye iye ducu guto woko.
Jabuli 105:30 Lobogi opoŋ ki lwak ogwal mapol ata, kadi wa gaŋ kal pa kabaka noŋo opoŋ ki ogwal keken.
Jabuli 105:31 Lubaŋa oloko, ci omiyo lwak lwaŋi madwoŋ obino, ki nyoggi bene gucorre i lobogi ducu.
Jabuli 105:32 Omiyo pee ocwer ma ka kot, ki lutkot bene owil mutyeko lobogi woko ducu.
Jabuli 105:33 Ojwero olok ki yat odurogi ducu, ci oturo yadi ducu ma i lobogi.
Jabuli 105:34 Dok oloko ci bonyo ocorre, lwak litino bonyo ma welgi pe kwanne;
Jabuli 105:35 gucamo ginapita woko liweŋ ki i lobo, gucamo kit kwa ginapita me cam ducu ma gupuro i lobogi.
Jabuli 105:36 Oneko litino kayogi wa co woko ducu, ma gin aye jo ma gukwoŋo nywalo ki tekogi.
Jabuli 105:982 
Jabuli 105:37 Okwanyo jo Icrael okelogi woko ma gutiŋo ryal ki jabu; dano mo ma ogatte i kin kakane ducu obedo pe.
Jabuli 105:38 I kare ma gua woko ki kunnu jo Ejipt cwinygi obedo yom, pien onoŋo gilworogi mada,
Jabuli 105:39 En oyaro pol malo ka wi jone, dok omiyogi mac me menyo piny dyewor,
Jabuli 105:40 Gulege ci ocwalo aluru, ocwalo kwon mabup ki i polo wek gucam guyeŋ.
Jabuli 105:41 Obaro got ci pii onyette okatti ki iye, omol ki i dye tim aroo calo kulu.
Jabuli 105:42 En opo i kom cikkene maleŋ, ki i kom Abraim ma laticce.
Jabuli 105:43 En okwanyo jone otelogi ki yomcwiny, ma lwakke ma en oyero gidaŋŋe ki wer matek.
Jabuli 105:44 Omiyogi lobo pa lurok, omiyo gukwanyo cam ki i poto ma jo me rok mukene guyelle iye,
Jabuli 105:45 wek lwakke gulub cikke, dok gugwok gin ma en ociko ducu. Wupak Rwot!
Jabuli 106:1 Wupak Rwot! Wumi pwoc bot Rwot, pien en ber; Mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka!
Jabuli 106:2 Aŋa ma twero tito pi tic madito matek ma Rwot otiyo, dok aŋa ma twero pako en muromo maber?
Jabuli 106:3 Jo ma ŋolo kop atir tye ki yomcwiny, jo ma tiyo gin ma tye atir kare ducu!
Jabuli 106:4 Ai Rwot, po pira ka inyuto kicani bot lwakki; konya, bene, ka ibilarogi;
Jabuli 106:5 wek anen kit ma joni ma iyero gibibedo kwede maber, ci anywak bedo ki yomcwiny kacel ki rokki, wek awakke kacel ki joni ma gin aye gipinnyi.
Jabuli 106:6 Wan kacel ki kwarowa ducu watyeko timo bal; wan watyeko timo roc, watimo gin maraco adada.
Jabuli 106:7 Kwarowa pe gutamo pi tic meri me aura ma yam itiyo botgi, i kare ma gitye i Ejipt: pe gupo i kom bup me mar meri ma pe lokke, ento gujemo woko i kom En Mamalo Twal i dog Nam Makwar.
Jabuli 106:8 Ento en pud olarogi aye pi nyiŋe, wek emi twerone madit oŋene.
Jabuli 106:9 Ojuko Nam Makwar, ci nam otwo wokot otelo wigi i dye nam matut calo gitye ka wot i dye tim mutwo.
Jabuli 106:10 Olarogi ki i ciŋ lukworgi, olarogi ki i twero pa lumerokgi.
Jabuli 106:11 Pii omwonyo lumerokgi woko liweŋ; ŋat mo acel i kingi pe odoŋ.
Jabuli 106:983 
Jabuli 106:12 Lacen lwak guye lokke; guwero wer bene me pake.
Jabuli 106:13 Ento wigi owil woko oyotoyot i kom tic ma en otiyo, gubedo ka tic ma pe doŋ gukuro ryeko ma a ki bote.
Jabuli 106:14 Cwinygi opukke pi camo riŋo i dye tim, gutemo i Lubaŋa i tim aroo.
Jabuli 106:15 En omiyogi gin ma gupenye pire, ento ocwalo kit two marac ma balo kom dano i komgi.
Jabuli 106:16 I kare ma nyeko omakogi i kom Moses, ki i kom Aron ma en ŋat maleŋ ma Rwot oyero,
Jabuli 106:17 ci lobo obar omwonyo Datan woko, ka oumo lwak pa Abiram woko bene.
Jabuli 106:18 Mac oturo ki lyel i wi lwakgi; ci leb mac ma lyel-l i owaŋo jo maraco woko ducu.
Jabuli 106:19 Gucweyo cal-latin twon i Koreb, ci gubedo ka woro cal jabu ma guliyo-ni.
Jabuli 106:20 Guloko deyo pa Lubaŋa woko, guwilo ki deyo pa cal twon dyaŋ ma camo lum.
Jabuli 106:21 Wigi owil woko i kom Lubaŋa Lalargi, ma yam otiyo gin me aura madito i lobo Ejipt;
Jabuli 106:22 pe gupo pi gin me aura ma en otiyo i lobo pa Kam, ki gin maraco ma kelo lworo ma en otiyo i dog Nam Makwar.
Jabuli 106:23 Mumiyo en owacci onoŋo ebetyekogi woko, ka nene pe Moses, ma en aye dano ma eyero, ocuŋ i nyime, i kin en ki lwakke, ci oloko akemone woko omiyo pe otyekogi.
Jabuli 106:24 Gucayo lobo maber ma yomo cwiny dano-ni woko, ma pe gubedo ki niye wacel i kom gin ma Lubaŋa ociko.
Jabuli 106:25 Gubedo i kemagi kun giŋur aŋura, dok pe guwinyo lok ma Rwot owaco botgi.
Jabuli 106:26 Omiyo en otiŋo ciŋe malo okwoŋo kwoŋ botgi ni, ebimiyo gito i dye tim,
Jabuli 106:27 dok ebikeyogi woko i kin rok mapatpat, kun eketogi woko atata i lobo mapol.
Jabuli 106:28 Cutcut guribbe ki rok mukene ka, woro jok Baal i Peor, dok gucamo gitum ma gityero pi jo muto;
Jabuli 106:29 gumiyo kiniga omako Rwot pi gin ma gutimo, ki two gemo marac bene opoto i komgi.
Jabuli 106:30 Finekaci oa malo, omine pi tyeko lokke, ci two gemo otuggi gik woko cut.
Jabuli 106:31 Gibedo ka po pi lok man ni en dano ma kite atir, gibipo iye bene matwal pi kare pa yalwak ducu.
Jabuli 106:32 Gumiyo kiniga omako Rwot i ŋet pii me Meriba pi meno omiyo Moses oneno can malit pigi.
Jabuli 106:984 
Jabuli 106:33 Gumiyo cwiny Moses odoko kec, omiyo oloko lok ma onoŋo myero pe en oloki,
Jabuli 106:34 Pe guneko jo me rok mukene, kit macalo onoŋo Rwot ocikogi kwede,
Jabuli 106:35 ento gurubbe woko ki lurok, gubedo ka lubo yo me woro cal jogi macalo lurok giworo.
Jabuli 106:36 Lwak pa Lubaŋa gubedo ka woro cal jogi, ma olokke odoko owic botgi.
Jabuli 106:37 Gubedo ka tyero litino awobegi ki anyiragi macalo gitum bot jogi.
Jabuli 106:38 Guneko jo mapol ma gipe ki bal, ma gin aye litino awobegi ki anyiragi, ma yam gutyero bot cal jogi me Kanaan macalo gitum; ci pi remo pa dano ma guoyo omiyo lobo odoko gin me kwer.
Jabuli 106:39 Gudoko jo ma keni pi gin: ma gutiyo; i gin ma gutiyo gubedo ka timo tim me kwele kwele.
Jabuli 106:40 Mumiyo kiniga omako Rwot i kom jone, omiyo okwero jone woko, ma gin aye gipinnye-ni.
Jabuli 106:41 Pi meno oweko omiyogi i ciŋ lurok, oweko lukworgi ma yam gidaggi aye gubedo ka loyogi.
Jabuli 106:42 Lukworgi ounogi mada, gudiyogi piny i te locgi.
Jabuli 106:43 Rwot olaro jone tyen mapol, ento gin gubedo ka jemo woko kome i gin ducu ma gutimo; gupoto piny twatwal pi balgi.
Jabuli 106:44 Ento Rwot pud owinyo kokogi aye i kare ma gukok, oniaŋ ada ni gitye ki can.
Jabuli 106:45 Omiyo opo pi gicikkene pigi; pi mar mere ma pe lokke omiyo Rwot oŋut oloko tamme.
Jabuli 106:46 Omiyo jo ducu ma giloyogi macalo opii me bedo ki kica i komgi.
Jabuli 106:47 Larwa, ai Rwot Lubaŋawa, cokwa woko ki i kin lurok, wek wapwo nyiŋi maleŋ, waum ka wapaki.
Jabuli 106:48 Gipwo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, gipake nakanaka! lo ducu myero guwac ni, “Amen!” Wupak Rwot!
Jabuli 107:1 Wumi pwoc bot Rwot, pien en ber; mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka!
Jabuli 107:2 Wek jo ma Rwot okokogi guwac kumeno, gin jo ma en okokogi ki i can,
Jabuli 107:3 kun okwanyogi ki i lobo pa lurok odwokogi cen i lobogi, ma ocokogi ki yo tuŋ wokceŋ ki yo tuŋ potoceŋ, ki yo tuŋ acam ki yo tuŋ acuc.
Jabuli 107:985 
Jabuli 107:4 Jo mogo gubedo ka lak ata i tim aroo, pe gumedo ki noŋo yo ma cito i gaŋ ka ma myero gubed iye;
Jabuli 107:5 kec ki orwo pii onekogi matek, omiyo gen ducu orwenyo woko ki i cwinygi.
Jabuli 107:6 I kare ma gitye ki can gukok bot Rwot, ci en olarogi ki i can megi.
Jabuli 107:7 Otelogi guwoto ki yo matir, nio ka guo wa i gaŋ ka ma myero gubed iye.
Jabuli 107:8 Myero gupwo Rwot pi mar mere ma pe lokke, ki pi tic me aura ma en otiyo pi dano!
Jabuli 107:9 En miyo jo ma orwo pii nekogi giyeŋ, ki jo ma kec nekogi bene en miyo giyeŋ ki jami mabeco.
Jabuli 107:10 Jo mogo gubedo i mutu ki colpiny, lumabuc ma gitweyo ki nyor ma gitye ka winyo arem madwoŋ,
Jabuli 107:11 pien gujemo woko pe gulubo lok ma Lubaŋa ocikogi kwede, dok gukwero pwony pa En Mamalo Twal.
Jabuli 107:12 Cwinygi ool woko pi tic matek ma gubedo ka tiyone; gupoto piny, ci onoŋo ŋat mo pe ma myero okonygi.
Jabuli 107:13 I kare ma gitye ki can gukok bot Rwot, ci en olarogi ki i cangi.
Jabuli 107:14 Okwanyogi okelogi woko ki i mutu ki colpiny, ka ocodo nyor ma gitweyogi kwede woko lirwatrwat.
Jabuli 107:15 Myero gupwo Rwot pi mar mere ma pe lokke, ki pi tic me aura ma en otiyo pi dano.
Jabuli 107:16 Oturo kika mola woko ducu, oŋolo rii nyonyo me cego doggola opoko iye woko i dul aryo.
Jabuli 107:17 Jo mogo komgi obedo lit pi balgi, gubedo ki can madwoŋ pi gin maraco ma gutimo.
Jabuli 107:18 Gubedo ka kwero kit cam ducu; onoŋo doŋ gicok to.
Jabuli 107:19 I kare ma gitye ki can gukok bot Rwot, ci en olarogi ki i cangi.
Jabuli 107:20 Ocaŋogi ki lok ma en oloko aloka keken, ci olarogi ki i to.
Jabuli 107:21 Myero gupwo Rwot pi mar mere ma pe lokke, ki pi tic me aura ma en otiyo pi dano.
Jabuli 107:22 Myero gupwoye kun gityero gityer me pwoc, dok gutit pi tic ma en otiyo kun giwero wer me yomcwiny!
Jabuli 107:23 jo mogo guwoto ki mel i dye nam, ginjo ma ticgi terogi i nam madoŋo.
Jabuli 107:24 Guneno gin ma Rwot twero tiyone, ticce me aura ma en tiyo i nam madoŋo-gu.
Jabuli 107:986 
Jabuli 107:25 En oloko, ci yamo matek okodo, omiyo pii me nam otwagge.
Jabuli 107:26 Omiyo mel gutiŋŋe malo ma gicok gudo polo, ka dok gudwogo piny gumwony woko ka matut i te nam; tekcwinygi orwenyo woko i can marom-meno.
Jabuli 107:27 Gucatte kun gipaŋŋe apaŋa macalo lumero koŋo, ma ryeko otum woko liweŋ ki i wigi.
Jabuli 107:28 I kare ma gitye ki can gukok bot Rwot, ci en olarogi ki i cangi.
Jabuli 107:29 Ojuko yamo matek ci nam opye mot, ki biamwonyi me nam ducu oliŋ woko mot.
Jabuli 107:30 Cwinygi obedo yom pi piny ma oliŋ woko mot litik; en okelogi bene wa i waŋ wat ka ma gimito bino iye, ki lobo ma tar atara ligwek doko waŋ it ma gunnye.
Jabuli 107:31 Myero gupwo Rwot pi mar mere ma pe lokke, ki pi tic me aura ma en otiyo pi dano.
Jabuli 107:32 Myero gudwore i cokke pa lwak, kun gipake bene i gurre pa ludito.
Jabuli 107:33 En loko kulu-gu ducu doko tim aroo mutwo, dok en juko waŋ it-gu woko ducu, pii doŋ pe mol ki iye,
Jabuli 107:34 loko lobo mulony doko lobo mubedo kado ma konnye doŋ pe; man timme pi bal pa jo ma bedo i lobo meno.
Jabuli 107:35 En loko tim aroo mutwo doko ka ma pii poŋ iye.
Jabuli 107:36 En miyo jo ma kec nekogi gibedo kunnu, ci gigero gaŋ ma myero gibed iye;
Jabuli 107:37 gicoyo kodi i potti, gipito olok bene, camgi cek mabup.
Jabuli 107:38 Ginya gidoko mapol pi gum ma Rwot omiyo botgi; en pe weko wel dyaŋigi dok piny.
Jabuli 107:39 I kare ma giloyogi, ma gileyo wigi kun giunogi, giyelogi, ma gimiyo cwinygi bene cwer,
Jabuli 107:40 en cayo rwodi ma unogi, miyo giwoto i dye tim ata ka ma yo pe iye.
Jabuli 107:41 Ento en laro jo ma piny obwoyogi ki i cangi, ci medo wel pa jo me odigi macalo lwak romi.
Jabuli 107:42 Jo ma cwinygi atir gineno ci gibedo ki yomcwiny; jo maraco ducu gijuko lok woko ki i doggi giliŋ litik.
Jabuli 107:43 Jo maryek myero gubed ka tamo pi jami magi matut ki i cwinygi, wek dano opar pi mar pa Rwot ma pe lokke.
Jabuli 108:987 
Jabuli 108:1 Cwinya omoko i komi, ai Lubaŋa, cwinya omoko i komi ma pe lokke! Abiwero wer kun apaki ki dwan maloŋo! In tipona, co woko!
Jabuli 108:2 Wun naŋa ki opuk bene wuco woko! An bene abicoyo rupiny miyo ceŋ tuc!
Jabuli 108:3 Abimiyo pwoc boti i kin lwak me rok ducu, ai Rwot; abiwero wer me paki i kin Lurok.
Jabuli 108:4 Mar meri ma pe lokke dit, o wa i polo, dok adani bene dit, o wa i pol.
Jabuli 108:5 Ai Lubaŋa, nyut ditti malo i polo, dok imi deyoni oryeny i wi lobo ducu!
Jabuli 108:6 Larwa ki tekki imi walo lukworwa, dok igam legawa, wek lwak ma imaro gubwot.
Jabuli 108:7 Lubaŋa oloko ki i kabedone maleŋ ni, “Abipoko Cekem woko ki deyo madit me loc, dok abipoko nota me Cukot woko i dul i dul bot jona.
Jabuli 108:8 Gilead mera, ki Manace bene mera; Epraim aye tok nyonyo me wiya, ki Juda mere odoo kerra.
Jabuli 108:9 Ento Moab aye becen me lwokka; ki Edom mera, obedo ka bolo warra; dok abidaŋŋe matek me loc i kom jo Pilciti.”
Jabuli 108:10 Aŋa ma bikela i gaŋ man ma girumo ki cel gogo? Aŋa ma bitelo wiya tera i Edom?
Jabuli 108:11 In pe doŋ ikwerowa woko, ai Lubaŋa? In pe doŋ inywako yo ki dul monywa me cito ka lweny, ai Lubaŋa.
Jabuli 108:12 Konywa me lewny i kom lukworwa, pien kony ma dano miyo pe gin mo!
Jabuli 108:13 Ka Lubaŋa tye ka lweny kacel kwedwa ci wabiloyo; en aye ma binyono lukworwa diyo woko piny.
Jabuli 109:1 Apaki, ai Lubaŋa, pe iliŋ mot!
Jabuli 109:2 Jo maraco ki lugoba gubino ka lweny i koma, kun giloko lok goba keken i koma.
Jabuli 109:3 Gimiya cwercwiny pi lok maraco me adagadaga ma giloko i koma, gilwenyo i koma noŋo ma pe abalo gin mo.
Jabuli 109:4 Gidota adota kadi bed amarogi, kadi wa i kare ma noŋo atye ka lego pigi.
Jabuli 109:5 Gitimo gin marac i koma pi gin maber ma atiyo botgi, dok gidaga kadi bed amarogi.
Jabuli 109:6 Yer dano marac wek opid kwede; wek ŋat mo i kin lukworre odote koŋ giteme.
Jabuli 109:988 
Jabuli 109:7 Myero giteme ci ginoŋ bal i kome; dok legane bene gikwan macalo bal ma en otimo!
Jabuli 109:8 Gijwik nino me kwone woko obed manok, wek dano mukene aye obile jamine!
Jabuli 109:9 Litinone gudok litino kic, ki dakone bene odok daa-to
Jabuli 109:10 Wek litinone gubed lumalgaŋ ma gilak ata kun gibedo ka lego jami alega; myero giryemgi woko bene ki i wi obur ka ma onoŋo gibedo iye!
Jabuli 109:11 Won banya ma en yam odeno banya bote myero okwany jamine woko ducu ma etye kwede, dok dano ata-gu myero guyak jamine ma en olimogi ki tic matek-ki.
Jabuli 109:12 Ŋat mo myero pe otim kica bote wacel, dok dano bene pe myero kica omake i kom litino kicce.
Jabuli 109:13 Wek likwaye ducu guto woko, wek nyiŋe bene dano pe gupo pire i kare pa yalwak ma bilubo.
Jabuli 109:14 Rwot opo i kom bal pa kwarone, dok pe ojwa bal pa minne woko wacel.
Jabuli 109:15 Wek Rwot opo i kom balgi teretere, ento dano myero pe opo i komgi matwal i lobo kany.
Jabuli 109:16 Pien dano meno pe otamo me bedo lakica, ento obedo ka ryemo kor lucan ki jo ma piny obwoyogi, ki jo ma cwinygi cwer ducu nio ka onekogi woko.
Jabuli 109:17 Onoŋo en maro loko lok me ceno dano; wek lok me ceno danone-ni odok i wiye! En onoŋo dag lamo gum; pi meno ŋat mo pe myero olam gumi kome.
Jabuli 109:18 Onoŋo lok me ceno dano odoko calo koti ma en ruko; wek doŋ obid kome woko macalo pii, dok macalo moo ma mido i cogone!
Jabuli 109:19 Wek obed calo boŋo ma en odwalo ikome; obed calo del pyer ma nino ducu en tweyo i pyere!
Jabuli 109:20 Man aye myero obed kit pwod ma Rwot pwodo ki jo ma dota, gin jo ma loko lok maraco ma gimito rwenyo kwona woko!
Jabuli 109:21 Ento in, ai Rwot Lubaŋana, konya pi deyo me nyiŋi, dok ilara-pi mar meri ma pe lokke maber-ri!
Jabuli 109:22 An lacan, piny obwoya woko, cwinya bedo ka ton atona keken.
Jabuli 109:23 Arwenyo woko calo tipo me otyeno; yamo kola woko macalo tero bonyo.
Jabuli 109:24 Pi ri kec pi kare malac omiyo coŋa doŋ odoko nyap; omiyo bene amok woko adoko goro.
Jabuli 109:25 Adoko doŋ ginaŋala pa jo ma gidota; ka gunena, ci giyeŋo wigi ayeŋa.
Jabuli 109:26 Konya, ai Rwot Lubaŋana; lara pi mar meri ma pe lokke!
Jabuli 109:27 Wek lukworra guŋe ni, in aye ma ilare an, ai Rwot!
Jabuli 109:989 
Jabuli 109:28 Wek gin gucen dano, ento in imiya meri gum. Wek alee otwod jo ma lwenye i koma-ni woko, ci an laticci abed ma cwinya yom.
Jabuli 109:29 Wek jo ma dota gulim can; wek lewic oumgi woko calo guruko boŋo.
Jabuli 109:30 Abimiyo pwoc bot Rwot ki dwan maloŋo; abipake i dye lwakke ka ma gucokke iye.
Jabuli 109:31 En cuŋ yo tuŋ lacuc i ŋet jo ma piny obwoyogi, pi Larogi ki i cin jo ma ŋolo kop me to i wigi.
Jabuli 110:1 Rwot owaco bot rwoda ni, “Bed I ŋeta yo tuŋ acuc i kabedo me deyo, nio ka abimiyo lukworri gidoko kom, laten tyeni.”
Jabuli 110:2 Rwot bicwalo odoo ker me twerri ki i Cion. En bimiyo ibedo ka loc i dye lukworri.
Jabuli 110:3 I nino ma ibilweny i kom lukworri lwakki gibimine kengi boti. Calo toyo ma luk odiko con, awobeni bene gibibino boti kit meno i wi godi maleŋ,
Jabuli 110:4 Rwot doŋ okwoŋo kwoŋ, pe dokbiloko tamme, “In ibibedo ajwaka nakanaka i kit pa Melkijadek.”
Jabuli 110:5 Rwot tye yo tuŋ Iacucci; i nino ma kiniga omake en biloyo luker woko ducu.
Jabuli 110:6 En biŋolo kop i kom jo me rok ducu dok bipoŋo bar me lewny ki kom jo muto; en biloyo luker ducu ma i wi loboni.
Jabuli 110:7 Kabaka bimato pii ki i laora kulu ma tye i ŋet yo, meno bimiyo en ilo wiye malo.
Jabuli 111:1 Wupak Rwot. Abimiyo pwoc bot Rwot ki cwinya ducu, i dul pa jo ma cwinygi atir, i dye lwak ma gucokke.
Jabuli 111:2 Tic ma Rwot tiyo dito dok me aura mada; jo ducu ma ticce yomo cwinygi giketo cwinygi twatwal me niaŋ iye.
Jabuli 111:3 Gin ducu ma en tiyo opoŋ ki deyo dok ki tek; dok porre mere bedo nakanaka.
Jabuli 111:4 En pe weko wiwa wil i kom ticce me aura ma en otiyo; Rwot ber dok lakica.
Jabuli 111:5 En miyo cam bot jo ma lwore; wiye bene po twatwal i kom gicikkene.
Jabuli 111:6 En onyuto twero me ticce bot lwakke, omiyogi lobo pa lurok wek gucam obed megi.
Jabuli 111:7 Tic ma en tiyo ducu obedo me ada dok tye atir, cikke ducu tye iye gen madwoŋ.
Jabuli 111:990 
Jabuli 111:8 Gimoko matwal dok giri nakanaka, ma myero gilubgi ki ada dok ki cwiny ma atir.
Jabuli 111:9 En okelo lar bot jone, dok oketo gicikkene kwedgi me bedo matwal. En leŋ dok myero gilwore!
Jabuli 111:10 Lworo Rwot aye acakki me ryeko, doŋ jo ma lubo gin ma en ociko gibedo ki niaŋ maber. Dano gibipake nakanaka!
Jabuli 112:1 Wupak Rwot. Tye ki gum dano ma lworo Rwot, ma bedo ki yomcwiny mada ka lubo cikke.
Jabuli 112:2 Likwayone gibibedo twoni oteka i lobo ma gibedo iye; likwayo pa ŋat ma cwinye atir gibimiyogi gum.
Jabuli 112:3 Jone gibilony dok gibedo ki lwak jami mapul, dok kite ma atir-ri bene bibedo nakanaka.
Jabuli 112:4 Ceŋ tuc, ryeny i colpiny pi jo ma cwinygi atir; Rwot ber, lakica, dok oporre.
Jabuli 112:5 Dano ma cwinye yom, ma miyo banya bot luwote, bibedo maber, dano ma tiyo ki jo ducu ki gen.
Jabuli 112:6 Dano ma kite atir pe gibidiro cen; gibipo pire nakanaka.
Jabuli 112:7 En pe bedo ki lworo kadi ka owinyo lok marac me cwercwiny: bedo ma cwinye tek kun geno Rwot.
Jabuli 112:8 En bedo ma cwinye opye mot, pe bilworo gin mo, nio waŋ ma oneno ka giloyo lukworre.
Jabuli 112:9 En poko jami noŋo bot lucan; dok kite ma atir-ri bibedo nakanaka; en bibedo ki twer dok gibiwore.
Jabuli 112:10 Dano marac ka oneno, ci kiniga mako woko; bibedo ka mwodo lake ma cwinye poto; gen pa dano marac rwenyo woko matwal.
Jabuli 113:1 Wupak Rwot! Wun lutic pa Rwot wupake, wupak nyiŋ Rwot!
Jabuli 113:2 Gipak nyiŋ Rwot nakanaka nia tin nio nino ma pe tum!
Jabuli 113:3 Cakke wokceŋ nio kwede yo tuŋ potoceŋ myero gipak nyiŋ Rwot!
Jabuli 113:4 Rwot tye malo i wi rok ducu, ki deyone bene tye malo okato polo woko.
Jabuli 113:5 Aŋa ma calo Rwot Lubaŋawa, ma bedo i kabedone ma tye malo,
Jabuli 113:991 
Jabuli 113:6 ma kulle neno piny ka mabor ki kunnu, ma neno polo ki lobo?
Jabuli 113:7 En ilo lucan malo nia ki i apwa, dok tiŋo jo ma piny obwoyogi kwanyogi woko ki i wi odur,
Jabuli 113:8 ci miyo gibedo kacel ki rwodi, ma gin aye rwodi pa lwakke.
Jabuli 113:9 En miyo paco bot dako ma lalur, dok miyo noŋo litino ci doŋ bedo ki yomcwiny madwoŋ. Wupak Rwot!
Jabuli 114:1 I kare ma jo Icrael gua woko ki I Ejipt, i kare ma likwayo pa Yakobo guweko lobo pa lurok ma jone loko leb mapat atika.
Jabuli 114:2 Juda odoko kabedo maleŋ pa Rwot, ci Icrael odoko lobone ma en loyo.
Jabuli 114:3 Nam oneno ci oriŋo woko, kulu Jordan ocuŋ woko ma pe mol.
Jabuli 114:4 Godi gupye calo nyogi romi, ki cere-gu gupye calo litino romi.
Jabuli 114:5 In nam, aŋo mutimme mumiyo iriŋo woko-ni? Dok in Jordan, icuŋ woko ma pe imol piŋo?
Jabuli 114:6 Wun godi kono, piŋo wubedo ka pye calo nyogi romi? Wun cere, piŋo wubedo ka pye calo litino romi?
Jabuli 114:7 In lobo, myero iyeŋŋe, pien Rwot doŋ cok bino; yeŋŋe i nyim Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Yakobo,
Jabuli 114:8 ma loko pata got doko ka ma pii poŋ iye, ki got mabit-gu loko doko waŋ it ma gunnye agunya.
Jabuli 115:1 Deyo obed boti keken, ai Rwot, ento pe obed botwa, pi mar meri ma pe lokke kacel ki adani.
Jabuli 115:2 Piŋo lurok myero gupenywa ni, “Lubaŋawu tye kwene?”
Jabuli 115:3 Lubaŋawa tye i polo, en tiyo gin ma cwinye mito.
Jabuli 115:4 Cal lubaŋagi gitiyo ki ryal dok ki jabu; meno gin ma dano gutiyo ki ciŋgi.
Jabuli 115:5 Doggi tye, ento pe gitwero lok, waŋgi bene tye, ento pe gitwero neno piny.
Jabuli 115:6 Itgi tye, ento pe gitwero winyo lok, umgi tye, ento pe gitwero ŋweyo piny.
Jabuli 115:7 Ciŋgi tye, ento pe gitwero mulo piny, tyengi bene tye ento pe gitwero wot; dok pe tye gin mo ma twero winnye ki i dwangi.
Jabuli 115:992 
Jabuli 115:8 Jo ma gitiyo cal lubaŋa magi girom aroma kwedgi, ki jo ducu ma geno cal lubaŋa magi bene gitye kit meno.
Jabuli 115:9 Wun jo Icrael, wugen Rwot! En aye ma konyowu dok gwokowu.
Jabuli 115:10 Wun jo me ot pa Aron bene wugen Rwot! En aye ma konyowu dok gwokowu.
Jabuli 115:11 Wun jo ma wulworo Rwot, wugen Rwot! En aye ma konyowu dok gwokowu.
Jabuli 115:12 Rwot pud po i komwa dok bimiyowa gum; en bimiyo gum bot jo Icrael, ki bot jo me ot pa Aron ducu.
Jabuli 115:13 Rwot bimiyo gum bot jo ducu ma gilwore, bot jo matino ki bot jo madito ducu maromrom.
Jabuli 115:14 Rwot omed litino botwu, wun kacel ki likwayowu.
Jabuli 115:15 Rwot myero omiwu gum, en muketo polo ki lobo!
Jabuli 115:16 Polo obedo jami pa Rwot kene, ento omiyo lobo bot dano, ni gubed iye.
Jabuli 115:17 Jo muto pe gipako Rwot, kadi bed wa ŋat ma donyo piny ka ma piny oliŋ mot bene pe pako Rwot.
Jabuli 115:18 Ento wan jo makwo wabimiyo pwocwa bot Rwot nia tin nio nino ma pe tum. Wupak Rwot!
Jabuli 116:1 Amaro Rwot, pien en owinyo kokona; en owinyo dwana kacel ki legana me bako dog ma alege kwede.
Jabuli 116:2 Kit macalo en ociko ite me winyo legana-ni, pi meno abibedo ka kok bote nino ki nino pi kare me kwona ducu.
