Icaya 40:16 Yen ducu ma gitoŋo ki i buŋa me Lebanon, pe romo waŋo gitum awaŋa, lee ma tye iye bene nok, pe giromo me atyera bot Lubaŋa.
Icaya 40:17 Rok ducu pe gin mo i nyime, gin ducu pe gubedo gin mo ki tun bote, gin ducu mwa.
Icaya 40:18 Doŋ ibiporo Lubaŋa ki aŋa, nyo itwero poro calle ki kit cal aŋo?
Icaya 40:19 Cal jok ma gitwako atwaka, latet t wero twakone, layub jabu mwono kome woko ki jabu, dok tiyo nyor ryal pire.
Icaya 40:20 Ŋat ma can odiyo adada, yero yat matek ma pe top me gityer, yenyo lapac ma ladiro, wek opane cal apaya, ma pe dok giromo kwanyone ki ka ma giketo iye.
Icaya 40:21 Pe wuŋeyo bo? Yam peya wuwinyo? Yam onoŋo pe gitito botwu pire con? Peya wuniaŋ nia wa i acakki keto lobo?
Icaya 40:22 ŋat ma bedo i wi komkerre malo en aye ma oketo, en bedo wa malo twatwal i ŋe pol, jo ma bedo piny i lobo ginen matino calo ocene. En ryeyo polo calo boŋo kicika, dok yaro bene calo kema me bedo iye.
Icaya 40:23 En miyo luloc me lobo gidoko gin ma konygi pe, en dwoko rwodi ducu me lobo woko piny lirwap.
Icaya 40:24 Gin gubedo calo ginapita ma pud gipito apita, ma pud gicoyo acoya kun guryeyo Lwitgi pud aryeya i ŋom, ma ka Rwot ocwalo yamo i komgi ci giner woko; ka ce yamo lapiru okodo i komgi, ci tiŋogi calo cuŋ kal terogi woko.
Icaya 40:25 Doŋ wubipora ki aŋo mono, wek abed cal kwede? Man peny ma ŋat Maleŋ openyo.
Icaya 40:26 Koŋ wutiŋ waŋwu malo wunen polo, aŋa ma oketo jami magi? ŋat ma telo monygi, ŋeyo welgi ducu, dok bene lwoŋogi ki nyiŋgi. Tekone dwoŋ twatwal, meno aye gin mumi yo mo ki i kingi pe rwenyo.
Icaya 40:27 Piŋo it ye ka koko, in Yakobo? Piŋo kono it ye ka waco ni, Rwot pe neni, in Icrael, kun iwaco ni Lubaŋa tika pe tye ka paro piri?
Icaya 40:28 Pud pe wuŋeyo bo? Yam peya wuwinyo? Rwot en Lubaŋa ma bedo nakanaka, en aye ma oketo wi lobo ducu. En pe ol, pe bene doko goro; ŋecce tut ma pe wacce, kadi tato tere bene pe twerre.
Icaya 40:29 En miyo tek bot jo magoro, dok bene medo tek bot ŋat ma tekone odok woko piny.
Icaya 40:30 Kadi ki awobe bene gitwero doko goro, gitwero ol bene ma giromo poto woko piny;
Icaya 40:31 ento jo ma neno bot Rwot, teko bidwogo cen i komgi. Gibituk gicito malo calo ocur, gibiriŋo ma pe giol, gibibedo ka wot nakanaka ma komgi pe biloc.
Icaya 41:1148  Rwot ocikke pi konyo jo Icrael
Icaya 41:1 Wuliŋ mot, wuwiny lokka, wun lobo ma tye i dog nam; wek rok ducu gulim tek manyen; gucak bino wek gulok lokgi. Myero wan ducu wanyiku cok wek wanolu kop i kinwa kekenwa.
Icaya 41:2 Aŋa ma otugo ŋat ma oa ki yo tuŋ wokceŋ, ma loyo lweny i kabedo ducu ma en woto iye? Aŋa ma miyo rok mapol i ciŋe, ka doŋ nyono luker maditodito woko i te tyene piny? Pala lucwanne miyo dano gidoko calo apwa, aterone nekogi, tiŋogi woko calo cuŋ kai ma yamo tero.
Icaya 41:3 Ryemogi, ci kato i nyimgi ki kuc, ma noŋo dwir mada, kun tyene pe gudo piny.
Icaya 41:4 Aŋa ma omiyo gin man otimme? Aŋa ma omiyo lwak jami mapatpat ma kombeddi tye-ni obedo tye kit macalo kombeddi tye kwede-ni nia i acakki piny? An Rwot aye abedo mukwoŋo nia i acakki piny, an Rwot Lubaŋa abibedo tye bene i agikki piny.
Icaya 41:5 Lobo ma tye i dog nam doŋ guneno gin ma atiyo, lworo omakogi, komgi obedo ka myel amyela; gin ducu doŋ gubino gunyiko cok.
Icaya 41:6 Dano acel acel konyo lawote, kun waco bot ominne ni, “Di cwinyi!”
Icaya 41:7 Lapac cuko cwiny latet jabu, ŋat ma yubo kom cal apaya wek obed pwot cuko cwiny ŋat ma goyo agoya i kom got ki nyono, kun waco ni, “Gin meno ma gimwononi ber”; ci giguro cal meno woko matek ki cumar wek pe dok oput woko.
Icaya 41:8 Ento in laticca Icrael, in Yakobo ma doŋ atyeko yeri, lakwar Abraim ma en ŋat ma amaro;
Icaya 41:9 in ma ceŋ akeli ki i agikki lobo, nen alwoŋi ki i gul ka mabor adada, kun awacci ni, “In laticca, doŋ atyeko yeri, dok bene pe abiboli woko cen.”
Icaya 41:10 Pe ilwor, an atye kwedi, cwinyi pe opoti, pien an Lubaŋani; abimiyi tek, dok abikonyi, abimaki ki ciŋa lacuc, ma miyo aloyo lukworra-ni.
Icaya 41:11 Wunen, jo ducu ma kiniga omakogi i komwu, gibimiyo lewic makogi, dok alee bene twodogi woko; jo ma pyem kwedwu, wun jona, gibidoko calo gin ma konnye pe, ci gito woko.
Icaya 41:12 Wubiyenyo jo ma lwenyo kwedwu, ento pe wubinoŋogi: jo ma bicobo mony i komwu, gibidoko calo gin ma konnye pe.
Icaya 41:13 Pien an a Rwot Lubaŋawu, doŋ amako ciŋwu ma lacuc woko likiŋ; an atye ka waco botwu ni, “Pe wulwor, an abikonyowu.”
Icaya 41:14 Pe ilwor Yakobo, kadi bed ibedo calo kwidi, pe wulwor, wun jo Icrael, kadi wugoro mada! Abikonyowu, Rwot ma owaco; ŋat ma bikokowu en aye ŋat Maleŋ me Icrael.
Icaya 41:1149 
Icaya 41:15 Nen, abimiyo wudoko dul me dino kal, mapek, dok manyen, ma dino kal maber twatwal; wubidino godi ci wuŋinyogi woko, dok wubiloko lobo ma gubedo cere gidoko calo cuŋ bel.
Icaya 41:16 Wubipyetogi, ci yamo bitiŋogi woko, yamo lapiru me kot bikeyogi woko atata. Ento wun wubibedo ki yomcwiny i Rwot; wubiwakke bene mada pi ŋat Maleŋ me Icrael.
Icaya 41:17 Ka ce lucan kacel ki jo ma piny obwoyogi gibiyenyo pii me amata, kun pii pe nen wacel, ma noŋo dwangi otwo dok ma lebgi omoko woko likaŋ, an Rwot abiwinyo legagi ci abidok iye bene, an Lubaŋa pa Icrael pe abitenyogi ata.
Icaya 41:18 Abimiyo pii mol i wi godi ka ma pii pe iye, pii bibedo ka gunnye agunya ki piny i luŋ-gu; abimiyo pii poŋ i dye tim ka ma yam otwo woko, waŋ it doŋ bibedo tye i lobo mutwo.
Icaya 41:19 Abimiyo yadi cedar doŋo i dye tim, ki okuto lacari ki yadi matino ma ŋwecgi kur, ki yaa; Abiketo yadi culle doko buŋa i dye t im ka ma yadi pe iye, yadi ciprec kacel ki k it yadi mukene mapatpat.
Icaya 41:20 Dano gibineno wek guŋe ni, Rwot Lubaŋa Maleŋ pa Icrael aye omiyo kit gin man otimme: gin gibitamo pire mtot lacen giniaŋ ni, Rwot aye ma tye ka timo man. Rwot Lubaŋa otemo lwak lubaŋa me rok mukene
Icaya 41:21 Rwot Lubaŋa mna en kabaka pa jo pa Yakobo owaco ni, “Wun lwak lubaŋa pa lurok, wunyut lok ma wutye kwede, dok wukel pidowu mogo matek bota.
Icaya 41:22 Wubin wunyut botwa gin ma bitimme i anyim. Doŋ wutit bot lwak gin ma yam otyeko timme woko, wek koŋ watam; wutittiwa gin ma bia ki i kom gin ma doŋ otyeko timme-nu; wek wan bene waniaŋ i lok ma bi timme.
Icaya 41:23 Wutittiwa gin ma bitimme i anyim, wek omi waye ni wun wubedo lubaŋa. Koŋ wutim gin maber nyo marac, ma poto cwinywa ma miyo bene lworo makowa.
Icaya 41:24 Wun pe wugin mo kadi ki acel, gin ma wutiyo-gu ducu konnye pe; jo ma yerowu doko gin me kwer ki tuŋ bota.
Icaya 41:25 Doŋ atyeko tugo ŋat ma bedo i lobo ma yo tuŋ acam ci en bene obino; atuge me bino ka lweny kun oa ki i yo tuŋ wokceŋ; en binyono luloc woko piny ki tyene calo nyono coto, calo lacwe agulu ma nyono lobo me ticce; en bilwoŋo nyiŋa.
Icaya 41:26 Aŋa ma yam otito botwa lok macon ni waŋe, nyo ma otito botwa con ni lok macalo man bitimme, wek waye ni en oloko lok ma tye atir dok ada? ŋat mo ma otito botwa pe, dok bene ŋat ma otuco pe, pe tye ŋat mo ma owinyo ka wubedo ka loko gin mo.
Icaya 41:27 An Rwot aye akwoŋo tito lok man bot jo Cion, dok bene acwalo lakwena ocito i Jerucalem wek otit lok maber bot jo ma bedo kunnu.
Icaya 41:1150 
Icaya 41:28 Ento ka aŋiyo piny aneno gin lwak lubaŋa-gu, pe anoŋo mo acel ma twero miyo tam, ma twero dok i peny ma apenyo.
Icaya 41:29 Nen, gin ducu konygi pe, ticgi ma gitiyo ducu mwa; calgi ma gitiyo ki mola ma giliyo, ducu mwa calo yamo.”
Icaya 42:1 Rwot owaco ni, “Nen, laticca ma an akonyo, ma an kikoma aye ayero ma cwinya yom i kome. Doŋ atyeko keto cwiny Maleŋ i ko me, en doŋ bikelo ŋolo kop atir bot jo me rok ducu.
Icaya 42:2 En pe bikok dok pe bidaŋŋe kun ilo dwane malo, pe gibiwinyo dwane i waŋa yo;
Icaya 42:3 en pe bituro lagada ma okak, dok pe bineko mac tara ma Lyel niminimi; en bikelo ŋolo kop atir ki gen.
Icaya 42:4 En bibedo ki gen nakanaka ma cwinye pe balle nio ka doŋ omiyo ŋolo kop atir oromo lobo ducu; lobo ma i dog nam ducu gitye ka kuro cikke.
Icaya 42:5 Rwot Lubaŋa ma oketo polo, ka doŋ oryeyo ocuŋ atir, ma oyaro wi lobo ki jami ma tye iye ducu, ma omiyo yweyo bot jo ducu ma bedo iye, ki kwo bot jo ducu ma woto iye, en owaco kuman ni,
Icaya 42:6 “An Rwot, doŋ atyeko lwoŋi me bedo ki kit ma atir, amako ciŋi, dok bene agwok i: doŋ atyeko miyi woko bot lurok macalo gicikke, me bedo ceŋ ma menyogi.
Icaya 42:7 In aye ibiyabo waŋgi, wek igonygi woko ki i mabuc ka ma gitweyogi iye, wek bene ikwanygi wo ko ki i piny macol ka ma onoŋo gibedo iye.
Icaya 42:8 An nyiŋa Rwot, pe amiyo deyona bot ŋat mo mukene, kadi wa pak ma gipaka kwede bene pe abimiyo bot cal jogi ma gipayo apaya.
Icaya 42:9 Nen, gin mukwoŋo ma yam atito pire doŋ otimme woko, kombeddi atito botwu pi gin manyen; ma pud peya ocako timme.” Wer me pako Rwot
Icaya 42:10 Wuwer wer manyen me pako Rwot, wupake wun lobo ducu! Wek nam omor kacel ki jami ducu ma tye iye, lobo ma tye i dog nam ki jo ducu ma bedo iye.
Icaya 42:11 Tim aroo ki lwak gaŋi ducu ma tye iye myero gupak Rwot, jo Kedar ducu myero gupake! Wek jo ma gibedo i Cela guwer pi yomcwiny, wek bene gudaŋŋe ki woo ki i wi godi pi yomcwiny.
Icaya 42:12 Dano ducu ma gibedo i dog nam ka mabor, myero bene gupak Rwot, kun gimiye deyo.
Icaya 42:13 Rwot cito ka lweny calo oteka lweny, akemone tugge calo dano ma lalweny, en daŋŋe dok bene wo ki dwan maloŋo adada, ento nyuto tekke i kom lukworre. Rwot ocikke me konyo jone
Icaya 42:1151 
Icaya 42:14 Lubaŋa owacci, “Aliŋ aliŋa doŋ pi kare malac twatwal, abedo ka diyo cwinya kun pe agamo dog jona; kombeddi doŋ abicako yelle pigi, myero doŋ acak omo cwinya ki yweyo calo dako ma tye ka colle ki arem me nywal.
Icaya 42:15 Abibalo lobo ma obe to godi godi kacel ki godi ducu, dok bene abimiyo gill ducu ma otwi iye two woko; abimiyo kulu ma pii tye iye two tal woko likaŋ, abimiyo pii two woko liweŋ ki i kabedo ducu ma yam pii logo iye.
Icaya 42:16 Abitelo lutowaŋ, i yo ma gin pe ŋeyo, i yo ma yam peya guwok ki iye, en aye abipeyogi ki iye. Abimiyo colpiny ma-yam umogi woko-ni doko leŋo, ka ma obedo burbur abipiro woko doko mapwot. Magi aye gin ma abitimo, pe abitenyogi ata liyak.
Icaya 42:17 Dano ducu ma gigeno cal jogi ma gipayo apaya, gin jo ma waco bot cal jogi ni, ‘Wun aye Lubaŋawa,’ gibidwokogi cen ki lewic madwoŋ twatwal.” Jo Icrael waŋŋi pe oyabbe i kare ma gipwonyogi
Icaya 42:18 Rwot dok owacci, “Wuwiny lokka wun ludiŋit, wun lutowaŋ bene wuyab waŋwu, wek wunen piny.
Icaya 42:19 Tye ŋat mo ma wane oto calo waŋ laticca, nyo ite odiŋ calo it lakwena ma aoro- ni? Aŋa ma waŋe oto calo waŋ danona ma doŋ otyeko dyero kwone pira, nyo ma waŋe oto calo waŋ laticca an Rwot?
Icaya 42:20 Icrael neno jami mapol twatwal, ento pe keto cwinye me nenogi maber, ite tye twolo ma romo winyo lok, ento pe winyo gin mo wacel.
Icaya 42:21 Pi kit ma atir pa Rwot, en mito ni giwor cikke, wek obed ki deyo.
Icaya 42:22 Ento man jo me rok ma doŋ giyakogi, dok gimayo limgi woko, gin ducu doŋ gicikogi woko ki bur, gikanogi woko i ot mabuc; gudoko doŋ ginayaka pa dano laboŋo ŋat ma larogi, gin doŋ mere ginayaka laboŋo ŋat mo ma waco ni, ‘Dwok cen kakare!’
Icaya 42:23 Aŋa i kinwu ma biciko ite ka winyo lok man, aŋa ma biketo cwinye wek cwiny pi kare ma tye anyim?
Icaya 42:24 Aŋa ma omiyo Yakobo i ciŋ ŋat ma oyake, ki Icrael i ciŋ luyak? Meno pe obedo Rwot ma wan watimo bal i nyime-ni? Pe en aye Rwot ma gukwero lubo yo ma en mito-ni; ma bene gukwero lubo cikke wokoni?
Icaya 42:25 Pi meno omiyo en ocoro Lyeto me akemone i komwa, ki tek me mony; macce olyel oromo i lobolcrael ducu, ento wan pe wamedo ki niaŋ gin ma tye ka timme, macce owaŋowa, ento pe waparo pire wacel.”
Icaya 43:1 Kombeddi doŋ Rwot Lubaŋa ma oketo in Yakobo, ma ocweyo in Icrael, owaco kuman ni, “Pe ilwor, pien doŋ atyeko koko in woko. An alwoŋi ki nyiŋi, in i mega.
Icaya 43:1152 
Icaya 43:2 Ka ibiwok ki i dye nam matut, abibedo kwedi, abigwoki; pii ma i kulu bene pe bimwonyi; kadi ibiwot iwok ki i dye mac, pe ibiwaŋ, leb mac pe bigudo komi.
Icaya 43:3 Pien an a Rwot Lubaŋani, an ŋat Maleŋ pa Icrael ma lari. Abimiyo Ejipt calo lim mo me koko in, Etiopia ki Seba bibedo gin ma giwili kwede.
Icaya 43:4 Pien in ibedo gin me wel mada bota, piri dit, dok amari adada, meno aye gin mumiyo amiyo dano me koko in, dok amiyo rok mapatpat pi laro kwoni.
Icaya 43:5 Pe ilwor, an atye kwedi, abikwanyo likwayi woko ki yo tuŋ wokceŋ akelogi kany, dok abicoko joni woko ki yo tuŋ potoceŋ adwokogi kany bene.
Icaya 43:6 Abiwaco bot jo ma tye yo tuŋ acam ni, ‘Doŋ wuweke,’ dok abiwaco bot jo ma tye yo tuŋ acuc ni, ‘Pe doŋ wumedde ki make;’ wek awobena kacel ki anyirana gudwog woko doŋ ki ka mabor, wek gua gudwog cen ki i lobo ducu.
Icaya 43:7 Gin jona, gilwoŋogi ki nyiŋa, an ma aketogi dok acweyogi wek guket deyo i koma.” Jo Icrael gubedo caden pa Rwot
Icaya 43:8 Lubaŋa owaco kuman ni, “Wukel lwakka i kabedo me ŋolo kop. Waŋgi tye, ento pe gineno piny; itgi tye, ento pe giwinyo loko
Icaya 43:9 Wek rok ducu gucokke kacel, mi dano ducu gucokke kunnu i ka ŋolo kop. Aŋa i kingi ma twero tito lok man, ma twero nyuto botwa gin ma yam doŋ otimme wa con? Myero gukel cadengi pi tito lok i komgi wek gulo lok, wek ka doŋ guwinyo lok, gumok kacel ni lokke kakare dok ada.”
Icaya 43:10 “Wun jo Icrael, wun cadenna,” Rwot ma owaco, “wun wubedo luticca ma an aye yam ayero, wek wuneya dok bene wuye an, wuniaŋ atir ni an aye Lubaŋa kena. Cakke yam con lubaŋa mo pe obedo tye, dok bene pe doŋ mo bibedo tye ma biluba.
Icaya 43:11 “An kena aye a Rwot, pe dok tye ŋat mo mukene ma twero larowu.
Icaya 43:12 An yam atito pire, alarowu dok atuco lokke Ka maleŋ bot dano, i kare ma onoŋo lubaŋa mo ma welo pud pe i kinwu; wun bene wubedo cadenna,” Rwot ma owaco.
Icaya 43:13 “An Lubaŋa, pud bene abimedde me bedo Lubaŋa nakanaka; pe dok tye ŋat mo mukene ma twero larogi ki i ciŋa: pe tye ŋat mo ma twero geŋa tiyo ticca.” A woko ki i lobo Babilon
Icaya 43:14 Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael ma larowu owaco kuman ni, “Me larowu, abicwale mony i kom jo Babilon; gibituro rii me dogcel woko ducu, woo my yomcwiny pa jo Kaldaya bilokke doko kumo.
Icaya 43:15 An a Rwot Lubaŋawu Maleŋ, an aye ma acweyowu wun jo Icrael, dok an kabakawu.”
Icaya 43:16 Rwot yam oyabo yo i dye nam, en mumiyo yo obedo tye i dye pii ma katone tek adada.
Icaya 43:1153 
Icaya 43:17 En opeyo dul mony matek twatwal okelogi ci onekogi woko, ki lwak gadigadi kacel ki aguragura. Gin ducu gupoto piny ma pe dok giromo a malo, odiyogi woko licwic calo mac tara ma gineko.
Icaya 43:18 En Rwot owaco ku man ni, “Wiwu myero doŋ owil woko i kom gin ma yam otimme con twatwal, pe wubed ka tamo gin ma yam doŋ otimme woko con.
Icaya 43:19 Myero wucik waŋwu wunen gin manyen ma atye ka timone; kombeddi doŋ tye ka timme. Wun pe wuneno ce? Abituco yo baro ki i dye tim, ki kulu bicako bedo tye i tim aroo kunnu.
Icaya 43:20 Lee tim ducu gibiwora, too ki udu gibipaka; pien amiyo pii onen i dye tim ata, ki kulu i tim aroo, pi miyo pii ki jona ma ayero wek gumati.
Icaya 43:21 Gin rok ma an aye acweyogi pira kena, wek guwer wer me paka.”
Icaya 43:22 Rwot owaco ni, “Ento in yam pe iwora, in Yakobo, onoŋo doŋ iol kweda woko, in Icrael.
Icaya 43:23 Onoŋo doŋ pe ikelo romini ityero bota me gitum awaŋa, onoŋo bene pe doŋ iwora ki gitummi. Anbene pe abedo ka yeli pi gitum, pe bene abedo ka olo komi pi odok luban.
Icaya 43:24 Pe iwilo lum makur ki lim ikelo bota, dok pe imiya ayeŋ ki moo dwolo me gitumwu ma wubedo ka tyerone bota. Ento wumiya atiŋo peko me balwu kun wuolo koma ki balwu maraco twatwal-li.
Icaya 43:25 “Myero wuŋe ni an a en, ajwayo balwu woko; atimo ku meno pi kit ma an atye kwede, pe doŋ abipo pi balwu.
Icaya 43:26 Wupo wiya wek walar lok kacel kwedwu, wukel lok ma nyuto ni lokwu tye atir wek wulo giwu kop.
Icaya 43:27 Kwarowu mukwoŋo bene obalo, lulocwu bene yam gutimo roc mapol i koma.
Icaya 43:28 Pi meno amiyo kipwola i kom rwodi ma giloyo kabedo maleŋ woko, amiyo Yakobo odoŋ me aneka, Icrael doŋ odoko gin ayeta pa dano.”
Icaya 44:1 Rwot owaco kuman ni, “In laticca Icrael, winy ba, wun jona ma ayero, likwayo pa Yakobo.
Icaya 44:2 An a Rwot ma aketi, ma acweyi nia ii meni, an aye ma abedo ka konyi i kare ma kwo doŋ cakke i komi. Pe ibed ki lworo Yakobo, pien in laticca, in Jecurun ma an aye ayero.
Icaya 44:3 “Pien abionyo pii i lobo mutwo, ma pii pe iye, abimiyo ora kulu toŋŋe cako mol i lobo mutwo; abiketo Cwiny Maleŋ i kom likwayi, dok abimiyogum bene bot likwayi.
Icaya 44:1154 
Icaya 44:4 Gibibedo maber calo lum ma pii oromo kome, calo yat ma odoŋo i ŋet kulu ma piine mol.
Icaya 44:5 Jo mogo gibiwacci gin jo pa Rwot, gibicako bino bot jo pa Yakobo me ribbe kwedgi, jo mukene bicoyo nyiŋ Rwot i ŋut ciŋgi, doŋ gibilwonne kengi ni gin dano ma tye i kin jo pa Icrael.”
Icaya 44:6 Rwot ma en kabaka me Icrael, Rwot me mony ma laro jo Icrael owaco ni, “An aye abedo mukwoŋo ki me agikki; pe dok tye lubaŋa mo mukene kono an keken.
Icaya 44:7 Aŋa ma calo an, ma twero tito kikore gin ma bitimme i kare me anyim, cakke ki i acakkine o kwede wa i agikkine? Wek gutit botwa gin ma bibedo i anyim.
Icaya 44:8 Pe wulwor, komwu bene pe omyel; yam atito lok man botwu woko con, kun anyuto jami ducu ma bitimme. Wunyam wubedo cadenna. Dok tye Lubaŋa mo mukene ma pe an? Tye dok Lubaŋa mo matek twatwal ma an peya awinyo pire?” Woro cal jogi meno tim me migo
Icaya 44:9 Dano ducu ma tiyo cal jogi gubedo jo ma konygi pe, dok cal jogi ma pigi tek botgi-ni pe konyo gin mo kadi ki acel. Jo ducu ma giworo cal jogi meno gin lutowaŋ ma pe giniaŋ; gin jo-nu gibimiyo lewic makogi matek.
Icaya 44:10 Aŋa ma tiyo cal jok, nyo ma liyo cal me awora ma twero konyo gin mo?
Icaya 44:11 Nen, gibimiyo lewic mako jo ducu ma giworo cal jogi macalo meno. Jo ma tiyo cal jogi-nu gubedo dano adana mamwa. Myero gin ducu gucokke kacel, gubin gucuŋ i kabedo me ŋolo kop; lworo bimakogi, dok alee bene bitwodogi gin ducu.
Icaya 44:12 Latet nyonyo tiyo ticce ki mac. Tek ma tye i bade en aye tiŋo kwede nyol me luŋo nyonyo. Kec neko, orwo pii bene make matek, ci miyo tekone cako dok woko piny.
Icaya 44:13 Ento lapac cako pimo bao, ci cero ka waŋe woko ki kalam kalu, cwero ki rana, ka doŋ cako pimone ki gi-ticce. En yu bo calle-nu woko tiyo bedo calo dano kikome, ma noŋo nen maber bene twatwal calo dano, me aketa i ot me worone.
Icaya 44:14 En twero toŋo yadi cedar, nyo twero yero yat mo ma tye i buŋa i tim, ci toŋo gire. Kare mukene en kikome pito yat cedar, ka kot ocwer ci miyo doŋo.
Icaya 44:15 Lacen yat meno bikonyo dano macalo yen me awaŋa i mac, kun dulle mukene bedo me tiyo cal jok. Dulle tuŋcel bedo me kuto mac me aoya ki me tedo; dul mukene en doŋ bitiyo ki cal jok me aworane.
Icaya 44:16 Nucu dulle en kuto ki mac, bulo ki riŋo me acamane ma miyo en limoteko. Ka doŋ tye ka oyo mac ci wacci, “Macce mit adada! Olyeto koma doŋ atika!”
Icaya 44:17 Ka dulle mudoŋŋe ducu en tiyo ki caljokke me aworane; en woro calle-nu, kun lego ni; “In aye lubaŋana, lara do!”
Icaya 44:1155 
Icaya 44:18 Jo-nu pe giŋeyo dok bene pe giniaŋ gin ma gitiyo, Pien cal jok ma giworo-ni oumo waŋgi woko, pe, giromo neno piny; tamgi bene oballe woko pe gitwero niaŋ i gin ma tye ada.
Icaya 44:19 Pe tye ŋat mo i kin jo ma tiyo cal jogi ma tamo tam, nyo ma tye ki ŋec, ma twero niaŋ ci miyo wacci, “Nucu yat ma atiyo ki cal jok-k i mogo awaŋo woko i mac, lodine atedo ki mugati, abulo ki riŋo ci acamo woko; dulle mukene ma doŋ odoŋŋe en aye atiyo ki cal jokka me awora. An doŋ atye kany ka woro odul yat en.”
Icaya 44:20 En moko buru; tamme me miŋo ca omiyo en doŋ orwenyo woko matwal, ma pe doŋ romo larre kene, pe bene twero niaŋ ni cal jok apaya ma emako i ciŋe-ni pe lubaŋa kadi ki acel. Rwot aye ma oketo dok en aye ma olaro jo Icrael
Icaya 44:21 Rwot owaco ni, “In Yako bo koŋ ipo i lok magi, myero ipo ni in laticca. An yam aketi ni ibed laticca, wiya pe biwil i komi wacel, in Icrael.
Icaya 44:22 Doŋ ayweyo balli woko ducu calo pol, ki tim maraco ducu ma yam ibedo ka timogi doŋ aketogi woko bene macalo lupu. Doŋ idwog cen bota, pien doŋ atyeko koki woko.
Icaya 44:23 “Wudaŋŋe ki wer me yomcwiny, wun lwak me polo, pien Rwot doŋ otyeko tiyo lok man! Wudaŋŋe ba, wun tut-piny! Wuwo ki wer, wun godi ducu, ki yadi ducu ma tye i buŋa i tim. Pien Rwot doŋ okoko Yakobo, deyone doŋ binen i kom Icrael.”
Icaya 44:24 Rwot ma oketi, ma ocweyi ki meni, ma en Rwot Lalar meri waco kuman ni, “An aye a Rwot ma oketo jami ducu, aryeyo polo kena; i kare ma atiyo lobo ŋat mo onoŋo pe ka ŋeta, ma okonya ki tiyone.
Icaya 44:25 Amiyo lanen pa lugoba odoko gin ma konnye pe, dok amiyo lutyet gudoko jo mamiŋ; acoro jo maryek adwokogi cen, amiyo guŋeyo ada ni ryeko kara pe gin mo.
Icaya 44:26 Amiyo lok ducu ma luticca gutito ocobbe kakare, gin ma lukwenana guwaco bene amiyo ocobbe. A waco bot Jerucalem ni dano dok bibedo i iye kunnu, ki gaŋ me Juda ni dok gibigerogi odoco; ka ma yam wi obur doŋ bidoko gaŋ.
Icaya 44:27 Aciko pii ma i nam matut ki ma i kulu ducu ni myero odwon woko, ci pii bene odwono woko.
Icaya 44:28 Awaco bot Ciro ni en bibedo laloc ma kakara, ni en bitiyo gin ma amito ni otine; en bimiyo gigero Jerucalem, dok bimiyo giketo te guti ot me wora.”
Icaya 45:1156 
Icaya 45:1 Rwot owaco ni, Ciro doŋ odoko kabaka ma doŋ atyeko wirone ki moo, amako ciŋe ma lacuc aketo en me loyo rok mapol, acwale wek ocit otur teko pa luker woko, atye ka yabo nyime ma pe dok biumme.
Icaya 45:2 Rwot owaco bot Ciro ni, “Abitelo nyimi, abiyubo yo bedo mapwot piri, abituro doggola ma gitiyo ki mola woko liweŋ, abitoŋo nyonyo rii me dogcel-gu aturo woko bene.
Icaya 45:3 Abimiyo boti lim ma gikano ka macol, ki jami mogo ma gikano i kabedo ma tye i muŋ, wek iŋe ni an Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, an aye ma atyeko yeri dok alwoŋi ki nyiŋi.
Icaya 45:4 Aketi ni ikony laticca Yakobo, jo Icrael ma gin jona, meno aye gin mumiyo ayeri; alwoŋi ki nyiŋi, amiyi nyiŋ pak kadi bed pe iŋeya.
Icaya 45:5 “An keken aye abedo Rwot, pe dok tye Rwot mo mukene, Lubaŋa mo mukene bene doŋ pe kono an keken; abimii teko kadi pe iŋeya.
Icaya 45:6 Man atimo wek dano guŋe ni an kena aye a Rwot, cakke ki i but lobo tuŋ potoceŋ o kwede tuŋ ka mukene, pe dok tye lubaŋa mo mukene kono an keken.
Icaya 45:7 An aye ma aketo leŋo ki colpiny, amiyo kuc bedo tye ki can bene bedo tye, an Rwot aye ma atiyo jami magi ducu.
Icaya 45:8 Abionyo loc o piny i lobo kun a ki i polo, abimiyo cwer calo kot, lobo biyabbe pi gamo larrre, dok bedo ki kit ma atir bene bicakke i lobo; an Rwot abimiyo lok man timme ada. Rwot aye ma oketo jami ducu
Icaya 45:9 “Dano ma pyem ki Lubaŋa ma okete bineno can. Agulu lobo twero pyem ki ŋat ma ocweye? Lobo twero penyo lacwe agulu gin ma en tiyo? Nyo agulu twero waco bot lacwe agulu ni pe gitiye maber?
Icaya 45:10 Latin ma penyo wonne ni, ‘In inywalo aŋo?’ latin-nu bineno can; nyo ma penyo minne ni, ‘Gin aŋo ma miyo it ye ka winyo arem me nywal?’ ”
Icaya 45:11 Rwot, en ŋat Maleŋ ma oketo Icrael, owaco kuman ni, “Wun pe wuromo penya lok i kom litinona, dok bene pe wutye ki twero mo me titta gin ma myero ati.
Icaya 45:12 An aye ma aketo lobo, ka doŋ aketo dano me bedo iye: aryeyo polo obedo tye kit macalo tye kwede-ni pi tekka, an bene aye ma aciko jami ma i polo ni gubed kit macalo gitye kwede-ni.
Icaya 45:13 An aye ma aketo Ciro i ticce me loc, abimiyo en cobo tic ducu kakare, en bigero gaŋŋa, dok bigonyo jona woko ki i opii, pe pi cul nyo kadi pi pwoc mo ma abimiyo bote.” Man lok ma Rwot me mony aye owaco.
Icaya 45:14 Rwot owaco ki Icrael ni, “Lonyo ducu me. Ejipt ki jami acata ducu me Etiopia, gin ducu bidoko meri, ki jo Seba ma gin twoni jo maboco, gin ducu gibibino boti ci gidoko opiini, gibilubo kori ma noŋo doŋ gitweyogi woko ki nyor, gibiryebbe piny
Icaya 45:1157  i nyimi ka wori. Gin ducu gibimwolle woko i nyimi kun giwacci, ‘In keken giri aye it ye ki Lubaŋa, in keni, lubaŋa mo mukene doŋ pe kono meri-ni keken.’ ”
Icaya 45:15 Ada, in aye ibedo Lubaŋa ma kanne woko, ai Lubaŋa pa Icrael, in aye ma ilaro dano.
Icaya 45:16 Lewic bimako jo ducu ma tiyo cal jogi, alee bitwodo gin ducu.
Icaya 45:17 Ento jo Icrael Rwot bilarogi woko, lar ma en larogi kwede biri nakanaka; lewic pe bimakogi wacel, alee mo bene pe bitwodogi liweŋ.
Icaya 45:18 Pien Rwot aye gire ma oketo polo, en bene aye ma obedo Lubaŋa! En ocako tic me keto lobo, ci otiyo otyeko, en omiyo ocuŋ omoko matek kakare. En yam pe oketo lobo ci oweko woko kun onyobbe atata, en oketo ni dano twero bedo iye. En Rwot aye ma owaco ni, “An a Rwot, pe dok tye Rwot mo mukene.
Icaya 45:19 An yam pe aloko lok i muŋ, i lobo ma tye i piny macol, an gira yam pe awaco bot likwayo pa Yakobo ni, ‘Wubiyenya i kabedo ma obedo atata.’ An Rwot aloko lok ada, dok anyuto gin ma tye kakare.” Rwot ki cal jogi me Babilon
Icaya 45:20 Rwot owaco ni, “Wucokke kacel, ci wubin, wubin wunyik cok, wun jo me rok mapatpat ma doŋ wubwot. Jo ma bedo ka tiŋo cal jogi ma gipayo apaya gin jo ma pe giniaŋ gin mo kadi ki acel; gubedo ka lego cal jok ma pe twero larogi-ni.
Icaya 45:21 Wubin wunyut lokwu i kabedo me pido; wek jo ma pido gupennye kengi. Aŋa ma oweko lok man oŋene cakke i kare macon? Pe an Rwot aye ma ceŋ atimo? Pe dok tye lubaŋa mo mukene kono an keken, an aye Lubaŋa ma kite atir, ma laro dano, pe dok tye mo mukene kadi ki acel.
Icaya 45:22 “Wulokke wubin bota, wek alarwu, wun jo ma bedo i wi lobo ducu! Pien an Lubaŋa kena, pe tye mo mukene.
Icaya 45:23 An doŋ atyeko kwoŋŋe ki nyiŋa kena, lok ma aloko tye atir; lok meno pe bipoto piny i ŋom ma noŋo pe ocobbe. ‘Jo ducu gibirumo coŋgi i nyima, dano ducu gibikwoŋo kwoŋ ki nyiŋa.’
Icaya 45:24 “Dano gibiwaco ni, kit ma atir ki tek gire noŋŋe ki bot Rwot; jo ducu ma yam cwinygi obedo ka waŋ i kom Rwot, gibibino bote ma noŋo lewic makogi mada.
Icaya 45:25 Likwayo Icrael ducu gibiloyo kop pi Rwot, ci gicako doŋ bedo ki deyo.”
Icaya 46:1 “Jogi pa jo Babilon doŋ cok gik woko! Bel ki Nebo ma yam giworo-ni, kombeddi doŋ gudoko gin ma lee tiŋo, man doŋ gudoko yec mapek twatwal ma miyo lee ol adada.
Icaya 46:2 Gin ducu doŋ gukulle piny, guguŋo kacel, cal jogi pe gitwero larre kengi; ento doŋ gimakogi woko gimito terogi i opii.
Icaya 46:1158 
Icaya 46:3 “Wuwiny lokka, wun jo me ot pa Yakobo, wun jo ma wudoŋ i ot pa jona Icrael. Abedo ka gwokowu cakke wa ki i i megiwu, atiŋowu cakke i kare ma ginywalowu.
Icaya 46:4 An Lubaŋawu ma bigwokowu, abigwokowu nio waŋ ma wuti; abibedo ka tiŋowu kadi wa i kare ma noŋo lwar doŋ otwi i wiwu. An aye ma aketowu dok agwokowu bene, abikonyowu, dok abilarowu.
Icaya 46:5 “Wupora ki aŋa mono? Tye ŋat mo ma rom kweda? Wupora do wek wabed calcal.
Icaya 46:6 Jo ma jobo jabu ajoba ki i kicaa Em, ma gipimo ryal ki mijan, giculo lim bot latet jabu wek oti botgi cal jok, ka doŋ giryebbe piny i nyime ka worone.
Icaya 46:7 Gitiŋo giketo i wi gwokgi, gicibo i kabedone, ci cuŋ iye matwal, kun pe twero a woko kene ki i kabedone-nu. Ka dano mo kok bote pi kony, en pe gamo doge, pe laro dano meno ma okok bote i kare me canne.
Icaya 46:8 “Ber wupo i kom lok man, wun lubalo; koŋ wutam, wulwod lokke ki i cwinywu.
Icaya 46:9 Wupo i kom gin ma yam otimme con, pien an Lubaŋa kena, pe dok tye mo mukene ma cal kweda.
Icaya 46:10 Cakke con i acakki piny, anyuto kit ma gin man bitimme kwede woko, ki kit ma bigik kwede bene. Awaco ni gin ducu ma ayubo bicobbe, dok abitimo gin mo keken ma ayubbe me tiyone.
Icaya 46:11 Abilwoŋo dano calo acut ki yo tuŋ wokceŋ; dano meno bia ki ka mabor, me cobo gin ma doŋ atyeko yubo con. Doŋ aloko, dok abicobone, doŋ atyeko yu bone, dok bene abitimo.
Icaya 46:12 “Wuwiny lokka, wun jo ma cwinywu nwaŋ, wun jo ma wutamo ni larre bor kwedwu twatwal.
Icaya 46:13 Nino ma abilarowu iye doŋ cok, pe doŋ bor wacel, pe abigalle me laro dano, abilaro Cion, pi Icrael ma anoŋo deyona pire.”
Icaya 47:1 Rwot owaco ni, “In Babilon ma imwonya mada, in gaŋ pa jo Kaldaya ma irom ki nyako ma peya oŋeyo laco mo, bin ilor piny ibed i apwa! Bed piny i nom, pe i wi komker! Pien pe dok gibiwaco ni, in iyom twatwal, pe iromo tiyo gin man.
Icaya 47:2 Kwany nya kidi wek ireg moko, gony kitambara woko ki i wii, luny boŋoni mabor-ri woko wek tyeni odoŋ noŋo, ŋol ki i dye kulu ikat loka tuŋcel.
Icaya 47:3 Ibidoŋ munero, komi ma myero pe onen doŋ binen ka maleŋ. An doŋ aculo kwor, pe abiweko dano mo bwot kadi ki acel.”
Icaya 47:4 Ŋat ma kokowa nyiŋe Rwot me mony, en ŋat Maleŋ pa Icrael.
Icaya 47:1159 
Icaya 47:5 Wubed ma Wuliŋ mot, kun wutye i piny macol, wun jo Kaldaya; pien pe doŋ gibilwoŋo gaŋwu ni mego ma loyo rok mapol.
Icaya 47:6 Kiniga yam omaka i kom jona, amiyo gubedo calo gin kipyeda; amiyo gubedo i te locci, ento kica pe omaki i komgi wacel; okol ma itweyogi kwede obedo mapek twatwal bot jo muteggi.
Icaya 47:7 Onoŋo iwaco ni ibibedo ka loyo rok mapol nakanaka, omiyo pe giri iketo cwinyi i lok magi, kadi po pi kit ma bigik kwede bene pe ipo,
Icaya 47:8 Pi meno winy lok man, in ma imaroyomcwiny twatwal-li, ibedo ka ramo ni pe tye ŋat mo ma rom kwedi, dok ni pe ibibedo macalo dato nyo ni kadi ki litinoni bene pe bito.
Icaya 47:9 Kit can aryo-nu ducu bipoto i komi, i nino acel, i dakika mo manoknok; to pa litino ki doko dato, gin ducu bipoto i wii lawaŋacel magwa, kadi bed itim lwak tim jokjok mapol ata, kadi bed doŋ it yet tyet ma rom mene.
Icaya 47:10 In noŋo doŋ itamo ni it ye ki kuc i kom tim maraco ma ibedo ka timone-gu, kun itamo ni ŋat mo pe ma neni. Ryekoni kacel ki ŋec ma it ye kwede gubedo ka rwenyi arwenya, ibedo ka tamo ki i cwinyi ni pe tye ŋat mo ma rom kwedi.
Icaya 47:11 Ento gin marac bipoto i komi, ma pe itwero timo gin mo mejukone. Can bipoto i komi, ma pe ibitwero kwanyone wacel; to bene bipoto i komi oyot mada, ma in pe iŋeyo iye gin mo.
Icaya 47:12 Cuŋ matek i tyet dok imedde ki timo tim me jokjok, ma yam ibedo ka timone cakke wa i tinoni; gwok nyo man twero konyi i yo mo, nyo bene twero miyo dano gilwori.
Icaya 47:13 Tekoni doŋ otum woko, kadi bed gitye ka miyo boti tam twatwal; koŋ gin doŋ gubin gulari, gin jo ma ŋeyo poko polo, ki jo ma ŋiyo lakalatwe kun giciko wangi malo ligaŋ, jo ma ka i por dwe manyen ducu gitito gin ma bitimme i komi-ni.
Icaya 47:14 Nen girom ki cuŋ kai, mac waŋogi woko; pe gitwero laro kwogi pigi kengi, ki i tek me leb mac. Mac man pe obedo mac me aoya, pe bene mac ma gitwero bedo i ŋete.
Icaya 47:15 Jo ma ibedo ka yelle kwedgi-ni tye kit meno ki tun boti, ma ibedo ka balo kareni botgi cakke wa ka tinoni. Gin ducu gibitenyi wokc ata liyak, kun ŋat acel acel cito i yone pat; ŋat mo ma bilari pe.
Icaya 48:1 Koŋ wuwiny man, wun jo me ot pa Yakobo, ma gilwoŋowu ki nyiŋ Icrael, wun likwayo pa Juda. Wun wukwoŋo kwoŋ I nyiŋ Rwot, kun wutuco bene nyiŋ Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ento pe i ada, dok pe i yo ma atir.
Icaya 48:1160 
Icaya 48:2 Ento gilwoŋŋe kengi ni gin jo me gaŋ maleŋ, dok gijeŋŋe i kom Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma nyiŋe Rwot me mony.
Icaya 48:3 “Yam atito con gin ma bitimme i-anyim, lokke yam okatti ki i doga, ci amiyo dano guŋeyo woko; aruyugi me timme oyotoyot, ci bene otine ocobbe kakare.
Icaya 48:4 Pien onoŋo aŋeyo ni cwinywu nwaŋ, kun wujiŋo ler ŋutwu woko bene matek calo nyonyo, dok tur nyimwu bene obedo macalo mola;
Icaya 48:5 en mumi yo yam atittiwu lokke con, atuco lok man botwu con ma peya otimme, wek ka otimme pe wuwac ni cal jogiwu aye mutimo, kun wumedde ki waco ni cal apayawu ki cal ma wuliyo aliya ki mac aye ma guwaco ni otimme.
Icaya 48:6 “Doŋ wutyeko winyo lok man, kombeddi doŋ wuneno gin magi ducu; pe wubitito pire? Cakke kombeddi cito kwede anyim abimiyo wuwinyo jami mogo manyen, gin mukene ma pe wun wuŋeyo kadi acel.
Icaya 48:7 Pud amiyo timme kombeddi, pe con twatwal; peya yam wuwinyo pigi kadi ki acel, wek pe wuwac ni yam onoŋo wuŋeyogi con.
Icaya 48:8 Peya yam wuwinyo pigi, dok bene peya onoŋo wuŋeyogi, cakke wa con itwu onoŋo pud odiŋ woko. Pien onoŋo aŋeyo woko ni wubibedo ki tim aranyi me goba, dok bene cakke wa ki i ic, onoŋo wubedo jo ma lujemo.
Icaya 48:9 “Koŋ abimiyo kinigana galle pi nyiŋa, koŋ abijuko kinigana woko piwu wek dano gupaka, wek pe atyekwu woko.
Icaya 48:10 Nen, doŋ atyeko Iiyowu woko, ento pe macalo ryal, atemowu i mac buk me can magwa adada.
Icaya 48:11 Man atimo pira kena, atimo pira kena, atwero weko gipyedo nyiŋa niŋniŋ? Pe atwero miyo deyona wacel bot lubaŋa mo mukene. Rwot bikoko jo Icrael
Icaya 48:12 “Wuwiny lokka, wunjo pa Yakobo wun jo Icrael ma an alwoŋowu. An a en, an aye abedo mukwoŋo dok abedo me agikki.
Icaya 48:13 An aye ma aketo te guti me lobo ki ciŋa, ayaro polo ki ciŋa lacuc; ka alwoŋogi, ci gin ducu a kacel.
Icaya 48:14 “Wun ducu wugurre kacel, wek wuwiny lokka. Aŋa i kingi ma otito ni gin magi bitimme? ŋat ma an Rwot amaro en aye abioro me cobo yubba i kom Babilon, en bilwenyo i kom jo Kaldaya.
Icaya 48:15 An gira, an kikoma doŋ aloko, dok bene doŋ atyeko lwoŋe woko, doŋ akele, nyime bibedo leŋ, bibedo bene maber.
Icaya 48:16 Wunyik cok bota kany, wek wuwiny: cakke i acakki piny, pe aloko gin mo i muŋ, cakke i kare ma ocako timme, onoŋo atye kunnu.” Kombeddi Rwot Lubaŋa doŋ oora ki Cwiny Maleŋ.
Icaya 48:1161 
Icaya 48:17 Rwot ma en ŋat Maleŋ me Icrael, ma en aye okokowu ki i opii, owaco kuman ni, “An a Rwot Lubaŋawu amito pwonyowu wek wubed maber, kun atelowu i yo ma myero wuwot iye.
Icaya 48:18 Kono yam wubedo ka winyo cikka, kono ber! Kono kucwu omol calo kulu ma mol jwi, kono wuloyo lok calo nam ma piine mol laboŋo yweyo-ni.
Icaya 48:19 Likwayowu kono calo kweyo, dano ma gua ki i komwu kono doŋ gidwoŋ calo apwa; kono nyiŋgi pe orwenyo kadi ki acel, kono bene pe gijwerowu woko liweŋ ki i nyima.”
Icaya 48:20 Wua woko ki i Babilon, wuriŋ woko ki bot jo Kaldaya, wunyut lok man kun wugoyo kijira, dok wutit pire bene, wucwallokke ocit wa i agikki piny, kun wuwaco ni, “Rwot doŋ okoko laticce Yakobo woko!”
Icaya 48:21 I kare ma en obedo ka telogi i tim, orwo pii pe onekogi matek; omiyo pii otuc omol pigi, kun a ki i kom pata got, obaro got ci pii onyette woko ka maleŋ.
Icaya 48:22 “Kuc pe pi jo ma gin lutim maraco” Man lok ma Rwot owaco.
Icaya 49:1 Wuwiny lokka, wun lobo ma wutye i dog nam, wucik itwu wuwiny, wun rok ma wua ki ka mabor. Rwot olwoŋa ma onoŋo pud atye i ic, ocako nyiŋa ma onoŋo pud atye i kom maa.
Icaya 49:2 En omiyo lok ma katti ki i doga obedo bit calo lak pala lucwan, okana woko i tipo ciŋe; en omiyo adoko calo atero ma gipako lake, okana woko i juro aterone.
Icaya 49:3 En owaco ni, “In laticca, in Icrael ma abinoŋo deyo pire.”
Icaya 49:4 Ento an awacci, “Ayelle me tiyo tic noŋo, atyeko tekona woko ducu nonono, laboŋo kony mo; ento kadi bed kumeno, gin ma myero pira tye bot Rwot, Lubaŋa gire bicula pi tic ma atiyo.”
Icaya 49:5 Ma pud peya ginywala, onoŋo Rwot doŋ oyera woko, en oketa me bedo laticce ma bidwoko jo pa Yakobo cen bote, ki me coko jone jo Icrael ma yam guket woko ata, pien Rwot oketo deyo i koma, Lubaŋana aye miya teko.
Icaya 49:6 En Rwot owaco ni, “Doko laticca obedo gin mayot twatwal me tiŋo kaka pa Yakobo mapatpat malo, ki me dwoko Icrael ma agwoko cen; an doŋ abiketi me bedo ceŋ bot lurok, wek imi larre oo wa i agikki piny ducu.”
Icaya 49:7 Rwot ma en ŋat Maleŋ me Icrael, ma en aye koko jo Icrael, en owaco kit man bot ŋat ma gicayo matek, ŋat ma rok papatpat doŋ okwero woko, ma tye macalo latic pa luloc: “Luker bineni ci gia woko malo, rwodi bineni ci giryebbe woko piny; man bitimme pi Rwot, ma en lagen, ŋat Maleŋ me Icrael ma oyeri.”
Icaya 49:8 Rwot owaco kuman ni, “Yam agamo dogi i kare me timo ber bot dano, yam akonyi i kare me laro dano, atyekogwoki bene, dok amiyoibedo macalo gicikke
Icaya 49:1162  bot rok ducu, abimiyo doŋ ibedo i lobo pa kwarowu ma kombeddi doŋ odoko obur-ri.
Icaya 49:9 Abiwaco bot lumabuc ni, ‘Wukatti woko,’ ki bot jo ma tye ka macol ni, ‘Wukatti woko ka maleŋ.’ Gibibedo calo romi ma camo lum i ŋet yo ducu, ka camgi bibedo i wi cere ducu ka ma yadi pe iye.
Icaya 49:10 Kec pe binekogi, kadi orwo pii bene pe binekogi, yamo malyet ki cen bene pe biwaŋogi, pien ŋat ma kica omako i komgi aye ma bitelogi, bitelogi kelogi wa i ŋet waŋ it ma piine gunnye agunya ki i ŋom.
Icaya 49:11 Abiketo yo wok ki i wi godina ducu, gibituco yo gudona cito malo i wi godi.
Icaya 49:12 Nen, gibia ki ka mabor, kun gia ki tuŋ acam ki yo tuŋ potoceŋ, jo mukene gibia ki i lobo Ciene.”
Icaya 49:13 Wer wer ki yomcwiny, in polo, cwinyi obed yom ba in lobo; wumwoc ki wer, wun godi! Pien Rwot doŋ okweyo cwiny jone, kica bimake i kom jone ma guneno can twatwal.
Icaya 49:14 Ento jo Cion guwacci. “Rwot doŋ obwotowa woko ata, wiye doŋ owil woko i komwa.”
Icaya 49:15 Ci Rwot ogamo cutcut ni, “Wi dako twero wii i kom latinne ma en doto, kica pe twero make i kom wode ma en onywalo? Kadi bed dano wiye twero wil, ento an wiya pe biwil i komwu.
Icaya 49:16 Nen, in Cion doŋ atyeko goro nyiŋi woko ki coc i ci ŋa, celli tye i nyima kare ducu.
Icaya 49:17 “Lugedoni gibitic oyot twatwal, makato jo ma yam guyaki, jo ma muki amuka bia woko ki boti.
Icaya 49:18 Tiŋ waŋi malo, nen kabedo ducu; gin ducu gicokke gibino boti. Rwot owaco ni, ‘Kit macalo atye kwo-ni, ibirukogi calo gin me deyo, ibitweyogi i komi kit macalo dako manyen tweyo ki tiko me wel i ŋute.’
Icaya 49:19 “Adada, wi oburri doŋ odoŋ noŋo, loboni doŋ otyeko balle woko; ento kombeddi doŋ bibedo madiŋ mada bot jo ma bibedo kunnu, jo ma yam gumwonyi woko-ni doŋ gibibedo ka mabor.
Icaya 49:20 Litinoni ma ginywalogi i opii, pud dok ibiwinyo giwaco ni, ‘Kabedona diŋ twatwal; myero dok gimed kabedo botwa.’
Icaya 49:21 Ibicako pennye kekeni ki i cwinyi ni, ‘Aŋa ma onywalo jo magi? An yam abedo lalur, dok abedo ki cwercwiny madit, gikwanya gitera woko cen calo opii; aŋa kono dok ma opito litino magi? Koŋ inen, yam adoŋ kena, ento litino magi dok gua ki kwene kono?’ ”
Icaya 49:1163 
Icaya 49:22 Rwot Lubaŋa owaco ki jone kuman ni, “Nen, abiryeyo ciŋa bot lurok, ci abitiŋo benderana malo bot rok mapol; gibikelo awobeni kun gikwakogi i korgi, dok bene gibitiŋo anyirani i wi gwokgi;
Icaya 49:23 luker bidoko wegi litinoni ci gipitogi, mon pa luker bibedo macalo megigi ma bidotogi. Gibiryebbe piny i nyimi ka wori, gibiŋano apwa ki i tyeni. Meno bimiyo iŋeyo ni an a Rwot; lewic pe bimako jo ma kura.”
Icaya 49:24 Gitwero kwanyo jami ayaka woko ki i ciŋ dano matek, nyo gitwero mayo opii woko ki i ciŋ dano mager?
Icaya 49:25 Ento Rwot owaco kuman ni, “Opii ma dano matek omakogi, gibimayogi woko ki bote, jami ayaka ma tye i ciŋ ŋat mager bene gibikwanyo woko ki bote, pien abipyem ki jo ma pyem kwedwu, ci abilaro litinoni woko.
Icaya 49:26 Abimiyo jo ma unowu gicamo riŋo komgi kekengi, dok gibimato remogi kekengi gimer kwede calo gumato koŋo Vino. Meno bimiyo dano ducu ŋeyo ni, an a Rwot ma Lalarwu, ŋat Matek pa Yakobo ma kokowu.”
Icaya 50:1 Rwot owaco kuman ni, “Waraga me keto nyom ma yam aryemo ki minwu tye kwene, ma ceŋ amiye i kare ma onoŋo aryeme-ni? Yam acatowu bot aŋa i kin jo ma yam onoŋo acamo banyagi? Nen, yam gicatowu pi balwu, dok pi turo cik, en aye ma oweko giryemo minwu woko.
Icaya 50:2 “Piŋo kono yam pe anoŋo dano mo i kare ma abino-ni? Dok i kare ma alwoŋo lwoŋo, piŋo ŋat mo kono pe ogamo doga? Wutamo ni ciŋa cek, pe twero koko wu? Tekona pe me larowu? Koŋ inen, nam otwo woko i kare ma ajuko, atwero loko kulu ducu doko tim aroo; rec ma i igi bidoko coo pi can pii, gito woko pi orwo pii.
Icaya 50:3 Atwero bene loko polo doko macol licuc, ci aumo woko ki boŋo cola.” Woro ma latic pa Lubaŋa tye kwede
Icaya 50:4 Rwot Lubaŋa doŋ opwonya i lok ma myero aloki, wek aŋe lok ma miyo teko bot dano ma ool. En coya woko ki i waŋ nino kare ducu odiko, en coya awiny gin ma en pwonya kwede.
Icaya 50:5 Rwot Lubaŋa doŋ otyeko yabo ita woko, pe ajemo, pe bene alokke ŋeya,
Icaya 50:6 Aloko ŋeya bot jo ma goya, dok bene aloko lema bot jo ma telo yer tika; pe akano waŋa woko ki lewic ki i laa ma giŋulo iye.
Icaya 50:7 Pien Rwot Lubaŋa konya, mumiyo alee mo pe otwoda; meno omiyo waŋa obedo matek calo got, dok onoŋo aŋeyo bene ni pe gibiketo lewic i wiya;
Icaya 50:8 pien ŋat ma bimiyo aloyo kop tye cok kweda. Ŋat mo tye ma mito pido kweda? Owek wacuŋ kacel kwede i nyim lukiko. Aŋa ce ma lakworra-ni? En mono obin cok i ŋeta kany.
Icaya 50:1164 
Icaya 50:9 Nen, Rwot Lubaŋa konya, aŋa ma biŋolo kop loya ni an labal? Nen, gin ducu gibiti woko calo boŋo, nyenye bicamogi woko.
Icaya 50:10 Aŋa i kinwu ma lworo Rwot, ma winyo lok ma laticce waco? Aŋa ma woto i piny macol ma pe neno yo ma en tye ka wot iye-ni, ento geno gire Rwot, kun jeŋŋe i kom Lubaŋane?
Icaya 50:11 Nen, wun jo ducu ma wumoko mac, wun jo ma moko mac i kom yen! Wuwot i dero mac ma doŋ wumokoni, kun noŋo mac ma wumoko i lak yen ca lyel menyo yo botwu. Gin ma wubinoŋo ki bota en ene: wubibuto piny ma noŋo wutye ki arem madit twatwal.
Icaya 51:1 “Wuwiny lokka, wun jo ma wumito larre, wun jo ma yenyo Rwot; koŋ wunen got ma yam gipayowu ki iye, ki bur madit adada me gweŋ matek ma gikwinyowu ki iye.
Icaya 51:2 Koŋ wutam pi kwarowu Abraim, ki Cara ma obedodawu; i kare ma alwoŋo Abraim onoŋo pe tye ki latin mo, ento lacen amiye gum, ci onywalo litino, dok anyayo likwaye odoko mapol twatwal.
Icaya 51:3 Pien Rwot bikweyo cwiny Cion; bikweyo cwiny kabedone ducu ma gibalo woko, tim ma iye bibedo calo Eden, ki tim aroo mutwo bibedo calo poto pa Rwot; yomcwiny madwoŋ bibedo tye kunnu, kun dano giwero wer me pwoc ki me pak.
Icaya 51:4 “Wuwiny lokka, wun jona, wuter itwu wuwiny lokka, wun rokka; pien abimiyowu cik, ki ŋolo kop atir ma bibedo macalo cen bot lurok.
Icaya 51:5 Kare me locca doŋ onyiko cok twatwal, larre ma abikelo tye ka bino, an ki koma aye abiloyo rok ducu; lobo ducu ma tye i dog nam gitye ka kura, gitye ki gen ni abilarogi.
Icaya 51:6 Wutiŋ waŋwu malo i polo, dok wukul waŋwu piny wunen lobo; pien polo ma wuneno-ni biket woko macalo yito, ento lobo biti woko calo boŋo, ka doŋ jo ma bedo iye gito woko calo ober; ento larre ma abikelo biri nakanaka, locca pe bigik wacel.
Icaya 51:7 “Wuwiny lokka, wunjo ma wuŋeyo kit ma atir, wun jo ma doŋ wumako cikka i cwinywu; pi meno pe wubed ki lworo kadi dano cayowu, cwinywu bene pe myero oballe ka ce giyetowu.
Icaya 51:8 Pien nyenye bicamogi woko calo boŋo, okok bene bicamogi woko calo yer romo, ento locca pe bigik wacel, larrena bibedo pi yalwak me kare ducu.”
Icaya 51:9 Co, co woko ki i waŋ nino, wek iruk teko, in ciŋ Rwot; co woko macalo i kare ma okato, ki lwak jo me kare macon. Pe in aye yam iŋolo Rakab iŋido woko matitino, icobo min kulu ineko woko?
Icaya 51:1165 
Icaya 51:10 Pe in aye ma yam imiyo pii ma i nam otwo woko, pii madit ma onoŋo yam tut twatwal-li; pe imiyo yo obaro dye nam matut ca, wek jo ma gikokogi gukat ki iye wa loka nam tuŋcel?
Icaya 51:11 Jo ma Rwot okokogi bidwogo i Cion, gibibino kun giwero wer. Yomcwiny ma ri nakanaka pe birwenyo ki i wigi, gibibedo ki yomcwiny madwoŋ, cwercwiny ki cur bia woko ki botgi.
Icaya 51:12 “An aye abedo ŋat ma kweyo cwinyi. Piŋo ilworo dano mamwa ma to woko-ni, latin pa dano ma giketo calo lummi?
Icaya 51:13 Piŋo wii owil woko i kom Rwot ma oketi, ma oryeyo polo, dok bene ma ocibo te guti me lobo? Piŋo kono ibedo ki lworo nakanaka nino ducu, pi akemo malyet pa jo ma giuno dano wadigi, ka ce gucako ticgi me neko dano? Akemo malyet pa ŋat ma uno dano-ni kono tye kwene?
Icaya 51:14 Ŋat ma onoŋo gitweyo macalo mabuc gibigonyo woko oyotoyot; en pe bito donyo piny i bur lyel, cam bene pe biremme.
Icaya 51:15 Pien an a Rwot Lubaŋani, ma tugo pii ki i nam, miyo twagge kun mor, nyina Rwot me mony.
Icaya 51:16 Doŋ atyeko keto lokka i dogi, akano waŋi woko bene doŋ i tipo ciŋa, aryeyo polo, aketo te guti me lobo, awaco bot jo Cion ni, ‘Wun wujona.’ ”
Icaya 51:17 Co woko ki i waŋ nino, co woko, a malo, in Jerucalem, in ma doŋ imato kikopo me akemo ma Rwot aye omiyo boti, i kare ma imato ducu, ci icako tagge.
Icaya 51:18 Pe tye ŋat mo ma twero peye, i kin litinone ducu ma en onywaloni; pe tye ŋat mo ma twero mako ciŋe, i kin litino ducu ma en opitogi.
Icaya 51:19 Can magi aryo-ni ducu opoto i komi lawaŋ acel, aŋa ma binywako kumo pi can magi kacel kwedi? Giyako loboni gibalo woko liweŋ, kec ki neko dano opoto iye magwa; man aŋa ma bikweyo cwinyi?
Icaya 51:20 Awobeni guwille woko, gubuto piny liraba ka ma yo ogik iye ducu, calo til ma omoko ki obwo; akemo pa Rwot doŋ oketo komgi woko, ki juk ma Lubaŋani obedo ka jukogi kwede.
Icaya 51:21 Pi meno, wun jona ma giunowu doŋ wuwiny lok man, wun jo ma wumer, ento pe wumer ki koŋo vino.
Icaya 51:22 Rwot Lubaŋawu ma pido lok pa jone owaco kuman ni, “Nen, doŋ atyeko kwanyo kikopo woko ki i ciŋwu, en kikopo ma miyo wumer wutagge-ni; agulu me akemona pe dok wubimedde ki matone.
Icaya 51:23 Doŋ abimiyo i cin jo ma unowu, ma yam doŋ guwaco botwu ni, ‘Wuryebbe piny wek wukati’; omiyo wuloko ŋewu doŋ odoko ŋom me anyonagi, dok ŋewu onoŋo doŋ tye macalo yo ma gilubo.”
Icaya 52:1166  Lubaŋa bilaro Jerucalem ki i opii
Icaya 52:1 Co woko, co woko ki i waŋ nino, ruk tekoni, in Cion; ruk boŋŋini mabecone, in Jerucalem, gaŋ maleŋ, pien dano mo ma pe giliro, ki jo ma komgi ki keni, pe dok gibidonyo boti.
Icaya 52:2 Teŋ apwa woko ki i komi wek ia malo, in Jerucalem ma yam ibedo opii. Wugony tol woko doŋ ki i ŋutwu, wun jo Cion ma yam wubedo opii.
Icaya 52:3 Pien Rwot owaco kuman ni, “Pe yam giculo lim mo me wilowu, dok bene pe gibiculo lim mo me kokowu.
Icaya 52:4 Yam wuwoto wucito i lobo Ejipt macalo lubedo, lacen jo Aciria guunowu laboŋo bal mo.
Icaya 52:5 Koŋ wunen kombeddi dok gitero jona woko i Babilon nonono; gitye ka ŋalo lulocgi, dano gitye ka cayo nyiŋa dyeceŋ jwi.
Icaya 52:6 Pi meno jona doŋ gibineya, wubiŋeyo ni an Lubaŋa, wubiŋeyo ni an a en ma atye ka lok kwedwu.”
Icaya 52:7 Neno tyene ber mada i wi godi, ŋat ma kelo lok maber, ma tito pi kuc, ma kelo lok maber me gin maber, ŋat ma tito lok me larre, ma waco bot Cion ni, “Lubaŋani tye ka loc.”
Icaya 52:8 Koŋ iwiny, lukur gaŋŋi gitye ka wer ki dwan maloŋo, giwero wer me yomcwiny kacel; pien gitye ka neno Rwot ki wangi, kun tye ka dwogo cen i Cion.
Icaya 52:9 Wumwoc ki wer lawaŋacel, wun ducu, wun wi obur Jerucalem; pien Rwot doŋ okweyo cwiny jone, doŋ okoko Jerucalem woko.
Icaya 52:10 Rwot doŋ oyabo tekone maleŋ ka maleŋ i nyim rok ducu; dano ducu ma i wi lobo gibineno, kit ma Rwot Lubaŋawa olarowa kwede.
Icaya 52:11 Wua, wua woko, wua woko ki kunnu, pe wugud gin mo ma kome ki keni; wua woko ki kunnu, wek wucit wulonnye kekenwu, wun jo ma tino jami pa Rwot.
Icaya 52:12 Pe wubia oyotoyot ma komwu myel, pe bene wubiriŋo ariŋa, pien Rwot bitelo nyimwu Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael bibedo i ŋewu kun gwokowu cawa ducu, Can pa latic pa Rwot
Icaya 52:13 Rwot owaco ni, “Nen, tic pa laticca tye ka wot maber, gibiwore ci gitiŋe malo: en bibedo dano mamalo twatwal.
Icaya 52:14 Jo mapol ma gunene gubedo ki ur matek; waŋe onoŋo nen pat mada ki waŋ dano, ki kome bene onoŋo pe rom ki kom dano.
Icaya 52:15 En bipoyo kom rok mapol kit meno, luker ducu doggi bitwo woko pire; pien gibineno gin ma yam pe gitittigi pire, dok gibiniaŋ i gin ma yam peya guwinyo pire.”
Icaya 53:1167 
Icaya 53:1 Rwot, aŋa ma yam oye lok ma wan watito? Dok aŋa ma Rwot onyuto tekone bote?
Icaya 53:2 Pien odoŋo i nyime calo ginapita ma pud tye ka doŋo adoŋa, ma pud lwite donyo adonya i ŋom mutwo. En pe tye ki kom mo maber nyo deyo ma kono omi wacik waŋwa i kome, gin mo ma ywayo tam padano onoŋo pe bote kadi ki acel, dok gin mo ma twero miyo wabedo ki tam i kome bene pe.
Icaya 53:3 Dano gicaye gikwere woko-gu, obedo ki cwercwiny madwoŋ ki arem madit ma okato kare. En bedo calo ŋat ma dano guumo waŋgi woko i kome, dano gicaye, ma pe waparo pire wacel.
Icaya 53:4 Adada, en ociro can piwa, otiŋo aremwa ducu i kome; gigoye dok gitime marac atika, mumiyo wabedo ka tamo ni Lubaŋa aye ma oketo can man i kome.
Icaya 53:5 Yam gicobe pi balwa, giketo ret i kome pi timwa marac; can ma giketo i kome-ni okelo kuc botwa, pi goc ma gigoye kwede omiyo wacaŋ,
Icaya 53:6 Wan ducu onoŋo yam waŋak warwenyo woko calo romi, ŋat acel acel onoŋo okwanyo yone kene, ento Rwot doŋ otiŋo balwa ducu oketo i kome.
Icaya 53:7 Yam giune, giketo can i kome, ento en pe oŋamo doge me loko lok mo; calo latin romo ma gitero ka nekone, dok calo romo ma oliŋ i nyim lunyar yerre, kit meno en pe oŋamo doge me loko.
Icaya 53:8 Giune, giŋolo kop i kome, ka gikwanye woko; aŋa kono ma oparo pi gin ma otimme i kome, ni gikwanye woko ki i lobo pa jo makwo, gigoye pi bal pa jo me rokwa?
Icaya 53:9 Gikwinyo lyelle kacel ki lyel pa lutim maraco, dok kacel ki lulonyo i kare me tone, kadi bed onoŋo en pe otimo bwami mo, dok pe oloko lok goba ki doge.
Icaya 53:10 Ento Rwot aye yam omito ni giket can i kome; omiyo obedo ki twon arem madit. I kare ma en bimine kene me bedo gitum pi bal, en bineno likwaye, ci bimedo nino me kwone bene. En bicobo gin ma Rwot doŋ mito yubo;
Icaya 53:11 bineno doŋ gin maber ma oa ki i cwercwiny ma yam owok ki iye; meno bikweyo cwinye. Laticca ma kite atir, bimiyo gikwano jo mapol ni kitgi atir; en bitiŋo balgi ducu i kome.
Icaya 53:12 Meno bimiyo amiyo bote kabedo me woro i kin jo madito, en bene binywako jami ma giyako i lweny kacel ki jo matego. Pien en doŋ omine kene me to woko, mumiyo gikwane kacel ki lubalo; ento en otiŋo bal pa dano mapol, dok obako doge olego pi lubalo adada.
Icaya 54:1 “Wer wer ki dwan maloŋo, in dako ma lalur ma pe yam inywalo latin mo-ni, mwoc ki wer kun idaŋŋe matek, in dako ma pud peya yam arem ogoyi! Pien litino
Icaya 54:1168  pa dako ma giweko odoŋ kene bibedo pol makato litino pa dako ma ginyomo ma bedo kacel ki cware, man Rwot ma owaco.
Icaya 54:2 Med kabedo me kemani obed malac, wek giyar boŋŋi aŋaba me kicikani woko i kabedoni; pe ibed ladur, med tolli obed maboco, dok bene gur teke me kemani ocuŋ matek likiŋ.
Icaya 54:3 Pien waŋ loboni bimedde dok tuŋ lacuc ki tuŋ lacam, likwayu bileyo kabedo pa lurok dok gibinya gipoŋo gaŋŋi ducu ma yam gudoŋ obur-ri.
Icaya 54:4 “Pe ilwor, pien lewic pe bimaki; pe iwek alee otwodi, pien pe gibiketo lewic i komi. Wii biwil woko i kom lewic ma yam onoŋo ibedo kwede me tinoni, pe dok ibipo i kom cac ma gibedo ka cayi kwede pi bedo keni macalo dato.
Icaya 54:5 Pien ŋat ma ocweyi aye obedo cwari, nyiŋe Rwot me mony: ŋat mukoki ki i can en aye ŋat Maleŋ me Icrael, gilwoŋe ni Lubaŋa me wi lobo ducu.
Icaya 54:6 “Pien Rwot doŋ otyeko lwoŋi woko, calo dako ma gibwoto odoŋ kene, kun tye ki cwercwiny, calo dako ma ginyomo ma onoŋo en pud nyako ka giryemo woko, man Lubaŋani ma owaco.
Icaya 54:7 Yam onoŋo aweki keni pi kare mo manok keken, ento abidwoki woko bota ki kica madwoŋ.
Icaya 54:8 Yam akano waŋa woko ki boti, pi kare manok ma onoŋo akemona dwoŋ twatwal, ento abitimo kica boti ki mar ma pe gik, man Rwot ma Lakok meri aye ma owaco.
Icaya 54:9 “Pien man ki tuŋ bota rom aroma ki kare pa Nua: kit macalo akwoŋo ni pii pa Nua pe dok bimedde ki poŋ i wi lobo ducu, kit meno bene doŋ akwoŋo nikiniga pe doŋ bimaka i komi, dok bene pe abijuki.
Icaya 54:10 Pien godi twero a, ki cere-gu gitwero kobo woko ka mukene, ento marra ma pe lokke pe bia ki i komi, dok cikkena me kuc pe gibidiro woko cen. Meno lok pa Rwot ma kica omake i komi. Jerucalem manyen
Icaya 54:11 “In gaŋ ma ineno can, ma yamo okodo i komi ki tek, ma pe gikweyo cwinyi, nen, abimwono got meri ki libi, dok abiketo te gutini ki capir.
Icaya 54:12 Abitiyo wi labila odini ki tiko makwar me wel, dogcelli abitiyo ki got makwar ma mil amila, ki kor celli doŋ abideyo ki litino kidi me wel mapatpat.
Icaya 54:13 “Litinoni ducu Rwot aye bipwonyogi, litinoni gibibedo maber twatwal.
Icaya 54:14 Kit ma atir bimiyo ibedo icuŋ matek: pe gibiuni kadi ki acel, lworo mo pe bimaki pire; jo ma giuni pe gibinyiko cok ka ŋeti.
Icaya 54:15 Ka ce dano biero daa i komi, meno noŋo pe oa ki bota; ŋat ma ero daa i komi bipoto gire pire kene.
Icaya 54:1169 
Icaya 54:16 “Nen, an ma aketo latet, ma buko lodi mac, ci teto jami lweny pi ticce; dok bene aketo ŋat ma labal lobo wek ojwer jami woko ducu.
Icaya 54:17 Pe tye jami lweny mo ma giteto pi lweny i komi ma bicobo ticce, ibiloyo lok me adot ducu ma gikelo i komi. Man aye gum ma lutic pa Rwot binoŋo, loyo kopgi a ki bota, man lok pa Rwot kikome.”
Icaya 55:1 “Wubin wutwom pii, wun jo ducu ma orwo nekowu; ŋat ma limme mo pe, myero bene obin owil cam. Wubin wuwil koŋo vino ki cak laboŋo lim, laboŋo wel mo.
Icaya 55:2 Piŋo wubalo limwu i kom gin ma pe kwon, piŋo kono wutyeko tekowu woko ka noŋo gin ma pe yeŋowu? Wucik itwu atika i lokka, ci wucam cam maber, dok wubed ki yomcwiny pi cam ma miyu ma amiyowu,
Icaya 55:3 Wucik itwu wuwiny lokka, ci wubin bota; wuwiny lokka, wek wubed kwo; ci abicikke kwedwu i gicikke ma ri nakanaka, abimiyowu mar mera ma pe lokke, ma genne, ma yam aciko pi Daudi.
Icaya 55:4 Nen, yam akete obedo caden bot lurok, latel ki lami-cik bot lurok.
Icaya 55:5 Nen, wun wubilwoŋo rok mapatpat ma pe wuŋeyogi, ki rok mapol mapatpat ma yam pe gineyowu gibiriŋo gibino botwu, pi Rwot Lubaŋawu, ma en ŋat Maleŋ me Icrael, pien en doŋ otyeko keto deyo i komwu.
Icaya 55:6 “Wuyeny Rwot i kare-ma en pud twero noŋŋe, wukok bot Rwot ma pud en tye cok.
Icaya 55:7 Latim marac myero obwot timme marac, ki dano ma pe kite atir bene owek tamme ma pe ber-ri; olokke odwog cen bot Rwot, wek Rwot otime kica, myero odwog cen bot Lubaŋawa, pien en biweko balle woko ducu.
Icaya 55:8 “Pien tamma pe tamwu, ki yowu bene pe yona,” man Rwot ma owaco.
Icaya 55:9 Kit macalo polo tye malo ka mabor makato lobo-ni, yona bene tye malo kit meno makato yowu, ki tamma bene tye malo kato tamwu woko.
Icaya 55:10 “Kit macalo kot ki pee corre bino piny kun gia ki i polo, ma pe dok gidok malo kunnu, ento gikweyo lobo, miyo ginapita twi ci doŋo, mi yo kodi bot laco-kodi ki miyo kwon bene bot dano me acama,
Icaya 55:11 lok ma a ki i doga bene bibedo kit meno; pe bidwogo bota noŋo ma noŋo pe otiyo gin mo, lokka bitiyo gin ma amito ni oti, dok bicobo gin ma acwale pire.
Icaya 55:12 “Pien wubikato woko kun wucito ki yomcwiny, gibiterowu ki kuc; godi ducu ki cere ducu ma i nyimwu gibimwoc ki wer licur, ki yadi ducu me tim biyeŋŋe ki yomcwiny.
Icaya 55:1170 
Icaya 55:13 Yat ciprec bitwi ma ka okuto; ki yadi ma ŋwecgi kur bitwi ma ka ocok; meno bibedo gin me po nakanaka, ma pe birwenyo, me nyuto ni an Rwot aye ma cen atiyo man.”
Icaya 56:1 Rwot owaco bot jone kuman ni, “Myero wuŋol kop atir, dok wuti gin ma tye atir, pien doŋ acok larowu, lar ma alarowu kwede binen ka maleŋ.
Icaya 56:2 Dano ma timo man tye ki gum madwoŋ, ki dano ma omako matek likiŋ, ma gwoko ceŋ cabit kun pe pyedo, dok gwoko ciŋe pe timo gin marac.”
Icaya 56:3 Larok mo ma obino oribbe ki Rwot pe myero owac ni, “Rwot bikoya woko matwal ki i komjone miyo abedo kaikena”; ki dano ma gikolo bene pe myero owac ni, “Nen, doŋ atye macalo yat ma otal.”
Icaya 56:4 Pien Rwot doŋ owaco kuman ni, “Jo ma gikologi ma gigwoko cen cabitta, ma giyero tiyo gin ma yomo cwinya, ma gumako gicikkena likiŋ,
Icaya 56:5 abimiyo botgi gin mo me po nyiŋgi ma bibedo i ot ka ma giwora iye i dye gaŋŋa, maber makato bedo ki litino awobe nyo litino anyira; abimiyo botgi nyiŋ ma bedo matwal, ma pe birwenyo kadi ki acel.
Icaya 56:6 “Doŋ lurok ma guribbe ki Rwot, me tic bote, kun gimaro nyiŋe, dok ma gimine me bedo luticce, dano ducu ma gwoko ceŋ cabit, kun pe pyedo, ma omako gicikkena woko likiŋ,
Icaya 56:7 gin jo-nu aye abikelogi i got mera maleŋ, dok abiyomo cwinygi i ot me lega ka ma giwora iye. Abigamo gitum awaŋagi ki gityer ma gityero bota, magi ducu abigamo i wi keno tyerra; pien oda gibilwoŋo ni ot me lega pa jo me rok ducu.”
Icaya 56:8 Rwot Lubaŋa ma ocoko jo Icrael ma onoŋo giryemogi woko owaco kuman ni, “Dok abicoko jo mukene agurogi bota, amedo i kom jo ma doŋ atyeko cokogi-ni.” Kop oloyo lutel pa jo Icrael
Icaya 56:9 Wun lee tim ducu wubin, wumwod riŋo, wun lee ducu ma wubedo i buŋa.
Icaya 56:10 Lukur-piny pa jo Icrael ducu wangi oto, gin ducu gipe ki ŋec kadi ki acel, gin ducu gicalo gwogi ma te lebgi oto, pe dok gitwero gweyo; gibuto piny gibedo ka lek aleka, gimaro nino nino matut keken.
Icaya 56:11 Gin gwogi ma giwor twatwal ma cam pe romogi. Gin lukwat ma pe giniaŋ gin mo; ŋat acel acel i kingi kwanyo mere yone kene, ŋat acel acel bene yenyo magobane kit ma cwinye mito.
Icaya 56:12 Gilwoŋŋe kekengi ni, “Wubin wacitu ka kelo koŋo vino, wubin wamatu kono makec wek wameru woko, diki dok binoŋŋe, madit makato ducu.”
Icaya 57:1171 
Icaya 57:1 Dano ma kite atir to, ŋat mo pe ma keto iye cwinye. Jo ma maro Lubaŋa gikwanyogi woko; ŋat mo pe ma paro pigi. Pien dano ma kite atir noŋo gikwanyo woko ki i can,
Icaya 57:2 en cako donyo i kuc; jo ma bedo kun cwinygi atir, giywe mot i kabutogi.
Icaya 57:3 Ento wun wubin wunyik cok bota kany, wun litino pa dako ma latal, ma latim abor aye onywalo ki malaya.
Icaya 57:4 Meno wutye ka nywaro aŋa ce? Wunamo dogwu malac kumeno i kom aŋa ma lebwu okatti woko kumeno-ni? Wun litino pa lutim bal, litino ma ginywalogi ki lok me goba,
Icaya 57:5 wun jo ma mitiwu pe kwe i te yat kworo, i te yadi ducu ma pote olot liyuk; ma wuneko litinowu woko i luŋ-gu, i te pata got ma obar?
Icaya 57:6 Gin ma gibipoko botwu tye i kin got mapwot ma tye i luŋ piny, gin jami-nu ducu mewu; pien doŋ wutyeko tyero gityer amata woko botgi, wukelo bene gityerwu me mo ko kwon, wutyero. Cwinya bibedo yom pi kodi tim macalo meno?
Icaya 57:7 Doŋ wuketo kabutowu i wi got ma wiye bor, wun doŋ wutyeko cito kunnu ka tyero gitumwu bot jok.
Icaya 57:8 Wuketo bene cal jok i ne kika ki i ne yat me doggola; pi weka woko, omiyo wupeto kabutowu. Wudonyo iye ka wuyaro obedo malac; wutyeko cikke kwedgi woko doŋ piwu kenwu, dok bene wumaro kabutowu, wuneno tim munero me lewic.
Icaya 57:9 Wucito bot jok Molek ki moo, wumedo moowu ma ŋwece kur onya odoko mabup; wuoro lukwenawu gucito ka mabor, wucwalogi bene gucito wa piny i lyel.
Icaya 57:10 Wot mabor oolo komwu woko, ento pe wuwaco ni, “Konnye pe”; wunoŋo kwo manyen ma medo tekowu, omiyo pe wuwillee giwu i waŋayo.
Icaya 57:11 Aŋa ma onoŋo wulworo twatwal, ma omiyo komwu myel, ma oweko wuwaco lok goba, wiwu doŋ owil woko pewupo i koma, ma pe doŋ wutwero tamo pira? Pe atemo diyo cwinya pi kare malac, ma oweko pe wubedo ki lworo mo i koma?
Icaya 57:12 En kitwu ma wutamo ni tye atir-ri, ki gin ducu ma wutimo abituco woko ka maleŋ, ento magi ducu pe bikonyi.
Icaya 57:13 Ka ce wukok matek pi kony, gin cal jogiwu-ni myero gularwu do! Yamo bitiŋogi terogi woko, aluu dog bicwalogi woko wa cen. Ento ŋat ma riŋo laro bota bileyo lobo, dok bene bibedo i kom got mera maleŋ. Lubaŋa ocikke me konyo ki caŋo jone
Icaya 57:14 Gibiwaco ni, “Wutor yo, wutor yo, wuyub yo, wuput ajut-gu woko liweŋ ki i yo pajona.”
Icaya 57:1172 
Icaya 57:15 Lubaŋa ma en ŋat Mamalo Twal, ma bedo nakanaka i kabedo ma otiŋŋe malo, ma bedo matwal, ma nyiŋe leŋ-ŋi, owaco ni, “An abedo i kabedo maleŋ ma otiŋŋe malo, dok bene abedo kacel ki ŋat mamwol, ma cwinye cwer, dok ma ŋut, pi miyo kwo manyen bot jo ma cwinygi cwer dok ma giŋut.
Icaya 57:16 Pien pe abibedo ka pyem nakanaka, dok bene kiniga pe bimaka kare ducu, pien cwiny dano oa ki bota, an aye ma amiyogi yweyo me kwo, amiyo bedo tye.
Icaya 57:17 Bal pa jona ki paro lim aye oweko akeco; omiyo agoyogi, akanne woko, kun kiniga maka, ento gumedde ameda ki jemo kun gitiyo gin ma cwinygi mito.
Icaya 57:18 Doŋ atyeko neno kitgi, ento pud abicaŋogi; abitelogi, abiculogi bene ki gin ma kweyo cwinygi, kun amiyo jo ma kumo pigi giloko lok me pwoc.
Icaya 57:19 Abimiyo kuc bot jo ma tye ka mabor ki jo ma tye ka ma cok, dok bene abicaŋo jona.
Icaya 57:20 Ento jo maraco gubedo calo nam ma twagge, ma pe koŋ twero pye mot, kun piine kelo yugi ki coto keken.
Icaya 57:21 Kuc mo pe pi jo ma gin lutim maraco.” Man lok ma Lubaŋawa owaco.
Icaya 58:1 “Daŋŋe matek, pe iliŋ, yab dwani owinnye maloŋo calo koko tum, tit bot jona roc ma gin gutimo, tuc bot jo me ot pa Yakobo balgi.
Icaya 58:2 Nen kono giyenya nino ducu ba, cwinygi bene yom me ŋeyo gin ma an amito ni guti, ginyutte macalo jo me rok ma kitgi atir, ma pe giweko lubo-cik pa Lubaŋagi: gipenya bene pi ŋolo kop aitr, cwinygi yom pi bedo cok ki Lubaŋa.”
Icaya 58:3 Dano gipenyo ni, “Piŋo wabedo ka ri kec, kun in pe ineno? Piŋo kono wabedo ka mwolle kenwa i nyimi, kun in pe iparo lok mo iye wacel?” Lubaŋa ogamo ni, “Koŋ wunen, i nino me ri kecwu, wuketo mere tamwu i timo gin ma yomo cwinywu keken, kun bene wuuno jo ma tiyo tic botwu.
Icaya 58:4 Koŋ wunen, wun wuri kec ki daa dok ki lweny, wudoŋo dano bene ki ciŋwu ma wuŋino woko ki kolo pi lweny. Kit ri kecwu ma wutye ka ri i kare-ni, pe bimiyo dwanwu winnye malo i polo.
Icaya 58:5 Wutamo ni kit ri kecwu-ni en aye gin ma an ayero, nino mo ma dano mwolle kekene? Ri kec ma dano kulo iye wiye piny calo lagada ma okulle, peto boŋo cola, pworo buru iye, ka doŋ cako buto iye, wulwoŋo man ni ri kec, ki nino ma Rwot Lubaŋawu pwoyo?
Icaya 58:6 “Kit ri kec ma an amito ene: gonyo tol me tim maraco woko, ki gonyo okol woko ki i tyen opii, weko jo ma giunogi guwot i kuc, ki turo okol woko ki i tyen dano.
Icaya 58:7 Poko cam bot jo ma kec nekogi, kelo lucan ma pacogi pe i gaŋi; ka ineno dano ma tye munero myero iruk boŋo i kome, pe myero ikanne woko ki i nyim joni.
Icaya 58:1173 
Icaya 58:8 Ceŋ bituc boti calorupiny, waŋ bur ma tye i komi bicaŋ woko oyotoyot. Kit ma atir ma it ye kwede bitelo nyimi, deyo pa Rwot aye ma bigeno ŋeyi.
Icaya 58:9 Dok bene ibilwoŋo, ci Rwot gamo dogi, ibikok bote, en bigamo ni; ‘An ene.’ “Ka ce, ibikwanyo okol woko ki i kinwu, cimo dano ki lwet ciŋ ki loko lok maraco,
Icaya 58:10 ka ce ibimiyo kwori pi konyo jo ma kec nekogi, dok bene icobo miti pa jo ma giunogi, man bimiyo ceŋ tuc piri ki i piny macol, piny macol licuc boti bidoko macalo dyeceŋ.
Icaya 58:11 Rwot biteli i kare ducu, en bicobo mitini ki jami mabeco, bimiyo cogoni bedo matek; ibibedo calo poto ma gionyo pi i oromo iye maber twatwal, ibibedo macalo pii ma gunnye agunya kare ducu, ma piine pe two kadi ki acel.
Icaya 58:12 Gibigero gaŋ i wi oburri macon doki, ibigero i kom acakki te guti ma yam kwarowu gugero, gibilwoŋi ni in layub celma otur, ŋat ma yabo yo ma yam oballe ducu doko maber. Gwoko ceŋ cabit
Icaya 58:13 “Ka ce iworo ceŋ cabit macalo kabedo maleŋ, iweko timo gin ma yomo cwinyi i nino maleŋ, ka ce iworo ceŋ cabit macalo nino me yomcwiny, dok macalo nino ma Rwot olonyo ma obedo maleŋ me deyo; ka ce imiyo deyo bot Rwot, kun pe ilubo yoni keni, kadi ki yenyo gin ma yomo cwinyi, nyo loko lok atata;
Icaya 58:14 ci cwinyi bibedo yom i kom Rwot, abimiyo iriŋo i wi cere mutiŋŋe maloi lobo; ibibedo ki yomcwiny i lobo ma yam kwaru Yakobo oleyo, pien Rwot kikome aye ma doŋ owaco lok man.”
Icaya 59:1 Nen, bad Rwot pe odoko cek, ma pe doŋ twero laro dano, ite bene pe odiŋ ma pe romme winyo lok;
Icaya 59:2 ento timwu marac aye opokowu woko ki Lubaŋawu, balwu omiyo waŋe doŋ oumme woko i komwu, omiyo doŋ pe winyo kokowu.
Icaya 59:3 Pien remo doŋ onywano ciŋwu woko, lwet ciŋwu opoŋ ki tim me bal keken; dok bene wuloko lokgoba ki dogwu, ki lebwu bene muŋo lok me timo tim maraco.
Icaya 59:4 Pe tye dano mo ma doto lawote i lok ma tye ada, pe tye ŋat mo ma cito i lukiko ci pido pido kakare; dano ducu gijeŋŋe i lok ma tere pe kun giloko lok goba keken, giparo pi timo gin marac ma kela can.
Icaya 59:5 Dano ducu ginywalo tim marac calo toŋ lacocodo, giciko obwogi calo oboropyen; ŋat ma camo toŋgi to woko, ento ka onyono anyona ororo a iye.
Icaya 59:6 Ento obwogi macalo meno pe bikonyogi wacel, pe bikonyogi me aruka kadi ki me umme. Ticgi ma gitiyo obedo tic me bal, ki ciŋgi bene timo tim bwami.
Icaya 59:1174 
Icaya 59:7 Tyengi yot giriŋo kwede madwir ka timo gin marac, giwille awila me cito oyotoyot ka neko jo ma pe ki bal. Gitamo megi tam me cito ka timo gin marac, yak ki balle me lobo tye yo gudogi ducu.
Icaya 59:8 Pe giŋeyo yo me kuc, ŋolo kop atir bene pe i gudogi, gin gugomo yogi woko, pe tye ŋat mo ma wok ki iye ma ŋeyo kuc. Jo Icrael gutuco balgi
Icaya 59:9 Meno omiyo ŋolo kop atir bor kwedwa, kit ma atir bene peya oo botwa; wayenyo leŋpiny, ci wanoŋo mutu, ma ka woto i ceŋ wawoto i colpiny.
Icaya 59:10 Wabedo ka boŋo kor ot ki ciŋwa calo lutowaŋ, waboŋo calo jo ma waŋgi oto; wayokke ki wot ma piny pud leŋ calo watye ka wot i dyewor, wanen calo jo muto ki i kin jo ma komgi tek.
Icaya 59:11 Nen doŋ watye ka ŋur aŋura calo lee, wabedo ka kok akoka calo amam, wakuro ŋolo kop atir ento pe wanoŋo; wakuro larre, ento tye ka mabor kwedwa.
Icaya 59:12 Pien balwa doŋ odurre mapol i nyimi, roc ma watimo aye doŋ obedo caden i komwa; pud wapo i kom bal wa, waŋeyo gin marac ma watimo.
Icaya 59:13 Wakalo wi cik, wakwero Rwot woko, waweko bene lubo kor Lubaŋawa, kun waloko lok me uno dano kijemo, wagamo lok goba bedo i cwinywa, ci waloko bene ka maleŋ.
Icaya 59:14 Ento ŋolo kop atir gidwoko cen, kit ma atir bene pe doŋ nyiko cok i ŋetwa, ki ada bene opoto woko i kabedo Ducu i dye gaŋ, gin mo ma tye kakare pe doŋ noŋo yo me donyo.
Icaya 59:15 Ada doŋ pe matwal, ŋat ma kwero timo tim marac giyako jamine woko. Rwot oye konyo jone
Icaya 59:16 Rwot oneno ci cwinye ocwer matek, pien ŋolo kop atir doŋ pe. En oneno ni dano mo doŋ pe; ouro mada pien ŋat mo doŋ pe ma twero laro pigi. En kikome aye doŋ bilarogi ki tekke kene, kit ma atir bimiyo en cuŋ matek.
Icaya 59:17 Oruko kit ma atir macalo gin me geŋo kore, ki otaŋ nyonyo me lar bene oruko i wiye; cwiny me culo kwor bibedo macalo boŋo arukane, dok akemo biboyo kome woko calo jor.
Icaya 59:18 En biculogi kun poro kit macalo timgi tye kwede, akemo bot lumonene, ki cul bot lukworre; dok biculo cul marac bot lobo ma tye i dog nam.
Icaya 59:19 Meno bimiyo gilworo nyiŋ Rwot cakke ki yo tuŋ potoceŋ, ki deyone cakke ki i tuŋ wokceŋ; pien biruyo bino oyotoyot calo pii ma mol mager, ma yamo pa Rwot aye ma twago. Rwot owaco bot jone ni,
Icaya 59:20 “An abibino i Cion ka kokowu ki i opii, wun jo pa Yakobo ma wuweko timo gin marac.
Icaya 59:1175 
Icaya 59:21 “Doŋ ki tuŋ bota, man en aye obedo gicikke ma acikke kwede kwedwu, Cwiny Maleŋ ma mera ma doŋ atyeko miyo botwu, ki lokka ma doŋ atyeko keto i dogwu, pe doŋ bia ki i dogwu, kadi ki i dog litinowu, nyo i dog litino pa litinowu, cakke tin cito kwede anyim kun bedo bene nakanaka.”
Icaya 60:1 A malo ba, in Jerucalem, pien ceŋŋi doŋ otuc woko, deyo pa Rwot doŋ otuc ocaro komi woko.
Icaya 60:2 Nen, colpiny biumo lobo woko, mutu macol licuc biumo rok mukene woko, ento Rwot bituc pi caŋo komi, gibineno deyone i komi.
Icaya 60:3 Lurok gibibino i leŋ pinnyi, luker bibino i dero ceŋ ma otuc i komi.
Icaya 60:4 Tiŋ waŋi malo wek koŋ inen piny, jo ducu gibicokke kacel, gibibino boti; awobeni gibia ki ka mabor, anyirani gibitiŋogi atiŋa i kor.
Icaya 60:5 Ibineno ci komi biryeny aryenya, cwinyi bimyel ci icako bedo ki yomcwiny; pien lim mabup me nam doŋ gibiweko i ciŋi, ki lonyo pa rok mapol gibikelo boti.
Icaya 60:6 Lwak kinaga mapol biumi woko, litino kinaga me Midian ki me Epa; kadi wa jo me Ceba ducu gibibino boti. Gibibino gikelo jabu ki odok luban, gibitito ki pak pi gin mabeco ma Rwot otimo.
Icaya 60:7 Romi ducu me Kedar gibicokogi boti, nyogi romi me Nebayot bikonyi; gibikelo macalo gitum i wi keno tyer me atyera bota, ci agamogi, dok abimedo deyo i kom oda me deyo.
Icaya 60:8 Magi kono jo mene ma gituk calo pol-li, nyo macalo amam ma gidok i dog odigi?
Icaya 60:9 Pien rok ma tye i dog nam bikura, mel ma oa ki i Tarcic aye bitelo yo, me kelo Litinoni ki ka mabor kacel ki lonyo madwoŋ twatwal, pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋani ma en ŋat Maleŋ me Icrael, pien en doŋ oketo deyo i komi.
Icaya 60:10 Lurok bigero celli, lukergi bikonyi ki tic; pien i kare ma yam akemo omaka, agoyi, ento pi mitina kena doŋ atyeko timo kica boti,
Icaya 60:11 Dogcelli bibedo twolo kare ducu, pe gibiloro i dyeceŋ kadi i dyewor; wek dano gukel lonyo pa rok ducu boti, kun giwoto ma gidorre dorre me deyo kacel ki lukergi.
Icaya 60:12 Pien rok ki ker ma pe biye locci bito; kodi rok macalo meno pud dok gibibalo lobogi woko aye.
Icaya 60:13 Deyo me Lebanon bibino boti, ciprec ki yadi mabeco ducu, wek omi kabedona maleŋ onen ma mwonya; dok bene abimiyo kabedo me teno tyena poŋ ki deyo.
Icaya 60:1176 
Icaya 60:14 Litino pa jo ma yam giuni gibibino boti laguno; ki jo ma yam gubedo ka cayi gibiryebbe piny i te tyeni; gibilwoŋi ni in ibedo gaŋ pa Rwot, Cion ma obedo gaŋ pa ŋat Maleŋ me Icrael.
Icaya 60:15 Ento kono yam koŋ giweki ata, gikweri woko, kun ŋat mo pe wok boti, abimiyo ibedo dit nakanaka, jo me kare ducu bibedo ki yomcwiny piri.
Icaya 60:16 Ibibedo ka doto cak pa jo me rok ducu, ibidoto tuno pa luker; ibiŋeyo ni an a Rwot, anaye lalarri, dok an aye ma akoko in, an a Won Twero ma abedo Lubaŋa pa Yakobo.
Icaya 60:17 Ma ka mola, an abikelo jabu, ma ka nyonyo, abikelo ryal, ma ka bao, abikelo mola, ma ka gweŋ abikelo nyonyo. Abimiyokucaye bedo maka ludoŋo ma loyo tic, kit ma atir aye bibedo nyamparani.
Icaya 60:18 Tim me bwami pe dok biwinnye i loboni, kadi yak nyo kadi balle pa lobo pe binen i waŋ apokki loboni. Ibicako nyiŋ celli ni, Larre, ki dogcelli ibilwoŋo ni, Pak.
Icaya 60:19 Ceŋ pe dok bimenyi dyeceŋ, kadi Leŋo me dwe bene pe bimenyi dyewor; Rwot aye ma bimenyi nakanaka, Lubaŋani aye ma bimiyo ibedo ki deyo.
Icaya 60:20 Ceŋŋi pe dok bipoto, dwe bene pe birwenyo; pien Rwot aye ma bimenyi nakanaka, kare me kumoni bene bigik.
Icaya 60:21 Joni ducu doŋ gibibedo jo ma kitgi atir; gibileyo lobo doŋ doko megi matwal, gibinen macalo jaŋ yat ma an aye apito, tic ma an kikoma aye atiyo wek dano gumiya deyo.
Icaya 60:22 Doggola pa joni nok ento olo doŋ bidoko kaka, ŋat matidi mada bi doko twon rok mo matek. An a Rwot; abimiyo man timme oyot ka karene oromo.
Icaya 61:1 Rwot Lubaŋa doŋ ocwalo Cwiny mere i koma, pien doŋ owira woko ki moo, wek ater lok me kwena maber bot jo ma giunogi. Oora bene me caŋo jo ma cwercwiny onurogi, ki me tito bot jo ma tye i opii ni gibigonyogi woko, ki jo ma gitweyogi i mabuc ni gibiyabo botgi doggola gibikatti woko;
Icaya 61:2 dok ni atit pi mwaka ma Rwot bitimo iye ber bot dano, ki kare me culo kwor pa Lubaŋawa; pi kweyo cwiny jo ma kumo.
Icaya 61:3 Oora me miyo lalukana me deyo bot jo ma kumo i Cion ma ka buru, moo wir me yomcwiny ma ka kumo, ruk me pako Lubaŋa ma ka bedo ki cwiny magoro. Gibilwoŋogi ni yadi me kit ma atir, yadi ma Rwot opito, wek omiye deyo.
Icaya 61:4 Gibigero gedo odoco i wi obur ma yam oballe con, ka ma yam giyako-gu ducu gibigero odoco; gibiyubo gaŋi ducu ma onoŋo gibalogi woko, ma onoŋo oballe con i kare pa yalwak mapol mukato anec.
Icaya 61:1177 
Icaya 61:5 Lurok gibicuŋ kun gikwayo romiwu, gin bene aye ma gibipuro potowu ki poto olokwu;
Icaya 61:6 ento wun gibilwoŋowu ni ajwagi pa Rwot, dano gibilwoŋowu ni wun lutic pa Lubaŋawa; wubicamo lonyo pa rok mapol, wu bibedo bene ki deyo pi limgi.
Icaya 61:7 Ma ka lewic ma yam omakowu gibimiyowu lim mabup tyen kiryo, ma ka jerowu ki yet, wubibedo ki yomcwiny pi gin mabup ma doŋ tye i ciŋwu. Pi meno wubinoŋo lim ma gipokkiwu i lobowu kiryo i wi wadigi; wubibedo doŋ ki yomcwiny nakanaka.
Icaya 61:8 Rwot owaco ni, “An amaro ŋolo kop atir, adag yak ki tim marac; abiculo waŋ can ma opoto i komgi cakare, abicikke kwedgi i gicikke ma ri nakanaka.
Icaya 61:9 Likwayogi biŋene matek i kin lurok, ki nyiŋ litino ma gin gunywalo biwinnye adada i kin rok ducu; jo ducu ma gibinenogi gibiniaŋ i komgi, ni gin gubedo rok ma Rwot omiyo botgi gum.”
Icaya 61:10 Cwinya bibedo yom matek i Rwot, abium pi Lubaŋana; pien doŋ otyeko ruka woko ki boŋo me larre, dok bene ouma woko ki jor me kit ma atir, macalo lanyom ma orukke maber ki tok me deyo, dok macalo dako manyen ma orukke ki ruk me wel.
Icaya 61:11 Pien kit macalo jami mapatpat twi i lobo, ki poto bene weko gin ma gicoyo iye twi, kit meno Rwot Lubaŋa bene bimiyo kit ma atir, ki pak, twi i nyim rok ducu.
Icaya 62:1 Pe abiliŋ pi Cion, pe bene abiywe pi Jerucalem, nio waŋ ma locce doŋ ocaro piny calo dero ceŋ dok larrene bene omenyo piny calo mac.
Icaya 62:2 Rok ducu bineno locci, in Jerucalem, ki luker ducu gibineno deyoni; doŋ gibilwoŋi ki nyiŋ manyen ma Rwot kikome aye bicako.
Icaya 62:3 Ibibedo calo tok me deyo ma tye i ciŋ Rwot, dok ibibedo macalo tok me ker ma nyuto loc pa Lubaŋani.
Icaya 62:4 Pe doŋ gibimedde ki lwoŋi ni gaŋ ma doŋ gibwoto woko, loboni bene pe gibilwoŋo ni lobo ma odoŋ obur, ento gibilwoŋi ni gaŋ ma calo dako ma cwinya yom i kome, kun gilwoŋo loboni bene ni dako ma ginyomo; pien Rwot cwinye yom i komi, dok loboni bibedo macalo dako ma ginyomo.
Icaya 62:5 Pien kit macalo awobi nyomo nyakoawobeni bene binyomi kit meno, dok kit macalo lanyom cwinye bedo yom pi nyako ger. Lubaŋani bene cwinye bibedo yom piri kit meno.
Icaya 62:6 In Jerucalem, aketo lukur-piny i wi celli malo; pe gibilin dyeceŋ ki dyewor benebene. Wun jo ma poyo wi Rwot, pe wuywe,
Icaya 62:7 dok bene pe wumiye kare me yweyo nio wan, ma en doŋ omiyo Jerucalem ocuŋ matek ma doŋ omiyo odoko gin ma gipako i wi lobo ducu.
Icaya 62:1178 
Icaya 62:8 Rwot doŋ okwoŋo kwoŋ matek twatwal, kun kwoŋo ki bade me twer ni, “Pe dok abimiyo lukworri gicamo kani, lurok bene pe dok gibimato koŋo vinoni ma in iyelle me tiyo tic pire;
Icaya 62:9 ento jo ma gukayo kal gibicamo ci gipako iye Rwot, ki jo ma gupwono olok gibimato koŋo vinone i dyekal me kabedona maleŋ,”
Icaya 62:10 Wuwok ki kunnu, wuwok ki i dogcel, wuyub yo pi lwak; wutor yo, wutor yo gudo-gu woko, wucok gweŋ woko bene ki tye, ka doŋ wuil bendera malo pi rok ducu,
Icaya 62:11 Nen, Rwot doŋ otyeko tito lok man oo wa i agikki lobo, ni, wuwac bot jo Cion ni, “Nen larrewu doŋ tye ka bino; nen, bakacicce tye bote cul me ticce bene tye i nyime.”
Icaya 62:12 Gibilwoŋogi ni gin rok maleŋ, gin jo ma Rwot okokogi ki i can; dok bene gibilwoŋini, Gaŋ ma Rwot omaro, ma pe oweko woko ata.
Icaya 63:1 Man aŋa ma bino ki i Edommi, ki i Bojra ma oruko boŋo makwarri, ma oruko ruk me deyo-ni, kun tye ka nyatte ki twon tekone madit-ti? “Meno an ennu atye ka tito lok me loyo kop, an atek, atwero laro dano.”
Icaya 63:2 Piŋo kono boŋoni ma iruko-ni kwar, kun nen calo boŋo pa ŋat ma nyono olok me biyo pige?
Icaya 63:3 “Anyono olok i bur me biyo pige an kena, kun ŋat mo mukene ma oa ki i rok rriapat onoŋo pe bota; anyonogi woko lirwatrwat ki akemo adada; pige makwar macalo remo obedo ka kir i koma matek, omiyo boŋona ducu onywane woko marac.
Icaya 63:4 Pien nino me culo kwor onoŋo iye i cwinya, mwaka me koko jona bene doŋ oromo.
Icaya 63:5 “Anene piny, ci anoŋo ni pe tye ŋat mo ma twero kenya; auro twatwal, ento onoŋo pe tye ŋat mo ma romo miya teko; meno omiyo ciŋa an kikoma aye loyo loc, akeca aye omiyo anoŋo teko.
Icaya 63:6 Cen anyono rok mapol woko ducu piny ki kinigana, akemona omiyo gulimo atwom twatwal, dok aonyo remogi omol piny i ŋom.” Rwot onyuto berre bot jo Icrael
Icaya 63:7 Abitito pi mar pa Rwot ma pe lokke, kun anyuto pak pa Rwot bene, pi gin ducu mabe co ma en Rwot otimo piwa, ki twon ber madit ma en onyuto bot jo Icrael ma en otimo botgi pi kicane, kun lubo bene mar mere madwoŋ ma pe lokke.
Icaya 63:8 Pien en owacci, “Adada, gin jona, litino ma pe gibibwola”; cutcut en odoko Lalargi.
Icaya 63:1179 
Icaya 63:9 I cangi ducu en bene oneno iye can, en kikome aye olarogi, pe lakwenane mo nyo kadi ki lamalaika. En okokogi pi mar mere ki pi kicane; en otiŋogi, ci obedo ka byelogi nino ki nino i kare macon.
Icaya 63:10 Ento gin gujemo woko i kome, omiyo kiniga omako Rwot, Cwiny mere maleŋ okumo twatwal. Pi meno en olokke odoko lakworgi, omiyo en kikome olwenyo kwedgi.
Icaya 63:11 Dano dok gupo pi kare macon, i kare pa Moses, ma latic pa Rwot, ci gupenyo ni, “Ŋat ma yam okwanyo lukwat romine ki i nam-mi tye kwene? En ŋat ma oketo Cwiny mere maleŋ i kingi-ni kono tye kwene?
Icaya 63:12 Ŋat ma yam omiyo ciŋe me deyo owoto i ŋet Moses tuŋ lacuc, ma omiyo pii opokke dul aryo i nyimgi wek enoŋ nyiŋ ma ri nakanaka,
Icaya 63:13 ma otelogi kun giwok ki i dye nam matut-ti?” Gubedo calo aguragura ma woto i tim, pe gubedo ka gatte kadi ki acel.
Icaya 63:14 Cwiny pa Rwot omiyo botgi yweyo, calo dyaŋi ma guo i luŋ. Yam itelo joni kumeno, wek inoŋ kwede nyiŋ me deyo. Lega pi kica ki kony
Icaya 63:15 Kul waŋi ki i polo inen piny i lobo, inen piny ki i kabedoni maleŋ me deyo. Arimani ki tekki kono doŋ tye kwene? Mar meri ki kicani kono tye kwene? Tim ber, pe ikwerwa woko.
Icaya 63:16 Pien in aye i Wonwa, kadi bed Abraim pe neyowa, dok Icrael bene pe paro piwa; in Rwot giri ibedo Wonwa, dok ibedo lakokwa cakke yam con.
Icaya 63:17 Piŋo imiyo waŋak woko ki i yoni, ai Rwot? Piŋo imiyo wadoko jo ma cwinywa nwaŋ kun pe walwori? Dwog cen botwa pi jo ma gitiyo piri, pi kaka ducu ma gubedo meri kikomi.
Icaya 63:18 Joni maleŋ gubedo i kabedoni maleŋ pi kare manok mo twatwal, lukworwa doŋ gunyono kabedo man ki tyengi gubalo woko.
Icaya 63:19 Doŋ wadoko calo jo ma yam in pe iloyogi, wadoko calo jo ma pe gilwoŋogi ki nyiŋi.
Icaya 64:1 Kono ibaro polo woko likwak ilor piny, kono ber! Kono imiyo godi guyeŋŋe i nyimi,
Icaya 64:2 kit macalo mac moko kwede i lak yen, dok bene miyo pii walo, wek omi lukworri guŋe nyiŋi, dok rok ducu komgi myero omyel i nyimi!
Icaya 64:3 Yam itiyo gin mogo ma kelo lworo madwoŋ ma wan kikomwa pe waromo tamo pire, yam ilor piny, ci godi guyeŋŋe i nyimi.
Icaya 64:1180 
Icaya 64:4 Cakke yam con ŋat mo gire pe owinyo, ŋat mo pe ma owinyo ki ite, ŋat mo bene pe oneno Lubaŋa mapat kono in keken, Lubaŋa ma tiyo tic pi jo ducu ma tye ka kure.
Icaya 64:5 In irwatte ki ŋat ma tiyo tic ma atir ki yomcwiny, irwatte ki jo ma po piri i yoni ducu. Nen, kiniga ceŋ omaki, pien onoŋo wabalo; wabedo ka timo bal pi kare malac twatwal. Tika wan wabilarre ada?
Icaya 64:6 Wan ducu doŋ wadoko calo ŋat ma kome ki keni, gin ma atir ducu ma watimo doŋ nen calo boŋo ma onyobbe woko ki gin me kwer. Wan ducu waner woko calo pot yat, balwa bene terowa woko calo yamo ma kodo.
Icaya 64:7 Pe tye dano mo ma lwoŋo nyiŋi, ma cukke ka maki likiŋ; pien in ikano want woko ki botwa, doŋ ibwotowa i balwa.
Icaya 64:8 Ento kadi bed kumeno, ai Rwot, in pud i Wonwa; wan lobo agulu, in aye lacwewa: wan ducu wabedo gin ma in aye itiyowa ki ciŋi.
Icaya 64:9 Ai Rwot, pe myero kiniga dok omaki matek, pe bene ibed ka po i kom balwa nakanaka, Koŋ inen, dok ipar, wan ducu wabedo joni.
Icaya 64:10 Gaŋini maleŋ ducu doŋ gudoko tim, Cion doŋ odoko tim, Jerucalem doŋ odoko obur.
Icaya 64:11 Otwa maleŋ, maber twatwal-li, ka ma yam kwarowa gipaki iye-ni, doŋ gityeko waŋone woko ki mac; kabedo ducu ma yam yomo cwinywa doŋ odoko obur.
Icaya 64:12 Ibidiyo cwinyi i kom jami magi, ai Rwot? Ibiliŋ, kun iunowa matek?
Icaya 65:1 Yam ayubbe pi gamo lok pa jo ma pe gikok bota, ento gin gigi pe gumito penya. Ayubbe bene ni myero gunoŋa, ento pe gigi gutemo yenya. Abedo ka waco botgi ni, “An atye en, an atye en.” Aloko bot rok ma onoŋo doŋ pe gilwoŋo nyiŋa.
Icaya 65:2 Abedo ka ryeyo ciŋa dyeceŋ jwi bot jo ma gijemo woko ajema, jo ma woto i yo ma pe ber wacel, kun gilubo gigi ryekogi kengi.
Icaya 65:3 Gibedo ka ŋeto cwinya kare ki kare, kun gibedo ka tyero gitum bot jogi i potti, giwaŋo odok eceta-gu i kom matafali;
Icaya 65:4 gibedo ka bedo i lyel-gu, i dyewor gibedo i kabedo mogo ma i muŋ; gibedo ka camo riŋo opego-gu, jami tedogi ducu onyobbe woko ki pig riŋo lee ma gikwero.
Icaya 65:5 Gin jo ma giwaco ni, “Bed kaikeni kunnu, pe ibin cok kweda, pien an doŋ gipoka woko pat kwedi pien an aleŋ,” Jo magi calo yito ma duny i uma, gicalo mac ma pe to kadi ki acel.
Icaya 65:6 Nen, doŋ gityeko coyo lok i nyima ni, “An pe abiliŋ aliŋa, ento abiculo. Adada, abiculogi gire,
Icaya 65:1181 
Icaya 65:7 timgi maraco kacel ki tim maraco pa kwarogi, man Rwot ma owaco pien gubedo ka waŋo odok eceta i wi godi, dok gubedo ka yeta bene i wi ceregu ducu; abiporo culgi ma oromogi abiculogi pi balgi macon.”
Icaya 65:8 Rwot owaco kuman ni, “Kit macalo koŋo vino noŋŋe ki i nyig olok, doŋ dano giwaco ni, ‘Pe ibal woko, pien gum tye iye’, abitimo kit meno pi luticca, pe abityekogi woko ducu.
Icaya 65:9 Abimiyo likwayo a ki i kom Yakobo, ki jo ma bileyo wi godina a ki i Juda; jona ma ayero gibileyo bedo megi, doŋ luticca gibibedo kunnu.
Icaya 65:10 Caron bidoko ka ma gikwayo iye romi, ki luk me Akor bidoko kabuto pa dyaŋi, bibedo pa jona ma gubedo ka yenya.
Icaya 65:11 Ento wun jo ma doŋ wubwoto Rwot, ma wiwu doŋ owil woko i kom got mera maleŋ, ma wuyubo meja pa jok wek omiwu gum, ma wupiko kono ma ginyo bo poŋ kikopo pi jok wek nyimwu obed leŋ,
Icaya 65:12 abimiyo ginekowu woko ki pala lucwan, wun ducu wubiguŋo aguŋa ka giŋolo ŋutwu, pien i kare ma yam alwoŋowu wun wukwero gamo doga woko, i kare ma abedo ka lok bene pe wuciko itwu ka winyo lokka, ento wubedo ka timo gin ma nen marac i nyima, wuyero bene gin ma pe yomo cwinya.”
Icaya 65:13 Meno omiyo Rwot Lubaŋa owaco ni, “Nen, luticca bicamo cam, ento wun kec binekowu; luticca bimato pii, ento wun orwo pii binekowu matek; luticca gibibedo ki yomcwiny, ento wun gibimiyo lewic makowu;
Icaya 65:14 yomcwiny bimiyo luticca giwera ento cwercwiny bimiyo wukok, dok bene bimiyo wudaŋŋe matek ki koko.
Icaya 65:15 Nyiŋwu bidoŋ bot jona ma doŋ ayero giceno ki dano, Rwot Lubaŋa kikome aye ma binekowu; ento luticce doŋ en bilwoŋogi ki nyiŋ mapat.
