Luka 8:25 Openyogi ni, “Niyewu tye kwene?” Lworo omakogi, guuro kun gupennye kekengi ni, “Man aŋa kono kaa, ma ciko yamo ki pii, ci giwinye-ni?” Yecu ocaŋo dano ma tye ki cen marac i Geraca (Matayo 8.28-34; Marako 5.1-20)
Luka 8:26 Gubino i lobo pa Lugeraca, ma okemme ki Galilaya.
Luka 8:27 Ka Yecu okato i wi tera, ci dano mo me gaŋ meno ma tye ki cen obino bote. Dano-nu onoŋo ori pi kare malac ma pe ruko boŋo, pe bedo i ot bene, ento bedo mere i kin lyel keken.
Luka 8:28 Ka oneno Yecu, ci odaŋŋe oryebbe i nyime, owaco ki dwan maloŋo ni, “Ilaro aŋo kweda, Yecu, Wod pa Lubaŋa Mamalo Twal? Abako doga boti, pe iyela.”
Luka 8:29 Pien onoŋo Yecu ociko cen marac ni oa woko ki i kom dano-nu. Pien tyen mapol dwogo i kome. Onoŋo gigwoke agwoka kun gitweye ki nyor ki nyonyo, ento yam turo gin ma gitweye kwede woko, cen ryeme, tere i tim.
Luka 8:30 Yecu openye ni, “Nyiŋi aŋa?” Ogamo ni, “Legion” ; pien cen mapol onoŋo tye i kome.
Luka 8:31 Cen gubako doggi bote ni pe ocikgi ni gicit i Bur.
Luka 8:32 Lwak opego mapol onoŋo gitye ka cam i kor got kunnu. Cen gubako doggi bote ni owek gidony i opego.
Luka 8:33 Cen gua ki i kom dano-nu, gudonyo i opego, lwak opego gutwarre ki ŋwec nia ki i kor got malo, ci gumwony woko i nam.
Luka 8:34 Ka lukwat guneno gin ma otimme, ci guriŋo, gutero lokke i gaŋ madit ki i kin paco.
Luka 8:35 Dano gucito ka neno gin ma otimme, gubino bot Yecu, gunoŋo dano ma cen oa ki i kome-ni obedo ka tyen Yecu, oruko boŋo, odoko dano; lworo omakogi.
Luka 8:36 Jo ma guneno lok man gutito botgi kit ma dano meno ma yam tye ki cen ocaŋ kwede.
Luka 8:37 Jo ducu ma gibedo i lobo pa Lugeraca ma orumo kunnu gulego Yecu ni myero oa woko ki botgi, pien onoŋo lworo omakogi matek; omiyo Yecu odonyo i yeya, odok cen.
Luka 8:38 Dano ma cen oa ki i komeni obako doge bot Yecu ni myero ebed bote; ento Yecu ocwale kun cike ni,
Luka 8:39 “Dok i paconi, icitit gin madit ma Lubaŋa otimo i komi.” Ocito otito i kin gaŋa meno ducu lok madit ma Yecu otimo i kome. Nya pa Yairo ki dako ma ogudo dog boŋo pa Yecu
Luka 8:1627  (Matayo 9.18-26; Marako 5.21-43)
Luka 8:40 Ka Yecu odwogo, lwak gujole ki yomcwiny, pien onoŋo gin ducu gitye ka kure.
Luka 8:41 Dano mo obino, nyiŋe Yairo, ma onoŋo ladit me kacokke. Oryebbe piny ka tyen Yecu, obako doge bote ni obin i ode,
Luka 8:42 pien onoŋo yam tye ki nyare ma onywalo acel keken ma onoŋo doŋ cok to; mwaka me ditte mito romo apar wiye aryo. I kare ma Yecu tye ka wot, lwak odiye.
Luka 8:43 Dako mo onoŋo tye kunnu ma yam onoŋo twoyo two agobi pi mwaka apar wiye aryo, ma doŋ obalo limme ducu bot daktar, ento pe otwero caŋ.
Luka 8:44 Obino cok i ŋe Yecu, ci ogudo dog ginarukane; cutcut remo ma cwer ocok woko.
Luka 8:45 Yecu openyo ni, “Aŋa ma oguda-ni?” Ka dano ducu gukwero woko, ci Petero ki jo ma tye kacel kwede, gugamo ni, “Ladit, lwak orumi dyere, gidine i komi.”
Luka 8:46 Ento Yecu owaco ni, “Ŋat mo oguda gire, pien awinyo tek oa woko ki i koma.”
Luka 8:47 Dako-nu oneno ni pe etwero kanne, ci obino kun kome myel, oryebbe i nyime, otito i nyim lwak ducu gin ma omiyo egude, ki kit ma ecaŋ kwede oyotoyot.
Luka 8:48 Yecu owacce ni, “Nyara, niyeni ocaŋi; wot ki kuc.”
Luka 8:49 I kare ma Yecu pud tye ka lok, dano mo obino ma oa ki i gaŋ pa ladit me kacokke, owaco ni, “Nyari doŋ oto woko, pe doŋ iyel Lapwony.”
Luka 8:50 Ento ka Yecu owinyo, owacce ni, “Pe ilwor, ye ayeya keken, ci en bicaŋ.”
Luka 8:51 Ka obino i ot, pe oye ni dano mo odony kwede i ot, kono Petero ki Jon, ki Yakobo, ki won latin ki minne keken.
Luka 8:52 Dano ducu onoŋo gitye ka koko kun gikumo pire; ento Yecu owaco ni, “Wuwek koko obedi; pien nyako-ni pe oto, ento onino anina.”
Luka 8:53 Gunyere matek, pien giŋeyo ni nyako-ni oto woko.
Luka 8:54 En omako bad latin, olwoŋe, owacce ni, “Nyako, a malo.”
Luka 8:55 Ci cwinye odwogo, oa malo oyotoyot, Yecu ociko ni gimine cam.
Luka 8:56 Lunyodone guuro mada; ento Yecu ocikogi matek ni pe myero gutit pi gin ma otimme-ne bot dano mo.
Luka 9:1 Yecu olwoŋo jone apar wiye aryo kacel, omiyo botgi tek ki twero i kom cen ducu, ki me caŋo two,
Luka 9:2 oorogi ka tito lok i kom ker pa Lubaŋa ki ka caŋo lutwo.
Luka 9:1628 
Luka 9:3 Ocikogi ni, “Pe wuwot ki gin mo, kadi ki odoo, kadi kicaa, kadi kwon, kadi lim, dok pe wubed ki kanyi aryo.
Luka 9:4 Ot ma wubidonyo iye, wubed kunnu, nio ka wubia, wucito giwu.
Luka 9:5 Ka ma pe gijolowu iye, ka wua ki i gaŋ meno, wuteŋ apwa tyenwu obed caden botgi.” ducu.
Luka 9:6 Gua gucito i kin gaŋ, gutito lok me kwena maber kun gicaŋo lutwo bene i kabedo Wi Kerode ocuŋ woko (Matayo 14.1-12; Marako 6.14-29)
Luka 9:7 Ento Kerode rwot madit ka owinyo pi gin ducu ma obedo ka timme, wiye ocuŋ woko, pien jo mogo guwaco ni Jon Labatija aye ocer ki i kin jo muto,
Luka 9:8 jo mukene ni, Elia aye doŋ onen, jo mukene ni, ŋat acel i kin lunebi macon aye ocer.
Luka 9:9 Kerode owaco ni, “Jo yam atoŋo wiye woko do; ento man aŋa ma dok awinyo lok macalo magi i komeni?” Oparo pi nene twatwal. Yecu omiyo cam ki jo alip abic (Matayo 14.13-21; Marako 6.30-44; Jon 6.1-14)
Luka 9:10 Ka lukwena gudwogo, gutitte lok ducu ma gutiyo. Yecu oterogi, ocito kwedgi i gaŋ ma gilwoŋo Betecaida i muŋ.
Luka 9:11 Ka lwak guwinyo, ci gulubo kore, en ojologi, otito botgi lok i kom ker pa Lubaŋa, ocaŋo jo ma komgi lit.
Luka 9:12 Ka piny doŋ mito yuto, jone apar wiye aryo gubino bote, guwacce ni, “Cwal lwak gucit i kin gaŋ ki i pacci ma orumo kany, wek guyeny kabuto, gunoŋ cam; pien kany watye i dye tim.”
Luka 9:13 Ento Yecu odok iye botgi ni, “Wun wumi botgi cam.” Gugamo ni, “Watye ki mugati abic ki rec aryo keken, nyo ka ce imito waciwil cam pi lwak man ducu.”
Luka 9:14 Pien onoŋo gimito romo dano alip abic. Ociko lupwonnyene ni, “Wumi dano gubed piny i dul, i dul acel acel dano pyerabic.”
Luka 9:15 Gutimo kumeno, gumiyo dano ducu gubedo piny.
Luka 9:16 Yecu okwanyo mugati abic ki rec aryo-nu, oneno malo i polo, olego iye gum, obaro iye, omiyo bot lupwonnyene wek guket i nyim lwak.
Luka 9:17 Gin ducu gucamo guyeŋ. Gicoko ŋide mudoŋ oromo aduku apar wiye aryo. Petero otuco lok i kom Yecu (Matayo 16.13-19; Marako 8.27-29)
Luka 9:18 Ka onoŋo en tye ka lega kaikene, kun lupwonnyene bene tye kacel kwede, en openyogi ni, “Dano mono giwacci an aŋa?”
Luka 9:1629 
Luka 9:19 Gudok iye ni, “Jon Labatija, jo mukene giwacci Elia, ki jo mukene ni ŋatti mo acel i kin lunebi macon aye doŋ ocer.”
Luka 9:20 Openyogi ni, “Wun kono wuwacci an aŋa?” Petero ogamo ni, “In i Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero.” Yecu otito pi tone (Matayo 16.20-28; Marako 8.30–9.1)
Luka 9:21 Ento Yecu ocikogi matek ni pe myero gutit lok man bot dano mo.
Luka 9:22 Dok owaco ni, “Wod pa dano myerone okany can madwoŋ, dok ludoŋo ki ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki lupwony-cik myero gukwere woko, ci guneke, ento myero gicere woko i nino me adekke.”
Luka 9:23 Dok owaco bot dano ducu ni, “Ka dano mo mito lubo kora, myero okwoŋ kwerre kekene, otiŋ yatariyane nino ducu, ci olub ki kora.
Luka 9:24 Pien dano ma mito laro kwone, birwenyone arwenya, ento dano ma rwenyo kwone pira, bilaro kwone.
Luka 9:25 Pien konyo dano ma olimo lobo ducu ki gin aŋo kun kwone rwennye woko, nyo balle?
Luka 9:26 Dano ma lewic make pira ki pi lokka, Wod pa dano bene lewic bimake i kome, i kare ma en bidwogo i deyone ki deyo pa Lubaŋa Won kacel ki pa lumalaika maleŋ.
Luka 9:27 Ento atito botwu ni, tye jo mogo ma gucuŋ kany ma pe gibibilo to, ma pud peya guneno ker pa Lubaŋa.” Kom Yecu olokke mapat (Matayo 17.1-8; Marako 9.2-8)
Luka 9:28 Ka nino ma mito romo aboro okato i ŋe lok magi, Yecu otero Petero ki Jon ki Yakobo, oito kwedgi i wi got ka lega.
Luka 9:29 I kare ma onoŋo en tye ka lega, waŋe olokke mapat, ginarukane odoko matar ma ryeny lidaŋdaŋ.
Luka 9:30 Nen, jo aryo gubedo ka lok kwede, jo-nu onoŋo aye Moses ki Elia,
Luka 9:31 ma gunen kun gitye ki deyo, guloko pi ane ki i lobo man, ma en myero ocob i Jerucalem.
Luka 9:32 Petero ki jo ma tye kacel kwedgi onoŋo nino omako waŋgi matek, ento gubedo ma waŋgi twolo, guneno deyone ki jo aryo ma gucuŋ kacel kwede.
Luka 9:33 Ka jo aryo-nu mito a woko ki bote, ci Petero owaco ni, “Ladit, bedo kany ber; kono wagero aduc adek, acel meri, acel pa Moses, ki acel pa Elia”. Onoŋo Petero pe ŋeyo gin ma myero eloki.
Luka 9:34 Ka pud loko lok man, pol obino, oumogi; lworo omakogi ka gidonyo i pol.
Luka 9:1630 
Luka 9:35 Dwan oa i polo ni, “Man aye Woda ma doŋ ayero; wuwinye.”
Luka 9:36 Ka dwan man doŋ oloko, ci ginoŋo Yecu odoŋ kene. Lupwonnye guliŋ aliŋa; i kare meno, pe gutito bot dano mo lok mo i kom gin ma guneno. Yecu ocaŋo awobi ma tye ki cen marac (Matayo 17.14-21; Marako 9.14-29)
Luka 9:37 Orwone, ka doŋ gulor piny ki i wi got, lwak madwoŋ gurwatte kwede.
Luka 9:38 Nen, laco acel ki i kin lwak odaŋŋe ni, “Lapwony, abako doga boti, inen woda, pien anywalo en acel kene.
Luka 9:39 Nen, cen bino i kome, ci miyo kok cut; ryeye, kelo bwoyo i doge, nyoŋo kome woko, pe a ki i kome oyotoyot.
Luka 9:40 Abako doga bot lupwonnyeni ni guryem woko, ento ryemone oloyogi.”
Luka 9:41 Yecu odok iye ni, “Wun yalwak me kare man, pe wutye ki niye, kitwu doŋ oballe woko. Abibedo kwedwu wa awene? Abidiyo cwinya i kwomwu nio wa awene? Kel wodi kany.”
Luka 9:42 Ka onoŋo tye ka bino, cen orete woko piny, oryeye matek. Ento Yecu ogerre i wi cen marac, ocaŋo awobi-nu, odwoke bot wonne.
Luka 9:43 Dano ducu guuro dit pa Lubaŋa. Yecu dok otito pi tone (Matayo 17.22-23; Marako 9.30-32) Ento ka pud gitye ka uro gin ducu ma en otiyo, Yecu owaco bot lupwonnyene ni,
Luka 9:44 “Wuwek lok man odony i itwu; pien Wod pa dano gibimiye i ciŋ dano.”
Luka 9:45 Ento lupwonnyene pe guniaŋ lok man; lok man okanne woko ki botgi wek pe guniaŋ iye; ci gulworo penye pi lok meno. Aŋa ma loyo ki dit? (Matayo 18.1-5; Marako 9.33-37)
Luka 9:46 Pyem yam ocakke i kingi, ni aŋa ma i kingi ma loyo ki dit.
Luka 9:47 Yecu ka oŋeyo pyem ma i cwinygi, okwanyo latin matidi, omiye ocuŋ i ŋete,
Luka 9:48 owaco botgi ni, “Dano ducu ma jolo latin man i nyiŋa, noŋo ojolo an, dano ducu ma jolo an, noŋo ojolo ŋat ma oora; pien ŋat matidi twatwal i kinwu ducu en aye ŋat madit.” Ŋat ma pe lakworwu tye tuŋ botwu (Marako 9.38-40)
Luka 9:49 Jon ogamo ni, “Ladit, waneno ŋat mo ma ryemo cen i nyiŋi, wageŋe, pien en onoŋo pe lubi kacel kwedwa.”
Luka 9:50 Ento Yecu odok iye ni, “Pe wugeŋe, pien ŋat ma pe lakworwu, noŋo tye tuŋ botwu.”
Luka 9:1631  Lucamaria mogo gukwero jolo Yecu i gaŋgi
Luka 9:51 Ka kare doŋ mito romo me tiŋe malo, ociko waŋe matek me cito i Jerucalem.
Luka 9:52 Ooro lukwena gukwoŋo nyime; gucito, gudonyo i gaŋ mo pa Lucamaria pi yubbe kabedo.
Luka 9:53 Ento Lucamaria pe gujole, pien waŋe okemo Jerucalem.
Luka 9:54 Ka lupwonnyene Yakobo ki Jon guneno, guwaco ni, “Rwot, imito wacik mac oa ki i polo, otyekgi woko?”
Luka 9:55 Ento Yecu olokke, ojukogi, [kun waco ni, “Pe wuŋeyo kit cwiny ma wutye kwede;
Luka 9:56 pien Wod pa dano pe obino ka tyeko kwo pa dano, ento pi larogi.”] Gucito i gaŋ mukene. Jo mogo ma onoŋo gimito lubo Yecu (Matayo 8.19-22)
Luka 9:57 Ka gitye ka wot i yo, dano mo owacce ni, Abilubi ka ma ibicito iye ducu.
Luka 9:58 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Too tye ki boro, winyo me polo tye ki odigi, ento Wod pa dano pe tye ki ka ma myero epyel iye wiye.”
Luka 9:59 Owaco bot dano mukene ni, “Luba.” Ento danonu ogamo ni, “Ladit, koŋ iwek aciyik wora.”
Luka 9:60 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Wek jo muto guyik jo muto wadigi; ento in iciti, inya lok i kom ker pa Lubaŋa.”
Luka 9:61 Ŋat mukene owaco ni, “Abilubi, ladit; ento koŋ iwek acit, acik jotuwa.”
Luka 9:62 Yecu owacce ni, “Pe tye dano mo ma mako kweri dyaŋ, ka dok neno ŋeye, ma biromo bedo i ker pa Lubaŋa.”
Luka 10:1 Ka man otum, Rwot oyero jo mukene pyerabiro, oorogi ki aryo aryo wek gukwoŋ nyime, me cito i gaŋi ducu ki i kabedo ducu ka ma en kikome bibino iye.
Luka 10:2 Owaco botgi ni, “Kac tye dwoŋ, ento lukac aye nok; pi meno wuleg Won poto, wek ocwal lutic ka kac.
Luka 10:3 Wucit giwu; nen, acwalowu macalo litino romi i kin orudi.
Luka 10:4 Pe wuwot ki kicaa lim nyo opiro, kadi war; pe wumot ŋat mo i waŋayo.
Luka 10:5 Ot ducu ma wudonyo iye, wukwoŋ waco ni, ‘Kuc obed i ot man.’
Luka 10:6 Ka latin me kuc tye kunnu, ci kucwu bibedo i kome; ento ka pe, ci kucwu bidwogo botwu.
Luka 10:1632 
Luka 10:7 Wubed i ot meno, kun wucamo dok wumato gin ma gimiyowu, pien latic myero gimiye mucarane. Pe wubed ka kobo i ot ki ot.
Luka 10:8 Ka wudonyo i gaŋ mo, ce gijolowu, wucam gin ma giketo i nyimwu;
Luka 10:9 wucaŋ lutwo ma tye iye, wutit botgi ni, ‘Ker pa Lubaŋa doŋ onyiko cok botwu.’
Luka 10:10 Ento ka wudonyo i gaŋ mo, ce pe gijolowu, ci wucit i waŋayo me gaŋ meno, wuwac ni,
Luka 10:11 ‘Wa apwa me gaŋwu ma omoko i tyenwa, wateŋo i komwu; kadi bed kit meno, myero wuŋe man ni, ker pa Lubaŋa doŋ onyiko cok.’
Luka 10:12 Atito botwu ni, i nino meno can pa Codom bibedo twaratwara makato pa gaŋ meno. Can bipoto i kom gaŋi mogo ma jo ma iye pe guŋut (Matayo 11.20-24)
Luka 10:13 “Ibikoko aŋee, in Korajin! Ibikoko aŋee, in Betecaida! Pien kono yam tic madito me twer ma gitiyo botwu gitiyo i Turo ki Cidon, kono jone guŋut wa con, kun giruko boŋo cola ma gibedo i buru bene.
Luka 10:14 Ento can pa Turo ki Cidon bibedo twaratwara i nino me ŋolo kop, makato can ma bipoto i komi.
Luka 10:15 Ki in Kapernaum, gibitiŋi woko malo i polo? Pe kumeno, gibidwoki woko piny i Lyel.
Luka 10:16 “Ŋat ma winyowu, noŋo owinyo an, ŋat ma kwerowu, noŋo okwero an; ŋat ma kwera, noŋo okwero ŋat ma oora.” Dano pyerabiro-nu gudwogo cen
Luka 10:17 Dano pyerabiro-nu gudwogo cen ki yomcwiny, kun giwaco ni, “Rwot, wa cen maraco bene guwinyo cikwa pi nyiŋi!”
Luka 10:18 En odok iye ni, “Yam aneno Catan kun poto piny nia ki i polo macalo lutkot.
Luka 10:19 Nen, doŋ amiyowu twero me nyono twol ki oton, ki me loyo tek ducu pa lakwor; gin mo pe bitimowu marac.
Luka 10:20 Kadi bed kumeno cwinywu pe obed yom pi man ni, cen guwinyo cikwu; ento cwinywu obed yom, pien nyiŋwu gicoyo i wi polo.” Yecu obedo ki yomcwiny (Matayo 11.25-27;13.16-17)
Luka 10:21 I cawa meno Yecu obedo ki yomcwiny i Cwiny Maleŋ kun waco ni, “Apwoyi, Wora, in Rwot me polo ki me lobo, pien ikano lok magi woko ki bot luryeko ki luŋe-piny, ci inyutogi bot litino lukere; iyo, Wora, pien onoŋo ipwoyo kit yo macalo meno.
Luka 10:1633 
Luka 10:22 Jami ducu doŋ Wora otyeko miyogi woko bota; ŋat mo pe ma ŋeyo ni Wod en aŋa, kono Wod keken, dok bene ŋat mo pe ma ŋeyo ni Wod en aŋa, kono Won keken, ki ŋat ma Wod oyero me nyuto Won bote.”
Luka 10:23 Yecu olokke bot lupwonnyene, owaco botgi i muŋ ni, “Tye ki gum, dano ma neno gin ma wun wuneno!
Luka 10:24 Pien atittiwu ni, lunebi ki luker mapol yam guparo pi neno gin ma wun wuneno, ento pe guneno, ki winyo gin ma wun wuwinyo, ento pe guwinyo.” Lacamaria maber
Luka 10:25 Nen, ŋat mo acel lapwony-cik oa malo, otemo i Yecu kun penye ni, “Lapwony, atim aŋo wek alim kwo ma pe tum?”
Luka 10:26 Yecu openye ni, “Gicoyo ni ŋo i cik? Ikwano niŋniŋ?”
Luka 10:27 Odok iye ni, “Mar Rwot Lubaŋani ki cwinyi ducu, ki tiponi ducu; ki tekki ducu, ki tammi ducu; mar lawoti bene macalo imarre keni.”
Luka 10:28 Yecu ogamo doge ni, “Idok iye kakare; tim kit meno, ci ibikwo.”
Luka 10:29 Ento dano-nu pi mito loyo kop, openyo Yecu ni, “Lawota aŋa?”
Luka 10:30 Yecu odok iye ni, “Yam tye dano mo ma oa ki i Jerucalem, cito piny tuŋ Jeriko, ci orwatte ki luyak; gulunyo boŋŋine ki i kome, gupwode, gucito, guweke kun doŋ cok to.
Luka 10:31 Ajwaka mo pa Lubaŋa onoŋo bene tye ka lubo yo meno; ka onene, ci obarre okato ki i ŋete.
Luka 10:32 Kit meno Lalevi ka oo i kabedo meno, onene, obarre okato ki i ŋete.
Luka 10:33 Ento Lacamaria mo ma onoŋo bene tye ka wot i yo-nu, oo ka ma en tye iye. Ka onene, kica omake i kome.
Luka 10:34 Ocito bote, oonyo moo jeituni ki koŋo vino i waŋ rette, otweyo. Lacen okete i wi kanane, otere i ot welo, ogwoke.
Luka 10:35 Orwone okwanyo lim, omiyo bot ŋat ma gwoko ot welo, ocike ni, ‘Twoye; gin ducu ma ibimiyo makato, an abiculi ka adwogo.’
Luka 10:36 Aŋa i kin jo adek-ki ma itamo ni obedo lawot dano-nu ma orwatte ki luyak-ki?”
Luka 10:37 Odok iye ni, “Ŋat ma otime kicani.” Yecu owacce ni, “In bene cit, icitim kit meno.” Yecu olimo Marita ki Maliam
Luka 10:38 Ka gitye ka wot i yo, ci Yecu odonyo i gaŋ mo, ci dako mo ma nyiŋe Marita ojole i ode.
Luka 10:39 Yam tye ki laminne nyiŋe Maliam ma obedo ka tyen Yecu kun winyo lokke.
Luka 10:1634 
Luka 10:40 Ento Marita onoŋo obedo ka canne ki tic mapol; ocito bot Yecu, openye ni, “Ladit, pe iparo ni lamera oweka atye ka tic kena? Wac bote wek okonya.”
Luka 10:41 Ento Rwot ogamo ni, “Marita, Marita, ibedo ki tam mapol, cwinyi oŋabbe pi jami mapol,
Luka 10:42 ento tye gin acel keken ma mitte. Maliam oyero dul maber ma pe gibikwanyo woko ki bote.”
Luka 11:1 Yecu onoŋo yam tye ka lega i kabedo mo; ka doŋ otyeko, ci ŋat acel i kin lupwonnyene owacce ni, “Rwot, pwonywa ki lega, kit macalo yam Jon opwonyo lupwonnyene.”
Luka 11:2 Yecu odok iye botgi ni, “Ka wulego, wuwac kit man ni, ‘Wonwa, giwor nyiŋi maleŋ. Ker meri obin.
Luka 11:3 Miwa nino ki nino camwa me nino ducu.
Luka 11:4 Iwek balwa, pien wan kikomwa waweko bal pa dano ducu ma gibalo botwa. Pe iterwa i abita.’”
Luka 11:5 Dok owaco bitgi ni, “Aŋa i kinwu ma tye ki lareme ci bicito bote cwiny dyewor ka penye ni, ‘Larema, konya ki mugati adek;
Luka 11:6 pien larema mo oa i wot, ocora, ci pe atye ki cam mo ma myero aket i nyime.’
Luka 11:7 En bidokke iye ki i ot ni, ‘Wek yela; doŋ acego doggola woko, wan ki litinona doŋ wabuto; pe atwero a malo ka mini gin mo.’
Luka 11:8 Atito botwu ni, kadi bed en pe bia malo ka miye gin mo pi bedo lareme, ento pi dide ci bia, bimiye gin ducu ma en mito.
Luka 11:9 Dok acikowu ni, Wulegi, ci gibimiyo botwu; wuyeny, ci wubinoŋo, wudwoŋ doggola, gibiyabo botwu.
Luka 11:10 Pien dano ma lego gimiye, ki ŋat ma yenyo bene, noŋo; ŋat ma dwoŋo doggola bene, gibiyabo doggola bote.
Luka 11:11 Aŋa i kinwu ma won latin, ka latinne olege ni omiye rec, ci bimiye twol ma ka rec?
Luka 11:12 Nyo ka olege ni omiye toŋŋweno, ci bimiye oton?
Luka 11:13 Ka wun jo maraco wuŋeyo miyo mot mabeco bot litinowu, ci Wonwu ma tye i polo pe bikatowu, bimiyo Cwiny Maleŋ makato bot jo ma lege?” Yecu ki Beeljebul (Matayo 12.22-30; Marako 3.20-27)
Luka 11:1635 
Luka 11:14 Yam onoŋo Yecu tye ka ryemo cen ma pe loko; ka cen doŋ oa ki i kom dano ma onoŋo tye ki cen, ma te lebe oto, oloko, ci lwak guuro.
Luka 11:15 Ento jo mogo i kingi guwaco ni, “En ryemo cen pi twero pa Beeljebul ladit pa cen.”
Luka 11:16 Jo mukene onoŋo giyenyo lanyut ki bote ma a ki i polo, pi teme.
Luka 11:17 Ento Yecu oŋeyo tamgi, ci owaco botgi ni, “Ka ker iye opokke aryo, ci ker meno lobone balle woko; ot poto i wi wadi.
Luka 11:18 Catan bene ka opokke kene i dul aryo, ci kerre bicuŋ niŋniŋ? Pien wun wuwaco ni aryemo cen pi twero pa Beeljebul.
Luka 11:19 Ka an aryemo cen pi twero pa Beeljebul, ci litinowu kono giryemo cen pi twero pa aŋa? Pi meno gin aye gibibedo luŋolkopwu.
Luka 11:20 Ento ka ce an aryemo cen pi ciŋ Lubaŋa, ci doŋ wuŋe ni ker pa Lubaŋa doŋ obino botwu.
Luka 11:21 Ka oteka ma oruko jami lwennye ducu tye ka gwoko gaŋ kalle, jamine ducu bedo ki kuc,
Luka 11:22 ento ka dano ma kate ki tek olwenyo i kome ce oloye, bicoko jami lwennye ma ya en geno, bipoko jami ma yam en oyako ki bote.
Luka 11:23 Ŋat ma pe tuŋ bota, meno noŋo en lakworra, dok ŋat ma pe nywako coko kweda, keto mere aketa. Kit ma cen marac dwogo kwede i kom dano (Matayo 12.43-45)
Luka 11:24 “Ka cen marac doŋ oa ki i kom dano mo, ci cito wirre i kabedo ma pii pe iye kun yenyo ka ma ebiywe iye; ento ka noŋone oloye woko, ci wacci, ‘Abidok gira i oda ka ma yam aa ki iye-ni.’
Luka 11:25 Ka obino, ci noŋo giyweyo i ot woko maleŋ, giyubo maber.
Luka 11:26 En dok, cito kelo cen mukene abiro ma giraco gikate woko, ci gidonyo gibedo i ode-ni; lacen dano-nu bibedo marac makato kit ma onoŋo yam obedo kwede con.” Gum me ada
Luka 11:27 Ka oloko lok man, ci dako mo ki i kin lwak owoto dwane, owacce ni, “Tye ki gum ic ma onywali, ki tuno ma idoto!”
Luka 11:28 Ento Yecu ogamo ni, “Makato gitye ki gum, jo ma giwinyo lok pa Lubaŋa, dok gigwoko!” Yalwak pa jo maraco gimito neno lanyut (Matayo 12.38-42; Marako 8.11-12)
Luka 11:1636 
Luka 11:29 Ka lwak gumedde mapol, ci Yecu ocako waco ni, “Yalwak pa jo maraco giyenyo lanyut, ento pe gibimiyo botgi lanyut mo, kono lanyut pa lanebi Yona keken.
Luka 11:30 Pien kit macalo Yona yam odoko lanyut bot jo Nineve, kit meno Wod pa dano bene bidoko lanyut bot yalwak me kare man.
Luka 11:31 Kabaka ma dako ma tye yo tuŋ acuc bicuŋ kacel ki yalwak me kare man i kare me ŋolo kop, ci miyo kop loyogi; pien en oa ki i agikki lobo obino ka winyo ryeko pa Solomon, ento nen, gin madit makato Solomon tye kany.
Luka 11:32 Jo Nineve bicuŋ kacel ki yalwak man i kare me ŋolo kop, ci miyo kop loyogi, pien gin yam guŋut pi lok ma Yona onoŋo otito, ento nen, gin madit makato Yona tye kany. Tara me kom (Matayo 5.15;6.22-23)
Luka 11:33 “Pe tye ŋatti mo ma cwinyo tara ci kano i gul, nyo umo auma ki aduku; ento cibo i wi okar, wek dano ducu ma gibino i ot gunen derone.
Luka 11:34 Tara me komi aye waŋi; ka ce waŋi bal mo pe iye, ci komi kulu bibedo leŋ. Ento ka ce waŋi tye ki bal mo i kome, ci komi kulu bibedo i colpiny.
Luka 11:35 Gwokke wek leŋo ma tye i ii-ni pe odok col.
Luka 11:36 Doŋ ka komi kulu bedo i leŋo, kun colpiny pe iye, ci komi kulu bibedo leŋ, macalo tara ma menyi ki derone ka tye ka lyel.” Yecu otuco pi can ma bipoto i kom Luparicayo ki lupwony-cik (Matayo 23.1-36; Marako 12.38-40; Luka 20.45-47)
Luka 11:37 Ka yam onoŋo tye ka lok, Laparicayo mo olwoŋe ka cam bote; Yecu odonyo i ot, obedo i dog cam.
Luka 11:38 Laparicayo ouro ka oneno ni ocako cam ma pe koŋ ologo ciŋe.
Luka 11:39 Rwot owacce ni, “Wun Luparicayo wulwoko ŋe kikopo ki ŋe atabo, kun iwu opoŋ yak ki tim maraco.
Luka 11:40 Wun lumiŋmiŋ! Ŋat ma tiyo gin ma woko pe en aye bene otiyo gin ma i iye?
Luka 11:41 Wumi gin ma i atabowu bot lucan wek okonygi; ci nen, jami ducu bibedo maleŋ botwu.
Luka 11:42 “Ento wubineno can, wun Luparicayo, pien wumiyo dul me apar me oyado ki ocobo ki kit pot dekwu ducu, kun wuweko ŋolo kop atir ki maro Lubaŋa; meno ducu myero wutim kun pe wuweko magi bene.
Luka 11:43 Wubineno can, wun Luparicayo, pien wumaro kabedo me dito i kacokke, dok wumito ni dano gumotwu i cuk.
Luka 11:44 Wubineno can! Pien wurom ki lyel ma pe ginen ma dano woto i wigi kun pe giŋeyo.”
Luka 11:1637 
Luka 11:45 Ŋat acel i kin lupwony-cik ogamo doge ni, “Lapwony, ka iwaco kit man nyuto ni iyeto wa wan bene.”
Luka 11:46 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Wubineno can, wun lupwony-cik bene! Pien wumiyo dano yeyo yec mapek, ma yeyone tek, kun wun kikomwu pe wugudo kadi ki lwet ciŋwu acel.
Luka 11:47 Wubineno can, pien wucano got i wi lyel pa lunebi ma yam kwariwu guneko.
Luka 11:48 Kit meno wun wucaden, wupwoyo tic pa kwariwu, pien gin guneko, wun wucano got i wi lyelgi.
Luka 11:49 Pi man Ryeko pa Lubaŋa owaco ni, ‘Abioro botgi lunebi ki lukwena, jo mogo i kingi gibinekogi gibilibogi,’
Luka 11:50 wek remo pa lunebi ducu ma gionyo nia i acakki piny gicul kworre i kom yalwak me kare man,
Luka 11:51 cakke i kom remo pa Abel nio kwede i kom remo pa Jekaria ma oto i kin keno tyer pa Lubaŋa ki kabedo maleŋ. Iyo atito botwu ni, gibiculo kworre i kom yalwak me kare man.
Luka 11:52 Wubineno can, wun lupwony-cik, pien wumayo layab me ŋeyo piny woko, kun wun kikomwu pe wudonyo iye, dok wugeŋo dano ma mito donyo iye bene.”
Luka 11:53 Ka doŋ oa ki kunnu, ci lupwonycik ki Luparicayo gucako dine matek ma girobo doge ki peny mapol,
Luka 11:54 kun gikiye wek gimak lok ma a ki i doge.
Luka 12:1 I kare meno, lwak dano alip ki alip gucokke kacel, kun doŋ ginyonne kekengi. Mukwoŋo, Yecu ocako waco bot lupwonnyene ni, “Wugwokke i kom tobi pa Luparicayo, ma en aye buta.
Luka 12:2 Pe tye gin mo ma giumo ma pe gibiyabo ka maleŋ, kadi gin ma gikano ma pe biŋene.
Luka 12:3 Lok ducu ma wuloko i colpiny biwinnye i leŋpiny; dok gin ducu ma wukwilo lokke i tyelo, gibitito lokke i wi ot malo. Ŋat ma myero dano olwor (Matayo 10.28-31)
Luka 12:4 “Lurema, atito botwu ni, pe wulwor jo ma neko kom, ma pe dok gitwero timo gin mo makato meno.
Luka 12:5 Ento abinyuto botwu ŋat ma myero wulwor; wulwor ŋat ma ka doŋ oneko, ci tye ki twero me bolo i Geena; iyo, atito ni, wulwore.
Luka 12:1638 
Luka 12:6 Ojwinyojwiny abic pe gicato pi cente pyeraryo? Ento pe tye mo acel i kingi ma wi Lubaŋa twero wil iye.
Luka 12:7 Kadi bed wa yer wiwu ducu bene doŋ gikwanogi woko liweŋ. Pe wulwor; pien piwu tek twatwal makato pi ojwinyojwiny mapol. Tuco nyiŋ Yecu i nyim dano (Matayo 10.32-33;12.32;10.19-20)
Luka 12:8 “Atito botwu ni, dano ducu ma tuco nyiŋa i nyim dano, Wod pa dano bene bituco nyiŋe i nyim lumalaika pa Lubaŋa;
Luka 12:9 ento ŋat ma kwera i nyim dano, gibikwere bene i nyim lumalaika pa Lubaŋa.
Luka 12:10 Dano ducu ma loko lok marac i kom Wod pa dano gibiweko balle; ento ŋat ma yeto Cwiny Maleŋ pe gibiweko balle.
Luka 12:11 Ka giterowu i nyim kacokke ki i nyim luloc ki wegi twer, pe wubed ka tamo kit ma myero wulok kwede, nyo ni wubigamo niŋniŋ, nyo ni kit lok aŋo ma wubiloko.
Luka 12:12 Pien Cwiny Maleŋ bipwonyowu i cawa meno i gin ma myero wuwaci.” Lalonyo ma lamiŋ
Luka 12:13 Ŋat acel i kin lwak owaco bot Yecu ni, “Lapwony, wac bot omera wek wapok ginaleya kwede.”
Luka 12:14 Ento Yecu ogamo doge ni, “Nyeri, aŋa ma oketa me bedo laŋolkop ki lapok jamiwu?”
Luka 12:15 Owaco botgi ni, “Wunen, wugwokke i paro lim; pien kwo pa dano pe cuŋ i wel lim mapol ma en tye kwede.”
Luka 12:16 Obolo botgi carolok ni, “Yam tye dano mo ma lalonyo ma cam ocek madwoŋ i potone.
Luka 12:17 Dano-nu opennye kekene ki i cwinye ni, ‘Abitimo aŋo, pien pe atye ki ka onyo bella?’
Luka 12:18 Owaco ni ‘Abitimo kit man: abimuko derona ducu, abigoyo mukene maditone, abionyo bella ki jamina ducu i igi.
Luka 12:19 Abiwaco ki cwinya ni, Cwinya, itye ki jami mapol ma birommi pi mwaka mapol; ywe, cam, mati, bed ki yomcwiny.’
Luka 12:20 Ento Lubaŋa owacce ni, ‘In lamiŋ! I dyewor ma tin gibikwanyo kwoni woko ki boti; jami ma iyubo-ni bibedo pa aŋa ce?’
Luka 12:21 Tye kit meno ŋat ma kano lonyo pire kene, kun pe tye ki lonyo bot Lubaŋa.” Bedo ki tam mapol (Matayo 6.25-34)
Luka 12:1639 
Luka 12:22 Yecu owaco bot lupwonnyene ni, “Pi meno awaco botwu ni, pe wubed ki tam mapol pi kwowu, ni wubicamo aŋo; nyo pi komwu, ni wubiruko aŋo.
Luka 12:23 Pien kwo pire tek kato cam, kom pire tek kato ginaruka.
Luka 12:24 Koŋ wupar mono pi agak; pe gicoyo kodi, dok bene pe gikayo, pe gitye ki dula kadi dero, ento Lubaŋa pitogi. Wun pe piwu tek kato pi winyo?
Luka 12:25 Aŋa i kinwu ma twero medo mwaka acel i kom kwone pi bedo ki tam mapol?
Luka 12:26 Ka gin manok macalo man timone loyowu, piŋo wubedo ki tam mapol pi lok mukene?
Luka 12:27 Koŋ wutam pi lega me tim, kit ma gidoŋo kwede; pe giwiyo uci, dok bene pe gicweyo boŋo; pud amedde ki waco botwu ni, kadi bed Solomon yam orukke ki deyone ducu, ento pe orukke macalo mo acel i kingi.
Luka 12:28 Ka ce Lubaŋa ruko lum ma i tim kit meno, ma bedo tye pi nino ma tin keken, ento diki inoŋo gibolo woko i keno, ci en pe birukowu makato, wun jo ma niyewu nok?
Luka 12:29 Pe wuyeny gin ma wubicamo, nyo gin ma wubimato; cwinywu pe obed ka tamo lok mapol. wumitogi. botwu.
Luka 12:30 Pien rok ducu ma i wi lobo yenyo jami magi; Wonwu ma tye i polo ŋeyo ni
Luka 12:31 Ento ma ka meno, wuket cwinywu i kom kerre, ci jami magi ducu gibimedo Lonyo ma gikano i polo (Matayo 6.19-21)
Luka 12:32 “Pe wulwor, wun romi manok, pien Wonwu oye atika me miyo botwu ker.
Luka 12:33 Wucat jamiwu, wukony ki lucan; wukwo kicaa lim ma pe ti, wukan lonyo ma pe tum i polo, ka ma lakwo pe o iye, dok nyenye pe balo.
Luka 12:34 Pien ka ma lonyowu tye iye, cwinywu bene bedo iye. Lutic ma kuro laditgi
Luka 12:35 “Wubed ma wutweyo pyerwu, kun tarawu lyel;
Luka 12:36 wubed macalo jo ma kuro laditgi ka bidwogo nia ki i karama me nyom, wek giyabbe doggola oyotoyot ka en obino, odwoŋo.
Luka 12:37 Tye ki gum lutic meno ma laditgi ka odwogo noŋo peya gunino. Ada awaco botwuni, en bitweyo pyere kene, bimiyo gibedo i dog cam, ci bibino, cako miyogi cam.
Luka 12:38 Ka obino cwiny dyewor nyo okogweno, kun onoŋogi kit meno, lutic meno gitye ki gum.
Luka 12:1640 
Luka 12:39 Ento myero wuŋe man ni, Kono nene won ot ŋeyo cawa ma lakwo bibino iye kono okiyo ma pe oweko dano oturo ode.
Luka 12:40 Pi meno, wun wubed ma wuyubbe pien Wod pa dano bibino i cawa ma pe wutamo.” Latic ma lagen ki ma pe lagen (Matayo 24.45-51)
Luka 12:41 Petero openyo ni, “Rwot, ibolo carolok man botwa keken, nyo bot dano ducu?”
Luka 12:42 Rwot ogamo ni, “Aŋa ma lagwok-ot ma lagen dok ma laryeko, ma laditte biweko dano ducu ma bedo i ode i te locce, wek opok botgi camgi i kare ma mitte?
Luka 12:43 Latic meno tye ki gum, ma laditte ka odwogo binoŋe kun tye ka tiyo ticce meno.
Luka 12:44 Ada awaco botwu ni, ladit-tu bimiye twero me loyo jamine woko ducu.
Luka 12:45 Ento ka litic meno oloko kekene ni, ‘Laditta doŋ ogalle ka bino’, ci cako goyo lutic ma co ki ma mon, kun camo, mato, dok mer,
Luka 12:46 ladit pa latic meno bidwogo i nino ma en pe tamo pi dwogone, dok i cawa ma en pe ŋeyo; bipwode, bikete i kin jo ma pe genne.
Luka 12:47 Latic meno ma oŋeyo gin ma laditte mito, ento pe oyubbe iye, dok pe olubo gin ma laditte mito, gibipwode matek twatwal.
Luka 12:48 Ento ŋat ma pe oŋeyo, ce otiyo gin ma twero miyo gipwode pire, gibipwode manok. Dano ma gimiye madwoŋ, gibimito madwoŋ ki bote; dok ŋat ma gikano jami mapol bote, gibipenye mapol makato. Yecu okelo apokapoka (Matayo 10.34-36)
Luka 12:49 “Abino ka cwinyo mac i lobo; kono doŋ omoko, kono ber!
Luka 12:50 Atye ki batija ma myero abatija kwede; kit ma aridde kwede nio ka ocobbe!
Luka 12:51 Wun wutamo ni abino ka kelo kuc i lobo? Atito botwu ni pe; kono apokapoka.
Luka 12:52 Cakke tin jo abic ma i ot acel gibibedo kun gipokke; jo adek bikwero jo aryo, jo aryo bikwero jo adek.
Luka 12:53 Won latin bipokke woko ki latinne, latin bene bipokke woko ki wonne; mego bipokke ki nyare, nyako bipokke woko ki minne; dayo bipokke woko ki ci-wode, ki ci-wod bene bipokke woko ki daane.” Poko kare (Matayo 16.2-3)
Luka 12:54 Yecu dok owaco bot lwak ni, “Ka wuneno pol otiŋŋe tuŋ potoceŋ, oyotoyot wuwaco ni, ‘Kot koni cwer’; ci cwer bene.
Luka 12:1641 
Luka 12:55 Dok ka wuneno yamo kodo ki i but piny tuŋ acuc, wun wuwaco ni, ‘Piny bibedo lyet matek’; ci timme bene.
Luka 12:56 Wun lubuta! Wuŋeyo poko kin gin ma nen i lobo ki i polo; piŋo pe wuŋeyo poko kin lanyut me kare man? Yubo lok ki ŋat ma doti (Matayo 5.25-26)
Luka 12:57 “Piŋo pe wuŋolo gin ma tye atir piwu kenwu?
Luka 12:58 Ka icito bot laŋolkop kun inywako yo ki ŋat ma doti, tem matek me yubo lok kwede ma kun pud wutye i yo, wek pe oteri i nyim laŋolkop, laŋolkop owek miyi bot askari, askari owek teri i mabuc.
Luka 12:59 Atitti ni, pe ibia ki kunnu nio ka iculo ducu ma wi cente mo pe orem.”
Luka 13:1 I kare meno onoŋo tye jo mogo kunnu ma gutitte pi Lugalilaya mogo ma yam Pilato orubo remogi kigitumgi.
Luka 13:2 En odok iye botgi ni, “Wutamo ni Lugalilaya meno gin lubalo makato Lugalilaya mukene ducu, ma omiyo guneno can kit meno-ni?
Luka 13:3 Atito botwu ni, pe; ento ka pe wuŋut, ci wun ducu wubito kit meno.
Luka 13:4 Nyo jo apar wiye aboro meno ma yam ot ma wiye bor opoto i komgi onekogi i Ciloam, wutamo ni gin onoŋo gutimo bal makato jo mukene ducu ma bedo i Jerucalem?
Luka 13:5 Atito botwu ni, pe; ento ka pe wuŋut, ci wun ducu wubito kit meno.” Carolok i kom oduro ma pe nyak
Luka 13:6 Yecu obolo carolok ni, “Yam tye dano mo ma onoŋo tye ki oduro ma gipito i poto olokke. En obino kun yenyo nyige, ento pe onoŋo.
Luka 13:7 Owaco bot lapur ni, ‘Nen, koni doŋ odoko mwaka adek kun abino, ayenyo nyig oduro man, pe anoŋo. Toŋ woko; piŋo balo ŋom nono?’
Luka 13:8 Lapur odokke iye ni, ‘Ladit, koŋ iwek obed pi mwaka man doki, nio ka abako ŋom i tere, aonyo iye cet dyaŋ mutwo.
Luka 13:9 Ka binyak i mwaka ma bino-ni, ci ber; ento ka pe, ci ibitoŋo giri.’ ” Gicaŋo dako ma cen ogomo i ceŋ cabit
Luka 13:10 Yam onoŋo Yecu tye ka pwony i kacokke mo i ceŋ cabit.
Luka 13:11 Dako mo onoŋo tye kunnu ma tye ki cen ma okelo goro i kome pi mwaka apar wiye aboro; onoŋo doŋ ogome woko, ma pe twero tirre.
Luka 13:1642 
Luka 13:12 Ka Yecu onene, olwoŋe, owacce ni, “Dako, gigonyi woko i kom goroni.”
Luka 13:13 Oketo ciŋe i kome; cutcut dako-nu otirre, ci opako Lubaŋa.
Luka 13:14 Ento kiniga omako ladit me kacokke, pien Yecu ocaŋo dano i ceŋ cabit. Owaco bot lwak ni, “Tye nino abicel ma myero giti iye tic; wubin i nino meno wek gicaŋwu, pe i ceŋ cabit.”
Luka 13:15 Rwot odokke iye ni, “Wun lubuta! Ŋat acel acel ki i kinwu pe gonyo twonne nyo kanane ki i ka-camgi, ci tero i pii i ceŋ cabit.
Luka 13:16 Dako man, ma en nya pa Abraim,, ma ceŋ Catan otweye pi mwaka apar wiye aboro kulu, pe myero gigonye ki i twec man i ceŋ cabit?”
Luka 13:17 I kare ma Yecu oloko lok man, ci lewic omako lukworre ducu; lwak ducu cwinygi obedo yom pi tic me deyo ducu ma en otiyo. Carolok i kom kodi karadali (Matayo 13.31-32; Marako 4.30-32)
Luka 13:18 Pi meno en owaco ni, “Ker pa Lubaŋa rom ki gin aŋo? Abiporo ki gin aŋo?
Luka 13:19 Rom ki kodi dek karadali ma dano mo okwanyo, ocoyo i potone; ci odoŋo, odoko yat madit, winyo me polo gibino gigero odigi i jaŋe.” Carolok i kom tobi (Matayo 13.33)
Luka 13:20 Dok owaco ni, “Abiporo ker pa Lubaŋa ki gin aŋo?
Luka 13:21 Rom ki tobi ma dako mo okwanyo, orubo ki moko mugati ma romo adita adek, nio ka moko ducu oyenyo, okwot.” Doggola madiŋ (Matayo 7.13-14,21-23)
Luka 13:22 Yecu omedde ki wotte i kin gaŋi madito ki matino, kun pwonyo, dok kwede tuŋ Jerucalem.
Luka 13:23 Ŋat mo openye ni, “Jo manok aye bilarre?” Yecu owaco botgi ni,
Luka 13:24 “Wuket tek wek wudony ki i doggola madiŋ; pien awaco botwu ni, jo mapol gibitemo donyo, ento pe gibitwero.
Luka 13:25 Ka won ot doŋ oa malo ocego doggola, wun wubicuŋ ki woko wudwoŋo doggola kun wuwaco ni, ‘Ladit, yab botwa doggola ba!’ En bidok iye botwu ni, ‘An pe aŋeyo ka ma wua iye.’
Luka 13:26 Ci wun wubiwaco ni, ‘Yam wacamo dok wamato kacel kwedi, dok bene ipwonyo dano i dye gaŋwa.’
Luka 13:27 Ento en biwaco botwu ni, ‘Awaco botwu ni, pe aŋeyo ka ma wua iye; wua woko ki i nyima, wun lutim maraco ducu!’
Luka 13:1643 
Luka 13:28 Kunnu wubikok, wubikayo lakwu, ka wuneno Abraim ki Icaka ki Yakobo ki lunebi ducu kun gitye i ker pa Lubaŋa, ento wun kikomwu gibolowu woko.
Luka 13:29 Dano gibibino kun gia ki tuŋ wokceŋ, ki tuŋ potoceŋ, ki yo tuŋ acam, ki tuŋ yo acuc, gibibedo piny i dog cam i ker pa Lubaŋa.
Luka 13:30 Nen, jo mogo ma lacen gibibedo meati, ki jo mogo meati gibibedo me lacen.” Yecu okok pi Jerucalem (Matayo 23.37-39)
Luka 13:31 I cawa meno luparicayo mogo gubino, guwaco bot Yecu ni, “Cit woko ki kany, pien Kerode mito neki.”
Luka 13:32 Yecu odok iye botgi ni, “Wucit, wuwac bot too can ni, ‘Nen, abiryemo cen dok abicaŋo dano tin ki diki, i nino me adekke abicobone.
Luka 13:33 Kadi bed kit meno, myero amedde gira ki wotta, tin ki diki ki diki maca; pien lanebi pe myero oto ka mukene ma pe i Jerucalem.’
Luka 13:34 Jerucalem, Jerucalem, in ma ineko lunebi, ma icelo dano ma gioro boti woko ki got, tyen adi ma nene amito coko litinoni woko, macalo min gweno coko litinone i te bwome, ento wun pe wuye giwu!
Luka 13:35 Nen, doŋ gitenyo otwu botwu. Atito botwu ni, pe wubinena nio ka wubiwacci, ‘Gipwo ŋat ma bino i nyiŋ Rwot.’ ”
Luka 14:1 I ceŋ cabit mo acel, ka Yecu ocito ka cam i ot pa laloc mo ma Laparicayo, gubedo ka kiye matek.
Luka 14:2 Onoŋo tye i nyime dano mo ma twoyo two akwota kom.
Luka 14:3 Yecu openyo lupwony-cik ki Luparicayo ni, “Cik ye ni gicaŋ dano i ceŋ cabit, nyo pe?”
Luka 14:4 Ento guliŋ aliŋa. Yecu omako latwoni, ci ocaŋe, ocike ni ocit gire.
Luka 14:5 Openyogi ni, “Aŋa i kinwu ma ka tye ki kanane nyo twonne ka opoto i waŋ it matut ci pe biywaye woko cutcut i ceŋ cabit?”
Luka 14:6 Dok i lok meno oloyogi woko. Pwony bot welo ki bot lalwoŋo
Luka 14:7 Ka oneno kit ma dano ma gilwoŋogi giyero ki kabedo mabeco, ci obolo botgi carolok ni,
Luka 14:8 “Ka gilwoŋi i karama me nyom, pe icibed i kabedo maber; gwok nyo gilwoŋo bene dano madit makati,
Luka 14:1644 
Luka 14:9 ci lalwoŋ wun aryo ducu bibino, biwaco ni, ‘Wek kabedo bot dano man.’ Ibidok i kabedo mapiny ki lewic madwoŋ.
Luka 14:10 Ento ka gilwoŋi, cit ibed i kabedo mapiny, wek ka dano ma olwoŋi obino en biwacci ni, ‘Larema, nyik i kom mamalo’, ci ibibedo ki deyo i nyim dano ducu ma wubedo kwedgi i dog cam.
Luka 14:11 Pien ŋat ma kette kene ni edit, gibidwoke piny, ŋat ma mwolle kene gibimiye doko dit.”
Luka 14:12 Owaco bene bot dano ma olwoŋe ni, “Ka ilwoŋo dano i cam me dyeceŋ nyo me otyeno, pe ilwoŋ luremi, nyo omegini, nyo watti, nyo lulonyo ma bedo cok ka ŋeti; wek gin bene guwek lwoŋi, wek gucul waŋ lwoŋoni.
Luka 14:13 Ento ka itedo karama, lwoŋ lucan, luŋolo, jo ma komo, ki kutowaŋ,
Luka 14:14 ci ibibedo ki gum, pien pe gitwero culo waŋ lwoŋoni. Culi bibedo i kare ma jo ma kitgi atir bicer iye.” Carolok i kom karama madit (Matayo 22.1-10)
Luka 14:15 Ka ŋat acel ma gubedo kwede i dog cam owinyo lok man, owaco ni, “Tye ki gum dano ma bicamo kwon i ker pa Lubaŋa!”
Luka 14:16 Ento Yecu odokke iye ni, “Dano mo yam otedo karama madit, olwoŋo iye jo mapol.
Luka 14:17 Ka kare me karama oromo, ci en ooro laticce ka poyo wi jo ma gilwoŋogi ni, ‘Wubin, pien doŋ giyubo jami ducu.’
Luka 14:18 Ento gin ducu gucako bako doggi ni gitim kica botgi. Ŋat mukwoŋo owacce ni ‘Awilo poto, myero acit ka nenone alegi itima kic.’
Luka 14:19 Dano me aryo owaco ni, ‘Awilo twoni apar me pur, acito ka ŋiyogi, alegi itima kica.’
Luka 14:20 Ŋat mukene owaco ni, ‘Pud anyomo dako anyoma nyen, pi meno pe atwero bino.’
Luka 14:21 Latic-cu odwogo otito bot laditte kit meno. Kiniga omako won ot, owaco ni, ‘Cit oyotoyot i waŋayo, ki i kin gaŋ, icikel lucan, luŋolo, lutowaŋ ki jo ma komo.’
Luka 14:22 Ci latic owaco ni, ‘Ladit, watimo gin ma iciko, ento kabedo gire pud tye.’
Luka 14:23 Ladit owaco bot laticce-nu ni, ‘Cit i gudo madito ki i ŋet yo, icuk dano ki tek wek gudony i ot, wek odaa opoŋ.
Luka 14:24 Pien atito botwu ni, pe tye ŋatti mo i kin jo ma yam gilwoŋogi ma bibilo karamana.’ ” Lubo Yecu tek (Matayo 10.37-38)
Luka 14:1645 
Luka 14:25 Lwak mapol guwoto kacel ki Yecu, ci Yecu olokke botgi owaco botgi ni,
Luka 14:26 “Ka ŋat mo obino bota, ma kun pe okwero wonne ki minne, dakone ki litinone, omegine ki nyimegine, kadi wa kwone kikome, pe twero bedo lapwonynyena.
Luka 14:27 Ŋat ma pe tiŋo yatariyane, kun luba, pe twero bedo lapwonnyena.
Luka 14:28 Pien aŋa i kinwu ka mito gero ot ma wiye bor, ci pe koŋ kwoŋo bedo piny ka kwano wel lim ma mitte, ka ce etye kwede ma eromo tyekone?
Luka 14:29 Ka pe kumeno, miyo ka ocibo guti, ma tyekone oloye woko, dano ducu ma gibineno gibicako ŋale,
Luka 14:30 kun giwaco ni, ‘Dano man ocako gedo, ento tyekone oloye woko.’
Luka 14:31 Nyo kabaka mene, ma oecito i mony ka lweny ki kabaka mukene, pe koŋ bedo piny poro lok, ka ce etwero tero dano alip apar me romo ki jo alip pyeraryo?
Luka 14:32 Ka pe kumeno, en cwalo kwena ma kabaka ca pud tye ka mabor, pi ribbe kwede ki kuc.
Luka 14:33 Kit meno, dano ducu ma i kinwu ma iye pe twero cayo gin ducu ma etye kwede, pe twero bedo lapwonnyena. Kado mabot (Matayo 5.13; Marako 9.50)
Luka 14:34 “Kado ber; ento ka doŋ odoko bot gibitimo niŋniŋ wek odok mit?
Luka 14:35 Pe doŋ ber me aketa i poto, dano gibolo woko ata. Ŋat ma tye ki it me winyo lok, owiny.”
Luka 15:1 Lujog-mucoro ki lubalo onoŋo yam ginyiko cok ka winyo lok pa Yecu.
Luka 15:2 Luparicayo ki lupwony-cik guŋur kun giwaco ni, “Dano man jolo lubalo dok camo kwedgi.”
Luka 15:3 Omiyo Yecu obolo botgi carolok man ni,
Luka 15:4 “Aŋa i kinwu ma tye ki romi miya acel, ka ŋat acel i kingi orwenyo, pe biweko romi pyeraboŋwen wiye aboŋwen i olet, ci cito ka yenyo en murwenyo-ni, nio waŋ ma onoŋe?
Luka 15:5 Ka onoŋe, ci bolo i wi gwoke, kun cwinye yom.
Luka 15:6 Ka oo paco, lwoŋo lureme ki luwote kacel, ci waco botgi ni, ‘Cwinywu obed yom kacel kweda, pien doŋ anoŋo romona ma yam orwenyo-ni.’
Luka 15:1646 
Luka 15:7 Kit meno atito botwu ni, bibedo yomcwiny madit twatwal i wi polo i kom labalo acel ma oŋut, makato i kom jo pyeraboŋwen wiye aboŋwen ma kitgi atir ma pe mito ŋut. Carolok i kom ciliŋ murwenyo
Luka 15:8 “Nyo dako mene, ma tye ki ciliŋ apar, ka ciliŋ acel orwenyo pe bicwinyo mac tara, ci yweyo ot kun yenyo matek nio waŋ ma onoŋo?
Luka 15:9 Ka doŋ onoŋo, ci lwoŋo lureme ki luwote kacel, kun waco botgi ni, ‘Cwinywu obed yom kacel kweda, pien doŋ anoŋo ciliŋ-ŋa ma onoŋo orwenyo-ni.’
Luka 15:10 Kit meno atito botwu ni, bibedo yomcwiny i nyim lumalaika pa Lubaŋa i kom labalo acel ma oŋut.” Carolok i kom latin murwenyo
Luka 15:11 Dok owaco ni, “Yam tye dano mo ma tye ki awobene aryo.
Luka 15:12 Matidine owaco bot wonne ni, ‘Aba, miya dul lim ma ka mera.’ Wongi opoko limme i kingi.
Luka 15:13 Lacen ka nino okato manoknok, awobi matidi-ni ocoko jamine ducu, ocako wotte me cito i lobo mabor; obalo limme kunnu pi bedo me carocaro.
Luka 15:14 Ka limme doŋ otum ducu, ci kec laparanat matek opoto i lobo meno, awobi-nu ocako mal ata.
Luka 15:15 Ocito odak bot ŋat mo ma i lobo meno; dano nu ocwale i olette ka kwayo opego.
Luka 15:16 Iye oparo yeŋ ki pok cam ma opego camo; pe tye ŋat mo ma omiye gin mo.
Luka 15:17 Ento ka oniaŋ pire kene, ci owaco ni, ‘Lutic pa wora tye adi ma gicamo kwon loyogi, ento an kono ato kec kany!
Luka 15:18 Abia, acito bot wora, abiwacce ni, “Aba, doŋ abalo bot polo ki i nyimi;
Luka 15:19 doŋ pe amyero gilwoŋa ni an a wodi; loka abed macalo ŋat acel i kin liticci.” ‘
Luka 15:20 Ci oa obino bot wonne. Ento ka onoŋo pud tye cen ka mabor, wonne onene. Kica omake i kome, oriŋo okwako ŋute, onoto leme.
Luka 15:21 Wode owacce ni, ‘Aba, doŋ abalo bot polo ki i nyimi, pe doŋ amyero gilwoŋa ni an a wodi.’
Luka 15:22 Ento wonne owaco bot luticce ni, ‘Wukel jor maber makato ducu oyot, wuruk i kome; wurwak agit i lwet ciŋe, ki war i tyene.
Luka 15:23 Wukel bene wod twon mucwe, wuneki, wek wacamu, wabed ki yomcwiny;
Luka 15:24 pien latinna-ni yam oto, koni doŋ kwo; yam orwenyo, doŋ ginoŋe.’ Gucako bedo ki yomcwiny.
Luka 15:1647 
Luka 15:25 “Wode madit onoŋo tye i poto; ka dwogo ma onyiko cok ki ot, owinyo wer ki myel.
Luka 15:26 Olwoŋo ŋat acel i kin lutic, openye ni, ‘Man kono gin aŋo ma tye ka timme-ni?’
Luka 15:27 Latic-cu odokke iye ni, ‘Omeru doŋ odwogo, woru onekke wod twon mucwe, pien ogame ma kome yot kun kwo.’
Luka 15:28 Ento kiniga omake, okwero donyo i ot. Wonne okatti woko obako doge bote,
Luka 15:29 ento en odokke iye ni, ‘Nen, pi mwaka magi mapol ata an atiyo boti, ma naka yam peya akwero winyo cikki, ento peya imiya kadi ma latin dyel mamwa, wek cwinya obed yom ki lurema.
Luka 15:30 Ento latinni man obino ma olanyo limmi ducu i kom mon ma lucoco, in inekke wod twon mucwe!’
Luka 15:31 Wonne ogamo doge ni, ‘Latinna, in nino ducu itye kweda, jamina ducu meri.
Luka 15:32 Ber wacam kun wabedo ki yomcwiny, pien omeruni yam oto, koni doŋ kwo, yam orwenyo, doŋ ginoŋe.’ ”
Luka 16:1 Yecu owaco bot lupwonnyene ni, “Yam tye ŋat mo ma lalonyo, ma tye ki lagwok- jamine. Gidoto danonu bote ni tye ka lanyo jamine.
Luka 16:2 Olwoŋe, openye ni, ‘Lok aŋo mono ma awinyo i komi-ni? Kella wel jami ma ikano, pien pe dok itwero bedo lagwok-jami.’
Luka 16:3 Lagwok-jamine oloko kekene ni, ‘Abitimo gin aŋo? Pien laditta mito kwanya woko ki i tic me gwoko jami. Pe atek ma aromo pur, lewic bene maka ka lego lim alega.
Luka 16:4 Aŋeyo gin ma abitimo, ka giryema woko ki i tic me gwoko jami, wek dano gujola i odigi.’
Luka 16:5 Olwoŋo lubanya pa laditte ki acel acel, owaco bot dano mukwoŋo ni, ‘Wel banya adi pa laditta ma tye boti?’
Luka 16:6 En odokke iye ni, ‘Moo jeituni ma romo agulu miya acel.’ Owacce ni, ‘Kwany waraga banyani, ibed piny oyotoyot, ico pyerabic.’
Luka 16:7 Lacen openyo ŋat mukene ni, ‘In kono itye ki wel banya adi?’ En ogamo ni, ‘Ŋano ma romo dwoŋo miya acel.’ Owacce ni, ‘Kwany waraga banyani, ico pyeraboro.’
Luka 16:8 Laditte opwoyo lagwok-jami ma pe lagen, pien otiyo ki ryeko; pien dano me lobo man giryek i yalwakgi, makato dano me ceŋ.
Luka 16:1648 
Luka 16:9 Atito botwu ni, wumak lurem pi tic ki lim ma pe atir, wek ka bitum, gijolwu i kabedo ma bedo matwal.
Luka 16:10 “Ŋat ma lagen i kom jami matidi mo, bibedo lagen bene i kom jami madwoŋ; ŋat ma pe lagen i kom jami matidi mo, pe bibedo lagen bene i kom jami madwoŋ.
Luka 16:11 Doŋ ka yam pe wubedo lugen i kom lim ma pe atir, aŋa ma bimiyowu lonyo me ada?
Luka 16:12 Ka yam pe wubedo lugen i kom jami pa dano mukene, aŋa ma bimiyowu jamiwu kikome?
Luka 16:13 Pe tye latic mo ma twero tiyo ki rwodi aryo; pien bikwero ŋat acel, bimaro ŋat mukene, nyo bimoko i kom ŋat acel, bicayo ŋat mukene. Pe itwero tic pi Lubaŋa ka dok pi lim bene.” Cik ki ker pa Lubaŋa
Luka 16:14 Luparicayo ma yam lumar lim guwinyo lok man ducu, ci gunyware.
Luka 16:15 Ento Yecu owaco botgi ni, “Wun aye jo ma nyuto kit ma atirwu bot dano, ento Lubaŋa ŋeyo cwinywu; pien gin ma dano dworo, en aye gin me kwer i nyim Lubaŋa.
Luka 16:16 “Cik ki lunebi obedo tye nio wa i kare pa Jon; cakke i kare meno gitito lok me kwena maber i kom ker pa Lubaŋa, dano ducu gitye ka donyo iye ki tek.
Luka 16:17 Ento bedo yot bot polo ki lobo me tum woko, makato ton acel me cik me balle. Lok ma Yecu owpnyo i kom keto nyom (Matayo 19.1-12; Marako 10.1-12)
Luka 16:18 “Dano ducu ma oryemo dakone, ka dok onyomo mukene otimo abor, ki ŋat ma onyomo dako ma cware oryemo bene otimo abor. Lalonyo ki Lajaro
Luka 16:19 “Yam tye dano mo ma lalonyo ma ruko boŋo ma lamar lamar ki kanyi maber me boŋo camanini kun camo cam me wel madwoŋ nino ducu.
Luka 16:20 I dog gaŋŋe lacan mo onoŋo buto iye, nyiŋe Lajaro, ma kome orwato bur,
Luka 16:21 kun iye paro yeŋo ki gin ma oo piny ki i wi meja pa lalonyo-nu; gwogi bene onoŋo gibino ginaŋo waŋ burre.
Luka 16:22 Ka lacan oto, ci lumalaika gutiŋe, gutere i kor Abraim. Lalonyo bene oto, ci giyike woko.
Luka 16:23 Oilo waŋe ki i Lyel kun tye ki can, oneno Abraim tye ka mabor kun Lajaro ojeŋŋe i kore.
Luka 16:24 Odaŋŋe ni, ‘Wora Abraim, tima kica, cwal Lajaro olut lwet ciŋe i pii, okwe ki leba, pien atye ki arem madwoŋ i mac man.’
Luka 16:1649 
Luka 16:25 Ento Abraim odokke iye ni, ‘Woda, po ni, i kare me kwoni gimiyi gin mabeco, ki Lajaro kit meno gimiye gin maraco; ento koni doŋ gikweyo cwinye kany, in kono itye ki arem.
Luka 16:26 Dok bene i kom lok man ducu, i kin wan ki wun giketo iye loŋo matut, wek ka jo ma gimito ŋolo nia ki kany, me bino botwu, pe otwerre, wek ŋat mo bene pe oŋol nia ki kunnu me bino botwa kany.’
Luka 16:27 En owaco ni, ‘Doŋ alegi ba, wora, ore i ot pa abana,
Luka 16:28 pien atye ki omegina abic, wek en ocitit botgi, gin bene guwek bino i kabedo man me can.’
Luka 16:29 Ento Abraim odokke iye ni, ‘Gitye ki Moses ki lunebi; wek guwiny lokgi.’
Luka 16:30 En owaco ni, ‘Pe, wora Abraim; ento ka ŋat mo i kin jo muto ocito botgi, ci gibiŋut.’
Luka 16:31 Abraim owacce ni, ‘Ka pe giwinyo lok pa Moses ki lunebi, ci kadi bed ŋat mo oa ki i kin jo muto bene, pe gibiye lokke.’ ”
Luka 17:1 Yecu owaco bot lupwonnyene ni, “Gin ma miyo dano poto i bal pe bigeŋŋe; ento bineno can ŋat ma kelo gin ma miyo dano poto i bal!
Luka 17:2 Kono obedo ber bot dano meno ka gitweyo kidi rego i ŋute, gibolo kwede i nam, kato ma en weko ŋat acel i kin litino matino magi poto i bal.
Luka 17:3 Wugwokke kenwu; ka omeru obalo, juke, ka oŋut, ci timme kica.
Luka 17:4 Ka otimo bal i komi tyen abiro i nino acel, ce olokke boti tyen abiro, kun legi ni, ‘Aŋut,’ time kica.” Med niyewa (Matayo 17.20)
Luka 17:5 Lukwena guwaco bot Rwot ni, “Med niyewa!”
Luka 17:6 Rwot ogamo ni, “Kono yam wutye ki niye macalo nyig kodi dek karadali, kono wuwaco ki yat man ni, ‘Putte keni, ipitte i dye nam,’ kono owinyo dogwu. Tic pa latic
Luka 17:7 “Aŋa i kinwu ma tye ki laticce ma puro ki kweri dyaŋ nyo kwayo romi, ma ka odwogo ki i poto ci wacce ni, ‘Bin oyotoyot ibed piny ka cam’?
Luka 17:8 Pe koŋ en biwacce ni, ‘Yubba cam me otyeno, itwe pyeri ikella cam, nio ka an acamo, amato, lacen in ibicamo ibimato’?
Luka 17:9 En pwoyo latic-cu pien olubo lok ma gicike kwede?
Luka 17:1650 
Luka 17:10 Pe gire. Wun bene kit meno, ka wutyeko tiyo gin ducu ma gicikowu, myero wuwac ni, ‘Wan lutic ma pe konyo gin mo; watiyo gin ma myero keken.’ ” Yecu olonyo ludobo apar
Luka 17:11 Ka onoŋo Yecu oecito Jerucalem, ci owok ki i waŋ apokki me Camaria ki Galilaya.
Luka 17:12 Ka odonyo i paco mo, ci ludobo guromo kwede, kun gucuŋ ka mabor,
Luka 17:13 gudaŋŋe ni, “Yecu, Ladit, timwa kica.”
Luka 17:14 Yecu onenogi, owaco botgi ni, “Wucit wunyutte kenwu bot ajwagi pa Lubaŋa.” Man pud gitye ka cito, komgi olony.
Luka 17:15 Ŋat acel i kingi ka oneno ni ecaŋ woko, ci odwogo cen kun pako Lubaŋa ki dwan maloŋo;
Luka 17:16 oryebbe piny ka tyen Yecu, kun pwoye. En onoŋo Lacamaria.
Luka 17:17 Yecu openyo ni, “Yam pe gilonyo dano apar? Jo aboŋwen kono gitye kwene?
Luka 17:18 Pe tye ŋat mo i kingi ma odwogo cen ka pako Lubaŋa, ento kono larok man keken?”
Luka 17:19 Owacce ni, “A, icit giri, niyeni ocaŋi.” Bino me ker pa Lubaŋa (Matayo 24.23-28,36-41)
Luka 17:20 Luparicayo gupenyo Yecu ni, “Ker pa Lubaŋa bibino awene?” En odok iye botgi ni, “Ker pe Lubaŋa pe bibino ki lanyut ma gineno.
Luka 17:21 Pe gibiwaco botwu ni, ‘Nen, en ene!’ nyo ni, ‘En ca!’ pien nen, ker pa Lubaŋa doŋ tye i kinwu.”
Luka 17:22 Owaco bot lupwonnyene ni, “Kare bibino ma wubiparo pi neno nino acel mo pa Wod pa dano, ento pe wubineno.
Luka 17:23 Gibiwaco botwu ni, ‘Nen, en ene!’ nyo ni, ‘Nen, en ca!’ Pe wucit iye, pe wulubgi.
Luka 17:24 Pien macalo lutkot wil, ci menyo but lobo tuŋcel nio tuŋcel, Wod pa dano bene bibedo kit meno i ninone.
Luka 17:25 Ento myero koŋ okany can madwoŋ, kun yalwak me kare man gikwere.
Luka 17:26 Macalo yam otimme i kare pa Nua, bitimme kit meno bene i kare pa Wod pa dano.
Luka 17:27 Yam gicamo, gimato, awobegi ki anyira ginyomme, nio i nino ma Nua odonyo kwede i yeya, pii aluka ocorre otyekogi ducu.
Luka 17:28 Kit meno bene i kare pa Lot, onoŋo gicamo, gimato, giwilo jami, gicato jami, gipito ginapita, gigero odi;
Luka 17:1651 
Luka 17:29 ento i nino ma Lot oa woko ki i Codom mac ki gweŋ calfa ma mac oliyo ocwer ki i polo, otyekogi ducu.
Luka 17:30 Bibedo kit meno i kare ma gibinyuto iye Wod pa dano.
Luka 17:31 I nino-nu, ŋat ma tye i wi ot kun jamine tye i ot, pe myero olor piny ka cokogi; kit meno bene ŋat ma tye i poto pe myero odwog paco.
Luka 17:32 Wupo mono i kom dako pa Lot.
Luka 17:33 Ŋat ma mito laro kwone birwenyone, ento ŋat ma rwenyo kwone, bigwoko.
Luka 17:34 Atittiwu ni,, i dyewor meno co aryo bibuto wi kitanda acel, gibikwanyo ŋat acel, gibiweko ŋat acel doŋ.
Luka 17:35 Mon aryo gibibedo ka rego kacel; gibikwanyo ŋat acel, gibiweko ŋat mukene doŋ.
Luka 17:36 Co aryo bibedo i poto, gibikwanyo ŋat acel, gibiweko ŋat acel doŋ.”
Luka 17:37 Gupenye ni, “Kwene, Rwot?” En owaco botgi ni, “Ka ma kom dano muto tye iye, acut bene gicokke kunnu.”
Luka 18:1 Obolo botgi carolok ma pwonyogi ni myero guleg jwijwi, guwek ol.
Luka 18:2 Owaco botgi ni, “Yam tye laŋolkop i gaŋ mo, ma pe lworo Lubaŋa kadi woro dano.
Luka 18:3 I gaŋ meno yam tye iye dato mo ma bino bote jwijwi kun wacce ni, ‘Cul kworra i kom lukworra.’
Luka 18:4 Tyen mapol laŋolkop obedo ka kwero; ento lacen oloko kekene ni, ‘Kadi bed pe alworo Lubaŋa ba, kadi woro dano,
Luka 18:5 ento dato man yela, abiculo kworre; gwok nyo bijonya nono ki bino bota nino ducu.’ “
Luka 18:6 Rwot owaco ni, “Wuwiny lok ma laŋolkop ma pe kite atir owaco.
Luka 18:7 Lubaŋa pe biculo kwor pa jo ma en oyero, ma gikok bote dyeceŋ ki dyewor? En bigalle ma pe timo gin mo i komgi?
Luka 18:8 Atito botwu ni, en biculo kworgi oyotoyot. Ento Wod pa dano ka bibino, tika binoŋo niye i lobo?” Carolok i kom Laparicayo ki lajog-mucoro
Luka 18:9 Dok obolo carolok bot jo ma genne kengi, ni kitgi atir, kun gicayo jo mukene. Owaco ni,
Luka 18:1652 
Luka 18:10 “Jo aryo yam gucito ka lega i ot pa Lubaŋa, ŋat acel Laparicayo, ŋat mukene lajog-mucoro.
Luka 18:11 Laparicayo ocuŋ, olego gire kene kun waco ni, ‘Lubaŋa, apwoyi pien an pe acalo jo mukene, lubuma, jo ma pe genne, lutim abor, pe bene acalo lajogmucoro man.
Luka 18:12 Ari kec kiryo i cabit acel; amiyo dul me apar me jamina ducu ma alimo.’
Luka 18:13 Ento lajog-mucoro ocuŋ ka mabor, onoŋo pe mito ilo waŋe malo i plo, ento en odoŋo kore, kun waco ni, ‘Lubaŋa, tima kica, pien an labalo!’
Luka 18:14 Atito botwu ni, dano man odok i ode kun oloyo kop makato ŋat mukene ca; pien dano ducu ma kette kene ni edit gibidwoke piny, ento ŋat ma mwolle kene gibimiye doko dit.” Yecu omiyo gum i kom litino (Matayo 19.13-15; Marako 10.13-16)
Luka 18:15 Gukelo bote litino matino, wek oket ciŋe i komgi; ka lupwonnyene guneno, gujukogi.
Luka 18:16 Ento Yecu olwoŋogi bote, owaco ni, “Wuwek litino gubin bota, pe wugeŋgi; pien ker pa Lubaŋa tye pi jo macalo gin.
Luka 18:17 Ada awaco botwu ni, ŋat ma pe jolo ker pa Lubaŋa macalo latin matidi, pe bidonyo iye.” Awobi ma lalonyo (Matayo 19.16-30; Marako 10.17-31)
Luka 18:18 Laloc mo openye ni, “Lapwony maber, atim gin aŋo wek alim kwo ma pe tum?”
Luka 18:19 Yecu openye ni, “Piŋo ilwoŋa ni aber? Pe tye ŋat mo maber kono Lubaŋa keken.
Luka 18:20 Iŋeyo cik, ni, ‘Pe itim abor, Pe ineki, Pe ibed caden me goba, Wor woru ki meni.’ “
Luka 18:21 Ogamo ni, “Amako lok magi ducu cakke wa ka tinona.”
Luka 18:22 Ka Yecu owinyo, ci owacce ni, “Pud iweko lok acel; cat jami ducu ma itye kwede, mi limme ki lucan, ci ibibedo ki lwak lonyo ma gikano piri i polo; ka doŋ ibin icak lubo kora.”
Luka 18:23 Ento ka owinyo lok man, okumo, pien onoŋo en lalonyo twatwal.
Luka 18:24 Yecu kun tye ka nene, owaco ni, “Tek mada bot lulonyo me donyo i ker pa Lubaŋa!
Luka 18:25 Pien bedo yot bot kinaga me donyo ki i waŋ libira, kato lalonyo me donyo i ker pa Lubaŋa.”
Luka 18:26 Dano ducu ma guwinyo guwaco ni, “Ci aŋa ma twero larre?”
Luka 18:1653 
Luka 18:27 Ento Yecu owaco ni, “Gin man pe twerre ki bot dano, ento ki bot Lubaŋa twerre.”
Luka 18:28 Petero owaco ni, “Nen, wan waweko pacciwa, walubi.”
Luka 18:29 Owaco botgi ni, “Ada, awacciwu ni, pe tye ŋatti mo ma oweko ode, nyo dakone, nyo omegine, nyo lunyodone, nyo litinone, pi ker pa Lubaŋa,
Luka 18:30 ma pe bilimo makato meno tyen mapol i kare man, ki i kare ma bibino anyim en binoŋo kwo ma pe tum.” Yecu dok onwoyo tito pi tone tyen me adekke (Matayo 20.17-19; Marako 10.32-34)
Luka 18:31 Yecu otero jone apar wiye aryo i muŋ, owaco botgi ni, “Wunen, waecito Jerucalem, lok ducu ma lunebi gucoyo i kom Wod pa dano bicobbe kakare.
Luka 18:32 Pien gibimiye bot Lurok, gibiŋale, gibitimo aranyi i kome, gibiŋulo laa i kome;
Luka 18:33 gibipwode ki del anino, gibineke, i nino me adekke en bicer.”
Luka 18:34 Ento pe guniaŋ lok ma en owaco; gikano te lok man woko botgi, pe gumedo ki ŋeyo lok ma giwaco botgi. Yecu ocaŋo latowaŋ cok ki Jeriko (Matayo 20.29-34; Marako 10.46-52)
Luka 18:35 Ka doŋ gunyiko cok ki Jeriko, latowaŋ mo onoŋo obedo piny i ŋet yo kun lego lim.
Luka 18:36 Ka owinyo lwak tye ka mol ki ka ŋete, ci openyo ni, “Meno kono gin aŋo?”
Luka 18:37 Gititte ni, “Yecu me Najaret aye tye ka kato.”
Luka 18:38 Latowaŋ odaŋŋe ni, “Yecu Lakwar Daudi, tima kica ba!”
Luka 18:39 Dano ma onoŋo gutelo nyim Yecu gujuke ni, “Liŋ, nye;” ento en omedde ameda ki daŋŋe ni, “Lakwar Daudi, tima kica!”
Luka 18:40 Yecu ocuŋ, ociko ni gikele bote. Ka obino cok, Yecu openye ni,
Luka 18:41 “Imito atimmi gin aŋo?” Latowaŋ ogamo ni, “Ladit, amito waŋa onen piny.”
Luka 18:42 Yecu owacce ni, “Nen giri piny, niyeni ocaŋi.”
Luka 18:43 Oyotoyot ocako neno piny, ci olubo kor Yecu kun miyo deyo bot Lubaŋa. Dano ducu ka guneno, ci gupako Lubaŋa.
Luka 19:1 Yecu odonyo i Jeriko kun oekato akata.
Luka 19:1654 
Luka 19:2 Onoŋo tye kunnu dano mo ma nyiŋe Jakayo, lajogmucoro madit, dok lalonyo bene.
Luka 19:3 Oparo pi neno Yecu, ento pe otwero pi lwak, pien en cek.
Luka 19:4 Oriŋo anyim, oito i wi yat olam wek enen, pien Yecu onoŋo oewok ki i yo-nu.
Luka 19:5 Ka Yecu oo i kabedo-nu, oneno malo, owacce ni, “Jakayo, lor piny oyotoyot; pien tin myero abed i odi.”
Luka 19:6 Jakayo olor oyotoyot, ojole ki yomcwiny.
Luka 19:7 Ka dano ducu guneno, ci guŋur kun giwaco ni, “En odonyo i ot ka bedo welo pa dano ma labalo.”
Luka 19:8 Jakayo oa malo, owaco bot Rwot ni, “Nen, Ladit, abimiyo nucu jamina bot lucan; ka abumo ŋat mo i gin mo, abicule waŋ aŋwen.”
Luka 19:9 Yecu owacce ni, “Tin lar obino i ot man, pien en bene lakwar Abraim.
Luka 19:10 Pien Wod pa dano obino ka yenyo ki ka laro jo ma orwenyo.” Carolok i kom ciliŋ alip acel (Matayo 25.14-30)
Luka 19:11 Ka pud giwinyo lok man, Yecu omedde ki lokke, obolo botgi carolok, pien onoŋo doŋ cok ki Jerucalem, dok pien onoŋo gitamo ni ker pa Lubaŋa binen cutcut.
Luka 19:12 Pi meno owaco ni, “Yam tye wod ker mo ma oa ocito i lobo mabor ka limo twerone me loc ka doŋ odwog cen.
Luka 19:13 Olwoŋo luticce apar, opoko botgi ciliŋ alip acel, owaco botgi ni, ‘Wucat ki wil nio waŋ ma an adwogo.’
Luka 19:14 Ento dano me lobone gukwere, gucwalo lukwena i kore ki lok ni, ‘Pe wamito dano man olowa.’
Luka 19:15 Ka doŋ en odwogo, ma doŋ ocamo ker, ociko ni gilwoŋ lutic ma yam emiyogi lim-mi, wek eŋe wel magoba ma gulimo i cato wilgi.
Luka 19:16 Dano mukwoŋo obino i nyime, owaco ni, ‘Ladit, ciliŋ miya ma imiya-ni omedde iye ciliŋ alip acel mukene.’
Luka 19:17 Ogamo ni, ‘Ber, in latic maber! Pien yam ibedo lagen i kom jami matidi mo, ibibedo ki twero i kom gaŋi apar.’
Luka 19:18 Dano me aryone obino, owaco ni, ‘Ladit, ciliŋ miya dok omedde iye ciliŋ miya abic mukene.’
Luka 19:19 Owacce ni, ‘In bene ibibedo ki twero i kom gaŋi abic.’
Luka 19:1655 
Luka 19:20 Ŋat mukene dok obino, owaco mere ni, ‘Ladit, limmi en, agwoko, aboyo i kitambara,
Luka 19:21 pien onoŋo alwori, pien in i dano magwa; ikwanyo gin ma pe ikano, ikayo ka ma pe icoyo.’
Luka 19:22 Owacce ni, ‘Abiŋolo kop loyi kun lubo lok ma oa ki i dogi keni, in latic marac! Yam iŋeyo ni an a dano magwa, akwanyo gin ma pe akano, akayo ka ma pe acoyo,
Luka 19:23 piŋo doŋ pe ikano limma i beŋŋe, wek ka adwogo, anoŋ kun acoko limma ki magobane?’
Luka 19:24 Owaco bot jo ma gucuŋ ka ŋete ni, ‘Wugam ciliŋ miya-ni woko ki bote wumi bot won ciliŋ alip acel-li.’
Luka 19:25 Guwacce ni, ‘Ladit, en doŋ tye ki ciliŋ alip acel!’
Luka 19:26 Ci en owacci, ‘Atito botwu ni, dano ducu ma mere tye gibimedo bote gin mo; ento ŋat ma mere pe, gibikwanyo woko ki bote kadi wa gin ma tye bote.
Luka 19:27 Ento lukworra magi, ma gin gukwera ni pe alogi-ni, wukelgi kany, wunekgi ki pala lucwan i nyima.’ ” Yecu odonyo i Jerucalem calo kabaka (Matayo 21.1-11; Marako 11.1-11; Jon 12.12-19)
Luka 19:28 Ka Yecu otyeko loko lok man, ci owoto anyim kun cito malo i Jerucalem.
Luka 19:29 Ka doŋ onyiko cok ki Betepage ki Betania, i te got ma gilwoŋo Jeituni, Yecu ocako oro jo aryo ki i kin lupwonynyene,
Luka 19:30 kun cikogi ni, “Wucit i gaŋ ma tye i nyimwu. Ka ce wudonyo iye wubinoŋo latin kana ma gitweyo, ma ŋat mo peya oito i wiye; ci wugony, wukel kany.
Luka 19:31 Ka ŋatti mo openyowu ni, ‘Wugonye piŋo?’ wun wubidok iye kit man ni, ‘Rwot aye mito.’ “
Luka 19:32 Kit meno jo ma giorogi gucito, ci gunoŋo kit macalo Yecu otito botgi-ni.
Luka 19:33 Ka gitye ka gonyo latin kana, wegine gupenyogi ni, “Wugonyo latin kana piŋo?”
Luka 19:34 Gudok iye botgi ni, “Rwot aye mito.”
Luka 19:35 Gukelo latin kana bot Yecu. Ka doŋ gupeto ginarukagi i wiye, ci gicibo Yecu i wiye.
Luka 19:36 Ka en oewoto, gipeto ginarukagi i waŋayo.
Luka 19:37 Ma doŋ onyiko cok ki Jerucalem, i luŋ me got Jeituni, lwak lupwonnyene ducu cwinygi obedo yom, gupako Lubaŋa ki dwan maloŋo pi tic madito ma guneno,
Luka 19:38 kun giwaco ni, “Lubaŋa omi gum i kom Kabaka ma bino i nyiŋ Rwot! Kuc obed i wi polo, ki deyo obed i kabedo ma malo twal!”
Luka 19:1656 
Luka 19:39 Luparicayo mogo ma i kin lwak guwacce ni, “Lapwony, juk lupwonnyeni.”
Luka 19:40 Yecu odok iye ni, “Atito botwu ni, ka kono jo-ni guliŋ, godi magi kikomgi kono gudaŋŋe.”
Luka 19:41 Ka doŋ onyiko cok, ma oneno gaŋ, okok pire,
Luka 19:42 kun waco ni, “Tin-ni ka kono iŋeyo lok ma kelo kuc boti, kono ber! Ento koni gikano woko ki boti.
Luka 19:43 Pien kare bibino i komi ma lukworri gibitoro lobo rumi dyere, gibidiri tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi,
Luka 19:44 gibireti piny, in ki litinoni; pe gibiweko gweŋ mo acel i ii doŋ ma ododde i wi wadi; pien yam pe iŋeyo kare ma gibilimi iye.” Yecu olonyo ot pa Lubaŋa (Matayo 21.12-17; Marako 11.15-17; Jon 2.13-22)
Luka 19:45 Yecu odonyo i ot pa Lubaŋa, ocako ryemo lucat-wil woko ki iye,
Luka 19:46 kun waco botgi ni, “Yam gicoyo ni ‘Oda bibedo ot me lega’; ento wun wuloko odoko boro pa luyak.”
Luka 19:47 Yecu obedo ka pwony i ot pa Lubaŋa nino ducu. Ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki lupwony-cik ki jo madito i kin lwak guyenyo yo me neke;
Luka 19:48 ento pe gunoŋo gin mo ma myero gutim i kome, pien dano ducu guketo cwinygi ka winyo lokke.
Luka 20:1 I nino mo acel ka Yecu tye ka pwonyo dano i ot pa Lubaŋa kun tito lok me kwena maber, ajwagi ki lupwony-cik ki ludoŋo gubino,
Luka 20:2 gupenye ni, “Tit botwa, twer aŋo mumiyo itimo gin magi; nyo aŋa ma omiyoni twero man?”
Luka 20:3 Yecu odok iye botgi ni, “An bene abipenyowu ki peny acel; wudokka iye.
Luka 20:4 Batija pa Jon twerone oa ki i polo nyo ki bot dano?”
Luka 20:5 Guporo lok kekengi kun giwaco ni, “Ka wawacci, ‘Oa ki i polo,’ en bipenyowa ni, ‘Piŋo pe wuye en?’
Luka 20:6 Ento ka wawaco ni, ‘Oa ki bot dano,’ dano ducu bicelowa ki got; pien dano ducu giye atika ni Jon aye lanebi.”
Luka 20:7 Mumiyo gudok iye bot Yecu ni pe giŋeyo ka ma oa iye.
Luka 20:8 Yecu owaco botgi ni, “An bene pe abitito botwu kit twer mumiyo atiyo lok magi.”
Luka 20:1657  Carolok i kom poto olok ki lupur (Matayo 21.33-46; Marako 12.1-12)
Luka 20:9 Yecu ocako bolo carolok man bot lwak ni, “Yam tye dano mo ma opito olok i potone, ci oweko bot lupur, ocito woko wa i lobo mukene, ori kunnu pi kare malac.
Luka 20:10 Ka kare oromo, ci ooro luticce bot lupur ni myero gumine nyig olok mogo; ento lupur gugoye, guryeme ci odok ki ciŋe nono.
Luka 20:11 En dok ooro latic mukene; gin gugoyo en bene, gutimo tim aranyi i kome, guryeme kwede odok ki ciŋe nono.
Luka 20:12 Dok ooro me adekke; guketo ret i kom man, gucwale woko.
Luka 20:13 Lacen won poto olok owaco ni, ‘Abitimo gin aŋo doŋ? Abioro woda ma amaro; gwok nyo gibiwore.’
Luka 20:14 Ento ka lupur gunene, guloko kekengi ni, ‘Man aye doŋ lale lim; waneke woko, wek lim ma en bileyo-ni obed mewa.’
Luka 20:15 Gucwale woko ki i poto olok, guneke. Won poto bitimogi niŋniŋ?
Luka 20:16 En bibino, ci neko lupur meno woko ducu, miyo poto olok bot jo mukene.” Ka guwinyo lok man, guwaco ni, “Pe kumeno!”
Luka 20:17 Ento Yecu ociko waŋe i komgi, owaco ni, “Man kono gin aŋo ma yam gicoyo ni, ‘Got ma lugedo gukwero-ni en aye odoko got madit ma i twok ot’?
Luka 20:18 Dano ducu ma poto i kom got man bitur woko; ento ka got man opoto i kom ŋat mo, binyote woko.”
Luka 20:19 Lupwony-cik ki ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa gumito make i cawa-nu, ento gulworo lwak; pien guniaŋ ni en obolo carolok man i komgi. Culo mucoro bot Cecar (Matayo 22.15-22; Marako 12.13-17)
Luka 20:20 Giŋiyo kare maber, ci gioro lurot, ma giporo bedo ni gin jo ma genne, wek gimak lok ma a i doge, wek gimiye i te loc ki twero pa laloyo.
Luka 20:21 Gupenye ni, “Lapwony, waŋeyo ni in iloko dok ipwonyo lok ma tye atir, pe ipoko kin dano, ento ipwonyo yo pa Lubaŋa ki ada.
Luka 20:22 Myero wacul mucoro bot Cecar nyo pe?”
Luka 20:23 Ento en oniaŋ ryekogi, openyogi ni,
Luka 20:24 “Koŋ wunyutta lim ma giculo kwede. Cal ki coc ma tye i kome-ni pa aŋa?” Gugamo ni, “Pa Cecar.”
Luka 20:25 Yecu owaco ni, “Wudwok jami pa Cecar bot Cecar, ki jami pa Lubaŋa wudwok bot Lubaŋa.”
Luka 20:1658 
Luka 20:26 Pe gutwero mako lok mo ma oa ki i doge i nyim lwak; ento guuro kit ma en ogamo kwede lok, ci guliŋ aliŋa. Peny i kom cer ki i kin jo muto (Matayo 22.23-33; Marako 12.18-27)
Luka 20:27 Lucadukayo mogo gubino bot Yecu, gin aye jo ma onoŋo giwacci jo muto pe gicer.
Luka 20:28 Gupenye ni, “Lapwony, Moses yam ocoyo botwa ni, ka laco mo oto woko oweko dakone ma pe ki litino, ominne myero olak dako-nu, wek onywal kwede litino ka wi ominne.
Luka 20:29 Yam tye omego abiro; ŋat mukwoŋo onyomo dako, ci oto laboŋo litino;
Luka 20:30 me aryone,
Luka 20:31 ki me adekke bene gulako dako-nu, kit meno gin abiro ducu gubedo ki dako-nu, guto laboŋo litino.
Luka 20:32 Lacen dako-nu bene oto.
Luka 20:33 I kare me cer ki i kin jo muto, dako-nu bibedo dako pa aŋa i kingi? Pien gin co abiro-ni ducu gubedo kwede.”
Luka 20:34 Yecu owaco botgi ni, “Jo me kare man ginyomme;
Luka 20:35 ento jo ma gikwanogi ni myero guo i lobo maca, ki i cer ki i kin jo muto, pe ginyomo, pe gibigero co,
Luka 20:36 pien pe dok gitwero to, doŋ girom ki lumalaika; gin litino pa Lubaŋa, ma gin litino me cer.
Luka 20:37 Ento ni jo muto twero cer, Moses kikome bene onyuto, i dul ma gikwano iye lok i kom caka, ka ma en olwoŋo iye Rwot ni, ‘Lubaŋa pa Abraim, Lubaŋa pa Icaka, ki Lubaŋa pa Yakobo.’
Luka 20:38 Doŋ Lubaŋa pe Lubaŋa pa jo muto, ento Lubaŋa pa jo makwo; pien dano ducu bedo kwo pire.”
Luka 20:39 Jo mogo i kin lupwony-cik gugamo doge ni, “Lapwony, iwaco kakare.”
Luka 20:40 Pien pe dok gudiyo cwinygi me penye ki lok mo. Peny pi lakwar Daudi (Matayo 22.41-46; Marako 12.35-37)
Luka 20:41 Ento Yecu openyogi ni, “Giwaco niŋniŋ ni Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero en lakwar Daudi?
Luka 20:42 Pien Daudi kikome bene owaco i buk me Jabuli ni ‘Rwot owaco bot Rwoda ni, Bed i kom bada malacuc, i kabedo me deyo
Luka 20:43 nio ka abimiyo lukworri doko kom me teno tyeni.’
Luka 20:1659 
Luka 20:44 Kit meno ka ce Daudi yam olwoŋe ni Rwot, ci dok en bedo lakwarre niŋniŋ?” Yecu otuco pi can ma bipoto i kom lupwony-cik (Matayo 23.1-36; Marako 12.38-40; Luka 11.37-54)
Luka 20:45 I kare ma lwak ducu winyo lokke, Yecu owaco bot lupwonnyene ni,
Luka 20:46 “Wugwokke i kom lupwony-cik ma gimaro wot ma guruko boŋŋi maboco, dok gimito ni dano gubed ka motogi wa i cuk-gu, gimaro bedo i kom pa wa ludito, ka gitye i kacokke, dok gimaro bedo i kabedo me deyo i karama.
Luka 20:47 Gin gimayo odi pa mon-to, dok gibedo ka lego lega maboco me buta keken. Giŋolo kop madit i wigi makato.”
Luka 21:1 Yecu otiŋo waŋe malo, ci oneno lulonyo kun gibolo motgi i canduk lim i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Luka 21:2 Oneno dato mo ma lacan, ma obolo cente aryo ma rom ki cente abic me kare-ni.
Luka 21:3 Owaco ni, “Adada awaco botwu ni, dato man ma lacan-ni obolo lim madwoŋ makato dano ducu;
Luka 21:4 pien gin ducu gugito but limgi madwoŋ-ŋi aye gubolo, ento en i canne-ni, obolo lim ducu ma tye bote, ma konyo kwone.” Yecu otito pi muko ot pa Lubaŋa woko (Matayo 24.1-2; Marako 13.1-2)
Luka 21:5 Ka onoŋo jo mogo i kin lupwonnyene gubedo ka lok pi ot pa Lubaŋa, kit macalo gideyo kwede ki godi mabeco ki gityer ma gimiyo pire, ci Yecu owaco ni,
Luka 21:6 “Gin magi ducu ma wuneno-ni, kare bibino, ma pe gibiweko got acel mo ma ododde i wi wadi ma pe gibicoro woko piny.” Can ma bipoto i lobo (Matayo 24.3-14; Marako 13.3-13)
Luka 21:7 Lupwonnye gupenyo Yecu ni, “Lapwony, man bitimme awene, dok kit gin aŋo ma binyuto ka man doŋ cok timme?”
Luka 21:8 Yecu ogamo ni, “Wugokke, ŋatti mo owek rwenyowu; pien jo mapol gibibino i nyiŋa, ma giwacci, ‘An aye a en!’ dok ni, ‘Kare doŋ onyiko cok!’ Pe wulubgi.
Luka 21:9 Dok ka wubiwinyo pi lweny ki pi arubaruba, pe wubed ki lworo, pien meno koŋ myero otimme, ento agik pe bibino oyotoyot.”
Luka 21:10 Lacen owaco botgi ni, “Rok bilweny ki rok wadi, ker bilweny ki ker wadi;
Luka 21:1660 
Luka 21:11 ki oyeŋyeŋ madoŋo biyeŋo lobo, kec laparanat ki two gemo mapatpat bipoto i kabedo mapol; ki gin ma miyo lworo mako dano, ki lanyut madoŋo bene, bia ki i polo.
Luka 21:12 Ento ma peya gin meno ducu otimme, koŋ gibimakowu, gibilibowu, gibiterowu i nyim kacokke, gibitweyowu i mabuc, gibikelowu i nyim luker ki i nyim luloc pi nyiŋa.
Luka 21:13 Man aye bibedo kare botwu me tito lok me caden i koma.
Luka 21:14 Pi meno, wumok i tamwu ni pe wubitamo con kit ma wubidok iye,
Luka 21:15 pien abimiyowu twero me dok ki ryeko, ma ŋat mo i kin lukworwu pe bitwero ette i kome, kadi pyem kwede.
Luka 21:16 Kadi wa lunyodowu ki omegiwu ki wadiwu ki luremwu bene gibidobowu, jo mogo i kinwu gibinekogi;
Luka 21:17 dano ducu bimon kwedwu pi nyiŋa.
Luka 21:18 Ento yer wiwu acel mo pe birwenyo.
Luka 21:19 Ka wudiyo cwinywu, ci wubilaro kwowu. Yecu otito pi keto Jerucalem (Matayo 24.15-21; Marako 13.14-19)
Luka 21:20 “Ento ka wuneno mony orumo Jerucalem, ci wuŋe ni kare me ketone doŋ onyiko cok.
Luka 21:21 Jo ma tye i Judaya myero guriŋ i wi godi, jo ma tye i gaŋ myero guriŋ woko ki iye, jo ma tye woko i kin paco pe dok gudony i Jerucalem.
Luka 21:22 Pien kare meno bibedo kare me culo kwor, ki cobo lok ducu ma yam gicoyo.
Luka 21:23 Dok mon ma giyac gibineno cam i kare meno, ki mon ma gidoto litino bene! Pien can man madit bipoto i lobo, ki kiniga madwoŋ bipoto i kom jo me rok man.
Luka 21:24 Gibinekogi ki pala lucwan, gibiterogi me bedo opii i kin rok ducu; Lurok gibinyono Jerucalem piny, nio ka kare pa Lurok ocobo kakare. Kit ma Wod pa dano bidwogo kwede (Matayo 24.29-31; Marako 13.24-27)
Luka 21:25 “Lanyut binen i kom ceŋ, i kom dwe ki i kom lakalatwe, rok mapol ma i wi lobo bikumo kun noŋo cwinygi oŋabbe aŋaba pi mor me biamwonyi.
Luka 21:26 Kom dano bimyel ki lworo, ka gibitamo gin ma bipoto i kom lobo; pien twer ducu ma i polo biyeŋŋe.
Luka 21:27 Lacen gibineno Wod pa dano kun bino i wi pol ki tek ki deyo madit.
Luka 21:28 Ka gin magi ocako timme, myero wunen malo, myero wutiŋ wiwu malo, pien kare me kokowu doŋ onyiko cok.”
Luka 21:1661  Pwony i kom yat oduro (Matayo 24.32-35; Marako 13.28-31)
Luka 21:29 Dok obolo carolok botgi ni, “Koŋ wunen yat oduro, ki yadi mukene ducu;
Luka 21:30 ka doŋ olot, wuneno piwu kenwu, ci wuŋeyo ni oro doŋ cok.
Luka 21:31 Kit meno wun bene, ka wuneno gin magi otimme, myero wuŋe ni ker pa Lubaŋa doŋ onyiko cok.
Luka 21:32 Ada awaco botwu ni, yalwak me kare man pe bitum nio waŋ ma lok magi ducu otimme.
Luka 21:33 Polo ki lobo gibitum, ento lokka pe bitum. Wubed ma waŋwu twolo
Luka 21:34 “Ento wugwokke kenwu, cwinywu owek doko nwaŋ pi woro cam, ki mero koŋo, ki pi lok me kwo man ma miyo wubedo ki tam mapol, wek nino-nu pe obin oumwu atura macalo akum;
Luka 21:35 pien bibino i kom jo ducu ma bedo i wi lobo ducu.
Luka 21:36 Ento wubed ma waŋwu twolo i kare ducu, kun wulego ni myero wubed ki tek me bwot ki i lok magi ducu ma bitimme, ki cuŋ i nyim Wod pa dano.”
Luka 21:37 Nino ducu onoŋo Yecu pwonyo i ot pa Lubaŋa dyeceŋ, ento dyewor woto buto i wi got ma gilwoŋo got Jeituni.
Luka 21:38 Odiko con dano ducu gibino bote i ot pa Lubaŋa ka winyo lokke.
Luka 22:1 Nino madito me Mugati ma Tobi Pe Iye ma gilwoŋo Kato (Paska) onoŋo onyiko cok.
Luka 22:2 Ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki lupwony-cik gubedo ka yenyo kit yo ma myero gineke kwede; pien onoŋo gilworo lwak. Juda oye me dobo Yecu (Matayo 26.1-5; Marako 14.10-11)
Luka 22:3 Catan odonyo i cwiny Juda Lakeriot ma en onoŋo dano acel i kin jo apar wiye aryo-ni.
Luka 22:4 Ocito oporo lok ki ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki ludito askari me ot pa Lubaŋa, kit ma myero emiye kwede botgi.
Luka 22:5 Cwinygi obedo yom, gucako cikke me miye lim.
Luka 22:6 Omiyo Juda oye, ci oyenyo kare maber ma myero emiye kwede botgi ma noŋo lwak pe.
Luka 22:1662  Yecu ocamo cam me Kato (Paska) kacel ki lpwonnyene (Matayo 26.17-25; Marako 14.12-21; Jon 13.21-30)
Luka 22:7 Nino me Mugati ma Tobi Pe Iye oromo, ma gitumo iye latin romo me Kato.
Luka 22:8 Yecu ooro Petero ki Jon, kun cikogi ni, “Wucit wuyub cam me Kato piwa, wek wacam.”
Luka 22:9 Gupenye ni, “Imito ni waciyub kwene?”
Luka 22:10 Yecu owaco botgi ni, “Nen, ka wudonyo i gaŋ me Jerucalem, ci laco mo birwatte kwedwu kun oyeyo agulu pii; en aye wulub kore wa i ot ma en bidonyo iye,
Luka 22:11 wutit bot won ot ni, ‘Lapwony penyi ni, Ot welo tye kwene, ka ma abicamo iye cam me Kato kacel ki lupwonnyena?’
Luka 22:12 Ci en binyuto botwu kicika ot malac ma malo ma gipeto, giyubo maber; wuyub kabedo kunnu.”
Luka 22:13 Gucito gunoŋo kit macalo Yecu owaco botgi-ni, guyubo cam me Kato kunnu.
Luka 22:14 Ka cawa oromo, Yecu obedo piny i dog cam, kacel ki lukwena. Acakki lok i kom Cam pa Rwotwa (Matayo 26.26-30; Marako 14.22-26;1 Kor 11.23-26)
Luka 22:15 Yecu owaco botgi ni, “Abedo ka paro mada me camo cam me Kato man kwedwu, ma kun pud peya aneno can;
Luka 22:16 pien awaco botwu ni, pe dok abicamo nio ka ocobo kakare i ker pa Lubaŋa.”
Luka 22:17 Ci otiŋo kikopo, ka doŋ orwoyo owaco ni, “Wumak man, wupok i kinwu;
Luka 22:18 pien awaco botwu ni, nia koni pe dok abimato pig olok nio waŋ ma ker pa Lubaŋa obino.”
Luka 22:19 Omako mugati, ka doŋ opwoyo, ci obaro iye, omiyogi kun wacci, “Man aye koma [ma gimiyo piwu, wutim kuman me po pira.”
Luka 22:20 Kumeno ka gucamo otum otiŋo kikopo, kun wacci, “Kikopo man aye gicikke manyen i remona ma oo piwu.]
Luka 22:21 Ento, nen, ŋat ma bidoba ciŋe tye kacel kweda i dog cam.
Luka 22:22 Pien Wod pa dano cito gire kit macalo yam giciko; ento dano meno ma dobo Wod pa dano bineno can!”
Luka 22:23 Lupwonnye gucako pennye kekengi ni, aŋa i kingi ma bitimo lok man. Pyem pi laro dito
Luka 22:24 Pyem bene ocakke i kin lupwonnye ni aŋa i kingi ma gitamo ni bedo ladit.
Luka 22:25 Yecu owaco botgi ni, “Luker pa Lurok gibwoyo lwakgi ki tek, jo ma tye ki twero i komgi gilwoŋogi ni lutim-ber.
Luka 22:1663 
Luka 22:26 Ento pe kit meno botwu; ŋat madit i kinwu myero odok macalo ŋat matidi, ki latel-wic myero obed macalo ŋat ma tiyo pi dano.
Luka 22:27 Pien aŋa madit, ŋat ma bedo i dog cam, kece mono ŋat ma kelle cam? Pe ŋat ma bedo i dog cam? Ento an abedo i kinwu macalo ŋat ma tiyo pi dano.
Luka 22:28 “Wun aye jo ma wubedo ka ŋeta jwijwi i kare ducu ma gibedo ka tema.
Luka 22:29 Macalo Wora omiya ker, an bene abimiyowu,
Luka 22:30 wek wucam, wumati i dog mejana i kerra, dok wubed i wi komker kun wuŋolo kop ki kaka apar wiye aryo pa jo Icrael. Yecu otito ni Petero bikwere woko (Matayo 26.31-35; Marako 14.27-31; Jon 13.36-38)
Luka 22:31 “Cimon, Cimon, nen Catan otyeko penyo piwu me apyeta macalo bel,
Luka 22:32 ento alego piri ni niyeni pe odok cen. In bene ka doŋ ilokke, myero ijiŋ cwiny utmegini.”
Luka 22:33 Petero owacce ni, “Rwot, doŋ ayubbe me cito kwedi i mabuc ki i to.”
Luka 22:34 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Petero, awacci ni, tin twon gweno pe bikok, nio waŋ ma ikwera tyen adek ni pe iŋeya.” Kicaa lim, opiro, ki pala lucwan
Luka 22:35 Yecu openyo lupwonnyene ni, “I kare ma yam aorowu laboŋo kicaa lim, nyo opiro, kadi war, gin mo oremowu?” Gugamo ni, “Pe.”
Luka 22:36 Ocikogi ni, “Ento koni, ŋat ma tye ki kicaa lim, myero oter, ki opiro bene kit meno. Ŋat ma pe ki pala lucwan myero ocat kanyine, wek owil kwede,
Luka 22:37 pien awaco botwu ni, ginacoya man myero ocobbe kakare i koma ni, ‘Gikwane kacel ki lubalo’; pien lok ma gicoyo i koma tye ka cobbe kakare.”
Luka 22:38 Guwacce ni, “Rwot, nen, pala lucwan tye kany aryo.” En odok iye botgi ni, “Meno romo.” Yecu olego i poto Gececemane (Matayo 26.36-46; Marako 14.32-42)
Luka 22:39 Yecu okato woko, ocito i wi got Jeituni macalo kite tye; lupwonnye gulubo kore.
Luka 22:40 Ka oo i kabedo meno, ci owaco botgi ni, “Wuleg Lubaŋa, wek pe wudony i abita mo.”
Luka 22:41 Opokke kwedgi ma rom ki ka ma gibayo iye lakidi, ci otumo coŋe piny, olego ni,
Luka 22:42 “Wora, ka imito, kwany kikopo man woko ki bota, ento pe obed macalo an amito; gin ma in imito aye myero otimme.”
Luka 22:43 Lamalaika ma oa ki i polo onen bote kun miye tek.
Luka 22:1664 
Luka 22:44 Ka kun onoŋo tye ki kumo twatwal, omedde ki lega matek; omiyo kwok ocorre i kome macalo remo ma ton cwer i ŋom.
Luka 22:45 Ka oa ki ka lega, obino bot lupwonynye, onoŋo gunino woko pi cwercwiny,
Luka 22:46 openyogi ni, “Wunino piŋo? Wua, wuleg Lubaŋa, wek pe wudony i abita mo.” Gimiyo Yecu i ciŋ lumonene ci gumake (Matayo 26.47-56; Marako 14.43-50; Jon 18.3-11)
Luka 22:47 Ka onoŋo Yecu pud tye ka lok, lwak gubino, kun dano ma nyiŋe Juda aye otelo wigi, en ŋat acel i kin jo apar wiye aryo-ni. Onyiko cok bot Yecu wek emote kun enoto leme.
Luka 22:48 Ento Yecu openye ni, “Juda, in idobo Wod pa dano ki noto lem?”
Luka 22:49 Ka jo ma i ŋete guneno gin ma mito timme, ci gupenyo ni, “Rwot, watoŋ dano ki pala lucwan?”
Luka 22:50 Ŋat acel i kingi otoŋo opii pa ajwaka madit pa Lubaŋa, oŋuno ite malacuc woko.
Luka 22:51 Ento Yecu owacci, “Ogik doŋ ki man keken!” Oboŋo ite, ocaŋe.
Luka 22:52 Lacen Yecu owaco bot ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki ludito pa askari me ot pa Lubaŋa, ki ludoŋo ma gubino i kome, ni, “Wubino i koma ki pala lucwan ki odoo- gu me maka macalo wubino i kom layak mo?
Luka 22:53 Yam abedo kwedwu jwijwi i ot pa Lubaŋa, pe wumaka. Ento koni aye karewu ki twero me colpiny.” Petero okwero Yecu (Matayo 26.57-58,69-75; Marako 14.53-54,66-72; Jon 18.12-18,25-27)
Luka 22:54 Ci gumako Yecu, gutere, gukele i ot pa ajwaka madit pa Lubaŋa. Petero olubo kore kun tye ki cen ka mabor.
Luka 22:55 Ka gimoko mac i dyekal, ma gubedo piny kacel, Petero bene obedo piny i kingi.
Luka 22:56 Aŋeca mo onene kun obedo ka ma mac ocaro; ka oŋiye matek, ci owaco ni, “Dano man bene nakanen tye kacel kwede.”
Luka 22:57 Ento Petero okwero woko kun waco ni, “Dako, pe aŋeye gira.”
Luka 22:58 Kare okato manok, ŋat mukene onene, owacci, “In bene i ŋat acel i kingi.” Ento Petero owaco ni, “Nye, an ko!”
Luka 22:59 Ka kare okato ma mito romo cawa acel, ŋat mukene oloko kun moko ni, “Ada, dano man nakanen tye kacel kwede; pien en Lagalilaya.”
Luka 22:60 Ento Petero ogamo ni, “Nye, an akwiya lok ma itye ka wacone-ni.” Cutcut ma pud en waco lok man, twon gweno otugi kok.
Luka 22:61 Rwot olokke oneno Petero. Ci Petero opo lok pa Rwot, kit macalo nene Yecu owacce ni, “Ma noŋo twon gweno peya okok tin, ibikwera woko tyen adek kulu.”
Luka 22:1665 
Luka 22:62 Ci okato woko okok ki cwercwiny madwoŋ. Ginywaro Yecu, gigoye (Matayo 26.67-68; Marako 14.65)
Luka 22:63 Jo ma gumako Yecu gunyware, gugoye;
Luka 22:64 guboyo waŋe woko bene ki kitambara kun gipenye ni, “Ka in lanebi tuci! Aŋa mugoyi?”
Luka 22:65 Guloko lok mukene mapol i kome, kun giyete. Yecu ocuŋ i nyim lukiko ka pido (Matayo 26.59-66; Marako 14.55-64; Jon 18.19-24)
Luka 22:66 Ka piny doŋ oru, ludoŋo pa lwak, kacel ki ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki lupwony- cik, gucokke kacel; gukele i nyim Lukikogi, guwaco ni,
Luka 22:67 “Tit botwa ka ce in aye i Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero.” Ento Yecu owaco botgi ni, “Ka atito botwu, wun pe wubiye;
Luka 22:68 ka apenyowu wun pe wubidokka iye.
Luka 22:69 Ento nia koni Wod pa dano bibedo piny i kabedo me deyo ka ŋet Lubaŋa Won Twer tuŋ lacuc.”
Luka 22:70 Gin ducu gugamo ni, “Doŋ in i Wod pa Lubaŋa do?” Yecu ogamo ni, “Wun wuwaco ni an a en.”
Luka 22:71 Guwaco ni, “Dok wamito caden me ŋo? Wan doŋ wawinyo piwa kenwa ki i doge kene.”
Luka 23:1 Lwak ducu gutwarre, gutero Yecu i nyim Pilato.
Luka 23:2 Gudote kun giwaco ni, “Dano man wanoŋo tye ka rwenyo rokwa, ogeŋowa ni pe wacul mucoro bot Cecar, kun lwoŋŋe kene ni en Kricito, kabaka.”
Luka 23:3 Pilato openye ni, “In i Kabaka pa Lujudaya bo?” Yecu ogamo ni, “Iwaco kakare gire.”
Luka 23:4 Pilato owaco bot ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki lwak ducu ni, “Pe anoŋo kop marac i kom dano man.”
Luka 23:5 Ento gin gudiye kun giwaco ni, “Dano-nu poyo lwak, kun pwonyo i lobo Judaya ducu, cakke ki i Galilaya nio kwede wa kany.” Yecu ocuŋ i nyim Kerode
Luka 23:6 Ka Pilato owinyo lok man openyo ka gwok nyo Yecu Lagalilaya.
Luka 23:1666 
Luka 23:7 Ka oniaŋ ni en tye i te loc pa Kerode, ci ocwale bot Kerode, ma en kikome bene onoŋo tye i Jerucalem i kare-nu.
Luka 23:8 Ka Kerode oneno Yecu, cwinye obedo yom twatwal, pien onoŋo yam con paro pi nene, pien owinyo pire, dok onoŋo geno ni ebineno lanyut mo ma en bitiyo.
Luka 23:9 Omiyo Kerode openyo Yecu ki peny mapolpol; ento Yecu pe omedo ki dok iye lok mo.
Luka 23:10 Ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki lupwony-cik gucuŋ i ŋete kun gidote ki tek.
Luka 23:11 Kerode ki askarine bene guŋale, gunyware; guruke ki boŋo me deyo, gudwoke kwede bot Pilato.
Luka 23:12 Kerode ki Pilato gudoko lurem i nino meno cut, pien yam con onoŋo gimon kekengi. Giŋolo Yecu kop me to (Matayo 27.15-26; Marako 15.6-15; Jon 18.39–19.16)
Luka 23:13 Pilato olwoŋo ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki luloc ki lwak kacel,
Luka 23:14 owaco botgi ni, “Wun wukelo dano man bota ni en ŋat ma rwenyo lwak, an apenye i nyimwu, ci nen, pe anoŋo kop mo marac i kome i kom lok ducu ma wudote kwede;
Luka 23:15 kadi Kerode bene pe onoŋo, pien Kerode odwoko en botwa. Nen, pe otimo gin mo ma myero gineke pire;
Luka 23:16 pi meno abigoye, ci abigonye. [17I kare me karama, yam mitte ni myero ogony botgi ŋat acel pigi.]”
Luka 23:18 Ento lwak ducu gudaŋŋe lawaŋacel ni, “Tere woko! Gony botwa Baraba!”
Luka 23:19 Baraba kono yam dano ma gitweye i mabuc pi tugo lwak i Jerucalem ki pi nek.
