Luka 23:20 Pilato dok oloko botgi, kun mito gonyo Yecu;
Luka 23:21 ento lwak gumedde ki daŋŋe ni “Gure woko i kom yatariya, gure woko i kom yatariya!”
Luka 23:22 Pilato owaco botgi tyen me adekke ni, “Piŋo kaa? Otimo kit gin aŋo marac? An gira pe anoŋo kop mo marac i kome ma myero gineke pire; pi meno abigoye, ci abigonye.”
Luka 23:23 Ento lwak guwo ki daŋŋe kun gidiye ni myero gigure i kom yatariya. Dwangi oloyo.
Luka 23:24 Omiyo Pilato oŋolo kop ni myero gitim Yecu kit macalo gimito.
Luka 23:25 Ogonyo dano ma yam gitweyo i mabuc pi tugo dano ki pi nek, ma lwak gubako doggi bote pire; ento omiyo Yecu botgi wek gutime kit macalo gimito.
Luka 23:1667  Giguro Yecu i kom yatariya (Matayo 27.32-44; Marako 15.21-32; Jon 19.17-27)
Luka 23:26 Ka gitye ka tere doŋ woko, ci gimako Cimon, dano mo me Cirene ma onoŋo donyo i gaŋ kun oa ki i kin paco, gucibo yatariya i kome, wek otiŋ, olub ki kor Yecu.
Luka 23:27 Lwak dano madwoŋ gulube, ki mon mapol ma gikumo kun gikok pire.
Luka 23:28 Ento Yecu olokke botgi owaco ni, “Anyira Jerucalem, pe wukok pira, ento wukok piwu kenwu ki pi litinowu.
Luka 23:29 Pien nen, kare bibino ma gibiwaco ni, ‘Tye ki gum lulur, kiot nyodo ma pe nywal, ki tuno ma pe gidoto!’
Luka 23:30 Lacen dano biwaco bot godi matino ni, ‘Wupot i komwa’; ki bot godi matino ni, ‘Umwa.’
Luka 23:31 Pien ka gitimo man ma yat pud dyak, bibedo niŋniŋ ka yat doŋ otwo?”
Luka 23:32 Jo aryo mukene bene, ma lutim maraco, giterogi wek ginekgi kacel kwede.
Luka 23:33 Ka guo i kabedo ma gilwoŋo Cogo Wic, gigure i kom yatariya kunnu, ki lutim maraco, ŋat acel tuŋ lacuc, ŋat acel tuŋ lacam.
Luka 23:34 Yecu owaco ni, “Aba, wayi tim kica botgi, pien pe giŋeyo gin ma gitye ka tiyone.” Gubolo kwir pi poko ginarukane.
Luka 23:35 Lwak gucuŋ kun gineno; ento luloc guŋale kun giwaco ni, “Yam olaro jo mukene, koŋ olarre kene ka en Kricito pa Lubaŋa, ma en oyero!”
Luka 23:36 Askari bene gunyware, gubino gumine koŋo vino mawac,
Luka 23:37 kun giwaco ni, “Ka in i Kabaka pa Lujudaya, larre keni!”
Luka 23:38 I waraga ma giketo ka wiye, gicoyo nukuta me leb Grik, ki me leb Roma, ki me leb Ibru ni, “Man aye Kabaka pa Lujudaya.”
Luka 23:39 Ŋat acel i kin lutim maraco ma giguro kacel kwede ocaye kun waco ni, “In pe i Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero ce? Larre keni wa ki wan bene!”
Luka 23:40 Ento lawote-ni ojuke kun waco ni, “In pe ilworo Lubaŋa, ma kun giŋolo kop i komi kwede ma rom?
Luka 23:41 Wan giwa giŋolo kop i komwa kakare; pien watye ka limo cul ma myero, pi timwa; ento dano man pe otimo gin mo marac wacel.”
Luka 23:42 Ci owaco ni, “Yecu, po pira ka ibidonyo i kerri.”
Luka 23:43 Yecu odok iye bote ni, “Ada, awacci ni, tin wabibedo kwedi i Paradic.” Yecu oto (Matayo 27.45-56; Marako 15.33-41; Jon 19.28-30)
Luka 23:1668 
Luka 23:44 Ka cawa doŋ mito romo abicel, piny ocido macol i wi lobo ducu nio wa i cawa aboŋwen,
Luka 23:45 kun waŋ ceŋ oumme woko; boŋo kicika me ot pa Lubaŋa obar, dyere opokke aryo.
Luka 23:46 Yecu odaŋŋe ki dwan matek, owaco ni, “Aba, amiyo cwinya i ciŋi!” Ka owaco lok man, ci oto.
Luka 23:47 Ka ladit ma loyo askari oneno gin ma otimme, opako Lubaŋa kun waco ni, “Ada, dano man kara dano ma kite atir!”
Luka 23:48 Lwak ducu ma gucokke ka nene, ka guneno gin ma otimme, gudok paco kun gidoŋo korgi.
Luka 23:49 Lureme ducu ki mon ma yam gubino kwede nia i Galilaya, gucuŋ ki cen kun gineno gin man. Giyiko kom Yecu i lyel (Matayo 27.57-61; Marako 15.42-47; Jon 19.38-42)
Luka 23:50 I kare-nu onoŋo dano mo ma nyiŋe Yucepu tye kunnu ma oa ki i gaŋ mo pa Lujudaya ma gilwoŋo Arimataya. En onoŋo ŋat acel i kin jo ma bedo i Lukiko, en dano maber, dok kite atir,
Luka 23:51 yam pe ocwako tamgi kadi ki ticgi, ento onoŋo kuro ker pa Lubaŋa.
Luka 23:52 Dano man ocito bot Pilato, olego pi kom Yecu.
Luka 23:53 Okwanye ki i kom yatariya, ci oboye ki boŋo camanini maleŋŋe, ka opyele i lyel ma gikwinyo i got, ka ma peya gipyelo iye kom ŋat mo.
Luka 23:54 Nino-nu onoŋo nino me Yubbe, cabit bene onoŋo doŋ cok cakke.
Luka 23:55 Mon ma yam gubino kwede nia ki i Galilaya, guneno lyelle, ki kit ma gipyelo kwede kome;
Luka 23:56 gudok, guyubo aŋwece ki moo wir. I cabit, guywe kit macalo cik tye.
Luka 24:1 I nino mukwoŋo me cabit, mon gupuk kwarpiny, gubino i wi lyel, kun gikelo aŋwecegi ma guyubo.
Luka 24:2 Gunoŋo ni giloro got woko ki i dog lyel,
Luka 24:3 ento ka gudonyo iye, pe gunoŋo kom Rwot Yecu.
Luka 24:4 Ka onoŋo pud guro lok man, nen, co aryo gucuŋ i ŋetgi ma guruko jor ma ryeny lidaŋdaŋ.
Luka 24:1669 
Luka 24:5 Ka komgi oryaŋŋe, ci guryebbe piny, co-nu gupenyogi ni, “Piŋo wuyenyo dano makwo i kin jo muto? [6En pe tye kany, ento ocer woko.] Wupo lok ma yam en owaco botwu i kare ma pud en tye i Galilaya,
Luka 24:7 ni, Wod pa dano myero gimiye i ciŋ lubalo, gigure i kom yatariya, ki cer woko i nino me adekke.”
Luka 24:8 Gupo lokke,
Luka 24:9 ka gua ki i wi lyel gudok, gutito lok man ducu bot jo apar wiye acel ca, ki bot jo mukene ducu.
Luka 24:10 Jo ma yam gutito lok man bot lukwena gin aye Maliam Lamagdala, Joana, ki Maliam min Yakobo, ki mon mukene ma onoŋo tye kwedgi.
Luka 24:11 Lokdgi obedo calo lok miŋo ki bot lukwena, pe guye lokgi. [12Ento Petero oa, oriŋo wa i wi lyel; ka ocuŋ oneno lyel, oneno boŋŋi camanini ma tye kengi pat; odok paco kun uro gin ma otimme.] Wot me cito Emau (Marako 16.12-13)
Luka 24:13 I nino-nu kikome jo aryo ki i kingi onoŋo nene gicito i paco ma gilwoŋo ni Emau, ma mito romo mairo abiro ki i Jerucalem,
Luka 24:14 kun giboko lok kekengi i kom gin ma otimme.
Luka 24:15 Ka kun giboko lok ma bene gilaro kacel, Yecu kikome onyiko cok, owoto kwedgi.
Luka 24:16 Ento waŋgi oumme woko, pe guŋeye.
Luka 24:17 Owaco botgi ni, “Wularo lok aŋo kekenwu kun wutye ka wot-ti?” Gucuŋ ma waŋgi nen ki can.
Luka 24:18 Ŋat acel i kingi ma nyiŋe Kelopa, odok iye bote ni, “In i welo keni i Jerucalem ce, ma pe iŋeyo lok ma otimme kunnu i kare man?”
Luka 24:19 Yecu openyogi ni “Gin aŋo?” Gudokke iye ni, “Lok i kom Yecu Lanajaret, ma yam obedo lanebi matek i lokke ki i ticce i nyim Lubaŋa, ki i nyim dano ducu,
Luka 24:20 ki kit ma ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki lulocwa gudobe wek giŋol kop i kome me neke, gugure i kom yataria.
Luka 24:21 Ento yam wageno ni en aye ŋat ma bikoko Icrael. Iyo, medo i kom meno ducu, tin doŋ nino me adek nia ma lok man otimme.
Luka 24:22 Mon mogo i kinwa bene gumiyowa ur. Gupuk i wi lyel odiko con,
Luka 24:1670 
Luka 24:23 pe gunoŋo kome; gudwogo cen kun giwaco ni guneno lumalaika ma onyutte botgi, kun giwaco ni en kwo gire.
Luka 24:24 Jo mukene ma onoŋo tye kacel kwedwa gucito i wi lyel, gunoŋo tye kit macalo mon guwaco; ento pe guneno kome.”
Luka 24:25 Yecu owaco botgi ni, “Wun lumiŋ, ki luwackom i cwinywu pi ye lok ducu ma lunebi yam guloko!
Luka 24:26 Pe myero ni Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero onen can magi, wek odony i deyone?”
Luka 24:27 Cakke wa i kom Moses, ki lunebi ducu, en ogonyo botgi lok ducu ma i ginacoya ma mako kome.
Luka 24:28 Ka gunyiko cok ki paco ma onoŋo gicito iye-ni, Yecu otimo macalo mito kato akata ki wotte,
Luka 24:29 ento gudiye matek kun giwaco ni, “Bed botwa, pien piny doŋ cok yuto, ceŋ bene doŋ cok poto woko.” Odonyo i ot obedo kwedgi.
Luka 24:30 Ka tye i dog cam kacel kwedgi, omako mugati, opwoyo, obaro iye, omiyo botgi.
Luka 24:31 Waŋgi oyabbe, guŋeye; ci cutcut orwenyo woko ki i waŋgi.
Luka 24:32 Gupennye kekengi ni, “Cwinywa nakanen pe obedo ka pukke i kare ma en tye ka lok kwedwa i waŋayo, kun yabbiwa ginacoya?”
Luka 24:33 Gua i cawa-nu, gudok i Jerucalem; gunoŋo jo apar wiye acel ca gucokke kacel, ki jo ma onoŋo tye botgi.
Luka 24:34 Jo-nu guwaco ni, “Rwot ocer ada, onyutte bot Cimon!”
Luka 24:35 Gutito lok ma otimme i waŋayo, ki kit ma giŋeye kwede i kare ma obaro mugati. Yecu onyutte bot lupwonnyene (Matayo 28.16-20; Marako 14.14-18; Jon 20.19-23; Tic 1.6-8)
Luka 24:36 Ka pud gitye ka loko lok man, Yecu kikome ocuŋ i kingi, [owaco botgi ni, “Kuc obed i komwu!”]
Luka 24:37 Ento komgi oto woko lirut, gulworo kun gitamo ni gineno tipo.
Luka 24:38 Yecu openyogi ni, “Piŋo cwinywu opoto? Piŋo wupennye kekenwu i cwinywu?
Luka 24:39 Wunen ciŋa, ki tyena, man an kikoma; wuboŋa, wunena; pien tipo pe tye ki kom ki cogo kit macalo wuneno an atye kwede.” [40Ka doŋ owaco lok man, ci onyuto ciŋe ki tyene botgi.]
Luka 24:41 Ento ka pud peya giye pi yomcwiny, kun giuro, owaco botgi ni, “Wutye ki gin mo kany me acama?”
Luka 24:42 Gumiye but rec ma gubulo,
Luka 24:1671 
Luka 24:43 ogamo, ci ocamo i nyimgi.
Luka 24:44 Lacen owaco botgi ni, “Man aye lokka ma yam aloko botwu i kare ma onoŋo pud atye kwedwu, ni, lok ducu ma gicoyo i koma i cik pa Moses, ki i lunebi, ki i jabuli myero ocobbe kakare.”
Luka 24:45 Oyabo tamgi wek giniaŋ ginacoya,,
Luka 24:46 owaco botgi ni, “Yam gicoyo kit man ni, Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero myero onen can, ci i nino me adekke myero ocer ki i kin jo muto,
Luka 24:47 dok myero gitit lok i kom ŋut ma kelo weko bal i nyiŋe bot rok ducu kun gicako ki i Jerucalem.
Luka 24:48 Wun wucaden me lok man.
Luka 24:49 Nen, abicwalo botwu gin ma Wora ociko; ento myero wubed i Jerucalem, nio ka gibirukowu ki tek ma a ki i polo.” Yecu ocito i polo (Marako 16.19-20; Tic 1.9-11)
Luka 24:50 Lacen oterogi woko nio wa Betania, otiŋo ciŋe malo olamo gum i komgi.
Luka 24:51 Ma kun pud lamo gum i komgi, ci opokke woko ki botgi, [gitiŋe, gitere i polo.]
Luka 24:52 Guwore, lacen gudwogo i Jerucalem ki yomcwiny madwoŋ,
Luka 24:53 guri i ot pa Lubaŋa jwijwi, kun gipwoyo Lubaŋa.
Luka 24:1672  Jon
Jon 1:1 I acakki piny Lok onoŋo tye, Lok tye bot Lubaŋa, Lok en Lubaŋa.
Jon 1:2 En ceŋ tye bot Lubaŋa i acakki piny;
Jon 1:3 jami ducu en aye ceŋ otiyo, pe tye gin mo ma ceŋ giketo laboŋo en.
Jon 1:4 I en con tye kwo, kwo meno con ceŋ pa dano.
Jon 1:5 Ceŋ oryeny i piny macol, ento piny macol pe ogeŋo ryeny.
Jon 1:6 Yam tye dano mo ma Lubaŋa ooro, nyiŋe Jon.
Jon 1:7 En obino pi bedo caden me tito lok i kom ceŋ, wek dano ducu guye pi lokke.
Jon 1:8 En kikome onoŋo pe ceŋ, ento obino pi tito lok me caden i kom ceŋ.
Jon 1:9 Ceŋ me ada ma menyo dano ducu onoŋo oebino i lobo.
Jon 1:10 En con tye i lobo, en aye ceŋ otiyo lobo, ento lobo pe obedo ki ŋec i kome.
Jon 1:11 En obino tugi, ento jone pe gujole.
Jon 1:12 Ento dano ducu ma ceŋ gujole, ma guye nyiŋe, omiyogi twero me doko litino pa Lubaŋa;
Jon 1:13 ma pe ginywalogi ki remo, kadi pi miti me kom, kadi pi mit pa dano, ento pi miti pa Lubaŋa.
Jon 1:14 Lok odoko dano, obedo i kinwa, kun opoŋ ki kica ki ada; wan waneno deyone, deyo macalo pa latin acel keken ma oa bot Won.
Jon 1:15 Jon obolo lok me caden i kome kun daŋŋe ni, “Man aye ŋat ma yam atittiwu pire ni, ‘Ŋat ma bino i ŋeya kata ki dit, pien en okwoŋo nyima con.’ “
Jon 1:16 Nia i lonyone mapol wan ducu gimiyowa kica i kom kica.
Jon 1:17 Pien cik yam gimiyo kun wok ki bot Moses, ento kica ki ada, Yecu Kricito aye okelo.
Jon 1:18 Pe tye ŋat mo ma yam oneno Lubaŋa; Wod acel keken, ma tye i kor Won, omiyo Won oŋene. Lok me caden ma Jon otito (Matayo 3.1-12; Marako 1.1-8;3.1-18)
Jon 1:19 Man lok me caden ma Jon obolo, ka Lujudaya guoro ajwagi ki jo Levi nia Jerucalem pi penye ni, “In aŋa?”
Jon 1:20 En otuco ka maleŋ, pe omuŋo, otuco ni, “An pe a Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero.”
Jon 1:1673 
Jon 1:21 Gupenye ni, “In doŋ aŋa? In Elia bo?” En odok iye ni, “Pe.” “In lanebi meno?” En ogamo ni, “Pe”.
Jon 1:22 Dok gupenye ni, “In aŋa kaa? Tittiwa, wek wadwok lok bot jo muorowa. Ilwoŋŋe kekeni ni in aŋa?”
Jon 1:23 En odok iye ni, “An a dwan ŋat ma daŋŋe i tim ni, ‘Wutir yo pa Rwot ocuŋ atir,’ macalo lanebi Icaya owaco.”
Jon 1:24 Jo mogo ma ceŋ gioro nia i kin Luparicayo
Jon 1:25 gupenye ni, “Doŋ piŋo ibatija dano, ka in pe i Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero, nyo Elia, nyo lanebi meno?”
Jon 1:26 Jon odokkigi iye ni, “An abatija dano ki pii; ento i kinwu ocuŋ ŋatti mo ma wun wukwiya,
Jon 1:27 en aye ŋat ma bino ki i ŋeya, ma an pe amyero ka gonyo del warre.”
Jon 1:28 Lok man ducu otimme i Betania loka Jordan, ka ma Jon yam obedo ka batija iye dano. Latin-romo pa Lubaŋa
Jon 1:29 Orwone Jon oneno Yecu kun woto bino tuŋ bote, owaco ni, “Nen Latinromo pa Lubaŋa ma kwanyo bal me lobo!
Jon 1:30 Man aye ŋat ma yam awaco pire ni, ‘I ŋeya bibino ŋat ma kata ki dit, pien en okwoŋo nyima con.’
Jon 1:31 An kikoma onoŋo pe aŋeye, ento pi lok man omiya abino kun abatija dano ki pii, wek ginyute bot jo Icrael.”
Jon 1:32 Jon otito lok me caden i kome ni, “Ceŋ aneno Cwiny Maleŋ kun bino nia ki i polo macalo amam, opye, obedo i kome.
Jon 1:33 An kikoma yam pe aŋeye; ento ŋat ma oora ka batija dano ki pii-ni owacca ni, ‘Ŋat ma ibineno Cwiny Maleŋ bino, pye, bedo i kome, en aye ŋat ma bibatija dano ki Cwiny Maleŋ.’
Jon 1:34 Doŋ aneno, dok atito lok me caden i kome ni, man en Wod pa Lubaŋa.” Lupwonnye ma gukwoŋo lubo Yecu
Jon 1:35 Orwone doki, Jon ka ocuŋ ki jo aryo i kom lupwonnyene,
Jon 1:36 oneno Yecu kun woto, owaco ni, “Nen Latin-romo pa Lubaŋa!”
Jon 1:37 Lupwonnye meno aryo guwinyo kun waco lok man, ci gulubo Yecu.
Jon 1:38 Yecu olokke, onenogi kun gilube, openyogi ni, “Wuyenyo aŋo?” Gin gupenye ni, “Rabbi (ma te lokke ni, Lapwony) ibedo kwene?”
Jon 1:1674 
Jon 1:39 Odok ki gin ni, “Wubin, wunen.” Gubino, guneno ka ma en onoŋo bedo iye; ci gubedo bote i nino meno, pien cawa doŋ onoŋo cok romo apar.
Jon 1:40 Ŋat acel i kin jo aryo ma yam guwinyo Jon kun loko, ci gulubo Yecu, onoŋo Anderiya, omin Cimon Petero.
Jon 1:41 En okwoŋo noŋo ominne Cimon, owacce ni, “Watyeko noŋo Meciya” (ma te lokke ni, Kricito).
Jon 1:42 En okele bot Yecu. Yecu onene, owacce ni, “In aye Cimon, wod pa Jon? Gibilwoŋi ni, Kepa” (ma te lokke ni, Petero ). Yecu olwoŋo Pilipo ki Natanael
Jon 1:43 Orwone Yecu omito cito i Galilaya. Orwatte ki Pilipo, owacce ni, “Luba.”
Jon 1:44 Pilipo yam Labetecaida, ma gaŋgi kacel ki Anderiya ki Petero.
Jon 1:45 Pilipo onoŋo Natanael, otitte ni, “Watyeko noŋo ŋat ma Moses yam ocoyo pire i cik, ma lunebi bene gucoyo pire, en aye Yecu me Najaret, wod pa Yucepu.”
Jon 1:46 Natanael openye ni, “Gin mo maber twero katti ki i Najaret?” Pilipo odokke iye ni, “Bin, inen.”
Jon 1:47 Yecu oneno Natanael kun bino bote, oloko i kome ni, “Nen Laicrael me ada, ma pe tye ki goba mo i cwinye!”
Jon 1:48 Natanael openye ni, “Iŋeya niŋniŋ?” Yecu odokke iye ni, “Ma peya Pilipo olwoŋi, kun ibedo i te olam, an aneni.”
Jon 1:49 Natanael odokke iye ni, “Lapwony, in giri i Wod pa Lubaŋa. In i Kabaka me Icrael!”
Jon 1:50 Yecu odokke iye ni, “In iye pien awacci ni, ‘Aneni kun ibedo i te olam’? Ibineno lok madito makato magi.”
Jon 1:51 Dok owacce ni, “Adada awacciwu ni, wubineno polo kun oyabbe, kun lumalaika pa Lubaŋa giito dok gilor piny i kom Wod pa dano.”
Jon 2:1 I nino me adekke nyom obedo i Kana, gaŋ mo me Galilaya. Min Yecu onoŋo tye kunnu,
Jon 2:2 Yecu ki lupwonnyene bene gilwoŋogi i nyom.
Jon 2:3 Ka koŋo vino otum, min Yecu otitte ni, “Vinogi doŋ pe.”
Jon 2:4 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Maa, walaro aŋo wan kwedi? Cawana pud peya oromo.”
Jon 2:5 Minne ociko lutic ni, “Wutim gin ducu ma en biwacciwu.”
Jon 2:1675 
Jon 2:6 Onoŋo tye kunnu dak pii me got abicel ma gicibo pi kit me lonnye pa Lujudaya; i dak acel acel twero a iye agulu abic nyo abicel.
Jon 2:7 Yecu owaccigi ni, “Wuony pii i dak” Guonyo opoŋ woko libyeny.
Jon 2:8 Owaccigi ni, “Doŋ wutwom, wuter bot ladit me nyom”; gutero.
Jon 2:9 Ka ladit me nyom obilo pii ma doŋ olokke odoko vino, kun pe oŋeyo ka ma oa iye (ento lutic ma gutwomo pii giŋeyo), ladit me nyom olwoŋo lanyom,
Jon 2:10 owacce ni, “Dano ducu koŋ kwoŋo miyo jo vino mamit; ka doŋ dano gumato oromogi, ka gikelo ma pe mit twatwalle; ento in ikano meri vino maber nio koni.”
Jon 2:11 Lanyut meno mukwoŋo Yecu otiyo i Kana me Galilaya, kun nyuto kwede deyone; lupwonnyene guye en.
Jon 2:12 Ka man otum, Yecu ocito i Kapernaum kacel ki minne ki omegine ki lupwonnyene; guri kunnu pi kare manok. Yecu olonyo ot pa Lubaŋa
Jon 2:13 Kato (Paska) pa Lujudaya onoŋo doŋ tye cok, omiyo Yecu ocito malo i Jerucalem.
Jon 2:14 I ot pa Lubaŋa onoŋo tye iye jo ma cato twoni ki romi ki amam, ki lulok-cente ma gubedo piny.
Jon 2:15 Yecu okedo anino ogwil matino, ci oryemogi ducu woko ki i ot pa Lubaŋa, kacel ki romi ki twoni. Oketo lim pa lulok-cente, oryebo mejagi.
Jon 2:16 Ociko lucat amam ni, “Teru jami magi woko, pe wulok ot pa Abana odok cuk.”
Jon 2:17 Lupwonnyene gupo lok ma yam gicoyo ni, “Arima pi odi mito neka woko.”
Jon 2:18 Pi man Lujudaya gupenye ni, “Lanyut aŋo ma inyuttiwa ma omiyo itiyo jami magi?”
Jon 2:19 Yecu ogamo doggi ni, “Wuket ot pa Lubaŋa man woko, an abigerone pi nino adek.”
Jon 2:20 Lujudaya guwacce ni, “Ot pa Lubaŋa man gigero pi mwaka pyeraŋwen wiye abicel kulu. In ibigerone pi nino adek keken?”
Jon 2:21 Ento en onoŋo loko pi kome ma ot pa Lubaŋani.
Jon 2:22 Ka doŋ gicere ki i kin jo muto, lupwonnyene gupo ni yam owaco lok man; ci guye ginacoya ki lok ma yam Yecu oloko. Yecu ŋeyo dano ducu
Jon 2:23 Ka onoŋo en tye i Jerucalem i nino madit me Kato (Paska), jo mapol guye nyiŋe pi neno lanyut ma en obedo ka tiyogi;
Jon 2:24 ento Yecu kikome pe obedo ki gen i komgi,
Jon 2:1676 
Jon 2:25 pien en ŋeyo jo ducu, pe omito ni ŋat mo otit lok i kom dano mo bote, pien en kikome ŋeyo gin ma tye i cwiny dano.
Jon 3:1 Ceŋ tye dano mo i kin Luparicayo ma nyiŋe Nikodemo, ma en ŋat acel i kin jo madito me Judaya.
Jon 3:2 En obino bot Yecu dyewor, owacce ni, “Lapwony, waŋeyo ni in lapwony ma ia ki bot Lubaŋa; pien pe tye ŋatti mo ma twero tiyo lanyut meno ma in itiyo, ka Lubaŋa pe tye kwede.”
Jon 3:3 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Adada awacci ni, dano ka pe ginywale tyen me aryo pe twero neno ker pa Lubaŋa.”
Jon 3:4 Nikodemo openye ni, “Dano gitwero nywale niŋniŋ ka doŋ oti? Twero donyo doki i ot nyodo pa minne tyen me aryo, ci ginywale?”
Jon 3:5 Yecu odok iye ni, “Adada awacci ni, dano ka pe ginywale ki pii ki Cwiny, pe twero donyo i ker pa Lubaŋa.
Jon 3:6 Ma ginywale ki kom en kom, ma ginywale ki Cwiny en cwiny.
Jon 3:7 Pe iŋur pien awacci ni, ‘Myero ginywalwu tyen me aryo.’
Jon 3:8 Yamo kodo dok ka ma en mito; iwinyo dwane, ento pe iŋeyo ka ma oa iye, nyo ka ma dok iye; dano ducu ma ginywale ki Cwiny tye kameno.”
Jon 3:9 Nikodemo openye ni, “Man twero timme niŋniŋ?”
Jon 3:10 Yecu odokke iye ni, “In lapwony pa Icrael, pe iŋeyo lok man?
Jon 3:11 Adada awacci ni, wan waloko i kom gin ma waŋeyo, wabedo caden i kom gin ma waneno, ento wun pe wuye lok ma watito botwu.
Jon 3:12 Ka attitiwu lok me lobo, wun pe wuye, wubiye niŋniŋ ka atittiwu lok me polo?
Jon 3:13 Pe tye ŋat mo ma yam oito i wi polo, kono en ma ceŋ olor piny nia ki i polo, en aye Wod pa dano, ma bedo i polo.
Jon 3:14 Kit macalo Moses yam otiŋo twol malo i tim-mi, Wod pa dano bene myero gitiŋe malo kumeno,
Jon 3:15 wek dano ducu ma ye en olim kwo ma pe tum.”
Jon 3:16 Pien Lubaŋa con omaro lobo kumeno, omiyo iye Wode acel keken, wek dano ducu ma ye en owek to, ento obed ki kwo ma pe tum.
Jon 3:17 Lubaŋa pe ooro Wode i lobo ni oŋol kop i kom lobo, ento wek lobo olarre pi en.
Jon 3:1677 
Jon 3:18 Ŋat ma ye en pe doŋ giŋolo kop i kome, ento ŋat ma pe ye en, doŋ giŋolo kop oloye con; pien pe oye nyiŋ Wod acel keken pa Lubaŋa.
Jon 3:19 Ŋolo kop tye kit man, ceŋ con obino i lobo, ento dano gumaro piny macol makato ceŋ, pien timgi rac.
Jon 3:20 Pien dano ducu ma timo gin marac dag ceŋ, pe bino i ceŋ, wek timme pe onen ka maleŋ.
Jon 3:21 Ento ŋat ma timo gin me ada bino i ceŋ, wek ticce onen ka maleŋ, ni en tiyo i Lubaŋa. En myero omedde, an myero adok piny
Jon 3:22 Ka man otum, Yecu ocito i lobo Judaya kacel ki lupwonnyene; obedo kwedgi kunnu kun batija dano.
Jon 3:23 Jon bene onoŋo tye ka batija dano i Ainon, cok ki Calim; pien pii onoŋo dwoŋ kunnu, dano gubino, en obatijagi.
Jon 3:24 Onoŋo peya gitweyo Jon i mabuc.
Jon 3:25 Pyem ocakke i kin lupwonnye mogo pa Jon ki Lajudaya mo i kom lok me lonnye.
Jon 3:26 Gubino bot Jon, guwacce ni, “Lapwony, ŋat ma ceŋ itye kwede loka Jordan, ma ceŋ ibolo lok me caden i kome-ni, nen, en tye ka batija dano, jo ducu gibino bote.”
Jon 3:27 Jon odok iye ni, “Dano pe twero noŋo gin mo pire kene, ka pe gimiye nia ki i polo.
Jon 3:28 Wun kikomwu onoŋo wubedo cadenna ni yam atito ni, ‘An pe a Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero ento giora akwoŋo nyime’.
Jon 3:29 Ŋat ma cuŋ i ŋet nyako aye lanyom; larem lanyom ma cuŋ i ŋete kun winye, cwinye bedo yom twatwal pi winyo dwan lanyom; pi meno an bene cwinya yom kakare.
Jon 3:30 En myero omedde, ento an myero adok piny.” Ŋat ma oa i polo
Jon 3:31 Ŋat ma oa ki malo loyo ducu; ŋat ma oa i lobo en dano me lobo, loko lok me lobo; ŋat ma oa i polo loyo ducu.
Jon 3:32 En bedo caden i kom gin ma oneno ki i kom gin ma owinyo, ento pe tye ŋat mo ma ye lok ma en otito.
Jon 3:33 Ŋat ma ye lokke, nyuto tamme ni, Lubaŋa en me ada.
Jon 3:34 Ŋat ma Lubaŋa ooro loko lok pa Lubaŋa, pien Lubaŋa pe miyo Cwiny kun pimo apima.
Jon 3:1678 
Jon 3:35 Won omaro Wod, ci omiyo jami ducu i ciŋe.
Jon 3:36 Dano ma ye Wod tye ki kwo ma pe tum; ŋat ma pe winyo dog Wod, pe bineno kwo, ento kiniga pa Lubaŋa bedo i kome.
Jon 4:1 Ka Rwot oŋeyo ni Luparicayo guwinyo ni Yecu tye ka loko jo mapol doko lupwonnyene ki batijagi, makato Jon,
Jon 4:2 (kun Yecu kikome pe obatija dano, kono lupwonnyene aye gubatijagi),
Jon 4:3 ci en oa ki i lobo Judaya, odok i Galilaya.
Jon 4:4 Ceŋ myero en oŋol ki i Camaria.
Jon 4:5 Obino i gaŋ mo me Camaria ma nyiŋe Cukar, cok ki poto ma Yakobo yam omiyo bot wode Yucepu.
Jon 4:6 Waŋ it pa Yakobo onoŋo tye kunnu; Yecu ool ki wot, ci obedo piny i ŋet waŋ it. Onoŋo doŋ cawa oromo ka abicel.
Jon 4:7 Dako mo me Camaria obino ka twomo pii. Yecu owacce ni, “Miya pii, amati.”
Jon 4:8 Pien onoŋo lupwonnyene gucito i gaŋ ka wilo cam.
Jon 4:9 Dako Lacamaria openye ni, “In Lajudaya ikwaya pii piŋo, ma kun an a dako me Camaria?” Pien Lujudaya pe gimer ki Lucamaria.
Jon 4:10 Yecu odok iye bot dako ni, “Kono yam iŋeyo mot ma Lubaŋa miyo, dok ka kono iniaŋ i kom ŋat ma kwayi ni, ‘Miya pii, amat-ti’, kono ikwayo en, kono omii pii me kwo.”
Jon 4:11 Dako odokke iye ni, “Ladit, in ipe ki gitwomo, waŋ it bene tut; inoŋo pii me kwo meno ki kwene?
Jon 4:12 In i dit ikato kwarowa Yakobo, ma yam omiyowa waŋ it man, ma omato piine, en ki litinone ki lwak limme?”
Jon 4:13 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Dano ducu ma mato pii man, orwo dok bineke aye;
Jon 4:14 ento dano ma bimato pii ma an abimiye, orwo pe bineke nino ducu. Pii ma an abimiye, bidoko waŋ it ma gunnye i iye nio wa i kwo ma pe tum.”
Jon 4:15 Dako okwaye ni, “Ladit, miya pii meno, wek orwo pe dok oneka, awek bino wa kany ka twomo pii.”
Jon 4:16 Yecu owacce ni, “Cit ilwoŋ cwari, ci idwog kany.”
Jon 4:17 Dako odokke iye ni, “An cwara pe.” Yecu owaco ki dako ni, “Iwaco kakare ni cwari pe.
Jon 4:1679 
Jon 4:18 Yam ibedo ki co abic, man ma koni itye kwede-ni pe cwari; man iwaco kakare.”
Jon 4:19 Dako owacce ni, “Ladit, aneno in giri lanebi.
Jon 4:20 Kwariwa yam giworo Lubaŋa i kom got man, ento wun wuwaco ni kabedo ma myero giwor iye Lubaŋa tye i Jerucalem.”
Jon 4:21 Yecu ogamo dog dako ni, “Dako, ye lokka; kare bibino ma pe wubiworo Won i kom got man, kadi i Jerucalem.
Jon 4:22 Wun wuworo gin ma pe wuŋeyo, wan waworo gin ma waŋeyo, pien larre oa ki bot Lujudaya.
Jon 4:23 Ento kare bibino, dok bene doŋ oo, ma ka jo ma woro i ada gibiworo Won i cwiny ki ada, pien Won yenyo jo macalo meno pi wore.
Jon 4:24 Lubaŋa en cwiny, jo ma wore myero guwore i cwiny ki ada.”
Jon 4:25 Dako owacce ni, “Aŋeyo ni Meciya bibino (en ma gilwoŋo Kricito); en ka bibino, bitittiwa lok ducu.”
Jon 4:26 Yecu odokke iye ni, “An a en ma loko kwedi-ni.”
Jon 4:27 Cutcut lupwonnyene gubino. Ci guuro pien onoŋo en tye ka lok ki dako, ento pe tye ŋat mo i kingi ma owaco ni, “Imito aŋo?” nyo ni, “Piŋo iloko kwede?”
Jon 4:28 Dako oweko agulu piine, ocito i gaŋ, owaco bot dano ni,
Jon 4:29 “Wubin, wunen laco mo-ni ma otitta gin ducu ma yam atiyo. Man mono pe en aye Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero?”
Jon 4:30 Dano gua ki i gaŋ, gucito bote.
Jon 4:31 I kine-nu lupwonnyene gubako doggi bote kun giwaco ni, “Lapwony, cam ba.”
Jon 4:32 Ento en owaccigi ni, “Atye ki cam ma acamo ma wun pe wuŋeyo.”
Jon 4:33 Omiyo lupwonnyene gupennye kekengi ni, “Ŋatti mo okelle cam?”
Jon 4:34 Yecu owaco botgi ni, “Camma en tiyo gin ma ŋat ma oora mito, ki cobo ticce.
Jon 4:35 Wun pe wuwaco ni, ‘Pud odoŋ dwe aŋwen me cako kac’? Atittiwu ni, wutiŋ waŋwu malo, wunen kit ma doŋ poto ocek kwede me akaya.
Jon 4:36 Ŋat ma kayo limo mucara, coko nyig pi kwo ma pe tum, wek lacoyone ki lakayone igi obed yom kacel.
Jon 4:37 Pien carolok man tye kakare ni, ‘Lacoyo pat, lakayo pat.’
Jon 4:38 Ceŋ aorowu ka kayo gin ma yam pe wucanne iye; jo mukene gucanne iye, wun wudonyo i cannegi.”
Jon 4:39 Lucamaria mapol ma i gaŋ meno guye en pi lok pa dako, ma owaco ni, “Otitta gin ducu ma yam atiyo.”
Jon 4:1680 
Jon 4:40 Ka Lucamaria gubino bote, gukwaye ni koŋ myero obed kwedgi; ci en ori kunnu nino aryo.
Jon 4:41 Jo mukene mapol guye en pi lokke.
Jon 4:42 Guwaco bot dako ni, “Koni pe waye pi lokki keken, pien wawinyo giwa ki itwa, doŋ watyeko niaŋ ni, ada dano man en Lalar me lobo.” Yecu ocaŋo latin pa latic madit i kal pa kabaka
Jon 4:43 Lacen ka nino aryo meno okato, en ocito i Galilaya.
Jon 4:44 Pien Yecu kikome otito ni, “Lanebi mo pe ma giketo deyo kome i lobo tugi.”
Jon 4:45 Ka obino i Galilaya, Lugalilaya gujole, pien guneno gin ducu ma en otiyo i Jerucalem i kare me nino madit, pien gin bene ceŋ gucito pi kwero nino madit.
Jon 4:46 En dok odwogo i Kana me Galilaya ka ma yam oloko iye pii odoko koŋo vino. Yam tye latic mo madit i kal pa kabaka ma kom wode lit i Kapernaum.
Jon 4:47 Ka owinyo ni Yecu oa i Judaya, obino i Galilaya, ocito obako doge bote ni obin ocaŋ wode, pien onoŋo doŋ cok to.
Jon 4:48 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Ka pe wuneno lanyut ki taŋo, ci pe wubiye kadi matidi mo.”
Jon 4:49 Latic i kal owacce ni, “Ladit, bin ma peya latinna oto.”
Jon 4:50 Yecu owacce ni, “Cit giri, wodi bikwo.” Dano meno oye lok ma Yecu owacce, ci ocito.
Jon 4:51 Ka pud tye ka bino i yo, orwatte ki luticce. Guwacce ni, “Latinni doŋ kwo.”
Jon 4:52 En openyogi cawa mene ma twone ocako dok cen. Gin gugamo ni, “Laworo cawa abiro aye lyeto oa ki i kome.”
Jon 4:53 Wonne oniaŋ ni meno aye cawa ma Yecu owacce iye ni, “Wodi bikwo”; omiyo en ki jo ma i ode ducu guye.
Jon 4:54 Man doŋ lanyut me aryo ma Yecu otiyo ka oa ki i Judaya, obino i Galilaya.
Jon 5:1 Lacen ka man otum, Yecu ocito i Jerucalem pi nino madit pa Lujudaya ma onoŋo tye.
Jon 5:2 I Jerucalem, i ŋet dogcel me romo, yam tye iye kut ma gilwoŋo i dog jo Ibru ni Beteceda, ma tye iye bolo abic.
Jon 5:3 Lwak lutwo mapol onoŋo buto iye, lutowaŋ, luŋolo ki lugoro, [ma gikuro twagge me pii.
Jon 5:1681 
Jon 5:4 Pien kare mogo lamalaika pa Rwot bino i kut, rubo pii. Ŋat ma okwoŋo lutte i pii kun pud girubo aruba, caŋ i kom kit two ducu ma yam tye i kome.]
Jon 5:5 Onoŋo tye kunnu laco mo ma twone doŋ ori i kome mwaka pyeradek wiye aboro.
Jon 5:6 Ka Yecu onene kun obuto, dok oŋeyo ni en ori kunnu pi kare malac, openye ni, “Imito icaŋ?”
Jon 5:7 Latwo ogamo ni, “Ladit, pe atye ki ŋat ma bola i kut ka pii orubbe. Ka atye ka komo, ŋat mukene dok kwoŋo leŋŋe iye i nyima.”
Jon 5:8 Yecu odokke iye ni, “A, ikwany gibutoni, iciti.”
Jon 5:9 Oyotoyot dano meno ocaŋ; okwanyo gibutone, ocito gire. Onoŋo ninone ceŋ cabit,
Jon 5:10 omiyo Lujudaya guwaco bot dano ma gicaŋo ni, “tin cabit, cik pe ye ni ikwany gibutoni.”
Jon 5:11 Ento en odok ki gin ni, “Ŋat ma ocaŋa aye owacca ni, ‘Kwany gibutoni, iciti.’ “
Jon 5:12 Gupenye ni, “Dano meno ma owacci ni, ‘Kwany gibutoni, iciti-ni’, en aŋa?”
Jon 5:13 Dano ma gicaŋo pe ŋeyo ŋat ma ocaŋe, pien onoŋo Yecu ocito gire woko, lwak onoŋo opoŋ kunnu.
Jon 5:14 Lacen Yecu onoŋe i ot pa Lubaŋa, owacce ni, “Nen, doŋ icaŋ. Pe dok ibal, wek gin marac makato meno pe opot i komi.”
Jon 5:15 Danonu ocito, otito bot Lujudaya ni, “Yecu aye ocaŋa.”
Jon 5:16 En aye gin mumiyo Lujudaya gulibo Yecu, pien otimo jami magi i cabit.
Jon 5:17 Ento Yecu odokkigi iye ni, “Wora tye ka tic nio koni, an bene atye tic.”
Jon 5:18 En gin mumiyo Lujudaya dok gumedde ka yenyo yo me neke, pe pi turo cabit keken, ento bene pi lwoŋo Lubaŋa ni wonne, ma kun kette kene ni erom ki Lubaŋa. Twer ma Wod pa Lubaŋa tye kwede
Jon 5:19 Yecu odok iye ni, “Adada awacciwu ni, Wod pe twero tiyo gin mo pire kene, ento tiyo gin ma eneno Won tiyo; pien gin ma en tiyo, Wod bene tiyo kit meno.
Jon 5:20 Won maro Wod, ci nyutte gin ducu ma en tiyo; dok binyutte tic madito makato magi, wek wuur.
Jon 5:21 Pien macalo Won cero jo muto, miyogi kwo, kit meno Wod bene miyo kwo bot jo ma en mito.
Jon 5:22 Won pe ŋolo kop i kom dano mo, ento doŋ otyeko miyo twer me ŋolo kop ducu bot Wod,
Jon 5:1682 
Jon 5:23 wek dano ducu oket deyo i kom Wod, macalo giketo deyo i kom Won. Ŋat ma pe keto deyo i kom Wod, pe keto deyo i kom Won ma ceŋ oore.
Jon 5:24 Adada awacciwu ni, dano ma winyo lokka, ma ye ŋat ma oora, tye ki kwo ma pe tum; pe gibiŋolo kop i kome, ento doŋ oa i to, oo i kwo.
Jon 5:25 “Adada awacciwu ni, kare bibino, dok bene doŋ oo, ma jo muto biwinyo iye dwan Wod pa Lubaŋa; jo ma guwinyo bikwo.
Jon 5:26 Pien macalo Won tye ki kwo i iye kene, kit meno en bene omiyo Wod bedo ki kwo i iye kene,
Jon 5:27 dok omine twer me ŋolo kop, pien en Wod pa dano.
Jon 5:28 Pe wuur lok man; pien kare bibino ma jo ducu ma tye i lyel biwinyo iye dwane,
Jon 5:29 ci gibikatti woko. Jo ma ceŋ gutimo maber bidonyo i cer me kwo, jo ma ceŋ gutimo marac bidonyo i cer me ŋolo kop. Caden pa Yecu
Jon 5:30 “An pe atwero tiyo gin mo pira kena; aŋolo kop kit macalo awinyo; kop ma aŋolo tye atir, pien pe ayenyo yo me tiyo gin ma iya mito kena, ento ma ŋat ma ceŋ oora mito.
Jon 5:31 Ka abolo lok i koma kena, lok ma abolo pe bedo me ada.
Jon 5:32 Tye ŋat mukene ma en aye cadenna, aŋeyo ni lok ma en bolo i koma lok me ada.
Jon 5:33 Wun ceŋ wuoro kwena bot Jon, en obolliwu lok me ada me caden.
Jon 5:34 An pe aye lok ma dano bolo i koma; ento awacciwu lok magi wek wularre.
Jon 5:35 En ceŋ tara ma gicwinyo, ma lyel, yam wumito bedo ki yomcwiny pi kare manok i dero macce.
Jon 5:36 Ento atye ki lok me caden ma pire dit makato pa Jon; pien tic ma Won omiya me acoba, tic magi kikomgi ma atye ka tiyogi, bedo caden i koma ni Won aye oora.
Jon 5:37 Doki Won ma ceŋ oora en kikome obedo cadenna. Wun yam pe wuwinyo dwane, pe wuneno wa calle;
Jon 5:38 pe wubedo ki lokke i iwu, pien pe wuye ŋat ma en ooro.
Jon 5:39 Wuyenyo i ginacoya, pien wutamo ni i gin wutye ki kwo ma pe tum, kun gin aye caden ma tito lok i koma;
Jon 5:40 ento wukwero bino bota, wek wulim kwo.
Jon 5:41 An pe alimo deyo ki bot dano,
Jon 5:42 ento aŋeyo ni pe wutye ki mar pa Lubaŋa i iwu.
Jon 5:1683 
Jon 5:43 An abino i nyiŋ Wora, ento wun pe wujola; ka ŋat mukene obino i nyiŋe kene, wun wubijole.
Jon 5:44 Wun wutero ye niŋniŋ, ka ŋat acel limo deyo ki bot lawote, ento pe wuyenyo deyo ma a bot Lubaŋa ma en acel keken?
Jon 5:45 Pe wutam ni abidotowu bot Won; ŋat ma dotowu en Moses, ma wun wugeno.
Jon 5:46 Ka kono wuye Moses, kono wuye an bene; pien en ocoyo lok i koma.
Jon 5:47 Ento ka pe wuye lok ma en ocoyo, wubiye niŋniŋ lok ma an atittiwu?”
Jon 6:1 Ka man otum, Yecu ocito loka nam Galilaya, ma en nam me Tiberia.
Jon 6:2 Lwak madwoŋ olube, pien ceŋ guneno lanyut ma en otiyo i kom lutwo.
Jon 6:3 Yecu oito malo i wi got, obedo piny kunnu kacel ki lupwonnyene.
Jon 6:4 Kato (Paska), ma en nino madit pa Lujudaya, onoŋo doŋ cok.
Jon 6:5 Ka Yecu otiŋo waŋe, oneno lwak madwoŋ kun bino bote, openyo Pilipo ni, “Wabiwilo kwon kwene wek jo man ocam?”
Jon 6:6 En oloko lok man pi teme, pien en kikome onoŋo ŋeyo gin ma ebitiyo.
Jon 6:7 Pilipo odokke iye ni, “Kwon me denari miya aryo pe biromogi, wek ŋat acel acel ogam manok.”
Jon 6:8 Ŋat acel i kin lupwonnyene, en Anderiya omin Cimon Petero, owacce ni,
Jon 6:9 “Latin awobi mo tye kany, ma tye ki mugati abic me cayiri, ki rec aryo; ento magi konyo aŋo bot lwak ma rom man?”
Jon 6:10 Yecu owacci, “Wuwek lwak obed piny.” Lum onoŋo olot twatwal i kabedo meno; dano ma gubedo piny welgi mito romo alip abic.
Jon 6:11 Lacen Yecu okwanyo mugati, opwoyo, opoko bot jo ma gubedo piny, ki rec bene, kit macalo gimito.
Jon 6:12 Ka doŋ guyeŋ, ci owaco bot lupwonnyene ni, “Wucok ŋide ma odoŋ, gin mo owek rwenyo.”
Jon 6:13 Gucoko ŋide, gupoŋo aduku apar wiye aryo ki i kom mugati abic me cayiri ma lwak gucamo odoŋ.
Jon 6:14 Ka lwak oneno lanyut ma en otiyo, guwaco ni, “Ada, man en lanebi meno ma bino i lobo.”
Jon 6:1684 
Jon 6:15 Ka Yecu oniaŋ ni gimito bino ka make tetek pi kete me bedo kabaka, ci olwi, ocito i wi got kene. Yecu owoto i wi nam ki tyene (Matayo 14.22-33; Marako 6.45-52)
Jon 6:16 Ka piny oyuto, lupwonnyene gucito i dog nam,
Jon 6:17 gudonyo i yeya, gucako ŋolo dye nam me cito Kapernaum. Piny onoŋo doŋ col, Yecu onoŋo peya obino botgi.
Jon 6:18 Nam otiŋŋe pi yamo ma onoŋo tye ka kodo.
Jon 6:19 Ka onoŋo doŋ gucero yeya ma romo mairo adek nyo aŋwen, ci guneno Yecu kun woto i wi nam ki tyene. Lworo omakogi,
Jon 6:20 ento en owaccigi ni, “An ennu, gwok wulwor”,
Jon 6:21 omiyo guye odonyo i yeya. Cutcut yeya oo i wi tera ka ma gimito cito iye. Lwak guyenyo Yecu
Jon 6:22 Orwone jo ma yam gudoŋ loka nam tuŋcel guneno ni onoŋo tye yeya acel keken kunnu, dok ni Yecu nene pe oito i yeya kacel ki lupwonnyene, ento lupwonnyene ceŋ gucito kengi.
Jon 6:23 Kadi bed kumeno, yeya mukene ma gia Tiberia gubino cok ki kabedo ka ma dano gucamo iye kwon ma Rwot opwoyo.
Jon 6:24 Ka lwak guneno ni Yecu pe kunnu, kadi wa lupwonnyene bene, gin kikomgi guito i yeya, gucito Kapernaum ka yenyo Yecu. Yecu en kwon me kwo
Jon 6:25 Ka gunoŋe loka nam tuŋ ca, gupenye ni, “Lapwony, ibino kany awene?”
Jon 6:26 Yecu odokkigi iye ni, “Adada awacciwu ni, wutye ka yenya pe ni pien yam wuneno lanyut, ento ni pien wucamo kwon, wuyeŋ.
Jon 6:27 Pe wuti pi cam ma top woko, ento pi cam ma ri nio wa i kwo ma pe tum, ma Wod pa dano bimiyowu; pien Lubaŋa Won oketo lanen mere i kome.”
Jon 6:28 Gin dok gupenye ni, “Myero watim gin aŋo wek wati tic pa Lubaŋa?”
Jon 6:29 Yecu odok iye botgi ni, “Man en tic pa Lubaŋa, ni wubed ki niye i kom ŋat ma en ooro.”
Jon 6:30 Gupenye ni, “Lanyut aŋo ma in itiyo, wek wanen, waye in? Tic aŋo ma in itiyo?
Jon 6:31 Kwariwa yam gucamo manna i tim, macalo gicoyo ni, ‘Omiyogi kwon me acama mua ki i polo.’ “
Jon 6:32 Yecu ogamo doggi ni, “Adada awacciwu ni, pe Moses aye yam omiyowu kwon meno mua ki i polo; ento Wora en aye tye ka miyowu kwon me ada nia ki i polo.
Jon 6:1685 
Jon 6:33 Pien kwon pa Lubaŋa en kwon ma bino piny nia ki i polo, ma miyo kwo ki lobo.”
Jon 6:34 Guwacce ni, “Rwot, miwa kwon meno nino ducu.”
Jon 6:35 Yecu owaco botgi ni, “An a kwon me kwo; ŋat ma bino bota, kec pe bineke; ŋat ma ye an, orwo pe dok bineke matwal.
Jon 6:36 Ento yam atito botwu ni, wun doŋ wunena, ento pe wuye.
Jon 6:37 Dano ducu ma Wora omiya bibino bota; ŋat ma bino bota, pe abiryeme.
Jon 6:38 Pien doŋ alor piny ki i polo, pe ka tiyo gin ma iya mito pira kena, ento ka tiyo gin ma ŋat ma yam oora mito.
Jon 6:39 Man en gin ma ŋat ma oora mito, ni i kom dano ducu ma en omiya awek rwenyo iye ŋatti mo, ento acergi woko ducu i nino me agik.
Jon 6:40 Man en gin ma wora mito, ni, dano ducu ma neno Wod, ma ye en, myero olim kwo ma pe tum; ci an abicere woko i nino me agik.”
Jon 6:41 Lujudaya guŋur i kome pien owaco ni, “An a kwon ma olor piny nia i polo.”
Jon 6:42 Guwaco ni, “Man pe Yecu, wod pa Yucepu, ma wonne ki minne waŋeyo? Piŋo en dok waco ni, ‘An alor piny nia i polo’?”
Jon 6:43 Yecu odok iye ki gin ni, “Pe wuŋur i kinwu kenwu.
Jon 6:44 Dano mo pe twero bino bota, ka Wora ma yam oora pe opeye; ci an bene abicere woko i nino me agik.
Jon 6:45 Gicoyo i buk pa lunebi ni, ‘Lubaŋa bipwonyogi ducu.’ Dano ducu ma owinyo lok ki bot Won, ce omako lokke, bino bota.
Jon 6:46 Pe ni ŋat mo yam oneno Won, kono ŋat ma yam oa bot Lubaŋa, en aye oneno Won.
Jon 6:47 Adada awacciwu ni, ŋat ma ye an tye ki kwo ma pe tum.
Jon 6:48 An a kwon me kwo.
Jon 6:49 Kwariwu yam gucamo manna i tim, guto woko.
Jon 6:50 Man en kwon ma lor piny nia i polo, ma ka dano mo ocamo, pe bito.
Jon 6:51 An a kwon makwo, ma olor piny nia i polo; ka ŋat mo ocamo kwon man, en bibedo kwo nakanaka. Kwon ma abimiyo en koma, ma amiyo wek lobo obed ki kwo.”
Jon 6:52 Lujudaya guero pyem i kingi kekengi, kun giwaco ni, “Dano man twero miyowa kome me acama niŋniŋ?”
Jon 6:53 Yecu owaccigi ni, “Adada awacciwu ni, ka pe wucamo kom Wod pa dano, wumato remone, pe wutye ki kwo i iwu.
Jon 6:1686 
Jon 6:54 Ŋat ma camo koma, ma mato remona, tye ki kwo ma pe tum, ci an abicere woko i nino me agik.
Jon 6:55 Pien koma en cam meada, remona en ginamata meada.
Jon 6:56 Ŋat ma camo koma, ma mato remona, bedo i an, an bene abedo i iye.
Jon 6:57 Macalo Won makwo ceŋ oora, kun an abedo kwo pi Won kit meno ŋat ma cama bikwo pira.
Jon 6:58 Man en kwon ma olor piny nia i polo, pe kit kwon ma yam kwariwu gucamo, guto woko; ŋat ma camo kwon man bibedo kwo nakanaka.”
Jon 6:59 En oloko lok magi i kare ma en pwonyo i kacokke i Kapernaum. Lok me kwo ma pe tum
Jon 6:60 Lupwonnyene mapol ka guwinyo, guwacci, “Man lok matek; aŋa ma twero winyo?”
Jon 6:61 Ento Yecu ka oŋeyo ki i cwinye kene ni lupwonnyene tye ka ŋur i kom lok man, openyogi ni, “Lok man obalo tamwu?
Jon 6:62 Bibedo niŋniŋ ka kono wuneno Wod pa dano kun ito ka ma yam en tye iye con?
Jon 6:63 Gin ma miyo kwo en aye cwiny, kom pe konyo gin mo; lok ducu ma awacciwu gin aye cwiny ki kwo.
Jon 6:64 Ento tye jo mogo i kinwu ma pe giye.” Pien nia i acakki Yecu onoŋo ŋeyo jo meno ma pe ye, ki ŋat ma bidobe.
Jon 6:65 En dok owaco ni, “Man en gin mumiyo ceŋ atittiwu ni, pe tye ŋat mo ma twero bino bota, ka Won pe omiye twer.”
Jon 6:66 Cakke i kare meno, lupwonnyene mapol gudok cen, pe dok gubedo ka wot kacel kwede.
Jon 6:67 Yecu openyo jone apar wiye aryo ni, “Wun bene wumito ket woto?”
Jon 6:68 Cimon Petero ogamo doge ni, “Rwot, wabicito bot aŋa? In itye ki lok me kwo ma pe tum.
Jon 6:69 Wan waye, dok watyeko niaŋ ni, in i ŋat Maleŋ pa Lubaŋa.”
Jon 6:70 Yecu odokkigi iye ni, “Ceŋ pe ayerowu wun apar wiye aryo? Ento acel i kinwu pa Catan.”
Jon 6:71 En onoŋo oloko i kom Juda wod pa Cimon me Keriot, ŋat acel i kin jo-nu apar wiye aryo, ma bidobe.
Jon 7:1687 
Jon 7:1 Ka man otum, Yecu obedo ka wot i kin Galilaya; pe omito cito i Judaya, pien Lujudaya gimito neke.
Jon 7:2 Nino madito me Bolo pa Lujudaya onoŋo cok.
Jon 7:3 Omegine guwacce in, “A ki kany, icit i Judaya, wek lupwonnyeni gunen tic ma in itiyo.
Jon 7:4 Pe tye dano mo ma tiyo tic i muŋ, ka en kikome mito ni dano guŋeye. Ka itiyo tic magi, nyutte keni bot lobo.”
Jon 7:5 Pien kadi omegine kikome bene pe guye en.
Jon 7:6 Yecu owaccigi ni, “Karena pud peya oo, ento karewu nino ducu tye.
Jon 7:7 Lobo pe twero kwerowu, ento okwero an, pien an atuco lok i kome, ni ticce ducu racu.
Jon 7:8 Wun wucit ka kwero nino madito; an pe acito i nino madito, pien karena peya oromo maber.”
Jon 7:9 Ka doŋ oloko lok man botgi, ci odoŋ i Galilaya. Yecu i nino madito me Bolo
Jon 7:10 Ento ka omegine doŋ gutyeko cito pi nino madito, ci en bene ocito, pe atyer, ento i muŋ.
Jon 7:11 Lujudaya gubedo ka yenye i nino madito kun gipenyo ni, “En tye kwene?”
Jon 7:12 Lwak onoŋo giŋur twatwal pire. Jo mukene guwaco ni, “En gire dano maber,” jo mukene ni, “Pe, en rwenyo lwak.”
Jon 7:13 Ento pe tye ŋat mo ma waco nyiŋe ka maleŋ, pien gilworo Lujudaya.
Jon 7:14 Ka doŋ oo i dye nino madito, Yecu ocito i ot pa Lubaŋa, ocako pwonyo dano.
Jon 7:15 Lujudaya guuro, kun giwaco ni, “Dano man oŋeyo nukuta niŋniŋ, kun kono pe okwano?”
Jon 7:16 Yecu odok iye ki gin ni, “Pwony mera pe mera kikoma, ento pa ŋat ma ceŋ oora.
Jon 7:17 Ka ŋat mo mito tiyo gin ma Lubaŋa mito, en biniaŋ ka ce pwony man oa ki bot Lubaŋa, nyo ka aloko pira kena.
Jon 7:18 Ŋat ma loko pire kene yenyo deyone pire kene, ento ŋat ma yenyo deyo pi ŋat ma oore, dano-nu en me ada, gin ma pe atir pe i iye.
Jon 7:19 Moses ceŋ pe omiyowu cik? Ento pe tye ŋat mo i kinwu ma gwoko cik. Piŋo wumito neka?”
Jon 7:20 Lwak odok iye ni, “In giri itye ki cen! Aŋa ma mito neki?”
Jon 7:21 Yecu ogamo doggi ni, “Yam atiyo tic acel, wun ducu wuuro.
Jon 7:1688 
Jon 7:22 Moses ceŋ omiyowu cik me lirre (pe ni oa ki bot Moses, ento ki bot kwaro), wun bene wuliro dano i ceŋ cabit.
Jon 7:23 Ka giliro dano i ceŋ cabit, wek cik pa Moses pe oballe, piŋo iwu waŋ i koma pi caŋo dano i ceŋ cabit?
Jon 7:24 Pe wuŋol kop pi neno ki waŋ, ento wuŋol kop atir.” Man en Kricito
Jon 7:25 Jo mogo me Jerucalem guwaco ni, “Man pe dano ma gimito neko-ni?
Jon 7:26 Ento, nen, en tye ka lok ka maleŋ, gin pe guwacce lok mo. Luloc tika niaŋ ni man en Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero?
Jon 7:27 Ento wan waŋeyo ka ma dano man oa iye; ka Kricito binen, pe tye dano mo ma biŋeyo ka ma en oa iye.”
Jon 7:28 I kare ma Yecu pwonyo i ot pa Lubaŋa, en odaŋŋe, owaco ni, “Wun wuŋeya, wuŋeyo ka ma aa iye? An pe abino pira kena. Ŋat ma oora en me ada, wun pe wuŋeye.
Jon 7:29 Ento an aŋeye, pien aa ki bote, en aye oora.”
Jon 7:30 Gumito make, ento pe tye ŋat mo ma oketo ciŋe i kome, pien karene peya oromo.
Jon 7:31 Ento jo mapol i kin lwak guye en. Guwaco ni, “Ka Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero binen, bitiyo lanyut mapol makato ma dano man tiyo?” Gicwalo askari ka mako Yecu
Jon 7:32 Luparicayo guwinyo ka lwak tye ka ŋur i kome, omiyo ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki Luparicayo gucwalo askari ka make.
Jon 7:33 Yecu owaco ni, “Pud dok abibedo kwedwu pi kare manok, lacen abidok bot ŋat ma yam oora.
Jon 7:34 Wubiyenya, ento pe wubinoŋa; ka ma abedo iye, wun pe wutwero o iye.”
Jon 7:35 Lujudaya gupennye kekengi ni, “Dano man mito cito kwene, ma wan pe wabinoŋe-ni? En mito cito bot jo mewa muket ata i kin jo Grik, ka pwonyo jo Grik?
Jon 7:36 Man te lokke niŋo, ni, ‘Wubiyenya, ento pe wubinoŋa,’ dok ni, ‘Ka ma abedo iye, wun pe wutwero o iye’?” Kulu me pii makwo
Jon 7:37 I nino me agikki me nino madito, ma en aye nino madit, Yecu oa malo, odaŋŋe, owaco ni, “Ka orwo neko dano mo, en myero obin omat bota.
Jon 7:38 Ŋat ma ye an, macalo ginacoya owaco, ‘Kulu me pii makwo bimol nia i iye’.”
Jon 7:1689 
Jon 7:39 En yam oloko lok man i kom Cwiny Maleŋ, ma jo ma giye en bilimo; pien onoŋo Cwiny Maleŋ peya gimiyo, pien onoŋo Yecu peya giketo deyo i kome. Apokapoka obedo i kin lwak
Jon 7:40 Ka guwinyo lok magi, jo mogo i kin lwak guwaco ni, “Adada, nye man en lanebi meno.”
Jon 7:41 Jo mukene guwaco ni, “Man gire Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero.” Jo mukene dok gipenyo apenya ni, “Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero yam a i Galilaya?
Jon 7:42 Ginacoya pe tito ni, Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero a ki i anywalli pa Daudi, ki i Beterekem, i gaŋ ma yam Daudi bedo iye?”
Jon 7:43 Kumeno apokapoka obedo i kin lwak pire.
Jon 7:44 Jo mogo i kingi omito make, ento pe tye ŋat mo ma oketo ciŋe i kome. Ludito pe guye Yecu
Jon 7:45 Askari gudwogo bot ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki Luparicayo. Gin gupenyogi ni, “Piŋo pe wukele?”
Jon 7:46 Askari gugamo doggi ni, “Pe tye ŋat mo ma yam oloko macalo dano man.”
Jon 7:47 Luparicayo gudok iye ni, “Wun bene gityeko rwenyowu?
Jon 7:48 Tye ŋat mo i kin luloc nyo i kin Luparicayo ma oye en?
Jon 7:49 Ento lwak man ma kwiya cik doŋ gicenogi.”
Jon 7:50 Nikodemo ma yam obino bote, ma en bene ŋat acel i kingi, openyogi ni,
Jon 7:51 “Cik mewa ŋolo kop i kom dano kun peya giwinyo lok ma a i doge, pi niaŋ i kom gin ma en timo?”
Jon 7:52 Gudokke iye ni, “In bene ia ki i Galilaya? Koŋ iyeny, ibineno ni pe tye lanebi mo ma bia ki i Galilaya.” [53Ŋat acel acel odok i ode.
Jon 8:1 Ento Yecu ocito wa i wi got Jeituni.
Jon 8:2 Odiko con en dok odwogo i ot pa Lubaŋa; jo ducu gucokke bote, en obedo piny, opwonyogi.
Jon 8:3 Lupwonycik ki Luparicayo gukelo dako mo ma gimako ka timo abor. Gukete i dyere,
Jon 8:4 guwacce ni, “Lapwony, dako man gimako ka timo abor, ginoŋe iye kikome.
Jon 8:1690 
Jon 8:5 I cik Moses ocikowa ni, dano macalo man myero gicel woko ki got. I kono iŋolo niŋniŋ?”
Jon 8:6 Guwaco lok man pi teme, wek ginoŋ lok ma gibidote kwede. Ento Yecu okulle piny, ocoyo ŋom ki lwete.
Jon 8:7 Ka gumedde ka penye, en oille malo, owaccigi ni, “Ŋat ma i kinwu ma pe ki bal okwoŋ cele ki got.”
Jon 8:8 En dok okulle piny, ocoyo ŋom ki lwete.
Jon 8:9 Ka guwinyo lok man, ci guket ki acel acel, kun ocakke ki i kom jo madito; ci Yecu odoŋ kene kun dako-nu pud ocuŋ i dyere.
Jon 8:10 Yecu oille, openyo dako ni, “Dako, gin kono gitye kwene? Pe tye ŋat mo ma oŋolo kop loyi?”
Jon 8:11 En ogamo ni, “Pe tye ŋat mo, ladit.” Yecu owaco ni, “An bene pe abiŋolo kop loyi. Cit giri; cakke tin pe dok ibal.”] Yecu en ceŋ me lobo
Jon 8:12 Yecu dok oloko ki gin kun waco ni, “An a ceŋ me lobo; ŋat ma luba pe biwoto i piny macol, ento bibedo ki ceŋ me kwo.”
Jon 8:13 Luparicayo guwacce ni, “In giri ibolo lok me caden i komi keni, lok ma ibolo pe me ada.”
Jon 8:14 Yecu odok iye ni, “Kadi bed abolo lok i koma kena, lok ma abolo me ada, pien aŋeyo ka ma aa iye, ki ka ma acito iye, ento wun pe wuŋeyo ka ma aa iye, ki ka ma acito iye.
Jon 8:15 Wun wuŋolo kop i kit pa dano, ento an pe aŋolo kop i kom ŋat mo.
Jon 8:16 Kadi bed aŋol kop, ŋolo koppa tye atir, pien pe atye kena, ento wan ki ŋat ma oora.
Jon 8:17 I cikwu gicoyo ni, lok pa caden aryo bedo ada;
Jon 8:18 an abolo lok me caden i koma kena, dok Wora ma oora bene cadenna.”
Jon 8:19 Gipenye ni, “Woru tye kwene?” Yecu odok iye ni, “Wun pe wuŋeyo an, kadi Wora. Kono wuŋeya, kono wuŋeyo Wora bene.”
Jon 8:20 En oloko lok man i kare ma pwonyo dano i ot pa Lubaŋa, i ot lim, ento pe tye ŋat mo ma omake, pien karene peya oromo. Ka ma acito iye wun pe wutwero bino iye
Jon 8:21 En dok owaco ki gin ni, “An abicito woko. Wun wubiyenya, wubito i balwu; ka ma acito iye, wun pe wutwero bino iye.”
Jon 8:1691 
Jon 8:22 Lujudaya guwaco ni, “En binekke kene, pien owaco ni, ‘Ka ma acito iye wun pe wutwero bino iye’?”
Jon 8:23 En owaccigi ni, “Wun wua ki piny, an aa ki malo; wun jo me lobo, an pe a dano me lobo.
Jon 8:24 Atyeko wacciwu ni, wubito i balwu; pien wubito i balwu ka pe wuye ni an a en.”
Jon 8:25 Gupenye ni, “In aŋa?” Yecu odok ki gin iye ni, “An a ŋat ma yam atittiwu con nia i acakki.
Jon 8:26 Atye ki lok mapol me aloka i komwu, ki kop mapol me aŋola; ento ŋat ma oora en me ada, atito ki lobo gin ma doŋ awinyo ki bote.”
Jon 8:27 Pe guniaŋ ni en tye ka tittigi pi Lubaŋa Won.
Jon 8:28 Omiyo Yecu owaco ki gin ni, “Ka doŋ wutiŋo Wod pa dano malo, ci wubiniaŋ ni an a en, dok ni pe atiyo gin mo pira kena, ento aloko gin ma Wora opwonya iye.
Jon 8:29 Ŋat ma oora tye kweda; pe oweka kena, pien nino ducu atiyo gin ma iye mito.”
Jon 8:30 Ka oloko lok man, jo mapol guye en. Lok me ada bigonyowu
Jon 8:31 Yecu owaco bot Lujudaya ma guye en ni, “Ka wumoko i lokka, ci wun lupwonnyena adada;
Jon 8:32 miyo wubiŋeyo lok me ada, lok me ada bigonyowu.”
Jon 8:33 Gudokke iye ni, “Wan likwayo pa Abraim; ma naka yam peya wabedo opii pa ŋatti mo. Man doŋ in iwaco niŋniŋ ni, ‘Gibigonyowu’?”
Jon 8:34 Yecu odokkigi iye ni, “Adada awacciwu ni, dano ducu ma timo bal, en opii me bal.
Jon 8:35 Opii pe bedo i ot nakanaka, ento latin anywalli bedo gire nakanaka.
Jon 8:36 Pi meno, ka Wod ogonyowu gibigonyowu atika.
Jon 8:37 Aŋeyo ni wun likwayo pa Abraim; ento wumito neka, pien lokka pe noŋo kabedo i iwu.
Jon 8:38 An aloko gin ma aneno ki bot Wora, wun wutiyo gin ma wuwinyo ki bot wonwu.” Wonwu Catan
Jon 8:39 Gudok iye ni, “Abraim en wonwa.” Yecu owaccigi ni, “Kono wun litino pa Abraim, kono wutiyo macalo Abraim.
Jon 8:40 Ento koni wumito neka, an dano ma atittiwu lok me ada ma awinyo ki bot Lubaŋa; Abraim yam pe otiyo kit meno.
Jon 8:1692 
Jon 8:41 Wun wutiyo gin ma wonwu otimo.” Gidok iye bote ni, “Wan pe ginywalowa i abor; watye ki wonwa acel, en aye Lubaŋa.”
Jon 8:42 Yecu ogamo doggi ni, “Kono Lubaŋa wonwu, kono wumara, pien an aa ki bot Lubaŋa, koni doŋ atye kany; pe abino pira kena, en aye oora.
Jon 8:43 Piŋo pe wuniaŋ lok ma awaco? Pien pe wutwero winyo lokka.
Jon 8:44 Wun wua ki bot wonwu, Catan, wumito cobo gin ma wonwu mito. Nia i acakki piny en con lanek, pe cuŋ i ada, pien lok me ada pe i iye. Ka en loko lok goba, en lok macalo kite tye, pien en lagoba, doki won goba.
Jon 8:45 Ento pe wuye an, pien an aloko lok me ada.
Jon 8:46 Aŋa i kinwu ma nyuto lok me bal i koma ma loya? Ka atito lok me ada, piŋo pe wuye an?
Jon 8:47 Ŋat ma oa bot Lubaŋa winyo lok pa Lubaŋa; gin ma omiyo wun pe wuwinyo, pien pe wua bot Lubaŋa.” Ma Abraim pud pe onoŋo doŋ an atye
Jon 8:48 Lujudaya gudokke iye ni, “Wan pe wawaco kakare ni, in Lacamaria, itye ki cen?”
Jon 8:49 Yecu odok iye ni, “An pe atye ki cen; ento aworo Abana, wun pe wuwora.
Jon 8:50 An pe ayenyo deyona pira kena; tye Ŋat ma yenyo ma kakara, en aye biŋolo kop.
Jon 8:51 Adada awacciwu ni, ka ŋat mo mako lokka, pe bito matwal.”
Jon 8:52 Lujudaya gudokke iye ni, “Koni doŋ waniaŋ ni itye ki cen. Abraim yam oto, ki lunebi bene guto, ento in iwaco ni, ‘Ka ŋat mo mako lokka, ci pe bibilo to matwal’.
Jon 8:53 In i dit ikato kwarowa Abraim, ma ceŋ oto-ni? Lunebi bene guto, do! In ikette ni in aŋa?”
Jon 8:54 Yecu ogamo ni, “Ka aketo deyo i koma kena, deyona mwa; Wora aye keto deyo i koma, en ma wun wuwaco ni Lubaŋawu-ni.
Jon 8:55 Wun pe wuŋeye; ento an aŋeye. Ka kono awaco ni pe aŋeye, kono adoko lagoba macalo wun; ento an aŋeye, amako lokke.
Jon 8:56 Kwarowu Abraim yam obedo ki yomcwiny ni ebineno ninona; ci oneno, cwinye obedo yom matek.”
Jon 8:57 Lujudaya guwacce ni, “In ma mwakani bene peya oromo pyerabic-ci, ineno Abraim?”
Jon 8:58 Yecu ogamo doggi ni, “Adada awacciwu ni, ma Abraim pud pe, onoŋo doŋ an atye.”
Jon 8:1693 
Jon 8:59 Omiyo gukwanyo got me cele; ento Yecu okanne, ci okato woko ki i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Jon 9:1 Ka ceŋ en oekato ki i yo, oneno dano ma ginywale ma waŋe oto.
Jon 9:2 Lupwonnyene gupenye ni, “Lapwony, aŋa ma obalo, laco man, kece nyo jo ma gunywale, ma omiyo ginywale ma waŋe oto?”
Jon 9:3 Yecu ogamo ni, “Laco man pe obalo, kadi jo ma gunywale, ento man otimme wek tic pa Lubaŋa onen i kome.
Jon 9:4 Myero wati tic pa ŋat ma oora ma ceŋ pud tye; dyewor bibino ma ŋat mo pe twero tic.
Jon 9:5 Ka pud atye i lobo, an a ceŋ me lobo.”
Jon 9:6 Ka oloko lok man, oŋulo laa piny, orubo ki ŋom, ci owiro ki waŋ laco-nu.
Jon 9:7 Owacce ni, “Citi, ilwok i kut me Ciloam” (ma te lokke ni, Ma gioro). En ocito olwoko, ci odwogo ma waŋe doŋ neno piny.
Jon 9:8 Luwote ki jo ma yam ginene kun kwayo lim guwaco ni, “Man pe laco ma bedo kun kwayo lim-mi?”
Jon 9:9 Jo mogo guwaco ni, “En kikome”; jo mukene ni, “Pe, ento cal kwede acala.” En ogamo ni, “An ennu, do!”
Jon 9:10 Gupenye ni, “Waŋi oyabbe niŋniŋ?”
Jon 9:11 En ogamo ni, “Dano ma gilwoŋo nyiŋe ni Yecu aye orubo ŋom, owiro ki waŋa, ci ocika ni, ‘Cit ilwok i Ciloam.’ Ci acito, alwoko, acako neno piny.”
Jon 9:12 Dok gupenye ni, “En tye kwene?” Ogamo ni, “Pe aŋeyo.” Luparicayo giyenyo kit ma gicaŋo kwede lawaŋoto
Jon 9:13 Gikelo dano ma yam waŋe oto-ni bot Luparicayo.
Jon 9:14 Nino ma Yecu orubo ŋom iye, oyabo ki waŋe, onoŋo ceŋ cabit.
Jon 9:15 Luparicayo dok gupenye ni, “Waŋi oyabbe niŋniŋ?” En odok ki gin iye ni, “En owiro ŋom i waŋa, alwoko, ci aneno piny.”
Jon 9:16 Luparicayo mogo guwaco ni, “Dano man pe oa ki bot Lubaŋa, pien pe gwoko cabit.” Ento jo mukene guwaco ni, “Dano ma labalo twero tiyo lanyut ma rom man?” Omiyo apokapoka obedo i kingi.
Jon 9:17 Dok gupenyo dano ma yam onoŋo waŋe oto-ni ni, “In itamo lok aŋo i kome, pien oyabo waŋi?” En odok iye ni, “En lanebi.”
Jon 9:1694 
Jon 9:18 Lujudaya pe guye ni en yam obedo lawaŋoto, dok ni giyabo waŋe, nio ka gilwoŋo jo ma gunywalo dano ma giyabo waŋe-ni.
Jon 9:19 Gipenyogi ni, “Man en latinwu ma wuwaco ni ginywale ma waŋe oto? Gin aŋo ma omiyo doŋ en neno piny koni?”
Jon 9:20 Jo ma gunywale gudok iye ni, “Waŋeyo ni man latinwa, dok yam ginywale ma waŋe oto.
Jon 9:21 Ento kit ma en neno ki piny koni, pe waŋeyo; dok wan pe waŋeyo ŋat ma oyabo waŋe. Wupenye; en doŋ dit, en bilok pire kene.”
Jon 9:22 Jo ma gunywale guwaco lok man pien gilworo Lujudaya, pien onoŋo Lujudaya guporo lok kacel ni, ka ŋat mo otuco ni Yecu en Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero, ci gibiryeme woko ki i kacokke.
Jon 9:23 En aye gin mumiyo jo ma gunywale guwaco ni, “En doŋ dit, wupenye.”
Jon 9:24 Pi lok man omiyo gulwoŋo dano ma yam waŋe oto tyen me aryo, guwacce ni, “Mi deyo bot Lubaŋa; wan waŋeyo ni dano man labalo.”
Jon 9:25 En ogamo ni, “Ka en labalo, pe aŋeyo; gin acel keken ma aŋeyo, en aye ni, yam waŋa oto, ento koni doŋ aneno piny.”
Jon 9:26 Gin gupenye ni, “En otimmi niŋniŋ? Oyabo waŋi niŋniŋ?”
Jon 9:27 En odokkigi iye ni, “Doŋ atittiwu con, wun pe wuwinyo. Piŋo pud wumito winyo? Wun bene wumito doko lupwonnyene, ce?”
Jon 9:28 Ci guyete kun giwaco ni, “In giri aye lapwonnyene ento wan giwa lupwonnye pa Moses.
Jon 9:29 Waŋeyo ni Lubaŋa yam oloko ki Moses, ento dano man pe waŋeyo ka ma oa iye.”
Jon 9:30 Dano ca odok iye ni, “Man lok me aura twatwal! Wun pe wuŋeyo ka ma en oa iye, kun en oyabo waŋa.
Jon 9:31 Waŋeyo ni Lubaŋa pe winyo lubalo, ento ka ŋat ma woro Lubaŋa, dok tiyo gin ma en mito, Lubaŋa winye.
Jon 9:32 Ma naka yam peya owinnye ni ŋat mo oyabo waŋ dano mo ma ginywale ma waŋe oto.
Jon 9:33 Ka kono dano man onoŋo pe oa ki bot lubaŋa, kono pe otwero timo gin mo wa acel.” woko.
Jon 9:34 Gugamo doge ni, “In ma ginywali i bal keken-ni bene ipwonywa?” Ci guryeme To-waŋ me cwiny
Jon 9:35 Yecu ka owinyo ni giryeme woko, onoŋe, openye ni, “In iye Wod pa dano?”
Jon 9:1695 
Jon 9:36 En odok iye ni, “En aŋa, ladit, wek aye en?”
Jon 9:37 Yecu owacce ni, “Doŋ inene, en aye ŋat ma tye ka lok kwedi-ni.”
Jon 9:38 En owaco ni, “Aye, Rwot”; owore.
Jon 9:39 Yecu owacce ni, “An abino i lobo ka ŋolo kop, wek jo ma pe neno piny gunen, jo ma neno gudok luwaŋoto.”
Jon 9:40 Luparicayo mogo ma cok kwede guwinyo lok man. Gupenye ni, “Wan bene waŋwa oto?”
Jon 9:41 Yecu odok iye ni, “Kono ka waŋwu oto, kono pe wutye ki bal; ento wun wuwaco ni, ‘Waneno’; pi meno balwu pud bedo gire.
Jon 10:1 “Adada awacciwu ni, ŋat ma pe donyo i dwol romo ki i doggola, ento ito ki ka mukene, dano meno lakwo ki layak;
Jon 10:2 ento ŋat ma donyo ki i doggola, en lakwat romi.
Jon 10:3 Lagwok-doggola yabbe kika, romi winyo dwane; en lwoŋo romi ki nyiŋgi, ci terogi woko.
Jon 10:4 “Ka doŋ ocwalo mere ducu woko, en woto i nyimgi, romi lube, pien giŋeyo dwane.
Jon 10:5 Pe gilubo welo, ento giriŋo woko ki bote, pien pe giŋeyo dwan welo.”
Jon 10:6 Yecu oloko ki gin carolok man, ento pe guniaŋ lok ma en otito botgi. Yecu en lakwat maber
Jon 10:7 Yecu dok owaco ki gin ni, “Adada awacciwu ni, an a doggola me romi.
Jon 10:8 Jo ducu ma yam obino okwoŋo nyima, gin lukwo dok luyak; ento romi pe owinyo dwangi.
Jon 10:9 An a doggola; ka ŋatti mo odonyo ki bota, en bibwot, bidonyo, bikatti woko, binoŋo cam.
Jon 10:10 Lakwo pe bino pi lok mo mukene, ento kono pi kwalo, pi neko ki pi tyeko; an abino wek gunoŋ kwo, gubed kwede madwoŋ.
Jon 10:11 An lakwat maber. Lakwat maber miyo kwone pi romi.
Jon 10:12 Ŋat ma tiyo pi mucara, ma pe lakwat, ma romi pe mere kikome, ka oneno orudi bino, weko romi, riŋo woko; orudi makogi, keyogi.
Jon 10:13 En riŋo woko pien tiyo pi mucara keken, pe paro pi romi.
Jon 10:14 An lakwat maber; aŋeyo romina, mera bene ŋeya,
Jon 10:1696 
Jon 10:15 macalo Won ŋeya, an bene aŋeyo Won; amiyo kwona pi romi.
Jon 10:16 Atye ki romi mukene bene, ma pe me dwol man; myero akelgi bene, gibiwinyo dwana. Kit meno bibedo lwak acel ki lakwat acel.
Jon 10:17 Gin mumiyo Won mara, pien amiyo kwona wek doki agam.
Jon 10:18 Pe tye ŋatti mo ma mayo ki bota; amiyo gira pira kena. Atye ki twer me miyo kwona, dok atye ki twer me gamo doki; alimo cik man ki bot Wora.”
Jon 10:19 Apokapoka dok obedo i kin Lujudaya pi lok man.
Jon 10:20 Jo mapol ki i kingi guwaco ni, “En tye ki cen, opo apoya; piŋo wuwinyo lokke?”
Jon 10:21 Jo mukene guwaco ni, “Lok man pe pa dano ma tye ki cen. Cen twero yabo waŋ dano ma waŋe oto?” Lujudaya gukwero Yecu
Jon 10:22 I kare meno nino madit me kwero ot pa Lubaŋa obedo i Jerucalem.
Jon 10:23 Onoŋo piny cwir, Yecu onoŋo tye ka wot i ot pa Lubaŋa, i te baraja pa Solomon.
Jon 10:24 Lujudaya gucokke, gurume i dyere, gupenye ni, “Ibimiyo wakalo akala pi kare ma rom mene? Ka in i Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero, tittiwa atir.”
Jon 10:25 Yecu odokkigi iye ni, “Atyeko tittiwu, wun pe wuye. Tic ma atiyo i nyiŋ Wora gin cadenna.
Jon 10:26 Wun pe wuye, pien pe wutye i kin romina.
Jon 10:27 Romina winyo dwana, an aŋeyogi, gin luba.
Jon 10:28 Amiyogi kwo ma pe tum; gin pe bito matwal, pe tye ŋatti mo ma bimayogi ki i ciŋa.
Jon 10:29 Wora ma omiyogi bota dit makato ducu, pe tye ŋatti mo ma twero mayogi ki i ciŋ Won.
Jon 10:30 An ki Won wan acel.”
Jon 10:31 Lujudaya dok gukwanyo got me cele.
Jon 10:32 Yecu owaccigi ni, “Atyeko nyuttiwu tic mabeco mapol ma oa ki bot Won; wumito cela ki got pi tic mene?”
Jon 10:33 Lujudaya gudokke iye ni, “Pe waceli pi tic mo maber, ento pi yeto Lubaŋa; pien in i dano adana, ikette keni ni in Lubaŋa.”
Jon 10:34 Yecu ogamo doggi ni, “Pe gicoyo i cik mewu ni, ‘An awaco ni wun lubaŋa’?
Jon 10:35 Ka en lwoŋo jo ma lok pa Lubaŋa obino botgi ni gin lubaŋa (ci ginacoya pe twero turre),
Jon 10:1697 
Jon 10:36 wun wuwaco bot ŋat ma Won olonyo, oore i lobo, ni, ‘Iyeto lubaŋa,’ pien an awaco ni, ‘An Wod pa Lubaŋa’?
Jon 10:37 Ka pe atiyo tic pa Wora, ci pe myero wuye an;
Jon 10:38 ento ka atiyo ticce, kadi bed pe wuye an gira, myero wuye tic; wek wuŋe dok wuniaŋ ni Won tye i an, ki an i Won.”
Jon 10:39 Dok gutemo make, ento en opucce woko ki i ciŋgi.
Jon 10:40 En dok ocito loka Jordan, i kabedo ka ma yam Jon okwoŋo batija dano iye, obedo kunnu.
Jon 10:41 Jo mapol gubino bote; guwaco ni, “Jon yam pe otiyo lanyut mo ento lok ducu ma Jon otito i kom dano man obedo me ada.”
Jon 10:42 Jo mapol guye en ki kunnu.
Jon 11:1 Ceŋ tye dano mo ma kome lit i Betania ma nyiŋe Lajaro, i paco pa Maliam ki laminne Marita.
Jon 11:2 En Maliam ma yam owiro Rwot ki moo, dok ojwayo tyene ki yer wiye, aye ominne kome lit-ti.
Jon 11:3 Nyimege gucwalo kwena bote kun giwaco ni, “Rwot, ŋat ma imaro kome lit.”
Jon 11:4 Ento ka Yecu owinyo, owaco ni, “Two man pe obino pi neke, ento pi kelo deyo bot Lubaŋa, wek pire gimi deyo bot Wod pa Lubaŋa.”
Jon 11:5 Yecu yam maro marita ki laminne ki Lajaro.
Jon 11:6 Ka owinyo ni kome lit, ci omedde ki ri doki nino aryo i kabedo ma yam en tye iye.
Jon 11:7 Lacen owaco bot lupwonnyene ni, “Wadoku doki i Judaya.”
Jon 11:8 Lupwonnyene gudokke iye ni, “Lapwony, Lujudaya nene gimito celi ki got, in dok idok kunnu?”
Jon 11:9 Yecu ogamo ni, “Cawa me dyeceŋ pe apar wiye aryo? Ka ŋatti mo woto i dyeceŋ, pe yokke, pien neno ceŋ me lobo man.
Jon 11:10 Ento ka ŋatti mo woto dyewor, yokke, pien ceŋ pe i iye.”
Jon 11:11 En owaco kit man, lacen owaco botgi ni, “Laremwa Lajaro doŋ onino, acito wek acicoye woko ki i waŋ nino.”
Jon 11:12 Lupwonnyene guwacce ni, “Rwot, ka onino, ci bicaŋ.”
Jon 11:13 Yecu onoŋo loko pi to mere, ento gin gitamo ni oloko pi yweyo me nino.
Jon 11:1698 
Jon 11:14 Lacen Yecu otittigi atir ni, “Lajaro doŋ oto;
Jon 11:15 cwinya yom piwu pien onoŋo pe atye kunnu, wek wun wuye. Ci doŋ wacitu bote.”
Jon 11:16 Tomaci (ma te lokke ni, Baŋi) owaco bot lupwonnye luwote ni, “Wan bene wacitu, wek watoyu kacel kwede.” Yecu en nicer ki kwo
Jon 11:17 Ka Yecu oo, onono ni Lajaro doŋ ori i lyel nino aŋwen.
Jon 11:18 Betania onoŋo cok ki Jerucalem, mito romo mairo aryo;
Jon 11:19 jo mapol i kin Lujudaya onoŋo gubino bot Marita ki Maliam pi kweyo cwinygi pi omingi.
Jon 11:20 Ka Marita owinyo ni Yecu oebino, en ocito, oromo kwede, ento Maliam odoŋ, obedo i ot.
Jon 11:21 Marita owaco bot Yecu ni, “Rwot, kono nene itye kany, kono omera pe oto.
Jon 11:22 Dok koni aŋeyo ni gin ducu ma ibilego ki bot Lubaŋa, Lubaŋa bimiyi.”
Jon 11:23 Yecu owacce ni, “Omeru bicer.”
Jon 11:24 Marita ogamo doge ni, “Aŋeyo ni en bicer i cer me nino me agik.”
Jon 11:25 Yecu owacce ki, “An nicer ki kwo; ŋat ma ye an, nadi oto, dok bikwo;
Jon 11:26 dano ducu makwo ma ye an, pe bito matwal. In iye man?”
Jon 11:27 En odok iye ni, “Iyo Rwot; doŋ aye ni in i Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero, Wod pa Lubaŋa, ma bino i lobo.” Yecu okok ki pig waŋe
Jon 11:28 Ka Marita oloko lok man, ci ocito olwoŋo laminne Maliam, okwille ni, “Lapwony tye kany, lwoŋi.”
Jon 11:29 Ka en owinyo, ci oa oyotoyot, ocito bote.
Jon 11:30 Yecu onoŋo peya oo i gaŋ-ŋu, ento onoŋo pud tye ka ma Marita oromo iye kwede.
Jon 11:31 Ka Lujudaya ma onoŋo gitye bote i ot kun gikweyo cwinye guneno Maliam oa malo oyotoyot, okato woko, gulubo kore, kun gitamo ni en cito i wi lyel ka koko kunnu.
Jon 11:32 Ka Maliam oo ka ma Yecu tye iye, ka onene, ci opoto piny ka tyene, owacce ni, “Rwot, kono nene itye kany, kono omera pe oto.”
Jon 11:33 Ka Yecu onene kun kok, ki Lujudaya ma gubino kwede bene gikok, cwinye opoto, iye owaŋ matek.
Jon 11:1699 
Jon 11:34 Openyo ni, “Wukete kwene?” Gudokke iye ni, “Rwot, bin inen.”
Jon 11:35 Yecu okok ki pig waŋe.
Jon 11:36 Omiyo Lujudaya guwaco ni, “Nen, yam mare mada.”
Jon 11:37 Ento jo mogo i kingi guwaco ni, “En ma ceŋ oyabo waŋ lawaŋoto pe twero geŋo dano man to?” Yecu ocero Lajaro
Jon 11:38 Yecu dok iye owaŋ matek, ojwat, ci obino i lyel; lyel meno onoŋo yam obedo boro got, ma giloro doge ki got.
Jon 11:39 Yecu owaco ni, “Kwanyu got woko.” Marita lamin dano ma oto-ni owaco ni, “Rwot, koni doŋ ŋwe, pien ori nino aŋwen.”
Jon 11:40 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Nakanen pe awacci ni, ka iye, ci ibineno deyo pa Lubaŋa?”
Jon 11:41 Ci gikwanyo got woko. Yecu otiŋo waŋe malo, owaco ni, “Aba, apwoyi pien doŋ iwinya.
Jon 11:42 An aŋeyo con ni iwinya kare ducu, ento awaco lok man pi lwak ma gucuŋ ka ŋeta, wek guye ni in yam iora.”
Jon 11:43 Ka doŋ owaco lok man, ci odaŋŋe ki dwan madit ni, “Lajaro, katti woko!”
Jon 11:44 En ma ceŋ oto-ni okatti woko, kun ciŋe ki tyene giriyo ki boŋo, waŋe giboyo ki kitambara. Yecu ocikogi ni, “Wugonye, wuweke ociti.” Giporo lok me neko Yecu (Matayo 26.1-5; Marako 14.1-2; Luka 22.1-2)
Jon 11:45 Jo mapol i kin Lujudaya ma gubino kacel ki Maliam, ka guneno gin ma Yecu otiyo, guye en.
Jon 11:46 Ento jo mukene i kingi gucito bot Luparicayo, gutittigi gin ma Yecu otiyo.
Jon 11:47 Omiyo ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki Luparicayo gulwoŋo Lukiko, guwaco ni, “Wabitimo gin aŋo? Pien dano man tye ka tiyo lanyut mapol.
Jon 11:48 Ka waweke kit meno, ci dano biye en, Luroma bibino, gibiketo kabedowa maleŋ ki rokwa woko.”
Jon 11:49 Ento ŋat acel i kingi, en Kayapa, ma en ajwaka madit i mwaka meno, owaco ki gin ni, “Wun pe wuŋeyo gin mo kadi matidi mo,
Jon 11:50 dok pe wutamo ni bibedo ber botwu ka dano acel oto pi lwak, wek pe gityek rokwa.”
Jon 11:51 En pe owaco lok man pire kene, ento pi bedo ajwaka madit i mwaka meno ceŋ en otito macalo lanebi ni Yecu bito pi rok meno;
Jon 11:52 pe pi rok meno keken, ento wek ocok litino pa Lubaŋa ma guket ata, gubed acel.
Jon 11:1700 
Jon 11:53 Cakke i nino meno guribo lok me neke.
Jon 11:54 Pi meno Yecu pe dok obedo ka wot ka maleŋ i kin Lujudaya, ento oa ki kunnu, ocito i lobo ma cok ki tim, i gaŋ ma gilwoŋo Epraim; obedo kunnu ki lupwonnyene.
Jon 11:55 Kato (Paska) pa Lujudaya onoŋo doŋ tye cok. Jo mapol gia ki i kin pacci gicito Jerucalem ma peya Kato (Paska) oromo, wek gilonnye kengi.
Jon 11:56 Giyenyo Yecu, kun giloko kekengi ma gicuŋ i ot pa Lubaŋa ni, “Wutamo niŋniŋ? Nyo en pe bibino pi nino madit?”
Jon 11:57 Ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa ki Luparicayo onoŋo doŋ guciko dano ni, ka ŋat mo oŋeyo ka ma en tye iye, myero onyuttigi, wek gimake.
Jon 12:1 Ka ceŋ odoŋ nino abicel me o i Kato (Paska), Yecu obino i Betania, ka ma Lajaro bedo iye, en ma ceŋ Yecu ocere ki i kin jo muto-ni.
Jon 12:2 Gitedde cam me otyeno kunnu; Marita obedo ka poko cam, Lajaro onoŋo ŋat acel i kin jo ma obedo kwede i dog cam.
Jon 12:3 Maliam okwanyo moo ma ŋwece kur me wel madwoŋ, moo nard magili, ma romo ratili acel, owiro ki tyen Yecu, ojwayo tyen Yecu ki yer wiye; ci ŋwec moo oromo i ot ducu.
Jon 12:4 Ento Juda me Keriot, ŋat acel i kin lupwonnyene, en ma bidobe, openyo ni,
Jon 12:5 “Piŋo moo man pe gicato i wel me ciliŋ miya adek, wek gimi bot lucan?”
Jon 12:6 En owaco lok man, pe ni en paro pi lucan, ento pien en yam lakwo, yam gwoko kicaa lim, ci kwanyo gin ma gibolo iye.
Jon 12:7 Yecu owaco ni, “Wuweke, wek en okan pi nino me yika.
Jon 12:8 Lucan wutye kwedgi nino ducu, ento an pe abibedo kwedwu nino ducu.” Giporo lok me neko Lajaro
Jon 12:9 Ka lwak Lujudaya madwoŋ guniaŋ ni en tye kunnu, ci gubino, pe pi Yecu keken, ento bene pi neno Lajaro ma en ocero ki i kin jo muto.
Jon 12:10 Pi meno ajwagi madito pa Lubaŋa guyubo lok me neko Lajaro bene,
Jon 12:11 pien pire Lujudaya mapol gua woko ki botgi, guye Yecu. Yecu odonyo i Jerucalem macalo kabaka (Matayo 21.1-11; Marako 11.1-11; Luka 19.28-40)
Jon 12:1701 
Jon 12:12 Orwone lwak jo mapol ma yam gubino i nino madit guwinyo ni Yecu bino i Jerucalem.
Jon 12:13 Gukwanyo jaŋ otit, gukato ka jole, kun gidaŋŋe ni, “Ojana! Lubaŋa o mi gum i kom ŋat ma bino i nyiŋ Rwot, ma en Kabaka pa Icrael!”
Jon 12:14 Yecu onoŋo latin kana, obedo i wiye, kit macalo gicoyo ni,
Jon 12:15 “Pe wulwor, wun jo Cion. Nen, kabakawu bino botwu, obedo i wi latin kana!”
Jon 12:16 Lupwonnyene pe guniaŋ man koŋ; ento ka doŋ giketo deyo i kom Yecu, ci gupo ni ceŋ gicoyo lok magi i kome, dok ni gitimo i kome.
Jon 12:17 Lwak ma yam onoŋo tye bote ka en lwoŋo Lajaro ki i lyel me cere ki i kin jo muto gutito pire.
Jon 12:18 En aye mumiyo lwak ocito ka jole, pien guwinyo ni en otiyo lanyut man.
Jon 12:19 Luparicayo guloko kekengi ni, “Doŋ wuneno ni pe wukonyo gin mo. Nen, lobo ducu doŋ owirre ka lube.” Lugrik mogo gumito neno Yecu
Jon 12:20 I kin jo ma yam gucito ka woro Lubaŋa i nino madit onoŋo jo mogo Lugrik.
Jon 12:21 Jo-nu gucito bot Pilipo me Betecaida ma tye i Galilaya, guwacce ni, “Ladit, wamito neno Yecu.”
Jon 12:22 Pilipo ocito, otito bot Anderiya; Anderiya ocito kacel ki Pilipo, gutito bot Yecu.
Jon 12:23 Yecu odokkigi iye ni, “Cawa doŋ oromo me keto deyo i kom Wod pa dano.
Jon 12:24 Adada awacciwu ni, nyig bel ka pe opoto i ŋom, oto, bedo kene; ento ka oto, ci ceko nyige mapol.
Jon 12:25 Ŋat ma maro kwo mere, birwenyone; ŋat ma kwero kwone i lobo man, bigwoko nio i kom kwo ma pe tum.
Jon 12:26 Ka ŋat mo tiyo pira, myero oluba; ka ma an abedo iye, laticca bene bibedo kunnu; ka ŋat mo tiyo pira, ci Won binyuto worone i kome. Wod pa dano myero gitiŋe malo
Jon 12:27 “Cwinya koni oŋabbe aŋaba. Abiwaco lok aŋo? Abana, lara i kom cawa man? Ento pi lok man omiyo ao i kom cawa-ni.
Jon 12:28 Abana, ket deyo i kom nyiŋi.” Dwan oa ki i polo ni, “Doŋ aketo deyo i kome, dok abiketo aye.”
Jon 12:29 Lwak ma gucuŋ ka ŋete guwinyo, ci guwaco ni, “Polo omor.” Jo mukene ni, “Lamalaika oloko kwede.”
Jon 12:30 Yecu ogamo ni, “Dwan man pe obino pira, ento piwu.
Jon 12:31 Koni gitye ka ŋolo kop i kom lobo man; koni lalo lobo man gibibole woko.
Jon 12:1702 
Jon 12:32 An ka gitiŋa malo nia i lobo, ci abipeyo dano ducu bota.”
Jon 12:33 En oloko lok man pi nyuto kit to ma ebito kwede
Jon 12:34 Lwak gugamo doge ni, “Wan wawinyo ki i cik ni Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero bedo nakanaka. In dok iwaco niŋniŋ ni Wod pa dano myero gitiŋe malo? Wod pa dano man en aŋa?”
Jon 12:35 Yecu owaccigi ni, “Ceŋ pud tye botwu pi kare manok. Wuwot ma kun wutye ki ceŋ, wek piny macol pe oŋukwu. Ŋat ma woto i piny macol pe ŋeyo ka ma ecito iye.
Jon 12:36 Ka pud wutye ki ceŋ, wuye ceŋ, wek wudok litino me ceŋ.” Lujudaya pe guye Yecu Yecu ka oloko lok man, ci opokke ki botgi, okanne woko ki botgi.
Jon 12:37 Kadi bed otiyo lanyut ma rom meno i nyimgi, pe guye en;
Jon 12:38 wek lok pa lanebi Icaya ocobbe kakare, ni, “Rwot, aŋa ma oye lok ma watito? Dok aŋa ma Rwot onyuto tekone bote?”
Jon 12:39 Man en gin mumiyo pe gitwero ye, pien Icaya dok owaco ni,
Jon 12:40 “En oneko waŋgi, omiyo cwinygi odoko nwaŋ, wek pe gunen ki waŋgi, pe bene guniaŋ ki cwinygi, wek omi pe gulokke gudwog bota acaŋgi.”
Jon 12:41 Icaya owaco lok man pien oneno deyo mere, oloko pire,
Jon 12:42 Kadi bed kit meno, jo mapol ma i kin luloc bene guye en, ento pi lworo Luparicayo omiyo pe gituco, wek pe giryemgi woko ki i kacokke;
Jon 12:43 pien gimaro deyo ma dano keto i komgi makato ma Lubaŋa miyo. Lok ma Yecu loko ŋolo kop i kom dano
Jon 12:44 Yecu odaŋŋe, owacci, “Ŋat ma ye an, pe oye an, ento oye ŋat ma oora.
Jon 12:45 Ŋat ma onena, noŋo oneno ŋat ma oora.
Jon 12:46 An abino i lobo pi bedo ceŋ me lobo, wek dano ducu ma ye an owek bedo i piny macol.
Jon 12:47 Ka dano mo winyo lokka ci pe mako, an pe aŋolo kop i kome; pien pe abino ka ŋolo kop i kom lobo, ento abino ka laro lobo.
Jon 12:48 Ŋat ma kwera, ma pe winyo lokka, tye ki ŋat ma biŋolo kop i kome; lok ma aloko biŋolo kop i kome i nino me agik.
Jon 12:49 Pien pe aloko pira kena: Won ma oora, en kikome aye omiya cik, i gin ma myero awaci ki ma myero aloki.
Jon 12:50 Aŋeyo ni cikke en kwo ma pe tum; pi meno gin ma awaco, awaco macalo Won oloko bota.”
Jon 12:1703 
Jon 13:1 Ma peya nino madit me Kato (Paska) oo, Yecu onoŋo ŋeyo ni cawane doŋ oromo me weko lobo man me dok bot Won; yam maro jone ma tye i lobo man; omarogi nio i agik,
Jon 13:2 Ka pud gitye ka camo cam me otyeno, ma doŋ Catan oketo tam i cwiny Juda wod pa Cimon me Keriot me dobe,
Jon 13:3 Yecu onoŋo ŋeyo ni Won otyeko miyo jami ducu i ciŋe, dok ni ea ki bot Lubaŋa, dok edok bot Lubaŋa.
Jon 13:4 Oa malo ki i dog cam, olunyo boŋŋine oketo teŋe, okwanyo taulo, otweyo i pyere.
Jon 13:5 Oonyo pii i becen, ci ocako lwoko tyen lupwonnye, ojwayo ki taulo ma otweyo i pyere.
Jon 13:6 Ka en oo bot Cimon Petero, Petero openye ni, “Rwot, in kulu aye ilwoko tyena?”
Jon 13:7 Yecu odokke iye ni, “In pe iŋeyo gin ma atye ka tiyo, ento ibiniaŋ lacen.”
Jon 13:8 Petero owacce ni, “In pe ibilwoko tyena matwal.” Yecu odokke iye ni, “Ka pe alwoki, noŋo ribbe pe i kinwa.”
Jon 13:9 Cimon Petero owacce ni, “Rwot, pe doŋ tyena keken, ento ciŋa ki wiya bene.”
Jon 13:10 Yecu owacce ni, “Ŋat ma doŋ olwokke, pe doŋ myero olwok kome, ento kono tyene keken, pien noŋo kome ducu leŋ. Wun wuleŋ, ento pe wun ducu.”
Jon 13:11 En onoŋo oŋeyo ŋat ma bidobe; en aye gin mumiyo en owaco ni, “Pe wun ducu wuleŋ.”
Jon 13:12 Ka doŋ olwoko tyengi, okwanyo boŋŋine, odok i kabedone, openyogi ni, “Wuniaŋ gin ma atimo i komwu?
Jon 13:13 Wulwoŋa ni Lapwony dok ni Rwot; meno ber, pien atye kit meno.
Jon 13:14 Ka an a Rwotwu ki Lapwonywu, alwoko tyenwu, wun bene myero wulwok tyenwu kekenwu;
Jon 13:15 pien an anyuttiwu lanen, wek wun bene wutim gin ma an atimo i komwu.
Jon 13:16 Adada awacciwu ni, latic pe bedo dit makato laditte, ŋat ma gioro pe dit kato ŋat ma oore.
Jon 13:17 Ka wuŋeyo lok man, ci wubibedo ki yomcwiny ka wutiyogi.
Jon 13:18 Pe aloko man i komwu ducu; aŋeyo jo ma doŋ ayero; ento wek ginacoya ocobbe kakare, ni, ‘Ŋat ma camo kwon kacel kweda otiŋo opunye i koma.’
Jon 13:19 Koni atittiwu lok man ma peya otimme, wek ka bitime, wuye ni an atye.
Jon 13:1704 
Jon 13:20 Adada awacciwu ni, ŋat ma jolo dano ma an aoro, noŋo ojolo an; ŋat ma jolo an, ojolo ŋat ma oora.” Yecu otito ni gibidobe (Matayo 26.20-25; Marako 14.17-21; Luka 22.21-23)
Jon 13:21 Ka Yecu oloko lok man, ci cwinye opoto, oloko atyer ni, “Adada awacciwu ni, ŋat acel i kinwu bidoba.”
Jon 13:22 Lupwonnye gunenne kekengi, pe guniaŋ ŋat ma en oloko i kome.
Jon 13:23 Ŋat acel i kin lupwonnye, en ma Yecu maro, onoŋo obuto cok ki kor Yecu.
Jon 13:24 Cimon Petero ogwele, owacce ni, “Tucciwa ŋat ma en oloko i kome.”
Jon 13:25 En ma ojeŋŋe i kor Yecu openye ni, “Aŋa, Rwot?”
Jon 13:26 Yecu ogamo ni, “En aye ŋat ma abigweyo dek, amiyo bote.” Ka doŋ ogweyo dek, ci omiyo bot Juda wod pa Cimon me Keriot.
Jon 13:27 Ka doŋ ogamo, ci Catan odonyo i iye. Yecu owacce ni, “Gin ma imito timo, tim oyot.”
Jon 13:28 Pe tye ŋat mo i dog cam ma oniaŋ gin ma omiyo oloko lok man bote.
Jon 13:29 Jo mogo gutamo ni, pien Juda onoŋo gwoko kicaa limgi, mumiyo Yecu owacce ni, “Wil jami ma mitte pi nino madit”; nyo ni myero omi gin mo bot lucan.
Jon 13:30 Ka en doŋ ocamo dek ma gigwene, ci okato woko cut; onoŋo piny doŋ col. Cik manyen ma Yecu omiyo
Jon 13:31 Ka doŋ okato woko, Yecu owaco ni, “Koni doŋ giketo deyo i kom Wod pa dano, dok giketo deyo i kom Lubaŋa pire.
Jon 13:32 Ka giketo deyo i kom Lubaŋa pire, Lubaŋa bene biketo deyo i kome pire kene, biketo deyo i kome oyotoyot.
Jon 13:33 Litino aduno, pud atye kwedwu pi kare manok. Wubiyenya, ento macalo ceŋ atito bot Lujudaya, kit meno atittiwu bene koni ni, ‘Ka ma acito iye, wun pe wutwero bino iye.’
Jon 13:34 Amiyowu cik manyen, ni, wumarre kekenwu; wumarre kekenwu macalo ceŋ amarowu.
Jon 13:35 Pi man dano ducu biŋeyo ni wun lupwonnyena, ka mer tye i kinwu.” Yecu otito ni Petero bikwere (Matayo 26.31-35; Marako 14.27-31; Luka 22.31-34)
Jon 13:36 Cimon Petero openye ni, “Rwot, icito kwene?” Yecu ogamo ni, “Ka ma acito iye, pe itwero luba koni, ento ibiluba lacen.”
Jon 13:37 Petero dok openye ni, “Rwot, piŋo pe atwero lubi koni? Abimiyo kwona piri.”
Jon 13:1705 
Jon 13:38 Yecu ogamo ni, “Ibimiyo kwoni pira? Adada awacci ni, twon gweno pe bikok, nio ka koŋ ikwera tyen adek.
Jon 14:1 “Cwinywu owek ŋabbe aŋaba; wuye Lubaŋa, wuye an bene.
Jon 14:2 I ot pa Abana tye iye kabedo mapol; kono pe kit meno, kono atittiwu ni acito ka yubo ki wun kabedo?
Jon 14:3 Ka acito, ayubo ki wun kabedo, dok abidwogo ka omowu bota, wek ka ma an abedo iye, wun bene wubed iye.
Jon 14:4 Ka ma an acito iye, wun wuŋeyo yone.”
Jon 14:5 Tomaci owacce ni, “Rwot, wan pe waŋeyo ka ma icito iye; watwero ŋeyo yone niŋniŋ?”
Jon 14:6 Yecu odokke iye ni, “An a yo, ki ada, ki kwo: pe tye ŋat mo ma bino bot Won, kono ki i an keken.
Jon 14:7 Kono ceŋ wuŋeya, kono wuŋeyo Wora bene; nia koni wuŋeye, doŋ wunene.”
Jon 14:8 Pilipo ogamo doge ni, “Rwot, nyuttiwa Won, ci biromowa.”
Jon 14:9 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Doŋ ari kwedwu kare malac rom man, pud peya iŋeya, Pilipo? Ŋat ma oneno an doŋ oneno Won: itwero waco niŋniŋ ni, ‘Nyuttiwa Won?’
Jon 14:10 In pe iye ni, an atye i Won, ki Won i an? Lok ma aloko botwu pe aloko pira kena, ento Won ma bedo i an aye tiyo ticce.
Jon 14:11 Wuye ni an atye i Won, ki Won i an; nyo ka pe kit meno, wuye an pi tic keken.
Jon 14:12 “Adada awacciwu ni, ŋat ma ye an, en bene bitiyo tic ma an atiyo; dok bitiyo tic madito makato man, pien acito bot Won.
Jon 14:13 Gin ducu ma wubilego i nyiŋa, abitiyone, wek giket deyo i kom Won pi Wod;
Jon 14:14 ka wubilego gin mo i nyiŋa, abitiyo. Yecu ocikke ni ebicwalo Cwiny Maleŋ
Jon 14:15 “Ka wumara, ci wubigwoko cikka.
Jon 14:16 Abilego Won, en bimiyowu Lacuŋudwar mukene ma bibedo kwedwu nakanaka,
Jon 14:17 en Cwiny me ada, ma lobo pe twero limo, pien lobo pe nene, dok pe ŋeye. Wun wuŋeye, pien en bedo kwedwu, dok bibedo i iwu.
Jon 14:18 “Pe abiwekowu macalo litino kic; abidwogo botwu.
Jon 14:19 Odoŋ kare manok, lobo pe dok binena, ento wun wubinena; pien an akwo, wun bene wubikwo.
Jon 14:1706 
Jon 14:20 I nino meno wubiŋeyo ni an atye i Won, ki wun i an, ki an i wun.
Jon 14:21 Ŋat ma tye ki cikka, ma gwokogi, en aye ŋat ma mara; ŋat ma mara Wora bimare, an bene abimare, abinyutte kena bote.”
Jon 14:22 Juda ma pe me Keriot openye ni, “Rwot, man bibedo niŋniŋ, ni ibinyutte keni botwa, ento pe bot lobo?”
Jon 14:23 Yecu odokke iye ni, “Ka ŋat mo mara, en bimako lok mera; Wora bimare, wabibino bote, wabiyubo kabedo piwa kenwa bote.
Jon 14:24 Ŋat ma pe mara, pe mako lokka; lok ma wuwinyo pe mera, ento pa Won ma ceŋ oora.
Jon 14:25 “Lok man atittiwu kun pud atye botwu.
Jon 14:26 Ento Lacuŋudwar, ma en Cwiny Maleŋ, ma Won bicwalo i nyiŋa, en bipwonyowu jami ducu, en bipoyo wiwu i lok ducu ma yam atittiwu.
Jon 14:27 Awekkiwu kuc, kuc mera amiyo botwu. Amiyowu, pe macalo lobo miyo. Cwinywu owek ŋabbe aŋaba, pe wulwor.
Jon 14:28 Doŋ wuwinyo awacciwu ni, an abicito woko, dok abidwogo botwu. Kono wumara, kono cwinywu yom, pien acito bot Won; pien Won dit kata.
Jon 14:29 Koni atittiwu lok man ma peya otimme, wek ka bitimme, wuye.
Jon 14:30 Pe dok abiduro lwak lok mapol kwedwu, pien lalo lobo man tye ka bino. En pe tye ki twer i koma;
Jon 14:31 ento man timme wek lobo oŋe ni, an amaro Won, atiyo macalo Won ocika. “Ayu, wacitu.
Jon 16:1 “Atyeko tittiwu lok man wek pe komwu oryaŋŋe.
Jon 16:2 Gibiryemowu woko ki i kacokke; kare bibino ma dano ducu ma nekowu bitamo ni etye ka tic pi Lubaŋa.
Jon 16:3 Gibitimo man i komwu pien pe giŋeyo Won, kadi an.
Jon 16:4 Ento atittiwu lok magi wek ka karegi bio, wupo ni yam atittiwu pigi. Tic pa Cwiny Maleŋ “Yam pe atito lok man botwu i acakki, pien onoŋo pud atye kwedwu.
Jon 16:5 Ento koni adok bot ŋat ma ceŋ oora. Pe tye ŋat mo i kinwu ma penya ni. ‘Icito kwene?’
Jon 16:6 Cwinywu opoŋ ki kumu pien atittiwu lok man.
Jon 16:1707 
Jon 16:7 Ento atye ka tittiwu lok ada, ni, bibedo ber botwu ka an acito; pien ka pe acito, ci Lacuŋudwar pe bibino botwu. Ento ka acito, ci abiore botwu.
Jon 16:8 En ka obino, bimiyo lobo niaŋ i kom bal, ki kit ma atir, ki ŋolo kop;
Jon 16:9 i kom bal, pien pe giye an;
Jon 16:10 i kom kit ma atir, pien adok bot Won, pe dok wubinena;
Jon 16:11 i kom ŋolo kop, pien laloc me lobo man doŋ giŋolle kop woko.
Jon 16:12 “Pud atye ki lok mapol me awaca botwu, ento pe wutwero kanyo koni.
Jon 16:13 Ka Cwiny me ada bibino, en bitelowu i ada ducu; pien en pe bilok pire kene, ento gin ducu ma en biwinyo, biwaco botwu, bitittiwu gin ma bitimme anyim.
Jon 16:14 En biketo deyo i koma, pien bikwanyo gin ma tuŋ bota, nyuttiwu.
Jon 16:15 Gin ducu ma Won tye kwede mega; en mumiyo awacciwu ni, en bikwanyo gin ma tuŋ bota, nyuttiwu. Cwercwinygi bilokke doko yomcwiny
Jon 16:16 “Odoŋ kare manok, pe dok wubinena; dok odoŋ kare manok, wubinena.”
Jon 16:17 Lupwonnyene mogo guloko kekengi ni, “Man gin aŋo ma en waco botwa, ni, ‘Odoŋ kare manok, pe wubinena, dok odoŋ kare manok, wubinena’; dok ni, ‘Pien adok bot Won’?”
Jon 16:18 Guwaco ni, “Man kono te lokke niŋo, ni, ‘Odoŋ kare manok’? Pe waniaŋ gin ma en tye ka waco.”
Jon 16:19 Yecu oŋeyo ni gin mito penye, omiyo en owaccigi ni, “Wutye ka pennye kekenwu pi lok ma nen awacciwu, ni, ‘odoŋ kare manok, pe dok wubinena; dok odoŋ kare manok, wabinena’?
Jon 16:20 Adada awacciwu ni, wubikok, wubikumo, ento lobo cwinye bibedo yom; cwinywu bicwer, ento cwercwinywu bilokke doko yomcwiny.
Jon 16:21 Ka mwoc ogoyo dako, kumo, pien cawane doŋ oromo; ento ka doŋ onywal, pe po i can pien noŋo cwinye yom pi nywalo dano i lobo.
Jon 16:22 Koni cwinywu cwer, ento abinenowu doki, ci cwinywu bibedo yom, pe tye ŋat mo ma bikwanyo yomcwinywu ki botwu.
Jon 16:23 I nino meno pe wubipenya lok mo. Adada awacciwu ni, ka wubilego gin mo bot Won, en bimiyowu i nyiŋa.
Jon 16:24 Nio koni yam pe wulego gin mo i nyiŋa; wulegi, wubinoŋo, wek wupoŋ ki yomcwiny. An doŋ aloyo lobo
Jon 16:1708 
Jon 16:25 “Lok man atittiwu i carolok; kare bibino ma pe dok abilok kwedwu i carolok, ento abitittiwu ka maleŋ lok i kom Won.
Jon 16:26 I nino meno wubilego i nyiŋa. Pe awacciwu ni abilego Won piwu,
Jon 16:27 pien Won kikome marowu, pien wun wumara, dok wuye ni an aa bot Won.
Jon 16:28 An aa bot Won, abino i lobo; doki aweko lobo, adok bot Won.”
Jon 16:29 Lupwonnyene guwaco ni, “Nen, koni iloko ka maleŋ, pe i carolok.
Jon 16:30 Koni waŋeyo ni, in iŋeyo gin ducu, dok penyi pe dok mitte; pi man waye ni ia ki bot Lubaŋa.”
Jon 16:31 Yecu odok iye ki gin ni, “Koni doŋ wuye?
Jon 16:32 Kare bibino, bene doŋ oo, ma wubiket woko, ŋat acel acel i pacone, wubiweka kena. Ento pe atye kena, pien Won tye kweda.
Jon 16:33 Awaco lok man botwu wek wubed ki kuc i an I lobo wutye ki can; ento wudi cwinywu, an doŋ aloyo lobo.”
Jon 17:1 Yecu ka oloko man, otiŋo waŋe malo i polo, owaco ni, “Abana, kare doŋ oromo; ket deyo i kom Wodi, wek Wodi bene oket deyo i komi,
Jon 17:2 macalo yam imiye twero i kom gin ducu ma tye ki kom, wek omi kwo ma pe tum bot jo ducu ma ceŋ imiyo bote.
Jon 17:3 Man en kwo ma pe tum, ni giŋe in Lubaŋa acel me ada, ki Yecu Kricito ma yam ioro.
Jon 17:4 Doŋ aketo deyo i komi i lobo, kun acobo tic ma ceŋ imiya me atiya.
Jon 17:5 Doŋ koni, Abana, ket deyo i koma i nyimi, ki deyo ma yam abedo kwede i nyimi ma peya iketo lobo.
Jon 17:6 “Atyeko nyuto nyiŋi bot jo ma ceŋ imiya ki i lobo. Gin ceŋ meri, in imiyogi bota, gin gugwoko lokki.
Jon 17:7 Koni giŋeyo ni jami ducu ma imiya oa ki boti;
Jon 17:8 pien doŋ amiyogi lok ma ceŋ imiya, gin doŋ gujolo, giŋeyo atikatika ni an aa ki boti; dok giye ni in iora.
Jon 17:9 Alego pi gin; pe alego pi lobo, ento pi jo ma ceŋ imiya, pien gin meri.
Jon 17:10 Jamina ducu meri, ki meri ducu mera, alimo deyo pigi.
Jon 17:11 An pe dok abedo i lobo, ento gin gitye i lobo, an abino boti. Won Maleŋ, gwokgi i nyiŋi ma con imiya, wek gibed acel macalo wan acel.
Jon 17:1709 
Jon 17:12 Ka ceŋ atye kwedgi kacel, agwokogi i nyiŋi ma imiya; akurogi, pe tye mo ma orwenyo ki i kingi, kono dano ma myero orweny, wek ginacoya ocobbe kakare.
Jon 17:13 Ento koni abino boti; lok man aloko i lobo, wek gubed ki yomcwiny mera, gupoŋ kwede.
Jon 17:14 Atyeko miyogi lok meri; ci lobo okwerogi, pien gin pe jo me lobo, macalo an pe a dano me lobo.
Jon 17:15 Pe alego ni myero ikwanygi woko ki i lobo, ento ni igwokgi ki i kom gin marac.
